verse_text: Ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-witu oosoo ka David-maꞌyoona suaketu, tamme Jew numu oꞌnosoo ekow pooha natuukwepu menoꞌo oo-toogoo manekena. Soo Jesus togesapa Jew numu, oosoo tuwazoo Abraham-maꞌyoona suaketu, noꞌoko tamme Jew numu-waꞌne.
Soo Abraham tooa Isaac mee naneꞌa. Soo Isaac tooa Jacob mee naneꞌa. Soo Jacob tooa Judah mee naneꞌa. Soo Judah ewow wangaꞌamu gaꞌyoo.
Judah waahoo nanaꞌatse doodooamu-gaꞌyoo Perez-no Zerah mee nananeadu. Mu pea uga Judah kunoopea Tamar mee naneadu. Soo Perez tooa Ram mee naneꞌa.
Soo Ram tooa Amminadab mee naneꞌa. Soo Amminadab tooa Nahshon mee naneꞌa. Soo Nahshon tooa Salmon mee naneꞌa.
Mu Salmon noko Rahab tooa Boaz mee naneꞌa. Soo Boaz yise wawaꞌa nodukwadoo, Ruth mee naneadu, mu tooa Obed mee naneꞌa. Soo Obed tooa Jesse mee naneꞌa.
Soo Jesse tooa David mee naneadu, ka mu Jew numu-kooba katudu. Soo David kummaꞌakoosoo nana Uriah mee naneadu nodukwa makoo Solomon mee naneadu tooa-gaꞌyoo.
Soo Solomon tooa Rehoboam mee naneꞌa. Soo Rehoboam tooa Abijah mee naneꞌa. Soo Abijah tooa Asa mee naneꞌa.
Soo Asa tooa Jehoshaphat mee naneꞌa. Soo Jehoshaphat tooa Joram mee naneꞌa. Soo Joram tooa Uzziah mee naneꞌa.
Soo Uzziah tooa Jotham mee naneꞌa. Soo Jotham tooa Ahaz mee naneꞌa. Soo Ahaz tooa Hezekiah mee naneꞌa.
Soo Hezekiah tooa Manasseh mee naneꞌa. Soo Manasseh tooa Amon mee naneꞌa. Soo Amon tooa Josiah mee naneꞌa.
Soo Josiah tooa Jechoniah mee naneꞌa. Oꞌno mu Jew numu wohomu Babylon numu mee nananeadu, ka mu Jew numu pummesoo tubewa-witoo mahuka, mu nedyaawekwuse.
Soo Jechoniah tooa Shealtiel mee naneꞌa. Soo Shealtiel tooa Zerubbabel mee naneꞌa.
Soo Zerubbabel tooa Abiud mee naneꞌa. Soo Abiud tooa Eliakim mee naneꞌa. Soo Eliakim tooa Azor mee naneꞌa.
Soo Azor tooa Zadok mee naneꞌa. Soo Zadok tooa Achim mee naneꞌa. Soo Achim tooa Eliud mee naneꞌa.
Soo Eliud tooa Eleazar mee naneꞌa. Soo Eleazar tooa Matthan mee naneꞌa. Soo Matthan tooa Jacob mee naneꞌa.
Soo Jacob tooa Joseph mee naneꞌa, oo nodukwa Mary. Soo Mary yise ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus dooaꞌadoo.
Tamme oo sopedakwatoo soo Jesus, Te Pabeꞌe David-maꞌyoo suaketu. Ooonneꞌyoona tamme oo sopedakwatoo soo Jesus Te Pabeꞌe.

Ka Te Pabeꞌe yaaꞌa teepu-koobatoo oo nadooaꞌadoopu-witu nu mu tuukwekwu. Soo Mary ka Joseph koomadookwuse yise Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi koheahoo. Pana soo Joseph gi oo nakasopedakwatoo ka Mary Te Naa Pooha-toohakwi oo kooheana gi oo nodukwadookwu mee soonamme. Soo Joseph besa sootumatuguna gi numu tuukweꞌe ka Mary kohea-kwitu, gi oo soomanasookwikuna.
Oetu ewa soohanena, soo Joseph yise mee nose. Soo Te Naa tummatziwabe toha kasa-gaꞌyoo meeoo oo tuukwe,
Ka Mary saaꞌa tooa-doose, u sakwa yise Jesus mee oo nea, Numu Magwetzoidu, mee naꞌunnedu. Oosoo Jesus pumme nanumu, pumme nakaꞌoedyukudu magwetzoikwudu, ka suda mu tumatuguna mu nemawunikukwu.”
Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa yadooawabe ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu waha. Menoꞌo yise toge oo-toogoosoo manepetu. Soo Te Naa yadooawabe mee unnepu,
“Soo tsuadumu gisoo nana-no suda manedu saaꞌa kohease, naatse dooaꞌadoodooa. Oosoo naatse Emmanuel mee naneadooa, Soo Te Naa tamme-no,ꞌ mee naꞌunnedu.”
Soo Joseph yise saaꞌa ka Mary nodukwadoo, ka Te Naa tummatzidu toha kasa-gakoo pumme netamma-kwaꞌne.
Pana soo Joseph gi ka Mary matzama, saaꞌa oo tooaꞌadoose ka oongaꞌa Jesus mee oo nea.

Ka Jesus ka Bethlehem mee naneadu-kwi nadooaꞌadoose, saaꞌa susumudu numu taba tsebooena-kwana kemmadu, ka mu paatoozooba-witu sopedakwadoodu ka mu Jew numu-kooba katudu, Herod mee naneadu-baa petuse oo tubenga,

“Hano soo tuhaꞌyoo nadooaꞌadoopu ka mu Jew numu-kooba katukwudu? Numme ka paatusooba poonne paba patakwetseapunne ka tsebooegese, ka oo nawuena ne tuukwedu. Yow numme petuhoo oo-matoo nanesootuhigena.”
Soo Herod oo nakasutakuoo.
Soo Herod yise ka mu Jew numu nanesootuhidu moohedu nanano sumu tuungu, yise mu tubengu, “Hanotoo yise soo Mu Pabeꞌe nawuekwu?”
Umu yise meeoo, “Oona ka Bethlehem mee naneadu-kwitoo ka yaa teepu Judea mee naneadu-koobatoo nawue, mu nanatugwengapu-waꞌnesoo. Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa yadooawabe tubotuguna Te Naa tunemamakwupu,
‘Soo Bethlehem mee naneadu ka teepu Judah-koobatu unu nanenagapunnedu. Soo numu ka nuga Jew nanumu moohekwudu oonona saaꞌa kemmadooa,’ mee soo Te Naa mooasoo unnepu-gaꞌyoo.”

Soo Herod yise ka pumme tummatzidu meeoo watze netamma, “Ka mu numu mu paatoozooba-witu sopedakwadoodu numu nu-matusoo taya.” Soo Herod yise meeoo mu tubenga, “Hannanoꞌo soo paatoozooba mu poonnepu tsebooege?” Umu ka ooka tu pudu poonne-kwitu oo tuukweꞌe.
Soo Herod yise meeoo mu netamma, “Soo tuhaꞌyoo Bethlehem-wi mee nu oo naka. Mu sakwa mease, ka oo mayudooase, e tuukwe, oꞌno nu punnoꞌo oo-matoo nanesootuhikwu,” meeꞌe soo Herod mu esayikute.
Umu paatoozooba sopedakwadoodu yise Bethlehem-witoo mease ka paatoozooba poonnesoo.
Umu tubetse besa sokwama ka paatoozooba poonnesesoo oo nageka, umu paatoozooba sopedakwadoodu yise ka nobe ka tuhaꞌyoo pukwiꞌyoona-wi petuga.

Umu paatoozooba sopedakwadoodu yise ka nobe-kwi tzoonooakase, ka tuhaꞌakoo poonne, ka oo pea Mary mee naneadu noko, umu oo-matoo nanesootuhi ooka tu hee-matu oo heme: unu nanenagadu oa tupe, ka besa kookwanadu, ka unu nanenakudu sanape numu yaꞌena punoko natuguyina tuwazoo.
Ka mu nose-kwi umu paatoozooba sopedakwadoodu mee natuuya tuukwe, “Gi ka Herod-matoosoo kodyukapana. Atatamesoo nobe-kwitoo kodyuka.”

Ka mu paatoozooba-witu sopedakwatoodu numu kodyukase, soo Joseph mee nose. Ka oo nose-kwi, soo Te Naa tummatzidu, toha kasa-gaꞌyoo oo-baa petuse mee yise ka Joseph netamma, “Yotsese, namamea ka teepu Egypt mee naneadu-kwitoo, ka Jesus noko Mary hanega. Osoo tutooepunne, nu saaꞌa mu tuukwedooa, oꞌno saaꞌa yise mu kodyudooa. Soo Herod ka Jesus watekwu ka Jesus batsakwuse.”
Soo Joseph yise ka tuponnese ka tu nosepu mayoho ka Egypt-witoo togaba-ma namamea, tu nodukwa noko tu tooaꞌa nobeahooka.
Umu ooosapa Egypt-wi ka Herod numu-kooba oo katu. Esoo namanedu Te Naa oꞌnosoo tunemamakwupu oo yadooawabe tubona meeoo, “Nu ka e dooa Egypt-wikoo bihookwu.”

Soo Herod unutse sutaꞌa ka mu numu ka paatoozooba-witu sopedakwatoodu gi pu-baa kodyu petugasoo, “Umuga sumuna e nemooaga,” mee soonamme. “Oosoo mu Pabeꞌe sumuna saaꞌa e kapikoo e tatsatsebooadooa,” mee soonammena. Oꞌno yise ka mu tu tutukwutumawabe noꞌoko nanaꞌatse, waha tomodu-toohatu dooake, mu oongaꞌa nokosoo ka Bethlehem-witu goe tuungu umu oo-tzageꞌe-kwitu tuwow. Menoꞌo ka soo tuhaꞌyoo oonanoꞌo tomopu mee oo sooyugwena ka umu paatoozooba-witu sopedakwadoodu pumme tuukwe-makoo.
Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa yadooawabe Jeremiah mee naneadu ekow botugu menoꞌo yise oo-toogoo manepetu.
“Ka mu Jew numu Ramah mee naneadu tubewa-gapunnedu-kwitu ewaꞌyoo numu tubetse unu sakwaꞌe. Umu tu doodooamu-kooba sakwina gi pumme netusoonaku-waꞌne ka tu doodooamu tuipu.”

Ka saaꞌa soo Herod yise yaꞌe. Ka oo yaꞌese, soo Joseph nosesoo tuwazoo. Soo Te Naa tummatzidu, toha kasa-gaꞌyoo oo tuukweꞌe ka oo nose-kwikoo punowsoo noꞌyoona kodyuka ka mu Jew nanumu tubewa-witoosoo, ka mu Jesus-noko Mary-nosoo.
Umu oo tooꞌe nebatsayagadu mooasoo tuipu. Ka kodyukamena,

soo Joseph meeoo tunaka soo Herod tooa Archelaeus mee naneadu ka tu naa kapi manese ka mu Jew numu-kooba menoꞌo katudu, ka Judea mee naneadu teepu-kooba. Ka meeow tunakase oto tu meakwu-ma suaꞌe. Soo oo nosepu punnoꞌo gi oonow mu mea tuungu. Ooonneꞌyoona umu ka Nazareth mee naneadu ka teepu Galilee mee naneadu-kwi petuga.
Ka oꞌnosoo Te Naa yadooawabe unne-kwaꞌnesoo manekena soo Te Pabeꞌe-witu. Meeꞌe soo Te Naa yadooawabe unnepu, “Oosoo ka Nazareth mee naneadu-wiꞌyoo kemmakwu.”
Ka saaꞌa sumuꞌyoo nana John mee naneadu mu numu baa-wi matzakadyakwe oona gi hemma nadukadu pukwi naa-wiꞌyoona. Soo John mu numu pu-baa petudu mee netammayakwe.
“E nakapunne, mu sakwa ka suda mu tumatuguna maꞌwu, pudusoo soo Te Naa noꞌoko numu nemadabuekwu.”

Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa yadooawabe Isaiah ka John gisoo nadooaꞌadoo oo manekwuna, mee botugupu “Mana ka hemma nadukadu gi naa-kwiꞌyoona sumuꞌyoo nana ka Te Naa pooha-toohakwi numu tunesootabuekwu, ‘E nananumu mu sakwa muusoo nuummabetseapunne ka Te Pabeꞌe pudusoo petukwunoto. Mu sakwa kaaheno tusooyugwe, oꞌno mu besa oo nakabetseanokwu.’ “
Soo John puhu nagwese-kwi namasooana mokobu nateꞌa. Kua noko nota peha tukana oo-ma naakugwetzoinumme.
Ewaꞌyoo numu tooe hanotu tooe
Umu ka suda tu tumatugupu wahana yise mu nemawunidyakwe ka kaaheno meadabekwu mee tusooyugwese. Soo John yise ka Jordan mee naneadu hoo-kwi mu matzakadyakwe.

Mu Sadducee-no Pharisee mee nananeadu numu nanesootuhi moohedu tooe gi tunakaꞌoedyukupana ka John-baa petugase, umu punnoꞌo baa-wi oo namatzaka tuungu, soo John yise mee mu netamma, “Mu unu etzaꞌa. Saaꞌa soo sutaꞌyoo mu-matoosoo kodyukwu. Mu baa-wi mumme e matzaka tuungu pana mu gi ka mu tumaꞌemukwapu nematzagakwunaꞌe.
Mu mooeꞌugasoo sakwa ka suta mu manena tubetse maꞌwukase ka besa tamme manese, oꞌno sakwa yise nu baa-wi mu matzaka.
Gi besa nasooyugwena mee unnegonnopana, ‘Numme yaahoo Te Naa doodooamu numme ka Jew numuna.’ Mu tookwa gi oo nakasopedakwadoo soo Te Naa tooe hownnekoo tooe tu doodooamu mu mesoo mayugwe.
Mu sakwa besa tumatugu. Mu ka ooosapa gi besa tumatuguna, mu kadoo namayugwekwusoo tooe haga tooe gi he-toogoo besaꞌyoo natunikwu.

Nu ka baa-wi mu matzakase, mu ka sutakoo podo mu meana maꞌwukase, ka besaꞌhoo podo meadabekwu. Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe pudusoo petukwu nuga oooonakwatusoo unu pooha-gaꞌyoo, nuga oooonakwa besaꞌyoo tuwazoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-matu-ma mu sootuhikwu, oosoo besa, gi totsabu mu mayugwekwu.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe petuse ka mu numu yaa teepu-koobatu nemadabuedooa ka mu bebesow ka mu suta-nagakoo tzobadooa. Ka pepesahoo numu yise tu nobe-kwi nabaaꞌyookukwu. Mu sutaꞌyoo numu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka tubetse gi tokedu goso-witoo namaꞌanakwunikwu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe oona Galilee mee naneadu-wiꞌyoona kemmase oona ka Jordan hooda-kwi ka John-baa petuga.
Yise ka John baa-wi namatzaka tuungu. Soo John yise meeoo oo netamma, “How yise u nuga oooonakwasoo besaꞌyoo pana nuka baa-wi namatzaka tuungu?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe oo nanekwegea, “U sakwa nuka baa-wi matzaka, noꞌoko ka Te Naa unnepu mayohona.”
Soo John yise ka Te Pabeꞌe baa-wi matzaka. Ka Te Pabeꞌe batzebuegena soo Te Naa Besa Pooha paꞌanakwana kweꞌnaꞌa tubongo yotse punoonooeke-kwaꞌne manegese oonaga mani petu.
Soo Te Naa paꞌanakwana yadooase mee unne, “Esoo Nuga Besa Tooa, nu-kwaꞌneꞌyoosoo. Nu unu a soopedyana besa ma-matoo soonamme.”
Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha ka Te Pabeꞌe sukwe oona numu-wanatoo taya oo nanesootuhi tuunguna.
Soo Sutaꞌyoo yise suda oo tooꞌe nemadunagaꞌa. Watsu mano (40) tooi petuga nanesootuhina gi hemma tukana.

Ka saaꞌa yise soo Sutaꞌyoo ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo tooꞌe netamma, “U sakwa nasootzaꞌme ka Numu Manumudoopu Tooaꞌana. U sakwa ka eka tupe tukaba mayugwese ka tsuayina a tuka.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe gi oo soonakabetseana, meeoo oo sukwe netamma,
“Soo E Naa meeoo unnepu, ‘Soo tukapu suuꞌmu nadukana gi numu magwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo. Ka Te Naa unnepu suuꞌmu nakabetseana mu numu namagwetzoikwu.’ “
Soo Sutaꞌyoo yise ka Te Pabeꞌe oona Jerusalem-witoo pabow nobe, pukwi mu numu nanesootuhi-kwitoo bikea. Paꞌatseꞌe ka pabow nanesootuhi nobe-kooba oo bi petugase

yise meeoo oo netamma, “U sakwa nanasookwugi manena ma-koobaꞌyoona nadawunihoo u ka Numu Manumudoopu Naa Dooa mee unnena. U gi namaniyaha-waꞌneꞌyoo ka u Naa u-kooba tueyaꞌe. ‘Soo U Naa ume pumme tummatzidu toha kakasa-gakoo u-kooba tueyaꞌe tuungukwu, umu paꞌakoosoo u-gwuuhookwu.’ “

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo oo netamma, “Nu gi ume unnena nakabetsea-waꞌneꞌyoo, soo Te Naa mooasoo meeoo unnepu, ‘Tamme sakwa gi ka Te Naa tooe hownnekoo tooe mapoonnepana, haꞌoo sakwa oosoo mani mee sokwamadu-kwaꞌne.’ “

Soo Sutaꞌyoo yise tuwazoo oo bi ka oona paꞌa kiba-matoo petugase, mu noꞌobatusoo nanaꞌatakoosoo numu ka teepu-koobatu oo tzapoonnekute. Soo Sutaꞌyoo yise meeoo tuwazoo ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Oꞌnosoo nuka mu numu yaa teepu-koobatu moohe tuungu, umu yise noꞌyoona e nakabetseakwu. U ka nu-matoo nanesootuhina, nu ume mu nakabetsea tuungukwu.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka sutakoo meeoo netamma, “Nu gi u-matoo nanesootuhi-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa mee mooasoo tubotugupu, ‘Tamme sakwa ka Te Naa-matoo suuꞌmu nanesootuhi. Tamme sakwa ookow suuꞌmu nakabetsea.’ “
Soo Sutaꞌyoo yise ka Te Pabeꞌe tooꞌe nepetukuse oo soomabanase, oo-baaꞌyoo meahoo. Yise Te Naa tutummatziwabe, mu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo oo-baa wupetuhoose, ka Te Pabeꞌe tummatzi.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka John nakwutamase oo nakase, ka teepu Galilee-witoo kodyuka. Ka Nazareth-wi nobe-ga pana ka Capernaum mee naneadu-witoo nowuꞌa. Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa yadooawabe Isaiah mee naneadu ka Te Pabeꞌe manekwuna mee botugupu. “Mu numu ka Capernaum-wi

Yaa manakwana soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu numu ka Te Naa-witu nanesootuhi tunedyooekooha, mee yise mu netamma, “Mu sakwa ka sutakoo gi nakabetseapana, ka besaꞌhoo podo meadabe, oꞌno soo Te Naa noꞌoko pumme nakaꞌoedyukudu sootuhikwu.”
Wahaꞌyoo nawangaꞌa pakwegana, mu Andrew-no Simon Peter mee nananeadu. Umu ka puma tu tuukwina ka banunadu-witoo wukwazuyakwe, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka pakumi meana mu poonnese meeoo mu netamma,
“Mu sakwa nu-no memease e tummatzimo. Nu mu tunedyooena mu e nakatzimokwu, oꞌno mu numu nu-kwitu nakaꞌoedyukukwu.”
Umu nawangaꞌa yise ka puma tu tuukwina maꞌwuoogase yaa manakwana ka Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu manegakwu.

Umu-tzageꞌe wahaꞌyoo nawangaꞌa James-no John ka tu naa Zebedee mee naneadu-no punnoꞌo oona sake-wiꞌyoona ka puma tu tuukwina mabetsabedyakwe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka banunadu kumi meadabena mu poonnegase mu nawangaꞌa bi.
Umu yise ka tu sake noko tu naa maꞌwukase ka Te Pabeꞌe-no memeahoo.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise noꞌoko ka teepu Galilee mee naneadu-koobaꞌyoona noꞌoko mu tuoegoedu mabesakumena, yise mu nanesootuhi-wiꞌyoona tuwow mu numu tunedyooemena mee mu netamma, “Mu sakwa ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyuku, pudusoo soo Te Naa puusoo besa mu sootuhikwu.”

Mana tooe hano tooe numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu naka, ka teepu Syria mee naneadu-witoo tooe. Mu numu tuoegoedu hane petudyakwe, tsoapayidu, yaꞌehookayidu, gi yuyutsunga manepu numu tuwazoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu mabesakuyakwe.

Ewaꞌyoo numu yise oo nakatzipetu. Mana ka teepu Galilee-witu yise tuwazoo mana teepu Sumu Mano Nogadu-witu, Judea mee naneadu, yise ka Jerusalem mee naneadu-kwitu, ka hooodu Jordan mee naneadu ooenapatu numu tuwazoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petudyakwe.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ewahoo numu pu-baa petudyidu poonne ka nanaewasoo mu manemena. Ka oonahoo poꞌwoa-matoo mease, o katuse numme pumme nakatzimodu
putzageꞌe petuse ewow numu pumme nakapunne soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu numu nanesootuhi tunedyooena mee unakwe,
“Tamme ka Te Naa sookwina oo sopedakwadoona tamme besakoo nasootuhikwu. Soo Te Naa puusoo te nemadunagakwu.
Tamme ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona suda te tumatuguna nemowunise, oꞌno suuꞌmu besa nasootuhikwu. Soo Te Naa besa te masokwamakukwu.
Tamme besaꞌyoona ka gi nidyupuna, tamme nasootuhikwu. Saaꞌa soo Te Naa ka teepu besasoo matabuese, tamme gi moobegwaga oo-koobakwi gwetzoimokwu.
Tamme nasootuhikwu ka Te Naa tubetse nakaꞌoedyukuna. Soo Te Naa oe te tummatzikwu, ka besa pumme te nakabetseꞌa.
Tamme ka kukummaꞌakoosoo numu tutuha sooyugwena besa nasootuhikwu. Soo Te Naa punnoꞌo tamme tutuha sooyugwekwu.
Ka Te Naa-tamme besa tusooyugwena tamme nasootuhikwu. Oꞌno tamme ka Te Naa sopedakwadookwu.
Ka nanakukummaꞌakoosoo numu nanapuaꞌa neyugwena, tamme nasootuhikwu. Oꞌno tamme Te Naa-waꞌneꞌyookwu.
Ka Te Naa te nakabetseꞌa mu numu ka suda te matuguna, tamme nasootuhikwu. Oꞌno soo Te Naa noꞌoko nasootuhipu tamme tu tuukwegapu ma te sootuhikwu.
Mu ka mu numu mumme gi petzabena gi too mu-no mu napuaꞌa, nanasuda nu-koobatoo esayina, mumme suda mu netamma sapa, gi suda sokwamapana, mu besa nasootuhikwu.
Mu sakwa besa sokwama soo Te Naa saaꞌa ka tu yadooawabe-kwaꞌne mu sootuhidooa, ka pu-baa mu petugase. Mu numu oꞌnosoo manakwana ooosapa ka Te Naa yadooawabe suda matugu.

Soo ongabe puu ka tukapu besa makamakute, tamme tutunakaꞌoedyukudu mu numu besa-tamme moohekwu. Soo ongabe ka tu kamana kadooꞌookoo gi he-toogoo besaꞌyoo, oosoo yise nahanekwunikwu. Ooosoo tamme punnoꞌo ka gi mu numu tummatzina ka gi kamadu ongabe-kwaꞌne tamme gi he-toogoo besaꞌyoo.
Tamme sakwa numu kootabuakudu-kwaꞌne manepunne. Soo kootabuadu ka giba-maꞌyoona puu kwingaꞌyoopana mesoo napoonne.
Soo tukootabuakunoo ka paaꞌaꞌyoona kwingaꞌa-kwitoo mesoo kootabuakute. Soo numu nobe-kwitu puu ka kootabuapunnena numu noꞌoko hemma mesoo poonne. Gi soo numu ka tukootabuakunoo-kooba hemma hane.
Yooonnekoo ewaꞌyoo numu ka besa manena, ka tukootabuakunoo-kwaꞌnesoo, oꞌno yise mu numu ka Te Naa netubetseꞌyikwu.
‘Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka te mooa tumayohope gi he-toogoo mayugwe,’ mee sumuna naꞌunnekwu. Pana soo Te Naa noꞌoko eka nabodu togesapa e mayugwe tuungu, gi kadooꞌoo mu nemayugwe.
Nu mu tuukwekwu, soo Moses ka oꞌnosoo umu te nanamooatupu oo tuukwepu noꞌyoona kaaheno manekekwu. Oosoo gi atasoo mane-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Soo tooe haga tooe gi ka a nabotuguna nakabetseadu, tamme tu netammana, yise ka mu numu gi ooka nakabetsea tuunguna oosoo gi hee manekwu, ka Te Naa tamme oo nemadabue-wi oo manepetuse.
Tamme sakwa unu tunakabetsea, ka umu nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu, ka mu nanesootuhidu-nagatu Pharisee mee nananeadu oooonakwasoo. Oꞌno yise soo Te Naa te sootuhikwu.
Umu te nanamooatupu mee te tuukwedu, ‘Tamme ka numu batsase, soo numu nehanedu sakwa punnoꞌo te mesoo batsa.’
Pana nu mu tuukwekwu tamme ka te puaꞌa sutakuna tooetoo oo nesootzemana, te tumaꞌemukwana saaꞌa tamme matusoo kodyukwu.
Tamme mooasoo yaa ka pabatsekoo nanesootuhi nobe-kwi petugonnose, ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhikwu. Tamme yise ka suda te puaꞌa te matuguna soomayuhoose
besasoo ka te puaꞌa-no hemma nemadabuese, yise o-no ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhikwu. Oꞌno yise tamme besa nasootuhikwu.

Tamme ka numu sudu matuguna soo numu ka numu nehanedu-kobenatoo te bikwuse tamme sakwa oo puaꞌadoo togesoo meadabena. ‘Ta sakwa oo soomuꞌwa,’ mee oo netamma. Tamme ka gi oo puaꞌagana, ka tunehanepe-wi petugase oosoo tamme-witu suda ka numu nehanedu-kobenaꞌyoona te nemadabuekwu. Soo numu nehanedu yise ka mu tukwutumadu tamme wutuma tuungukwu.
Tamme yise nakwutumatugukwu, ka tamme tu tunekwina te mamakwu-kwitootooe, meeꞌe nu mu tuukwe.
Umu te nanamooatupu putoogoo tumayoho meana oꞌnosoo mee te tunetammakupu, ‘ Tamme sakwa gi nanakukummaꞌa-nosoo nanapotammapana.’
Nu mu tuukwekwu tamme sakwa gi te pupuaꞌa nodukwa-no tooe how tooe manepana, tamme tookwa mooasoo te soonamme-kwi suda tusooyugwe ka oo manena.

Nu sakwa puu ka tumadinakwatu e pooe tzatsebooase oo takwasukwuni ka ookahoo suda nuka mayugwe. Tooe nu sumusoo pooe-gana natukuse sapa gi haꞌoo, oꞌno gi noꞌyoona e tookoo ka nidu-kwitoo natzakwunikwu,” meeꞌe soo Jesus e-makoo te tunenagakute.
“Nu sakwa ka tumadinakwatu e mi tsekaꞌase oo wuni ka suda oo-ma tumatuguna. Tooe nu ka sumusoo mi-gapana gi haꞌoo ka sutakoo e mi kadooꞌoo mayugwese gi noꞌyoona e tookoo natunikwu.
Soo te tumayohope meeoo, ‘Tamme sakwa ka nupoonnekwunikwuse oo botuguna oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo tamme ka te nodukwa-no napoonnekwunikwuse.’

Pana nu mu tuukwekwu tamme sakwa ka nodukwadoose gi te nodukwa poonnekwunipana, tamme tumaꞌemukwa ka oo poonnekwunise. Soo te nodukwa ka kummaꞌakoosoo pootammana, tamme oo mesoo poonnekwuni. Tamme sakwa gi a napoonnekwunina mogoꞌne nodukwadoopana.
Umu te nanamooatupu mee tuwazoo te tunedyooꞌe, ‘Tamme sakwa ka Te Naa-makoo meesoo tunedyahana, ka namano hayu te unnese, tamme oo-toogoo manekwu.’

Ka oo wahana, kaaheno oo waha, meeꞌe nu mu netamma, oꞌno mu numu besa mu sooyugwe. Yaatusoo hemma mamanepunne-makoo gi tunedyahapana. Yise gi too Te Naa manepunne-makoo tunedyahapana. Gi too tamme tammesoo nanedyahapana. Noꞌokoo hemma, soo Te Naa matabuepu, noꞌyoona hee oo-tooha manepunne.

Umu te nanamooatupu ooosapa mee te tunedyooedu, ‘Soo tooe haga tooe ka tu puaꞌa pooe tsetzatseboogese, oogow pooe sakwa punnoꞌo natsetzatsebooge. Ka e tamma nadosawekuse, oogow tamma sakwa punnoꞌo nadosaweku.’

Nu mu tuukwekwu tooe suda tamme tu matugu sapa, tamme sakwa gi umu-no nagoepana. Ka sumunakwatu te soba namatakeꞌehoose tamme sakwa oo sukwe tutzomunaku. Oꞌno oosoo ka sumunakwatu matakeꞌehookwu tuwazoo.
Tamme sakwa ka gi hownnekoo mu numu tumanagakuna, oosoo ka te kwasu gwuuse sapa, gi hownneꞌyoo.
Ka tooe haga tooe hemma tamme mu tzagwuhu tuungu-tzageꞌetoo sapa, tamme sakwa kwingaꞌatoosoo ooka oo tzagwuhukuka.
Ka mu numu hemma tamme mu natuungu, tamme sakwa mu gea.
Mu ka sumuna o nakadu ka oꞌnosoo mu numu meeoo unegayakwe, ‘Tamme sakwa te pupuaꞌamu soobedyana ka tamme wohonedu gi petzape.’
Pana nu mu tuukwekwu tamme sakwa ka tamme wohonedu soobedya, tooꞌe gi tamme mu soobedya sapa. Ka tamme mu nekusedya, tamme sakwa nanesootuhi besow umutoo nekwina.
Oꞌno tamme ka Te Naa-waꞌnesoo ka noꞌoko numu, tooe mu sutakoo sapa nanakwaꞌnesoo mu matugu. Soo Te Naa ka taba umu-koobatoo tsebooedu madaꞌe, ka powmabu tuwazoo.
Soo Te Naa gi besa te sootuhi-waꞌneꞌyoo ka mu numu tamme-too besaꞌhoo suuꞌmu besa nanamatukuna nanasoobedya. Mu sutaꞌyoo numu punnoꞌo ka besa tu namatuguna soobedya.
Tamme gi besa manakwe ka tamme pupuaꞌamu suuꞌmu besa yadooena. Mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu puu besa mesoo nanapuaꞌamu-gaꞌyoo.
Tamme sakwa ka Te Naa, te paꞌanakwatu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo, noꞌobatusoo numu besa soobedya.
Tamme sakwa gi naanamanepana, gi ooosapa numu poonnena suuꞌmu besa numu matugupana. Soo Te Naa te paꞌanakwatu, besa te sootuhikwu ka gi nasootzaꞌmena ooosapa besa te manakwe.

Ka mu tutuha manedu te maka-kwaꞌne, tamme sakwa gi numu tuukwepana ka tooe hanoꞌyoona tooe oo manekwuse. Umu nanetzamedu numu ka Te Naa nakabetseꞌa mee naneꞌyugwedu suuꞌmu, oo manakwe. Umu ka mu tutuha manedu numu maka nobe-kobenaꞌyoona, tooetoo nanesootuhi nobe-kwiꞌyoona mu numu maka, oꞌno mu numu mu poonnekwu. Mu numu mooasoo meeoo mu tuukwe, ‘Soo Te Naa mu sootubetseaꞌyi,’ pana ka numu koobenaꞌyoona oo mu manakwe yise, ‘Umu besa manakwe,’ mee soo Te Naa gi mu netamma-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Tamme sakwa mu tutuha manedu watzemaka. Gi sakwa haga oo sopedakwatoopana ka oo te manakwe, tooe te besa pupuaꞌamu pana.
Soo Te Naa te sootuhikwu, ka mu tutuha manedu te watze tummatzaꞌe, ka te sopedakwadoona.

Tamme sakwa manaꞌyoona gi numu tamme poonne-kwiꞌyoona watze nanesootuhi gi namanasootzaꞌme numu poonnenaꞌyoona. Oꞌno soo Te Naa toge manakwe mee te netammana, te sootuhikwu. Susumudu mu numu tunakaꞌoedyukudu mee naneꞌyugwedu nasootzaꞌme, ka Te Naa-matoo papabatse nanesootuhina ka nanesootuhi nobe-kwiꞌyoona yise ona mu numu nonobe-kobenaꞌyoona, tuwazoo. Mooasoo mu numu meeoo mu netamma, ‘Mu kaaheno manakwe,’ pana soo Te Naa gi mu sootuhi-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Tamme sakwa gi sumu-kwaꞌnesoo uꞌnaꞌwepana ka gi oo nakasopedakwatoona. Mu numu gi Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu oo manakwe. Umu meeoo sokwama numme ka ewa unnena numme nanakabetseakwu mee.
Tamme sakwa gi ooosapa Te Naa ewasoo sumu-kwaꞌnesoo tuukwedyipana mooasoo soo Te Naa oo sopedakwatoo tooe gisoo pumme te tuukweꞌe sapa.
Mee sakwa noꞌyoona numu nanesootuhi. ‘U, Ne Naa ne paꞌanikwatu u tubetse besaꞌyoo.
U noꞌoko numme-kooba poohakatudu. Numme noꞌoko numu yaa teepu-koobatu ume mu nakabetseana soogwaꞌe, ka u-baatu-kwaꞌnesoo.
Nonotsa tu tabemea-kwi besa ne sootuhi.
Ka ne tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwana, ka mu numu suda numme matugu numme puu oo soomuꞌwa.
Ne matzino, kaaheno ne mayugwe. Oꞌno numme besa-kwitoo tsebooe petugakwu.’
Ka mu numu suda tamme matuguduna oo soomuꞌwase, oꞌno Te Naa, te paꞌanakwatu punnoꞌo oo soomuꞌwakwu ka suda te manakwe.
Pana tamme ka gi oo soomuꞌwuna ka numu suda tamme matugu, Te Naa, Te paꞌanakwatu punnoꞌo gi oo soomuꞌwa-waꞌneꞌyoo ka suda te tumatugu.

Tamme ka te nanesootuhina manekuna gi nasootzaꞌmepana ka gi tukapu tukapana nanesootuhina, tamme sakwa besa sokwamana besa namabetsea. Mu numu tunakaꞌoedyukudu mee naneyugwedu puu nasootzamena gi namabetseana suda sokwamadu-kwaꞌne tabuamoꞌo. Mu numu mooasoo, ‘Umu toge manakwe,’ mee mu netamma, pana soo Te Naa yise gi oo manedu sootuhi-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Tamme ka watze tukana nanesootuhina, soo Te Naa mooasoo gi te watzekute, ka mooasoo te sopedakwatoona besa te sootuhikwu.

Tamme sakwa ka Te Naa tamme sootuhikwuna ooosapa soogwipunne. Tamme ka oo-matu mease saaꞌa oo-baaꞌyoona soo Te Naa ooosapa besa te sootubetseaꞌyina ewa te nenagakwu. Tamme sakwa gi yaa teepu-koobatoosoo hemma te heegana mu numu unu nenagana soogwipana, gi ka teepu-koobatoo hemma ka Te Naa oooonakwa nenagapana. Umuoo ooonneꞌyoo kadooꞌoo sukwe manepetugadyidu: susumudu natzasooꞌadu, susumudu yungusanadooadu, susumudu natuduhatsasooadu.
Soo unu te nenagapunnena ka Te Naa-baa gi kadoo namayugwedu, gi tuwazoo natutuhatzasooadu. Soo te pewu yise ooosapa ka unu te nenagapunne-kwi manepunnekwu.
Soo te pooe tukootabuakunoo-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme ka besa yaatu poonnena suuꞌmu tamme besaꞌyookwu, pana tamme ka sutakoo poonnena suta tusooyugwekwu. Tamme ka unu tammesoo besa tusooyugwena nasootuhikwu.
Ka tooe hemma tooe sutakoo soohanena ooosapa togano-kwi manepunne. Tamme ka waha-tamme tusooyugwena ooosapa ka togaba-witu-kwaꞌneꞌyookwu.

Gi tamme waha-tamme tusooyugwena tamme gi waahoo nakabetsea-waꞌneꞌyoo sumu-noꞌokwisoo, tamme sakwa ka Te Naa nakabetsea, gi sakwa tamme ewahoo hemma nananenagadu suuꞌmu te heegakwuna soogwipunne. Tamme puu gi nanokwisoo waahoo numu moohedu nakabetsea-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme sumuna sumuhoo besa soobedyana ka sumuoo gi petzabekwu.

Nu mu tuukwekwu mu sakwa gi nasootookepana gi suda nasooyugwewunupana ka tukapu mu kutuugekwuna, ka baa mu heebena mu tuugekwuna, ka wunapu pukwi mu namasooakwuna mu tuugekwuna. Soo Te Naa ka gwetzoibu te sootuhikwu.

Tamme sakwa ka mu hootsebaꞌa soohanena umu puu gi hemma haꞌoo yugwepana tu tukana maꞌyu ka Te Naa pumme mabetseꞌa. Tamme puu mu hootsebaꞌa oooonakwasoo nadatsungadu. Soo Te Naa suuꞌmu puu noꞌoko te mabetsea tuwazoo ka kwingaꞌatoo te gwetzoimokwuna.
Tamme gi hownnekoosoo tammesoo kwingaꞌatoo te gwetzoimokwuna madaꞌe tamme sakwa yise gi ka tukapu te tuuge-kwitoo suda soonammekupana.
Tooe ka wunapu pukwi mu namasooakwuna tuugepana gi oowetoo suda nasooyugwepana. Mu tonegeaꞌa puu tubewabe-kwi naadu. Tooe umu puu gi hemma nakoobatoo matabuepana besa tatabuꞌa.
Umu tonegaꞌa ka Jew numu-kooba katudu Solomon mee naneadu kwasu oooonakwa besa tatabuꞌa.
Soo Te Naa umuoo tonegea besa tatabua matabue, tooe yabesoo mu takwasuhookwuse sapa. Tamme sakwa ka ooka Te Naa tamme mabetseadu nakabetsea.
Tamme sakwa yise gi suda sokwamapana ka haꞌoo tukapu natoogoo tuugena tuwazoo baa natoogoo te tuugekwuna tooꞌetoo ka wunapu pukwi te namasooana te tuugena tamme sakwa gi suda sokwamapana
ka umu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-kwaꞌne umu puu gi hekwitoo sapa suda nasooyugwe. Mooasoo soo Te Naa te paꞌanakwatu tamme-koobatoo te sopedakwadoo, puma te gwetzoina te sootuhi.
Tamme sakwa ka Te Naa besa te nakabetseakwuna unu soogwi. Oosoo yise noꞌoko hemma puma te gwetzoina te sootuhikwu.
Tamme sakwa yise gi suda oo sokwamakupana, ka saaꞌa hemma manekwuna. Tamme mooasoo togekoo suda namanatsaꞌyana oosoo puusoo oo-toogoo manemeana nasoomuꞌwadu.
Tamme sakwa gi tunesootzimapana, gi tuwazoo suda numu netammapana, oꞌno soo Te Naa besa te sooyugwe.
Tamme ka mu tummatzina, soo Te Naa oogow punowsoo te makodyukukwu.

Tamme sakwa gi te puaꞌa nesagwikupana, ka sagwane oo tumaꞌemukwase. Tamme sumuna ookowsoo tumaꞌemukwa. Hownnekoo yise mu ka mu puaꞌa pooe-wikoo tuutsekoo hemma mesoo poonne ka mummesoo pooe-wikoo hemma pabatsekoo katu sapa?
Mooeꞌugasoo mu sakwa mummesoo pooe-witu tzatsebooase, oꞌno mu yaatu poonnena, ka mu puaꞌa mesoo tummatzaꞌe. Ooosoo sakwa mu ka suda mu tumatuguna yugwese, oꞌno mu ka mu pupuaꞌamu mesoo tummatzi.

Tamme sakwa ka mu numu gi tamme nakabetseadu, gi ka Te Naa besa unnepu tuukwepana. Umuoo ka Te Naa besa unnepu gi heesoobedyana, gi hemma sootubetseyi. ‘Oosoo gi hee,’ mee umuoo numu sokwamana te nekusegeakwu.
Tamme ka oo soogwina, nanetsagwayina, oꞌno tamme ookow nasootuhikwu.
Ka mu tooaꞌa tukaba nekwaꞌe, mu puu gi tupe oo gea-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Ka pakwe oo nekwaꞌe, mu puu gi togogwa oo gea-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Tooe tamme gi totogeꞌyoopana puu te dooamu besa matugu, soo Te Naa yise tamme besa matuguna te sootuhikwu.
Tammesoo besa namatugu-kwaꞌne sakwa tamme besa numu matugu. Oꞌno yise tamme noꞌoko ka Te Naa tamme tunetammakuna mayohokwu.
Tamme sakwa ka Te Naa besa podo meadabe, oosoo unu nameana tuutze hanoꞌyoo, pana soo sutaꞌyoo po paba hanoꞌyoona suta-kwitoo nameꞌa. Ewaꞌyoo numu ka sutakoo po nake.
Pana soo Te Naa besa po tubetse nagwetzoidu-kwitoo nameꞌa, gi moobegwa-gaꞌyoo. Oosoo tuutze hanoꞌyoona huutseꞌyoo numu ekow nage.
Tamme sakwa mu esagoedu numu, mu Te Naa yadooawabe mee naneꞌyugwedu gi nakaꞌoedyukupana. Umuoo nunuꞌu-waꞌneꞌyoo numu kadooꞌoo mayugwedu, tooꞌe besaꞌyoo mee naneꞌyugwepana.
Mu ka mu ooonnekoo numu sopedakwadookwu ka suda mumme mu matugu-makoo. Tamme puu wuyupooe gi tsaꞌabu-makoo wutaꞌne-waꞌneꞌyoo, wuyupe-makoo suuꞌmu.
Noꞌyoona soo hee namasuadu tu pooe-kwaꞌnekoosoo suakute, susumudu besaꞌyoo, susumudu sutaꞌyoo.
Soo tsaꞌabu sutakoo pooe-gaꞌyoo gi pumme tuka-waꞌneꞌyoo, gi he-toogoo besaꞌyoo nuubetakwunina natunaꞌe.
Susumudu numu eka sutakoo pooe-gakoo tsaꞌabu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo mu tumatugu-makoo umu nasopedakwatoo ka gi he-toogoo besaꞌyoona.
Umu Te Naa nakabetseana oo tubetse nakaꞌoedyukudu suuꞌmu oo-baa petugakwu, gi umu Te Pabeꞌe nakabetseadu, mee naneyugwedu.

Ka e kodyu petuse ewaꞌyoo numu mee e netammakwu, ‘U yow E Pabeꞌe. Nu ooosapa u unnepu mu numu tuukwedu. Nu mu tsoapa nematzagakwuni, ka mu tsoapagoedu-makoo. Nu ewa nanabesa tumadabuegena, u pooha-toohakwi.’
Pana nu mee mu netammakwu, ‘Mu gi nu-notu, gi nu-tsageꞌyoopana mu ewa numu nemooaga. Ooonneꞌyoo nu mu taꞌya.’
Ka besa e naka tumayohokudu puu nu tuukwekwu. Tupe besa nobetoodu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo, oosoo puu ohobudu gi namanubue oo matabue.
Tooe ka baa unu hooꞌoo ka teepu putoohakwitu patokwenawunu sapa gi anoꞌa, oosoo ka besa namadabuepuna.
Mu numu ka e unnena gi oo nakatumayohodu, ka nana tu nobe teepu-kooba oo sukwe matabuedu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Soo oo nobe-toona ka baa unu hoo petuse patadyoomowkwu.
Ka tu powma petuse ka baa unu hooꞌoo, unu tu hukwa petuse soo nobe gi besa namadabuena wunapowkwu tubetse paba suda unni petuse, gi hee nabenaꞌe.”
Ka Te Pabeꞌe yadooamakwuse mu numu mee nananetamma, “Numme gi meeoo naꞌunnedu nakadu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe tubetse besa ka Te Naa unnepu-witu wahadyakwe, gi ka umu te nedyooedu-kwaꞌne.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka giba-maꞌyoona wuegena, ewaꞌyoo numu oo-ma tzabehooke.
Sumuꞌyoo nana tookoo uayidu ka Te Pabeꞌe tuukwese nama oo pooha-matugu tuungu.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus yise oo-ma pooha matuguse mee oo netamma, “Nu u mabesakukwu.

U sakwa ka mu numu nanesootuhikudu petuse, ka menoꞌo besa u manepu o tzapoonneku yise ka Moses tamme tunetamma-waꞌnesoo Te Naa pooha tuwunikuse. Mu tzapoonneku ka u tookoo uayina namabesakuna. Pana gi ka mu numu tuukwepana ka ume e mabesakuse.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka Capernaum mee naneadu-wi petugase sumuꞌyoo mu tukwutumadu moohedu-matu, tubetse wawaꞌa, oo-baa petuse, meeoo oo netamma, “U sakwa e tummatzi.
Soo tooebetse nuka tummatzidu gi yutsunga manepu oona e nobe-wi, unu nuummaba wumana. Nu ookahoo u mabesakukwuna sookwaꞌe.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo oo netamma, “Nu sakwa tooꞌe oo mabesakuhoodooa.”

Soo tukwutumadu moohedu yise meeoo oo netamma, “Nu gi mu-matu numu, mu Jew numme wakwawaꞌa nuutumooedu, tooe u gi nuga nobe-kwitoo kemmapana gi hownneꞌyoo. Nu oo sopedakwadoo u sakwa oo sukwe yadooese, soo e tummatzidu besa mane.

Nu tuwazoo oo sopedakwatoo ka numu nu-toohatu puu nuka nakabetseꞌa, nu ka meeoo mu netammaꞌyina, ‘U sakwa mea,’ oosoo yise meahooyakwe. Nu ka mu bihooyina, mu yise numatoo kemmayakwe. Nu ka nuka tummatzidu mee netammana, ‘U sakwa yoo mane,’ oosoo yise e nakabetseayakwe.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka oo unnena nakase, ka mu numu meeoo netamma, “Yow yise soo tubetse tunakaꞌoedyukudu. Noꞌoko ka mu Jew numu oooonakwasoo unu tunakaꞌoedyukute.
Noꞌobatusoo numu tooe hanotutooe ka Te Naa-baa petuga ka oo ewa tukanoꞌo, oꞌnosoo umu Te Naa nanayadooawabe: Abraham, Isaac, tuwazoo Jacob meeꞌe nananeadu ono onokwu.
Tooe mu Jew numu yisetu, mee nanasoobedyadu gi oeꞌyookwu ka gi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Umu togabu-witoo nakwumaꞌanakwunina, yise ooosapa sakwikwu, soo suda mu tumuduguna yise umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka tukwutumadu moohedu meeoo netamma, “U nobe-witoosoo mea. Nu mooasoo ka u tummatzidu mabesakupu, u ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu nanesootuhimakwuse oeꞌyoona mease, ka Simon Peter-baa petuga. Soo Simon Peter yahe peawabe unu tuoeyaꞌena oo tookoo udutuna onahoo hape. Umu o nobe-witu ka Te Pabeꞌe oetu tuukweꞌe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka peawabe-matoo mease,
oo mi-kooba matuguse oosoo besa mani. Oosoo peawabe yise yotseoose, mu tugoomahanekuhoose, mu tuka tuunguhoo.

Oogowsoo yongona ewaꞌyoo tuoegoedu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa nabi petudyakwe, tsoapagoedu tuwazoo. Oosoo umu-ma pooha matugumese noꞌoko mu tuoegoedu numu mabesaku. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tsoapa nematzagukwuniyakwe.
Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa yadooawabe Isaiah mee naneadu mee tuukwe yoo namanekwu mee tubotugu, “Soo Te Pabeꞌe te mabesakukwu ka te tuoegoꞌe.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu numu tu naꞌoonnakwi ewa manemena mu poonnena, yise ka numme nakatzimodu ka banunadu oowenapatoo sake-wi mu natsemange tuungu.
Ka ooonnapa petugase, sumuꞌyoo nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petuse meeoo oo netamma, “Nu sakwa u-no mea tooe hano tooe u meꞌa sapa u-no manenumme.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo oo netamma, “U deaꞌa gi nobe-gakwu. Mu etzaꞌa puu ka teepu-naga to-gaꞌyoo, mu hootsebaꞌa mu sunngabe-ma nobe-doo pana nu gi nobe-gaꞌyoo.”
Sumuꞌyoo nana ka Te Pabeꞌe-no manennummedu meeoo oo netamma, “Nu sakwa e nobe-wi mooe nummedooa. E naa yaꞌe, nu oo mooe nomatugudooase, oꞌno yise saaꞌa nu u-no manennummedooa.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo oo netamma, “U sakwa menoꞌosoo nu-no maneka. Mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu numu gi nuuno manedu saaꞌa puusoo tu nanumu tutuꞌina nanomatugudooa.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus ka sake-wi tsebooeka ka umu pumme nakatzimodu-no.
Ka banunadu panowmookwi ne manekase unu hukwa petuhoo. Soo baa pabatseꞌe pakwutiwununa ne sake bakaanogaꞌa. Te Pabeꞌe mesoo uwedape.
Umu oo nakatzimodu oo netupoonne mee unnese, “Uda! U sakwa tuponnese ne magwetzoi. Tamme sumuna badatuꞌihookwu.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu netamma, “Gi suipana, mu gi e tubetse nakaꞌoedyukute pana nu mu magwetzoihookwu.” Oꞌno soo Te Pabeꞌe yise yotsehoose, ka baa noko hukwapa yooi tuunguhoo. Soo pakwutiwununa ka tu hukwamakwuse, punnoꞌo yooꞌihoo.
Numme Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu mee nananetammamoꞌo, “Uune! Yow esoo Te Pabeꞌe, unu pooha-gaꞌyoo. Soo hukwapa ka baa-no a nakabetseꞌa.”

Wahaꞌyoo tsoapagoedu naana ka teepu Gadara mee naneadu-kwi, oonow ka tupe tawaga-kwi nobe-gaꞌyoo, ka mu tuipu nakoonaga. Gi haga oo-toogoo mea-waꞌneꞌyoo. Mu naana ka unu susutaꞌyoona, numu tumaheyakwe noꞌoko numu kusegeayina. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka banunadu natsemangegase oonow umu-tzageꞌe petuhoogase, ka sake-wiꞌyoona wuegase,
tsoapagoedu naana oo-baa pepetuhooga, papabatse apegeakoohase mee oo netamma, “Gi ne matzamapana. U ka noꞌokosoo hemma Manumudoopu Dooa. Gi suda ne yugwepana. Saaꞌa u kadoo ne mayugwekwu, gi menoꞌo.”
Gi haaꞌno umu kwingaꞌa ewaꞌyoo hogu toꞌo.
Mu tsoapa ka mu nanana-nagaꞌyoona ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “U ka mu naana-nagakoo ne nemakuase numme sakwa mu hogu-naga mani petuga.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu tsoapa mee netamma, “Unudooe meaꞌa,” mu tsoapa yise ka mu nanana-nagaꞌyoona kuowkase ka mu hogu-naga mani petuga. Noꞌyoona mu hogu namatatanomanese ka bakumanaꞌyoona ka baa-witoo sawehoose noꞌyoona padatuihoo.
Mu hogu takonemodu yise ka Gadarea-witoo tatanomanegase, ka mu numu tuukwe petuga, ka mu hogu badatuihoona, yise ka Te Pabeꞌe ka tsoapagoedu nanana oo mabesakuna tuwazoo.
Ewaꞌyoo numu ka Gadarea-wiꞌyoona kemmase, ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petugase, ka Te Pabeꞌe tayakwunaꞌe, “Ne tsasoopedya sakwa u,” mee oo netammana.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka sake-wi tsebooesesoo, ka banunadu paꞌoenapatoo punowsoo kodyuka.

Soo tuoeyaꞌedu gi yutsungu manepu ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa natzakwu petuga. Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu sopedakwatoo ka mu naana pu-ma mu nasoonatzaꞌe. Te Pabeꞌe yise ka gi yutsungadu nana meeoo netamma, “E puaꞌa, u sakwa besa soonamme. Nu ka u tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwakwu.”
Susumudu mu Jew nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu meeoo sokwama, “Esoo hayoo suda unakwe. Masoogina ka Te Naa-waꞌnesoo nasooyugwena meeoo unnewunu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mooasoo oo sopedakwatoo ka mu tusooyugwena yise meeoo mu netamma, “Gi suda tusooyugwepana.
Mu gi e nakaꞌoedyukute ka mu numu tumaꞌemukwana e soomuꞌwa-kwitu, pana mu oo poonnekwu ka eka nana e mabesakuse.

Mu yise oo sopedakwadookwu nu eka teepu-kooba ookow poohabe hee-gaꞌyoo, ka mu numu tumaꞌemukwana e soomuꞌwakwuna.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka nana gi yutsungadu meeoo netamma, “Wunuoose ka u kapa nobe-witoosoo tzagwuuka.”
Noꞌyoona mu numu oo poonnese, oo sooꞌoedyukuse meeoo nanaꞌunakwe, “Te Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo. Numme nanabesa namanedu yaa tabeno poonne. Te Pabeꞌe unu pooha-gana tamme-baa petu.”

Nu Matthew, oonow ka putoogoo numu tzoonooadyikwi katuna numu tunekwidyakwe. Te Pabeꞌe o meana e poonnese ka o e katu, yise meeoo e netamma, “U sakwa e tummatzi, nu-nosoo manenumme.” Nu yotseoose oo-no meahoo.
Ka saaꞌa soo Te Pabeꞌe e nobe-witoo nu-no mease numme tuka. Ewaꞌyoo mu numu tunekwidu o, tumaꞌemukwadu mee mu Pharisee ne neꞌa, numme ka ewaꞌyoona onona ewatuka.
Mu Pharisee ka Te Pabeꞌe poonnese numme-no tuka, meeoo yise ka pumme nakatzimodu netamma, “Oosoo Mu Pabeꞌe sakwa gi mu suda tutumatugudu-no tukapana, mu numu tunekwidu ooonneꞌyoo.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu nakase, mee unakwe, “Nu yaa ka teepu-kooba petuse, ka mu tumaꞌemukwadu Te Naa-witu gi sopedakwadoodu tuukwekwu. Gi nu mu numu mooasoo kaaheno meadu mee nasooyugwedu Te Naa-witu sopedakwadoodu tunedyooekwu. Mu sakwa ka Te Naa unnena natunedyooe ka mee oo unakwe, ‘Nu mu numu besa nanamatuguna umu-makoo sookwaꞌe, gi tuwazoo nu hemma umu-nakwana sookwaꞌe.’ Soo pooha-gaꞌyoo puu tuoegoedu numu-doo suuꞌmu nabaꞌe, gi ka gi tuooegoedu numu-doo. Nu puu ka mu tumaꞌemukwadu suuꞌmu tummatzikwu, gi ka mu besa nasooyugwedu numu.”
Umu John pupuaꞌamu-matu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petuse mee unakwe, “Numme ka mu Pharisee-no gi tukapana nanesootuhiyakwe. How yise umu ume nakatzimodu gi punnoꞌo ooosoo tumatugu?”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu nanekwegea, “Nu togesoo yaahoo umu-no, pudu nodukwadoodu-kwaꞌne, umu puu ka nanoꞌyoona besa sokwama. Pana pudusoo nu gi umu-noꞌyookwu, oꞌno yise saaꞌa umu e nakatzimodu gi tukapana nanesootuhidyikwu.

Ka oohoo a manepunne mu gi hownnekoo ka mu numu pudu tumayohope noko ka mumme putoogoo mooa tumayohope mayua-waꞌneꞌyoo. Oosoo puu wanapu nadotsana-kwaꞌne. U pudu wanapu ka mooa wanapu-ma dotsanase, oosoo gi toge tubuakwu.
Mu gi hownnekoo eka mumme pudu natunetammakuna ka mu mooa tumayohope noko mayua-waꞌneꞌyoo.”

Ka Te Pabeꞌe togesoo yadooawunu, soo mu nanesootuhidu nemadanagadu oo-baa petugase oo-kobena meatzedose oo nanetzakwiyaꞌe yise meeoo unakwe, “E padu yaꞌegaꞌa, u sakwa kemmase oo-kooba pooha matuguse, oosoo sakwa besa mane.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise oo-no mea mu tunakatzimodu-no.
Oꞌno yise togesoo mu meaꞌa soo sumuꞌyoo mogoꞌne hoone tuoeyaꞌedu, sumumano wahamatsebooekudu (12) tommo petugapu, ka Te Pabeꞌe ooonnakwana oo kwasu tzamow,
mee tusooyugwena, “Nu ka Te Pabeꞌe kwasu sukwe tzamowse besa manekwu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise yabesoo oo pooha wumowse oo sopedakwatoo meeoo yise oo netamma, “U mooasoo besa mani, e nakaꞌoedyukuna, besa soonamme.” Soo mogoꞌne yise yabesoo puuhamakwu.
Ka oona Jairus nobe-wi petugase ewaꞌyoo numu sakwaꞌe soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Puuwunaꞌyoopunne, esoo tsuaꞌa gi yaꞌe, esoo sukwe uꞌwe.” Umu numu oo-maꞌyoona sukwe nanekoꞌe.
Ka mu numu puuwanakoo soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tsuaꞌa mi-ma tzakaduse oo tzadyota.
Esoo Te Pabeꞌe manena yise tooe hano tooe nawaha.
Ka Te Pabeꞌe oeꞌyoona pudu meahoose, wahaꞌyoo gi tutubootabuedu nanana umu-no tzabegease mu-nakwi memeꞌana papaba meeoo oo netammamena, “Ne Pabeꞌe u sakwa ne sootuhi.”

Ka nobe-kwi ka Te Pabeꞌe egease, mu gi tutubootabuedu oo-matoo memea; soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu tubengu, “Mu haaꞌa oo sooꞌoedyukute ka nuka mumme mabesakukwuna?” Umu yise meeoo oo nanekwegea, “Aha, Ne Pabeꞌe.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu pooe-ma matuguse meeoo mu netamma, “Mu ka tunakaꞌoedyukuse namabesakukwu.”
Mu nanana yise besa tubootabue mamani. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Gi haka saaꞌa tuukwepana.”
Ooonneꞌyoopana umu yise mana teepu kaaꞌno oo waha kodyu.
Ka togesoo ka Te Pabeꞌe mea, soo tsoapayidu gi yadooa manepu oo-baa nabi petu.

Ka Te Pabeꞌe ka tsoapayidu nana mabesakuse, soo tsoapayidu nana yise yadooa mani. Mu numu yise noꞌyoona oo poonnedu meeoo unakwe, “Soo Te Pabeꞌe yow besaꞌyoo gi hee hannanoꞌo yooonneꞌyoo ka te nanumu-nagatu napoonnedu.”
Pana mu nananesootuhidu-matu meeoo, “Oosoo ka tsoapa moohedu sutakoo poohabe pooha-gana, ooonneꞌyoona oosoo yise ka sutakoo tu pooha-gana-ma mu tsoapa nematzagakwuniyakwe.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mana tooe ka Te Naa unnepu wahanumme, mu numu tunedyooena, mu nanesootuhi-kwiꞌyoona tooe. Tooe hownnekoo tooe tuoeba mabesakute tuwazoo.
Nanaꞌewow numu poonne mukwadu-kwaꞌne mu manemoꞌo, tutuha mu soobedya, ka oo mu manemoꞌo gi too howsoo mane-waꞌneꞌyoo ka pumme tummatzikwudu kadooꞌookoo. Te Pabeꞌe yise tutuha mu soobedya.

“Gi haga ka Te Naa besa podosoo mu moohe-waꞌneꞌyoo,” mee soonammena. Te Pabeꞌe yise pumme nakatzimodu mee netamma, “Ewaꞌyoo mu numu ka Te Naa besa unnepu tu nakakwuna soogwidu. Pana gi ewaꞌyoo numu mu tuukwedu.
Tamme sakwa ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhi mee unnena, ‘Ne Naa, U, ewowsoo numu sootuhi ka besa u unnepu wahakwudu. Oꞌno yise ewaꞌyoo numu u-witu nakana, u nakasopedakwadookwu.’ “

Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka numme sumumano wahamatsebooeku (12) naana pumme nakatzimodu nabaatoo bise meeoo ne netamma, “Nu manatooe mu tayakwu mu nanesootuhibu mu numu tunedyooekwu. Nu mu pooha-makase mu tsoapa nematzagakwunikwu, noꞌobatusoo tuoebu-ma tuꞌoegoedu namabesakumokwuna tuwazoo.”
Umu sumumano wahamatsebooekudu (12) nanana Te Pabeꞌe nayadooawabe mee nananeꞌa, Simon, soo Te Pabeꞌe Peter mee oo neꞌa, Andrew, Peter pabeꞌe, James tu wanngaꞌa John-no, mu naa Zebedee mee naneadu.
Philip, Bartholomew, Thomas, nu Matthew uga numu tunekwidu, James, oo naa Alphaeus mee naneadu, Thaddeus,
Simon, ka Cana mee naneadu-wiꞌyoona kemmapu, soo Judas punnoꞌo saaꞌa ka Te Pabeꞌe-toogoo pabenapu.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka gisoo numme pumme nakatzimodu mana tooe hano tooe ka Te Naa unnepu numu tunedyooe tayana, mee ne netamma, “Mu sakwa mu Jew numu-matoo suuꞌmu mea umuoo gi ka Te Naa besa podu meꞌa, gi ka mu susumudu tooe hownnekoo tooe numu-matoo meapana.
Mu sakwa meadabena mu numu tuukwe, ‘Soo Te Naa petukwuna tzakeꞌe manekena.’

Mu sakwa mu tuꞌoegoedu mabesaku, mu uagoedu, mu tsoapagoedu tuwazoo. Mu sakwa ka mu numu yaꞌedu mayodayisoo. Mu sakwa gi numu tunekwi, mu sukwe tummatziyi, soo Te Naa puu gi mu tunekwaꞌe mu sakwe sootuhiyakwe.
Gi hemma puma mu tumu-waꞌnekoo hanegapana.
Gi hemma hanepana pukwi mu namasooa-waꞌnekoo gi tuwazoo tunekwipana, umu mu nakapunnedusoo sakwa ka hemma mu soogwina mu tummatzi.
Ka tooe hano tooe petugase mu sakwa besow numu mayuse oo nobe-kwi yise umu-baaꞌyoopunne.
Mu ka kummaꞌakoosoo nobe-kwi egease besow mu numu oe nobe-gakoo nekwiku.
Umu ka besaꞌyoo numuna nasootuhikwu. Umu ka sutaꞌyoona soo besow mu nekwipu mu-matoosoo namakodyukakwu.
Ka mu numu besa mu unnepu gi nakaꞌoedyukute, ka numu nonobe-too meana, ka koosebu mu moko-makoo tataꞌne mea. Ka oo mu manese umu oo sopedakwadookwu ka gi besa tu manena gi mu nakaꞌoedyukute.

Saaꞌa soo Te Naa mu numu nemadabuekwu, soo suda mu tumatugupu yise umu-matoosoo kodyukwu, ka oꞌnosoo namane-kwaꞌnesoo soo sutaꞌyoo puu ka mu numu Sodom noko Gomorrah mee nananeadu-matoo kodyu, umu yise nakootzasooa.
Mu numu pumatoo mumme e tayakwuna sutaꞌyoo numu etzaꞌa-waꞌne. Ka umu-baaꞌyoona mu sakwa unu besa sapa manena, besa mu matuguna, kaaheno Te Naa unnepu mu tunedyooe, umu sumuna mu tooꞌe nemooagakwu.
Mu sakwa besa mu eyaꞌena. Umu sumuna mu-toogoo pabenase, mu nagusedyakwu,
umu ka mu wakwawaꞌa numu moohedu-koobenatoo saaꞌa mu hanese, mu nanehanedooa. Mu saaꞌa nuupagetadooa. Mu gi e nakaꞌoedyukudu saaꞌa gi mu petzabedooa. Mu yise nuga besa unnepu mu tuukwekwu.
Mu ka nakwutumase gi suda oo soonammekupana ka haꞌyoo mu unnekwuna. Mu ka Te Naa besa pooha-toohakwi yadooakwu. Soo Te Naa mu unnekwuna mu tuukwekwu.
Mu numu nu-koobatoo gi mu petzabekwu. Mu nananumusoo sumuna mu nekwohonekwu. Mu sumuna nabatsakwu ka mu pabeꞌe tooetoo mu tooaꞌasoo mumme wahase. Pana mu ka e nakaꞌoedyukumona, nu mu magwetzoikwu.
Ka mu numu mumme suda matugu, kummaꞌa-witoosoo mease umuoo tunedyooe. Mu sakwa tooe hanotoo tooe mea. Nu sumuna petukwu gisoo ka nakwitu Jew numu-baa mu petugaꞌa.
Mu ka numu tunedyooena mu nu-waꞌnesoo namatugukwu. Umu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu puusoo Sutaꞌyoo mee e neꞌa. Umu mumme tuwazoo suda netammakwu. Pana oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo, oꞌno mu nu-waꞌneꞌyookwu.
Mu sakwa gi suipana ka besa e unnepu mu numu tuukwena. Tooe ka mumme e watze tuukwe sapa, saaꞌa mu sakwa numu nakana oo mesoo waha.

Tamme sakwa ka mu numu tamme nekwohoꞌne sapa, gi umu-ma suipana. Umu tooe te batsase sapa, gi hownnekoo te moogooa how yugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme sakwa gi umu-ma nakaꞌemukwapana, ka Te Naa unnena suuꞌmu togeꞌyooku. Te Naa suuꞌmu o te soonammena, te tookoo noko madipunnedu, Te Naa suuꞌmu sakwa tamme besa sooyugwena.
Pana soo Te Naa unu te nenaka. Mu hootsebaꞌa puu gi haaꞌno nanenaka pana soo Te Naa mu soopedyana mu mabetseꞌa. Soo Te Naa puu gi e watzekute, noꞌoko tamme-witu sopedakwadoopunne.
Mu ka mu numu yaa teepu-koobatu tuukwena, ‘Soo Jesus E Pabeꞌe,’ nu saaꞌa punnoꞌo ka E Naa-kobenaꞌyoona. ‘Mu nugatu,’ mee tuukwedooa.
Mu ka ‘Jesus e Pabeꞌe,’ mee mu unne-ma nasookwina, nu saaꞌa punnoꞌo ka E Naa-kobenaꞌyoona, ‘Mu gi nugatu,’ mee ka Te Naa tuukwedooa.
Mu sumuna mee sokwamakwu, ‘Nu ka Te Pabeꞌe petuku manese yaa manakwana, hee-noꞌyoona besaꞌyookwu.’ Pana gi! Mu numu mu nekwohonekwu ka nuka mu nanesootuhaꞌe.
Mu nanumupana mu wohonekwu. Mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu numu pummesoo naanapuaꞌamu, tu yahe nokosoo mu wohonekwu, ka nuka mu nakaꞌoedyukumanese.
Mu numu tamme-baasoo nobe-gaꞌyoo sumuna punnoꞌo te wohonekwu.
Mu nuka noꞌokosoo hemma oooonakwa unu soobedyakwu. Mu sakwa ka mu naa, mu pea, noko mu doodoomu, oooonakwasoo unu e soobedya, oꞌno mu ka E Naa besa podo meadabekwu.
Mu ka mee unnena, ‘Tooe nu ka Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo nabatsase sapa, oosoo besaꞌyoo,’ oꞌno yise mu ka mumme e sooyugwe-kwaꞌneꞌyoona, mu e nanumu manepunnekwu.
Mu ka nu-koobatoo nasoomawunise nabatsase, nu ka tubetse gwetzoibu gi moobegwagakoo mu sootuhikwu. Mu ka mummesoo tookoo unu soobedyana, gi gwetzoibu-ma nasootuhi-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Tooe haga tooe ka mu nuka nakatzimodu tummatzidu nuka tummatzaꞌedu-kwaꞌnesoo manepunne. Soo tooe haga tooe nuka tummatzidu ka Te Naa tummatzidu-kwaꞌne tuwazoo manepunne.

Tamme ka Te Naa yadooawabe tummatzina, oosoo ka Te Naa yadooawabena, saaꞌa soo Te Naa te sootuhikwu ka ooka tu yadooawabe tu sootuhi-kwaꞌnekoosoo. Tamme ka kaaheno meadabedu numu tummatzina, oosoo ka Te Naa besa podo meana, saaꞌa soo Te Naa te sootuhikwu, ooka tu sootuhi-kwaꞌnekoosoo.

Ka tooe hownnekoo tooe besa sumuoo Te Naa doodooamu-matu te matugu, oosoo ka Te Naa dooaꞌana, ka oo puudyaꞌe, baꞌutzutzudu oo sukwe bamagase sapa, soo Te Naa ka besow tamme-matusoo makodyukukwu,” meeꞌe soo Te Pabeꞌe.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu waha matsebooekudu (12) pumme nakatzimodu tunedyooemakwuse, ka teepu Galilee mee naneadu-witoo mease mu numu nonokadu-kwi nanesootuhibu mu tunedyooemena.
Soo John nakwutumana ka Te Pabeꞌe manepu-kwitu naka, yise ka mu tu pupuaꞌamu-matu ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo taꞌya mee mu tutubengatuunguna,
“U haaꞌa yow Te Pabeꞌe, pute soo Te Pabeꞌe saaꞌa petukwu?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeꞌe mu nanekwegea, “Mu sakwa ka John tuukwe ka mu poonnena, mu nakana tuwazoo.

Ka umu gi tutubootabuedu numu tubootabue manese, mu toyomodu numu besa numme manese, mu gi nakatakedu numu nakadake manese, mu numu uagoedu besa maneyakwe, mu tuipu numu namayodasesoo, yise ka mu tutuha manedu numu ka Te Naa besa unnepu natuukwese.
Mu ka ooosapa e nakaꞌoedyukuna gi nu-ma nasookwina, besa nasootuhikwu.”
Ka mu John pupuaꞌamu kodyukase, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka John-witu mu numu tuukwe, “Ka oꞌnosoo nuga-kobenasoo mu numu oona giba-ma ka John-baa petugayakwe, soo John yise gi waha-tamme tusooyugwedu nana.
Hemma mu poonnekwu mee mu sokwamana oo-matoo mea? Mu besa namasooadu, besa namadabuedu nana poonnekwu mee haaꞌa mu sokwama? Mu numu besa nanamadabuedu ka numu-kooba katudu nobe-witu.
Soo John o Te Naa nayadooawabe, ookow Te Naa nayadooawabe mu nakakwuse oo-baa petugaꞌa. Soo John ka umu oꞌnosoo Te Naa nanayadooawabe oooonakwa besaꞌyoo.

Soo John ka Te Naa besaa nayadooawabe. Oꞌnosoo ka John-witu nabotugupu-gaꞌyoo soo Te Naa meeoo e netammapu-gaꞌyoo, ‘Ume-kobenasoo ka teepu-koobatoo nu e nayadooawabe tayakwu ka mu numu ume petukwu-kwitu tunesootabue tuunguna.’
Nu mu tuukwe soo John noꞌoko numu oooonakwa besaꞌyoo. Pana saaꞌa soo gi maawaneꞌyoo numu Te Naa-tooha manedu ka John oooonakwasoo nasootuhikwu.
Soo John baa-wi numu matzakadu ewow numu baa-witoo ka suda mu tutumatuguna patamatzakakwunaꞌe. Umu ka Te Naa besa unnepu nakaꞌoedyuku manekeyakwe.
Noꞌyoona oꞌnosoo mu Te Naa nanayadooawabe ka Elijah nuga-kobenasoo wahagena. Mu sakwa oo nakaꞌoedyuku soo John ka Elijah-waꞌneꞌyoo, oosoo nu-kobenasoo petukwu.
Mu sakwa besa oetu nakapunne.
Nu mu-witu natugwengakwu. Mu doodooake-waꞌneꞌyoo gi besa mu pupuaꞌamu-no tuꞌateꞌa. Mu puapuaꞌamu sumuna mee mu netamma,
‘Numme mu tunekwukukwu. Numme saaꞌa nugagonnodooa, mee mu unnese, pana mu gi oo-toogoo manakwe. Mu ka suda ne sokwama, gi numme-no sakwaꞌe. Mu e unnepu gi heesoobedya.’
Soo John puu ka petuse, gi unu tuka, gi tuwazoo atsa baa hepe, umu yise meeoo ka John-witu netamma, ‘Soo John sutakoo pooha-gaꞌyoo numu poohadu.’
Ka nuka mu-baa petugase mee tuwazoo mu e nesootzeꞌma, ‘Oosoo nana ewa tukana, umu suda tutumatugudu pupuaꞌamu-gaꞌyoo.’ Umu besaꞌyoo numu ka Te Naa unnepu nakasopedakwadoona, ‘Besaꞌyoo,’ mee unnekwu.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu numu tooe tuukwe ka mooeꞌugasoo pukwiꞌyoona nanabesa tu pooha manepu, umu ka tooe nanabesa oo pooha manepu poonnese sapa, gi oo sooꞌoedyukuna gi ka suta tu tumatuguna nematzagakwunaꞌe.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee unakwe, “Mu numu ka mu Chorazin noko Bethsaida mee nananeadu-wi nonobe-gaꞌyoo mu tumaꞌemukwana mu-matoosoo kodyukwu. Nu mu tooꞌe tuukwepana mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukute, ka suda mu tumatuguna gi mu nanekwahakwunaꞌe.

Mu ka oꞌnosoo umu sutakoo numu ka mu Tyre noko Sidon mee nananeadu-witu oooonakwasoo suta-kwi manekwu ka saaꞌa Te Naa numu nemadabue-wi oo manepetuse. Umuoo otuoo numu sakwa uga ka besa e pooha manepu poonnese, umu sakwa sumuna ka suda tu tumatuguna nanekwahakwunise, tunakaꞌoedyuku mane.
Mu numu yaaꞌa ka Capernaum-witu unu besaꞌyoo mee naneyugwe. Pana mu maꞌemukwana mu-matoosoo kodyukwu.

Ka oꞌnosoo tu namane-kwaꞌneꞌyoosoo soo sutaꞌyoo puu ka Sodom mee naneadu-matoo kodyuse, umu nakootzasooa. Mu sumuna umuoo oooonakwa suda namatugukwu ka saaꞌa Te Naa numu nemadabuekwuse soo sutaꞌyoo mu-matoosoo kodyukwu.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe punnoꞌo tubetse besa soonammena meeoo nanesootuhaꞌe, “Ne Naa u noꞌokosoo hemma ka teepu-koobatu yise ne paꞌanakwitu tuwazoo nemadabue. U tubetse besaꞌyoo u ka umu u dooamu ka besa etzaga u unnepu nakasopedakwadookwuna mu sootuhipuna tooe gi unu mu natunedyooe sapa. Umu unu natunedyooepu gi gea u unnepu nakasopedakwatoo.
Yooonnekoo u tusooyugwe-kwaꞌne.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu numu mee netamma tuwow, “Soo E Naa noꞌokosoo hemma e sopedakwatoona e sootuhipu. Oosoo suuꞌmu e sopedakwatoo. Nu punnoꞌo ka E Naa sopedakwatoona nu ka numu oetu nakasopedakwadookwuna mu mesoo tuukwe.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu numu mee netamma, “Mu numu ka gi manese, suda sokwamana sakwa nuka nanetzakwiyaꞌe, oꞌno nu mu pewu-witu sootuhikwu.
Mu sakwa ka e unnepu oo nakana, oo nakaꞌoedyuku, nu ka besaꞌyoona, gi paba nasooyugwe.
Mu ka e unnepu etzaga mesoo nakabetseanona, oꞌno saaꞌa mu besa sokwamakwu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise numme pumme nakatzimodu-no oona tubewabe-too meꞌa. Numme tseagoena ka tumasuape-matu mabokana oo mahangemeana oo tuka.

Mu nanesootuhidu Jew numu moohedu, Pharisee mee nananeadu, mu poonne, umu yise Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “Tamme Jew numu mooa tumayohona, oꞌno nanesootuhi tabeno gi hee how nuugwe. Umu u nakatzimodu ka te Jew numu tumayohope gi heesoobedya. Umu ka tumasuape mahangena oo tukamena ka nanesootuhi tabeba gi numu hemma how yugwenoꞌo.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Mu ka sumuna uga oo naka ka oꞌnosoo soo besa tamme-kooba katudu, David mee naneadu, punnoꞌo ka te Jew tumayohope takopapu ka tu pupuaꞌamu-no tseagoena.
Soo David ka Te Naa nanesootuhi nobe-wi petugase ka tu pupuaꞌamu-no ka pooha tukaba tuka umu nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu suuꞌmu tukana. Oosoo ka Te Naa-nakwana gi hownneꞌyoo.

Mu sakwa tuwazoo oo nea ka te tumayoho-wi soo Te Naa meeoo, ‘Oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo ka nanesootuhi tabeno mu nanesootuhi tunedyooedu puu, oꞌno tabeno hemma how mesoo yukwe ka pabow tu nanesootuhi nobe-wiꞌyoona.’
Nu yise ka pabow nanesootuhi nobe oooonakwa besaꞌyoo.
Mu sakwa oo nakasopedakwadoo ka Te Naa unnena, ‘Mu ka nanatoo besaꞌyoona nuka mu sukwe hee-makapana oooonakwaꞌyoo nadatsuungu.’ Oꞌno mu oo sopedakwadookwu numme tookwa gi tumaꞌemukwa.
Nu yow mu Pabeꞌe. Nu noꞌoko hemma ka mu nanesootuhi-kwi mu nemadabuekwudu.”
Onona mease soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu nanesootuhidu-baa petuga.

Soo nana sumu-nakwatu mi pasadu ka nanesootuhipe-wi. Mu Te Pabeꞌe manena nesootuꞌadyidu soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “Oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo haaꞌa nu ka nana mi mabesakuna ka nanesootuhi tabeba numme puu, oꞌno tabeba gi hemma how yugwe?” Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe numu mabesakute oo nesootuꞌadyaꞌe.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu nanekwegea, “Aha, oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo ka besa tumatuguna ka oꞌno tabeba-wi. Mu muusoo punnoꞌo oo manekwu. Soo mu kootsoo sumuna ka teepu tawaga-witoo wuese ka mu nanesootuhi tabeno mu yise puu oo tzatsebooakwu. Soo numu ka kootsoo oooonnakwasoo nadatsunga.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka nana meeoo netamma, “Matuhee.” Oosoo yise matuhese soo Te Pabeꞌe oo mi mabesakuhoo ka sumunakwatu-kwaꞌnesoo.
Pana mu Jew numu Pharisee
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka pumme mu batsakwuna sopedakwadoose umu-baaꞌyoona meahoo. Ewaꞌyoo numu oo-no manekase oosoo yise mu tuoegoedu mabesaku yise meeoo mu netamma, “Mu numu saaꞌa gi tuukwepana.”
Ka oꞌnosoo Isaiah mee naneadu Te Naa yadooawabe tubotugupu-waꞌnesoo manepetu. Isaiah meeoo tubotugupu.

“Soo Te Naa tummatzidu menoꞌo yow tamme-baa. Soo Te Naa oo-matoo besa soonammena ka oo netutzease o esoo Te Pabeꞌe. Soo Te Naa Tu Besa Pooha-ma oo sootuhise oosoo ka mu gi Jew numu tuukwekwu ka Te Naa umu magwetzoikwuna.
Oosoo gi numu-no nahadu, gi paba yadooadu tuwazoo.
Tooe ka mu gi nanatzooedu noko tutuha mamanedu suda namanatzaya sapa, soo Te Pabeꞌe mu magwetzoikwu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu pumme wohonedu tooe matzooekukwu.
Noꞌobatusoo numu yise oo nakaꞌoedyukukwu, Te Pabeꞌe yise mu magwetzoikwu.”
Mu numu yise ka tsoapayidu nana ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa bi petu. Soo nana gi tubootabue, gi besa yadooa soo Te Pabeꞌe yise oo mabesaku. Soo nana yise besa tubootabue manese, besa yadooa tuwazoo.
Ewaꞌyoo numu ka nana namabesakuse oo poonnena, mee yise nananetamma, “Yow tookwa esoo nawahapunnedu Te Pabeꞌe, mooasoo tamme-baa petu.”

Mu Pharisee numu yise ka mu numu unnegonnona nakase, gi ka Te Pabeꞌe sooꞌoedyukuna mee nanaꞌunakwe, “Esoo nana numu nemooaga mu numu yise nakaꞌemukwa, sutakoo poohagana ooonneꞌyoona esoo tsoapa nematzagakwunidyakwe.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mooasoo pumme mu sooyugwena sopedakwadoona, mee mu netamma, “Mu numu ka pumme moohedu gi nakabetseana nanano nananepetukuna, soo mu moohedu gi mu numu moohe-waꞌne tabuꞌa, mu numu yise kadooꞌoo sukwe namayugwekwu.

Mu gi toge unakwe mu ka ‘Numu poohadu,’ mee e netammana. Soo numu poohadu gi hownnekoo nanesootuhina ka tsoapa numu-nagakoo nematzagakwuni-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Sutaꞌyoo gi ka tsoapa numu-nagakoo nanematzagakwunina petzape, umu tsoapa ka oo tutummatzina.
Mu Jew numu moohedu puu ka mu tsoapa numu-nagakoo nanesootuhina mu nematzagakunaꞌe. Mu puu gi numu poohadu mee mu neꞌa. Mu sakwa gi nuka meeoo soobedyapana.
Ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi nu nanesootuhina mu tsoapa nematzagakwuni, mu sakwa menoꞌo oo sopedakwadoo soo Te Naa noꞌoko numu sootuhaꞌe.

Nu ka mu susutakoo moohedu oooonakwasoo unu pooha-gana nuga pooha ooosapa oo matzooekute. Soo natzooedu nana puu ka tu hemma besa takonena gi hee oo matzooekute, pana ka numu tzakunase, oꞌno yise oo hemma hanekwu. Yooosoo nu ka sutakoo yugwese, oꞌno nu mu numu magwetzoikwu ka suta-makoo.
Soo numu gi e nakabetseadu tookwa e wohonekwu. Tooe haga tooe nu-witu mu numu gi tunesootabuedu, oosoo punnoꞌo e tumooꞌoodu-kwaꞌnesoo manepunne.
Nu togesapa mu tuukweꞌekwu tooe haga tooe numu yise ka Te Naa suda netammana nuka tuwazoo, oosoo nasoomuꞌwakwu. Pana soo tooe haga tooe ka Te Naa Besa Pooha suda netammana gi nasoomuꞌwa-waꞌneꞌyoo.

Tumasuape-waꞌneꞌyoo, soo tumasuape puu susumudu besaꞌyoo, susumudu sutaꞌyoo. Tamme puu oo sopedakwatoo ka tumasuape hownnekoo soo besaꞌyoo tumasuape pooedooꞌa, besa mesoo naduka. Mu tsaꞌabu pooe puu gi naduka-waꞌneꞌyoo. Susumudu numu eka sutakoo pooe-gakoo tsaꞌabu-waꞌneꞌyoo mu tumatugu-makoo umu nasopedakwatoo ka gi he-toogoo besaꞌyoona.
Mu togogwa-waꞌne nanasoobedya, mu suda apegea ka sutaꞌyoona. Tamme ka te unne-makoo nasopedakwadoo ka hownneꞌyoona.
Mu ka besaꞌyoona besa manena besa apegea, pana ka sutaꞌyoona suda manena, suda apegea.
Pana nu mu tubetse tuukwekwu, mu saaꞌa oo nanekwahakwu how manena mu meeoo tooe unakwe, oo-makoo saaꞌa soo Te Naa mu nemadabuedooa.
Mu kaaheno apegeana, soo Te Naa saaꞌa mu tookwa kaahenoꞌyoo mee mu netammadooa. Mu ka suda apegeana saaꞌa soo sutaꞌyoo mu-matoosoo kodyukwu.”
Yise mu susumudu nanesootuhidu tunedyooedu ka mu Pharisee mee nananeadu-nagatu ka Te Pabeꞌe mee netamma, “Nanasookwugi u tutumadabuena ne tzaponneku, oꞌno yise numme u sooꞌoedyukute.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Mu sutaꞌyoo numu, mu gi e nakaꞌoedyuku-waꞌneꞌyoo, ka nanasookwugi e manakwe e poonnese suuꞌmu. Nu ka oꞌnosoo Te Naa yadooawabe Jonah mee naneadu manepu-waꞌnesoo manekwu.

Soo Jonah puu ka pabatsekoo pakwe numua-wi pahe tabeno yise pahe togano tooiyakwe pana soo pabaꞌyoo baa-kummanatoo oo mootzakwate soo Jonah yise ka yaa teepu-koobasoo petu. Nu punnoꞌo oo-waꞌnesoo pahe tabeno yise pahe togano nu natukuse, oꞌno yowsoo ka teepu-koobasoo petukwu.
Ka Te Naa mumme nemadabuekwuse, mu numu

Soo mogoꞌne mana taba meanakwatu numu-kooba katudu punnoꞌo suta mu nemadabuekwu. Oosoo mogoꞌne tubetse kwingaꞌa manakwana kemmadu Jew numu-kooba katudu, Solomon mee naneadu yadooana nakagese, ‘Unu soonamme,’ mee oo nakana. Tooe nu ka Solomon oooonakwa unu soonammepana mu gi e heesoobedya.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tsoapa-witu numu natugweꞌngakwu. Soo tsoapa ka numu-nagakoo namatsatsebooese, kummaꞌakoosoo punaga tu ekeahookwuna wate, pana ka gi tumayuna
oꞌno yise mee unakwe, ‘Nu punowsoo kodyukakwu.’ Ka numu punagaꞌyoo tumeahoopu mayuse oosoo numu sumuna gisoo ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-ma nasoonatzaꞌena.

Oꞌno yise soo tsoapa natakwatsukwuhoo (7) kukummaꞌakoosoo tsoapa pumme oooonakwasoo unu susutakoosoo bise, ka punagaꞌyoona tu meapu-nagatoosoo kodyukakwu. Soo numu yise unusoo suda namanatzayakwe. Ooosoo tooe nu ka e sutaꞌyoona tooꞌe nematzagakwunise sapa umu gi e nakaꞌoedyukute. Ooonneꞌyoona soo sutaꞌyoo mu-tamme kemmakwu.”
Togesoo ka Te Pabeꞌe mu numu yadooedyakwe oo pea oo wangaꞌamu-no petugonno. Puuwuna konnopunnenasoo ka mu numu-matu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witoo taya.
Sumuꞌyoo meahoose ka Te Pabeꞌe tuukwe petuga, “U pea u wangaꞌamu-no u baꞌe u-no apeageakwuse.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe umu pumme nakatzimodu umu-matoo tayase mee yise oo netamma, “Umuoo suuꞌmu nu yaatoo nanumu-gaꞌyoo. Umuoo ka E Naa-matoo nanesootuhina. Noꞌoko tooe haga tooe ka E Naa-matoo nanesootuhidu oo unnetusoo manedu umuoo nu tubetse nanumu-gaꞌyoo.”
Oꞌno tabenasoo soo Te Pabeꞌe ka nobe-wiꞌyoona mease, ka banunadu-kumaba petuoogase oona katu.
Mu numu tubetse ewaꞌyoo ka oo naꞌoonnakwi manepunnena oo taakooꞌnapunne, soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka sake-wi tsebooese oe katu, mu numu ewaꞌyoo punnoꞌo ka baa-kumana konnopunne.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu tunedyooena mu natugwenga katu, mee mu netamma, “Soo nana tumasuaꞌa.
Susumudu soo oo pooe matu ka a nadapoohabe-witoo sawehoose mu hootsebaꞌa mu sooa.
Susumudu oo pooe tubebuꞌa-matu punnoꞌo oona tupe-nagatoo gi tookapu teepu-ga-witoo sawehoose yabesoo naahoose sapa,
soo taba mu kootuikuhoo, umu ka gi tookaputoo tunahabena.
Susumudu mu a pooe punnoꞌo tsaꞌabu-nagatoo sawehoose, naase sapa, soo tsaꞌabu ka ewa naana mu tatsatsebooge.
Susumudu besow teepu-koobatoo sawese besa naakese ewa pooetooa.
Mu sakwa ka mumme e tunedyooe-makoo a nakasopedakwadoose mamakoo natunedyooe.”
Numme Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu Te Pabeꞌe-baa petugase meeꞌe oo tubenga, “How manena u ka mu numu natugwenga?”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ne nanekwegease mee unakwe, “Mu e nakatzimodu mooasoo nasootuhipu. Mu mooasoo oo nakasopedakwadoo ka Te Naa unnepu. Mu nasootuhipu pana mu numu gisoo ookow nasootuhaꞌe, ooonneꞌyoona nu meeoo mu natugwenga katu Te Naa nuka tunetammakuna.
Soo tooe haga tooe numu ka sagwane tunakaꞌoedyukuse, saaꞌa oo-no meadabena unusoo tunakaꞌoedyuku manepetugakwu. Tooe haga tooe numu ka gi tunakaꞌoedyukuna hanobasoo gi tunakaꞌoedyuku manekwu.
Ooonneꞌyoona nu mu numu natuukweꞌnga. ‘Tooe mu numu oo poonnepana, umu gi ooka tu nakasopedakwatoona petzape. Tooe mu numu oo nakapana, gi oo nakaꞌoedyukute.’

Oꞌnosoo Te Naa yadooawabe Isaiah mee naneadu mu numu manekwu-kwitu botugupu, mee naꞌunakwe, ‘Mu ooosapa ka Te Naa besa unnepu nakamo, pana gi oo soonakaꞌoedyukute. Mu tuwazoo tooe oo poonne pana gi oo soo nakasoopedakwadoo.

Mu numu ka Te Naa besa unnepu tu nakasopedakwadookwuna gi petzape, tooꞌe mumme tu tuukwe sapa. Mu sakwa ka mumme oo tuukwena nakaꞌoedyukuna, mu poonnena nakasopedakwadoona, oꞌno sakwa mu nu-matoo kemmase, nu yise mu sootuhikwu.’
Nu mu sootuhikwu mu ka oo nakana, oo oedyukuna ka mumme e tuukwena, oo poonnena, oo nakasopedakwadoona ka e manena.

Nu togesapa mu tuukwekwu, oꞌnosoo mu nanamooatupu ewaꞌyoo mu Te Naa yadooawabe, mu kukummaꞌyooosoo bebesaꞌyoo numu e tooe soopoonne pana e tooe soonaka pana gi hownnekoo oo mane-waꞌneꞌyoo. Oꞌnosoo nu gi mu nanamooatupu-baa pana menoꞌo mu nasootuhipu nu ka mu-baa petuse.
E nakapunne nu ka e natugwenga-kwitu mu tunedyooekwu. Esoo natugwengapu-kwitu, tamme ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukudu.

Susumudu ka Te Naa unnepu naka pana gi oo oedyukuna ooonneꞌyoona ka a pooe a natapohabeku-kwitoo a sawe-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Soo a pooe ka Te Naa unnepu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Soo gi togeꞌyoo ka Te Naa unnepu-witu mu numu nemooagatu, oosoo yise ka hootsebaꞌa-waꞌneꞌyoosoo ka a ewana ka a pooe kwakwape oo totsopetahookwu. Yoo mu numu hanobasoo gi tunakaꞌoedyuku manekwu. Oosoo ka a pooe a nadapodo-wi namasuadu-kwaꞌnesoo.
Susumudu numu-matoo sumuna ka tupe-nagatoo a pooe nabebuꞌa-kwaꞌneꞌyoo ka Te Naa unnepu nakana, besa Te Naa unnepu-matoo nakasokwama.
Mu nanewohonena mu numu yabesoo tunakaꞌoedyukumakwukwu.

Susumudu numu sumuna ka a pooe mu tsaꞌabu-nagatoo sawe-kwaꞌneꞌyookwu. Mu numu ka Te Naa unnepu nakapana ka ewa tu heetooana sumu petukute, yise ka teepu-kooba tooe hownnekoo tooe suda oo soonammekute. Esoo ka besa te tooꞌe tunakapu tamatzooekukwu.

Pana mu numu-matu ka a pooe besow teepuna namasuadu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo, umu ka besa naꞌunnedu nakase oo nakaꞌoedyukukwu. Umu ka besa-kwi natumasuakudu-kwaꞌneꞌyookwu ka ewow besow pooe saawe-waꞌne ka Te Naa unnepu nakaꞌoedyukute. Tamme ka Te Naa besa unnepu mu numu tuukwena, oꞌno ewaꞌyoo umu numu tunakaꞌoedyukukwu.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise kummaꞌakoosoo mu numu natugwenga tunedyooe tuwow. “Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka mu gi tunakaꞌoedyudu-no namayuꞌa yaa teepu-koobatu. Ka nana tubewabe-gaꞌyoo-kwaꞌne, soo numu tubewabe hee-gaꞌyoo puu ka besow tu pooe suuꞌmu masuakute.
Mu numu yise tumasuamakwuse ka tu yongose utuika ka tu woho togabama tu tubewabe-wi petuse ka tsaꞌabu pooe ka besow tumasuape-nagatoo pebuꞌase meaꞌa.
Ka tumasuape besa naahookese, soo tsaꞌabu punnoꞌo oo-nagakwi namayuadu naahooke.
Soo tumasuadu tummatzidu mee oo netamma, ‘Numme oo sopedakwadoo ka besow a pooe mawe tubewabe-wi u masuase. How yise manena mu tsaꞌabue punnoꞌo umu-nagakwi naꞌa?’
Soo tumasuadu meeꞌe mu nanekwegea, ‘Oosoo nuka wohoꞌnedu ka sumuna mow manakwe.’ Umu oo tummatzidu mee oo netamma, ‘Numme sakwa mu tsaꞌabu tzanooedapebuꞌa.’
Soo tubewabe hee-gaꞌyoo meeꞌe mu nanekwegea, ‘Gi menoꞌosoo. Mu sumuna ka besow tumasuape nokosoo ka tsaꞌabu tzanooeꞌdakwunidooa ka menoꞌosoo oo manena.
Ka tumasuape nayasakwuse, nu saaꞌa mu yasadu mee netammadooa, Ka tsaꞌabu mooe hanese, nana-ma mu wutamase mu tuni. Oꞌno saaꞌa yise ka besow tu pooe e tubane nobe-kwi tubane.’ “

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu numu tuwazoo kummaꞌakoosoo natugwenga ka mu numu nanesootuhidu mane-kwitu. Sumuꞌyoo natugwengape meeoo yise oo soo puu ka tuutsekoo a pooe manakwana suakese ka saaꞌa naakese pabatse suakese paba manepetugase nanaꞌemota maꞌnatooakwu. Mu hootsebaꞌa yise oo maꞌna-ma mesoo aata yoohoo soo nanesootuhibu manepunne. Menoꞌo numme tutunakaꞌoedyukute huutseꞌyoosoo ka saaꞌa ewow numu tunakaꞌoedyukudu manese ka tutsekoo a pooe paba naa petuga-kwaꞌne manekwu nanaꞌemota maꞌnaga-kwaꞌne manepetugakwu.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe ooosapa mu numu tuwazoo natugwengayakwe ka umu-matu tunakaꞌoedyukute ewaꞌyoosoo numu saaꞌa tunakaꞌoedyuku manekwu. Meeꞌe yise unakwe, “Ka mogoꞌne tukaba tohanedyidu-kwaꞌne. Oosoo puu ka tumayuaꞌa hongobe noko mooe mayuꞌase, ka saaꞌa soo oo tukabadoona besa koposekwu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ewow numu nanatuukweꞌe hemma mu nakasopedakwatoo-kwikoo yise mu ewow numu manaꞌyoona saaꞌa ka nanatugwengapu tu nakatzimodu tunesootabuedooa.
Soo oꞌnosoo Te Naa yadooawabe ka Te Pabeꞌe natugwengakwu-kwitu wahana, meeꞌe tubotugupu, “Nu mu Pabeꞌe mu natugwengakwu ka gi hannanoꞌo mu nakapugana.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu numu baaꞌyoona meꞌase ka nobe-kwi ka numme pumme nakatzimodu-no tzoonooahooka. Numme yise meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe tubenga, “Numme gi ka natugwenga-kwitu nakasopedakwadoo, hayoo u unnena?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeꞌe ne nanekwegea, “Nu ka tumasuadu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo.

Noꞌyoona numu ka teepu-koobatu yaatuoo ka tubewabe-kwaꞌnesoo manepunne. Mu numu nuka nanesootuhidu bebesow a pooe-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Mu numu ka sutakoo nakabetseadu punnoꞌo ka sutakoo tsaꞌabu sua-kwaꞌneꞌyoo.
Soo Gi Togeꞌyoo e wohonedu ka tsaꞌabu masuapu. Ka saaꞌa soo Te Naa eka teepu-koobatu mu numu nemadabuekwu. Mu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo ka Te Naa tummatzikwu.

Nu ka mu toha kakasa-gakoo, nuka tummatzidu yaa teepu-koobatoo tayakwu, oꞌno umu ka mu tumaꞌemukwadu numu kadooꞌoo mayugwekwu. Ka mu tsaꞌabu natunikwu-kwaꞌne, umu ka sutakoo numu goso gi tookedu-witoo maꞌanakwu. Umu suda sokwamana sakwikwu. Oꞌno soo Te Naa ka teepu atasoo mayugwekwu.
Umu numu Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhidu ooosapa padakwetseaakwu ka taba-kwaꞌne, ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona. Mu sakwa e nakapunnena a nakasopedakwadoo.

Soo Te Naa God tubetse besa te sootuhaꞌe tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe besa nakabetseana, ka yaaꞌa teepu-koobatu hemma te heegana oooonakwasoo besaꞌyoo mee oo sooyugwena, ka hemma puma tu tumuna tubewabe-wi watze nagoodu-kwaꞌne. Soo numu ka oo mayuse oo watze tugukwusoo yise noꞌoko tu hemmama tumuse ka tabewabe tumukwusesoo, oosoo besa soonammena ka hemma puma tu tumukwuna nawatzetugu-matoo.
Tamme sakwa oo tubetse soogwi ka Te Naa tamme sootuhikwuna.
Soo numu puu unu nanenagadu tsomebe mayuhoose, ka unu oo sookwina noꞌoko tu hemma-ma tumuse yise ka umu tu soogwina tsomebe tumukwu.

Ekow teepu-koobatu, mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-no namayuꞌa, umu ka pakwe nuukwi-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Soo numu puu ka puma tu tukwina ka paa-witoo tzakwekuse noꞌobatusoo pakwe hanehookwu susumudu besaꞌhoo, susumudu gi besaꞌhoo.
Ka tu tukwinoo kaanohoose bakumanatoo oo tzapewoyaga. Oosoo ka besow pakwe tu kawona-wi hanemena ka sutakoo yise tapebuamena.
Ka Te Naa ka teepu atasoo yugwese mu toha kakasagakoo Te Naa tutummatziwabe mu numu nanasukwesoo yugwe, mu bebesahoo sugwesoo, mu sutakoo too sugwebasoo, ka mu pakwe nuukwi-kwaꞌne.
Mu sutaꞌyoo ka goso gi tokedu-witoo nahanekwunikwu umu suda sokwamana sakwikwu.
Mu haaꞌa ka mumme e tuukwena nakasopedakwatoo?” meeꞌesoo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu numu tubenga. Umu oo nanekwegea, “Aha numme tooe besa oo nakasopedakwatoo.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Soo mooa tumayohope sopedakwadoodu ka menoꞌo mumme e tunedyooepu nakasopedakwadoose, oꞌno oosoo besakoosoo mu numu tunedyooekwu. Howꞌoo puu soo numu pudutupu nokosoo mooatupu hee-gaꞌyoo tu nobe-kwikoo yise mu wutzadyupa, ꞌyoo manepunnedu unu besaꞌyoo.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu natugwengamakwuse,

tu nanumu-baasoo kodyu petuga. Ka mu numu-baa nanesootuhi petuga, ka mu numu besasoo Te Naa-witu tuukwena. Mu numu oe oo nakapunnedu meeoo netamma, “Haꞌoo yise soo Jesus besa yadooa, pana oosoo sukwe tamme-matusoo?
Tamme oo sopedakwatoo oosoo Mary sukwe tooa. Mu James, Joseph, Judas, Simon yise a wangaꞌamu.
Yise a punneꞌemu yow tamme-naga. Haꞌoo yise soo Jesus unu pooha-gaꞌyoo?”

Ooonneꞌyoona yise umu gi ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukute. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeꞌe mu netamma, “Ka yaa teepu-koobatu mu numu ka Te Naa yadooawabe nakaꞌoedyukukwu, oogowsoo nanumu, oo nonopuaꞌamu-no suuꞌmu gi.”
Huutsekoosoo numu tuoegoedu-matu oetu soo Te Pabeꞌe mabesaku, umu ka gi tunakaꞌoedyukuna.
Ka mu Jew numu-kooba katudu Herod mee naneadu ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus besa tumatugu-kwitu pudu nakase oosoo mu pumme tummatzidu meeoo netamma.
“How haaꞌa soo John numu baa-wi matzakadu pumme te batsasesapa tuusootabuese, unu poohadooapu? Esoo Jesus John haaꞌa?”
Ka oꞌnosoo soo Herod tu pabeꞌe nodukwa nodukwadoose, soo mogoꞌne Herodias mee naneadu.
Oꞌno soo John yise ka Herod ooosapa mee netammanoꞌo, “Gi toge u manakwe. Gi ka Herodias nabaaꞌyookupana,” mee.
Oosoo yise ka John unnena gi petzabena oo soobatsapana gi oo manakwe ka mu numu-ma suina. Mu numu ka John Te Naa yadooawabe oedyukute.
Ka Herod nawuena soomaꞌyuna tabenoꞌo soo Herodias padu mu numu ewana-kobenaꞌyoona oo nugakute. Soo Herod yise tubetse besa soonamme.
Soo Herod yise ka pumme nugakudu meeoo oo netamma, “Tooe hemmadooe u soogwina nu u geakwu.”
Soo tsuadumu yise ka tu pea tubengase soo pea yise meeoo, “Ka John koota tsekeaꞌase, yise ka oo wo hanese, yise tseda-wi oo wuna,”
Soo Herod yise oo nesootuꞌadyaꞌe ka John tu batsa tuungukwuna, pana ewaꞌyoo numu yise oo naka ka Herod unnena.
Soo Herod yise mu tukwutumadu ka John koota tsekaꞌa tuungu.
Umu ka oo wo tsekaꞌase oo wo tseda-wi oo wunase, yise ka Herodias padu yongageaꞌa. Soo tsuadumu yise ka Herodias gea.
Mu John pupuaꞌamu ka oo nakase yise mease oo tugudooase ka Te Pabeꞌe tuukweꞌe.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus yise ka John nabatsana nakase Te Pabeꞌe ka tu nakatzimodu-no ka sake-wi kuase ka banunadu ninapatoo natzemangeka numu-wanatoo. Pana ewaꞌyoo numu ka mu meana nakase ka banunadu-kumi sogo mease oo takwi petuga.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka sake-wiꞌyoona ka baa-kumabatoo ewow mu numu-baa petuga, oosoo oeꞌyoona tsebooeke. Oꞌno yise soo Te Pabeꞌe tutuha mu soobedyana mu tuoegoedu mabesakute.
Ka tu yongokese, numme oo nakatzimodu oo-baa petuse meeoo oo netamma, “U sakwa mu taꞌya ka kwayaꞌyoona mu kemmase. Umu sakwa puusoo tu tukakwuna hownnekoo mayu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus mee ne netamma, “Gi umu numu tayapana, mu sakwa muusoo yaanoko mu maka.”
Numme ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “Manegeoo numme tutukutsekoo patzebonomadu tukaba-gaꞌyoo. Yise waahoo numme too pakwe-gaꞌyoo.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo ne netamma, “Yaa nu-matoo oo hanehooke.”

Oꞌno yise soo Te Pabeꞌe mu numu ka pooena mu neꞌaataꞌakuse ka manegeoo tutukutsekoo patzebonomadu tukaba, noko waahoo pakwe hemehoose toogoopatu poonnese nanesootuhi. Oꞌno yise ka tukaba noko pakwe tzabokase umu pumme nakatzimodu mu ewow numu maka tuungu.

Mu numu yise noꞌyoona togekoo tukase wutzuꞌme. Ka tu naduka makwuse numme ka mu tugupenina ka tukaba noko pakwe matsobase oosoo tukapu nagupenina sumu-manoꞌyoona waha-ma tsebooekudu (12) kawona-wi umu kaanokuhoo.
Mu numu tubetse ewaꞌyoo namaka (5000 nanana).
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka numme pumme nakatzimodu suuꞌmu ka sake-wi taya. Umu ka banunadu ninapatoo natzemangekakwu. Oꞌno yise soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu ewow numu tuwazoo mu nobe-kwitoosoo taꞌya.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka giba-matoo mease nanesootuhaꞌe, ka tu yongokese oosoo puu suuꞌmu o.
Ka sake mooasoo banamookwi manikease, unu hukwabetu soo paa unu bayutsungakooha.
Awamooasoo gisoo tu tabuagena soo Te Pabeꞌe ka sake-witoo meahoo baa-koobakwi kemmakaꞌe.
Numme tunakatzimodu sake-wi meana ka Te Pabeꞌe numme-tamme kemmakaꞌe oo poonne oo-ma unu sui. “Uda! Tsoapa tamme-tamme,” mee numme unnemoꞌo.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee sookweta unne, “Gi suipana. Nu yow kemma.”
Soo Peter yise mee oo netamma, “U ka togesapa Ne Pabeꞌena ka paa-koobakwi namatoo e bikwu. Oꞌno yise nu u oedyukukwu.”
“Yaatoo kemmow,” meeoo soo Te Pabeꞌe oo netamma. Soo Peter yise ka sake-wiꞌyoona wuese ka Te Pabeꞌe-tamme ka baa-koobakwi meahoo.
Ka hukwapa-ma suise tooꞌe padadyaꞌe. Pabatse waꞌagenumme, “E Pabeꞌe e magwetzoi.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka paa-wikoo yabesoo oo tzatseboogese oo magwetzoihoo yise meeoo oo netamma, “Mow u ka gi e sooꞌoedyukuna. U sakwa yaa manakwana gi waha-tamme tusooyugwepana.”
Ka sake-wisoo mu kuase, soo hukwapa wuyooihoo.
Mu naana ka sake-wi manepunnedu ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo nanesootuhikooha, “U tookwa togesapa Te Naa Besaa Tooa.” mee yise oo netamma.
Umu yise ka mangekase ka Gennesaret mee naneadu-kwi petuga.
Mu nanana yise onoko ka Te Pabeꞌe poonnese oo sopedakwadoona oetu mana tooe nanatuukwe. Mu numu yise mu tuꞌoegoedu mu nuummadu oo-baa tsato petugonno.
Mu tuoegoedu ka oo-baa petugadyina ka pukwi oo namasooana sukwe tzamayina, besa maniyakwe.
Mu Jew numu nanesootuhipe papabeꞌe numu tunedyooedu ka mu Pharisee mee nananeadu-nagatu, ka Jerusalem mee naneadu-kwiꞌyoona kemmase, ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petu.

Mu Pharisee yise meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “How manena mu u nakatzimodu ka te nanamooatupu tumayohope-too gi meꞌa? Oosoo te tumayohope puu mee te tunedyooe, tamme mooe mabatzagase yise tuka. Pana umu ume nakatzimodu gisoo namabatzagapana tuka.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu Pharisee nanekwegea, “Mu muusoo ka Te Naa tamme tunetammakupu tagotekena ka mu nanamooatupu tumahohona nagena.”
Soo Te Naa unnepu mee naꞌunakwe, ‘Mu sakwa mu naanapuaꞌamu besa matugu yise mu ka mu naanapuaꞌamu suda netammadu sakwa nabatsa.’
Mumme putoogoo mooa tumayohona pana mu meeoo, ‘Tamme sumuna ka mu naanapuaꞌamu mee netammakwu. “Nu ka Te Naa God tummatzaꞌe, gi umu e naanapuaꞌamu.” ’
Mu gi besa ka mu naanapuaꞌamu matugu ka oo tumatuguna. Mu ka Te Naa tunetammana takopa ka mu mooa tumayohope ooosapa nagena.
Mu ka Te Naa nakabetseꞌa mee mu naneyukwe. Soo oꞌnosoo Te Naa yadooawabe Isaiah togesapa mu netamma ka mee tubotuguna.
‘Umu numu meeoo unnepana mu tupa sukwe apeakana gi mu tubetse sokwamana. Umu ka Te Naa gi nakabetsea.

Umu ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe mee sukwe naneyugwepana ka mu numu aata-tammesoo neꞌemukwa ka pummesoo tusooyugwena ka mu numu ewana mee netamma. “E nakapunne mummesoo tumayohope tumayoho, oꞌno Te Naa nakabetsea.” ’ “
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu numu ewana mee netamma, “E nakapunne e nakasopedakwatoo.
Mu sakwa e nakasopedakwatoo soo hemma mu tukana gi hownneꞌyoo Te Naa-nakwana. Soo suda te tumatuguna, yise gi besa soonammena, umuoo soo Te Naa gi petzape.”
Umu oo nakatzimodu ka Te Pabeꞌe-tzageꞌetoo mease meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “U haaꞌa oo sopedakwatoo mu nanesootuhidu papabeꞌemu Pharisee mee nananeadu unu sutagonno ka ookow nakase?”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu nanekwegea, “Mu Pharisee nakatsasoopedya. Soo E Naa puusoo saaꞌa kadooꞌoo mu mayugwedooa, umu Pharisee ka gi ooka nakaꞌoedyukuna. Umuoo ka tsaꞌabu namasua-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Umuoo sukwe natuoona pepuꞌakwu tsaꞌabu-waꞌne. Umuoo gi tubootabuedu numu kummaꞌakoosoo gi tubootabuedu numu tzakadu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Umu Pharisee gi kaaheno numu neyugwemodu. Umu ooonneꞌyoo numu ka teepu tawaga-kwitoo sawehookwu ka gi ka besa podo meana.”
Soo Peter yise ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “U ka natugwengapu naꞌunnena ne tuukwe.”
Mee yise soo Te Pabeꞌe oo nanekwegea, “Umu ume nakatzimodu gisoo besa e nakasopedakwatoona meeoo unakwe.
Soo hemma te tukana puu te sapu-kwitoo meana yise kaaheno tsebooegea.
Pana soo suda mu unnena ka meeoo tuwazoo mu suda tusooyugwe, oosoo suda mu mayugwe.
Tamme ka suda tusooyugwena sumuna saaꞌa numu batsadooa, kumanosoo napootamana ka nanodukwana, tuduhana, esayina, suda numu-witu nemadabuena.
Ka suda tumatuguna soo numu gi besaꞌyoo; tooe mu ka mu mooe tumayohope nagepana, oosoo gi besa mu mayugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus ka numme tu nakatzimodu-no yise oona wawaꞌa tubewabe-witoo Tyre noko Sidon-witoo mease o petuga.
Oꞌnona yise sumuꞌyoo wawaꞌa mogoꞌne oo-baa petuse meeoo oo netamma, “E Pabeꞌe u sakwa e tummatzi, e padu unu tsoapayaꞌe ooka oo nematzagakwuniku.”
Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe yise gi ka wawaꞌa mogoꞌne nanekwegeꞌa. Numme oo nakatzimodu yise meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Ka mogoꞌne taya, oosoo te nakwi nanetzakwiyaꞌe kemmanoꞌo.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Nu mu Jew numu suuꞌmu magwetzoigena.”
Soo wawaꞌa mogoꞌne yise oo-kobena meatzedo petusoo meeꞌesoo tuwazoo unne, “E Pabeꞌe, e tummatzi.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise oo sukwe nemapoonnena meeoo oo netamma, “Gi nu wawaꞌa sootummatzi. Numme Jew mu wakwawaꞌa saduꞌu mee neꞌa. Mu numu puu tu dooamu tukakwuna tu saduꞌu gi maka.”
Yise soo wawaꞌa mogoꞌne mee punnoꞌo nanekwegea, “Tooe saduꞌu pana puu ka hemma nagupenina namaka. U sakwa nuga padu mabesaku u nanumu noko,” mee.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka wawaꞌa mogoꞌne meeoo netamma, “Besaꞌyoo u e nakaꞌoedyukudu u ka meeoo unnena nu u tummatzikwu. U nobe-kwitoo yise kodyuka nu ka tsoapa mooasoo nematzagakwunihoo,” meeꞌe. Soo mogoꞌne padu yise besa mani.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka numme tu nakatzimodu-no oona mease, ka banunadu Galilee mee naneadu kumi meꞌa. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka gibana manepetugase oonahoo katu.

Ewaꞌyoo numu oo-baa petudyipunne, nanakummaꞌakoosoo tuoe-gaꞌyoo susumudu toyodu, susumudu gi tubootabuedu, susumudu gi nummedu, susumudu gi apegeadu. Mu tuoegoedu numu noꞌyoona Te Pabeꞌe-kumaba natzapookwakute. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise noꞌoko mu mabesaku.

Mu numu yise mee nanaꞌunakwe, “Mu gi apeageadu apegea mani, umu gi yuyutsungamodu nummenumme mani, mu totoyodu kaaheno mo mani, mu gi tutubooetubooedu punnoꞌo yaatu poonne mani. Soo Te Naa tubetse besaꞌyoona tooe gi te Jew numu sapa te sootuhaꞌe.”

Saaꞌa yise soo Te Pabeꞌe numme pumme nakatzimodu mee netamma, “Nu mu numu sootuhaꞌe. Umu pahe tabeno ooosapa nu-noꞌyoona, gi hemma tuka. Nu gi mu tayakwuni-waꞌne nuumma ka mu tzuagoꞌe. Umu-matu sumuna mana po-witoo tseaꞌanooakwu, tamme sakwa mu maka.”
Numme oo tunakatzimodu yise mee Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Tamme gi mu maka-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme gi hownnekoo yaatuoo tukapu mayu-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
“Haaꞌnoko tamme tukaba-gaꞌyoo?” mee soo Te Pabeꞌe. “Natakwatsukwuꞌyoo (7) tamme tukaba-gana yise tamme huuhoosoo dudutsekoo pakwe,” mee numme ka Te Pabeꞌe nanekwegea.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka numu ewana ka teepu-kooba aata tuungu
yise ka natakwatsukwuꞌyoo tututsekoo tukaba tu mi-wi hemmase, ka pakwe nokosoo, Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe, yise ka tukaba tzabokase, ka pumme nakatzimodu mu ewow numu maka tuungu.
Noꞌyoona numu yise wutzuꞌmehoo. Numme oo nakatzimodu ka mu tugupenina natakwatsukwuoo kawona kaanokuhoo.
Umu tubetse ewatseꞌyoo numu yise oe (4000 naana).
Soo Te Pabeꞌe noko yise mu numu nobe-kwitoo tayahoose ka sake-wi tsebooese, ka baa natzemangeka ka Magadan mee naneadu teepu-witoo mea numme pumme nakatzimodu-no.

Mu nanesootuhidu moohedu ka mu Pharisee noko Sadducees mee nananeadu-nagutu kemmana ka Te Pabeꞌe nesootzemanasoo oo-baa petuhoose mee oo netamma, “Ka paꞌanakwanasoo nanasookwugidu tumadipu ne tzapoonneku, oꞌno yise numme u nakaꞌoedyukukwu.”
Te Pabeꞌe mee mu netamma, “Mu oo sopedakwatoo mooa tabeno besa nuummapunnekwu ka yaa yongona gi tu koomeapunne.
Ka yaa togano ka muha nakagoapunne, mu oo sopedakwatoo mooa tomoapunnekwu. Mu mooasoo ka koomeba-witu sopedakwatoo pana mu gi oo nakasopedakwatoo ka teepu manekwuna ka nuka, mu Pabeꞌe petuse.

Mu numu menoꞌo mommodu sutaꞌyoo mu ka nanabesa e tumadina mumme e tzapoonneku tuunguna, oꞌno mu e sooꞌoedyukukwu mee nu unnena. Mu sakwa oo sopedakwatoo nuga hownneꞌyoona, nu ka Jonah-waꞌneꞌyookwu. Oꞌnosoo soo Jonah puu pahe tabeno ka pakwe numua-wiꞌyoose sapa gwetzoise ka teepu-koobasoo tuwazoo nummenumme. Nu Jonah-waꞌneꞌyookwu. Ooonneꞌyoona nu ka yaꞌese pahe tabeno manepunnese namayodakwu. Oꞌno yise mu oo sopedakwadookwu, nu yow Mu Pabeꞌe.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise umu-baaꞌyoona mea numme pumme nakatzimodu-no ka banunadu natzemangeka. Numme oo nakatzimodu ka tukaba ne tunokwuna soomuꞌwake. Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo ne netamma,
“Mu sakwa ka mu Pharisee noko Sadducee tukaba namayana nuutumooe.”
Numme yise mee nananetamma, “Oosoo meeoo unakwe ka gi tukaba te hanekese.”
