Soo Te Pabeꞌe oo sopedakwatoo ka ne unnena, yise mee ne netamma, “Mu tookwa gisoo e nakaꞌoedyukute.

Mu sakwa tooe gi tukaba-gapana gi suda oo sooyugwepana. Mu sakwa e nakasopedakwatoo, nu mu mabetseakwu. Mu sakwa oo soomayu sumu, nu ewow numu maka manegehoosoo (5) tukaba-gana. Mu oo soomaꞌyu ka ewow nagupenina muusoo tzoba.
Nu mooasoo yise tuwow ewowsoo numu maka, natakwatseꞌyoo (7) tukaba-gana, mu yise ewowsoo tuwazoo hane ka a nagupenina.
Mu sakwa tuwazoo oo sopedakwatoo nu gi tukaba-witu netamma. Mu sakwa ka mu Pharisee noko Sadducee tukaba namayuna nuutumooe.”

Numme oo nakatzimodu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe nakasopedakwatoo, oosoo gi ka tukaba-witu netammana pana ne tuukwena gi ka mu Jew numu nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu nakabetseapana, umu ka besow ka sutakoo noko mayuꞌa.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Philippi mee naneadu teepu-wi petuga soo Te Pabeꞌe ka numme tunakatzimodu meeoo tubenga, “Haꞌyoo mu nu-kwitu naka?”

Numme tunakakatzimodu yise meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe nanekwegea, “Susumudu umu-matu mee u netamma, ‘U ka sumuna John, numu baa-wi matzakadu.’ Susumudu yise punnoꞌo meeoo, ‘U, Ne Naa yadooawabe Elijah mee naneadu, pute Jeremiah mee naneadu, tooe haga tooe sumuna ka umu Te Naa yadooawabe-matu.’ “
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka numme pumme nakatzimodu meeoo netamma. “Mu puu haꞌyoo e sooyugwe?”
Soo Simon Peter oo nekwegea, “U yow Ne Pabeꞌe. U ka Te Naa Besaa Tooaꞌa.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo ka Simon Peter netamma, “U Simon, Jonah tooa, soo Te Naa tookwa u sootuhipuna u tunedyooepu. Ooonneꞌyoona u e nakasopedakwadoo. Sukwe numu gi nu-kwitu meeoo u tunedyooe-waꞌneꞌyoo.

Yaa manakwana nu Peter mee u neakwu, Tupe mee naꞌunnedu. U tupe-waꞌneꞌyoo u e tubetse nakaꞌoedyukute, nu yow U Pabeꞌe. U ka yaa teepu-koobatu nanesootuhikuna, soo te paꞌanakwatu u nakasootuhikwu. Oꞌno numme nanesootuhidu ka Etzaꞌa suda unnepu matzooekukwu.
Nu E Besa Pooha-matu-ma u sootuhikwu, u saaꞌa ewow numu ka nanesootuhibu tunedyooedooa. Soo E Besa Pooha nayadooana mooasoo Te Naa tunemamakwupu, ookow u punnoꞌo mayohonokwu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo ne netamma, “Gi menoꞌo e wahapana nu yow Mu Pabeꞌe.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe oowe manakwana ooosapa ka umu pumme nakatzimodu mee tuukwegena, “Nu Jerusalem-wi petugase mu Jew numu moohedu e kusedyana e batsakwu. Pana waha tabe mease nu tuusootabuekwusoo.”
Soo Peter yise seagabatoo ka Te Pabeꞌe bise oo nesagwikuna meeꞌe oo netamma, “Nu ka Te Naa-matoo u nanesootuhikukwu. Soo Te Naa u sootuhise u gi nabatsakwu, gi yise meeoo tusooyugwepana.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise oo nakasopedakwadoose ka Peter-tamme nakwumanase mee oo netamma, “Gi ookow e tuukwepana. U sukwe numu-waꞌne tusooyukwe ka sutaꞌyoona, u gi ka Te Naa-ma nasoonatzaꞌe.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise numme nakatzimodu mee netamma, “Soo tooe haga tooe nuka nakaꞌoedyukudu sakwa mee unne, ‘Gi hownneꞌyoo tooe nu ka Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo nabatsase sapa, nu oo nagenokwu.’
Tooe haga tooe ka nu-koobatoo nasoomawunina oosoo namagwetzoikwu. Soo tooe haga tooe ka puusoo tooꞌe namagwetzoina puusoo kadooꞌoo namayugwekwu.
Soo tooe haga tooe ka teepu-koobaꞌyoona ewow hee-gana yaꞌese soo ewow oo hee-gana gi oo magwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Nu, Mu Pabeꞌe, ka E Naa pooha tooha-kwi ka umu Te Naa tummatzidu toha kakasa-ga-no petuse saaꞌa ka mu numu nemadabuekwu.
Nu togesapa mu tuukwekwu susumudu menoꞌo yow mu konnodu-matu gisoo tuidu, mu ka Te Naa pooha-toohakwi e gwetzoina poonnekwu.”
Naapahe tabe mease soo Te Pabeꞌe pihoo tu pupuamu oona kiba-matoo bika, mu oo pupuaꞌamu mee nananeadu Peter-no, James, yise oo wanngaꞌa John.
Togesoo ka Te Pabeꞌe nanesootuhaꞌe oo koba atasoo tubuagaꞌa, yise pukwi oo namasooana tohawiyanegaꞌa, yise patakwetseapunne.
Wahaꞌyoo nanana Moses-no Elijah mee nananeadu yise oo-baa petuse oo-no yadooꞌa.
Soo Peter yise meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Besa numme ka yaanona, ka oo u soomanakwe numme sakwa pahe tutukutsekoo tatza nobe mu matabuekukwu umme Elijah yise Moses.”
Togesoo oo yadooawunu oosoo koomeba umu-kooba habagahoo petu. Oonagaꞌyoona yise soo Te Naa mu yadooe, “E Besaa Tooa unu e soobedyana, besa e masoonammedu, mu sakwa besa a nakabetsea.”
Umu oo pupuaꞌamu unu nakasui meatzedose oo-matoo nanesootuhigonno.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe umu-matoo mease yise mu tzamase meeoo mu netamma, “Yosuhoo gi suipana.”
Umu yise yaatu poonnese, soo Te Pabeꞌe suuꞌmu yise o.
Umu ka giba-maꞌyoona sawekese soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Gi haga tuukwepana ka yaanoko mu poonnepu ka e namayodase saaꞌa mu numu tuukwe.”
Numme Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu oo tubenga, “Haꞌyoo unnena mu Jew numu nanesootuhi moohedu meeoo numu tunedyooe, ‘Soo Elijah mooe petugakwu’?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu nanekwegea, “Oosoo yoo kaaheno manepunne. Elijah mooe petuse hemma e mooe nemabetseabekupu.
Mooasoo soo Elijah mu-baa petupu pana mu numu gi oo posopedakwadoo meeꞌe nu. Umu tooe how tooe Elijah sootunagapu oo batsapu. Umu nuka tuwazoo kusegeana e batsakwu.”
Oꞌno numme oo nakatzimodu yise oo nakasopedakwadoo soo John Baa-wi Numu Matzakadu tookwa Elijah. Oosoo Te Pabeꞌe-kobenasoo nanekemmadu.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe bihoo numme pumme nakatzimodu-no ka numu ewa-kwi petugonno sumuꞌyoo nana ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa meatzedohoose mee oo netamma,
“U sakwa ka e tooa nanesootuhiku masoo yaꞌehookayina sumutooe ka numu peta-kwitoo anoakayakwe yise ka baa-witoo wuehooyakwe tuwazoo. Oo manena masoo unu nuummaba wuma.
Nu ka umu ume nakatzimodu-baa a bi petuse sapa umu gi a mabesakute.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee unakwe, “Mu gi e tubetse nakaꞌoedyukute tooe nu wunaꞌme yaa mu-baaꞌyoose sapa. Mu sakwa e nakaꞌoedyuku. Ka naatse yaa nu-baa bi petu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka tsoapa ka naatse-nagakoo nematzagakwunihoose, soo naatse yise besa mani.
Numme tunakatzimodu ka Te Pabeꞌe-no oetu watze nehanena mee unakwe, “How yise manena numme gi ka tsoapa nematzagakwunaꞌe?”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee ne netamma, “Mu gi oo nematzagakwunaꞌe mu ka gi tubetse tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Mu sakwa uga ka tubetse tunakaꞌoedyukuna tooe ka tuutsetse tunakaꞌoedyukuna sapa mu ka giba nooyooa tuunguna oosoo oo manikwu. Mu ka tubetse tunakaꞌoedyukuna tooe hemma tooe oo natuunguna o nageakwu.”
Ka saaꞌa Galilee-wi ne petugase soo Te Pabeꞌe mee ne netamma,
“Umu e wohomu nu-ma tzakaduse, e batsakwu yise waha tabe mease nu saaꞌa e yaꞌe-kwikoo namayodakwu.” Numme oo tunakatzimodu suda nakasokwama ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo unakwe.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe numme pumme nakatzimodu-no ka Capernaum mee naneadu-wi petuga, soo pabatsekoo nanesootuhi nobe-witu tumasumudoodu ka Peter-baa petuoose mee oo tubenga, “Soo Jesus haaꞌa punnoꞌo ka nanesootuhi nobe-witu tumanagayakwe?”

“Aha soo Te Pabeꞌe oo manekwu,” mee soo Peter oo nanekwegea. Ka nobe Te Pabeꞌe pukweꞌyoo-kwi soo Peter egeagase soo Te Pabeꞌe mee oo mooe netamma, “Haꞌyoo u oetu sooyugwe, Peter? Soo numu-kooba katudu puu gi pummesoo dooamu tunekwaꞌe, ka tu tumasumudookwi oosoo mu wakwawaꞌa suuꞌmu tunekwikwu haaꞌa?” “Mu wakwawaꞌa-makoo suuꞌmu,” meeꞌe soo Peter oo nekwegea.
“Nu tookwa ka Te Naa tooana gi tumanaga-waꞌneꞌyoo,” meeꞌe soo Te Pabeꞌe.

“Pana ta ka tumanagase umu gi taka sutakute.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Peter pakwega tayase, mee oo netamma, “Ka banunadu-kwi petugase saaꞌa ka u mooe pakwe tutzatsebooana tupa-witu poonne ka u tumayu-ma saaꞌa ta-kooba tumanagahoo.”
Numme Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu ka Te Pabeꞌe meeꞌe tubenga, “Haga saaꞌa ka numme-matu numu oooonakwa besaꞌyoo ka numme Te Naa-baa ne petugase?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka tuutsekoo tuhaꞌakoo tzakwuhoose umu-naga oo tzakwunukuhoo.
Yise mee unakwe, “Nu kaaheno mu tuukwekwu, mooeꞌugasoo mu nanekwahakwu oo nematzagakwunikwu, mu yise tutugusekoo dooake-waꞌneꞌyookwu. Oꞌno yise mu ka Te Naa-baa petugadooa.
Mu ka tuhaꞌa-kwaꞌne manekoo petuse, mu gi numu oooonakwa besaꞌyoo mee nasooyugwena. Soo tuhaꞌyoo yise e tubetse nakatzimodu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Oꞌno yise mu numu-oooonakwa besaꞌyookwu ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona.
Mu ka nuga dooamu puaꞌa-gana, oꞌno mu nuga puaꞌa tuwazoo.
Soo tooe haga tooe ka umu nuga dooamu suta-kwitoo kwasenona ka mu tumaꞌemukwase, oosoo oo tumaꞌemukwana oo-matoosoo kodyukwu.
Mu yaaꞌa teepu-koobatu numu ewaꞌyoo gi toge-tamme nakwasenodu, saaꞌa mu tumaꞌemukwana mu-matoosoo kodyukwu.

Nu sakwa e-mi sukwe tsekaꞌa yise gi ka suda namanedu mahane. Besaꞌyoo ka sumuoosoo mi-gana Te Naa-baa petugase, gi waahoo mi-gana ka ooosapa nikatu-kwitoo wue. Nu sakwa e kuku sukwe tsekaꞌa ka gi togekoo podo meana. Besaꞌyoo ka sumuoosoo kuku-gana Te Naa-baa petugase, gi waahoo kuku-gana ka ooosapa nikatu-kwitoo wue.
Nu sakwa tuwow e pooe sukwe tsepata ka gi togekoo soopoonnena. Besaꞌyoosoo ka sumuoosoo pooe-gana Te Naa-baa petugase, gi waahoo pooe-gana ka ooosapa nikatu-kwitoo wue.
Mu sakwa gi e dooamu matu suda matugupana mu toha kakasa-gakoo, Te Naa tummatzidu, ooosapa Te Naa-baatu, e dooamu mabetseana mu nanesootuhiku.
Mu sakwa ekow nakasopedakwatoo, soo nana puu ka ewow tu seepu hee-gana, sumuoo watzekuse, oosoo ka mu ewow tu seepu maꞌwukase ka sumuoo watekakwu.
Yise ka oo mayuse ka mu ewow gi nawatzekudu oooonakwasoo besa oo-matoo soonammekwu.
Soo Te Naa punnoꞌo ooosoo tamme-koobatoo ka umu pumme dooamu nawatsekukwuna gi petzape.
Ka tunakaꞌoedyukudu-matu suda pumme matuguse, u sakwa oo tuukwe gi numu nakana. Oosoo ka u nakabetseana, oꞌno u oo magwetzoikwu.
Pana ka gi ume oo nakabetsea, u sakwa sumuoo tooetoo waahoo u pupuaꞌamu-matu bikase onosoo apegea. Oꞌno mu numu u-notu u nakase oo wahakwu.
Oosoo ka gi mu nakabetseana, mu sakwa ka mu nanesootuhidu-baa petugase oo waha. Ka gi mumme oo nakabetsea, mu sakwa oo tsasoopedya.
Nu kaaheno mu tuukwe, mu ka sumuoo numu meeoo neyugwese, soo Te Naa te paꞌanakwatu punnoꞌo ooosoo.
Nu tuwazoo sumubatu kaaheno mu tuukwekwu, ka waahoo mu nagatu ka Te Naa-matoo nanetsagwayina, soo Te Naa mu nakasootuhikwu.
Ka waahoo tooetoo pihoo nanano sumuse ka nuka mu nakaꞌoedyukuna nu-matoo mu nanesootuhaꞌe nu umu-noꞌyookwu.”
Soo Peter yise ka Te Pabeꞌe mee tubenga, “Ne Pabeꞌe, huu sakwa nu ka e puaꞌa suda nuka matugu oo soomuꞌwaꞌyi? Natakwatsukwu (7) haaꞌa?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo oo nanekwegea, “Tooe hano sapa oo matuadyigena yise ka ooka oo nemakodyukuyakwe tamme sakwa ooosapa punnoꞌo oo soomuꞌwano.
Soo numu-kooba katudu puu ka mu pumme tummatzidu kutzina oo soogwaꞌe.
Sumuꞌyoo nana ka numu-kooba katudu-baa nabi petu, tubetse ewow oo nakutzikudu gi hownnekoo oo tumanagakute.
Soo numu-kooba katudu yise meeoo oo netamma, ‘U nodukwa, u doodooamu, noꞌoko hemma u hee-ga-ma u tumukwu, u ka gi hownnekoo punowsoo e tumanagaku-waꞌne manepunnena.’
Soo nana ka numu-kooba katudu meeoo netamma, ‘U sakwa e sootuhina, gi nuga hemma-ma tumupana. Nu sakwa tooe hownnekoo dooe noꞌoko punowsoo u tumanagaku.’
Soo numu-kooba katudu oo nakasootuhise meeoo oo netamma, ‘Gi hownneꞌyoo tooe u ka gi punowsoo e tumakodyukupana. U sakwa menoꞌo nobe-witoosoo kodyuka.’

Soo nana ka numu-kooba katudu tutuha soobedya yise mease sumuoo numu tapoegea huutsekoo pumme nakutzikudu. Oo-ma tzakaduse oo tooe matsongakwadyabe. ‘U sakwa ka nuka u nakutzikuna e tumanagaku,’ mee oo netamma.
‘Nu gi hownnekoo menoꞌo u tumanagaku-waꞌneꞌyoo pana nu saaꞌa noꞌoko tooe hownnekoo tooe ooka u makodyukudooa. U sakwa tutuha e soobedya.’
Pana oosoo gi tutuha oo soobedyana ka nana wutuma tu nakutzina oo tumanaga-witoo tooe.
Mu numu-kooba katudu tummatzidu ka nana manena poonnena suda oo soobedya. Umu ka numu-kooba katudu-baa petugase ka nana manena oo tuukweꞌe.
Soo numu-kooba katudu ka nana nabatoo bise, meeoo oo netamma, ‘U suda manakwe. Nu mooasoo meeoo u netammapu, “Gi hownneꞌyoo tooe u gi ka u nakutzina tumanagapana.”
U puu ka u puaꞌa gi tutuha soobedya ka ume oo nakutzikute. U sakwa tutuha mu numu u soobedyana sootuhi, nu puu tutuha u soobedyana u sootuhipu.’
Soo numu-kooba katudu ka sutakoo nana besa tu matugukwuna gi petzabepana oo wutuma tuungu, noꞌoko tu nakutzina oo tumanaga-witoo tooe.
Tamme ka te pupuaꞌamu suda tamme matugupu gi soomuꞌwana soo te tumaꞌemukwana tamme-matoosoo kodyukwu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus ka mu numu tunedyooemakwuse Galilee-wiꞌyoona mea, ka teepu Judea mee naneadu-koobatoo. Te Pabeꞌe ka meana ka hooodu Jordan mee naneadu mangeka.
Ewaꞌyoo numu yise oo nagekase soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus yise mu mabesakute.
Mu Pharisee Te Pabeꞌe-baa petuse oo tooꞌe nekwesekuna, ka numu nanodukwa napoonnekwuni-kwitu.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu nanekwegea, “Mu ka tuneana oꞌnosoo ka Te Naa numu pudu manumudoose meeoo naꞌunakwe, ‘Nu ka nana noko mogoꞌne manumu-doopu.
Soo nana-no mogone ka nanodukwadoose tu naanapuꞌamu-koobaꞌyoona mease umu yise sumuoosoo numu-waꞌneꞌyoo.’
Soo Te Naa meeꞌe soo numu ka nanodukwadoose sakwa gi napoonnekwunipana.”
Umu Pharisee yise meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “How yise soo Moses mooasoo ka meeoo tunetammana, ‘Soo numu ka napoonnekwunikwuse tubope-makoo napoonnekwunaꞌe?’ “

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu nanekwegea, “Mu ka gi Te Naa nakabetseana ooonneꞌyoona soo Moses meeoo mu tunetammakute mu ka napoonnekwunikwuse tubope-makoo napoonnekwunaꞌe. Pana ka Te Naa numu pudu manumudoo-kwi manakwana meeoo nayadooa ka nanodukwadoose gi napoonnekwunipana.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus yise meeoo tuwazoo mu netamma, “Soo numu ka tu nodukwa poonnekwunise tooe gi kummaꞌakoosoo nana-no oo tumaꞌemukwa sapa ka kummaꞌakusoo nodukwadoose maꞌemukwa. Oosoo suda tumatugudu.”
Numme Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu mee ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Numme sakwa gi uga nodukwadoopana sumuna puu numme saaꞌa napoonnekwunikwu.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee ne netamma, “Susumudu numu gi hownnekoo nanodukwadoo-waꞌneꞌyoo umu ka tooe hownnekoo tooe namaniyahapugana, susumudu punnoꞌo numu gi nanodukwadoo umu ka Te Naa suuꞌmu sooabegana. Gi noꞌyoona numu ka eka meeoo naꞌunnedu nakabetsea-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
Mu numu tu dooamu ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa bi petudyakwe ka umu oo nanesootuhiku tuunguna mu sootuhi mee oo netammana. Numme Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu mu numu nesagwikute ka oo mu manakwe.
Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu netamma, “Gi mu numu ka mu tu dooamu bi petudu nesagwikupana. Nu mu tutugutsekoo dooake nanesootuhikukwu umu-waꞌnekoo sokwama-gakoo soo Te Naa besa dooamu-gaꞌyoo.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu dooake nanesootuhikuse umu-ma pooha matugumena mu sootuhina yise umu-baaꞌyoona mea.
Sumuꞌyoo nana ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petuga mee tutubenguna, “U tubetse besaꞌyoo nana haꞌoo besa sakwa tuwow nu manese namagwetzoi?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeꞌe oo nanekwegea, “U sakwa gi nuka ka besa-witu tutubengapana, soo Te Naa suuꞌmu besaꞌyoo. U ka soonamagwetzoina u sakwa ka Te Naa unnepu suuꞌmu nakabetsea.”
“Noꞌoko haaꞌa?” mee soo nana ka Te Pabeꞌe tutubenga. Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo oo nanekwegea, “Aha. U sakwa gi numu batsapana, gi numu nowuakupana, gi tuduhapana, gi esayipana numu-witu
besa tu naa noko tu pea sooyugwena. U sakwa unu mu numu-no nanasoobedya, mummesoo nasoobedya-kwaꞌne.”
“Mooasoo nu ka a nabotugu-kwaꞌne tumaduku,” mee soo nana, “Nu haaꞌa namagwetzoikwu?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeꞌe oo nanekwegea, “U sakwa noꞌoko u hemma-ma tumuse ka u nahemena ka mu tutuha manedu hanekuse, oꞌno yise u ewow hee-gakwu ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona. Oꞌno u yise e nakatzinummekwu.”
Soo nana ka ewow hee-gana suda oo nakasoonammekuna mea.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe numme pumme nakatzimodu mee netamma, “Nu kaaheno mu tuukwekwu. Soo ewow hee-gaꞌyoo numu unusoo manena namagwetzoikwu.
Gi hownnekoo soo ewow hee-gaꞌyoo numu puusoo namagwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
Numme ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo unakwe oo nakase meeꞌe punnoꞌo unakwe, “Hownnekoo soo numu tutuha manedu namagwetzoikwu?” Numme meeoo sokwama soo ewow hee-gaꞌyoo numu besa nasootuhipuna namagwetzoaꞌe.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ne pooꞌnekwunihoose mee ne netamma, “Gisoo mu e nakasopedakwadoo, mu gi muusoo namagwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa suuꞌmu mu magwetzoikwu.”
Soo Peter yise meeoo oo netamma, “Numme noꞌoko hemma ne hee-gana maꞌwugese ume nageke. Hemma yise numme hee-gakwu?”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeꞌe ne nanekwegea, “Nu kaaheno mu tuukwekwu. Ka teepu atasoo manekese, nu ebe te paꞌanakwaꞌyoona numu nemadabuekwu, mu yise e nakatzimodu punnoꞌo noꞌoko mu (12) Jew numu nemadabuekwu.

Noꞌyoona numu tu nobe maꞌwukadu, tu nanumu, tu hemma, noꞌoko tu hee-gana, tu doodooamu, tu tubewabe, ka nuka nagena, ewowsoo besa noꞌobatusoo nasootuhikwu ka gi moobegwaga ka gwetzoibu-ma besaꞌhoo nasootuhikwu.
Umu yaaꞌa teepu-koobatu menoꞌo numu moohedu, saaꞌa ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona gi hee manepunnekwu. Umu menoꞌo gi maawaꞌneꞌyoo yaaꞌa teepu-kooba manepunnedu, ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona numu moohedooa.”

Te Pabeꞌe togesoo te tunedyooemena. Esoo tamme oo tunedyooena ka Te Naa umu pumme tummatzidu besa sootuhi-witu mee yise oo netamma, “Soo Te Naa ka nana-waꞌnesoo puu ka awamooasoo mu numu tu tubewabe-witu a pooe tzaboka tuungu.
Esoo nana puu ka pumme tutzabokakudu tunemanagakute umu yise oo neꞌoedyukute.
Saaꞌa oogowsoo awamooa soo nana tubewabe hee-gaꞌyoo ka mu numu-nagatu gi hemma how yugwedu natummatzibu wategase mu
mayuse meeoo mu netamma, ‘Mu sakwa e tutzabokaku. Nu saaꞌa mu tumanagakudooa.’
Ka tabeno tu manekese tu yongokese tuwazoo ooosoo tuwazoo manakwe.
Gisoo tu taba egeagaꞌa soo nana tuwazoo measesoo ewasoo numu gi hemma howyugwedu too mayuse mee mu netamma, ‘Mu haaꞌa tabewano yow?’
Umu yise meeoo oo nanekwegea, ‘Aha, gi deaꞌa haga ne natummatzi tuungu.’ ‘Mu sakwa nuka tummatzi,’ mee yise soo nana mu netamma.

Ka tu nayakwengase soo nana tubewabe-gaꞌyoo ka umu pumme tummatzidu moohedu mee netamma, ‘Noꞌoko umu nuka tummatzigonnodu mu bise mu tumanagakuhoo. U sakwa ka umu nakwi petudu mooe tumanagakuhoo, oꞌno yise mu susumudu ooosoo ka umu mooeꞌugasoo petudu tumanagaku tuwazoo.’
Umu numu nakwi petudu ka umu mooeꞌugasoo petupu noꞌokosoo saaꞌa tumunagaku.
Umu mooe tutummatzi petudu numu oooonakwakoosoo natumanakakukwu mee sokwamapunnepana, umu noꞌyoona nananoꞌokosoo natumanakakuhoo.
Mu mooe tutummatzi petupu ka nana tubewabe-gakoo nesootzema mee unnena.
‘Haꞌoo manena mu ne-nakwi petupunnedu numme noꞌokosoo natumanakakute? Numme yise tabewano yow tooe kootuise sapa umu nokosoo natumanakakute.’
Soo tubewabe hee-gaꞌyoo yise mu naka ka mu nenisagoꞌe ka sumuoo umu-matu mee netamma, ‘E puaꞌa, nu kaaheno u tumatugukute. Nu ooka u gea ka ume e tuukwe-kwaꞌnesoo.
Mu sakwa mumme e gea-matoo besa sokwama. Nu meeoo mesoo tusoohanena sumu noꞌokosoo mu mesoo tumanagakute.
Esoo u natumanakakuna nugatu. U sakwa gi moogoo tusooyugwepana, nu ka noꞌoko numu sootuhina tooe gi haaꞌno mu tutzabokase sapa numu noꞌoko tumanagakute.’
Umu yaaꞌa teepu-koobatu menoꞌo numu moohedu saaꞌa ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona gi hee manepunnekwu. Umu menoꞌo gi maawaꞌneꞌyoo yaaꞌa teepu-kooba manepunnedu ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona numu moohedooa.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka Jerusalem-witoo meana, numme tunakatzimodu bikase meeoo ne tuukwe,
“Jerusalem-wi te petugase mu numu-kobenatu yadooadu nu-ma tzakadukwu, oꞌno yise umu wakwawaꞌa-matoo e tzakakase yise umuoo nuka batsa tuungukwu.
Umu wakwawaꞌa yise e nasootzamekukwu e wupagetana yise e batsakwu. Nu yise saaꞌa waha tabemease tuusootabuese namayodakwu.”
Mu nawangaꞌa James-no John pea o ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petuga.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu pea meeoo tubenga, “Haꞌyoo u unnena yow?” Soo mu pea yise meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Haꞌoo sakwa umu e doodooamu saaꞌa ka u-baa manepunnena ka numu u nemadunaga meakwuse?”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu waahoo oo doodooamu netamma, “Mu gi a nakasopedakwatoo ka putoogoo e meakwuna. Nu nabatsakwu. Mu haaꞌa tooe punnoꞌo oo-toogoosoo mea-waꞌneꞌyoo?” mee. Mu wahaꞌyoo yise ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “Numme sakwa punnoꞌo u-kwaꞌnesoo mesoo mane.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeꞌe mu nanekwegea, “Aha, mu nu-koobatoo nabatsakwu, mooasoo soo Te Naa oo nemamakwupu. Pana nu gi ka mu numu-kobena mu neyugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
Numme Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu mu unnena nakana ka mu James noko John unu nakasagwikute.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo ne netamma, “Mu sakwa gi ooosapa numu-kooba nasooyugwepana ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona.

Mu sakwa noꞌoko numu tummatzino, nu-kwaꞌne. Nu puu ka yaaꞌa mu-baa petuse noꞌoko numu tummatzaꞌe. Pudusoo nu mu numu-koobatoo nabatsakwu, oꞌno saaꞌa yise nu mu numu gwetzoibu-ma gi moobegwagakoo sootuhidooa.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe numme pumme nakatzimodu-no ka Jericho-wiꞌyoona mease ewaꞌyoo numu ne nakwisoo meadape.
Oonow yise ka po-kumaba wahaꞌyoo gi tutubootabuedu nanana yugwe. Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe pukumi mea oo nakana oo nanetsagwayaꞌe mee unnemoꞌo, “Ne Pabeꞌe ne nanesootuhiku.”
Mu numu mu nakadu mu nesagwikute meeoo mu netamma, “Mu gi unnepana.” Pana umu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe pabasoo yadooeyakwe, “Ne Pabeꞌe ne nanesootuhiku.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise yooꞌi petugase namatoo mu baꞌe ka puba mu pepetuhoose mee soo Te Pabeꞌe mu tubenga, “Hownnekoo natummatzibu mu sookwaꞌe?”
Umu gi tutubootabuedu nanana yise meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Numme gi tutubootabuena yaatu ne poonnena soogwaꞌe.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe tutuha mu nakasoobedyana mu pooe-kooba matuguse. Umu yise tubootabue mamanikwate ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukuna. Umu naana yise ka podo Te Pabeꞌe-nakwi memea.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe numme pumme nakatzimodu-no ka Jerusalem mee naneadu-kwitoo meaꞌa. Soo giba Olive mee naneadu oo-tzageꞌe. Ka Bethpage mee naneadu-tzageꞌe numme petuga.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise waahoo numme pumme nakatzimodu-matu mee netamma, “Mu sakwa yaatoo ne maꞌwukase ka Bethpage-witoo manekakwate. Onoko mu sumuoo tzagaze tooaꞌa-gakoo oo natzakunadu mayukwu. Oo tzadopase, nu-matoo oo wetzakake.
‘How mu mu yugwekwu?’ mee ka mu numu mumme tubenga, mu saaꞌa mee mu netammadooa, ‘Te Pabeꞌe mu soogwina, oosoo saaꞌa mu makodyukudooa.’ “
Oꞌno soo Te Naa yadooawabe tubotugupu mee naꞌunakwe ka menoꞌo Te Pabeꞌe manekwuna.
“Mu sakwa mu numu Jerusalem-wi nonobe-gakoo tuukwe soo mu-kooba katukwudu mu-baa petukwu tzagaze tooaꞌa-gakoo-kooba katuna. Esoo mu tumayohope ka numu nanapupuaꞌamu-gakwuna wahadu.”
Umu wahaꞌyoo naana yise ka Te Pabeꞌe tumayohoku.
Umu ka tzagaze nadooaꞌa ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa wetzaka petuse oo nasonatugukuse, soo Te Pabeꞌe yise oo-kooba tsebooese, oo-kooba katunoꞌo.

Ewaꞌyoo numu tu wunagapu ka po-kooba wupatzetagonno susumudu numu punnoꞌo sunngabe maꞌna ka Te Pabeꞌe-kobena tuoonana oo-ma oo podokute. Umu ka umu-kooba katudu ooosapa yoo tumatuguna besa oo sooyugwena yoo oo tumayohoku tabuꞌa.

Ewaꞌyoo numu yise Te Pabeꞌe naꞌooonakwatu oo netubetseyaꞌena ewa unnegonno, “U yow Ne Tubetse Pabeꞌe, ne magwetzoidu. U menoꞌo numme-kooba katudu ka te namooatupu David-waꞌneꞌyoo, numme besa sokwama ka Te Naa-matoo, ka numme-matoo ume oo tayase. Soo Te Naa u tubetse sootuhikwu. Soo Te Naa saaꞌa puusoo ne magwetzoidooa.”
Numme ewaꞌyoo ka Jerusalem-wi petugase ka Te Pabeꞌe-no, mu numu otuoo yise ne poonnese mee ne tubenga, “Haga masoohoo?”
Numme ewaꞌyoo mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-notu meeoo mu nanekwegea, “Yow esoo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus ka Nazareth mee naneadu-kwitu ka Galilee mee naneadu teepu-koobatu kemmana.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Jerusalem-witoo mea, yise ka pabow nananesootuhi nobe-tzageꞌe kodyu petuga. Mu weehoo-ma tumudu poonne. Tu hemma tsanabedona, tu weeho-ma tumugonno tuwazoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka hemma pukooba mu tuoona-na manapow, ka mu kadunoo tuwazoo, yise oekoo mu numu matzayubow. Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu netamma, “Mu ka nobeana gi-matoogoo meapana. Esoo pukwiꞌyoona tu nananesootuhina.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa yadooawabe ekow botugupu, ‘E nobe pukwiꞌyoona noꞌobatusoo numu nanesootuhina.’ Menoꞌo mu yise miꞌyoona nanatuduha.”
Umu gi tutubootabuedu, mu toyomodu ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petudyakwe ka pukwiꞌyoona mu nanesootuhi-kwiꞌyoona soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu mabesakumena.

Mu Jew numu tutunehanedu oo poonne ka nanabesa Te Pabeꞌe pooha manakwe yise tuwow ka mu doodooake naka ka papaba ooka mu nesookwugaꞌe, “U yow Ne Pabeꞌe ne magwetzoidu. U tubetse besaꞌyoo.” Mu tutunehanedu yise mu nakasagwaꞌekute. Umu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo ohobu netamma, “U sakwa ka mu doodooake uꞌnewununa nedyooihoo.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu netamma, “Mu ka sumuna oo sopedakwatoo oꞌnosoo Te Naa yadooawabe meeoo tubotugupu, ‘U, Ne Naa mu tutugutsekoo doodooake besa ume nemadabue tuungu.’ “
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise Bethany-witoo mease oonow tooi.
Ka oo mooꞌa awamooa, soo Te Pabeꞌe numme pumme nakatzimodu-no ka Jerusalem-tamme mea.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka meana, ka sunngabe Fig mee naneadu poonnese, oo-tamme mea ka tzuayaena. Unu sunngabe naka-gaꞌyoo gi pooe-gaꞌyoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka sunngabe meeoo netamma, “Gi gea hannanoꞌo u pooedooa-waꞌneꞌyoo.” mee. Soo sunngabe yise pasahoodooe.
Oꞌno numme Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu ka sunngabe pasahoose oo poonnepunne, numme ka Te Pabeꞌe mee netamma, “Uune! How manena soo sunngabe yabesoo pasa?” meeꞌe.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo ne netamma, “Mu sakwa a nakasopedakwadoo mu ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukwu, gi waha-tamme tusooyugwepana soo Te Naa mu nakasootuhikwu ka mu nanesootuhaꞌe. Mu ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna, mu punnoꞌo nu-kwaꞌnesoo mesoo manakwe. Ka ooka mu natuungu, oosoo yise oo-toogoo manekwu. Mu unu pooha-gaꞌyoo. Gi hee unu manepunnekwu.
Mu ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna ka Te Naa-matoo nanetzakwiyaꞌena, Te Naa mu nakasootuhikwu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka pukwiꞌyoona mu nanesootuhi-wi petugase mu numu tunedyooꞌe. Mu Jew numu tutunehanedu ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petuse mee oo tubenga, “Haga pooha tunetamma-toohakwi u yoo manakwe?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu nekwegea, “Nu ka John-witu mu mooe tuukwekwu. Mu ka kaaheno e nanekwegease, oꞌno yise saaꞌa nu punnoꞌo haga pooha-toohakwi ꞌyoo nu e manena mu tuukwekwu.

Haga ka John meeoo netammana oosoo numu baa-wi matzaka, soo Te Naa God, pute oosoo puusoo oo sukwe manakwe?” Mu tutunehanedu yise puusoo nanano apegeagonnose, mee unakwe, “Tamme ka meeꞌe unnese, ‘Soo Te Naa God ka John meeoo netamma.’ Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo te netammakwu, ‘How yise manena mu ka John gi nakabetsea?’
‘Pana soo John puusoo oo manakwe,’ mee te unnese, mu numu punnoꞌo te kusekeakwu, soo John Te Naa nayadooawabe mee oo netammana oo nakaꞌoedyukuna.”
Umu yise mee ka Te Pabeꞌe nanekwegea, “Numme gi oo sopedakwatoo.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Nu punnoꞌo gi mu tuukwe-waꞌneꞌyoo ka haga pooha-toohakwi, e pooha maꞌnawena.

Nu mu natugwengakwu, oꞌno saaꞌa mu e tuukwe hanotu umu-matu kaaheno manepunne. Wahaꞌyoo tootooebetse tu naa-no nobe-gaꞌyoo. Soo mu naa sumuoo tu tooa mee netamma, ‘U sakwa yaa tabeno ka te tubewabe-witu hemma how yugwega.’
‘Gi nu,’ mee oosoo ka tu naa nemaꞌese sapa saaꞌa mease ka tubewabe-witu hemma mahane.
Soo mu naa yise ka sumuoo tuwazoo tu tooa meeoosoo netamma, ‘U sakwa ka te tubewabe-witu hemma oo tummatzi.’ ‘Unudooe e naa,’ mee unnese sapa gi oo-toogoo manakwe.

Hanotu umu-matu ka tu naa nakabetseꞌa?” “Soo mooeꞌugasootu,” meeꞌe mu numu tutunehanedu ka Te Pabeꞌe nanekwegea. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Nu kaaheno mu tuukwekwu, umu numu tumaꞌemukwadu ka nuka oedyukuna, mu ka Te Naa-baa petugakwu, mu nananesootuhidu mee naneyugwedu punnoꞌo sakwa e nakaꞌoedyuku manese mu punnoꞌo Te Naa-baa petugakwu.

Ka John mu-baa petugase ka Te Naa besa po-witu mumme oo tuukweꞌe, mu gi oo nakabetseꞌa. Mu tumaꞌemukwadu mee mu netammana suuꞌmu ka suda tu mamanenona nemawunina oo nakabetseꞌa. Mu yise mu poonne pana gi umu-waꞌnesoo manakwe.

Nu yaa menoꞌo mu tuukwekwu ka nana tubewabe hee-ga-kwitu. Oosoo nana mooe tumasuꞌakese yise oo naꞌooonnakwitoo kooduadoose yise oo-toogoo tubane nobe-too. Ka tu tumasua-matu mu numu tunemanagakuse ka ooka mu mabetseakwu-kwitoo, yise oona kwingaꞌa mea.
Ka tu tumasuana kwasuse, soo tumasuadu ka sumuoo tu tummatziwabe umu-matoo taya. Oo naamookwitu a tupooe oo hane tuunguna.
Mu numu yise ka pumatoo natayadu petugase oo wupagetahoose gi a tupooe-matu oo hanekupana oo tayakwunihoo.
Soo tumasuadu ewowsoo umu pumme tummatzidu oetoosoo taya pana umu tumasuape mabetseadu mu goehoo tuwazoo.
Nakwitoo yise ka tu besa dooa umu-matoo taya mee tusooyugwena, ‘Umu sumuna besa e besaa tooa matugukwu.’
Pana umu tumasuape mabetseadu oo tooa pu-baa petuse meeꞌe nananetamma, ‘Esoo numu ka tubewabe hee-gea manekwu tamme sakwa a batsase, oꞌno tamme ka tubewabe hee-gakwu.’
Umu yise ka tabewabe-wikoo oo matzatseboogese oo batsahoo.
Haꞌoo soo tabewabe hee-gaꞌyoo, ka umu ookow mabetseadu yugwekwu ka umu-baa petugase?” mee soo Te Pabeꞌe tutubenga.

“Oosoo ka mu tumaꞌemukwana umu-matusoo makodyukukwuse kadoo mu mayugwekwu ka mu sutakoo. Ka penakwa tumasuase yise kukummaꞌakoosoo ka tu tumasuape mabetsea tuungukwu, kummaꞌaꞌyoosoo oo tubewa-kooba tumasuase oo naamookwitu oo hanekukwu,” meeꞌe umu ka Te Pabeꞌe nanekwegea.

Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Nu mu tuukwekwu mu gi ka Te Naa-baaꞌyookwu mu ka gi e nakaꞌoedyukuna. Mu numu nuka tubetse nakaꞌoedyukudu suuꞌmu Te Naa-baaꞌyoona numu moohekwu. Mu oo sopedakwatoo ka oꞌnosoo Te Naa nayadooawabe meeꞌe nu-kwitu botugupu-gaꞌyoo, ‘Mu tupe nobe-toodu puu ka sumuhoo tupe moodyise, soo mu tumoodyina tookwa gi pumme wuni-waꞌneꞌyoo o ka nobe madipunnedu.’ Nu yow oosoo nanetammadu tupe Te Naa nobe madipunnedu.
Nu yow ookow tupe-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Oꞌno mu gi nuka nakaꞌoedyukudu kadoo namayugwekoo. Ka numu nanemadabuekwu-kwi oo manepetuse umu gi e nakaheesoobedyadu kadooꞌoo namayugwekwu.”
Mu Jew numu tutunehanedu ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo pumme natukwenga nakase umu oo nakasopedakwatoo soo Te Pabeꞌe tookwa umu-witu netamma.
“Hownnekoo sakwa tamme oo wutumahoo?” meeꞌe mu tutunehanedu sokwamapana mu tutunehanedu ka mu numu-ma suipunnena ka mu numu Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa yadooawabe meeꞌe oo oedyukuna.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu natugwengasoo tuwazoo meeoo noꞌobatusoo numu nasootuhikwu gi Jew suuꞌmu mee yise tuukweꞌe.
“Nu mu natugwengakwu ka numu-kooba katudu-kwitu. Soo numu-kooba katudu numu ewa tukakukwu ka tu tooa nodukwadookwuse.

Ka tu nanumusoo numu-kooba katudu ewa tukakwu-kwitoo bina, umu pumme tummatzidu umu tayase meeꞌe mu tuukweꞌe saaꞌa, mee mu netammana, ‘Nu mooasoo tubatsase ka e tooa naꞌewa tukakukwuna mamakwupunne. Mu sakwa yabesoo nu-matoo kemma.’
Pana umu oetoo oo nanumu oo tubina gi oo nakaheesoobedya. Sumuꞌyoo tu tubewabe-witoo meahoo, sumuꞌyoo punnoꞌo hemma how yugwega.
Mu susumudu yise ka mu numu-kooba katudu tummatzidu wohonena, mu goehoo.
Soo numu-kooba katudu gi ka mu numu pumme tummatzidu oo pumme mu yugwena petzabena, tu tukwutumadu taꞌya, umu yise mu nobe tuni tuungu.
Ka umu pumme tummatzidu yise meeꞌe netamma, ‘Soo e tooa nodukwadookwunoꞌo naꞌewa tukakwudu mooasoo namamakwupunne. Umu yise e nanumu oetoo e tubina nagutza besa nanasooyugwe, gi kemma.
Mana po-witoo mease tooe haga tooe nu-baa tuka tuungu, oo soomanedutooe.’

Umu oo tummatzidu yise mease noꞌoko numu tu poonnena tooe ka numu-kooba katudu nobe-kwi bi petu. Saaꞌa ewaꞌyoo numu oe manepetu. Umu yise namebatu susumudu bebesaꞌyoo susumudu too sutaꞌyoo. Umu yise pukwi tu namasooakwuna nahemese yise naꞌewa tuka.
Soo numu-kooba katudu oe petuoose sumuoo nana mayuhoo gi namabetzapedu.
Mee oo netamma, ‘E puaꞌa, haꞌoo u gisoo namabetzapepana yow numu-baa?’ Soo nana gi hownnekoo oo nanekwegea.
Soo numu-kooba katudu yise umu pumme tummatzidu mee netamma, ‘A tzakunase mabe ooosapa unu togano-kwitoo a tzakwuni, umu mabetuoo ooosapa suda sokwamana sagwipunnedu.’ “
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo, “Nu ewow numu bipana huuꞌyoosoo oo-toogoo namabetzapedu suuꞌmu ka Te Naa ewa tukakwu-kwiꞌyookwu.”
Mu Pharisee yise tunehanese ka Te Pabeꞌe unne-makoosoo oo nemadihookwu, mee oo-toogoo tunehane.

Ka tunehanese mu punotusoo mu wakwawaꞌa numu pabeꞌe Herod mee naneadu-notu nanana ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo tayase umu yise meeꞌe ka Te Pabeꞌe netammana, “U tubetse besaꞌyoona mu numu Te Naa-witu besa tunedyooꞌe. U gi numu tutzeadu yise gi tuwazoo u numu nesootzemadu oo namanedu u gi heesoobedyadu.
Numu pabeꞌe natumasumudookuyi-kwitu hayoo u sooyukwe mee numme u tubengagese?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mooasoo oo sopedakwatoopunne ka pumme mu nemadikwuse yise meeoo mu netamma, “How yise mu manena e tooꞌe nemooaga? Mooasoo mumme gi e watzekupunne sapa mu e tooꞌe nemadaꞌe.
Ka namasumudoona a haneku.” Umu tu tumasumudoona-matu oo gea.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tumasumudoope pumme mu gease meeoo mu tubenga, “Haga ma-ma namanaka yise haga naneana tuwow ma-ma naboꞌo?” mee.

Umu yise meeoo, “Mu wawaꞌa pabeꞌe namanagana ma-ma, oo neneana tuwow ma-ma naboꞌo,” mee. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo tuwow mu netamma, “Tamme sakwa mu wakwawaꞌa numu pabeꞌe geasoo, umuoo nanumu tumadabuena. Tamme puu Te Naa tumadabuena Te Naa yise te hee-gaꞌyoo.”
Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe unnena nakase besa sokwamana umu yise nasoomenakwase meaꞌa.
Mu nananesootuhidu Sadducee mee nananeadu mee oo natunedyooꞌe soo numu ka yaꞌese otosoo soo moogooa mobegwa-gaꞌyoo. Oogowsoo tabeno
“Oꞌnosoo Te Naa yadooawabe Moses mee naneadu ka menoꞌo te tumahohope te mayoho tuungu soo nana ka yaꞌese, oo wanngaꞌa sakwa ka oo nodukwa nodukwadoose oosoo yise ka tu pabeꞌe dooamudookukwu.
Umu natakwatsukwuꞌyoo (7) nanakwangaꞌamu tamme numu-naga. Mu Pabeꞌe nodukwadoose, gisoo dooamudoona yaꞌe.
Umu oo wangaꞌamu nanapenakwa oo tooꞌe nodukwadooke pana gisoo oo-makoo dooamu-gana tuꞌi tzasooahooke.
Soo mogoꞌne punnoꞌo saaꞌa yaꞌe.
Soo numu ka tu yaꞌe-kwikoo namayodase ka ume unne-kwaꞌne mane haga yise umu-matu ka mogoꞌne nodukwa-gakwu, umu ka noꞌyoona oo nodukwa-gapana?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu nanekwegea, “Mu tookwa gi ka Te Naa tubetse unnena ka oo pooha noko nakasopedakwatoo, ka mu numu yaꞌe-kwikoo namayodakwuna.
Soo numu ka tuise namayodase gi nananodukwamu-gakwu, umu ka umu Te Naa tutummatziwabe mu toha kakasa-ga-kwaꞌneꞌyookwu.
Mu ka sumuna Te Naa unnepu nabotuguna neꞌa, ‘Umu mu nanamooatupu Abraham, Isaac, yise Jacob nu-matoo togesoo nanesootuhidu.’ “
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo, “Tooe Mu Abraham, Isaac-no Jacob oꞌnosoo kadoo manepupana, umu togesoo gwetzoaꞌe umu ka Te Naa-matoo togesoo nanesootuhina.”
Ewaꞌyoo mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakadu mee nananetamma, “Tamme gi hannanoꞌo yooonnekoo nakadu, Te Pabeꞌe besa numu tunedyooedu.”

Pana ka mu nananesootuhidu Pharisee mee nananeadu soo Sadducee gi hownnekoo ka Te Pabeꞌe nekwegea. Mu Pharisee mee tunakase umu pudu tunemadabue ka Te Pabeꞌe nemapoonnehookwu mee sokwamana. Umu Pharisee sumuoo punagatusoo ka Te Pabeꞌe mee tubenga tuungu,
“Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa yadooawabe Moses ewow tumayohope te mayoho tuungu. Hanotu umu te tumayohope-nagatu unu besaꞌyoo pumme mooe datsunga-waꞌneꞌyoo?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee oo nanekwegea, “Tamme sakwa ka Te Naa besa soobedyana ooosapa meeoo sokwamamo.
O a besana.
Soo penakwatu besaꞌyoo tumayohope te nakabetseakwuna punnoꞌo meeꞌe, ‘Tamme sakwa noꞌoko numu besa soobedya tammesoo nasoobedya-kwaꞌne.’
Tamme ka Te Naa noꞌoko mu numu besa soobedyana, tamme tookwa noꞌoko ka Te Naa tamme tunetammakuna nakabetseꞌa.”
Mu Pharisee numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa sumu, soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu Pharisee tubenga,
“Haꞌyoo mu puu oo soobedya? Haga nakwana oosoo Te Pabeꞌe suaketu?” Umu Pharisee meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe nanekwegea, “Ka numu-kooba katudu David mee naneadu-nakwana suakekwutu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Soo David ka Te Naa pooha-toohakwi Te Pabeꞌe mee oo natubaꞌnga. Ka David tubotugu-kwi meeoo,
‘Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe mee netammapu, “U sakwa ooosapa e tumadinakwu katu ka umu ume wohonedu e matzooekunoꞌotoo.” ’
How yise soo David Te Pabeꞌe mee oo natubaꞌnga ka punakwana oo nanekemma sapa?” meeꞌe soo Te Pabeꞌe mu Pharisee tubenga.
Gi haga hownnekoo oo nanekwegea-waꞌneꞌyoo, umu yise gi hemmasoo oo tubengasoo mani.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus yise ka mu numu ewana ka mu tunakatzimodu-nokosoo mee netamma,
“Mu Jew numu nanesootuhibu tunedyooe ka Moses kapi naneyugwena ka oo unnena numu tunedyooe.
Mumme mu tunedyooena kaahenoꞌyoo pana umu puu gi oo-toogoo tumayohopana mu tunedyooꞌe. Mu sakwa gi umu-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Umu unu namanedu te mayoho tuungupana, gi te tummatzi sokwama.
Umu sukwe nasootzamena ka tumayohope mayoho mee naneꞌyugwe.

Umu puu besa-kwi tu namasooa-ma nasootzaꞌme numu pumme besa neyugwena pedukudu tuwazoo. Umuoo ka tu naꞌewa tuka numu-kooba tunaneyugwena besa soobedya punnoꞌo, oꞌno mu numu besa mu sooyugwekwu mee nasooyugwedu.
Pana mu sakwa gi kummaꞌakoosoo numu nanesootuhibu tunedyooedu mee mumme netammadu sookwipana. Nu suuꞌmu yow kaahenotu ka nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu mu noꞌyoona sumu-kwaꞌneꞌyoosoo.
Mu sakwa gi tooe haga tooe ka teepu-koobatu Te Naa mee neapana, mu sumuoosoo Tubetse Naa-gaꞌyoo, oosoo yise ebe te paꞌanakwa manepunne.
Mu sakwa tuwazoo gi kummaꞌakoosoo ka yaa teepu-koobatu, Te Pabeꞌe, mee neapana. Nu suuꞌmu yow Mu Pabeꞌe.
Soo unu nadatsungadu mu nagatusoo sakwa mu tummatzi.
Ka te nasootzaꞌme soo Te Naa gi besa te sooyugwe. Pana ka gi te nasootzaꞌme soo Te Naa besa te soomadabuꞌe.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe togesoo mu yadooedyakwe, “Mu nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu yise ka mu numu ka mu nanesootuhidu-nagatu Pharisee mee nananeadu-kwitu nu mu tuukwekwu. Mu tumaꞌemukwana mu-matoosoo kodyukwu mu ka nanesootuhaꞌe mee sukwe naneyugwena. Mu ka mu numu Te Naa nakabetseakwuna takohoꞌne ka mu gi oo nakabetseana. Ka Te Naa tamme a nameana ka natzakwonaꞌa mu tzatuma-kwaꞌne manepunne.

Mu tubetse unu sutaꞌyoona soo mu tumaꞌemukwana mu-matoosoo kodyukwu. Mu mana tooe momona sumuoo numu mu-ma nakatzabese mu mumme tumayohope oo tunedyooe gi ka Te Naa unnena, mu waha oo-koobakwisoo ka goso gi tokedu-tamme oo taya mummesoo mane-kwaꞌne.

Mu Pharisee tooe ka Te Naa-witu gi nakasopedakwadoopana ka mu numu tooꞌe tunedyooꞌe. Mu yise ka mu numu neꞌemukwa. ‘Mu hee ka te nanesootuhi nobe-kwitu oa tupe namadabuedu ka Te Naa nahemagana tamme sakwa yise mu sootubetseyaꞌe. Pana ka nanesootuhi nobe sakwa tamme gi sootubetseyaꞌepana,’ mee mu.
Soo nanesootuhi nobe Te Naa-tu ka oa tupe-kwaꞌneꞌyoosoo.
Mu oo netubetseyaꞌe ka Te Naa nahemagana pana mu ka pukooba oo natuguna gi heesoobedya.
Pana nanosoo umu Te Naa nahemagana.
Tamme sakwa yise namekoosoo mu sootubetseyaꞌe
ka oa tupe ka nanesootuhi nobe noꞌoko, umu noꞌyoona Te Naa tumadabuena.
Tamme ka tamme-koobatu-kobenaꞌyoona namayodase, tamme ka Te Naa ooka nemadabuedu nokosoo-kobenaꞌyoona namayota.

Mu nanesootuhidu numu tunedyooedu ka Pharisee mee nananeadu ka Te Naa oꞌnosoo unnepu tzamunetana numu tunedyooena mu ka Te Naa nakabetsea mee sukwe naneꞌyugwena. Mu ka gi haaꞌnoko mu hee-gana-matu ka Te Naa geapana ka kaaheno Te Naa besa unnepu gi nakabetseana. Mu sakwa ka Te Naa mumme sooyugwe-kwaꞌneꞌyoo, mu sakwa tuwazoo sakwane sapa ka Te Naa totsaꞌmaka. Mu sakwa besa numu matuguna, besaꞌyoona, kaaheno tusooyugwena ka Te Naa-wi tubetse besa tunakabetsea.
Mu ka gi kaaheno numu tunedyooena gi toge-tamme numu moohe.

Mu Pharisee gi kaaheno numu tunedyooena umu-matoosoo kodyukwu. Mu ka numu poonnenaꞌyoona besa nasooyugwena pana mu tusoohane gi togeꞌyoo. Mu suda totsa tusooyugwe, tuduhana, unu moogoobuna. Mu unu totsadu tseda-waꞌneꞌyoo numu puu ka oo naꞌoonnakwitu suuꞌmu gi madotzakuna oetu tooesoo totsaꞌa.
Mu Pharisee tumamooagadu. Mu sakwa gi toge mu manena nematzaga, oꞌno mu besaꞌyookwu.
Mu ka mu numu nakoopu-waꞌneꞌyoo oosoo puu besa namabetzape puuwanatu a napoonne-kwitu, soo tsoapa suuꞌmu oe.
Mu besa tatabuꞌa ka numu mumme poonnekwi ooonneꞌyoo pana mu ka Te Naa gi nakabetseana unu eꞌesapu.
Mu ka oꞌnosoo Te Naa nanayadooawabe nakoona mabetsabena,
mee nanaꞌunakwe, ‘Tamme sakwa uga ka oꞌno mona Te Naa nanayadooawabe gi goe ka umu te nanamooatupu-waꞌne.’
Tooe mu meeoo sukwe unnepana mu nanamooatupu manena mu nakwisoo meꞌa.
Mu punnoꞌo umu-waꞌneꞌyoosoo. Ooosapa ka umu Te Naa nanayadooawabe goetabekwu.
Mu togogwa-waꞌneꞌyoo. Mu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo saaꞌa nanemadabuese ka goso gi tookedu-kwitoo natzakwunikwu.
Ka yoo a manepunne nu ooosapa ka kaaheno Te Naa unnepu tunedyooekukwudu mu-matoo tayatabekwu, pana mu umu-matu goena, mu kusedyana, suda mu matuguna, mu tayapebuakwu, umu-matu tzakwenetakwu.
Mu oe naneyugwekwu ka noꞌoko Te Naa nanayadooawabe goena. Mu numu menoꞌo modu togesoo ooosapa manedape soo sutaꞌyoo mu manetabena mu-matoosoo kodyukwu.

Nu ewasoo mumme Jerusalem-witu numu tutuha soobedyayakwe, nu sakwa tooe ka hootze-waꞌne tu dooamu ka tu kasa-tooha hane mee nu tusooyugwe. Pana mu gi mumme oo e matuguna petzape. Mu nonoꞌotsa umu Te Naa nanayadooawabe mu-matoo e tayayakwe oo batsayakwe.
Ka saaꞌa mu-matu kadooꞌoo namayugwese mu nogadu-kwitu numu kadooꞌyookwu.
Saaꞌa ka mu-baasoo e kodyu petuse mu mee unnedooa, ‘Yow soo Te Pabeꞌe wunaꞌme te wutooena.’ “
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka numme pumme nakatzimodu ka pabatsekoo nanesootuhi nobe-kwiꞌyoona meaꞌa, numme yise ka nanesootuhi nobe-kwitu apegeamoꞌo.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee ne netamma, “Besa oo poonne ka nanesootuhi nobe maasoo puu tupe namadabuena ka saaꞌa mu tupe noꞌyoona abedikwu gi sumuꞌyoo sapa wunukwu.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka tutsekoo giba Olive mee naneadu-ma poyase onow katu. Numme yise numu-wanaꞌyoona mee oo tubenga, “Haꞌoo saaꞌa numme oo sopedakwadoo tabuadooa hannanoꞌo yoo namanese u kodyu petukwu ka yaatu teepu atasoo u mayugwekwu?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee ne nanekwegea, “Besa sapa gi kummaꞌakusoo numu mumme nemooagadu nakaꞌoedyukupana.
Ewaꞌyoo soo numu mee sumuna mu netammakwu, ‘Nu yow Mu Pabeꞌe,’ yise ewow numu nemooꞌaga.
Mu ka tu nanaꞌakwe-kwitu nakakwu, tooetoo nanaꞌakwekwu pana gi suipana. Tooe tu nanaꞌakwedyakwe sapa gisoo atasoo ka yaatu teepu e yugwekwi manakwe.
Yoo namanekwu ka hemma suda manekwuse. Ewa-baatu numu kukummaꞌyoosoo nanagoena, tukapu natugena natseagoena, soo teepu yise yutsungayikwu.
Saaꞌa numu mu wohonena ka mu numu moohedu mumme goe tuungukwu. Noꞌobatusoo mu numu gi mu petzabekwu nu-koobatoo.
Ewaꞌyoo mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-matu gi nu-kwi tunakaꞌoedyuku manese gi nanapetzabena nanakwohonekwu.
Ewaꞌyoo numu nu yow Te Naa yadooawabe mee naneyugwedu mu-baa petuse ewow numu nemooagakwu.
Yise ewaꞌyoosoo soo numu suda tumatuguna tooe noꞌyoona mu numu gi nanapetzape manekwu.
Pana mu sakwa ooosapa tunakaꞌoedyuku tooe mu numu mumme tumooꞌoo, oꞌno mu namagwetzoikwu.
Mooeꞌugasoo noꞌobatusoo numu ka Te Naa besa naꞌunnedu natuukwekwu. Umu punnoꞌo oo naka ka Te Naa numu magwetzoikwuna. Oꞌno yise nu ka yaatu teepu atasoo yugwekwu.
Tooe hemma tooe sutaꞌyoo ka nananesootuhi nobe-kobena natzekwunukukwu. Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa yadooawabe Daniel mee naneadu yoo eka sutakoo
Oꞌno sakwa mu ka oo poonnese, Judea-wiꞌyoona yabesoo meaꞌa.
Mu ka ona puuwanaꞌyoona mu sakwa gi hemma hanepana meaꞌahootooe.
Ka oona tubewabe-kwiꞌyoona mu sakwa gi mu wegea-kwitoo kodyupana.
Mu momokoꞌne kokoheadu yise mu nunuupetzekudu tutuha namanatzayakwe ka numu tuyamanese.
Umu sakwa nanesootuhi, gi sakwa tommo tooetoo te nanesootuhi tabeno hee oo suda manepana.
Oꞌno numu nanasuda manekwu. Gi hannanoꞌo oo suda namatugupu-gaꞌyoo.
Soo Te Naa umu tu nanumu tutuha soobedyana mu sootuhina ka suda mu nuugwena tzadyooikuse, oꞌno mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu namagwetzoikwu.
Tooe haga tooe sumuna meeoo mu tuukwekwu, ‘Soo Te Pabeꞌe mooasoo kodyu petu,’ mee, gi oo nakaꞌoedyukupana.

Ewa tuwazoo naꞌesagoekwu, ‘Nu yow Mu Pabeꞌe mee naꞌunnekwu.’ Ewasoo mu numu moohedu numu nemooagayakwe. Ewa nanasookwugi hemma mu tzapoonnekukwu tooe hemma tooe mahanekwu ka umu e dooamu tooꞌe nemooagana.
Nu yaa menoꞌo ekow mu tuukweꞌe.
Ka tooe haga tooe mumme mee tuukwe, ‘Soo Te Pabeꞌe numme-baa, tooetoo mana numu-wanakoo oo nanepoonne, tooetoo ebe nobe-kwi,’ mee mu unakwe sapa gi oo poonne-gapana, gi mu nakaꞌoedyukupana.
Nu ka numu poowutzaba-kwaꞌne oo yabe manikwu ka tukwukwetseba tabatsebue-nakwana ka koomeba pedakwana ka taba egea-tamme mani-kwaꞌnekoosoo, nu mu-baa kodyu petuhookwu soo numu noꞌyoona e poonnekwu.
O mu e nakaꞌoedyukudu suuꞌmu nu-baa sumuhookwu.
Oꞌno ka gi hemma besa manekwuse, soo taba toganohookwu, soo muha punnoꞌo. Mu paatoosooba punnoꞌo sawedyikwu.
Noꞌyoona mu numu punnoꞌo ka koomeba-nagakoo e pooha kodyu petukwuna poonnekwu. Noꞌobatusoo gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu numu suda sokwamakwu.

Soo tumooyagakunoo paba namooyagakuhookwu, ka e kemmana mu tuukwena. Nu ka mu nuka tummatzidu toha kakasa-gakoo, mooe tayakwu umuoo saaꞌa umu nuga tutzeana nu-kwi tunakaꞌoedyukudu manatutooe tsobakwu.
Ka sunngabe pooedooakese, mu meeoo sokwamadooa, tamme tookwa tamatsebooe.
Ka gi besa hemma manekese, mu yise oo sopedakwadookwu, nu tookwa pudusoo kodyu petukwu.
Susumudu mu numu-matu ka hemma oo manedu poonnekwu gisoo yaꞌena.
Nuga unnepu besa naꞌunnedu, gi atasoo mane-waꞌneꞌyoo.

Ka hannanoꞌo oe e petuookwuna manepetuse gi haga ka teepu-koobatu oo sopedakwatoo. Mu toogoopatu Te Naa tutummatzidu puu gi, nu punnoꞌo gi. Te Naa suuꞌmu oo sopedakwatoopunne ka hannanoꞌo e petuookwuna.

Nu sumuna yabesoo umu-baa kodyu petukwu gi mu numu meeoo sokwamanoꞌo. Ka gisoo e petu mu numu tooe how tooe maꞌnaꞌwekwu. Ka oꞌnosoo tu mane-kwaꞌnesoo ka nana Noah mee naneadu togesoo ka yaa teepu-kooba gwetzoinumme. Umu puu tukana, hebena, nananodukwadooyakwe ka oꞌno tabeno ka Noah ka sake-wi natzatumase. Mu numu puu ka gi ka Noah nakaheesoobedyana. Oꞌno umu puu ka teepu patatzopahoose, batatuihoo ka gi oo nakaheesoobedyana. Ooosoo tuwazoo manekwu ka e kodyu petuse.
Sumuna wahaꞌyoo nanana ka tubewabe-wiꞌyoona, sumuꞌyoo nakwuhoogase, sumuꞌyoo nabenihookwu.
Sumuna wahaꞌyoo momokoꞌne toosoona, sumuꞌyoo nakwuhoogase, sumuꞌyoo nabenihookwu.
Mu sakwa nonotsu tabeno nuummabetsabena. Tooe hannanoꞌo tooe nu kemmowgena, yongona, togano, awamooasoo. Nu sumuna gi mu nuummabetsabe mu mayu petukwu.
Mu sakwa namabetzapepunne ka e kodyu petukwuna wutooena, soo numu puu namabetzapepunne ka tu nobe-kwitu natuduhakwuna sopedakwatoona, oꞌno soo hemma tuduhakwudu gi mu hemma tuduha-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Mu sakwa yise ooosapa namabetzapepunne nu mu-baa petuhookwu gi meeoo mu sokwamanoꞌo.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo tuwazoo unakwe, “Umu nuga besa yadooawabe mu e dooamu nehane aatakwu, unu sokwamana sakwa ooosapa besa e dooamu tummatzi. Umu yise ka nuka nakaꞌoedyukudu nemabetseana ka e besa unnepu mu tunedyooena.
Nu ka kodyu petuse umu e netutzeana ka umu nuka nakaꞌoedyukudu besa mu nemabetsea mu mayu petuse, nu besa mu sootuhikwu.
Oꞌno umu e hemma noꞌoko nemadunagakwu.
Pana soo e yadooawabe ka suda tusooyugwena, gi yabesoo e petukwuna sookana.
Oosoo yise umu tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi mu nemabetseana, tukana, ewa hebena mesoo baayaꞌena tooe how tooe manekwu.
Nu yise gi oo soonamme-kwaꞌne yabesoo kodyu petukwu. Nu yise ka umu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-noko oo tatsungukwu. Oꞌno oosoo mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-no suda sokwamanoꞌo.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo tuwazoo unakwe, “Nu ka nuga kodyu petukwu-kwitu mu natugwengakwu. Mu sumumanoꞌyoo (10) sususuꞌa ka nana wutooedu-waꞌneꞌyoo ka naꞌewa tukakwu-kwitoo pumme oo bikakwuse.

Manegeꞌyoo umu-matu ka mooasoo oo nakana ka tu tukootabuakunoo besa mabetsapunnena oo wutooepunne ewow yoohoo oo-kumabasoo hanepunne. Umu manegeꞌyoo punnoꞌo oo nakapunnedu gi tu tugootabuagunoo mabetseꞌa, oo sukwe wutooepunne.
Soo nana gidyaꞌe manegena umu oo wutooedu utuigana yise noꞌyoona utuihooga.

Togabeno umu nanetupoonne mee natuukwehoo, ‘Pudusoo soo nana petuookwu,-tzageꞌe manegena yosuhoose oo-no meaꞌa mu ka tooe mooasoo namamakwupunne.’ Noꞌyoona mu sususuꞌa yosuhoose tu tukootabugunoo mabetsabekooha.
Mu gi oo-toogoo namabetzapepunnedu sukwe kemmadu ka tu tukootabuakunoo togegaꞌa mu tu pupuaꞌamu punotu tooꞌe yoohoo natuungu.
Umu pupuaꞌamu yise mee mu nanekwegea, ‘Gi! Esoo yoohoo sumuna gi toge tamme-too togeꞌyoo. Mu sakwa muusoo yoohoo tumuhoo.’

Ka mu sususuꞌa yoohoo tumugase, soo mu wutooena nana petuhoo. Mu sususuꞌa mooasoo nuummabetsabepunnedu ka nana-no meaꞌa ka tu naꞌewa tukakwu-kwitoo. Ka oe mu petugonnogase soo natzakwonaꞌa natzadumahoose natseponoehoo.
Saaꞌa umu yoohoo tumumodu yise saaꞌasoo ka natzakwonaꞌa-wi tooꞌe petugonno. Meeꞌe tooꞌe unakwe, ‘Ne tutzakwonaku.’
Oosoo nana yise mee mu nanekwegea, ‘Mu mooasoo saaꞌasoo manasoo manemo. Manakwingaꞌa-witoosoo meaꞌa.’
Nu Mu Pabeꞌe ookow nana-waꞌneꞌyoo. Mu sakwa namabetzapepunnena nu-no mea ka tooe hannano tooe mumme e bi petugase.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeꞌe tuwazoo mu natugwenga, “Sumuꞌyoo numu puu ka meakwuse, ka hemma how pumme yugwekudu hemma nemanekuka. Ka tuꞌeyaedu meeoo netamma, ‘Gi uꞌwepana.’
Ka sumuoo pumme tummatzidu manegeoo oa tupe oo heme, ka sumuoo pumme tummatzidu waahoo oa tupe oo heme, sumuoo tummatzidu sumuoo oa tupe oo gea. Oꞌno soo nana mea.
Soo oo tummatzidu ka manegeoo nahemedu hee-ma tumuna oo-masoo too tumuwununa sumumano (10) oe mamaꞌe petuga.
Soo tummatzidu ka waahoo nahemedu punnoꞌo manegeoo nahemedu-kwaꞌnesoo manese watsu oo mamaꞌe petuga.
Soo oo tummatzidu ka sumuoo nageadu yise ka teepu-tooha oo sukwe kooohoo.
Ka saaꞌa soo nana kodyu petuse mu pumme tummatzidu namatoo bi.
Ka umu tu hemepu-witu soosopedakwatoona soo oo tummatzidu manegeoo nahemekadu oo makodyuse yise manegeoo too oo-koobakwisoo oo heme.
Soo nana meeoo oo netamma, ‘U punnoꞌo besa manepu-gaꞌyoo u manegeoo nanakummaꞌakoosoo numu nemadabuekwu. Nu ewahoosoo u hanekukwu. U besa soonammekwu, yaa manakwana u nu-baaꞌyoona.’
Soo sumuꞌyoo oo tummatzidu punnoꞌo ka waahoo oa tupe nahemedu meeoo ka nana netamma, ‘U waahoosoo oa tupe e hemese, nu onoko tzanabedose menoꞌo watsukwuoo oa tupe u makodyukukwu.’

Soo nana meeoo oo netamma, ‘U tookwa punnoꞌo tubetse besa manepu-gaꞌyoo. U besa e nakabetsea tooe ka huutsekoo ume e hanekuse sapa. Nu ewahoosoo u hanekukwu. U punnoꞌo besa soonammekwu, yaa manakwana u nu-baaꞌyookwu.’
Soo tummatzidu punnoꞌo ka sumuoo oa tupe nageadu meeoo ka nana netamma, ‘U nenaduꞌyana. U ooosapa tooe hema soogwidu tooe gi numu tummatzipana.
Nu ka u-ma suina gi oo sookwatzekuna teepu-tooha ka oa tupe kooohoo. Yaaꞌa yise soo u oa tupe.’
Soo nana yise meeoo oo netamma, ‘U unu sutaꞌyoo, unu toetzebu. U mooasoo e sopedakwadoo ka e u manekwuna ka e tusoogwipunne.
U sakwa ka e oa tupe uga wutumase, oꞌno oosoo ewasoo manekwu.’
Ka oa tupe oo-makoo gwuuse ka nana sumumano (10) oa tupe makodyupu nagea.
Soo tooe haga tooe ka pumme tu geana besakoo mabetseana ewowsoo nageakwu. Soo tooe haga tooe yise ka gi besa oo mabetseana oosoo umu-makoo nahanekwu.
Soo gi besa tummatzidu ka unu togano-kwitoo natayakwu ka gi besa nanasoonamme-kwitoo.
Ka Te Naa Besa Pooha tooha-kwi e petuse ka mu nuka tummatzidu toha kakasa-gakoo-no, nu saaꞌa ka mu numu nemadabuedooa ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi.
Noꞌobatusoo numu saaꞌa nu-baa e koobena manepetuse, nu yise mu tapokase mu nuga dooamu sukwesoo hanekwu.
Nu ka mu nuga dooamu e tumadinakwa hanekwu ka mu susutakoo numu e oenakwa hanekwu.
Ka umu e tumadinakwatu nu mee netammakwu, soo Te Naa namatoo mu bise Te Naa mu doodooamu-gakwu mu sootuhise, mu ooosapa Te Naa-baaꞌyookwu. Te Naa oꞌnosoo oo nemamakwupu gisoo ka teepu matabuena.
Mu nasootuhikwu ka e tzuayaꞌe e makase, e bamaka ka e puudyi, e nabaaꞌyookute tooe e wawaꞌa sapa.
Mu pukwi e namasooana e heemaka ka ooka e soogwaꞌe. Mu e tuoeyaꞌe e mabetsea. Mu nu-baa nobeꞌne ka e nakwutuma.
Mu bebesaꞌyoo numu mee unnekwu, ‘Hannanoꞌo numme u poonnena, u maka ka u tzuayaꞌe, yise ka u puudyaꞌe u bamaka?
Hannanoꞌo numme u nabaaꞌyookute tooe u wawaꞌa sapa? Hannanoꞌo pukwi u namasooana numme u heemaka ka ooka u soogwaꞌe?
Ka u tuoeyaꞌe haaꞌa u mabetseꞌa? Hannanoꞌo u nakwutuma u nobeꞌne?’
Nu mu tuukwekwu, ‘Mu ka umu e doodooamu-nagatu besa matuguna mu nuka besa matugudu-kwaꞌne manepunne.’

Nu ka umu e oenakwatu yise mee netammakwu, ‘Mu sakwa nu-baaꞌyoona meaꞌa. Mu ka gi tookedu goso-witoo meakwu, ka sutakoo yise too ooka tummatzidu-no ka suta-too namadabuedu-kwitoo mu meaꞌakwu, ka gi e tummatzina ka mumme e soogwaꞌe.
Mu gi e maka ka e tzuayaꞌe. Mu gi e bamaka ka e puudyaꞌe.
Mu gi e nabaaꞌyookute ka wawaꞌana mu-baa e petugase. Mu pukwi e namasooana gi e heemaka, ka ooka e soogwaꞌe. Mu gi e mabetsea ka e tuoeyaꞌe, ka e nakwutuma gi e nobeꞌne.’

Nu oo sopedakwadoo umu punnoꞌo mee e nanekwegeakwu, ‘Numme gi u nabaaꞌyookudu ka gi hannanoꞌo u poonnena. Gi too u hee-makadu ka gi u poonnena, tooe u tuoeyaꞌe sapa, tooe u nakwutuma sapa, gi hownnekoo u tummatzi ka gi u poonnena.’
Nu mee mu nanekwegeakwu, ‘Nu togesapa mu tuukwekwu. Mu gi nuka tummatzaꞌe-kwaꞌne manepunne ka umu e doodooamu gi tummatzina.
Mu gi he-toogoo besaꞌyoo mee mu soobedyana. O mu sutaꞌyoo numuna soo suda mu tumatuguna mu-matoosoo kodyukwu. Umu bebesaꞌyoo numu punnoꞌo ooosapa Te Naa-baaꞌyoona besa nasootuhikwu.’ “
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu numu natukwengamakwuse ka numme pumme nakatzimodu mee netamma.
“Mooa yongona tamme ka gi namayuadu tukaba ewa tukakwu. Ka tu naꞌewa tukanoꞌo nu sutakoo nana-waꞌne nakwuse natzakwenekwu. Oo nu nabatsa tabuakwu.”
Mu Jew numu tutunehanedu ka pumme tubetse moohedu Caiaphas mee naneadu nobe-wi sumuhoo.
Mu Jew numu tutunehanedu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu watze tunehanese yise oo batsakwu mee tunehanena.
Pana mu tutunehanedu ka mu numu-ma suaꞌe. “Tamme gi hownnekoo ka tu naꞌewa nadukanoꞌo ka Jesus wutama-waꞌneꞌyoo mu numu sumuna te goehookwu,” meeꞌe umu nananetamma.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe oona Bethany-wi ka Simon
Sumuꞌyoo mogoꞌne oo-matoo kemma tupe osa-kwikoo besa kwanadu namakwanakuna unu nanenagadu gwuuna. Ookow ka Te Pabeꞌe kwo-kooba tokwuukwateoo ka oo tuka katu.
Numme oo nakatzimodu ka mogoꞌne manena poonnese oo nesootuꞌadyaꞌe, meeoo yise, “How manena oo nahadyakwe ka besa kwanadu unu naneagadu namakwanakuna?
Oosoo sakwa uga oo-ma tumuse mu tutuha manedu namadea.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “A tsasoopedya. Gi a nesootuꞌadyaꞌepana. Esoo mogoꞌne besa manakwe.
Mu tutuha manedu tooe hannanoꞌo pana ooosapa mu-noꞌyookwu, pana nu yise gi ooosapa mu-noꞌyookwu.
Oosoo ka namakwakuna nu-kooba tokwuukwateoo ka e nakoookwuna-kobena e natugukwuna tumayohokuna.
Tooe hano tooe ka teepu-koobakwi soo besa nayadooadu numu natunedyooe-kwi ekow mogoꞌne besa tumatugu-kwitu nawahakwu.”
Sumuꞌyoo ka numme Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu-matu Judas Iscariot mee naneadu ka mu Jew tutunehanedu-baa petuse
mee mu netamma, “Mu ka Ne Pabeꞌe pukwiꞌyoona mumme e tuukwese, haaꞌnoko sakwa mu e tumanagaku?” Mu Jew numu tutunehanedu yise pahe mano-ma tsebooekudu (30) oo tumanagakuhoo.
Soo Judas yise mee soonamme, “Hownnekoo sakwa nu ka Jesus bika?”
Ka Gi Namayuadu Tukaba naꞌewa tukana oe manepetuse, numme Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu mee ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Hanoꞌyoona sakwa numme ka te nanesootuhi yongo tukakwuna mahanega?”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee ne netamma, “Mu ka Jerusalem-wi petugase sumuoo nana tapoegakwu mee saaꞌa oo netamma, ‘Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo, “Soo e nabatsakwuna mooasoo tuganaꞌa manegena. Nu ka umu nuka nakatzimodu-no ume nobe-kwiꞌyoona nanesootuhi yongo tukadooa.” ’ “
Numme ka Te Pabeꞌe tumayohokuna, ka ne nanesootuhi yongo tukakwuna mabetsabe.
Ka tu yongose, soo Te Pabeꞌe Gi Namayuadu Tukaba numme-no tuka.
Ka togesoo ne tuka, soo Te Pabeꞌe mee ne netamma, “Mu sakwa oo tubetse nakasopedakwadoo sumuꞌyoo mu-nagatu ka umu nuka wohonedu-matoo e bihookakwu.”
Numme suda sokwamana nanasusumuꞌyoona ka Te Pabeꞌe mee tubengadyipunne, “Nu haaꞌa?” meeꞌe.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee ne nanekwegea, “Sumuꞌyoo yaa nu-no tukadu.
Pana saaꞌa oosoo umu e wohonedu nu-matoo bikekwu soo oo manedu tumaꞌemukwana oo-matoosoo kodyukwu.”
Soo Judas Iscariot ka Te Pabeꞌe ka ooka wohonedu-matoo bikakwu. Oosoo yise ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo tubenga, “Nu haaꞌa?” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo ka Judas netamma, “O u mooasoo oo yadooahoo.”

Ka togesoo ne tuka aata soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tukaba gwuuhoose oo-koobatoo nanesootuhise oo tzabokahoo. Ookahoo numme pumme nakatzimodu hemehoose mee unakwe, “Mu sakwa eka tukaba tuka esoo nuga tookoo-matu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka tseda gwuuhoose ka atsa baa oe tuoonahoose oo-koobatoo nanesootuhise mee ne netamma, “Mu sakwa noꞌyoona mamatu hebe.
Esoo nuga puupe-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa mooasoo tunemamakwupu nu mu-koobatoo nabatsa. Ooonneꞌyoona yise soo Te Naa mu tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwakwu.
Nu mu tuukweꞌe nu ekow atsa baa ka yaa teepu-koobatu tubetse gi hebekwusoo, Te Naa ka te teepu mapudutupudoose, oꞌno yise nu tubetse pudutupusoo mu-no hebekwu.”
Numme yise nanesootuhi hoobea negwuuna ka Olive mee naneadu poꞌwoadu-matoo mea.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee ne netamma, “Ka yaa togano suda tu namanekwuse mu e maꞌwuookakwu. Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa yadooawabe tubotugupu, meeꞌe naꞌunakwe ka menoꞌo e manekwuna. ‘Soo seepu takonedu nabatsahookwu, mu seepu yise nanaꞌemota petugwahookwu.’
Pana saaꞌa nu ka e yaꞌe-kwikoo namayodase mu-kobenasoo Galilee-wi mani petuhoogakwu.”
Soo Peter meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Umu sumuna u-koobaꞌyoona meaꞌakwu, nu gi umu-no meakwu,” meeꞌe.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo ka Peter netamma, “Togesoo tu toganopunne, gisoo ka tsekana kwuꞌa waha-dooe oo yaka, pahe-dooe ona u numu tuukwekwu u gi e sopedakwatoo.”
Soo Peter yise meeoo Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Tooe umu e batsakwu mee unnepana gi nu meeoo unne-waꞌneꞌyoo.” Numme Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu noꞌyoona oo-waꞌnesoo unakwe.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise numme-no Gethsemane-wi petugase onona yise mee ne netamma, “Yowsoo aatapunne nu nanesootuhigakwu.”
Mu Peter, James, John, oꞌno meaꞌa. Soo Te Pabeꞌe
mee mu netamma, “E pewu-kwitu tubetse suda nuumma. Mu sakwa yaahoosoo aatapunne.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe sagwane umu kwingaꞌatoosoo meahoose, o teepu-kooba meatzedose, yise nanesootuhikooha. “E Naa Toogoopatu. Nuga Naa Toogoopatu. Nuka u tunetammakuse nu oo-toogoo meakwu. Ekow e pewu-kwitu suda nuummana, kadooꞌoo mayugwe.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka umu pahe-matoo kodyukase, utuaꞌe mu mayuhoo petugase mee mu netamma, “Mu sakwa nanesootuhipunne, oꞌno soo sutaꞌyoo gi mu matzama.
Mu gi oo mapuꞌa ka gi manese meeꞌe nu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise penakwa nanesootuhigase, oꞌno yise tuwow mee unakwe, “E Naa nu tooe a nuukatupana oo-toogoo meakwu ka nuka u tunemayohokupu.”
Yise tu pupuaꞌamu-baa kodyu petuse, mu utuaꞌe mu mayu petusoo.
Ka mu poonnese kodyukase meeoosoo nanesootuhaꞌe.
Ka nanesootuhimakwuse ka umu tu pupuaꞌamu-baasoo petugase meeoo mu netamma, “Yow, haaꞌa mu togesoo utuaꞌe? Yosuhoo! Tamme meaꞌakwu, nu natzakwenekwu. Yaa soo sutaꞌyoo nana kemma.”
Togesoo ka Te Pabeꞌe yadooadyakwe soo Judas uga numme-notu, mu ewaꞌyoo tukwutumadu o-no numme-baa petugonno, tsegesa noko papabatsekoo hooope hehemana. Mu Jew numu tutunehanedu numme-matoo tutayana.
Mooasoo soo Judas meeoo mu tunetammakupu, “Nu saaꞌa oo mitzadyamehoodooa, oꞌno u oo sopedakwadoodooa o soo Jesus.”
Soo Judas ka Te Pabeꞌe yise mee netamma, “How u E Pabeꞌe?” yise oo mitzadyaꞌmehoo.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee oo netamma, “E puaꞌa. Yabesoo sakwa u oo manikwuna mayohohoo.” Mu naana ka Judas-notu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe-ma tsakatuhoo.
Sumuꞌyoo numme-matu yise tsegesa-ma ka mu Jew numu tunehanedu pabeꞌe tummatzidu naka wugaꞌakwunihoo.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo oo netamma, “U tsegesa mabesootugu. Soo tooe haga tooe ka tsegesa-ma mooemanedu nanagoedu, oosoo oo-masoo nabatsakwudu.
Mu sakwa e unnena nakasopedakwatoo, nu ka E Naa ewow oo tutummatziwabe toha kakasa-gakoo sakwa mesoo natummatzi tuunguse uga.
Pana nu ka gi umuoo natummatzi tuunguse, ka oꞌnosoo Te Naa yadooapu nabotugu-waꞌnesoo manepunne.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu pumme gwuuhoodu mee netamma, “Nu gi suda tumatugudu, gi nu naduyadu, gi tuduhadu tuwazoo. Gi sakwa mu e tumahepana wobe-ma, tsegesa-ma tuwazoo. Tooe ka e nanesootuhi nobe-kwikoo sapa gi nu-ma tzakadupu-gaꞌyoo. Muusoo tooꞌe.
Mooasoo soo tubope ebeoo nabotugu oꞌnosoo Te Naa tamme tuukwe-kwaꞌnesoo.” Noꞌyoona numme nakatzimodu yise suise oo-baaꞌyoona namapetukwahoo.
Mu tutukwutumadu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe mu Jew numu tunehanedu pabeꞌe Caiaphus mee naneadu-baatoo bihooka. Mu Jew numu tutuhanedu ka Caiaphus-no watze tunehane ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu.
Soo Peter kwingaꞌa mu-nakwi meadabena ka pukwi mu tutunehane-kwi petuhooga obe puuwanasoo. Soo Peter mu otuoo tutukwutumadu-baa katu, mee soonammena, “Howga umu ka Te Pabeꞌe yugwekwu?”
Soo Jew numu pabeꞌe mu tutunehanedu-no ka Te Pabeꞌe tooꞌe nebatsa, gi toge oo manena tooꞌe nekwatepana, gi hemma nemamaꞌyu.
Tooe ewaꞌyoo numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu esayipana gi nanakwaꞌnesoo nanano tuukweꞌe. Wahaꞌyoo numu yise saaꞌa mee unnekwate “Esoo nana meeoo,
‘Nu ka nobe ka Te Naa pukwiꞌyoona te nanesootuhina kadooꞌoo mesoo mayukwe yise pahe tabeba-wi oo mesoo mayota.’ “
Soo Caiaphas yise wunuoose ka Te Pabeꞌe meeꞌe netamma, “U sakwa ne tuukwe ka mu numu ume netamma-kwitu.”
Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe yise gi. Soo Caiaphas yise tuwow mee oo netamma, “U sakwa togekoo tuukwe u haaꞌa tooꞌe Te Pabeꞌe? U haaꞌa toogoopadu Te Naa Besaa Tooa?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo oo nanekwegea, “Aha, u besa unakwe. Nu togesapa mu tuukwe saaꞌa mu e poonnekwu Te Naa-baaꞌyoona e tunemadabue ka koomeba-kooba e kodyu petuse.”

Soo Caiaphas tu kwasu makebuekooha. Yooonnekoo mu numu oo sopedakwatoo ka suda Te Pabeꞌe unnena oo nakasagwaꞌekuhoose. Soo Caiaphas yise mee mu tutuhanedu netamma, “Oosoo suda unakwe ka Te Naa-waꞌneꞌyoo mee naneyugwena. Gi tamme manatusoo oetusoo wahakwutu sookwaꞌe. Mu muusoo oo naka ka suda oo unakwe mu sakwa haꞌyoo oetu netamma.
Hayoo mu sokwama?” Umu yise ka Caiaphas nanekwegease meeoo unne, “Soo Jesus sakwa nabatsa.”
Umu-matu ka Te Pabeꞌe kobi-too toohegonno yise madopotona oo topagetagonno. Oo matatsena oo nematzama,
mee unnena, “U sakwa ne mesoo tuukwe ka ume topagetadu ka u pooha ume tuukwe u ka Te Pabeꞌe mee unnena.”
Soo Peter tooesoo ka Te Pabeꞌe mu nehane puuwana tu nobe-kobena katu. Sumuꞌyoo tutummatzidu tsuadumu mee oo netamma, “U haaꞌa punnoꞌo ka Jesus-notu
Soo Peter yise noꞌoko mu numu tu naꞌoonnakwi manepunnedu mee netamma, “Nu gi oo-notu. Nu gi oo sopedakwatoo.”
Ka koodua nanatzakwonaꞌa-witoo soo Peter meahoo. Oꞌno yise kummaꞌyoosoo tsuadumu tutummatzidu punnoꞌo oo poonnese mee ka mu numu o konnodu netamma, “Esoo nana uga ka Jesus-notu
Soo Peter yise meesoo, “Nu gi ka nana sopedakwatoo, mee uga nu.”
Saaꞌa sumuꞌyoo umu o konnodu-matu mee ka Peter netamma, “U tookwa umu-notu, u umu-matoo-waꞌnesoo yadooakanga.”
Soo Peter yise mee mu netamma, “Nu togesapa unakwe soo Te Naa sakwa gi e sootuhipana ka mumme e esayaꞌekute. Nu gi ookow nana sopedakwatoo.” Toge, oꞌno soo tsekana kwuꞌa yagayakwe.

Soo Peter yise oo soomayuhoo ka Te Pabeꞌe pumme netammapu, “Pahe u gi e nesopedakwadoopunnekwu gisoo ka tsekana kwuꞌa yaka.” Soo Peter puunuwatoo mease yaka ka tooe Te Pabeꞌe sopedakwatoopana gi oo nesopedakwadoose.
Awamooasoo noꞌyoona mu Jew numu tutunehanedu ka Te Pabeꞌe batsakwu mee tunehane.
Ka Te Pabeꞌe mi tzagunetowse ka mu otuoo numu-kooba katudu Pilate mee naneadu-matoo oo bika. Mu Jew tutunehanedu gi mu numu batsa-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Soo Judas
“Nu suda manakwe nu ka mu tummatzina ka besow nana mu batsakwuse,” mee soo Judas unakwe. “U suda soonamme gi numme,” mee umu tutunehanedu oo netamma.
Soo Judas yise ka mu tumakodyukuna ka pabatsekoo nanesootuhi nobe-wiꞌyoona sutahoose oo tabebuowse meahoo. Yise puusoo natzakwenehoose yaꞌehoo.
Mu Jew numu tutunehanedu ka oo tutabebuahoona tzobahoose mee unakwe, “Esoo numu nabatsa-kwi a natumanakana. Esoo sutaꞌyoo gi ka nanesootuhi nobe-kwi natumasumudoodu-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
Umu yise tubewa oo-ma tumuhookwu mee tunehane wakwawaꞌa numu pukwi nakooꞌyikwuna
Menoꞌo yise esoo tubewabe, Numu Pu-koobatoo Nabatsapu, mee naneꞌa.
Oꞌnosoo Te Naa nayadooawabe, Jeremiah mee naneadu, ka yoo tu namanekwuna oꞌnosoo wahapu.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka Pilate-baa nabi petugase soo Pilate yise mee oo tubenga, “U haaꞌa ka Jew numu-kooba katukwudu?” Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo oo nanekwegea, “Aha, nu yow oosoo.”
Mu Jew numu tutunehanedu nanasuda oo netamma, pana soo Te Pabeꞌe gi haꞌyoo unakwe.
Soo Pilate yise mee ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Mu tutunehanedu tubetse suda u netamma. U sakwa ka mu tutunehanedu kaaheno nanekwegea.”
Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe gisoo tuwazoo haꞌyoo sukwe unakwe. Soo Pilate meeoo soonamme, “Nu gi o nakasopedakwatoo haꞌoo manenaga masoo gi mu nanekwegea.”
Nonotsa sumu tomoyina tu naꞌewa tukanoꞌo soo numu-kooba katudu sumuoo mu nakwutumadu-matu tzamaꞌwuyakwe ka mu numu unnemakoosoo.
Mu ewaꞌyoo numu sumuoo nakwutumadu unu sopedakwatoo Barabbas mee naneadu ewow numu goedu.
Ka mu numu sumuse soo Pilate mee mu tubenga, “Hanotu umu-matu mu natzamaꞌwukwuna soogwaꞌe Barabbas pute Jesus?”
Soo Pilate oo sopedakwatoo ka mu numu Jew tutunehanedu ka Te Pabeꞌe gi mu petzape oo nuusoogwedu ooonneꞌyoona umu ka Te Pabeꞌe wutumase.
Tooesoo ka Pilate oetu soohane oo nodukwa kummaꞌakoosoo oo-matoo taya mee oo tuukwe tuunguna, “Gi ka besaꞌhoo nana how yugwepana soo e nosena suda e masoonamme u ka oo batsa tuungukwuse.”
Mu numu tutunehanedu meeꞌe ka ewow numu tunetammakute, “Ka Barabbas tzamaꞌwuse ka Jesus batsa,” meeꞌe.
“Hanotu umu-matu nu tzamaꞌwukwu?” meeꞌe soo Pilate tutubenga. “Barabbas,” mee mu numu noꞌyoona oo nanekwegea.
“Haꞌoo yise nu oo yugwekwu ka Jesus Mu Pabeꞌe?” meeꞌe soo Pilate mu tubenga. Umu noꞌyoona oo nanekwegease mee unne, “Oo batsa.”
Soo Pilate yise mee mu tubenga, “Haꞌoo suda mu oo tumatuguse, oo batsa tuungu?” Pana umu tunenoyukwesoo, “Oo batsa.”

Soo Pilate ka mu numu-ma suina meeoo mu netamma, “Nu tooe mu tooꞌe tumayohokukwu mu Jesus batsa mee tunetamma gi yise nu hownnekoo oe naneyugwekwu.” Soo Pilate yise mu-kobenaꞌyoona mabatzaka, ka umu-tammesoo ka Te Pabeꞌe nabatsana tzamunase, puu gi oe soonaneyugwena mee unnena.
Noꞌyoona mu numu yise oo nanekwegea, “Oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo. Mooasoo numme noꞌyoona oo patza tuunguse. Gi too hownneꞌyoo tooe soo oo numme manena numme-matoosoo kodyuse.”
Soo Pilate yise ka Barabbas tzamaꞌwuse ka umu tutukwutumadu ka Te Pabeꞌe wupagetu tuunguse ooka mu batsa tuungu, oo taposa paaꞌa yise oo batsakwu.
Mu tutukwutumadu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe tu nobe-witoo tzakakase noꞌyoona mu susumudu tutukwutumadu oo naꞌoonnakwi mani.
Umu yise ka pukwi oo namadabuena tsakwumetahoose ka numu-kooba katudu-kwaꞌnesoo oo wunagayaku.
Unutse monoga-kwi tuwow oo tzowupagaku tonobe-makoo a namadabue-kwi. Natzetono oo mi-wi tuguse oo-kobena meatzedona oo-maꞌyoona nanekoꞌe mee unnena, “U tookwa yow mu Jew numu-kooba katudu.”
Umu oo kobitu toohena ka pumma oo natzetomasoo oo kwo-makoo oo wupageta.
Ka oo-maꞌyoona nanekoemakwuse umu oo kwasu-kwisoo oo kwaseakuse oo tzakahooka oo batsakwuse.
Umu tutukwutumadu ka meadabena, Simon mee naneadu wegeahoo. Mu tutukwutumadu ka Simon nenoyukwe ka Te Pabeꞌe puma nataposakwuna oo hane tuunguna.
Umu yise ka Numu Tzonoho mee naneadu-wi oo bi petuhooga.
Yise umu atsa tutzaꞌemukwa baa noko natusooabe mayuana oo tooꞌe hebe tuungu, soo Te Pabeꞌe yise gi oo hepe.
Yise awamooa umu oo mi-makoo paaꞌa oo taposa. Mu tutukwutumadu yise oo kwasu natotsakwate.
Ka Te Pabeꞌe nataposana tzopanakwa wobe-matoo mee nabotugu, “Yaa esoo Jesus, ka mu Jew numu-kooba katudu.”
Mu wahaꞌyoo unu tutuduhadu punnoꞌo ka Te Pabeꞌe naꞌenakwa nataposa.
Mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe moopa meana oo-maꞌyoona nanekoꞌe.

Mu numu oo-moopa meadu oo-maꞌyoo nanekoꞌe ka Te Pabeꞌe mee netamma, “U meeoo unnepu u Te Naa nobe wudyoomase, pahe tabeba-wi besa oo matabuekwu. U sakwa ka unu tumadina mamaꞌyoo wuekese, namagwetzoi.”
Umu numu tutunehanedu oo-maꞌyoo nanekoꞌe mee unnena,
“U mu numu magwetzoise, pana yise gi hownnekoo uusoo namagwetzoi. Ne hee Pabeꞌe u? Gi hownnekoo uusoo namagwetzoi ka naduyana mee unnepana. Uusoo yaa teepu-matoo wuese numme u nakaꞌoedyukukwu.
Masoo Te Naa Besaa Tooa mee naneyakwe Te Naa God sakwa oo magwetzoi ka Te Naa-wi oo tunakaꞌoedyukute mee oo unakwe.”
Umu tutuduhadu oo naꞌenakwa natzakwenedu punnoꞌo oo-maꞌyoona nanekoꞌe.
Tabeno manakwana oona ka taba pahe-kwikoo tooe, ka teepu-koobakwitu toganopunne.
Ka pahe-kwikoo tooesoo toganopunne soo Te Pabeꞌe paba waꞌagedyadooa, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabachthani,” mee naꞌunnedu, “E Naa, E Naa, how manena u e matusookwunaꞌe?”
Umu susumudu konnopunnedu-nagatu mee unne, “Masoo tookwa ka Elijah oꞌnosoo Te Naa yadooawabe mee naneadu bidyakwe.”
Sumuꞌyoo umu-nagatu yabesoo tanomanegase yise suda kammadu baa yotsogadu-kooba hanese oodutsekoo hooope-ma oo tzetzabekuse ka Te Pabeꞌe baa tumakute.
Pana mu susumudu meeoo, “Oo tsasoopedya. Sumuna soo Elijah tamme-baa tabua petuse oo magwetzoikwu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise paba yadooase soo oo moogooa oo-nagaꞌyoona tsebooegea.

Soo wunapu ka Te Naa pooha pukwiꞌyoona numu nanesootuhidu-makoo nowmootoo natzakwenedu ka Te Pabeꞌe yaꞌehoose soo wunapu paꞌanakwana tubongo nowmootoo natzagebuꞌehoo. Soo teepu yutsungakoohase mu tupe payooagonnona tsawekooha.
Mu numu pukwi natuoonana-kwitu soo teepu paꞌyooawununa mu numu pukwi natuoonana wonedihoo. Mu numu tuꞌina Te Naa dooamu suuꞌmu tu natuoona-kwiꞌyoona tuusootabue.
Ka Te Pabeꞌe tuusootabuese, oꞌno mu numu mooasoo tu nakoo-kwiꞌyoona tuusootabuepuna yosupu, umu ewow numu poonne ka Jerusalem-witu.

Mu tukwutumadu pabeꞌe ka mu tukwutumaku ka Te Pabeꞌe eyaꞌepunnedu umu noꞌoko hemma manewununa poonne ka teepu yutsungakoohase ka Te Pabeꞌe yaꞌehoose umu yise unu suigonnona meeꞌe nanaꞌunakwe, “Masoo tookwa tooꞌe togesapa ka Te Naa Tooaꞌa.”
Ewaꞌyoo momokoꞌne punnoꞌo onow kwingaꞌa konnopunnena oo poonnepunne umuoo ka Galilee-wiꞌyoona ka Te Pabeꞌe-no kemmapu oo tummatzina.
Umuoo momokoꞌne-nagatu paheꞌyoo Mary Magdalene, yise Mary mu James noko Joseph pea, yise tuwazoo Zebedee nodukwa.
Ka tu pudu yongose soo nana Joseph
Soo Joseph yise ka Te Pabeꞌe tookoo tzakwekuse pudutupu toha wanapu hane petuse oe oo mabutooe.

Mooasoo soo Joseph ka tupe-wi tutotawagase, ka sumu tabeno puusoo oe natugukwu mee soonammena. Ooweoo yise ka Te Pabeꞌe tookoo nanomatugu. Ka pabatsekoo tupe yise oo-kobenatoo tonanooehoose yise oeꞌyoona mea.
Mu Mary Magdalene-no Mary punnoꞌo ka pukwi oo nanomatuguna oowenapa oo poonnedyugwe.
Ookow mooꞌa mu Jew numu tutunehanedu noꞌyoona ka Pilate-baa petuga.
Umu mee oo netamma, “Numme oo soomayu soo Jesus uga meeoo ka mu numu esayaꞌekuyakwe ka saaꞌa yaꞌese waha tabeno manese namayodakwu.

U sakwa watsukuoo umu u tutukwutumadu-matu pukwi oo natuguna waha tabeno mu tuꞌeyaꞌe tuungu, oꞌno umu oo nakatzimodu sumuna gi oo tookoo tuduhadooa, oosoo tu yaꞌekwikoo namayoda mee gi mu numu tuukwedooa. Ekow naꞌesayaꞌedu ka mooasoo Jesus unnena oooonakwa sutaꞌyookwu,” mee mu tutunehanedu unakwe.
“Unu ooka mu tuꞌeyaꞌe tuungu,” mee soo Pilate.
Umu yise ka pukwi oo natugu-kwitoo mease unutse oo madumahoo, oꞌno gi haga oe egea-waꞌneꞌyoo, umu yise mu tutukwutumatu ooka eyaꞌe tuungu.
Yise ka nanesootuhi tabeba waha tabeno oo tabemease ka Te Pabeꞌe yaꞌese oogow awamooasoo, mu Mary Magdalene-no Mary ka Te Pabeꞌe natugu-kwitu poonne memeahoo.
Gisoo ka oe mu pepetugaꞌa soo teepu unu yutsungakooha yise soo Te Naa tummatzidu toha kasa-gaꞌyoo ka tupe oo koobenatu tonanooekwunihoose oo-kooba katuoo.
Soo Te Naa tummatzidu besa kootabedooana tukwukwetseba-waꞌne yise besa toha namasoꞌa.
Umu tutukwutumadu kwepekeagonnona, ka oo poonnese abedihooga ka sui nunugwehoose.
Ka mu momokoꞌne pepetuhoogase soo Te Naa tummatzidu mee mu netamma, “Gi suipana, nu oo sopedakwatoo mu ka Te Pabeꞌe tookoo wate.
Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe gi yow, mooasoo yotsepu ka tu unne-kwaꞌnesoo. Kekemowse ka pukwi oo natzatugupu poonne.

Yabe memeahoose ka umu oo nakatzimodu tuukwe petuga Te Pabeꞌe tu yaꞌe-kwiꞌyoona mooasoo yotsepuna mu-kobenasoo Galilee-wisoo petuoogakwu. Ka o petuoogase, mu saaꞌa Te Pabeꞌe poonnedooa. O soomayuna ka Te Pabeꞌe mumme tuukwepu,” meeꞌe soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo.
Umu momokoꞌne yise yabesoo ka pukwiꞌyoo oo natugupu-wiꞌyoona memeahoose, besa sokwama gisoo besa oo nakasopedakwadoopana, mu nakatzimodu tuukwega.
Mu momokoꞌne memeana ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus wegease Te Pabeꞌe mee mu netamma, “Haꞌoo mu?” Umu yise oo-tamme kekemmase oo-kobena meatzedokwatese oo kuku-kooba matuoonase oo-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus yise mee mu netamma, “Gi suipana. Mu sakwa umu nuka nakatzimodu ka teepu Galilee-witoo taya, nu saaꞌa onoko mu tapoegeadooa.”
Ka mu momokoꞌne ka Jerusalem-witoo kokodyuse mu tutukwutumadu yise ka mu Jew numu tutunehanedu papabeꞌe-baa petugonno ka tu poonnena mu tuukwe.
Mu tutunehanedu papabeꞌe ka mu tutukwutumadu ewatseꞌe tumanagakukwu.
Mu tutunehanedu mee mu netamma. “Mu sakwa mu numu tuukwe ka umu Jesus nakatzimodu tookwa ka oo tookoo hanedooapu ka togano ne utuihoogase.
Ka Pilate ooka nakase numme saaꞌa ookow tuwazoo tumanagakudooa, oꞌno saaꞌa soo Pilate gi haꞌoo mu yugwedooa.”
Mu tutukwutumadu ka pumme tu tumanagakuna hemmase mu numu nemooaka. Yaa manakwana mu Jew numu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe tookoo natuduhapu meeꞌe pumme tu nemooagapu oo tubetse nakaꞌoedyukudooa.
Mu sumumanoꞌyoona sumu-ma tsebooekudu (11) Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka teepu Galilee mee naneadu-kwi petu ka giba-kumaba ka Te Pabeꞌe mooasoo pumme tunetammakupu-wi.
Umu-matoo ka Te Pabeꞌe poonnese oo-matoo nanesootuhi. Pana umu-matu ka Te Pabeꞌe poonnese punnoꞌo gi oo posopedakwadoo.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Soo Te Naa noꞌoko tu besa pooha-ma e pooha sootuhi, ka ebe tamme-kooba Te Naa-baa noko yise ka yaa teepu-koobatu tuwazoo.

Menoꞌo nu mu tuukweꞌe mu sakwa ka tooe hano tooe manemona noꞌobatusoo numu nu-kwitu tunedyooe. Ka mumme nakaꞌoedyukudu baa-wi matzaka Te Naa-koobatoo, nu-koobatoo, yise ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-koobatoo tuwazoo.
Mu sakwa mu tunedyooena, oꞌno umu noꞌoko mumme e tuukwena mayohokwu. Nu ooosapa mu noꞌyookwu ka teepu mobegwanatoo tooe.”

Nu sakwa Te Pabeꞌe Jesus Te Naa Tooa-witu, mu tuukwe. Oꞌnosoo Te Pabeꞌe petukwu-witu, mu Te Naa yadooawabe tubotuguna yise meeoo, “Mana ka hemma nadukadu gi naa-wiꞌyoona sumuꞌyoo nana ka Te Naa pooha-toohakwi yadooakwu, ‘Mu sakwa muusoo namabetseapunne, ka Te Pabeꞌe pudusoo kodyu petukwunoꞌoto. Mu sakwa kaaheno tusooyugwepunne, oꞌno mu oo nakabetseanokwu.’ “

Ka saaꞌa sumuꞌyoo nana John mee naneadu ka numu baa-wi matzakadyakwe, oona ka hemma nadukadu pukwi gi naa-wiꞌyoona. Soo John ka mu numu maꞌemukwapu, mu nanekwaha tuungu. “Oꞌno soo Te Naa mu maꞌemukwana soomuꞌwakwu,” mee mu netamma. Ka mu nanekwahakese, soo John yise baa-wi mu matzakakwu.
Ewaꞌyoo numu tooe hanotoo tooe oo-baa petudyakwe.
Soo John a puhu nagwesena namadabue-wi kwaseana, yise mokobu-ma nateꞌa. Kua noko nota peha natumatzuꞌatoona tukana.
Soo John yise mee mu numu netammayakwe, “Soo Te Pabeꞌe pudusoo petukwu, nuga ooonakwasoo unu pooha-gaꞌyoo, yise nuga ooonakwa tuwazoo besaꞌyoo.
Nu baa-wi mu matzaka, mu ka sutakoo po maꞌwukase, ka besaꞌhoo podo meadabekwu. Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Tu Besa Pooha-ma mu sootuhikwu.”
Oꞌno yise soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Nazareth, ka teepu Galilee mee naneadu-koobaꞌyoona kemmana ka John-baa petuhooga. Soo John yise ka Te Pabeꞌe baa-wi matzaka, ka hooodu Jordan mee naneadu-wi.
Ka Te Pabeꞌe batsebooegena, o poonne ka Te Naa Besa Pooha paꞌanakwana kweꞌnaꞌa tubongo punoonooekwuekedu-kwaꞌne manegese oo-naga mani petu.
Soo Te Naa paꞌanakwana meeoo oo netamma, “U yow Nuga Besaa Tooa, nu-kwaꞌneꞌyoosoo. Nu unu u soopedyana besa u-koobatu soonamme.”

Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha yise ka Te Pabeꞌe oona numu-wanatoo taya. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu nunuꞌu-baa watsumano (40) tooꞌi. Soo Sutaꞌyoo oo-baa petugase oo tooꞌe maꞌemukwa pana soo Te Pabeꞌe gi oo-ma nakaꞌemukwa. Mu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo ka Te Pabeꞌe sootummatzise soo Te Pabeꞌe oo-toogoo tsebooe.
Ka John nawutumase soo Te Pabeꞌe ka teepu Galilee mee naneadu-kwitoo nanesootuhibu mu numu tunedyooemeꞌa.
Ka mu numu meeoo netamma, “Pudusoo Te Naa noko mu numu nemadabuekwu. Mu sakwa ka sutakoo gi nakabetseapana, yise ka Te Naa besa unnepu suuꞌmu nakaꞌoedyuku.”
Wahaꞌyoo pakwe-gadu naana, nawangaꞌa Andrew-no Simon mee nananeadu, ka pumma tu tuukwina ka banunadu-witoo wukwazuyakwe, oonow soo Te Pabeꞌe ka bakumana meꞌa.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu netamma, “Mu sakwa nu-no mease e nakatzimodu mane. Nu oo mu mayugwese, mu saaꞌa ka mu numu nuka nakatzimodu mayugwedooa.”
Umu nawangaꞌa yise ka pumma tu tuukwina maꞌwuhookase, ka Te Pabeꞌe nagegakwate.
Umu tzageꞌe soo wahaꞌyoo nawangaꞌa, James-no John, ka tu naa Zebedee mee naneadu-no ka tu naa sake-wi. Umu ka pumma tu tuukwina mabetsabedyakwe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka banunadu-kumana meadabena mu poonne,
yise umu nawangaꞌa tuwazoo bihooka. Umu yise ka tu sake noko tu naa maꞌwuhookase, Te Pabeꞌe nakwisoo puno memeahoo.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka Capernaum mee naneadu-wi petuga. Nanesootuhi tabeno ka mu nanesootuhi nobe-wi petugase, ka mu numu besasoo Te Naa-witu tuukweꞌe.
Mu numu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu mee netamma, “Soo Te Pabeꞌe yow, oosoo tubetse besa ka Te Naa unnepu-witu wahadyakwe, gi ka te tunedyooedu-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
Sumuꞌyoo nana tsoapayidu oe.
Soo nana tsoapa-toohakwi waꞌagese, ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “Uda! U haaꞌa kadooꞌoo ne mayugwekwu? U sakwa ne tsasopedya. Numme u sopedakwatoo, u Jesus, noko Hemma Manumudoopu Besaa Tooa.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tsoapa nematzagakwunihoo meeoo oo netamma, “Gi unnepana, mana-gaꞌyoona tsebooegea.”
Soo tsoapa kwebebewununa yise paba waꞌakese tsebooega.
Mu numu yise mee nananetammakooha, “Uuneꞌyoo! Numme gi hannanoꞌo mownnekoo poohabe poonnedu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe puu sukwe yadooase ka tsoapa nematzagakwunihoo.”
Mu numu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu nanatuukwe ka teepu Galilee mee naneadu-koobakwitu.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise watsukweoo tu pupuaꞌamu-no ka mu nanesootuhi-wiꞌyoona meaꞌase, ka Simon Peter-baa petuga.
Simon Peter yahe peawabe unu tuoeyaꞌena, tu tookoo unu udutu hape. Umu oo nobe-witu ka Te Pabeꞌe tuukweꞌe.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise oo-baa petugase, oo mi-makoo oo tzadyoda. Oosoo yise yotseoose, saahoose, mu tukatuungu.
Oogowsoo yongona tu taba egease, mu numu tuoegoedu ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa bi petudyakwe.
Tubetse ewaꞌyoo mu numu ka nobe-kobena sumupunne.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe umu numu-ma matuoonase, mu noꞌobatusoo tuoegoedu numu mabesaku, mu tsoapagoedu tuwazoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise gi mu unne tuungu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu tsoapagoedu gi ooka mu wahakwuna petzape, umu ka oo sopedakwadoona.
Oogow mooꞌa awamooa tooesoo tu toganopunne soo Te Pabeꞌe yotsese, oona numu-wanatoo mease nanesootuhaꞌe.
Saaꞌa soo Simon tu pupuaꞌamu-no oo wateka.
Ka oo mayuse, meeoo oo netamma, “Mu numu u kwate, u sakwa kodyugasoo,” mee.
Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu netamma, “Mu numu mana tooe nonobe-gakoo sakwa nu ka Te Naa besa unnepu mu tuukwe. Soo e pooha meeoo e netamma, ‘Manatutooe mu numu ekow nanesootuhibu tunedyooe.’ “
Soo Te Pabeꞌe oona ka teepu Galilee mee naneadu-witu ka mu numu tuukweꞌe, ka mu nanesootuhi-wiꞌyoona.
Sumuꞌyoo nana unu tookoo uayidu, ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petuga. Ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petugase, nanesootuhina meeoo oo netamma, “U sakwa e mabesaku ka meeoo soonammena.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus oo nakasootuhise, yise oo mi-makoo oo tzamahoose, mee oo netamma, “Nu u mabesakukwu. U besa manekwu.

Yabesoo u sakwa ka te nanesootuhiwabe petuoose oo tzapoonneku ka besa manese, yise ka Te Naa ka Moses tamme netamma-waꞌnesoo, oo tzapoonneku ka u tookoo uayina namabesakuse. Pana tubetse gi ka mu numu tuukwepana ka ume e mabesakuna.”
Pana soo nana ewow mu numu tuukwe ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu, yise tooe hanoꞌyoona tooe ewaꞌyoo numu oo-baa petudyakwe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise kwingaꞌa numu-wanatoo mea, gi yise punowsoo kodyukaꞌa.
Huu tabe mease, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Capernaum-wi kodyu petuga. Ewaꞌyoo numu yise oo petugana nakow,
yise oo-baa petudyakwe. Ka nobe kaaꞌno, ka natzakwuna-kobenakwi tuwazoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu numu tunedyooꞌe ka Te Naa-witu.
Watsukweꞌyoo nanana kapa-wikoo ka gi yutsungadu nana tzakwuhuna ka nobe-wi petuga.
Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo oo tzakwuhookase sapa, ewaꞌyoo numu ka nobe-wi, umu gi hownnekoo oe tzoonooꞌa. Umu yise ka nobe-koobatu tzatawagase, ka kapa-nokosoo tobongo oo tzakweku ka Te Pabeꞌe-kobenatoo.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe oo sopedakwatoo, ka mu naana pumme mu nakaꞌoedyukute, yise ka gi yutsungadu nana meeoo netamma, “E puaꞌa, nu ka u tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwakwu.”
Umu Jew numu tunedyooedu o aatadu mee sokwama,
“Esoo hayoo suda naꞌunnedu unni. Masoogina ka Te Naa-waꞌnesoo tusooyugwe, mee soonamme. Soo Te Naa suuꞌmu ka numu tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwa.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise oo sopedakwatoo, ka mu tusooyugwena yise meeoo mu netamma, “Mu gi e nakaꞌoedyukute nu ka mu numu tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwa, pana mu oo poonnekwu ka nana e mabesakuse.
Mu yise oo sopedakwadookwu nu eka teepu-kooba ookow poohabe hee-gaꞌyoo, ka mu numu tumaꞌemukwana e soomuꞌwakwuna.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka nana gi yutsungadu meeoo netamma,
“Wunuoose ka u kapa nobe-witoo tzakwuka.”

Soo nana yise ka tu kapa tzakwuhuna mea. Noꞌyoona mu numu oo sooꞌoedyukuna meeoo, “Te Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo. Numme nanabesow namanedu yaa tabeno poonne. Numme gi haananoꞌo yooonnekoo poohabe poonnedu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka banunadu-kumabasoo petugase, ewaꞌyoo numu oo-baa petudyakwe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa unnepu mu tuukwe.
Sumuꞌyoo nana Levi
Saaꞌa soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Levi nobe-witoo oo-no mea, umu tukaga. Ewaꞌyoo numu tumasumudoodu o, tumaꞌemukwadu mee mu Pharisee mu neꞌa, umu ka Te Pabeꞌe nagedu yise umu-no tuka.
Mu Pharisee ka Te Pabeꞌe umu-no mu tuka mu poonnese, meeoo ka umu oo nakatzimodu netamma, “Umu mumme tunedyooedu sakwa gi suda tumatugudu numu-no tukapana, umuoo tumasumudoodu ooonneꞌyoo.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu nakase, mee unakwe, “Nu yaa ka teepu-kooba petu, ka mu tumaꞌemukwadu Te Naa-witu tuukwekwuse. Ka mu numu mooasoo kaaheno meadu mooasoo Te Naa-witu sopedakwatoo. Soo pooha-gaꞌyoo puu tuoegoedu numudoo suuꞌmu nabaꞌe, gi ka besow numudoo, nu puu ka mu tumaꞌemukwadu suuꞌmu tummatzaꞌe, gi ka besow numu.”

Susumudu numu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petuse mee oo netamma, “Umu John pupuaꞌamu yise ka mu Pharisee-no mee tunetamma, ‘Numme puu gi tukapana nanesootuhiyakwe.’ How yise umu ume nakatzimodu gi punnoꞌo ooosoo tumatugu?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu nanekwegea, “Nu togesoo yaahoo umu-no, pudu nodukwadoodu-kwaꞌne, umu puu ka nananoꞌyoona besa sokwama.
Pana pudusoo nu gi umu-noꞌyookwu, oꞌno yise umu e nakatzimodu gi tukapana nanesootuhikwu.

Ka oohoo a manepunne mu gi hownnekoo ka mu numu pudu tumayohope noꞌoko ka mumme putoogoo mooa tumayohope mayua-waꞌneꞌyoo. Oosoo puu wanapu nadotsana-kwaꞌne.
