U pudu wanapu ka mooa wanapu-ma dotsanase, oosoo gi toge tubuakwu. Mu gi hownnekoo eka mumme pudu natunetammakuna ka mu mooa tumayohope noko mayua-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
Sumu nanesootuhi tabeno, soo Te Pabeꞌe yise umu pumme nakatzimodu-no ona tubewabe-too meꞌa. Umu tseagoena ka wada-matu mabokana, oo mahangeana oo tuka.

Mu nanesootuhidu Jew numu moohedu, Pharisee mee nananeadu, mu poonne, umu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “Umu u nakatzimodu gi ka te Jew tumayohope mayoho. Umu ka wada mahangeana oo tukadyakwe, esoo nanesootuhi tabeba, gi numu hemma howyugwenoꞌo.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Mu sakwa oogow nea ka oꞌnosoo soo besa tamme-kooba katudu, David mee naneadu, punnoꞌo ka ne Jew tumayohope takopa, ka tu pupuaꞌamu-no tseagoena.

Soo David ka Te Naa nanesootuhi nobe-witoo mease ka tu pupuaꞌamu-no, soo nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu Abiatha mee naneadu, ka pooha tukaba mu maka, umu nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu suuꞌmu tukana. Soo Te Naa yise gi hayoo mu netamma.
Soo Te Naa ka nanesootuhi tabeba nemadabue ka mu numu nasootuhi-kwi, gi sakwa mu numu oꞌno hemma how yugwe tuungu.
Nu yow Mu Pabeꞌe. Nu mu manekwuna nemadabue ka nanesootuhi tabeno.”
Oꞌno yise soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu nanesootuhidu-baa petuga. Soo nana mi pasatopoꞌnepu gi miyutsengudu ka nanesootuhipe-wi.

Mu tunesootzemadu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe poonnepunne how saaꞌa soo Te Pabeꞌe ka nana mi mabesaku. Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe how u nanesootuhi tabeno numu sootuhaꞌe? Mee oo tooꞌe netammakwuse. Oo wohonedu oo hoawipunne, ka gi hemma haꞌoo nuugwenoꞌo oo oo manakwe.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo ka nana netamma, “Yaatoo kemma.” Soo nana ka Te Pabeꞌe-baatoo meꞌahoo.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka umu pumme poonnepunnedu meeoo netamma, “Ka pabow tabeba-wi gi hemma how nuugwenoꞌo, oꞌno haaꞌa sutaꞌyoo? Yise oꞌno tabeba haaꞌa mu gi haꞌyoo oo sooyugwe? Oꞌno haaꞌa mu gi namabesakukwu? Oꞌno haaꞌa ka pabow mu tabebanoꞌo, yaꞌepana gi howꞌneyoo?” Umu yise gi tunemaꞌyuhoo.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise gi besa mu sooyukwe mu soosawikuna, gi mu numu nakasootuhaꞌe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo oo netamma ka gi mayutsungadu, “Matuhe.” Oosoo yise matuhe, oo mi namabesakuhoopu.
Mu Pharisee oeꞌyoona meaꞌase, mu wakwawaꞌamu numu pabeꞌe pupuaꞌamu-no oetu nehanegonno, noꞌyoona mee tusooꞌyukwe umu sakwa Te Pabeꞌe batsa mee.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe umu tunakatzimodu-no yise ka banunadu-kumaba petuga. Ewaꞌyoo mu numu, ka Te Pabeꞌe nakatzaꞌe, mu tuoegoedu besa oo mayugwepu-witu nakadu tooe hano manakwanatu tooeSoo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu tunakatzimodu mee netamma, “Mu sakwa ka sake mabegapunne, nu oe meahookwu.” Mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe tu tsamowkwunu petzabena, umu nanamatsagawunu.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka giba-matoo meahoose, ka umu pumme nakatzimodu bi, ka mu netutzease.
Sumumano wahamatsebooekudu (12) umu-nagatu netutzease yise meeoo mu netamma, “Mu e yadooawabe manekwudu. Nu yise nanesootuhibu mu numu mu tunedyooe tayakwu.
Mu pooha-gana tsoapa nematzakwunikwu.”
Umu oo yadooawabe mee nananeꞌa Simon, soo Te Pabeꞌe Peter meeoo oo neahoo,
James tu wanngaꞌa John-no, mu naa Zebedee mee naneadu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka James noko John Nunuadu-kwaꞌne mee mu neꞌa.
Andrew, Philip, Bartholomew, Matthew, Thomas, James, oo naa Alphaeus mee naneadu, Thaddeus, Simon, ka Cana mee naneadu-wiꞌyoona kemmadu,
soo Judas punnoꞌo saaꞌa oobenakwa tukwutumadu ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo bika.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe tu nobe-wi kodyu petuga. Mu numu yise ka nobe-wi ewa mani petuga, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka umu tunakatzimodu-no mu mabetseana, gi ooosapa tuka.
Mu nanumu gi oo manena nakana, umu yise meeoo sokwama, “Esoo emukwa. Numme sakwa nobe-witoo oo tzakaka,” mee.
Mu Jew numu nanesootuhiwabe ka Jerusalem-wiꞌyoona kemmaꞌase, ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petugase, ka Te Pabeꞌe nesootzemana meeoo, “Oosoo numu poohadu. Oosoo sutakoo pooha-gana ka tsoapa nematzagakwunidyakwe.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Sutakoo u pooha-gana gi hownnekoo tsoapa nematzagakwuni-kwaꞌneꞌyoo.
Ka yooonnekoo, mu numu sukwe nanayadooena, gi hownnekoo hemma nemamakwu ewa nanatumooꞌoo.
Mu naanapuaꞌamu sukwe nanahase gi hemma nemamakwu-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Mu numu poohadu naduyadu sutakoo pooha-gaꞌyoo, gi hownnekoosoo sutakoo nematzagakwuni-waꞌneꞌyoo. Mu sutakoo pooha-gaꞌyoo gi puusoo tu nanagoena petzape.
Nu ka sutakoo ooonnakwa unu pooha-gaꞌyoo, yise nu tuwazoo unu nazooꞌe. Nu mu mesoo matzooekute.
Ka noꞌoko suda te tumatugupu soo Te Naa kadooꞌoo mayugwekwu, ka ooka te nekwaꞌe. Ka Te Naa-witu gi suda netammapana tuwazoo.
Pana ka ooka Te Naa Besa Pooha sutaꞌyoo mee netammadu, soo Te Naa gi oo soomuꞌwakwu.”
Mee soo Te Pabeꞌe mu netamma, ka tu Besa Pooha mu nesootzeꞌma.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe pea-no oo wanngaꞌamu yise petugonno, obe puuwana konno ka oo yadooadyakwe.
Ewaꞌyoo mu numu oo nanaꞌoonnakwi aatadu meeoo oo netamma, “U pea-no u wanngaꞌamu obe puuwanaꞌyoona u-no neyadooꞌa.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu nanekwegea, “Haga e pea-no e kwangamu?”
Ka umu tu naꞌoonnakwi aatadu poonnese meeoo mu netamma, “Mu suuꞌmu yaatu e nanumu.
Mu ka E Naa te paꞌanakwatu nakabetseana, noꞌyoona mu ka E Naa nakabetseana, e tubetse nanumu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka banunadu-kumabaꞌyoona mu numu tunedyooꞌe. Ewaꞌyoo mu numu oo naꞌena-kwi manepunne, soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka sake-wi tsebooese oe katu; mu numu yise ka banunadu-kumaba konno.
Oꞌno soo Te Pabeꞌe ewa mu numu tunedyooena, meeoo mu tuukweꞌe,
“E nakapunne, sumuꞌyoo nana ka tubewabe-wi tumasuꞌa.
Susumudu soo oo pooe tumasua-matu ka a nadapodo-witoo sawemena, mu hootsebaꞌa yise mu sooꞌa.
Susumudu soo oo pooe punnoꞌo unu tupe-ga-nagatoo saꞌwe, gi tookapu teepu-ga-witoo. Umu yabesoo naahoose sapa,
soo taba mu koopasakuhoo, umu ka gi tookapatoo tuna-gana.
Susumudu tsaꞌabu-nagatoo sawe meana, naa pana mu tsaꞌabu ewa naana mu tatsatsebooa.
Susumudu besow teepu-koobatoo sawehoose besa naꞌa. Umu tumasape ewa pooedooꞌa.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu numu meeoo netamma, “Mu sakwa e nakapunne, mu ka besow naka-gana.”
Umu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu mu numu-no ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petugase, meeꞌe oo tubenga, “Haꞌoo manena u mu numu natugweꞌnga?”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu nekwegease mee unakwe, “Mu e nakatzimodu mooasoo nasootuhipu. Mu mooasoo oo nakasopedakwadoo, ka Te Naa unnepu. Mu nasootuhipu, pana mu numu gisoo ookow nasootuhaꞌe, ooonneꞌyoona nu meeoo mu natugwengakatu Te Naa nuka tunetammakuna.

‘Mu ooosapa ka Te Naa besa unnepu nakamo, pana gi oo soonakaꞌoedyukute. Mu tuwazoo tooe oo poonne pana gi oo soonakasopedakwadoo. Mu sakwa ka mumme oo tuukwena nakaꞌoedyukuna, mu poonnena nakasopedakwadoona, oꞌno sakwa mu nu-matoo kemmase, nu yise mu sootuhikwu.’
Mu haaꞌa ka nuga natuukwepu sopedakwadoodu? Haꞌoo yise mu ka ekow naꞌunnepu mumme e tuukweꞌe gi oo nakasopedakwatoo?
Soo Te Naa yadooana ka numu tumasuꞌa-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Soo numu yise ka teepu-waꞌneꞌyoo.

Soo numu ka teepuna tumasuꞌana, susumu-kwi gi besa naꞌa. Soo numu ka Te Naa yadooana gi oo nakaꞌoedyukute. Soo gi togeꞌyoo yise mu numu tzaꞌemukwa. Mu natzaꞌemukwadu yise ka po-koobatoo sawetu-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Susumudu numu ooonneꞌyoo gi tunagadu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Ka mooeꞌugasoo susumudu besa sokwamana pumme tu nesootzeꞌma
yabesoo ka Te Naa yadooana soomuꞌwa.
Susumudu numu ka teepuna naadu, tsaꞌabu-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo ooonneꞌyoo numu ewa tu hee-gana petukute. Ka tsaꞌabu-waꞌneꞌyoo yabesoo ewaꞌa, yise ka Te Naa yadooana gi nakaꞌoedyukute.
Susumudu soo numu besa tumasuꞌa, ka besow teepu-wi. Ewaꞌyoo mu numu tunakaꞌoedyukudu manekwu, tamme ka Te Naa besa unnepu mu tuukwena.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Tugootabuagunoo gi he-tooha sukwe nuunadu. Paꞌaꞌyoona mu gootabuakupunnena, yise noꞌoko hemma gootabuakute. Soo e natugwengapu tugootabuagunoo-kwaꞌnesoo.
Umu-waꞌnekoosoo nu ka Te Naa-witu mu tunesootabuedooa.
Mu e nakaꞌoedyukudu tubetse unu sokwamakwu, mumme e tuukwe-kwaꞌne, mu yise unusoo besa tusopedakwadookwu. Mu gi e nakabetseadu noꞌoko oo soomuꞌwakwu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu netamma, “Mu numu ka Te Naa unnepu-witu nakase e nakaꞌoedyukudooa. Ooosapa mu manemokwu tumasuꞌape-kwaꞌne. Sumuꞌyoo nana puu ka tubewabe-wi wahabu masuꞌase,
oosoo puu gi nasootabue yabesoo naꞌa. Tooe togano, tooe tabeno tooe, yabesoo naꞌa. Oo naa tabuꞌana, tamme gi sopedakwatoo.
Naakese, paꞌa wunukese, yise ka naa makwuse, nakutadu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo, “Mu ka e nakaꞌoedyukuna ewa manese nu mu tuukwekwu. Menoꞌo huutseꞌyoosoo numu E Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyute,
atsapooe-kwaꞌne. Atsapooe tuutseꞌyoo ka namasuana,
oosoo puu paꞌa naakese kwasu, mu hootsebaꞌa yise oo-naga nobe-too.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ewow numu nanatuukweꞌe, hemma mu nakasopedakwatoo-kwikoo, yise saaꞌa soo Te Pabeꞌe ka nanatugwengapu tu nakatzimodu watse tunesootabuedooa.
Ka tu yongokese, soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu pumme nakatzimodu mee netamma, “Tamme ka banunadu ooenapatoo meakwu.”
Mu oo nakatzimodu mu numu ewatoo mease, ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa sake-wi tzoonooase ka baa natzemangega. Susumudu ka sake-wi umu-no.
Unu hukwa petuse, baa ka sake-wi bakaanoho.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka sake ooonnakwa habenoꞌo tu mi tzopedanena, atasoo uꞌwedape. Mu oo nakatzimodu suina, yise oo netupoonnese, mee oo netamma, “Haꞌyoo u ne soobedya? How sakwa u ka ne badatuꞌihoose?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka hukwapa noko baa yadooese, “Obeda sapa,” mee unne. Gi hukwa manise, gi hee yutsungapunne.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka umu tunakatzimodu meeoo netamma, “Mu sakwa gi unu suꞌipana, gisoo mu nuka togesoobedya.”
Umu yise meeoo nananetamma, “Haga esoo nana? Soo hukwapa ka baa-no a nakabetsea.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu tunakatzimodu-no ka Gerase mee naneadu-kwitoo natzemange petuga.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka sake-wiꞌyoona tsebooekase, sumuꞌyoo nana tsoapayidu oo tapoegea. Esoo nana ka tupe tawaga-wi nobe-gaꞌyoo mu tuꞌipu nakoo-kwi. Ewasoo oo mi-no oo kowpa natzakunediꞌyakwe. Nonotsa yise soo nana oo mesoo tzahanekwunihooyakwe. Gadooꞌoo haga natzooedu oo wutama-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Soo nana nonotsa tabeno, tooetoo togano, tooe hano tooe oona manennumme mu tuꞌipu natuoona-kwi, tooetoo giba-nagakwi waꞌagenumme, puusoo ka tupe-ma natzebokana.
Oosoo yise ka Te Pabeꞌe poonnese oo-baa tanomanepetuoo.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo oo netamma, “U tsoapa mana-gaꞌyoo tsebooegea.” Soo tsoapa yise meeoo oo netamma, “How yise u nukadooe? Numme u sopedakwatoo. U Jesus, Numu Manumudoopu Tooaꞌa. Gi numme makadooꞌookupana.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka nana meeoo tubenga, “Haꞌyoo u naneꞌa?” Soo tsoapa oo nanekwegeꞌa, “Ka ewaꞌyoona numme, numme ewa nananeꞌa.”
Umu tsoapa ewana meeoo oo netamma, “Gi ne tayapana ekow teepu-koobakoo.”
Ewaꞌyoo mu hogu ka giba-kumaba tuka konnomoꞌo.
Umu tsoapa yise meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “U sakwa mu hogu-nagatoo ne taya.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Muusoo tooꞌe.” Mu tsoapa yise ka mu hogu-naga mani. Mu hogu ka banunadu-kwi badatuꞌihoo.

Mu naana yaatu, mu hogu mabetseadu ka mu hogu badatuꞌihoose, mu naana nanaꞌemota tatanomane, ka mu numu yise tuukweꞌe. Umu noꞌyoona kemmase oo poonne. Pudusoo yise ewaꞌyoo numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa mani petu. Soo nana soonamme-kwitu besa manese, oosoo yise onow katu, tu hekwi namasooana.
Ewaꞌyoo mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-ma nasoosuina yise oo tayakwunaꞌe.
Ka Te Pabeꞌe ka sake-wi tsebooedyakwe, soo nana ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “Nu u-no meakwu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo ka nana netamma, “U sakwa gi nu-no meapana, u sakwa u nanumu-witoo kodyu. Te Naa besa ume tumadukugana mu tuukwe.”
Soo nana yise kodyuka, ka teepu Sumumano (10) mee naneadu-kwitoo. Noꞌyoona mu numu oo nakadu besa nakasokwama.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka banunadu mana-kwi nummese, ewaꞌyoo numu oo-baa manegaꞌa.
Oosoo nana mu nanesootuhidu nematugudu, Jairus mee naneadu, ka Te Pabeꞌe-kobena meatzedo petuse
mee oo netamma, “E padu unu tuoeyaꞌe. U sakwa yabe kemmase, oo-kooba pooha matuguse, oosoo sakwa besa manese, besa nuumma.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise oo-no mea. Ewaꞌyoo numu umu-no oo takooꞌnegeaꞌa.
Sumuꞌyoo mogoꞌne hoone tuoeyaꞌedu sumumano wahamatsebooekudu (12) tommo petuga.
Mu poopooha-gaꞌyoo gi besa oo mayugwe. Oosoo yise noꞌoko tu hemma tzasooꞌa petuga. Nahanobasoo manemena, yise hanobasoo manepetuga.
Oosoo yise ooka Te Pabeꞌe-witu nakase, oo ooonakwana oo kwasu tzamow, mee toosoohanena,
“Nu sakwa oo kwasu sukwe tzamase, besa mane.”
Ka oo tzamase, soo oo puuhana yise pasahoo. Oo tookoo yise noꞌyoona besa nuumma, ka besa manese.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise yabesoo tu pooha-matu yaahoose, oo sopedakwatoose umu-tamme nakwumunase, yise meeoo unne, “Haga e tzamow?”
Umu oo nakatzimodu meeoo oo netamma, “Ewaꞌyoo numu u takooꞌnapunne. U yise meeoo, ‘Haga e tzamow?’ “ mee.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yaatu poohnamooꞌase, oo poonne ka oo manedu.
Oosoo mogoꞌne yise suꞌise kwebebewunu. Ka tu manena sopedakwatoose, oꞌno yise ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo kemmase oo nanekwahakute.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee oo netamma, “U ka e nakaꞌoedyukuna besa manese, saaꞌa mea.”
Ka Te Pabeꞌe togesoo yadooawunu, oona ka Jairus nobe-wiꞌyoona kemmadu meeoo tuukweꞌe, “U padu yaꞌeoo, gi ka Jesus u nobe-witoo bipana. Nagutza saaꞌasoo.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe oo nakase ka Jairus mee netamma, “Gi suꞌipana. E nakabetsea.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka Jairus-no oo nobe-witoo memeakwate. Peter, James, John suuꞌmu umu-no ka Jairus nobe-witoo meaꞌa, meeoo susumudu nakatzimodu mu netamma, “Gi kemmapana numme-no.”
Ka oonow mu petugase mu numu ewaꞌyoona sakwaꞌe.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka nobe-wi egease, meeoo mu netamma, “Gi sakwipana. Esoo tseaꞌa gi yaꞌe, sukwe uꞌwe.”
Umu oo-maꞌyoo nanekoꞌe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise puuwanatoo mu taya. Ka tseaꞌa naanapuaꞌamu-no ka umu punotu bina ka tseaꞌa habe-kwitoo meaꞌa.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka tseaꞌa-matoo takwuese, oo mi-ma tzakaduse, meeoo oo netamma, “Yotseoo.”
Soo tseaꞌa wahamatsebooekute (12) tomopu, yise tuponnese, yabesoo yotseoose, wununnumme. Mu numu otu oo poonnedu hayoo sapa sokwamahoo.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tseaꞌa naanapuaꞌamu meeoo netamma, “Hemma manatu a maka.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu tunetammakute, “Gi haka tuukwepana kayoo e tumadukuse.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe umu tu nakatzimodu-nosoo ka Jairus nobe-wiꞌyoona tu nanumu-witoosoo kodyu petuga.

Ka nanesootuhi tabeba oo manepetuse, soo Te Pabeꞌe numu-baa nanesootuhi petuga, ka mu numu besasoo Te Naa-witu tuukweꞌe. Ewaꞌyoo numu oe oo nakapunne, meeoo nananetamma, “Soo Jesus besa yadooa, pana oosoo tamme-nagatusoo. Haꞌoo yise esoo Jesus ka ekow yooonnekoo nageapu, Te Naa-witu tu sopedakwadoona?

Esoo nana uga nobe-doodu yise yaa menoꞌo unu tu pooha-gana te tzapoonnekute. Tamme oo sopedakwadoo, oosoo Mary tooa. Mu James, Joseph, Judas, Simon yise oo wangaꞌamu. Yise oo punneꞌemu yow tamme-naga.” Yise umu gi ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukute.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu netamma, “Ka yaa teepu-koobatu mu numu ka Te Naa yadooawabe nakaꞌoedyukudu, yise umu oogowsoo nanumu, oo nonopuaꞌamu-no gi.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu susumudu numu tuoegoedu-ma matuoona yise mu mabesaku. Huutseꞌyoo numu namabesaku, umu ka gi tunakaꞌoedyukuna.
Te Pabeꞌe tutuha tu nanumu soobedya ka mu tooꞌe tuukwese sapa, gi pumme mu nakaꞌoedyukute. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise oona tzatzageꞌe-kwisoo nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooennumme.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu wahamatsebooekudu (12) tu nakatzimodu bise, meeoo mu netamma, “Nu mu pooha-makakwu, puma tsoapa mu nematzagakwunikwuna. Wakwahaꞌyoona saaꞌa gi hemma hemapana memea.
Gi nadukadu tunopana, gi magoꞌo, gi puma hemma mu tumukwuna tuwazoo hemapana.
Gi waahoo kwasu hemapana. Sumu-kwisoo tanegeana tuwow.
Ka mooeꞌugasoo tunakaꞌoedyukudu nobe-wi egease, ooweoo umu-baa tooi, gi oonatooe tooinnummepana.
Yise ka mu numu gi mumme nakaꞌoedyukudu gi mu nobe-wi egeapana. Ka kooseba mu moko-matu tataꞌnese, oeꞌyoona saaꞌa memea. Mu numu tzapoonneku how sutaꞌyoo tookwa umuoo numu.”
Mu tunakatzimodu yise meaꞌase, meeoo mu numu tuukwe meꞌa, “Gi suda manepana.”
Yise ewow tsoapa nematzagakwunimena. Ewaꞌyoo mu numu tuoegoedu yoohoo, namagunana besa manakwe.

Ewaꞌyoo numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu nesoobedya. Susumudu numu meeoo, “Masoo sumuna soo John numu baa-wi matzakadu, tuusootabuese, unu poohadooa.” Susumudu numu meeoo oosoo ka sumuna Elijah. Susumudu punnoꞌo meeoo, “Oosoo Jesus ka sumuna Te Naa-witu wahadu.” Mu numu pabeꞌe Herod mee naneadu, ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu nakase, yise meeoo, “Nu tukwutumadu ka John batsa tuungu. Oosoo yise sumuna tuusootabuepu?”
Ka oꞌnosoo, soo Herod tu pabeꞌe nodukwa nodukwadoo, soo mogoꞌne Herodias mee naneꞌa.
Soo John ka Herod meeoo netammanoꞌo, “Gi toge u manakwe, gi ka Herodias nodukwadoopana.”
Soo Herodias unu sutana ka Herod ka John tooꞌe batsa tuungu.
Soo Herod yise ka John tu batsakwu-ma unu suaꞌe, ka John nanesootuhidu nana. Mu tukwutumadu ka John wutumow. Soo Herod besa ka John nakasoobedya pana oo yadooa-ma nakasuaꞌe.
Yise geaꞌa soo Herod tu nadooaꞌadoonoꞌo tabeno mu numu papabeꞌemu-no ewa tuka.
Herodias padu tukawunuse yise mu numu nugakute. Noꞌyoona yise oo nugana besa soobedya. Soo Herod mee oo netamma, “Hemma u? Tooe hemmadooe u soogwina nu u geaꞌakwu.”
Soo tsuadumu tu pea tubenga,
“Hemma sakwa yise nu natuungu?” Yise soo oo pea meeoo oo netamma, “Ka John koota tsekowse, ka oo wo hanese, yise tseda-wi oo wuuna.”
Soo Herod oo nesootuꞌadyaꞌe ka oo batsa tuunguse, ewa mu numu oo unnena naka.
Herod yise ka mu tukwutumadu ka John koota tsekeaꞌa tuungu,
ka oo wo tseda-wi oo wuunase, ka Herodias yise yongagea.
Mu John nakatzimodu oo nakase yise oo tookoo tugudooa.
Umu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu oo-baatoosoo kodyuse, ka Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko ka tu manemopu-witu oo tuukwe.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu netamma, “Tamme sakwa gi haaꞌno songapangapunne.” Ewaꞌyoo numu pooha namagunana meagonno, gi tu tuka-ma sokwamana manegonno.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise umu tu nakatzimodu-no ka sake-wi, gi numu pumme poonne-kwitoo meaꞌa.
Mu numu mu meaꞌase, mu poonne. Ewaꞌyoo mu numu mu posoopedakwadoona oo nanatuukwe ka baa-kumi mu mea tu noꞌata-kwiꞌyoona umu yise oo-baa sogo tatanomanepetuga.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka sake-wiꞌyoona wue petuga ka baa-kumabatoo, ewaꞌyoo mu numu o, pukwi oo petuga-kwi. Mu numu sukwe mukwadu-kwaꞌne mu posoobedyana, mu sootuhina yise mu tunedyooꞌe.
Yabesoo yise taba egagaꞌa,
mu tunakatzimodu ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “U sakwa mu taꞌya ka kwayaꞌyoona mu kemmaꞌase. Umu sakwa puusoo tu tukakwuna hownnekoo mayu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Hemma sakwa tamme mu maka?” Mu tunakatzimodu yise meeoo, “Numme haaꞌa ka tukapu tumukwu? Ewaꞌyoo numu yaatu. Hanoko sakwa yise numme ka tukapu mu mayuku?”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Huuhoo mu tukaba-gaꞌyoo? Mu sakwa oo poonnetooa.” Ka saaꞌa umu tunakatzimodu meeoo oo netamma, “Manegeoo numme tukaba-gaꞌyoo. Yise waahoo tuwazoo numme pakwe-gaꞌyoo.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo ka mu tunakatzimodu, “Maa poohega-kooba sapa mu numu aata tuungu. Yoodeꞌa, mu sakwa mu toonooba-wisoo aata.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu aatahoose, ka tukaba, noko pakwe hemahoose, toogoopadu poonnese, nanesootuhikooha. Yise ka tukaba noko pakwe tzabokase, umu pumme nakatzimodu, mu ewow numu maka tuungu.

Yise ewow numu maka (5000 nanana). Ka nanesootuhina ka tukaba noko pakwe togeꞌyookwunu ka mu numudoo negwaꞌe, umu yise ewa tukase, noꞌyoona wutzuꞌme. Mu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu yise ooka pakwe, noko tukaba nagupenina ka wahamatsebooekudu (12) kawono, oo-ma kaanoku.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise umu pumme nakatzimodu meeoo netamma, “Mu sakwa ka sake-wi kodyu, ka banunadu natzemangegase, yise ooka Bethsaida mee naneadu-kwitoo kodyuka. Mu numu ewana yise nu tayakwu.”
Yise ka mu meaꞌase soo Te Pabeꞌe ka giba-matoo mea, ka nanesootuhikwuse.

Ka yongona, ka sake-wi ka banunadu banaamoo-kwitoo, soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko mu poonne. How gi besa natzemange, ka kwenahadu unu hukwawunu. Oꞌno awamooasoo tu tabuꞌagena, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka banunudu-koobakwi kemmakaꞌe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise umu moopa tooꞌe meahoo.
Mu tunakatzimodu oo poonnese unu suise, yise waꞌagemoꞌo, “Uda tsoapa.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu yadooe, “Gi suipana. Nu yaahoo.”

Ka sake-wi umu-baa tsebooese, yise soo hukwapa kadoo manigeaꞌa. Umu oo nakatzimodu gi geaꞌa oo pooha manena nakasopedakwadoona ka manegeoo tukaba nagoohanena, waahoo pakwe tuwow. Ka ewow numu oo makana poonne pana gi oo sooꞌoedyukute.
Ka Gennesaret mee naneadu-kwi umu natzemange petuse, tu sake o tzakuna,
oeꞌyoona yise sawe. Mu numu ewana nosumuna ka oo nesopedakwatoona
oo nanatuukwe. Umu nanatuukwewunudu, mu tuoegoedu, mu nuummadu oo-baa bi petudyakwe. Susumudu oo-baa natzahedape petu.
Umu yise Te Pabeꞌe kwasu-matu tzamase, noꞌyoona besa mane.
Mu Jew numu nananesootuhipe papabeꞌe numu tunedyooedu ka mu Pharisee mee nananeadu-nagatu kemmana, ka Jerusalem mee naneadu-kwiꞌyoona kemmase, ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa.
Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu poonne, umu gisoo mabatzagapana tukagonno.
Umu Jew-no Pharisee tumayohope-wi umu gi tuka ka gisoo mabatzagana ka tu nanamooatupu tumayohope.
Umu ka hano mose tu tootsa mabatzakwunaꞌe. Tu tseda, pukwikoo tu saakwuna, batzakase oekoo saakwu. Ne nanamooatupu mee ne tunetammakuna, numme yise oo mayoho.

Umu Jew tuukwewabe, mu Pharisee-no, ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “Mu u nakatzimodu sagwane maꞌemukwapu-gaꞌyoo, gi tu mi mabatzakapana tuka. Umu te nanamooatupu ka tu nanumu meeoo netamma namabatzakase yise tuka.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “How yise mu ka te nanamooatu besa nakana, gi Te Naa tuukwewabe naka? Soo Isaiah, ka mumme nemooagadu-witu meeoo unnepu. ‘Mu ka Te Naa nakabetseꞌa mee mu naneyakwe.’ Soo oꞌnosoo Te Naa yadooawabe togesapa mu netamma ka mee tubotuguna. ‘Umu numu meeoo unnepana mu tupa apeakana, gi mu tubetse sokwamana. Umu ka Te Naa gi nakabetseꞌa.

Umu ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe mee sukwe naneyugwepana, ka mu numu aata-tammesoo neꞌemukwakute, ka pummesoo tusooyugwena mu numu ewana mee netamma, “E nakapunne pummesoo tumayohope tumayoho oꞌno mu ka Te Naa nakabetseꞌa.” ’
Umu meeꞌe mu nanamooatu mu Te Naa unnepu-waꞌnesoo.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Mu sakwa gi umu te nanamooatupu tuukwena nakaꞌoedyukupana. Mu sakwa Te Naa suuꞌmu nakaꞌoedyuku.
Ka mooasoo soo Moses meeoo unnepu, ‘Te Naa noko ka numu tu naanapuaꞌamu mabetsea tuungu. Soo tu naanapuaꞌamu suda netammadu sakwa nabatsa.’

Mumme putoogoo mooa tumayohona pana mu meeoo, tamme sumuna ka mu naanapuaꞌamu mee netammakwu, ‘Nu ka Te Naa God tummatzi, gi umu e naanapuaꞌamu tummatzaꞌe.’ Mu gi besa ka mu naanapuaꞌamu matugu, ka oo tumatuguna. Mu ka Te Naa tunetammana takopa, ka mu te nanamooatupu tumayohope ooosapa nagena.
Ewaꞌyoosoo te nanamooatupu unnepu mu numu ka gi besow tunedyooe, tamme sakwa ka Te Naa tuukwena suuꞌmu nakaꞌoedyuku.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu ewa-kwikoo mu numu netamma.
“Mu sakwa e nakasopedakwatoo, soo hemma mu tukana gi hownneꞌyoo, Te Naa-nakwana. Soo suda te tumatuguna yise gi besa te soonammena yugwe, umuoo soo Te Naa gi petzape,” mee.
Ka nobe-wiꞌyoona mu tunakatzimodu meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe tubenga, “Haꞌyoo u ka mu numu tuukwepu?” mee.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu nanekwegeꞌa, “Mu sakwa oꞌnosoo e nakasopedakwatoo. Soo tooe hemma tooe te tukana gi hownneꞌyoo Te Naa-nakwana. Soo tukapu gi atasoo numu yugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo tukapu numu-nagakwi sukwe meadu.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise te tzapoonnekute tooe hownneꞌyoo numu tukapu besaꞌyoo.
“Ka suda te tumatuguna soo Te Naa gi petzape.
Noꞌobatusoo suda te tusooyugwena, tuduhana, tubatsana,
moogoobuna, numu mooagana, numu nowuakuna. Kummaꞌakusoo nasoodyagena, numu nesootzemana, besa nasooyugwena,
ooonnekoo soo Te Naa gi petzape.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise oona tubewa-wi, Tyre mee naneadu-kumaba, ka nobe-wi watze petuga, gi haga oo sopedakwatoo. Mu numu puusoo yise oo mayuoo.
Yise sumuꞌyoo wawaꞌa mogoꞌne oo-baa petu. Ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu nakase ka tu padu tsoapayaꞌe ooka oo nematzagakwuni tuunguna.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise oo nemapoonnena mee oo netamma, “Gi nu wawaꞌa sootummatzaꞌe. Nuga nanumu suuꞌmu sakwa nu tummatzi. Numme Jew mu wakwawaꞌa saduꞌu mee neꞌa. ꞌYoo manepunne mu numu puu gi tu dooamu tukakwuna tu saduꞌu maka.”
Soo wawaꞌa mogoꞌne yise mee oo netamma, “Mu te dooamu puu tu tugupenina saduꞌu maka. U sakwa nuga padu mabesaku u nanumu too,” mee.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka wawaꞌa mogoꞌne meeoo netamma, “Aha, besaꞌyoo u ka meeoo unnena, nu u tummatzikwu. U nobe-witoo kodyuka ka tsoapa nu mooasoo nematzagakwunipu.”
Soo mogoꞌne ka kodyu petugase, ka tu padu besa manepu, ka tu kapa-kooba oo habennumme oo mayuoo petuga.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka Tyre mee naneadu-nakwana kodyuna ka Galilee banunadu-witoo mea. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka Sidon mee naneadu-toogoo meꞌa. Ka teepu Sumumanoꞌo Nogatudu mee naneadu.

Onona mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa sumuoo nana bi petu. Oosoo nana gi nakatawagadu, gi besa yadooadu tuwazoo. Mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “U sakwa namekoosoo u mi-makooba matuoonase, eka nana mabesaku.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka nana bihooka mu numu ewanagakoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise tu makoogoo ka nana naka-wi tsetuoonahoo. Ka tu makoogoo tu huutse-ma mobanase, ka nana ego-kooba tsetugu.
Yise soo Te Pabeꞌe toogoopadu poonne. Nasongapose ka nana gi nakatawagadu meeoo netamma, “Yise nakatawaga.”
Soo nana nakatawaga manese, besa yadooa mani.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu numu netamma, “Gi sakwa mu haka tuukwepana,” pana mu numu gi oo nakabetseana oo nanatuukweꞌe.
Umu meeoo, “Uune! Soo Te Pabeꞌe unu tumadaꞌe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu gi nakatawagadu nakadage maꞌeyakwe, mu gi apegeadu besa apegea maneyakwe.”
Mu numu ewana sumuna tusooase, gi hemma tuka, soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu tu nakatzimodu netamma,
“Nu suda umu numu nuummakute, ka pahe tabeno gi hemma mu tuka, umu tseagoꞌe.
Nu ka nobe-witoo mu tayase, umu sumuna tsuawumehoekwu, umu-matu ka kwingaꞌa kemmase.”
Umu oo nakatzimodu yise meeoo oo nanekwegea, “Ka tubetse numu-wanaꞌyoona hownnekoo tamme ka nadukatu umutoo mayukwu?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu tubenga, “Haaꞌnoko mu tukaba-gaꞌyoo?” Mu oo nakatzimodu yise meeoo, “Natakwatsukwuꞌyoo (7) tukaba.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu numu meeoo netamma, “Ma teepuna sapa aatapunne.” Oꞌno yise ka tukaba hanese, oo-koobatoo nanesootuhise oo tzabokase, mu tu nakatzimodu mu numu ooka haneku tuungu, umu yise ka tukaba mu numu ewana haneku.
Umu yise tuwazoo huutsekoo tutugutzekoo pakwe-gaꞌyoo; ka pakwe tuwazoo nanesootuhikuse mu tu nakatzimodu mu numu haneku tuungu.
Mu numu yise ka tukase wutzumeoose, ka tunakatzimodu natakwatsukwuoo (7) kawona-witoo ooka a nagupenina tzoba.
Tubetse ewaꞌyoo (4000) numu o.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu numu nobe-witoo taya. Yabesoo yise ka tu sake-wi mu tu nakatzimodu-no kuowse onona ka teepu Delmanutha mee naneadu-kwitoo meaꞌa.
Mu Pharisee ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petugase oo nesootzemana mee oo netamma, “U sakwa mee tzapoonneku ka Te Naa Pooha-matu u hee-gana.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu nasoomenakwana, mee ka mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu netamma, “Mooasoo nu mu tzapoonnekuse sapa, mu gi oo sooꞌoedyukute. Nu gi mu tzapoonnekukwu, ka e pooha-gana.”
Oosoo yise ka mu tunakatzimodu-no, ka mu Pharisee-baaꞌyoona meaꞌase ka sake-wi tzoonooase ka baa natzemangeka.
Umu oo nakatzimodu ka baa natsemanegase ka tu tukuba soomuꞌwaka. Sumuoosoo tukaba yise tunoꞌo ka sake-wi.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma “Ka mu numu yadooedu namayuadu tukaba gi soogwipana.”
Umu oo nakatzimodu yise gi oo nakasopedakwadoona yise meeoo nananetamma, “Soo Te Pabeꞌe te nesootzeꞌma ka tukaba te soomuꞌwakuse.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu nakasopedakwadoose meeoo mu netamma, “Gi suipana ka gi tukuba-gana. Mu gisoo e pooha nakasopedakwatoo.

Mu ka sumuna oo soomaꞌyu nu manegeoo tukaba-koobatoo nanesootuhi, oo ewakwuna soogwina. Nu yise ewow numu (5000) maka. Huoo kawona-witu ooka a nagupenina umu numu tzobahoo?” mee. Sumuꞌyoo mu oo nakatzimodu yise meeoo oo nanekwegea, “Wahamatsebooekudu (12) kawona-witu,” mee.

“Nu yise tuwow ewowsoo (4000) numu maka, natakwatsukwuoo (7) tukaba-gana, mu yise ewowsoo tuwazoo hane, ka a nagupenina. Huoo kawona-witu ooka a nagupenina umu numu (5000) tzobahoo?” Sumuꞌyoo mu oo nakatzimodu yise meeoo oo nanekwegea, natakwatsukwuoo (7) kawona-witoo mee.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo unakwe, “Mu gi e nakasopedakwatoo, mu tuwazoo gi e nakaꞌoedyukute.”
Umu yise ka Bethsaida-wisoo kodyu petu. Susumudu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo gi tubootabuedu tsaka petu. Umu meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “U sakwa eka nana, gi tubootabuedu-ma matuguse a mabesaku.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise oo tsakakase oo pooe-witoo tooheoo. Yise o-kooba matuoonase, meeoo oo tubenga, “U haaꞌa tooe besa tuboohaꞌe menoꞌo?”
Soo gi tubootabuedu mee oo nanekwegea, “Nu menoꞌo yaatu poonnepana, ka mu numu-ma sogomeadu, sunngabe-kwaꞌne posoobedya.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe oo pooe-kooba matuoonasoo, soo gi tubootabuedu besa manise besa tuboohwaꞌe.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo oo netamma, “U sakwa kaaheno nobe-witoo mea, gi numu tuukwepana.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu tunakatzimodu-no ka Galilee-wiꞌyoona meaꞌa, ka Caesarea Philippi mee naneadu-kwitoo. Onow po-kumi sogo meana meeoo mu tubenga, “Hayoo mu nu-witu naka?”
Umu oo nekwegea, “Susumudu numu meeoo u ka sumuna John baa-wi numu matzakudu. Susumudu numu meeoo u ka sumuna Elijah. Susumudu punnoꞌo meeoo u ka sumuna Te Naa-witu wahadu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu tubenga, “Hayoo mu nu-witu sooyugwe?” Soo Peter oo nekwegea, “U Te Tubetse Pabeꞌe,” mee.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu netamma, “Gi e wahapana, nu yow Mu Pabeꞌe.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu tunakatzimodu tuukwe, “Mu numu yadooakudu gi e petzape, unu nananuumadu e wumakuse, e batsase, oꞌno yise pahe tooise saaꞌa nu tuusootabooedooa.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe toge kaaheno meeoo unakwe. Umu oo nakase soo Peter yise ka Te Pabeꞌe oetu meeoo watze tunesoobedyakute, “Gi soo hee oo manepunne. Gi umu u batsa.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu tunakatzimodu-matoo kodyuse meeoo ka Peter netamma, “Gi meeoo unnepana. Oosoo Sutaꞌyoo u neꞌemukwawunu. U sukwe numu soonamme-kwaꞌne tusooyugwe, gi ka Te Naa soonamme-kwaꞌne.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise noꞌoko mu numu, ka umu tunakatzimodu-nokosoo mee mu netamma, “Tooe haga tooe nu-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu sakwa mee unne oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo, tooe mu ka nu-koobatoo nabatsase sapa, mu e nagenokwu.
Tamme ka tammesoo tooꞌe namagwetzoina tamme kadooꞌoo namayugwekwu, mu ka nu-koobatoo kadooꞌoo mesoo namayugwena mu namagwetzoikwu.
Tamme ka teepu-koobaꞌyoona ewow hee-gaꞌyoo pana ka te yaꞌese oosoo gi te magwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Gi oosoo te gwetzoina tumu-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Tooe haga tooe nu-ma nasookwina, noko e unnepu tuwazoo, nu yise punnoꞌo, saaꞌa mu-ma nasookwikwu, ka Te Naa pooha-toohakwi e petuse, ka toogoopadu e tutummatziwabe mu toha kakasa-gakoo-no.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Nu togesapa mu tuukwepu susumudu mu yaa konnodu gisoo tuina, e pooha-gana poonnekwu.”
Oona ka sumuna sumu natakwatsu (7) tooise oosoo Te Pabeꞌe tu pupuaꞌamu bikase, oona ka paꞌa giba-maꞌyoona nanesootuhi-ga.
Ka togesoo oo nanesootuhiwunu soo pukwi oo namasooana atasoo tapuꞌa, besa toha patakwetseaawunu.
Oꞌno yise wahaꞌyoo nanana oo-baa petuoo, Elijah-no Moses meeꞌe nananeadu umu nanano yise yadooꞌa.
Soo Peter yise meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Besa numme ka kemmaꞌase. Numme sakwa piho mu tatza nobe-tooku. Oꞌno mu ka Elijah noko Moses-no susuꞌmuoo,”
mee unne, ka gi tu unnena sopedakwadoona ka unu suise.
Togesoo oo yadooawunu soo koomeba umu-kooba habaga petuoo. Te Naa yise ka koomeba-nagaꞌyoona yadooakooha. “Yow esoo nuga Besaa Tooa, mu sakwa besa a nakabetsea.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe suuꞌmu yise umu-baasoo. Mu Elijah-no Moses kadooꞌoo.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe tu nakatzimodu-no ka giba-maꞌyoona sawekese meeoo mu netamma, “Gisoo haka tuukwepana, ka mu poonnena. Ka kadoo e manese yise e yotsese, oꞌno suuꞌmu saaꞌa mu numu tuukwe.”
Mu oo nakatzimodu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe nakase gi oo waha, pana yise meeoo nanatuubenga, “Haꞌoo manena meeoo unakwe? Te Pabeꞌe haaꞌa yaꞌese yise pudu yotsekwu?”
Umu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “Umu Te Naa yadooawabe meeoo unakwe, Elijah mooe petukoo, o haaꞌa togesapa numme natuukweꞌe? Oꞌno yise haaꞌa Te Pabeꞌe mu nakwi saaꞌa petudooa?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Aha, meeoo tubetse nabotugu. Mooeꞌugasoo soo Elijah ka mu numu mooe tunesootabue petukwu. Nu yise oo-penakwa petuhoose suda punnoꞌo namatugukoo.
Mooasoo soo Elijah mooe kemmapu. Umu numu yise tooe how tooe ka Elijah yugwe, ka a nabotugu-kwaꞌnesoo.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise tu pupuaꞌamu-no ka mu tunakatzimodu-baasoo kodyu petu. Mu numu ewana ka Te Pabeꞌe poonnese besa sokwamase oo-tamme tatanomanega. Mu nananesootuhidu tuukwewabe, ka Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu-no mooasoo mu nanepetukute oe petuoo.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu tubenga, “How manena umu nananepetukute?”
Sumuꞌyoo nana ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “Nu e tooaꞌa u-baa tooꞌe hane petu u kadooꞌookoosoo. Oosoo tsoapayaena gi besa yadooꞌa.
Tooe hanoꞌyoona tooe, soo tsoapa oo-ma tabuꞌana soo e tooa yaꞌeookayakwe. Nu umu ume nakatzimodu, ooka tooꞌe nematzagakwuni tuungu. Umu gi oo mabuꞌa.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu netamma, “Mu gi e nakabetseꞌa, tooe nu wunaꞌme yaa mu-paꞌyoopana mu gi e nakaꞌoedyukute. Ka naatse tzakowke.”
Soo naatse ka Te Pabeꞌe poonnese yaꞌehooka.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo, “Haaꞌno wunaꞌme soo naatse ꞌyoo manenumme?” Mee soo oo naa, “Tuhaꞌa manakwanasoo.
Susumudu soo tsoapa ka naatse tooꞌe soobatsana goso-witoo oo wunapuyakwe, baa-witoo tuwazoo. U pooha haaꞌa ne sootuhi-waꞌneꞌyoo? Ne mesoo tummatzaꞌe haaꞌa?”
Soo Jesus yise oo nanekwegea, “U deaꞌa mooasoo e pooha-gana sopedakwatoo. Nuka u toge soobedyase, oꞌno nu u tummatzikwu.”
Soo nana meeoo, “Sagwane nu u nakaꞌoedyukute, pana unusoo ume e nakaꞌoedyukuna nu sookwaꞌe.”
Gisoo mu numu ewana petu, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tsoapa kwingaꞌatoo nematzagakwunise mee oo netamma, “Yaanona mea. Gi kodyupana ka naatse-matoo.”
Soo naatse paba yadooase, yaꞌeooka. Mu numu yise meꞌe, “Yaꞌehoo haaꞌa?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe o mi-makoo oo tzadyota. Soo naatse besa manise yotseoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise umu tu nakatzimodu-no, ka mu numu-baaꞌyoona meaꞌa.
Ka nobe-kwi mu tzoonooase, umu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu oo tubenga, “How manena numme gi oo nemabuꞌa?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu nekwegea, “Oosoo yooonneꞌyoo tsoapayaedu nanesootuhibu-ma nataꞌyadu.”
Galilee-too umu watze mease
soo Te Pabeꞌe yise umu tunakatzimodu tuukwegaꞌase meeoo mu netamma, “Mu nuka wohonedu nu-ma tzakaduse, e batsase, saaꞌa nu pahe tabemease tuusootabuedooa.”
Umu oo unnepu gi nakasopedakwatoo, pana umu ooka tu tubengakwuna-ma suaꞌe.
Ka mu tunakatzimodu ka Capernaum-wi petugase, ka nobe-kwiꞌyoona soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu tubenga, “Hekwitu mu nehane mu ka kemmana?”
Mu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu yise gi ka Te Pabeꞌe nanekwegea, ka numu ooonakwa besa-kwitu nehanena, “Soo tooe haga umu-nagatu ka mu ooonakwa besaꞌyoona oosoo ka Te Naa-baatoo mooe meakoo.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise noꞌoko mu tunakatzimodu nabatoo bise meeoo mu netamma, “Soo tooe haga tooe numu-kobena soo nadatsungadu, sakwa noꞌoko numu sumu-nakwiꞌyoona numu tummatzino.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise tuutsekoo tuhaꞌakoo umu-baatoo bise, meeoo mu netamma,
“Mu ka tuutsekoo tuhaꞌakoo nu-koobatoo besa soobedyana, mu tookwa nuka besa sobedya tuwazoo.”

Soo John ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “Ka nana ka tsoapa nematzagakwunidu, numme poonne. Tooe oosoo nana gi numme ume nakatzimodu-matu pana u nanea-ma ka tsoapa nematzagakwuni. Numme yise meeoo oo netamma, ‘U sakwa gi ka Te Pabeꞌe nanea-ma ka tsoapa nematzagakwunipana,’ “ mee.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu netamma, “Mu sakwa uga gi meeoo oo netammapana. Oosoo ka e nanea-ma ka tsoapa nematzagakwunikwuse oosoo tookwa gi e nekwohonekwu.
Oosoo besa e tummatzaꞌe.
Tooe haga tooe ka e nakaꞌoedyukuna tooe umu nuka tummatzidu bamagase sapa nu mu sukwe sootuhi meakwu.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu tunakatzimodu meeoo netamma, “Gi besa soo tooe haga tooe ka nuga dooamu ka gi togekoo podo mu tunedyooena. Nu sakwa puu sukwe badyaꞌe, gi yise ka gi togekoo mu Te Naa dooamu tunedyooe.

Nu sakwa e mi sukwe tsekaꞌa, gi ka suda namanedu mahane. Besaꞌyoo tooe ka sumuoosoo mi-geana Te Naa-baa petugase, gi waahoo mi-geana, ka niwunu-kwitoo wue. Nu sakwa e kuku sukwe tsekaꞌagwuuni, gi ka gi togekoo podo mea. Besaꞌyoo tooe ka sumuoosoo kuku-gana ka Te Naa-baa petugase, gi waahoo kuku-gana ka niwunu-kwitoo wue. Nu sakwa tuwow e pooe sukwe tsepata, gi ka gi togekoo poonnena. Besaꞌyoo tooe ka sumuoosoo pooegeana ka Te Naa-baa petugase, gi waahoo pooegeana niwunu-kwitoo wue, owetuoo ooosapa nidabedu gi nimakwudu. Mu woꞌabe yise ooosapa mu tookoo sooꞌadape.
Noꞌyoona oowetuoo numu oo wumadooa.
Ongabe puu ka tukapu besa makamakute, ka gi onga-gana gi hee besa kamma. Mu sakwa ongabe-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Mu sakwa besa nanapuaꞌana, besa sokwamamo.”
Oꞌno yise ka tubewa, Judea mee naneadu-kwiꞌyoona, soo Te Pabeꞌe ewow numu tunedyooeꞌe. Ka hooodu, Jordan mee naneadu baa mangega.
Ewaꞌyoo tunesootzemadu numu, Pharisee mee nananeadu oo-baa petuse, meeoo oo tubenga, “Besaꞌyoo haaꞌa soo numu ka nanodukwadoose, yise napoonnekwunina?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu netamma, “Haꞌyoo soo Moses ka moooꞌasoo te tuukwe?”
Umu mee oo nanekwegeꞌa, “Ka moooꞌasoo soo Moses mee tuboꞌo, tamme ka napoonnekwunina sakwa tubope-ma napoonnekwuni.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Te Naa gi meeoo te netamma. Pana mu gi Te Naa nakabetseana soo Moses yise ekow mu tuukwe.
Oꞌnosoo, soo Te Naa ka numu pudu manumudoose meeoo, ‘Nu ka nana noko mogoꞌne manumudoopu.
Umu yise nanodukwadoose, soo nana tu naanapuaꞌa-baaꞌyoona nomea. Tu nodukwa-no yise nobe-gaꞌyoo.
Umu yise sumuoosoo numu-waꞌneꞌyoo. Gi waahoo numu-waꞌneꞌyoo.’
Soo Te Naa meeꞌe te netamma, ‘Ka nodukwadoose gi napoonnekwunipana.’ “
Ka nobe-kwi petugase, mu oo nakatzimodu ka a napoonnekwunipu-witu mee ka Te Pabeꞌe tubenga.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu nanekwegea, “Mu nanodukwa sakwa mesoo napoonnekwunipana, ka kummaꞌakoosoo nodukwadoose maꞌemukwa.”
Mu numu yise tu doodooamu ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa hane petudyakwe, umu oo nanesootuhiku tuunguna. Mu tunakatzimodu ka mu numu poonnena mu nesagwikute ka oo mu manakwe.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu poonnena meeoo mu netamma, “Gi mu numu tu dooamu hane petudu tayapana, gi mu nesagwikupana. Nu mu dooake sootuhise, umu yise ka Te Naa-baatoo meakwu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo unakwe, “Nu kaaheno mu tuukwekwu, mu mooeꞌugasoo, nanekwahakwu, tutugutsekoo dooake-waꞌneꞌyookwu gi maꞌemukwadu. Oꞌno yise mu ka Te Naa-baa petugakwu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu doodooake tzahedana, mu nanesootuhikuna, mu sootuhise umu-baaꞌyoona mea.
Sumuꞌyoo nana ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa tanomane petugase oo-kobena meatzedose ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “U tubetse besaꞌyoo nana, haꞌoo besa sakwa tuwow nu manese namagwetzoi?” mee.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo oo nanekwegea, “U haaꞌa mee e netamma, u besaꞌyoo? Gi haga besaꞌyoo, Te Naa suuꞌmu besaꞌyoo.
U oo sopedakwatoo ka Te Naa tamme tuukwepu; gi numu batsapana, gi numu nowuakupana, gi tuduhapana, gi esayipana numu mane-witu, besa tu naa noko tu pea sooyugwena.”
Soo nana yise meeoo oo netamma, “Mooasoo nu tuhaꞌyoona meeoo naꞌunnedu nakabetseakena.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise, ka ooka besa soobedyana mee oo netamma, “U sakwa noꞌoko u hemma-ma tumuse, ka u nahemena ka mu tutuha manedu hanekuse, oꞌno yise u ewow hee-gakwu, ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona. Oꞌno u yise nuka nakatzinnummekwu.”
Soo nana ka oo nakase suda soonamme ka ewow hee-gana.
Ka nana mease, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu tunakatzimodu meeoo tuukwe, “Soo ewow hee-gaꞌyoo numu unusoo manena namagwetzoikwu.”

Mu tunakatzimodu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakase punnoꞌo meeoo tutubenga, “Hownnekoo soo numu yise mesoo namagwetzoaꞌe?” Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo unakwe, “Soo numu gi puusoo namagwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa suuꞌmu mu magwetzoikwu.”
Mu tunakatzimodu mee oo netamma, “Kadooꞌoo haga numu magwetzoi-waꞌne tabuꞌa.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu netamma, “Aha. Te Naa suuꞌmu numu magwetzoidu.”
Soo Peter meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Mooasoo numme noꞌoko ne hemma matusookwunikese, nanesootuhi mane.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Tooe haga tooe tu nobe maꞌwukadu, tu nanumu, noꞌoko hemma tu hee-gana, tu dooamu, tu tubewabe, ka nuka nagena ewowsoo besa noꞌobatusoo nasootuhikwu, menoꞌo manekwana. Mu nasootuhikwuna gi moobegwagakwu.
Umu yaaꞌa teepu-koobatu menoꞌo numu moohedu, saaꞌa ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona gi hee manepunnekwu. Umu menoꞌo gi mamaawaꞌneꞌyoo, yaaꞌa teepu-kooba manepunnedu ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona numu moohedooa.”
Soo Jesus yise ka Jerusalem-witoo mea. Mu oo nakatzimodu mu numu-no nakasuipana oo nageka. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu tunakatzimodu suuꞌmu watze tuukwe.
“Jerusalem-wi te petugase, mu numu-kobenatu yadooadu nu-ma tzakadukwu, yise umu wawaꞌa tibo-matoo e tzakakakwu, yise umu nuka batsa tuungukwu.
Umu tiboꞌo yise e kobitoo toohena, e wupagetana, yise e batsakwu. Pahe tabe mease nu yise saaꞌa tuusootabuedooa.”
Mu nawangaꞌa James-no John ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petu, yise meeoo oo netamma, “U haaꞌa sakwa ne tummatzi?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu tubenga, “Hownnekoo sakwa nu mu tummatzi? Hemma mu soogwina?”
Umu meeoo oo nanekwegea, “U ka pudusoo numu-kobena katukwuse, how sakwa numme ka u-baa sapa aatana?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu nanekwegea, “Nu nabatsase, namayodase yise saaꞌa ka numu-kobena katudooa. Mu haaꞌa punnoꞌo ooosoo?”
Mu wahaꞌyoo ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “Numme sakwa punnoꞌo ooosoo mesoo mane.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu nanekwegea mee, “Aha. Mu punnoꞌo nu-kwaꞌnekoosoo wumakwu nu-koobatoo nabatsase, saaꞌa namayodakwu.
Gi nu ka mu numu-kobena mu aata tuungu-waꞌneꞌyoo. Mooasoo soo Te Naa oo nemamakwupuna mu oo sopedakwatoo.”
Noꞌyoona mu oo nakatzimodu mu nakase, ka James noko John unu sutakute.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Gi umu wakwawaꞌamu-kobena katudu-kwaꞌne paba nasooyugwepana. Mu sakwa noꞌoko numu tummatzimo. Nu ooonneꞌyoo, ka yaa petuse, nu noꞌoko ka mu numu tummatzaꞌe. Nu mu numu-koobatoo nabatsakwu, oꞌno saaꞌa mu numu gwetzoidooa.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka pumme nakatzimodu-no ka Jericho mee naneadu-too meakwu. Ewaꞌyoo mu numu umu-no oo-toogoo meꞌa. Ooosapa po kumabu katudu, soo nana gi tubootabuedu, Bartimaeus mee naneadu, nonotsu mu numu pu-moopaa meadu meeoo netammakayakwe, “E tummatzi.”
Yise oosoo ka Te Pabeꞌe kemmana nakase, meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “U sakwa e sootuhi,” mee.
Umu numu ewana oo nesagwikute, “Gi unnepana,” mee oo netamma. Oosoo ka Te Pabeꞌe pabasoo yadooe, “U sakwa e sootuhi.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise umu pumme nakatzimodu mee netamma, “Ka gi tubootabuedu, nu-baatoo bike.” Umu tunakatzimodu ka gi tubootabuedu nana mee netamma, “Besa nasooyugwese, yotse, soo Te Pabeꞌe yaa menoꞌo, u baꞌe, mee.”
Soo gi tubootabuedu nana yise tu nagaꞌapu mawunise yotsehoo, yise ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo takwue.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo, “Hownnekoo sakwa nu u tummatzi?” Soo gi tubootabuedu meeoo, “Nu gi tubootabuena, enatu e poonnekwuna sookwaꞌe.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee oo netamma,
“Unudea, u ka e togesobedyase suuꞌmu, besa manekwu.” Oosoo gi tubootabuedu nana yise yaatu besa poonne manese, ka podo ka Te Pabeꞌe tuyohoka.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka umu pumme nakatzimodu-no ka Jerusalem mee naneadu-kwitoo meana, ka Bethphage, noko Bethany mee nananeadu naamootoo mease, ka giba Olive mee naneadu tzageꞌe petuga. Oꞌno soo Te Pabeꞌe waahoo umu pumme nakatzimodu-matu
meeoo netamma, “Ka Bethpage-witoo memeakwate. Onoko mu sumuoo tzagaze natzakunadu mayukwu, gisoo pukooba nakatudu. Oo tzadopase punowsoo saaꞌa oo wetzakake.”
Ka mu numu mumme tubenga, “How mu manakwe?” mee saaꞌa mu nekwegea, “Soo Te Pabeꞌe yabesoo a soogwina saaꞌa yise punowsoo a makodyukudooa.”
Umu ka memease, ka tzagaze, ka nobe-kobena oo natzaku oo mayu petugase, oo tzadoopahoo.
Mu numu o konnodu mee mu tubenga, “How yise manena mu a tzadoopa?”
Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe unnena mu tuukwese, umu yise, “Muusoo tooꞌe,” mee mu netamma.
Mu wahaꞌyoo naana yise ka tzagaze ka Te Pabeꞌe-baatoo tzakakase, wega oo-kooba hanese, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu wega-kooba katunoꞌo.
Ewaꞌyoo numu tu wega ka po-kooba wupatzeta, susumudu numu punnoꞌo sunngabe maꞌna hanese, yise ka Te Pabeꞌe ooka podokute.
Ewaꞌyoo numu oo kumi meana ka Te Pabeꞌe nesootuhinoꞌo, besa sokwamana, papaba apegeana, “U yow, U Ne Tubetse Pabeꞌe, noꞌoko numu magwetzoidu.
U numme-kooba katudu ka ne namooatupu David-waꞌneꞌyoo, numme besa sokwama soo Te Naa ka numme-matoo u tayase, soo Te Naa u tubetse sootuhikwu. Soo Te Naa saaꞌa puusoo te magwetzoikwu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jerusalem-wi petugase, ka nanesootuhi nobe-kwitoo meahoo, noꞌoko hemma oetu besa sootseꞌma, pana ka mooasoo unu yongona oo mane-gapu umu tunakatzimodu-no Bethany-witoo meaꞌa.

Ka ookow moooꞌa awamooa, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka umu tunakatzimodu-no Bethany-wiꞌyoona meaꞌa. Oosoo ka meana, ka sunngabe Fig mee naneadu poonnese, oo-matoo mea, ka tzuayaꞌena. Ka tamano, ka sunngabe pooe naa-kwi oo manepetuse, gisoo oo pooetooꞌa oo mayu petu. Unu sunngabe naka-gaꞌyoo suuꞌmu.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka sunngabe meeoo netamma, “Gi gea hannanoꞌo u pooetooa-waꞌneꞌyoo.” Umu oo nakatzimodu oo naka.

Umu Te Pabeꞌe ka pumme nakatzimodu-no ka Jerusalem-witoo meaꞌa, yise ka pabow nananesootuhi nobe tzageꞌe kodyu petuga. Mu weehoo-ma tumudu poonne. Tu hemma tsanabedona, tu seepu-ma tumugonno tuwazoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka hemma pukooba mu tuoonana manapow, oo kadunoo tuwazoo, yise oekoo mu numu matzayubow.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu netamma, “Mu ka nobeꞌana gi ma-toogoo meapana. Esoo pukwiꞌyoona tu nananesootuhina.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa unnepu mee naꞌunakwe, ‘E nobe pukwiꞌyoona noꞌobatusoo numu nanesootuhina.’ Menoꞌo mu yise nanatuduha miꞌyoona.”
Soo numu pabeꞌe, ka mu numu-koobatoo yadooadu-no ka Te Pabeꞌe manena sopedakwatoose, oo-ma nakasuaꞌe ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo unakwe, yise oo nebatsa, ka ewow numu ooka nakatogeꞌyookute.
Ka yongo-nakwa, soo Te Pabeꞌe umu pumme nakatzimodu-no punowsoo kodyuka, ka Bethany-wi tooibodona.
Tu pudu taba tsebooegena, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu tunakatzimodu-no Jerusalem-witoo meaꞌa. Ka sunngabe mooasoo pasapu oo poonne.
Soo Peter ka Te Pabeꞌe unnena soomayuna mee oo netamma, “U ka etzeꞌe ka sunngabe pasa tuungu, oosoo yise menoꞌo pasapu,” meeꞌe.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Aha. Mu ekow soomaꞌyu. Mu sakwa ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukuse nanesootuhi. U ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna, u ka giba ka banunadu-naamookwitoo nooyooa tuunguse, oosoo oo-toogoo manikwu.
Ka nanesootuhi manese, mu sakwa ka mumme suda tumatugukudu soomuꞌwase. Oꞌno Te Naa yise punnoꞌo ka suda mu tumatuguna soomuꞌwakwu.”
Ka Jerusalem-witoosoo kodyuse soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu tunakatzimodu-no, ka nanesootuhi nobe-kobenakwi soo Te Pabeꞌe nanapedo meowbodote. Mu Jew numu tutunehanedu ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petuse
mee oo tubenga, “Haga pooha tunetamma-toohakwi u yoo manakwe?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu nanekwegea, “Nu ka John-witu mu mooe tuukwekwu. Mu ka kaaheno e nanekwegease oꞌno yise saaꞌa nu punnoꞌo haga pooha-toohakwi ꞌyoo nu e manena mu tuukwekwu.
Haga ka John meeoo netammana oosoo numu baa-wi matzaka, soo Te Naa God, pute oosoo puusoo oo sukwe manakwe?”

Mu tutunehanedu yise puusoo nanano apegeagonnose, mee unakwe, “Tamme ka meeꞌe unnese soo Te Naa God ka John meeoo netamma, soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo te tubengakwu, ‘How yise manena mu ka John gi nakabetsea?’
Pana, ‘Soo John puusoo oo manakwe,’ mee te unnese mu numu punnoꞌo te kusekakwu, soo John Te Naa nayadooawabe mee oo netammana, oo nakaꞌoedyukuna.”
Umu yise mee ka Te Pabeꞌe nanekwegea, “Numme gi oo sopedakwatoo.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Nu punnoꞌo gi mu tuukwe-waꞌneꞌyoo ka haga pooha-toohakwi, e pooha maꞌnaꞌwena.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu numu-koobatoo yadooadu mee natugwenga, “Sumuꞌyoo nana puu tumasuꞌa. Soo nana tumasuase, oo naꞌoonnakwi koodua-doose, ka tu tumasuana toogoo tuubane nobe-too. Ekow nobe-kwikoo hoobadookwuse. Oosoo tuwazoo tueyaꞌe nobe-toose, ka tumasuape-matu mu numu tuukwena ka tubewabe mu mabetseakwu-kwitoo, yise kwingaꞌa mea.
Ka tu nayasa-wi oo manepetuse, oosoo sumuoo numu ka tabewabe-witoo taya, pumme naamookwitoo oo tupooegea tuunguna.
Umu ka nana-ma tzakaduse oo mooedyakwehoo, yise oo taya, gi oo pooe makana.
Soo tumasuadu yise punowsoo kummaꞌakoosoo pumme tummatzidu taya, umu numu yise suda manakwe, oo kwo-makoo oo wupageta gi hemma oo hanekute.

Oꞌno yise soo tumasuadu ka kummaꞌakoosoo pumme tummatzidu taya tuwazoo. Umu yise oo patsow. Soo tumasuadu yise ewowsoo pumme tutummatzidu oetoo tayayakwe. Susumudu mu tutummatzidu oetoo natayadu nuupagetayakwe yise umu-matu punnoꞌo nagoꞌe.
Nakwitoo ka tu besaa tooa tu nabenina umu-matoo taya mee tusooyugwena, ‘Umu ka e besaa tooa nakaꞌoedyukuna gi how a yugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.’
Pana mu numu meeoo nananetamma, ‘Esoo ka tumasuadu besaa tooa. Tamme ka a batsowse, ka oo teepu manikwu.’
Umu yise oo-ma tzakaduse oo batsase ka tumasuape-kwitoo oo wuwazuhoo.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Mu oo sopedakwatoo, soo tumasuadu sutakwu ka kodyu petuse, ka umu pumme tutummatzidu nagoese. Oꞌno yise oosoo ka tabewabe kummaꞌakoosoo numu hane tuungukwu.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Mu sakwa oo sopedakwadoo, ka oꞌnosoo Te Naa yadooawabe mee nu-witu botugu, ‘Mu tupe nobe-tootu tumoodyipu tupe tookwa besaꞌyoo tupe, ka penakwa mu nobe namadabue-kwi oosoo tupe unu nadatzenga petu. Soo Te Naa yoo tumadabue, tamme yise tubetse besa sokwama ma-koobatoo.’ “
Mu numu-koobatoo yadooadu ka Te Pabeꞌe tooꞌe nekwutuma, ka pukwitu oo sopedakwatoose, umu ka mu numu-ma suꞌina, sukwe meꞌa.
Mu numu-koobatoo yadooadu-matu Pharisee, mu wakwawaꞌa numu pabeꞌe pupuaꞌamu-no, ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo nataya. Yow umuoo numu ka Te Pabeꞌe unu nesoonahadyakwedu.

Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “U tubetse besaꞌyoona, ka umu numu Te Naa-witu besa tunedyooꞌe. U gi numu tutzeadu; yise gi tuwazoo u numu nesootzemadu. How haaꞌa sakwa tamme, ka mu wakwawaꞌa numu pabeꞌe tumanagaku?”
Soo Jesus mu sopedakwatoo ka pumme mu nesoonahadyakwe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Gi sakwa mu e nesoonahadyakwepana, ka mu tumanagapu-matu e tzapoonneku.”
Umu yise oo tzapoonnese soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Haga mama namanaka, yise haga naneana mama naboꞌo?” mee. Umu mee oo netamma, “Soo mu wakwawaꞌa pabeꞌe mama.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Tamme sakwa mu wakwawaꞌa numu pabeꞌe gea, esoo umuoo nanumu tumadabuena. Tamme sakwa ka Te Naa tumadabuena, ka Te Naasoo gea.” Mu numu besa o sukwe pooꞌnepebuꞌahoo.
Mu sumubaatu nanesootuhidu numu, Sadducee mee nananeadu, ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petuga. Umu Sadducee meeoo nananesootuhidu, soo numu ka yaꞌese sumu tammesoo meꞌadu.
Umu meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe tuukwe, “Oꞌnosoo ka Moses tunetammapu umu mayohodu, ka tu pabeꞌe gi dooamu-gakoo kadooꞌoo oo manese, soo penakwatu oo wanngaꞌa sakwa oo nodukwadoose, tu pabeꞌe dooamu-dooku.
Natakwatsukweꞌyoo (7) mu nanakwangaꞌamu. Oosoo mu tubetse pabeꞌe ka ekow mogoꞌne mooe nodukwa-gaꞌyoo. Ka tu mooe kooma kadoo manese, gi oo-makoo dooamu-gaꞌyoo.
Ka oo pabeꞌe yaꞌese, oo wanngaꞌa koomadoo. Ooka tuwazoo yaꞌese, gisoo tuwow oo-makoo dooamu-gaꞌyoo.
Umuoo natakwatsukwuoo (7) naana esoo mogoꞌne nanasusuꞌmu mu koomadookese, gisoo umu-makoo dooamu-gana yise punnoꞌo kadoo ꞌmane.
Esoo mogoꞌne yise ka saaꞌa namayodase haga kooma-gakwu? Mu noꞌyoona natakwatsukwuꞌyoo (7) nanakwanngaꞌamu oo nodukwa-gakena,” meeꞌe umu oo nesootzemana unakwe.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu Sadducee netamma, “Mu gi o nakasopedakwatoo ka Te Naa tubetse tunetammapu, tamme oo pooha netammapu.
Mu sakwa yise ka saaꞌa namayodase mu toha kakasa-gakoo Te Naa tummatzidu-kwaꞌne, mu gi mu nodukwa-gana soohanekwu.

Mu ka oo nakaꞌoedyukuna tooe mu tuise sapa. Mu saaꞌa gi moobegwaga gwetzoimokwu ka Te Naa-baa petugase. Te Naa tamme tunetammakuna. Moses ka pooewunudu niwunu oo-kobena wunu, soo Te Naa yise ka Moses meeoo netamma, ‘Mu Abraham, mu Isaac, mu Jacob puu tooesoo nu-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe. Nu yise mu Nanesootuhi Naa.’ “
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Te Naa gi mu tuipu Naa, mu togesoo modu suuꞌmu. Mu ka Te Naa nanetsagwayipana, mu tubetse gi oo nakaꞌoedyukute.”

Oosoo sumuꞌyoo nana mu tunedyooedu-matu, oona oo nakakwunu. Ka Te Pabeꞌe noꞌosoo pumme mu numu tubenga, besa mu nanekwegeꞌa mee oo nakasoobedya, soo nana ka Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo tubenga, “Hanotu umu-matu ka Te Naa unnepu ooonnakwa besaꞌyoo umu te tumayohope-matu?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo oo netamma, “Waha-baatu esoo naꞌunnepu Te Naa tamme tuukwepu besaꞌyoo. Mooeꞌugasoo, ‘Soo Te Naa Te Manumudoopu.
Tamme sakwa tubetse besa oo soobedya.’
Soo penakwatu yise meeoo. ‘Tamme sakwa mu numu besa soobedya tammesoo nasoobedya-kwaꞌne.’ “
Soo nana meeoo oo netamma, “Besaꞌyoo soo nayadooape. Oosoo sumuꞌyoosoo, Te Naa Te Manumudoopu. O oosoo Te Naa.
Tamme punnoꞌo sakwa ka Te Naa besa soobedya. Soo penakwatu yise, tamme sakwa tammesoo besa nanasoobedya, tuwazoo. Umu wahaꞌyoo noꞌokosoo nanesootuhipu ooonnakwa besaꞌyoo.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee oo netamma, “U unu soonammedu. U tookwa unu oo nakaꞌoedyukukwu.” Umu numu yise naka nasookwise gi hemma ka Te Pabeꞌe tubenga mani.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka pabow nanesootuhi nobe-kobena petu, umu ewaꞌyoo numu o manepunne. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu numu netamma, “Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe tuukwewabe David-matu mee oo netamma.

Pana soo David ka Te Naa pooha-toohakwi Te Pabeꞌe mee oo natubaꞌnga. Ka David tubotugu-kwi meeoo, ‘Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe mee netammapu, “U sakwa ooosapa e tumadinakwu katu ka umu ume wohonedu e matzooekunoꞌotoo.” ’
How yise soo David Te Pabeꞌe mee oo natubaꞌnga ka punakwana oo nanekemma sapa?” meeꞌe soo Te Pabeꞌe mu tubenga.
“Ka mu meeoo tuukwedu gi nakaꞌoedyukupana, umu tu nanesookwugina sukwe soogwidu. Umu numu tunedyooedu unu besow namasooꞌa.
Ka paba tu naꞌewa tukanoꞌo, umu besa-kwi tu katuna soogwaꞌe. Ka nanesootuhi nobe-kwiꞌyoona, tuwazoo unu besa-kwi tu katuna soogwaꞌe.
Umu yise ka mu pepeawabe hemma tuduhana mu nanesootuhikute. Umu sugweꞌapa wunaꞌme mu nanesootuhikute. Umu gi besa numu tunedyooedu. Umu unu suda manedu tumatuguna, umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu owenapa mu poonne katu, ka mu numu ewana ka tumasumudoope-kwi tutuoonadyakwe. Susumudu mu naana ewow hee-gaꞌyoo ewa oe tutuooꞌna.
Sumuꞌyoo mogoꞌne tu kooma kadooꞌoo manekupu umu-tamme kemma. Gi hemma mapuꞌa, oosoo yise huutse oe tutuuooꞌna.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu tunakatzimodu netamma, “Yaa esoo mogoꞌne. Esoo tu penebetu oe tuoonahoo.
Yise mu naana gi ewa oe tutuooꞌna ka a namasumutoo-kwi, tooe ewa oo hee-gapana. Esoo mogoꞌne tu penebetu oe tuoonahoo. Gi haaꞌnokoo oe tuoona, pana a besana puma mu gwetzoina mee nu.”

Ka nanesootuhi nobe-kwiꞌyoona, sumuꞌyoo mu tunakatzimodu-matu ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “Esoo nanesootuhi nobe tupe noko namadabuepu-gaꞌyoo. Mu yaatu tupe papabaꞌyoo. Esoo nanesootuhi nobe besa tabuꞌa.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo oo netamma, “Esoo nobe besaꞌyoo pana te wokwohomu noꞌoko a wuyoomedakwunikwu.”
Umu yise ka tuutsekoo giba-ma, Olive mee naneadu-kwitoo mease o aataꞌa, ka nanesootuhi nobe poonne. Peter, James, John, Andrew yise mee oo watse tubenga.
“How sakwa tamme oo sopedakwatoo tabua, ka nobe nuudyoomedakwuna? Hee te tzapoonnekukwu hannanoꞌo oo manikwuna?”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu nanekwegeꞌa, “Ewaꞌyoo numu meeoo naneyugwedu, yow numme Te Pabeꞌe. Nu gi mu esayaedu-matu, meeoo soo esayaedu mu tuukwekwu. Ewaꞌyoo mu numu nanemooagakwu. Gi mu nakaꞌoedyukupana.
Tooe hanotu tooe mu numu mesoo nanagoꞌe. Gi saaꞌa suꞌipana. Gi soo te teepu suda mane-waꞌneꞌyoo, gi meeoo hemma sooyugwepana.
Mu numu yise nanano ewa nanagoekwu. Tooe hanotu tooe saaꞌa, soo te teepu yutsungadooa. Mu numu saaꞌa tseagoedooa. Gi besow saaꞌa hemma mu poonnedooa.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Mu sakwa namasootzema. Mu sumuna nahemase, mu nanehanedooa. Mu saaꞌa nuupagetadooa. Mu gi e nakaꞌoedyukudu saaꞌa gi mu petzabedooa. Mu yise nuga besa unnepu mu tuukwedooa.
Noꞌobatusoo mu numu saaꞌa e unnepu nakadooa.
Mu ka nakwutumase, gi suda oo soonamekupana ka hayoo mu unnekwuna. Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha ooka madaꞌe.
Ewaꞌyoo mu numu gi e petzabedooa, mu nananumudooe suda mu matugudooa, yise mu goedooa saaꞌa. Ka umu gi e sooꞌoedyukudu, gi mumme numu petzabedu, gi e nakaꞌoedyukudu, gi e maꞌwukadu, nu magwetzoikwu.
Tooe hemma tooe sutaꞌyoo
Oosoo tu nobe-kobena wununnummedu sakwa gi tu nobe-kwitu hemma gwuupana, yabesoo meeow.
Soo tubewabe-kwitu hemma how yugwewunudu sakwa punnoꞌo gi hemma gwuupana, gi tu nobe-kwitoo kodyupana, yabesoo meeow.
Ka yabesoo meaꞌakwuse, mu koheadu-kwi gi besa, ka mu sutuba meaꞌakwuse mu oongaꞌa petzekudu punnoꞌo.
Umu sakwa nanesootuhi gi sakwa tommo hee oo suda manepana.
Esoo gi besa a namanekwuna tubetse unu suda, gi hannanoꞌo namanedu ka teepu namadabuese.
Te Naa yise ka umu tu tutzeanana sootuhikwu, ka gi oo tzadyooꞌikuna gi haga namagwetzoꞌi-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Tooe haga tooe sumuna meeoo mu tuukwekwu, ‘Soo Te Pabeꞌe mooasoo kodyu petu.’ Gi oo naka oedyukupana.

Ewa tuwazoo naꞌesagoekwu, ‘Nu Yow Mu Pabeꞌe mee naꞌunnekwu.’ Ewasoo mu numu moohedu numu nemooagayakwe. Nanasookwugi hemma mu tzapoonnekukwu, tooe hemma tooe pooha mahanekwu, ka umu e dooamu tooꞌe nemooagana.
Mooasoo nu mu tuukwepu. Ooonneꞌyoona sakwa mu namasootzemapunne.
Oꞌno ka gi hemma besa manekwuse, soo taba toganohookwu, soo muha punnoꞌo.
Mu paatoozooba punnoꞌo sawedyikwu.
Noꞌyoona mu numu punnoꞌo ka koomeba-nagakoo e pooha kodyu petukwuna poonnekwu.
Umu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo e tutummatzikwutu, tooe hanotu tooe ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona, mu e nanumu nu-baa hanepetukwu.
Ka sunngabe pooedooase, mu meeoo sokwamadooa, tamme tookwa tamatsebooe.
Ka gi besa hemma manekese, mu yise oo sopedakwadookwu, nu tookwa pudusoo kodyu petukwu.
Susumudu mu numu-matu ka hemma oo manedu poonnekwu gisoo yaꞌena.
Nuga unnepu besa naꞌunnedu, gi atasoo naneyugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.

Ka hannanoꞌo oe e petuookwuna manepetuse, gi haga ka teepu-koobatu oo sopedakwatoo. Mu toogoopatu Te Naa tutummatzidu puu gi, nu punnoꞌo gi. Te Naa suuꞌmu oo sopedakwadoopunne ka hannanoꞌo e petuookwuna.
Mu sakwa ooosapa namasootzemapunne.
Nu-kwaꞌnesoo, sumuꞌyoo numu puu ka meakwuse, ka hemma how pumme yugwekudu hemma nemanekuga. Ka tuꞌeyaedu meeoo netamma, ‘Gi uꞌwepana.’
Mu sakwa nonotsu tabeno nuummabetsabena. Tooe hannanoꞌo tooe nu kemmowgena, yongona, togano, awamooasoo. Nu sumuna gi mu nuummabetsape mu mayu petukwu.”

Mooa yongona oetu, oꞌnosoo te manena te natzamaꞌwukwuna soomayuna, yise ewa tukakwu, ka Gi Namayuadu Tukaba tukakwu. Soo Jew numu tutunehanedu ka Te Pabeꞌe watze nesootzeꞌma mee yise, “How sakwa tamme ka Jesus watze tzakadu tabuase, oo batsa?
Tamme sakwa gi numu poonnena oo batsapana, mu numu tamme-no nagoedooa.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Bethany-wi ka Simon Tookoo Pehe mee naneadu nobe-kwi. Mu tukawunu, sumuꞌyoo mogoꞌne oe petuoo. Ka tupe osa-witu ka besa kwanadu nakwanaꞌa gwuuna. Ka osa tsabadowse, ka Te Pabeꞌe kwo-kooba oo tuoonahoo.
Susumudu mu Te Pabeꞌe-batu ka mogoꞌne manena nesootuꞌadyaꞌe, “Oosoo sakwa gi oo nahadyagwepana ka besa kwanadu nakwanaꞌa oosoo ewa nanenagadu. Oosoo sakwa oo-ma tumuse mu tutuha manedu namadea.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “A tsasoopedya. Gi a nesootuꞌadyaꞌepana. Esoo mogoꞌne besa manakwe.
Mu tutuha manedu tooe hannanoꞌo pana ooosapa mu-noꞌyookwu, pana nu gi ooosapa mu-noꞌyookwu.
Soo mogoꞌne manena deaꞌa, e natugukwu-kwitoo a natumayohona.
Tooe hano tooe ka teepu kaaꞌno, ka besa nayadooadu-kwi esoo mogoꞌne manepu saaꞌa nanatugwengadooa. Oo-makoo tamme nanasoomayudooa.”
Sumuꞌyoo mu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu-matu Judas Iscariot mee naneadu ka mu Jew numu tutunehanedu-baa petuse mee mu netamma, “Nu oo sopedakwatoo ka Ne Pabeꞌe pukwiꞌyoona nu sumuna mu tuukwekwu.”
Mu tutunehanedu besa sokwama ka oo nakase umu yise ka Judas tumasumudooku. Soo Judas yise meeoo soonamme, “Hownnekoo sakwa nu ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo mu bika?”
Yaa tabeno numme ka seepu tooaꞌa batsakwu, ka gi namayuadu tukaba noko oo ewa tukakwuse mu oo nakatzimodu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe tubenga, “Hanoꞌyoona sakwa tamme ewa tuka?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise waahoo mu tunakatzimodu-matu tayase. Mee mu netamma, “Ka nana baa tzanodu mu saaꞌa wegeadooa.

Mu saaꞌa ookow nageakadooa. Ka nobe-kwi oo egeakase oo-nosoo saaꞌa tzoonooahookwatese ka nana nobe-gakoo mee netamma, ‘Soo Te Pabeꞌe umu pumme nakatzimodu-no yaa u-baaꞌyoona nanesootuhi yongo tukakwu.’
Esoo nana nobe-gaꞌyoo yise mu tzapoonnekukwu, ka paꞌatu nobe-kwiꞌyoona ka tukapu mu yonga tukakwuna mu saadooa.”
Mu wahaꞌyoo yise memea, ka Te Pabeꞌe unne-toosoo manekwuse.
Ka tu yongose Te Pabeꞌe umu tunakatzimodu-no ka nobe-kwi petuga.
Umu-no tukanasoo, Te Pabeꞌe mee unakwe, “Sumuꞌyoo mu-matu nu-no tukadu ka mu tukwutumadu nu-matoo bikekwu, umu yise e batsakwu.”
Mu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu oo nakase, suda nuummana, umu nanasusuꞌmuꞌyoona mee unakwe, “Nu haaꞌa?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu nekwegea, “Sumuꞌyoo mu-nagatu nu-no tukadu.
Tooꞌe soo Te Naa mooasoo, ‘U nabatsakwu,’ mee tunetammapana, saaꞌa oosoo umu e wohomu nu-matoo bikepu tumaꞌemukwana oo-matoosoo kodyukwu.”
Mu tuka, soo Te Pabeꞌe tukaba gwuuhoose, oo-koobatoo nanesootuhise oo tzaboka. Yise umu tunakatzimodu hemese ooka mu tuka tuungu, mee unnena, “Esoo puu nuga tookoo-waꞌneꞌyoosoo.”
Yise ka besow atsa baa yoongase oo-koobatoo nanesootuhise, ooka mu hebe tuungu.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeꞌe unnena, “Esoo puu nuga puupe-waꞌneꞌyoosoo. Te Naa Toogoopatu besa unnena tunetammana, suda mu manepu-koobatoo e nabatsakwuse.
Nu mu tuukweꞌe nu ekow atsa baa ka yaa teepu-koobatu tubetse gi hebekwusoo, saaꞌa ka Te Naa ka te teepu mapudutupudoose, oꞌno yise nu tubetse pudutupusoo hebekwu.”
Umu yise nanesootuhi hoobea nekwuna ka Olive mee naneadu tuutsekoo giba-matoo meaꞌa.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee ne netamma, “Ka yaa togano suda tu namanikwuse mu e maꞌwuookakwu. Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa yadooawabe meeꞌe tubotugupu, meeꞌe naꞌunakwe ka menoꞌo Te Pabeꞌe manekwuna. ‘Soo seepu takonedu nabatsahookwu, mu seepu yise nanaꞌemota petugwahookwu.’
Nu saaꞌa e yaꞌekwukoo namayodase, Galilee-witoo mu-kobenasoo meadooa. Mu saaꞌa, o nu-baa petugadooa.”
Soo Peter meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Mu u nakatzimodu sumuna u-koobaꞌyoona meaꞌakwu, nu gi umu-no meakwu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo ka Peter netamma, “Togesoo tu toganopunne, ka tsekana kwuꞌa gisoo wahadooe oo yaka, u pahedooe oona numu tuukwekwu u gi e sopedakwatoo mee.”
Soo Peter yise meeoo Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Tooe umu e batsakwu mee unnepana nu gi meeoo unne-waꞌneꞌyoo, ka gi u-ma nasookwina.” Mu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu noꞌyoona oo-waꞌnesoo unakwe.
Ka Olive namasuꞌa-wi petuse, Gethsemane mee naneadu, soo Te Pabeꞌe mu tunakatzimodu mee netamma, “Yowsoo aatapunne. Nu nanesootuhigakwu.”
Mu Peter, James, John oo-no meaꞌa.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu netamma, “E pewu-kwitu tubetse suda nuumma. Mu sakwa yaahoosoo aatapunne.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe sagwane umu kwingaꞌatoosoo meahoose, o ka teepu-kooba meatzedose, yise nanesootuhikooha.
“E Naa Toogoopatu. Nuga Naa Toogoopatu. Nuka u tunetammakuse nu oo-toogoo meakwu. Ekow e pewu-kwitu suda nuummana, kadooꞌoo mayugwe.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka nanesootuhimakwuse
tu pupuaꞌamu utuaꞌe mu mayu petuga. Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu netamma, “How mu tubetse unu utuigapu-gaꞌyoo?” Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Peter meeoo netamma, “U sakwa gi uwepana.”
Noꞌoko yise meeoo netamma, “Mu sakwa nanesootuhi aata oꞌno soo sutaꞌyoo gi mu matzama. Mu gi oo mapuꞌa ka gi manese meeꞌe nu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise penakwa nanesootuhigase ka mooeꞌugasoo tu nanesootuhi-kwaꞌnekoosoo nanesootuhi.
Yise tu pupuaꞌamu-baa kodyu petuse, mu utuaꞌe mu mayu petusoo.

Yise nanesootuhigasoo tuwazoo saaꞌa umu-baasoo kodyu petu, tooesoo mu utuaꞌe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Yow haaꞌa mu togesoo utuaꞌe? Yosuhoo, tamme meaꞌakwu, menoꞌo oe mani petu, nu natzakwenekwu. Yaa soo sutaꞌyoo nana kemma.”

Ka Te Pabeꞌe togesoo yadooꞌa, Judas petuoo, mu Jew numu tutunehanedu mu tukwutumadu taya ka Judas noko. Pabatzeꞌekoo koodooꞌoo noko tsegesa hemana. Soo Judas, ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo tooe. Soo Judas yise oo-no namitzadyaꞌme oꞌno umu oo sopedakwatoo.
Umu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe-ma tsakatu.
Sumuꞌyoo umu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu-matu yise tsegesa-ma ka mu Jew numu tunehanedu pabeꞌe tummatzidu naka wugaꞌakwunihoo.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu tukwutumadu meeoo netamma, “Nu gi suda tumatugudu, gi nu naduyadu, gi tuduhadu tuwazoo. Gi sakwa mu koodooꞌoo-ma e tumahepana, tsegesa-ma tuwazoo.
Tooe ka e nanesootuhi nobe-kwikoo sapa, mu gi nu-ma tzakadupu-gaꞌyoo. Muusoo tooꞌe. Mooasoo soo tubope ebeoo nabotuku, oꞌnosoo Te Naa tamme tuukwe-kwaꞌnesoo.”
Mu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu oo-ma suꞌise, ka Te Pabeꞌe-baaꞌyoona namabetugwahoo.
Nu ka tooebetsena, ka Te Pabeꞌe nagwuuhoose, nagaꞌapu-wi wunagaꞌa yaahoose ka Te Pabeꞌe-nakwi meanoꞌo.
Umu tukwutumadu e nagaꞌapu-ma tsakatu, nu yise e nagaꞌapu makwumahoose namameow.
Umu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe naꞌenakwakoo oo puta-ma tzakaduse, ka Jew numu pabeꞌe-matu oo tsakaka. Umu tutunehanedu oo nehanekwu.
Soo Peter kwingaꞌa mu nakwi meꞌa, ka Jew numu pabeꞌe nobe-kobena petugase, o yooekatu.
Soo Jew numu pabeꞌe ka mu tutunehanedu-no ka Te Pabeꞌe tooꞌe batsakwuse, gi toge oo manena tooꞌe nemayupana gi hemma nemamaꞌyu.
Susumudu nanana oo manena tooꞌe wahana sukwe esagoꞌe. Umu tooꞌe tuukwepana kadooꞌoo hee, tubetse gi hemma nemamaꞌyu.
“Numme meeoo oo unakwe oo naka, ‘Nu ka nobe, ka Te Naa-matoo pukwiꞌyoona te nanesootuhina kadooꞌoo mesoo mayugwe, yise pahe tabeba-wi oo mesoo mayota.’ “
Mu naana gi nanakwaꞌnesoo unakwe.
Soo Jew numu pabeꞌe umu-kobenaꞌyoona ka Te Pabeꞌe tubenga, “Togesapa haaꞌa umu nanana meeoo u netamma?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe tubetse gi hiyoo unakwe. Soo Jew numu pabeꞌe yise mee oo tubenga, “U haaꞌa Te Pabeꞌe? U haaꞌa toogoopatu Te Naa Tooa?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee oo nanekwegea, “Aha, mu oeꞌyoopana e poonnekwu, nu Te Naa Toogoopatu-kumaba katukwu. Saaꞌa nu koomeba-naga petuookwu, oꞌno yise mu e pooha poonnekwu.”
Soo Jew numu pabeꞌe yise tubetse unu sutahoose tu kwasu tsakebuꞌehoo, mee mu netamma, “Oosoo suda unakwe ka Te Naa-waꞌneꞌyoo mee naneyugwena. Gi tamme manatusoo oetusoo wahakwutu sookwaꞌe.
Mu oo naka ka suda oo unakwe mu sakwa hayoo oetu netamma. Haꞌyoo mu sokwama?” Mu numu tutunehanedu mee oo netamma, “Tamme sakwa oo batsa.”
Yise o kobitoo toohegonno, o pooe kwudumowse, oo wupageta, mee yise oo netamma, “Ne tuukwe ka pooha-gana, haga u wupageta?” Mu tutukwutumadu oo-ma tzakaduse, yise oo koba mabatseoo.

Soo Peter yise ka Jew numu tunehanedu naa nobe-kobena pedana oe yooekatu. Sumuꞌyoo tsuadumu ka Jew numu tunehanedu naa hemma how yugwegudu, ka Peter meeoo netamma, “U haaꞌa yise ka Jesus nakatzimodu-matu?” mee.
Soo Peter mee oo nanekwegea, “Nu gi oo sopedakwatoo.” Soo Peter meeowse ka natzakwonaꞌa kumabu wunu.
Soo tsuadumu ka mu numu o konnodu meeoo netamma, “Esoo nana ka Jesus nakatzimodu-matu.”
Soo Peter ka mu numu-ma unu suꞌina punnoꞌo mee oo netamma, “Gi nu.” Pudusoo mu numu o toonoobatu meeoo oo netamma, “U tookwa togesapa yow ka Jesus nakatzimodu-matu. U ka Galilee-witu.”
Soo Peter meeoo mu netamma, “Gi nu mu numu nemooagadu, nu gi umu-matu.”
Yise tsekana kwuꞌa waha yaga. Soo Peter ka Te Pabeꞌe pumme netammana soomayuse, suda soonammena, yagakooha.
Awamooasoo soo mu Jew numu tutunehanedu ka Te Pabeꞌe batsakwu mee tunehane. Yise ka Te Pabeꞌe mi tzakunase, ka teepu-kooba katudu naa, Pilate mee naneadu-kobena oo tzaka petuga.
Soo Pilate mee ka Te Pabeꞌe tubenga, “U haaꞌa ka mu Jew numu-kooba katukwudu?” Soo Te Pabeꞌe oo nekwegeꞌa, “Aha, nu yow oosoo.”
Mu Jew numu tutunehanedu mee ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Ewa u suda manakwe.”
Soo Pilate yise mee ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Umu tooe hayoo tooe u netamma. U haaꞌa gi oo naka, oꞌno u gi hayoo unakwe?”
Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe gisoo tuwazoo hayoo sukwe unakwe. Soo Pilate meeoo soonamme, “Nu gi o nakasopedakwatoo haꞌoo mane-naga masoo gi mu nanekwegeꞌa.”
Nonotsa sumu tomoyina tu naꞌewa tukanoꞌo soo numu-kooba katudu sumuoo mu nakwutumadu-matu tzamaꞌwuyakwe, ka mu numu unne-makoosoo.

Ewaꞌyoo mu numu ka Pilate-baa petuse, yise meeoo oo netamma, “U sakwa sumuoo mu nakwutumadu-matu tzatsebooe.” Soo Pilate oo nesopedakwatoo ka Jew tutunehanedu gi Te Pabeꞌe soobetzabena, ooonneꞌyoona yise mu numu tutunehanedu ka Te Pabeꞌe wutuma. Soo Pilate meeoo mu tubenga, “Mu haaꞌa ka Mu Pabeꞌe Jesus tzamaꞌwukwu?” Mu Jew numu tutunehanedu meeoo mu numu netamma, “Mu sakwa ka Pilate ka Barabbas tzatsebooe tuungu.” Oosoo nana, Barabbas mee naneadu, tu pupuamu-no nakwutumadu. Umu ka mu Roman numu-no nanagoena, susumudu mu numu-matu nagoehoo.
Soo Pilate mu numu mee netamma, “Esoo nana nu-baa petu, mu Jew Numu-kooba Katudu mee naneadu. How yise nu oo yugwekwu?”
Mu numu waꞌagemoꞌo, “Oo tzakwenne. Oo batsa.”
Soo Pilate mee mu netamma, “How tubetse suda oosoo manakwe?” Mu numu pabasoo waꞌagemoꞌo, “Oo batsa.”
Soo Pilate gi oo nebatsapana, yise mu numu puusoo oo nebatsana. Soo Pilate yise ka Barabbas, ka mu tukwutumadu tzamaꞌwu tuunguse, ka Te Pabeꞌe wupagetase oo batsa, paꞌa oo taposa mee tunetamma.
Mu tukwutumadu ka Te Pabeꞌe, ka Pilate nobe-kwitoo tzakaka. Noꞌyoona mu tukwutumadu oe sumuhoobetu.
Umu numu-kobenaꞌyoona o wunagaꞌayaakuhoo, mono-ga-kwi oo tzowupagaku.
Umu oo-maꞌyoona nanekoꞌena, oo nematzamana, mee oo netamma, “U tookwa yow Jew Numu-kooba Katudu.”
Umu hooope-ma oo kwo-makoo oo wupagetana, oo kobitoo toohena, o-kobena meatzedona oo nasootzamekuna, oo-maꞌyoona nanekoena.
Umu Te Pabeꞌe nanetzaꞌmekumakwuse, oo namasooapu-wisoo oo matabue. Umu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe tsakakase, oo batsakwu.
Umu tukwutumadu ka meadabena, Simon
Ka Te Pabeꞌe Numu Tzonoho mee naneadu-kwi o bi petuga.
Yise umu atsa tutzaꞌemukwa baa, noko natusooabe mayuana oo tooe hebe tuungu, soo Te Pabeꞌe yise gi oo hepe.
Yise awamooa umu oo mi-makoo paꞌa oo taposa. Mu tukwutumadu yise oo kwasu nanatotsakwate.
Ka sunngabe namadabue-ma puma oo nataposana meeoo natuboꞌo, “Yow esoo Jew Numu-kooba Katudu.”
Wahaꞌyoo tutuduhadu punnoꞌo ka Te Pabeꞌe naꞌenakwana nataposa.
Mu numu oo-moopa meagonnona, oo-maꞌyoo nanekoꞌe mee unnena, “U meeoo unnepu, u Te Naa nobe wudyoomase, pahe tabewa-wi besa oo matabuekwusoo.
U sakwa ka unu tumadina mamaꞌyoo wuekese, uusoo namagwetzoi.”
Umu numu tutunehanedu oo-maꞌyoo nanekoꞌe mee unnena, “U mu numu magwetzoise, pana yise gi hownnekoo uusoo namagwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo.

Hownneꞌyoo Ne Pabeꞌe U? Gi hownnekoo uusoo namagwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo, ka naduyana mee unnepana. Uusoo yaa teepu-matoo wuese, numme u nakaꞌoedyukukwu.” Umu punnoꞌo oo naꞌenakwa nataposadu oo-maꞌyoo nanekoꞌe.
Tabeno manakwana oona ka taba pahe-kwikoo tooe, ka teepu-koobakwitu toganopunne.
Pahe-kwikoo tapuakese soo Te Pabeꞌe paba waꞌage yadooa, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabachthani,” mee naꞌunnedu, “Nuga Naa, Nuga Naa, How manena u e matusookwunaꞌe?”
Umu susumudu o konnopunnedu-nagatu mee unne, “Masoo tookwa ka Elijah, oꞌnosoo Te Naa yadooawabe mee naneadu bidyakwe.”

Sumuꞌyoo umu-nagatu yabesoo tanomanegase, yise yotsogadu wanapu, suda kammadu baa oodutsekoo hooope-ma oo tzetzabekuse, ka Te Pabeꞌe tzatumakute. Pana mu susumudu meeoo, “Oo tsasoopedya. Sumuna soo Elijah tamme-baa tabua petuse oo magwetzoikwu.”
Oꞌno soo Te Pabeꞌe paba waꞌagese, yaꞌeoo.

Soo tukwutumadu ka Te Pabeꞌe poonne ka oo yaꞌehoose, mee yise unne, “Masoo tookwa tooꞌe togesapa ka Te Naa Tooaꞌa.” Soo wunapu ka Te Naa pooha pukwiꞌyoona numu nanesootuhidu-makoo naamootoo natzakwenedu, ka Te Pabeꞌe yaꞌehoose, soo wunapu paꞌanakwana tubongo oo naamootoo natzagebuꞌehoo. Soo teepu yutsungakoohase, mu tupe payooagonnona sawekooha.

Ewaꞌyoo momokoꞌne punnoꞌo onow kwinaꞌa konnopunnena oo poonnepunne, umuoo ka Galilee-wiꞌyoona ka Te Pabeꞌe-no kemmapu oo tummatzina. Umuoo momokoꞌne-nagatu paheꞌyoo, Mary Magdalene, yise Mary mu James noko Joseph pea, yise tuwazoo Zebedee nodukwa.

Soo nana, Joseph mee naneadu, Arimathea-wikoo nobe-gaꞌyoo, ka numu tutunehanedu-matu, unu napetzabedu. Toogoopatu Te Naa ka teepu besa oo yugwekwunu wutooedu. Ka tu pudu yongogaꞌa soo Joseph ka Pilate nobe-kwi petuga yise oo tubenga, “How sakwa u ka Te Pabeꞌe tookoo e tzagea?”
Soo Pilate mee unakwe, “Soo Jesus haaꞌa tubetse yaꞌepu?” Soo tukwutumadu nabise, yise natubenga, “Soo Jesus tubetse yaꞌepu haaꞌa?” Soo tukwutumadu, “Aha,” mee unakwe.
Yise ka tukwutumadu nakase, soo Pilate ka Joseph mee oo netamma, “Yise a haneka.”
Soo Joseph yise ka Te Pabeꞌe tookoo tzakwekuse toha wunapu hane petuse, oe oo manobea. Tupe tuwaga-kwi oo tugu. Pabow tupe o-kobenatoo tonanooehoo.
Umu Mary Magdalene-no, Joseph pea Mary mee naneadu, ka Te Pabeꞌe natugu-kwitu poonnepunne.
Sumu tabe mease, oogow mooa awamooasoo taba pudu tsebooegena, paheꞌyoo momokoꞌne ka Te Pabeꞌe natugu-kwitoo meaꞌa. Mary Magdalene, James pea, yise Salome-no.
Yise ka o meadabena meeoo unnemena, “Haga yise ka pabow tupe o-kobenatu tonanooekwunikwu?”
Yise toogooonakwatu poohwise, soo pabaꞌyoo tupe mooasoo natonanooekwunipu.
Oe mu tzoonooase sumuꞌyoo tooebetse toha kasa-gaꞌyoo Te Naa tutummatzi-matu, toha namasooana o katu. Mu momokoꞌne oo-ma suihoo.
Soo tooebetse mee mu netamma, “Mu sakwa gi suipana. Mu ka Te Pabeꞌe Nazareth-witu wate; oosoo nabatsapu, oosoo kadooꞌoo yaatu; mooasoo namayodapu. Poonne yaa oo habepu-witu kadooꞌoo.
Mu sakwa mease, Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu tuukwe, Peter tuwazoo. Mooasoo soo Te Pabeꞌe mu mooenakwasoo Galilee-witoo meapu. Onoko yise mu oo poonnekwu, mooasoo mu natuukwepu.”
Umu momokoꞌne yise oꞌno tatanomanega. Gi haga umu-matu sukwe yadooꞌa, umu ka suihoose.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe tu yaꞌe-kwiꞌyoona namayodase, unu awamooasoo ka Mary Magdalene natzapoonneku petu, ka Mary Magdalene-nagakoo natakwatsukwuoo (7) tsoapa taꞌyakwunipu-gaꞌyoo ka oꞌnosoo.
Mary saaꞌa ka umu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu-matoo meahoose yise mu tuukwe petuga, umu yise oeꞌyoopana sagwaꞌe.
“Te Pabeꞌe pudu namayoda. Nu o poonne,” mee mu netamma. Umu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu gi oo nakaꞌoedyukute.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe atasoo tabuana, waahoo nanana nobe-kwitoo meaꞌa. Yise umu-no manega.
Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe sopedakwatoohoose punowsoo memeahoo mu tunakatzimodu tuukwe petuga. Pana umu tunakatzimodu gi mu nakaꞌoedyukute.
Penakwa mu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu tuka, soo Te Pabeꞌe mu natzapoonneku, mee yise mu netamma, “How manena mu gi oo nakaꞌoedyukute, tooe ka umu numu mumme tuukweꞌe sapa?
Ka tooe hano tooe yaa teepu-kooba momona, mu sakwa ka Te Naa besa yadooapu wahamo, noꞌobatusoo numu tuukwe.
Mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu, ka gi tookedu goso-witoo meakwu. Umu oe tunakaꞌoedyukudu yise baa-wi namatzakana namagwetzoikwu.
Umu oe unu tunakaꞌoedyukudu toogoopatu yadooa-masoo yadooakoohakwu.
Tooe togogwa tuwazoo mu tokuese, tooetoo mu sutakoo hebehoose sapa, mu gi nuummaba wuma-waꞌneꞌyoo. Yise mu umu-kooba matuguna, mu nanesootuhikuna, mu tuoegoedu besa manekwu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe umu-no yadooamakwuse, yise toogoopatoo tsebooegase, ka Te Naa tumadinakwa katu petuga.
Umu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu tooe hano tooe numu besa o unnena tuukwemoꞌo, nanabesa tu tumadina pumme tu sootuhipu mu tzapoonekute. Esoo toge sapa. Maaꞌno sapa.
Ka Te Pabeꞌe ka yaa teepu-kooba tamme-baaꞌyoona oo manepu-witu. Oꞌno Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu ka oo poonnese ne tuukweꞌe. Ewaꞌyoo numu mooasoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu botugu.
Nu ka noꞌoko umu ooka poonnedu unnepu nenayodase besa oetu nakasopedakwadoose, menoꞌo e puaꞌa Theophilos nu u-matoo tuboꞌo,
oꞌno saaꞌa u punnoꞌo oo nakasopedakwadookwu mee nu tusooyugwe.
Oosoo sumuꞌyoo waꞌetse, Zachariah mee naneadu, ka mu Jew numu Abijah mee naneadu nananesootuhidu-matu
Umuoo uga besaꞌyoo numu, noꞌoko ka Te Naa unnepu kaaheno nakabetseꞌa.
Umuoo ooosapa gi dooamu-gaꞌyoo soo Elizabeth ka gi dooamudoo-waꞌneꞌyoona.

Mu Jew numu nanesootuhi papabeꞌe nanahoesoo ka tu tumayohoyina, ka pabatsekoo Jew nanesootuhipe nobe-kwiꞌyoona mayohoyakwe. Umu ka nanesootuhi nobe-kwitoo meakwudu, ka besa kookwanadu kootugukwudu. Sumu tabenoosoo Zachariah nanetutzeꞌa
Ka besa kookwanadu nakootugukwunoꞌo oe manepetuse, soo Zachariah ka nanesootuhi nobe-kwi egeaka. Umu numu puuwanasoo konnopunnena nanesootuhigonno.
Zachariah yise meeoo pooha tuusoobedyakooha. Sumuꞌyoo umu Te Naa tutummatziwabe mu toha kakasa-ga-matu petuhoose, ka besa kookwanadu pukwikoo nakootuguna-kumaba wunupunne.
Soo Zachariah yise ka Te Naa tummatziwabe poonnese suihoo.
Soo Te Naa tummatziwabe ka Zachariah mee netamma, “U sakwa gi suipana. Soo Te Naa tookwa u nanetsukwiyaꞌena naka. U nodukwa Elizabeth mee naneadu saaꞌa naatse tooaꞌagakwu. U yise John mee oo neakwu.
Ka oo nadooaꞌadoose, mu saaꞌa besa sokwamadooa, ewaꞌyoo numu saaꞌa punnoꞌo ooosoo.

Soo John besaꞌyoo numukwu, ka gisoo oo nadooaꞌadoo soo Te Naa tu Besa Pooha-ma oo sootuhikwu. Soo John sakwa ooosapa gi atsa tutzaꞌemukwa baa hebepana, gi tooe hownnekoo puma tu nabaayina hebepana tuwazoo.

Saaꞌa ka nana manese, soo John unusoo pooha-gakwu ka Te Naa yadooawabe Elijah mee naneadu-kwaꞌne. Ka Te Pabeꞌe gisoo petu, saaꞌa u tooa, John, mu numu oo-toogoo mooe nemamakwupunnedooa. Soo John ka mu numu Te Naa oemota manepu, ka oo besa podo mu makodyukwu. Soo John ka mu naanapuaꞌamu tu doodooamu besa soobedya mayugwedooa. Soo John saaꞌa ewow Jew numu ka Te Naa mu nakaꞌoedyuku-matusoo makodyudooa.”
Soo Zachariah ka Te Naa tummatzidu toha kasa-gakoo mee netamma, “Mooasoo nu unu waꞌetsena, e nodukwa punnoꞌo unu peawabe. Hownnekoo yise nu oo sopedakwadoodooa u sumuna e nemooaka?”
Soo Te Naa tummatzidu toha kasa-gaꞌyoo mee oo nanekwegea, “Gabriel mee nu naneꞌa. Nu Te Naa-nakwana kemmadu. Soo Te Naa-soo meeoo e netamma, nu u tuukwedooa ka besa naꞌunnedu.
Menoꞌo manakwana, u gi yadooa manekwu, u ka ume e tuukwena gi nakaꞌoedyukuna. Pana saaꞌa ka u tooa nawuese, u yadooasoo manedooa.”
Noꞌyoona mu numu puuwanasoo konnodape ka Zachariah wutooena. “Haꞌooga manena oosoo gi yabe tsebooegena?” mee umu sokwama.
Ka saaꞌa umu-matoo tsebooekese, yise sukwe miyutsuꞌnge, gi yadooꞌa. “Soo waꞌetse tuusoobedyadu-kwaꞌne nuumma,” mee mu numu sokwama.
Saaꞌa ka tu nananesootuhi pupuaꞌamu tutumatzimakwuse, ka nanesootuhi nobe-kwiꞌyoona, Zachariah nobe-kwitoosoo kodyuka.
Ka saaꞌa soo oo nodukwa, Elizabeth mee naneadu, kohea. Manege muha manepetuga, Elizabeth ooosapa nobe-kwisoo.
Soo Elizabeth yise mee unakwe, “Soo Te Naa e tubetse sootuhipu. Menoꞌo manakwana numu gi e nesootzemakwu, gi dooamu-gaꞌyoo mee e netammana.”
Soo tsuadumu Mary mee naneadu, Nazareth mee naneadu-kwi nobe-gaꞌyoo
Soo Gabriel ka Mary-baa petugase meeoo oo netamma, “Soo Te Naa tubetse besa u sootuhikwu.”
Soo Mary oo-ma nakasuaꞌe, “Hemmagina netamma?” mee soonammena.

Soo Gabriel yise mee ka Mary netamma, “Gi suipana. Soo Te Naa besa u-matoo soonammena, u sootuhikwu. Pudusoo u kohease saaꞌa u naatse oongaꞌa dooadookwu. U yise Jesus mee oo neakwu Numu Magwetzoidu mee naꞌunnedu. Oosoo unu pooha-gakwu, oosoo ka Te Naa-nakwana kemmakwuse. Soo Te Naa saaꞌa ooosapa tu doodooamu-kooba tueyaꞌe tuungudooa ka mu namooatupu David-waꞌnesoo soo David puu tu nanumu nehanegatudu. Gadoo hee oo ooonakwatu.”
Soo Mary yise mee ka Gabriel tubenga, “Hownnekoo yise nu tooaꞌadookwu, nu ka gi hannanoꞌo nanano habepuna?”
Soo Gabriel yise mee oo nanekwegea, “Soo Te Naa ka tu Besa Pooha-ma oo u sootunagakwu. Ka oo Besa Pooha-toohakwi u koheakwu, oosoo tuhaꞌyoo ka Te Naa Tooaꞌakwu.
Soo u hamaꞌa Elizabeth punnoꞌo u-kwaꞌnesoo besa nasootuhipu. ‘Oosoo gi dooamu-doodu mogoꞌne,’ mee mu numu ka oꞌnosoo oo nea pana oosoo yise mooasoo naapahe muha kohea.
Noꞌyoona soo Te Naa unnepu togesapa manekena.”
Soo Mary meeoo, “Nu Te Naa tummatziwabe. Tooe how tooe nuka Te Naa mayugwena besaꞌyoo.” Soo Gabriel yise meahoo.
Gi haaꞌno obenakwatoo, soo Mary namahanese, mea oona giba-matoo ka teepu Judea mee naneadu-kwitoo, ka tu hamaꞌa Elizabeth nobenega.
Ka Zechariah nobe-kwi yise petugase, ka Elizabeth-no yadooꞌa.

Soo Elizabeth ka Mary-no yadooadyakwe, oo wuma ka tu oongaꞌa yutsungahoose. Soo Elizabeth yise ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi pumme oo wupetuhoose yadooakooha. Mee yise unnewunu, “Soo Te Naa tubetse besa u sootuhipu, u oongaꞌa nokosoo.
Nu besa soonamme ka yaa nu-baa u petuse, ka tamme magwetzoikwudu u koheꞌa, ka Te Naa ume besa sootuhaꞌe.
Ka u petuhoose nuka u yadooese, e oongaꞌa nu-nagaꞌyoona yutsungahoo, ka besa soonammese.
Soo Te Naa tubetse besa u sootuhi u ka tubetse besa noꞌoko oo unnepu nakaꞌoedyukuna.”
Soo Mary tubetse besa soonammena nanesootuhikooha meeoo yise, “Soo Te Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo, numu magwetzoidu. Nu tubetse besa oo-matoo soonamme.
Tooe gi e maawaꞌnekoo sapa soo Te Naa e soobedyana tubetse besa e sootuhi. Yaa manakwana mu numu ooosapa meeoo nu-kwitu wahakwu, ‘Soo Te Naa ka Mary tubetse sootuhipu.’
Soo Te Naa tubetse unu pooha-gaꞌyoo.
Soo Te Naa oe manakwana te soobedyana tamme punnoꞌo ka oo nakaꞌoedyukuna besa nasootuhi.
Soo Te Naa unu naduya hemma yugwedu, oosoo umu besa nasooyugwedu numu matzooekute,
mu numu-kooba aatadu nokosoo. Pana ka mu gi maawaꞌnekoo numu besa sootuhaꞌe.
Soo Te Naa ka mu tutuha manedu sootuhaꞌe, pana mooasoo besa manepunne mee nasooyugwedu numu soo Te Naa tsasoopedya.
Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa ka te namooatupu Abraham mee netammapu, ‘Mu yow e nanumu besa sootuhikwu.’ Menoꞌo yise soo Te Naa ka mooasoo meeoo unnepuna yise ooosapa besa te sootuhaꞌe.”
Pahe muha soo Mary ka Elizabeth-baaꞌyoose tu nobe-kwitoosoo kodyukasoo.
Ka saaꞌa yise soo Elizabeth naatse tooaꞌadoo.
Oo nananumu-no oo nonopuaꞌa besa sokwama ka oo nakase, soo Te Naa ka oongaꞌa-ma besa ooka sootuhise.
Sumu nasatese, umu nanesootuhaꞌe ka Jew numu tumayohokuna soo oongaꞌa Jew mane, oo nakakwuse tuwazoo. Umu oo nonopuaꞌa ka oongaꞌa Zachariah mee tooe neahookwu, ka oo naa-waꞌnesoo,
pana soo Elizabeth meeoo mu netamma, “Masoo John mee naneakwu.”
Umu yise meeoo oo tubenga, “How yise John? Gi too haka u nananumu-matu John mee naneꞌa.”
Umu ka Zachariah mayutzengese, oo mi yadooꞌena, oo tubenga, “Haꞌyoo u ka u tooaꞌa naneamakakwu?”
Soo Zachariah yise punnoꞌo mu tumawahakuse pumma tu tubokwuna nekwaꞌe.
