Ka pumme ooka tu gease, Zechariah yise meeoo oo-ma tubohoo, “Mooasoo masoo John mee naneꞌa.” Oꞌno yise soo Zachariah tuapa nanakahoopetuhoosoo yadooase nanesootuhikoohase mee unnewunu, “Soo Te Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo.”

“Esoo ka Te Naa umu sootuhipu. Hownneꞌyookwu gina esoo tuhaꞌyoo?” mee umu oo nonopuaꞌamu sokwama. Gi haaꞌno oobenakwatoo mu numu ka teepu Judea mee naneadu-koobatu ka oona giba-na nonobe-gaꞌyoo, ka Zachariah Elizabeth-no unu moomooatupu dooaꞌadoose oo nanatukwena, punnoꞌo meeoosoo, “Hownneꞌyookwugina oosoo tuhaꞌyoo?” Umu ka Te Naa saaꞌa ooka sootuhikwuna sopedakwadoo, soo tuhaꞌyoo ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-ma tu hee-gakwu.
Soo Zachariah ka Te Naa pooha-toohakwi nanesootuhina mee unakwe,

“U, Ne Naa numme Jew numu ooosapa pumatoo nanesootuhidyina. U tubetse besaꞌyoo. U ka ne namooatupu Abraham mee naneadu meeoo netammapu u ka numme wohonedu-makoo ne magwetzoikwu mee. Menoꞌo yise u ka u unnepu oo-toogoo mayohogena. U mooasoo meeoo unnepu ka Ne Pabeꞌe numme-baa petuse, oosoo ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu David mee naneadu-nagatu tsuagetu. Oosoo Te Pabeꞌe unu poohagakwu
umu numme wohonedu tu pooha-ma matzooekukwu. Gi numme hemma-ma nasoosuꞌa.
U nakabetseana kaaheno ka u besa podo meadabekwu.
Yise u e tooa John, ka Te Naa yadooawabe manekwu. U ka Te Pabeꞌe-kobenasoo meadabenokwu ka mu numu nemabetsea meakwu.

U meeoo ka mu numu tuukwekwu soo Te Naa te sootuhina te magwetzoina, te tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwakwu soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tutuha te soobedyana. Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-baatoo taꞌya ka tabatsebooege-kwaꞌnekoo yaa teepu-koobatoo petuookwu.
Mu numu, ka togaba-witu tuigadu oosoo mu tzapoonnekukwu ka besow po, oꞌno yise soo Te Naa mu magwetzoikwu.”
Soo John ka saaꞌa, ka nana manekese, ka Te Naa pooha hee-gaꞌyoo. Mana giba-ma nobe-gaꞌyoo numu-wana, ka namamakwuse mu Jew numu nanesootuhibu tunedyooekwuse.
Oꞌno
Soo Joseph ka David-maꞌyoona tsuaketu tu nanamooatupu, yise ka Bethlehem numu nokatu-kwiꞌyoona kemmapu ka Judea mee naneadu teepu-koobatu. Soo Joseph ka Mary-no yise ka Nazareth

Umu yise Bethlehem-wi pepetugase, soo Mary yise naatse tooaꞌadoo. Oosoo mu oongaꞌa mu mooe tooaꞌa. Soo Mary yise wunapu-wi oo wutootase, ka pookoo tukanoo-kwi oo tzahabeku, umu ka gi hanosoo toikwuse. Mooasoo kakaaꞌnoꞌyoo soo numu pukwi tooina.
Mu seepu takonedu-matu tu seepu takoꞌne, ona sukwe puuwana.

Te Naa-baaꞌyoona mu tutakonedu-koobatoo paꞌanakwana gootabua petuse mu gootabuakupunne, yise sumuꞌyoo Te Naa tummatziwabe, mu toha kakasa-gakoo-matu paꞌanakwana umu-tamme wuegena. Mu tutakonedu tubetse unu suaꞌe.
Soo Te Naa tummatzidu yise meeoo mu netamma, “Mu sakwa gi suipana. Nu besa mu tuukwegena, noꞌobatusoo numu besa masokwamakwudu.
Yaa tabeno mooasoo soo Te Pabeꞌe nadooaꞌadoo, oona Bethlehem-witoo ka David pukwiꞌyoo kemmapu-wiꞌyoona. Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu magwetzoikwutu.
Mu oo sopedakwadookwu nu togesapa mu tuukweꞌe, mu oo mayukwu ka oongaꞌa wunapu-wi namabutooena, pookoo tukanoo-kwi oo natzahabekute.”
Toge oꞌno, ewaꞌyoo mu Te Naa tutummatzidu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo paꞌanakwana umu-baa petugonnose nanesootuhina mee unnegonno,
“U paꞌanakwatu Ne Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo. U, Ne Naa ka mu numu-matoo besa soonammena yaa teepu-koobatoo mu sootuhina mu magwetzoikwu.”
Umu Te Naa tutummatzidu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo yise punowsoo toogoopatoosoo kodyuhoo. Mu tutakonedu yise meeoo nananetamma, “Tamme sakwa oona Bethlehem-witoo mease, oo poonne ka Te Naa tamme tuukwena.”
Mu tutakonedu yise yabesoo meaꞌase, Mary-no Joseph mayu petuga, yise ka oongaꞌa ka pookoo tukanoo-kwi oo natzahabekute.

Mu tutakonedu yise punnowsoo kodyuna, nanesootuhina mee unnemena, “Ne Naa, u tubetse besaꞌyoo. U, Ne Naa numme sootuhipu. Numme nanasookwugi pooha namanipu poonnena ka pooha naꞌunnewunudu naka. Noꞌyoona tookwa soo ume unnepu togesapa.” Umu yise punowsoo meana mu numu tuukwemena, ka oongaꞌa tu poonnepu-witu. “Hownneꞌyookwugina soo oongaꞌa?” mee mu numu ka mu tutakonedu unnena nakadu sokwama. Soo Mary mu unnena soomayuna, yise ewa oetu soohaneyakwe.

Namewatsu tabe mease ka mu Jew numu ka Te Naa pumme tunetammakapu mayohoyakwe umu ka oongaꞌa Jew numu manena tumayohokukwu. Jesus mee oo nea, ka Te Naa tummatziwabe ka toha kasa-gakoo pumme netamma-kwaꞌnesoo, gisoo ka Mary koheꞌa.

Soo Mary ka tu hoone manena tatukwase, yise ka Joseph-no ka tu oongaꞌa Jesus tzahedana ka Jerusalem mee naneadu-kwitoo memea. Ka o pepetugase, ka pabow nanesootuhi nobe-kwitoo memea, soo Mary waahoo weeho ka Te Naa tzademe, ka Te Naa tunetammana mayohona. Soo Te Naa meeoo, “Soo numu mooe tooa tooe hannano pana nugatu.”
Sumuꞌyoo besaꞌyoo waꞌetse, Simeon mee naneadu, Jerusalem-wi nobe-gaꞌyoo. Oosoo ooosapa ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhina, ka tu Nanumu Magwetzoidu Te Pabeꞌe petukwuna wutooedu.
Soo Te Naa ka Simeon ka Tu Besa Pooha-ma meeoo, tuusoobedyapu-gaꞌyoo, “Gisoo u yaꞌena, u Nanumu Magwetzoikwudu poonnekwu.”
Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha ka nanesootuhi nobe-kwitoo ka Simeon taꞌya. Oꞌno yise mu Mary-no Joseph ka Jesus tzahedana pepetuoo, ka tumayohope mayohokwuse.
Soo Simeon ka Jesus tzahedase, tu puta-wi oo hedapunnena, ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhiwunu mee unnewunu,

“U, Ne Naa, tubetse besaꞌyoo. Nu menoꞌo oo poonne numme-matoo u tutayana numu magwetzoikwudu. Oosoo saaꞌa mu gi Jew numu togesapa u unnepu tunedyooena yise mu Jew numu sootuhidooa. Wunaꞌme nu oo wutooꞌe, ume nakabetseana. Nu gisoo yaꞌena oo poonnekwu mee u e tuukwe. Menoꞌo yise nu besa soomanena mesoo yaꞌe, nu ka mooasoo oo poonnese.”
“Soo Simeon sumuna besa ka ne tooa-witu netamma,” mee mu Jesus naanapuaꞌamu ka gi oo nakasopedakwadoopana besa oo nakasokwamakute.

Soo Simeon yise mu nanesootuhikuse, ka Mary meeoo netamma, “U tooaꞌa saaꞌa ka mu Jew numu suda tumatuguna tzapoonnekudooa, yise ka hayoo mu tusooyugwena. Umu-matu namagwetzoikwudu. Umu-matu punnoꞌo kadoo namayugwekwu umu ka oo nekwohonena. U punnoꞌo unu tutuha soonammekwu ka mu numu u tooa tumooꞌookese.”
Toge oꞌno, tubetse unu peawabe, Anna mee naneadu, umu-baa petuhoo. Soo Anna tubetse besaꞌyoo numu. Besaꞌyoo uga kooma-gana

ka tu kooma yaꞌese, unusoo besaꞌyoo ka wunaꞌme nonotsa awamooa nanesootuhiyakwe ka nanesootuhi nobe-kwiꞌyoona nanesootuhidyina, nonotsa yongona tuwazoo. Ewasoo gi tukapana nanesootuhiyakwe. Soo Anna Te Naa yadooawabe.
Ka Mary noko Joseph pu-baa pepetugase, Anna ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhi, “U, Ne Naa, tubetse besaꞌyoo. Yowsoo oongaꞌa te wutooena. Esoo tamme Jew numu magwetzoikwudu.”
Joseph-no Mary ka tumayohope mayohose, ka Te Naa pumme netamma-kwaꞌne ka tu teepu Galilee mee naneadu-kwitoo punowsoo kodyuka, ka Nazareth mee naneadu-kwitoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-nosoo.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus mee naneadu naatse manekese, unu natzooena, unu soonamme, ka Te Naa pumme sootuhaꞌe.
Nonotsa sumu tomoyina soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus naanapuaꞌamu ka Jerusalem mee naneadu-kwitoo memeayakwe, nananesootuhina naꞌewa tukayakwe, ka oo soomayuna, oꞌno mu Jew numu natzamaꞌwu.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka tooebetse manese, sumumano waha matsebuekudu (12) tomose, umu-no mea.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus naanapuaꞌamu yise ka hemma namamakwuse, ka Jerusalem-wiꞌyoona memea. “Soo Jesus ka sumuna ta nananumu noko tu pupuaꞌamu-no kemma,” mee umu sokwama. Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Jerusalem-wisoo mani. Oꞌno yongona umu oo tooꞌe kwate tu nananumu-baatu.
Pana umu-baatu kadooꞌoo. Umu yise ka Jerusalem-witoosoo kokodyuka oo watena.
Pahe tabe mease, umu oo mayu, ka nanesootuhi nobe-kwikoo mu nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu naka katuna ka nanesootuhibu-witu besasoo mu tutubengayakwe.
“Esoo besa oo nakasopedakwadoona mu mesoo nanekwegeayakwe, tooe togesoo naatsepana,” mee mu nanesootuhibu numu oo soobedya.
“How manena soo Jesus mow mu numu tunedyooedu yadooe katu?” mee oo naanapuaꞌamu sokwama. Soo oo pea yise meeoo oo netamma, “Manatu tooe numme u tooꞌe wate. U sakwa uga gi ꞌyoo suda ne matugupana.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe oo nanekwegease meeoo, “How yise manena mu e tooꞌe wate? Mu mooasoo oo sopedakwatoo nu yaa E Naa-baa oo nakabetseana.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe naanapuaꞌamu oo unnena gi nakasopedakwatoo.
Umu yise ka Nazareth mee naneadu-kwitoo punowsoo kodyuka. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise tu naanapuaꞌamu besa nakabetsea.
Nanakese unu soonamme manepetu soo Te Naa besa oo soobedya, mu numu punnoꞌo.
Ka saaꞌa soo John

Soo John yise ka giba-maꞌyoo wuekese, ka baa hooodu Jordan mee naneadu-kumi meadabena, mu numu maꞌemukwapu mu nanekwaha tuungu. “Oꞌno soo Te Naa mu maꞌemukwana soomuꞌwakwu,” mee mu netamma. Ka mu nanekwahakese, soo John yise baa-wi mu matzakakwu.

Soo John ka oꞌnosoo Te Naa yadooawabe Isaiah mee naneadu pumme waha-kwaꞌne manakwe. Isaiah meeoo tubotugu. “Mana ka gi hemma nadukadu naa-wiꞌyoona sumuꞌyoo nana ka Te Naa pooha-toohakwi mu numu tunesootabuekwu, ‘Mu sakwa muusoo namabetseapunne ka Te Pabeꞌe pudusoo petukwunoꞌoto. Mu sakwa kaaheno tuusooyugwepunne, oꞌno mu besa oo nakabetseanokwu.’

Menoꞌo mu numu ka unu nanakwohonedu sutakoo podo meꞌa. Nanekwahase, ka po kaaheno mayugwe. Soo Te Naa ka numu besa mayugwekese, mu oo nagenokwu. Soo Te Naa ka giba wuwutaꞌnena kaaheno mayugwese, mu tutuaga kwakwabedu kaanokukese, mu numu yise kaaheno oo podokoo besa meadabekwu.
Noꞌobatusoo numu yise oo nakasopedakwadookwu ka Te Naa tamme magwetzoaꞌe.”

Soo John ka mu numu pu-baa petudu mee netamma yakwe, “Mu unu etzaꞌa. Saaꞌa soo mu tumaꞌemukwana mu-matoosoo kodyukwu. Mu baa-wi mumme e matzaka tuungu, pana mu gi ka mu tumaꞌemukwapu nematzagakwunaꞌe.

Mu mooeꞌugasoo sakwa ka suta mu manena tubetse maꞌwukase, ka besa-tamme manese, oꞌno sakwa yise nu baa-wi mu matzakakwu. Gi besa nasooyugwena mee unnegonnopana, ‘Numme yaahoo Te Naa doodooamu, numme ka Jew numuna.’ Mu tookwa gi oo nakasopedakwadoo soo Te Naa tooe hownnekoo tooe tu doodooamu mu mesoo mayugwe.
Mu sakwa besa tumatugu. Mu ka ooosapa gi besa tumatuguna mu kadooꞌoo namayugwekwu. Tooe haga tooe gi he-toogoo besaꞌyoo natunikwu.”
Ewaꞌyoo numu oo nakana oo tubengu, “Hownnekoo sakwa numme besa tumatugumo?”
Soo John mee mu nanekwegea, “Mu sakwa ka tutuha manedu tummatzi. Tamme ka waha-batu hemma hee-gana sakwa sumuoo ka numu gi hee-gakoo gea. Ka tukapu-gana tamme sakwa mu tseagoedu maka.”
Mu tumasumudoodu ka John-baa petuse baa-wi oo namatzaga tuunguna. “Hownnekoo sakwa numme besa tumatuguyi?” mu numu mee oo tutubengu.
Soo John mu nanekwegea, “Mu ka mu tumasumutoona suuꞌmu haneyi.”

Mu tukwutumadu punnoꞌo oo tutubengu, “Hownnekoo sakwa numme besa natumunagakuna suuꞌmu oo natubesatuka?” Soo John mee mu nanekwegeana, “Mu sakwa gi mu numu nesuana hemma puma mu tumuna hanepana. Mu sakwa gi mu numu nemooagana mu esayikupana.”
Mooasoo mu Jew numu oo sopedakwatoo ka tooe hannano tooe ka Te Pabeꞌe nanepetuna umu yise ka John Te Pabeꞌe mee sooyugwe.

Soo John ka mu sokwamapunnena sopedakwadoona mee mu netamma, “Nu gi Mu Pabeꞌe. Nu gi oo-waꞌne unu pooha-gaꞌyoo. Nu baa-wi numu sukwe matzakayakwe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe nuga ooonakwa unu pooha-gaꞌyoo nuga ooonakwa besaꞌyoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-ma mu sootuhikwu oosoo suda mu manena mu nematzagakuse mu gi tunakabetseadu kadooꞌoo namayugwekwu.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe petuse ka mu numu yaa teepu-koobatu nemadabuedooa ka mu bebesow ka suta-nagakoo tzobadooa. Ka bebesow numu yise Te Naa nobe-kwi mu nabaaꞌyookukwu. Ka sutakoo numu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tubetse gi tokedu goso-witoo maꞌanakwunikwu.”
Meeoonekoo soo John ka oꞌnosoo ooosapa numu tunedyooe ka Te Naa besa unnepu-witu.

Soo John ka mu numu baa-wi matzadyakwe, soo Te Pabeꞌe punnoꞌo oo-baa petugase yise baa-wi namatzaka. Ka Te Pabeꞌe nanesootuhiwunu, soo Te Naa Besa Pooha paꞌanakwana kweꞌnaꞌa tubongo punoonooe yotsekwuge-kwaꞌne yise oonaga manipetu. Soo Te Naa paꞌanakwana yadooase, mee unne, “U yow E Besaa Tooa, nu-kwaꞌneꞌyoosoo. Nu unu u soopedyana besa u-matoo soonamme.” Ka saaꞌa soo mu Jew numu-kooba numu nehane katudu Herod mee naneadu gi togeꞌyoo nana. Tu pabeꞌe nodukwa, Herodias mee naneadu, oo-makoo tsakahoose oo nodukwadoo. Soo John ka Herod manena nesootuꞌadyaꞌena mee oo netamma, “U sakwa gi ewa suda tumatugupana. U sakwa gi uga ka u pabeꞌe nodukwa nodukwadoopana.” Soo Herod gi oo nakabetsebena nanahanoꞌobasoo ka John wutuma tuunguna.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka pahemano (30) tommo manepetuse numu nanesootuhibu tunedyooe maneka. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Joseph tooa mee mu numu-matu unakwe. Soo Joseph naa Heli mee naneꞌa.
Soo Heli naa Matthat mee naneꞌa. Soo Matthat naa Levi mee naneꞌa. Soo Levi naa Melchi mee naneꞌa. Soo Melchi naa Jannai mee naneꞌa. Soo Jannai naa Joseph mee naneꞌa.
Soo Joseph naa Mattathias mee naneꞌa. Soo Mattathias naa Amos mee naneꞌa. Soo Amos naa Nahum mee naneꞌa. Soo Nahum naa Esli mee naneꞌa. Soo Esli naa Naggai mee naneꞌa.
Soo Naggai naa Maath mee naneꞌa. Soo Maath naa Mattathias mee naneꞌa. Soo Mattathias naa Semein mee naneꞌa. Soo Semein naa Josech mee naneꞌa. Soo Josech naa Joda mee naneꞌa.
Soo Joda naa Joanan mee naneꞌa. Soo Joanan naa Rhesa mee naneꞌa. Soo Rhesa naa Zerubbabel mee naneꞌa. Soo Zerubbabel naa Shealtiel mee naneꞌa. Soo Shealtiel naa Neri mee naneꞌa.
Soo Neri naa Melchi mee naneꞌa. Soo Melchi naa Addi mee naneꞌa. Soo Addi naa Cosam mee naneꞌa. Soo Cosam naa Elmadam mee naneꞌa. Soo Elmadam naa Er mee naneꞌa.
Soo Er naa Joshua mee naneꞌa. Soo Joshua naa Eliezer mee naneꞌa. Soo Eliezer naa Jorim mee naneꞌa. Soo Jorim naa Matthat mee naneꞌa. Soo Matthat naa Levi mee naneꞌa.
Soo Levi naa Simeon mee naneꞌa. Soo Simeon naa Judah mee naneꞌa. Soo Judah naa Joseph mee naneꞌa. Soo Joseph naa Jonam mee naneꞌa. Soo Jonam naa Eliakim mee naneꞌa.
Soo Eliakim naa Melea mee naneꞌa. Soo Melea naa Menna mee naneꞌa. Soo Menna naa Mattatha mee naneꞌa. Soo Mattatha naa Nathan mee naneꞌa. Soo Nathan naa David mee naneꞌa.
Soo David naa Jesse mee naneꞌa. Soo Jesse naa Obed mee naneꞌa. Soo Obed naa Boaz mee naneꞌa. Soo Boaz naa Salmon mee naneꞌa Soo Salmon naa Nahshon mee naneꞌa.
Soo Nahshon naa Amminadab mee naneꞌa. Soo Amminadab naa Ram mee naneꞌa. Soo Ram naa Hezron mee naneꞌa. Soo Hezron naa Perez mee naneꞌa. Soo Perez naa Judah mee naneꞌa.
Soo Judah naa Jacob mee naneꞌa. Soo Jacob naa Isaac mee naneꞌa. Soo Isaac naa Abraham mee naneꞌa. Soo Abraham naa Terah mee naneꞌa. Soo Terah naa Nahor mee naneꞌa.
Soo Nahor naa Serug mee naneꞌa. Soo Serug naa Reu mee naneꞌa. Soo Reu naa Peleg mee naneꞌa. Soo Peleg naa Eber mee naneꞌa. Soo Eber naa Shelah mee naneꞌa.
Soo Shelah naa Cainan mee naneꞌa. Soo Cainan naa Arphaxad mee naneꞌa. Soo Arphaxad naa Shem mee naneꞌa. Soo Shem naa Noah mee naneꞌa. Soo Noah naa Lamech mee naneꞌa.
Soo Lamech naa Methuselah mee naneꞌa. Soo Methuselah naa Enoch mee naneꞌa. Soo Enoch naa Jared mee naneꞌa. Soo Jared naa Mahalaleel mee naneꞌa. Soo Mahalaleel naa Cainan mee naneꞌa.
Soo Cainan naa Enos mee naneꞌa. Soo Enos naa Seth mee naneꞌa. Soo Seth naa Adam mee naneadu. Ka Adam yise soo Te Naa manumudoopu.
Ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwiꞌyoona Te Pabeꞌe ka Jordan hooodu-kumabaꞌyoona mea. Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha numu-wanatoo oo tayana oo nanesootuhi tuunguna.
Saaꞌa yise soo sutaꞌyoo ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “U sakwa nanamanena nasootzaꞌme ka Te Naa Tooaꞌana. U sakwa eka tupe tukaba mayugwe, oꞌno u oo mesoo tuka.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe gi oo nakabetseana, mee unakwe, “Soo Te Naa meeoo, ‘Tukapu nadukana suuꞌmu gi numu magwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo.’ Soo Te Naa unnepu suuꞌmu numu magwetzoi.”
Soo Sutaꞌyoo yise paꞌatoo ka Te Pabeꞌe bikase, oo tzapoonnekute noꞌyoona nanaꞌataꞌyoosoo numu ka teepu-koobatu.
Soo Sutaꞌyoo yise meeoo tuwazoo ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Oꞌnosoo nuka mu numu yaa teepu-koobatu e moohe tuungu, umu yise noꞌyoona e nakabetseakwu.
U ka nu-matoo nanesootuhina, nu ume mu nakabetsea tuungukwu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo ka Sutakoo netamma, “Nu gi u-matoo nanesootuhi-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa unnepu mee mooasoo nabotugu, ‘Tamme sakwa ka Te Naa-matoo suuꞌmu nanesootuhi, ookow suuꞌmu nakabetsea.’ “

Soo Sutaꞌyoo yise ka Te Pabeꞌe ka Jerusalem mee naneadu-witoo bika. Paꞌatseꞌe ka pabow nanesootuhi nobe-kooba oo wunu tuunguse, ka Te Pabeꞌe mee netamma, “U sakwa nanamanena u ka Te Naa Tooaꞌana. U sakwa ma-koobaꞌyoona nadawunihoo.
Oꞌno soo Te Naa u magwetzoikwu oosoo ka meeoo nabotuguna, ‘Soo Te Naa umu pumme tummatzidu u mabetsea tuungu.
U gi tupe-ma tukwutzaꞌnge-waꞌneꞌyoo, umu ka u tsipunnena.’ “
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka Sutakoo meeoo netamma, “Nu gi umu unnena nakabetsea-waꞌneꞌyoo, oosoo ka meeoo nabotuguna. ‘Tamme gi ka Te Naa mapoonne, haꞌoo sakwa oosoo mani mee sokwamana.’ “
Soo Sutaꞌyoo yise ka Te Pabeꞌe-baaꞌyoona meahoo. “Sumuna penakwasoo nu ka Mu Pabeꞌe makwuhookwu,” mee soonammena.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise punowsoo kodyuka ka pummesoo teepu Galilee mee naneadu-witoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka meadabena ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi ka Te Naa unnepu numu tunedyooe mea ka Jew numu nanesootuhi nobe-wiꞌyoona tuwow. Noꞌyoona ka teepu-koobatu mu numu oo nanatuukweꞌe yise mee nanaꞌunakweꞌe, “Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus tubetse unu besow pooha-gaꞌyoo.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Nazareth pukwi tu namananana-wisoo petuga. Ka nanesootuhi tabeba oe manepetuse, soo Te Pabeꞌe numu-baa nanesootuhi petuga ka ooosapa maneyina.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise natunea tuungu. Oosoo yise wunuoohoo. Umu ka oꞌnosoo Te Naa yadooawabe Isaiah mee naneadu tubona nakea. Oo tsakwunowse oo-toogoo tu poonnemese ka oo mayuse ooka mu neakutu mee naꞌunnedu.

“Soo Te Naa Tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma e sootuhipu ka umu tutuha manedu gi how mane-waꞌne manepunnedu numu tu unnepu e tuukwe tuunguna. Ka Te Naa Pesa Pooha-ma ka mu nanasuda tu tumatugumasoo tzangedu umuoo suda tumatuguna soomuꞌwakwu mu sootuhina mu magwetzoikwu. Mu gi tutubootabuedu-kwaꞌne manepunnedu nu sootuhina mu magwetzoikwu. Yise mu numu mukwapunnedu numu nanasuda namatugudu,
nu besa tuukwekwu. ‘Menoꞌo soo Te Naa mu magwetzoikwu.’ “
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise oo neamakwuse o ka pumatoo a natubona mabutooese punowsoo ka tu tummatzidu geasoo yise ka numu tunedyooedu katunoo-wi katuhoo. Noꞌyoona numu yise oo nakapunne.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Yow menoꞌo soo oꞌnosoo a unnepu oo-toogoo manekena. Mu muusoo namakoo a poonne.”
“Soo Jesus nanabesa yadooapana masoo tamme-matusoo, masoo Joseph tooa. Haꞌoo yise masoo besa yadooꞌa?” Meeꞌe noꞌyoona mu tunakapunnedu nananetamma.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu netamma, “Mu sumuna meeoo e netammakwu, ‘Mooasoo numme oo naka u ewow numu magwetzoikena ka Capernaum mee naneadu wiꞌyoona. U sakwa yaanona ka umesoo numu mabetsea,’ mee sumuna mu e netammakwu.
Nu mu tuukwekwu mu wakwawaꞌa Te Naa yadooawabe etzaga nakaꞌoedyuku pana mu oogowsoo nanumu oo nopuaꞌamu-no gi oo nakaꞌoedyuku-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Ka tubetse oꞌnosoo oo namanepu-waꞌne, wunaꞌme (3 ½) tomopu gi tu powꞌma, ewaꞌyoo Jew numu natseagoe. Ewaꞌyoo mu Jew pepeawabe tu koomamu tuipu punnoꞌo tseagoe
pana soo Te Naa gi mu maka. Soo Te Naa ka wawaꞌa peawabe

Ewaꞌyoo Jew numu unu tookoo peheꞌuagoedu pana soo Te Naa gi ka Elisha umuoo mabesaku tuungu. Soo Te Naa ka Elisha ka wawaꞌa tookoo pehe uayidu Naaman mee naneadu mabesaku tuungu. Soo Te Naa ka umu wakwawaꞌa etzaga tunakaꞌoedyukudu sootuhikwu, gi mumme gi tutunakaꞌoedyukudu.”
Mu numu ka meeoo oo unakwe oo sutakuse yise ka nanesootuhi nobe-wikoo oo tayahoo. Yise oona wutaꞌne-matoo oo tzakakase ka oo batsowkwuse.
Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe mu tasegeyidoo meahoose mu namatsatsepooge, yise kokodyuka.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus yise ka Capernaum mee naneadu-wi petuga. Toge, oꞌno mu nanesootuhigonno tabeno umu-baa petuga. Soo Te Pabeꞌe petugase, ka besowsoo ka Te Naa-witu mu numu tunedyooewunu.
Mu numu yise oo nesookwugaꞌe oosoo tubetse besa ka Te Naa unnepu-witu wahamena, “Yow tookwa esoo Te Pabeꞌe,” meeꞌe mu numu.
Sumuꞌyoo nana tsoapayidu oe. Soo tsoapa waꞌagena ewa unnewunu ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netammabodote.
“Uda! U haaꞌa kadoo e mayugwekwu? U sakwa ne tsasoopedya. Nu u sopedakwatoo, u Jesus, ka Noꞌoko Hemma Manumudoopu Besaa Tooaꞌa.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tsoapa nematzagakwunihoo meeoo oo netamma, “Gi unnepana, managaꞌyoona tzebooegea.” Soo tsoapa ka oo-nagaꞌyoona tsebooegease, ka nana wunapowkase sapa oosoo gi namanayaha.
Mu numu yise mee nanaꞌunnegonno, “Uuneꞌyoo! Tamme haꞌyoo gi hannanoꞌo besa mownnekoo poohabe poonnedu. Esoo Te Pabeꞌe puu ka tsoapa nematzagakwunihoo, sukwe yadooase sapa.”
Mu numu otuoo yise ka Te Pabeꞌe manipu poonnedu nanatuukwekooha ka saaꞌa yise ewaꞌyoo numu otuoo nanakwingadu oo nanatuukwegonno.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu nanesootuhimakwuse oeꞌyoona mease, ka Simon Peter-baa petuga. Soo Simon Peter yahe peawabe unu tuoeyaꞌena oo tookoo unu udutuna onahoo hape. Umu o nobe-witu ka Te Pabeꞌe oetu tuukweꞌe.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise oo-baa wunu petugase meeoo oo netamma, “U mooasoo besa mani.” Oosoo peawabe yise yotseoose, mu tugoomahanekuhoose, mu tuka tuunguhoo.
Oogowsoo yongona tu taba egowse, mu numu nanaꞌatakoosoo tutuꞌoe-gaꞌyoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa natzato petudyakwe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise umu-ma pooha matugumena mu mabesakumena

mu tsoapagoedu nokosoo. Mu tsoapa yise mee unnegayakwe, “U yaahoo ka Noꞌokosoo Hemma Manumudoopu Tooaꞌa.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu tsoapa tayayakwe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe gi ooka mu wahakwuna petzape, ka pumme mu sopedakwatoona. Ka mu tsoapa tsebooegeayakwe, mu tsoapagoedu numu yise besa maniyakwe.
Oogow mooꞌa awamooa soo Te Pabeꞌe yise oona numu-wanatoo mea. Saaꞌa mu numu yise oo watena, oo mayuse, oo tooꞌe nabaaꞌyoo tuungu.

Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu sukwe netamma, “Mu numu manatooe nonobe-gakoo, nu ka Te Naa tamme mabetseakwuna-witu mu tuukwekwu. Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha meeoo e netamma, ‘Manatutooe mu numu ekow nanesootuhibu tunedyooe.’ “
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise oona ka teepu Judea mee naneadu-wiꞌyoona ka mu numu tuukweꞌemena, yise mu nanesootuhi-wiꞌyoona tuwazoo.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka banunadu Gennesaret mee naneadu-kumaba wununa, ewow numu Te Naa unnepu tunedyooedyakwe. Ewaꞌyoo numu oo naꞌoonnakwi manepunne ka Te Naa unnepu soonakana.
Wahaꞌyoo sake o. Mooasoo soo mu tuukwidu Simon mee naneadu-no ka sake-wiꞌyoona tsebooese, ka puma tu tuukwina tzabazagadyakwe.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Simon sake-wi tsebooese, oo natzemange tuungu sagwane ka bakumanatoo. Oꞌno oweoo ka sake-wi soo Te Pabeꞌe katuna ka Te Naa unnepu numu tunedyooe.
Ka mu numu yadooemakwuse, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Simon mee netamma, “U sakwa ma tookapu baa-ga-witoo natsenooyooe ka puma mu tuukwina ka baa-witoo tzasawekuse, mama tuukwina tutzakadukooha.”
Soo Simon yise ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “Nu u nakabetseakwu tooe mooasoo numme togawano tooꞌe tuukwise sapa gi hemma tzakuꞌa.” Umu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma-kwitu wukwihoo.
Tubetse ewaꞌyoo pakwe yise natzakadu, soo puma mu tuukwina yise natakebuꞌe.
Umu ka mu tu pupuaꞌamu James noko John

Soo Simon Peter ka tu pupuaꞌamu James, John-no yise, oꞌno oo pudu sopedakwatoo ka Te Pabeꞌe unu pooha-gana, umu ka ewow pakwe mu tuukwina poonnese, soo Peter yise ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo nanesootuhikooha mee unnewunu, “Uda! Nu ooosapa tumaꞌemukwanummedu. U tubetse besaꞌyoo. U sakwa gi nu tzageꞌe manepana.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo ka Peter netamma, “Gi nu-ma suipana. Wunaꞌme u pakwe-ganummedu. U sakwa nu-ma tsabegase ka Te Naa besa unnepu mu numu tunedyooemea e tummatzina.”
Umu yise noꞌyoona ka bakumana petuse, Simon, James yise John noꞌoko ka tu hemma matusookwunise ka Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu mane.

Umu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe-no meana ka numu nogadu-kwi petuga. Sumuꞌyoo nana unu tookoo uayidu onona, ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petugase oo nanetsagwayina meeoo oo netamma, “U sakwa e mabesaku ka meeoo soonammena.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus yise oo-ma pooha matuguse mee oo netamma, “Nu u mabesakukwu, u besa manekwu.

Ka besa manese. U sakwa ka mu Jew numu nanesootuhiwabe natzapoonnekuse ka Moses tamme tunetamma-kwaꞌnesoo ka Te Naa tuwuniku ka te tookoo uayina namabesaku-kwitoo. Gi saaꞌa mu numu tuukwepana ka ume e mabesakuna.”
Ooonneꞌyoopana soo nana ka besa manise ka mu numu tuukwekooha ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu, yise ewaꞌyoo numu tuoegoedu oo takoona petu ka besa tu manekwuna sookwina.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise kwingaꞌa numu-wanatoo mease nanesootuhaꞌe.

Saaꞌa soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu numu tunedyooedyina ka Te Naa-witu. Susumudu naana ka mu numu Jew tumayohona numu tunedyooedu, susumudu yise mu nanesootuhibu tunedyooedu-nagatu Pharisee mee nananeadu mana kwingaꞌakwitu
Huuꞌyoo nanana kapa-wikoo ka gi yutsungadu numu tzakwuhuna petuga. Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo napoohameapana,
ewow numu ka nobe-wikoo umu gi hownnekoo oe tzoonooꞌa. Umu yise ka nobe-kooba tupoyase oo-koobatu tzatawagase ka kapa-nokosoo tobongo ka tuoeyaedu tzakweku ka Te Pabeꞌe-kobenatoo.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe oo sopedakwatoo ka mu nanana puu-ma unu nasoonatzaꞌe yise ka gi yutsungadu nana meeoo netamma, “E puaꞌa, nu ka u tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwakwu.”

Umu Jew numu tunedyooedu mu Pharisee mee nananeadu-no o aatadu mee tusooyugwe manepunne, “Esoo hayoo suda naꞌunnedu unni. Masoogina Te Naa mee nasooyugwe. Soo Te Naa suuꞌmu ka numu tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwa.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise oo sopedakwatoo ka mu tusooyugwena, yise meeoo mu netamma, “Mu gi e nakaꞌoedyukute ka mu numu tumaꞌemukwana e soomuꞌwa pana mu oo poonnekwu ka eka nana e mabesakuse.

Mu yise oo sopedakwadookwu nu eka teepu-kooba ookow poohabe hee-gaꞌyoo ka mu numu tumaꞌemukwana e soomuꞌwana.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka nana gi yotsungadu meeoo netamma, “Wunuoose ka u kapa nobe-witoo tzakwuka.”
Soo nana ka tu kapa tzakwuhuna nobe-kwitoosoo meana, ooosapa meeoo unnenoꞌo, “Te Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo.”
Noꞌyoona mu numu oo sooꞌoedyukuna meeoo punnoꞌo, “Te Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo. Numme nanabesa namanedu yaa tabeno poonne. Numme gi hannanoꞌo yooonnekoo poohabe poonnedu.”

Sumuꞌyoo nana Levi mee naneadu ka oonow putoogoo numu tzoonooadyakwe mu numu tunekwina tumasumudoodyakwe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka oetoo meana ka o oo katu oo poonnese yise meeoo oo netamma, “U sakwa umu-no nu-no manenumme.”
Soo Levi yotseoose, oo-no tzabeka.
Ka Levi nobe-wiꞌyoona paba natabetuka yise saaꞌa soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Levi nobe-witoo oo-no mea mu Pharisee mee nananeadu tuka. Ewaꞌyoo numu tumasumudoodu o, tumaꞌemukwadu mee nananeadu umu-no tuka.
Mu Pharisee ka Te Pabeꞌe umu-no tuka oo poonnese, ka umu oo nakatzimodu nesootzemana meeoo mu netamma, “Umu gi toge manakwe umu-no tuka, umu tumasumudoodu mu nanumu suda dyugwedu.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka oo unnena nakase, meeoo yise unakwe, “Nu yaa ka teepu-kooba namanumudoopu ka mu tumaꞌemukwadu Te Naa-witu tuukwekwuse. Ka mumme mooasoo besa nasooyugwedu numu nu gi hownnekoo mu tummatzi-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
Umu Pharisee nanesootuhidu naana yise ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “Umu John nakatzimodu ka numme Pharisee-no gi tukapana nanesootuhiyakwe. How yise umu ume nakatzimodu gi punnoꞌo ooosoo tumatugu?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu nanekwegea, “Nu togesoo umu-noꞌyoona, pudu nodukwadoodu-kwaꞌne umu puu ka nananoꞌyoona besa sokwama.
Pana pudusoo nu gi umu-noꞌyookwu, oꞌno yise saaꞌa umu e nakatzimodu gi tukapana nanesootuhikwu.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu tunedyooena mee tuwazoo mu tuukwe, “Ka oohoo a manepunne mu gi hownnekoo ka mu numu pudu tumayohope noꞌoko ka mumme putoogoo mooa tumayohope-noko mayua-waꞌneꞌyoo. U pudu wanapu ka mooa wanapu-ma dotsanase, oosoo gi toge tubuakwu.
Mu gi hownnekoo eka mumme pudu natunetammakuna ka mooa tumayohope noko mayua-waꞌneꞌyoo.

Pana mu numu ka mumme e pudu tumayoho tuunguna gi nakabetzape. Mu ka mummesoo mooa tumayohona soonoyugwena. Mu ka mooatupu atsa tutzaꞌemukwa baa hebedu numu-waꞌneꞌyoo. Oosoo puu gi pudu atsa tutzaꞌemukwa baa petzape oosoo meeoo, ‘Soo mooatupu atsa tutzaꞌemukwa baa besa kamma.’ “
Ka tu nanesootuhi tabeba-wi soo Te Pabeꞌe yise umu pumme nakatzimodu-no oona tubewabe-too meana unu tseagoena ka tumasuape-matu mabokamena oo mahangena o tukamena esoo mooasoo natumayohodu.

Mu Jew numu nananesootuhidu, Pharisee mee nananeadu, mu poonnena, ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “Umu u nakatzimodu ka te Jew tumayohona gi heesoobedya. Umu ka tumasuape mahanegena oo tukana esoo nanesootuhi tabeba gi numu hemma how yukwenoꞌo. Esoo tamme Jew numu mooa tumayohona, oꞌno nanesootuhi tabeno gi numu hemma how yukwenoꞌo ꞌyoo manakwe.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise punnoꞌo meeoo mu netamma, “Mu sakwa uga oo nea ka oꞌnosoo soo besa tamme-kooba katukwudu, David mee naneadu, punnoꞌo ka te Jew tumayohona takopapu tu pupauꞌamu-no ka tseagoena.
Soo David ka Te Naa nanesootuhi nobe-wi petugase, ka tu pupuaꞌamu-no ka pooha tukaba tuka, umu nanesootuibu numu tunedyooedu suuꞌmu tukana. Oosoo ka Te Naa-nakwana gi hownneꞌyoo.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu netamma, “Nu yow Mu Pabeꞌe. Nu noꞌoko hemma ka mu nanesootuhi tabeba-wi mu nemadabuekwu.”
Ka tu nanesootuhi tabeno soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu nanesootuhidu-baa petugase Te Naa-witu mu numu tunedyooꞌe. Sumuꞌyoo nana tumadinakwatu tu mi pasatopoꞌnepu gi mayutsungadu oe numu-no.

Umu Pharisee nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu, mu Jew nanana Pharisee mee naneadu-no ka Te Pabeꞌe besa eyaꞌepunne oo sookwahaꞌyoo howga saaꞌa ekow nana oo mabesakudooa. Oꞌno tabeno gi hemma how nuugwenoꞌo, ooka saaꞌa how kadooꞌoo oo mayugwekudooa.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe oo tusooyugwena sopedakwatoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo ka nana netamma, “Yaatoo kemma.” Soo nana ka Te Pabeꞌe-baatoo meahoo.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka umu pumme poonnepunnedu meeoo netamma, “Ka pabow tabeba-wi gi hemma how nuugweno, oꞌno haaꞌa sutaꞌyoo? Yise oꞌno tabeba haaꞌa mu gi haꞌyoo oo sooyukwe oꞌno haaꞌa mu gi namabesakupana gi hownneꞌyoo? Oꞌno haaꞌa ka pabow mu tabebanoꞌo, yaꞌepana gi hownneꞌyoo?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu poohwise yise ka gi mayutsungadu meeoo netamma, “Matuhe.” Oosoo yise matuhe oo mi namabesakuhoopu.
Umu tunesootzemadu sutaꞌa yise nanano mee tunehane, “Tamme sakwa ka Jesus batsa.” meeꞌe.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise oona giba-matoo mease togawano nanesootuhaꞌe ka Te Naa-matoo.
Ookow mooa awamooa soo Te Pabeꞌe ka umu pumme nakatzimodu namatoo baꞌe. Sumu manoꞌyoona wahamatsebooekudu (12) umu-nagatu netutzea tu yadooawabe manekwudu. Umu mee nananeꞌa:
Simon, soo Te Pabeꞌe Peter mee ookow neaꞌa; Andrew, Peter pabeꞌe, James, John, Philip, Bartholomew,
Matthew, James, oo naa Alphaeus mee naneadu, Simon, numu-no watze nagoedu mee tuwazoo naneadu, Judas ookow naa James mee naneꞌa,
Soo Judas punnoꞌo saaꞌa ka tukwutumadu ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo nemanekukwudu.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu pumme nakatzimodu-no ka giba-maꞌyoona wuekese, oo tookanakwa yamoso-wi petugonnohoo. Ewaꞌyoo numu tooe hanoꞌyoona tooe petudyipunne ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa
Susumudu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakahooyapunnedu, susumudu tuoegoedu natzatogedu, mu tsoapagoedu punnoꞌo oo-baa natzatodu.
Noꞌyoona mu tuoegoedu natzatodu ka Te Pabeꞌe tzamadyakwe ka oo pooha noꞌoko numu mabesakute.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka umu pumme nakatzimodu meeoo netamma, “Tooe tamme ka menoꞌo tutuha manepana nasootuhaꞌe, ka saaꞌa soo Te Naa yise unusoo te mabetseakwu.
Tooe tamme ka menoꞌo tseagoepana nasootuhaꞌe, saaꞌa tamme ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona gi tutuugekwu. Tooe tamme yaano ka suda sokwamapana nasootuhikwu, saaꞌa tamme Te Naa-baaꞌyoona besa sokwamakwu.
Mu ka mu numu mumme gi petzabena gi too mu-no mu napuaꞌana, nanasuda nu-koobatoo mumme tu netamma sapa gi suda sokwamapana mu besa nasootuhikwu.

Mu sakwa gi oo nasoomenakwapana tooe how mumme tu yugwe, mumme suda tu netamma sapa. Mu ka saaꞌa Te Naa-baa petugase unusoo besa nasootuhikwu. Mu nanamooatupu puu mu Te Naa yadooawabe nanasuda matugu pana, menoꞌo yise umu ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona besa sokwama, ka besa pumme tu sootuhise.

Pana soo tooe haga tooe ka menoꞌo besa manepunne ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona ookowsoo nasootamana, gi haꞌyoo sokwamana, gi hemma toge soobedyana, umuoo gi nasootuhikwu, ka mooasoo umu yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona besa sokwamana.
Mu ka menoꞌo mu hee-gana paba sooyugwena oosoosoo mu takonepunnena mu gi hownnekoo nasootuhaꞌe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Mu ka mu numu besa mu nemadabuena petukuna, ka saaꞌa mu gi nasootuhikwu. Mu numu puu ooosapa ka mu yaahoo Te Naa yadooawabe meeꞌe mumme tu nemooaka mu besa mu sooyugwe.
Pana nu mu tuukwekwu tamme sakwa te wohomu besa soobedya yise besa mu matugu tooe umu gi te soobedya sapa.
Ka tamme mu nekusegea, tamme sakwa ooosapa nanesootuhi besow umutoo nekwina.

Nu mu tuukwekwu tooe suda tamme tu matugu sapa, tamme sakwa gi umu-no nagoepana. Ka sumunakwatu te soba namatakeꞌehoose, tamme sakwa oo sukwe tutzomunaku. Oꞌno oosoo ka sumunakwatu matakeꞌyookwu tuwazoo. Tamme sakwa ka numu nakutzikuna gi hownnekoo oo tumanagakuna, oosoo ka te kwasu kwuse sapa, oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo tamme te wunagapu oo gease tuwazoo. Ka mu numu hemma tamme mu natuungu, tamme sakwa mu gea.
Soo Te Naa gi besaꞌyoo numu mee te neakwu tamme ka sukwe numu tamme besa soobedyadu besa soobedyana. Mu sutaꞌyoo numu puu besa nanasoobedya.
Tamme gi besa manakwe ka besa te matugudu suuꞌmu besa matuguna. Mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu pana besa mesoo nanamatugu. Tamme sakwa noꞌobatusoo numu unu soobedya ka Te Naa-waꞌneꞌyoona.
Tamme sakwa ka mu numu tamme nagutzikudu suuꞌmu tummatzina, tamme tookwa gi besa manakwe. Mu sutaꞌyoo numu puu nanatummatzaꞌe ka punowsoo oo namakodyukwuna sopedakwatoona.
Tamme sakwa te wohomu besa soobedya, oꞌno soo Te Naa besa te sootuhikwu. Tamme ka Te Naa tamme-koobatu-waꞌneꞌyookwu. Soo Te Naa numu sootuhi tooe gi besa mu tumatugu sapa.
Soo Te Naa puu tutuha numu soobedya, tamme sakwa punnoꞌo ooosoo.
Gi tunesootzemapana, gi tuwazoo suda numu netammapana, oꞌno soo Te Naa besa te sooyugwekwu. Tamme ka mu numu suda tamme matukupu soomuꞌwase, soo Te Naa punnoꞌo te tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwakwu.
Tamme ka mu numu tummatzina, soo Te Naa ookow punowsoo te makodyukukwu.

Tamme sakwa unu besa a nakaduguse, oꞌno tamme kukummaꞌakoosoo mesoo tunedyooꞌe. Tamme ka gi hemma nakasopedakwadoopana numu tooꞌe tunedyooena, soo numu puu gi tubootabuena kummaꞌakoosoo gi tubootabuedu numu tzakadu-kwaꞌneꞌyookwu. Umu nanosoo a tawaga-kwitoo sawehookwu.
Soo numu tunedyooedu ka natunedyooedu ooonakwasoo tusopedakwatoo. Pana tamme ka noꞌokosoo hemma natunedyooese, tamme ka numu tunedyooedu-kwaꞌnesoo tusopedakwadookwu.

Tamme sakwa gi te puaꞌa nesagwikupana, ka sagwane oo tumaꞌemukwase. Tamme sumuna ookow ooonakwasoo tumaꞌemukwa. Hownnekoo yise mu ka mu puaꞌa pooe-wikoo tuutsekoo hemma mesoo poonne ka mummesoo pooe-wi hemma egease sapa. Mooeꞌugasoo mu sakwa mummesoo pooe-witu tzatsebooase, oꞌno mu yaatu poonnena, ka mu puaꞌa mesoo tummatzaꞌe. Ooosoo sakwa mu ka suda mu tumatuguna yugwese, oꞌno mu ka mu pupuaꞌamu mesoo tummatzaꞌe.
Noꞌobatusoo tumasuape tu tupooe-kwaꞌnekoosoo suakute. Mu tumasuape ka besaꞌhoo a pooe-nakwana suaketu besaꞌyoo. Mu sutakoo tsaꞌabu pooe-nakwana suaketu-kwaꞌne, mu punnoꞌo gi besaꞌyoo.
Noꞌobatusoo tumasuape ka pummesoo pooe-kwaꞌnesoo suaketu.
Soo numu ka tumasuape-kwaꞌnesoo tu mane-makoo nasopedakwadookwu, tooe haꞌoo soo numu ka besaꞌyoona tooetoo sutaꞌyoona.
Mu ka ‘Jesus E Pabeꞌe,’ meeꞌe natubangana mu sakwa e nakabetseayi.
Ka besa e nakatumayohokudu nu tuukwekwu.
Tupe-kooba besa nobe-toodu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo, oosoo puu ohobu gi namanabue oo matabue. Tooe baa unu hooꞌoo ka teepu putoohakwitu patokwanawunu sapa gi anoꞌa, oosoo ka besa namadabuepuna.
Mu numu ka e unnena nakapana gi oo nakatumayohodu, ka nana tu nobe teepu-kooba oo sagwa matabuedu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Soo oo nobe-toona ka baa unu hoo petuse kadooꞌoo o patadyoomedikuoo.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu ewow numu tunedyooemakwuse, oeꞌyoona mease, ka Capernaum mee naneadu-wisoo kodyu petuga.
Soo mu tukwutumadu moohedu wawaꞌa gi Jew numu, sumuoo ka pumme tummatzidu-matu unu soobedya. Oosoo oo tummatzidu unu tuoeyina, yaꞌegaꞌa.
Soo wawaꞌa gi Jew nana ka Te Pabeꞌe onow pupaa petugana nakase, mu Jew numu moohedu Te Pabeꞌe-matoo taya, oo bina ka pumme tummatzidu oo mabesaku tuunguna.
Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petugase, mee oo netamma, “U sakwa eka wawaꞌa nana tummatzi.
Soo wawaꞌa nana tamme Jew numu unu soobedyana, ka te nanesootuhi nobe te matabuekupu.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise umu-no mease ka wawaꞌa nana nobe tzageꞌe mu manigase, soo tukwutumadu moohedu tu pupuaꞌamu ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo taya mee oo netammana, “Nu sukwe wawaꞌa. Mu Jew numu numme wakwawaꞌa nuutumooedu. U sakwa gi ne nobe-kwi egeapana, gi hownneꞌyoo.
Nu gi maawaꞌneꞌyoona, gi u-matoo mea-waꞌneꞌyoo. Nu u sooꞌoedyukute u sukwe yadooahoose, oosoo e tummatzidu besa manekwu.
Nu punnoꞌo ka numu nanemadunagadyina sopedakwadoo. Nu puu ka nu-koobatusoo unnetoosoo manakwe.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka meeoo naꞌunnedu nakase, mee ka ewow numu netamma, “Yow yise soo nana tubetse tunakaꞌoedyukudu. Tooe gi tamme Jew numu-matu pana unu tunakaꞌoedyukute.”
Ka tukwutumadu moohedu pupuaꞌamu ka oo nobe-witoo kodyukase, soo oo tummatzidu mooasoo besa manepu.
Oogow moooꞌa soo Te Pabeꞌe umu tunakatzimodu-no yise ewaꞌyoo numu punnoꞌo umu-no ka Nain mee naneadu-kwitoo kemmana.
Sumuꞌyoo tooebetse ka mogoꞌne penebe dooa yaꞌe. Soo oo pea oꞌnosoo tu kooma yaꞌekupu. Ewaꞌyoo umu oo pea nonopuaꞌamu oo-no mea ka tu tooa oo nomatugugakwuse.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu wegease
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka yaꞌedu tzamahoose, mu oo tzagwuudu yise konno pebuꞌahoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka yaꞌepu tooebetseꞌe mee netamma, “Yotsehoo.”
Soo tooebetse katuhoose yadooakooha. Soo Te Pabeꞌe punowsoo nobe-kwitoo mu taya.
Mu numu o konnopunnedu meeoo nanaꞌunnekooha, “Uune! Esoo togesapa unu pooha-gaꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa te sootuhina, eka unu pooha-gakoo tu yadooawabe, tamme-matoo tayapu.”
Mu numu yise oo nanatuukwekooha ka Te Pabeꞌe manipu, oꞌno yise noꞌyoona numu ka teepu-koobakwitu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu naka, mu numu mana tzatzageꞌe-witu teepu-gaꞌyoo tooe.
Mu John pupuaꞌamu ka John tuukweꞌe noꞌoko ka Te Pabeꞌe mane-kwitu.
Waahoo pumme pupuaꞌamu-matu soo John taya ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo. Soo John mee mu netamma, “Mu sakwa ka Jesus tutubenga, ‘U haaꞌa yow Te Pabeꞌe, pute soo Te Pabeꞌe saaꞌa petukwu?’ “
Ka oo-baa pepetugase, soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌobatusoo tuoegoedu numu mabesakute: tsoapagoedu, gi tubootabuedu, tooe hownnekoo tooe tuoebu.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu nanekwegea, “Mu sakwa ka John tuukwe ka mu poonnena, mu nakana tuwazoo: ka umu gi tubootabuedu numu tubootabue manese, mu toyomodu numu besa momona, mu gi nakatawagadu numu nakatage mu manese, mu numu uagoedu besa manese, mu tuipu numu namayodase, yise ka mu tutuha manedu numu ka Te Naa besa unnepu mu tuukwe.
Pana mu ka ooosapa e nakaꞌoedyukuna, gi nu-ma nasookwina, mu nasootuhikwu.”
Ka mu John pupuaꞌamu kokodyukase, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka John-witu mu numu tuukweꞌe, “Ka oꞌnosoo nuga-kobenasoo, ka oona giba-ma umu uga ka John-baa petugayakwe. Soo John gi waha-tamme tusooyugwedu nana.

Soo John gi nanenagadu namasooꞌa. Pana umu gi oo-makoo oo-matoo meꞌa. Mu ka John nakapunnekwuse oo-baa petuga, soo John ka Te Naa yadooawabena. Soo John ka umu oꞌnosoo Te Naa yadooawabe ooonakwa besaꞌyoo.

Soo John ka Te Naa poenaꞌewabe. Oꞌnosoo ka John-witu nabotugu soo Te Naa mee e netamma, ‘U-kobenasoo ka teepu-koobatoo nu e poenaꞌewabe tayakwu, ka mu numu ume petukwu-kwitu oo tunesootabue tuunguna.’
Soo John noꞌoko numu ooonakwa besaꞌyoo. Pana saaꞌa noꞌyoona numu nu-toohatu, ka John ooonakwasoo nasootuhikwu.”
Ka mu numu mu tumaꞌemukwadu mee nananeadu-no ka Te Pabeꞌe John besa oo nemadabuꞌe, umu besa sokwama ka baa-wi pumme oo matzakadyakwe. Umu meeoo, “Soo Te Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo.”
Pana umu nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu gi nanekwahana, ka John baa-wi namatzaka tuunguna, ka Te Naa pumme netamma-kwaꞌne.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo, “Nu mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-kwitu mu tuukwekwu.

Mu mu doodooake-waꞌne gi besa mu pupuaꞌamu-no tuateꞌa. Mu pupuaꞌamu sumuna mee unakwe, ‘Numme mu tunekwukukwu, mu saaꞌa nugagonno. Pana mu gi nuka.’ Mu pupuaꞌamu yise mee tuwazoo mu netammakwu, ‘Numme ka suda mu sokwama, mu-no sagwikwu, pana mu gi sagwaꞌe.’
Soo John ka petuse, gi tuka, gi tuwazoo atsa baa hepe. ‘Soo John numu sukwe poohadu,’ mee mu.
Ka nuka mu-baa petugase, nu tukana, hepe, mu yise e nesootzema mee unnena, ‘Oosoo nana ewa tukana, sukwe baayina, umu tumaꞌemukwadu pupuaꞌamu-gana.’
Umu sokwamadu numu ka Te Naa unnepu nakasopedakwadoona, ‘Besaꞌyoo,’ mee unnekwu.”

Soo nana Simon mee naneadu ka umu Pharisee mee nananeadu nanesootuhidu-nagatu, ka Te Pabeꞌe-nabatoo baꞌe, oo tuka tuunguna. Sumuꞌyoo otuoosoo mogoꞌne gi toge tumatugudu sapa tooe ka Te Pabeꞌe ka Simon nobe-wiꞌyoona ka mu ewa tukana naka. Soo mogoꞌne yise besa kwanadu nakwanana tupe-ma namadabuepu osa-wi nakedadu hanena, ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petuhooga. Soo Te Pabeꞌe o sekedabena tukadape, soo mogoꞌne oo pepa wunuhoo petu.

Soo mogoꞌne yise yagana, ka oo kuku-koobatoo yaga pasawehoo. Yise meatzedose tu tzopuhu-ma oo mabasakuse, oo kuku mootuhikwunaꞌe, yise ka besa kwanadu nakwanaꞌa oo kuku-koobatoo totsakwatese oo mawoꞌnge.

Soo Simon ka mogoꞌne yoo ka Te Pabeꞌe sootuꞌnagana poonnena oo sootuꞌadyina meeoo oo soobedya, “Esoo Jesus tookwa gi ka Te Naa pooha hee-gaꞌyoo. Masoo sakwa ka Te Naa pooha uga hee-gana soo oo pooha oo sopedakwadookwu, ka mogoꞌne sutaꞌyoona, oꞌno masoo sakwa uga gi ka mogoꞌne natzamakupana.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka Simon soonammena pooha sopedakwadoo, meeoo yise oo netamma, “Nu besasoo u tuukwekwu.” Soo Simon yise ka Te Pabeꞌe mee netamma, “Haꞌyoo u e tuukwekwu?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe oo nanekwegease meeoo, “Wahaꞌyoo numu puu ka sumuoo numu nakutzikute. Sumuꞌyoo ewatseꞌe oo nakutzikute, sumuꞌyoo punnoꞌo huutseꞌe oo nakutzikute.
Umu wahaꞌyoo yise gi hownnekoo oo tumanagakute. Soo mu kutzidu yise mee mu netamma, ‘Nu ka nuka mu nakutzikuna soomuꞌwakwu.’ Hanotu umu-matu yise unu oo soobedyakwu ka besa pumme oo sootunagase?”
Soo Simon yise ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo nanekwegeaꞌa, “Soo ewa oo nakutzikudu, mee tuwa nu.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mogoꞌne-tamme nakwumunase, ka Simon meeoo netamma, “Nu ka u-baa petuse, u puu gi ka pukwi e tabatsagakwuna e bawununakute. Esoo mogoꞌne puu ka e kuku tu yagapu-ma pakedyase yise ka tu tzopuhu-ma a mabasakute.
Esoo mogoꞌne puu ka besa nu-matoo soonammese e kuku mootuhikwunaꞌe, u puu gi e mootuhi ka haꞌoo besa nu-matoo soonammena ka e petuse.
Ka besa kwanadu nakwanana e kuku-koobatoo totsakwate e kuku onokoo mawonge u puu yoohoo-ma sapa gi e tzopuhu mahane.

Tooe masoo mogoꞌne ewa tumaꞌemukwakepana, nu yise ka oo tumaꞌemukwapu soomuꞌwakwu, masoo ka unu e soobedyana. Nu ka mu numu tumaꞌemukwadu tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwa. Susumudu numu ka sagwane tumaꞌemukwana mee nasooyugwena gi unu e heesoobedya.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mogoꞌne meeoo netamma, “Nu noꞌoko ume tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwa.”
“Haga esoo numu tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwadu mee naneyugwedu?” mee mu numu tuka aatadu nanatubengu.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mogoꞌne meeoo netamma, “U ka nuka nakaꞌoedyukuse u namagwetzoikwu. Besa sapa manena mea.”
Ka saaꞌa yise soo Te Pabeꞌe mana tooe hanotoo tooe ka teepu tanamooanumme ka Te Naa besa unnepu mu numu tunedyooena, mu oo nakatzimodu ooosapa oo-nosoo;
mu momokoꞌne punnoꞌo umu-no. Sumuꞌyoo mogoꞌne Mary Magdalene mee naneadu oo-nagakoo soo Te Pabeꞌe uga natakwatsukwuhoo (7) tsoapa tayakwunipu
yise ewaꞌyoosoo momokoꞌne
Ewaꞌyoo numu manaꞌyoona tooe ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petudyakwe yise soo Te Pabeꞌe mu yadooena, mu natugwengayakwe mee unnena,

“Soo nana tumasua-ga. Yise susumudu soo oo pooe tumasua-matu ka a nadapodo-witoo sawe mea, yise ka puuwana mu kwakwape mu numu umu-koobakwi mona mu tatuikuna umu gi naꞌa. Mu hootsebaꞌa yise punnoꞌo mu sukwe sooꞌa.
Susumudu soo oo pooe punnoꞌo unu tupe-gakwitoo sawena, yabe naahookese, yise yabe tagwazuoo ka gi baa-gana.
Susumudu a pooe punnoꞌo tsaabu-nagatoo sawehoose, soo tsaꞌabu yise umu-no naana mu tatzatsebooahoo.
Susumudu besow teepu-koobatoo sawehoose, yise besa naꞌa, nanaꞌewa pooedooꞌa. Mu sakwa besa e nakapunne.”
Umu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu yise oo tubenga, “Haꞌyoo oosoo unakwe?”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee unakwe, “Nu ka Te Naa tuwatzetuguna mu tuukwekwu, mu mooasoo oo nakasopedakwadoona nasootuhipu; pana susumudu numu gisoo ookow nasootuhaꞌe, ooonneꞌyoona nu meeoo mu natuugwengakute. Tooe mu numu e poonnepana, umu gi e posopedakwadoo. Tooe umu e nakapana, gi e nakasopedakwatoo.
Soo mu nanatugwengana meeoo, soo a pooe ka Te Naa yadooa-kwaꞌneꞌyoo.
Susumudu ka Te Naa besa unnepu nakapana gi oo ꞌoedyukuna, soo gi togeꞌyoo yise mu tzaꞌemukwana, mu natzaꞌemukwadu yise ka po-koobatoo saweoopu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo, yise gi namagwetzoi.
Susumudu ka tupe-nagatoo sawehoopu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. A pooe besa oo-matoo soonamme, tamme yise tuwazoo gi tunaga-kwaꞌneꞌyoo ka nanewohonena, tamme yabesoo tunakaꞌoedyukumakwu.
Tamme ka a pooe mu tsaꞌabu-naga naadu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo, susumudu ka Te Naa unnepu nakase, ewa tu hee toowana petukute, yise gi tunakaꞌoedyukute.
Pana tamme ka a pooe besow teepuna namasuadu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme yise ka besow naꞌunnedu nakatuguna oo nakaꞌoedyukute.
Tamme ka tugootabuagunoo kootabuakuse hekooba oo wunakwu numu ooka poonne-kwi. Gi puu tamme hee-tooha oo watzetugu-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Tugootabuagunoo-waꞌnesoo sakwa tamme mu numu ka Te Naa unnena tuukwe. Tamme sakwa ka ooka mu nakaꞌoedyukukwuna petsabena gi mu numu-makoo oo nekwatzetugu.
Tamme sakwa ka Te Naa unnena besakoo nakowꞌya. Tamme ka sagwane oo nakasopedakwadoona saaꞌa unusoo oo nakasopedakwadoo manepetugakwu. Tamme yise ka gi oo nakatuguna noꞌoko te natuukwepu soomuꞌwakwu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe pea oo wangaꞌamu-no petugonnose yise gi hownnekoo oo tzageꞌe mane-waꞌneꞌyoo ka mu numu tubetse ewow.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo natuukweꞌe, “U pea-no u wangaꞌamu-no mabe puuwana konnopunne, u baꞌe.”

Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe mu numu meeoo netamma, “Umu sakwa tooe tuutooepunne, soo Te Naa tunetamma noko hemma ooonakwatu. Nu saaꞌa ka tunemamakwuoose, oꞌno saaꞌa nu mu tuukwedooa. Ka mu Te Naa unnepu nakabetseadu nu tubetse nanumu-gaꞌyoo.”
Sumu tabeno soo Te Pabeꞌe umu pumme nakatzimodu-no sake-wi kuaka. “Tamme sakwa ooonakwatoo ka banunadu natsemangega,” mee soo Te Pabeꞌe mu netamma.
Ka togesoo mu meꞌa soo Te Pabeꞌe uwehooka. Unu hukwabetu. Soo sake bakaanogaꞌa umu sumuna patatsopedihookwu.

Umu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu unu suihoose, oo netupoonne, mee oo netammana, “Tamme batatuihookwu.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise tupoonnese, ka hukwapa meeoo netamma, “Gi hukwapana,” ka baa tuwazoo meeoo, “Gi yutsungapana.” Umu yise gi yutsungahoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise umu pumme nakatzimodu nesagwikute,
“Mu sakwa uga e nakaꞌoedyuku.” Umu yise meeoo, “Uune! Yow esoo Te Pabeꞌe, unu pooha-gaꞌyoo. Soo hukwapa ka baa-no a nakabetseꞌa.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu tu nakatzimodu-no yise natsemangega, ka Galilee paꞌooenapa petuga, ka teepu Gerasenes mee naneadu-wi petu.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka oho bakumana petugase ka sake-wiꞌyoona tsebooese ka sumuoo nana tsoapayidu oo tapoegea. Wunaꞌme manekapu soo nana gi kwaseana nummenumme. Ka poꞌwoa-ma taage-wi mu numu nakoo-naga nobe-gaꞌyoo.

Mu tsoapa unu natzooe oo mayugwe. Mu numu wehepu namadabue-ma oo tooꞌe tzakunayipana oosoo oo mesoo wukaꞌakayina natzepooekuyakwe. Soo tsoapayidu nana Te Pabeꞌe poonnese oo-baa petuse, oo-kobena meatzedopetu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tsoapa oo-nagakoo tayakwunikwuse soo tsoapa yise ka Te Pabeꞌe mee netamma, “U sakwa e tsasoopedya. U Jesus, Noꞌoko Hemma Manumudoopu Tooaꞌa. U sakwa gi e wohonepana.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka tsoapa tubenga, “Haꞌyoo u naneꞌa?” Oosoo yise mee oo nanekwegea, “Ewaꞌyoo mee numme nananeꞌa, numme ka tubetse ewaꞌyoona.”
Umu tsotsoapa yise ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “Gi ka goso ooosapa nidabedu-witoo ne tayapana.”
Ewaꞌyoo hogu oona wutaꞌnedu pedakwana toꞌo. “U sakwa umuoo hogu-matoo ne tayase numme umu-naga manikwu,” mee mu tsotsoapa ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Muusoo tooꞌe.” Mu tsotsoapa yise ka mu hogu-naga mani. Mu hogu yise tatanomanegase ka pagadudu-wi padatuihoo.

Mu hogu tatogudu tatanomanegase ka oo hemma manina poonnese noꞌoko mu numu tuukweyimoꞌo. Mu numu ka ooka nakowse ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petugonno, soo nana ugasoo tsoapayidu besa manepu ka Te Pabeꞌe-kobena katu besa namasooapu-gana. Mu numu yise oo tu namanena nadugwengagonno.
Mu numu otuoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-ma nasoosuise oo taꞌya. Soo Te Pabeꞌe mease yise ka sake-wisoo tsebooe.
Soo nana ugasoo tsoapayidu ka Te Pabeꞌe-no tooꞌe nemeꞌa, pana soo Te Pabeꞌe mee oo netamma,
“U sakwa u nobe-kwitoo mease u nanumu tuukwe ka Te Naa ume mabesakuse.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise punowsoo natsemangega. Soo nana ka pumme tu mabesakuse ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu noꞌoko numu tuukweꞌe.
Ka Te Pabeꞌe kodyu petuse mu numu ewaꞌyoo besa sokwama.
Oona yise nana kemma, Jairus mee naneadu, mu nananesootuhidu nematugudu ka Te Pabeꞌe-kobena meatzedo petugase oo-matoo nanesootuhikooha yise tu nobe-witoo oo paꞌe.
Soo Jairus oo penebe padu pudu tsuadumu yaꞌegana. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise Jairus-no mea, mu numu mu takooꞌnamena.
Sumuꞌyoo mogoꞌne hoone tuoeyaꞌena sumumano wahamatsebooekudu (12) tommo petuga tooꞌe natzatona mu poopooha-gaꞌyoo mee naneyugwedu, gi besa oo mayugwe.
Oosoo mogoꞌne yise ka Te Pabeꞌe ooonakwi kemmahoose, ka oo kwasu pekwitu tzammahoo yise oosoo oo puuhana yooihoo.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo, “Haga oosoo e tzamahoo?” Ka noꞌoko umu numu ooka gi nesopedakwatoo, Peter yise meeoo, “Ne Pabeꞌe, ewaꞌyoo numu u naꞌoonakwi u takooꞌnagena!”
Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoosoo tuwow, “Haga e tzamahoo? Nu oo wuma ka e pooha tumabesakuhoose.”
Soo mogoꞌne yise ka Te Pabeꞌe pumme sopedakwatoose suꞌise, kwebebewunu, yise ka Te Pabeꞌe-kobena meatzedose oo nanekwahakute noꞌoko mu numu nakana, ka yabesoo besa tu manina.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee oo netamma, “U besa mani, ka e nakaꞌoedyukuna. Mow yise ka besa manese nummenumme.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe togesoo ka mogoꞌne yadooꞌadyakwe, soo nana ka Jairus nobe-wiꞌyoona kemmadu ka Jairus meeoo tuukwe petu, “U padu mooasoo yaꞌeoo. Gi ka Jesus u nobe-witoo bipana, nagutza saaꞌasoo.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe oo nakatzamaꞌyu ka Jairus meeoo oo tuukwewunu yise ka Jairus meeoo netamma, “Gi suda oo soonammekupana, e nakaꞌoedyuku, u padu besasoo manekwu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka Jairus-no nobe-witoo mea ka pepetugase gi haga tuwazoo oetoo nemeakute, mu Peter, James yise John suuꞌmu yise ka tsuatuma naanapuaꞌamu-no oe tzoonooahoo.
Umu numu oo naꞌoona-kwi manepunnena sakwigonno, soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu netamma, “Gi sakwipana; esoo tsuaꞌa gi yaꞌe, esoo tuusootabooekwu.”
Umu oo-maꞌyoona nanekoꞌe, ka oo sopedakwatoona ka tsuaꞌa yaꞌepu.
Pana Te Pabeꞌe oo mi-ma tzakaduse, yise meeoo oo netamma, “Yotseoo.”
Soo tsuaꞌa yise tuponnese, yotseoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka oo naanapuaꞌamu meeoo netamma, “Hemma ka tsuaꞌa manatu maka, esooga tzeayaꞌe.”
Soo tsuaꞌa naanapuaꞌamu oo pooꞌne pebuꞌahoo ka tu padu yotseoose. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Gi haka tuukwepana ka e manena.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka umu sumumanoꞌyoona wahamatsebooekudu (12) pumme nakatzimodu nesumuse, yise meeoo mu netamma, “Nu yise nanesootuhibu mu numu mu tunedyooe tayakwu. Mu pooha-gana tsoapa nematzakwunikwu, noko tuoegoedu mabesakukwu tuwazoo,
yise meadabena mu numu tuukwe, ‘Pudusoo soo Te Naa besa te nemadabuekwu.’ “
Soo Te Pabeꞌe tuwazoo meeoo mu netamma, “Gi mu hemma hanegapana, mu kwasu, gi hemma puma mu tumukwuna tuwazoo, yise gi nadukadu.
Ka sumuoo nobe-kwi petugase gi meapana mu sakwa ononasoo kummaꞌa-kwitoosoo meadooa.
Ka mu numu besa naꞌunnepu gi mu nakaꞌoedyukute, ka umu-baaꞌyoona meana, ka koosebu mu moko-makoo tataꞌneka. Ka ꞌyoo mu manena oo sopedakwadookwu umu suda manakwe ka gi mu nakapunnena.
Mu yise meana nanesootuhibu mu numu tunedyooena yise ka tuoegoedu mabesaku meaꞌa tuwazoo.”

Ewaꞌyoo mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe nesoobedyana, yise umu-matu meeoo, “Haꞌoogina masoo Elijah?” umu-matu meeoo. “Oosoo Jesus ka umu Te Naa oꞌnosoo tuukwewabe-kwaꞌneꞌyoo.” Mu Jew numu pabeꞌe Herod mee naneadu ka Jesus-witu nakase, yise meeoo, “Nu ka mu tukwutumadu ka John batsa tuungu. Oosoo John yise sumuna tuusootabuepu.” Soo Herod yise ka Te Pabeꞌe nepoonne.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu tunakatzimodu-no numu-wanatoo mea ka Bethsaida mee naneadu-tamme.
Mu numu ka mu meana nakase mu nageka. Oosoo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus yise besa soonammese ka Te Naa besa unnepu mu tunedyooꞌe ka mu tuoegoedu mabesakuna.
Ka tu taba ekowgase, mu wahamatsebooekudu (12) tunakatzimodu meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Soo yaatu numu kwingaꞌyoona, kadooꞌoo hee. U sakwa mu numu taya umu mana mease tu tukakwuna hanedooakwu.”

Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus meeoo mu netamma, “Hemma sakwa tamme mu maka?” Mu oo nakatzimodu yise meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Numme manegeoo tukaba-gaꞌyoo yise waahoo pakwe-gaꞌyoo. Pute sakwa numme mease mu ewow numu tukapu tumukudooa?”
Tubetse ewaꞌyoo (5000) nanana o. Oꞌno yise soo Te Pabeꞌe mu tunakatzimodu meeoo netamma, “Mu numu sakwa ka poohegea-kooba sapa aataꞌapunne.”
Umu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu yise pumme oo netamma-kwaꞌne manese yise noꞌyoona aatahoo.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu aatahoose ka tukaba noko pakwe hemahoose toogoopatu poonnese, nanesootuhikooha. Oꞌno yise ka tukaba noko pakwe tzabokase, mu ewow numu ka umu pumme nakatzimodu maka tuungu.
Mu numu noꞌyoona yise ewa tukase, wutzuꞌme. Ka mu numu wutzuꞌmese mu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu ka a nagupenina tunoka wahamatsebooekudu (12) kawona kaanoku.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhi mu nakatzimodu oo-no. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka umu tunakatzimodu meeoo tubenga, “Hownneꞌyoo oosoo nana mee mu numu nu-kwitu netamma?”

Umu tunakatzimodu yise meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe nanekwegea, “Susumudu numu, ‘Ume ka numu baa-wi matzakadu John’ mee netamma. Susumudu numu yise meeoo, ‘Soo Jesus Te Naa yadooawabe Elijah mee naneadu.’ Susumudu numu punnoꞌo meeoo, ‘Ka mu Te Naa yadooawabe-matu.’ mee u-kwitu netamma.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tu nakatzimodu meeoo netamma, “Haꞌyoo mu puu e soobedya?” Soo Peter oo nekwegea, “U yow Ne Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa numme-matoo tutayana.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu netamma, “Gi menoꞌo numu tuukwepana, nu yow Mu Pabeꞌe. Mu Jew numu yadooakudu gi e petzape, unu e kusekase, e batsase yise waha tooise saaꞌa nu tusootabooekwu.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise noꞌoko mu numu, ka umu tunakatzimodu-nokosoo mee mu netamma, “Tooe haga tooe nu-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu sakwa mee unne oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo, tooe mu ka nu-koobatoo nabatsase sapa, mu e nagenokwu.
Tamme ka tammesoo tooꞌe namagwetzoina tamme kadooꞌoo namayugwekwu, mu ka nu-koobatoo kadooꞌoo mesoo namayugwena mu namagwetzoikwu.
Tamme ka teepu-koobaꞌyoona ewow hee-gaꞌyoo pana ka te yaꞌese oosoo gi te magwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo.

Gi oosoo te gwetzoina tumu-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tooe haga tooe nu-ma nasookwina, noꞌoko e unnepu tuwazoo, nu yise punnoꞌo, saaꞌa mu-ma nasookwikwu ka Te Naa pooha-toohakwi e petuse, ka toogoopatu e tutummatziwabe mu toha kakasa-ga-no.
Nu togesapa mu tuukwepu susumudu mu yaa konnodu gisoo tuina e pooha-gana poonnekwu.”
Sumu nasatese, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka umu tu pupuaꞌamu tuukwe, mu Peter yise James noko John nano mu mea tuunguna, oona giba-matoo nanesootuhigakwuse.
Togesoo oo nanesootuhaꞌe oo koba atasoo tabuagaꞌa, yise pukwi oo namasooana tohawiyaꞌnegase patakwetseapunne.
Yise wahaꞌyoo nanana oꞌnosoo Te Naa yadooawabe Moses-no Elijah mee nananeadu oo-baa tabua petu. Umu punnoꞌo patakwetseapunne.
Nanano apegeadyakwe ka Te Pabeꞌe besa manekwuna ka Jerusalem-wiꞌyoona tamme-koobatoo oo nabatsakwuna. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise te magwetzoikwu.
Soo Peter tu pupuaꞌamu-no usumeadyakwe umu ka tupoonnese umu ka mu pihoo o konnodu patagwetseapunne mu poonne.

Mu Moses-no Elijah memeahookwuse, soo Peter gi haꞌyoo unne-waꞌneꞌyoo, ka Te Pabeꞌe mee netamma, “Besa numme ka kemmase. Numme pihoo mu tatza nobe-dookukwu, u sumuoo mu Moses-no Elijah punnoꞌo namesusuꞌmu.”
Togesoo oo yadooadyakwe, soo koomeba mu haba-gakuhoo petu, umu-koobakwi manikese, mu tunakatzimodu suaꞌe.
Soo Te Naa yise koomeba nagaꞌyoona mu yadooe mee mu netamma, “Esoo yow E Besaa Tooa, nu a netutzea. Mu sakwa a nakabetsea.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe suuꞌmu yise umu-baa mani. Ka oꞌno umu gi haga tuukweꞌe ka a namanina.
Ka giba-maꞌyoona mu sawekese ewaꞌyoo mu numu yise mu takwi.
Umu nagaꞌyoona sumuꞌyoo nana yise ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “E tooa sakwa u mabesaku, oosoo tsoapayina gi besa manakwe. Oosoo e besaa tooa.
Tooe hanoꞌyoona tooe soo tsoapa oo-ma tabuaꞌana soo e tooa yaꞌeookayakwe, oobenakwatoo unu nuummaba wumayakwe.
Nu umu ume nakatzimodu tooꞌe nematzagakwuni tuungu umu yise gi oo mabuꞌa.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Mu gi e nakabetseꞌa tooe nu wunaꞌme yaa mu-baaꞌyoona mu gi e nakaꞌoedyukute. Ka naatse yaatoo tzakowke.”
Soo naatse ka Te Pabeꞌe poonnese yaꞌeooka. Oꞌno soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tsoapa nematzagakwunise ka naatse magwetzoi ka tsoapa-makoo. Soo naꞌatse ka besa manise soo Te Pabeꞌe oo naa-matoo oo nemawunihoo.
Mu numu yise ka Te Naa nesookwugi. Mu numu yise mee nananetamma, “Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka unu pooha-gana nanasookwugi tumadabue.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka umu pumme nakatzimodu mee netamma,
“Mu sakwa a tubetse soomayu ekow naꞌunnepu nu saaꞌa nakwutumakwu.”
Umu oo nakatzimodu gi oo nakasopedakwadoo ka meeoo oo unakwe. A nawatzetugu-kwaꞌne umu oo nakasoobedyana ooka tu tubengukwuna nasoogwaꞌe ka meeoo oo unakwe.
Umu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu puusoo gi nanatogeꞌyookute ka nooꞌyoo meeoo tusooyugwena, “Nu yow oo ooonakwatusoo.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe oo sopedakwatoo ka mu tusooyugwena, oosoo yise sumuoo ka tuhaꞌakoo nabaa tzakwunukuna

umu pumme nakatzimodu mee netamma, “Sumuna mu noꞌyoona mee soonamme nu sakwa mu moohe. Soo sumuꞌyoo mu-matu gi maawaꞌne nanasoobedyadu gi yoo tuhaꞌa-kwaꞌne saaꞌa mu moohedooa. Ka tuhaꞌakoo tummatzina nu-koobatoo, ka nugatuna nuka tummatzidu-kwaꞌnesoo manepunne ka E Naa tuwow tummatzipunnesoo.”

Yise soo John ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo tuukweꞌe, “Numme sumuoo nana poonne, ume pooha tooha-kwi tsoapa tayakwunidu. Numme yise meeoo oo netamma, ‘U sakwa gi mu tsoapa tayakwunipana ka Ne Pabeꞌe pooha-ma, ka gi numme tunakatzimodu-matuna.’ “
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo oo netamma, “Mu sakwa uga gi meeoo ka nana netammapana. Tooe haga tooe e nanea-ma ka tsoapa nematzagakwunidu tookwa te tummatzidu, oosoo ka gi te wohonena.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa pudusoo namatasoo oo bikwu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo tusooyugwe, “Nu sakwa ka Jerusalem-witoo mease mu numu-no nanesootuhi.”
Susumudu tu pupuaꞌamu-matu mooe taya ka mu wakwawaꞌa Samaritan mee nananeadu numu-matoo mu tutubenga tuunguna umu-baa tooikwu mee tusooyugwena.
Mu Samaritan numu gi Jew numu togeꞌyookute ka Jerusalem-wiꞌyoona mu paba nananesootuhaꞌyoo. Mu oo tutayana oo wegeatooase yise meeoo oo tuukwe, “Umu wakwawaꞌa gi u nenabaaꞌyookute.”
Wahaꞌyoo umu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu-matu James-no John mee nananeadu mu nakase mee ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Tamme sakwa ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhi umu wakwawaꞌa numu sakwa natuni.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise umu-tamme nakwumunase mee mu netamma, “Gi suda unnepana.”
Umu yise kummaꞌabasoo numu-baa tooikwu.
Ka podo-toogoo mu meadape soo nana ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “Nu tooe hano tooe u mea nu u nagenummekwu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo oo netamma, “U ka nu-noꞌyoona gi nobe-gakwu. Mu etzaꞌa puu ka teepu-naga to-gaꞌyoo, mu hootsebaaꞌa punnoꞌo sunngabe-ma nonobe-gaꞌyoo, pana nu yise gi nobe-gaꞌyoo.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka sumuoo nana meeoo netamma, “U sakwa nu-no maneka.” Soo nana yise ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo nanekwegea, “Nu sakwa e naa-no nummenummese, ka oo yaꞌese oo tuguse, saaꞌa u-no tzabekadooa.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo oo netamma, “Menoꞌosoo nu-no maneka. Mu-matusoo gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu saaꞌa ka mu naa mabetseadooa.”
Kummaꞌyoosoo nana punnoꞌo meeoo, “E Pabeꞌe, nu sakwa punnoꞌo u-no manenumme; pana mooeꞌugasoo nu mu e nobe-kwitusoo mu mooe tuukwekase nu u-no tzabekadooa.”
Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo oo netamma, “Soo tooe haga tooe e nakaꞌoedyukudu sakwa gi punowsoo kodyupana.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka ewahoo (70) numu tutunedyooemodu meeoo netamma, “Nu mu numu-matoo wakwaha-kwikoo mu tayamena ka pukwi e petugakwuna, ka Te Naa besa unnepu mu tuukwena.

Gi haga ka Te Naa besa po-witu mu tuukwe. Ewaꞌyoo mu numu ka Te Naa besa unnepu nakasoogwidu. Pana huꞌyoosoo ka Te Naa unnepu mu numu tunedyooedu. Tamme sakwa ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhi mee unnena, ‘U sakwa ewowsoo numu netutzea ka besa u unnepu wahakwudu. Oꞌno yise ewaꞌyoo numu u-kwitu nakana, u nakaꞌoedyukukwu.’
Mana mea, nu mu tayakwu mu sutahoo numu-nagatoo.
Gi hemma hanegapana, gi nobenepana, gi magoꞌo, gi mu moko, yise gi numu yadooepana ka meana.
Ka tooe hanotu nobe-kwi pudu egea-kakwuse besow mu numu oe nobe-gakoo mooe nekwiku.
Ka nanesootuhidu oo nobe-gakoo oo nanesootuhiku, oosoo besaꞌyookwu. Umu ka sutaꞌyoona soo besow umu mu nekwipu mu-matooso namakodyukukwu.
Tooe hano tooe mu-baaꞌyoona osoo saaꞌa tukana, hebena tuwazoo. Gi oo nasookwipana o mu natummatzina gi nanaꞌatakoosoo nobe-toogoo meꞌa.
Ka mana tooe hano tooe petugase, ka u namakana tuka, gi oo nabeatsegapana.
Mu tuoegoedu nanesootuhikuna mu mabesakuna ka noꞌoko mu numu meeoo netamma, ‘Pudusoo soo Te Naa te nemadunagakwu.’
Ka tooe hano tooe petugase ka mu numu gi mumme togeꞌyookute, gi umu-baaꞌyoopana.
Mu tsasoopedya, oeꞌyoona mea mu tunesootabue ka gi toge mu manena umu-matoosoo kodyukwu ka gi te oedyukuna.

Nu yise mu tuukwe saaꞌa ka Te Naa mu numu nemadabuekwu, soo suda mu tumatugupu umu-matoosoo kodyukwu, ka oꞌnosoo tu namane-kwaꞌnesoo, soo sutaꞌyoo puu ka Sodom mee naneadu-matoo namakodyukuse, umu nakootzasooa.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe tuwow mee, “Mu numu ka mu Chorazin noko Bethsaida mee nananeadu-wi nonobe-gaꞌyoo tooe umu nanaꞌewasoo e besa pooha manekena poonnepana umu gi e oedyukute. Sumuna soo mu tumaꞌemukwana umu-matoosoo kodyukwu, nu ka oo tooꞌe wahana, umu gi oo nakaꞌoedyukuna. Mu numu ka Tyre noko Sidon-wi nonobe-gaꞌyoo ka oꞌnosoo sakwa ka mumme poonnena e oedyukuna gi uga nagoekwu. Ka Te Naa numu nemadabuekwuse mumme manena umu manepu ooonakwa sutaꞌyoo.
Mu numu ka Capernaum-witu nonobe-gaꞌyoo punnoꞌo gisoo besaꞌyoo. Mumme maꞌemukwana sumuna punnoꞌo mu-matoosoo kodyukwu ka gi e oedyukuna punnoꞌo.
Soo tooe haga tooe unu e nakaꞌoedyukute Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukudu tuwazoo. Soo tooe haga tooe punnoꞌo nuka gi togeꞌyookudu, Te Naa tuwazoo gi togeꞌyookute. Soo Te Naa yaatoo mu-matoo e taya.”
Saaꞌa mu ewaꞌyoo nanana Te Pabeꞌe tutuyana oo-baasoo petugase mee oo netamma, “Numme u pooha-ma ka mu tsotsoapa nematzagakwunina, umu meaꞌayakwe.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma,
“Menoꞌo yise soo e wohonedu soo sutaꞌyoo namatzooekuhoo.
Nu mu besa pooha-makapu oꞌno soo sutaꞌyoo gi hownnekoo mu matzooekute. Gi hee mu matzama-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tooe mu togogwa-kooba tatukuse sapa oosoo gi how mu yugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Ka mumme e pooha-maka gi ookow madumotseagapunne, pana soo gwetzoibu yise Te Naa mumme sootuhipu, o yisetu.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe punnoꞌo tubetse besa soonammena meeoo nanesootuhi, “Ne Naa u noꞌokosoo hemma ka teepu-koobatu yise ne paꞌanakwitu tuwazoo nemadabue. U tubetse besaꞌyoo u ka umu u dooamu ka besa etzaga u unnepu nakasopedakwadookwuna mu sootuhipuna, tooe gi unu mu natunedyooepu sapa. Umu unu natunedyooepu, gi gea u unnepu nakasopedakwadoo. Yooonnekoo u tusooyugwepu-kwaꞌne.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu numu mee netamma tuwow, “Soo E Naa noꞌokosoo hemma e sopedakwatoona e sootuhipu. Oosoo suuꞌmu e sopedakwatoo. Nu punnoꞌo ka E Naa sopedakwatoona nu ka numu oetu nakasopedakwadookwuna mu mesoo tuukwe.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka umu pumme nakatzimodu mee netamma, “Soo Te Naa tubetse besa ka besa e unnepu nakasookwina. Pana umu te nanamooatupu gi ooka nasootuhi. Menoꞌo yise mu e poonnena ka besa e unnepu nakasopedakwatoo.”

Ewaꞌyoo numu ka Te Pabeꞌe naka aataꞌa. Sumuꞌyoo nana ka mu Jew tumayohope numu tunedyooedu ka Te Pabeꞌe tooꞌe nekwesekuna wunuoose mee oo tubenga, “Haꞌoo besa sakwa saaꞌa nu manese ka yaꞌese, ka Te Naa-baatoo mea?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe oo nanekwegea, “U ka te tumayohope nea, hayoo puu oosoo oetu naꞌunakwe?”

Soo nana ka Te Pabeꞌe nanekwegea punnoꞌo meeoo yise, “Tamme sakwa ka Te Naa unu soobedya, noꞌoko te sokwama-ma ka hemma how te yugwena tuwazoo. Tamme sakwa te pupuaꞌamu tuwow besa soobedya, tammesoo nasoobedya-kwaꞌne.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo oo netamma, “U togekoo e nanekwegea. U ka ekow unnepu nakabetseana, saaꞌa u ooosapa ka Te Naa-baa nobe-gakwu, ka yaꞌese.”
Soo nana yise tu tumatuꞌadyina sopedakwatoona ka Te Pabeꞌe mee tubenga, “Haga yise nuga puaꞌa?”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo tuwow mu natugwengakooha, “Sumuꞌyoo Jew nana ka Jerusalem mee naneadu-wiꞌyoona tubongo meana ka Jericho mee naneadu-kwitoo. Umu tuduhadu oo mooedyugwese noꞌoko hemma oo-makoo hanehoo oo tooꞌe batsahoo ka po-kumaba oo maꞌwuhooka.
Ka saaꞌa oosoo Jew nanesootuhidu o kemmana, oosoo ka unu namooedyugwepu nana onoko poonnese ka po oo tookana-kwi oo-moopa meahoo.
Saaꞌa yise punnoꞌo oosoo Jew nanesootuhidu tummatzidu o kemmana ka nana poonne oosoo yise punnoꞌo oo-moopa meahoo.
Sumuꞌyoo numu mu Jew gi petzabedu saaꞌa punnoꞌo o kemma. Oosoo ka unu namooedyugwepu nana poonne, tutuha oo soobedyana tooe ka nana Jew sapa.
Oosoo yise oo-matu meahoose natusooa-ma oo mahanese, ooka oo wupagakute. Ka tu pookoo-kooba o tzatsebooase ka numu tooi nobe-witu oo hanehoogase onanoko oo mabetsea.
Awamooa yise ka tooi nobe hee-gakoo nana tumanagakuse mee oo netamma, ‘Ka namooedyugwepu e mabetseaku. U ka ewowsoo tzasooase, nu saaꞌa ooka u tumanagakudooasoo, nu ka kodyupetuse.’
Haꞌoo yise, hanotu umu-matu ka nana unu namooedyugwepu puaꞌa?”
Soo nana ka Te Pabeꞌe nanekwegea, “Esoo nana oo tummatzise oo puaꞌa mane.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka nana mee netamma, “U sakwa punnoꞌo noꞌobatusoo numu soobedya, noꞌobatusoo pupuaꞌamu-ga.”
Mu Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu pumme nakatzimodu-no ooosapa meadabena ka numu nokadu-kwi petugonno. Sumuꞌyoo mogoꞌne Martha mee naneadu yise nabaa mu tuka tuungu.
Soo Martha punneꞌe Mary mee naneadu ooosapa ka Te Pabeꞌe-kumaba katuna, oo nakakatu oo yadooadyakwe.
Soo Martha gi namadamawunu, ka tukapu mu mahanekuwununa. Soo Martha yise ka Te Pabeꞌe mee netammadooa, “Nu ka tukapu gi namadamawunu, u sakwa ka Mary nuka tummatzi tuungu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Martha meeoo netamma, “Gi ka tukapu-witu suda nasooyugwewunupana.
Soo e unnekatuna ka te tukakwuna ooonakwaꞌyoopunne. Soo Mary soo besa e nakasoobedyana. Ooonneꞌyoona gi nu a tayahoo.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mana tooe hanoꞌyoona tooe nanesootuhidyina tunemamakwuse soo sumuꞌyoo oo nakatzimodu meeoo oo netamma, “Ne Pabeꞌe, ne nanesootuhi tunedyooe, ka John umu tu nakatzimodu tunedyooe-kwaꞌnesoo.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Ka nanesootuhina mee unneyi, Ne Naa ne paꞌanakwatu, u tubetse besaꞌyoo. U noꞌoko numme-kooba pooha katudu. Numme noꞌoko numu yaa teepu-koobatu ume mu nakabetseana soogwaꞌe, ka u-baatu-kwaꞌnesoo.
Nonotsa tu tabe mea-kwi tukapu gi ne namatuugekwuna.
Ka ne tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwana numme puu oo soomuꞌwa ka mu numu suda numme matugu. Ne matzino kaaheno ne mayugwe. Oꞌno numme besa-kwitoo tsebooe petugakwu.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise umu pumme nakatzimodu meeoo netamma, “Tamme sakwa ooosapa nanetsagwayidyi. Mu numu nanetsagwayina ꞌyoo manepunne. How sakwa puu tamme ka togabeno ka tu puaꞌa nobe-witoo mease ka oo yadooe petugase mee unnena,
‘E puaꞌa mana kwingaꞌatu pudu petuhoose, nu gi hemma oo maka-waꞌne manepunne. U sakwa pihoo tukaba nanoꞌhona e hemepunne?’
Sumuna soo u puaꞌa gi u tutzakwonakwu-waꞌneꞌyoo ka mooasoo habena, umu oo doodooamu tuwa mooasoo bokwa, oosoo yise gi yotsese u maka-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Pana saaꞌa pumme u nenoyukwe oosoo yotsese ka natzakwona tzakwuna, yise u makakwu. Tamme nanesootuhidyina oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa te sootuhise ka natzakwona tzakwonase, te makakwu.

Nu yise meeoo mu netammakwu, tutubenguse u nageakwu, oo watena u oo mayukwu, tutokangese u natutzakwonakukwu. Soo tooe haga tooe tutubengadu oo nageakwu, soo tuwatedu oo mayukwu, soo tutokangedu oo natsakwonakukwu.
U puu ka u tooaꞌa ka pakwe nekwaꞌe gi togogwa oo gea-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Tooe tamme gi totogeꞌyoopana puu te dooamu besa matugu, soo Te Naa yise tamme besa matugukwu Tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma te sootuhikwu.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tsoapayidu nana gi besa yadooadu nanesootuhikuse, yise ka oo namabesakuhoose soo tsoapayidu nana besa manese, yadooawunu. Mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe ka nana namabesakuse oo poonnena oo nesookwugaꞌe.
Susumudu mu numu ka oo nakana yise meeoo nanaꞌunakwe, “Esoo nana Jesus ka tsoapa nematzagakwunihoo. Oosoo ka umuoosoo pooha-ma oo mu yugwewunu.”
Susumudu yise ka oo manena poonnena gi oo sooꞌoedyukuna unusoo oo pooha manikwuna nepoonne.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mooasoo pumme mu sooyugwena sopedakwadoona, mee mu netamma, “Mu numu ka pumme moohedu gi nakabetseana nanano nananepetukana, soo mu moohedu gi mu numu moohe-waꞌne tabuꞌa, mu numu yise kadooꞌoo sukwe namayugwekwu.

Mu gi toge unakwe mu ka, ‘Numu poohadu,’ mee e netammana. Soo numu poohadu gi hownnekoo nanesootuhina ka tsoapa numu-nagakoo nematzagakwuni-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo sutaꞌyoo gi ka tsoapa numu-nagakoo nanematzagakwunina petzape, umu tsoapa ka oo tutummatzina.
Mu Jew numu moohedu puu ka mu tsoapa numu-nagakoo nanesootuhikuna mu nematzagakwunaꞌe. Mu puu gi numu poohadu mee mu neꞌa. Mu sakwa gi nuka meeoo soobedyapana.
Ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi nu nanesootuhina mu tsoapa nematzagakwuni, mu sakwa menoꞌo oo sopedakwadoo soo Te Naa noꞌoko numu sootuhaꞌe.
Nu ka mu susutakoo moohedu ooonakwasoo unu pooha-gana nuga pooha ooosapa oo matzoekute. Soo natzooedu nana puu ka tu hemma besa takonena gi hee oo matzooekute,
pana ka numu tzakunase oꞌno yise oo hemma hanekwu.
Yooosoo nu ka sutakoo yugwese oꞌno nu mu numu magwetzoikwu ka suta-makoo.
Soo tsoapa ka numu-nagakoo natayase, kummaꞌakoosoo puma tu kaduookwunu wate, pana gi tumaꞌyu, yise ka gi tumaꞌyuna meeoo unakwe, ‘Nu punowsoo kodyukakwu.’
Ka numu punagaꞌyoo tumeahoopu mayuse, oosoo numuna sumuna gisoo ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-ma nasoonatzaꞌena.
Oꞌno yise soo tsoapa natakwatsukwu (7) kukummaꞌakoosoo tsotsoapa pumme ooonakwa unu susutakoosoo bise ka punagaꞌyoona tumeapu-nagatoosoo kodyukakwu. Soo nana yise unusoo suda namanatzayakwu.”
Sumuꞌyoo mogoꞌne oonow numu-naga wunudu ka oo nakase meeoo oo netamma, “U pea sakwa nasootuhi ka u dooaꞌadoose yise ka u petzekuse tuwazoo.”
Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo oo netamma, “Oo mu numu ka Te Naa unnepu nakana, ka oo oedyukuna umu unu nasootuhikwu,” mee.

Ka mu numu ewasoo manemena soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Mu sutaꞌyoo numu gi e nakaꞌoedyukudu ka nanasookwugi besa e manena poonnese e nakaꞌoedyukukwu suuꞌmu, mee mu tusooyugwe. Ka oꞌnosoo Te Naa yadooawabe, Jonah mee naneadu
ka mu wakwawaꞌa numu Te Naa unnepu tuukwena mu oo nakaꞌoedyukute. Nu yise yow Mu Pabeꞌe mu-baa petuse pana mu gi e nakaꞌoedyukute.

Oꞌnosoo soo mogoꞌne mana mu taba mea-nakwatu numu nehane katudu, puu kwingaꞌa kemma ka mu Jew numu-kooba katudu Solomon mee naneadu oo tunetammana nakakwuse, ‘Ka unu oo sopedakwadoo,’ mee neyugwena. Tooe nu ka Solomon ooonakwa unu tusopedakwadoopana mu gi e nakabetseꞌa.
Ka numu paba nanehanenoꞌo mu wakwawaꞌa ka Jonah nakaꞌoedyukupu sakwa mu nemadabue ka mu menoꞌo gi nuka nakaꞌoedyukudu, tooe nu ka Jonah ooonnakwa pooha-gakooapa.

Soo besa e unnepu tukootabuakunoo kootabua-kwaꞌne. Tamme puu ka oo kootabuakuse paaꞌa hee-kooba oo wuna. Oꞌno soo tooe haga tooe petudu noꞌoko hemma mesoo poonne. Gi tamme puu kawona-tooha oo watzetugu.
Soo te pooe puu tukootabuakunoo-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme ka besow poonnena suuꞌmu tamme besaꞌyookwu, pana tamme ka sutakoo poonnena suta tusooyugwekwu.
Tamme ka besow nakasopedakwatoo,
tamme besaꞌyookwu.”
Ka Te Pabeꞌe yadooawunu, sumuꞌyoo nana nasootuhidu Pharisee mee nananedu-nagatu punnoꞌo oo tuka tuungu. Oosoo yise oo-no tuka kaduhoo.
Mu Jew numu tu mi mooe bakomase tuka, ka oo tumatuguna. Soo Jew nana yise meeoo soonamme, “How manena soo Jesus tuka gisoo tu mi bakomana?”

Te Pabeꞌe yise mee ka nana netamma, “Mu Jew numu tumatuguna, puu besa ka mu tookoomatsuꞌa, pana soo mu soonammena togesoo totsaꞌa, ka numu mooa-gana mu sutaꞌyoo. Ka tseda-kumitu suuꞌmu matsuana soo oetu togesoo totsaꞌa.
Te Naa namekoo mu mi noko mu soonammena matabuepu. Te Naa yise namekoo gi mu totsana sookwaꞌe.
U ka mu tutuha manedu numu makana u besaꞌyoo.

Mu Pharisee nananesootuhidu tooe gi haanoko hemma hanepana mu ka Te Naa tosamakayakwe. Mu besa manakwe ka oo tosamakana. Mu gi ka Te Naa besa unnepu nakabetsea ka Te Naa unu soobedyanaka kukummaꞌakoosoo numu besa matuguna, mee naꞌunnena.

Mu Pharisee nananesootuhidu mu ka tu naꞌewa tuka besa-kwi mooe aatahooyakwe, ka tu nananesootuhaꞌe mu tuwazoo ooosoo. Mu kukummaꞌakoosoo numu, ‘Oosoo besa nanesootuhidu,’ mee mumme mu netammana soobedya. Mu tumaꞌemukwana saaꞌa mu-maatoosoo kodyukwu.
Mu suda manakwe ka kukummaꞌakoosoo numu neꞌemukwana ka Te Naa besa po oemota mu moohena.”
Sumuꞌyoo ka nanesootuhibu tunedyooedu-matu ka Te Pabeꞌe mee netamma, “U suda numme-witu waha tuwazoo.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee oo netamma, “Mu nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu punnoꞌo mu tumaꞌemukwadu mu-matoosoo kodyukwu. Mu ka mu kukummaꞌakoosoo numu unu namanedu tumayohope nage tuungu pana mu gi hownnekoo ooka mu mayoho tummatzi-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Mu puu ka oꞌnosoo Te Naa yadooawabe besa nanomatuooꞌna, ka umu mu nanamooatupu tugoena besa matabuena.
Mu tookwa ka mu nanamooatupu tugoena togeꞌyookute, oꞌno mu ka mu nanomatuoonana besa matabuꞌe.
Soo Te Naa gi hemma watzekudu mee unakwe, ‘Tooe nu ka umu e yadooawabe umu-matoo tayase sapa umu mu kusegana mu koꞌehookwu.’
Mu oe naneyukwe ka noꞌoko Te Naa yadooawabe goese.
Mu nanesootuhibu tunedyooedu ka puusoo gi ka Te Naa nakabetseana gi hownnekoo ka Te Naa nakabetsea-kwitu mu numu tunedyooe-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
Ka Te Pabeꞌe meahookwuse mu Pharisee unu oo sutakuna oo tooe nemasutana,
oꞌno oosoo suda unnise umu ookow oe neyugwekwu mee tooꞌe sokwamana.

Ewaꞌyoo mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-baatoo kemmana, ka tubetse ewaꞌyoona ka Te Pabeꞌe takooꞌna, nanakwukutzuꞌnena ka wogo manepunnena. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu nakatzimodu tu tunedyooehookwuna pedukwunu meeoo yise,
“Mu sakwa gi suipana ka besa e unnepu mu numu tuukwe.
Ka mu nawatze natuukwena sapa waha, haꞌoo puu soo togano-kwitu puu ka tu tabua-kwitu waha.
E pupuaꞌamu, nu mu tuukwe gi ka te tookoo batsakwudu-ma suipana, umu ka te tookoo suuꞌmu batsakwu gi ka te moogooa. Soo te moogooa gi hownnekoo nabatsa-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Pana nu mu tuukwe ka yise pumma mu sui-waꞌneꞌyoo, oosoo Te Naa. Soo Te Naa suuꞌmu ka te tookoo noko te moogooa kadoo mesoo maꞌyugwe.
Mu hootsebaꞌa puu gi haaꞌno nanenaka pana soo Te Naa mu soopedyana mu mabetseꞌa.
Soo Te Naa puu gi te watzekute, ka te tzopuhutooe tatzengana ka te wo-matu. Gi suipana, tamme mu hootsebaꞌa ooonakwasoo nadatzeꞌnga.
Mu ka mu numu tuukwena, ‘Soo Jesus E Pabeꞌe,’ nu saaꞌa ka E Naa tamme-koobatu, ‘Mu nugatu,’ mee tuukwedooa.
Mu ka ‘Jesus E Pabeꞌe,’ mee mu unne-ma nasookwina, nu saaꞌa ka E Naa tamme-koobatu, ‘Mu gi nugatu,’ mee oo tuukwedooꞌa.
Noꞌyoona numu yise ka Te Naa suda netammana oosoo nasoomuꞌwakwu, pana mu ka Te Naa Besa Pooha suda netammana oosoo gi nasoomuꞌwa-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Ka nakwutumuna ka nanehanena mu nanesootuhidu noko numu moohedu-kobenaꞌyoona, gi ka mu unnekwuna suda soonammekupana.
Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha ka mu unnekwuna mu tuukwekwu.”
Sumuꞌyoo umu Te Pabeꞌe nakapunnedu-matu mee oo netammadooa, “U sakwa ka e pabeꞌe mee netammana oosoo ka ne naa hemma nu-no nowmoo.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka nana mee netamma, “Mu gi nuga nehanena.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu numu tuwow meeoo netamma, “Tamme sakwa gi moomoogoobupana. Tooe tamme how ewow hee-gapana oosoo gi numu magwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu numu mee natugwengakooha, “Soo ewow hee-gaꞌyoo nana tubewabe-gana ewow besa hemma suaku.
Oosoo mee soonamme, ‘Haꞌoo sakwa nu mane? Nagutza ewaꞌyoo soo e tumasuana, gi toge e tubane nobe-kwi noꞌyoona nahane-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Nu sakwa umu e tubane nobe tzadyoometase papabowsoo matabue.
Oꞌno nu saaꞌa besa soonammekwu ka noꞌoko tumasuana oe hanese. Meeoo nu soonamme, nu ewa tubanese wunaꞌmetoo mesoo meawunukwu. Nu gi hemma how yugwena sukwe tukana, hebena, besa soonammekwu.’
Soo nana tu yaꞌeookwuna gi sopedakwadoo. Oꞌno togano soo nana yaꞌehoo. Noꞌyoona oo tumasuape kummaꞌyoosoo nahaneku.
Tamme ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona ewow hee-gaꞌyoo ka oo-mahoo nasoonatzina ka Te Naa gi nakabetseana tamme matuꞌadyipunne.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe umu tunakatzimodu meeoo netamma, “Gi suda oo sokwamakupana ka tukapu sumudooe tuugena, yise too ka pukwi mu namasooana.
Soo numu gwetzooina ka tukapu ooonakwatu, ka pukwi numu namasooana ooonakwatu tuwow.
Mu ka mu hootsebaꞌa poonne, umu puu tooe gi tumasua pana mesoo tuka, soo Te Naa mu mabetsea. Soo Te Naa puu mu hootsebaꞌa ooonakwasoo te soobedya.
Tamme gi hownnekoo tammesoo kwingaꞌatoo te momokwuna madaꞌe, tamme sakwa yise gi ka te tuka-witu suda soonammekupana.
Mu yise ka yooonnekoo tututsekoo gi soomadi how yise ka a pabana suda soonammekute.
Ka mu tonegeadu puu soo Te Naa mabetseꞌa ka umu puu gi tuusoogwi tatabuꞌa. Umu ka Jew numu-kooba katudu, Solomon mee naneadu unu nananenagadu oo nemasooaꞌapu oo ooonakwa besa tatabuꞌa.
Soo Te Naa umuoo tonegeaꞌadu puu besa matabue. Tooe umuoo yabesoo takwasugwuuse sapa, oosoo Te Naa yise ooosoo ka pukwi te namasooana gi te namatuugekwuna ka oo nakabetseana.
Tamme sakwa yise gi suda sokwamapana ka te tukakwuna, ka te hebekwuna kadooꞌookoo.
Mooasoo soo Te Naa te paꞌanakwatu oo sopedakwadoo, gi nawatzekudu. Umu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu ooonnekoo yaaꞌa teepu-koobatu ka tukapu, ka pukwi tu namasooana ooosapa ookow ooonakwa sooyugwe.
Tamme sakwa yise ka Te Naa nakabetseanona oosoo gi hemma te namatuugekukwu.
Gi suda oo sokwamakapana, oosoo Te Naa besa te sootunagaꞌa.
Noꞌoko mu hemma-ma tumuse mu tutuha manedu haneku, soo Te Naa te paꞌanakwatu yise besakoo mu sootuhikwu. Soo Te Naa besasoo mu sootuhikwu, oꞌno ookow sakwa mu gi soomuꞌwapana.
Tooe hee tooe mu tusoodyahana o mu manepunnekwu.
Mu sakwa ooosapa namamakwupunne ka yaa teepu-koobasoo e kodyu petukwuse.
Mu sakwa umu-waꞌnesoo ka mu tuutooedu nehanedu petukwuse besa sokwama.
Ka togesoo mu tubonne oosoo kodyu petuse umu nasootuhikwu. Oosoo puusoo tukapu mu makakwu.
Ka tooesoo mu tubonne petuse tooe togabeno tooetoo tabua-tamme tunehanedu ka utuina besa sokwama.
Nu gi nuka meeoo mu soobedyanoꞌo mu-kooba o petukwu. Ooonneꞌyoo mu sakwa yise namabetzapepunne.”
Soo Peter yise mee ka Te Pabeꞌe tubenga, “U haaꞌa noꞌoko numu netammana, pute numme tunakatzimodu suuꞌmu?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo ka Peter nekwegea, “Soo nuga poenaꞌewabe netutzeana sakwa unu soonammena besa numu tummatzi. Umu yise ka nuka nakaꞌoedyukudu mabetseana mu makakwu ka tukapu mu sookwaꞌe.
Nu ka kodyu petuse umu e poenaꞌewabe ka umu nuka nakaꞌoedyukudu besa mu mabetseꞌa mu mayu petuse, nu mu sootuhikwu.
Nu besasoo mu sootuhikwu, noꞌoko hemma nemadabuekwu.

Sumuna soo numu nanesootuhi moohedu ka meeoo tusooyugwena, ‘Gi soo Te Pabeꞌe yabesoo kodyu petukwu. Nu menoꞌo tooe how ka umu ooka nakaꞌoedyukudu suuꞌmu suda matuguna ka ewa puusoo namakoo tusoohanena mesoo baayaꞌe.’
Nu yise ka kodyu petuse tooe hano tooe petukwu gi nuka meeoo mu soobedyanoꞌo. Oꞌno nu yise ka umu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-noko mu nanesootuhibu moohedu mu meeoo sooyugwe.
Soo numu gi nuka nakabetseadu tooe oo sopedakwadoopana ka pumme e tuukweꞌe soo suda mu tumatuguna umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.
Soo numu gi oo nakasopedakwatoodu ka sutaꞌyoona sagwane sapa nanekusekakwu.

Nu menoꞌo gi oo nasoomanekute ka nu-tamme kemmadu, ka nabatsakwuse. Nu sukwa tooe yabe soo oo tatukwahoo meeꞌe nu sooname. Oꞌno nu saaꞌa ka teepu nemadabuekwu. Menoꞌo sakwa mooasoo oe manepetu mee nu soonamme.
Mu sumuna mee sokwama menoꞌo ka Te Pabeꞌe petuse noꞌyoona numu nanapuaꞌakwu. Pana gi oo manepunne. Umu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tumooꞌookwu tooetoo tu nananumu sapa.

Esoo nana gi nuka heesoobedyadu sumuna pummesoo tooa, tooetoo tu naa tumooꞌookwu. Soo mogoꞌne gi nuka heesoobedyadu sumuna punnoꞌo ka tu padu, tu pea, tooetoo tu yahepeawabe tumooꞌookwu. Sumuna manegeꞌyoo nananosoo nobe-gaꞌyoo nanatumuooꞌookwu, wahaꞌyoo umu-matu pihoo tumooꞌookwu, tooetoo paheꞌyoo ka umu waahoo nu-matoo nananesootuhidu tumooꞌookwu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu ewow numu mee netamma, “Mu puu oo sopedakwatoo ka tu powmakwuse soo taba egea-tammetu unu koomeapunnekwu.
Mu tuwazoo oo sopedakwatoo ka unu tu naꞌudutukwuse ka taba meanakwana hukwakwu.
Pana mu gi e nakaꞌoedyukute ka suda tumatuguna.
Mu gi etzaga muusoo besa nanemadabue-waꞌneꞌyoo ka suda mu tumatugu-kwitu. Mu sakwa tuwazoo oo nakaꞌoedyukuna mu sakwa kaaheno tumatugu.

Mu sakwa yise ka mumme nehanekwudu-kobenatoo nabikwuse, tamme sakwa oo puaꞌadoo togesoo meadabena. Tamme ka gi oo puaꞌagana, ka tunehanepe-wi petugase oosoo tamme-witu suda nemadabuekwu. Soo numu nehanedu yise ka mu tukwutumadu tamme wutuma tuungukwu.
Tamme yise nakwutumatugukwu, ka tamme tu tunekwina tumanagase suuꞌmu mee nu mu tuukweꞌe.”
Mu numu-matu ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo tuukweꞌe, “Mu numu-matu Galilee-wiꞌyoona kemmadu umu ka Jerusalem-witoo nanesootuhimidu. Soo mu Roman numu moohedu Pilate mee naneadu mu numu goehoo.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu numu mee netamma, “Mu ka sumuna mee sokwama umuoo numu Galilee-wiꞌyoona kemmadu tookwa ka mu Galilee numu ooonakwa unu tumaꞌemukwadu ooonneꞌyoona soo sutaꞌyoo umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.
Pana gi, soo sutaꞌyoo mu-matusoo kodyukwu ka gi mu nanekwuha.
Mu sumuna meeoo sokwama, ‘Umu numu nagoehoodu soo tukwutumadu nobe umu-koobatoo aanooahoo, umuoo tookwa hanobasoo sutaꞌyoo numu ka mu Jerusalem-wi nonobe-gadu hanobasoo.’
Pana gi, mu ka gi mu tumaꞌemukwana wahana mu-tammesoo kodyuse kadoo mu mayugwekwu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu tuukwe, “Sumuꞌyoo numu puu pogobesa tu tubewabe-wi masua. Saaꞌa menoꞌo soo pogobesa kwasu mee soonammena oetoo e petugayakwe pana gi pooedooꞌa.
Ka pumme tummatzidu yise mee netamma, ‘Pahe tomokapu, gisoo pooedooana. Masoo pogobesa gi he-toogoo besaꞌyoo numu sukwe kapamooaka. U sakwa a tuhewekwuni.’
