Soo tummatzidu yise meeoo oo netamma, ‘Nu a naꞌoonnakwitu hewese pookoo kwedana ma-kooba hanese sumu tomoba-wi a mabetseakwu.

Yise ka sumu tomoba-wi a pooe-dooase, oosoo besaꞌyookwu. Pana ka sumu tomoba-wi gi a pooe-tooase, oꞌno saaꞌa nu a tuhewekwunikwu.’ Yooonnekoosoo soo Te Naa ka mu Jew numu oetu tunenagakute, ka gi mu maꞌemukwana mu waha, mu tumaꞌemukwana mu-matoosoo kodyukwu.”
Sumu tu nananesootuhaꞌe nasumuꞌu soo Te Pabeꞌe mu numu tunedyooedyakwe.
Soo sumuꞌyoo mogoꞌne wunaꞌme (18) tomopu manena tookoo tootzadyamedu.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mogoꞌne tutuha manedu mee oo netamma, “Yaatoo kemmase nu u mabesakukwu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe naꞌenakwa oo-ma matuoonahoose soo mogoꞌne yise kaaheno nakwumaꞌese mee unnetooe, “Soo Te Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo.”

Soo nanesootuhibu nehanedu ka Te Pabeꞌe sutakuoo ka nanesootuhi tabebuno ka mogoꞌne oo mabesakuhoose yise ka nehanedu-umu meeoo netamma, “Tamme Jew numu naapahe tabeno natzatoꞌo, mu umuoo tabeba-wi mesoo nemabesakute. Pana ka te nanesootuhi tabeba-wi gi hee how nuukwu. Oꞌno mu gi natzatoꞌo-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee oo netamma, “U umesoo unnena takopadyakwe. Ka nanesootuhi tabeno mu puu ka mu pookoo tzadopayina oo bamagayakwe.

Soo mogoꞌne ka u pookoo-waꞌne soo sutaꞌyoo wunaꞌme a tuoe tzatobotoo, nu yise o tzadopase ka gwetzoibu-ma oo sootuhise esoo yise besa mane, u yise e togeꞌyookuhoo, ka maka e mabetsakuoose ka nanesootuhi tabeba-wi.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe nesootzemadu gi hownnekoo oo nekwegea pana ewaꞌyoo numu oo besaꞌyookute ka Te Pabeꞌe besa manina.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu numu natugwengasoo tuwazoo, “Nu mu tuukwekwu, haꞌoo soo numu manekwu ka e nakaꞌoedyukuna. Menoꞌo mu huutseꞌyoo nuka nakaꞌoedyukudu pudusoo mu ewasoo manekwu.

Ka wuyupe sua-kwaꞌne. Oosoo puu tuutsekoo a pooe-nakwana suake, oo soo tunadooakese, naakese, nanaꞌemota maꞌnadooa petugakwu. Ka suube-kwaꞌneꞌyoo mu hootsebaꞌa puu ka oo maꞌna-ma mesoo aataꞌa. Ooosoo mu manekwu ka e nanesootuhinona.

Ka mogoꞌne tukabadoo-kwaꞌne. Oosoo puu ka tumayuꞌa ka hongobe noko mooe mayuꞌa. Soo tumayuꞌa saaꞌa noko ka oo tugoohanetoo mani, soo tukaba yise paꞌatseꞌe posehoo. Yooosoo yise soo numu ka e nakaꞌoedyukuna.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka Jerusalem-tamme meano noꞌoko mu numu nokadu-too tu meana nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooemena.
Sumuꞌyoo numu ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo oo tubenga, “Hutseꞌyoosoo numu haaꞌa namagwetzoi?” Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee oo nanekwegea,
“Huutseꞌyoo mu tubetse tuꞌoedyukudu suuꞌmu namagwetzoikwu ka ꞌyoo a manepunne mu sakwa unu o petukuno ka mu namagwetzoikwuna.

Ewaꞌyoo numu menoꞌo gi e nakaheesoobedyadu nu yise yotsese ka natzakwunaꞌa mu-nakwi tzatumowkwu mu puuwanaꞌyoona oo tooꞌe waꞌagekwu mee unnena, ‘E Pabeꞌe e tutsakwonaku nu mi egeahookwu.’ Nu yise meeoo unnekwu, nu gi u sopedakwatoo. U tookwa gi besa tumatugupu.
Mu yise mee e netammakwu, ‘U ne sopedakwadoo. Numme u-no ewa tukayakwe, u yise ne nobe-wiꞌyoona nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooeyakwe.’
Nu yise mee mu netammakwu, mu gi nu-notu ka suda mu manena manoyugwena, mu sakwa mea. Nu gi mu sopedakwadoo.
Mu Jew numu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu mu nanatuaganena sakwikwu umu ka te nanamooatupu noꞌoko Te Naa nanayadooawabe Te Naa-baakoo.
Noꞌobatusoo numu Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukudu ka eka teepu-koobatu ka Te Naa-baa petugakwu yise ooosapa oo-noꞌyookwu.
Susumudu numu menoꞌo gi meeoo nanasoobedyadu mooe nasootuhidu, mu yise meeoo nanasoobedyadu numu-nagwi manekwu.”
Susumudu numu ka mu nanesootuhi-nagadu ka mu Pharisee mee nananeadu ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petuse mee oo netamma, “U sakwa yaanona mea soo mu numu-kooba katudu Herod mee naneadu u nebatsayagate.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Mu sakwa ookow etzaꞌa mee tuukwe, ‘Gi haaꞌnotoo nu yaanopunnekwu mu toegadu mabesakuna, mu magwetzoina, mu tsoapa nematzagakwunikwu ka E Naa nuka tunetammakupu nu mamakwuhoogena.
Pudusoo nu Jerusalem-witoosoo kodyukwu mu numu Jerusalem-witu suuꞌmu nonoꞌotsa ka Te Naa yadooawabe goeyakwe, otoo nu numu-koobatoo nabatsekwu ka E Naa tunetammana nu mamakwuookwu.’

Nu wunaꞌme mumme Jerusalem-witu tutuha soobedya ka hootze tu dooamu ka tu kasa-tooha tuwatzetugu-kwaꞌne. Pana mu gi oo mu namatuguna petzape. Mu noꞌoko umu Te Naa yadooawabe sukwe tagoehoo, tupe-ma. Pudusoo mu kadoo namayugwese mu nobe-kwitu, hee kadooꞌyookwu. Saaꞌa ka mu-baasoo e petuse mu mee unnekwu, ‘Yow soo Te Pabeꞌe Te Naa pooha-toohakwi petu.’ “
Tu nanesootuhi tabeba-wi mu Pharisee nanesootuhidu moohedu ka Te Pabeꞌe tuka bi. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise umu-no tuka, mu Pharisee oo e yaꞌepunne ka Te Pabeꞌe nesootzemakwuse.
Sumuꞌyoo nana tookoo pawadu oo numu-no.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe oo poonne ka umu Pharisee yoo Jew tumayohope sopedakwadoodu tubenga, “Haꞌyoo soo mumme tumayohope? Besaꞌyoo, gi hownneꞌyoo haaꞌa ka nanesootuhi tabeno soo numu namabesakuna?”
Pana umu gi oo nanekwegea. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka tookoo pawadu nana tzamahoose oo mabesakuse oo nobe-kwitoo oo taꞌya.

Ka mu Pharisee yise mee netamma, “Ka nanesootuhi tabeno mu dooa tawaga-kwitoo wuehoose, tooetoo mu kootsoo, ka gi hownnekoo oo tzebooꞌe, mu puu oo tummatzikwu. Mu sakwa yise gi e nesootzemapana ka nana e tummatzaꞌe.”
Umu Pharisee gi hanotoosoo haꞌyoo unne-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu poonne ka susumudu mu numu nadukabidu besa nasooyugwena ka besow kadunoo-kwitu mooe ohomanakwe, oosoo yise mee mu netamma,
“Tamme ka naꞌewa tuka-kwitoo tamme tubise, tamme sakwa gi besa nasooyugwena besa-kwitoo mooe ohomanepana. Tamme ka besow kadunoo-kwi mooe kaduhoose sumuna saaꞌa tamme ooonakwa besaꞌyoo oe petuhookwu.
Soo numu oetoo te tuka bidu yise mee te netammakwu, ‘Yaa e besa puaꞌa petuhoo. U sakwa ookow kadunoo maka.’ Tamme yise sumuna gi besa oo nakwumakukwu ka oekoo tamme tu tayahoose.

Ka tamme tubise, tamme sakwa gi ka hemma besa-kwitoo mooe ohomanepana. Soo numu te tuka bidu te manena poonnena sumuna mee te netammakwu, ‘U e besa puaꞌa yaa ka besa kadunoo-kwi katuse ka e pupuaꞌa-baa, umu-no tuka.’ ‘Oosoo besaꞌyoo numu,’ mee umu numu oo manepunnedu, te sootubetseyina.
Tamme ka tammesoo besa nasooyugwena, saaꞌa namanasookwikudooa. Tamme ka gi besa nasooyugwena saaꞌa, ‘Oosoo besaꞌyoo,’ mee nanetammakwu.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka nana pumme tuka bidu meeoo netamma, “Tamme ka naꞌewa tukana, tamme sakwa tutuha manedu, mu gi yutsungadu numu oetu bi tuungu. Umuoo gi hownnekoo ooonnekoo soo te tumakodyuku-waꞌneꞌyoo. Saaꞌa yise ka Te Naa te yaꞌe-wikoo tamme oo mayodase, te tumakodyuku-kwi tamme nasootuhikwu. Pana tamme ka tu pupuaꞌamu te nananumu, yise ka besa manepunnedu te nanumu suuꞌmu tuka bise, umu saaꞌa punnoꞌo te tuka bikwu, umuoo yise mooasoo te tumakodyukukute. Saaꞌa soo Te Naa gi ooonekwitoo te sootuhi-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
Sumuꞌyoo numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-no tukana meeoo, “Mu numu ka Te Naa-noꞌyoona ewa besa nasootuhikwu mu ewa tukadu besa sokwamakwu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa paba ewa tuka-kwitu yise ka nana natukwenguna, “Sumuꞌyoo numu tu pupuaꞌamu makakwuse mee soonammena,
ewa yongo saa tuungu, ewow tu pupuaꞌamu oetoo bi.
Pana mu oo pupuaꞌamu mee oo sooyugwena sukwe nanemaweakooha sumuꞌyoo oo puaꞌa mee oo netamma, ‘Nu ka tubewabe heetooꞌase, nu oo tasootzemahookwu.’
Sumuꞌyoo punnoꞌo meeoo, ‘Nu sumumano (10) kootsoo tumuhoose, nu umuoo poopoonnegakwu.’
Oosoo sumuꞌyoo punnoꞌo meeoo, ‘Nu gi kemma-waꞌne menoꞌo manepunne, nu pudu nodukwadoohoose.’

Soo oo tayana ka kodyu petuse, ‘Umu gi kemmow-waꞌne menoꞌo manepunne,’ meeoo oo tuukwe. Soo nana suda oo nakwumaku ka ewa tukooma hane tuunguse tu pupuaꞌamu gi kemma. Ka pumme tummatzidu yise mee netamma, ‘Manatutooe mu numu nemasumudoodooa, tooe hownnekoo tooe, mu tutuha manedu, mu gi unu besa mamanemodu nokosoo gi tutubootabuedu, tooe hownnekoo tooe umu ewa tukoohane, umu nu-no tukakwu.’
Saaꞌa mu numu oo bi petuse mee oo netamma, ‘Nu mooasoo nuka u netamma-kwaꞌne manese sapa, ewowsoo tamme soogwaꞌe. Gisoo u nobe kaaꞌno.’
Soo nana yise ka pumme tummatzidu tayasoo too meeoo netamma, ‘U sakwa manatutooe mu numu masumudoo, yise e nobe kaanohookwu.
Pana umu numu mooeꞌugasoo e tooꞌe bina umu gi nu-baatu yongo tuka-waꞌneꞌyoo.’ “
Ewaꞌyoo numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-nakwi meadape. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yooihoose umu-tamme nakwumunase mee mu netamma,

“Mu nuka noꞌokosoo hemma-ooonakwa unu soowabega. Mu sakwa ka mu naa, mu pea, mu nodukwa noko mu doodooamu, mu samoomu, muusoo sapa tuwow nuka mu-ooonakwa unu soowabega, oꞌno mu ka E Naa besa podo meadabekwu.
Mu nu-koobatoo nasoomawunise tooe mu nabatsase sapa, oꞌno mu nu-noꞌyookwu.
Mooeꞌugasoo gisoo ka Te Naa besa podo meana, tamme sakwa oetu soohane, tamme haaꞌa tooe oo mane-waꞌneꞌyoo?
Soo numu puu ka nobe-tookwuse ka gi oo nanenagakwuna mooe soohanena sukwe nobe-tookoohase, ona manikese, tukwumehoe petugase yise oto oo matusookwuni. Oꞌno yise mu numu oo-maꞌyoona nanekoe.
‘Ma how manedu masoo? Masoo sakwa uga mitu soohanese, oꞌno yise uga nobe-too.’
Tamme sakwa nakobenatusoo soohanena ka naꞌakwebu moohedu-waꞌne, oosoo tu manikwuna puu mooe soohanese numu-no nagoekwu.
Oosoo ka mu tubetse ewow, ka gi mu matzooeku-waꞌne manepunnena, oosoo yise umu-no oetu nehanese mu tu pupuaꞌamu-doose sumusoo nanano besa meadabekwu.
Mu ka nu-noꞌyookwuse mu noꞌoko mu hee-gana matusookwunikwu, oꞌno gi hee mu tsitugukwu.
Ongabe puu besaꞌyoo ka ongakamana. Ka gi ongakama manese, tamme gi hownnekoo oo madi-waꞌneꞌyoo.

Oosoo gi he-toogoo besaꞌyoo ka gi kamana, tamme oo totsakwatekwunaꞌe. Ooosoo tamme ka Te Naa besa podo meadabena, ka te kammana kadoo manepetugase, Te Naa te totsakwatekwunaꞌe. Mu sakwa e nakapunne, oꞌno mu gi nasootuaganedooa.”
Ewaꞌyoo umu tumasumudoodu-no kummaꞌakoosoo numu tumaꞌemukwadu ka Te Pabeꞌe yadooadyakwe oo-baa petuse oo nakapunne.
Umu Pharisee nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu mee naneyugwedu ka Te Pabeꞌe nesootzemana mee unakwe, “Oosoo Jesus ka mu tumaꞌemukwadu pupuaꞌamu-gaꞌyoo umu-no tukayakwe.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu natugwengayakwe.
“Tamme puu ka ewow seepu-gana sumuoo nawatsekuse ka mu ewow seepu ka giba-masoo maꞌwukese ka sumuoo seepu nawatzekudu watehookakwu.
Ka nawatzekudu seepu mayuse, tamme ka besa soonammena nobe-kwitoo oo tzanogakwu.
Mee yise tamme ka te pupuaꞌamu tuukwekwu, ‘Mu sakwa nu-no besa sokwamapunne, nu ka seepu nawatzekuse oo mayusoo.’

Ka umu Te Naa tutummatzidu mu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo puu besa sokwamayakwe ka sumuoo numu tumaꞌemukwadu nanekwahayakwe, pana mu numu kaaheno meadu mee sukwe naneyugwedu mu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo suda oo sokwamakute ka gi kaaheno mu nanekwaha.
Soo mogoꞌne puu sumumano (10) ese tupe-ma namadabuedu hee-gaꞌyoo yise sumuoo watzekuse toogootabuakuse tu nobe-kwitu wutzooꞌnekwu oo watena.
Ka oo mayuse besa soonammena mee tu pupuaꞌamu-noko tu nopuaꞌamu tuukweꞌe, ‘Nu besa soonamme ka e tuwatzekuna mayuse.’
Ooosoo umu Te Naa tutummatzidu mu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo besa sokwamakwu ka sumuoo tumaꞌemukwadu namayuse ka Te Naa besa podo menoꞌo meakwu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo natugweꞌnga, “Sumuꞌyoo nana waahoo dooamu-gaꞌyoo.
Soo oo penage ka tu naa meeoo netamma, ‘U sakwa ka hemma saaꞌa u yaꞌese nuka u hanekukwuna menoꞌosoo e haneku.’ Soo mu naa yise tu hemmatu oo haneku.
Saaꞌa yise soo oo tooa ka pumme tu hee-maga-ma tumuse yise kwingaꞌa-too mea. Ewa nanasuda manena yabesoo ka pumme tu hemma-gana pumatu tu tumupu tzasooꞌow.
Ka saaꞌa ka tukapu unu natugenoꞌo, oosoo tsuayina ka tu hemma tzasooase gi hownnekoosoo ka tukapu tumu-waꞌne manepetu.
Sumuꞌyoo nana oonow tabewa-gaꞌyoo hogu-gaꞌyoo oo nedyaꞌwe ka tu hogu oo maka tuunguna.
Oosoo ka unu tsuayina ka ‘Umu hogu namakana sakwa nu tuka,’ mee soonamme ka gi hownnekoo ka nadukadu tamamayuna.
Oowetu soohanese mee tusooyugwe, ‘Menoꞌo nu tsuayaꞌegaꞌa. Pana umu e naa tummatzidu puu besa namakayakwe ewa natugapeniyakwe.
Nu sakwa nobe-kwitoo kodyuse ka e naa mee netamma, “Nu tubetse suda u masoonammekute, ka Te Naa tuwazoo.
U sakwa gi e natubangapana, nu ka sutaꞌyoona, u sakwa e sukwe nedyaꞌwe.” ’
Oosoo yise nobe-kwitoo kodyuka gisoo pumme oo wupetugaꞌa soo oo naa ona o kemma o posopedakwudoose tutuha oo poosoopedyase oo-matoo tanomanese, oo masootuhi petuga.
Soo oo tooa yise meeoo oo netamma, ‘Nu tubetse suda mu manuuma ka Te Naa tuwazoo. Mu sakwa gi e natubangapana, nu ka sutaꞌyoona.’
Pana soo oo naa ka umu pumme tummatzidu mee netamma, ‘Yabesoo ka e dooa besa namasooapu hanekuooke, maꞌnegeaꞌa tuwow, moko pukwi oo namadabuekwuna oo hanekuooke.
Ka unu yoohoopu te tubatsakwuna kootsoo hanehoodooa oo batsahoose oo koomahanekooha. Tamme ewa tukase besa sokwamakwu.
Oosoo ka yoo manepunnena nu ka e dooa watzekutu-kwaꞌne mane ka oo petuse tooe nanasuda oo manenumme sapa, nu besa soonamme ka oo petuse. Umu yise ewa tukana too nuka.’
Saaꞌa soo oo pabeꞌe oona tubewabe-kwiꞌyoona kemmana, ka mu tunekwuꞌu mu nakana,
ka sumuoo umu tu naa tummatzidu-matu meeoo tubenga, ‘How manena umu nugadu-kwaꞌne nanaka?’
Soo tutummatzidu yise meeoo oo tuukwe, ‘U wanngaꞌa petuoosesoo, u naa ka unu yoohoopu kootsoo oo batsaku. U naa ka oo-matoo besa soonamme ka oo petuhoosesoo.’
Soo oo pabeꞌe sutahoose gi ka nobe-kwi eka. Soo oo naa oo-matoo tsebooekese oo tooꞌe baꞌe.
Pana oosoo ka tu naa meeoo netamma, ‘Nu tubetse wunaꞌme ooosapa u nakabetseanumme. Pana u gi hannanoꞌo hemma e geadu. Gi moosooe seepu tooaꞌa sapa, ewa e pupuaꞌamu-no e tukakwuna e batsakute.
Pana u tooa ka pumme u hemena ka mu sutakoo momokoꞌne-matoo sukwe tzasooꞌa, menoꞌo kodyu petuse u yise ka unu yoohoopu kootsoo oo batsakukwu.’
Soo oo naa yise mee oo nanekwegeadooa, ‘U e besaa tooa ooosapa nu-baatu. Noꞌyoona soo nuga hee umetu-kwaꞌnesoo manepunne.

Besaꞌyoo te ewa tukana ka besa ta sokwama. Yoo soo manepunne, soo u wanngaꞌa uga nawatsekupu-kwaꞌne manese, menoꞌo yise ka petuse tamme besa sokwama oo-matoo.’ Yooosoo soo Te Naa ka manatooe how tooe te manemose ka te kodyu petuse besa tamme-matoo soonammekwu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka umu pumme nakatzimodu mee natugwenga, “Sumuꞌyoo nana hee-gaꞌyoo kummaꞌakoosoo numu tu hemma mabetsea tuungu. Saaꞌa yise mee oo naka, gi besa oo hemma meakute.
Oosoo yise nabaatoo oo bise mee oo netamma, ‘U ka e hemma sukwe tzasooꞌa mee nu u naka. Ka noꞌoko hemma e tumadabue tuunguna nu-matoosoo haneke, u gi hemma e mabetseakukwu yaa manakwana.’
Soo oo mameakudu mee soonamme, ‘Howga nu manekwu? Nu ka umu hemma how nuugwewununa gi mapuꞌana gi mu numu e nedyaꞌwe-waꞌneꞌyoo. Nu mu numu hemma e natuunguna nasookwikute.
Nu sakwa ka numu hemma sukwe hanekwu, oꞌno umu saaꞌa ka e nadayahoose e makadooa.’
Oosoo yise noꞌoko mu numu ka pumme nedyaꞌwedu nagutzikudu nabaatoo bi. Ka mooeꞌugasootu mee tubenga, ‘Haaꞌnoko u ka e nedyaꞌwedu nakutzikute?’
Oosoo meeoo oo nanekwegeꞌa, ‘Ewatsekoo yoohoo, nu oo nakutzikute.’ Oosoo yise mee oo netamma, ‘Yaasoo u tumadabuepu. U sakwa oo naamookwitusoo ma-ma botugu.’

Ka sumuoo yise too meeoo tubenga, ‘U punnoꞌo haaꞌnoko oo nakutzikute?’ Oosoo meeoo oo nanekwegea, ‘Ewatsekoo weeda nu oo nakutzikute.’ Mee yise oo netamma, ‘Yaa punnoꞌo ume tumadabuena huutsekoo mi botugu.’
Saaꞌa soo oo nedyaꞌwedu yise ka tu hemma mameakudu manena naka, mee yise oo netamma, ‘U tubetse unu soonamme. U ka nawitu poohina.’

Ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu ooosapa nawitu poohi ka umu tunakaꞌoedyukudu soonamme. Tamme sakwa punnoꞌo nawitu soohane. Tamme sakwa ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona te hee-matu numu hanekuna, besa mu matuguna ewa pupuaꞌamu-ga. Oꞌno ka saaꞌa tamme ka Te Naa-baa petugase, soo Te Naa te sootuhikwu ka besa te tumatugu-koobatoo.
Tamme ka gi unu nanenagadu he-koobatoo esagoena, tamme ka unu nanenagadu he-koobatoo esagoekwu tuwazoo.

Yoo manepunne tamme ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona ka gi te hemma kaaheno mabetseana, saaꞌa ka Te Naa-baa manepetugase tamme gi ka tubetse nasootuhipe nageakwu, tamme ka gi kaaheno mu tumatuguna mabetseana.
Ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona ka gi kaaheno hemma mabetseana saaꞌa ka Te Naa-baa petugase, tamme gi tammesoo hownnekoo nasootuhipe nageakwu.
Tamme gi hownnekoo waahoo soowabega-waꞌneꞌyoo. Sumuna tamme sumuoo besa soobedyana besa oo nakabetseakwu. Tamme gi namekoosoo soogwi-waꞌneꞌyoo ka Te Naa noko ka hemma ewow te hee-gana.”
Mu Jew nanesootuhidu numu Pharisee mee nananeadu ooosapa tu natumanakakuna soogwipunnedu. Umu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe unnepu nakase gi oo nakaheesoobedyana oo-maꞌyoona sukwe nanekoꞌe.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Mu ka mu numu mee tuukweyakwe, ‘Soo Te Naa besa ne sootuhise ewow ne heemaka numme ka besaꞌyoo numuna.’ Pana soo Te Naa gi mu watzekupunne ka yow teepu-koobaꞌyoona besa namanekwuna. Ka mu numu yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona besa mee mu nasooyugwedu, saaꞌa ka Te Naa-baa petugase, ‘Gi hee,’ mee oosoo mu netammadooa.
Ka John gisoo petu-kwitoo tooe mu ooosapa mu mooa tumayohope nagenoꞌo. Pana menoꞌo numme ka Te Naa besa unnepu numu tunedyooena noꞌobatusoo numu tookwa etzaga eka mee soonamme.
Pana soo Te Naa unnepu gi yise atasoo nuugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo, ooosapa manepunne.

Mu yise meeoo, ‘Oosoo numu ka tu nodukwa poonnekwunise kummaꞌakoosoo mogoꞌne nodukwadoose te tumayoho-kwi oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo,’ pana ka Te Naa tamme poonne-kwi mu maꞌemukwa. Yise ka napoonnekwunina mogoꞌne nodukwadoose, mu too tumaꞌemukwasoo esoo togesoo Te Naa unnepu.”
Mee yise soo Te Pabeꞌe mu natugwenga tuwazoo, “Soo ewow hee-gaꞌyoo nana ooosapa unu nanenagadu namasooadu. Nonotsa tabeno besa tukayakwe.
Nonotsa tabeno oo nobe-kumaba soo tutuha manedu nana unu uayidu, Lazarus mee naneadu habeyakwe.
Ka ewow hee-gakoo nana tugutsaꞌabu natuunguyakwe. Mu saduꞌu yise punnoꞌo ooosapa oo ua-witu ekosebayakwe.

Saaꞌa yise soo Lazarus yaꞌe. Umu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo Te Naa tutummatzidu ka oo moogooa Te Naa-baatoo bika. Oobeoo petuoogase ka besow te namooatupu Abraham mee naneadu-kumaba katuse oo-no tuka. Soo ewow hee-gaꞌyoo nana punnoꞌo yaꞌese nakoo.
Ka goso gi tookedu-wi petuga. Toogoopatu poonnese nakwingaꞌatoo ka Abraham poonne ka Lazarus oo-baa katu.

Ka Abraham waꞌagese meeoo netamma, ‘E puaꞌa, u sakwa tutuha e soobedyase ka baa-wi Lazarus mamoogoo oo tsetzaka tuungu soo Lazarus sakwa ka e ego-koobatoo ooka oo pasaweku tuungu, esoo goso nuummabu e wumakute.’

Soo Abraham yise meeoo oo netamma, ‘Uga tooe oo soomaꞌyu ka togesoo ka teepu-kooba nummenummena, u uga ooosapa ewow hee-gana, oo-ma nasoonatzina, menoꞌo yise oosoo gi u magwetzoꞌi gi hemma nesoobedya tooe ka Lazarus tutuha manenumme sapa u gi oo tummatzaꞌe. Menoꞌo Lazarus yise besa hee-gana u yise nuummaba wuma.
Numme gi hownnekoo u tummatzi-waꞌneꞌyoo ka pabow tukapa ta naamookwi hape.’
Soo uga ewow hee-gaꞌyoo nana yise ka Abraham mee oo netamma, ‘U sakwa umu manegeoo (5) e wangaꞌamu-matoo ka Lazarus taya, oosoo mu tuukwe ka e namanatzayina. Oꞌno saaꞌa umu gi nu-kwaꞌnesoo manedooa.’
Soo Abraham yise meeoo oo netamma, ‘Umu haaꞌa gi mu Te Naa yadooawabe tubona neadu?’
Oosoo yise ka Abraham meeoo netamma, ‘Umu gi ka Te Naa nayadooawabe nakaheesoobedyadu pana mu ka Lazarus yaꞌepu oo sopedakwadoona ka pu-baasoo oo petugase, oꞌno umu oo oedyukukwu.’
Soo Abraham yise meeoo oo netamma, ‘Umu ka mooasoo gi Te Naa unnepu nakaꞌoedyukuna tooe umu numu yaꞌekwikoo namayoda pu-baa petuga sapa, umu gi oo nakaꞌoedyuku-waꞌneꞌyoo.’ “
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise pumme nakatzimodu mee netamma, “Ooosapa ewaꞌyoo numu ooonneꞌyoo, ka suta-kwitoo numu mesoo kwase nokayakwe. Soo sutaꞌyoo umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.
Umu ka sumuoo Te Naa tooa-matu kwase nokase, soo mu manena hanobaꞌyoonasoo umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.
Tamme sakwa ooosapa ka te puaꞌa besa matuguna mu tummatzi yise ka te puaꞌa tamme suda matugu tamme sakwa oo tuukwe. Oosoo ka suda tu manena nemakodyuse tamme sakwa oo soomuꞌwakwuni.
Tooe hano sapa oo matuadyigena yise ka ooka oo nemakodyukuyakwe tamme sakwa ooosapa punnoꞌo oo soomuꞌwano.”
Umu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu oo-matu kemmase meeoo netamma, “Unusoo besa ne tuꞌoedyukukwuna ne sootuhi.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Tooe tamme tuutse te pewu katzookwanatuma tuꞌoedyukuna, ka sunngabe ooweoo baa-witoo anoa tuunguse oosoo yise te tunetammatusoo manekwu.
Gi sakwa tamme pabow oo neyugwena Te Naa unnepu mayohonona, mooasoo tamme tu tunepohabekuna mayohodyina. Ka tummatzidu-kwaꞌne oosoo puu ka puuwanatu mamakwuse nobe-kwi petu.
Oosoo puu gi katuhoopetuse tukakoohakwu. Mooeꞌugasoo oosoo ka pumme nedyaꞌwedu tukakwuna mooe haneoose,
yise saaꞌa ka pumme nedyaꞌwedu tukamakwuse, oꞌno yise punnoꞌo tukakwu. Oosoo gi haꞌyoo oo sooyugwe, ‘Nu ka mooasoo oo tu tunepohabekuna mayohodyina.’
Tamme ka Te Naa tunepohabekuna mayohodyina, gi sakwa tamme papaba oo sooyugwepana o te nagekwuna yaa manakwana.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Jerusalem-witoo meana, ka umu Jew numu noko wakwawaꞌa numu tubewabe Samaria mee naneadu-kumi mea.
Toge ka Samaria-wi oo egeakakwuse sumumanoꞌyoo (10) nanana uagoedu oo wegeahoo. Umu gi oo tzageꞌe nuuyugwena,
mee oo sukwe netamma, “U Ne Pabeꞌe Jesus, u sakwa ne sootuhi.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Ka mu Jew numu nanesootuhiwabe tzapoonneku mu mooasoo namabesakuhoo.” Ka tooesoo mu meagaꞌa mu ua besa manika.
Sumuꞌyoo wawaꞌa nana suuꞌmu ka tu ua namabesakuse besa soonammese ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoosoo kodyuhoodooa mee unnenoꞌo, “Soo Te Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo.”

Ka Te Pabeꞌe-kobena petugase mee oo netamma, “U besa e sootuhi ka e mabesakuse.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo unakwe, “Nu sumumanoko (10) nanana mabesaku pana sumuꞌyoosoo umu-matu kodyutooa ka Te Naa besa pumme tumatugukupu waha. Umu sumu kadoopu (9) Jew nanana gi kodyu petu, umu sumuna ooosapa meagaꞌa.
Esoo sumuꞌyoosoo wawaꞌa nana yise kodyu petu yise mu uagoedu e nanumu gi e heesoobedya tooe pumme e mabesakuse sapa.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka wawaꞌa meeoo netamma, “Tooe u wawaꞌa pana, u ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna namabesaku, menoꞌo yise u nobe-kwitoo mesoo kodyu.”

Mu numu ka umu nananesootuhidu-nagatu Pharisee mee nananeadu ka Te Pabeꞌe mee tubenga, “Hannanoꞌo soo Te Naa te nemadabuedooakwu?” Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu nanekwegea, “Gi tamme oo poonne-waꞌneꞌyoo ka tamme oo nemadabuekoohase.
Numu gi meeoo unne-waꞌneꞌyoo, ‘Menoꞌo soo Te Naa te nemadabue,’ soo Te Naa ka mooasoo tamme-nagakwitoo nemadabuena.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka pumme nakatzimodu meeoo netamma, “Mooeꞌugasoo mu Jew numu menoꞌo yaa teepu-kooba gwetzoimodu, gi e nakaꞌoedyukute. Umu e batsakwu. Saaꞌa mu sakwa e poonne mee tooe sokwamapana mu gi e poonne-waꞌneꞌyoo. Mu susumudu mu nemooagakwu mee mu netammakwu, ‘Soo Te Pabeꞌe mooasoo watze petuse oonowsoo numme-baa.’ Mu sakwa gi mu nakabetseapana. Nu tooe hanoꞌyoona tooe mesoo napoonnekwu ka petuhoose tukwukwutzeba-kwaꞌne.
Ka gisoo e petu mu numu gi e nakaheesoobedyadu tooe how tooe maꞌnaꞌwekwu. Ka oꞌnosoo tu mane-kwaꞌnesoo ka nana Noah mee naneadu togesoo ka yaa teepu-kooba gwetzoi nummenumme.

Umu puu gi oo nakaheesoobedyadu tooe pumme oo tooe tuukwe sapa tukana, hebena, tooe how tooe manakwe. Ka oꞌno tabeno ka Noah ka sake-wi tsebooese, powma petuse soo teepu patatsopowse mu numu ka teepu-koobatu noꞌyoona batatuihoo.
Ka oꞌnosoo ka namanepu tuwow ka Lot togesoo eka teepu-kooba gwetzoinumme
Pana ka Lot ka Sodom-wiꞌyoona namameꞌa soo goso paꞌanakwana powmadu-kwaꞌne sawewunuse noꞌoko mu kootuikuoo.
Ooosoo mu menoꞌo numu maꞌnaꞌwekwu, ka saaꞌa e kodyu petuse.
Mu puu ka nobe-kobenaꞌyoona tooetoo ona tubewabe-kwiꞌyoona, mu sakwa gi mu nobekwitoosoo kodyupana tooe ka mu hemma soomayupana.
Mu sakwa ka Lot nodukwa manepu soomayu. Oosoo puu ka namameahoose wesabetugase, ongabe mani.
Tamme ka tammesoo tooe namagwetzoina, tamme kadoo nuugwekwu, pana ‘Ka gi hownneꞌyoo tooe nu ka Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo nabatsase sapa,’ mee unnena tamme namagwetzoikwu.
Ka yaa teepu-koobasoo e petuse sumuna wahaꞌyoo numu kapa-wi utuikwabekwu, sumuꞌyoo tunakaꞌoedyukudu nu-no manegakwu sumuꞌyoo gi e nakaheesoobedya umu natzapenihookwu.
Sumuna wahaꞌyoo momokoꞌne oonaꞌyoona toosoona, sumuꞌyoo tunakaꞌoedyukudu nu-no manekakwu sumuꞌyoo gi e nakaheesoobedyadu oosoo natzapenihookwu.”
Sumuꞌyoo mu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu-matu mee oo tubenga, “Hanoꞌyoona oo namanekwu?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu nanekwegea, “Tooe hanoꞌyoo tooe mu kweꞌnaꞌa puu ka hemma nabatsa-kwi sumuhookwu. O oosoo puu oo sopedakwadoo tabuꞌa.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu numu mee tunedyooe, “Tamme sakwa ooosapa nanetzakwiyino gi oo nasoomukwapana tooe gi yabesoo tamme tu nekwegea sapa.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu numu meeoo natugweꞌnga,
“Sumuꞌyoo sutaꞌyoo nana gi ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu, gi numu tutuha soobedyadu, mu numu-nehanedu.
Nonotsa tabeno sumuꞌyoo peawabe oo-baa petuyina mee oo netammayakwe, ‘Oosoo e wohonedu suda e matugu. U sakwa e tummatzi.’
Wunaꞌme soo numu-koobatu nehanedu gi oo nakabetsea pana saaꞌa mee soonamme, ‘Tooe nu gi ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna gi mu numu tutuha soobedyapana, nu sakwa ka peawabe tumayohoku.
Ka nonotsa tabeno e tubenguna e nesagwaꞌe.’ “
Mee tuwazoo soo Te Pabeꞌe unakwe, “Soo sutaꞌyoo nana numu-nehanedu ka peawabe ooosapa pumme nanetsagwayi oo tumayohoku.
Soo Te Naa ka umu tu doodooamu nakasootuhikwu ka nonotsa tabeno mu nanetzakwiyinoꞌo, ka nonotsa togano tuwazoo.
Umu nagutza tubetse wunaꞌme tuutooe, soo Te Naa yabesoo mu nanekwegeahookwu. Pana ka yaa teepu-koobasoo e kodyu petuse, sumuna mu numu tuꞌoedyukudu kadooꞌyookwu.”
Susumudu numu puusoo besa nasooyugwena kukummaꞌakoosoo numu sutaꞌyoo mee sooyugwe ooonneꞌyoona soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu natugweꞌngaꞌa.
“Wahaꞌyoo numu-ga ka mu nanesootuhidu tunehane-kwitoo memeakwate. Sumuꞌyoo ka mu nanesootuhidu Pharisee mee nananeadu-nagatu, sumuꞌyoo yise tumaꞌemukwadu.

Soo mu Pharisee-matu ka mu numu-wana wununa nanesootuhiwunu, ‘Ne Naa u tubetse besaꞌyoo. U nuka besa matabue gi ka numu-waꞌnesoo. Nu ooosapa nonoꞌotsa awamooa nanesootuhina pooha tuwunikwu punnoꞌo. Mu susumudu numu suda sukwe manena unu moomoogoobana unu nanidyapu. Soo o wunudu tumaꞌemukwadu puu ooonneꞌyoo. Nu gi oo-waꞌneꞌyoo.’
Soo tumaꞌemukwadu nasookwina gi oetu poonnena sukwe nanesootuhikooha, ‘Nu tubetse ewa suda manakwe. U sakwa tutuha e soobedyana e tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwa.’

Ka mu nanesootuhimakwuse soo Te Naa mee unakwe, ‘Oosoo tumaꞌemukwadu besa manakwe ka tu tumaꞌemukwana nematzakwunina, nu yise oo sootuhikwu suda oo manepu soomuꞌwakwu. Soo Pharisee numu togesoo sutaꞌyoo tu tumaꞌemukwana gi nematzagana, puusoo besa nasooyugwena.’ Tamme ka tammesoo besa nasooyugwena gi hee ka Te Naa-nakwana. Pana tamme ka tammesoo gi maawaꞌneꞌyoo e mee nasooyugwena, oꞌno soo Te Naa te sootuhikwu.”
Mu numu tu doodooamu tooe Te Pabeꞌe-baa bi petugonno umu mu nanesootuhiku tuunguna. Mu oo tunakatzimodu ka mu poonnena mu numu nesagwikute ka oo mu manegonno.

Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu tu nakatzimodu netamma, “Gi mu numu mu dooamu hane petugonnodu nedagonnopana. Mu tututsekoo dooake nu sootuhikwu.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo unakwe, “Nu kaaheno mu tuukwekwu. Soo tuhaꞌyoo ka haꞌyoo oo tuukwe oo nakaꞌoedyukukwu. Mu sakwa ka tuhaꞌa-kwaꞌne tunakaꞌoedyukuna mu ka Te Naa-baa petugakwu.”
Sumuꞌyoo numu moohedu ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo tubenga, “U tubetse besaꞌyoo nana. Haꞌoo besa sakwa tuwow nu manese namagwetzoi?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo oo nanekwegea, “U haaꞌa mee e netamma, ‘U besaꞌyoo,’ gi haga besaꞌyoo, Te Naa suuꞌmu besaꞌyoo.
U oo sopedakwatoo ka Te Naa tamme tuukwepu: gi numu batsapana, gi numu nowuakupana, gi tuduhapana, gi esayipana numu mane-witu, besa tu naa noko tu pea sooyugwena.”
Soo nana yise meeoo oo netamma, “Mooasoo nu tuhaꞌyoona meeoo naꞌunnedu nakabetseakena.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka nana unnena nakase mee oo netamma, “U sakwa noꞌoko u hemma-ma tumuse ka u nahemena ka mu tutuha manedu hanekuse, oꞌno yise u ewow hee-gakwu ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona. Oꞌno u yise nuka nakatzinummekwu.”
Soo nana yise ka oo unnena nakase suda soonamme ka ewow hee-gana, tu hemma unu nenagana.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe oo poonnepunnena ka nana-witu meeoo netamma, “Oosoo ewow hee-gaꞌyoo tuheka-ma nasoonatzina gi puusoo namagwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
Mu oo tunakatzimodu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakase punnoꞌo meeoo tutubenga, “Hownnekoo soo numu yise mesoo namagwetzoi?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo unakwe, “Soo numu gi puusoo namagwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo. Pana soo Te Naa suuꞌmu mu magwetzoikwu.”
Soo Peter yise meeoo oo netamma, “Mooasoo numme noꞌoko hemma puu ne heegana maꞌwugese u-no maneke.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Tooe haga tooe, tu nobe maꞌwukadu, tu nanumu noko hemma tu hee-gana tu doodooamu tu tubewabe, ka nuka nagena ewowsoo besa noꞌobatusoo nasootuhikwu, menoꞌo manakwana. Mu nasootuhikwuna gi moobegwagakwu.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Jerusalem-witoo umu tu nakatzimodu sukwesoo nesumudoose umu-no yadooana meeoo mu netamma, “Tamme ka Jerusalem-wi petugase, soo Te Naa yadooawabe oꞌnosoo nu-witu tubotugu oto nanemamakwu. Umu numu tutunehanedu nu-ma tzakadukwuse, ka mu tiboꞌo-matoo e tzamunase umu yise e batsakwu.
Umu tiboꞌo yise e kobitoo toohegonno e wupagetana, yise e batsakwu. Pana nu yise saaꞌa pahe tabe mease tuusootabuedooa,” mee.
Pana mu oo nakatzimodu yise gi oo nakasopedakwatoo yise meeoo nanaꞌunakwe, “Haꞌyoo naꞌunnedu tamme gi nakasopedakwatoo?”
Ka Jericho tzageꞌe ka Jesus manekena sumuꞌyoo gi tubootabuedu nana oonow po-kumaba katuna ka mu numu natummatzi tuunguyakwe.
Esoo gi tubootabuedu nana ka mu ewow numu pukumi meadu meeoo tubenga, “Haꞌoo haaꞌa namanewunu?” mee.
Mu numu yise meeoo oo netamma, “Soo Jesus yaa kemma.”
Soo gi tubootabuedu yise meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “E Pabeꞌe e sootuhi.”
Ewaꞌyoo mu numu oo-naꞌoonnakwitu yise oo nedayakwe. “Gi unnepana,” mee oo netammayakwe. Pana soo gi tubootabuedu yise pabasoo ka Te Pabeꞌe yadooadyakwe, “U E Pabeꞌe, u sakwa e sootuhi.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise yooꞌipetu ka mu numu ka gi tubootabuedu tsaka tuungu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka pu-baa ka gi tubooetabooedu natzaka petuse meeoo oo tubenga,
“Hownnekoo natummatzi u sookwina?” mee. Soo gi tubootabuedu yise meeoo oo netamma, “Nu gi tubootabuena yaatu soopoonne.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo ka gi tubootabuedu netamma, “Mow u ka besa tunakaꞌoedyukuna, menoꞌo yise u yaatu poonnekwu.”
Yabesoo yise soo gi tubootabuedu besa manise yaatu besa poonnena ka Te Pabeꞌe nakwi ka podo meadabekoo. Mu numu ka gi tubootabuedu nana namabesakuse oo poonnese yise ka Te Pabeꞌe nesookwugi.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Jericho mee naneadu-too meana.
Sumuꞌyoo nana besa manepunnedu Zacchaeus mee naneadu ka tumasumudoope nemadunagadu oonow.
Ka Te Pabeꞌe soopoonne pana gi oo poonne. Nagutza ewatseoo mu numu ka meetzeꞌe oo wunu.
Ka sunngabe-ma tuboyahoo ka Te Pabeꞌe tu kumi meakwuse.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka sunngabe-toohakwi meana anguse ka Zacchaeus poonnese mee oo netamma, “Yabeupu wueke nu u-baaꞌyookwu yaa tabeno.”
Zacchaeus besa soonammese wuekese ka Te Pabeꞌe tu nobe-kwitoo bika.
Mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe nesootzemakooha mee oo netamma, “Soo Jesus ka tumaꞌemukwadu-baaꞌyookwu.”
Soo Zacchaeus ka Te Pabeꞌe mee netamma, “Nu naamookwitu ka e hee-ga-matu mu tutuha manedu numu namadeakwu. Nu ka mu numu e tutuhana watsu oo-koobakwi nu oo makodyukudooa.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo, “Yaa tabeno-manakwana u ka u dooamu-no namagwetzoikwu. Yaa tabeno u Te Naa tooa manekwu.
Nu yaa teepu-koobatoo nataya tumaꞌemukwadu magwetzoikwuse.”

Mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakapunnena, “Soo Te Pabeꞌe mooasoo ka Jerusalem tzageꞌe oosoo ka o petugase soo Te Naa mu numu-kooba katuna mu moohekwudu ka Te Pabeꞌe mayugwekwu,” mee mu numu sokwamapunne. Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu sokwamana sopedakwadoo yise mee mu netamma, “Oꞌno umu oo nakasopedakwadookwu gi menoꞌosoo namanikwudu nu saaꞌa numu moohekwudu.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu natugweꞌnga, “Soo sumuꞌyoo nana ka numu-kooba katudu nanumu ka mu numu-kooba pumme tu neyugwese oosoo ka umu sumumano (10) pumme tummatzidu mee netamma, ‘Nu nanasusuꞌmuhoo oa tupe mu hemegakwu. Mu saaꞌa mu maꞌewadooa. Nu kwingaꞌa meakwu ka noꞌoko tamme-kooba katudu-matoo oosoo mu-kooba katudu e nemayugwekwu. Nu yise nanemamakwutooase yise saaꞌa yowsoo kodyu petukwu, mu ka oa tupe maꞌewase saaꞌa nu-matoosoo oo makodyukudooa.’

Soo numu-kooba katudu yise mea susumudu mu numu otuoo ka nana gi petzabena sumuoo numu taya ka noꞌoko numu-kooba katudu-matoo mee oo tunetammakute, ‘Gi ookow nana ka numme-kooba katukwudu nemayugwepana, numme gi oo petzape.’
Pana oosoo numu-kooba katudu naneyugwese yise punowsoo kodyukakwu. Ka petugase, ka umu pumme tummatzidu nabatoo bi. ‘Howgena umu e tumaꞌewaku?’ mee soonammena.
Soo mooeꞌugasoo oa tupe nageadu oo-baa petuse

mee oo netamma, ‘U sumuoo oa tupe e gea nu oo maꞌewase menoꞌo yise nu sumumano (10) u makodyukukwu.’ Soo numu-kooba katudu yise mee oo netamma, ‘U tubetse besa manepu-gaꞌyoo. U besa e tumatugukupu ka sumuoosoo ume e gease. Menoꞌo yise nu besa u sootunagakwu, nu sumumano (10) nanakummaꞌakoosoo numu-kooba u nemadabuekwu.’
Soo penakwatu oo-baa petuse, punnoꞌo meeoo, ‘U sumuoosoo oa tupe e gease, nu yise punnoꞌo oo maꞌewase menoꞌo mangeoo oa tupe nu u makodyukudooa.’
Soo numu-kooba katudu meeoo oo netamma, ‘U punnoꞌo besa manepu-gaꞌyoo u manegeoo nanakummaꞌakoosoo numu-kooba nemadabuekwu.’
Kummaꞌyoosoo yise oo-baa petuhoose, mee oo netamma, ‘Yaa soo oa tupe nuka u geapu nu a makodyukukwusoo. Nu wanapu-naga a watzetugu.
Nu oo watzetugu ka u-ma suina, u nenaduꞌya. U ooosapa numu-makoo tusoogwipunnedu.’
Soo numu-kooba katudu yise meeoo oo netamma, ‘Nu ka nenaduyana ooosapa numu-makoo tusoogwipunnedu, u sakwa uga ka ume e geana tooe how tooe sootunagase uga punnoꞌo oo maꞌewa.’
Soo numu-kooba katudu yise ka mu numu oo konnodu mee netamma, ‘Ka oa tupe oo-makoo gwuuse ka nana sumumanoko (10) e makodyukudooadu saaꞌa gea.’
Mu numu yise meeoo netamma, ‘Mooasoo oosoo besa manepunne ewow oa tupe-gaꞌyoo. Haꞌoo yise u oo-koobakwisoo oo tugeakwu?’
Pana soo numu-kooba katudu mu nanekwegea, ‘Soo numu ka pumme tu tugeana besa matuguna, oosoo ewasoo nageakwu. Soo numu yise ka gi toge tumatuguwunudu gi besa oo tzasooana umu-makoo nahanekwu.
Menoꞌo yise ka umu nuka wohonedu ka numu-kooba e katukwu-kwi gi e petzabedu yaatoo masumudoose yaa e poonnenaꞌyoo kadoo mu mayugwe.’ “
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka meeoo unnemakwuse ka umu pumme nakatzimodu-no Jerusalem-kwitoo meaꞌa.
Bethpage noko Bethany mee nananeadu-kumi meana ka poꞌwoadu Olive mee naneadu tzageꞌe petuga. Oꞌno yise soo Te Pabeꞌe waahoo pumme nakatzimodu-matu taya, meeoo mu netammana,
“Ka Bethpage-witoo memeakwate. Onoko mu sumuoo tzagaze gisoo namadusooꞌyookudu mayukwu, oo tsadopase nu-matoo oo wetzakake.
Ka numu mumme tubenga, ‘How mannena mu oo tzadoopa?’ mee mu nekwegea, ‘Ne Pabeꞌe oo soogwaꞌe.’ “
Mu wahaꞌyoo naana yise memease pumme tu tuukwe-kwaꞌnesoo oo mayu petuga.
Ka tzagaze mu tzadoopawunu, mu numu mu tubenga, “How manena mu a tzadoopa?”
Umu yise mu nekwegea, “Soo Ne Pabeꞌe a nekwaꞌe.” Oꞌno mu numu yise gi hayoo mu netamma.
Mu wahaꞌyoo naana yise ka tzagaze ka Te Pabeꞌe-baatoo tzakakase, wega oo-kooba hanese, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu wega-kooba katunoꞌo.
Ewaꞌyoo numu wega ka po-kooba wupatzeta.
Oosoo yise ka tuupetukana ka poꞌwoadu Olive petakwana mea mu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu yise papaba apegeana oo nesookwugaꞌe ka oo manena poonnena.
Umu papaba apegeana, “U yow, Ne Tubetse Pabeꞌe ne magwetzoidu.”
Ewaꞌyoo mu Pharisee-matu yise meeow ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Mu ume nakatzimodu nesagwiku.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu nekwegea, “Ka umuoo gi unakwe, kukummaꞌyoosoo e nesookwugikwu.”
Ka Jerusalem mee naneadu tzageꞌe soo Te Pabeꞌe manegana ka Jerusalem poonnese mu numu tutuha soonammeguna mu yagakute
mee unakwe, “Tooe menoꞌo pana mu sakwa oo soopedakwadoo, ka mumme e soomagwetzoikwuse pana mu gi e nakaheesoobedya.
Saaꞌa umu mu wokwohomu mu naꞌoonakwi mani petuse mu takone petukwu, mu gi hownnekoo oo namatzatsebooe-waꞌneꞌyoo. Umu paaꞌa teepu tapoꞌwogese ka mu tupe koodeadoo-koobakwi mu-baa tsonooahookwu.

Umu mu numu kadooꞌoo maꞌese mu nobe wunabetahookwu ka yow Jerusalem-witu. Gi sumuꞌyoo sapa natapoꞌwogedu tupe namayukwu. Sukwe puuwapudooahookwu. Soo Te Naa menoꞌosoo mu mabetseana mu magwetzoikwu mee tooe soonammepana mu gi ka Te Naa nakaheesoobedya.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka hemma-ma tumudu-matoo meahoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu numu oeꞌyoona hemma-ma tumudu tayapebuꞌahoo oosoo ka mu manena gi togeꞌyookuna. Ka mu tayana soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu netamma, “Soo Te Naa ka umu oꞌnosoo tu yadooawabe ekow po tugupu, ‘Soo e nobe pukwiꞌyoona noꞌobatusoo numu nanesootuhikwu.’ Mu ka e nobe-kwiꞌyoo gi besa manakwe ka miꞌyoona nanatuduhana.”

Nonotsa tabeno soo Te Pabeꞌe mu numu tunedyooe ka nanesootuhipe-kwiꞌyoona. Mu Jew numu tutunehanewabe ka Te Pabeꞌe batsakwu mee unnena oo hoawi pana gi hownnekoo oo batsa-waꞌneꞌyoo ka mu numu ewa oo naꞌoonnakwi mamanepunne numu yise mu Jew numu tutunehanewabe tuꞌeapunnena oꞌno umu gi hownnekoo how Te Pabeꞌe yugwe.
Sumu ka Te Pabeꞌe mu numu tunedyooedyakwe ka Pabow Nanesootuhi Nobe-kobenaꞌyoona umu Jew numu tutunehanedu-nagatu oo-baa petuse,
mee oo tubenga. “Haga meeoo u netammana u ka Pabow Nanesootuhi Nobe-kwi u tooe namabedakwabawunu?” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise punnoꞌo mee mu nanekwegea, “Nu punnoꞌo ka John-witu mu tubengakwu.
Mu ka e nanekwegease nu punnoꞌo ka nuga pooha-witu mu tuukwekwu.
Haga ka John meeoo netammana oosoo numu baa-wi matzaka soo Te Naa pute oosoo puusoo oo sukwe manakwe?”

Umu yise puusoo mee nananetamma, “Tamme ka meeoo oo nanekwegease, ‘Soo Te Naa ka John mu numu baa-wi matzaka tuungu,’ meeoo oo netamma. Esoo meeoo te netammakwu, ‘How yise mu ka John gi nakaꞌoedyukute?’ Tamme meeoo ka Jesus netammase, puusoo oo manakwe, mu ewow numu punnoꞌo te kusedyakwu umu ka oo nakaꞌoedyukuna soo John Te Naa yadooawabe.”
Umu yise mee ka Te Pabeꞌe nanekwegea, “Numme gi oo sopedakwatoo.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Nu punnoꞌo gi hemma mu tuukwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus yise mu numu meeoo natugwenga, “Sumuꞌyoo nana tumasuꞌana yise mu numu ooka mabetsea tuunguse, yise mea.

Ka oo kwasuse, soo tumasuadu ka sumuoo tu tummatziwabe umu-matu taya. Oo naamookwitu a tupooe oo hane tuunguna. Mu numu yise ka pumatoo natayadu petugase oo wupagetahoose gi a tupooe-matu oo hanekupana oo tayakwunihoo.
Soo tumasuadu yise tuwazoo kummaꞌakoosoo pumme tummatzi oetusoo taya. Mu numu yise tubetse suda manena oo wupagetana punowsoo oo taꞌya gi hemma oo geapana.
Oꞌno yise soo tumasuadu ka kummaꞌakoosoo tuwazoo taya, ookow yise manayahoose punowsoo taya.
Soo tumasuadu yise meeoo tusooyugwe, ‘Howga yise nu manekwu? Nu ka e besaa tooa tayakwu. Umu sakwa sumuna ookow e besaa tooa nakaꞌoedyuku.’
Pana mu numu ka oo poonnese meeoo nanaꞌunakwe, ‘Yow esoo ka tumasuadu besaa dooa. Tamme a batsowse, ka oo tubewabe manekwu,’ mee unnena.
Umu yise ka tumasuape-wikoo oo matzatsepoogese oo batsa.

Soo tumusuadu ka oo nakahoose ka tu tooaꞌa nabatsahoose unu sutaꞌa, oosoo yise mu tumahese mu goe. Oꞌno yise oosoo tumasuape hee-gaꞌyoo kummaꞌakoosoo numu hane tuungukwu.” Mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakapunne oo unnena nakasopedakwadoose mee unne, “Suda hayoo.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Ka oꞌnosoo Te Naa nayadooawabe meeꞌe nu-kwitu botugupu-gaꞌyoo, ‘Mu tupe nobe-toodu puu ka sumuoo tupe moodyise. Soo mu tumoodyina tookwa gi pumme wuni-waꞌneꞌyoo o ka nobe madipunnedu.’ Nu yaahoo oosoo nanetammadu tupe Te Naa nobe madipunnedu.
Nu yow tupe-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Oꞌno mu gi nuka nakaꞌoedyukudu kadoo namayugwekoo. Ka numu nanemadabuekwu-kwi oo manepetuse umu gi e nakaheesoobedyadu kadoo namayugwekwu.”
Mu Jew numu tutunehanedu ka Te Pabeꞌe umu pukwitu netammana nakasopedakwatoona oo wutumahookwu mee unnegonno pana mu ewahoo Jew numu-ma sui.
Umu tutunehanedu-matu ka Te Pabeꞌe oo-matoo taya mu tutubenga tuunguna ka Te Pabeꞌe nehoawipunnena oo tunedyooepu-kwitu oo hooawipunne yise ka wakwawaꞌa numu moohedu-tamme oo tzamunahookwu.
Umu oo-matoo natayadu yise mee oo netamma, “Numme kaaheno numu u tunedyooena sopedakwatoo. U ooosapa Te Naa kaaheno unnepu numu tuukwenoꞌo. U gi numu tuutzeadu, mu numu u-nakwana sumuꞌyoosoo.
U ka mu wakwawaꞌa-tamme mu teepu-kooba natunekwiyi-kwitu haꞌyoo sooyugweꞌe?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka pumme mu nanekwegeakwu-kwitoo pumme mu hoawipunnena sopedakwadoona, mee mu netamma,
“Mu tumanagana e tzapoonneku.” Umu yise sumuoo oo tzapoonnekute. “Haga namanagana ma-ma?” meeꞌe mu tubenga. Umu yise meeoo oo nanekwegea, “Ka mu Tibo-kooba katudu namanagana ma-ma.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Tamme sakwa mu Tiboꞌo numu pabeꞌe geasoo umuoo nanumu tumadabuena. Tamme puu Te Naa tumadabuena Te Naa yise te hee-gaꞌyoo.”
Umu tutunehanedu-matu natayadu gi haꞌyoo unni-kwaꞌneꞌyoo ka ewow numu ka pumme nakapunne.

Mu Jew numu nananesootuhidu Sadducee mee nananeadu oo nakaꞌoedyukute soo numu gi hownnekoosoo ka yaꞌeyina soo oo moogooa ka Te Naa-baatoo meꞌa, gi too gwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo mee oo sooyugwedu. Susumudu umu-matu ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petuse nanatugweꞌnga.
Mee yise umu oo netamma, “Ka oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa yadooawabe Moses mee naneadu mee tunetammapu, ‘Soo nana ka yaꞌese soo oo wanngaꞌa sakwa ka oo nodukwa nodukwadoose ka tu Pabeꞌe dooamu-dookukwu.’
Umu natakwatsukwuꞌyoo (7) nanakwanngaꞌamu-witu. Soo mu pabeꞌe nodukwadoose, gisoo dooamu-gana yaꞌe.
Umu oo wangaꞌamu nanasuꞌmu nanapenakwa ookowsoo nodukwadoose sapa punnoꞌo gisoo oo-makoo dooamu-doona tuipetuga.
Saaꞌa soo mogoꞌne punnoꞌo yaꞌe.
U meeoo unnena, ‘Soo numu tu yaꞌekwikoo natzadyodase,’ ka ume unne-kwaꞌne mane haga yise umu-matu ka mogoꞌne nodukwa-gakwu, umu ka noꞌyoona oo nodukwa-gapana?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Mu numu menoꞌo ka yaa teepu-kooba mommodu ooosapa nananodukwadooyikwu.
Soo numu ka tuise namayodase gi nananodukwamu-gakwu, umu ka umu Te Naa tutummatziwabe, mu toha kakasa-ga-kwaꞌneꞌyookwu.
Umuoo Te Naa besa dooamu ka oo tummatzidu mu toha kakasa-ga-kwaꞌneꞌyoo umuoo ooosapa gwetzoibu nasootuhipu.

Tubetse togesapa soo Te Naa numu tu tui-kwikoo mayodakwu soo Moses pana meeoo te netamma ka numu tu tui-kwikoo namayodase. Oꞌnosoo soo Moses ka niwunudu sawabe-kobena wunupunnena soo Te Naa mee oo netamma, ‘Nu yow mu Naa. Umu u nanamooatupu mee nananeadu Abraham, Isaac yise Jacob nu-matoo togesoo nanesootuhi.’ Mu Abraham, Isaac-no Jacob tookwa togesoo gwetzoimoꞌo umu ka Te Naa-matoo togesoo nanesootuhimona tooe oꞌnosoo tuipupana.
Soo Te Naa noꞌoko mu numu moogooa gi watzekute.”
Susumudu mu nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu-matu o konnopunnena ka Te Pabeꞌe mee netamma, “U besakoo mu tuukweꞌe.”
Umu yise gi hemmasoo oo tubenga-waꞌne mane.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Umu nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu meeoo numu tunedyooe,” soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka David-maꞌyoona suaketu. Hownnekoo yise soo David ka Te Pabeꞌe natubangakwu?
Tooe soo David puusoo ka tu hoobeadoo-kwi mee tubotugupana, ‘Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe mee netammapu, “U sakwa ooosapa e tumadinakwa katu,
ka umu ume wohonedu e matzooekunoꞌotoo tooe.” ’
Nu ka David kobenatusoo, soo Te Naa ka yaa teepu-koobatoo e taya. Nu ka David-maꞌyoona kemmadu, oooneꞌyoona soo David, ‘E Pabeꞌe,’ natubanga,” meeꞌe soo Te Pabeꞌe.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka umu pumme nakatizmodu mee mu netammadyakwe ewaꞌyoo mu numu oo nakapunne,

“Mu sakwa gi mu Jew numu nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu-kwaꞌne manepana. Umu puu besa-kwi tu namasooa-ma nasootzaꞌmepunne numu pumme besa neyugwena petukudu. Umuoo ka tu naꞌewa tuka numu-koobatu naneyugwena soobedyadu punnoꞌo, oꞌno mu numu besa mu sooyugwekwu meeꞌe nasooyugwedu.
Nanesootuhaꞌe mee naneyugwe pana ka mu pepeawabe nobe umu-makoo tuduha tuwazoo. Umuoo tumaꞌemukwana umu-matoosoo kodyukwu ka suda mu tumatugu-kwi.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka umu ewow unu nanenagadu hee-gakoo numu tubebuamena mu poonnepunne.
Sumuꞌyoo tutuha manedu peawabe tu penebetu oe tuoonahoo.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka pumme nakatzimodu meeoo netamma, “Yow esoo besow mogoꞌne. Esoo tu penebetu oe tuooꞌna.
Yise mu naana gi ewa oe tuoonana, ka a namasumutoo-kwi tooe ewa hee-gapana. Esoo mogoꞌne tu penebetu oe tuooꞌna. Gi haaꞌnokoo oe tuooꞌna,” mee soo Te Pabeꞌe.
Susumudu mu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu yise ka nanesootuhi nobe-kwitu, ka mu nanenagadu besow tupe namadabuena oo poonnena oo nesookwugaꞌe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma,
“Esoo yow menoꞌo mu poonnena esoo besa tabuadu yaanona nobe te wokwohomu saaꞌa noꞌoko a wudyoomedakwunidooa.”
Mu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu yise meeoo oo tubenga, “Hannano yise oo mani petukwu how saaꞌa numme oo sopedakwadoo tabuakwu?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu nanekwegea, “Gi kummaꞌakoosoo numu mumme nemooaga oo nakaꞌoedyukupana. Ewaꞌyoosoo numu mee mu netammakwu, ‘Nu yow mu Pabeꞌe,’ mee mu nemooagana gi umu-ma nakaꞌemukwapana.
Mu tuwazoo ka tu nanaꞌakwe-kwitu nakakwu, tooetoo nanaꞌakwekwu pana gi oo-ma nakasuipana. Tooe yoo sumuna mooe namanekekwu sapa pana gisoo soo yaatu teepu atasoo e yugwekwuna oe manakwe.
Tooe hanotu tooe saaꞌa soo te teepu suyugadooa. Ewa-baatu numu kukummaꞌyoosoo nanagoena,
tukapu natugena natseagoena soo teepu yise yutsungayikwu. Tooe hemma tooe mu koomeba-nagakoo poonnekwu.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo tuwazoo mu netamma, “Gisoo hemma ꞌyoo manakwe umu gi nananesootuhidu gi mu petzabena mu-ma tzakaduse mu wupagetana mu wutumetakwu. Oꞌno yise mu numu-kooba katudu-kobenaꞌyoona mu nanehanekwu nu-koobatoo.
Oꞌno sakwa yise mu nukwitu mu tuukwe.
Ka pumme mu nehanekwuse nakwutumase saaꞌa mu unnekwu-kwitu gi soohanepana.
Nu saaꞌa ka mu nanehane nuusoo mu unnekwuna mu nemadabuekudooa, oꞌno saaꞌa soo mumme tumooꞌoodu gi hanotu haꞌyoo unnetooa.

Ewaꞌyoo mu numu gi e petzabedooa u nananumudooe suda u matugudooa yise mu goedooa saaꞌa. Tooe umu gi e sooꞌoedyukudu gi mumme numu petzabekwuse sapa, mu e nakaꞌoedyukudu gi e maꞌwukadu, nu mu magwetzoikwu.
Mu ka te wokwohomu ka Jerusalem-naꞌoonnakwi manise mu poonnena mu oo sopedakwadookwu, pudusoo mu wokwohomu ka Jerusalem kadooꞌoo maꞌekwuse.
Mu numu Jerusalem-witu sakwa ka giba-matoo namameaꞌa umu oo tzage-kwitu sakwa punnoꞌo mu-nosoo, gi sakwa haga Jerusalem-witoo namameapana.
Soo Te Naa ka oꞌnosoo ka mumme tooꞌe nemananaꞌwipu mu-matu gi oo nakahoyase menoꞌo yise mu-koobadooe.
Mu momokoꞌne kokoheadu yise mu nunupetzekudu tutuha namanatzayakwe ka numu tuyagoese.

Susumudu numu nagoehookwu, susumudu punnoꞌo ona tooe hano tooe kwingaꞌatoo nawetzakakwunihookwu. Tubetse wunaꞌmetoo mu wakwawaꞌa ka Jerusalem-wi nonobe-gakwu. Saaꞌa ka Te Naa tunetammana namamakwuse, soo Te Naa ka mu Jew numu punowsoo Jerusalem-witoo nemakodyukukwu.
Togesapa soo Te Naa ka yaatu tamme-koobatu atasoo yugwekwu. Ka tubetse baa unu bayutsungadyakwe mu numu oo-ma nakasui.
Mu numu tubetse suikwu ka gi oo sopedakwadoona ka hemma yoo manakwe.
Mu e nakaꞌoedyukudu saaꞌa gi nasootookepana ka yoo hemma manekwu, nu mu magwetzoikwu. Ka yaa teepu-koobatoo mu numu e poonnekwu ka e pooha patakwetseana tubongo ka koommeba naga-kwi e wuegena.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka umu pumme nakatzimodu mee netamma, “Ka sunngabe pooedooagese mu puu oo sopedakwadoo ka pudusoo tatza manepetukwu.
Ooonekoosoo mu ka yoo hemma suda manegena poonnekwu, mu oo sooꞌoedyukukwu pudusoo kodyu petukwuna.
Mu numu menoꞌo yaa teepu-koobatu gisoo tuina ka Jerusalem kadoo nuugwekwuna poonnekwu.
Esoo nuga unnepu besa naꞌunnedu gi hee atasoo a yugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.

Mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu yaa teepu-koobatu gi ka e kodyu petukwuna soomaꞌyu. Ka tu manegonnona suuꞌmu soomaꞌyuna suda oo sokwamakute ka tooe how tooe manena. Nu gi nuka mu soogwinoꞌo umu-baa petukwu. Mu sakwa nuka nakaꞌoedyukudu gi hemma tu hee-gakwitu soohanekupana, gi suda oo sokwamakupana. Mu mooasoo namamakwupunne.
Tamme sakwa yise Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhi oosoo ka suda ka mu gi nakaꞌoedyukudu-tamme kemmadu-makoo te magwetzoikwu. Oꞌno yise e petuse mu e dooamu nasootuhikwu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tuutsekoo poꞌwoadu Olive mee naneadu-ma tooaꞌe. Nonotsa tabeno ka nanesootuhi nobe-kumabatoo meayina ka mu numu Te Naa besa unnepu tunedyooebodotu.
Nonotsa awamooa mu numu awamooasoo sumuhooyakwe ka oo nakabodona.
Mooa dyongona oetu, oꞌnosoo te manena te natzamawukwuna soomayuna, yise ewa tuka, Gi Namayuadu Tukaba tukakwu.
Mu Jew numu tutunehanedu ka Te Pabeꞌe watze batsakwu meeꞌe sokwama pana ka mu numu-ma suipunne.
Ka sumuoo Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu-matu, Judas mee naneadu soo sutaꞌyoo ookow maꞌemukwa.
Soo sutaꞌyoo ka mu tutunehanedu-matoo ka Judas taya mu tuukwe tuunguna oosoo mu tzapoonnekukwu ka Te Pabeꞌe pukwiꞌyoona, oꞌno mu oo watze tzakadukwu.
Mu Jew numu tutunehanedu besa sokwamana, “Numme u tumanagakukwu,” meeꞌe ka Judas netamma.
Soo Judas, “Nu ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo mu bikakwu, gi numu poonnena,” mee tusooyugwe.
Yaa tabenoo numme ka seepu tooaꞌa batsakwu, ka gi namayuadu tukaba noko ne ewa tuka-kwi manepetu.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka Peter noko John meeoo netamma, “Mu sakwa mooe memeakwatese ka te nanesootuhi yongo tukakwuna mabetsabega.”
Umu yise meeoo tubenga, “Hanoꞌyoo yise numme tugoomahanegakwu?”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu nanekwegea, “Ka Jerusalem-wi mu pepetugase mu sumuoo nana banoꞌosa tu tsoabu-kooba tokwuhudu wegeakwu. Mu saaꞌa ookow nagekadooa. Ka nobe-kwi oo egeakase oo-nosoo saaꞌa tzoonooahoo kwatese
ka nana oo nobe-gakoo mee saaꞌa netamma, ‘Soo Te Pabeꞌe umu pumme nakatzimodu-no yaa u-baaꞌyoona nanesootuhi yongo tukakwu.’
Esoo nana nobe-gaꞌyoo yise mu tzapoonnekukwu ka paꞌatu nobe-kwiꞌyoona ka tukapu mu yongo tukakwuna mu saadooa.”
Umu yise mooe memeow tu tukakwuna mahaneookwuse.
Ka tu yongose, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka umu nakatzimodu-no tukana
mee mu netamma, “Nu tubetse unu mu-no e nanesootuhi yongo tukakwuna petzape gisoo nabatzana.
Esoo te nanesootuhi yongo tukana ka numu-koobatu e nabatsakwuna oo wahadu ka seepu dooa nabatsa-kwaꞌne. Yow nakwitu umu nanesootuhi tukakwuna e nabatsana-kobena.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka tseda gwuuꞌhoose atsa baa oekoo oo-koobatoo nanesootuhihoose umu pumme nakatzimodu mee netamma, “Noꞌyoona sakwa mu ma-matu hebe.
Nu mu tuukweꞌe nu ekow atsa baa ka yaa teepu-koobatu tubetse gi hebekwusoo, saaꞌa Te Naa ka te teepu mapudutupudoose oꞌno yise nu tubetse pudutupusoo hebekwu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tukaba gwuuꞌhoose ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhihoose oo tzabokase yise mee mu netamma, “Yoonnekoo soo e tookoo mu-koobatoo natzabokakwu eka tukaba-waꞌne. E soomayu saaꞌa ka a tukana.”
Ka mu tukamakwuse ooosoo ka tseda-witu yukwe soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo unnena, “Nu sakwa mu-koobatoo nabatsa. Soo atsa baa e puupe-waꞌneꞌyoosoo.
Soo sumuꞌyoo numu ka umu nuka batsakwadu-tamme e tzamunahookwudu tamme-baa tuka.
Mooasoo soo Te Naa meeoo tunetamma, nu ooonnekoo nabatsakwu. Pana saaꞌa oosoo umu wohomu nu-matoo bikepu tumaꞌemukwana oo-matoosoo kodyukwu.”
Umu oo nakatzimodu yise mee nanatubenga, “Hanotugina tamme-matu yoo manekwu?”
Umu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu puusoo nanano nananepetukute. “Ka puusoo nana suꞌsumme ka Te Pabeꞌe nakwasoo manepunnekwu,” meeꞌe nanatusooyugwena.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu nakana yise mee mu netamma, “Gi mu wakwawaꞌa numu-kooba katudu-kwaꞌne, paba nasooyugwepana. Soo sumuꞌyoo mu-nagatu mooe natatsungadu sakwa mu tummatzi. Gi paba nananeyugwepana mu numu tummatzi, tooe nu mu Pabeꞌe pana nu ooosapa mu-kwitu poohigena. Mu sakwa e manena tuusoodyahana nu-kwaꞌnesoo. Soo sumuꞌyoo mu-nagatu mu mooe tatsungadu sakwa mu tummatzi. Mu ka numu tummatzidu gi heesoobedya. Pana nu mu Pabeꞌe, yise mu tummatzaꞌe, mu sakwa nanatummatzi punnoꞌo.
Mu nu-no tukakwu ka saaꞌa Te Naa-baa mu petukase. Mu yise nu-nosoo ka mu Jew numu nemadabuekwu mu ka ooosapa e nakaꞌoedyukuna tooe mu numu nuka wohone sapa.
E besa puaꞌa Simon Peter, soo sutaꞌyoo mu tapokakwu te manena gi petzabena.
Pana nu u nanesootuhikute u sakwa gi e nakaꞌoedyukumakwupana. Ka u unnekwuna saaꞌa nemakodyuse u sakwa umu ta pupuaꞌamu besa mu nanesootuhi meakwuna mu nemayugwekwu.”
Soo Simon Peter yise mee ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Nu ooosapa u-noꞌyookwu tooe taka mu wutuma tooetoo taka mu goekwuse sapa.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka Simon Peter meeoo netamma, “Awamooasoo gisoo ka tsekuna kwuꞌa yaka, u saaꞌa pahe mu numu mee netammapunnedooa, ‘Nu maka Jesus gi sopedakwatoo.’ “

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka umu pumme nakatzimodu meeoo tubenga, “Nu ka oꞌnosoo ka besa e unnepu mu numu mu tuukwe tuunguna ka mu tayase tooe gi mu hee-gakoo sapa, gi tuwow mu magoꞌo-gana, gi tuwazoo kummaꞌakoosoo mu moko-gaꞌyoo sapa. Mu puu uga hemma tuuke haaꞌa?” Umu mee oo nanekwegea, “Numme u unne-kwaꞌnesoo gi hemma tuuke.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Ka yaa manakwana ka mease ka mu hemma magoꞌo noko hanega ka ooone-gana. Mu ka gi segesa-gana ka mu wegabedo tutsanabedu.
Soo nu-kwitu nanemamakwudu nabotugudu oo-toogoo manipetukwu. Mee oosoo naꞌunakwe, ‘Nu ka mu nanasuda tumatugudu-kwaꞌnesoo namatugukwu.’ “
Umu oo nakatzimodu mee oo netamma, “Mooasoo numme waahoo segesa-gaꞌyoo.” “Gi nu mownnekoo segesa netamma,” meeꞌe soo Te Pabeꞌe mu netamma.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka umu pumme nakatzimodu-no ka nobe-kwiꞌyoona meaꞌase ka poꞌwoadu Olive mee naneadu-matoo petuga, oosoo ka uga ooosapa maneyina.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Mu sakwa nanesootuhi. Oꞌno mu ka sutakoo mumme nemooaka mu gi oo-ma nakatzabedooa.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise gi haaꞌno umu kwingaꞌatoo mease meatzedose mee nanesootuhaꞌe,
“E Naa, soo tubetse suda nuka tu yugwekwuna nu-tamme kemmana nu gi oo nasoomanekena. Ka ume nuka tunetammapu nu oo mayohokwu.”
Oꞌno yise sumuꞌyoo soo Te Naa tummatziwabe soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo oo-baa tabua petuse ka Te Pabeꞌe besakoosoo sootuhidooa.
Togesoo ka pumme tu yugwekwuna oo soonammetugupunne soo oo nanekoonana ka teepu-koobatoo puupe pasawedu-kwaꞌne manewunu.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka nanesootuhimakwuse yotsese ka umu pumme nakatzimodu-baa petuhooga ka suda sokwamana mu utuaꞌe mu mayu petuse,
mee mu netamma, “Mu sakwa gi utuꞌipana. Yosuhoose nanesootuhigonno, oꞌno mu ka Sutakoo mumme nemooaga mu gi oo-ma nakatzabe-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
Ka Te Pabeꞌe togesoo yadooawunu soo nana Judas mee naneadu mu tukwutumadu-no ewow numu oo-baa moohe petu. Oosoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petuse oo mitzadyaꞌme. Oꞌno umu oo sopedakwatoohoo.
Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo o netamma, “Judas how u suda e matugukwuse sapa e mitzadyaꞌme?”
Mu Te Pabeꞌe-no tunakatzimodu ka tukwutumadu poonnese meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe tubenga, “Tamme haaꞌa umu-no nagoekwu?”
Sumuꞌyoo mu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu yise sumuoo mu Jew pabeꞌe tummatziwabe naka tsekaꞌakwunihoo.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo oo netamma, “Mow sapa.” Ka meeoo oo netammase ka nana naka pukwikoo oo nakwugaꞌahoo-kooba matuguse soo oo naka besa mani.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu Jew pabeꞌe tukwutumadu meeoo netamma, “Nu gi suda tumatugudu, gi naduyadu, gi tuduhadu tuwazoo. Gi sakwa mu koodooꞌoo-ma e tumahepana, wobe-ma, tsegesa-ma tuwazoo.
Tooe mu ka e nanesootuhi nobe-kwikoo sapa gi nu-ma tzakadupu-gaꞌyoo. Muusoo tooꞌe. Mooasoo soo tubope ebeoo nabotuku oꞌnosoo Te Naa tamme tuukwe-kwaꞌnesoo.
Mu tukwutumadu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe-ma tzakaduse oo bika ka mu Jew-numu tutunehanedu naa-matoo. Soo Peter kwingaꞌa mu-nakwi meadabe.
Ka mu numu yise ka tunehane nobe-kobenakoo pedahoose soo Peter yise ka mu numu-naga katu.
Sumuꞌyoo tseadumu yise ka Peter poonnese ka oo tsetsoogase yise meeoo unakwe, “Esoo nana ka Jesus-matu.”
Pana soo Peter yise meeoo unakwe, “Nu gi ma-notu.”
Ka mu numu togesoo aataꞌa, kummaꞌyoosoo numu ka Peter poonnese punnoꞌo meeoosoo, “U punnoꞌo umu-notu.” Pana soo Peter yise meeoo ka nana netamma, “Nu gi.”
Togesoo mu tuutooe kummaꞌyoosoo numu punnoꞌo ka Peter meeoo netamma. “U tubetse yow ka Jesus nakatzimodu-matu. U Galilee-witu.”
Soo Peter meeoo mu netamma, “Nu gi mu numu nemooaga, nu gi umu-notu.” Togesoo ka Peter ookow nemayuyakwe soo tsekana kwuꞌa yagakooha.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka Peter poonnegaꞌa. Soo Peter yise oo soomayuhoo ka Te Pabeꞌe pumme netammapu. “Gisoo ka tsekana yaka pahe tooe u gi e nanenamaꞌyoodooa.”
Soo Peter pumme unnepu soomayuse yagakooha.
Mu tutukwutumadu ka Te Pabeꞌe nasootzamekuna oo pooe wutumase yise oo wupageta.
Yise meeoo oo tubenga, “U tooꞌe noꞌokosoo gi hemma watzekudu, haga menoꞌo u wupageta?”
Mu ewaꞌyoo tutukwutumadu haꞌyoo tooe oo netammana oo-maꞌyoona nanekoꞌe.
Ka tu tabuakese mu tutukwutumadu ka Te Pabeꞌe mu tunehanedu-koobenatoo hane petuga yise mu tutunehanedu meeoo oo tubenga.
“U haaꞌa yow soo nanetammadu Ne Pabeꞌe?” Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu nanekwegea, “Tooe mu mumme e tuukwe sapa gi mu e oedyuku-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Saaꞌa mu e poonnekwu Te Naa toogoopatu-kumaba e katu numme mu tunemadabuekukwu.”
Mu tutunehanedu yise meeoo oo tubenga, “U haaꞌa Te Naa Tooa?” Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo, “Aha, nu yow soo Te Naa Tooaꞌa.”
“Oosoo ka meeoo naneyugwena puusoo gi toge-tamme kemmowgena,” mee mu tutunehanedu nanaꞌunakwe.
Mu numu tutunehanedu ka Te Pabeꞌe tzakunana ka tiboꞌo numu nehanedu Pilate mee naneadu-kobena oo bi petuga.

Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe nemooyugwena ka Pilate mee netamma, “Numme eka nana mayu esoo ewa ka mu numu suda neyugwe. Gi ka mu Roman numu-kooba katudu ka mu tumasumudooyina hemepana, mee mu netamma, ‘Nu yow Mu Pabeꞌe ka mu Jew numu-kooba katukwudu,’ mee unakwe.”
Soo Pilate yise ka Te Pabeꞌe tubenga, “U haaꞌa mu Jew numu-kooba katukwudu?” Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo, “Aha, o umesoo unnena.”
Soo Pilate yise ka mu Jew numu tutunehanedu noꞌoko meeoo netamma, “Nu ka ma-no yadooase, yise esoo ka oo manepunne e tuukwe mu unnena tubetse oo ataꞌyoosoo. Esoo nana gi suda manakwe.”
Pana mu tutunehanedu ooosapa mee unnegonno, “Esoo ka mu numu suda neyugwewunu, mana ka teepu Galilee mee naneadu-toogoo suda tuneyugwedu.”
Soo Pilate ka meeoo mu unnegonno mu nakase mee mu tubenga, “Oosoo haaꞌa Galilee-wiꞌyoona kemmapu?”

Umu mee oo nanekwegea, “Aha.” Soo Galilee numu-kooba katudu Herod mee naneadu punnoꞌo Jerusalem-wi. Soo Pilate yise ka Te Pabeꞌe ka Herod-matoo nemawuni. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka Herod pukwiꞌyoo-kwitoo tzakaka.

Soo Herod besa soonamme ka Te Pabeꞌe puu-baa natzaka petugase. “Soo Jesus sumuna umu besa tu tumadipu-matu e tzapoonnekukwu. Wunaꞌme nu oetu nakakena besa oo poonne soonamme,” mee soo Herod soonammekatu.
Ewa ka Te Pabeꞌe tubenga pana soo Te Pabeꞌe gi oo nanekwegea.
Mu Jew numu tutunehanedu osoo konnopunnena noꞌobasoo nanasuda oo netammagonno.

Soo Herod yise ka umu tutukwutumadu-no ka Te Pabeꞌe suda matuguna oo-maꞌyoona nanekoena oo nasootzamekugonno. Umu unu nanenagadu-kwi oo kwaseakute mu Jew numu-kooba katudu mee oo netammana yise ka Pilate-matoosoo oo taya.
Wunaꞌme mu ka Pilate-no Herod gi natokeꞌyookute pana ka yoo hemma manepetuse umu napuaꞌahoo.
Ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa punowse petugase soo Pilate ka mu Jew numu tutunehanedu nesumuhoo.
Yise mee mu netamma, “Mu ekow nana nu-baa bi petu. Esoo nana ka mu numu suda neyugwe gi ka numme-kooba katudu nakabetsea mu meeꞌe e tuukwena. Nu oetu soohanese masoo gi ka mu unnekwasoo manakwe.
Nu tuwazoo ka Herod-matoo a tooꞌe taya. Soo Herod punnoꞌo gi how a yugwe ka gi how a manakwe.
Masoo sakwa sukwe nuupageta yise natzamaꞌwu mee nu mesoo unakwe.”
Noꞌyoona mu numu ewa unnegonno, “Ka Barabbas ne tzamaꞌwukuse ka Jesus batsa.”

Soo Barabbas nakwutuma oosoo ka mu wakwawaꞌa tamme-kooba aatadu wohonekese numu goese ooetoo nakwutumadu. Soo mu wakwawaꞌa tumatuguna ka tabeba oe maneyakwe sumuoo nakwutumadu natzamaꞌwuyakwe mu numu oo netutzeayina.
Soo Pilate ka Te Pabeꞌe tooꞌe netzamaꞌwusoo pana
mu numu ewa unnegonno, “Oo tzakwenne, oo batsa.”
Soo Pilate mee mu numu tubenga, “How manena mu ooka e batsa tuungu? Oosoo gi suda tumatugu. Nu oo wupagetase oo tzamaꞌwukwu.”
Pana mu numu papabatsesoo mee nanaꞌunnegonno, “Oo batsa.” Soo Pilate yise mu nakabetsea.
Soo Pilate yise ka mu tutukwutumadu ka Te Pabeꞌe batsa tuungu ka mu numu meeoo unakwe.
Soo Pilate yise ka Barabbas tzamaꞌwu tooe mu wakwawaꞌa numu-kooba aatadu oo wohonekese numu oo goese sapa.

Sumuꞌyoo nana Simon mee naneadu ka Cyrene mee naneadu-wiꞌyoona kemmadu ka Jerusalem-witoo kemmadape. Mu tutukwutumadu Te Pabeꞌe tzemahudu oo wegeagena. Oo-ma tzakaduse ka Te Pabeꞌe puma nataposakwuna oo tokwu tuungu ka Te Pabeꞌe-nakwisoo.
Ewaꞌyoo momokoꞌne mu-nakwisoo punnoꞌo meadape sakwina.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe umu-tamme nakwumunase ka mu momokoꞌne mee netamma, “Mu sakwa gi nu-koobatoo sagwipana. Mu sakwa muusoo yise ka mu doodooamu-koobatoo sakwi.
Pudusoo Jerusalem-witu suda namanekwu mu doodooamu-makoo suda namanatzayakwe mu yise mee unakwe, ‘Mu numu gi doodooamu-gaꞌyoo tookwa besa namanatzi.’
Umu yise ka giba-matoo nanesootuhikoo mee unnena, ‘U sakwa numme-koobatoo aanooakase mee wumabema.’ “ Pana soo giba gi oo manakwe.
Togesoo e gwetzoi sapa umu suda e yugwe tooe gi suda e manakwe sapa. Umu ka saaꞌa e batsase umu mumme numu Jerusalem-witu unu suda yugwekwu mu ka suda tumatuguse.”
Mu wahaꞌyoo tuduhadu punnoꞌo ka Te Pabeꞌe-no natzakase nataposa.
Mu tutukwutumadu yise ka Numu Tzonoho mee naneadu-kwi petugase ka sunngabe nuummadabue-ma oo taposa wahoo tutuduhadu naana naamookwi.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee nanesootuhikooha, “E Naa u sakwa mu numu yaa manepunnedu maꞌemukwana soomuꞌwa, umu gi oo nakasopedakwadoona yoo e yugwe.” Mu tutukwutumadu yise ka oo kwasu natotsakwate.

Mu numu oona konnona Te Pabeꞌe tupoonnepunne mu Jew numu tutunehanedu oo-maꞌyoona nanekoꞌe. Mu Jew numu tutunehanedu ka Te Pabeꞌe mee netamma, “U puu kukummaꞌakoosoo magwetzoi mee unnepana menoꞌo sakwa yise u uusoo namagwetzoi u ka Te Pabeꞌe mee naneꞌyugwena.”
Mu tutukwutumadu punnoꞌo ka Te Pabeꞌe-maꞌyoona nanekoꞌena. Umu yise ka suda kammadu baa suda manena ka Te Pabeꞌe tooꞌe mapoonneku pana oosoo
yise gi oo hepe. Umu mee oo netamma, “U sakwa uusoo namagwetzoi, u ka pooha-gana mu Jew numu-kooba katudu mee naneyugwena.”
Ka Te Pabeꞌe tzopa ka sunngabe-ma soo wobe nataposa mee oo-ma natuboꞌo, “Yow soo Jew numu-kooba katudu.”
Sumuꞌyoo mu tutuduhadu-matu ka Te Pabeꞌe-kumaba nataposadu mee oo netamma, “U ne Pabeꞌe mee naneyugwepana gi hownnekoo te magwetzoaꞌe.”
Soo sumuꞌyoo tutuhadu punnoꞌo ka Te Pabeꞌe-maꞌyoona sooiwunudu mee netamma, “Gi meeoo unnepana. U sakwa ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyuku ta punnoꞌo nagoekwu.
Ta ka tumaꞌemukwase sakwa oe tumanaga pana esoo nana puu gi tumaꞌemukwa.”
Oosoosoo tuduhadu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe mee netamma, “Ka u pooha-toohakwi kodyu petuse, saaꞌa e sootuhi.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee oo netamma, “U sakwa oo nakasopedakwatoo yaa tabeno soo Te Naa ta sootuhikwu ka pu-baa ta pepetugase.”
Tabeno manakwana oona ka taba pahe-kwitoo oo katu-kwikoo tooe, noꞌoko teepu-koobakwitu toganopunne.
Soo taba koomeba-ma natzadoboyahoo. Soo wunapu ka Te Naa pooha pukwiꞌyoona mu pooha maneyina naamootoo natzakwenedu paꞌanakwana tubongo oo naamootoo natzagebuꞌehoo.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa mee nanetzakwiyaꞌe, “E Naa menoꞌo u-matoo e moogooa meahookwu.” Yise soo Te Pabeꞌe yaꞌehoo.
Soo tueyaꞌedu pabeꞌe ka a namanina poonnese mee unakwe, “Esoo nana tookwa togesapa besaꞌyoo.”
Ewaꞌyoo numu ka Te Pabeꞌe yaꞌehoose oo poonne suda sokwamana ka suda oo matuguse yise nobe-kwitoo kodyu mee nanaꞌunnena, “Tamme suda manakwe, tamme tumaꞌemukwa.”
Umu Te Pabeꞌe soobedyadu umu momokoꞌne Galilee-wiꞌyoona ka Te Pabeꞌe-no kemmapu oona kwingaꞌyoona oo poonne ka suda oo nuugwe.
Sumuꞌyoo nana Joseph mee naneꞌa
Soo Joseph gi ka Jew numu tunehanedu nakabetzape ka Te Pabeꞌe mu nebatsa. Soo Joseph ka Te Naa tu nakabetseana sookwina.
Soo Joseph ka Pilate-baa petugase ka Te Pabeꞌe tookoo oo natuungu.
Soo Joseph ka oo tookoo hanehoose wunapu-wi oo mabutooe. Gisoo ka taba egea, ka tupe-naga natudotawaga gisoo numu pukwi nanomatuguna, ooweoo soo Joseph ka Te Pabeꞌe tookoo nanomatugu.
Esoo ka nanesootuhi tabeno-kobenasoo namanena.
Umu momokoꞌne ka Te Pabeꞌe-no Galilee-wiꞌyoona kemmaꞌadu ka Joseph nagegase ka Te Pabeꞌe nanomatuguna poonne.
Umu nobe-kwitoo kodyukase nakwanaꞌa matabue oo tookoo-kooba nahanekwudu. Umu ka Jew tumayohope mayohona gi kodyu ka nanesootuhi tabeno oo manese.
Ookow moooꞌa awamooasoo tu pudutabuagena mu momokoꞌne Te Pabeꞌe tookoo pukwi nanomatugupu-wi petugonnohoo ka nakwanaꞌa tu tumadabuepu hanena.
Soo tseketadyadu tupe oo-kobena nahanepu puma oo namatumana namagonnonooekwunipu-gaꞌyoo.
Umu oe tzoonooahookase sapa gi ka Te Pabeꞌe tookoo oekoo maꞌyu.
“Hano soo Te Pabeꞌe tookoo?” mee umu nananetammadyakwe. Wahaꞌyoo toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo umu-baa tapua petu besa patakwetseadu-kwi nanamasooana.
Mu momokoꞌne umu-ma nasoosuahoo.
Mu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo mee mu momokoꞌne netamma, “Mu sakwa gi suipana. Gi ka togesoo nummenummedu numu ka numu tuipu-nagatu watepana. Te Pabeꞌe gwetzoi.
Mu sakwa oo soomayu ka gisoo nabatsana oosoo mu tuukwe, ‘Pudusoo mu sutaꞌyoo numu e batsakwu yise waha tabe mease nu namayodakwusoo.’ “
Mu momokoꞌne yise ka Te Pabeꞌe unnepu soomaꞌyu,
ka oo nanomatugupu-wiꞌyoona meaꞌase ka Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu noꞌoko tuukwe.
Mu Te Pabeꞌe nanayadooawabe gi ka pumme mu tuukwepu nakaꞌoedyukute sukwe meeoo tooe unakwe mee mu soobedyana.

Soo Peter yotseoose ka Te Pabeꞌe uga nanomatugu-kwitoo tanomanegea. Ka oe petuoogase, oetu tomooeꞌma pukwi oo namasooapu suuꞌmu oe kwakwape oosoo yise nobe-kwitoosoo mea mee soonamme, “Mu momokoꞌne tookwa togesapa tuukwe haꞌoogena yise mani?”
Oꞌno tabenosoo wahaꞌyoo nanana Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu Emmaus mee naneadu-witoo memea kwinga nasogomea ka Jerusalem-wiꞌyoona.
Umu ka memeadabena ka namani-kwitu nanatugweꞌnga.
Te Pabeꞌe mu hatsuhookase sapa
umu gi oo posopedakwadoo.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu tubenga, “Hekwitu mu netammana?” Umu ka suda sokwamana wamepetu.
Sumuꞌyoo umu-matu Cleopas mee naneadu mee oo netamma, “U suuꞌmu ka sumuna ka umu Jerusalem-witu-matu gi ka a namane-kwitu naka.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise oo tubenga, “Haꞌoo tu namanise?” Umu yise meeoo, “Jesus-witu, oosoo unu pooha-gaꞌyoo ka Nazareth-witu kemmana. Ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-ma soo Jesus unu pooha-gaꞌyoo oosoo ka ewow numu mabesakuse yise Te Naa besa unnepu numu tuukwepu.
‘Soo Jesus tookwa Te Pabeꞌe. Oosoo ka mu Tiboꞌo tayakwuni,’ mee numme ooosapa sokwamadu. Pana umu tutunehanedu ka mu Tiboꞌo ooka batsa tuunguna. Etzeꞌe tabe mea ka oo tu namanise.
Yaa awamooa mu momokoꞌne numme-matu besow ne tuukwe gi ne nakasopedakwadoona. Umu meeoo, ‘Awamooasoo numme meaꞌa ka pukwi Te Pabeꞌe nanomatugu-kwitoo,
pana Te Pabeꞌe kadooꞌyoo. Numme ne tuusoobedya-kwikoo umu Te Naa tummatzidu mu toha kakasa-gakoo poonne umu mee ne tuukweꞌe, “Te Pabeꞌe gwetzoi.” ’
Mu numme-nagatu-matu mu naana ka oo nanomatugu-kwitoo meaꞌa. Umu oo poonne petuga oosoo ka mu momokoꞌne umu tuukwe-kwaꞌnesoo. Pana umu gi Te Pabeꞌe poonne.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Mu gisoo e nakasopedakwadoo. Mu gisoo oo nakaꞌoedyukute ka oꞌnosoo Te Naa yadooawabe tamme tuukwena.
Oꞌnosoo umu meeoo tubotugu, ‘Soo Te Pabeꞌe mooe nabatsase saaꞌa yise noꞌoko mu numu nemadabuekwu.’ “

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise besasoo mu tuukweꞌe ka oꞌnosoo Te Naa nanayadooawabe Te Pabeꞌe-witu mu numu tuukwekepu. Mooeꞌugasoo soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Moses unnepu mu tuukweꞌe penakwa yise umu susumudu Te Naa nanayadooawabe unnepu waha.
Umu yise ka umu waahoo naana pukwitoo mea tzageꞌe manepetu. Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe oo-kwingadusoo meadu.
Umu yise meeoo oo netamma, “Mooasoo yongoho pudusoo taba egeahookwu, u sakwa numme-baasoo tooi.”
Ka mu tukakwuse, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tukaba gwuuhoose oetu mu nanesootuhikukooha. Ka tunemamakwuse oo tzabokase umu-matoo oo mameaku.
Oꞌno umu o posopedakwatoo oosoo yise gi tapuꞌaka.
Umu yise mee uꞌunekwate, “Ka te sogo kemmadape, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka a nabotuguna besasoo ta tuukwe, ta yise besa oo nakasoobedya.” Umu yise yosuhoose ka Jerusalem-witoosoo kokodyuhooka, okow yongonasoo.
Ka mu pepetugase noꞌyoona Te Pabeꞌe yadooawabe nanano o, ewaꞌyoo numu punnoꞌo mu-kumisoo.
Umu ka mu waahoo mee netamma, “Soo Te Pabeꞌe togesapa tu yaꞌe-kwikoo namayodu, Simon Peter ka Te Pabeꞌe poonne.”

Umu wahaꞌyoo yise mee mu netamma, “Soo Te Pabeꞌe numme-no sogomea. Ka oꞌnosoo Te Naa nanayadooawabe tubotuguna ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu besasoo ne tuukweꞌe. Numme ka mooeꞌugasoo gi oo posopedakwatoo. Saaꞌa ka oo nanesootuhise ka tukaba oo tzabokase, numme oo pudu posopedakwatoo.”
Togesoo mu apegeagonno soo Te Pabeꞌe umu-baa tapuꞌa petuse mu yadooꞌe.
Umu nasoosuihoo, “Uda tsoapa,” mee sokwamahoo.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Mu sakwa gi nu-ma suipana. Gi nu tsoapa.
Nu nuusoo yow ka e mi noko e kuku pumakoo e natzepotzetapu poonne. Mu e mesoo tzama. Soo tsoapa gi tookoope-gaꞌyoo.”
Ka besa sokwamahoose umu gisoo oo sooꞌoedyukupana ka tsoapa mee oo sooyugwepunnena. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu tubenga, “Mu haaꞌa hemma nadukadu hane?”
Umu yise pakwe nanoꞌhona oo magahoo
oosoo yise mu-kobenaꞌyoosoo tukakooha umu yise oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Pabeꞌe tookwa togesapa nummenumme.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Mooasoo nu ka mu-baaꞌyoona mu tuukweꞌe noꞌoko ka Te Naa yadooawabe tubotuguna togesapa oo-toogoo namanekwu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka Te Naa nanayadooawabe tu tubotugupu nanakasoopedekwadoo oo mayugwe.
Mee mu netamma, “Mooasoo oꞌnosoo e manekwuna nanemamakwu. Nu nabatsase pahe tabe mease nu e yaꞌekwikoo namayoda.

Soo nu-kwitu besa naꞌunnedu noꞌobatusoo numu oo natuukwekwu, mooeꞌugasoo yaa Jerusalem-wiꞌyoona yise mana kwingaꞌa-kwi. Mu numu yise tu tumaꞌemukwana nanekwahase mu tumaꞌemukwana nasoomuꞌwase mu nasootuhikwu ka nuka nakaꞌoedyukuna.
Mu ka nu-kwitu mu numu tuukwekwu ka e manena poonnena yise ka e unnepu nakana.
Pudusoo nu mu poohamakakwu ka Te Naa unne-kwaꞌne. Mu sakwa yaa Jerusalem-wisoo ka mumme e pooha-makananoꞌoto.”
Saaꞌa yise Bethany-tamme meana soo Te Pabeꞌe mayodase mu nanesootuhikute.
Toesoo mu nanesootuhikuwununa umu-baaꞌyoona toogoopatoo tsebooega.
Umu Te Pabeꞌe tuukwewabe yise besa sokwamana ka Jerusalem-witoosoo kodyuka.
Umu ooosapa ka pabatsekoo nanesootuhi nobe-kwiꞌyoona nanesootuhiyakwe, “U, Ne Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo,” mee unneyakwe.
Gisoo ka teepu namadabue soo Te Pabeꞌe mooasoo o. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa-baa ka Te Naa-waꞌneꞌyoonasoo.
Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko hemma matabue tuungu.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka ooosapa nummennummekwuse noꞌoko numu kootabuakute Tu Besa Pooha-ma.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe kootabuapunnena, togano-wi numu mesoo kootabuakute. Soo sutaꞌyoo togabu-witu gi oo matzooeku-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-baa petuse gi haaꞌnoto tamme-nagakwi nummennumme. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tubetse kootabuadu ka mu numu yaa teepu-koobatu haneku petu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ooosapa besa tusooyugwedu, numu besa matugu tuwazoo ka kaahenotu ooosapa tuwazoo waha. Numme ka Besa Poohabe poonne, soo Te Naa ka Tu Besaa Tooaꞌa ooka sootuhi. Soo nana John mee naneadu ka Te Naa tamme-tamme tutayana ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu mu numu oo tuukwe tuungu. Saaꞌa mu numu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukukwu. Soo John yise ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi paba yadooase mee unne, “Yow esoo nana puwitu mumme e tuukweyina.” Mu yise mee unakwe, “Tooe esoo nuga kwanngaꞌapana esoo ka Te Tubetse Pabeꞌe-notu esoo ka ooosapa gwetzoinnummekwuse. Ooonneꞌyoona tamme sakwa yise oo nakabetsea.” Soo John gi Te Pabeꞌe, oosoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu numu sukwe tuukwekwu. Ka mu numu meeoo tuukwekwu soo Te Pabeꞌe numu magwetzoikwu. Tooe soo Te Pabeꞌe oꞌnosoo ka teepu matabuese sapa, ka tu nanumu-baa petuse, susumudu umu-matu gi oo heesoobedya. Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu suuꞌmu, Te Naa doodooamu manepetugakwu. Gi tamme hownnekoo tammesoo namagwetzoaꞌe soo Te Pabeꞌe ka gwetzoibu te sootuhikwu. Numme ka nanabesa oo pooha manena poonne.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko hemma hee-gana, yise ewahoo nasootuhipe te sootuikwu.
Oꞌnosoo soo Moses ka te nanamooatupu tuukweꞌe, mee mu saaꞌa ka Te Naa-witu nakadooa. Saaꞌa yise soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus te tuukwe soo Te Naa unu te soobedya. Soo Te Pabeꞌe togesapa te tuukwe.
Gi haga ka Te Naa poonnedu, oo Besaa Tooaꞌa Jesus suuꞌmu ooosapa oo-noꞌyoodu oo sopedakwadoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa witu te tunesootabue.
Mu Jew numu nanesootuhi moohedu Jerusalem-witu ka mu naana-matu yise ka mu tutummatzidu-no ka John-matoo nataya mee yise oo tubengu. “Haga u? U haaꞌa Te Pabeꞌe? U haaꞌa yow oosoo nanetammadu?”
Soo John mee mu nanekwegea, “Gi nu.”

“U haaꞌa Elijah?” mee tuwazoo umu oo tubengu. Soo John yise meeoo, “Nu gi Elijah.” Umu yise tuwazoo oo tubenga, “U haaꞌa Te Naa yadooawabe numme-matoo oo tutayana oꞌnosoo nanetammadu?” “Gi!” mee soo John.
Umu yise meeoo oo netamma, “Haga yise u? Haꞌyoo saaꞌa numme mu numu numme tayadu tuukwedooa? U sakwa uusoo nakwitu ne tuukwe.”

Soo John mee mu nanekwegea, “Nu yow soo nana Te Naaꞌa Pooha-tookwi, numu-wana nobe-gaꞌyoo mu numu nu-baa petudyana nu meeoo mu netamma, ‘Ka suda mu tumaduguna nematzagakwuni, ka Te Pabeꞌe pudusoo petukwuna tuganaꞌa tzageꞌe manekena ne mu numu tunesootabue.’ Ka Te Naa yadooawabe, Isaiah mee naneadu e manena nanemamakwupu-witu oo nabotugupu.”

Mu Jew nanesootuhidu-nagatu Pharisee mee nananeadu, ka mu Jew numu moohedu-nagatu-no ka John-matoo nataya. Ka baa hooodu Jordan mee naneadu-kwi soo John baa-wi numu matzakayakwe, ka Bethany mee naneadu tzageꞌeꞌyoona. Mu Pharisee meeoo ka John netamma, “U gi Elijah, u gi Te Pabeꞌe, u gi tuwazoo Te Naa yadooawabe-matu, how yise manena u numu baa-wi matzakayakwe? Hownnekoo pooha tooha-kwi, yise haga mu numu baa-wi u matzaka tuungu?” Soo John yise mu nanekwegea, “Nu ka mu numu, baa-wi sukwe matzaka. Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu-nooꞌyoopana mu gi oo soopedakwatoo-waꞌneꞌyoo.”

Ooga mooa soo John ka Jesus Te Pabeꞌe poonne, pudamme oo kemma. Soo John yise Te Naa Besa pooha-toohakwi meeoo, “Yowsoo Te Pabeꞌe. Yow esoo nana mu numu nanasuda mamanena-koobatoo nabatsakwudu. Soo Te Naa ka mu numu baa-wi e matzaka tuungudu mee tuwazoo e netamma, ‘U ka mu Pabeꞌe posopedakwadookwu, ka E Besa Pooha-ma oo pooha nasootuhise. Soo E Besa Pooha yise ooosapa ka mu Pabeꞌe-nagaꞌyookwu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise saaꞌa ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka E Besa Pooha-ma punnoꞌo sootuhikwu.’ Nu ooosapa meeoo mu netammanoꞌo, ‘Soo Te Pabeꞌe pudusoo petukwu.’ Tooe oosoo e wanngaꞌa natubanga pana yow esoo Te Tubetse Pabeꞌe numu-koobenatusoo. Gisoo nu Te Pabeꞌe posopedakwadoo, nu mu numu baa-wi matzakakena, ooonneꞌyoona mu Jew numu oo nakasopedakwadoo ka Te Pabeꞌe pudusoo petukwuna.” Soo John yise mee unakwe, “Nu ka Te Naa Besa Pooha poonne, paꞌanakwana, kweꞌnaꞌa tubongo wueketu-kwaꞌne tabuakese ka Te Pabeꞌe-naga manipetu.
Nu ka Pooha Nasootuhipe poonne, nu yise mu tuukwe oosoo Te Tubetse Pabeꞌe.”
Ookow moooa soo John waahoo umu putoohakwi natunedyooemodu-no oona konnopunne.
Ka Te Pabeꞌe pumoopa oo sogomeꞌa oo poonnese, John mee mu netamma, “Mow masoo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsakwudu.”
Wahaꞌyoo umu natunedyooemodu-matu oo nakahoose, ka Te Pabeꞌe-nakwi memeahoo.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe wesase mu poonne ka tu nakwi mu memeaꞌa. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu tubengu, “Hemma mu?” Umu yise meehoo, “Hano u tooiyakwe?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu nanekwegea, “Nu-no kemmase muusoo oo poonnekwu.” Umu yise, oo-no memea, oonaa oo pukwiꞌyoo-witoo. Oꞌno tabeno umu gi haaꞌno oona oo-baaꞌyoopunne.
Sumuꞌyoo mu waha-matu natunedyooemodu Te Pabeꞌe-nakwi meadu, Andrew mee naneadu, Simon Peter pabeꞌe ka tu wangaꞌa-baa petuoogase oo tuukwe, “Numme ka Te Pabeꞌe-no nanatapoegea.”
Ka Simon yise Te Pabeꞌe-baa bi petuooga. Ka mu pepetuoogase soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Simon poonnese mee oo netamma, “U yow, Simon
Oogow moooꞌa soo Te Pabeꞌe ka teepu Galilee mee naneadu-witoo meakwu, mee tusooyugwe. Soo Philip mee naneadu punnoꞌo o. Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee ka Philip netamma, “U sakwa nu-no mea.”
Soo Nathanael mee naneadu oonow nobe-gaꞌyoo. Soo Philip
Soo Nathanael yise mee unakwe, “Gi besaꞌyoo numu suuꞌmu, ka Nazareth-wiꞌyoona kemma.” Soo Philip yise meehoo, “Kemmase uusoo nama oo tapoegea.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Nathanael poonne, meeoo yise, “Yow esoo Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu. Esoo gi suda tusooyugwedu.”
Nathanael yise mee tutubengu, “Hownnekoo u e sopedakwatoo?” Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee oo nanekwegea, “Nu oona sunnga-toohakoo u pooha poonne gisoo ka Philip ume baꞌe.”
Soo Nathanael yise mee unakwe, “U yow Ne Pabeꞌe, u ka tamme Jew numu-kooba katukwutu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo, “Nu u pooha poonnena mee e unakwe u haaꞌa e nakaꞌoedyukute?
Nu kaaheno mu tuukwe, mu saaꞌa ka Te Naa nanabesa oo tumadaꞌe oo poonnekwu. Mu nuga mane-too ka Te Naa sopedakwadoo petugakwu, o tutusooyugwena, tuwazoo.”
Waha tabe mease ka teepu Galilee mee naneadu-koobaꞌyoona, ka Cana mee naneadu-kwiꞌyoona numu nanodukwadookwu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka numme tunakatzimodu-no oetu nabaꞌe, soo Te Pabeꞌe pea punnoꞌo.
Togesoo ne tuka aata soo atsa baa nasooꞌahoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe pea mee oo netamma, “Soo nahebedu punoko te tukana nasooꞌahoo.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe oo nanekwegea, “Gi hownnekoo nu menoꞌo mu tummatzi-waꞌneꞌyoo, e pooha manekwuna gisoo oe manepetu.”
Ooonneꞌyoopana soo oo pea yise ka umu numu tummatzidu mee netamma, “Ka e tooa mumme tunetammaku-kwaꞌnesoo, saaꞌa mane.”
Naapaheꞌyoo papabatseꞌyoo tupe-ma namadabuedu, pukwi baa mu tubanena umu tzageꞌe nahane. Mu Jew numu nanesootuhipu puma namayohona, pukwi mu mabatzagana.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu netamma, “Baa-ma ka pukwi mu tubanena kaanoku.” Ka ooka mu kaanokuse,
soo Te Pabeꞌe meeꞌe mu netamma, “Ka baa-matu bayoongase, ka mu tuka-kooba poenaꞌewabe mooe bamaga.”
Soo mu poenaꞌewabe ka baa-matu tumahoo, oosoo tookwa atsa baa manipu-gaꞌyoo. Soo mu poenaꞌewabe ka Te Pabeꞌe ooka sootunagahoona gi sopedakwatoo, umu numu tummatzidu suuꞌmu oo sopedakwatoo.

Soo mu poenaꞌewabe ka nodukwadookwudu bihoose mee oo netamma, “Tooe haga tooe ka besow atsa baa numu mooe hebekuyakwe. Yise saaꞌa ka mu numu baagoehookase, umu ka gi tubetse besow mu numu hebekuyakwe. U nakwitoo ka besow nabeni.”
Yow esoo nagutza mooeꞌugasoo ka Te Pabeꞌe pooha manikepu, ka Cana-wiꞌyoona. Owe manakwana numme ka Te Pabeꞌe numme pooha tunedyooemona unukoosoo besa oo nakaꞌoedyukute manika.
Saaꞌa soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Capernaum mee naneadu-witoo mea, tu pea, tu wangaꞌamu, yise numme Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu-no. Numme punnoꞌo huu tabenosoo o.
Saaꞌa yise numme tunakatzimodu ka Te Pabeꞌe-no Jerusalem-witoo tuwazoo meaꞌa. Ka mu Jew numu ka oꞌno tu namagwetzoina soomayuna gi namayuadu tukaba nadukanoꞌo tabeba-gaꞌyoo, oꞌno yise paba tukayakwe.

Numme pabow nanesootuhi nobe-wi petuooga, oo-kobenaꞌyoona ka tu nananesootuhinoꞌo mu nanana kootsoo-ma tumuꞌu, seepu noko weeho tuwazoo, yise susumudu nanana o manepunnena ka mu wakwawaꞌa puma tumukwuna tzanabetokudyakwe numme mu poonne.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise tugapoo nakwebaꞌa-doose, ka puma mu tumuna mu kootsoo noko mu seepu tuwazoo, ka pabatsekoo nanesootuhi nobe-kumabakoo wumahukwunihoo. Ka pukooba mu tutzanabetokudyina tonabedahoose, ka oo-kooba natuoona tatapepuꞌa.
Ka mu nanana weeho-ma tumudu mee netamma, “Mu sakwa mu hootsebaꞌa haneooka, gi ka Te Naa-matoo pukwiꞌyoona te nanesootuhidyina nobe-kobenaꞌyoona hemma-ma tumupana.”
Numme ka Te Pabeꞌe tunakatzimodu ka saaꞌa oo soomaꞌyu ka oꞌnosoo Te Naa yadooawabe mesoo tubotugupu ka Te Naa unnepu, “E Naa ume ooosapa namatuguna, ka numu u-tamme suda tumaduguna nu gi petzape.”
Susumudu mu Jew numu nanesootuhi papabeꞌe mee oo netamma, “U sakwa besa nanasookwugi ne tusootunagaku, oꞌno numme u oedyukukwu yow tookwa ka Te Naa tunetammana mayoho mee numme u sooyugwekwu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu nekwegea, “Mu ka eka nanesootuhi nobe kadoo mayugwese, nu pahe tabeba-wisoo oo mayodakwusoo.”
Mu Jew numu nanesootuhi papabeꞌe yise mee unakwe, “Esoo pabaꞌyoo nanesootuhi nobe wuꞌnaꞌmeꞌyoosesoo namadabuepu. U yise ka sumuꞌyoonasoo hownnekoo u pahe tabeba-wisoo nanakwisoo a matabuehookwu?”
Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe puusoo tu yaꞌe-kwikoo tu namayoda-kwitu netammana meeoo unakwe, umu yise gi oo nakasopedakwadoo.

Ka saaꞌa Te Pabeꞌe tu yaꞌe-wikoo, pihoo tabeba-wisoo namayoduse, oꞌno numme ka oo unnepu pudu nakasopedakwadookooha, ka puusoo oo nanetammana. Numme yise oo nakaꞌoedyukute ka Te Naa oꞌnosoo nanayadooawabe unnepu, yise ka Te Pabeꞌe unnepu togesapa nayadooadu.
Ka mu Jew numu ewa tukanoꞌo ka Jerusalem-wiꞌyoona, ewaꞌyoo numu ka nanabesa ka Te Pabeꞌe pooha manena poonnese oo nakaꞌoedyuku.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu numu waha-tamme tusooyugwedu sopedakwadoo, mooasoo mu manekwuna gi watzekupunne, soo Te Pabeꞌe owetuoo mu numu pumme batsakwuna soopedakwedoo. Ka sukwe numu gi totogekoo mu sopedakwadoona.
Sumuꞌyoo nana Nicodemus mee naneadu ka umu nananesootuhi papabeꞌe-matu
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee oo netamma, “Nu kaaheno u tuukwekwu. Ka Te Naa nakabetsakwuse, u sakwa pudu nadooaꞌadoosoo.”
Soo Nicodemus yise mee ka Te Pabeꞌe tubenga, “Mooasoo nu unu waꞌetsena. Hownnekoo nu pudu nadooaꞌadookwusoo? Gi nu hownnekoo ka e pea nagasoo egease pudu nadooaꞌadookwusoo tuwazoo.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee oo nanekwegea, “Nu kaaheno u tuukwekwu. U ka Te Naa-wi mooe tunakaꞌoedyukuse, oꞌno yise u ka Te Naa unnepu nakaꞌoedyukukwu. Numu puusoo oo madaꞌe ka numu pudu nadooaꞌadoona, pana soo Te Naa Besa Pooha suuꞌmu, ka mu numu tunakaꞌoedyuku mayugwekwu.
Gi a nasoomenakwupana, gi nagutza unu namanedu nu u netammakute.

Soo Te Naa ka hukwapa-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo hukwapa puu tooe how tooe hukwa-tabuꞌa, gi tamme oo poonne-waꞌneꞌyoo. Gi haga pukwiꞌyoona oo kemmana, yise pukwitoo oo meana sopedakwadoo. Gi haga oo sopedakwadoo hownnekoo soo Te Naa Besa Pooha mu numu tunakaꞌoedyuku mayugwekwu.”
Nicodemus yise mee unakwe, “Togesoo nu gi oo nakasopedakwatoo ka nuka u tuukwena.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo, “U sakwa ekow nakasopedakwadoo, u ka mu Jew numu mooasoo tunedyooennummena.
Nu togesapa u tuukwekwu. Nu ka e sopedakwatoona, ka e poonnena tuwazoo, nu u tooe tuukwe pana u gi e nakaꞌoedyukudu.

Ka yaa teepu-koobatu ka numu sooabe, Te Naa-no sumusoo manepunnedu u gi oo nakaꞌoedyukute tooꞌe nu u tooe tuukwepana, ka hemma manepunnena ume e tuukwe u gi oo nakasopedakwatoo, u ka gi oo nakaꞌoedyukuna.
Gi haga yaa teepu-koobatu ka Te Naa manepunne-kwitu sopedakwadoo nu suuꞌmu, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa baꞌyoona kemmapuna oo sopedakwadoo.
