Ka oꞌnosoo mu te nanamooatupu manepu-waꞌneꞌyoo, ka togogwa pumme tokuese umu ka Te Naa nanetsagwayaꞌe. Soo Te Naa yise meeoo mu tunetammakute, ‘Ka weehepu togogwa-waꞌne matabuese, paꞌa oo taposase, umu numu saaꞌa ookow poonnena gwetzoimodooa.’
Mu ka nuka nanetzakwiyina gwetzoikwu. Oꞌnosoo te nanamoomooatupu-waꞌnesoo ka paꞌa e nataposase mu saaꞌa gwetzoidooa.
Te Naa noꞌoko numu ka teepu-koobatu besa soobedyana, tu besa dooa tamme-koobatoo nemawuni. Tooe haga tooe nu-kwi tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi yaꞌekwu ooosapa gwetzoinnummekwu.
Soo E Naa ka yaa teepu-koobatu numu e magwetzoi tuunguna yaatoo e taꞌya, gi nagutza ka mu sutakoo numu kadoo e mayugwe tuunguna.
Tooe haga tooe nu-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu gwetzoikwu. Tooe haga tooe gi nuka heesoobedyadu sumu-tammesoo yaꞌekwu, mooasoo soo Te Naa meeoo tunetammapu.
Nu yow gwetzoibu manepunnena, ooonneꞌyoona susumudu numu nu-ma soonammetugu, umu gi e heesoobedyadu ka suda tu manena hemma ooonakwa sooyugwena. Soo suda mu tumaduguna umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.
Soo tooe haga tooe suda manedu gi nuka petzape, gi tuwazoo nu-matoo kemma, oosoo ka suda tu manena soogwina ooosapa togano-kwi.
Mu numu besa tumadugudu ka tu tumaduguna gi nasookwina, nu-matoo kemma, oꞌno noꞌyoona numu mu poonne umuoo tookwa Te Naa nakabetseadu.”
Ka saaꞌa soo Te Pabeꞌe ka numme tunakatzimodu-no, ka teepu Judea mee naneadu-kwi petuse mu numu baa-wi matzaka.
Soo John punnoꞌo baa-wi numu matzakadyakwe
Oꞌno soo John gisoo nakwutumana.
Umu John pupuaꞌamu, mu Jew nanesootuhiwabe-matu-no, ka baa-witu numu namatzakadyi-koobatoo nanepetukute.
Umu John pupuaꞌamu ka John-matoo mease mee oo netamma, “Soo nana Te Pabeꞌe mee u netammana, menoꞌo numu baa-wi matzakadyakwe.
Soo John yise meeoo, “Numme ka Te Naa numme tunetammekupu mayohodyakwe.”
Mu mooasoo mee e unnena naka, “Nu gi mu Pabeꞌe, nu oo-kobenasoo yaatoo natayadu. Nu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu numu tunesootabuadu.

Ka numu nanodukwadoose, soo nana ka mogoꞌne nodukwadoose oo kooma manekwu. Soo nana puaꞌa oo-baa sukwe wununa oo nakapunne. Oosoo punnoꞌo besa soonamme ka nana nodukwadoodu besa soonamme. Ooonneꞌyoona nu besa soonamme ka mu numu Te Pabeꞌe-matoo mu mea, mu poonnena.
Mu numu sakwa Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimo gi nuka.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko numu-koobatu ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona kemmana, ka Te Naa manepunne-kwitu noꞌoko sopedakwatoo. Mu numu puu ka yaa teepu-koobatu hemma sopedakwadoona oo waha.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko ka Te Naa-witu sopedakwadoona te tooꞌe tuukweꞌe, pana susumudu numu gi oo nakaꞌoedyukute.
Tooe haga tooe ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukuse soo Te Naa oo tubetse togeꞌyookute.
Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-matoo tayapu, oosoo ka Te Naa kaaheno unnena te tuukwe tuunguna. Soo Te Naa tooꞌe noꞌoko ka tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma Te Pabeꞌe sootuhi.
Soo Te Naa ka tu Tooa, Te Pabeꞌe Jesus, unu soobedyana tooꞌe noꞌoko tu pooha oo-tamme nemawuni.
Mu numu Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu ooosapa gwetzoimokwu. Mu gi Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna punnoꞌo gi gwetzoibu nasootuhikwu, yise mu tumaꞌemukwana umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.
Mu Jew nananesootuhidu Pharisee mee nananeadu, ka Te Pabeꞌe nuusookweta. Umu ka mee tunakana, ewaꞌyoo numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyuku manemena.
Numme Te Pabeꞌe-matoo natunedyooemodu, ka numu baa-wi matzakadyakwe, soo Te Pabeꞌe gi baa-wi numu matzakadu.
Numme ka Te Pabeꞌe-no ka teepu Judea mee naneadu-kwiꞌyoona meaꞌase, ka Galilee mee naneadu-kwitoosoo kodyuka, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu Pharisee pumme nuusoogweda oo sopedakwadoona.
Ka oonow meana, numme ka teepu Samaria mee naneadu-toogoo meꞌa.
Ka Samaria-wi numme ka Sychar mee naneadu-kwi petuga.

Oꞌnosoo ka Jacob pahoda-kwi numme petuga, ka kwingaꞌa sogo mease, gi nadamanese. Ka tabeno tu manekese numme ka Te Pabeꞌe oo tamawuse, tukapu tumuga. Soo sumuꞌyoo mogoꞌne baa-witoo kemmana oo-baa petuoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee oo netamma,”Nu unu puudyaꞌe nu baa soogwaꞌe.”
Soo Samaritan mogoꞌne mee ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “U Jew numu pana u nuka Samaritan numu banekwikute.” (Mu Jew numu ka mu Samaritan, gi petzabedu, gi unu mu yadooꞌedu.)

Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee ka Samaritan mogoꞌne netamma, “U ka e pooha-gana gi sopedakwadoona gi ka E Naa ume sootuhikwuna tuwazoo, u sakwa uga ka oo tubengase soo Te Naa sakwa ka baa puu-ma nagwetzoidu u bamaka.”
Soo mogoꞌne yise mee oo netamma, “U gi tugapu-gana, gi too u wetooa-gaꞌyoo, soo pahodape tuwow tookapuꞌyoo. Hownnekoo yise u eka baa puma nagwetzoidu hanekwu?
U haaꞌa ka te namooatupu Jacob ooonakwa besowsoo pahodape-gaꞌyoo? Soo Jacob ne pahodakupu puma ookowsoo gwetzoina, umu oo doodooamu yise oo kootsoo punnoꞌo puma gwetzoina.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee oo nanekwegea, “Tooe haga tooe ka ekow baa hebedu puudyaꞌekwusoo.
Pana eka nuga pumme bamakana gi puudyaꞌe-waꞌneꞌyoo. Oosoo eka baa, nuga pumme bamagana nanagatoo hebese, oosoo patzona-waꞌne gi pasa-waꞌneꞌyoo, numu ooosapa gwetzoinnummekwu.”
Soo mogoꞌne yise mee ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “U sakwa e bamaka, oꞌno nu gi puudyaꞌena gi yaatu bidya petuyaꞌekwu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee oo netamma, “Ka u kooma bihoodooase yaasoo pepetuhoo.”

Soo mogoꞌne mee oo netamma, “Nu gi kooma-gaꞌyoo.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee oo netamma, “U togesapa tuukweꞌe, ka meeoo unnena, ‘Nu gi kooma-gaꞌyoo,’ mee. U manegeoo koomamu-gapu. Soo nana menoꞌo puno u nobe-gana gi u kooma.”
Soo mogoꞌne yise mee ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Menoꞌo nu u sopedakwatoo u tookwa sumuꞌyoo ka umu Te Naa nanayadooawabe-matu.
Umu ne nanamooatupu ekow giba-koobaꞌyoona nanesootuhaꞌe, pana mu Jew yise meeoo tunetamma, ‘Tamme sakwa Jerusalem-wiꞌyoona nanesootuhi.’ Haga yise toge-koo?”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee oo nanekwegea, “Mu Samaritan numu nanesootuhi pana, togesoo gi oo nakasopedakwadoo. Numme ka Te Naa sopedakwatoo oosoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-no numme Jew-matu magwetzoipu. Mu numu tooe hanoꞌyoona tooe nanesootuhikwu. Pudusoo mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka kaaheno Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhikwu, ka oo besa pooha pumme tummatzaꞌe. ‘Yooonnekoo nu-matoo mu kaaheno nanesootuhiyakwe,’ meeꞌe soo Te Naa te netamma. Soo Te Naa unu pooha-gana ooonneꞌyoona tamme tooe hanoꞌyoona tooe sakwa ka oo pooha-masoo oo-matoo nanesootuhi.”
Soo mogoꞌne yise mee oo netamma, “Nu oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Pabeꞌe yise pudusoo petukwu. Ka saaꞌa petuse oosoo noꞌokosoo hemma kaaheno te tuukwekwu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee oo netamma, “Nu mooasoo yow. Nu Mu Pabeꞌe.”
Numme ka Te Pabeꞌe ka mogoꞌne-no yadooꞌadyakwe oo poonnena umu-baa petuoogonno. Haꞌooga manena ka mogoꞌne yadooedyakwe? Mee numme sookama pana gi mu tubenga.

Soo mogoꞌne ka tu banoꞌosa mawuoogase ka tu nobe-witoo kodyuhooka. Numme ka Te Pabeꞌe mee netamma, “Mooasoo numme tukapu tumuhoodooa, yaatu tuka.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee ne netamma, “Nu atamasoo gwetzoidu.”
Numme yise mee nananetamma, “Haga gina tukapu a makahoodooa?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee unakwe, “Nu ka E Naa tunetammana nakabetseana gwetzoaꞌe.

Mooasoo ewaꞌyoo ka Te Naa besa unnepu-witu mu numu tunedyooe. Ooonneꞌyoona menoꞌo mu numu mumme wutooꞌe, ka Te Naa besa unnepu pumme tunedyooekwudu. Nu yise meeoo mu netammakwu mu numu nu-kwitu tuukwe, oꞌno ewaꞌyoo numu e nakaꞌoedyuku manepetukwu, yise soo Te Naa gi mobegwa-ga mu sootuhikwu. Mu ka ꞌyoo mu manekwi nasootuhikwu. Mu yise ka mu numu ka Te Naa unnepu mooe tunedyooedu-no besa sokwamakwu ka mu numu nuka nakaꞌoedyukuna mu nasootuhaꞌe.”

Toge, oꞌno soo mogoꞌne ka petuoogase ka tu nanumu mu Samaritan numu, mee netamma petuga, “Kemmase ka nana wegeadooa oosoo noꞌoko e manepu gi nekwatsekute. Nu oo nakaꞌoedyukute o oosoo Te Pabeꞌe.” Ewaꞌyoo numu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyuku mane. Mu numu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petuhooga.
Mu Samaritan numu yise mee ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “U sakwa yaa numme-baasoo.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise waha tabeno umu-baa.
Ka Te Pabeꞌe unnepu nakase ewaꞌyoosoo numu tunakaꞌoedyuku mane.
Umu ka mogoꞌne mee netamma, “U ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu ne tuukwese numme tunakaꞌoedyuku mane, ka mooeꞌugasoo numme ka nummesoo oo poonnese, oo nakana numme yise tubetse tunakaꞌoedyuku mane.”
Waha tabe mease soo Te Pabeꞌe ka teepu Galilee mee naneadu-kwitoo mea.
Mooasoo soo Te Pabeꞌe ne tuukweꞌe ka Te Naa nayadooawabe nananumu gi ooka mu nakaꞌoedyukuna.
Ewaꞌyoo Galilee numu mooasoo ka tu pooha naꞌewatuka-kwikoo ka Jerusalem-witu nanabesa ka Te Pabeꞌe pooha tumadugupu poonne. Ooonneꞌyoona ka Galilee-wi ka Te Pabeꞌe petugase mu numu besa oo matuku.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka Cana-witoosoo
Soo numu moohedu ka Te Pabeꞌe ka teepu Galilee-wi petuna nakase, ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petuse mee oo netamma, “E dooa unu tuꞌoedyuina yaꞌegaꞌa ona Capernaum-wi. U sakwa kemmase oo mabesakudooa.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee oo netamma, “Mu gisoo tunakaꞌoedyukute. Mu ka nanabesa e pooha manepu poonnese suuꞌmu oo nakaꞌoedyukukwu.”
Soo numu moohedu nana ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “U sakwa menoꞌosoo nu-no kemma, gisoo ka e tooa yaꞌe.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee oo netamma, “U sakwa kodyuka, u tooa mooasoo gwetzoikwu.”
Soo numu moohedu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukuse meahoo, togesoo ka oona tu nobe-kwitoo oo mea, soo oo tummatzidu nana oo wegeahoodooase mee oo tuukweꞌe, “U tooa mooasoo besa manepu.”
Soo numu moohedu ka pumme tummatzidu nana mee tubenga, “Hannanoꞌo besa mani?” Oosoo yise oo nanekwegea, “Etzeꞌe toge tabeno kadooꞌe.”

Soo nana oetu soomayuhoo, ka oona nokwikoo haꞌyoo soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo e netamma, “U tooa mooasoo besa namagwetzoipu.” Soo numu moohedu nana ka mu tu nobe-kwitu numu-no, ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyuku mane.
Yow esoo wahasoo ka Te Pabeꞌe nanabesa pooha tumadugupu, ka teepu Galilee-koobaꞌyoona. Gi haaꞌnoꞌyoose ka teepu Judea mee naneadu-kwiꞌyoona oo kodyu petuse.
Saaꞌa Te Pabeꞌe ka Jerusalem-wi petuga, ka mu Jew numu otuoo ewa pooha tuka-noꞌo.
Ka Jerusalem-wi oo petugase, tuutseꞌekoo banunadu Bethsaida mee naneadu naꞌoonnakwi manegeoo nahabatoo.

Ewaꞌyoo tuoegoedu numu oho. Susumudu gi tutubootabuedu, umu-matu gi modu, umu-matu gi yuyutsunga manepu. Umu ka Te Naa tummatzidu toha kasa-gakoo wutooena, ka pudusoo ka baa oo mayutsunga petukwuse. Soo mooeꞌugasoo numu ka baa bayutsungawunudu-kwi ekadu besa maniyakwe.
Sumuꞌyoo gi nummedu nana ewa (38) tomogapu oe numu-no.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe oo poonne ka oona oo hape, yise soo gi nummedu nana wunaꞌme o hape, mee oetu naka. Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee oo tubengu, “U haaꞌa u namabesakuna soogwaꞌe?”
Soo nana mee ka Te Pabeꞌe nanekwegea, “Ka bayutsungatu-kwitoo e tummatzikwudu kadoo haga. Kummaꞌyoosoo nonotsa nuka-kobenasoo ka baa-wi mooe ekeahooyakwe.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee oo netamma, “Yotseoose nummemanese, ka u wegea mahedase nobe-kwitoo kodyuka.”
Esoo ka mu Jew numu nanesootuhi tabeno tooe, a namanena.
Mu Jew numu nanesootuhi moohedu ka nana namabesakupu mee netamma, “Soo tamme putoogoo tumayohona, gi soo numu puusoo tu wegea maheta tamme nanesootuhi tabeno.”
Oosoo nana besa manipu mee oo nanekwegea, “Soo nana e mabesakudu meeoo e netamma, ‘U besa manese, u wegea mahedase nummennumme,’ “ meeꞌe.
Umu numu nanesootuhi moohedu yise mee oo tubenga, “Haga meeoo u netamma?”
Soo nana gi oo sopedakwatoo ka Te Pabeꞌe, ka mu numu ewa-naga oo manise.

Saaꞌa soo Te Pabeꞌe ka pabatsekoo nanesootuhi nobe-kwikoo oo mayuse mee oo netamma, “U menoꞌo besa manepu. Ka suda u tumaduguna maꞌwu, u ka gi suda u tumaduguna maꞌwuna, soo suda u tumaduguna u-matoosoo kodyuse u unusoo tuoeyidooa.”
Soo nana yise mease ka mu Jew numu nanesootuhi moohedu tuukweꞌe, “Soo Te Pabeꞌe e mabesaku.”
Mu Jew numu nanesootuhi moohedu, ka Te Pabeꞌe nekwohone petu, oosoo ka nanesootuhi tabeno mu numu mabesakuna.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu netamma, “Soo Nuga Naa, puu nonotsa tabeno numu sootuhidyakwe, gi oo maꞌwudu. Nu punnoꞌo oo-waꞌneꞌyoo.”

Mu Jew numu nanesootuhi moohedu, ka Te Pabeꞌe unu batsa soogwaꞌe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka nanesootuhi tabeba-wi mu numu mabesakuna, yise meeoo unakwe, “Soo Te Naa nuga tubetse Naa.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa-waꞌneꞌyoosoo mee nanetammadu.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu netamma, “Nu kaaheno mu tuukwekwu. Nu ka E Naa tunetammana mayoho. Nu gi nugasoo manena suuꞌmu mayoho.

Soo E Naa ka unu e soobedyana, ka hemma how tu yugwena e tzapoonnekute. Saaꞌa E Naa nanabesowsoo e tzapoonnekukwu. Nu yise punnoꞌo mumme ooka tzapoonekukwu. Oꞌno yise mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu meeoo, ‘Uune! Soo Te Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo.’
Soo E Naa puu mu numu mu yaꞌekwikoo mayodakwu, nu punnoꞌo gwetzoibu mu numu meeoo e soobedyana sootuhikwu.
Soo E Naa gi ka mu numu saaꞌa nemadabuekwu, oosoo nu-tamme oo tzamunapu.
Soo E Naa noꞌobatusoo numu nu-tooha manekwuna soogwaꞌe. Tooe haga tooe nuka gi heesoobedyadu, ka E Naa tookwa gi heesoobedyadu.

Nu kaaheno mu tuukwekwu tooe haga tooe e unnena nakaꞌoedyukudu, ka E Naa nakaꞌoedyukudooa tuwazoo, umuoo ooosapa gwetzoibu nasootuhikwu. Umuoo tunakaꞌoedyukudu suda tumaduguna, soo Te Naa mooasoo soomuꞌwa, umuoo gi numu-no paba nanehanekwu, ka mooasoo Te Naa besa podo meana.
Nu kaaheno mu tuukwekwu. Nu-matoo nanesootuhidu, tooe tuipu pana, saaꞌa ka e yadooase tu tutui-kwiꞌyoona yosuse, ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna, umuoo ka ooosapa gwetzoibu gi mobegwa-gakoo nasootuhikwu.
Soo E Naa ka gwetzoibu-ma mu numu sootuhikwudu. Nu punnoꞌo ooosoo.
Soo E Naa ka mu numu tu nemadabuekwuna nu-matoo nemawuni, ooonneꞌyoona nu ka mu numu nemadabuekwu, nu ka Mu Pabeꞌena.

Mu sakwa ekow nakaꞌoedyuku. Pudusoo noꞌyoona mu tuipu numu yosukwu, ka e nakase, ka pumme e baꞌe. Soo numu besa tumadugudu, besa nasootuhikwu, ka ooosapa gi moobegwaga nagwetzoidu. Umu suda tumadugudu, punnoꞌo soo nanasuda mu tumaduguna umuoo-matoosoo kodyukwu. Umu suda sokwamana puusoo nasootuaganekwu.
Oꞌno nu ka E Naa nuka tunetamma-kwaꞌnesoo numu paba nehanekwu. Nu besa numu nehanekwu, E Naa pooha-toohakwi nu numu nehanekwu nu gi nuusuꞌmu numu nehanekwu.
Ka nuusoo nakwitu e nanekwaha mu gi hownnekoo e nakaꞌoedyuku-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Pana soo E Naa yise nu-witu wahana, oꞌno yise mu sakwa oo nakaꞌoedyukute. Nu oo sopedakwatoo ka Te Naa nanekwahana oosoo kaaheno tuukwe.
Mu mooasoo mu numu tayapu ka John nu-witu tubengakwudu. Soo John kaaheno mu tuukwepu.
Mu numu yise ka John unnena soogwaꞌe. Nu oo sopedakwatoo ka mooasoo togesapa tuukwena. Nu mu nemayukute ka John nu-witu wahapu, oꞌno yise mu punnoꞌo e nakaꞌoedyukuse namagwetzoikwu.
Soo John ka Te Naa Besa Po mu tzaponnekute, mu gi haaꞌnoto besa sokwamapunne.
Soo John unnepu ka mu numu nu-witu sopedakwatoo tummatzi. Ka nanabesa e tumadipu E Naa nuka tunetammakuna, mumme e tzapoonneku oꞌno mu numu oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa yaa mu-matoo e taya.
Mu gi ka Te Naa nakana, gi tuwazoo oo poonne. Soo Te Naa nu-witu wahase, oꞌno yise yaatoo e taya.
Mu gi ka Te Naa unnena nakaꞌoedyukute mu ka gi oo nakaꞌoedyukuna mumme oo tunetammakuna.
Mu ka Te Naa unnepu nease numme namagwetzoikwu mee mu sokwamana. Pana nu-witu mu neꞌa, ooonneꞌyoona mu sakwa e nakaꞌoedyukuse mu namagwetzoi.
Pana mu gi nu-matoo kemma, oꞌno nu gi ka gwetzoibu-ma mu sootuhi-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Nu gi ka mu numu besa nu-witu tuukwedu wate pana
nu ka nuusoo oo sopedakwadoona, mu tookwa gi ka Te Naa besa soobedya.
Tooe soo Te Naa mu-matoo e taꞌyase sapa, mu gi e nakaꞌoedyukute. Ka kummaꞌakoosoo atasoo numu tunedyooe petuse, mu oo nakaꞌoedyukute, tooe Te Naa gi ooka taꞌya sapa.
Mu ka mu numu mu besaꞌyoo mee mumme mu netammana besa soobedya, pana ka Te Naa meeoo unnena gi nakaheesoobedya. Mu gi hannanoꞌo e nakaꞌoedyuku-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Soo Moses mu magwetzoidu tooe mu magwetzoi mee mu tusooyugwe sapa. Ka oꞌnosoo soo Moses te namooatupu ka Te Naa unnepu te tuukweꞌe. Soo Moses ka suda mu tumaduguna ka Te Naa tuukwekwu.
Tooe haga tooe ka Moses unnepu nakaꞌoedyukudu nuka nakaꞌoedyukukwu tuwazoo, soo Moses ka e manekwuna botuguse.
Mu ka gi Moses tubotuguna nakaꞌoedyukuna, mu tookwa nuka gi nakaꞌoedyukute.
Saaꞌa ka tamano tu manegese soo Te Pabeꞌe ka numme tunakatzimodu-no, ka banunadu Galilee
Soo Te Pabeꞌe tu manekwuna sopedakwatoona, haꞌyoo saaꞌa soo Philip unnedooa mee soonammena, ka Philip mee tubenga, “Hanoko nadukadu tamme tumuse, noko umu numu makakwu?”

Soo Philip oo nanekwegease meeoo oo netamma, “Soo nana tooe hemma tooe how yugwe, pumme tukapu puma tu tumuna suuꞌmu hee-gaꞌyoo, pana, oosoo gi togeꞌyoo, ka mu ewow numu makakwuse, ka tukapu ewa nanenaga.”
Sumuꞌyoo punnoꞌo ka Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu-matu Andrew
“Esoo naatse manegeoo tukaba-gaꞌyoo, waahoo tutukutsekoo pakwe noko. Nagutza huutseꞌyoo, gi tamme noꞌoko mu numu maka-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo, “Ka mu numu ka pooega-kooba aata tuungu

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu manegeoo tutukutsekoo tukaba hemmahoose, ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhikooha. Ka numme pumme nakatzimodu yise hemehoose, noko mu numu aatadu ne maka tuungu, ka tutugutsekoo pakwe ooosoo tuwazoo ooosoo yugwe.
Numu noꞌyoona togekoo yise tukahoo, ka noko numu wutzuꞌmese, soo Te Pabeꞌe numme tunakatzimodu mee netamma, “Noko ka tukapu nagupenidu masumudoo. Gi ka tukapu nahadyugwepana.”
“Numme sumumano wahamatsebooekudu (12) kawona kaanoku, ka tukapu nagupeni-ma, o soo manegeꞌyoo tutukutseꞌyoo tukaba.”

Mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe besa tumadabuehoose, oo poonnese mee nananetamma, “Yow esoo Te Pabeꞌe Te Naa nayadooawabe. Wunaꞌme tamme ka Te Naa nakawutooepunne, ka yaa teepu-koobatoo ka Te Pabeꞌe oo tayakwuse.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe oo sopedakwadoo, ka mu numu-kooba katudu oo nemayugwekwuse, ooonneꞌyoona mu maꞌwukase puu suuꞌmu oona ka giba-matoo meahoo.
Ka yongona tu manepetuse numme oo nakatzimodu ka banunadu-kwitoosoo kodyuka.
Ka tu toganokase sapa, soo Te Pabeꞌe gisoo numme-baa kodyu petu. Numme yise ka sake-wi kuase, ka Capernaum-witoo natsemangega.
Unu hukwa petuse, soo baa unu bayutsungakooha.
Numme banamoo-kwitoo natsemangega, o ne manikese numme ka Te Pabeꞌe poonne ka baa-koobakwi, oo kemmanoꞌo ka sake tzageꞌe oo manikese numme sui.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee ne netamma, “Nu yow, gi suipana.”
Numme yise ka sake-wi oo netzatsebooase yabesoo ka bakumana petuga, Capernaum tzageꞌe.

Oogow awamooa mu numu ka banunadu oowenapaꞌyoona mee nananetamma, “Soo Te Pabeꞌe umu pumme nakatzimodu-no sumuoo sake-gaꞌyoo. Ka togano tamme mu poonne ka mu tunakatzimodu ka sake-wi mu meaꞌase. Soo Te Pabeꞌe gi umu-no.”
Kukummaꞌyoosoo sake punnoꞌo o ka Tiberias mee naneadu-wiꞌyoona kemmadu, ka oona etzeꞌe Te Pabeꞌe pukwiꞌyoona nanesootuhina, mu numu pukwikoo oo makapu tzageꞌe petugadyakwe.

Noꞌyoona mu numu oo poonne soo Te Pabeꞌe umu pumme nakatzimodu-no gi o, ewaꞌyoo numu yise ka sake-wi kuase ka Capernaum-witoo natzemangekase, ka Te Pabeꞌe watega. Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe mayuse meeoo oo tubenga, “Hannano u natsemangeke?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu numu ewana nanekwegea, “Nu togesapa mu tuukwe. Mu numu ewana ka tseakoꞌena suuꞌmu e wategena, ka tukapu suuꞌmu soogwina. Gi umu ka nanabesa e pooha manena poonnese e wate.

Gi ka nasooꞌawunudu paba sooyugwepana, mu sakwa ka tukapu pumme numu nakugwetzoinnummena paba sooyugwe. Soo Te Naa nuka pooha-maka. Nu ookow tukapu puma mu nakugwetzoinnummena mu sootuhikwu.” Umu numu ewana yise oo tubenga, “Hownnekoo yise numme ka Te Naa nakabetseakwu?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu nanekwegea, “Nuka nakaꞌoedyuku meeꞌe soo Te Naa unnena yaatoo e taya, oꞌno mu oo nakabetseakwu.”
Umu numu yise meeoo oo netamma, “Sumu tuwazoo besa u tumadina ne tzapoonneku, oꞌno numme u nakaꞌoedyukukwu.
Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa puu umu te nanamooatupu tukaba makamena. Soo Te Naa unnepu mee nabotugu, ‘Te Naa paꞌanakwana tukaba puma mu nakugwetzoinnummena mu maka, umu yise oo tuka.’ “

Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu netamma, “Nu togesapa mu tuukwekwu, soo Moses gi ka mu nanamooatupu ka tukaba puma mu nakugwetzoinnumme maka. Pana menoꞌo soo Te Naa ka tukaba pummetusoo puma mu nakugwetzoinnummena-ma mu sootuhaꞌe.
Nu yow soo tukaba Te Naa-nakwana kemmadu. Soo Te Naa ekow tukaba-ma mu sootuhikwu, nu ka Te Naa-nakwana kemmapu, puma mu namagwetzoikwuna.”
Umu numu yise mee ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Menoꞌo manakwana u sakwa ooosapa ꞌyoonnekoo tukaba-ma ne sootuhi.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Nu yow soo tukaba mu sootuhikwudu ooosapa puma mu gwetzoimokwuna. Soo numu nuka nakaꞌoedyukudu gi kummaꞌakoosoo tooe hownnekoo tukapu sookwi-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo numu nuka nakaꞌoedyukudu gi puudyi-waꞌneꞌyoo ka nuka nanetzakwiyaꞌena.
Pana mumme e tuukwe-kwaꞌnesoo, mu ka nanabesa e tuyugwena poonnepana mu gi e nakabetsea.
Noꞌyoona umu Te Naa tutzeana, nuka nakaꞌoedyukute. Nu yise gi mu tsasoopedya-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Nu ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona kemma, nuka oo tunetammakuna mayohokwuse, gi nuusoo meeoo tusooyugwena.
Soo Te Naa ka umu pumme nakaꞌoedyukudu tuikwuna gi petzabena. Nu saaꞌa ka yaa teepu-koobasoo kodyu petuse, noꞌoko umuoo nuka nakaꞌoedyukudu, mu tuipu tuwazoo mayosudooa.
Soo Te Naa noꞌobatusoo numu nuka nakaꞌoedyukuna, ooosapa gwetzoimokwuna soogwidu. Nu ka kodyu petuse umuoo tuipu mayosukwu.”

Umu Jew numu nanesootuhidu, yise ka Te Pabeꞌe nanetzamekute ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo unakwe, “Nu yow ka tukapu-waꞌneꞌyoo numu puma nakugwetzoinnummena, Te Naa-baaꞌyoona kemmadu.” Umu Jew numu nanesootuhidu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo, “U, Ne Naa-witu esayaꞌe. U sukwe Jesus, ka Joseph tooa. Numme ka u naanapuaꞌamu sopedakwatoo.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Gi e nanetzamekupana.

Gi mu numu puusoo e nakaꞌoedyuku-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa mu numu sootuhidyina umu nuka suuꞌmu nakaꞌoedyukudu Te Naa doodooamu manekekwu. Nu ka petuse saaꞌa umu nuka nagemodu, mayosukwu, tooe mu tuipu sapa.
Soo Te Naa yadooawabe oꞌnosoo mee tubotugu, ‘Soo Te Naa saaꞌa noꞌoko numu tunedyooedooa.’ Tooe haga tooe numu ka Te Naa unnena nakana, yise oo nakaꞌoedyukudu, saaꞌa nu-matoo kemmadooa.
Gi haga ka Te Naa poonnedu, nu suuꞌmu ka Te Naa poonne ka oo-baaꞌyoona kemmapuna.
Nu togesapa mu tuukwekwu, noꞌyoona mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ooosapa gwetzoimokwu.
Nu yow soo tukapu-waꞌneꞌyoo puma numu nakugwetzoinnummena, ooosapa numu puma gwetzoimokwuna.
Umu te nanamooatupu puu, ka sukwe nadukadu-ma namagwetzoimoꞌo, ka Te Naa pumme makana. Soo tukapu sukwe nawutzuꞌme, gi numu tubetse magwetzoaꞌe.

Nu yise yow soo puma numu tubetse gwetzoina tukapu-waꞌneꞌyoo, nu ka Te Naa-manakwana kemmadu. Esoo tukapu nugasoo tookoo-waꞌneꞌyoo, tooe haga tooe ka nuka tookoo tukase, ooosapa gi mobegwa-gakoo gwetzoimokwu. Nu ka mu-koobatoo nabatsase, oꞌno yise mu ooosapa gwetzoimokwu. Nu yaahoo soo tukapu numu puma nakugwetzoinnumme, nu puma mu gwetzoikwuna.”
Mu Jew numu puusoo nananepetukukooha mee nanaꞌunnena, “Haꞌoo haaꞌa puusoo tu tookoo-matu tzapookana te makakwu, tamme pute yise oo tukakwu?”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Nu kaaheno mu tuukwe, nu yow mu Pabeꞌe. Tooe haga tooe nuka nakaꞌoedyukudu ooosapa nu-noꞌyookwu. Nu ka tukapu numu puma nakugwetzoinnummekwuna. Soo e puupe ka baa mu hebena, puma mu namagwetzoina. Soo tooe haga tooe soogwetzoidu nu-ma suuꞌmu gwetzoikwu. Nu ka kodyu petuse mu tuiputooꞌe saaꞌa namayosudooa.
Soo e tookoo tubetse tukapu-waꞌneꞌyoo, yise e puupe punnoꞌo tubetse baa-waꞌneꞌyoo. Nu-mamma ooosapa numu gwetzoimokwu.
Tooe haga tooe ka e tookoo tukadu, yise ka e puupe hebedu ooosapa nu-noꞌyoopunne.
Soo Te Naa yaatoo e tayase, nu yise ka Te Naa pooha-toohakwi mu-baa gwetzoinnumme. Tooe haga tooe ka e nakaꞌoedyukuna, nu e pooha-ma mu sootuhikwu, oꞌno yise mu ooosapa gi mobegwa-gakoo gwetzoimokwu.

Nu yow oo soo tukapu, puma numu nakugwetzoinnummekwuna, ka Te Naa-manakwana kemmadu. Tooe haga tooe nu-noꞌyoopunnedu ooosapa gwetzoinnummekwu. Soo tukapu te nanamooatupu pumatu tukapu, gi haaꞌnoto numu magwetzoidu. Pana nu yow gwetzoibu mu sootuhikwudu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe, meeoo mu numu netammadyakwe tooesoo ka nanesootuhi nobe-wiꞌyoona, ka Capernaum-wiꞌyoona.
Ewaꞌyoo numu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakapunne pana gi oo nakatugu yise mee nananetamma, “Esoo nana tamme tunedyooena unusoo namanena nanakaꞌoedyukukwu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe oo sopedakwatoo umu gi oo nakasopedakwadoo, ka oo unnewununa. Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo, “Mu sakwa gi nasootookepana, ka meeoo mumme e netamma.
Mu sakwa sumuna gi oo nakaꞌoedyuku tooe e poonnepana, ka Te Naa-matoosoo e koyukase.
Mu numu gi puusoo namagwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa-suuꞌmu mu magwetzoikwu. Soo nuga unnepu putoogoo ka Te Naa Besa Pooha mu nakaꞌoedyukuna suuꞌmu mu sootuhikwu, oꞌno yise mu ooosapa gwetzoimokwu.
Pana susumudu mu-matu gi e nakaꞌoedyukute.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Nu mooasoo mu tuukwepu, soo numu gi puusoo nama e nakaꞌoedyuku-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo E Naa mee e netamma, ‘Mumme nu-kwi tunakaꞌoedyuku mayugwe,’ “ mee.
Ewaꞌyoo numu gi oo nakaꞌoedyukuna yise tu nonobe-witoo kodyuka.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise numme sumumano wahamatsebooekudu (12) pumme nakatzimodu mee tubengu, “Mu haaꞌa punnoꞌo e nasoomenakwu?”
Soo Simon Peter yise ka Te Pabeꞌe nekwegea, “Numme ooosapa u-noꞌyookwudu. U ooosapa kaaheno ne tunedyooennumme. Numme ka gwetzoibu besa nakasoobedya.
Numme u nakaꞌoedyukuna, oo nakasopedakwatoo u yow Ne Tubetse Pabeꞌe.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee ne netamma, “Nu mumme sumumano wahamatsebooekudu (12) netutzea. Pana sumuꞌyoo mu-nagatu ooosapa gi nu-noꞌyoopunne.”

Ka nana Judas Iscariot mee naneadu soo Te Pabeꞌe netammana meeoo. Tooe soo Judas sumumano wahamatsebooekudu (12) tunakatzimodu-nagatu pana soo Judas ka saaꞌa umu Te Pabeꞌe ooowemota mani, ka umu wohonedu-tamme mane, umuoo ka Te Pabeꞌe batzakwu mee tunetammana.

Saaꞌa soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko ka teepu Galilee mee naneadu-koobakwi numu tunedyooennumme. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka teepu Judea mee naneadu-kwitoo gi meꞌa, mu Jew moohedu oonatuoo pumme nehooawi, pumme mu nepatza.
Mu Jew numu nanesootuhi ewa tukakwuna tzageꞌe manegena, oꞌno umu numu sumuyakwe, nanasusuꞌmu tatza nobe-kwi nobegana, ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe ewaꞌyoo yise nasootuhiyakwe.

Umu Te Pabeꞌe wangaꞌamu gi oo oedyukute ka tu pabeꞌe. Umu oo wohonena mee oo netamma, “U sakwa Judea-witoo mea. U pooha tumadipe mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu oetuooo tzapoonnekukwu. U ka pooha-gaꞌyoo mee naneyugwena, gi oo nekwatzetugupana. U ka nanabesa tumadi mee unnena u sakwa noꞌoko numu tzapoonneku.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu nanekwegea, “Nu gi o mea-waꞌne manepunne, mu yise tooe hannano tooe mesoo mea.
Nu ka mu numu suda tumadugu mu tuukweꞌe, ooonneꞌyoona umu yise gi e petzape, pana umu mumme gi nekwohoꞌne.
Nu gi menoꞌo mu-no mea-waꞌne manepunne.”
Ka mu tu wangaꞌamu mease, soo Te Pabeꞌe punnoꞌo huu tabeno ka Galilee-wisoo, saaꞌa puu suuꞌmu watze mea.
Mu Jew numu moohedu ka mu numu-naga-kwitu ka Te Pabeꞌe tooꞌe wate. Ewow numu tooꞌe tubenga, “Hano soo Jesus?”
Ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu ewaꞌyoo numu nanatuukwe. Susumudu umu-matu meeoo, “Soo Jesus besaꞌyoo nana,” pana susumudu punnoꞌo meeoo, “Soo Jesus numu nemooagadu.”
Mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-noꞌyoopunnedu ka mu Jew numu moohedu-ma suina, ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-witu watze nanatuukwe.
Ka mu Jew numu pahe tabeno nanesootuhi ewa tuka-kwi manepetuse, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka pabow nanesootuhi nobe-kwi petuse yise nanesootuhibu-witu mu numu tuukweꞌe.
Mu numu mee nanatubenga, “Hownnekoo esoo nana noꞌokosoo hemma sopedakwatoo? Esoo gi hannanoꞌo nanesootuhibu-witu natunedyooepu-gaꞌyoo.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo, “Nu ka Te Naa unnena mu tunedyooe. Nu gi nugasoo tusooyugwena mu tunedyooꞌe.
Tooe haga tooe ka E Naa nakabetseadu oo sopedakwadookwu oo nakaꞌoedyukukwu, ka E Naa unnepu e waha.

Soo tooe haga tooe pummesoo tusooyugwena wahakwu, besa pummesoo nanemadabuewununa soogwaꞌepunnedu. Nu ka toge kaahenotu E Naa unnepu mu tunedyooe, oꞌno mu Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhikwu. Nu togesapa mu tuukweꞌe, nu gi esayaꞌe.
Mu puu ka Moses putoogoo tumayohomeana nakaꞌoedyukudu mee naneyugwe, pana mu puu gi oo nakabetseꞌa. Mu ka Moses nakabetseana, how manena mu e batsa soogwaꞌe?”
Mu numu mee oo netamma, “Soo tsoapa haaꞌa u maꞌemukwa? Gi haga u batsa-soogwaꞌe.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Sutaꞌyoo nana mee mu e netamma, ka nanesootuhi tabeno numu e mabesakukena.

Oꞌnosoo soo Moses ka mu nanamooatupusoo tumayohope mu tunedyooꞌe, ooonaꞌyoona numu kootze naꞌoonnakwitu natsekea, umu yise Jew numu maneyakwe. Mu nanamooatupu oꞌnosoo ka Moses-kobenasoo gwetzoimodu, oo ka tu doodooamu mooe yugwe.

Mu puu ka Moses nakabetseana ka nanesootuhi tabeno sapa ka mu doodooamu oo yugweyakwe. Ooonneꞌyoona nu ka nanesootuhi tabeno sapa ka mu doodooamu oo yugweyakwe. Ooonneꞌyoona nu ka nanesootuhi tabeno ka nana mabesaku
mu sakwa gi e sutakupana, gi e nesootzemapana.”
Susumudu mu numu-matu mee nananetamma, “Yaa esoo nana. Mu Jew moohedu batsayagana.
Soo Jesus noꞌoko ne-kobenaꞌyoona yadooadyakwe. Hownneꞌyoonagina mu numu moohedu a tsasoopedya? Te moohedu ka Te Pabeꞌe sumuna nakaꞌoedyukute, ooonneꞌyoona oo tsasoopedya.”

Susumudu punnoꞌo meeoo, “Mana numme pukwiꞌyoona a kemmana sopedakwadoo pana, oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa yadooawabe meeoo tubotugu. ‘Gi haga pukwiꞌyoona oo kemmana soopedakootookwu.’ Numme ka nana pukwiꞌyoona kemmana sopedakwatoo ooonneꞌyoona numme meeoo oosoo tookwa gi Te Pabeꞌe-matu.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka pabow nanesootuhi nobe-kumabaꞌyoona ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi mee mu netamma, “Mu meeoo sokwama, mu ka Te Pabeꞌe sopedakwatoo mee, pana mu ka pukwiꞌyoona oo kemmana, tuwazoo gi sopedakwadoo. Mu gi ka E Naa yaatoo nuka tayadu nakasopedakwatoo, oosoo Nuga Naa, nu oo-baaꞌyoona kemmahoo. Pana E Naa unnena nu kaaheno mu tuukweꞌe, nu gi nugasoo unnena wahadu.”
Mu Jew numu tutunehanedu ka Te Pabeꞌe sookwutuma pana gi oo-toogoo manakwe, ka gisoo ka Te Pabeꞌe nabatsakwi oo manakwe.

Ewaꞌyoo numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-noyoopunnedu mee nanaꞌunakwe, “Esoo nana noꞌokosoo hemma nanabesa pooha madaꞌe, ooonneꞌyoona esoo nana tookwa Te Pabeꞌe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka petuse, oosoo noꞌokosoo hemma nanabesa pooha madikwu.”
Mu Jew numu tutunehanedu ka mu numu unnena nakana nuusoogweda, ka mu tuukwutumadu ka Te Pabeꞌe wutuma tuungu, pana umu gi oo wutuma.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu numu mee netamma, “Nu gi haaꞌnoto mu-baaꞌyoopunnekwu. Pudusoo nu yise saaꞌa ka Te Naa-matoosoo kodyukakwu.
Ooonneꞌyoona mu saaꞌa, unu e tooꞌe soogwi pana gi e mayu-waꞌneꞌyoo. Mu nu-no tooꞌe soogwedapana gi mu hownnekoo nu-noyoopunnekwu.”
Mu numu yise mee nananetamma, “Hanogina oosoo meakwuse tamme gi oo nageka-waꞌneꞌyoo? Oosooga sumuna ka mu Jew numu tooetoo ka mu gi Jew numu-baa manekwuse.
Hayoo unnena oosoo ka meeoo, ‘Mu e tooꞌe soogwi pana gi e mayu-waꞌneꞌyoo, mu too gi e nageka-waꞌneꞌyoo, ka e kodyukase?’ “

Ka mu Jew numu ewa tuka nanesootuhi tabeno namamakwuhoogaꞌa, soo Te Pabeꞌe wunuse ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-punagakoo mee unakwe, “Tooe haga tooe wunaꞌme tu gwetzoinnummekwuna gi mobegwa-gakoo soogwidu nu-toohatoo nasoomawunise, nasootuhikwu.
Soo Te Naa unnepu mee naꞌunakwe oosoo, ‘Tooe haga tooe nuka nakaꞌoedyukudu patzona-waꞌne gi pasa-waꞌneꞌyoo, ooosapa gi mobegwa-gakoo gwetzoibu nasootuhikwu.’ “
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa Besa Pooha ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu saaꞌa tusootuhi-kwitu te tuukwekwu. Soo Te Naa gisoo ka Tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma mu numu poohamaka, ka Te Pabeꞌe gisoo pubaatoo kodyu petugaꞌa.”
Susumudu oo unnena nakase, mu numu-matu meeoo, “Oosoo tookwa Te Naa yadooawabe.”
Mu susumudu punnoꞌo mee, “Yow tookwa Te Pabeꞌe.” Umu-matu yise mee unakwe, “Oosoo tookwa gi Te Pabeꞌe, oosoo Galilee-wiꞌyoona kemmadu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe gi Galilee-wiꞌyoona kemmakwudu.
Soo Te Naa unnepu meeoo, ‘Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka te namooatupu David maꞌyoona suaketu. Oosoo ka Bethlehem mee naneadu-kwiꞌyoona kemmakwu, oosoo uga David pukwiꞌyoona kemmana.’ “
Mu numu yise nanapokihoo nanaꞌatasoo tusooyugwegonnona.
Mu susumudu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe nuusoogwetakugonno, pana gi haga yise oo wutuma.
Mu tukwutumadu yise ka mu tutunehanedu-matoo kodyuka. Mu tutunehanedu ka mu tukwutumadu mee tubenga, “How manena mu gi ka Jesus wutuma?”
Mu tukwutumadu meeoo mu nanekwegea, “Oosoo nanabesa unakwe, gi haga nana oo-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
Mu tutunehanedu yise mee mu tukwutumadu netamma, “Mu haaꞌa punnoꞌo oo nakaꞌoedyukute?
Numme tutunehanedu gi oo nakaꞌoedyukute, numme mooasoo noꞌoko hemma sopedakwadoo, numu gi numme nemooaga-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Mu gi tutusopedakwatoodu gi Te Naa unnena sopedakwadoo, mu tumaꞌemukwana umu-tamme kodyusoo.”
Sumuꞌyoo umu-notu Nicodemus

“Oosoo meeoo nayadooa soo Te Naa unnepu, ‘Tamme sakwa ka nana-no mooe yadooase, ka haꞌoo manekwuse oo sopedakwatoose, oꞌno tamme sumuna oo nehanese tamme oetu sopedakwadookwu, oosoo haaꞌa besaꞌyoo pute gi besaꞌyoo?’ “
Umu yise mee oo nanekwegea, “U punnoꞌo umu Galilee-witu-kwaꞌne yadooa-kaꞌnga. U sakwa ka Te Naa unnepu nease oo nakasopedakwadoo, soo Te Naa yadooawabe gi Galilee-wiꞌyoona kemmakwudu.”
Ka Te Pabeꞌe tunemamakwuse, mu numu tu nonobe-kwitoosoo kodyudyipunne.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka giba Olive mee naneadu-matoo kodyuka, oonow tooikwu mee soonammena.
Oogow mooꞌa awamooasoo tu tabuagena, soo Te Pabeꞌe kodyuka, oona ka pabow nanesootuhi nobe-kobenatoosoo. Ewaꞌyoo numu oo nakadu oo-baa petudyipunne. Oonow katuna nanesootuhibu mu tunedyooꞌe.
Sumuꞌyoo mogoꞌne mooasoo kooma-gapana kummaꞌakoosoo nana pootaꞌma. Mu nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu, ka mu Pharisee mee nananeadu-nagatu, ka mogoꞌne poonnese ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa oo bi petuoo.
Umu Jew nananesootuhidu mee ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Numme eka mogoꞌne kummaꞌakoosoo nana pootaꞌma a mayuhoo.
Ka te tumayohope-wi soo Moses oꞌnosoo ka te nanamooatupu oo tuukwe-kwi, oosoo mee naꞌunakwe ka ꞌyoo manedu mogoꞌne batsa. How tamme a yugwekwu?”
Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe tooꞌe nekusekuna, ka gi pumme oo nanekwagea umu oo nekwohone mee sokwamana. Soo Te Pabeꞌe natsekwuꞌne katuhoose ka tu mamoogoo-ma, ka teepu-ma tubokooha.
Mu nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu, ka Te Pabeꞌe ooosapa meeoo tubengadyakwe, “Yabe hayoo unne how sakwa tamme a maꞌe?”

Umu o suuꞌmu tubengadyakwe, soo Te Pabeꞌe yise, wunuoose mee mu netamma, “Unu tooe, tupe-ma oo tapagetahoo, oo yaꞌe-kwitoo tooe. Pana soo gi hannanoꞌo tumaꞌemukwadu sakwa oo mooe tabe.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise natsekwuꞌne katusesoo ka teepu-ma tutsebokoohasoo.
Ka nasookwise mu nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu, ka mogoꞌne meeoo netammadu, mu wakwaꞌetse mooe meaꞌa, yise mu tootooebetse umu benakwatoo punnoꞌo meaꞌa. Ka mu petukwahookase,
soo Te Pabeꞌe wunuse ka mogoꞌne meeoo tubenga, “Haga menoꞌo meeoo u netamma?” Soo mogoꞌne meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe nanekwegea, “Gi haga.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo ka mogoꞌne netammasoo, “Nu punnoꞌo gi. U nobe-kwitoosoo kodyuka. Yaa manakwana gi kummaꞌakoosoo nana pootaꞌma-pana.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu numu ka pabatsekoo nanesootuhi nobe-kumaba manepunnedu mee netamma, “Nu ka teepu-koobatu kootabedooakute, oꞌno mu numu ka Te Naa besa po poonnena oo nagenokwu. Mu numu nuka nakaꞌoedyukudu gi togaba-wiꞌyookwu.”
Mu Pharisee ka Te Pabeꞌe mee netamma, “U ka uusoo nanetammana esayidyakwe, ooonneꞌyoona numme yise gi u nakaꞌoedyukute.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo, “Tooe nu nuusoo nanetamma pana, nu togesapa mu tuukweꞌe. Nu ka pukwiꞌyoona e kemmana, yise ka pukwitoo e meakwuna mooasoo sopedakwadoo. Mu yise gi ekow nu-kwitu sopedakwatoo.”

Mu ka nuka nemadabuena gi togekoo tunemadabue, mu ka gi oo nakasopedakwadoona. Soo E Naa yaatoo nuka tayadu e tummatzikwu, nu yise kaaheno mu nemadabuekwu. Nu gi mu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo, nu kaaheno mu tunemadabuekukwu.
Soo te tumayohope meeoo, ‘Ka waahoo numu nawaꞌnesoo nanekwaha oosoo togesapa.’
Numme yise ka Te Naa-no wahaꞌyoo ooonneꞌyoona nu yise kaaheno mu tuukwe.”
Umu yise mee oo tubenga, “Haga yise u naa?” Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu nanekwegea, “Mu gi nu-kwitu sopedakwadoo, hownnekoosoo yise mu ka E Naa sopedakwadookwu?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu tunedyooꞌe ka pabatsekoo nanesootuhi nobe-kobenaꞌyoona, puu-kwikoo mu numu tumasumudoo tsageꞌyoona. Soo Te Pabeꞌe gi nakwutuma, ka gisoo oo nabatsa-kwi oo manakwe.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu gi hemma heesoobedyadu mee netamma, “Ka pukwiꞌyoona e kemmapu-witoo e kodyuse, mu saaꞌa e tooe soogwikwu, pana mu gi e mayu-waꞌneꞌyoo. Suda mu tumadugu-kwisoo mu tuikwu. Mu gi nuga pukwitoo mea-kwitoo mea-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
Mu Te Pabeꞌe gi heesoobedyadu, gi oo nakasoobedakwadoodu yise meeoo nananetamma, “Haꞌoo manena meeoo unakwe? Puusoo haaꞌa nabatsakwuse?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee unakwe, “Mu ka sutakoo nakabetseꞌa, noꞌyoona mu numu ka teepu-koobatu moohedu punnoꞌo ka sutakoo nakabetseꞌa. Pana nu ka Te Naa te paꞌanakwatu nakabetseꞌa.
Mu ka gi nuka nakaꞌoedyukuna, mu ka togesoo sutaꞌyoo numuna, tuikwu.”
Umu yise oo tubenga, “How yise ꞌyoo u numme ataꞌyoosoo?” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Nu ooosapa mu tooꞌe tuukwenoꞌo, pana mu gi e nakaꞌoedyukute.
Nu yise ka ewasoo suda mu tumadugu-kwitu mu mesoo tuukwe-waꞌneꞌyoo, pana nu gi. Soo E Naaꞌyatoo nuka tayadu, kaaheno mu nemadunagakwu. Nu noꞌoko mu tooe tuukweꞌe, ka Te Naa nuka tunetammakuna.”
Mu Jew numu moohedu gi oo nakasopedakwatoo, soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu oo waha tuunguna, yaatoo oo taya.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee unakwe, “Mu saaꞌa e nabatsase, susumudu mu-matu oo nakaꞌoedyukukwu, nu mu Pabeꞌe. Oꞌno mu oo sopedakwadookwu, nu gi nugasoo tusooyugwena mayohokwu, pana nu ka E Naa nuka tunetammakuna mu sukwe tuukweꞌe.
Soo E Naa yaatoo e tayase, ooosapa nu-no, gi e maꞌwukaꞌa, nu ka ooosapa besa Te Naa nakabetseana.”
Ka Te Pabeꞌe yadooadyakwe ewaꞌyoo numu oo nakaꞌoedyuku manemena.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu pudu tunakaꞌoedyukudu mee netamma, “Mu ka ooosapa o nakaꞌoedyukuna nu mu doodooamu-gakoo.
Mu yise ka kaahenotu sopedakwadookwu, gi mu numu ka suta-kwitoo namoohegakwu.”
Umu yise meeoo, “Numme ka Abraham-maꞌyoona suaketu. Haꞌyoo u unnena meeoo unakwe tamme suta-kwitoo namoohegakwu?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu nanekwegea, “Nu kaaheno mu tuukwekwu. Soo tooe haga tooe nanasuda tu manena mayohodu ka sutakoo nakabetsea.
Soo numu tummatziwabe, puu gi ka pumme nedyawedu nanumu. Pana soo numu nedyawedu dooaꞌa ooosapa nanumu nadatsungapunne.
Nu Mu Pabeꞌe, nu ooosapa mu nanumu-gakwu, mu ka e nakaꞌoedyukuna. Nu mu sootuhise, oꞌno mu gi suta-kwitoo namoohegakwu.
Tooe mu Abraham-maꞌyoona suakese sapa mu Te Naa dooamu mee nasokwama mu e batsa soogwaꞌe, mu ka gi e togeꞌyookuna.
Nu ka Nuga Naa nuka tuukwena mu tooꞌe tuukwe pana, mu ka suta-nakwana suakese, ooonneꞌyoona mu sutakoo nakabetsea.”

Umu yise meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Numme gi suta-nakwana suaketu, Abraham ne namooatupu.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu netamma, “Umu Abraham doodooamu ka Te Naa besa nakabetseꞌa Abraham-waꞌnesoo. Mu gi Abraham doodooamu-waꞌneꞌyoona, gi tuwazoo Te Naa dooamu-waꞌneꞌyoo, ka gi Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukuna.
Mu yise e batsa soogwaꞌe tooe nu kaaheno mu tooe tuukwepana mu ka Te Naa nuka netamma-kwaꞌnesoo, soo te namooatupu Abraham gi mu-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Mu ka oo manena kummaꞌakoosoo Naa-gaꞌyoo.” Umu mee ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Numme gi kummaꞌakoosoo naa-gaꞌyoo. Numme sumuoosoo Naa-gaꞌyoo soo numu manumudoopu, ne tubetse Naa.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Mu ka Nuga Naa nenagana, mu sakwa unu e soobedya. Soo E Naa yaatoo e tayase, nu yise yow mu-baa petu. Gi nuusoo meeoo nasooyugwena.
Mu gi e nakabetsea. Gi ka e unaꞌwena nakapunne.
Soo Sutaꞌyoo, mu Naa, ooonneꞌyoona mu ookow nakabetseꞌa. Soo Sutaꞌyoo ooosapa numu kadoo mayugwekena, ooosapa mu esayaꞌekuna.
Mu ka gi togekoo nakaꞌoedyukute, ooonneꞌyoo mu gi e nakaꞌoedyukute tooe kaaheno mumme e tuukweꞌe sapa.
Noꞌyoona mu e sopedakwadoo, nu ooosapa besa tumadugudu. Nu kaaheno mu tuukwepana mu gisoo e nakaꞌoedyukute.
Soo Te Naa doodooamu ooosapa oo nakabetseꞌa. Mu yise meeoo unnepana mu gi oo-noꞌyoopunne.”
Mu Jew numu mee oo netamma, “U gi kaaheno numme-matu, u ka mu sutakoo numu-matu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. U tumaꞌemukwadu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu netamma, “Nu gi tumaꞌemukwadu. Nu ka E Naa togeꞌyooku pana mu gi e togeꞌyookute, ooonneꞌyoona mu suda nu-kwitu waha.
Nu gi nuusoo besa naneyugwena, soo Te Naa saaꞌa besa nu-kwitu waha. Soo Te Naa ka umu nu-kwitu esayidu nemadunagakwu.
Nu kaaheno mu tuukwe tooe haga tooe e nakabetseadu gi yaꞌekwu.”

Mu Jew numu yise meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Menoꞌo numme u sopedakwatoo u tumaꞌemukwadu. Soo te namooatupu Abraham puu yaꞌe, Te Naa nanayadooawabe punnoꞌo noꞌyoona tuipu. U yise meeoo, tooe haga tooe e nakabetseadu gi yaꞌekwu.
U haaꞌa ka Te namooatupu Abraham ooonakwa besaꞌyoo? Hownneꞌyoo, mee puu u uusoo nasooyugwe?”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu nanekwegea, “Nu ka nuusoo nakwitu wahana, mu gi e nakaꞌoedyukute. Pana soo nuga Naa, besow e poohamaka, ookow nuga netammana, ooonneꞌyoona mu numu nuka nesookwugaꞌe. Mu ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhidu mee nananeyugwedu.
Pana mu gi ka E Naa sopedakwatoo, nu suuꞌmu ka E Naa sopedakwatoo. Nu gi esaꞌyaꞌe mu-kwaꞌnesoo, ooonneꞌyoona nu sakwa oetu mu tuukwe, ka Te Naa e sopedakwadoo-kwitu.
Soo te namooatupu Abraham besa soonamme ka oꞌnosoo oo pooha poonnena ka yaa teepu-kooba e petukwuna.”
Mu Jew numu moohedu meeoo oo netamma, “Soo Abraham tubetse oꞌnosoo yaꞌepu. U ka Abraham gi poonnedu. Oꞌnosoo ume gisoo nadooaꞌadoo.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Nu oo-koobenasoo mooasoo gwetzoi, tubetse oꞌnosoo gisoo ka Abraham nadooaꞌadoo.”
Umu yise tupe tzobakooha oo tatzagowkwu mee soogwamana. Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe mu manikwuna sopedakwadoo ka umu-baaꞌyoona yise ka pabow nanesootuhi nobe-wiꞌyoona watse meahoo.
Soo nana gi tubootabuena nadooaꞌadoopu, oona po-kumaba katu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe umu pumme nakatzimodu-no oona meadabena oo poonne.
Numme oo nakatzimodu ka Te Pabeꞌe mee tubenga, “Haga suda tumadugu-kwi esoo nana gi tubootabuena nadooaꞌadoopu, masoo nana haaꞌa puusoo suda tumaduguse, pute umu oo naanapuaꞌamu?”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee ne netamma, “Esoo nana gi tubootabuedu, suda oo tumaduguna gi oo-matoosoo kodyu, oo naanapuaꞌamu suda tumaduguna gi oo dooaꞌa-matoo kodyu. Oꞌnona eka gi tubootabuedu namabesakuse mu numu oo poonnese ka Te Naa nesookwugaꞌe.
Tamme sakwa ka Te Naa nuka yaatoo tayadu nakabetsea. Pudusoo nu nabatsase gi mu-noꞌyookwu.
Nu ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoopunnena ka mu numu tummatzina, umu ka Te Naa-witu nakasopedakwadookwu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka teepu-koobatoo toohese ka tu huutsenoko ka pasakwabu mayuase, ka gi tubootabuedu nana popoꞌa-kooba oo matzabekuhoo.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo oo netamma, “U sakwa meahoose ka patzona Siloam mee naneadu-kwi nabakomamitooa.” Soo gi tuboodabudu nana yise ka oonahoo nabakomamitooase, besa tubootabuena kodyu petuuoosoo.
Mu numu uga, ka gi tubootabue oo poonnedu mee nanaꞌunakwe, “Yow haaꞌa tooꞌe, esoo nana uga oona po-kumaba katuna numu tumasumudoo tuunguyidu?”
Susumudu numu meeoo nanaꞌunakwe, “Aha mow oosoo nana.” Susumudu yise punnoꞌo mee, “Gi esoo oosoo nana, oo-waꞌnesoo sukwe tabuadu.” Soo nana yise mee unne, “Nu yow soo nana gi uga tubootabuedu.”
Umu yise mee oo tubenga, “How manise u tubootabue mane?”
Oosoo mee mu nanekwegea, “Sumuꞌyoo nana Jesus mee naneadu, pasagwabu e popoꞌa-kooba matzabekuse, yise ka patzona Siloam-witoo e bakomami tuungu. Nu ka bakomamitooase, besa tubootabue mani.”
Umu yise meeoo oo tubengasoo, “Hano yise oosoo nana meahoo?” Oosoo uga gi tubootabuedu nana besa manena yise meeoo, “Nu gi oo sopedakwatoo.”
Umu numu yise ka mu Jew nananesootuhidu numu Pharisee mee nananeadu-matoo ka nana bika.

Ka nanesootuhi tabeba-wi ka nana besa namabesakuse, mu Pharisee mee oo tubenga, “How manise u tubootabue mani?” Oosoo mee mu nanekwegea, “Soo Jesus tu huutsepu ka teepu noko pasagwabudoose e popoꞌa-kooba oo matzabekuhoose oo-koobatoo yise e bakomami tuunguse, nu yise bakomamitooase, yaatu poonne mani.”

Susumudu mu Pharisee-matu mee unakwe, “Soo Jesus tookwa gi besaꞌhoo pooha-gana ka te nanesootuhi tabeba-wi numu mesoo mabesakute, masoo tookwa gi ka Te Naa-nakwana kemmadu.” Susumudu mu Pharisee-matu yise meeꞌe punnoꞌo unakwe, “Ekow nana mow besa oo mayugwese oosoo tookwa Te Naa besa pooha hee-gaꞌyoo.” Umu yise oo-koobatoo nananepetukute.
Umu yise, ka uga gi tubootabuedu nana mee tubenga, “Haꞌyoo u ka nana ume mabesakudu-kwitu soobedya?” Oosoo mee mu nanekwegea, “Oosoo oo kaaheno Te Naa yadooawabe.”
Mu Pharisee gi oo nakaꞌoedyukute, ka nana uga gi tubootabuena. Umu yise oo naanapuaꞌamu-witoo tutaꞌya.
Umu oo naanapuaꞌamu nabi petuse, mu Pharisee mee, ka oo naanapuaꞌamu tubenga, “Esoo haaꞌa mumme dooa? Yaa haaꞌa oosoo gi tubootabuena nadooaꞌadoodu? Haꞌoo manese menoꞌo tubootabue mane?”

Mu Jew numu moohedu mooasoo mee tunetammapu, “Numme tooe haga tooe ka Jesus Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu ne Jew nanesootuhi nobe-kwikoo tayakwunihookwu.” Umu oo naanapuaꞌamu ka mu Jew numu moohedu-ma suipunne, ka meeoo mu tunetamma. “Soo Jesus ne dooa mabesaku,” mee tu unnikwu-ma suipunne. Mu oo naanapuaꞌamu mee mu nanengwegea, “Numme oo sopedakwadoo, esoo ne dooa oe manakwanasoo. Pana numme gi oo sopedakwatoo ka hownnekoo oo namabesakuse, ka ooka mabesakudu tuwazoo. Mooasoo masoo ewa tomopu, makowsoo tubenga.”

Umu numu moohedu yise ka nana uga gi tubootabuedu nabatoosoo bihoo tuwazoo. Umu yise mee oo netamma, “U sakwa ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhi gi ka Jesus-matoo. Numme oo sopedakwatoo soo Jesus suda tumadugu.”
Pana soo uga gi tubootabuedu meeoo mu nanekwegea, “Sumuna oosoo tooꞌe suda tumadugudu, nu gi oo sopedakwadoo, pana nu oo sopedakwatoo, nu uga gi tubootabuedu, pana menoꞌo nu yaatu mesoo poonne.”
Umu yise mee oo tubenga, “Haꞌoo soo Jesus u sootunagase u yaatu mesoo poonne?”

Oosoo mee mu nanekwegea, “Mooasoo nu mu tuukwe, pana mu gi e nakaꞌoedyukute. Haꞌoo manena mu ookowsoo e tubengayakwesoo? Mu haaꞌa punnoꞌo ka Jesus nakatzimokwu mee sokwamana, mee sumu tutubengadyakwe?”
Umu yise ka nana nakasagwaꞌekuhoo yise meeoo oo netamma, “U ka sutakoo nana nakaꞌoedyukuna meeoo unakwe. Pana numme puu ka Moses unnepu nakaꞌoedyukute.
Soo Moses yise uga, oꞌnosoo Te Naa yadooawabe. Numme ka Jesus gi Te Naa nayadooawabe mee oo unakwe sapa, gi oo nakaꞌoedyukute.”

Soo nana yise mee mu nanekwegea, “Gi hannanoꞌo hagaa ꞌyoonnekoo nana tunadooaꞌadoo-kwi manakwanasoo gi tubootabuedu mabesakudu. Soo Jesus ka gi tubootabuedu numu mesoo mabesakuna, oosoo kaaheno ka Te Naa maꞌyoona kemmadu. Oosoo gi sutaꞌyoo nana mee pumme netamma-waꞌne. Soo Jesus ka Te Naa nakabetseadu, ooonneꞌyoona oosoo ka Te Naa pooha-toohakwi numu mabesakute. Ooonneꞌyoona sakwa mu oo sopedakwadoo, soo Jesus, Te Naa yaatoo tutayana meeꞌe nu.”
Mu Pharisee ka uga gi tubootabuedu nanekwegea, “U puu ka u nadooaꞌadoo-kwi manakwana tubetse sutaꞌyoo. Gi hownnekoo u ne tunedyooe-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka oekoo ka nana natayakwunihoose oo naka, oo watega, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka oo mayuse mee oo netamma, “U haaꞌa ka Te Naa Tooaꞌa nakaꞌoedyukute?”
Soo nana yise mee ka Te Pabeꞌe nanekwegea, “Aha, nu ookow nakaꞌoedyukute. Pana nu gi oo poonnedu, haga oosoo?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus yise meeoo, “Nu yow soo U Pabeꞌe Te Naa Tooaꞌa.”
Soo nana yise mee unakwe, “Nu u nakaꞌoedyukute.” Soo nana yise Te Pabeꞌe-matoo nanesootuhikooha.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee unakwe, “Nu yaa teepu-kooba petu, ka umu gi Te Naa-witu nakasopedakwatoodu ka Te Naa pudu unnepu tunedyooegena, oꞌno saaꞌa umu besa oetu nakasopedakwadookwu. Susumudu mu-matu mooasoo oo nakasopedakwadoodu besa manepunne mee nasooyugwe pana, mu gi eka mumme e tunedyooena nakasopedakwadoo.”
Mu Pharisee-matu ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo unakwe oo naka. Umu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “Numme gi ka Te Naa-witu nakasopedakwadoo, mee haaꞌa u unnena meeoo?”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu nanekwegea, “Soo numu gi oo nakasopedakwadoodu, gi mu tumaꞌemukwana umu-matoosoo kodyu-waꞌneꞌyoo. Pana mu yise ka Te Naa-witu nakasopedakwadoo mee naneyugwedu soo mumme tumaꞌemukwana yise mu-matoosoo kodyukwu.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu netamma, “Nu togesapa mu tuukwekwu. Soo tooe haga tooe ka seepu koodua natzakwonaꞌadoo oe egeadu, oosoo kaaheno mu mabetseakwudu. Soo tooe haga tooe ka koodua-koobakwi oe tooe egeadu, tookwa gi toge manedu.

Soo tueyaꞌedu ka umu mabetseadu sopedakwadoona, oosoo suuꞌmu oe natzaꞌegeakwu. Soo seepu takonedu pummesoo seepu bihookakwu. Umu oo seepu yise, ka seepu koodua-wiꞌyoona kuowkase oo nagekakwu umu pumme takonedu tuapa nakasopedakwadoona.
Pana umu seepu ka kummaꞌakoosoo tuapa nakahoose umu sukwe namameaꞌakwu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka natugwenga makwuse, umu gi ka oo natugwengapu nakasopedakwadoo.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo tuwow, “Nu yow ka koodua natzakwonaꞌa-waꞌneꞌyoo, sumuoosoo natzakwonaꞌa-gaꞌyoo. Mu oo-toogoo oe egase nu ooosapa mu-kooba tueyaꞌekwu. Nu mu mabetseana, mu gi hemma namatuugekwu. Umu kukummaꞌaꞌyoosoo sumuna mooasoo nu-kobenasoo petugadu mee unnedu, ‘Nu mu magwetzoikwu.’ Umuoo esagoedu. Umuoo tuduhagetu-kwaꞌneꞌyoosoo, umu nuka nagedu kadoo tooꞌe mayugwedu. Mu e nanumu tooe kadoo mayugwekwudu. Pana umu nu-noyookwudu, gi ka mu numu nemooagadu nakatzabe-waꞌneꞌyoo. Nu yise yow petu, mu magwetzoikwutu, mu yise ooosapa gwetzoimona besa sokwamamokwu.

Nu yow ka mu mabetseakwuse, nu gi mu namanayahakwuna sookwaꞌe, nu ka mu-koobatoo nabatsakwuse, umu Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukudu yise nu-noꞌyookwu. Soo E Naa besa e sooyugwe, nu ka oo tunetammapu mayohona mu numu magwetzoina, umu-koobatoo tuwazoo nabatsakwuse. Mu numu e batsakwu ka meeoo e soonamme, pana nu gi meeoo tusooyugwe. Nu pooha tumadaꞌe, yise nu mesoo gwetzoaꞌekwusoo, soo E Naa ka ꞌyoo e mane tuunguna. Nanakukummaꞌayoosoo numu saaꞌa e nakaꞌoedyukudooa. Nu yise sumusoo mu mayugwe petuse, mu mabetseana, mu-kooba tueyaꞌedooa. Soo seepu takonedu gi mu seepu toge soobedya, ka puu gi mu hee-gana. Oꞌno yise ka etzaꞌa mu seepu-baa petuse, soo mu takonedu sukwe meahoo, oosoo ka gi mu seepu hee-soobedyana. Soo etzaꞌa mu seepu-matu goehookwu, mu susumudu yise nanaꞌemota petukwowkwu.”
Mu Jew numu ka oo nakase ka Te Pabeꞌe unnepu-witu, nanano sukwe nanepetukute.
Susumudu umu-matu mee unakwe, “Esoo nana tumaꞌemukwadu unu sutaꞌa, gi oo nakabetseapana.”
Susumudu umu-matu punnoꞌo mee unakwe, “Soo tumaꞌemukwadu, gi mee ooonnekoo yadooa-waꞌneꞌyoo, masoo unu nesoonamme. Esoo nana, Te Pabeꞌe gi tubootabuedu numu mabesakupu.”
Saaꞌa ka tu tommo petuse, mu Jew numu nanesootuhidu ewa tuka, umu ka oo soomayuna ka oꞌnosoo tu nanamooatupu ka Te Naa nanesootuhi nobe mu mabetsabepu.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe oona wunudyinnumme, ka nanesootuhi nobe-matoo nahabadoodu-tooha, ka Solomon haba mee naneadu-toohaꞌyoona mu numu nanesootuhiyakwe, umu-baa.
Mu Jew numu tutunehanedu oo naꞌoonnakwi manise mee oo tubenga, “U haaꞌa ne nanekwegeakwu? U haaꞌa Ne Pabeꞌe?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu nanekwegeꞌa, “Nu mooasoo mu tooꞌe tuukwe pana mu gi e nakaꞌoedyukute. Nu ka E Naa nuka netamma-kwaꞌnesoo manakwe, mu sakwa uga e sopedakwatoo, pana mu gi e nakaheesoobedya.
Mu tookwa gi nu-noꞌyookwudu.
Umu nu-noꞌyoopunnedu e nakasopedakwadoo, yise e unnetoosoo manaꞌwe. Nu mu sopedakwadoo,
mu yise ooosapa mu gwetzoimona petukudu. Gi haga nu oemota mu mayugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Soo E Naa umu e doodooamu mayugwepu, soo E Naa ka mu numu ooonakwasoo pooha-gana, gi haga ka E Naa oemota mu nemayugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Nu punnoꞌo unu pooha-gaꞌyoo ka E Naa-waꞌnekoosoo.”
Mu Jew numu tutunehanedu tupe tzobakooha, ka Te Pabeꞌe unnena gi naka petzabena oo tatzagahookwu mee sokwamana.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu netamma, “Ka E Naa nuka tunetammakuna nu mayohona ka mu numu tummatzaꞌe, mu yise oowetoo e batsayagate.”

Umu mee ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Pana numme u batsakwu ka Ne Naa-waꞌnesoo u naneyugwe. Gi numme ka besa u tumadugu-kwitu u batsakwu. U sukwe numu, numme-waꞌnesoo pana u mee unakwe, ‘Nu ka Te Naa-waꞌneꞌyoosoo.’ “
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu netamma, “Mu tookwa ka Te Naa unnepu neꞌa, ka mee naꞌunnedu, ‘Soo Te Naa meeoo ka sukwe numu netamma, “Mu sakwa nu-kwaꞌneꞌyoosoo.” ’
Soo Te Naa unnepu gi naꞌesayidu. Nu gi sukwe numu nu ka Te Naa tubetse yadooawabe. Ooonneꞌyoona mu sakwa gi e batsapana, tooe nu ka E Naa-waꞌneꞌyoo meeꞌe e unakwe sapa.
Soo Te Naa yaa teepu-koobatoo e taya. Haꞌoo manena mu, ‘Esayaꞌe,’ mee e netamma, ‘Nu Te Naa Tooaꞌa,’ mee e unakwe?
Mu sakwa ka Te Naa pooha-ma nanabesa e manekena nakaꞌoedyuku, tooe mu gi e nakaheesoobedya pana. Mu sakwa oo nakaꞌoedyuku, numme ka E Naa-no sumuꞌyoosoo.”
Umu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe tooꞌe wutumahookwu, pana soo Te Pabeꞌe mu namatzatsebooge.
Numme natunedyooemodu, yise ka Te Pabeꞌe-no meaꞌa, ka Jordan hooodu kwingakwatoo, ka oꞌnosoo John numu baa-wi matzakapu-witoo.
Onona ewaꞌyoo numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo kemmadyakwe. Umu mee nananetamma, “Soo John puu gi pooha-gapana noꞌyoona ka John Te Pabeꞌe-witu wahapu menoꞌo oo-toogoo manekena.”
Ooonneꞌyoona ewaꞌyoo numu onona ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyuku mane.
Soo nana Lazarus mee naneadu ka oona Bethany mee naneadu-kwi nobe-gaꞌyoo unu tuoeyaꞌe. Lazarus ka umu tu susuakwumu Mary
yise numme pumme nakatzimodu mee netamma, “Tamme ka teepu Judea mee naneadu-kwitoosoo kodyu.”
Numme yise ka Te Pabeꞌe punnoꞌo mee netamma, “Te nanumu papabeꞌe otuoo tupe-ma u tooꞌe tatsagapu. U sakwa gi oetoosoo kodyupana.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo, “Nu menoꞌo yaahoo togesoo gwetzoinnumme. Gi hee menoꞌo e patza-waꞌneꞌyoo, gisoo nu E Naa nuka tunetammakupu mamakwu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee ne netamma, “Te puaꞌa Lazarus sukwe uꞌwe, tamme oo-matoo mease nu saaꞌa oo netupoonnedooa.”
Numme oo nakatzimodu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe mee netamma, “Gi tookwa oosoo hownneꞌyoo ka sukwe uwena. Oosoo puusoo pudusoo tupoonnekoo.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Lazarus yaꞌena sopedakwadoo. Numme meeoo sokwama soo Lazarus tookwa sukwe uꞌwe.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise besasoo oetu ne tuukweꞌe, “Soo Lazarus yaꞌepu.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee ne netamma, “Nu besa soonamme nu ka gi onona ka Lazarus yaꞌehoose. Oꞌno nu e besa pooha manena mu tzapoonnekukwu, oꞌno yise saaꞌa mu e nakaꞌoedyukudooa. Menoꞌo tamme ka oo natugu-kwitoo meaꞌa.”
Soo nana Thomas mee naneadu, Namatu mee tuwazoo naneadu, mee ne netamma, “Tamme sakwa ka Te Pabeꞌe-no meaꞌase, oꞌno sumuna tamme saaꞌa ka Te Pabeꞌe-nosoo natagoedooa.”
Ka oo Te Pabeꞌe-no ne petuhoogase mu numu meeoo ne tuukweꞌe, “Mooasoo watsu tabe meakapu soo Lazarus ka tupe tawaga-kwi natugupuna.”
Soo Bethany ka Jerusalem tsageꞌyoona, ewaꞌyoo mu Jew numu ka Jerusalem nakwanatu kemmana mu Mary noko Martha-baa petugase, ka Bethany-wiꞌyoona mu netusoonakute, ka mu wanngaꞌa yaꞌese.
Mu numu ka Martha meeoo tuukweꞌe, “Soo Jesus mu puaꞌa mooasoo oo-na kemma.” Soo Martha yise oo wegea meahoo. Soo Mary ka gi oo nakana tu nobe-kwisoo.
Soo Martha yise ka Te Pabeꞌe wegeꞌowse mee oo netamma petuga, “U sakwa uga ka ne wanngaꞌa tooesoo gwetzoꞌi petuse, oosoo uga gi yaꞌekwu.
Soo Te Naa ka pumme u nanetzakwiyaꞌe u nakasootuhidyina mu numu besa mayugweyakwe.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee oo netamma, “Saaꞌa soo u wanngaꞌa gwetzoise tuusootabuekwu.”
Soo Martha yise ka Te Pabeꞌe mee netamma, “Aha, nu oo sopedakwatoo soo teepu saaꞌa atasoo manekwu, noꞌyoona mu tuipu tuusootabuekwu.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee ka Martha netamma, “Nu ka mu numu mayodakwu. Soo tooe haga tooe nuka nakaꞌoedyukudu, tooꞌe yaꞌese sapa nu mu matuusootabuese umu ooosapa gwetzoimokwu. U haaꞌa puu e nakaꞌoedyukute?”
Martha yise meeoo oo netamma, “Aha, nu u nakaꞌoedyukute, u yow Ne Pabeꞌe, oꞌnosoo nanekemmapu.”
Soo Martha yise ka Mary-matoo mease meeoo oo watse tuukwe, “Soo Te Pabeꞌe mooasoo petuoose u baꞌe.”
Soo Mary ka oo nakahoose, yotsekase ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo meahoo.
Mooasoo ewaꞌyoo Jew numu petugonno ka Mary netusoonakuna. Ka Mary gi obeda yotseoose oo meahoose umu numu meeoo sokwama, “Oosoo tookwa ka tu wanngaꞌa natugu-kwitoo meahoo.” Umu yise oo-nakwi meaꞌa.
Soo Mary ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petugase oo-kobena meatzedose, mee ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “U sakwa uga ka oꞌnosoo petuoose, e Pabeꞌe sakwa uga gi yaꞌe.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Mary tu pupuaꞌa-no mu sakwaꞌe mu poonnena, tutuha mu sooyugwe.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo tutubenga, “Hano natzatugu?” Umu yise mee oo nanekwegea, “Kemmow, numme u tzapoonnekukwu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise yaka.

Mu numu otuoo yise mee nanaꞌunnegonno, “Masoo Jesus tookwa togesapa ka Lazarus unu soobedya.” Mu susumudu punnoꞌo mee unnegonno, “Esoo Jesus puu ka gi tubootabuedu mabesaku, ka Lazarus sakwa uga tuwazoo ooosoo. Soo Lazarus uga gi yaꞌekwu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise tutuha soonammena, ka tupe tawaga-kwitoo ka Lazarus pukwi natugu-kwitoo mea. Ka tupe tawagana-kobena papabatseꞌyoo tseketadyadu tupe-ma oo nadatumapunne.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo, “Ka tupe sekebatoo magonnonoekwuni.” Soo Lazarus suakwu Martha yise meeoo oo netamma, “Oosoo mooasoo watsu tabeno manekapu ka mi natzatuguna. Menoꞌo ka sumuna oosoo suda kwanakapu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo oo netamma, “Mooasoo nu mee uga u tuukwepu, u ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna, oꞌno u ka Te Naa pooha tuyugwena poonnekwu.”
Ka tupe mu magonnonoese, soo Te Pabeꞌe toogoopatu poonnese meeoo nanesootuhi, “Ne Naa u nanasookwugaꞌe, nu ka nonoꞌotsa u nanetzakwiꞌyina u e nakasootuhiyakwe.
Nu oo sopedakwadoo u ooosapa e nakasootuhidyidu. Nu menoꞌo yaanona u yadooꞌe, oꞌno mu numu yaatu e nakaꞌoedyukukwu, nu yaahoo U Besaa Tooa.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise pabatseꞌe ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi mee unne, “Lazarus, yaatoo kemma.”
Soo Lazarus yise, yaatoo tsebooeke, oo tookoo noꞌyoona wunapu-ma nakwutoota, oo-koobadooe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu numu meeoo netamma, “Ka a nakwutootana tzahanehoo.”
Ewaꞌyoo mu numu Jerusalem-wiꞌyoona ka Mary-no kemmadu ka Te Pabeꞌe pooha manena poonnese oo sooꞌoedyukute.
Pana susumudu umu-matu gi oo sooꞌoedyukudu, ka mu Pharisee Te Pabeꞌe tumooꞌoodu-matoo mease ka Te Pabeꞌe besa pooha tuyugwepu mu tuukweꞌe.
Mu tutunehanedu-no mu Pharisee sumuhoose mee unakwe, “Soo Jesus ewa naduya pooha manekena. Haꞌoo sakwa tamme oo sootunaga?

Ka menoꞌo gi ooka te tzodyooikute noꞌyoona numu sumuna oo nakaꞌoedyuku mani petugakwu. Oꞌno sumuna mu Roman numu moohedu umu tukwutumadu yaatoo tayase umu ka te nanesootuhi nobe, yise noꞌoko te nanumu manepunnena kadoo mayugwekwu.”
Sumuꞌyoo mu tutunehanedu pabeꞌe Caiaphas mee naneadu mee mu netamma, “Mu gi hemma sopedakwatoo.
Tamme sakwa ka Jesus batsa, oosoo puu sukwe sumuꞌyoosoo nana. Tamme puu ewaꞌyoo. Oꞌno tamme noꞌyoona gi tuikwu.” Gi puu pumme tusooyugwena yadooꞌa.
Oosoo ka mu tunehane pabeꞌena, soo Te Naa pumme soonammetuguna oo yadooa tuunguna, oosoo yise meeoo, “Jesus noꞌoko ka mu tu nanumu-koobatoo nabatsakwu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe gi ka mu tu nanumu-koobatoo suuꞌmu nabatsakwu, noꞌobatusoo numu-koobatoo nabatsakwu.
Mu Jew tutunehanedu yise oo batsakwu mee tunehane.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ooonneꞌyoona tukena nuuyugwesapa, numme yise ka Te Pabeꞌe-no Ephraim mee naneadu-kwitoo meꞌa, onahoo sukwe hee-wanatoo.
Soo tabeba tzageꞌe manekena ka mu pooha tumayohoyina, oꞌno umu gi namayadu tukaba
Ewaꞌyoo numu ka Jerusalem-kwitoo ewa tuka mi. Mu numu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe watena mee nanatubenga, “Haꞌoogena soo Jesus ka ewa tukape-kwitoo kemmakwu?”
Mu tutunehanedu, mu numu meeoo netamma, “Ne tuukwe saaꞌa ka Jesus poonnese, oꞌno numme oo wutumowkwu.”
Naapahe tabeno ka Gi Namayuadu Tukaba mu nanesootuhi ewa tukakwuna penipunne, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Bethany-wi petuga Lazarus-baa oo nobe-kwi, ookow soo Te Pabeꞌe ka oꞌnosoo mayodapu oo yaꞌekwikoo.
Soo Lazarus hamaꞌa Martha ewow numu ka Te Pabeꞌe noko maka, ka Lazarus tuwazoo.

Togesoo mu tuka aata soo Martha punneꞌe, Mary, unu nanenagadu, besa kwanadu nakwanaꞌa ka Te Pabeꞌe kuku-koobatu hanehoose, tu tzopuhu-ma oo-maꞌwonge. Soo nakwanaꞌa noꞌoko ka nobe-tootu besa kwanakupunne.
Sumuꞌyoo umu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu-matu Judas Iscariot
“Masoo sakwa uga eka nakwana-ma tumu, gi a nahadyagwe ka mu tutuha manedu numu oo-ma tummatzi.”
Soo Judas gi ka mu tutuha manedu numu heesoobedya. Soo Judas ka tumasumudoope mahaneyina oo-matu tuduhayakwe.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo oo netamma, “Gi ka Mary meeoo netammapana. Esoo ka e nabatsakwuna tzageꞌe manekena, ooonneꞌyoona soo Mary ꞌyoo e sootunagaꞌa.
Mu tutuha manedu numu ooosapa mu-noꞌyookwu, pana yise nu gi ooosapa mu-noꞌyookwu yaa teepu-kooba.”
Ewaꞌyoo mu Jew numu ka Te Pabeꞌe, ka Mary nobe-kwi oo-baa nobenge oo sopedakwatoo. Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe poonnegetu, ka Lazarus tuwazoo.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Lazarus oo yaꞌekwikoo oo matuusootabuꞌase, ewaꞌyoo mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyuku manegena. Mu yise tutunehanedu ka Lazarus nuusookwetakuna oo batsakwu meeꞌe tunehane. Ewaꞌyoo numu ka Jerusalem-witu ka Te Pabeꞌe ka Lazarus oo mayodase oo poonnedu nanekwahakooha.
Ookow mooꞌa soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Jerusalem-witoo mea.

Ewaꞌyoo numu ka Jerusalem-wi numu-baa ewa nanesootuhi tukagetu oo naka ka Te Pabeꞌe kemmana. Mu numu ka mu nanekwahana nakadu, ka Te Pabeꞌe wegeaga, ooꞌoodutsekoo poohegakoo sunngabe maꞌna hemmana. Umu papabatse nanakatsebooegonno, besa nesokwamana mee unnena, “Soo Te Naa menoꞌo te tummatzikwu. Soo Te Naa yaatoo Te Pabeꞌe tayapu. Soo Te Naa Te Pabeꞌe sootuhikwu. Esoo Te Pabeꞌe menoꞌo tamme-kooba tunehane katukwudu.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe tuutsekoo tzagaze-kooba katunooꞌoo, ka Te Naa unnepu nabotugu-kwaꞌne, “Mu numu saaꞌa, gi suipana. Soo mu-kooba katukwudu pudusoo petukwu tzagaze-kooba katuna.” Numme ka oꞌno gi oo nakasopedakwadoo. Saaꞌa ka Te Pabeꞌe tu yaꞌe-kwikoo namayodase numme oo ꞌoedyuku manepetu, noꞌoko ka Te Naa yadooawabe oꞌnosoo tubo tuguna.
Mu Pharisee puusoo mee nananetamma, “Mu numu gi te nakabetseꞌa manegena, umu ka Jesus suuꞌmu nakaꞌoedyukugonnona.”
Ka mu ewa nanesootuhi tuka, mu wakwawaꞌa mu Jew umu-no oe.
Mu wakwawaꞌa ka Philip-matoo kemmase yise mee oo netamma, “Numme sakwa ka Jesus-no nanatapoegea.” Soo Philip ka Andrew tuukwe, umu yise nanosoo ka Te Pabeꞌe tuukwe.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu netamma, “Pudusoo nu mu numu suda mane-koobatoo nabatsakwu. Oꞌno yise mu oo sopedakwadoodooa, yow nu mu Pabeꞌe, mu magwetzoi meakwudu. Ewaꞌyoo numu e nakaꞌoedyukuna ooosapa gwetzoimokwu. Nu togekoo mu tuukwe. Nu ka hemma pooe-kwaꞌne puu, ka teepu-tooha namasuase tooe suda manese sapa, ka suakese ewa pooedooakekwu, yooosoo nu punnoꞌo manekwu. Ka e yaꞌese e namayodase, ewaꞌyoo numu nunakwana nanesootuhi manekekwu.
Tooe haga tooe gi nu-notu, ka gi moobekwa-gakoo nagwetzoidu gi nasootuhi-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tooe haga tooe nu-no meadabedu, oosoo ka tubetse gi moobekwu-gakoo nagwetzoidu nasootuhikwu.
Soo tooe haga tooe nu-matoo nanesootuhidu ooosapa nu-noꞌyookwu. Soo E Naa yise ooosapa gi mobegwa-gakoo nanagwetzoidu mu sootuhikwu.
Menoꞌo nu suda soonamme, nu yaa teepu-koobatoo kemma, mu numu-koobatoo nabatsakwuse. Gi nu ka E Naa mee netamma-waꞌneꞌyoo, ka nuka wohonedu-makoo e magwetzoi.

U, E Naa, ka mu numu u-matoo nanesootuhi mayugweke, mee nu u nanetzakwiyaꞌe.” Soo Te Naa yise paꞌanakwana mee oo nanekwegea, “Nu mooasoo nu-matoo nanetzakwiyaꞌe mu mayugwepu, mu yise ooosapa manenokwu.”

Ka Te Naa tuapa nakase mu susumudu numu oo konnopunnedu-matu mee nananetamma, “Nunuabu-waꞌne meeoo numme oo nakasoobedya.” Mu susumudu yise punnoꞌo mee unne, “Sumuna soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo ka Te Pabeꞌe yadooe.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus yise ka mu numu mee netamma, “Soo Te Naa pabatseꞌe e yadooe, nunuaꞌadu-kwaꞌne nanakahoo, oꞌno mu punnoꞌo oo sopedakwadookwu ka nuka oo yadooꞌe.

Pudusoo nu mu-koobatoo nabatsakwu.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe tuwazoo mee unakwe, “Nu noꞌobatusoo numu nuka nanesootuhi mayugwekwu. Saaꞌa mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu, soo suda mu tumadugupu umu-matoosoo kodyukwu. Nu ka Sutakoo, mu numu tumaꞌemukwa mayugwedu matzooekukwu.”
Susumudu mu numu otuoo mee unakwe, “Numme mee oo naka, soo Te Naa unnepu meeoo naꞌunakwe, ‘Soo Te Pabeꞌe ooosapa gwetzoinnummekwu.’ U yise ka Ne Pabeꞌena, u gi hownnekoo nabatsa-waꞌneꞌyoo.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu nanekwegea, “Te Naa unnepu nu mumme numu tunesootabuekute, ooonneꞌyoona soo Te Naa yaa teepu-kooba mu-baa e manumudoopu. Ka e yaanoko e nakaꞌoedyuku, nu yise saaꞌa ka tubetse nanagwetzoidu mu sootuhikwu. Mu ka sutakoo matzooekukwu ka nuga dooamuna, pudusoo nu E Naa-matoosoo kodyukakwu, mu yise gi hownnekoo e nagega-waꞌneꞌyoo.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mease umu tu wohomu watze.

Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa yadooawabe Isaiah mee naneadu mee tubotugupu-gaꞌyoo, “Te Naa, gi haga pumme ne tuukwena nakaꞌoedyukute, tooe umu ka nanabesa u tumaduguna poonnepana.” Mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe poonne, ka nanabesa oo tumadugu. Pana ka Isaiah oꞌnosoo unnekwaꞌnesoo gi noꞌyoona umu oo nakaꞌoedyukute.

Mee tuwazoo soo Isaiah unakwe, “Mu numu tusoomatzooena tooe ka Te Naa unnepu nakapana gi oo soonakabetseꞌa. Umu sakwa sumuna ka oo nakasopedakwadoona, ka suda tu tumaduguna maꞌwuse e nakaꞌoedyuku manese, nu mu mabesakukwu. Oo manena umu gi ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukute.”
Soo Isaiah meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu waha, soo Isaiah ka Te Pabeꞌe pooha nakasopedakwatoona.

Susumudu mu numu Jew numu-matu, yise susumudu mu Jew numu moohedu-matu, ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukute. Pudu mu Pharisee nanesootuhidu mee unakwe, “Numme ka tooe haga tooe Jesus-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu tayakwunikwu.” Ooonneꞌyoona umuoo tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi nanekwaha.
Umu gi oo nakaheesoobedya tooe ka Te Naa meeoo pumme netamma sapa. Pana ka mu numu pumme nesookwugina suuꞌmu besa soobedya.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe tu besa pooha-toohakwi mee unakwe, “Numu nu-kwi tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi nuka suuꞌmu nakaꞌoedyukute, umu ka Te Naa yaatoo nuka tayadu nakaꞌoedyukute tuwazoo.
Mu numu nuka sopedakwadoodu, ka Te Naa nuka yaa teepu-koobatoo tayase, ka nu mumme numu Te Naa-witu nakasopedakwadoo mayugwekwuse.
Mu numu ka nu-kwi tunakaꞌoedyuku manese, gi ka suda tu tumadugu-ma sokwamakwu.
Nu ka mu numu magwetzoikwuse yaa teepu-kooba petu, gi mu wohonekwuse.
Tooe haga tooe gi e unnepu nakaꞌoedyukudu saaꞌa, soo suda mu tumaꞌemukwana umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.
Nu gi e sukwe tusooyugwena wahana meeoo unakwe, ka Te Naa yaatoo nuka tayadu meeoo nuka netamma. Mu numu ka Te Naa nakabetseadu ooosapa gi moobegwaga gwetzoimokwu.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe ooosapa numme pumme nakatzimodu yaa teepu-koobatu unu soobedyadu. Ka gi namayadu tukaba nanesootuhi naꞌewa tukakwuna oe manegena, soo Te Pabeꞌe unu ne soobedyana, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka oo sopedakwatoona, pudusoo nabatsase ka Te Naa-matoosoo kodyukakwu.
Soo Sutaꞌyoo mooasoo ka Judas Iscariot
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise oo sopedakwatoo, soo Te Naa oo Pooha-makase noꞌyoona hee oo-toohakwi gwetzoimokwu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe numme pumme nakatzimodu-no yongo tukana,
soo Te Pabeꞌe yotseoose, tu nagaꞌapu tzakwumowse, namatzuaꞌa-ma wunateahoo.
Ka baa pukwi mu tabatzaganoo-wi tuoonahoose, numme pumme nakatzimodu ne tabatzagakute, ne kuku mabasakute.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka Peter-baa mani petu, soo Peter yise ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “U Ne Pabeꞌe. U gi nuka tabatzagakupana. Umu ooonneꞌyoo numu moohedu, gi numu tabatzagatudu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Peter meeoo nanekwegea, “Menoꞌo u ka ꞌyoo e manena gi nakasopedakwadoo, pana saaꞌa u besasoo oo nakasopedakwadookwu.”
Soo Peter ka Te Pabeꞌe mee netamma, “Gi nuga kuku tabatzagapana.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Peter nanekwegea, “Nu u tabatzagakuse, u e dooaꞌa manekwu. Nu ka gi u tabatzagakuna u gi e dooaꞌa mane-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
Soo Peter ka Te Pabeꞌe yise mee netamma, “Noꞌoko e tookoo e nabageaku, e kuku, e mi, e wo tuwazoo.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka Peter mee netamma, “U mooasoo pudu nabagea u gi tootsaꞌa, u kuku suuꞌmu. Soo Te Naa mooasoo ka suda mu tumaduguna soomuꞌwapu, pana sumuoo mu-nagatu suda tumaduguna gi soomuꞌwa, oosoo ka tooesoo suda tumaduguyina.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Judas Iscariot netammana ka oo sopedakwatoona, saaꞌa soo Judas ka umu Te Pabeꞌe wohonedu-no ka Te Pabeꞌe wutumakwu.
Ka noꞌoko ne tabatzagakumakwuse, ka tu nagaꞌapu-wi namadabuese oo katuhoosoo.
Mee yise ne netamma, “Nu mu tuukwekwu ka how manena nu mu kuku tabatzagakute. Mu yise Ne Pabeꞌe mee e neꞌa. Oosoo togesapa, nu Mu Pabeꞌe.
Nu Mu Pabeꞌe mu tabatzagaku ooonneꞌyoona mu sakwa nanatummatzina, mu sakwa punnoꞌo nanatabatzagaku. Mu sakwa gi paba nasooyugwepana tooe meeoo soonammepana.
Ooosapa nu besa mu tummatzidu, ooonneꞌyoona mu sakwa besa nuga mumme matugu-kwaꞌnesoo besa nanamatugu.
Nu togesapa mu tuukwe mu sakwa nanatummatzi, mu sakwa gi mee tusooyugwepana, ‘Nu nagutza besaꞌyoo gi ka E Pooha Pabeꞌe numu tummatzi-kwaꞌne mane-waꞌneꞌyoo.’
Mu haaꞌa oo nakasopedakwatoo ka how manena nu mu tabatzagaku? Mu ka e unnepu nakabetseana, soo Te Naa mu sootuhikwu.
Sumuoo mu-nagatu soo Te Naa gi sootuhikwu. Nu mu posopedakwatoonasoo mu netutzea, nuka tummatzikwutu. Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa yadooawabe meeoo tubo, “Sumuꞌyoo mu-nagatu nu-no tukadu e wohonekwu.”
Gisoo oo tu namanakwe nu mu tuukweꞌe, saaꞌa yise ka oo tunamanese mu mee unnekwu, ‘Soo Jesus togesapa Te Pabeꞌe.’
Nu togesapa mu tuukweꞌe. Nu ka umu e nanayadooawabe numu-matu mu-matoo tayakwu, mu ka mu nakabetseana e doodooamu manekwu. Umu nuga doodooamu, E Naa doodooamu tuwazoo.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise suda soonammena mee tuwazoo ne netamma, “Sumuꞌyoo mu-nagatu saaꞌa e nemawunidooa, ka umu e wohomu-matoo.”
Numme tunakatzimodu nanapoonnemoꞌo, numme gi oo sopedakwatoo ka haga oo netammana.
Nu ka Te Pabeꞌe-kumaba katu, oosoo ka nuka unu soobedyana.
Soo Peter e tsetzoogase mee unakwe, “Ka Te Pabeꞌe tubenga haga oosoo netamma.”
Nu ka Te Pabeꞌe tzageꞌesoo nuuyugwese, ka Te Pabeꞌe tubenga, “Haga numme-matu u wohomu-matoo u nemawunikwu?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee e nanekwegea, “Nu ka egea tukaba-matoo a hooba-wi matzakase ka ookow nana geahookwu.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tukaba hooba-wi, a namatzakana ka Judas Iscariot geahoo.

Soo Judas yise ka tukaba-matoo tukowse, soo sutaꞌyoo Judas-ma katuoose oo-naga mani. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo ka Judas netamma, “Yabeapu ka u tusoohane-kwaꞌne mani.” Mooasoo tu toganokase soo Judas meahoo. Numme tuka aatadu gi oo nakasopedakwadoo ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo ooka nemaꞌese. Ka Judas ka pumma ne tumukwuna hanedu, numme-matu yise meeoo sokwama, “Sumuna soo Te Pabeꞌe tukapu oo tumu tuungusoo, ka tu ewa tukapu-kwitoo.” Numme-matu punnoꞌo meeoo sokwama, “Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo, ka mu tutuhamanedu-matu haneku.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee ne netamma, “Menoꞌo soo Te Naa mu tzapoonnekukwu, nu Mu Pabeꞌe. Menoꞌo manakwana tamme ka Te Naa nesookwugikwu e mane-koobatoo. Pudusoo ꞌyoo namanekwu.
Mu e besa doodooamu. Pudusoo nu gi mu-baaꞌyookwu. Mu e wate pana gi e mayu-waꞌneꞌyoo, ka mu Jew numu moohedu e tunetammaku-kwaꞌnesoo.
Nu pudu tumayohope mu tuukwekwu, ‘Nuka mumme soobedya-kwaꞌne, mu sakwa menoꞌo manakwana ooonnekoo soo nanasoobedyana.
Noꞌobatusoo numu mu nakasopedakwadookwu, mu e doodooamu, ka besa mu nanasoobedya mu poonnena.’ “

Soo Simon Peter mee ka Te Pabeꞌe tubenga, “Howtoo maꞌa u meakwu?” Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee oo nanekwegea, “Nu oona kwingaꞌa meakwu, ka Te Naa-matoo, mu gi hownnekoo nu-no mea-waꞌneꞌyoo. Pana nu saaꞌa mu bidooa.”
Soo Simon Peter yise mee oo netamma, “Haꞌyoo u unnena meeoo, mu gi menoꞌo nu-no mea-waꞌneꞌyoo? Nu u-noꞌyookwu ka unu u soobedyana tooe mu numu taka goekwuse sapa.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee oo netamma, “Nu u sopedakwadoo. U gi nu-no yaꞌekwu, yaa togano u gi e nanenamaꞌyookwu. Gisoo ka kweꞌnaꞌa kwuꞌa yaka u saaꞌa pahe tooe ka mu numu mee netammadooa, ‘Nu gi ka Jesus sopedakwatoo.’ U gi ooosapa nu-noꞌyoopunnekwu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise numme pumme nakatzimodu mee netamma, “Gi suda sokwamapana. Mooasoo mu ka Te Naa nakabetsea, nuka nakabetsea tuwazoo.
Soo Te Naa nobe-kwitu ewow kapa-gaꞌyoo. Nu togesapa, nu gi esayaꞌe. Nu mease ka Te Naa-baa mu kapadookukwu. Saaꞌa nu yaasoo kodyu petuse, mu bikakwu Te Naa-matoo. Oꞌno yise mu ooosapa nu-noꞌyookwu.
Mu mooasoo oo sopedakwadoo ka a nameatabuana.”
Soo Thomas yise ka Te Pabeꞌe mee netamma, “Numme gi oo sopedakwadoo ka pukwitoo u meakwuna. Numme gi a nameatabuana sopedakwatoo.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee oo netamma, “Nu ka besow podo mu moohekwu. Nu togesapa ka Te Naa-witu sopedakwatoo, nu ka mu numu ooosapa gwetzoimo-kwitoo mu moohekwu, gi tooe haga tooe hownnekoo puusoo ka Te Naa-baatoo mea-waꞌne, nu otu mu mesoo bigaꞌa.
Mu mooasoo e tubetse nakaꞌoedyukute. Yaa manakwana mu ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukuna, oo poonnekwu tuwazoo.”
Soo Philip yise ka Te Pabeꞌe mee netamma, “Ka Te Naa ne tzapoonneku. Oꞌno numme besa sokwamakwu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Philip mee netamma, “Wunaꞌme nu mu-baa, pana tooesoo mu gisoo e tubetse sopedakwatoo. Tooe haga tooe nuka poonnedu ka Te Naa tuwazoo poonne.
Numme ka Te Naa-no nawaꞌneꞌyoosoo. Nu gi nugasoo tusooyugwena nu mu tuukweꞌe, pana E Naa nuka tunetammakuna nu waha.
Mu sakwa ka mumme e tuukwena nakaꞌoedyuku, numme ka Te Naa-no toge nawaꞌneꞌyoosoo. Ooonneꞌyoona mu sakwa e nakaꞌoedyuku, nu ka mu tuoegoedu mabesakuyakwe.

Mu sakwa oo tubetse nakaꞌoedyuku, nu pudusoo ka Te Naa-matoo kodyukakwusoo. Nu yise mumme nuka nakaꞌoedyukudu ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-matu-ma mu sootuhise, oꞌno mu nu-kwaꞌnesoo punnoꞌo, besa pooha nasootuhikwu. Mu punnoꞌo nanasookwugi, nuga ooonakwasoo besa pooha manekwu.
Mu ka e nakaꞌoedyukuna e nanetzakwiyaꞌena, nu mu nakasootuhikwu. Oꞌno mu numu saaꞌa mee unnedooa, soo Te Naa tookwa besaꞌyoo.
Tooe haga tooe mu-nagatu unu e soobedyadu, e nakabetseakwu.
Nu ka Te Naa tuukwekwu, ‘U sakwa u Besa Pooha-matu-ma mu sootuhi.’ Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha yise ooosapa mu-noꞌyoona mu tummatzikwu.

Soo Te Naa Besa Poohasoo ka kaahenotu mu tunedyooekwu. Ka Te Naa Besa Pooha mumme tummatzi, oosoo ooosapa mu-noꞌyoona, mu ka Te Naa besa podo meadabekwu. Mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu, gi ka Te Naa Besa Pooha sopedakwadoo, oosoo yise gi hownnekoo mu tummatzi-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Tooe pudusoo mumme e maꞌwugakwuse sapa, mu gi suda sokwama-waꞌneꞌyoo, ka mu-baatoosoo e kodyu petukwuse.
Pudusoo mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi e poonne-waꞌneꞌyoo, mu suuꞌmu. Nu puu namayodakwu saaꞌa, mu punnoꞌo ooosoo.
Ka e namayodase, mu oo sopedakwadookwu, nu ka E Naatu, mu punnoꞌo nugatuna, nu mummetu.
Mu numu e nakabetseadu, besa tookwa e soobedya. Ka umuoo nuka unu soobedya, soo Te Naa tookwa punnoꞌo unu umuoo soobedyakwu. Nu punnoꞌo besa umuoo soobedyana mu tzapoonnekute nu umu-nosoo.”
Soo Judas mee naneadu, gi Judas Iscariot, ka Te Pabeꞌe mee netamma, “Hownnekoo yise u ne natzapoonnekute, pana mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi u poonne-waꞌneꞌyoo?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee oo nanekwegea, “Tooe haga tooe nuka unu soobedyadu e nakabetseakwu. Soo Te Naa punnoꞌo unu mu soobedyakwu. Numme ka Te Naa-no mu natubangakwu.
Tooe haga tooe gi e nakabetseadu, tookwa gi e nakaheesoobedya. Nu ka E Naa nuka mumme e tuukwe tuunguna suuꞌmu mu tuukwe.
Nu ka togesoo mu-baaꞌyoopunnena eka besa naꞌunnedu mu tuukweyakwe.
Nu saaꞌa ka Te Naa-baa petugase, ka oo Besa Pooha-matu-ma mumme oo sootuhi tuungudooa. Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha noꞌoko hemma mu tunedyooekwu, noꞌoko hemma mumme e tuukwena mu tzasoomayukudooa.
Nu besa mu masoonammekwu nuga besa soonamme-kwaꞌnesoo. Mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi hownnekoo besa soonamme-waꞌneꞌyoo. Gi suda soonammenapana, gi tuwazoo suipana.

Mooasoo nu mu tuukweꞌe, ‘Pudusoo nu nabatsakwuse, saaꞌa namayodase mu-baasoo kodyu petukwu.’ Mu tookwa gi e tubetse soobedya, mu sakwa uga ka e soobedyana besa sokwama, ka Te Naa-matoo e kodyukakwuse. Menoꞌo soo e Naa nuga ooonakwakoosoo pooha-gaꞌyoo.
Nu ka a namanekwuna mu tuukwe, ka hemma oo manese mu e nakaꞌoedyukukwu.
Pudusoo nu gi mu-no yadooa-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Sutaꞌyoo e tumooꞌoogena, pana oosoo gi nuka matzooeku-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Pana soo e Naa mu numu-koobatoo e nabatsa tuunguna, nu yise ka Te Naa nakabetseakwu. Mu numu oo sopedakwadookwu, nu tookwa E Naa besa soobedya. Tamme sakwa mea.” Umu yise ka nobe-kwiꞌyoona mea.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe numme pumme nakatzimodu mee netamma, “Nu puu toesabooe namasua-kwaꞌneꞌyoo, soo oo pooetooana mesoo nadukadu. Soo Te Naa puu ka tumasuadu ooka mabetseadu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo.

Noꞌyoona yise mu nuka nakaꞌoedyukudu, ka tumasuape maꞌna-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo tooe haga tooe gi ka Te Naa nakabetseadu, ka toesabooe gi pooetooa-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa ookow tsegaꞌakwunise oo wunikwu. Mu numu ka Te Naa nakabetseadu ka toesabooe ewow besa pooetooa-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa puu ookow mabetseana oosoo besasoo pooedooꞌa.
Mu ka tumasuape maꞌna besa pooetooadu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo, mu ka mumme e tuukwena nakaꞌoedyukuna.

Gi nu oemota manepana, nu yise punnoꞌo gi mu ooowemota mane-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo toesabooe maꞌna-matu gi puusoo pooetoo-waꞌneꞌyoo, ka toesabooe-maꞌyoona suuꞌmu. Yooonnekoo mu gi muusoo besa tumadugu-waꞌneꞌyoo, mu nu-noꞌyoona suuꞌmu, besa tumudugukwu.
Umu mu-naga-kwitu nu-noꞌyoodu ka Te Naa nakabeatsedu. Tooe haga tooe nu oemota manegadu, gi besa tumadugu-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Tooe haga tooe gi nu-noꞌyoodu, ka tumasuape maꞌna-waꞌne nawunikwu, oosoo ka pasase, natapoꞌwokese, natunikwu.
Mu ka nu-noꞌyoona ka mumme e tunedyooena nakabetseana, mu ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhina, oosoo yise mu nakasootuhikwu.
Mu numu ka besa mu manakwe mu poonnena mee unnekwu, ‘Oosoo tookwa Te Pabeꞌe-matoo nanesootuhidu,’ umu yise mee tuwazoo unnekwu, ‘Te Naa besaꞌyoo,’ mee.
Nu besa mu soobedya, ka Te Naa nuka soobedya-kwaꞌne. Nu-no meadabe, oꞌno nu ooosapa besa mu soobedyakwu.
Nu puu ka Te Naa nakabetseana, oosoo ooosapa besa e soobedyakwu.
Nu tubetse besa soonammena nu eka mu tuukwe, oꞌno mu punnoꞌo tubetse besa sokwamakwu.
Nu besa mu soobedya, ooonneꞌyoona nu mee mu netamma, yooonnekoo sakwa mu besa nanasoobedyamo.
Tooe haga tooe ka tu puaꞌa-koobatoo mesoo nabatsadu, tookwa tu puaꞌa besa soobedya.
Tooe haga tooe nuka nakabetseadu puu nuga puaꞌa, nu sakwa oo-koobatoo mesoo nabatsa.

Mu nuka sukwe tummatzimodu yaa manakwana e besa pupuaꞌamu tuwazoo. Soo sukwe tutummatzidu puu gi ka pumme tu tunetammakukwudu manekwuna sopedakwadoo. Nu ka noꞌoko hemma ka Te Naa mumme e tuukwe tuunguna mu tuukwena ooonneꞌyoona mu tookwa e pupuaꞌamu.

Mu gi e netutzease nu yow Mu Pabeꞌe, pana nu mu netutzease oꞌno mu ka Te Naa nakabetsea, mu yise e wangaꞌamu. Nu ka Te Naa mu nakabetsea tuungu, oꞌno yise soo besa mu tumadugupu gi mobegwa-gakwu. Mu e nakaꞌoedyukudu yise, ka e nanetsagwayaꞌena, soo Te Naa yise noꞌoko mu nekwina mu sootuhikwu.
Nu yise mee mu netamma, ‘Besa nanasoobedya,’ mee.
Ka mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu numme wohonedu gi mumme mu petzabekwuse, mu sakwa oo soomayu ka mooasoo nuka mu mooe wohonena.
Nu ka menoꞌo mu wangaꞌamu natubanga. Ooonneꞌyoona mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi mu petzape mu gi umu-matu. Umu puusoo nanasoobedya.
Mooasoo nu mu tuukwe soo nuka nagedu nu-kwaꞌnesoo namadugukwu. Ka nuka tu wohone-kwaꞌnesoo, umu mumme wohonekwu. Ka gi nuka mu nakaꞌoedyuku-kwaꞌne, umu gi mumme nakaꞌoedyukukwu.
Umu ka gi Te Naa yaatoo nuka tayadu sopedakwadoona, ooonneꞌyoona umu gi e nakaꞌoedyukuna mu wohonekwu.
Ka gisoo umu e tunedyooe umu gi oo sopedakwatoo ka suda tumaduguna, pana menoꞌo umu oo sopedakwadoo, saaꞌa yise soo suda mu tumaduguna umu-matoosoo kodyukwu, ka gi mu nanekwuha.
Soo tooe haga tooe gi e heesoobedyadu ka Te Naa gi heesoobedya tuwazoo.
Tooe umu numu e mabesakute e poonnepana, umu menoꞌo ka Te Naa nokosoo ne wohoꞌne. Nu umu oe neyugwe ka gi nuka mu nakaꞌoedyukute.
Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa yadooawabe mee tubotugu, ‘Tooe gi suda e tumadugu sapa umu e wohoꞌne,’ ka Te Naa yadooawabe unne-kwaꞌnesoo.
Nu saaꞌa ka Te Naa-baa petugase, ka oo Besa Pooha-matu yaa teepu-koobatu sootuhi tuungudooa. Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha kaahenotu mu tunedyooekwu, yise ka mu numu nu-kwitu tuukwekwu.
Ka mu numu e tunedyooe manakwana, mu e nakatzina ooosapa e nagenoꞌo. Ka ꞌyoo hemma manepunne, mu punnoꞌo mu numu nu-kwitu tuukwemokwu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe togesoo numme pumme nakatzimodu yadooedyakwe mee yise ne netamma, “Mooasoo nu ekow mu tunedyooepu, oꞌno mu ooosapa e nakaꞌoedyukumokwu.
Mu numu ka Jew nanesootuhi nobe-kwikoo mu tayahoo, ka gi mu-no soonanesootuhina. Ka mu goena umu mee sokwamakwu, ‘Numme Te Naa tummatzidu.’
Pana umu mumme goedu puusoo nanemooaga, umu ka gi e nakaꞌoedyukuna ka Te Naa tuwazoo gi nakaꞌoedyukute.
Nu ka a namanekwuna mu tuukwe, oꞌno mu saaꞌa ka mu numu mumme wohoꞌne oo soomayudooa ka mumme e tuukwena. Nu mooeꞌugasoo ekow gi mu tuukweꞌe, ka togesoo mu-baaꞌyoona.
Menoꞌo yise nu ka Te Naa-matoosoo kodyukakwu. Gi haga mu-nagatu meeꞌe e tubengu, ‘Howtoo u meakwu?’ mee.
Mu ka mee mumme e tuukwese, nu ka Te Naa-matoosoo kodyukukwu, mu suda sokwama.
Nu kaaheno mu tuukwekwu, nu ka Te Naa-baasoo kodyu petugase, nu mu nanesootuhikukwu, oꞌno nu saaꞌa ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-matu punowsoo mu sootuhise mu besa sokwamadooa.

Ka Te Naa Besa Pooha petuse, mu numu saaꞌa ka tu maꞌemukwana soomuꞌwadooa ka nu-kwi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Nu ka gi wunaꞌme yaa teepu-kooba mu-baaꞌyookwuse, soo Te Naa Besa Pooha ka Te Naa Besa podo mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu moohekwu. Soo Te Naa mooasoo ka sutakoo nemamakwupu yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona suda mumme wuyugwedu.
Nu ewow mu tunedyooe penaꞌe, pana menoꞌo mu gisoo oo nakasopedakwadoo-waꞌne manepunne.
Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha ka petuse ka toge kaaheno hemma manepunne-wikoo, mu tuukwekwu gi pummesoo tusooyugwe-kwikoo mu moohekwu. Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha saaꞌa ka hemma manegekwuna mu tunesootubuedooa.
Ka nu-kwitu tuwazoo, soo Te Naa Besa Pooha mu tunedyooedooa, oꞌno mu saaꞌa, ‘E Pabeꞌe,’ mee e natubangadooa. Noꞌyoona hee Te Naa-toohakwi manepunnedu punnoꞌo nugatu.
Nu pudusoo nabatsakwu, pana huu oo tabe mease nu namayodase yaa teepu-koobasoo kodyu petukwu. Oꞌno yise nu saaꞌa, ka Te Naa-matoosoo kodyukakwu.”

Numme tunakatzimodu-matu mee nananetamma, “Tamme gi oo nakasopedakwadoo ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme tuukwena. Haꞌyoo unnena meeoo unakwe, ‘Nu pudusoo nabatsase huu oo tabe mease namayodase kodyu petukwu yise saaꞌa ka Te Naa-matoosoo kodyukakwu?
Haꞌoo manena soo Te Pabeꞌe pudusoo meakwu?’ “

Soo Te Pabeꞌe oo sopedakwatoo numme oo tubengakwu ka haꞌyoo unnena mee yise ne netamma, “Mu muusoo nanatubenga how manena nu mee unakwe, ‘Nu pudusoo nabatsakwu. Huu oo tooise namayodase, nu kodyu petukwu.’
Nu togesapa mu tuukweꞌe ka umu e wohomu nuka batsase, mu suda sokwamana, sakwikwu. Mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu besa sokwamakwu. Pana mu ka suda sokwamase sapa, saaꞌa mu besa sokwamakekwu ka e kodyupetuse.

Ka e nabatsase, mu ka mogoꞌne dooaꞌa-doo-kwaꞌne nuummawunukwu. Soo mogoꞌne puu suda soonamme ka unu nuummaba wumana. Pana ka oongaꞌa nadooaꞌadoose soo mogoꞌne ka tu nuummawununa soomuꞌwase ka oongaꞌa-matoo besa soonammekwu.
Mu pudusoo suda sokwamakwu, pana ka e kodyu petuse mu besa sokwamakwu. Gi haga yise suda mu masokwama-waꞌneꞌyoosoo.
