Oꞌnosoo gi yoo manepunne, ka Te Naa-matoosoo e kodyukase mu gi hemma nuka tubenga-waꞌneꞌyoo. Mu ka Te Naa-matoo nanetzakwiyaꞌe, oosoo mu nakasootuhikwu ka nuka mu nakaꞌoedyukute. Menoꞌo manakwana mu ka Te Naa nanetzakwiyise soo Te Naa nu-koobatoo mu nakasootuhikwu, mu yise besa sokwamakwu.
Nu mu tuukweꞌe, mu tunedyooena, ka Te Naa-witu. Mu gi mu natuukwe-witu nakasopedakwadoo, pana pudusoo nu ka Te Naa-witu mu tuukwekwu, besa ooka mu nakasopedakwadoo-kwikoo.

Ka Te Naa-matasoo e kodyukase mu saaꞌa ookow nanetzakwiyidooa, nu-toohakwi. Mu besa e soobedyana e nakaꞌoedyukute, ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona yaa teepu-kooba e petuse. Mu ka nuka besa soobedyana, soo Te Naa punnoꞌo mumme besa soobedyana, mu nakasootuhiyakwe.
Nu ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona kemmase yaa teepu-kooba petu. Pudusoo nu nabatsase, namayodase, ka Te Naa-matoosoo kodyukakwu.”
Numme mee oo netamma, “Menoꞌo numme oo nakasopedakwatoo, ka numme u tuukwena.
Menoꞌo manakwana numme oo nakaꞌoedyukukwu, u noꞌoko hemma sopedakwadoo. U mooasoo oo sopedakwadoopunne, gisoo uga umu ne tubenga sapa. Numme oo nakaꞌoedyukute, soo Te Naa yaa numme-baatoo u taya.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee ne netamma, “Mu menoꞌo e nakaꞌoedyukute,
pana pudusoo mu nu oemota manegakwu. Pana nu gi nu suuꞌmu, soo Te Naa ka nu-noꞌyoona.

Nu eka mu tuukweꞌe, oꞌno mu besa sokwamakwu ka e nakaꞌoedyukuna. Mu ka togesoo yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu, mu e tumooꞌooyikwu. Pana besa sokwama nu ka sutakoo umu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu moohedu matzooekukwu.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka yadooamakwuse toogoopatu poonnese nanesootuhikooha, “E Naa, pudusoo umu e wohomu e batsakwu. Mu numu tunesootabue, nu togesapa u besa dooa. Nu yise punnoꞌo ewow numu u-matoo nanesootuhi mayugwekwu.

U noꞌoko numu moohedu e mayugweke. Tooe haga tooe e nakaꞌoedyuku u mayugwepu, nu punnoꞌo ooosapa mu gwetzoimokwuna mu sootuhikwu, u numu manumudoopu nu yise Jesus Mu Pabeꞌe. Mu numu taka sooꞌoedyukudu ooosapa gwetzoimokwu.
Nu noꞌoko nuka u tunetammakuna yaa teepu-koobatu mamakwu. Ooonneꞌyoona mu numu besa u nemadabuekwu nu-koobatoo.
Oꞌnosoo gisoo ka teepu namadabuꞌe, ta nabaaꞌyoona, nawaꞌneꞌyoosoo.
U mu numu-matoo nuka nakaꞌoedyuku mayugweke. Nu yise punnoꞌo ume mu nakasopedakwadoo tunedyooe.
Umu ume doodooamuna, u yise nugatu mu mayugweke. Umu ume nakabetseꞌa, umu tuwazoo u nakaꞌoedyukute, u yow noꞌoko hemma e nemadabuekute.
Noꞌoko nuka u tunedyooepu nu mu numu tunedyooekwu. Umu oo nakaꞌoedyukuna, oo sopedakwatoo nu u-baaꞌyoona yaa teepu-kooba petu, umu tuwazoo oo nakaꞌoedyukute, u yaatoo e taya.
Nu umu nuka nakaꞌoedyukudu, suuꞌmu nanesootuhikute u sakwa mu sootuhi.
U ka mu nu-matoo nanesootuhidu doodooamu-gaꞌyoo. Umu ka ume doodooamuna, nuga doodooamu tuwazoo. Ka taga doodooamu besa manakwe mu numu oo sopedakwadookwu, nu tookwa besaꞌyoo.

Pudusoo nu ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona mease u-baasoo petugakwu. Pana umu e nakaꞌoedyukudu, togesoo yaa teepu-koobaꞌyookwu. E Naa, u ooosapa besaꞌyoo. U unu poohagana, ka umu taka nakaꞌoedyukudu mesoo mabetsea. Umu yise sumu-kwaꞌneꞌyookwu, ta-kwaꞌne, ta puu nawaꞌnesoo.
Tooꞌe noꞌyoona umu-matu togesoo e nakaꞌoedyukute, u tunetamma-waꞌnesoo. Nu ka umu-baaꞌyoona suta-makoo mu mabetseayakwe. Sumuꞌyoosoo nana nu oemota manekwu. Pudusoo oosoo kadooꞌoo namayugwekwu.
Pudusoo nu u-matoosoo kodyukakwu. Nu togesoo yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona u-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe, u ka umu nuka nakaꞌoedyukudu sootuhikwu. Umu ka pumme u sootuhise besa sokwamakwu, nu-kwaꞌnesoo.

Nu ka u unnepu-witu mu tuukweꞌe. Mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka mu taka nakaꞌoedyukudu gi petzape, umu taka nakaꞌoedyukudu ka nu-kwaꞌneꞌyoona, gi umu-waꞌneꞌyoona. Umu e nakaꞌoedyukudu gi ka taka wohonedu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Nu mee nanesootuhaꞌe ka suta-makoo ka yaa teepu-koobatu mabetsea mee, gi u, umu taka nakaꞌoedyukudu gi eka teepu-koobakoo taꞌya. Soo taka nakaꞌoedyukudu gi ooosapa ka teepu-koobaꞌyookwu nu-kwaꞌnesoo.
U umu taka nakaꞌoedyukudu ka u unnepu nakaꞌoedyukudu, ka togesapa oo naꞌunakwe, umu u tubetse nakabetseakwu. U yaa teepu-koobatoo e taya.
Menoꞌo yise nu ka umu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tayakwu, umu ka noꞌobatusoo numu u unnepu tunedyooekwu.
Oꞌno umu, u nakabetseakwu nu-kwaꞌnesoo, nu pudusoo umu-koobatoo nabatsakwu, oꞌno yise umu u tubetse nakabetseakwu.
Umu taka nakaꞌoedyukudu sootuhi. Nu-kwitu ka numu nanekwuhana nakadu sootuhi, oꞌno umu e nakaꞌoedyukukwu.
Ta nanosoo sumu-kwaꞌneꞌyookwu, noꞌoko umu taka nakaꞌoedyukudu mayugweke. Umu ta-no manese, mu numu oo sopedakwadookwu ka yaa teepu-koobatoo nuka u tayase.
U puu u yadooawabe ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona e mayugwepunne, umu taka nakaꞌoedyukudu punnoꞌo nuga yadooawabe manepunne. Umu punnoꞌo sumu-kwaꞌneꞌyookwu, ta-kwaꞌne, ta puu nawaꞌneꞌyoosoo.

Nu puu umu-no, u yise punnoꞌo nu-nosoo. Umu yise sumu-kwaꞌneꞌyookwu, ta-kwaꞌne, ta puu nawaꞌneꞌyoosoo. Ooonneꞌyoona mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu sakwa oo nakasopedakwatoo u yaatoo e taya, u ka umu taka nakaꞌoedyukudu besa nanasoobedya mu mayugwekese nuka u soobedya-kwaꞌnesoo.

U, E Naa, ooosapa besa e soobedyadu, gisoo ka teepu namadabue sapa. U ka mu numu taka nakaꞌoedyuku mayugwepu, oꞌno umu ta-baa ooosapa gwetzoimokwu. Oꞌno umu ta-nawaꞌneꞌyoo mee ta unnena nakasopedakwadookwu, yise taka nesookwugikwu.
U tubetse besaꞌyoo. Mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu yaa teepu-koobatu u-kwitu gi sopedakwadoo, nu suuꞌmu noꞌoko hemma u-kwitu sopedakwatoo.
Nu u-kwitu besa mu tuukwepu, yise ooosapa u-kwitu mu tuukwennummekwu. Nu ooosapa umu-noꞌyookwu, oꞌno yise umu besa nanasoobedyakwu nuka u soobedya-kwaꞌne.”

Mooasoo soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tumasuape-nagaꞌyoona nanesootuhi. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka nanesootuhi-makwuse, ka numme pumme nakatzimodu-no ka duaga Kidron mee naneadu-too meꞌa. O numme ka tumasuape-naga mane-petuga.

Mu Pharisee numu ka numu-koobatoo yadooadu-no, ka mu tukwutumadu ka Judas Iscariot namoohe tuunguna. Soo Judas oo sopedakwatoo ka tumasuape-naga, pukwiꞌyoona mu nanesootuhidyina, ka Te Pabeꞌe ooosapa onatoo meayakwe ka numme pumme nakatzimodu-no. Soo Judas ka mu tukwutumadu ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo bihooka. Umu ewahoo tukootabuakunooo, tsegesa noko wehe hehemana.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mooasoo oo sopedakwatoo ka tu namanekwuna, yise umu-matoo mease, mu tubengu, “Haka mu wate?”
Umu oo nanekwegea, “Ka Jesus Nazareth-wiꞌyoona kemmadu numme wate.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe meehoo, “Nu yow oosoo.” Umu noꞌyoona ka suise, petapenooyooese, ka teepu-koobatoo abedihoo. Judas togesoo umu-no.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu tubengusoo, “Haka mu wate?” Umu oo nanekwegea, “Ka Jesus Nazareth-witu kemmana numme wate.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meehoo, “Mooasoo nu mu tuukwe, ‘Nu yow oosoo.’ Mu ka nuka watena, umu e nakatzimodu tzamaꞌwu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meehoo unakwe, oꞌno soo e unnena kaahenoꞌyookwu, “Nu gi sumuhoo watzekute ka umu nuka nakaꞌoedyukudu-matu.”
Soo Simon Peter yise ka tu tsegesa gwuuhoose, ka nana Malchus
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka Peter meeꞌe netamma, “Maka u wehe namasootugu. Nu ka Te Naa nuka netamma-kwaꞌnesoo manekwu.”
Mu Jew-no Roman tukwutumadu ka Te Pabeꞌe tzakunahoo ka oo wutumakwuse.
Umu ka nana Annas mee naneadu-matoo oo tzakahooka. Soo Annas ka numu-koobatoo yadooadu, Caiaphas mee naneadu yahe.
Soo Caiaphas mooasoo ka mu Jew numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu tuukwepu, “Oosoo nanenagakwu, sumuꞌyoosoo nana noꞌoko numu-koobatoo nabatsakwuse.”

Ka Te Pabeꞌe togesoo ka Annas nobe-witoo nabigena, soo Simon Peter sumuhoo Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu-no mu-nakwi memeadape. Soo Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu ka Annas sopedakwatoo, yise ka Te Pabeꞌe-nosoo ka Annas nobe-kobenatoo meahoo.
Soo Peter ka natzakwonaꞌa-kumaba tooe wunu-petuga. Sumuꞌyoo numme Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu-matu kodyuse, ka mogoꞌne ka natzakwonaꞌa-wi tunekwegedyudu yadooebetuse, oosoo yise oe ka Peter tzaꞌegahoo.
Soo mogoꞌne ka natzakwenaꞌa-wi ka Peter tubengu, “U-haꞌa sumuꞌyoo mu Jesus nakatzimodu-matu?” Soo Peter mee oo nanekwegea, “Nu gi umu-matu.”
Unu utzutzuna, mu numu tummatzidu ka mu tukwutumadu-no puuwanakoo pedana, oe yooꞌe. Soo Peter umu-baa yooꞌe.
Soo Annas ka Te Pabeꞌe tubengu ka numme pumme nakatzimodu-witu, yise ka numu oo tunedyooe-witu tuwazoo.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee ka numu nehanedu moohedu nanekwegea, “Noꞌyoona numu ka pukwitu pumme e tunedyooena sopedakwatoo. Umu ooosapa e nakayakwe, ka mu numu e tunedyooe ka nanesootuhi nobe-wiꞌyoona. Nu gi mu watze-tunedyooe.
Mu gi nugasoo tubengu-waꞌneꞌyoo. Mu sakwa tooe haka tooe nuka nakadu tubengu. Umu oo sopedakwatoo ka e unnena.”
Sumuꞌyoo tukwutumadu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe kobitu matatseꞌe. Soo tukwutumadu oo nesagwiku, “U sakwa gi ka tamme moohedu suda nanekwegeapana.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo, “Ka e esayaꞌe, u sakwa kaaheno e waha. U sakwa yise gi nuka matatzeꞌepana, ka kaaheno e unakwe.”
Soo Annas yise togesoo natzakunadu ka Te Pabeꞌe ka Caiaphas-matoo taya. Oosoo ka numu-koobatoo yadooadu.
Saaꞌa tuwazoo umu-matu ka Peter meehoo tubengu, “U-haꞌa sumuꞌyoo mu Jesus nakatzimodu-matu?” Soo Peter yise meehoo, “Gi, nu gi umu-matu.”
Soo Peter pudutseꞌe sumuhoo nana naka wukaꞌakwunihoo. Oo nanumu yise mee ka Peter netamma, “Nu u poonne u ka Jesus-no oona ka tumasuape-kwi.”
“Nu gi o,” mee soo Peter, oꞌno yise soo kweꞌnaꞌa kwuꞌa yagakooha.

Mooasoo mu Rome numu-kooba katudu ka Pilate netutzea, Jew numu oo moohe tuunguna. Oogow moooꞌa awamooasoo, mu Jew numu moohedu ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus Caiaphas-makoo tzakahooka, ka Pilate nobe-witoo. Tooe haga tooe gi ka mu wawaꞌa nobe-wi tzoonooa, ka gi umu-waꞌneꞌyoonosoo, ka hemma nayongotuka gi oo tuka, ka oo nabeatsegana, ka tu tumayohope meeoo naꞌunakwe. Umu Jew numu moohedu ka Pilate nobe-wi gi tzoonooꞌa.
Soo Pilate umu-matoo tsebooekese, mu tubengu, “Haꞌoo suda esoo nana manakwe?”
Umu oo nanekwegea, “Esoo ka suda tumaduguse, numme u-matoo a bike.”

Soo Pilate mee mu netamma, “Mu sakwa mummesoo tumayohope-too a nemadabue.” Mu Jew numu moohedu ka Pilate meeoo netamma, “Soo numme Jew tumayohope meeoo, numme oo mesoo batsa, pana mu Roman numu moohedu ne wutumakwu, ka numu ne batsase.”
Esoo ꞌyoo manepunne. Oꞌno yise saaꞌa soo Te Pabeꞌe tu unne-kwaꞌnesoo sunngabe namadabue-ma nataposase, nabatsakwu.
Soo Pilate ka tu nobe-wisoo ekeahoogase, ka Te Pabeꞌe tubengu, “U-haꞌa mu numu-kooba katudu?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee ka Pilate nanekwegea, “Nu ka mu Jew numu Pabeꞌe, nu gi ka numu-kooba katudu mee mu nea-kwaꞌneꞌyoo.”
Soo Pilate yise mee Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Nu gi Jew numu. U ka mu Jew numu Pabeꞌena, how manena yise umu nu-matoo u taya? Haꞌoo suda u tumadugu?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee ka Pilate nanekwegea, “Mu Jew numu u-matoo e taꞌya, umu e nakatzimodu gi nu-koobatoo nagoꞌe. Nu saaꞌa mu numu-kooba katudu manekwu, ka Te Naa-baa petugase.”

Soo Pilate yise oo tubengusoo, “U-haꞌa numu-kooba katudu?” Soo Te Pabeꞌe oo nanekwegea, “Nu yaahoo Mu Tubetse Pabeꞌe. Nu yaa teepu-koobatoo nadooaꞌadoo, ka mu numu ka kaahenotu tuukwekwuse. Soo tooe haga tooe ka kaahenotu soonakadu sakwa e nakapunne.”
Soo Pilate tutubengu, “Hee esoo kaahenotu?” Gi ka pumme oo nanekwegeakwuna wutooꞌe, ka mu Jew numu moohedu-matoo tzebuegase, mee unakwe, “Gi nu suda a tumaduguna mamakoo nemamaꞌyu.
Soo ne tumayohope ka tu naꞌewa tukanoꞌo, sumuꞌyoo mu nakwutumadu-matu natzamaꞌwuyakwe. Mu haaꞌa eka mu-kooba katudu e tzamaꞌwutuungukwu?”
Mu numu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe wohonena mee unne, “Gi, ka Barabbas tzamaꞌwu.” Unu tutuhadu ka Barabbas mee naneꞌa.
Soo Pilate ka mu tutukwutumadu tu nobe-kwitoo bihoose, yise meeoo mu netamma, “A wukwupageta.”
Mu tutukwutumadu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe tzeabe tzowupagaꞌa-doose, oowehoo oo tzowupakakuhoo. Umu ka numu-kooba katudu kwasu-waꞌne tabuadu-wi oo kwaseyakuhoo.
Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo kemmase, meeoo oo nanetzaꞌmekute, “Yaa u mu Jew numu-kooba katudu.” Umu yise oo kobikoo oo totopagetahoo.
Soo Pilate yise tsebooekese, ka mu Jew numu moohedu mee netamma, “Nu mu-matoosoo a tzakagekoo, pana nu meeoo esoo gi suda tumadugupu-gaꞌyoo.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tzebooekese, tzeabe-wi tzowupagana, ka numu-kooba katudu kwasu-waꞌnekwisoo namadabue. Soo Pilate mee mu netamma, “Yaa esoo nana. Muusoo how a yugwe.”

Mu Jew numu moohedu ka pumme nakatzimodu-no oo poonnese, ewa unnekooha, “A tzakwenne, sunngaba namadabue-ma a taposa.” Soo Pilate meehoo mu netamma, “Mu sakwa a tzakakase, a tzakwenne. Nu meeoo esoo gi suda tumatuku.”

Mu Jew numu moohedu yise meeoo, “Masoo meehoo, ‘Nu yaa ka Te Naa Tubetse Tooa.’ Soo Te Naa nayadooawabe, Moses mee naneadu, oꞌnosoo mee tubotugu, numme sakwa ka mee ooonnekoo esayidu batsa. Masoo sakwa nabatsa.”
Soo Pilate ka mu nakase, unu suaꞌe.
Ka Te Pabeꞌe-no nobe-wisoo tzoonooase, oo tubengu, “U haaꞌa ooonneꞌyoo?” Soo Te Pabeꞌe gi oo nanekwegea.
Soo Pilate ka Te Pabeꞌe meehoo netamma, “U sakwa e nanekwegea, nu u nemadabuekwu. Nu ka u natzamaꞌwukwuna, tooe too u nabatsakwuna meesoo natuungu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe oo nanekwegea, “U oo mesoo manakwe, ka Nuga Naa te paꞌanakwatu mee unakwe. Mu numu u-baatoo e tzakadu suda tumaduguna, saaꞌa umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.”

Soo Pilate yise oo tooꞌe netzamaꞌwu, pana mu Jew numu moohedu ewa unnekooha, “U ka eka nana tzamaꞌwuse, u ka mu Roman numu-kooba katudu woho. Tooe haga tooe meeoo unnedu, ‘Nu numu-kooba katudu,’ ka Rome-witu numu-kooba katudu netumooꞌoo.”
Soo Pilate ekow nakase, ka Te Pabeꞌe puuwanatu bihookase, yise ka numu moohedu katunoo-wi katu, oona ka Tupe-ma Napodopu mee naneadu-wiꞌyoona.

Soo Pilate yise ka mu Jew numu moohedu meeoo netamma, “Yaaꞌa soo mu Pabeꞌe.” Umu ewa unnekooha, “A tzakakase, a tzakwenne.” Soo Pilate yise mu tubengu, “Nu haaꞌa sakwa eka mu-kooba katudu tzakwenne?” Soo numu nanesootuhi moohedu meehoo, “Numme Rome-kooba katudu suuꞌmu nakabetsea. Numme gi kummaꞌasoo moohedu nakabetseꞌa.” Soo Pilate yise ka mu Roman tutukwutumadu ka Te Pabeꞌe tzakwenne tuungu.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka sunngabe namadabuenna pumatoo tu natzakwenekwuna, puma tu nataposakwuna, tzanona meꞌa ka pumme tu wumahukase. Oona ka Numu Tzonoho mee naneadu-wi petuga.
Oꞌno umu ka Te Pabeꞌe waahoo nanana noko, ka sunngabe namadabue-matoo tapotseda. Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu naamookwi mu wahaꞌyoo oo nanaꞌenakwa.
Soo Pilate wobe-ma mu tubotuungu, ka Te Pabeꞌe tzopa nataposakwudu, mee o-ma natuboꞌo, “Yow soo Jesus, Nazareth-witu, mu Jew numu-kooba katudu.”
Ewaꞌyoo Jew numu ka meeoo nabodu neꞌa, soo pukwi mu natzakwenena ka Jerusalem tzageꞌe. Pahe-batu numu apeka-ma naboꞌo: mu Jew numu; mu Roman numu; mu Greek numu apeka-kwikoo.
Soo mu Jew numu moohedu ka Pilate meeoo netamma, “Gi ka ‘Mu Jew numu-kooba katudu,’ mee ma-ma tubopana, ‘Esoo nana meeoo, “Nu yaa Jew numu-kooba katudu,” ’ meeꞌe sakwa mu ma-ma tubo.”
Pana soo Pilate meeoo, “Nu mooasoo meeoo tubose, nu gi atasoo a yugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.”

Watusukweꞌyoo (4) tutukwutumadu ka Te Pabeꞌe ka sunngabe namadabue-ma taposahoo. Umu nanasusuꞌmu oo namasooape hanehoo. Umu yise meeoo, “Ka a kwasu tamme gi tzakebuepana, esoo sumuhoosoo pabahoo wunapu-kwi namadabuꞌe. Tamme sakwa eka wunapu nanatukuku.” Ka oꞌnosoo Te Naa unnepu nabotugu-kwaꞌnesoo, oo-toogoosoo mani petu, “Umu nanasuꞌmu ka oo namasooapu-matu hanehoose, ka oo kwasu nanatotzakwate.” A nabotugu-kwaꞌnesoo mu tutukwutumadu manakwe.
Mu watsukweꞌyoo momokoꞌne ka Te Pabeꞌe natzakwene tzageꞌe konno, oo pea, oo pedoo-no, Mary mee naneadu Clopas nodukwa, yise Mary Magdalene. Nu, John, punnoꞌo osoo wunupunne.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tu pea nu-baa oo wunu oo poonnese, meehoo tu pea netamma, “John menoꞌo yise umesoo tubetse tooa-waꞌneꞌyoo
Nuka yise mee netamma, “Menoꞌo masoo yise umesoo tubetse pea-waꞌneꞌyoo.” Oowe manakwana Te Pabeꞌe pea ooosapa nu-no.

Saaꞌa soo Te Pabeꞌe ka oo sopedakwadoose, noꞌoko ka Te Naa pumme tunetammakupu namamakwuse, mee unakwe, “Nu unu puudyaꞌe.” Oosoo meehoo naꞌunakwe, oꞌnosoo ka Te Naa unnepu ka a nabotugu-kwaꞌnesoo manepunnekwu.
Atsa baa suda kamadu suuꞌmu o nuuna, umu yise hooope-ma wanapu tzakunase, ka atsa baa-wi oo tzetsakase, ka Te Pabeꞌe tupa-wi oo tzematsuꞌa.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka atsa baa tumase, meehoo, “Yaatoo namamakwuhoo.” Yise tzokwuꞌehoose, yaꞌehoo.
Mu Jew numu moohedu gi ka mu numu tookoo paaꞌa nataposana petsape, ka oogow moooꞌa paba nanesootuhikwuse oo tumaduguyina.
Mu tutukwutumadu yise oetusoo kodyuse, ka mu waahoo nanana ka Te Pabeꞌe nanaꞌenakwa natzakwenedu kowpa wugotehoo.
Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe mooasoo yaꞌepu, umu yise gi oogow kowpa wugote.
Sumuꞌyoo mu tutukwutumadu-matu, ka Te Pabeꞌe ka tu tutokwateno-ma oo sapu kumanakoo oo tzeboosahootooa. Puupe-no baa yise oe manakwana papasawekooha.
Esoo mumme e tuukwena kaahenoꞌyoo, nu nuusoo namakoo a poonne, oꞌno sakwa mu punnoꞌo tunakaꞌoedyuku.
Ka soo Te Naa unnepu namamakwuhoo, mee oo unnepu, “Gi oo oho-matu nuugodekwu.” Yise oo unnepu, “Umu numu oo tzeboosahoodu yise o poonnedooa.”

Sumuꞌyoo nana Joseph mee naneadu ka Arimathea mee naneadu-wiꞌyoona kemmadu, ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukute. Soo Joseph gi haka tuukwe, ka mu Jew numu moohedu-ma suina. Soo Joseph yise ka Pilate mee tubengu, “How sakwa nu ka Jesus tookoo hane?” Soo Pilate yise meehoo, “Gi hownneꞌyoo.” Soo Joseph yise ka Te Pabeꞌe tookoo hanehooka.
Joseph ka nana Nicodemus mee naneadu-no memea.
Umu ka mu Jew numu tumayohope mayohona ka oo tookoo ka myrrh noko aloe-ma mawoꞌngese, wanapu-wi oo toputooe.
Ka Te Pabeꞌe natzakwenepu tzageꞌe ewaꞌyoo sunngabe toonoopa oona soo tupe tuwaga, gisoo haga pukwi natuguna.
Ka tu paba nananesootuhikwuse, oogow tabeno yabesoo yongogaꞌa umu ka pukwi oo natzakwenepu tzageꞌekoo ooka tupe tuwagana mayuse, oowe soo Te Pabeꞌe natugu.
Awamooasoo togesoo tu toganopunne, ka tu nasatenoꞌo, Mary Magdalene oo natugu-wi petuhooga, oo poonne soo tupe namanonooepu-gaꞌyoo ka teepu tawagana-kobenatu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe tookoo kadooꞌoo oetu.
Numme-baa tanomane petuhoo numme Simon Peter-no, mee ne tuukwe, “Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe tookoo hanehoogapu-gaꞌyoo, nu gi o sopedakwadoo pukwi ooka mu hanena.”
Numme, John, yise Peter-no memeakwate oo natugu-witoo.
Numme nanosoo tatanomanega, pana nu ka Peter tusoowunihooka, nu oe mooe petuhooga.
Pana nu gi oe ega. Nu oetu sukwe tomoema petugase, oo poonne ka wanapu pukwi oo natoputoepu.
Soo Simon Peter petuhoogase, oe egahookase ka mu wanapu o kwakwape mu poonne.
Soo wanapu oo wo pukwi namabutoo dapepu besa namasoomedapu oo tzageꞌesoo hape.
Nu yise oe egase, o poonnena oo nakaꞌoedyukute Te Pabeꞌe namayodapu.
Pana numme gisoo oo nakasopedakwatoo ka Te Naa unnepu, soo Te Pabeꞌe namayoda tu yaꞌe-wikoo meeꞌe.
Numme yise nobe-witoo kokodyuka.
Mary Magdalene ka pukwi o natugupu-kobenaꞌyoona yaka. Yagana yise, ka pukwi oo natugupu-witu tooe poonnennumme.
Waahoo toha kakasa-gakoo poonne oe mu yugwe, sumuꞌyoo ka Te Pabeꞌe tsotugu tabepu-wi, sumuꞌyoo yise o tatugudapepu-wi.
Umu yise ka Mary tubengu, “Mogoꞌne, how manena u yaka?” Soo Mary mee mu nanekwegea, “Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe tookoo hanehoogapu-gaꞌyoo. Nu yise gi o sopedakwatoo oo pukwiꞌyoona.”
Oꞌno yise nakwumunase, ka Te Pabeꞌe poonne o oo wunu, pana gi oo posopedakwatoo.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe meehoo oo netamma, “Mogoꞌne, how manena u yaka? Haga u wate?” Soo Mary ka tumasuape mabetseadu mee oo soobedyana, mee oo netamma, “U ka oo haneoogase e tuukweꞌe, hano u oo hane? Nu oo hanekwu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meehoo oo netamma, “Mary.” Soo Mary oo-tamme nakwumunase, ka mu Jew numu apeka-wikoo oo neꞌa, “E Pabeꞌe.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meehoo oo netamma, “Gi e tzamapana. Nu gisoo ka Te Naa-matoo kodyukaꞌa. Mease, umu nuka nakatzimodu tuukwe, nu ka Te Naa-matoo kodyukakwu.”
Soo Mary Magdalene yise numme Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu-matoo mease, numme tuukweꞌe, “Nu ka Te Pabeꞌe poonne.” Oꞌno yise ka numme o netammapu ne tuukweꞌe.
Oogow togano numme Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu nanano ka nobe-wi natzepunooꞌe, numme ka mu Jew numu moohedu-ma suina. Soo Te Pabeꞌe numme-baa tabua-petuse, mee ne netamma, “Besaꞌyoo.”
Yise ka tu mi ne tzapoonnekute, ka pukwikoo tu nataboosahoopu noko. Numme tubetse besa sokwama ka Te Pabeꞌe poonnese.
“Besaꞌyoo,” mee soo Te Pabeꞌe ne netammasoo. “Ka Te Naa meeoo nuka netamma, nu yaa ekaoo teepu-kooba petu. Nu punnoꞌo mu tuukwe, mana tooe hano tooe ka mu numu nu-witu tuukwemo.”
Numme-koobatoo songahaꞌase, meeoo unakwe, “Nu ka E Besa Pooha-matu-ma mu sootuhikwu.”

Soo poohabe, ka mu numu suda tumaduguna puma mu nematzagakwunikwuna. Soo Te Naa yise ka suda mu tumaduguna soomuꞌwakwu. Mu ka gi mu tuukwena, umu gi hownnekoo ka suda tu tumaduguna nematzagakwuni-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo suda mu tumaduguna yise umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.
Sumuꞌyoo numme tunakatzimodu-matu Thomas

Numme tunakatzimodu ka Thomas meehoo tuukwe, “Numme ka Te Pabeꞌe poonne.” Oꞌno yise oosoo meehoo, “Nu ka oo mi-wi tawagadu poonnese, oe tzetuguse, ka tutokwatenoo tuꞌuadoopu-kooba matuguse suuꞌmu, nu oo nakaꞌoedyukukwu.”
Sumu nasatese, numme tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka nobe-wi sumuhoo, oꞌno soo Thomas numme-no. Tooe ka mu natzakwunaꞌa natzepunooꞌe sapa, soo Te Pabeꞌe numme-baa petuse, mee soo unakwe, “Besaꞌyoo.”
Yise soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Thomas mee netamma, “Ka e mi poonnese, mi tzetuguse, oꞌno sakwa u e tubetse nakaꞌoedyuku.”
Soo Thomas yise gisoo ka Te Pabeꞌe tzamana o nakaꞌoedyuku. Thomas meeoo, “U Ne Tubetse Pabeꞌe. Nu u-matoo nanesootuhikwu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meehoo oo netamma, “U ka e poonnese suuꞌmu e nakaꞌoedyukute. Mu numu gisoo e poonnedu oo sukwe nakaꞌoedyukuyina unusoo nasootuhiyakwe.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ewa nanabesa nanasoogwugaꞌe pooha manakwe ka numme tunakatzimodu punoko, ewaꞌyoo oo manepu gi naboꞌotugu.
Pana esoo mee naꞌunnedu nu botugu, oꞌno mu oo nakaꞌoedyukukwu, soo Jesus Te Tubetse Pabeꞌe, ka Te Naa Besaa Tooaꞌa. Mu yise ka oo nakaꞌoedyukuna mu ooosapa gi moobekwa-ga gwetzoimokwu.
Saaꞌa soo Te Pabeꞌe numme-baasoo tapua petusoo ka banunadu, Tiberius mee naneadu-kumabaꞌyoona. ꞌYoo yise namani.
Numme, Simon Peter, Thomas
Soo Simon Peter meeoo, “Nu tuukwigakwu.” Numme meeoo, “Numme u-no.” Numme yise sake-wi meaꞌa, pana togamano gi hemma tzakadu.
Oogow awamooa, unu tu tapuakese, soo Te Pabeꞌe oona bakumana wunu, pana numme gi oo posopedakwadoo.
Ne waꞌagese meeoo, “E pupuaꞌamu, mu haaꞌa gi tutzakadu?” Numme yise oo nanekwegea, “Gi tuwazoo.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee ne netamma, “Ka puma mu tuukwina ka sake tumadinakwatoo tzakweku, mu tuhanehookwu.” Numme yise oo manise, ka tuukwinoo tzamapana, ka ewow pakwe oekoo.
Nu yise ka Peter meeoo netamma, “Masoo tookwa Te Pabeꞌe.” Soo Peter yise ka gi besa namasooana, wunagow yaahoose, ka baa-witoo nadawunihoose, bakumabatoo bahabehooka.
Numme yise o nageka ka sake-wi, ka tuukwinoo ewow pakwe oekoo oo wupewoꞌyana.
Numme ka bakumana petuhoogase, numme oo poonne, onoko nabedana pakwe, noko tukaba, o nanohotuku.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo ne netamma, “Maka pakwe mu tutzagadu-matu hanehooke.”
Simon Peter yise meahoose ka puma tu tuukwipu bakumabatoo tzabewoꞌyahoo. Ewaꞌyoo (153) papabatseꞌyoo pakwe pana soo puma mu tuukwipu gi natzakebue.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo ne netamma, “Mu tukanna.” Numme gi mee oo tubengu, “Haga u?” nnumme ka mooasoo oo sopedakwadoona.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise tukaba noko pakwe ne maka.
Toge pahe (3) soo Te Pabeꞌe numme tunakatzimodu natzapoonnekute, ka tu yaꞌe-kwikoo namayodase.

Ka ne tukamakwuse, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Simon Peter meeoo netamma, “Simon, u John tooa. U haaꞌa noko hemma ooonakwasoo besa e soobedya?” Simon mee oo nanekwegea, “Aha, ne Pabeꞌe, u oo sopedakwatoo nu ume puaꞌa.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo oo netamma, “Umu nu-kwi tunakaꞌoedyukudu mabetsea.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee tuwazoo oo tubengasoo, “Simon, u haaꞌa unu e soobedya?” Soo Simon oo nanekwegeasoo, “Aha, Ne Pabeꞌe, u oo sopedakwatoo nu ume puaꞌa.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo oo netammasoo, “Ka umu nu-kwi tunakaꞌoedyukudu mabetsea.”

Sumu tuwazoo soo Te Pabeꞌe oo tubengasoo, “Simon, u haaꞌa e puaꞌa?” Ka Peter suda nenuuma soo Te Pabeꞌe ka oo tubengasesoo, “U haaꞌa e puaꞌa?” Soo Simon meeoo, “U Ne Pabeꞌe, u noꞌokosoo hemma sopedakwatoo. U oo sopedakwatoo nu u puaꞌa.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo, “Umu nu-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu mabetsea.
Nu togesapa u tuukwekwu, tooebetseꞌena u tooe hano tooe mesoo mea u petzabe-kwitoo.
ꞌYooonnekoo soo Peter ka Te Naa-koobatoo nabatsakwu, meꞌesoo Te Pabeꞌe unnena. Yise meeoo oo netamma, “Nuka nageno.”
Peter wesase e poonne, tu nakwi e meꞌa
Soo Peter yise ka Te Pabeꞌe tubengu, “Ne Pabeꞌe, Haꞌoo yise masoo manekwu?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus oo nanekwegea, “Sumuna masoo nummennummekwu e kodyu-kwitootooe esoo gi ume pukwitoo suda soonammena. U sakwa nuka nage-no.”

Ooonneꞌyoona susumudu tunakaꞌoedyukudu meeoo, “Soo John gi yaꞌekwu.” Esoo gi togesapa. Te Pabeꞌe meeoo sukwe unakwe, “Sumuna masoo nummennummekwu e kodyu-kwitootooe, esoo gi ume pukwitoo suda soonammena.”
Nu oosoo mu tunakatzimodu-matu oo poonnedu o botugu, ka a namanena. Tamme noꞌyoona oo sopedakwatoo esoo e tubona kaahenoꞌyoo a namanena.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ewa nanabesa pooha manakwe tuwazoo, nu gi toge besa noꞌoko mu bo-waꞌneꞌyoo, umu ewaꞌyoo. Nu umu-matusoo mu bokute, oꞌno mu punnoꞌo ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukukwu.

Ka mooeꞌugasoo numu-matoo tubose ka Te Pabeꞌe mane-kwitu mu tuukweꞌe, yise ka mu numu yaa teepu-koobatu tunedyooe, oꞌno yise ka Te Pabeꞌe tu tunakatzimodu oo tunetammakuna mu tuukweꞌe. Ka Te Pabeꞌe nabatsase oosoo tu yaꞌe-kwikoo namayodase umu pumme nakatzimodu ewasoo natzapoonekute. Ka Te Naa numu magwetzoina mu tuukweꞌe. Mee tuwazoo mu netamma, “Soo John puu mu sootuhina baa-wi mu matzaka. Pudusoo soo Te Naa tu Besa Pooha-ma mu sootuhikwu. Mu sakwa Jerusalem-wi tuutooepunne ka Te Naa mumme sootuhi-kwitoo tooe.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe umu tu tuukwewabe-no oona giba-ma nanatapoegease, umu meeoo oo tubenga, “U haaꞌa yabesoo tamme Jew numu ka mu Tiboꞌo-makoo natzamaꞌwukwuna natuungu umu yise gi te nemadunagakwu?”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu nanekwegeꞌa, “Mu gi oo sopedakwatoo ka hemma oo manekwuse, Te Naa ookow soomadabuekwu ka hemma oo manekwuna.

Pana Te Naa Besa Pooha-ma mu nasootuhikwu. Oosoo mu pooha makakwu. Mu yise noꞌoko mu numu nu-kwitu tuukwemokwu: Mu numu Jerusalem-witu, Judea noꞌoko Samaria mee nananeadu teepu-koobatu tuwazoo, tooe hanotu tooe, tooe haga tooe ka teepu-koobatu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka yadooamakwuse, toogoopatoo ka koomeba-naga tsobakase yise tubetse mea.
Umu oo tuukwewabe oo poonnepunne.

Mooasoo oo tsobakase sapa toogoopatu poonnepunne, wahaꞌyoo toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo toha kwakwaseyaadu umu-baa petuse, meeoo mu netamma, “Toogoopatu poonnemakwu. Te Pabeꞌe Te Naa-matoosoo kodyuhooka. Sumu tabeno oosoo yaa teepu-koobasoo kodyu petukwu tu mea tabua-kwaꞌnesoo petu tabuadooa.”
Mu oo tuukwewabe tubongosoo kodyu ka giba, Olive mee naneadu-maꞌyoo, ka Jerusalem mee naneadu-kwitoo katzageꞌe o namea.

Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe tuukwewabe tunetutzeana mee nananeadu: Peter, John, James, Andrew, Philip, Thomas, Bartholomew, James, Alphaeus tooa, Simon Zealot, Judas, James tooa. Ka Jerusalem-wisoo petuse ka waha nakooba yugwedu nobe-kwi huudooe tooipunne.
Ooweꞌyoonow umu yise nanano nanesootuhiyakwe. Oosoo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus pea umu oo wangaꞌamu yise ewaꞌyoo momokoꞌne umu-no.
Sumu tu nanesootuhinoꞌo, ewaꞌyoo (120) numu oeꞌyoona nanesootuhi. Soo Peter yotsese ka mu numu yadooe, meeoo yise mu netamma,

“E nanumu, tamme sakwa sumuoo nana netutzea ka numme Te Pabeꞌe tuukwewabe-no nadatsungakwudu. Oꞌnosoo soo Judas uga numme-nagatu Te Pabeꞌe tuukwewabena natutzeadu. Pana yise oosoo ka mu tukwutumadu-matoo Te Pabeꞌe nemawuni, umu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe wutumase yise oo batsa.” Soo Judas ka suda tu tumadugu-kwi natumunagakute yise ka pumme tu tumanagaku-ma tubewa tumu. Oꞌno yise ka suda nuummakese, puusoo nabatsa. Oosoo-kobena-tamme aanooaka. Ka tu sapu wubadow petuse, oo sagwa noꞌyoona tseboogeke oosoo yise yaꞌehoo. Mu numu Jerusalem-wi nonobe-gaꞌyoo ka oo nakase yise ka tubewabe Pukwitu Nabatsapu meeꞌe oo neꞌa. Soo Peter ka mu numu puno nanesootuhidu mee tuwazoo netamma, “Oꞌnosoo soo David yise meeoo unakwe ka tu hoobeadoo-kwi soo Judas ꞌyoo manekwu mee tubopu, ‘Oosoo yise ka yaꞌese, saaꞌa gi nasoomaꞌyukwu.’ Sumuba tu hoobeadoo-kwi meeoo, ‘Kummaꞌyoosoo numu sakwa oo kapi nanekatuku.’

Tamme sakwa kummaꞌakoosoo numu netutzea ka Judas kapi ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu mu numu tuukwekwudu. Esoo nanetutzeadu sakwa oe manakwanasoo ooosapa tamme-no kemmadabedu ka John numu baa-wi matzakanoꞌo manakwana yise ka Te Pabeꞌe nabaatoo pumme oo binoꞌotoo tooe.”
Mu numu yise ka Peter meeoo unakwe oo nakapunnese, oꞌno yise mu numu waahoo nanana Matthias noko Joseph
Yise meeoo nanesootuhi, “U noꞌoko numu gi watzekudu. Yise u tunetutzeana ne tuukwe ka Judas kapi manedu, ka Te Pabeꞌe mu numu oo tuukwe-kwaꞌnesoo.”
Ka onow ka mu numu tumayoho-kwikoo umu ka mu numu netutzea. Soo Matthias yise nanetutzea, numu-no Te Pabeꞌe-witu tuukwewabe-matu-no nadatsunga.
Yise, oꞌno ka tunayasamakwuse, mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu nananoꞌo sumu, ka oꞌno tabewa-wi ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhina.
Gi obeda yise unu hukwadu-kwaꞌne nanakabetu, yise paꞌanakwana ka nobe-kwi kangabetu.
Hee goso-ga-kwaꞌneꞌyoo noꞌoko umu-ma aatahoobetu.
Oosoo Te Naa Besa Pooha mu tzapoonnekuna ka Te Naa umu sootuhaꞌe. Oosoo Te Naa Besa Pooha noꞌoko umu oe manepunnedu, sootuhihoo umu yise nanakummaꞌamakoosoo yadooape-ma apegeakooha.
Ewaꞌyoo nananesootuhidu umu tzageꞌe nonobe-gaꞌyoo. Nanakummaꞌakoosoo
Meeoo yise nananetamma, “How namani?”
Umu-matu meeoo unakwe, “Umu tookwa baakoꞌe.”
Mu tuukwewabe yosuhoose, soo Peter paba yadooa ka mu Jew numu meeoo netamma, “E pupuaꞌamu, besa e nakapunne.
‘Baakoꞌe’ mee umu ne netamma. Gi numme. Tamme Jew numu gi atsa tutzaꞌemukwa baa hebedu awamooasoo, ka gisoo tukana. Menoꞌo togesoo sumu kadooꞌoopu-kwi (9) taba-gatu.
Yowsoo Te Naa yadooawabe oꞌnosoo tamme oo tuukwepu. Te Naa yadooawabe Joel mee naneadu, mee tubotugupu,

Te Naa meeoo te netamma, ‘Nu gisoo ka teepu atasoo yugwena, nuga pooha-matu noꞌoko nanaꞌatakoosoo numu nanakummaꞌakoosoo poohabe-matu-ma sootuhidooa. Mu doodooamu tooe saaꞌa a unnena wahadooa. Tootooebetseꞌe saaꞌa pooha tuusoobedyadooa. Mu wakwaꞌetse saaꞌa punnoꞌo pooha nosedooa.
Mu momokoꞌne, mu nanana e nakaꞌoedyukudu saaꞌa nu E Besa Pooha-matu-ma sootuhidooa. Umu yise e unnepu wahamodooa.
Tooe hownnekoo tooe saaꞌa nu mu tsapoonnekudooa ka hemma oo manekwuse, ka teepu-koobatoo tooetoo mu paꞌanakwatoo: puupe, goso, kweedaba.
Ka oꞌno tabeba-wi ka teepu atasoo oo yugwekwuse mu notu tonumapunnekwu. Soo muha unu atsakwedyana puupe-kwaꞌne tabuadooa.
Pana noꞌoko nuka nanetzakwiyidu nu magwetzoidooa.’
E pupuaꞌamu, soo Jesus Te Pabeꞌe. Soo Te Naa meeoo unakwe, ‘Oosoo Mu Pabeꞌe,’ meeꞌe. Mu oo sopedakwatoo ka besa mumme oo tumadugukupu ka Te Naa pooha-ma.
Pana mu yise ka oo-ma tu natzakaduse, mu ka gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu wakwawaꞌa ooka batsa tuungu, ‘Paꞌa o taposa,’ mee mu netamma. ‘Mu tunetamma-kwaꞌnesoo mu mani,’ mee soo Te Naa.
Oo tunetamma-kwaꞌne, gi tubetse yaꞌe saaꞌa petudooasoo.

Soo Te Naa yadooawabe David mee naneadu ookow waha ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu te tuukwepuna. ‘Nu oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa ooosapa nu-notu. Nu gi hownnekoo nammayamoa-waꞌneꞌyoo ka ooosapa Te Naa nuka mabetsea.
Nu yise besa soonamme oo nesookwagaꞌena ka Te Naa mee oo netammana, nu oo sopedakwatoo e yaꞌekwuna e namayodakwuna e nummekwunasoo.
U, Ne Naa gi e yaꞌena petzape. U gi suda e tookoo manena soopetzape.
Nu ka umetuna. U e magwetzoikwusesoo. Nu yise u-baaꞌyoona tubetse besa soonammekwu,’ mee soo David tubo.

E nanumu, ka David-witu nu mu tuukwekwu. Tamme oo sopedakwatoo ka oꞌnosoo ka David tamme mooe tuukweꞌe. Oosoo puu ka yaꞌese, natuguse, tamme oo sopedakwatoo ka pukwi oo nakoopu. Oosoo gi nakwitusoo waha. Oosoo Te Pabeꞌe-witu te tuukwe.
Soo David oo sopedakwatoo ka Te Pabeꞌe saaꞌa nuugwekwuna. Soo Te Naasoo meeoo ka David tuukweꞌe, ‘Sumuꞌyoo mu-nagatu Te Pabeꞌe manedooa. Oosoo mu nanumu moohedooa u-kwaꞌnesoo.’
Soo David ooka te tuukwe soo Te Pabeꞌe gi tubetse yaꞌe oo tookoo gi pehekwu. Oosoo tu yaꞌe-kwiꞌyoona namayodakwu.
Te Naasoo tuwow nakumma-baatoo oo baꞌe, ka Te Pabeꞌe pooha-maka. Menoꞌo yise soo Te Pabeꞌe tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma ne sootuhi. Tamme oo nakana oo poonne. Soo Te Pabeꞌe toogoopatoo meapu.
Soo David gi oo manakwe. Soo David ookahoo waha Te Pabeꞌe-witu meeoo unakwe, ‘Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe nabaa katu tuungu.
Oosoo yise ka umu oo wokwohomu matzooekukwu.’
Ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu sakwa tamme Jew numu unusoo sopedakwatoo. Mu oo batsapu pana yise soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe oo mayugwese yise saaꞌa soo Te Pabeꞌe numu nemadunagakwu.”
Umu numu ka Peter nakase, unu suda oo sokwamakuna ka tu manena yise meeoo oo netamma oo poenaꞌewabe-nokosoo, “Haꞌoo sakwa numme manese kaaheno oo mayugwe?”

Soo Peter mu nekwegease meeoo, “Mu sakwa ka suda mu manena maꞌwu, baa-wi namatzakase mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyuku. Oꞌnosoo Te Naa noꞌoko mu sootuhise te maꞌemukwana soomuꞌwakwunise ka Tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma mu sootuhi.
Oosoo Te Naa unnegeapu mee, ‘Mu nanumu, mu dooamu, yise noꞌoko numu mana kwingaꞌa-kwitu noꞌyoona e tunetutzeana, umu e dooamu manekwu,’ mee unnena.”
Soo Peter ewasoo meeoo mu numu tuukweyakwe, yise meeoo mu netamma, “Mu numu ewa suda manakwe yow menoꞌo. Soo Te Naa gi mu sootuhikwu, gi umu-waꞌne manepana, oꞌno saaꞌa mu namagwetzoikwu.”

Ewaꞌyoo (3,000) numu ka Peter nakaꞌoedyuku ka oꞌno tabeno, umu baa-wi namatzaka. Umu nanesootuhiyakwe ka Te Naa tuukwewabe tu nakana pumme tunedyooe. Ka Te Pabeꞌe nabatsase oo soomayuna nanano tukana noꞌoko hemma nanatummatzina.
Mu nanana Te Pabeꞌe tuukwewabe Te Naa besa pooha-toohakwi ewow numu mabesakuyakwe, nanasookwugi tumadaꞌe.
Mu Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu noꞌoko ka hemma nanatummatzaꞌe.
Mu numu ewow hee-gaꞌyoo oo-ma tumuna, yise mu gi hee-gakoo tummatzaꞌe.
Nonotza tabeno ka pabow nanesootuhi nobe-kwitoo meayakwe. Nanano tukayina tu pupuaꞌamu nobe-kwiꞌyoona tooe ka besa nanano sokwamana,
ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhidyina. Noꞌyoona mu numu nesookwugaꞌe ka mu besow umu tunakaꞌoedyukudu nonoꞌotsa tabeba-wi nanaꞌewasoo manenoꞌo ka Te Naa numu magwetzoaꞌe ka nanano mu nanesootuhaꞌe.
Nonotsa tatabeno pahe-kwikoo ka taba katu nananesootuhiyakwe, mu Peter-no John ka pabow Jew nanesootuhi nobe-wikoo nanesootuhiyakwe.

Soo sumuꞌyoo nana ka tuhaꞌyoonasoo gi nummedu natzakwu petuyakwe. Besa Tabuadu tupe koodua natzakwonaꞌa mee naneadu-kumabaꞌyoo, soo nana oo natzatuguna mu numu nanesootuhigadu tukumi meadu tunekwi tabeyakwe.
Sumu tabeno soo nana pumme tu tzakwumena, mu Peter noko John wegease, “Puma e tumukwuna e gea,” mee mu netamma.
Umu yise besa oo poonnese soo Peter meeoo oo netamma, “E nakapunne.”
Oosoo nana besa mu poonnekwunihoose yise meeoo soonamme, “How gina hemma e geakwu?”
Soo Peter yise meeoo, “Nu gi hemma hee-gapana nu sakwa ka Jesus pooha-ma u tummatzi. Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus
Soo Peter yise ka nana gi nummedu oo mi-makoo oo tzadyota. Oꞌno yise soo nana mesoo wunuoose, o natakwuninumme.

Ka besa tu kowpa noko tu tawetzoko natzooe manise ka Solomon haba mee naneadu-toohatoo, yise mu Peter noko John-no meahoo. Ka besa manise, ka Te Naa nanesootuhi numme. Mu numu yise oo poonnese meeoo unnegonno, “Yowsoo nana ka Besa Tabuadu tupe koodua natzakonaꞌa-kwiꞌyoona numu ka hemma puma tu tumukwina natuungu katuyidu.” Ewaꞌyoo mu numu oo poonnese oo nesookwugaꞌe ka besa oo manise.
Ewaꞌyoo mu numu sookweda kemmaꞌase ka nana mu Peter noko John-kumaba, ka haba Solomon mee naneadu-tooha mu konno mu poonne petuse, “Uune! U oo mabesaku,” mee mu numu unne.
Ka mu numu petugonno, soo Peter meeoo mu netamma, “E nanumu, gi tammesoo pooha nanesootuhi-makoo soo nana besa mani. Gi meeoonekoo tusooyugwepana.
Ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus pooha-toohakwi soo nana besa mani. Soo Te Naa
Mu ka mumme moohedu-no ka Te Pabeꞌe batsa gi ka Jesus Te Pabeꞌe sopedakwadoona.
Esoo Te Naa unnepu togesapa. Mooasoo soo Te Naa nanamooatupu yadooawabe o botugu ka Te Pabeꞌe nabatsakwuna.
Ka Te Naa sakwa ooosapa nanetzakwiyi yise ka sutakoo nemaꞌwuni. Yise ka besatoosoo nummenumme. Soo Te Naa mu sootuhikwu ka sutakoo mu nemaꞌnunise.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus Te Naa netutseana ebe toogoopatoo meapu ka teepu saaꞌa atasoo yugwekwuse. Oꞌno soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-baa petuse te sootuhikwu. Oꞌnosoo mu Te Naa yadooawabe ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu te nanamooatupu tuukwe.
Sumuꞌyoo umu-nagatu Moses mee naneadu meeoo, ‘Te Naa saaꞌa tamme-matoo yadooawabe tayadooa, te nanumu-nagatu, nu-kwaꞌnekoosoo, yadooawabe. Mu sakwa oo nakabetsea saaꞌa.
Soo tooe haga tooe gi ka Te Pabeꞌe tumayohokudu tookwa gi Te Naa doodooamu-matu.’
Noꞌoko soo Te Naa yadooawabe Te Pabeꞌe-witu te tuukwe.

Yow tamme Te Naa doodooamu Te Naa yadooawabe-kwaꞌne. Te Naa te sootuhi tamme oꞌnosoo tu tuukwe-kwaꞌne. Noꞌyoona tamme ekow sopedakwatoo. Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa ka sumuoo te nanumu-nagatu Abraham mee naneadu meeoo netamma, ‘Saaꞌa soo sumuꞌyoo u-maꞌyoo tsuaketu petukwu. Mu noꞌobatusoo nanaꞌatakoosoo numu nu sootuhikwu, ka hemma oo manese.’
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mooasoo tamme-baa petu. Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe oo yaꞌe-kwikoo oo mayoduse, tamme mooe tuukwe. Oosoo te sootuhikwu ka sutakoo po ooemota te nakwumunase.”

Ewaꞌyoo (5000) numu tunakapunnedu ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-witu nakaꞌoedyuku manepetuga. Ka Peter togesoo mu numu yadooewunu, mu numu nananesootuhidu Sadducee mee nananeadu-nagatu, mu Jew tukwutumadu-no oe petuhooga. Mu Sadducee ka gi numu namayoda-kwi tunakaꞌoedyukute. Umu ka Peter sutakute ka meeoo numu oo tunedyooe soo Te Pabeꞌe ka yaꞌese namayoda. Mu Jew natukwutumawabe ka Peter noko John tukwutuma nobe-kwi wudumedow, ka mooasoo o togano-gaꞌa, nagutza saaꞌasoo ooka tu nehane-kwi.
Oogow moooꞌa mu Jew tutunehanedu Jerusalem-wiꞌyoona tunehane.
Mu numu moohedu mee nananeꞌa Annas, Caiaphas, John, Alexander, ewow tu nananumu-no oe.

Mu tutunehanedu yise mu tukwutumadu meeoo netamma, “Ka Peter noko John ne kobenatoo bitooa,” meeꞌe. Ka mu nabi petuhoose, mu tutunehanedu mu mooe ohobu tubengakooha. “Haga pooha-ma mu ka gi nummedu mabesakupu? Haga ooka mu mabesaku tuungu?”
Soo Peter ka Te Naa Besow Pooha-toohakwi mu Jew tutunehanedu nanekwegea, “Haꞌoo mu ka besa ne manakwe sapa mu gi besa mee netamma? ‘Haga pooha-ma mu ka nana besa mayugwe?’ mee umu.

Numme noꞌoko mu Jew numu noko mu tuukwekwu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe pooha besa oo mayugwe. Tooe mu ka Te Pabeꞌe batsa tuunguse sapa, soo Te Naa Pooha yise oo yaꞌe-kwikoo oo miyoda. Ookowsoo pooha-ma soo nana namagwetzoi.

Ka te mooa nayadooawabe tubo-kwaꞌnesoo manekena meeꞌe, ‘Soo mumme nanesootuhi moohedu ka pumme tu tupe-makana wuni, soo Te Naa meeoo ka puma tu nobe-tookwuna netamma, “Mow soo tupe tubetsetu.” ’ Soo Te Pabeꞌe ookow tupe-kwaꞌneꞌyoo.
Te Pabeꞌe Jesus suuꞌmu te magwetzoikwudu. Gadooꞌoo haga oogow-kumisoo te magwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo.”

Mu tutunehanedu mu sopedakwatoo ka mu Peter noko John gi natunedyooepu yise mu tumadugu-kwitu sopedakwatoo ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-witu gi nasookwina mu waha. Mu Jew numu moohedu mu nesookwugaꞌe. Mu Jew tutunehanedu mu sopedakwatoo ka Te Pabeꞌe mu naka nagemoꞌo.
Soo nana namagwetzoipu ooka Peter noko John-kumabasoo wunu, gi hownnekoo umuoo yise haꞌyoo mu netamma-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Mu tutunehanedu mu Peter noko John puuwanatoo tayahoo.

“Haꞌoo sakwa tamme mu naana sootunaga?” mee yise unnemoꞌo. Yise meeoo, “Noꞌyoona mu numu Jerusalem-witu mee unakwe, ‘Masoo nana Te Naa pooha-ma besa manepu-gaꞌyoo!’ Gi hownnekoo tamme oo nesootuꞌadyae-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Tamme sakwa mu naana neta, umu sakwa gi ka Te Pabeꞌe pooha-witu ka mu numu tuukwepana.”
Mu Peter noko John oetusoo bise yise meeoo mu netamma, “Gi mu numu tuukwepana ka Mu Pabeꞌe pooha-witu.”
Soo Peter yise meeoo mu tutunehanedu netamma, “Mu oo sopedakwatoo ka besa oo manepunnena, numme haaꞌa ka Te Naa nakabetseakwu pute mumme? Numme ka Te Naa nakabetseakwu gi mumme.
Numme gi hownnekoo ka mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu tuukwemakwu-waꞌneꞌyoo.”

Mu tutunehanedu tooe how tooe mu yugwekwu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu gi mu wahamakwu. Umu yise mu sukwe tzamaꞌwu ka gi hekwi sapa meeoo mu netammana. Mu tutunehanedu mu numu-ma suaꞌe ka Te Naa-matoo mu nanetzakwiyaꞌe ka hemma manekwi.
Soo Te Naa magwetzoipu nana mooasoo watsu mano tomopu (40).
Mu Peter-no John yise pumme tu tzamaꞌwuse, tu pupuaꞌamu-matoosoo kodyuka. Mu Peter-no John yise mu tunehanedu unnena mu tuukweꞌe.
Umu yise noꞌyoona oo nakase, nanesootuhaꞌe, Te Naa-matoo mee unnemoꞌo, “Te Naa numu manumudoopu. U noꞌokosoo hemma madidu. U noꞌokosoo hemma ne nemadunagapunnedu.

U, Ne Naa, ume pooha ka oꞌnosoo ne nanumu David mee naneadu ka ume nakaꞌoedyukudu tubo tuungupu u-kwitu. ‘Mu wakwawaꞌa unu sutakugonnona ka Te Naa unu netumooꞌoona oo-no nagoe sokwama pana gi how mane-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Ewaꞌyoo nanakummaꞌyoosoo numu moohedu nana-no tooe how tooe ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus Te Naa tuutzeana mooe yugwekwu,’ meeꞌe

Menoꞌo tamme ekow poonne mesoo David yadooapu ka Herod-noko Pontius Pilate mu tukwutumadu-no mu te nanumu Jew-no tuwazoo apegea ka Te Pabeꞌe batsakwu mee unnena oosoo ume nakabetsea. U, Ne Naa, tunetutzeana, Te Pabeꞌe meeꞌe u.
Ume tunetammana yoo saaꞌa manedooa.
U, Ne Naa, oo soomaꞌyu mu tunehanedu naana ka Peter noko John manayahakwu mee. Gi mu tutunehanedu naana-ma ne suikwununumme u natuungu, noꞌoko numu u-witu numme mesoo tuukwedooa.
U pooha-gana mu numu numme tzapoonnekukwu. U, Ne Naa, mu tuoegoedu besa manekwuna, ne tzapoonekwuna u pooha-gaꞌyoo.”

Ka nanesootuhimakwuse soo mu nobe wudyutsungawunu. Oosoo Te Naa Besaa Pooha oo wudyutzengewunu. Oosoo Te Naa Besa Poohasoo umu wumana, umu gi suaꞌena ka Te Naa unnena wahagonno. Umu yise ka Te Naa unnena mana kwayaꞌa-kwidooe wahammoꞌo.
Oꞌno yise noꞌyoona mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu besa nana-matoo sokwama. Noꞌokosoo hemma nanatummatzaꞌe, gi hemma nananetumooꞌe.
Mu tuukwewabe meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu waha, “Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka namayodase tusootabuese, yise ka Te Naa pooha mu numu tzapoonnekute.” Soo Te Naa ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu sootuhi.

Noꞌokosoo hemma mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu hee-gaꞌyoo ka Te Pabeꞌe tubewabe noko nobe-ma mu tumukukwu ka oo mu soomanakwe. Mu Te Pabeꞌe tuukwewabe tumasumudoona mu numu yise gi hee-gakoo ka hemma mu sookwina oo-matoo mu hanekute.
Sumuꞌyoo nana Joseph mu Te Pabeꞌe tuukwewabe Barnabas
ka tubewa-ma tumuse, noꞌoko pumme tu tumanagakuna ka Te Pabeꞌe tuukwewabe heme.
Pana soo nana Ananias mee naneadu, ka tu nodukwa Sapphira mee naneadu-no tu hemma-ma tumukwatekwu.
Ka tu nodukwa-no oo nanenagana naamookwitoo mu hemekwu mee tunetamma. Ka oona mu tuukwewabe nobe-kwi petugase, a naamookwitusoo mu hemese, mee mu netamma, “Noꞌoko nu mu hemekoo.”

Soo Peter yise meeoo oo netamma, “How u yise manena u ka sutakoo nakabetsea? U yise ka Te Naa Besa Pooha nemooagana oo-matu manumaku ka tubewa-koobatoo, ne esayaekute, ‘Noꞌoko numme mu hemekoo,’ mee ne tuukwena.
Mummetu uga soo tubewabe ka gisoo oo-ma u tumuꞌu. Ka tubewabe-ma mu tumuse, soo mu natumunagakuna mummetu mani. Haoo u manena suda manakwe?

U Te Naa nemooaga, gi ka mu nanana suuꞌmu.” Ka meeoo naꞌunnedu soo Ananias nakase, yaꞌehoose, aanooaka. Mu tootooebetse yise oo maputooehoose, oo hanegase, oo tugutooa. Noꞌyoona umu oo nakadu unu suaꞌe.
Ka saaꞌa manekese soo Ananias nodukwa Sapphira oe petuoo. Gisoo tu kooma yaꞌe-kwitu naka.
Soo Peter yise meeoo oo tubenga, “Mow haaꞌa yise noꞌyoona mu natumanakakuna ka tubewabe-kwitu mu nahemmana?” “Aha, yow sapa ne hemmana,” meeꞌe soo Sapphira esiyihoo.

Soo Peter yise meeoo oo netamma, “How manena mu ka Te Naa Besa Pooha soomapoonnetu-kwaꞌne manakwe, ka Te Naa gi how mumme oo yukwe sapa?” Soo Peter yise meeoo, “Umu u kooma tugumodu mi pudu tzoonooagena, umu tuwazoo ume ooosoo yugwekwu.”
Oꞌno yise Sapphira yaꞌehoo, ka Peter-kumabatoo aanooaka. Mu tootooebetse oe tzoonooa petudu mooasoo oo yaꞌepu oo mayuoo petu. Umu yise oo tzakwuhukase, oona oo kooma-kumabasoo oo tugu.
Noꞌyoona mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ekow nakase, umu unu nakasui.
Ka ewow tu nanumu poonnena mu Te Pabeꞌe tuukwewabe ewow numu mabesakute. Mu numu nanatabooegea besa nanano nanesootuhina, oona ka Solomon mee naneadu haba-wi ka Jew nanesootuhi nobe-kumaba.
Ewaꞌyoo mu numu yise Te Pabeꞌe unnena nakaꞌoedyuku petuga. Gi haga oo sukwe manakwe, umu tubetse manedu. Mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu meeoo nananetamma, “Umu besa ka Te Naa oo nakaꞌoedyukuna.”
Oona puuwana po-kumaba mu numu tu pupuaꞌamu tuoegoedu tzapokwakute, wegea-kooba tuwow. Ka Peter o-toogoo mea, sumuna o habagana wumase, sumuna besa manekwu mee sokwamana.
Ewaꞌyoo numu petudyakwe Jerusalem-kumaba nonobe-gaꞌyoo tuutooe ka mu Te Pabeꞌe tuukwewabe besa tuukwena nakana. Umu mu pupuaꞌamu tuoegoedu yise namagwetzoi.
Soo mu Jew pabeꞌe ka tu pupuaꞌamu-no unu ka Peter noko John nuusookwedakute.
Umuoo ka mu Peter noko John pabenase umu nuudumedahoo.
Oꞌno togano soo Te Naa tummatziwabe toha kasa-gaꞌyoo ka Peter noko John-baa wue petuse ka tukwutuma nobe natzakwonaꞌa tzakwonow. Mu Peter noko John oekoo bihookase, meeoo mu netamma,
“Ka nanesootuhi nobe-kumabatoo memeahoo. Mu sakwa ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus mumme magwetzoidyi-kwitu mu numu tuukwekwu.”

Tu tabuagena, oona nanesootuhi nobe-kobena pepetugase, mu numu tunedyooꞌe. Mu nanesootuhi pabeꞌe ka tu pupuaꞌamu-no sumuhoo petuga, mu Jew tutunehanedu-no yise tunehane. Mu tutukwutumadu taya oona tukwutuma nobe-kwitoo mu Peter noko John mu bi tuunguna.
Ka mu tutukwutumadu oona tukwutuma nobe-kwi petugase, mu Peter-no John kadoo oetu. Punowsoo mease, ka mu tutunehanedu meeoo tuukwe,
“Numme ka tukwutuma nobe natzepunnoe oo mayu ka tukwutumadu tooesoo tuꞌeyaꞌekatu, pana mu Peter-no John kadoo oetu.”
Soo mu Jew pabeꞌe-no soo nanesootuhi nobe-kooba tukwutumadu naa mu naka, howga mu Peter noko John mani howgena hee manekwu ka yoo hemma manise?
Sumuꞌyoo yise petuoose, mu tunehane-kwiꞌyoona meeoo unakwe, “Yow menoꞌo mu Peter-no John mu tukwutumana ka nanesootuhi nobe-kobenaꞌyoona mu numu tunedyooe.”
Mu tukwutumadu naa mu susumudu tukwutumadu-no meaꞌase, mu Peter noko John bihoodooa. Mu tukwutumadu gi mu tubetse manoyukwe mu numu-ma suꞌina, mu numu sumuna tupe-ma mu tapagetana mu tagoehoodooa.
Mu numu pabeꞌe meeoo ka mu Peter noko John netamma,
“Numme mooasoo meeoo mu netammapu, ‘Gi ka Jesus-witu numu tunedyooepana.’ Pana mu noꞌoko numu Jerusalem-witu ekow tunedyooe. Mu yise ka Jesus nabatsa-kwi numme oe neyugwe.”
Soo Peter yise ka umu susumudu Te Pabeꞌe tuukwewabe-no ka mu numu tutunehanedu meeoo netamma, “Tamme sakwa Te Naa unnena mayoho gi mumme sukwe unnena.

Te nanamooatupu pumatoo nanetzakwiyina soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-matoo tayapu. Mu ka sunngabe namadabue-ma oo tzakwenese, oo batsapu. Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus yaꞌe-kwikoo mayoduse numu oo moohe tuungupu. Ka mu numu suda tumadugupu mu nemawuni tuunguna, oꞌno yise soo Te Naa ka suda mu tumudugupu soomuꞌwu. Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe numu oo magwetzoi tuungu.
Numme ooosapa mu numu tuukwenoꞌo soo Te Naa yise ka tu Besa Pooha-ma mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu sootuhi. Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha ka mu numu tzapoonnekute Te Pabeꞌe pooha-gaꞌyoo.”
Mu tutunehanedu nakasutaꞌa, ka mu Te Pabeꞌe tuukwewabe batsakwu ka mee mu tunetamma.

Soo nana Gamaliel mee naneadu ka nananesootuhidu Pharisee mee nananeadu-matu yotsehoo. Esoo nana numu nanesootuhi tunedyooedu, yise noꞌyoona numu oo togeꞌyookute ka besa-tamme. Soo Gamaliel ka mu tutukwutumadu ka mu Te Pabeꞌe tuukwewabe oetu tzadyuba tuunguse.
Oꞌno yise ka mu tutunehanedu meeoo netamma, “E nanumu, ka mu naana-witu mu tunemadabuepu-witu soohane.
Ewa natomose soo nana Theudas mee naneadu meeꞌe unakwe, ‘Nu tubetse naduyadu.’ Yise ewaꞌyoo (400) nanana oo nagemoꞌo. Ka saaꞌa oo nabatsase, umu oo nagemodu nanapokise.
Ka saaꞌa ka mu numu nadatsuꞌnga, soo nana Judas mee naneadu oona Galilee tubewabe-witu kemmana mu numu, ‘E nage’ mee mu netamma. Oosoo punnoꞌo nabatsase, umu oo nagemodu nanapokise.
Mu sakwa yise menoꞌo umuoo naana gi matzamapana. Mu tzamaꞌwu. Ka sukwe numu unnena suuꞌmu oosoo gi hee.
Soo Te Naa ka mu tummatzina mu gi hownnekoo how mu yugwe-waꞌne mu ka Te Naa tumooꞌoogana.”

Oo unne-kwaꞌnesoo umu manakwe ka mu Peter noko John oetu bise, ka tukwutumadu umu wupageta tuungu. Umu tutunehanedu meeoo yise mu Peter noko John netamma, “Gi Jesus-witu mu numu tuukwepana.” Mu yise natzamaꞌwu.
Mu Peter-no John yise mu tunehanedu-baaꞌyoona nemeahoo. Besa sokwamana, “Ta tookwa besaꞌyoo, oꞌno ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-koobatoo nuupageta,” mee yise unnemo.
Ka nanesootuhi nobe-kobena nonoꞌotsa sumuyakwe oona numu nobe-kwi tuwazoo. Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-witu numu tunedyooena, yise noꞌoko numu ka Jesus Te Pabeꞌe-witu tuukwe.

Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ewa manena, yise nananesootzema. Mu Greek-ma apegeadu numu meeoo, “Mu Hebrew-ma apegeadu tutuha manedu pepeawabe ewow tukapu hanekute, pana mu numme-batu Greek pepeawabe gi namaka.”
Mu Te Pabeꞌe tuukwewabe noꞌoko tunakaꞌoedyukudu nesumudoose mee mu tuukwe, “Numme sakwa ka Te Naa unnepu-witu mu tuukwe. Gi numme yise ooosapa ka mu pepeawabemaka.”
Natakwasukwuoo (7) naana sakwa netuutsease, umu sakwa mu pepeawabe ooosapa makayi. Umuoo nanana sakwa besaꞌyoona, Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi unu sokwamana, tunakabetseana.
Oꞌno sakwa numme ooosapa mesoo nanesootuhina ka Te Naa unnepu numu tuukwe.

Noꞌyoona mu numu yise oo nepesaꞌyookute. Mu natakwatsukwuꞌyoo (7) nanana yise nanetutzea. Mee nananeadu: Stephen, Philip, Prochorus, Nicanor, Timon, Parmenas, Nicolaus. Soo Nicolaus yise wawaꞌa mu Jew numu-waꞌnekoo nanesootuhidu, ka oona Antioch mee naneadu-kwitu kemmana.
Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka natakwatsukwuoo (7) nanana ka tuukwewabe-baa nabi petu. Soo mu tuukwewabe ka mu natakwatsukwuoo (7) nanana nanesootuhikuse, umu-kooba matugu.
Ewaꞌyoo mu numu ka Te Naa unnepu nanatukwena mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu yise ewa mani petu ka Jerusalem-wi. Ewaꞌyoo mu Jew numu nananesootuhiwabe punnoꞌo ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna.
Soo Stephen ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi unu tunakaꞌoedyukute. Soo Stephen numu magwetzoi besa numu yugweyakwe tu pooha-toohakwi.
Ewaꞌyoo mu Jew Greek-ma apegeadu ka Stephen-no nanepetukute.
Soo Stephen unu pooha-gana unu soonammena umu yise gi togebesa howꞌyoo unne-waꞌneꞌyoo.

Ewow yise mu nanana meeoo netamma umu yise oetoo esayina suda oo netamma, “Numme ka Stephen nakana te nanamooatupu tumayohope Moses unnepu gi numu mayoho tuungu. Soo Moses ka te nanamooatupu tumayohona te tunedyooe yise ka Te Naa tunetammana,” mee mu tunehanedu netamma.
Ooonneꞌyoona mu numu ka umu pumme moohedu-no gi mu nepetzape. Ka Stephen numu-kobenatoo tzaka oo nehanekwuse.
Mu oetu esayidu meeoo mu netamma, “Esoo nana ka te nanesootuhina tooꞌe netakonedu, ka Te Naa nobe-kwi yise ka te nanamooatupu tumayohope ka Moses tamme tunedyooepu o gi te tumayoho tuungu.
Numme yise oo unnena naka ka oosoo nana Jesus
Ewaꞌyoo mu numu ka tunehanekwiꞌyoona ka Stephen poonne oo koba atasoo tubuabodote ka unu pooha-ga-kwaꞌne oo tapuꞌa.
Soo nanesootuhi pabeꞌe yise meeoo oo tubenga, “Mu numu haaꞌa togesapa u-kwitu waha?”

Soo Stephen oo nanekwegease noꞌoko mu numu meeoo netamma, “E nanumu, e nakapunne. Yaa nanesootuhi nobe-kwiꞌyoona suuꞌmu numu nanesootuhaꞌe mee mu unnepana soo Te Naa namooatupu Abraham puu oona kwingaꞌa mu wakwawaꞌa tubewa-wi oo manepunne sapa Te Naa-matoo mesoo nanesootuhi, ka Mesopotamia mee naneadu-kwiꞌyoona. Oꞌnosoo Te Naa ka Abraham natzapoonnekuse,
meeoo oo netamma, ‘U sakwa u nobe noꞌoko u nanumu maꞌwukase, kummaꞌakoosoo teepu-kooba mea. Nu u pukwiꞌyookwunu u tzapoonnekukwu.’

Abraham yise oo tumayohoku. Ka tu naa-no mea ka teepu Chaldea mee naneadu-kwiꞌyoona mease yise Haran mee naneadu-kwi petuga. Oonaꞌyoona soo Abraham naa yaꞌe. Soo Te Naa yise ka Abraham ekow teepu, eka tamme menoꞌo pukwiꞌyoo-koobatoo oo taya.
Gisoo soo Te Naa oo teepu maka Abraham yise punnoꞌo gisoo dooamu-gaꞌyoo. Gisoo soo Te Naa ka teepu-matu oo nemawunikute.”
Soo Te Naa meeoo tuwazoo oo netamma, “Umu mu doodooamu saaꞌa wakwawaꞌa-naga nobe-gadooa. Mu wakwawaꞌa suda mu matugukwu, unu mu nedyaꞌwena ewasoo tomoba-witoo (400) ꞌyoo yise namanekwu.
Oꞌno saaꞌa yise mu wakwawaꞌa tumaꞌemukwana umu-matoosoo kodyudooa. Oꞌno mu u-maꞌyoona tseagekwudu saaꞌa yaa nu-baasoo nanesootuhi petudooa.”

Soo Te Naa mu tumayoho tuungu, “Mu sakwa mu naatse doodooamu kootze naꞌoonnakwitu tsekeaꞌa. Oꞌno umu Te Naa dooamuna nasopedakwatookwu.” Abraham nodukwa naatse dooaꞌadoo, Isaac mee yise naneahoo. Sumu nasatese soo Abraham yise ka tu tooa tookoo tsekeaꞌa. Ka saaꞌa yise soo Isaac ka tu tooa Jacob ooosoo yugwe. Soo Jacob yise punnoꞌo umu tu sumumano wahamatsebooeku (12) tu nanaꞌatse ooosoo yugwe.

Soo Te Naa unnena togesapa manepu, mu Jacob doodooamu yise ka tu wanngaꞌa Joseph mee naneadu unu nuusoogweda. Ooonneꞌyoona umu yise Joseph gi petzape. Umu oo papabeꞌe ka Joseph-ma tumu. Mu wakwawaꞌa ka Joseph tumuse ka Egypt-witoo oo bika. Ka oonow petugase, umu oo-ma tumu. Soo Te Naa ka Joseph sootuhi.

Tooe how suda ka Joseph namatugu sapa Te Naa oo magwetzoi. Soo Egypt-witu numu moohetu Pharaoh mee naneadu ka Joseph sopedakwadoose, besa tusoohanedu mee oo soopedyana ka Joseph noꞌoko mu numu Egypt-witu moohe tuungu, pumme tummatzidu tuwazoo moohedu.
Ka saaꞌa ka Egypt teepu nanaꞌena-kwitu gi bowꞌmana unu pasana gi hee naꞌa. Mu tubewa-gaꞌyoo unu suda manepunne. Mu te nanamooatupu gi nadukadu mayu.
“Ewaꞌyoo tukapu ka Egypt-wi,” mee soo Jacob tunaka. Mu tu doodooamu taya tukapu mu tumu tuunguna.
Ka penakwa tu doodooamu tukapu tumu tuunguse, Joseph tu pabeꞌemu tuukweꞌe, ‘Nu tubetse Joseph,’ mee yise ka Pharaoh-matoo mu bika.
Soo Joseph yise tu pabeꞌemu noꞌoko tu nanumu mu bi tuungu. Noꞌyoona (75) mu Joseph nanumu Egypt-wi petuga. Umu ka saaꞌa osoo tuꞌise punowsoo nahanekese, yow te teepu-wisoo natuoona.
Ka Abraham oꞌnosoo mu Hamor numu-makoo mu tubewa tumu-kwi umu natuoona ona Shechem mee naneadu-kumaba.
Mu numu ewasoo manemena. Soo Te Naa ka Abraham oo tuukwena pudusoo oo-toogoo namanekoo.
Kummaꞌyoosoo nana mu numu-kooba katudu manekwu, gi uga ka Joseph heesoobedyadu.
Oosoo nana mu te nanamooatupu tumooꞌookese suda mu yugwe. Mu numu tu oongaꞌa puuwana maꞌwu tuungu. Umu yise tuaꞌe.
Oꞌno soo Moses mee naneadu nadooaꞌadoo. Besa tabuadu oongaꞌa. Pahe (3) muha umu nobe-kwisoo oo tzakwatse,
oꞌno yise puuwana ka oongaꞌa maꞌwu. Soo mu numu-kooba katudu padu oo mayuse, yise oo tooaga.
Ka saaꞌa yise oosoo Moses noꞌoko mu Egypt numu manena natunedyooe. Besa hemma how yugwedu. Besa unnedu.
Soo Moses ka nana manese yise pummesoo nanumu-baa nobenega.
Ka o petugase, sumuꞌyoo Egypt nana ka Jew nana unutse mooedyugwe.
Soo Moses ka Egypt nana tutzagow ka tu nanumu-koobatoo.

Soo Moses yise meeoo soonamme, ‘Umu e nanumu ka natzamaꞌwukwuse oo sopedakwadookwu ka Te Naa nuka pooha-makase.’ Pana umu gi oo sooꞌoedyukute ka ooka mooꞌa oo petugase, wahaꞌyoo Jew nanana nanagoehoo. Mu tooꞌe tzadyooikuse, meeoo mu netamma, ‘Mu e nananumu gi muusoo nanagoepana.’
Soo nana unu tu puaꞌa koosekeowdu ka Moses tomatzakowse, meeoo oo netamma, ‘Numu u nemadunagadu mee u naneyugwe.
Hownneꞌyoo u? Etzeꞌe u sumuoo nana patsow. Menoꞌo haaꞌa yise u nuka batsakwu?’
Soo Moses oo nakase, soogweda meeow wakwawaꞌa teepu Midean mee naneadu-koobatoo. Oonow petugase oonatusoo nodukwadoose, waahoo nanaꞌatse dooamudoo.
Waꞌetse manekese soo Moses oona giba Sinai mee naneadu-kumabaꞌyoona, oonatu nipunne oo poonnese oetoo meahoo heega mee soonammena. Ka goso-baa oo petugase, Te Naa goso-wiꞌyoona oo yatooe.
‘Nu yow, mu tubetse manumudoopu. Nu-matoo mu nanumu, mu nanamooatupuna Abraham, Isaac-no Jacob nanesootuhiyakwe.’ Soo Moses oetu tu poonnekwu-ma suise, kwepegawunu.
Soo Te Naa meeoo oo netamma, ‘U moko tzakwumedow u pooha teepu-kooba ꞌwunu.
Mu Egypt numu e dooamu suda matugu nu mu poonne. Mu e dooamu nanepagamoꞌo. Nu mu magwetzoidooa. Nu ume Egypt-witoo tayakwu. Umu saaꞌa mu tzamaꞌwudooa.’

Mooasoo soo Moses te nanamooatupu tumoodyina. Mooasoo umu meeoo oo netamma, ‘Numu u nemadunaga, meeꞌe u naneꞌyugwe. Hownneꞌyoo u?’ Ekow Moses Te Naa umu-matoo tayakwu. Oosoo mu nemadunagana mu moohedooa ka nidu-kwitu pumme tu pooha-makapu-ma. Oosoo nanasookwugi hemma mu tzapoonnekute ka Egypt-wiꞌyoona. Yise oona Atsa Baa mee naneadu-kumabaꞌyoona tuwazoo oosoo watsumano (40) tomoka tu nanumu moohenoꞌo ka oona gi etzaka tukapu namasua-kwi.
Oosoo tu nanumu Te Pabeꞌe-witu tuukwe, “Sumuꞌyoo te nanumu-matoo petukwu. Nu ka Te Naa tuukwewabe-matu, oosoo punnoꞌo ooonneꞌyookwusoo,” mee soo Moses tu nanumu netamma.

Soo Moses tu nanumu-no petu ka giba-kumaba. Oo nobetu-ga ka giba-kumaba, soo Te Naa tummatziwabe soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo saaꞌa oo yadooedooa ka giba-koobaꞌyoona. Soo Moses saaꞌa ka giba-maꞌyoona wuekese tu nanumu Te Naa pooha unnena tuukwedooa.
Mu te nanumu gi oo nakabetseꞌa umu ka Egypt numu tumayohonasoo petzabena.

Ka Moses ka giba-matoo kodyukasesoo, umu ka oo pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “Numme gi ka Moses unnena mayoho-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Moses ka Egypt-nakwana ne bi petu. Pana menoꞌo hanoga mea. U sakwa pummatoo te nanesootuhikwuna matabuega.”
Umu yise kootsoo tooaꞌa-waꞌne tumadabuese, oo-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe. Ewa nanuka ka oo mu tumadabue-matoo. Umu gi Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe.

Soo Te Naa yise meeoo mu netamma, ‘Muusoo tooꞌe, ka taba noko paatoosooba-matoo mu nanesootuhi.’ Soo Te Naa tuukwewabe mee umu-witu tubotugu. ‘Soo Te Naa mu Jew numu meeoo netamma, “Ewa (40) tomoka mu ka mana gi hemma naa-kwiꞌyoona, gi nu-matoo nanesootuhina. Mu nu-matoo nanesootuhi mee naneyugwe pana mu nanesootuhi nobe tsekatukuse ka taba-matoo nanesootuhi.
Paatoosooba-matoo tuwazoo. Ooonneꞌyoona nu mu wakwawaꞌa numu oona kwingaꞌa Babylon mee naneadu teepu-koobatoo numu-matoo mu tzamaꞌwukwu.” ’
Soo Te Naa yise ka Moses nanesootuhi nobe-too tuungu tooe hemma tooe puhu-makoo. Soo Moses yise oo tumayohoku ooka tu poonne tabua-kwaꞌne. Ka tooe hano tooe mu numu momona ka nobe tzanomoꞌo.

Ka Moses kadooꞌoo manese, sumuꞌyoo nana Joshua mee naneadu ka Moses kapi manekwu. Mu numu ekow teepu-koobatoo ka nobe hanekekoo. Ka mu numu yow petuse, ewaꞌyoo wakwawaꞌa mooasoo yow nonobe-gaꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa mu wakwawaꞌa kadoo mayugwese umu yise otuoo mu teepu-wi nobe-dookwu. Oꞌno yise soo nanesootuhi nobe ooosapa ka yow teepu-koobaꞌyookwu. Saaꞌa soo David nadooaꞌadoose, nana manepetuga.
Soo Te Naa oo sootuhipu. ‘Oꞌno sakwa nu Te Naa tupe nobe-dookuse,’ mee soo David tusooyugwe.
Gi ooosapa oo tumadabue. Oo tooa Solomon mee naneadu oo nanesootuhi nobe-dooku.
Soo Tamme Manumudoopu gi numu tumadabuena nobe soogwaꞌe. Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa yadooawabe meeoo tubotugu,
‘Soo Te Naa mee unakwe, “Nu paꞌa mu-kooba katu, pana ka e kuku-ma ka teepu mesoo tamma. Nu noꞌokosoo hemma matabuepu. Mu gi toge nuga pukwiꞌyoo-waꞌnekoo nobe matabue-waꞌneꞌyoo.” ’ “
Soo Stephen mee tuwazoo unakwe, “Mu yaatoo gi tunakaꞌoedyukuna gi tumayohodu. Mu nonoꞌotsa Te Naa Besa Pooha netumooꞌoo.
Mu nanamooatupu ka Te Naa gi petzabedu. Mu yise punnoꞌo ooosoo manakwe. Mu nanamooatupu ka Te Naa tuukwewabe noꞌoko suda matugupu-gaꞌyoo. Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe petukwuna wahadu yise nagoe.
Te Naa tu tummatziwabe, ka toha kasa-gakoo mu-matoo taya tu unnena mu mayoho tuunguna, pana mu gi oo tumayohokute ka Te Pabeꞌe batsase.”
Mu numu oo nakasutakute ka Stephen unnena gi nakabetsabena.
Te Naa Besa Pooha tuusoobedyana, toogoopatu poonnese, ka Te Naa poonne. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa-kumaba ꞌwunu.
Soo Stephen yise mu numu meeoo tuukwe, “Nu ka toogoopatu Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa-kumaba ꞌwunu oo pooha poonne.”
Noꞌyoona mu numu tu naka-wi matugumo ka gi oo unnena soonakana, oo nesagwikuna.

Ka Jerusalem-wikoo oo tzadoodooekase oonow petugase, mu oe oo neyugwedu tu wunagapu tzakwumetase, ka sumuoo nana, Saul mee naneadu-kobena mu tuoona petuga. Umu yise tupe-ma ka Stephen tatapageta. Umu oo batsa soogwina.
Gisoo pummetu batsa soo Stephen mee nanesootuhi, “Ne Pabeꞌe Jesus, besa-kwitoo ka e moogooa hanega.”
Measedose tuwazoo pabatseꞌe nanesootuhi, “Ka suda mu tumadugu-kwitu gi mu sootuꞌadyipana.” Oobenakwatoo soo Stephen yaꞌehoo gi oo unnena soonakana, oo nesagwaꞌekuna.

Mu nanana Te Naa-tamme nanesootuhidu ka Stephen nabatsana tzakwuhooka. Unu oo yagakuse oo tugu. Ewaꞌyoo numu ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu unu toomooꞌoo. Soo Saul besa soonamme ka oo nabatsase yise oona nonobe-too Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu wate mu manoyugwena mu tsapewoꞌya ka mu wutumetakwuse. Ewow nanana wutumeta momokoꞌne nokosoo. Soo Saul yise mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka Jerusalem mee naneadu-witoo wateka mu goekwuse. Mu Te Pabeꞌe tuukwewabe suuꞌmu oesoo nabenihoo. Mu ewaꞌyoo tunakaꞌoedyukudu nanaꞌemota petukwuhoo. Ka Jerusalem-wiꞌyoona, ka Judea noko Samaria mee nananeadu-koobaꞌyoo meaꞌa. Mu numu ka oonow meana soo Jesus Te Pabeꞌe mee mu tuukwemena.
Soo Stephen puaꞌa, Philip mee naneadu oona Samaria mee naneadu teepu-wi petuga. Onow petugase ka mu oeteoo numu Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-witu tuukweꞌe.

Ewow numu besa ꞌmayugwe. Ewaꞌyoo tsoapagoedu ka mu tsoapa umu-makoo tayakwunina. Umu tsoapa yise waꞌageyina meahooyakwe mu tsoapagoedu yise besa ꞌmaneyakwe. Soo Philip yise mu numu ka Jesus-witu mu tuukwena, mu yise ka oo poonnena yise ka Philip besa nakabetseꞌa.
Mu numu yise besa sokwama.
Oona Samaria-wi sumuꞌyoo tupoohadu nana nobe-gaꞌyoo, Simon mee naneadu. “Nu besow pooha-gaꞌyoo,” mee mu nemooagana.
Mu numu yise oo nakaꞌoedyukuna yise meeoo unakwe, “Oosoo tookwa Te Naa God.” Wunaꞌme yise ꞌmanepetuga ka tu pooha-ma numahanena.
Menoꞌo soo Philip ka Te Naa ꞌmanepunne-kwitu mu numu tuukweꞌe soo Jesus yise togesapa Te Pabeꞌe. Mu nanana-no momokoꞌne ka oo nakaꞌoedyukuna, baa-wi namatzaka.
Soo Simon punnoꞌo numu-no baa-wi namatzaka. Oosoo ka Philip nagennumme. Ka Philip pooha manakwe oo poonnena ka oo poohagana, Simon yise oo nasoodyagena.
Te Pabeꞌe tuukwewabe oo nakase, ka mu Samaria-witu numu Te Naa unnepu nakaꞌoedyukuna, mu waahoo nanana Jerusalem-witu, Peter noko John umu-matoo taya.
Samaria-wi petuga, mooasoo ewaꞌyoo Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu baa-wi namatzakapu. Gisoo ka Te Naa Besa Pooha wumadu.
Mu Peter-no John mu nanesootuhikuna umu-ma matuguna, umu yise ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-matu-ma nasootuhi.
Simon punnoꞌo o, oosoo ka mu tuukwewabe poonne umu ka mu nananesootuhidu-ma tubetse matuguyina, Simon yise meeoo mu netamma,
“Yaaꞌa, nu sakwa ka poohabe-matu tumu. Nu punnoꞌo mu-kwaꞌneꞌyookwu. Nu punnoꞌo umu-ma matuguyina, umu ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-matu-ma nasootuhidooa.”
Soo Peter meeoo oo netamma, “Soo Sutaꞌyoo noko kadooꞌoo u mayugwekwu. U ka Te Naa tamme sootuhipu tooꞌe netumuna.
U tookwa gi numme-matu soo Te Naa u sopedakwatoo. U sutaꞌyoo ka meeoo tusooyugwena.
Nu u sopedakwatoo u ooosapa sutaꞌyoo. Soo hee ooosapa u-tamme gi togeꞌyookwu. Suda u tusooyugwena oo soomuꞌwuse, ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhi. Soo Te Naa ka suda u tusooyugwena gi sootuꞌadyidooa.”
Simon yise ka Peter meeoo netamma, “Ka Te Naa-matoo nuka nanesootuhiku. Oꞌno saaꞌa soo hee nuka u tuukwepu gi oo-toogoo manedooa.”
Umu Peter-no John yise ka Te Naa unnena wahase, oona punowsoo kodyuka Jerusalem-witoo. Ka kodyuna, ka teepu mu Samaria-witu numu ka Te Naa unnena tuukwemena.

Soo sumuꞌyoo Te Naa tummatzidu toha kasa-gaꞌyoo ka Philip-baa petugase, meeoo oo netamma, “U sakwa mease, gi ka po kaaheno habedu-too meapana, ka taba meana-kwi sakwa u ka Jerusalem-wiꞌyoona, mea ka Gaza mee naneadu-kwi u petugakwu.”

Sumuꞌyoo nana wuguna-wi meꞌa. Mooasoo Jerusalem-wi nanesootuhitooase, punowsoo pummesoo teepu-koobatoo kodyuna, Ethiopia mee naneadu-kwitoo. Soo nana mu numu tumanagana mabetseadu, ka Ethiopia numu moohedu mogoꞌne tummatzidu.
Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha ka Philip meeoo netamma, “Ka nana hatsukase, oo-nosoo meakwuni.”
Ka oo hatsukase, oo naka ka Isaiah tubo tuguna oo neꞌa. Soo Philip yise oo tubenga, “U haaꞌa oo nakasopedakwadoo maka u tuneana?”
Oo nanekwegease meeꞌe, “Gi, nu gi oo nakasopedakwatoo. Haga sakwa mitu e tuukwe? Nu-baa katuno.”
Mee yise tuneakooha, “Soo seepu puu gi tunemaꞌyu ka pummetu sebakwuse, pummetu batsakwuse tuwow. Umu-waꞌnesoo soo Te Pabeꞌe gi hayoo unakwe.
Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe-maꞌyoo nanekoena, gi besa oo matuku. Mu numu suda manakwe ka Te Pabeꞌe batsase.”
Soo nana ka Philip meeoo tubenga, “Haga-witu netamma, puusoo haaꞌa pute haka?” “Jesus-witu,” meeꞌe soo Philip oo nanekwegea, “Soo Jesus tubetse Te Pabeꞌe.”
Soo Philip yise ka tu tuneana-witu oo tuukwese yise ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu tuwazoo oo tuukweꞌe.
Ooosapa memeadape yise ka banunadu-kumaba pepetuga. Soo nana meeoo unakwe, “Yaaꞌa baa. U sakwa mi e matzaka.”
Ka waguna tutziwabe yooi tuunguse, ka baa-witoo Philip-no memea. Soo Philip yise ka baa-wi oo matzaka.
Ka baa-wiꞌyoona pakuase, soo Te Naa Besa Pooha ka Philip bihooka. Soo nana yise besa soonammena, tu nobe-kwitoo mea.
Azotus mee naneadu toogoo, soo Philip mease, yise kwenaha-tamme meadooa, Caesarea mee naneadu-wi petu. Noꞌokosoo putoogoo tu meatoo, ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu mu numu tuukwemena.
Soo Saul sutawununa yise ka umu Te Pabeꞌe Jesus nakaꞌoedyukudu goewunu. Soo Saul mu Jew numu moohedu meeoo netamma ka Jerusalem-wiꞌyoona.

Ka Damascus mee naneadu-kwitoo mu Jew numu moohedu-matoo tupo, “Nuka tummatzi,” mee mu netamma. Umu Te Pabeꞌe Jesus nakaꞌoedyukudu sakwa nakwutuma. Oꞌno saaꞌa yise mu ka Jesus nakaꞌoedyukudu Jerusalem-witoo bika.
Soo Saul tu pupuaꞌamu-no meana oona Damascus tzageꞌe manegase, hemma tukwukwutseba-waꞌnekoo poonnese yise anoaka.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Saul meeoo netamma, “U suda a masoonammekute.”
“Haga u?” mee soo Saul unne. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo, “Nu Jesus u yow ooosapa suda e masoonammennumme.
Yotsese meaꞌase ka Damascus-wi petugase u u manekwuna natuukwedooa.”
Umu oo pupuaꞌamu gi haꞌyoo unni-kwaꞌneꞌyoo ka oo naka pana gi haka poonnena.
Soo Saul yotsese, oonatu tooꞌe poonne pana gi tubootabue mani. Umu oo pupuamu oo mi-makoo oo tzakaka ka Damascus mee naneadu-kwitoo.
Pahe tabeno maneka soo Saul ka gi tubootabue manese, gi tukana gi hemma hebena.

Sumuꞌyoo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus nakaꞌoedyukudu Ananias mee naneadu Damascus-wi nobe-gaꞌyoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe, “Ananias,” mee, uni mee tuusoobedyana. “Nu u naka,” mee soo Ananias oo nanekwegea. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo, “Yotsese, meana ka Judas nobe-kwitoo ka Saul-witu tutubenga. Oona soo po kaaheno hape Judas ookow po-kumaba nobe-gaꞌyoo ka Saul
U, Ananias, ka Saul-ma matuguse oosoo besa tubootabue ꞌmanekwu, mee soo Saul tuusoobedya.”
Soo Ananias meeoo unakwe, “Ewaꞌyoo numu ka Saul-witu e tuukwe. Soo Saul gi besaꞌyoo nana. Soo Saul ka Jerusalem-witu mu ume nakaꞌoedyukudu wutumetana mu kutsedyina, mu wukoꞌe.
Soo Saul yow petu ooosoo manekwuse.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Ananias nekwegea, “Unu mease, nu oo netutzea ka Saul noꞌobatusoo numu nu-kwitu tuukwekwu, mee nu unakwe. Mu wakwawaꞌa moohedu, yise oo Jew nananumu.
Ewaꞌyoosoo mu numu ka Saul nekwutumana, oo kutsedyana ka nu-kwitu pumme ka Saul tuukweꞌe,” mee soo Ananias nose.

Soo Ananias yise ka Judas nobe-kwi petugase, ka Saul-ma matuguse, meeoo oo netamma, “E puaꞌa, soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus u-baa petudu u-nosoo nummedu u-matoo e taya. Ume oosoo magwetzoise. Yise ka besaꞌhoo tu pooha-matu-ma u sootuhi.”
Hee sapaga ka Saul pooe-kwiꞌyoona sawehoose, oosoo besa tubootabue ꞌmani. Yotsese, yise soo Ananias baa-wi oo matzaka
saaꞌa ka tukase natzooesoo ꞌmanepetuga.
Soo Saul ka mu Jew numu meeoo tuukwe soo Jesus Te Pabeꞌe meeꞌe, yise ka mu Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu-baa huu tooiyakwe ka Damascus-wi.

Ewaꞌyoo umu oo nakadu gi oo nakaꞌoedyukuna mee unakwe, “Esoo nana mu Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu goepu ka Jerusalem-wiꞌyoona. Masoo yaatuoo mu Te Pabeꞌe Jesus nakaꞌoedyukudu wutumetakwuse mu Jew numu moohedu yise Jerusalem-witoo mu bikakwu. Masoo menoꞌo meeoo te netamma oo nakaꞌoedyuku soo Jesus Te Pabeꞌe.”
Soo Saul nenaguꞌa ka Te Naa unnena Te Naa Besa pooha-toohakwi oo wahana unusoo poohatooꞌa. Ka mu Jew numu tubetse tzapoonnekute soo Jesus Te Pabeꞌe. Umu numu gi hanotosoo hayoo unne-waꞌneꞌyoo.

Ka saaꞌa mu Jew numu tunehane ka Saul patsakuse tabewano, togawano oona natzakwunaꞌa-wi oo tooꞌe potamana. Soo Saul mu naka ka pumme mu batsakwuse. Mu susumudu Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu ka pabatsekoo kawona-wikoo ka tupe nagoodeadoona ka mu numu nogaduna naꞌoonnakwidu habedu oonow tawaga-too natzakweku tugapoo-ma ka togano.
Soo Saul ka Jerusalem-wi petugase mu Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu-no tooꞌe nesumuꞌu. Umu suaꞌe ka gi tunakaꞌoedyukuna ka ookow puu Te Pabeꞌe Jesus oo nakaꞌoedyukute.

Soo Barnabas oo nakaꞌoedyukuna oo bikea oona mu tuukwewabe-matoo. Soo Barnabas mee unakwe, “Esoo nana ka oona Damascus po-wiꞌyoona ka Te Pabeꞌe poonnese oo nakabetsea. Ka Damascus-wi masoosoo mu numu-ma suina ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus pooha-toohakwi Jesus-witu mu numu tuukwe.”
Soo Saul yise Jerusalem-wi mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-no ka mu Jew numu-ma gi suina, mu nesumuse ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu mu tuukwe ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi.
Ka mu Jew numu Greek-ma yadooadu-no nanepetukute. Unu umu oo nesutakute umu ka oo batsakwu mee sokwamana.
Mu Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu o nakase oo bikea oona Caesarea mee naneadu-kwitoo oo nobe-kwitoosoo o kodyu tuunguna.

Ka Saul tunakaꞌoedyuku ꞌmanese, mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka teepu Judea, Galilee, Samaria mee nananeadu-koobatu gi how nuugwe, gi nuutumetana, gi namatzama. Umu ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-ma nasootuhise Te Naa podo mea. Ewa yise ꞌmanepetuga.
Ka saaꞌa soo Peter mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu oona kwayaꞌa-kwitu nobenedyinnumme. Oona ka Lydda mee naneadu-kwi petuga mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu nobengena.

Sumuꞌyoo nana Aeneas mee naneadu ka Lydda-wi nobe-gaꞌyoo, gi yutsungadu ooosapa habedabe namewatsu (8) tomokapu. Oo-baa soo Peter petugase meeoo oo netamma, “Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus u mabesakukwu. Yotsese, u kapa mabetsabe.”
Ewaꞌyoo mu numu Lydda-wi nonobe-gaꞌyoo, yise ewaꞌyoo numu Sharon mee naneadu tubewa-witu oo poonnese oo nakaꞌoedyuku soo Jesus Te Pabeꞌe.
Sumuꞌyoo mogoꞌne tunakaꞌoedyukudu Tunna mee naneadu oona Joppa mee naneadu-kwi nobe-gaꞌyoo. Ewa nanabesa tumadugupu. Ewow numu tutuha manedu gi hee-gakoo tummatzaꞌe.
Soo Tunna yise unu tuoeyaese yaꞌe. Mu oo pupuaꞌamu oo tookoo pakedyase oona nobe-kooba tuutseꞌe nanobe-too-kwi oo tzatugu.
Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu oo sopedakwatoo ka Peter oona Lydda-wikoo soo Joppa ono natsageꞌe. Umu wahaꞌyoo naana ka Peter baꞌe, oo natummatzi tuunguna.

Soo Peter ka nobe-kwi petuoose oosoo ka tuutse oo-kooba nanobe-too-kwitoo meahoo. Noꞌyoona mu momokoꞌne gi kookoomama-gaꞌyoo sakwina manegonno, ka wanapu pukwi tu namasooana ka Peter tzapoonnekute ka gisoo Tunna yaꞌe oo tumadabuena.
Soo Peter yise noꞌoko puuwanatoo mu taya Te Naa-matoo meatzedose nanesootuhise ka Tunna tookoo yadooꞌe, “Yotseoo Tunna.” Tunna yise mitu poonnegase ka Peter pooꞌnese katuoo.
Soo Peter ka Tunna mi-makoo oo tzadyotase oo kuku-ma oo tzawunukuoo. Oo gwetzoina mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tzapoonnekute, mu gi kookoomamu-gakoo nokosoo tuwazoo.
Mu Joppa-witu ewaꞌyoo oo naka ka namanena yise ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuhoo.
Sumuꞌyoo nana ka Joppa-witu Simon mee naneadu kootsoo puhu mahanedu. Soo Peter wunaꞌme ka Simon-baa.
Sumuꞌyoo tukwutumadu naa, Cornelius mee naneadu oona ka Caesarea mee naneadu-wi nobe-gaꞌyoo
Soo Cornelius besaꞌyoo nana noꞌoko mu Jew tutuha manedu numu tummatzidu, noꞌyoona ka tu doodooamu-nosoo ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhiyakwe. Gi Jew numu, pana mu Jew-waꞌnesoo nanesootuhiyakwe.
Sumu tabeno pahe-kwikoo ka taba soo Cornelius nanesootuhina tuusoobedya. Te Naa tummatzidu toogoopaꞌyoona oo-baa petuse, mee oo netamma, “Cornelius.”

Soo Cornelius oo pooꞌnese, oo-ma suise, mee unne, “Nu u nakapunne. Hemma u how e yukwe tuungu?” Soo Te Naa tummatzidu meeoo oo netamma, “Soo Te Naa u sootuhi, putamme u nanesootuhipu oo nekwegeana, ka u nanumudoo u tunekwipu tuwazoo.

U sakwa menoꞌo oona Joppa mee naneadu-kwitu nanana taya. Sumuꞌyoo nana, Simon Peter mee naneadu oonow, mu sakwa oo bidooa. Oosoo punnoꞌo Simon mesoo naneadu, tu puhu mahanedu oo baa soo Simon Peter manepunne. Soo Simon nobe oona tubetse baa-kumaba,” mee tuusoobedya.

Soo Te Naa tummatzidu yise meahoo. Soo Cornelius tuponnese, ka mu waahoo nobe-kwi tutummatzidu ka Te Naa unnena mu tuukwe. Sumuoo tukwutumadu tuwow tuukwe. Oosoo ooosapa oo tummatzidu, ka Cornelius noꞌoko mu Jew numu-waꞌne nanesootuhaꞌe. Oona Joppa mee naneadu-kwitoo mu taya.
Oogow mooꞌa tabeno mu nanana wupetuga, soo Peter ka nobe-kooba poyase, nanesootuhaꞌe.
Ka saaꞌa yise unu tzuayaꞌena, “Hemma sakwa nu tuka?” mee soonamme. Ka mu numu tu tukakwuna mabetsape soo Peter mee tuusoobedyow.
Soo koomebaga tawaga mee nose. Pabatseꞌe hemma natzatobododu-kwaꞌne tabuadu ka Peter noko ka teepu-tamme wuegena.
Ka oo wue petuhoose, noꞌobatusoo hee oe, togogwa-no noꞌobatusoo nunuꞌu, noꞌobatusoo kweꞌnaꞌa.
Soo Peter meeoo nanetamma, “Yabe yotsese, matu tuka.”
Peter yise meeoo, “Nu gi mownnekoo tukadu. Ne nanamooatupu tunetammana numme mayoho, gi numme hemma mownnekoo tukadu.”
Mee tuusoobedya, “Esoo besaꞌyoo gi sutaꞌyoo soo Te Naa ka meeoo unnena, ‘Besaꞌyoo.’ “
Pahe tooe meeoo oo netammayakwe. Oꞌno yise oosoo pabatse natzapogotugudu toogoonakwa yabetseꞌesoo tsebooehooka.
Soo Peter meeoo soonamme, “Hayoo gena soo e tuusoobedyana e tuukwedu?” Mu natayadu ka oona Simon nobe-kwitoo mea, ka nobe-kobena, ka natzakwunaꞌa-kumaba konno petugase
yise meeoo tutubenga, “Soo Simon Peter haaꞌa mu-baa?”
Soo Peter togesoo meeoo soonamme, “Haꞌyoo gena soo e tuusoobedyapu e tuukwedu?” Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha meeoo oo netamma, “Mu nanana u kwate.
Wuegase gi suipana umu-no mea. Nu ume mu bi tuungu, umu-no mea.”
Soo Peter yise umu-baatoo wuese meeoo mu netamma, “Yaaꞌa nu. Hemma mu sookwaꞌe?”

Umu oo nanekwegea, “Soo Cornelius mee naneadu, mu tukwutumadu moohedu, yaatoo ne taꞌya. Besaꞌyoo nana oosoo mu Jew numu-waꞌne Te Naa-witu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tuwazoo. Mu Jew numu unu oo nenaka. Soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo mee ka Cornelius netamma, ‘U oo tuukwe u oosoo saaꞌa u nobe-kwitoo kemmadooa. Oosoo u tuukwekwu ka u soonakana.’ “
Soo Peter ka mu natayadu nabaa tooi tuungu. Soo Peter ka tu tabuase, ka mu nanana-no mea. Susumudu mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu Joppa-witu punnoꞌo umu-no mea.

Sumu tooise, oogow mooa tabeno ka Caesarea mee naneadu-kwi petuga. Cornelius ka mu sookwipunnena tu nanumu noꞌoko tu pupuaꞌamu ka Peter unnekwuna mu naka tuunguna. Mooasoo soo nobe kaanopunne. Soo Peter yise petuooga, Cornelius oo-matoo meahoose, oo-kobena meatzedoose oo-matoo nanesootuhikooha. Peter oo tzadyotase meeoo oo netamma, “Gi nu-matoo nanesootuhipana. Nu gi Te Naa God. Nu u-kwaꞌnesoo, sukwe numu.” Soo Peter oo-no yadooase ka nobe-kwi tzoonoowahooka.
Ka nobe-kwi egease, noꞌoko mu numu oe manepunnedu meeoo netamma, “Mooasoo mu oo sopedakwatoo ka numme Jew tumadaguna. Numme ka mu gi Jew numu nobe-kwi gi nobeꞌnge. Gi too mu pupuaꞌamu-gaꞌyoo.
Pana mu ka e bise nu kemma. Nu gi e namanayahowkwu-ma suaꞌe. Soo Te Naa ookow e tzapoonnekute noꞌyoona numu nanakwaꞌneꞌyoosoo. Hayoo u e netammakwuse yaatoo e bi?”
Cornelius meeoo oo nanekwegeꞌa, “Pahe tabeno manegapu, pahe-kwikoo, ka oona nobe-kwiꞌyoonasoo nu nanesootuhaꞌe. Sumuꞌyoo nana nu-kobena tabuꞌa petu. Oo kwasu unu patakwetzeꞌatu-kwaꞌne tabuꞌa
meeoo yise e netamma, ‘Soo Te Naa u nanesootuhina nekwegea. U nanekwegeana soomaꞌyuna ka oo nanumu u tummatzipu.
Mu numu-matu taya Joppa-witoo umu sakwa Simon Peter yaatoo bike. Oosoo Simon oo-no, oosoo Simon mee naneadu nana tupuhu mahanedu oo nobe ka tubetse baa-kumaba.’
Yabesoo nu nabaatoo mu baꞌe, besa umu ka oo manese. Noꞌyoona yise tamme yow Te Naa-kobena manepunne. U yise ka Te Naa unnepu ne tuukwekwu.”
Soo Peter meeoo mu netamma, “Ka oꞌnosooga soo Te Naa mu Jew numu suuꞌmu besa soobedya, mu susumudu numu gi, mee nu soonamme. Menoꞌo nu oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa gi numu moodyaꞌe.
Oosoo ka tunakaꞌoedyukudu sootuhaꞌe mu besa tumatugutu, mu gi Jew numu nokosoo.
Soo Te Naa ne taya mu Jew numu-matoo mu tuukwe, mee ne netammana soo Te Naa sakwa tunakaꞌoedyukudu sootuhina ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus tamme-koobatoo nemawuni. Oosoo noꞌoko-tamme Pabeꞌe.
Mu ka sumuna mooasoo oowetuoo nakapunne, soo John mu numu baa-wi matzagadyakwe.” Soo meeoo naꞌunnedu noꞌoko Galilee mee naneadu tubewabe kaano nanakapunne. Oona Judea mee naneadu tubewabe-witooe.
Ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-witu nawahana, soo Te Naa tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma oo sootuhi, mana yise besa manennumme, ka Te Naa pooha-masoo ka tsoapagoedu mabesaku.
Numme yise besa oo tumaduguna poonne, mu Jew numu-nagatu
Ka Te Pabeꞌe soo Te Naa mayoda, ka waha tabeno oo yaꞌedape. Ooonekoo ekow soo Te Naa te tzapoonnekute.
Ka tu yaꞌe-kwiꞌyoona namayoduse gi noꞌyoona numu oo poonne. Numme suuꞌmu Te Naa tunetutzeana ookow waha. Numme ka Te Pabeꞌe poonne. Gi tsoapa, numme oo-no tukase, baa oo-no hepe.
Mu numu meeoo ne tuukwe tuungu. Soo Te Naa puusoo oo netutzea. ‘Nu noꞌobatusoo mu numu nehanekwudu, mu gisoo yaꞌepu yise yaꞌepu tuwow.’
Oꞌnosoo noꞌyoona mu Te Naa nanamooatupu tuukwewabe ekow botugu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu. Umu meeoo, ‘Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe poohamaka. Te Pabeꞌe yise noꞌoko pumme nakaꞌoedyukudu tumaꞌemukwana somuꞌwa.’ “
Ka Peter tooesoo umu-no yadooawunu soo Te Naa mu Cornelius noko oo pupuaꞌamu besaꞌhoo tu Pooha-matu-ma mu sootuhi.

Mu Jew numu ka Peter-no petudu, ka mu wakwawaꞌa nanaꞌatasoo apegeagonno mu naka, ka Te Naa pooha pumme sootuhaꞌe. Umu Jew numu ka Peter-no gi oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa noꞌoko numu gi Jew sapa ka tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma sootuhi. Soo Peter yise meeoo unakwe,
“Tamme sakwa ka gi Jew numu baa-wi matzaka umu ka tamme-waꞌneꞌyoonasoo. Soo Te Naa puu Tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma mu sootuhi.
Baa-wi sakwa mu namatzaka ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus nakaꞌoedyukuna.” Umu ka Peter nenuummaku numme-baasoo, huudooe tooipunne mee oo netammana.
Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka Judea mee naneadu teepu-koobatu mu naka ka mu wakwawaꞌa Te Naa unnena mu nakaꞌoedyukute.
Ka Peter Jerusalem-wi petugase, susumudu mu Jew numu-matu Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu oo nesootzeꞌma,
meeoo yise oo netamma, “U gi te tumayohope mayoho u ka mu wakwawaꞌa-baa petugase, umu-no tuka.”
Soo Peter yise noꞌoko tu manepu mu tuukwe, mee unakwe,
“Nu ka oona Joppa mee naneadu-kwiꞌyoona nanesootuhaꞌe. Ka nanesootuhina nu meeoo tuusoobedyana heegina tubongo ka teepu-koobatoo paꞌanakwana wuegena.
Ka oo wue petuse nanakummaꞌyoosoo hee oeꞌyoona saꞌwe petuhoo: togogwa, nunuꞌu, nanakummaꞌyoosoo kweꞌnaꞌa nu oo poonne.
Nuka meeoo netamma, ‘Yabe mu batsase, mu tuka.’
Nu yise meeoo, ‘Gi numme putoogoo meana. Nu gi mownnekoo tukadu.’
Meeoo yise e netamma, ‘Soo Te Naa esoo besaꞌyoo, gi sutaꞌyoo soo Te Naa ka meeoo unnena.’
Toge pahe nu meeoo natuukwe. Noꞌyoona soo hee toogoopa nahanegapu, mee nu tuusoobedyana.
Yabesoo paheꞌyoo nanana petugono ka nobe e pukwiꞌyoopu-wi ka Caesarea mee naneadu-kwiꞌyoona umuoo natayapu. Umuoo yise petugono punowsoo e bigeakwuse.
Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha meeoo e netamma, ‘Gi tunetutzeapana. Umu-no mea.’ Nu yise mu naapihoo tunakaꞌoedyukudu-no mea. Numme yise mu wakwawaꞌa nobe-kwi petuga.
Oosoo meeoo mee tuukweꞌe, ‘Soo Te Naa tummatziwabe oo nobe-kwi oo-baa petugase meeoo oo netamma, “Tooe haka tooe sakwa ka Joppa mee naneadu-kwitu ka Simon Peter mee naneadu bitooa.
Soo Simon Peter ka petuse, mu tuukwetooa soo Te Naa unnepu yise ka mu nobe-kwitu, mu tummatziwabe nokosoo mu magwetzoitooa,” meeꞌe soo Te Naa tummatziwabe.’
Nu yise oetu mu tuukweꞌe tooesoo e yadooawunu Te Naa Besa Pooha umu-ma mani petu. Ka oꞌnosoo tukwaꞌnesoo tamme ooka wumakwusoo.
Nu yise oo soomaꞌyu ka oꞌnosoo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus tamme netammapu, ‘Soo John baa-wi mu matzaka pana Te Naa yise eka tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma mu sootuhi,’ meeꞌe.
Soo Te Naa yise ka Tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma mu sootuhi ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus te oedyukute. Menoꞌo punnoꞌo tamme-waꞌnesoo, ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-ma nasootuhipu. Nu gi ka Te Naa tumooꞌoo-waꞌneꞌyoo uweoo.”
Umu ka Peter tumooꞌoodu, uga, oo nakase gi hanotusoo hayoo unne-waꞌneꞌyoo, ka Te Naa nesootuhina meeoo umu unakwe, “Yise menoꞌo mu wakwawaꞌa atasoo tu manena yugwese soo Te Naa mu magwetzoikwu.”

Ka Stephen nabatsase ewaꞌyoo mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu mea ka mu numu pumme nehowaꞌe. Susumudu kwenaha-tamme ka tubetse baa kumi meꞌa Phoenicia mee naneadu teepu-koobatoo susumudu Cyprus-witoo natsemangega, umu-matu tuwow Antioch mee naneadu-kwitoo meꞌa ka meana ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu mu Jew numu tuukwe meꞌa.
Pana umu-matoo ka mu wakwawaꞌa teepu Cyprus noko Cyrene mee nananeadu-witoo nadooamudoo, ka Antioch-wi petugase, mu wakwawaꞌa punnoꞌo oetu natuukweꞌe.
Ka ooka mu waha Te Naa mu sootuhi. Ewaꞌyoo wakwawaꞌa mu nakana oo nakaꞌoedyukute ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu.
Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tooesoo Jerusalem-wiꞌyoona umu-witu nakase, sumuoo nana Barnabas mee naneadu umu-matoo taꞌya. Ka Antioch-wi ka Barnabas petugase
umu oo poonne ka ewow numu oo sootuhaꞌe. Soo Barnabas besa umu-matoo soonammena ka Te Naa ooosapa nakaꞌoedyukuna oo tumayohokuna.
Soo Barnabas besaꞌyoo nana; unu tunakaꞌoedyukuna, ka Te Naa Besa Pooha hee-gaꞌyoo, ka saaꞌa mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ewa manega.
Soo Barnabas ka Paul watena Tarsus mee naneadu-kwi petuga. Soo Paul uga Saul mee naneadu.

Oo mayuse punowsoo oo bika Antioch-witoo. Sumu tommo mu Barnabas-no Paul ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tunedyooena ewow numu noko, yow ka Antioch-wiꞌyoona mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu, “Te Pabeꞌe nakanagemoꞌodu,” mee umu naneapu.
Oꞌno yise umu Te Naa-witu numu tunedyooedu Jerusalem-wiꞌyoona ka Antioch-wi petuga.

Sumuꞌyoo umu-matu Agabus mee naneadu ꞌwunuhoose ka Te Naa Besa Pooha wumana meeoo mu tuukwe, “Pudusoo noꞌyoona ka teepu-koobatu numu tseagoekwu.” Soo Te Naa unnepu oo-toogoo mani ka Claudius mee naneadu numu-kobena oo katu.
Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu Antioch-witu ka mu Judea-witu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tumasumutookute. Tu mapuꞌa noko umu mu haneku.
Mu Barnabas-no Paul oo hanegase, umu tunakaꞌoedyukudu moohedu ka Judea-witu haneku.
Mu Jew numu-kobena katudu Herod mee naneadu ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu kusega, gi besa mu sootunagaꞌa.
Soo Herod ka tukwutumadu tsegesa-ma ka John pabeꞌe James batsa tuungu.
