Soo Herod soo tuwow ka Peter nebatsa ka mu Jew numu oosoosoo besa manuumakwu ka James oo batsase. Ka mu numu sumuse ka Te Naa nesootuhaꞌe gi namayudu tukaba mu ewa tukanoꞌo, soo Herod ka Peter mu wutuma tuungu.
Mu nanana ooka naꞌeyaꞌe tuungu ka oo tukwutuma nobe-kwikoo. Watsu-baa watsukwuoo naana ooka eyaꞌe tuungu, ka mu ewa tukamakwuse ookow moooꞌa umu oo nehanedooa mee unnena.
Ka Peter nakwutumase, mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ooosapa unu oo nanesootuhikute.
Ka togano ka Peter nanehanekwunoꞌo umu oo maꞌwetzogo-kwikoo nanaꞌenakwu tukwutumadu-noko natzakunetu. Soo tukwutumadu yise ka natzakwuna-kumaba oo eyaꞌepunne. Soo Peter uwegapu.

Gi obeda soo pukwi mu utuina kootabuꞌa petu, yise sumuꞌyoo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo oe mani petuse, ka Peter matuponnese meeoo oo netamma, “Yabe yotseoo.” Soo Peter yotsehoose ka pummatu natzakunana ooetoosoo sawekuoo.
Soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo yise meeoo oo netamma, “Yabe yotseoose, namahaneoo. U nate noko u moko-wi namadabuehoo, wunagayowse e nakwi kemmow.”
Soo Peter oo nagekase sapa, gi oo sopedakwatoo oo manese meeoo soonamme, “E nosena tookwa.”
Wahaba, waahoo tukwutumadu moopa memeꞌa o umu pumme eyaꞌedu, oona yise ka weehepu natzakwunaꞌa-wi pepetuooga, oosoo puusoo wonabe. Oeꞌyoona kuꞌowkase,

oonanoꞌo manikase, soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo oo maꞌwuooga, mee yise soo Peter soonamme, “Gi tookwa e nosena. Soo Te Naa e tubetse magwetzoipu. Herod mu susumudu Jew numu-no e batsayagate. Pana soo Te Naa ka toha kasa-gakoo nuga magwetzoi tuungu.
Nu sakwa John Mark pea-baatoo mea,” mee tusooyugwe. Ka John Mark pea Mary nobe-kwitoo mea. Ewaꞌyoo numu ka Peter nanesootuhikuna o.
Ka nobe-kobena petuoogase ka natzakonaꞌa dokaꞌnge. Mary tummatzidu tsuadumu Rhoda mee naneadu ka oo nadokaꞌnge oetu poonne petuga.
Soo tsuadumu oo sopedakwatoo ka Peter petuoona, besa soonammese gi ooosapa ka natzakwonaꞌa tzakwuna oobe nobe-kwitoo tanomane mu numu meeoo tuukweꞌe, “Peter oobeoo puuwana natzakwona-kwi ꞌwunu.”

Mu numu gi oo nakaꞌoedyukudu. “U koodeseyaꞌe,” mee ka Rhoda netamma. Meeoo pumme mu netamma sapa mu tuukwe, “Togesapa soo Peter ebeoo petuhoo.” Umu yise meeoo, “Oosoo tookwa mooasoo nabatsapuna, te natzanakakute.”
Soo Peter ooosapa tudokangedyakwe. Umu yise ka oo tzakwunase, ka Peter poonne. Noꞌyoona apegeakooha oowetuoo nanatukwena.

Ka Peter tu mi mayodase umu apegea makwuhoo. Soo Peter yise mu tuukweꞌe, “Ka e nakwutumase, soo Te Naa e tummatzina yow e bipetu. Mu sakwa tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka James saaꞌa tuukwe mu susumudu tunakaꞌoedyukudu nokosoo.” Soo Peter yise kummaꞌakoosoo tubewa-witoo mea.
Ka tu tabuase, mu tukwutumadu suda sokwama, umu ka Peter pukwiꞌyoona gi sopedakwadoona.
Soo Herod oo tooꞌe wate pana gi oo maꞌyu. Soo Herod yise mu tukwutumadu ka Peter eyaꞌedu goekwu meeꞌe unakwe. Soo Herod mease ka Caesarea mee naneadu-kwi nobetugu.

Ka saaꞌa mu numu sutakute ka Tyre noko Sidon-witu. Umu ka Herod pumme sakwaꞌekuna gi petzabebena ka Herod tubewabe-witu tu tukapu hanena. Umu-matoo mease, ka Herod tummatzidu Blastus mee naneadu oo puaꞌadoo. Soo Blastus yise ka Herod noko mu tunehanekwuna nemadabue. Soo Herod yise tu besa kwasu-wi namahanena mu tunehane-wi petuooga. Ka mu numu-kobena katuse, mu numu yadooꞌe. Mu numu besa oo sooyugwena meeoo oo netamma, “U, Ne Naa God-waꞌne.”
Soo Herod yabesoo unu tuoeyihoo. Woꞌabe tu tookoo sooawunu yaꞌehoo ka meeoo soonammena, “Nu yow Te Naa God-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
Ka yoo tu namanewunu, ewaꞌyoo numu oo naka ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu ka Herod manena nakaꞌoedyukuna.
Mu Paul-no Barnabas ka mu numu tu tummatzina mamakwuse Jerusalem-wiꞌyoona memea. John Mark umu-no memea. Ka Antioch mee naneadu-witoo kodyuka.
Ka oonow mu pepetugase, mu susumudu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka Antioch mee naneadu-kwi nonobe-gaꞌyoo. Umu-matu nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu, mu Barnabas-no Paul umu-no.
Ka gi tukapana mu nanesootuhaꞌe soo Te Naa Besa Pooha mu yadooꞌe, “Nu ka Barnabas noko Paul netutzea, noko numu nu-kwitu mu tunedyooe tuunguna. Umuoo sakwa mu taya.”
Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi tukapana ka Paul noko Barnabas-ma pooha matuguse, mu nanesootuhikute yise mana mu taya.
Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha ka Barnabas noko Paul tayase, umu ka Seleucia Cyrene mee naneadu-kwi pepetuga. Onona umu natzemangeka
ka Salamis mee naneadu-kwitoo. Ka oe pepetugase, mu Jew numu nanesootuhi nobe-kwi pepetuooga, mu Jew numu ka Te Naa unnena tuukwe. John Mark ka mu Paul noko Barnabas tummatzaꞌe.
Umu yise saaꞌa ka Paphos mee naneadu-kwi petugonnoga. Oosoo ka Salamis mee naneadu tubewabe ooꞌenakwa. Soo sutaꞌyoo Jew numu poohadu Bar-Jesus mee naneadu o numu-no.
Soo mu wakwawaꞌa moohedu Sergius Paulus mee naneꞌa, oosoo mu wakwawaꞌa moohedu besa tusooyugwedu, mu Barnabas noko Paul ka Te Naa-witu tutuubenga.
Soo Bar-Jesus ka Sergius Paulus meeoo netamma, “Gi ka Paul noko Barnabas nakaꞌoedyukupana.”
Ka Te Naa God Besa Pooha punagakoo oo poonnese, meeoo unakwe.
“U mu numu gi toge neyugwedu. U ka sutakoo nunuꞌu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. U ka Te Naa tumooꞌoona mu numu ka gi besow podo taꞌya.
Soo suda u manena u-matoosoo kodyudooa gi u manena petzabena. U gi tubootabue manekwu ka suda u manena gi maꞌwuna.” Yabesoo gi tubootabue manise, numu pumme tsakakwudu tooꞌe kwate.
Soo Sergius Paulus ka Bar-Jesus gi tubootabuedu poonne oosoo yise ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu nakaꞌoedyukute yise ka Te Naa unnepu nesookwugaꞌe.
Soo Paul tu pupuaꞌamu-no ka Paphas-wiꞌyoona baa-koobakwi natzemangeka ka Perga mee naneadu-kwi pepetuga
Umu Paul-no Barnabas ka Perga mee naneadu-too memease, ka Antioch mee naneadu-kwi pepetuga ka teepu Pisidia-kooba. Ka te nanesootuhi tabebanoꞌo umu ka mu Jew numu nanesootuhi nobe-kwitoo memea.
Mu Jew nanesootuhidu nemadugudu ka Te Naa God unnena neamakwuse meeoo mu netamma, “E nanumu, manatu haaꞌa haꞌyoosoo unnekwe?”
Soo Paul oo wunuse mee mu netamma, “E nanumu-no mu tooe haga tooe Te Naa God nakaꞌoedyukudu e nakapunne.

Soo Te Naa God, pu-matoo tamme Jew numu nanesootuhina, ka mu te nanamooatupu netutsease, ka mu nanesootuhikuse ewa mu mayugwe ka Egypt-wiꞌyoona, ka mu wakwawaꞌa-waꞌnekoo. Soo Te Naa yise unu pooha-gaꞌyoo ka Egypt-wikoo mu bikase,
mu mabetsea ewa (40) tomoka ka teepu gi numu tumasuana naa-kwi.
Oosoosoo tuwow (7) natakwatsukwuoo-baatoo numu kadoo mayukwe ka Canaan mee naneadu teepu-kooba yise ka te nanamooꞌatupu ookow teepu mu tzapokaku.
Unu ewa (450) tomokaꞌa oosoo ka mu nanaꞌakwedu-matu unu pooha-gakoo netutzease. Oꞌno soo numu moohedu Samuel mee naneadu ka Te Naa God yadooawabe mane.
Umu yise pukobena katudu nekwina, soo Te Naa ka Saul mee naneadu netutsea
Oꞌno yise soo Te Naa oo nabatsakuse ka David yise netutsea ka numu-kobenatoo. Soo Te Naa God mee unakwe, ‘Soo David, Jesse dooa, oosoo nana e sookwi-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Ooosapa besa e nakabetseadu.’
Soo Te Naa God ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus tamme Jew numu magwetzoidu matabuepu-gaꞌyoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus David-matu meeꞌe soo Te Naa God te tuukwepu-gaꞌyoo.

Ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus gisoo Te Naa unnepu mu numu tuukwe petu, soo John mee naneadu meeoo mu numu tuukweꞌe, ‘Noꞌyoona mu Jew numu sakwa ka suda tu manena maꞌwuse baa-wi namatzakase ka Te Naa God besa podo mea,’ mee.
Soo John ka numu tu tunedyooena mamakwuse meeoo unakwe, ‘Nu Te Pabeꞌe mee haaꞌa mu e sooyugwe? Gi nu. Soo Te Tubetse Pabeꞌe saaꞌa petukwu. Nu gi oo-waꞌneꞌyoo. Oosoo e ooonakwa pooha-gaꞌyoo.’
E nanumu, mu Abraham dooamu-matu yise mu susumudu numu Te Naa meeoo te tuukwe, ‘Nu mu magwetzoikwu.’

Mu numu Jerusalem-wi nonobe-gaꞌyoo ka mu pumme moohedu-no tooe nonoꞌatsa ka Te Naa unnepu naka, ka oo tubona naneayakwe, pana gi yise ka Jesus Te Pabeꞌe sopedakwatoo. Gi oo nakasopedakwatoo ka Te Naa oꞌnosoo Te Pabeꞌe-witu oo waha. Umu ka Te Naa unnena gi nakaꞌoedyuku pana oo mayoho.
Umu gi hanotusoo suda naꞌunnedu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu waha-waꞌneꞌyoo pana ka Pilate ooka batsa tuungu.
Oꞌnosoo ka Te Naa tuukwewabe meeoo tubopu umu ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus batsakwu. Umu yise tooesoo oo manakwe. Oosoo ka yaꞌese, ka sunngabe namadabue-maꞌyoona natzakwekuse, nakoo.
Soo Te Naa oo matusootabuesoo.
Ewa tabeba-wi oosoo umu-no Galilee-wiꞌyoona kemmadu natzapoonnekuyakwe. Umuoo naana mu numu oetuooo tuukwe.
Menoꞌo numme Barnabas-no yow petu mu tuukwe ka Te Naa oꞌnosoo unnepu ka Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus tamme magwetzoi-kwitu.

Menoꞌo toge oo-toogoosoo Te Naa unnepu manakwe. Oꞌnosoo David meeoo tubope-gaꞌyoo ka penakwa hoobeabe-kwi meeoo unakwe Te Pabeꞌe witu, ‘Soo Te Naa meeoo unakwe, “U e dooa. Nu u tubetse Naa. Nu menoꞌo mu numu tuukweꞌe.” ’
Soo Te Naa meeoo unakwe, ‘Nu besa u tummatzikoo ka David e tuukwe-kwaꞌnesoo.’ Ka kummaꞌakoosoo David hoobea tubo-kwi tuwazoo meeoo, ‘U gi ka u tunetutzeana tookoo peheku-waꞌneꞌyoo.’
Soo David ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu meeoo tuboꞌo gi puusoo nakwitu. Soo David ka Te Naa pumme netammatoo manese, yaꞌe. Ka oo nakoose oo tookoo mooasoo pehewunu.
Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe tookoo gi pehe. Te Naasoo oo matuusootabuesesoo.
E nanumu e naka, soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus tamme-koobatoo nabatsase, soo Te Naa ka te tumaꞌemukwana sumuꞌwase te sootuhikwu.

Ka te tunakaꞌoedyukute soo Te Naa te tumaꞌemukwana sumuꞌwa. Tamme ka te nanamooatupuna manena sukwe mayohona, ka Moses tamme tuukwe-kwaꞌne. Soo Te Naa gi te tumaꞌemukwana sumuꞌwa tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi gi tunakaꞌoedyukuna.

Umu meeoo tuboꞌo Te Naa meeoo unakwe, ‘E nakapunne. Mu ka gi sootunakaꞌoedyukuna, mu kadooꞌoo namayugwekwu. Ka tooesoo u gwetzoaꞌe, nu u tummatzikwu. Tooe numu e tuukwe sapa mu gi oo nakaꞌoedyuku-waꞌneꞌyoo.’ Mu sakwa oo nakaꞌoedyuku, oꞌno gi mu kadooꞌoo namayugwekwu ka mu oꞌnosoo Te Naa te tuukwe-kwaꞌne.”
Mu Paul noko Barnabas nanesootuhi nobe-kwiꞌyoona umu kukuowse umu meeoo mu netamma, “Ka penakwa nanesootuhikwuse, ka Te Naa unnena saaꞌa ne tuukwesoo.”
Ewaꞌyoo mu Jew numu-no mu wakwawaꞌa mu Jew-kwaꞌne nanesootuhi tabuadu ka Paul noko Barnabas-no mea. Paul-no Barnabas mu yadooena meeoo mu netamma, “Mu sakwa Te Naa besa podo ooosapa mea.”
Ka penakwa nanesootuhi tabenoo ewaꞌyoo mu numu ka Antioch-wi sumu ka Te Naa unnena nakakwuse.
Umu Jew numu moohedu unu sutaꞌa ka ewow numu gi Jew numu pana oetoo kemma ka Paul nakana. Umuoo moohedu ka Paul noko Barnabas unnena netumooꞌoo.

Mu Paul-no Barnabas gi mu Jew numu unne-ma suina meeoo unakwe, “Mu ka Te Naa unnena mooe naka. Mu muusoo gi oo nakaꞌoedyukuna mu yise gi nasootuhaꞌe. Numme yise menoꞌo ka mu wakwawaꞌa Te Naa unnepu-witu tuukwekwu.
Ka oꞌnosoo numu meeoo tuukwedu ka Te Naa unnena po tuguse te tuukweꞌe. ‘U sakwa noꞌoko enatu tooe mu wakwawaꞌa nu-kwitu tuukwe. Oꞌno mu e nakasopedakwadoo yise namagwetzoikwu,’ mee soo Te Naa.”
Mu wakwawaꞌa oo nakase, besa sokwamana meeoo unakwe, “Soo Te Naa unnepu unu besaꞌyoo.” Noꞌyoona umu Te Naa tunetutzeana tunakaꞌoedyukute.
Soo Te Naa unnena yise tooe hanotu tooe yaa teepu-koobatu numu oo naka.

Mu Jew numu moohedu, mu momokoꞌne ka mu Jew numu-kwaꞌne nanesootuhidu, mu numu moohedu ka mu Paul noko Barnabas tumooꞌoose, oꞌno yise umu ka Antioch-wiꞌyoona memea. Mu Paul-no Barnabas yise ka Antioch kooseba tu kuku-makoo tataꞌnese, mu numu tzapoonnekuna ka how sutaꞌyoo umu. Ka Antioch-witu umu tunakaꞌoedyukudu besa sokwama ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-tooha tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Mu Paul-no Barnabas yise ka Iconium mee naneadu-wi pepetuga.
Mu wahaꞌyoo nanana, Paul-no Barnabas Iconium mee naneadu-witoo memea, ka mu Jew numu nanesootuhaꞌe oe pepetuooga. Ewa-baatu numu o. Ewaꞌyoo umu-matu ka Paul sooꞌoedyukute ka Te Naa unnena oo waha.
Mu Jew numu-matu gi mu Paul-no Barnabas sooꞌoedyukuna mu nesootzema mee mu wakwawaꞌa netamma, “Gi mu nakaꞌoedyukupana.”
Ka nanesootuhipe-kwiꞌyoona kukuowga. Wunaꞌme ka Iconium-wi gi mu numu-ma suina, mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe besa unnepu tuukwe. Mu Paul-no Barnabas ka Te Pabeꞌe besa pooha punagakoo ewow numu mabesaku.
Mu numu oowetuoo waha-tamme tusooyugwedu susumudu umu-matu tunakaꞌoedyukute tooꞌesoo umu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu.
Mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu Jew mu wakwawaꞌa mu Jew moohedu-no ka Paul noko Barnabas tupe-ma tagoekwu mee tunetammana.
Mu Paul-no Barnabas ka tu nanetammana nakase, yabesoo oeꞌyoona memeow. Yabesoo ka kummaꞌakoosoo teepu, Lycaonia mee naneadu-koobatoo memeahoo. Ka Lystra noko Derbe mee nananeadu-kwi pepetugase,
Te Naa besa unnepu-witu mu numu tuukwe.
Soo nana Lystra-witu tuutse-wi manakwana gi nummedu
ka Paul naka katu. Soo Paul ka nana poonnese, yise meeoo oo sooyugwe, “Esoo nana unu tunakaꞌoedyukudu pumme magwetzoi-waꞌne manepunne.”
Soo Paul yise pabatseꞌe meeoo ka nana netamma, “Kaaheno u kuku-ma wunuhoo.” Soo nana gi nummedu yabesoo yotsehoose, yise numme ꞌmani.
Ewaꞌyoo mu numu ka oo poonnena ka besa oo manise puusoo tu yadooa-wi mu nanesootuhikuna yise meeoo mu netamma, “Yaatoo umu pumatoo te nanesootuhina te paꞌanakwana numu manise, menoꞌo yow tamme-baa.”
Ewaꞌyoo mu numu ka Barnabas-wi meeoo sooyugwe, “Yow esoo pumatoo te nanesootuhina moohedu Zeus mee naneadu,” mee. Yise ka Paul-witu meeoo netamma, “Yow Zeus yadooawabe, Hermes mee naneadu.”
Soo Zeus ka pabow nanesootuhi nobe-gaꞌyoo ka Lystra-kumaba mu nanesootuhiwabe mu kootsoo koomamu wetzaka ka tonegeadu umu-ma wusoena. Oꞌno yise mu numu sakwa ka Barnabas nanetzakwiyaꞌe mee sokwamana.
Mu Paul-no Barnabas ka mu numu suda manakwe gi besa mu nakasoopedyase puusoo tu kwasu makebuese umu yabesoo mu numu-nagatoo memeahoose, papabatse mu yadooese meeoo,

“Gi numme-matoo nanesootuhipana. Numme mu-kwaꞌneꞌyoosoo, sukwe numu, ka besow wahamodu. Gi too ka Zeus-matoo nanesootuhipana, oosoo gi kaaheno unnedu nana. Soo Te Naa noꞌoko hemma ka teepu-koobatu matabuepu.
Soo Te Naa noꞌoko mu numu meeoo netamma, ‘Mu uga mummesoo soomea-kwaꞌne mea tabuꞌa pana menoꞌo mu sakwa nu-matoo suuꞌmu nanesootuhi.’ Soo Te Naa mooasoo mu numu ka tu pooha tzapoonnekute.
Soo Te Naa powmaba taya ewatseꞌyoo yise soo tukapu naa, tamme yise nasootuhi,” meeꞌe.
Mu numu gi ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu togesoo ka Paul noko Barnabas-matoo tu nanesootuhina tooꞌe soogwi, pana gi.

Ka saaꞌa susumudu mu Jew numu Antioch noko Iconium-wiꞌyoona kemmadu petu. Mu numu Lystra-witu, “Soo Paul sutaꞌyoo,” mee mu tuukwena. Umu oo tooꞌe tatsagow tupe-ma oo tapagetana. Ka Lystra-wikoo yise oo tzapewuyaka, Paul yaꞌepu mee sokwamana. Pana gi!
Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka Paul naꞌoonnakwi sumuhoose, oosoo yise yotseoose, ka Lystra-witoo kodyuka. Ookow moooꞌa, Barnabas-no ka Lystra-wiꞌyoona memea. Ka Derbe mee naneadu-kwitoo memeakwate.

Mu Paul-no Barnabas ka Derbe-wi pepetuga ewow numu ka Te Naa besa unnepu-witu tuukwe. Ewaꞌyoo numu tunakaꞌoedyukudu mane. Mu Barnabas-no Paul kokodyukwate, Lystra, Iconium, noko Antioch Pisidia mee naneadu-too kokodyu.

Ka memeadabenona, mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu, “Gi mu tunakaꞌoedyukuna maꞌwupana,” mee mu netammana. Meeꞌe tuwazoo mu netamma, “Mu numu saaꞌa mu netumooꞌookwu, pana gi umu-ma suipana. Ka saaꞌa tamme ka Te Naa-matoo meakwu besa-kwitoo.”
Noꞌoko putoogoo tu meana ooka moohedu netutzeamena mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu. Mu Paul-no Barnabas gi tukana mu nanesootuhikuna ka Te Naa mee netamma, “U, Ne Naa sakwa mu sootuhi. Besa mu mabetsea.”
Umu ka teepu Pisidia mee naneadu-kwitoo, memeꞌa,

ka Perga-wi pepetugase, ka mu numu Te Naa unnepu tuukwe.
			ka Attalia mee naneadu-kwi pepetugase, ka sake-wi Antioch-witoo punowsoo natzemangeka. Otoo mu nanesootuhidu mu taꞌya mana ka Te Naa besa unnepu waha. Menoꞌo yise mu Paul-no Barnabas oo manemakwu.
Umu mu kokodyu petuse, mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu sumuse, mu Paul-no Barnabas ka tu mopu-witu mu numu tuukweꞌe oosoo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-witu mu wakwawaꞌa tunakaꞌoedyukudu mayugwemena.
Wunaꞌme yise umu o, ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-baa.

Mu Jew naana-matu ka Jew teepu-wiꞌyoona kemmase petugonno, ka mu Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu gi Jew numu yise meeoo netamma, “Mu sakwa ka ne nanamooatupu tunetammana mayoho, ka Moses numme tuukwepu. Mu kwuꞌa naꞌoonnakwitu sakwa natsekeaꞌa. Mu ka ꞌyoo manese ka mu Jew numu-waꞌnesoo manepunnekwu, oꞌno soo Te Naa mu magwetzoikwu.”
Mu Paul-no Barnabas oo netumooꞌoo ka meeoo mu Jew naana-matu unakwe.

Mu Paul-no Barnabas, susumudu mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-no nataya Jerusalem-witoo ka umu nananesootuhidu moohedu oowetuoo tubengakwuse, ka mu susumudu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka saaꞌa puusoo gi oo naka togeꞌyookuna. Umu Paul-no Barnabas yise ka Phoenicia noko Samaria tubewa-too memeana mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tuukwemena, ka mu wakwawaꞌa gi Jew numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi unu tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu yise besa nakasokwama.
Ka Jerusalem-wi petugase, mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu umu pumme moohedu-no besa nesokwama, ka mu nakana ka Te Naa-witu mu waha, ka Te Naa pumme sootuhipu.

Susumudu numu ka mu nanesootuhidu-matu Pharisee mee nananeadu mee unakwe, “Umuoo wakwawaꞌa Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu sakwa ka tu kwuꞌa naꞌoonnakwitu natsekeaku, ka Moses tamme tunetammakupu ka tamme Jew nanamooatupu manena tumayohokuna.”
Umu tunakaꞌoedyukudu moohedu tunehane oowetuoo nehanekwuse.
Wunaꞌme umu nanano apegease, soo Peter ꞌwunuoose meeꞌe unakwe, “E nanumu, oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa e pooha nose-kwi meeoo e netamma, mu wakwawaꞌa ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu saaꞌa nakaꞌoedyukudooa.
Soo Te Naa oo sopedakwatoo pumme ka mu wakwawaꞌa noko ka tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma mu sootuhina tamme tu sootuhi-kwaꞌnesoo.
Soo Te Naa tamme-waꞌnesoo mu matabuepu, mu tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwa ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukute.

Mu haaꞌa gi oo naka toogeꞌyookute ka Te Naa unnena, mu haaꞌa mu wakwawaꞌa tamme nanamooatupu manena mayoho tuungukwu? Umuoo tumayohope unu namanakwe. Tamme puu gi oo mayoho-waꞌneꞌyoo, umu te nanamooatupu punnoꞌo gisoo. Tamme sakwa gi umu ooka mayoho tuungupana.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus te magwetzoina te sootuhaꞌe ka te tunakaꞌoedyukute. Umu wakwawaꞌa tamme-waꞌneꞌyoosoo,” mee soo Peter unakwe.

Noꞌyoona mu numu gi tunemayuoose, ka Paul noko Barnabas nakapunne. Ka mu numu meeoo netamma, “Ka Te Naa numme pooha-maka-ma numme mu wakwawaꞌa besa mayugweyakwe.” Ewasoo nanabesa tu manepu-witu mu numu tuukwe.
Umu yise ka apekeamakwuse, soo James mu numu meeoo netamma, “E nanumu,
mooasoo soo Peter te tuukweꞌe, ka mooeꞌugasoo soo Te Naa oo tzapoonne ka mu wakwawaꞌa tu sootuhina, yise umu-matu wakwawaꞌa tu dooamu mayugweke.
Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa tuukwewabe eka toge meeoosoo naꞌunnedu botugu, soo Te Naa meeoo te netamma,
‘Nu ewow mu Jew numu tumaꞌemukwadu kadoo mayugwekwu. Saaꞌa yise nu ka mu David nanadooamu sootuhidooa. Ka tooe haga tooe anooase, nu oo mayodadooa.
Oꞌno saaꞌa mu susumudu numu nu-kwitu nakaꞌoedyukudooa. Susumudu mu wakwawaꞌa-matu saaꞌa nu e dooamu mayugwedooa,’
mee soo Te Naa unakwe, oꞌno gisoo hemma oo manakwe.”
Soo James ooosapa yadooadyakwe meeꞌe, “Yise nu meeoo tusooyukwe tamme sakwa gi unutu-kwikoo mu wakwawaꞌa tunedyooe ka Te Naa mu nakaꞌoedyukute.

Tamme sakwa umu-matoo tubo mee naꞌunnedu, ‘Gi hownneꞌyoo tooe mu gi tumayohona ka mu Jew numu tumayohope. Yoo oo sukwe ꞌmane: ka mu numu tooe hemma-too tooe nanesootuhidyidu tuka, gi umu-baatu tukapana. Ka nodukwa-gana gi kummaꞌakoosoo pootamapana. Gi too puupe tukapana. Gi ka hemma tookoo puu-gakoo tukapana tuwazoo.
Yoo sakwa tamme mu mane tuungu mooasoo mu ka yoo tu namanena naka.’ “

Noꞌyoona mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka pumme moohedu-no meeoo tusooyugwe, “Numme sakwa mu Paul noko Barnabas ka mu nanana yaatu tamme-matu ka Antioch mee naneadu-witoo taya.” Waahoo nanana yise netutzea ka pumme moohedu-nagatu, Silas-no Judas mee nananeadu.
Tubose, umu-noko oo taya, meeꞌe naꞌunnedu, “Mu ne nananumu mu ka tunakaꞌoedyukudu moohedu-matoo natayana: Mu wakwawaꞌa Antioch-witu tunakaꞌoedyukudu mana Syria noko Cilicia mee nananeadu teepu-witu.
Numme meeoo tunaka, susumudu numu yaatuoo mu nemooagana mu nesagwaꞌe ka tooe haꞌyoo tooe mu netammana. Numme gi umuoo mu-matoo taꞌya. Gi numme meeoo mumme mu netamma tuungu.
Menoꞌo yise numme tunehanese, noꞌyoona meeoo unakwe, numme nanana tunetutzease mu tayakwu. Umu saaꞌa ne pupuaꞌamu, Paul noko Barnabas-no kemmadooa.
Mu Paul-no Barnabas tooꞌe nagoehoo ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-koobatoo.
Numme yise Judas noko Silas mu-matoo tayakwu. Eka tubope-kwaꞌnesoo, umu toge maawaꞌnesoo mu tuukwekwu.
Ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-no numme meeoo sokwama besa mu ka gi numme Jew numu tumayohope mayohona. Yooꞌoo suuꞌmu sakwa mu ꞌmane.
Ka mu numu tooe hemmatoo tooe nanesootuhidyidu tuka gi umu-batu tukapana. Ka nodukwa-gana gi maꞌemukwapana. Umuoo tumayohope mu nagena besa ꞌmanekwu.”
Mu tubope gwuudu ka mease Antioch-wi petuga. Umu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tunehane, umu yise ka tubope mu geahoo.
Umu yise oo nease, besa sokwama ka besa oo naꞌunakwe.
Umu Judas-no Silas yise ewow numu nanesootuhi tunedyooꞌe. Tu nanesootuhipe-kwitu mu tuukwena, oꞌno umu unusoo oo nakaꞌoedyukukwu.
Onosoo ka saaꞌa umu punowsoo kokodyuka.
Paul-no Barnabas Antioch-wisoo. Umu onatu-nosoo ka Te Naa unnena numu tuukwe.
Saaꞌa soo Paul ka Barnabas meeoo netamma, “Ta sakwa oona mu numu nonoꞌata-toosoo moga ka Te Naa God unnepu ta wahapu-witoo mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu nobengena, howga umu menoꞌo manakwe?”
Soo Barnabas ka tu nanumu John Mark mee naneadu nepina.
Soo Paul gi oo nepetzabena soo Mark gi umu-no tu nummena mamakwu, ka oona teepu Pamphylia mee naneadu-kwiꞌyoona nobe-kwitoosoo kodyu.
Mu Paul-no Barnabas nanepetukuse, yise susumuꞌyoonasoo meakwu meeꞌe tunetamma. Mu Barnabas-no Mark, ka Cyprus mee naneadu teepu-witoo natsemangega.
Soo Paul ka Silas netutzea puno meakwudu. Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu mu nanesootuhikute soo Te Naa umu-kooba tueyaꞌe.
Umu memea oona ka tu memeatoo yise ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka Syria noko Cilicia mee nananeadu teepu-koobatu nanesootuhi tunedyooemena.

Mu Paul-no Silas ka memeadabena ka Derbe mee naneadu-too memease ka Lystra mee naneadu-kwi pepetuga. Sumuꞌyoo tunakaꞌoedyukudu Timothy mee naneadu oonow nobe-gaꞌyoo. Oo pea Jew numu. Oo naa mu wakwawaꞌa numu-matu.

Ookow soo Paul naakwena ka susumudu tunakaꞌoedyukudu soo Timothy besaꞌyoo nana mee mu unakwe. Soo Paul yise ka Timothy Jew numu mayugwe mooasoo noꞌyoona mu Jew numu oo sopedakwadoo soo Timothy naa mu wakwawaꞌa numu-matu.
Mu Paul, Silas, Timothy-no ka meadabena noꞌoko tooe hanotu tooe mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu meeoo tuukwemena. Tamme moohedu Jerusalem-witu meeoo mu netamma, “Gi ka mu Jew nanamooatupu tumayohope mayohopana.”
Mu numu unu tunakaꞌoedyukudu nonoꞌotsa tabemeakwi ewasoo tunakaꞌoedyuku manemena.
Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha mu pihoo nanana ka teepu Asia mee naneadu-kwitoo gi nemeakute. Umu yise Phrygia noko Galatia mee nananeadu teepu-kumi meꞌa.
Ka Mysia mee naneadu teepu-kooba petugase, soo Te Naa Besa Pooha ka teepu Bithynia mee naneadu-koobatoo gi mu nemeakute.
Umu yise Mysia-too mease ka Troas mee naneadu-kwi petuga. Nu Luke, oꞌno o. Nu yise umu-no manika.
Sumu tooise soo Paul meeoo nose, sumuꞌyoo nana Macedonia-wiꞌyoona kemmadu oo nose-kwi oo-baa petu, yise meeoo oo netamma, “Ka Macedonia mee naneadu teepu-koobatoo natzemangese, ne tummatzi.”
Soo Paul ka meeoo nosese numme ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuduna oosooga sumuna tu unnena oonow te waha tuunguna, numme yise Macedonia-witoo meakwu.
Numme yise Troas-wiꞌyoona mea. Numme natzemangekase Samothrace-wi petuga. Ookow mooa numme tuwazoo natzemangeka, Neapolis-witoo sawe petuga.
Numme yise Philippi-wi oona sogo mease oo petuga, soo Philippi ka teepu Macedonia-koobatu mooe nadatsunga. Mu numu otuoo Roman numu. Huu tabeno tooe numme o.
Ka nanesootuhi tabebano numme ka Philippi hooonakwatoo mea ka paa hooodu-kumabaa petuga, mu Jew numu o sumuna nanesootuhiyakwe. Numme aatase, mu momokoꞌne nananesootuhidu-no apegea.

Sumuꞌyoo umu-matu ne nakapunnedu Lydia mee naneadu mogoꞌne, Thyatira mee naneadu-witoo nadooaꞌadoopu. Oosoo Lydia Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhidu. Oo nakaꞌoedyukute ka Te Pabeꞌe oowetuoo ka Paul pumme tuukwe.
Ka saaꞌa Lydia ka umu puno baa-wi namatzakapu nenuummakuna mee unakwe, “Mu sakwa nu-baasoo ka e sopedakwatoose, nu punnoꞌo ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tubetse tunakaꞌoedyukudu.” Ne tubetse nenuummakute.

Sumu numme oona pukwiꞌyoona mu Jew numu nanesootuhidyi-kwitoo meana, oosoo tsuaduma togogwa pooha-gaꞌyoo ne wekeꞌahoo. Ka tu togogwa pooha hemma manekwuna pumme oo tuukweyakwe soo tsuadumu mu numu tuukweyakwe. Mu numu ka tsuadumu meeoo neyugwedu ewa natumanakakute ka tsuadumu numu tuukwe-kwi.

Oosoo tsuadumu huu tabeno ne nagedyinnumme paba yadooanummena mee unnena, “Umuoo naana ka Te Matabuepu nayadooawabe. Umuoo mu tuukwekwu how soo Te Manumudoopu mu magwetzoi tabuakwu.” Soo Paul oo-matoo suda soonamme ka tsuadumu ooosapa oo manakwe. Soo Paul yise nakwumunase eka togogwa pooha meeoo netamma, “Ka Te Pabeꞌe pooha tooha-kwi nu u nematzakukwuni!” Yabesoo yise oosoo sutaꞌyoo poohabe ka tsuadumu nagaꞌyoona tsebooeka.
Umu meeoo ka tsuadumu neyugwedu unu sutaꞌa. Umu oo sopedakwadoona ka hemma manikwuna, yise gi haka natumanakakwu-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Umu yise ka Paul noko Silas-ma tzakaduse mu numu nehanedu-matoo mu bika. Yise meeoo mu netamma, “Umu naana yow Jew numu, umu tamme-baaꞌyoona suda tuneyugwe.”
Umu meeoo te netammana, “Numme Jew tumayohona mayoho.” Tamme noꞌyoona mu netumooꞌoo ka gi mu Jew tumayohope tumayoho-waꞌneꞌyoona. Umuoo tumayohope gi tamme Roman numu tumayoho-kwaꞌneꞌyoo.
Mu numu unu sutana ka mu Paul noko Silas topagetakooha. Mu numu nehanedu yise mu kwasu tzakebooekwunihoose mu tukwutumadu mu Paul noko Silas wupageta tuungu.
Ka saaꞌa wunaꞌme mu wupagetase, mu wutumetowse mu tueyaꞌedu umu eyaꞌe tuungu.
Mu tueyaꞌedu yise numu kwingaꞌa-kwitu-kwi mu wutumetase, mu kowpa wobe tasekeya-wi tsakunetahoo.
Oona togabeno mu Paul-no Silas nanesootuhina tunekwuꞌupunne, mu susumudu nakwutumadu mu naka.
Soo teepu unu yutsungakooha soo tukwutuma nobe punnoꞌo. Soo tukwutumadu tutzakunedapu wugoomedihoo.
Soo tuꞌeyaꞌedu tupoonnese, ka tukwutuma nobe nanatzakwunaꞌa wuwonetahoopu mu mayuhoo. Oosoo puusoo tooꞌe nabatsowkwu ka tu tsegesa-ma, mu nuutumedadu ka kuowka mee soonammena.
Soo Paul pabatseoo yadooese meeoo oo netamma, “Gi uusoo namaguapana. Numme togesoo noꞌyoonasoo yow.”
Soo tuꞌeyaꞌedu tukootabuakunoo natuungubodote. Ka unu suise ka Paul-baatoo sookweda meahoose mu-kobena meatzedo petugase, ka unu pooha-gaꞌyoo mee mu soobedyana,
oobenakwa yise mu bihoogase mee mu tubenga, “Haꞌoo sakwa nu manese namagwetzoi?”
Umu meeoo oo nanekwegea, “Ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukuse, u namagwetzoikwu noꞌoko umu u nobe-kwitu tuwazoo.”
Umu yise noꞌoko mu nobe-kwitu nokosoo ka Te Naa besa unnepu tuukwe.
Oosoo mu bikease ka tu nuupagetapu-witu baa-ma batzaka, umu yise noꞌyoona oo nobe-kwitu-nosoo baa-wi namatzaka.
Oosoo yise tu nobe-kwitoo mu bikease mu maka. Te Naa nesookwugana noꞌyoona oo sootogeꞌyookute, oo-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe, ka mu Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-no.
Ka tu tabuase, mu numu nehanedu mu tukwutumadu taya ka tukwutuma nobe-kwitoo. “Umu Paul noko Silas tzamaꞌwu,” mee unnena.
Soo tuꞌeyaꞌedu ka Paul meeoo netamma, “Soo mu numu moohedu mumme e tzamaꞌwu tuunguse mu sakwa menoꞌo nanosoo memea.”

Soo Paul mu tukwutumadu meeoo netamma, “Numme umuoosoo numme tzamaꞌwuna soogwaꞌe ka umuoosoo suda mane-kwi. Umu ewow numu-koobenaꞌyoona ne wupageta gisoo ne nehanepana. Umu yise ne wutumeta, tooe numme togesapa Roman numupana. Mu Roman tumaduguna puu gi ꞌyoo ne matugu-waꞌneꞌyoo. Menoꞌo yise mikoo ne watze taꞌya.”
Mu tukwutumadu ka mu numu nehanedu-baa petugase mu tuukwe. “Mu Paul-no Silas mu Roman numu-matu.” Mu numu nehanedu yise unu nakasuaꞌe.
Umu numu tunehanedu yise mu Paul noko Silas-baa, ka tukwutuma nobe-kwi petugase mu tzamaꞌwuoo, suda nesokwamana ka mu kusegase. Umuoo punnoꞌo onoko mu tayahookwu.
Mu Paul-no Silas yise tukwutuma nobe-kwiꞌyoona memeahoose ka nobe-kwi pepetuhooga, ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu oetu meeoo netamma, “Unu ooosapa ka Te Naa unnepu oedyukuno.” Oeꞌyoona yise memea.

Mu Paul-no Silas memeadabena ka tubetse baa kumana memeana ka mu Amphipolis noko Apollonia mee nananeadu-toogoo memease, Thessalonica mee naneadu-kwi pepetuga. Yise ka Jason mee naneadu-baa tooaꞌe. Mu Jew numu o nanesootuhi nobe-gaꞌyoo.

Soo Paul ooka mu Jew numu nanesootuhi nobe-witoo meahoo ka ooosapa maneyina. Yise pahe nasateba-wi nanesootuhibu mu numu tunedyooeyakwe. Soo Paul mu numu ka Te Naa oꞌnosoo unnena tuukweyakwe oo nabo-kwaꞌnesoo hemma manegena.
“Soo Te Pabeꞌe nabatsase yise tuusootabue,” mee soo Paul mu netamma. “Soo Jesus Te Tubetse Pabeꞌe.”

Susumudu mu Jew numu ka Paul noko Silas nakaꞌoedyukute ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu pumme mu tuukwe, ewaꞌyoo wakwawaꞌa punnoꞌo mu Jew-waꞌnesoo nanesootuhidu, yise ewaꞌyoo unu nadatsungadu momokoꞌne punnoꞌo ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukute.

Susumudu mu Jew numu-matu mu nuusoogwedakuna, huuhoo umu totoetzeabu sutakoo nanana ka mu numu ka Paul noko Silas-matoo mu nemanekute. Mu numu yise sumuse, ka Jason nobe-kwi petugonnoga ka Paul noko Silas wategana, mu nehanekwu mee unnena.

Ooonneꞌyoopana yise gi onoko mu maꞌyu. Ka Jason noko susumudu mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu hemmowkase, ka tunehanepe-kwitu mu bihooga. Umu tu tunehanedu meeoo netamma, “Yow mu Paul-no Silas ena noꞌoko teepu-koobakwi suda tuneyugwedu. Yow yise umu menoꞌo pepetu.”
Soo Jason mu numu-matu-no mu tummatzina, mu nabaaꞌyookute. Umu Paul-no Silas gi tamme-kobena katudu oedyukute. Umu pummesoo-kobena katudu oedyukudu, Mu Pabeꞌe Jesus mee naneadu.
Mu numu, mu pumme moohedu-no naka sutaꞌa ka mu unnena nakase.
Umu ka Jason umu-kooba tumanaga tuunguse, oꞌno umu mu tzamaꞌwukwu.
Oꞌno togano mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu mu Paul noko Silas taya ona Berea mee naneadu-kwitoo. Mu Paul-no Silas yise Berea-wi pepetugase ka mu Jew numu-no nanesootuhaꞌe.

Mu otuoo Jew numu ka mu Jew numu Thessalonica-witu ooonakwa besaꞌyoo, umu ka Te Naa unnepu-witu besa nakasoobedyana. Umu ooosapa ka Te Naa besa unnepu nabona neadu, ka Paul unnena soonakatogeꞌyookuna.
Ewaꞌyoo Jew numu oo soonakaꞌoedyukute, umu Greek momokoꞌne ewa hemma hee-ga-nosoo, ewaꞌyoo Greek naana punnoꞌo.
Mu Jew numu Thessalonica-witu oo naka ka Paul ka Te Naa unnepu mu numu Berea-witu oo tuukwe. Umu yise o petugase, susumudu mu numu otuoo ka Paul tumooꞌoona ka mu numu ka Paul ooemota mu tooe neyugwe.
Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu otuoo yise ka Paul taꞌyase, mu Silas-no Timothy yise oso. Susumudu mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka Paul-no mea, oona ka tubetse baa-tamme.
Ka Athens mee naneadu-wi petugase, soo Paul umu puno kemmadu punowsoo taꞌya, ka mu Silas noko Timothy yabesoo umu bi tuunguna.

Ka mu Silas noko Timothy gisoo o pepetuga, soo Paul oona ka Athens-dootu sootsemadyinnumme. Ewaꞌyoo mu numusoo tumadabuena pummatoo mu nanesootuhidyina otuoo. Soo Paul suda soonamme ka pumatoo mu nanesootuhina ewow onoko poonnena.

Ka mu Jew numu nanesootuhi tabeba oe maneyakwe, soo Paul meayina mu Jew numu noko mu wakwawaꞌa nanesootuhibu tunedyooꞌe. Nonotsa tabeno ka Athens-witoo meayina ka mu numu hemma-ma tumudu Te Naa-witu tuukweyakwe.

Susumudu mu numu atakoosoo nanesootuhibu Epicurean noko Stoic mee nananeadu-matu oonow. Paul umu-no yadooꞌa. Meeoo umu unakwe ka Paul pumme tuukwe, soo Te Pabeꞌe tu yaꞌe-kwiꞌyoona namayodapu meeꞌe. Susumudu umu-matu meeoo nananetamma, “Oosoo Paul ooosapa sukwe yadooadu.” Susumudu punnoꞌo meeoo, “Oosoo sumuna wakwawaꞌa naa nanesootuhi yadooawabe gi toogoope-gakoo te tuukwe.”
Umu yise oona ka tu tunehaneyi-kwitoo ka Paul bika Areopagus mee naneadu-kwitoo. Umu yise meeoo oo netamma, “Yaanona u tooe hemma tooe ne mesoo tuukwekwu ka u tunaka-kwitu.
Numme gi ooonnekoo nakadu. Menoꞌo numme oo pudu nakakwu. Numme yise punnoꞌo oo nakasopedakwadookwu.”

Mu numu oetuooo ooonneꞌyoo. Susumudu umu-matu Athens-witoo nadooamu-doopu, umu-matu punnoꞌo oto nowuꞌapu ooosapa meeoo apegeamodu, besow pudu tusoohanepe tooetoo besa naꞌunnedu tutunakakwuna sookwipunnedu.
Soo Paul ka mu tunehanedu-kobena wunuse, meeoo mu netamma, “Nu mu sopedakwadoo mu unu nanesootuhaꞌe.

Nu ka mana nummennummena ewow hemma mummesoo tumadabuena pummatoo mu nanesootuhidyina poonne. Nu sumuoo ka pukoobaꞌyoona mu nanesootuhidyina poonne, meeoo oo-ma natuboꞌo, ‘Pu-matoo ka mu nanesootuhidyina gi mu nakasopedakwadoona.’ Menoꞌo nu ooka mu tuukwekwu mu tookwa ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhi, pana gi oo sopedakwatoo.
Soo Te Naa noꞌoko hemma nemadugoopedoopu, noꞌoko hemma manumudoopu, ka yaa teepu-koobatu noꞌoko tamme-koobawitoo tuwazoo, ka taba, muha, yise noꞌoko mu paatoozoobu.
Gi soo Te Naa tamme-makoo hemma soogwaꞌe ka puu te matabuepu-gana te songapu makase, tamme oo-ma yutsungamoꞌo te sootuhaꞌe ka hemma te soogwaꞌe.
Sumuoo mogoꞌne noko nana mooe matabuepu, umu-maꞌyoona yise tamme ewa numu manepetuga. Mooasoo soo Te Naa hemma nemamakwu.
Oꞌno sumuna mu numu Te Naa watena, yise unusoo manena oetu nakasopedakwadoo. Umu sumuna oetu nakasopedakwadoo pana gi oo unu namanakwe ooka te nakasopedakwadoona. Yow yise soo Te Naa.
Soo Te Naa gwetzoibu te sootuhipu. Mooasoo mu oo sopedakwadoo soo mu hoobeabe bodu meeoo unakwe ka oo bona. ‘Yow tamme ka Te Naa dooamu.’

Tamme oo sopedakwadoo ka Te Naa, gi oosoo mu numu tumadabuena pummatoo mu nanesootuhi-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Soo numu ka hemma matabuekwuse, oetuoo mooe soohanese, yise oo matabue. Tupe-ma, weehepu-ma, tooetoo oa tupe-ma oo matabue. Soo Te Naa God gi ooonneꞌyoo.
Mu gi ooosapa besa tusooyugwedu soo Te Naa ooonneꞌyoopana mu nakasootuhi. Menoꞌo soo Te Naa noꞌoko numu tooe hanotu tooe meeꞌe netamma, ‘Mu sakwa suda mu tumaduguna maꞌwu.

Pudusoo ka teepu atasoo nu yugwekoo, nu bebesow mu-nagatu sootuhikwu, mu sutakoo numu soo sutaꞌyoo umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.’ Soo Te Pabeꞌe namayodapu ka oo yaꞌekwikoo, ooonneꞌyoona soo Te Naa noꞌobatusoo numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-toohakwi sootuhikwu ka pumme mu nakaꞌoedyukute,” meeꞌe soo Paul ka mu tunehanedu netamma.

Umu ka oo nakase, ka numu yaꞌena namayoda-witu pumme oo tuukwese nanaꞌatasoo tusooyugwe. Susumudu umu-matu ka Paul-maꞌyoona nanekoꞌe. Umu-matu meeoo unakwe, “Numme owetuoosoo unu besa soonakasopedakwadoo.”

Umu-matu yise tunakaꞌoedyukudu mane: ka mu tunehanedu-matu Dionysius mee naneadu, mogoꞌne Damaris mee naneadu yise huuꞌyootooe numu tunakaꞌoedyuku mane punnoꞌo. Soo Paul yise ka mu tunehane-kwiꞌyoona mea.
Ka saaꞌa soo Paul yise ka Athens-wiꞌyoona mease, ona ka Corinth mee naneadu-wi petuga.

Sumuꞌyoo Jew nana, Aquila mee naneadu Pontus-wiꞌyoona kemmana ooweoo nobe-gaꞌyoo. Ka tu nodukwa Priscilla mee naneadu-no ka Rome mee naneadu-kwi ka teepu Italy mee naneadu-wi uga nobe-gaꞌyoo. Soo Rome numu moohedu Claudius mee naneadu, ka mu Jew numu ka Rome-wikoo taꞌya. Mu Aquila tu nodukwa-no ka Corinth-wi pudu pepetuga. Soo Paul umu-baa nobe-gana,
umu-no ka tutzekadukupe matabuꞌe.
Ka mu Jew numu nanesootuhi tabeba oe maneyakwe, soo Paul ka mu Jew numu nanesootuhi nobe-kwi petudyakwe, ka wakwawaꞌa noko soo Jesus Te Pabeꞌe meeꞌe mu tunedyooꞌe.

Mu Silas-no Timothy Macedonia-wiꞌyoona memeakwate. Ka Corinth-wi pepetugase, soo Paul ka tu tutzekadukupe tu matabueyina maꞌwukase, ka mu Jew numu nonoꞌotsa tabeno mee mu tuukweyakwe, “Soo Jesus o Te Tubetse Pabeꞌe.”

Oꞌno yise mu Jew numu ka Te Naa noko ka Paul tumooꞌoo. Soo Paul ka umu suda manakwe mee soonammena, meeoo mu netamma, “Muusoo gi Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukuna, soo Te Naa gi mu sootuhaꞌe. Gi nuga mane-kwi nu mooasoo Te Pabeꞌe unnena mu tooꞌe tuukwe. Menoꞌo yise nu mu tsasobedya nu nanesootuhibu mu wakwawaꞌa sukwe tunedyooꞌe.”
Ka mu Jew nanesootuhi nobe-wiꞌyoona yise mease, oona sumuoo gi Jew numu-matu nana Titus Justus mee naneadu-baa tooi petuga. Esoo nana Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu.

Oo nobe oonahoo ka mu Jew nanesootuhidu moohedu Crispus mee naneadu noꞌoko ka tu nobe-kwitu-no Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyuku mane. Ewaꞌyoo mu numu Corinth-witu ka Paul naka, umu yise tunakaꞌoedyukudu manedu, baa-wi namatzaka.
Sumu togano soo Paul meeoo nose, soo Te Pabeꞌe-ga mee oo netamma, “Gi nu-kwitoo umu numu u tuukwe-ma suipana.
Nu yow u-notusoo ewaꞌyoo tuwazoo mu numu yaatuoo nuka sootogeꞌyookute. U yow nu-mama naduya manepunnedu. Gi haga u matzooeku-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
Sumu tomona naapahe muha, soo Paul ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-baaꞌyoona ka Te Naa unnepu-witu mu tunedyooꞌe.
Soo nana, Gallio mee naneadu ka eweoo teepu Greece mee naneadu pudu nehanedu mane. Mu Jew numu nananemooedyugwese, ka Paul tumooꞌoo oo-ma tzakaduhoose, ka tunehanepe-kobena oo bi petuhoo.
Yise meeoo ka Gallio netamma, “Esoo nana ka mu numu atasoo tumayoho tuunguna gi numme tumayoho-waꞌne.”
Gisoo ka Paul yadooꞌa soo Gallio mee mu Jew numu netamma, “E nakapunne mu Jew numu. Oosoo Paul gi suda manakwe, nu gi mu nakabetseakwu.
Mu sukwe nanepetukute. Mumme tumayohope-wiꞌyoona muusoo sakwa oo nemadabuꞌe nu gi ooka mu nemadabueku-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
Noꞌoko yise ka tunehanepe-wikoo mu tayahoo.
Umu Jew numu yise ka pumme nanesootuhi moohedu Sosthenes mee naneadu ka tunehane nobe-kobenaꞌyoona unu mooedyugwe. Soo Gallio gi haꞌyoo mu netamma.

Wunaꞌme manepetuga soo Paul ka Corinth-wi. Saaꞌa mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-baaꞌyoona mea, mu Priscilla-no Aquila, ono mangeka ka teepu Syria-tamme. Ka Cenchrae mee naneadu-wi petugase, ka Te Naa tu nagena tzapoonnena tu tzopuhu tsekaꞌa.
Meadabena ka Ephesus mee naneadu-wi petuga, soo Paul ka mu Jew numu nanesootuhi nobe-wi petugase, soo Paul ka mu Jew numu-no yadooakwuse, otuoo mu numu oesoo nenuummakute.
Soo Paul yise mee mu netamma, “Gi nu. Nu saaꞌa kodyu petudooa, ka Te Naa nuka meeoo netamma.” Mu Priscilla-no Aquila oso mamani, puu suuꞌmu soo Paul ka Ephesus-wiꞌyoona mea.
Ka Caesarea mee naneadu-wi petugase, mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-no nanesootuhi. Oꞌnona meadabena ka Antioch-wi petuga.

O tooe huudooe tabemea, mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-baa. Ooosapa meadabena ka mu teepu Galatia-no Phrygia mee naneadu-too meana, mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka Te Naa-witu tuukwe ooka mu nakaꞌoedyuku-kwitoo mu nenoyukwe meꞌa.
Sumuꞌyoo Jew nana Alexandria-witoo nadooaꞌadoopu, Apollos mee naneadu, unu soonammena oo sopedakwatoo ka Te Naa unnena nabotuguna.
Oosoo Apollos mooasoo oo nakapana gisoo ka Te Naa po-witu natunedyooepu, ka Te Pabeꞌe po-witu mu tuukwekwuse sapa, ka John baa-wi numu matzakayina suuꞌmu oetu sopedakwadoona, ka Ephesus-wi petu.
Mu yadooekooha gi mu numu-ma suina, ka mu Jew nanesootuhi nobe-wiꞌyoona. Mu Priscilla-no Aquila oo nakase, oo-matoo kekemmase, ewasoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu hemma oo tuukweꞌe.

Saaꞌa soo Apollos mee tusooyugwe, “Nu sakwa Greece-witoo natsemangega,” Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu meeoo oo netamma, “U oto mea.” Umu yise mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-matoo tubose, mu tuukwe, “Soo Apollos unnena togesapa.” Soo Apollos ka o petugase, ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu netummatzaꞌe. Soo Te Naa yise mu nakasootuhina,
ewow numu tzapoonnekute ka mu Jew unnena gi togekoo. Soo Te Naa oo tzapoonne soo Jesus togesapa Te Pabeꞌe mee oo nabotugu.

Soo Paul ka Apollos togesoo Corinth-wikoo sogo meadabenona ka Ephesus mee naneadu-kwi petuga. Sumumano waha-ma tsebooekudu (12) naana o, mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu. Soo Paul mu mayuse, mu tubenga, “Soo Te Naa haaꞌa Tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma mu sootuhi, ka tunakaꞌoedyuku mu manese?” Umu meeoo oo nanekwegea, “Numme gi ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-witu nakadu.” Soo Paul tuwazoo meeoo mu tubenga, “Hownnekoo mu nasootuhise ka baa-wi namatzaka?” Umu meeoo oo tuukweꞌe, “Soo John oetu numu tuukweyina yise numu matzakayakwe oo numme yugweyakwe ka tunakaꞌoedyuku ne maneyakwe.” Soo Paul yise meeoo mu netamma, “Soo John baa-wi numu matzaka ka sutakoo podo mu meadabepu mu nematzakakwunise, yise ka Te Naa besa podo mu meadape. Meeoo soo John mu tuukwekwunaꞌe. ‘Sumuꞌyoo ka saaꞌa e-nakwi kemmadooa. Ooka sakwa mu nakaꞌoedyuku.’ Soo John netammana Te Pabeꞌe Jesus mee naneꞌa.” Mu numu ka Paul unnena nakase, baa-wi namatzaka ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Soo Paul yise tu mi-ma mu wo-ma matuguyina, soo Te Naa yise tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma mu sootuhiyakwe. Umu yise nanakummaꞌakoosoo yadooa-ma apegeagonno, ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-ma oo unnena wahakono.
Pahe muha-wi soo Paul mu Jew numu nanesootuhibu tunedyooeyakwe ewa ka Te Naa besow po-witu mu tuukwena. Soo Paul gi umu-ma suaꞌe.

Susumudu mu Jew-matu tusoomatzooekuna gi oo nakaꞌoedyukuna, suda ka Te Naa-witu netamma ka numu ewa-kwiꞌyoona. Soo Paul yise umu punnoꞌo Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu-no ka Jew nanesootuhi nobe-kwiꞌyoona meꞌa.

Waha tommo petuga, umu ka nonoꞌotsa tabeno ka natunedyooe nobe Tyrannus mee naneadu-kwitoo numu tunedyooebodona. Paul ka Te Pabeꞌe unnena noꞌobatusoo numu modu tunedyooꞌe ka teepu Asia mee naneadu-kwiꞌyoona.
Soo Te Naa yise ka Paul ewow Tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma sootuhise oosoo yise ewahoo numu mabesaku.
Mu numu besa mayugweyakwe. Susumudu numu ka wanapu noko kwasu-matu natzakebooena ka Paul-makoo tuhanena, ka mu tuoegoedu-matu hemedyakwe. Mu tuoegoedu yise besa maneyakwe, mu tzoapugoedu punnoꞌo.

Susumudu Jew numu mu tsoapa madidu mana tooe manemoꞌo ka mu tsoapa tooꞌe nematzagakwunina. Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe pooha-ma gi nasootuhipu, mu tsoapa sukwe tooꞌe tayakwunina ka Jesus nanea-ma. Umu meeoo ka tsoapa netammayakwe, “Nu u tayakwunaꞌe ka Paul ooosapa wahana ka Jesus nanea-ma.”
Natakwatsukwuꞌyoo (7) nanakwanngaꞌamu ka Jew nanesootuhidu moohedu, Sceva mee naneadu dooamu, uga tsoapa nematzagakwunidu. Umu ka tsoapa tooꞌe nematzagakwuni,
pana soo tsoapa gi meꞌa, meeoo mu sukwe nanekwegea, “Nu ka Jesus sopedakwatoo, ka Paul tuwazoo. Mumme nu gi sopedakwadoo. Mu gi umu-waꞌneꞌyoo. Hownneꞌyoo mu?”
Soo tsoapayaedu nana umu-koobatoo nadawunihoose, mu kwasu magebooekwunihoose, unu mu moomooedyugwese yise ka nobe-kwikoo mu matzayubahoo.
Noꞌyoona numu ka o nakase Te Pabeꞌe pooha nesookwugaꞌe, “Besaꞌyoo,” mee ka Te Pabeꞌe Pooha netamma.
Oꞌno yise ewaꞌyoo mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka suda tu manena nanekwahamena.

Ka tu manepu mu numu uga poohadu ka sutakoo tu pooha pukwi nanabotuguna ka mu numu-kobena hane petuse mu tunaꞌe. Ooonnekoo mu tzapoonnemena ka suda tu manena maꞌwukwuse oo nemawunina. Ka oetu tu nasoohane-kwi mu manenaga sumuna tubetse ewa nanenaga.
Ka ꞌyoo tu namane-kwi soo Te Naa unnena umu-tamme nanakasopedakwadoo manekese, ewaꞌyoo numu ka Te Naa unne-kwitu nakaꞌoedyuku manepetu.
Obenakwa, soo Paul meeoo soonamme, “Nu sakwa mana ka teepu Macedonia noko Greece-too mease, ka Jerusalem mee naneadu-kwitoo. Onona yise ka Rome mee naneadu-kwitoo mea.”
Waahoo nanana pumme tummatzidu, Timothy-no Erastus mee nananeadu, mooe taya nakobenasoo Macedonia-witoo. Sagwane wunaꞌme o ka Asia mee naneadu teepu-kooba.

Ka gisoo Ephesus-wiꞌyoona oo meꞌa ewaꞌyoo numu Paul tuaganena ka Te Pabeꞌe unnepu-witu oo waha. Mu numu otuoo, gi Jew numu, Artemis mee naneadu numu tumadabue-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe. Ka pabow nanesootuhi nobe-kwi soo Artemis namadabuꞌe Ephesus-wi.
Soo Demetrius mee naneadu ka esekweehepu-ma ka mu nanesootuhi nobe-kwaꞌne tutugutse tumadabuena ka umu pumme tummatzidu-no ewa oo-ma tumuꞌu. Mu numu yise tu nobe-kwi oo hanena oo-matoo nanesootuhi.
Noꞌoko pukwaꞌne tumadabuedu nesumuse, meeꞌe mu netamma, “E pupuaꞌamu tamme ꞌyoo te tumadabue-ma gwetzoi.

Esoo nana Paul yise ka mu numu meeoo netamma, ‘Gi ka numu tumadabue-matoo nanesootuhipana. Umu gi hee, gi toogoope-gaꞌyoo.’ Ewaꞌyoo numu oo nakabetseꞌa yow Ephesus-wi tuwazoo mana noꞌoko ka teepu Asia-kooba.

Ka saaꞌa mu numu gi te tumadabuena petzabekwu, tamme Artemis nanesootuhi nobe noko ka Artemis tuwazoo gi petzabekwu. Esoo Artemis paba nanenagadu pummatoo mu nanesootuhina noꞌyoona Asia-koobatu noko yise ka te teepu-koobakwitu.”
Umu ka ekow nakase, unu nakasagwaꞌe. Noꞌyoona yise waꞌagekoohase meeoo unnegonno, “Soo Artemis pummatoo ne nanesootuhina, Ephesus-wi naduyadu.”

Pudusoo numu noꞌoko ka ootuoo nakase, umu-baa manekakwu. Umu waahoo ka Paul pupuaꞌamu-ma tzakatu Gaius noko Aristarchus mee nananeadu ka Paul-no Macedonia-wiꞌyoona kekemmadu, yise pabow pukwikoo mu tunehaneyi-kwitoo mu bihooka.
Soo Paul oetoo tooꞌe nemeꞌa, ka mu numu ewa-kwikoo mu yadooekwu mee soonammena pana mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi oetuoo oo meakute.
Susumudu umu numu mooedu-matu Paul pupuaꞌamu mee oo tuyatuukweꞌe, “Gi ka mu tunehane-kwitoo meapana.”
Mu numu nanaꞌatasoo waꞌagemoꞌo ka gi oo sopedakwatoona ka pukwitu mu nanesumuna.
Sumuꞌyoo Jew, Alexander mee naneadu oe. Susumudu mu numu-matu ono apegea.
Mu numu ka oo Jew oo sopedakwatoo oosoo gi Artemis-matoo nanesootuhidu, umu yise pabasoo waꞌagekooha Atemis pummatoo ne nanesootuhina unu naduyadu. Ooosapa waꞌagegonno wunaꞌmetoo.

Mu tunehanedu tubowabe mu numu yadooena mee mu netamma, “E pupuaꞌamu, noꞌyoona numu oo sopedakwatoo tamme yow Ephesus-witu ka pabow Artemis nanesootuhi nobe mabetseadu. Tamme ka pooha tupe paꞌanakwana tamme-matoo wuepu hee-gaꞌyoo.
Noꞌyoona numu te sopedakwatoo, tamme togesapa ka Artemis-matoo nanesootuhidu.
Umu nanana mu bi petuna, gi hemma tuduha ka te nanesootuhi nobe-kwitu. Gi umu ena suda tuukwe, ka Artemis-witu.
Tamme tunehanewabe-gana tunehaneyakwe tuwazoo. Mu Demetrius umu punotu-no ka haꞌyoo numu soonetammana umu sakwa mu tunehane-witoo meeoo mu netamma.
Mu ka ewasoo haꞌyoo sooꞌunena mu sakwa tunehanepe-kwikoo nanemadabue.
Gi tamme haꞌyoo ka Roman numu-kooba katudu tuukwe-waꞌneꞌyoo, haꞌoo manena tamme yaa tabeno sumuꞌu. Umu sumuna mee te netamma ka te nanagoꞌe.
Mu sakwa noꞌyoona nobe-kwitoosoo kodyuka.”
Ka saaꞌa hemma namamakwuse, soo Paul noꞌoko mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu nesumuse mu yadooꞌe, ka Te Pabeꞌe unnepu-witu mu tuukwena. Yise ka Ephesus-wiꞌyoona natzemangeka ka Macedonia mee naneadu teepu-witoo.
Ka meadabena ewow tunakaꞌoedyukudu tunedyooemena ka Greece mee naneadu teepu-kooba petuga.
Pahe muha yise o. Syria-witoo natzemangekakwuse, ka mu Jew numu pumme batsayagate mu sopedakwatoona. “Nu sakwa kodyu Macedonia-too ka Jerusalem-witoo,” mee soo Paul tusooyugwe.
Ewaꞌyoo numu oo-no mea
Noꞌyoona mu naana ka natzemangekase, ka Troas mee naneadu-kwi petuga. O ne wutooekwu. Nu Luke, yise Paul punnoꞌo.

Numme Philippi-wi gi namayudu tukaba mu ewa tukakwuse pepetuga. Numme yise umu-baaꞌyoona ka Philippi-wiꞌyoona memease natzemangekase, ka Troas mee naneadu-kwitoo. Manege tabe mease, numme ka umu-baa pepetuga ka Troas-wi. O numme sumu nasate.
Naapahe tu tabemeanoꞌo togano, numme nanano sumu nanesootuhina atsa baa hebena tukaba tukakwuse. Paul wunaꞌme mu yadooꞌe ka oogow moooꞌa Troas-wiꞌyoona meakwuse.
Togabeno maneka numme ka nobe-kwikoo ewa tugootabuekuna. Pahe nana-kooba aatadu nobe-wiꞌyoona, ka numu sumu-koobatu-wi numme.

Sumuꞌyoo tooebetse Eutychus mee naneadu ka naboonneꞌe natsatawaga-wi katu. Unu uwegapana ka Paul unnena naka katu. Uꞌweoogase, yise ka naboonneꞌe natsatawaga-wiꞌyoona wuehoo. Mooasoo oo yaꞌehoose umu oo tooꞌe tsagwuuhoo.
Soo Paul umu-matoo wuegase, ka oo-koobakwi habehoose oo hedapunnese oo yaꞌe-kwikoo oo tzakodyuhoo mu numu yise meeoo netammadooa, “Gi suda sokwamapana. Mooasoo nu a nemagwetzoihoo.”
Oobe paꞌatusoo meaꞌase, umu noꞌyoona nanesootuhina ka Te Pabeꞌe pumme tunetammapu mayoho. Soo Paul yise ka tu tabatsebooe-witoo tooe mu yadooꞌe. Soo Paul mu yadooemakwuse mea.
Umu ka tooebetse gwetzoihoodu tu nobe-witoo bikase, yise unu besa sokwama.
Ka Jerusalem-tamme numme meana ka Ephesus tzageꞌetoo natzemangeka. Soo Paul oto sogo meakwu mee unnega.
Assos-wiꞌyoona numme-baa sake-wi tsebooese, noꞌyoona numme natsemangega ka Mitylene-witoo.

Oogow moooꞌa numme tuwazoo natsemangega ka tuutse pagadudu ooenapatoo Chios mee naneadu-witoo. Oogow moooꞌa tuwazoo numme yise ka Samos mee naneadu-witoo. Oogow moooꞌa tuwazoo numme yise ka Miletus mee naneadu-kwi petuga.
Jerusalem-witu mu ewa tuka tzageꞌe manegena umu ka Te Naa nesookwugaꞌena ka tu tumasuana besa suꞌa. Oꞌno petugakwu mee soo Paul soonammena, ka Ephesus ka teepu Asia mee naneadu-wi gi yoowaꞌe.
Soo Paul ka Miletus-wi petugase Ephesus-witoo sumuoo taya mu wakwaꞌetse-matoo, mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu moohedu Ephesus-wi nobe-gaꞌyoo nabatoo mu bi tuunguna.
Ka pu-baa mu petuse, meeoo mu netamma. “Mu e sopedakwatoo, nu ka Te Naa besa podo ooosapa meadape. Nu ka mu-baaꞌyoona yaa Asia teepu-koobaꞌyoona.
Nu ka Te Naa nakabetseꞌa, ‘Nu mu ooonakwa besaꞌyoo,’ mee gi soonammena. Nu yagana ka Te Naa-matoo mu nanesootuhikute. Nu ka mu-baaꞌyoona ooosapa suta-kwi ka mu Jew nuka tumooꞌoo.
Nu gi suina noꞌoko hemma mu tuukweꞌe mumme tummatzi-waꞌnekoo tooe haga tooe-kobenaꞌyoona mu nobe-kwitu tuwazoo.
Nu mu Jew noko mu wakwawaꞌa meeoo netamma ka sutakoo po maꞌwukase ka Te Naa besa podo mea. Ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna.
Menoꞌo yise soo e pooha meeꞌe e netamma, ‘Jerusalem-witoo mea,’ pana nu gi oo sopedakwatoo how hemma manekwuna ka onona.
Eka suuꞌmu nu sopedakwatoo noꞌoko Te Naa Besa Pooha mee e tuukweyakwe nu nakwutumakwu yise ewa suda namanedu nu-tamme kemmakwu.
Pana gi hownneꞌyoo. Oosoo gi hee. Nu gi nuusoo namabetsea, nu ka Te Pabeꞌe nuka netamma mamakwukwu. Noꞌoko numu nu ka besa naꞌunnedu tuukwekwu. Oosoo te magwetzoaꞌe ka te soobedyana.”
Soo Paul meeoo tuwazoo mu netamma, “Nu mooasoo mu tuukwepu ka Te Naa besa podo a nameadabena. Menoꞌo nu oo sopedakwatoo mu gi ka teepu-koobakoosoo e poonne-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Nu gi suina noꞌoko mu tuukwe ka Te Naa manekwuna. Gi nuga manena mu ka Te Naa besa po maꞌwukase, ka yaꞌese, gi Te Naa-matoo mease.

Muusoo noꞌyoona nanamabetseana soo Te Naa Besa Pooha umu tunakaꞌoedyukudu mu mabetsea tuungu ka umu Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukudu-nokosoo. Oosoo Te Pabeꞌe doodooamu mu mayugwe ka Te Pabeꞌe mu-koobatoo nabatsase.
Nu oo sopedakwatoo ka e mease, saaꞌa ewaꞌyoo etzaꞌa mu-baa petuse mu tooꞌe nemooagana tooe haꞌyoo tooe mu netammakwu. Ewow sumuna mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu kadoo mayugwekwu.
Mu-matu sumuna ka etzaꞌa podo manese, umu ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukudu esayikuna tooe haꞌyoo tooe mu tuukwena, umu ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tooꞌe neꞌemukwakuna.
Unu besa sapa, nu pahe tommoka ooosapa ka Te Naa-witu meeoo mu tooꞌe tuukwegena ka mu-koobatoo tutuha nasooyugwena.
Menoꞌo yise nu ka Te Naa mumme sootuhi tuungu oo unnepu-noko ka numu oo sootuhina unu tunakaꞌoedyuku mu mayugwekwu. Soo Te Naa mu sootuhikwu tu unne-kwaꞌnesoo ka umu tu besa podo meadabedu-nokosoo.
Nu gi mu-makoo hemma soogwaꞌe.
Mu, mooasoo e sopedakwatoo, nuusoo e tukapu noko pukwi e kwasuena tumuꞌu umu nu-notu punnoꞌo ooosoo.

Mu e manena poonne ka mu tutuha manedu e tummatzaꞌe, mu sakwa punnoꞌo ooosoo. Mu oo soomaꞌyu ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme mee netamma, ‘Tamme besa nasootuhikwu ka kummaꞌakoosoo hemma numu tummatzina gi ka kummaꞌakoosoo numu-makoo hemma sookwipunnena.’ “
Soo Paul yise ka tunemamakwuse, meatzedose, nanesootuhikooha.
Noꞌyoona umu oo-baatu sukwina oo hedana oo mootuhina ka oo tubetse meakwuse.
Umu suda sokwama ka meeoo pumme oo netamma, “Nu gi hannanoꞌo mu-baasoo kodyu petu-waꞌneꞌyoo.” Umu yise ka sake-witoo o-no mea pana, gi o-no oe kuꞌa.
Numme mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-baaꞌyoona mea. Numme Jerusalem-tamme natzemangeka
Numme mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu onoko mayuse umu-baa naapahe tooipunne. Ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi umu ka Paul meeoo netamma, “Gi Jerusalem-witoo meapana.” Pana oosoo gi mu nakabetsea.
Ka ne mea-kwi oo manepetugase numme ka sake-witoo mea. Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu numme-no ne takwunikakwuse: nanana, momokoꞌne, tu doodooamano. Numme oona pakumaba petugase, meatzedose, nanesootuhaꞌe.
Numme mu maꞌwukase ka sake-wi tzoonooaka, umu yise nobe-kwitoo kodyu.
Meadabena numme ka Ptolemais mee naneadu-kwi petuga. O numme mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu nobeꞌnge umu-baa numme tooi.

Ooga moooꞌa numme mea ka Caesarea mee naneadu-kwitoo. Philip mee naneadu mu nanesootuhidu tunedyooedu o nobe-gaꞌyoo. Oosoo umu natakwatsukwuꞌyoo-matu (7) a nanetutzeana ka mu gi koomamu-gakoo pepeawabe mabetseadu.
Oosoo watsukweoo tsutsuꞌa padumu-gaꞌyoo ka hemma manekwuna numu tuukwedu. Umu-baa numme.
Huuꞌoo tooise, sumuꞌyoo nana Agabus mee naneadu o petu ka teepu Judea mee naneadu-wiꞌyoona kemmadu. Oosoo punnoꞌo umu-waꞌneꞌyoosoo ka hemma how manekwuna numu tuukweyakwe.

Oosoo numme-baa petu. Oona ka Paul nate natuku oo gwuuꞌhoo. Ka nate-ma tu mi noko tu kuku namatzakunase, meeoo ne netamma, “Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha meeoo soo numu eka nate hee-gaꞌyoo mu Jew Jerusalem-witu yooonnekoo oo tzakunakwu. Oo oo yugwese umu ka mu wakwawaꞌa moohedu oo tzageakwu.”
Numme ka o nakase, numme ka mu numu-no ka Paul tooꞌe nenuumakute, “Gi Jerusalem-witoo meapana,” meeoo oo netammana.
Soo Paul mee ne sukwe netamma, “Gi sukwipana mu suda e nesoonnumme. Ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-koobatoo oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo tooe e tzakunapana. E batsase sapa gi hownneꞌyoo.”
Soo Paul gi ne nakabetseꞌa. Numme oo nemaꞌwuse gi hayoosoo ooetuooo netamma. Nummesoo meeoo nananetamma, “Oo-toogoo manekwu.”
Oꞌno yise numme namahanese ka Jerusalem-witoo mea.
Susumudu Caesarea-witu tunakaꞌoedyukudu numme-no mease oona Mnason nobe-kwitoo ne bikea. O yise numme tooikwu.
Numme Jerusalem-wi petuga, mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu besa numme-matoo sokwama ka pu-baa ne petugase.
Oogow moooꞌa soo Paul numme-no mea ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu moohedu, James mee naneadu-no ne apegeakwuse. Noꞌyoona mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu moohedu oe.
Soo Paul noꞌoko tu nummepu-witu mu tuukwe, “Soo Te Naa mu wakwawaꞌa sootuhi ka pumme mu nakaꞌoedyukute ka nuga unne-wi.”

Ookow nakase, mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu moohedu noꞌyoona ka Te Naa nesookwugaꞌe mee unnena, “Te Naa besaꞌyoona numu nakasootuhiyakwe ka mu wakwawaꞌa besa tu sootuhi-kwaꞌne.” Oꞌno yise ka Paul meeoo netamma, “Yow tamme-nagatu mu Jew numu tumayoho-kwi umu tooesoo oo nakaꞌoedyukute.
Ewaꞌyoo numu u-kwitu naka u ka mu Jew numu mu wakwawaꞌa-nagatu mee netamma, ‘Gi ka Jew tumayohona mayohopana,’ meeoo u-kwitu tu nanaꞌesagoena numme naka.
Umu ka u petuse oo naka.
U sakwa ka te tumayohona besa oo-toogoo a nameana mu tzapoonneku. Watsukweꞌyoo naana numme-notu ka Te Naa meeoo netamma, ‘Numme mu Jew numu tumayohope mayohokwu.’
U sakwa namahanese umu-no mease, oetoo mu natunekwina tumanaka. Oꞌno yise ka mu tumamakwuse, mu tzopuhu noꞌoko wutseba. U ka oo manena noꞌyoona numu u sopedakwadookwu ka te tumayohona u mayohose.

Gi hownneꞌyoo mu wakwawaꞌa ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu, ka mu Jew numu tumayohona gi mayohona. Mooasoo numme umu wakwawaꞌa-matoo tubopu mee naꞌunnedu, ‘Gi hownneꞌyoo mu ka Jew tumayohona gi mayohona. Yoo sakwa mu sukwe mane. Gi ka numu tumadabuena pumatoo mu nanesootuhina nabeamakapu tukapana, puu-gakoo a tookoo tuwazoo. Gi nanakummaꞌakoosoo numu aahe pootammapana.’ “

Ookow moooꞌa soo Paul namahanese, ka mu watsukwuoo nanana-no, yise ka pabow nanesootuhi nobe-witoo meaꞌa. Meeoo mu tuukwena, “Pudusoo tamme Jew tumayohope namamakwuse noꞌyoona ka Te Naa hemma nabeamakakwu.”

Sumu nasateka mu Jew numu putoogoo ka tu nanesootuhina mu mayohokwuse. Mooasoo oo namamakwugaꞌa, mu Jew numu Asia-witu kemmana, ka Paul wohonedu, ka Paul poonne oona ka pabatsekoo nanesootuhi nobe-wikoo. Umu oo-ma tzakaduse, papaba apegeakooha,

ka mu ewow numu oetu meeoo netammabodote, “Ne nanumu, yabe ne tummatzi. Yaaꞌa esoo sutaꞌyoo nana, ka mana tooe hano tooe numu tunedyooena tamme numu nekwohonena, te tumayohona tumooꞌoodu, ka te nanesootuhi nobe nokosoo. Menoꞌo yise masoo te nanesootuhi nobe totsakute ka mu wakwawaꞌa, gi Jew numu, eka te pooha nobe-wi bi petuse.”
Umudoo ka Paul nesootzemana ka sumuoo wawaꞌa
Ewaꞌyoo mu numu Jerusalem-witu sumukooha, ka nanesootuhi nobe-wikoo puuwanatoo ka Paul tzabewoꞌyowkase, ka natzakwonaꞌa tzadumow.
Umu yise oo tooꞌe batsowkwu. Oꞌno yise mu Roman tukwutumadu pabeꞌe oo nakahoo ka namaniwunudu.
Mu tukwutumadu ka mu numu sumu-kwitoo tatanomanega. Mu numu ka putamme mu tatanomanegena mu poonnese, ka Paul tu yugwegonnona maꞌwuhoo.
Mu tukwutumadu ka Paul-baa petugonnose, oo mi-ma tzakadu yise waahoo tukwutumadu naamookwi namaꞌwetzogoeyakuhoo. Mu moohedu meeoo yise mu numu tubenga, “Haga esoo nana? How suda esoo manakwe?”
Mu numu nanaꞌatasoo unnegonno soo tukwutumadu moohedu gi mu nakasopedakwatoo. Soo mu moohedu ka mu tukwutumadu yise meeoo netamma, “Oona tamme pukwiꞌyookwitu a bihooka.”
Yise ka a natupoyano-wi petuhoose, mu tukwutumadu oo tokwuhooka ka mu numu ewana unu sutagonno.
Umu mu-nakwi ooosapa mu nagenoꞌo, “A batsa,” mee unnena.
Ka nobe-kobena oo natzakwona-wi petuhoogase, mu Greek yadooa-ma soo Paul ka tukwutumadu moohedu mee netamma, “Nu sakwa u-no yadooa.” Soo mu moohedu oo nekwegea, “U tzakadoo Greek-ma mesoo yadooꞌa?
U haaꞌa oosoo nana Egypt-witu kemmana ka pudu oosoo nana tutzanagoekuse, yise ewa (4000) naana mu tugoedu-nagatu ka giba-matoo bika?”
Soo Paul meeoo oo nanekwegea, “Nu gi. Nu Jew numu. Nu ka Tarsus mee naneadu-wi numu-baa nabotugu
“Unudea,” mee soo tukwutumadu moohedu oo nemaꞌe. Ka paꞌa tu natupoyano-wi soo Paul wunuse, mayodahoo, mu numu yise gi tunemayuhoo, ka mu Jew numu yadooa-masoo mu numu yadooekooha.
“E nanumu, e nakapunne. Nu gi hannanoꞌo suda tumadugupu.”
Mu numu ka pummesoo yadooa-ma ka Paul Jew-ma yadooakoohase, gi tunemayuhoo.
Soo Paul meeoo mu numu netamma, “Nu yow tubetse Jew. Nu ka Tarsus-witoo
Nu uga umu Te Pabeꞌe podo meadu tumooꞌoo. Nu yise mu naana noko momokoꞌne umu-nagatu wutumetayakwe, susumudu nu goꞌe.

Mu Jew numu tutunehanewabe noꞌyoona oo sopedakwatoo e unnena togesapa. Tubope e geana ka mu Jew numu moohedu tuukwena ka mu Jew numu Damascus-witu nuka tummatzi tuunguna. Numme e pupuaꞌamu-no ka Damascus-witoo meaꞌa, ka mu Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu Damascus-witu yaa Jerusalem-witoo hane petuse ka mu wutumetakwuse.
Oona tabeno-nakwa ka Damascus tzageꞌe ne kemma hee sapaga tukwukwutsebu-waꞌneꞌyoo besa kootabuadu paꞌanakwana
e wunapow. Nu nuka tu yadooese oo nakahoo, ‘U yow ooosapa suda e masoonammennumme.’
Nu oo tubenga, ‘Haga u?’ Mee yise e netamma, ‘Nu mu Pabeꞌe Jesus
Umu e pupuaꞌamu nu-notu ka kootabuatu poonne pana gi Te Pabeꞌe unnena naka.
Nu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, ‘Haꞌoo yise nu manekwu?’ Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo e netamma, ‘Yotsese, ka Damascus-witoo mea. Ka o u petugase, u manekwuna u natuukwedooa.’
Nu ka kootapuape-ma kootupooseyaꞌehoo. Umu e pupuaꞌamu yise ka Damascus-witoo e tzakaka.
Sumuꞌyoo nana, ka te Jew tumayohope besa mayohodu Ananias mee naneadu oonow. Mu Jew numu oonow nobe-gaꞌyoo mee sokwama, ‘Soo Ananias besaꞌyoo nana.’
Ka saaꞌa soo Ananias nu-baa petuoo, wunupunnese, mee e netamma, ‘Besa manese, mitu poonne.’ Nu yabetse esoo mitu pooꞌnese oo pooꞌne.
Mee yise e netamma, ‘Soo Te Naa te nanamooatupu pummatoo nanesootuhina ume netutzea. U sakwa Te Naa unnetoo mane ka Te Pabeꞌe poonnese oo unnena nakaꞌoedyuku.
U sakwa oo waha u pooha poonnena, u pooha nakana tuwazoo. Noꞌobatoosoo numu sakwa u tuukwe.
Nu baa-wi u matzakakwu. U ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-matoo nanesootuhina, soo Te Pabeꞌe suda u tumaduguna u-makoo namatzakakwunikwu. Oꞌno yise u besa nuummakwu.’
Ka saaꞌa nu Jerusalem-witoo kodyukase, nu nanesootuhina, ka tammesoo nanesootuhi nobe-kwiꞌyoona, nu meeoo tuusoobedya.
E tuusoobedya-kwi Te Pabeꞌe nu-kumaba wunuse meeoo e netamma, ‘Yabe sapa Jerusalem-wiꞌyoona meahoo. Mu Jew numu gi u nakaꞌoedyuku-waꞌneꞌyoo tooꞌe nu-kwitu besa u wahasapa.’
Nu meeoo unakwe, ‘Umu sumuna e nakapunnekwu ka puusoo oo sopedakwatoona, nu uga umu u-kwi tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka ne tunehanedu-kobenaꞌyoona kusekana, mu wutumeta.
Nu, oꞌno o ka mu Jew numu ka Stephen tupe-ma natatzagaze, o wununa nu mu tummatzaꞌe, ka mu wunagapu hemapunnena.’
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee e netamma, ‘U sakwa mea. Nu oona kwingaꞌatoo mu wakwawaꞌa-matoo u tayakwu,’ “ meeꞌe soo Paul nanekwaha.
Mu numu oo nakapunne ka “Wakwawaꞌa,” meesoo unnese, oo sopedakwatoose ka puu gi mu wakwawaꞌa petzabena umu yise paba mee unnegonno, “A batsa. Masoo gi he-toogoo besaꞌyoo, gi numme-waꞌne.”
Umu waꞌagena tu kwasu tzakebuekwunina toogoo-baa koosebu tapebuꞌagonno, ka oo manena, “Sutaꞌyoo numu,” mee ka Paul netammana.

Ewatse suda mu unnegonno soo mu Roman tukwutumadu pabeꞌe umu tu tukwutumawabe ka Paul ka tukwutumadu nobe-kwitoo bigase ooka mu wupageta tuungu. Soo mu moohedu ka Paul meeoo soobedyana oosoo sakwa sumuna pumme tu wupagetase, ka suda tu manena waha.

Ka pummetu tzakunayakwe soo Paul ka tukwutumawabe moohedu putsageꞌe wunudu meeoo netamma, “Nu yaahoo Roman numu ooonneꞌyoona ka gisoo e nanehane, u gi e wupageta-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme Roman numu gi yoo nuugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo. Oosoo tamme tumayohope o.”
Soo tukwutumawabe ka oo nakase meahoo ka pumme moohedu-matoosoo mease, meeoo oo netamma, “Tamme suda manakwe ka ekow nana wupagetakwuse. Esoo tookwa yise tamme Roman numu-matu.”
Soo mu tukwutumadu moohedu ka Paul-baa petuse, meeoo oo tubenga, “U haaꞌa togesapa numme Roman numu-matu?” “Aha,” mee soo Paul.
Soo mu tukwutumadu moohedu mee unakwe, “Nu Roman numu namayugwepu, nu ewa oo e mane-kwi tumanagapu.” Soo Paul yise meeoo, “Nu yow ooosapa tubetse Roman numu.”
Ooka pumma tu wupagetakwuna hemana yabesoo umu oo tzamaꞌwuhoo soo umu moohedu punnoꞌo unu suaꞌe, oosoo oo sopedakwatoo ka Paul Roman numu manepunnena, umuoo sakwa uga gi oo tzakunapana.

Oogow moooꞌa soo tukwutumadu moohedu mee soonamme, “Hekwi mu Jew numu ka Paul oo yugwe?” Ka Paul nabatoo mu bi tuungu ka tukwutuma nobe-wikoo, yise ka mu Jew tunehanedu nesumudoose, ka Paul umu-kobena bi petu.
Soo Paul gi umu-ma suina mu tunehanedu poonnese, mu mesoo yadooe, meeoo mu netamma, “E nanumu, nu ka ooosapa kaaheno tumadugunona oo sopedakwatoo, soo Te Naa punnoꞌo e sopedakwatoo.”
Oꞌno soo Jew numu tubetse moohedu Ananias mee naneadu ka Paul tzageꞌe konnodu-matu ka Paul kobikoo oo matake tuungu.

Soo Paul meeoo ka Ananias netamma, “Soo Te Naa punnoꞌo ume ooosoo yugwekwu. U gi besaꞌyoo pana u nasookwatsetuguna, besa nasooyugwe. U gi besa numu matugudu. U gi besaꞌyoo te tumayohope-toohakwi ka e nemadunagana tooe uusoo punnoꞌo gi oo-toogoo tumayohopana meeoohoo. U sakwa uga umu gi e matake tuungupana.”
Mu numu oo konnopunnedu ka Paul meeoo netamma, “U suda unakwe. U uga gi ka mu numu tubetse moohedu meeoo yadooe-waꞌneꞌyoo, soo Te Naa oo netutzeapu.”
Soo Paul mu nekwegea, “Oosoo haaꞌa numu-kooba manepunnedu? Meeoo ooetuooo nabotuku, ‘Gi ka mumme moohedu suda netammapana.’ “

Soo Paul oo sopedakwatoo ka mu tutunehanedu puu nanakuma-matoosoo mu nanesootuhaꞌe. Susumudu umu-matu nananesootuhidu Sadducee mee nananeadu-matu. Umu gi oo nakaꞌoedyukute ka numu tu nadyaꞌe-wiꞌyoona yotsekwuna, yise mu toha kakasa-gakoo umu Te Naa tutummatzidu, mu tsoapa-witu tuwazoo. Susumudu umu-nagatu Pharisee mee nananeadu oo nakaꞌoedyukute ka numu yaꞌese mu yotsese, ka mu toha kakasa-gakoo tuwazoo ka tsoapa-nokosoo. Soo Paul yise mu tunehanedu yadooe, “Nu yow tubetse Pharisee nanesootuhidu. E naa punnoꞌo ooosoo. Ooonneꞌyoona umu e tumooꞌoogena, nu oo nakaꞌoedyukute ka numu tu yaꞌe-wiꞌyoona mu yotsena.”

Mu tunehanedu puusoo nanano nanepetukukooha. Wahaba manese apekeagonno. Umu Pharisee-matu Paul-witu mee netamma, “Esoo Paul gi suda manakwe. Soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo sumuna tooe hemma tooe oo tuukwepu, tooetoo poohabe sumuna.”
Umu tunehanedu papabatse nanepetukukooha. Soo tukwutumadu moohedu unu suaꞌe. Umu sakwa sumuna ka Paul unu maꞌe, mee soonammena. Umu tu tukwutumawabe meeoo netamma, “Oo bihooga oona te nobe-witoo.”
Oogow togano soo Paul meeoo nose. Soo Te Pabeꞌe oo-baa petuse meeoo oo netamma, “Gi numu-ma suipana. U mooasoo Jerusalem-wi nu-witu wahapu. Saaꞌa tuwow u Rome-wi nu-witu wahadooa.”
Oogow moooꞌa mu Jew nanana (40) nanano meeoo tunetamma, “Numme gi tukana, gi too baa hebekwu, ka Paul nabatsanoꞌotootooe.”
Umu ka mu Jew numu tunehanedu-baa petuse, mee mu netamma, “Numme meeoo tubetse unakwe. Numme gi tukana, gi baa hebekoo, ka Paul nabatsa-kwitoo tooe.”

Mu tunehanedu mu tukwutumadu moohedu meeoo netamma, “Numme ewasoo ka Paul hemma tubenga penaꞌe. Ka tunehanepe-witoo ka Paul bihooka. Numme namamakwupunnekwu, gisoo ka Paul tunehane-kwi nabi petu numme oo batsowkwu.”
Soo Paul nanakwu mu naka ka mu unnena. Soo oo nanakwa yise ka mu tukwutumadu nobe-wi petugase, ka Paul-no yadooꞌa.
Soo Paul ka mu tukwutumadu moohedu meeoo netamma, “Ka tooebetse bihooka ka mumme moohedu-matoo. Esoo hemma oo watze tuukwekwu.”
Soo tukwutumadu moohedu ka tooebetse bihookase, ka pumme moohedu-matu yise mee oo tuukwe, “Soo nakwutumadu Paul mee naneadu u-matoo ka tooebetse e bi tuungu. Esoo hemma u watze tuukwekwu.”
Soo tukwutumadu tubetse moohedu ka tooebetse tzakowka numu-wanatoo, yise oo watze tubenga, “Hayoo u e tuukwekwuse?”
Soo tooebetse oo nanekwegea, “Mu Jew numu watze tunehane. Moooꞌa saaꞌa u ka Paul mu tunehanedu-matoo bikadooa. Umu meeoo u netammakwu, ‘Numme ka Paul ewasoo nakwitu tubengakwu.’
U sakwa gi mu nakaꞌoedyukupana. Ewaꞌyoo (40) mu Jew nanana gi tukana, gi hepe, ka Paul tu batsakwu-kwitoo tooe. Umu ka Paul watse hoawina, ka oo patsakwuse. Ume unnena umu menoꞌo wutooepunne.”
Mu tukwutumadu tubetse moohedu ka tooebetse meeoo netamma, “Gi haka tuukwepana ka nuka u tuukwepu. U sakwa menoꞌo mea.”
Soo mu tukwutumadu tubetse moohedu waahoo tu tukwutumadu moohedu nabatoo mu bi tuungu. Ka pu-baa mu pepetuhoose, soo tukwutumadu tubetse moohedu meeoo mu netamma, “Ewatsekoo (470) tukwutumadu
Soo Claudius Lysias ka te moohedu Felix-matoo tubohoo mee naꞌunnedu.
“Yaa esoo nana, Paul mee naneadu, mu Jew numu mamatzakaduse, a tooꞌe batsowkwu. Nu ka a Roman numu a sopedakwadoose numme umu tukwutumudu-no a magwetzoi.
Saaꞌa nu a bikadooa ka mu Jew numu tunehanedu-matoo, ‘How manena umu meeoo a netamma?’ meeꞌe nu soonammena.
Gi hekwi tookwa umu meeoo a netamma, a nebatsana. Gi tookwa esoo pumme wutuma-waꞌne. Ka tu tumayohope gi a tumayoho-kwi mee a netamma.

Nu meeoo natuukweoo susumudu Jew numu ka Paul batsayagate mee. Ooonneꞌyoona nu yabesoo u-matoo a taꞌya. Nu too u-matu ka umu Paul tuaganedu taꞌyakwu tuwazoo. Ume-kobenaꞌyoona sakwa umu meeoo a netamma,” meeꞌe soo tukwutumadu pabeꞌe tuboꞌo.
Umu tukwutumadu togawano meadabese, ka Paul Antipatris-wi bi petuga.
Oogow moooꞌa mu sogo meadu tukwutumadu punowsoo kodyuka tu nobe-kwitoo. Mu tukwutumadu poopookoo-gaꞌyoo ka Paul-nosoo meadabe ka Caesarea mee naneadu-kwitoo.
Ka oonow petugase, ka Paul ooka Felix-matoo bika, yise ka tubope oo gea.
Soo Felix ka tubope neahoose, ka Paul yise meeoo tubenga, “Hanotu teepu-koobatoo u nadooaꞌadoopu?” “Ka teepu Cilicia mee naneadu-koobatoo nu,” meeꞌe soo Paul.

Soo Felix yise meeoo oo netamma, “Ka mu numu ume tuaganedu petuse, nu saaꞌa u nehanedooa.” Felix ka mu tukwutumadu yise ka Paul wutuma tuungu pabatsekoo nobe-kwi, oꞌnosoo uga ka numu moohedu Herod mee naneadu nobe-wi.

Ka saaꞌa huu oo tabe mease, soo mu Jew numu tubetse moohedu Ananias mee naneadu, susumudu mu Jew numu moohedu-no ka pukoobatoo yadooadu Tertullus mee naneadu-no petugonno. Ka Felix-kobena oo bi petuse ka Paul tubetse suda nemadabuꞌe.

Ka Paul Felix-kobena bi petuse soo Tertullus meeoo ka Felix netammakooha, “U numme Jew numu unu besa masokwama ka numu nehane manese. U ka besow gwetzoibu ne tummatzaꞌe noꞌoko ka teepu-koobakwi. Numme u netubetseayikwu ka yoo u mane-kwi.

Numme gi u nematzaꞌmakwu. Gi haaꞌnotseꞌe ne nakapunne, numme eka Paul-witu yabesoo u tuukweoo. Esoo Paul suda tuneyugwedu, numme Jew noko mu Roman numu tsanagoekuna noꞌoko ka teepu-koobakwi. Esoo nana Paul ka nanesootuhibu-wi mu moohedu ka Nazarene mee nananeadu-matu.
Ka ne nanesootuhi nobe suda tooꞌe maꞌe, numme yise mamatsakatu.
U sakwa uusoo oo tubenga, oꞌno yise u ume ne tuukwena nakaꞌoedyukukwu.”
Noꞌyoona mu Jew numu moohedu yise meeoo unakwe, “Soo numme-koobatoo yadooadu togesapa yadooꞌa.”

Soo Felix ka Paul tu mi-ma matuukwe ka oo yadooa tuunguna. Oꞌno yise soo Paul meeoo oo netamma, “Ewasoo tommokapu u numu nehanena nu u sopedakwatoo. Nu nuusoo nakwitu u mesoo tuukwe, oꞌno yise u e unnekwuna nakasopedakwadookwu.
U oo sopedakwadookwu ka sumumano wahama tsebooekudu (12) tabe meapu, nu ka Jerusalem-wiꞌyoona nanesootuhidyina.

Mu numu nuka tuakanedu ka nanesootuhi nobe-wikoo e mayu. Nu gi mu numu nesumuna, gi numu-no nanepetukute. Nu yise gi mu numu ka nanesootuhi nobe-wiꞌyoona tsanagoekute, gi tuwazoo ka Jerusalem-wiꞌyoona.
Soo umu unnena gi tookoope-gaꞌyoo umu ka esagoena.

Nu yise meeoo unnekwu nu ka Jesus podo meꞌa, kummasoo nanesootuhidu mee umu e netamma, pana nu gi ooohoo. Nu togesoo Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe, ka te nanamooatupu nanesootuhiputoo meꞌa. Yise nu noꞌoko ne tumayohope tumayohoku meꞌa, ka oꞌnosoo ka Te Naa-witu nabotugutoo.
Nu umu-waꞌnesoo tunakaꞌoedyukute, soo Te Naa mu bebesow tuipu numu mayodakwu pana mu susutakoo soo suda mu manena umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.
Ooonneꞌyoona nu ooosapa besaꞌyoona o sopedakwatoo. Soo Te Naa e sopedakwatoo, mu numu punnoꞌo.

Wunaꞌme nu mana nummennumme nanesootuhina, yaa yise nu nugasoo teepu-wi pudu kodyu petu. Ewa nu natumasumudookuse ka mu tutuha manedu e nanumu nu haneku petu. Nu ka nanesootuhipe-kwitoo tuwuniyakwe ka mu Jew numu tumayoho-kwaꞌne.
Mu Jew e mayuhoo, tu nanesootuhi nobe-kwikoo, nu ka mu Jew numu tumayohona mayohokwuse. Nu gi haga wawaꞌa-no. Nu tuwazoo gi tutsanagoekute.
Susumudu Jew numu Asia mee naneadu-kwiꞌyoona kemmadu oe. Umuoo nu-ma tzakadu. Umuoo sakwa menoꞌo yownona, oetu waha ka how suda e tumadugu.
Umu Jew numu nehanedu menoꞌo yaatoo sakwa oo waha ka suda e manena sopedakwatoona. Umu oho ka mu Jew tunehanedu-kobena e nanekwunukuse.
Nuuga sumuna suda manakwe ka umu-nagaꞌyoona paba meeoo unnewununa, ‘Nu nanehane mu-kobenaꞌyoona ka oo nakaꞌoedyukuna soo Te Naa ka tuipu numu matuusootabueyakwe.’ “
Mooasoo soo Felix ka Te Pabeꞌe po-witu sopedakwatoo. Ka tunehanepe neyooikuhoose mee mu netammana, “Ka mu tukwutumadu tubetse moohedu, Lysias mee naneadu, petuse, nu saaꞌa u nemamakwudooa.”
Ka tukwutumadu moohedu Paul-kooba tueyaꞌe tuungu. Tu soomane-kwaꞌnesoo ka oeꞌyoona masoo mesoo manakwe. Umu a pupuaꞌamu punnoꞌo a mesoo mabetseꞌa
Huuoo tabe mease, soo Felix tu nodukwa ka Paul-witoo taya oo-no yadooakwuse. Umu ka Paul nakapunne ka tu tunakaꞌoedyuku-witu Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-witu oo waha.

Soo Paul yise meeoo mu tuukwe, “Mu sakwa uga besaꞌyoo, ka gi kummaꞌamasoo emukwana, ka nanodukwana. Soo suda mu manena umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.” Soo Felix nakasuꞌise yise meeoo oo netamma, “Menoꞌo sakwa u ka tukwutuma nobe-witoosoo namakodyuku. Nu saaꞌa u bidooa.”
Soo Felix meeoo soonamme, “Soo Paul hemma e geakwu ka pumme e tzamaꞌwuse,” pana soo Paul gi oo manakwe. Ooosapa ka Paul-witoo tutayayakwe ka oo-no yadooayina.
Soo Felix gi ka Paul tzamaꞌwu, ka mu Jew numu matubetseana, waha tomoka kummaꞌyoosoo nana, Porcius Festus mee naneadu, nanetutzease ka teepu-kooba numu moohedu Felix kapi mani.
Soo Festus ka Caesarea-wi petuga, ka teepu-kooba numu moohedu manese. Ka saaꞌa pahe tabe mease, ka Jerusalem mee naneadu-witoo mea.
Ka petugase, mu Jew tunehanedu oo-no yadooꞌa ka Paul netumooꞌoona.
Meeoo oo tubetse netamma, “Ka Paul Jerusalem-witoo ne tayaku.” Ka tooesoo oo kemma umu oo watse batsakwuse.
Pana soo Festus meeoo unakwe, “Pudusoo nu kodyukakwu Caesarea-witoo. Soo Paul togesoo oonow nakwutuma.
Umu mumme moohedu-matu sakwa nu-no mea. Onona umu ka Paul syda nabeoy wagadiia,”
“Soo Festus umu-baasoo namewatsu (8) tooetoo sumumano (10) tabe mea ka Caesarea-wisoo kodyu petuse. Oogow moooꞌa yise tunehane. Ka Paul nakobenatoo mu bi tuungu.
Ka Paul petuoose,mu Jew numu moohedu Jerusalem-witu mee unnekooha. “Ewa masoo suda tumayugwepu.” Gi hownnekoo umu kaaheno oo waha-waꞌneꞌyoo ka oo oo manakwe.
Soo Paul ka Festus meeoo netamma, “Nu ka Jew tumayohope, noꞌoko ka ne nanesootuhina gi netumooꞌoodu, ka mu Roman numu-kooba katudu tuwazoo.”
Soo Festus ka mu Jew numu moohedu sootupuaꞌapunnena hemma too besa umu-nakwana tusookwipunnena ooonneꞌyoona ka Paul meeoo netamma, “U sakwa Jerusalem-witoo mea. Onona sakwa tuwazoo u nanehane.”
Soo Paul oo nekwegea, “Menoꞌo nu yow mu Roman numu tunehane-kwi. Yaanonasoo sakwa nu nanemamakwu. U oo tubetse sopedakwatoo nu gi ka mu Jew numu suda tumadugudu.

Nu sakwa uga ka sutaꞌyoona, ka hemma haꞌoo suda yugwese, oetoo nabatsa-waꞌneꞌyoo, u sakwa yise e batsa. Pana nu gi e nabatsakwuna namameꞌa. Pana nu gi suda tumadugudu nu gi nuka mu netamma-kwaꞌne manakwe. U gi nuka mu batsa tuungu-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme Roman numu-kooba katudu sakwa e tunetammaku.”
Soo Festus tu pupuaꞌamu-no yadooase, ka Paul meeoo netamma, “Unudea. U ka tamme-kooba katudu ume nemamakwu tuunguna, nu oo-matoo u tayakwu.”

Ka saaꞌa sumuꞌyoo nana, Agrippa mee naneadu, tu hamaꞌa, Bernice mee naneadu-no, ka Festus nobenge petuga. Soo Festus umu-kumabasoo teepu-koobatu moohe katudu. Soo Agrippa, Bernice-no ka Caesarea mee naneadu-wi pepetuga,
huu togano ka Festus-baa tooiyakwe. Soo Festus ka Paul-witu ka Agrippa tuukweꞌe, “Sumuꞌyoo nana yow nu-baa Felix oo wutumase, oo maꞌsuka.
Nu ka Jerusalem-wi petugase, mu Jew moohedu-no oowetoo nehane. Umu yise meeoo e netamma, ‘Ooka ne batsaku.’
Pana nu meeoo mu nanekwegea, ‘Soo ne Roman tumayohope yoo manepunne, mooeꞌugasoo soo Paul ka mu pumme tuakanedu uga mooe nanekwegeakwu. Oꞌno yise umu oo nemadubuekwu.’
Ka yaa mu petuse, ka saaꞌa oogow moooꞌa awamooasoo nu mu nehane. Nu eka nana nakobenatoo mu bi tuungu.
Umuga saaꞌa nanasuda oowetuoo e tuukwedooa mee nu soonamme.
Pana gi! Umu ka tu nanesootuhipe-witu e tuukwekooha. Umu sumuoo nana-witu e tuukwe Jesus mee naneadu yaꞌese, ‘Soo Jesus namayoda,’ mee soo Paul.
Nu gi oo sopedakwatoo ka ooonnekoo e nemadabuekwuna. Nu yise ka Paul tubenga, ‘U haaꞌa sakwa nu-no Jerusalem-witoo mea? Onona sakwa sumuna nu besa u nemadabue.’
Pana gi! Soo Paul meeoo e netamma, ‘Soo tamme Roman-kooba katudu sakwa mitu puusoo nemadabue.’ Nu yise yowsoo oo tsitugu. Nu saaꞌa ka tamme-kooba katudu-matoo oo tayadooa.”
Oꞌno yise soo Agrippa ka Festus mee netamma, “Nu ka Paul unnekwunu besa nakasoonamme.” “Unudea, mooo’a ta ka Paul nakadooa,” mee soo Festus oo nanekwegea.

Oogow moooꞌa Agrippa tu hamaꞌa Bernice-no yise Festus besa nanamadabuena nanana-kwi sogo meadape ka pabatsekoo tunehane nobe-kwitoo. Mu tukwutumadu moohedu ka mu numu moohedu-no punnoꞌo oe. Soo Festus mu tukwutumadu ka Paul bi tunngu.

Soo Festus ka Agrippa, yise noꞌoko mu numu oe konnodu noke meeoo netamma, “Yow esoo Paul mee naneadu. Ekow nana noꞌyoona mu Jew yaatuoo yise Jerusalem-witu netumooꞌoo. Umu ooosapa waagena meeoo e netammana, ‘Maasoo nana sakwa nabatsa.’
Pana nu yise gi hemma pukwi oo nabatsa-waꞌnekoo nemamayu. Soo Pau puusoo meeoo unakwe, ‘Soo Roman numu-kooba katudu sakwa puusoo nu-witu nemadabue.’ Nu yise oo-matoo oo tayakwu.

27 Nu sakwa ka numu-kooba katudu-matoo tubo ka suda a tumadagupu. Nu gi ka Paul taya-waꞌne tabuꞌa ka gisoo suda oo tumadugupu nemamayuna. Nu gi hemma maꞌyu e tubokwuna Nu yise e puaꞌa Agrippa, umu yaa manepunnedu noꞌoko yaa u-kobenatoo ka Paul bi tuungu. Tamme ka Paul-no yadooase oo unnena naksase, sumuna nu hemma saaꞌa bodooa.”
Soo Agrippa mee ka Paul netamma, “Yise sakwa u nakwitu ne tuukwe. How manena mu Jew numu u netumooꞌoo?” Soo Paul mayutsungadooase, ka umu moohedu Agrippa mee naneadu yadooꞌekooha.
“Nu nuusoo nakwitu mu tuukwekwu. Nu oo sopedakwatoo nu besa soonamme ka mumme e mane-witu tuukwena.
U oo sopedakwatoo noꞌoko ka mu Jew tumayohona how puu umu tumadugu. U sakwa e nakapunnese gi yabesoo e nanekwegeapana.
Mooasoo noꞌyoona e sopedakwatoo nu umu-nagaꞌyoona nanapu. Umu Jew numu ka Jerusalem mee naneadu-kwi nonobe-gaꞌyoo.
Umu Jew numu oo sopedakwatoo ewasoo tommo petugapu, nu ka numme nanesootuhidu-matu Pharisee mee nananeadu-no. Umuoo ka mu Jew tumayohopu unu mayoho. Umuoo u mesoo tuukwe ka pumme u tubenga.

Nu yise menoꞌo nanehane ka o nakaꞌoedyukuna soo Te Naa ka te namamooatupu meeoo tuukwepu, ‘Soo Te Naa mu numu tuipu mayodakwu,’ meeꞌe. Noꞌyoona numme Jew numu ooosapa nanesootuhidu, Te Naa-matoo meakwu ka oo nakaꞌoedyukuna. Esoo numu tunakaꞌoedyukuna gi unu manepunne, mu saaꞌa oo sopedakwadoodooa.
Nu oꞌnosoo uga ka umu Te Pabeꞌe

Nu mu Jerusalem-witu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tumooꞌookese, ‘Ewow Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu wutumeta,’ ka mu Jew tunehanedu meeoo nuka netamma. Ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu mu tunehanedu-kobena negonnokuse, nu punnoꞌo meeoo mu netamma, ‘Mu sakwa nagoepebuꞌa.’

Ewasoo nu mana umu nananesootuhi mamanepunnetoo meayina, ka umuoo wohonena. Umu sakwa suda Te Naa-witu waha mee nu soonammena. Nu tuwazaoo nanakwingaꞌakwi nummeyakwe mu wakwawaꞌa noꞌaata-too mu nanesootuhidu nekwohonena.
Mu Jew numu tunehanedu ka Damascus mee naneadu-witoo e tayana, umu Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu ootuoo wutumeta mee e netammana.
Ka tabeno tu manekese numme ooosapa meadabena, paꞌanakwana numme-koobatu besa kootabuapetu ka taba ooonakwa besa kootabuapunne, yaa ne naꞌoonnakwi ka e pupuaꞌamu-no ne meadape.
Numme noꞌyoona ka teepu-kooba pookwahoo. Haga sapaga ka Jew numuyadooa-wikoo e yadooewunu, ‘Saul, Saul u ooosapa suda e masoonammennumme, uusoo punnoꞌo suda soonamme gi e nakaꞌoedyukuna.’
Nu yise ka e tuapa nakana mee netamma, ‘Haga u?’ Soo e tuapa nakana meeoo unne, ‘Nu yow Jesus Mu Pabeꞌe. U ooosapa suda e masoonammennumme.
17 Menoꞌo yise yotse. Nu ume yadooꞌe, ume nu netutzea, u sakwa mana nu-witu wahannumme. Esoo e tuusoobedyana u tuukwedooasoo. Noꞌobatusoo numu nu-witu tuukwe,
nanakumma-baatusoo numu-matoo nu u tayakwu. Nu u tummatzina u magwetzoidooa ka umesoo nanumu ume tumooꞌookese, yise ka noꞌoko nanakummaꞌakoosoo numu ume tumooꞌoo tuwow.’
Nu ooosapa tumayohokena ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo nuka netamma eka e tuusoobedya-wi.

Mooeꞌugasoo mu numu Damascus-witu nu Te Pabeꞌe-witu tuukwe, saaꞌa tuwow Jerusalem-wi yise ka teepu Judea mee naneadu-wiꞌyoona. Nu noꞌoko nanakummaꞌakoosoo numu nanesootuhikuna mu tunedyooemena. ‘Gi ka sutakoo podo meapana,’ mee nu mu netamma. ‘Ka gi besa mu tumaduguna nematzagase. Ka besaꞌhoo podo meadabe. Ka oo manena tamme oo tzapoonnekwu ka Te Naa podo meana.’
Nu ka e tuusoobedyana mayohona mu Jew numu nu-ma tzakadu, ka tu nanesootuhi nobe-kobenaꞌyoona e tooe batsa.
Ka mu Moses noko ka Te Naa yadooawabe numu mu tuukwepusoo nu mu numu tuukwe ka Te Pabeꞌe petukwu-witu numu oo magwetzoikwu-witu tuwow.
Umu meeoo, ‘Oosoo Te Pabeꞌe nabatsase, numu-kobenasoo namayodakwu tu yaꞌe-wiꞌyoona,’ meeꞌe. Oosoo saaꞌa namekoosoo mu Jew noko mu wakwawaꞌa tuukwedooa ka Te Naa besa po-witu.”
Ka Paul togesoo yadooꞌa ka tu mane-kwitu oo wahadyakwe, soo Festus pabatse meeꞌe unne, “Paul, u gi sukwe soonamme. U ka nagutza wunaꞌme natunedyooedabena, oosoo u soonammena suda yugwe petu.”
Soo Paul mee unne, “Nu gi hownneꞌyoo, nu oetu besa soohanena tubetse togekoo yadooꞌa.
Soo Agrippa noꞌoko Te Pabeꞌe-witu sopedakwadoo, ooonneꞌyoona nu etzaga oo-no yadooa. Soo Agrippa tookwa mooasoo oo sopedakwadoo ka e netamma-kwitu. Esoo e netammana gi tookapu-kwikoo a namanena.”
Soo Paul yise ka Agrippa meeoo netamma, “U ka umu oꞌnosoo Te Naa tuukwewabe tubotuguna nakaꞌoedyukute, nu u sopedakwadoo.”
Tooesoo ka Paul yadooawunu, soo Agrippa mee oo netamma, “U gi nuka tunakaꞌoedyuku mayugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
Soo Paul ka Agrippa meeoo netamma, “Nu-kwaꞌnesoo deaꞌa yaahoo menoꞌo mu nanesootuhikukwu mu noꞌyoona e nakapunnedu, yaa tabeno Te Pabeꞌe tubetsedu-gakwu, pana gi mu nu-kwaVne mu natzakuna petzape.”
Mu Agrippa, nanodukwa, ka Felix-no konnohoose,
ka nobe-kwiꞌyoona meaꞌa. Nanano apekase mee unakwe, “Esoo nana Paul tookwa gi suda manakwe. Gi pumme batsa-waꞌne manepunnena gi tuwazoo pumme wutumatugu-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
Soo agrippa meeoo ka Felix netamma, “Esoo nana Paul mesoo natzamaꞌw, pana ka te Roman numu-kooba katudu-matoo nemea. Ta sakwa yise oo-matoo a taya.”

Soo Festus sake-wi ne tayakwu ka teepu Italy mee naneadu-kwitoo mee unakwe. Mu Roman numu moohedu ka tukwutumadu moohedu-no Julius mee naneadu ka Paul noko kukummaꞌakoosoo oo-no nakwutumadu mu eyaꞌe tuungu.
Numme ka sake-wi
oogow moooꞌa ka Sidon-wi petuga
Sidon-wiꞌyoona numme mease, soo hukwapa atatamesoo hukwadyakwe gi ka ne mea-tamme. Numme yise oo kwutoohanakwu-kwi meꞌa ka pagadudu Cyprus mee naneadu-kumi.
Numme ooosapa natsemangena ka mu Cilicia noko Pamphylia mee nananeadu teepu-kumi meadabena ka Myra noko Lycia mee nananeadu teepu-kooba petuga.
Soo Julius sumuoo sake mayuhoo Alexandria-wiꞌyoona kemmana Italy-witoo meadu. Ooweoo numme noꞌyoona kuaka.

Obeda numme natsemange ewa tabe meaka, numme unusoo manena ka Cnidus mee naneadu-kumi meꞌa. Soo hukwapa ne wumatzooejuna, numme gi hownnekoo oosapa meadabe-waꞌne. Numme yise oo kwutoohanakwu-kwi natsemange, ka pagadudu Crete mee naneadu ka Cape Salmone-kumi numme meꞌa.
Numme ooosapa pakumi meꞌa unusoo manena numme Fair Havens mee naneadu sake pukwi dyooi-kwi petu ka Lasea mee naneadu-kumaba.
Ewa tabe meaka, numme ka onona. Tommoba mooasoo tzageꞌe manekena. Soo Paul mu naana ka sake-koobatu mee tuya tuukweꞌe.
“E pupuaꞌamu, nu oo sopedakwatoo tamme ka ooosapa meadabena te nobeana tamme watzekukwu, te sake nokosoo, oꞌno sumuna tamme punnoꞌo batuikwu.”

12 Umu sake-witu pabeꞌe hise soo sake hee-ga-no oo sopedakwatoo ka eak sake pukwi yooina gi besaꞌyoo gi pukwi tommo-waꞌne. Umu ka Phoenix mee naneadu-kwitoo sakwa tamme ninapa natzemangeka mee unakwe. Otuoo soo sake pukwi yooina ka Crete-kumaba tamme mesoo wutoohapunne pana taba egea-nakwatu gi, o yise tomokwu mee unnena. Soo Julius umuoo nakaꞌoedyuku, pana ka Paul yaasoo sakwa tamme tommo mee oo unnena gi nakaꞌoedyukute.

Ka taba meana-nakwana soo hukwapa obeda hukwadyakwe. Mu sake mahanedu meeoo sokwama, “Numme mesoo mangegaꞌa ka Phoenix-witoo,” meeꞌe. Ka sake baa-wi tsipunnedu tsatsebooase yise numme ka Crete-kumi meꞌa.
Pudusoo unu kwenaha petuoo, unu hukwawunu.
Soo hukwapa ka sake patodyakwekuooka unu ka pagadudu-makoo. Numme yise oo tsasoopedya, gi nasoomanese ka hukwapa ka sake patodyakwehookuse.

17 Numme ka tuutse pagadudu Clauda mee naneadu taba meana-kwi meꞌa. Otuoo sagwane wutoohapunne. Onona numme ka tuutsekoo sake ka pabatsekoo sake-kooba wutsabeku. Mu sake mahanedu tugapu-ma ka sake wunotake. Oꞌno soo sake gi nuukote ka oo namadabuena. Umu suina meadape numme sakwa sumuna ka baapooe. Syrtis mee naneadu-kwitoo, mee sokwamana.
