Umu yise ka tu tumadabuena tzakwekuse, soo hukwapa ka sake wupoohedape.
Ooosapa unu hukwadape, ookow moooꞌa yise umu ka sake-wi tu nobea-matu tzapebuꞌa.
Ookow moooꞌa numme nummesoo mima ka sake-witu hemma tuwazoo tzapebuꞌa.
Soo paba hukwapa huu tabe meaka ooosapa hukwadabena. Unu koomeapunnena soo taba ka mu paatoozooba-no gi napoonne-waꞌneꞌyoo. Numme sumuna noꞌyoona batuꞌikwu mee numme sokwama.

Numme gisoo tukana wunaꞌme maneka. Soo Paul yise numu-kobena wunuse mee unakwe, “E pupuaꞌamu, oꞌnosoo sakwa mu e nakabetsea. Tamme sakwa uga Crete-wizoo. Tamme yise ka natzemangekase ꞌyoo suda hee manakwe.
Pana gi suipana, gi haga tamme-matu yaꞌekwu. Soo sake suuꞌmu kadooꞌoo namaꞌekwu.
Nu oo sopedakwatoo ka togano soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo Te Naa tummatzidu nuga nagena nu-baa petu.
Soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo meeoo e netamma, ‘Gi suipana, Paul. Soo Te Naa ka Roman-kooba katudu ume nehane tuungu. U nanesootuhidu gi haga ka sake-koobatu batuidooa.’
Yise e pupuaꞌamu, gi suipana. Nu oo nakaꞌoedyukute ka Te Naa, nu tuwazoo oo sopedakwatoo soo hee oo unne-kwaꞌnesoo manekwu.
Soo hukwapa mana tooe hano tooe pagadudu kumana te hane petugadooa.”
waha nasatese soo hukwapa tooesoo ka tubetse baa Mediterranean mee naneadu-koobakwi ne wumatzaka. Togabeno tu manekuse, ka mu sake-witu mahanedu meeoo sokwama, “Menoꞌo ka sumuna numme teepu tzagee.”
Umu yise ka baa managahoose gi tubetse tookapu. Gi haaꞌno tu manepunnese umu tuwazoo oo managahoosoo. Oꞌno yise tuwazoo gi unu tookapu.
Umu suina watsukwuoo sake tzadyooikudu ka baa-witoo tzapebuꞌa. Oꞌno soo sake gi tupe-matoo tape. Umu nanesootuhaꞌe, “Soo sake sakwa gi nuukodepana gisoo tu tabuꞌa,” mee unnena.
Mu sake-witu mahanedu tooꞌe namameaꞌa ka sake-wiꞌyoona. Ka tuutsekoo sake umu baa-witoo tzakweku sukwe sapa, ka sake-kobenatu ooka tzadyooikudu tzasawekuna.
Soo Paul ka Julius noko mu tukwutumadu mee netamma, “Ka mu dake-witu mahanedu mease, tamme gi hownnekoo namagwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
Mu tukwutumadu yise ka tugapoo ka tuutsekoo sake tsipunnedu tsekeaꞌahoose oo tzamaꞌwuhoo. Mu sake-witu mahanedu yise gi hownnekoo namamea-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Ka tu tabuagena soo Paul noꞌoko ka mu numu mee netamma, “Waha nasateka mu gi hemma tukana sukwe nanetzagwiyina.
Mu sakwa Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukute oo unnepu meeoo. ‘Gi haga tameme-matu namaꞌehookwu, gi tuwazoo yaꞌekwu.’ Mu sakwa menoꞌo tuka esoo puma mu gwetzoikwuna.”
Soo Paul ka tunemamakwuse, ka tukaba gwuuhoose yise ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe, ka tukaba-matu tsakaꞌowse oo tukakooha.
Noꞌyoona mu numu ka Paul tuka oo poonnese umu punnoꞌo ka tukapu-matu tukakooha.
38 Ka noꞌoko mu tukamakwuse, umu ka tukapu nabenina tzapebuꞌa, ka baa-witu. Oꞌno soo sake unusoo yayagwahookwu. Tubetse ewaꞌyoo (276) numu ka sake-koobatu.
Ka tubuakese, mu sake-witu mahanedu gi ka teepu posopedakwatoo. Ka bakohapunnedu poonnena paba haanokwi otuba teepu-gaꞌyoo. Oto sakwa numme eka sake wunooꞌyooꞌehoo petuga meeꞌe sokwama.

Mu tugapoo yise tsebokow ka sake tsipunnedu-makoo yise tu tutsakahenookuna o-tamme tzameakute. Ka sake-kobenatu ka pabatsekoo wanapu namadabuena toogoopa tsadyota, oꞌno soo hukwapa ka sake-kobena-tamme wumatzaka ka a bakohapunne-kwitoo.
Pana soo sake ka otuba-ma tzange petuga. Soo sake-kobenatu ka otuba-wi tzangehoo soo baa yise ka how wuꞌmaꞌnawena ka sake ooonnakwatu wuugodehoo.
Mu tukwutumadu ka mu nakwutumadu nekoꞌe. “Oꞌno gi umu-matu namameakwu,” mee unnena.
Soo Julius ka Paul soomagwetzoina mu netahoo ka meeoo mu unakwe. Noꞌoko mu nanana besa babokwadu meeoo netamma, “Ka baa-witoo natakwatese ka teepu tamme babokwahooga.”
Ka saaꞌa mu susumudu gi babokwadu ka sake-matu wobe poki-ma wawiyooana ka teepu-tamme patodyakwe. Yoo numme noꞌyoona manena ka teepu-kooba mani petuga.
Ka teepu-kooba ne petugase, yow esoo pagadudu Malta mee naneadu mee numme natuukweꞌe.
Mu numu otuoo besa ne matuku. Unu utzutzupunnena, powmakooha. Umu yise ne pedakuhoo pumma ne yooekwuna.
Soo Paul koona hanena, ka goso-kooba oo tuoonakwuse, togogwa yise ka koona-tohaꞌyoona tsebooeke ka goso nayooekwumana. Ka Paul mi-makoo oo toguehoose, ooo-ma tubetse kuwayooakwunihoo.

Mu numu oo poonne ka togogwa ka Paul mi-ma oo kukwiyooapunne, mee yise nananetamma, “Tooe esoo nana ka tubetse baa-wikoo namagwetzoise sapa, soo suda oo tumadugupu, oo-matoosoo kodyuna a batsowkwu, soo togogwa oo toguꞌehoo.”
Soo Paul yise ka togogwa ka goso-witoo tzawunihoo, gi how soo togogwa oo yugwe.

Mu numu oo tooe wutooepunne, hannanoꞌo ka saaꞌa pawahoodooa, tooetoo yabesoo yaꞌehoodooa meeꞌe sokwamapunne. Wunaꞌme manikea soo Paul gi how manena, umu yise atasoo sokwamahoose mee nananetamma, “Esoo Paul tookwa pummatoo te nanesootuhina.”
Soo numu moohedu Publius mee naneadu tubewa-gaꞌyoo, gi kwinga ka onona. Soo Publius besa ne matuguna numme oo-baa pahe tooiyakwe.
Oo naa tuꞌoeyaena hape, unu oo tookoo udutuna, wunaꞌme manekapu nuummayina. Soo Paul oo-matoo mease oo-ma matuguse oo nanesootuhikuse, oosoo yise besa mani.
Ka oo nakase noꞌyoona mu tuoegoedu numu ka pagadudu-koobatu ka Paul-baa petuyina besa namayugweyakwe.

Umu tuoegoedu besa maneyidu ewatseꞌe tooe hemma tooe na heꞌme. Yise pahe muha manese numme Italy-witoo natzemangeka. Oꞌno ewasoo umu hemma ne hanekute ne sookwina. Sumuꞌyoo sake Alexandria-wiꞌyoona kemmana Nawaꞌneꞌyoosoo mee naneadu punnoꞌo ookowsoo pagadudu-kumaba tomopu-gaꞌyoo. Oo-kooba numme manega ka Rome-tamme
Numme ka Puteoli mee naneadu-wi petuse, oto numme ka sake-wiꞌyoona sawe petuga.
Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu numme oe tapoega. Umu yise, “Sumu nasateba-witoo sakwa mu numme-baa,” meꞌe ne netamma. Ononasoo numme ka Rome-witoo mea.
Mu tunaka-ꞌoedyukudu Rome-witu numme-witu nakadu mu Appius Forum noko three Taverns mee maneneadu-wi ka saaꞌa nawegeadooa. Soo Paul ka mu poonnese Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhikooha, besa soonammena.
Ka Rome-wi ne petugase soo Paul puusoo nanobe-gakute, sumuoo tukwutumadu pumme eyaedu-no, ono soo Paul gi namameaꞌa meeꞌe umu oo sooyugwena.

Pahe tabe meaka numme o petuse soo Paul mu Jew numu Rome-witu umu numu moohedu tu tunehane-witoo paꞌe. Ka mu sumuse meeoo mu netamma, “E nanumu, nu gi hekwi te nanumu netumooꞌoo-waꞌneꞌyoo. Nu te tumayohona ka te nanamooatupu pumakoo mu tumayohona gi takopadu. Mu Jew numu Jerusalem-witu meeoo e netammana, nu nakwutumana mu yise mu Roman numu-tamme e tzamaꞌwu.
Mu Roman numu e nemadabuese, e netzamaꞌwu, umu ka oo nakase, ka gi suda e manakwe, nu gi pumme batsa-waꞌne.
Mu Jew numu gi oo nakabetzape ka mu Roman numu nuka netzamaꞌwu. Nu yise meeoo unakwe, ‘Nu ka mu Roman numu-kooba katudu nuka nemadabue tuungu,’ tooe nu gi suda naꞌunnedu e nanumu-tamme unnekwuse.
Nu ka mu soopoonnena mu-no soodyadooana, ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu mu tuukwekwuse, ka Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo nu nakwutumase.”
Mu Jew numu moohedu meeoo ka Paul netamma, “Gi numme u-witu nabodu tubope kwuꞌu ka teepu Judea mee naneadu-witu. Gi mu te nanumu suda naꞌunnedu u-witu ne tuukwedu.
Pana numme ume tusooyugwena soonakapunne ume nanesootuhi pupuaꞌamu mu numu tooe hanotu tooe ooosapa mu netumooꞌooyakwe.”

Umu Jew numu yise ka Paul-no tunemadabue, “Oꞌno tabeno saaꞌa tamme nanatabooegadooa.” Ewaꞌyoo numu ka Paul-baa petudyakwe. Tabewano soo Paul ka Te Naa besa po-witu mu numu tuukweꞌe. Soo Paul ka Te Naa unnena mu nemadabuekuna, ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu sakwa umu nakatogeꞌyookuse, oo-tamme mane.
Susumudu umu-matu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukute, susumudu punnoꞌo gi.

Soo Paul yise ka mu gi tunakaoedyukudu meeoo netamma, “Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa Besa Pooha mu-kwitu meeꞌe unnepuMu tooe ka Te Naa besa pooha poonne oo unnepu nakapana, gi ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukute. Mu gi ka Te Naa nakaheesoobedya. Mu sakwa ka Te Naa besa unnepu nakaꞌoedyuku Te Naa-tamme mane, gi oemota, oꞌno soo Te Naa mu sootuhina, mu magwetzoikwu.’ ” Soo Paul yise meeoosoo mu netamma, “Mooasoo nu ka Te Naa besa unnepu mu tuukwepu. Yaa manakwana nu mu wakwawaꞌa gi Jew numu Te Pabeꞌe-witu tuukwekwu. Umu-matu oo nakaꞌoedyukukwu.” Ka Paul meeoo unnese mu Jew numu puusoo nananepetukuna petukwahooka.
31 Waha tomoka soo Paul ka tu nobe-wiꞌyoona, oe tumanakana. Noꞌobatusoo numu pumme nobengeketu soo Paul ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu tuukweyakwe. Mu Roman tukwutumadu punnoꞌo gi haꞌyoo ka Paul netamma.

Ka Te Naa besa unnepu-witu, nu, Paul, mu-matoo tuboꞌo, ka Rome mee naneadu-wi nonobe-gakoo. Nu ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus nakabetseadu, oosoo e netutzease, nu yise yaahoo yadooawabe mane yise mana mu numu e tuukwe tuungu ka besa tu unnepu-witu.
Ka besa Te Naa unnepu umu oꞌnosoo Te Naa yadooawabe mooasoo oo bo tugupu.

Oꞌnosoo umu Te Naa yadooawabe oo waha ka Jesus, Te Naa Besaa Tooaꞌa-witu, menoꞌo yise soo naꞌunnedu togesapa oo-toogoo manepetu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe numu-waꞌnesoo nadooaꞌadoo tabuapu. Oosoo ka David-manakwana kemmapu.
Pana oosoo tuwazoo ka Te Naa-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa Besa Tooaꞌa ooka te tzapoonnekute, ka tu Besa Pooha-ma oo yaꞌe-wikoo oo mayodase.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe e sootuhi ka tu yadooawabe e mayugwese, ka manatooe e tayana, ka tu besa unnepu noꞌoko numu e tuukwe tuunguna. Oꞌno umu oo nakaꞌoedyukuna saaꞌa oo nakabetseadooa.

Mu punnoꞌo ka Rome-witu ooosoo. Soo Te Naa mu tunetutzea ka Te Pabeꞌe doodooamu manekese, oosoo ka besa mu soobedyana. Nu meeoo mu nanesootuhiku soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-no ooosapa mu sootuhinokwu yise mu magwetzoikwuse.
Tooe hano tooe e nummenummetoo mu numu e tuukwe ka Te Pabeꞌe tu nakaꞌoedyukuna. Nu ka Te Pabeꞌe nuka nakasootuhaꞌe, Te Naa-matoo mu nanesootuhikute.

Nu ooosapa ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe, mu-toogoo besaꞌhoo natuunguna. Nu ka Te Naa tubetse nakabetseana, ka ena tooe hano tooe mu numu tuukwena, ka besa naꞌunnedu ka oo Besaa Tooaꞌa-witu. Oosoo oo sopedakwadoo nu ooosapa mu nanesootuhikuyakwe, nu sakwa mu-baatoo sumudooe mea, ka Te Naa meeoo nuka netamma.
Nu sakwa mu-baatoo mease, mu nanesootuhikuna. Oꞌno mu unusoo besa kaaheno tusooyugwena, mu unusoo tunakaꞌoedyuku manepetugadooa.
Mu ka tuꞌoedyukuna oetoo e nehanese, tamme nanahoesoo oetu nemadabuese. Oꞌno saaꞌa nu mu-baa besa petuga nuummadooa.
Pana nu gisoo meꞌa, nu ka gi hownnekoo meana. Nu yise besa mu nobene soonamme, nu sakwa ka mu gisoo tunakaꞌoedyukudu tummatzi. Nu ka mooasoo tooe hano tooe gi Jew numu nanesootuhibu tunedyooese.
Soo Te Naa meeoo e netamma, “Noꞌoko tooe hownnekoo tooe numu-matoo mease, mu tuukwe.”
Mu-matoo tuwazoo Rome-witoo. Nu unu oo soogwaꞌe mu-baa e petugakwuna, yise ka nanesootuhibu mu tunedyooekwuse,

nu gi e nanenasookwina soogwaꞌe mu numu mesoo tuukwena ka Te Naa unnepu. Soo tooe haga tooe ka Te Naa besa unnepu nakaꞌoedyukudu, soo Te Naa pooha mu magwetzoikwu, mu Jew numu nokosoo mu gi Jew numu tuwazoo.

Soo Te Naa besa unnepu te tuukweꞌe, soo Te Naa meeoo, “Tamme besaꞌyoo numu, ka ooosapa tunakaꞌoedyukuna.” A nabotugu-kwaꞌnesoo, “Soo numu ka kaaheno Te Naa besa podo meana, puusoo nanemagwetzoikwu, oosoo ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna.”
Tamme oo sopedakwadoo soo suda numu tumatuguna numu-matoosoo kodyukwu, ka ooosapa suda tumatuguna mu numu ka Te Naa togesapa unnena ne watzetugu.

Tooe mu numu gi Te Naa poonnepana, mu numu sumuna oo sopedakwadookwu ka Te Naa ka teepu matabuepu. Oosoo puusoo mu tzapoonnekute ka noꞌoko hemma besa tu matabuena, yise ka unu tu pooha-gana tuwazoo. Pana umu gi oo nesookwugaꞌena, yise gi oo-matoo nanesootuhi tuwazoo. Umu sakwa oe naneyugwe, ka gi sootunakaꞌoedyukuna. Umu meeoo nanasooyugwe, “Numme tubetse unu sokwama.” Pana gi! Umu tookwa gi hemma sopedakwadoopana meeoo nasooyugwe.

Umu gi ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe, oosoo Te Naa yise noꞌokosoo pooha-gaꞌyoo gi yaꞌedu. Pana umu tooe hemma-too tooe nanesootuhaꞌe gi pooha-gakoo: Numu-waꞌnekoo, tooetoo kweꞌnaꞌa, etzaꞌa, yise togogwa-matoo gi puusoo namagwetzoi-waꞌnekoo, sukwe yaꞌeyakwedu.

Umuoo gi ka Te Naa-wi tu tunakaꞌoedyukuna petzape, Te Naa besaꞌyoona gi nakaꞌoedyukute pumme nesookwugi-waꞌnekoo, tu naꞌesayina suuꞌmu umu nakabetseadu. Umu gi ka pumme manumudoopu-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe, yise pumme nesookwugi-waꞌnekoo. Umu ka hemma namadabue-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe. Ooonneꞌyoona soo Te Naa mu tsasoopedya, umu yise ka sutakoo podo meadape. Umuoo suda tusooyugwena, suda ka pummesoo tookoo yugwe. Umu noꞌobatusoo suda tu manena petzape. Mu momokoꞌne ka gi toge-wikoo, ka tu puna mogoꞌne mesoo maꞌemukwana.
Mu nanana punnoꞌo gi ka mu momokoꞌne soogwina puusoo nana-ma tumanaka. Umuoo suda tubetse manakwe soo suda mu tumatuguna umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.
Soo Te Naa gi how mu yugwe suda mee tusooyugwe sapa umu ka gi Te Naa sooꞌoedyukuna.

Umu yise tooe haꞌoo tooe manakwe nanasuda: unu moomoogoobuna, nanidyapuna, tu pupuaꞌamu nasoodyagena, nanahana, numu mesoo batsana, nanaꞌesagoena, nanatumooagana, ewa suda nanatuukwena, Te Naa gi petzabena, suda nanadyadooena, nananesagwaꞌena, nananesootzemana, besa nanasooyugwena, tu nanaanapuꞌamu gi nakabetseana, gi numu tutuha soobedyana, gi kaaheno tumatuguna, yise tooe haꞌoonnekoo tooe suda namanedu oedyukuna.
Umu oo sopedakwadoopana ka Te Naa meeoo unnepu, “Soo numu ꞌyoo manedu sakwa yaꞌe.” Umu yise suda mesoo manakwe ka tu pupuaꞌamu suta-witoo pumme moohe.
Numme Jew numu sakwa umu gi Jew numu gi nesootzemapana, numme punnoꞌo ka ooosoo manena. Numme punnoꞌo nummesoo oe naneyukwe ka tooe how tooe manena.
Tamme oo sopedakwadoo soo Te Naa kaaheno noꞌobatusoo umu numu suda manedu kadoo mayugwekwu.
Tamme sakwa gi meeoo sokwamapana, “Soo Te Naa nuka gi kadooꞌoo mayugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo tooe suda e manakwe sapa. Nu umu ataꞌyoosoo.”

Soo Te Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo, gi etzaga sutadu. Oosoo ka oo te matuguna, oꞌno tamme sakwa ka suda te tumatuguna maꞌwukase, yise ka oo besa podo meadabekwu. Pana tamme ka meeoo sokwamana, “Nu gi ka suda e tumatuguna maꞌwu-waꞌneꞌyoo yise ka oo besa podo mea-waꞌneꞌyoo.” Oꞌno yise tamme tammesoo ka sutakoo mabetseadu-kwaꞌne tabuꞌa, tamme-matoosoo kodyukwu ka kaaheno nanasuuꞌmu numu manena umu-matoosoo kodyuse.
Noꞌoko mu numu tumatugupu umu-matoosoo kodyukwu haꞌoo ka mu besow tooetoo mu sutakoo.

Mu numu ooosapa besa manekwu umu ka besow podokoo soomeana, ka Te Naa besa pumme sootuhaꞌe ooosapa nummenummena ka Te Naa-baa nobe-gakwu. Umu numu ka gi toge-witu nakabetseana puu suuꞌmu mee nasooyugwena nanasutatoo meadabekwu, yise kadoo namayugwekwu. Soo Te Naa noꞌokosoo hemma nana-kwaꞌnesoo matugukwu: mu Jew numu, mu gi Jew numu tuwazoo.

Soo numme Jew tumayohopu ne tuukweꞌe, ka ne manekwuna. Numme ka kaaheno oo mayohona, numme besaꞌyoo meeꞌe soo Te Naa unnekwu. Tamme tammesoo oo naka, pana gi oo nakabetseana, tamme kadooꞌoo namayugwekwu. Umu gi Jew numu gi ka te tumayohopu nakadu pana umu puusoo oo sopedakwatoo ka how besa manena, tooetoo suda manese. Umu ka Te Naa nakabetseana oo tzapoonnena oo sopedakwadoo ka Te Naa pumme mane tuunguna. Umu kadooꞌoo namayugwekwu ka gi oo nakabetseana. ꞌYoo tu namanekwuse, soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe numu watze tusooyugwena oo nemadabue tuunguna. Meeoo nu mana ka mu numu tuukwe.
Numme Jew sumuna unu ka te tumayoho-ma nasoonatzaꞌe.
Te Naa-ma nanaꞌunakwe ka mee unnena, numme nummesoo oo sopedakwatoo ka besa ka Te Naa numme mane tuunguna, ka ne tumayohopu natunedyooese.
Numme mu gi ooka sopedakwatoodu mesoo tunedyooe doodooake tuwazoo, soo ne tumayohopu ka Te Naa besa podokoo ne tzapoonnekute.
Aha, numme Jew ka besow po sopedakwatoo, pana numme gi oo nakabetseꞌa. Numme mu numu meeoo netamma, “Mu sakwa gi tuduhapana,” yise numme sumuna nummesoo tuduha.

Numme mu numu meeoo mu netamma, “Mu sakwa ka nananodukwana kukummaꞌamasoo emukwapana.” Numme, nummesoo, sumuna ꞌyoo suda manakwe. Numme meeoo, “Numme gi hemma namadabue-matoo nanesootuhi-waꞌneꞌyoo,” pana numme sumuna kummaꞌakoosoo numu natusooa tuduha.

Numme meeoo nanaꞌunakwe, numme o sopedakwatoo noꞌoko ka Te Naa tumayohopu, numme oo nage tuunguna. Pana numme ka mu gi Jew numu suda ka Te Naa-witu mu netamma tuungu, ka numme gi oo unnena nakabetseana.
Numme meeoo, “Numme ka Te Naa tubetse dooamu, numme ka Jew numuna.” Numme ka Jew-na besaꞌyoo, numme ka Te Naa unnena nakabetseana. Pana numme ka gi oo unnena nakabetseana, numme gi Te Naa dooamu.
Mu gi Jew numu ka Te Naa unnena nakabetseadu Te Naa doodooamu numme Jew ooonakwasoo, besaꞌyoo umu ka Te Naa unnena nakabetseana.
Numme yise Te Naa doodooamu ka oo nakabetseana, ka sukwe Jew numuna.
Numme ka tunakabetseana soo Te Naa te soonammena sopedakwadoona te sootuhikwu. Oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo tooe mu numu te nesootzemapana.
Tamme sumuna meeoo unnekwu, “Oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo tooe Jew numupana oosoo gi Te Naa doodooamu te mayugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
Pana gi! Oosoo besaꞌyoo ka Jew numuna, soo Te Naa ka tu unnepu numme Jew numu tuukwese.
Numme Jew numu gi oo nakabetsea, pana soo Te Naa ooosapa oo nakabetseꞌa, ka pummesoo unnepu.
Numu tooe esagoepana, soo Te Naa unnepu ooosapa togesapa. Meeoo nabotugu oo naꞌunne-kwaꞌnesoo, “Soo Te Naa ooosapa kaahenoꞌyoo ka tu yadooa-wi. Gi haga oo tuagaꞌne, ‘Oosoo esayaꞌe,’ mee unnena.”

Sumuna numu-matu meeoo unnekwu, “Tamme ka suda manena, oosoo oo tzapoonne ka Te Naa besaꞌyoona. Soo Te Naa gi kaahenoꞌyoona oosoo ka mu numu tu maꞌemukwana umu-matoosoo makodyukukwu,” mee mu sukwe numu unakwe. Pana gi! Te Naa ooosapa kaahenoꞌyoona; kaahenosoo mu numu nemadabuekwu. Susumudu numu-matu sumuna meeoo unnekwu, “Nu ka suda manena, nu ka Te Naa besa nemadabue, tamme sakwa yise sutaꞌyoo, oꞌno soo Te Naa besa nanemadabuekwu,” mee umu. Susumudu numu esayaꞌe, nu meeoo unakwe, mee unnena. Mu numu suda unnedu sakwa oe naneyugwe. Pana soo suda mu tumatuguna umu-matoosoo nakwukodyukukwu.
Numme, Jew numu, nasootuhaꞌe mu gi Jew numu-waꞌnesoo. Noꞌyoona tamme nanakwaꞌneꞌyoosoo. Nu mooasoo meeoo mu netammapu
noꞌyoona tamme ka sutakoo po-toogoo meaꞌa, a nabotugu-kwaꞌnesoo, “Gi haga besa manakwe, gi haga kaaheno ka Te Naa besa podo meꞌa. Gi tamme-matu ka Te Naa sopedakwatoo.
Umu gi ka Te Naa tu nakabetseana petzape.
Umu ka Te Naa besa po maꞌwukase, gi he-toogoo besaꞌyoo.
Umu esagoena, numu nesootzemana nanasuda unnena.
Umuoo mu numu nuummaba wumakuna suda mu yugwena, numu batsayakwe. Umu unu nidyapu.
Umuoo gi ka Te Naa tu nakabetseana soohanedu.”
Numme yise oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa meeoo te netammana, numme Jew numu oe naneꞌyakwe, ka mu gi Jew numu-waꞌnesoo. Numme punnoꞌo ka gi Te Naa nakabetseana.
Soo ne tumayoho tabuana oo tzapoonne tamme noꞌyoona tumaꞌemukwa, gi tamme oo tzapoonne ka te besaꞌyoona.

Numme Jew ooosapa meeoo sokwamayakwe, soo Te Naa besaꞌyoo mee te netammakwu, ka te tumayohope te nakabetsea ka umu te nanamooatupu tamme-too tunemadabuepu. Pana umu Te Naa yadooawabe oꞌnosoo te tuukweꞌe, ka saaꞌa soo Te Naa besa te matabuekwu. Menoꞌo yise oe manepetu.
Soo Te Naa te tuukweꞌe mu besaꞌyoo mee te netammakwu, tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Oosoo noꞌoko nanakwaꞌnesoo te matugukwu, mu Jew numu yise ka mu gi Jew numu tuwazoo.
Tamme ka noꞌyoona tumaꞌemukwakupuna, gi ka Te Naa tamme oo netamma-kwaꞌnesoo manena.
Soo Te Naa ekow nasootuhipu te sootuhipu, tamme yise besaꞌyoo soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tamme-koobatoo nabatsase besa te mayugwekwu, oꞌno yise, “Mu besaꞌyoo,” mee te netammakwu.

Soo Te Naa tusoohanena te tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwase, soo Te Pabeꞌe yise tamme-koobatoo nabatsa. Esoo oo tzapoonne oosoo tookwa kaahenoꞌyoo. Ka oꞌnosoo soo sutaꞌyoo gi numu-matoosoo kodyudu, oosoo ka besaꞌyoona oo soohanena, soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsakwu, oosoo yise noꞌoko mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu Te Pabeꞌe-wi, “Besaꞌyoo,” mee mu netammakwu.
Menoꞌo tamme gi nanaꞌunne-waꞌneꞌyoo tamme tammesoo besa nanemadabue. Pana gi! Soo Te Naa “Besaꞌyoo,” mee te netamma, tamme ka te nakaꞌoedyukuna, gi ka te tumayohopu tunakabetsea-wi.
Soo Te Naa sumuꞌyoosoo, namekoosoo te sootuhaꞌe (mu Jew numu, yise mu gi Jew numu tuwazoo, tamme ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna).
Sumuna mu numu meeoo unakwe, “Tamme tunakaꞌoedyukuna gi hee ka tumayohopu namadabue.” Pana gi! He-toogoo soo te tumayohopu namadabuepu.
Soo ne nanamooatupu, Abraham mee naneadu, punakwana numme Jew numu suakena, punnoꞌo ooonneꞌyoosoo.
Oosoo gi nanaꞌunne-waꞌneꞌyoo oosoo puusoo besa namadabuepu ka tunakabetseana. Pana gi!
O nabotugu-kwaꞌnesoo, “Soo Te Naa ka Abraham sootuhise, ‘Besaꞌyoo,’ mee oo netamma, soo Abraham ka oo nakaꞌoedyukuna.”
Tamme ka kummaꞌakoosoo hemma how yugwekuse hemma nagease, oosoo gi te sukwe nageana.
Pana soo Te Naa tamme sootuhina, ka besaꞌyoona te sukwe nasootuhina, tamme ka oo nakaꞌoedyukuna, tooe haꞌoo ne tumatuguna sapa, te sootuhaꞌe.
Oꞌnosoo ne moohedu David mee naneadu mee tubotugu ka Te Naa numme sootuhina, numme ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna, tooꞌe haꞌoo ne tumatugu sapa.
“Soo Te Naa tubetse besa te manuuma ka te tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwase. Tubetse besa te manuuma ka besaꞌyoo mee te netammana.”

Tooe haga tooe sumuna meeoo soonamme, “Soo Te Naa mu Jew numu suuꞌmu besa sootuhaꞌe.” Pana gi! Soo Te Naa ka Abraham besa sootuhi puu gisoo Jew numu oo manakwe ka oo tumayohomeana. Pana ka saaꞌa ka te tumayohope nagena, Jew manese oo tzapoonne, soo Te Naa mooasoo besaꞌyoo mee oo netamma. Ekow yise te tzapoonnekute soo Te Naa besa numu sootuhaꞌe tamme ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna, tooꞌe gi te Jew numu sapa. Menoꞌo yise oosoo te natzapoonnekute, tamme sakwa oo nage, ka Abraham-waꞌne besa tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Menoꞌo tamme ka besa nasootuhidu numuna besaꞌyoo mee nanetamma, tamme ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna Abraham-waꞌnesoo, ka gisoo Jew numu oo manakwe, numme Jew numu, yise mu gi Jew numu tuwazoo.

Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa ka Abraham meeoo netamma, “Umuoo-maꞌyoona suaketu saaꞌa noꞌoko ka teepu-koobatu hemma nemadabue meadooa.” Soo Te Naa meeoo unakwe, “U e tubetse nakaꞌoedyukute,” tooe how ne tumayohope nakabetseapana.
Soo Te Naa haaꞌa sakwa unu ka tumayohopu nagedu suuꞌmu sootuhi? Oo unnepu haaꞌa yise gi hee tamme tunakaꞌoedyukudu-tamme?

Soo Te Naa te sootuhaꞌe ka pumme te nakaꞌoedyukute. Tamme ka tammesoo besa manena nageana, tamme gi besa mane-waꞌneꞌyoo; te maꞌemukwapu tamme-matoosoo kodyukwu. Pana ka te tumayohope nakabetseana naꞌunnepu kadookoo, tamme tookwa gi tumaꞌemukwa.

Menoꞌo yise soo Te Naa ka besow nasootuhibu-ma te sootuhi, tamme ka Abraham-waꞌnesoo tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Oosoo gi how manepunne tooe tamme gi ka mu Jew tumayohopu nakabetseapana. Ooonneꞌyoona tamme noꞌyoona ka Abraham-maꞌyoona suakepu.

A nabotugu-kwaꞌnesoo, soo Te Naa tamme manumudoopu yise mu tuipu matusootabuena, ka Abraham meeoo netamma, “U-nakwana ewaꞌyoo nanaꞌataꞌyoosoo numu suakekwu.” Abraham oo nakaꞌoedyukute. Tooꞌe gi oo nanakaꞌoedyuku oo manepunne sapa oosoo Abraham ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukuna meeoo soonamme, “Numme dooamu-ga-waꞌneꞌyoo, tooe nu unu waꞌetsepana; soo e nodukwa punnoꞌo gi dooamu-ga-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
Soo Abraham gi wahaba ka Te Naa unnepu nakaꞌoedyukuse, yise unusoo oe tunakaꞌoedyuku mani.
Ooosapa oo nakaꞌoedyukute ka Te Naa tu unne-kwaꞌnesoo manakwe.
Ooonneꞌyoona soo Te Naa meeoo oo netamma, “Besaꞌyoo numu,” meeꞌe.

Soo Te Naa ekow naꞌunnedu Abraham-witu botugu tamme-too tuwazoo gi ka Abraham suuꞌmu. Soo Te Naa, “Besaꞌyoo,” mee te netammakwu ka te tunakaꞌoedyukute soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme maꞌemukwa-koobatoo nabatsase, soo Te Naa yise oo mayodase tamme yise besa manekwu.
Menoꞌo tamme ka Te Naa-no besa napuaꞌa, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka besa te mayugwese, tamme ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna.
Menoꞌo oosoo te sootuhaꞌe tooꞌe gi te besaꞌhoo sapa, besa tamme sokwama ka tamme oo sopedakwadoo, ka tamme yaꞌe-wikoo tamme o mayodakwuse, yise ooosapa besa sokwamakwu ka Te Naa-baa petugase.
Menoꞌo tamme yise besa sokwama soo tooe how tooe suda namanedu gi hee tamme-nakwana ka besa tamme tu sootuhaꞌe, ookow tamme oo natunedyooe.
Tamme ka gi nasootookena te tusooyugwekwudu unu natzooe manepetugakwu ka te tunakaꞌoedyukute. Oꞌno tamme yise oo sopedakwadookwu ka Te Naa tamme sootuhaꞌe.
Tamme oo sopedakwadoo menoꞌo tamme ooosapa besa sokwamamokwu ka Te Naa tamme sootuhi ka tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma. Oosoo unu te soobedya.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe te soobedya tooe suda te tumatugu sapa. Soo Te Naa tunemadabuena oe manepetuse, oosoo tamme-koobatoo nabatsa, tamme gi hownnekoo tammesoo nanemagwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Tamme puu gi yaꞌe-waꞌneꞌyoo kummaꞌakoosoo numu-koobatoo. Sumuna tubetse besow numu-koobatoo suuꞌmu nu nabatsakwu.
Pana ka togesoo te maꞌemukwa soo Te Pabeꞌe puu tamme-koobatoo nabatsapu, soo Te Naa ka besa te soobedyana.
Tamme yise besaꞌyookwu, tamme ka togesoo te sutakoo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatase. Oosoo te tubetse magwetzoikwu ka te tumaꞌemukwana gi tamme-matoosoo makodyukuna.
Ka pumme te tumooꞌoo, soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo oo mabatsa tuungu. Menoꞌo yise tamme oo pupuaꞌamu oosoo yise te magwetzoikwu ka Te Pabeꞌe ka oo nabatsa-wikoo oo mayodase tamme-koobatoo.
Menoꞌo tamme ka Te Naa nesootuhaꞌe ka Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo, oosoo ka Te Naa doodooamu te mayugwese.
Ka mooeꞌugasoo namanumudoopu nana Adam mee naneadu tumaꞌemukwase, soo oo tumaꞌemukwanasoo oo batsa. Oo-waꞌnesoo noꞌyoona numu yaꞌeyakwe, ka noꞌyoona mu numu tumaꞌemukwa.

Mu numu gi hownnekoo ka tu maꞌemukwana sopedakwatoo ka Moses-kobenasoo, gisoo ka te tumayohope tamme oo namadabuekute. Pana yise hownnekoo mu numu oo sopedakwatoo ka maꞌemukwana soo Moses gisoo mu numu tuukwe mu manekwuna.

Mu numu gi maꞌemukwa ka Adam maꞌemukwa-kwaꞌne, pana umu noꞌyoona tuiyakwe. Nu ka Adam-witu wahadyakwe, soo Adam ka Te Pabeꞌe-no nanosoo numu moohedu, soo Adam ka suta podokoo te moohe, soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka besow podo. Soo Adam maꞌemukwa-waꞌneꞌyoo ewow numu goeke. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ewow numu magwetzoaꞌe.
Ka Adam maꞌemukwase, ewaꞌyoo numu tumaꞌemukwana nakwukodyu yise nagoꞌe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ewow numu tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwana, mu magwetzoaꞌe.
Oosoo Adam ka Te Naa gi nakana, tooꞌe noꞌoko numu kadoo mayugwe, pana soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa nakana noꞌobatusoo numu magwetzoi.
Ewaꞌyoo numu tumaꞌemukwa mane ka Adam gi tunakabetseꞌa, soo Te Pabeꞌe nakabetseadu ewow numu besa mayugweke.
Tooe mu numu ka Te Naa unnepu nakase sapa, ewaꞌyoosoo tumaꞌemukwa. Pana soo Te Naa ka mu numu nakasootuhi. Tooe ewa mu tumaꞌemukwa sapa, oosoo mu sootuhise, mu tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwa.
Tamme yise tuikwu ka tumaꞌemukwana, pana tamme yise ooosapa mommokwu ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus tamme sootuhise tamme-koobatoo oo nabatsase.
Sumuna numu meeoo soonamme, “Ka tumaꞌemukwape ewow, soo Te Naa tookwa ewa tusoomuꞌwakwu. Nu sakwa ooosapa maꞌemukwano, oꞌno soo Te Naa ooosapa oo soomuꞌwanokwu.” Ooonneꞌyoo pana tamme gi!
Gi tamme ooosapa tumaꞌemukwano-waꞌneꞌyoo ka meeoo te soonammena kadoo namayugwese.

Soo baa-wi te namatzakana yise mee naꞌunnedu, tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌneꞌyookwusoo. Tamme puu tuipu-kwaꞌne oosoo ka tamme-koobatoo nabatsase. Tamme menoꞌo mommo pudu namanumudoopu-waꞌneꞌyoo, soo Te Naa pooha puu ka Te Pabeꞌe nabatsa-wikoo oo mayodapu.

Tamme uga ooosapa ka sutakoo nakabetseadu, gi hownnekoo yooi-waꞌneꞌyoo. Pana menoꞌo soo oꞌnosoo te tumatugupu kadoo namayugwepu ka Te Pabeꞌe mooasoo oo-koobatoo nabatsase, tamme yise gi ka suda namanedu nakabetsea-waꞌneꞌyoo. Menoꞌo tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌnesoo namayodakwu, tamme ka yaꞌese saaꞌa oo-baasoo ooosapa nobe-gana, ka Te Naa nakabetseakoo.
Tamme oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Pabeꞌe tu nabatsa-wikoo namayodase, gi yaꞌe-waꞌneꞌyoosoo. Mooasoo oꞌnosoo oosoo puu ka numu tuina matzooekupu.
Oꞌnosoo oosoo tamme tumaꞌemukwa-koobatoo nabatsapu. Menoꞌo soo Te Pabeꞌe gi yaꞌe-waꞌneꞌyoo, pana ka Te Naa nakabetseana, gwetzoimokwu.

Meeoosoo sakwa tamme nasooyugwe. Soo yaꞌepu numu gi hownnekoo tumaꞌemukwa-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme sakwa ka yaꞌepu-waꞌneꞌyoosoo gi te maꞌemukwana soohanepana. Soo nummedu numu ka tu tunakabetseana soogwaꞌe, tamme sakwa umuoo numu-waꞌne, yise ka Te Pabeꞌe noko Te Naa nakabetseꞌa.
Tamme sakwa gi ka suda te tusooyugwena nakabetseapana.

Gi sakwa nagutza tamme menoꞌo te tookoo soonahadyagwepana, tamme sakwa Te Naa nakabetsea. Menoꞌo manakwana yise soo Te Naa pummesoo tusooyugwetoo te nemadabuekwu. Oosoo ka pudu numu-waꞌne te matabuese, ka mu numu tu yaꞌe-wikoo tu mayodapu-waꞌne.
Menoꞌo yise tamme gi suda tumatugu-waꞌneꞌyoosoo, soo Te Naa yise te sootuhi tooe tamme gi ka ne Jew tumayohopu nakabetseapana.
Sumuna umu-matu mee unnekwu, “Menoꞌo tamme te Jew numu tumayohopu gi nakabetseana, tamme ewa mesoo maꞌemukwa, soo Te Naa ka te sootuhina te maꞌemukwana soomuꞌwakwu.” Pana gi!

Nu besasoo ooka mu tuukwekwu. “Tamme ka sumuoo numu nakabetseana oosoo te nehanedu, tamme yise oo mane. Tamme ka sutakoo nakabetseana, oosoo sutaꞌyoo te sooꞌakwu. tamme ka besow nakabetseana, tamme besaꞌyookwu.”
Mu ugasoo ka sutakoo nakabetseadu, mu yise ookow nakaꞌoedyukute. Nu ka Te Naa nesootuhaꞌe menoꞌo, mu ka besow nakabetseana, ka mu natunedyooepu.
Mu ugasoo mu tookoo-ma tumaꞌemukwana sutaꞌyoo. Menoꞌo sakwa yise mu kaaheno tumayohono.
Tamme ka oꞌnosoo suda te tumatuguna nakabetseana tamme gi ka besow nakabetseꞌa.
Oosoo gi te tummatzidu, te sukwe koꞌe. Menoꞌo yise tamme ka oꞌnosoo te mane-ma nasookwaꞌe.
Pana menoꞌo tamme ka Te Naa nakabetseana ka oo besa podokoo meana, ooosapa tamme besa gwetzoimona, gi ka suda namanedu nakabetseakwu.
Tammesoo tumaꞌemukwana ka te koꞌe, pana soo Te Naa te sootuhaꞌe te gwetzoimokwuna, ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus tamme-koobatoo nabatsase.
Ka mu Jew numu tumayohope-witu, e nanumu, mu oo sopedakwadoo ka gisoo yaꞌena suuꞌmu tamme te tumayohope nakabetseadu. Menoꞌo sakwa nu besasoo mu tuukwe.

Soo te tumayohope oe ꞌmane ka mi manekase gi hownnekoo nanemaꞌwuni-waꞌneꞌyoo ka nanodukwa-waꞌne. Tamme ka nanodukwadoose, tamme sakwa te kooma-baa. Tamme suda manakwe ka kummaꞌakoosoo nana koomadoose ka tooesoo kooma-gana kooma mooasoo yaꞌepu, oꞌno yise tammesoo mane-gaꞌyoo ka te mane-kwi. Oꞌno sakwa tamme yise saaꞌa kummaꞌasoo mesoo koomadoo. Oosoo yise gi hownneꞌyookwu.

Oo manepunne, e nanumu, tamme ka gisoo Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna, tamme ka te Jew tumayohopu-nosoo, soo te Jew tumayohope yise ka namanedu-witu suda te tunedyooe. Oꞌno yise tamme ka suda namanedu-witu soohanese sapa tooesoo suda manakwe. Soo suda namanedu tamme-matoosoo kodyuse, te goekwu. Pana menoꞌo soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tamme-koobatoo nabatsase, yise namayodase oosoo tamme yaꞌe-kwaꞌnesoo ka mooasoo te Jew tumayohope gi hee tamme-nakwana. Oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo tamme ka gi ka te nanamooatu Jew tumayohope nakabetsea manese, tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe tumayohokuna, tamme ka Te Naa Besa Pooha nakabetseꞌa. Menoꞌo yise tamme besa manekwu.

Umu-matu sumuna mee sookamma, “Ka Jew tumayohope numme nakabetseana numme tumaꞌemukwa.” Gi! Soo te Jew tumayohope ka te tumaꞌemukwana te tuukwe. Gisoo tamme te tumayohope sopedakwadoo tamme sakwa gi kummaꞌakoosoo numu nasoodyagepana. Ka tooe hekwi tooe soo te Jew tumayohope te tunedyooe, tamme sakwa gi kummaꞌakoosoo nasoodyagepana, nu oo sopedakwatoo, nupuu tumaꞌemukwa.

Nu yise unusoo numu nasoodyage manemena, nu ka oo sopedakwadoona nu sakwa gi numu nasoodyagepana. Tamme yise gi oo sopedakwadoo ka te yaꞌekwuna. Pana tamme ka te Jew tumayohope-witu nakase, tamme oo nakasopedakwatoo ka tumaꞌemukwana, tamme tookwa tuikwu.

Nu meeoo soonammeyakwe, “Soo te Jew tumayohope e magwetzoikwu,” mee. Pana gi! Umu e sukwe tzapoonnekute nu yaꞌekwu, nu ka gi mu nakabetseana. Nu yise nanemooaga ka meeoo soonammena, “Nu namagwetzoikwu ka te tumayohope nakabetseana.” Pana gi, nu yaꞌekwu.
Oosoo ne Jew tumayohope unu besaꞌyoo pana yise suda te tumatugunasoo te koꞌe. Aha, pana soo ne Jew tumayohope e tzapoonneku nu ooosapa tumaꞌemukwa, nu ka gi hownnekoo ka te tumayohope nakabetseana.
Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha ka te Jew tumayohope-ma te sootuhi; pana nu gi oo nakabetsea-waꞌneꞌyoo. Nu ka sutakoo suuꞌmu nakabetseana.
Nu nanesootuhibu soogwipana ka sutakoo nu tuyoho nu yise gi how madaꞌe.
Nuudea oo sopedakwadoopana ka mu Jew tumatuguna besaꞌyoona, nu yise sutaꞌyoo numu.

Nu gi suda e manena petzabe; pana soo sutaꞌyoo oo e mane tuungu. Nu nuusoo gi besa mane-waꞌneꞌyoo, nu ooosapa suda manakwe. Nu besa soomane pana nu gi besaꞌyoo. Nu gi ka besa e soomanena mayoho. Nu ka suda namanedu gi e petzabena suuꞌmu mayoho.
Nu ka besa tooꞌe soomanepana, togesoo suda manenoꞌo. Nu oo sopedakwatoo nu ooosapa ooonneꞌyoo.
Besa nu tooꞌe tusooyugwepana oosoo sutaꞌyoo e manoyugwe.
Nu tubetse unu suda soonamme soo sutaꞌyoo e yaꞌe-witoo e moohe. Haga e magwetzoikwu?

Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus yise menoꞌo e magwetzoikwu. Nu ka Te Naa nesootuhikwu ka oowetoo namagwetzoise. E soonamme-wi nu ka Te Naa nakabetseꞌapana, nu nuusoo togesoo maꞌemukwa. Ooonneꞌyoona nu ꞌyoo manepunne.
“Noꞌyoona Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyuku, nu ka suta mu tumatuguna gi mu-matoosoo makodyukukwu,” mee soo Te Naa te netamma.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe Besa Pooha te magwetzoise, te maꞌnaꞌwena nemadabuꞌe, tamme yise gi ka sutakoo nakabetsea manekwu.

Soo te Jew tumayohope gi ka te tumaꞌemukwana tzadyooiku-waꞌneꞌyoo. Ekow te sukwe tzapoonnekute tamme nabatsakwu ka tumaꞌemukwana. Soo Te Naa yise Tu Besaa Tooaꞌa yaatoo manumudoopu. Soo Te Naa te tumaꞌemukwana ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoosoo makwukodyupu yise oo batsa, ka te Jew tumayohope tunetammana-kwaꞌneꞌyoo.
Tamme suda tusooyugwe tamme ka gi besow podo meanona. Tamme besa tusooyugwe, tamme ka Te Naa Besa Pooha tumayohokuna.
Tamme ka suda te tusooyugwena nakabetseana, oosoo te batsakwu. Pana tamme ka Te Naa Besa Pooha nakabetseana, tamme namagwetzoise, besa yise sokwamamokwu.
Tamme ka te tookoo suda tusooyugwena nakabetseana, tamme tookwa ka Te Naa wohokana, gi Te Naa nakabetsea-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Tamme ka gi Te Naa nakabetseana, oosoo gi tamme-matoo besa soonamme.
Tamme ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohaꞌyoona oo nakabetsea gi ka sutakoo nakabetseꞌa. Tamme ka gi Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohaꞌyoona, gi ka Te Pabeꞌe doodooamu.
Tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe nanumuna, te moogooa ooosapa ka Te Naa-baaꞌyookwu, soo Te Naa ka meeoo unnena tamme besaꞌyoo tooe te tookoo yaꞌese sapa, tamme ka tumaꞌemukwapuna.
Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus mayoda ka oo nabatsase ka Tu Besa Pooha-ma, oo Besa Pooha yise ka saaꞌa tamme tookoo mayodakwu, ka oo Besa Pooha te nemadabuepuse.
E nanumu, tamme sakwa gi ka suda te tusooyugwena nakabetseapana.
Tamme ka sutakoo nakabetseana, oosoo te goekwu. Ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohaꞌyoona tamme ka suda namanedu tzadyooikuse, namagwetzoikwu.
Tamme ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohaꞌyoona tamme tookwa Te Naa doodooamu.

Soo Te Naa ka tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma te sootuhise, tu doodooamu te mayugwe. Oosoo unu besa te soobedyana tamme yise, “E Naa,” mee oo neꞌa. Te Naa te magwetzoise tu manewabe te mayugwe. Tu doodooamu te mayugwe, tamme yise gi oo-ma suaꞌe.
Ka Te Naa Besa Pooha tamme oedyukute tamme togesapa Te Naa doodooamu.

Te Naa te sootuhikwu noꞌoko nasootuhibu ka Te Pabeꞌe tu sootuhi-kwaꞌnesoo tamme punnoꞌo ka oo doodooamuna. Ka Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌnesoo tamme punnoꞌo nuummabu wumakwu yaa ka teepu-koobaꞌyoona. Oꞌno oo-waꞌnesoo soo Te Naa punnoꞌo te sootuhikwu.
Soo suda namanedu yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona gi hee, soo Te Naa ka saaꞌa besa masoo te sootuhikwu, mee nu.
Soo Te Naa tu doodooamu mu mayugwese oꞌno yise soo hee noꞌyoona oo tumadabuena atasoo namayugwekwu.
Ekow umu wutooꞌe. Soo numu yaꞌekwuna kadooꞌyoo namayugwekwu, noꞌyoona hee besaꞌyookwu soo Te Naa ooonnekoo hemma besaꞌhoo te sootuhikwu.
Mooasoo Te Naa Tu Besa Pooha-ma te magwetzoina yise saaꞌa te mapudutuputookwu tamme ookow soogwipunne.
Tamme tooe besa sokwamana oo wutooepunnekwu ka hemma noꞌoko atasoo namayugwekwuse.
Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha te tummatzaꞌe, tamme ka gi oo soomapuꞌana. Tamme gi oo sopedakwatoo how sakwa tamme nanesootuhi tabua, tamme gi oo nakasopedakwatoo tooe tamme oo nanesootuhikute sapa.

Soo Te Naa oo nakasopedakwatoo ka tu Besa Pooha nanesootuhiwunu. Oosoo noꞌoko numu sokwammana sopedakwatoo. Soo oo Besa Pooha yise te nanesootuhikute, ka Te Naa pumme sooyugwe-kwaꞌnekoo oo nanesootuhaꞌe.
Soo Te Naa noꞌoko a namanekwuna besa tamme-tamme nemadabue, ka besa pumme te soobedya, oosoo ka mooasoo te netutzease, te sootuhaꞌe.
Oꞌno yise soo Te Naa tamme-witu sopedakwadoona te netutzease, tamme yise Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌneꞌyookwu. Oꞌno yise soo oo tooaꞌa Te Tubetse Pabeꞌe manepunnekwu, oosoo yise ewow samoomu-gakwu.
Oꞌno soo Te Naa ka tamme-witu soohanese, yise te netutzease, meeoo te netammakwu, “Mu besaꞌyoo,” yise nawaꞌnesoo te mayugwekwu.
Gi haga te matzooeku-waꞌneꞌyoo, soo Te Naa ka te tummatzina.
Soo Te Naa puu gi ka tu tooa tamme-makoo netumooꞌe. Tamme oo sopedakwatoo oosoo noꞌokosoo hemma te sukwe sootuhaꞌe ka tu tooa tamme-koobatoo nabatsase.
Gi haga te maꞌemukwa-ma te tuagane-waꞌne manepunne tooe ka te maꞌemukwase sapa. Soo Te Naa mooasoo noꞌoko oo soomuꞌwapu. Menoꞌo yise tamme besaꞌyoo mee oosoo.
Gi haga sutaꞌyoo mee te netamme-waꞌneꞌyoo, ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsase, tu yaꞌe-wikoo namayodase, menoꞌo Te Naa-baa katuna ka besow tamme-too negwaꞌe.

Gi hee ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme soobedyana kadoo mayugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo: Gi tooe how tooe a namanewunudu, numu-tamme tumooꞌoona, tseagoena, tutuha manena, suta-wi manepunnena, numu tamme goena, gi hee ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme soobedyana kadoo mayugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
A nabotugu-kwaꞌnesoo, “Ka Te Naa-dooamuna tamme oo-waꞌnesoo, tooe hannanoꞌo tooe nahoawipunnena.”
Ookow tamme mu matzooekupunne ka Te Pabeꞌe togesoo besa tamme soobedya.

Nu oo sopedakwatoo gi hee ka Te Naa tamme soobedyana tzadyooiku-waꞌneꞌyoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-makoo. Gi hee tamme-koobatu, gi mu toha kakasa-gakoo, gi tsoapa, gi poohabe, gi suda namanedu, gi hee teepu-koobatu, gi hee ka togesoo momona te manena, gi yaꞌena, gi saaꞌa tooe how te manikwuna, gi hee tooe-hanotu tooe Te Naa tumadabuena, ka Te Naa tamme soobedyana gi te sootuhidyidooa.

Nu nugasoo nanumu ooosapa suda soonammekuyakwe. Nu oo sopedakwadoo ka Te Naa Pooha-toohaꞌyoona nu togesapa tuukweꞌe. E nanumu sakwa Te Naa nakaꞌoedyuku nu-kwaꞌnesoo, yise Te Naa mu sootuhise, oꞌno umu gwetzoimokwu, ookow nu unu soogwaꞌe. Tooe nu ka e nasootuhina watzekuse sapa, umuoo sakwa ooka nasootuhi. Gi yise oo manepunne.

Umu Te Naa besa doodooamu mee nananea. Umuoo sakwa Te Naa besa doodooamu, soo Te Naa ka oꞌnosoo mu sootuhipuna. Oosoo ka mu tzapoonnekuna tu tubetse besaꞌyoona, mu tuukweꞌena, mu tunetammakuna putoogoo mu meakwuna, yise ka mu nanesootuhi tabuakwuna. “Nu saaꞌa Te Pabeꞌe mu-matoo tayadooa,” mee mu netamma.
Te Pabeꞌe ekow teepu-koobatoo nawuese ka umu oo numu habetoo kemmapunnedu. Ka Te Naa tamme nehanepunnedu, ka Te Pabeꞌe manumudoopu ookow nu nesootuhaꞌe.
Soo Te Naa unnepu ooosapa togesapa. Umu-naga-kwitu suuꞌmu Jew numu, Te Naa tubetse doodooamu, gi noꞌyoona.
Umu Abraham maꞌyoona suagetu-nagatu suuꞌmu Te Naa doodooamu. Soo Abraham ewow naaꞌatse dooamu-gaꞌyoo pana soo Te Naa meeoo oo netamma, “U tooaꞌa Isaac-maꞌyoona suagetu suuꞌmu nu saaꞌa sootuhidooa.”
Esoo Te Naa unnena, “Mu numu nugasoo tunetuzeana nu sootuhikwu ka nuga tumanumudoona suuꞌmu tuwazoo.”
Soo Te Naa ka Abraham tuukweꞌe ka Isaac nadooaꞌadookwuna, mee unakwe, “Penakwa tamano ka matoogoosoo e kodyu u nodukwa Sara naatse Tooaꞌa-gakwu.”
Ka saaꞌa yise soo oo tooa Isaac mee naneadu nadooaꞌadoo, nana manekase yise punnoꞌo nodukwadoo. Oo nodukwa Rebecca mee naneadu ka saaꞌa punnoꞌo waahoo koheꞌa.

Soo Te Naa ka mu waahoo dooake-witu mee oo netamma, “Soo oo wanngaꞌa saaꞌa ka tu pabeꞌe moohedooa. Nu ooka oo wanngaꞌa netutzease oo sootuhikwu gi ka oo pabeꞌe.” Umu ka gisoo nadooamudoona, gisoo tumaꞌemukwa. Soo Te Naa puusoo tu sootuhikwuna netutzea. Gisoo mu dooake hemma sopedakwadoo sapa, ka tooe how tooe mu manakwe sapa tuwazoo. Ooonnekoo soo Te Naa te tzapoonnekute.
Sumuna umu-matu meeoo unakwe, “Soo Te Naa gi toge tumatugupu.” Pana gi!
Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa ka Moses meeoo netamma, “Nu nugasoo petzabena sootuhikwu.”
Soo Te Naa yise ka pummesoo petzabena sootuhaꞌe, tooꞌetoo umu tu nasootuhina petzabedu.

Ewetuoo oosoo nabotugu ka Te Naa unnena, mu Egypt numu moohedu meeoo netammana, “Nu umuoo numu u moohe tuungu, pana nu yise u ooonakwa natzooedu pooha-gaꞌyoo. Oꞌno yise noꞌyoona numu ka teepu-koobatu oo nakasopedakwadookwu ka e pooha-gana,” meeꞌesoo Te Naa.
Soo Te Naa yise mu sootuhaꞌe umu tu netutzeana. Umu-matu tusoomatzooedu soo Te Naa mu tzasobedya.
Sumuna tooe haga tooe meeoo unakwe, “Tamme ka suda manena, soo Te Naa sakwa gi tammesoo meeoo netammapana. Oosoo ꞌyoo te matabuena. Tamme gi hownnekoo oo madaꞌe.”

Pana gi! Tamme sakwa gi meeoo ka Te Naa nemadabuepana. Nu besasoo ooka mu tuukwekwu tamme pukwenabe teepuna-tsedadoo-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo tseda sakwa puu gi ka pumme matabuepu meeoo netammapana, “U atasoo e matabue.” Soo numu pummesoo petzabe-kwaꞌne tumadabue, tooe hownnekoo tooe mu puu tsedadookwu, sumuna besa puu-ma nasootzame-waꞌnekoo, tooetoo mu sukwe tsedadookwu.
Ooosoo Te Naa puu ka mu numu besa matuku. Susumudu numu ooosapa tumaꞌemukwa pana soo Te Naa gi yabesoo mu sutakute. Pana saaꞌa umu kadooꞌoo namayugwekwu.

Oosoo oo tzapoonne ka susumudu numu manekwuna. Pana susumudu numu oosoo netutzea ka mu sootuhikwuse. Umu yise oo tzapoonnekwu how besaꞌyoo tookwa soo Te Naa. Susumudu umu-matu Jew numu, susumudu yise gi. Pana yise noꞌyoona nanakwaꞌneꞌyoosoo.

Ka mu gi Jew numu-witu ka oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa yadooawabe Hosea mee naneadu Te Naa meeoo unnena tubotugupu, “Umuoo numu ugasoo gi nuga doodooamu. Pana nu nugasoo dooamu mu mayugwekwu. Nu ugasoo gi mu soobedyadu pana menoꞌo yise nu besa mu soobedya.”

Ka mu Jew numu-witu soo Te Naa yadooawabe Isaiah mee naneadu mee tubotugupu. “Menoꞌo tubetse ewatseꞌyoo Jew numu pana ka saaꞌa soo numu tumaꞌemukwana numu-matoosoo kodyukwu yaa teepu-koobatu. Soo Te Naa yise huutsekoosoo Jew numu magwetzoikwu.”

Menoꞌo yise Isaiah unne-kwaꞌnesoo manepetu. “Tooꞌe noꞌyoona tamme kadooꞌoo tooꞌe namayugwekwu ka mu Sodom noko Gomorrah mee nananeadu-kwaꞌnesoo. Pana soo Te Naa huuoo tamme-makoo suaketu magwetzoihoo.”
Meeꞌe nu mu tuukwekwu. Susumudu mu gi Jew numu gi puusoo besa tooꞌe manakwe, pana soo Te Naa yise besa mu mayugwekwu ka unu mu tunakaꞌoedyukute.

Susumudu Jew numu punnoꞌo besa tooꞌe manakwe, pana gi, umu ka gi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Umu puusoo sukwe besa tooꞌe naneyugwe, ka ne Jew tumayohope nakabetseana, pana mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka saaꞌa puusoo kadoo namayugwekwu.
Ka oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa meeoo unakwe, “Ka mu Pabeꞌe mu-baasoo petuse. Umu oo nakaꞌoedyukudu ooosapa saaꞌa namagwetzoikwu, pana mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka saaꞌa puusoo kadoo namayugwekwu.”
E pupuaꞌamu, umu e Jew numu namagwetzoina, nu unu oo soogwina ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe umu-koobatoo.
Nu mu sopedakwatoo umu ka Te Naa tu nakabetseana soogwaꞌepana, umu gi hownnekoo oo nakasopedakwatoo.
Umu puusoo besa tooꞌe manepana, umu ka gi oo nakasopedakwadoona, soo Te Naa besaꞌyoo mee mu neakwu ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi mu tunakaꞌoedyukute.

Mu Jew-wi nanesootuhidu numu tooꞌesoo namagwetzoipana ka pumme Jew nanesootuhi-wikoo, gi hownnekoo namagwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise menoꞌo atasoo te tunetammakute. Tamme Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukuna, oꞌno Te Naa mee te netammaku, “Besaꞌyoo,” oꞌno yise tamme namagwetzoikwu.
Soo ne Jew tumayohope ka Te Naa po ataꞌyoosoo. Soo Moses meeoo ka ne Jew tumayohope-witu botugu, “Tamme ka te tumayohope ooosapa nakabetseana, tamme namagwetzoikwu,” pana tamme gi oo mane-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Pana ka te tunakaꞌoedyukudu-witu oosoo besa te mayugwekwu meeoo nabotugu, “Gi unu namanakwe, numu namagwetzoina. Gi tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe yaa teepu-koobatoo bise, oosoo te magwetzoikwu.
Gi tamme ka oo yaꞌe-kwikoo oo mayoda-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Mooasoo oo namanepu tamme mooasoo ooetu naka. Ekow meeoo naꞌunnedu tamme nakaꞌoedyukuna.”
“Soo Jesus Te Pabeꞌe,” meeꞌe tamme unnena tamme oo tubetse nakaꞌoedyukuna, soo Te Naa oo yaꞌe-wikoo oo mayodase, yise oosoo te magwetzoikwu.
Tamme ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna soo Te Naa, “Besaꞌyoo,” mee te netamma, tamme yise ka oo wahana, soo Te Naa te magwetzoaꞌe.
Oo nabotugu-kwaꞌnesoo, “Umu tunakaꞌoedyukute, ka gi oo-ma nasookwina.”
Mu tooe haga tooe ka Te Pabeꞌe tu namagwetzoina natuungudu nanakabetseadooa, mu Jew numu, mu gi Jew numu tuwazoo. Te Pabeꞌe pumatoo te nanesootuhidu noꞌoko te sootuhaꞌe.

Ka gisoo Te Pabeꞌe-matoo mu nanesootuhaꞌe soo Te Naa sakwa tooe haga tooe umu-matoo tayase umu yise umu-baa petugase, ka Te Naa unnepu mu tuukwe. Umu numu oo nakase ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuse, oꞌno yise oo-matoo nanesootuhikwu. Ka a nabotugu-kwaꞌnesoo, “Besa mu numu ka petudyina, nu ka Te Naa besa unnena mu tuukwekwu.”

Umu Jew numu natuukweꞌe, pana gi noꞌyoona ka Te Naa besa unnepu nakabetseꞌa. Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa yadooawabe Isaiah mee naneadu umu-witu boꞌo meeꞌe, “Huuꞌyoosoo numu oo nakaꞌoedyukute ka pumme ne tuukwena.”
Mooasoo mu Jew numu ka Te Naa besa unnepu naka, meeꞌe natubotugu, “Tooe hano tooe ka teepu-kooba soo Te Naa unnepu nawaha.”

Mu Jew numu ka Te Naa unnepu nakasopedakwatoo, pana gi nasootuhi, ka gisoo oo nakaꞌoedyukuna. Soo Moses meeoo mu netamma, “Umu numu, mu gi Jew numu mu nasootzaꞌme sooyugwena umu meeoo unnena umuoo gi hee umuoo mu nasoodyagekwu ka Te Naa umuoo sootuhaꞌe.”
Isaiah ka Te Naa unnena waha, “Umu uga gi nu-matoo nanesootuhidu, gi uga e soomayudu pana menoꞌo nu mu natzapoonekute, umu yise e sopedakwatoo manepetu.”
Pana mu ka Jew numu-witu soo Te Naa meeoo unakwe, “Nu ooosapa umuoo numu tuukweꞌe nu mu sootuhikwu, pana umu gi e unnena nakabetseꞌa.”

Ewaꞌyoo Jew numu gi nasootuhaꞌe, umu ka gi Te Naa nakabetseana, pana gi noꞌyoona mu Jew. Huuꞌyoosoo nasootuhaꞌe. Nu puu ooonneꞌyoo. Nu Jew numu, ka Abraham-maꞌyoona suaketu. Nu ka mu Jew-nagatu-matu Benjamin mee nananeadu. Soo Te Naa puu nuka sootuhaꞌe.

Soo Te Naa ka mu Jew numu netutzea mu sootuhikwuse. Soo Te Naa ooosapa umu-nagatu magwetzoikwu. Oꞌnosoo soo Elijah meeoo mu soobedyadu. Noꞌyoona mu Jew gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-witu meeoo nabotugu oosoo ka mu Jew numu nanetzaꞌmekute ka Te Naa meeoo tuukwena,

“Umuoo numu gi u-matoo nanesootuhi manepu. Umuoo gi u nakabetsea-waꞌneꞌyoo. Umuoo noꞌoko u yadooawabe goꞌe ka u-witu mu waha. Menoꞌo yise nu suuꞌmu nabenaꞌe, togesoo u-matoo nanesootuhidu. Umu yise nuka tooꞌe batsa.”
Soo Te Naa oo nanekwegease meeꞌe, “Susumudu (7000) umu numu-matu togesoo nu-matoo suuꞌmu nanesootuhaꞌe.”
Menoꞌo yise tooe ooosoo. Susumudu Jew numu soo Te Naa sootuhaꞌe, puusoo mu netutzeana mu sootuhaꞌe umuoo tunakaꞌoedyukute.
Soo Te Naa ekow mu sootuhibu. Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ooka sukwe sootuhipu, gi hemma puusoo obedoo soogwaꞌe.
Soo Te Naa huuoosoo Jew numu netutzea tu sootuhikwuna. Tooꞌe noꞌyoona Jew numu ka Te Naa pumme sootuhina soogwipana, gi nasootuhaꞌe. Umuoo tusoomatzooena, gi tunakaꞌoedyukute.
A nabotugu-kwaꞌnesoo, “Yow tabeba-wi Te Naa gi mu sukwe tsasobedya ka gi pumme mu sooheesoobedya.”
Soo David ka oꞌnosoo meeoo tubotugu, “Umu puusoo suda nuukwe ka tooe hemma-ma tooe nasoonatzi, pumme magwetzoikwudu.”

Nu menoꞌo mu Jew numu gi sootuhaꞌe, pana ka saaꞌa umuoo punnoꞌo nasootuhikwu. Menoꞌo mu gi Jew numu punnoꞌo nasootuhaꞌe-waꞌnesoo, mu Jew numu ka gi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Ka saaꞌa mu Jew numu ka Te Naa kukummaꞌakoosoo numu oo sootuhina oo sopedakwadoose, umu yise ka Te Naa pumme sootuhina punnoꞌo soogwikwu.

Mu gi Jew numu nasootuhaꞌe, ka mu Jew numu nasootuhaꞌe, ka mu Jew numu ka Te Naa po maꞌwukase. Ka saaꞌa unusoo besaꞌyookwu, ka mu Jew numu ka Te Naa po-matoosoo kodyuse. Oꞌno yise noꞌobatusoo numu nananosoo nasootuhikwu.

Mu gi Jew numu nu meeoo netammakwu, soo Te Naa-manaa tooe hano tooe e taꞌya, mumme gi Jew numu tu unnena e tuukwe tuunguna. Nu ooosapa besa soonamme ka nanesootuhibu mu tunedyooena, nu besakoo mu tunedyooꞌe, nu ka meeoo soonammena, “Sumuna nugasoo nanumu-matu ka Te Naa pumme sootuhina soogwaꞌe, umu ka oo nakana, soo Te Naa mu gi Jew numu sootuhaꞌe.”

Otea besaꞌyookwu ka saaꞌa mu Jew numu tunakaꞌoedyuku manese, ka menoꞌo mu Jew numu gi tunakaꞌoedyukute, mu gi Jew numu yise natuukwe ka Te Naa unnepu. Umuoo yise Te Naa doodooamu mane. Pana ka saaꞌa ka mu Jew numu punnoꞌo tunakaꞌoedyukuse, oꞌno oe manepetukwu, mu tuipu yise namayodakwu. Umu pumaꞌyoona mu Jew-nakwana suaketu, ugasoo Te Naa doodooamu. Umu Jew numu yise punnoꞌo Te Naa dooamu manepetukwu.

Nu besasoo ooka mu tuukwekwu. Umu Te Naa doodooamu besow wuyupe-waꞌneꞌyoo. Mu Jew numu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu a maꞌna pasa-kwaꞌneꞌyoo, umu puu natsegeaꞌakwuni. Mu gi Jew numu ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna ka besaꞌhoo a maꞌna-waꞌneꞌyoo. Ka besow wuyupe tuna-matoo nadotsanase, mu yise ka besow wuyupe-makoo mu besow nasootuhikwu, tooꞌe ka gi besow wuyupe-matu kemmapana.
Mu sakwa gi naanaꞌunnepana mu ka mu Jew numu ooonnakwa besaꞌyoo. Yoo manepunne, soo wuyupe tubetse tuna puu ka a maꞌna ooonnakwasoo natzooꞌe. Tuna oosoo ka a maꞌna paꞌa tsuipunne.
Mu sakwa gi meeoo tusooyugwepana, “Nu tookwa tubetse besaꞌyoo. Nu ka umu a maꞌna natzakodekwunina kapi manepunne.”

Umu a maꞌna natzakodekwuni ka gi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Mu ka wuyupe-ma namabeni, mu ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Pana mu ka gi tunakaꞌoedyuku manese, mu punnoꞌo a maꞌna pasa-kwaꞌne natzakodekwunaꞌe. Mu sakwa besasoo mu ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna gi muusoo paba nasooyugwepana.

Yooonnekoo soo Te Naa te tzapoonnekute ka tu hownneꞌyoona. Oosoo ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu besa matugu pana, ka saa gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu soo sutakoo umu-matoosoo kodyukukwu. Tamme ka gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu manese, tamme kadoo namayugwekwu punnoꞌo.
Mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu Jew numu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyuku manepetuse, umuoo ka a tuna-masoo punowsoo nadotsanakwu. Soo Te Naa ookow pooha-gaꞌyoo punowsoo mu nadotsanana.

Gi haga puu ka sutakoo wuyupe maꞌna ka besow wuyupe-ma dotsana-waꞌneꞌyoo. Pana soo Te Naa mumme oo yugwekwu. Mu ka sutakoo wuyupe-maꞌyoona kemmadu maꞌna-waꞌneꞌyoo, oosoo yise ka besa wuyupe-ma mu dotsanapu. Pana oosoo etzaga ka Te Naa-wi ka sumu-kwaꞌnekoosoo maꞌna oe soo matabuena, ka mu Jew numu oꞌnosoo pummesoo puwiꞌyoona mu kemmana a tuna-maꞌyoona ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Te Naa-nakwana gi unu manepunne mu Jew numu ka besow wuyupe-maꞌyoonasoo kemmapuna.

Ka mu Jew numu gi tunakaꞌoedyuku-witu mu numu ugasoo gi oo nakasopedakwatoo. Pana ookow nu besasoo mu tuukwekwu, nu ka gi Jew numu ooonnakwa besaꞌyoo mee mu nasooyugwena petzabena. Soo Te Naa ka mu Jew numu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu sakwa sasobedyapunne, ka mu gi Jew tunakaꞌoedyuku-witoo tooe umu ooka nakaꞌoedyukukwu.

Oꞌno yise soo Te Naa noꞌoko mu Jew numu magwetzoikwu. Te Naa unnepu nabotugu, soo Te Naa meeoo, “Nu ka mu Jew numu meeoo netammapu. Nu mu maꞌemukwana soomuꞌwakwu. Sumuꞌyoo nana yise mu-nagatu saaꞌa mu Pabeꞌe manedooa. Oosoo saaꞌa noꞌoko mu maꞌemukwana kadoo mayugwedooa.”

Menoꞌo yise umu Jew numu ka Te Naa woho-gaꞌyoo. Umu ka gi oo nakaꞌoedyukuna ka Te Naa besa unnena. Mu yise menoꞌo oo doodooamu manepu. Pana soo Te Naa mooasoo tunetutzeapu, oosoo ka mooasoo mu nanamooatupu sootuhaꞌe pumakoo mu suagepu.
Soo Te Naa mu sootuhikwu mee unakwe. Oosoo gi tu soonammena aatasoo yugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Mu uga gi nasootuhidu mu gi ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukuna.
Menoꞌo umu gi ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyuku, pana ka saaꞌa umu punnoꞌo nasootuhikwu mu-kwaꞌnesoo.
Soo Te Naa oo tzapoonne noꞌoko numu ooosapa maꞌemukwana pana oosoo ka saaꞌa noꞌobatusoo numu sootuhikwu.

Soo Te Naa ka besaꞌyoona te sootuhaꞌe. Oosoo unu soonamme noꞌokosoo hemma sopedakwatoo. Oosoo tubetse besa hemma sootunagapu tamme gi oo nakasopedakwatoo oo tusoohanena. Noꞌyoona oo tusoohanena besaꞌyoo, gi haga besasoo hemma oo tuukwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Nobatusoo ewa hemma hee-gaꞌyoo gi haga hemma oo gea-waꞌneꞌyoo oo soogwipunnena. Oosoo gi hemma nagutzikute.
Oosoo ka noꞌokosoo hemma hee-gana. Noꞌoko hemma matabuepuna, noꞌokosoo tuwazoo nemadabue. Ooosapa sakwa tamme noꞌyoona nanasoogwugi oo nesootuhi.
Tamme sakwa tammesoo Te Naa nagea, soo Te Naa ka ewa besa te sootuhina. Tamme sakwa Te Naa sootuhi ka oo nakabetseana.
Tamme sakwa atasoo tusooyugwe, gi ka mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-kwaꞌne. Te Naa tamme mapudutuputoose, oꞌno yise tamme oo sopedakwadookwu ka besa tamme oo sooyugwe-kwaꞌnesoo.

Ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi nu meeoo mu netamma, “Mu sakwa gi nanaꞌunnepana.” Soo Te Naa nanaꞌatamasoo te sootuhipu. Tamme sakwa oo sopedakwatoo ka puma Te Naa tamme sootuhina, oo nakaꞌoedyukuna oo tumayohoku.

Tamme Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu tookoo-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo numu tookoo pu sumuꞌyoosoo pana ewa nanamaꞌata. Tamme puu sumuꞌyoosoo, pana ewa nanaꞌatamasoo nasootuhaꞌe. Oꞌno yise tamme nanatummatzi, tamme yise nanaꞌatasoo manakwe nu puu sumuna Te Naa yadooawabe, nu sakwa yadooa ka Te Naa nuka sootuhi-makoosoo.

Nu sumuna numu tunedyooekwu Te Naa-witu, nu sakwa yise besa numu tunedyooe. Nu sumuna tutuha manedu numu makakoo, nu sakwa yise mu tutuha manedu e mapuanoko makakoo. Nu sumuna numu moohekwu. Nu sakwa yise ka besow podo mu mooheno. Sumuna nu besa numu matugukwu, nu sakwa yise besa soonamme ka ooonneꞌyoona. Noꞌyoona sakwa tamme ka Te Naa tamme sootuhi-kwaꞌne mane.
Tamme sakwa unu nanasoobedyadu numu. Tamme sakwa ooosapa besa tumatugu, gi ka suda te manena petukupana.
Tamme sakwa mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu besa soobedya, ka te samoomu te soobedya-kwaꞌnesoo. Tamme sakwa ooosapa besa mu matugu tammesoo ooonakwa besasoo.
Tamme sakwa ooosapa ka Te Naa nakabetsea ka oo Besa Pooha-toohakwi, gi toetzegoepana.
Tamme sakwa ooosapa nanesootuhi, gi tutuha nasooyugwepana, ka mu numu tamme wohoꞌne. Tamme ka oo sopedakwadoona ka saaꞌa soo Te Naa te magwetzoikwu.
Ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tutuha manedu hemma soogwaꞌe, tamme sakwa mu gea, ka oo hee geana. Tamme sakwa mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-kumakwiꞌyoonasoo kemmadu nabaaꞌyooku.
Ka mu numu tamme wohoꞌne, tamme sakwa mu nanesootuhiku, besow umutoo nekwi.
Ka mu numu besa sokwama, tamme sakwa punnoꞌo umu-waꞌnesoo.
Tamme sakwa nanano besa tusooyugwe. Tamme sakwa gi numu ooonakwa besa nasooyugwepana, pana besa umu-no nanapuaꞌaga.
Tooe tamme suda mu matugu sapa, tamme sakwa besa mu matugu.
Tamme sakwa tammesoo manena maneka, oꞌno yise tamme gi numu-no nanagoꞌe.

Ka mu numu tamme suda matugu, tamme sakwa gi umuoo suda matugupana. Tamme sakwa sukwe besa mu matugu, umu ka saaꞌa suda mu tumatuguna umu-matoosoo kodyukwu. Meeoo natugotugu, “Te Naa meeoo, ‘Nu ka sutakoo mu suda tumatugudu-matoosoo makodyukukwu.’ “
Meeoo tuwazoo natubotugu, “Ka te wohomu tsuagoꞌe, tamme sakwa mu maka. Ka mu puugoꞌe, tamme sakwa mu bamaka. Umu yise nasookwikwu ka suda te matuguse.”
Ka mu numu suda tamme matugu, tamme sakwa gi umu-waꞌnesoo manepana, gi suda mu matugupana. tamme sakwa umu-tamme besaꞌyoo. Soo te besaꞌyoona, yise ka suda mu manena matzooekukwu.
Noꞌyoona sakwa tamme ka mu numu moohedu nakabetsea, soo Te Naa ka numu mu moohe tuunguna.
Tamme ka gi mu nakabetseana, tamme ka Te Naa gi nakabetseꞌa tuwazoo. Mu numu moohedu ka suda tumatugudu gi besa matugu.

Tamme sakwa gi umu-ma suipana, tamme ka ooosapa besa manemona. Umu besa te masokwamakute ka oo te manakwe, yise te tummatzaꞌe. Mu suda tumatugudu sakwa ka mu numu moohedu-ma sui, umu ka gi besa mu matugukwuse. Soo Te Naa ka mu numu moohedu, numu moohe tuungu.
Tamme sakwa mu moohedu nakabetseꞌa, tamme oo sopedakwatoo o a namanena gi ka mu numu moohedu besa sukwe masoonammedu.
Tamme sakwa mu tumanagaku mu numu moohedu umu ka Te Naa tummatzina, umu ka mu numu moohena.
Oosoo toge tabuꞌa tamme sakwa mu numu moohedu besa sooyugwena mu tumanagaku ka umuoo te kutzina.
Tamme sakwa gi ooosapa numu hemma nakutzikupana. Ooosapa besa numu soobedyanumme. Tamme ka numu soobedyana, tamme noꞌoko ka Te Naa unnepu nakabetseꞌa.
Soo Te Naa meeoo te netamma, “Mu sakwa gi tuduhapana, mu sakwa gi numu goepana, gi kummaꞌakoosoo namahegana nasoodyagepana, gi ka kukummaꞌasoo emukwapana.”
Tamme sakwa ka mu numu nawaꞌnekoosoo soopedyana, tamme noꞌoko Te Naa unnepu nakabetseꞌa. Tamme yise gi kummaꞌakoosoo numu suda matugukwu.
Menoꞌo tugana manipetu soo Te Naa tamme magwetzoikwuna, menoꞌo te nanemadabuekwuna tzageꞌe manike ka te tunakaꞌoedyukute. Tamme sakwa gi toetzegoepana, ka mu ooosapa utuidu-kwaꞌne.

Menoꞌo yise ka sutakoo togaba-witu-waꞌneꞌyoo. Mu numu ewa suda manakwe yaa teepu-koobatu. Pana pudusoo soo Te Naa noꞌoko ka teepu atasoo yugwekwu, esoo teepu yise besaꞌyookwu. Pana tamme tunakaꞌoedyukudu mooasoo atasoo manegena. Gi sakwa tamme suda manepana. Gi nanano baagoepana, gi nana-ma tumanagapana, gi nanagoena, gi nananemooyugwepana.
Tamme sakwa ka Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌneꞌyoo. gi sakwa suda tusooyugwepana, ka te tookoo soogwi-kwaꞌne. Tooꞌe tamme oo suda tusooyugwepana gi sakwa tamme oo-toogoo manepana.
Tamme sakwa mu numu gisoo unu tunakaꞌoedyukudu pupuaꞌamu-ga, gi umu-no nanahapana.
Sumuna umu-matoo tooe hownnekoo tooe tukapu mesoo tuka, sumuna umu-matoo gi a tookoo tukadu. Susumudu a tookoo gi tukadu, tu tumayohope mayohodu.

Tamme sakwa gi nananemooyugwepana, gi nananesootzemapana tuwazoo, soo Te Naa noꞌoko te doodooamu-gaꞌyoo. Tamme sakwa noꞌyoona ka Te Pabeꞌe nakabetsea. Te Pabeꞌe meeoo te netamma, “Tamme besaꞌyookwu tooetoo sutaꞌyookwu.” Gi sakwa tamme numu nesootzemapana ka tamme atasoo mu tunakaꞌoedyukute. Soo Te Naa ooosapa mu tummatzina umu besa manenokwu.

Susumudu tamme-matu nanesootuhi tabeba-gaꞌyoo. Susumudu meeoo, noꞌyoona tabeba nanakwaꞌneꞌyoosoo. Tamme sakwa oo sopedakwadoo, ka tammesoo tunakaꞌoedyukuna ooosoo yise meadabe. Pana mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi nesootzemapana ka nanakummaꞌasoo mu tumayoho. Mu numu nanesootuhi tabeba-gaꞌyoo, yise ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe, mu numu a tookoo tukadu punnoꞌo Te Pabeꞌe-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe ka tukapu-koobatoo. Mu numu gi a tookoo tukadu punnoꞌo nanesootuhaꞌe ka Te Naa-matoo pumme tukapu-koobatoo.
Pana noꞌyoona tamme sakwa ooosapa ka Te Pabeꞌe nakabetsea.
Tamme ka tooesoo gwetzoimona sakwa Te Pabeꞌe nakabetsea, yise ka Te Naa-baa petugase tamme ooosapa ka Te Naa nakabetseakwu tuwazoo.
Tamme sakwa yise oo nakabetseamo ka togesoo gwetzoimona tooe yaꞌese sapa tuwazoo, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka yaꞌese namayoda.
Tamme sakwa gi nananesootzemapana, gi suda nananemadabuepana, saaꞌa soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko te nemadabuekwu.
Ka a nanemadabue-witu meeoo nabotugu, “Saaꞌa noꞌyoona numu ka Te Naa nesootuhidooa. Noꞌyoona numu oo tunemadabuena nakabetseakwu.”
Ooonneꞌyoona tamme noꞌyoona nanasuuꞌmu ka Te Naa nanekwegeakwu ka te manepu-witu.
Tamme sakwa yise gi numu nesootzemapana. Sumuna mu numu-matu gi oo nakasopedakwadoo ka te tumayohope te nagenoꞌo.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe, Jesus nuka tunedyooepu soo tukapu noꞌyoona besaꞌyoo mee. Susumudu tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi oo nakasopedakwatoo, noko ka te tukapu besaꞌyoona.

Ka oo nabeatse-gana sumuna nagumanayahadooa. Umu yise tumaꞌemukwa ka sutaꞌyoo mee oo sooyugwena. Nu sumuna gi toge mu tumatugukuna umuga sumuna oo namanabuekute. Nu sakwa yise gi suta mu tumatugukupana, soo Te Pabeꞌe mooasoo umu-koobatoo nabatsapu.
Tooe tamme gi oo nabeatse-gapana, tooetoo gi ooka te namanabuekute sapa.
Soo Te Naa unnepu gi ka tukapu-witu suuꞌmu ka nahebetu-witu tuwazoo. Soo Te Naa meeoo te netamma ka oo Besa Pooha-toohakwi, “Besaꞌyoona, besa tumatuguna, besa sokwama.”
Tamme ka oo unnepu nakabetseana ka te pupuaꞌamu besa sooyugwena, soo Te Naa besa soonammekwu tamme-koobatoo. Mu numu yise oo sopedakwadookwu tamme tookwa besa manakwe.
Tamme sakwa ooosapa mu numu tummatzino, umu yise oo nakaꞌoedyukuna, gi oo-koobatoo nananepetukukwu.
“Noꞌyoona tukapu besaꞌyoo,” meeꞌe soo Te Naa, tamme sakwa gi ka Te Naa numu sootuhikwuna umu-makoo magamukupana, ka te tukana tuwazoo. Tamme nabeatse saaꞌa gi ka mu numu manayahadooa.
Oosoo besaꞌyoo tamme ka gi a tookoo tukana, gi atsa tzaꞌemukwa baa hebena, tamme sumuna atasoo tumayohodu numu manayahakwu.
Tamme noꞌoko ekow sopedakwadoo, tamme sakwa gi unnepana. Tamme gi wahaba tusooyugwedu, tamme oo sopedakwadoo; ka besow nakabetseana, yise besa sokwamakwu.
Tamme tumaꞌemukwa, ka gi tammesoo tumayohope nakabetseana.
Tamme sakwa ka unu tunakaꞌoedyukuna umu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu tummatzi, oꞌno umu punnoꞌo unu tunakaꞌoedyukukwu. Gi sakwa tamme tammesoo tusooyugwe-kwaꞌne manepana.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe, puu Te Naa tunetammatoo manakwe. Gisoo soo Te Pabeꞌe ka teepu-kooba petuna oo sopedakwatoo, ka mu numu suda pumme matugukwuna. Oꞌnosoo a nabotugu-kwaꞌnesoo, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa meeoo netamma, “Umu ume wohonedusoo nuka nekwohoꞌne tuwazoo.” Oosoo mooasoo oo sopedakwatoo pana yaa petu.
Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa noꞌoko eka naꞌunnepu botugu, tamme natunedyooekwuna, te nenoyukwekwu, oꞌno tamme ooosapa tunakaꞌoedyukuna, oo sopedakwatoona, Te Naa yise te sootuhikwu.

Soo Te Naa te nenoyugwena te tummatzaꞌe, “Mu yise oo nakabetseana nananeꞌoedyukuna ka Te Pabeꞌe nagenokwu,” nu mu nanetzakwiyaꞌekute. Ka Te Naa tamme sootuhikwuna, tamme noꞌyoona sumusoo nesootuhimeakwu.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe tu pupuaꞌamu te mayugwepu. Tamme sakwa yise besa nanamatugu. Soo Te Naa tamme-koobatoo nanesookwugikwu.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka namanumudoose ka Te Naa unnepu togesapa mayugweke ka mu Jew numu oꞌnosoo tuukwepu oosoo ka mu Jew numu tummatzikwu.
Te Naa ka mu gi Jew numu sootuhipunnena yise umu ka Te Naa nesookwugaꞌe. Te Pabeꞌe unne-kwaꞌnesoo nabotugu-kwaꞌnesoo, “Nu ka Te Naa hoobeatookute. Umu gi Jew numu, nu ka Te Naa besaꞌyoona tuukwekwu.”
Meeꞌe tuwazoo nabotugu, “Noꞌyoona numu sakwa ka Te Naa nesootuhi.”
Mee tuwazoo soo Isaiah tubotugu, “David-maꞌyoona suaketu pudusoo petukwu. Te Naa noꞌobatusoo numu nemadabuekwu, mu gi Jew numu punnoꞌo oo sopedakwadookwu soo Te Naa mu magwetzoikwu.”

Mu oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa mumme magwetzoikwu. Nu oo-matoo nanesootuhikwu oosoo besa mu masoonammekwu, mu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukuna. Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi nanaꞌunusoo besa tunakaꞌoedyuku manedooa.
Nu mu sopedakwatoo mu besaꞌyoo numu, ewa hemma sopedakwadoona Te Naa unnepu-witu hemma mesoo nanatunedyooꞌe.
Pana nu mu-matoo tuboꞌo mu nemayukuna ka mooasoo mu sopedakwadoona.
Soo Te Naa e sootuhise, nu ka mu gi Jew numu tuukweꞌe ka besa oo unnena, oosoo Te Naa Besa Pooha besa mu mayugwena, soo Te Naa yise tu doodooamu mu mayugwekwu.
Nu besa soonamme ka Te Pabeꞌe nuka sootuhise, nu yise ka Te Naa unnena waha.

Nu gi nuga soo unena waha, pana ka Te Pabeꞌe Pooha-toohakwi, nu yise oo wahana oo tzapoonne, ka mu gi Jew numu ooka nakaꞌoedyukwuna. Mooasoo tooe hano tooe ka Jerusalem mee naneadu-wiꞌyoona ka Illyricum-witoo, nu noꞌoko ka Te Pabeꞌe besa unnepu waha.
Nu ooosapa ka mu numu gisoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu nakadu tunesootabue meaꞌakwu. Mooasoo ka numu natuukwepu-wiꞌyoona, nu gi numu nanesootuhibu tunedyooe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
A nabotugu-kwaꞌnesoo, “Mu numu gisoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu nakadu oo nakase, oo nakasopedakwadookwu.”
Ewasoo tommoka nu ka mu-baatoo soomeayina tuwazoo. Pana nu ooosapa yaanona nanedyaꞌwe nu ka mu numu yaatuoo tuukwena. Pana nu mooasoo mu numu yaatuoo tuukwemakwu.
Nu saaꞌa mu-baa yooigeadooa ka teepu Spain mee naneadu-witoo meana. Nu besa soonammekwu ka mu-baa nobengena, mu yise e tummatzikwu ka mana e numme-kwi.
Mu Jew numu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi ka Jerusalem-witu ooosapa mu gi Jew numu tooe hanotu tooe tummatziyakwe, ka Te Naa besa unnena mu wahakwuse.

Menoꞌo mu gi Jew numu yaa teepu-koobatu mu Macedonia noꞌoko Achaia mee nananeadu-witu meeoo sooyugwe, “Besaꞌyoo ka Jerusalem-witoo mu tutuha manedu Jew numu mu Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu tummatzina, ka hemma mu tayakuna.”
Umu oo sopedakwadoo umu ka Te Naa pumme sootuhina, ka mu Jew numu otuoo pumme tuukweꞌe ka Te Naa unnena. Umu ꞌyoo soomanena, umu yise tumasumutoo.
Menoꞌo yise nu Jerusalem-witoo oo hanekakwu. Nu yise ka mu numu tumasumutoona mu hanekuse, nu mu-baa yooigeadooa ka teepu Spain mee naneadu-witoo meana.
Nu oo sopedakwatoo ka mu-baa e petugase soo Te Pabeꞌe te sootuhikwu.
Nu nuusoo natoogoo nanesootuhaꞌeyakwe mu sakwa e nanesootuhi tummatzi meeꞌe soo Te Pabeꞌe te tunemadabuekupu ka tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma te sootuhise besa nanasoobedya mee te netammana.
Mu sakwa e nanesootuhiku, oꞌno nu namagwetzoikwu ka umu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu nuka nebatsayakwe ka teepu, Judea mee naneadu-witoo, e meakwuse. E nanesootuhiku tuwazoo ka Jerusalem mee naneadu-wi.
Ka Te Naa mane-makoosoo nu saaꞌa mu baa petugase besa soonammedooa, oꞌno mu saaꞌa yise e nenoyugwenokwu.
Nu meeoo nanesootuhi, soo Te Naa sakwa mu sootuhi.
Eka mogoꞌne Phoebe mee naneadu-witu, eka tubope gwuudu, masoo tunakaꞌoedyukudu, Cenchrea mee naneadu-witu kemmana.
Oosoo ewasoo mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tummatziyakwe, nuka tuwazoo. Saaꞌa mu-baa oo petugase, tooe hemma tooe oo soogwina oo gea, oosoo ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna.
Susumudu mu-nagatu nu mooasoo sopedakwadoo. Nu yise mu soomaꞌyu. Umuoo nananeana yaa: Priscilla-no Aquila, e napuaꞌana, numme ka mu numu Te Pabeꞌe-witu tuukwe.
Umuoo nu-koobatoo tooꞌe nabatsakwate, nu yise ka mu gi Jew numu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-no, mu nesootuhaꞌe.
Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu mu nobe-witu numu-no nanesootuhaꞌe. E puaꞌa, Epaenetus mee naneadu soo numu-kobenasoo tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka mu numu-nagatu ka ekow teepu Asia mee naneadu-witu.
E puaꞌa, Mary, ooosapa Te Pabeꞌe nakabetseadu.
E pupuaꞌamu Andronicus-no Junias, nu-no uga nakwutumadu. Umu tuwazoo Jew nanana, umu unu nasopedakwadoodu Te Pabeꞌe yadooawabe. Umuoo nu-koobenasoo tunakaꞌoedyukuna.
Ampliatus, Te Pabeꞌe-makoo e besa puaꞌa.
Urbanus, Te Pabeꞌe ewa tummatzidu numme-waꞌnesoo, e besa puaꞌa, Stachys.
Apelles, ooosapa Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu. E puaꞌa, Aristobulus nanumu.
Herodian nu-kwaꞌnesoo Jew numu, Narcissus nanumu punnoꞌo nanesootuhidu.
E pupuaꞌamu Tryphaena-no Tryphosa, mu momokoꞌne, ewa Te Pabeꞌe tummatzi. Persis punnoꞌo ewa ka Te Pabeꞌe tummatzi.
Rufus punnoꞌo ka Te Pabeꞌe ewa tummatzi. Oo pea ooosapa tu tooa-waꞌnesoo e matugudu.
Asyncritus, Phlegon, Hermes, Patrobas, Hermas yise umu-no nanesootuhidyidu, mu nobe-wiꞌyoona.
Philologus, Julia, Nereus tu punneꞌe-no. Olympas yise umu o-no nanesootuhidyidu oo nobe-wiꞌyoona.
Noꞌyoona mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu yaatoo mu soomaꞌyu. Tamme sakwa noꞌyoona nanapuaꞌa.
E pupuaꞌamu, mooasoo mu ka Te Naa besa unnepu natunedyooepu. Tamme sakwa mu tsasobedya umu ka naꞌunnepu-koobatoo nananepetugudu.
Umuoo ooonneꞌyoo nananepetugudu ka pummesoo sookwina nakabetseadu. Gi umu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakabetsea. Umuoo besa ka mu gi sokwamadu numu yadooꞌe, umu ka mu nemooagana.

Pana mu gi umu-waꞌneꞌyoo. Noꞌyoona numu oo sopedakwatoo mu ka Te Naa nakabetseadu. Nu besa mu-koobatoo soonamme. Nu meeoo mu soobedya mu sakwa ooosapa oo nakasopedakwadoona besa manena gi suda tusooyugwepana.
Soo Te Naa te tummatzina, tamme gi nanaha. Pudusoo oosoo mu tummatzina mu ka sutakoo matzooekukwu ka mumme matzamadu. Nu mu nanesootuhikute soo Te Pabeꞌe sakwa mu sootuhi.
Umu nu-baatu punnoꞌo mu soomaꞌyu, nuka tummatzidu, Timothy. E nanumu Lucius, Jason-no Sosipater.
Nu, yise, Tertius tubodu mu soomaꞌyu. Ooka, nu Paul, e pubaaꞌyoona Gaius punnoꞌo.
Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu yaatuoo. Mu numu nokadu kooba tumanakatudu, Erastus mee naneadu punnoꞌo mu soomaꞌyu.

Te Naa suuꞌmu unu soonammedu, oosoo unu soonammena te sootuhina, tamme yise gi tunakaꞌoedyukumakwukwu. Onosoo Te Naa meeoo tusooyugwepu, “Nu noꞌobatusoo numu sootuhikwu,” mee. Yise oꞌnosoo oo yadooawabe ekow botugupu. Tooe noꞌyoona mu numu uga gi a nakasopedakwatoo, pana menoꞌo yise soo besa naꞌunnedu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu nawaha, noꞌobatusoo numuoo natuukwe, umu yise oo nakaꞌoedyukuna oo nakabetsea. Nu punnoꞌo mana numu tuukweyakwe ka besa naꞌunnedu. Ooosapa tamme ka Te Naa nesootuhikwu ka Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo.
Nu, Paul, Te Naa tunetutzeana Te Pabeꞌe yadooawabe, ne tubona ka e pua Sosthenes-no.
Esoo mu Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu, ka Corinth mee naneadu-witu-matoo nabodu Te Naa tunetuutzeapu numme-waꞌnesoo.
Numme meeoo mu nanesootuhikute, “Soo Te Naa Te Pabeꞌe-no mu sootuhise, mu magwetzoikwu.”
Nu ooosapa Te Naa besa sooyukwe ka besa Te Pabeꞌe-toogoo mu nasootuhise.
Mu noꞌobatumasoo nasootuhipu ka Te Pabeꞌe mane-wi. Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu sootuhi, mu yise tuwazoo noꞌoko hemma waha, yise noꞌoko hemma mu nakasopedakwadoona.
Noꞌyoona soo mumme ne tuukwepu ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-witu oo manepunne.
Mu yise besa pooha nasootuhipu ka Te Pabeꞌe besa podo meadabena oo-baa mu petuga-matoo tooe.
Oꞌno yise mu tubetse besaꞌyookwu ka Te Pabeꞌe mumme tunemadabueku-kwaꞌne.
Tamme Te Naa-ma nasoonatzaꞌe oosoo te netutzeapuna. Tamme yise ooosapa ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-noꞌyookwu. Oosoo te nemabetseakwu.
E nanumu, menoꞌo nu mu tuukweꞌe nanano tuunoyugwena, oꞌno mu gi nanasukwesoo nanatumooꞌookwu, tamme ka noꞌyoona Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna.
E nanumu, soo mogoꞌne Cloe mee naneadu nanaumu-matu mee e tuukwe, “Mu nanahana nananepetukute,” mee.

Mee nu tunakana susumudu mu-nagatu mee unakwe, “Numme Paul nakabetseadu,” susumudu punnoꞌo meeꞌe, “Numme Apollos nakabetseadu,” yise susumudu punnoꞌo meeoo, “Numme Peter nakabetseadu,” yise sumubaatu punnoꞌo meeoo, “Numme Te Pabeꞌe suuꞌmu nakabetseadu.”

Tamme noꞌyoona Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu gi nanaꞌataꞌyoosoo, tamme noꞌyoona nanakwaꞌneꞌyoosoo. Nu, Paul, gi mumme magwetzoidu, nu ka gi numu-koobatoo nabatsapuna. Mu baa-wi namatzaka ka Te Pabeꞌe nakabetseana, gi mu nuka tumayohokute.
Nu besa soonamme ka waahoosoo nanana suuꞌmu, mu-nagatu baa-wi matzakase
Nu gi mu numu meeoo unnena petzape, umu baa-wi mu matzaka ka Paul-wi tunakabetseana meeꞌe.
Nu tookwina ka mu Stephen nanadooamu baa-wi matzakapu tuwazoo, pana nu gi haga kummaꞌakoosoo soomaꞌyu baa-wi e matzagapu.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu-matoo e taꞌya, ka besa naꞌunnedu mumme e tuukwe tuunguna, gi nagutza baa-wi numu e matzaka tuunguna. Nu mu tuukweꞌe ka Te Pabeꞌe pooha-toohakwi, gi nugasoo unnena. Soo nuga unnena gi pooha-gaꞌyoo, pana soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsapu, suuꞌmu pooha-gaꞌyoo.

Mu numu kadooꞌoo namayugwekwudu meeoo sokwama, “Soo Te Naa unnepu Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsapu-witu gi oo nakaheesoobedya.” Tamme Te Naa-toohakwi namagwetzoidu oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa unnepu unu pooha-gaꞌyoo.
Soo Te Naa unnepu nabotugudu meeoo, “Nu ka unu soonammedu mee nasooyugwedu numu, ooka yadooadu tuwazoo, gi he-toogoo mayugwekwu.”

Soo Te Naa mooasoo ka unu sokwamadu mee naneyugwedu numu unnena gi he-toogoo mayugwepu. Gadooꞌoo haga numu-matu unu soonammedu, ewa natunedyooepu, noꞌoko ka teepu-koobatu namanewununa sopedakwadoodu, ka Te Naa kumisoo.

Soo Te Naa tooe gi mu sokwama tumapuꞌa sapa, puusoo soo Te Naa nakwitu mu tunedyooe. Oosoo Te Naa numu magwetzoi umu besa ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu pumme tu tuukweꞌe, tooe susumudu numu gi hemma heesoobedya mee mu unakwe sapa.

Tamme ooosapa mu numu tuukweꞌe ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo oo nabatsana tooe ka susumudu mu Jew numu gi ooka nakaꞌoedyukute sapa. Susumudu mu Jew numu ka Te Naa pumme tzapoonneku tuungu, ka gi Te Naa unnena nakatoge soobedyana ka nanabesa oo pooha manena. Susumudu mu gi Jew numu Te Naa unnepu gi nakaꞌoedyukute yise meeoo sokwama soo unnepu gi hee.
Tamme numu Te Naa tunetutzeapu, namekoosoo mu Jew numu yise mu gi Jew numu-nagatu oo sopedakwadoo soo Te Naa unnepu Te Pabeꞌe-witu tubetse unu pooha-gaꞌyoo.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa-witu nakasopedakwadoona te sootuhipu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe tubetse unu soonammedu.

E pupuaꞌamu, mu haaꞌa oo soomaꞌyu ka hownneꞌyoo uga tamme ka Te Naa gisoo nakaꞌoedyukuna. Huuꞌyoosoo tamme-nagatu uga sokwamadu ka mu numu unu sokwamadu-nagatu. Huuꞌyoosoo tamme-nagatu numu moohedu yise huuꞌyoosoo ewow hemma hee-gaꞌyoo.
Soo Te Naa tamme numu gi maawaꞌnekoo soobedyana te netutzeꞌa, tamme numu ooonakwasoo sootatzenguna. Ka numu ooonakwasoo nasooyugwedu umuoo ka Te Naa-nakwana gi natatzenga.
Soo Te Naa tu dooamu te matabue, oꞌno tamme gi tammesoo nanaꞌunakwe Te Naa-kobenaꞌyoona.

Te Naa te sootuhaꞌe tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe-toohaꞌyoona tamme Te Naa doodooamu manepu ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsapu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe te magwetzoipuna, besa te matabuepu. Ka ꞌyoo manepunnena tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe-toohakwi sokwama tabuꞌapuna.
Esoo nabotugudu tubetsetu nayadooadu. “Tamme sakwa Te Pabeꞌe suuꞌmu netubetsea.”

Nu ka mu-baa petugase, nu gi natzooe nuummana, gi nuusoo nama nanaꞌunne-waꞌne manepunne, nu yise meeoo tusooyugwe nu sakwa ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsa-witu suuꞌmu mu tuukweꞌe. Nu meeoo mu soobedyana mu sakwa tunakaꞌoedyuku ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi. Nu gi nugasoo tusooyugwe-kwikoo mu nenoyugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo, nu ka Te Naa-ma nasoonatzina.
Oꞌno mu sakwa oo sopedakwadoo mu ka Te Naa Pooha-toohakwi tunakaꞌoedyukute, gi numu sukwe unne-toohakwi.

Nu ka ooka nakasopedakwatoodu numu unusoo oosoo besa tuukwekwu ka Te Naa besa unnepu-witu. Ka oꞌnosoo Te Naa gi eka mu numu tunesootabue ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu. Menoꞌo yise oosoo tamme tuukweꞌe, tamme ka oo doodooamu manese. Soo Te Naa soonammepu gi ka numu tusooyugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo, gi tuwazoo ka numu moohedu tusooyugwe-kwaꞌne. Ka Te Naa-nakwana numu moohedu saaꞌa gi hee manedooa.
Umuoo numu gi oo nakasopedakwadoo-waꞌneꞌyoo ka unu soonammedu unnepu. Umu gi oo nakasopedakwatoona, ooonneꞌyoona umu ka Te Pabeꞌe batsapu.
Esoo nabotugudu tubetsetu meeꞌe ka oꞌnosoo nayadooaꞌadu, “Soo Te Naa ka umu unu pumme soobedyadu sootuhikwu.”
Pana soo Te Naa noꞌoko ooka te nakasopedakwadookwuna te sootuhipu, ka Tu Besa Pooha-toohakwi. Oo Pooha noꞌokosoo hemma te tuukweꞌe, ka Te Naa soonammepunnena tooe.
Soo numu puu, puusoo tu tusooyugwena sopedakwatoo. Soo Te Naa punnoꞌo ka tu tusooyugwena puusoo sopedakwatoo.
Soo Te Naa ka Tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma te sootuhipu noꞌoko soo hemma pooha sopedakwadoodu. Esoo oo Besa Pooha gi ka egeahoo teepu-koobatu poohabe-waꞌneꞌyoo.

Oosoo puusoo ooka tamme tu pooha sootuhipu te tsanakasopedakwatookute. Ooonneꞌyoona numme ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-ma nasootuhipu, mu numu tuukwe, soo Te Naa Besa Pooha te tunedyooe, gi tamme kummaꞌakoosoo poohabe natunedyooe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Soo numu ka gi Te Naa Besa Pooha-ma nasootuhina, ka Te Naa pumme sootuhina gi soogwaꞌe. Umu gi hee mee oo sooyugwe, umu ka gi oo nakasopedakwadoona.

Ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi suuꞌmu tamme oo nakasopedakwadookwu. Tamme ka Te Naa Besa Pooha heegana tamme noꞌoko hemma nakasopedakwadookwu, oetu soohanekwu; pana gi haga tamme nakasopedakwatoona tamme-witu nehane-waꞌneꞌyoo. Meeoo oowetuoo nabotugu.

“Mu numu gi ka Te Naa soonammena nakasopedakwatoo. Oosoo numu ooonakwatusoo sopedakwatoo gi umu puu hemma oo tunedyooe-waꞌneꞌyoo.” Pana tamme oo nakasopedakwatoo ka Te Pabeꞌe tusooyugwena ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi.
E nanumu, nu mu sukwe yadooe, mu numu sukwe nagedu e yadooe-kwaꞌnesoo, gi ka umu Te Naa Besa Pooha nakabetseadu-kwaꞌne. Mu pudu nadooamudoodu oongaꞌa-waꞌneꞌyoo.

Umu puu gi ka unu nayadooadu nakasopedakwadoo pudu nadooaꞌadoodu oongaꞌa-waꞌne, sukwe petze suuꞌmu, gi ka a tookoo tuka. Mu gisoo kummaꞌakoosoo naꞌunnepu-too namabetzape, ka gisoo mu oo nakasopedakwadoona tuwazoo.
Mu gisoo ka Te Naa besa podo mea. Mu togesoo nanahana, nana ooonakwa nasooyukwe nanatamme. Ooonekoo mu nasoopetakwatoo mu gi Te Naa podo meꞌa, mu numu mu sukwe nage.
Susumudu mu-nagatu meeoo unakwe, “Numme Paul nakabetseadu.” Susumudu punnoꞌo meeoo, “Numme Apollos nakabetsea.” Mu ka meeoo nanahana mu numu sukwe nake.

Numme Apollos-no gi Mu Pabeꞌe, numme Apollos-no ka Te Pabeꞌe sukwe tummatzidu, numme yaahoo a nanetutzeana mu-matoo natayadu. Nu mooeꞌugasoo mu tuukwe ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu. Ka saaꞌa soo Apollos unusoo oetuooo mu tunedyooekwu, pana soo Te Naa suuꞌmu ooka mu nakasopedakwadookwuna mu tunedyooekwu, ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu.
Numme yise ka Apollos-no nawaꞌneꞌyoosoo, numme ka Te Naa tummatzidu. Tamme Te Naa nakabetseadu suuꞌmu nanakummaꞌamasoo nasootuhikwu, ka besa te mane-kwi.

Mu ka Te Naa nobe-kwaꞌneꞌyoo, nu ka tupe tzatuoona ka Te Naa pukooba nobe-dookwuna. Mu nu penakwa kemmadu Te Naa yadooawabe oo-koobasoo nasootuhikwu saaꞌa tuwazoo ka numu besa tunedyooena. Soo besa naꞌunnedu Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsapugana ka nobe pukooba katu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo.
Gi hanotu mu atasoo naꞌunnedu naka-waꞌneꞌyoo, nu mooasoo ka Te Pabeꞌe nabatsapu-witu mu tuukwepu, ka togesoo mu-baaꞌyoona, mu sakwa oo nakaꞌoedyuku.

Soo numu natunedyooena ka numu tummatzina, ka besow tupe namadabuedu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tamme tunedyooedu tamme mu tunedyooepu-makoosoo nesootunagakwu. Soo te natunedyooena besaꞌyoo ka numu tummatzina, soo Te Naa besa podo nameadu besaꞌhoo tupe-kwaꞌneꞌyoo, goso sapa gi how oo yugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo. Owetuoo yise Te Naa te tubetse sootuhikwu. Soo te natunedyooena ka gi numu tummatzina gi besaꞌyoo, oꞌno oosoo wahabu, wobe yise hooope-kwaꞌneꞌyookwu. Oosoo puu ka nihoose kootzasooakwu. Soo gi besa numu natunedyooena, gi ka goso-wiꞌyoona namatzatsebooe-waꞌneꞌyoo, gi hee nagoopenikukwu. Tamme sukwe namagwetzoikwu, gi tamme nasootuhikwu.
Tamme ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna soo Te Naa Besa Pooha tamme-nagaꞌyoona, tamme ka Te Naa nobe-kwaꞌneꞌyoo, mu sakwa ekow nakasopedakwadoo.
Tamme ka tammesoo gi besaꞌyoona, soo Te Naa kadoo te mayugwekwu. Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha gi tamme-naga-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa ka umu gi totsaba-gakoo numu-naga suuꞌmu.

Mu sakwa gi nasooꞌemukwapana. Ka tooe haga tooe mu-nagatu unu soonamme mee oo nasooyugwe sapa, gi sakwa oosoo meeoo nasooyugwepana, ka tu tusopedakwadoo-ma sakwa oosoo gi nasootzaꞌmepana. Soo Te Naa gi ooka besa sooyugwe. Oosoo ka gi meeoo nasooyugwena oosoo soonammetabuakwu.

Soo Te Naa umu unu sokwamedu mee nasooyugwedu ka teepu-koobatu, “sagwamanakwe,” mee mu nemadabue. Oosoo togesapa nabotugu, soo Te Naa unnepu, “Soo Te Naa oo sopedakwatoo ka umu unu sokwamadu numu, mu numumu nemooꞌagadu. Oosoo yise suda mu tumatuguna umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.” Yise meeoo tuwazoo,
“Soo Te Naa oo sopedakwatoo, mu unu sokwamadu numu tusooyugwena gi hee.”
Gi yise umu-ma nanaꞌunnepana.

Noꞌyoosoo hee Te Naa tumadabuena tamme tummatzikwudu: nu Paul, Apollos, yise Peter, ka teepu-kooba togesoomodu, mu tuipu, menoꞌo namanedu tooetoo saaꞌa a namanekwuna noꞌyoona namadabuepu te tummatzikwuse.
Tamme namadabue ka Te Pabeꞌe nakabetseakwudu, soo Te Pabeꞌe yise punnoꞌo Te Naa nakabetseadu.
Mu sakwa numme ka Te Pabeꞌe tummatzidu besa matugu, ka Te Naa Pooha unnepu-witu newahammoꞌo.
Tamme sakwa kaaheno numu tunedyooe ka Te Naa besa unnepu. Gi hownneꞌyoo numu nuka nesootzemapana.
Mu gi e nesootzemapana, Te Naa suꞌumu e hownneꞌyoona sopedakwadoo.

Mu sakwa muusoo gi numu nemadabuepana gi numu nesootzemapana. Mu sakwa ka Te Pabeꞌe wutooe oo kodyu petukwuna. Oosoo ka kodyupetuse te nemadabuekwu oosoo mu tuukwekwu noꞌoko ka sutakoo numu tuwatzetugu-ma mu yise ka besa mu tumatugu-ma mu sootuhikwu.

E nanumu, nu mooasoo ka numme-witu mu nanekwahakapu yise Apollos-witu tuwazoo, oꞌno mu oo nakasopedakwadoona gi ka Te Naa tubo tuguna kwingakwatoosoo mane-waꞌneꞌyoo. Oꞌno mu gi susumudu numu nanaꞌooonnakwa sooyugwedooa.

Mu sakwa gi nanaꞌunnepana ka muusoo gi besaꞌyoona punnoꞌo. Tamme ka nanaꞌunnena tamme meeoo sokwama, “Numme besaꞌyoo ka ne mane-kwi,” pana mu gi besaꞌyoo. Noꞌyoona soo besa te tumatuguna Te Naa tamme sootuhina.

Susumudu mu-matu nanaꞌunnena mee nanaꞌunakwe, “Mooasoo soo Te Naa noꞌoko tu Besa Pooha-ma ne sootuhipu.” Numme, Te Naa besa yadooawabe, puu gisoo noꞌoko ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-ma nasootuhaꞌe. Mu punnoꞌo gisoo. Ka Te Pabeꞌe petuse, oꞌno saaꞌa soo Te Naa noꞌoko Tu Besa Pooha-ma te sootuhidooa.

Pana gi! Soo Te Naa meeoo unakwe, “Gi hownneꞌyoo ka e yadooawabe, suda matugupana.” Soo Te Naa tuwazoo meeoo, “Gi hownneꞌyoo umu e yadooawabe ka nu-koobatoo nagoese numu-kobenaꞌyoona, ka mu toha kakasa-gakoo-kobenaꞌyoona tuwazoo.”

Gi hownneꞌyoo tooe mu numu haꞌyoo tooe ne sooyugwepana, numme ka Te Pabeꞌe besa podo meana. Pana mu ka mu numu besa mumme mu sooyugwena petukute. Gi hownneꞌyoo tooe mu numu gi ohobu nanesootuhi mee ne sooyukwe pana, mu puu unu mu besa nanesootuhi, mu ka mu numu mee mumme mu sooyugwekuna petzape. Numu besa mu sooyukwe pana, umu numme gi heesoobedya.
Menoꞌo numme tseagoena, puugoena, mooasoo pukwi ne namadabuena ketzimena kadoo manemena. Numme mooasoo namooedyakwe. Numme-too gi nobe-gaꞌyoo.

Numme ooosapa nummesoo hemma how yugwe, ne mi-ma. Numme ooosapa besa mu yadooꞌe tooe suda numme mu netamma sapa. Tooe ka mu numu numme netumooꞌoo sapa, numme ka togesoo tunakaꞌoedyukuna gi hayoo unakwe.

Tooe mu numu numme nesootzeꞌma sapa numme besa mu matugu. Gi hownneꞌyoo tooe numme ka tuukwunipu-kwaꞌne namatugupana. Oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo tooꞌe gi haga ne petzabepana. Oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo numme gi hee ka mu numu-nakwana.
Nu meeoo mu tuuya tuukweꞌe, oꞌno sakwa mu ka Te Naa podo besa meadabe. Gi nu mu sukwe nasookwina petzape, nu ka unu mu soobedyana.
Nu uga mooeꞌugasoo mu manena mu tuukwe, ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-witu, oꞌno mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu mane, ka e doodooamu-waꞌnesoo. Saaꞌa ewaꞌyoo numu nanesootuhi tunedyooedu kemma.
Mu sakwa ooosapa nu-no Te Pabeꞌe nageno.

Nu ka Timothy mu-matoo taya, e dooa-waꞌnesoo e soobedyana. Oosoo puu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakabetseadu. Ka mu-baa petugase soo Timothy saaꞌa mu nemayukudooa, noꞌoko mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu e tuukwena tooe mu tunehane-kwiꞌyoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu.
Susumudu mu-matu naanaꞌunakwe, ka gi mu-baa e petugakwuse. Nu gi petugakwu mee mu sokwama.

Pana pudusoo nu mu-baa petugakwu, ka Te Naa nuka meeoo netammase, oꞌno nu oo sopedakwadookwu haꞌoo mu numu paba nasooyugwedu ka Te Naa besa podo tubetse meadabe tu unne-kwaꞌnesoo, pute umu sukwe nasootzaꞌme.
Tamme sakwa gi meeoo sukwe unnepana, “Numme ka Te Naa besa podo meꞌa,” meeꞌe. Tamme sakwa ka mu numu tzapoonneku ka Te Naa Besa Pooha hee-gana.
Ka saaꞌa mu-baa e petugase, mu sakwa besaꞌyoona, nanasoobedyana, mu ka ata-tamme soo manena nu mu nesagwikukwu. Nu gi mu nesagwikuna meeoo mu netamma.
Nu meeoo tunaka sumuꞌyoo nana mu-nagatu ka tu naa nodukwagapu nodukwadoo. Oo suda namanedu mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu puu gi mayoho.
Mu sakwa nasookwi, mu sakwa uga ka nana needa, oosoo gi mu-baaꞌyoo-waꞌneꞌyoo. Pana oo manena mu papaba nasooyugwe.
Tooe nu yaa mu-kwingaꞌayoo pana nu oo sopedakwatoo ka a namanewununa oosoo suda manakwe mee nu tusooyugwe, meeoo soo sakwa nu tusooyukwe nu ka mu-baaꞌyoona.
