Mu ka nanano sumuse, ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna soo Te Naa Besa Pooha mu-nagaꞌyookwu; nu saaꞌa mu soomayupunnedooa.

Mu yise sakwa ka suta-matoo eka nana tzakwuni. Oosoo sumuna ka oo tookoo kadooꞌoo mayugwekwu, pana yise ka suda oo tusooyugwena kadooꞌoo namayugwese, oosoo namagwetzoidooa ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus tamme nemadabuekwudu kodyu petuse.
Mu sakwa gi ewetuoo-ma nanaꞌunnepana. Sumuꞌyoosoo numu ka sutaꞌyoona noꞌoko mu numu suda nemadabue. Mu sakwa gi nanano namayuapana, besaꞌyoo ka mu sutakoo numu-no. Mu gi namayuadu tukaba-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Mu sakwa gi ka sutakoo numu nabaaꞌyookupana. Oꞌno mu tubetse unu besaꞌyoo ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsase. Oosoo ka seepu-waꞌneꞌyoo numme Jew numu tubatsana, ka tu ewa nadukanoꞌo.

Ookow ewa tukapu-wiꞌyoona numme Jew gi namayuadu tukaba suuꞌmu tuka. Oosoo meeoo naꞌunnedu, numme gi namayuꞌa, besaꞌyoo suuꞌmu, kadoo sutaꞌyoo. Tamme sakwa gi namayuapana, susumudu besaꞌyoo, susumudu sutaꞌyoo. Tamme ka oꞌnosoo unu nidyupu, tooe how tooe suda manakwe, menoꞌo yise tamme sakwa kaaheno gi totsaba-gana meadabe.
Oꞌnosoo nu mu-matoo tubopu, mu numu suda tusooyugwedu gi napuaꞌapana,
nu gi ka mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu netamma. Umu ooonneꞌyoona: unu moogoobuna, tutuhana, hemma namadabue-matoo nanesootuhina.

Susumudu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukute mee naneꞌyugwe, tooe umu tooe how tooe manaꞌwepana sapa. Umu meeoo naneyugwedu tooe how tooe manakwe kummano napootammana, unu moogoobuna, hemma namadabue-matoo nanesootuhina, baagoena, tumamooagana, tooe how tooe manakwe. Umu meeoo naneyugwedu sawa gi tame pupuaꞌa-ga mee nu.
Tamme sakwa mu numu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi nemadabuepana. Tamme gi mu nemadabue-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme sakwa mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu suuꞌmu nemadabue.
Ka saaꞌa soo Te Naa puusoo mu numu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu nemadabuekwu. Mu sakwa ka nana suda manedu tuukwe oosoo gi mu-matu.
Tamme ka tunakaꞌoedyukudu-no nahana tamme sakwa ka tunakaꞌoedyukudu tamme ooka nemakaahenoku tuungu. Tamme sakwa mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi meeoo netammapana.
Mu oo sopedakwadoo ka saaꞌa Te Naa doodooamu noꞌoko numu nemadabuekwudu ka yaa teepu-koobatu. Tamme tuwazoo ka mu toha kakasa-gakoo, Te Naa tu tummatzidu nemakaahenokukwu.
Ooonneꞌyoonow tamme sakwa tammesoo ka nanahana oo nemakaahenoku. Tooe gi besa soonamme-gaꞌyoo mu-nagatu, ka ooonnekoo mesoo namakaahenokute.
Nu meeoo mu tuukwe, oꞌno mu oo sopedakwadoo mu ka suda manena. Tooe haga tooe mu-nagatu ka sumuna unu soonammedu, ka mu nanahana nemakaahenokukwu.
Mu sakwa ooonnekoo mu-nagatu mayu, pana gi hownneꞌyoo mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi kaaheno mu nemayugwe tuunguna.
Soo natoogoo mu pabenana oo tzapoonne, mu nanosoo suda manakwe. Mu sakwa meeoo sokwama, “Gi hownneꞌyoo tooe haga tooe e tumooꞌoona e tooe wutumana.”
Pana gi! Mu muusoo mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu wutumana, mu tumooꞌoogena, mu samoomunokoosoo.

Soo numu suda tumatugudu ka saaꞌa soo Te Naa gi oo sootuhi-waꞌneꞌyoo, gi nanemooagapana. Gi haga saaꞌa Te Naa-matoo meadooa ka yoo suda tumatuguna: atasoo nanesootuhidu, nanakummaꞌakoosoo pootamana, nana-ma tusoonagana,
tutuhadu, unu moogoobu numu, baagoedu, tunesootzemadu, tooetoo numu nemooagadu, tooe hownnekoo tooe suda namanedu mayohodu.
Mu uga ooonneꞌyoo ka gisoo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Pana menoꞌo yise soo Te Naa Besa Pooha gi totsabu mu matabue, besa tuwazoo mu matabue ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus tamme-koobatu nabatsase.

“Tamme tooe how tooe mesoo manakwe,” mee mu, pana soo te manena gi te tummatzi-waꞌneꞌyoo. “Tamme noꞌosoo mesoo manakwe,” mee mu unne, “Pana oosoo sakwa gi te soonammena ata-tamme wuyugwepana.” meeꞌe nu.

Menoꞌo tamme ekow teepu-kooba gwetzoimodu, ka ooka nadukadu-ma gwetzoaꞌe. Pana soo hee nadukadu ka te tookoo-no punnoꞌo gi ooosapa ekow yaatuhoo teepu-koobaꞌyookwu. Umuoo yaa ekow teepu-koobatoosoo moobegwa-gakwu. Soo Te Naa ka te matabuepuna ka te tookoo te soonahadyakwena, gi petzape.
Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe oo yaꞌe-kwikoo oo mayoda, tamme tuwazoo ooosoo sootunagakwu.

Mu sakwa oo sopedakwatoo menoꞌo tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe matusoo. Gi puu soo Te Pabeꞌe tu tookoo soonahadyagwe-waꞌneꞌyoo. Mu sakwa oo sopedakwatoo soo wahaꞌyoo numu ka nodukwadoose umu sumusoo numu-waꞌne manepunne. Meeoo nabotugu soo Te Naa unnena, “Ka waahoo numu nanodukwadoose, umu sumuoosoo numu-waꞌneꞌyoo.” Gi puu tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe tookoo kummaꞌamasoo sutama matzabeku-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Oo soomayuna mu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukuna mu sumu-kwaꞌnesoo oo-no manepunne.
Mu sakwa ka kummaꞌanosoo mu nanapootamana, ooosapa nuutumooena. Noꞌyoona soo suda numu tumatuguna gi mu-notusoo, pana mu ka kukuma-nosoo nanapootamana, muusoo mu tookoo soonahadyakwe ka oo manena.
Tamme sakwa gi tammesoo tookoo soonahadyakwepana, soo te tookoo ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohaꞌyoona, tamme ka oo-gatuoona. Ooonneꞌyoona soo Te Pabeꞌe
ka tamme suda manekwitoo nabatsase, tamme-kooba tuꞌeyae. Oꞌno tamme ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi manese, tamme sakwa ooosapa besa oo tumayohoku-no.
Menoꞌo yise, nu ka nuka mu tubengapu ka mu tubokwi nu mu nanekwegeakwu. Aha. Oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo soo numu ka gi nanodukwadoona.
Pana nu meeoo, mu sakwa nanodukwadoo ka mu-nagatu nanapootaꞌma.
Mu nananodukwadoose, soo nana ka mogoꞌneno mesoo naꞌaheyaꞌe tooe hannanoꞌo tooꞌe umu ka meeoo sokwamana.
Soo mogoꞌne gi puusoo tu tookoo nemadabuꞌe, oo kooma ooka oo nemadabuekute. Ka nana tookoo soo mogoꞌne punnoꞌo oo nemadabuꞌe.
Mu sakwa ooosapa maneꞌyi ka muusoo meeoo sokwamana, tooetoo huu tabeno gi oo manepana ka muusoo unu nanesootuhikwuse. Mu yise sakwa ooosapa maneꞌyisoo oꞌno yise soo sutaꞌyoo gi mu kwaseno-gakwu.
Nu meeoo unakwe oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo ka nanodukwadoose, pana yise oosoo tuwazoo gi hownneꞌyoo ka gi nanodukwadoopana.
Nu meeoo soonamme, nu-kwaꞌneꞌyoona tuwazoo oosoo besaꞌyoo. Nu puu gi nodukwa-gaꞌyoo. Pana soo Te Naa ka numu nanaꞌatasoo sootuhaꞌe.
Ka umu gisoo nodukwadoodu, yise umu tu koomamu yaꞌekupu nu meeoo, oosoo besaꞌyoo mu-toogoo ka gi nanodukwadoona. Nu puu ooonneꞌyoo.
Pana umu ka soonaꞌahegoena umu sakwa nanodukwadoo. Oosoo besaꞌyoo ka nanodukwana gi ka tu nanaꞌahegoena sukwe peduguna.
Ka mu mooasoo nanodukwa nanosoo tunakaꞌoedyukudu numu, nu meeoo, “Soo oo nodukwa sakwa gi ka tu kooma poonnekwunipana.”
Pana umu ka napoonnekwunise, gi kummaꞌakoosoo nodukwadoopana.

Soo penakwa e unnekwuna nugasoo tusooyugwena, gi ka Te Pabeꞌe unnena. Soo tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-no mooasoo nanodukwadoo-gana, “Gi hownneꞌyoo nu ka oo-baa nobe-gana,” mee soo gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu soonamme, soo tunakaꞌoedyukudu sakwa gi oo poonnekwunipana.
Soo oo kooma ka gi tunakaꞌoedyukuna nasootuhaꞌe ka tu nodukwa tunakaꞌoedyukute. Soo mogoꞌne punnoꞌo ooosoo nasootuhaꞌe ka tu kooma tunakaꞌoedyukute. Oꞌno yise mu doodooamu punnoꞌo nasootuhaꞌe.
Soo gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi oo-baaꞌyoopana gi hownneꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa tamme-nakwana te besa sokwamamokwuna soogwaꞌe.
Mu momokoꞌne gi oo sopedakwadoo, mu sumuna mu kooma magwetzoikwu. Mu nanana punnoꞌo sumuna pummesoo nodukwa magwetzoikwu.

Nu noꞌobatusoo tunakaꞌoedyukudu meeoo netammayakwe, “Soo numu mooasoo Jew numu manepunnedu sakwa gi tu Jew numuna maꞌwupana. Soo numu ka gi Jew numuna sakwa gi Jew numu manena mayohopana. Ka Jew numuna gi hownneꞌyoo, yise gi Jew numupana tuwazoo gi hownneꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa unnena te nagena suuꞌmu besaꞌyoo.” Tamme noꞌyoona nanasuuꞌmu sakwa ka te manepunne-kwaꞌnesoo manepunne, ka gisoo Te Pabeꞌe-wi te tunakaꞌoedyukute. Soo Te Pabeꞌe o te matabue. Tamme sakwa besa sokwama.
Soo numu tummatzidu sakwa meeoo soonamme, “Oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo nu ka numu tummatziwabena.” Pana ka pumme tu tzamaꞌwuse, oosoo sakwa puusoo manega.
Soo numu tummatzidu tubetse natzamaꞌwukwu ka puusoo tunakaꞌoedyuku manese. Soo numu ka puusoo manegana sakwa ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus tummatziwabe mane.
Tamme sakwa ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyuku mane, ka noꞌoko tamme-koobatoo oo nabatsase. Mu sakwa gi sukwe numusoo nakabetseapana.
Ka Te Pabeꞌe te matabue-kwaꞌne, tamme sakwa besa sokwama. Soo Te Naa mu netutzea pumme nakabetseadu, tooe mu maawaꞌnekoo sapa.
Meeꞌe mu e tubenga, “How sakwa mu sususuꞌa koomamudoo?” Gi nu ka Te Pabeꞌe yadooa-makoo meeoo naꞌunnedu naka. Nu ka nuga soo oetu sooyugwena mu tuukwekwu, nu ka Te Pabeꞌe nayadooawabe manepunnena.
Ka ewa suda hemma manegena. Mu sakwa ooosapa manepunne mu manepunne-kwaꞌnesoo.
Mu-matu ka nananodukwagana gi sakwa nanapoonnepebuꞌapana. Mu-matu sakwa ka gi nanodukwagana gi nanodukwadoopana.
Mu-matu ka nananodukwadoona gi hownneꞌyoo pana gi besa manepunne, ookow gi petzabena nu meeoo. Pana soo numu ka nanodukwadoose, ewa nanasuda hee manekena, nu yise gi mu-toogoo ookow soogwaꞌe.
Tamme gi haaꞌno tubenaꞌe ka Te Pabeꞌe pudusoo kodyu petukwuse. Tamme ka nananodukwana sakwa gi suda sokwamapana ka te manekwi.

Tamme suda sokwamadu sakwa gi ka suda pukwi te sokwamana soomayupana. Ka besa sokwamana sakwa tamme ka besa pukwi te sokwamana gi ooosapa soomayupana. Tamme sakwa noꞌyoona ooosapa oo soomayupunne ka Te Pabeꞌe kodyu petukwuna. Tamme ka hemma tumuna, “Oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo tooe gi oo hee-gapana,” mee sakwa tamme sokwama.
Tamme ka hemma-ma tumuna tamme sakwa gi numu ooonakwatusoo soogwipana. Pudusoo noꞌyoona soo hee teepu-koobatu kadooꞌoo namayugwekwu.
Nu gi suda mu sokwamana petzape. Soo nana gi nodukwa-gaꞌyoo puu sakwa ka Te Pabeꞌe suuꞌmu soowabega. Oosoo tookwa ka Te Pabeꞌe tubetse nakabetseadu.

Soo nodukwa-gaꞌyoo nana puu tu nodukwa tummatzi tuwazoo, oosoo yise wahaba soonammepunnena, namekoosoo tummatzaꞌe. Soo tsuadumu gi kooma-gaꞌyoo ka Te Naa suuꞌmu soowabegakwu. Ookow suuꞌmu tu nakabetseana unu sookwaꞌe. Soo mogoꞌne yise kooma-gaꞌyoo ka tu kooma tummatzaꞌe tuwazoo.

Nu gi meeoo mu soonetammana mu sakwa gi nanodukwadoopana. Nu ka oo namanena mu tuukwena mu ka nanodukwadoose. Nu tubetse unu ooka mu sookwikute ka Te Pabeꞌe mu nakabetseana. Nu gi waha-tamme mu tusooyugwena petzape.

Mu meeoo e tubenga, “Soo tsuadumu naa haaꞌa, ka tu padu mesoo tzakoomadookute?” Soo tsuadumu naa ka meeoo soonammena, “Mooasoo e padu tsuadumuna, oosoo sakwa koomadoo,” oosoo yise mesoo koomadookwu. Oosoo gi suda namanedu.
Pana oosoo ka gi meeoo tusooyugwena oosoo sakwa gi koomadoopana. Oosoo tuwazoo ka gi tu koomadoona sookwina, oosoo besa ka gi oo tzakoomadoona.
Soo nana ka tu padu tzakoomadoona besaꞌyoo pana soo nana gi ka tu padu tzakoomadookuna unusoo besaꞌyoo.
Mu e tubenga, “Soo tu kooma yaꞌekupu haaꞌa sakwa koomadoosoo?” meeꞌe. Soo mogoꞌne sakwa ooosapa tu kooma-baa nobe-ga oo yaꞌe-witoo tooe. Oꞌno yise oosoo kummaꞌakoosoo koomadookwu tunakaꞌoedyukudu.
Pana nu meeoo oo sooyukwe oosoo sakwa unu besa soonamme ka gi koomadoona nu meeoo soonamme sumuna soo Te Naa Besa Pooha punnoꞌo meeoo soonamme.

Mu meeoo tuwazoo e tubenga mu tubo-wi, “Numme haaꞌa sakwa a tookoo tuka, ka umu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu hemma namadabuena, pummatoo mu nanesootuhina?” Mu-nagatu meeoo sokwama, “Numme suuꞌmu ekow sopedakwatoo,” mu yise kukummaꞌakoosoo nesootzeꞌma. Pana gi! Mu papaba nasooyokwe, ka meeoo sokwamana. Tamme sakwa nanasoobedya, gi nananesootzemapana. Oꞌno yise tamme nanatummatzaꞌe ka unusoo te tunakaꞌoedyukukwuna.
Tamme ka meeoo sokwamana, “Numme mooasoo oo sopedakwadoo,” tamme tookwa gisoo oo sopedakwatoo, ka yise te sopedakwadookwuna.
Pana tamme ka Te Naa unu soobedyana soo Te Naa te tubenga, tamme yise gi papaba nasooyugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.

Ka umu tunakaꞌoedyukudu a tookoo tukase, ka umu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka hemma namadabuena mu geana ka pummatoo mu nanesootuhina, tamme oo sopedakwadoo ka mu hemma namadabuena gi hemma ne tummatzi-waꞌneꞌyoo. Umuoo hee gi pooha-gaꞌyoo. Noꞌokoo mu hee-nagatu ka numu pumatoo nanesootuhina, soo Te Naa suuꞌmu tubetsetu.

Ewaꞌyoo hee namadabuꞌe numu pumatoo nanesootuhina, pana soo Te Naa suuꞌmu noꞌoko hemma matabuepu. Ookow tamme nakabetseakwu. Sumuꞌyoosoo yise tuwow soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus noꞌoko hemma matabuese, te magwetzoi. Tamme oo sopedakwatoo esoo togesapa.

Susumudu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ekow gisoo nakasopedakwadoo. Umu uga ooosapa ka hemma namadabue-matoo nanesootuhidu, oꞌnosoo gisoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Umu ka ooonnekoo a tookoo tukayina oo soomaꞌyu ka hemma namadabue-matoo tu nanesootuhina. Oo soomaꞌyuyinasoo togesapa mee soonammena oo-matoo nanesootuhiyakwesoo, umu ka gisoo unu tunakaꞌoedyukuna.
Soo tukapu te tukana gi atasoo te yugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme gi besasoo mane-waꞌneꞌyoo, tooe oo tukapana. Tamme tuwazoo gi hanobasoo mane-waꞌneꞌyoo tooe gi oo tukapana.
Ka gisoo umu tunakaꞌoedyukudu suda tumatuguhoose, ka ooonnekoo oo tuka ka mu-baaꞌyoona, mu sakwa gi ooonnekoo tuka.

Soo gisoo unu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka ooonnekoo mu tuka mu poonnena, oosoo sumuna mu-kwaꞌnesoo ꞌmanedooa. Mu oo sopedakwatoo soo hemma namadabuedu gi hee pana oosoo gi oo nakasopedakwadoona oo-matoo nanesootuhikoohakwusoo.
Oosoo yise tumaꞌemukwa mu ka oo sopedakwadoona, soo hemma namadabuena puu gi hee, pana oosoo yise gi oo sopedakwadoo. Oosoo mumme puaꞌa, ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus pukoobatoo nabatsapu.
Mu ka ꞌyoo manena mu tumaꞌemukwa, mu ka gisoo unu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tumaꞌemukwa mayugwena. Mu ka Te Pabeꞌe-tamme tumaꞌemukwa.
Nu ka ooonnekoo tukase ka e puaꞌa tumaꞌemukwakute, nu yise gi ooonnekoo tuka-waꞌneꞌyoo. Oꞌno soo e puaꞌa gi tumaꞌemukwakwusoo.

Nu ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus poonne, e tuusoobedya-wikoo. Oosoo e pooha-makapu. Nu ooweoo ka Te Naa yadooawabe manepu. Nu yow Te Naa yadooawabena nu nanesootuhi mu neyugwepu. Mu nananesootuhidu e sopedakwatoo, tooe susumudu numu gi nuka sopedakwatoo sapa.
Nu ka mu numu nuka nesootzeꞌma mee mu netamma,
“Oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo mu sakwa ka e makana, nu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu mu tuukwena.

Oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo nu ka umu Te Naa yadooawabe-nagetu-waꞌnesoo manena. Umu ka ena momona nanesootuhipe numu tunedyooe, tu nodukwa bina onosoo namaka. Umu Te Pabeꞌe wangaꞌamu puu ooonneꞌyoo, Peter punnoꞌo.
Oosoo gi toge tabuꞌa numme ka Barnabas-no suuꞌmu, ka Te Naa yadooawabe-nagatu, nummesoo namabetseana.”

Gi puu hanotu soyuzu puusoo tumanakana ka soyuzu-wiꞌyoo-waꞌneꞌyoo. Oosoo puu gi hownneꞌyoo soo numu ka wuyupooe wutaꞌnese, ka puusoo oo-matu tukana, oosoo ogowsoo tuutaꞌnena. Oosoo tuwazoo gi hownneꞌyoo soo bakeadaꞌa ka kootsoo tookoo tukana, ka pummesoo mabetseapu.
Nu gi mu numu sukwe unnena mu tuukweꞌe.
Soo Te Naa yadooawabe, Moses mee naneadu, oꞌnosoo tubotugupu ka Te Naa unnena, “Gi ka mu pookoo mumme yasa tummatzidu oo-matu, matumooepana.” Soo Te Naa gi mu pookoo suuꞌmu tummatzina meeoo.
Oosoo meeoo unakwe ka tamme tummatzina tuwazoo. Soo numu puu ka oo masuase, ka pumme tu yasa tummatzise sakwa oo-matu natumanagaku.
Numme mooasoo mu tummatzaꞌe, ka Te Naa unnepu mu tuukwe. Ooonneꞌyoona mu sakwa ne tummatzi.

Susumudu ka Te Naa yadooawabe-nagatu mu natummatzi tuungu. Numme meeoo mu netamma-waꞌne tabuꞌa mu sakwa ne tummatzi. Pana numme gi oo manakwe. Numme meeoo sokwama, numme ka mu natummatzi tuunguna, mu sumuna gi tunakaꞌoedyuku manekwu, “Oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo numme ka nummesoo namabetseana oꞌno mu tunakaꞌoedyukukwu,” mee numme sokwamana.
Mu oo sopedakwatoo, soo pooha-gaꞌyoo, nupoodu, puu natumunagakute, ka numu mahanena.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus meeoo ne netamma, oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo numme sakwa ka natumunagakuna, ka nanesootuhipe numu tunedyooena.
Nu sakwa sukwe tzuayaꞌe, gi mu natummatzi tuungu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu numu tunedyooena.
Tooe nu ka Te Naa-witu wahapana, nu besaꞌyoo mee nu gi unne-waꞌneꞌyoo. Nu ꞌyoo manakwe ka e pooha tuusoobedya-toohakwi, ka Te Naa nuka meeoo netamma.
Susumudu numu ka pumme tu tumanagakuna suuꞌmu soogwaꞌe, pana nu gi umu-waꞌneꞌyoo, nu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu numu sukwe tuukwe.
Nu besa soonamme, ka besa naꞌunedu mu numu tuukwena, gi nu mu tunekwaꞌe tooe oo mane-waꞌneꞌyoopana.
Tooe nu nuusoo manegapana, nu noꞌoko numu ka besaꞌhoo nanesootuhipe tummatzaꞌe, oꞌno umu oo nakasopedakwadoona, ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudooa.

Nu ka mu Jew numu nanesootuhipe tunedyooena mu Jew numu-waꞌnesoo manakwe, oꞌno umu Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakasopedakwadoodooa. Tooe nu oo sopedakwatoopana ka mu Jew numu putoogoo tumayohona gi numu magwetzoi sapa.

Nu nanesootuhipe ka mu gi Jew numu tunedyooedu, ka mu Jew numu tumayohona gi nagedu. Nu umu-waꞌnesoo manakwe ka Te Pabeꞌe-toogoo a nananesootuhi tabuana mu tunedyooekwuse. Gi nu ka Te Naa-matoo tu nananesootuhina maꞌwu.

Nu ka umu gisoo unu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-baaꞌyoona ka hemma mu nuutumooꞌe, nu punnoꞌo umusoo nuutumooꞌe, oꞌno yise umu gi tumaꞌemukwa. Nu noꞌobatu numu-kwaꞌnesoo mesoo manakwe, oꞌno yise umu punnoꞌo ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyuku manese, namagwetzoikwu.
Oꞌno yise ewaꞌyoo numu oo nakasopedakwadookwu, ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu, oosoo yise nuka magwetzoikwu tuwazoo.
Mu oo sopedakwadoo, tooe ewaꞌyoo numu tanomane nabetugu pana sumuꞌyoosoo oo makwuyakwe. Oo sakwa tamme ka Te Naa besa po tubetse nagena, oꞌno soo Te Naa te sootuhikwu.

Tooe haga tooe ka numu-no tuꞌateakwuse ka tu tookoo mooe mabetseꞌa. Umu ka makwuse natumanakakute. Pana soo mu natumanakakuna gi wunaꞌmetoo meadape. Pana soo Te Naa tamme sootuhipu tubetse besaꞌyoo. Oosoo ooosapa wunaꞌmetoo meadabekwu gi moobekwa-gaꞌyoo.
Ooonneꞌyoona nu kaaheno ka Te Naa besa po nagenoꞌo. Nu gi oo maꞌwudu.
Nu ka e tookoo nuga nakabetseana mayugwenoꞌo, oꞌno nu gi oo maꞌwukase ka nanesootuhipe e natumanakakuna watzekute, nu ewow numu ka nanesootuhi tunedyooꞌe umu yise tunakaꞌoedyukute mane.

Ka oꞌnosoo numme Jew numu nanamooatupu manepu-witu nu mu natugwengakwu, oꞌno mu saaꞌa oetu nakasopedakwadoodooa, tooe haga tooe tamme-matu sumuna oo watzekukwu, ka besa te pooha nasootuhipe ka tammesoo tumaꞌemukwase. Ka oꞌnosoo numme nanamooatupu ka Te Naa yadooawabe, Moses mee naneadu nagenoꞌo. Umu baa-wi namatzakapu-waꞌne ka Te Naa pumme moohenoꞌo, ka koomeba, yise ka tubetse baa pumme oo tzakwonakuse umu yise oo-toogoo meꞌa. Oosoo ka tu pooha-ma nanasookwugidu mu tzapoonnekute. Te Naa yise ka tubetse baa putoogoo mu meakwuna naꞌemota tsapedooꞌakuse, umu numu yise ka oo pasawoyoꞌato ninapatoo mangeka.
Soo Te Naa ka tu pooha-ma mu makase, baa ka tupe-nagakoo mu baamaka. Oosoo tupe ka Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌneꞌyoosoo. Oosoo tooe hano tooe umu-no mea.
Pana yise tooe noꞌyoona umu-nagatu ka saaꞌa, gi ka Te Naa besa po nagekaꞌa. Umuoo soo Te Naa gi sootuhaꞌe, ka suda mu tumatugu-kwi, umu yise tuꞌi, ka oona gi hekwana manepetugase.
Tamme sakwa oo sopedakwadoo, soo suta mu tumatuguna umu-matoo kodyukwu. “Gi sakwa mu umu-waꞌne manepana,” mee soo Te Naa te tuyatuukweꞌe.
Tamme sakwa ka hemma namadabue-matoo umu-waꞌne gi nanesootuhipana. Soo Te Naa unnena meeoo nabotugu, “Mu numu tuka aatase, hebena, yise nuga yotsuyakwe, nanesootuhina ka hemma namadabue-matoo.”

Tamme sakwa gi kukummaꞌa-nosoo nanapootamapana umu-matu-waꞌne. Ewaꞌyoo umu-matu tuꞌi, togogwa tukue-ma, umu ka kukummaꞌa-no nanapootama. Umu ka Te Naa tumadina soopoonnena, gi oo nakaꞌoedyukuna. Gi oo manepana.
Mu sakwa gi Te Naa nesootzemapana umu-matu-waꞌne. Umu puu tuoegoese, tuꞌi.
Ka oꞌnosoo umu nanamooatupu manepu nabotugu, ooonneꞌyoona soo Te Naa menoꞌo te tuyatuukwe, gi umu-waꞌneꞌyoopana.
Tamme sakwa ooosapa gi ka Te Naa besa po maꞌwupana. Tooe tamme besa nasooyugwepana, “Numme besaꞌyoona, numme gi ka Te Naa besa po maꞌwuka-waꞌneꞌyoo,” tamme sumuna oo maꞌwukekwu.

Tooe ka sutakoo tamme suda maꞌemukwa tuungu sapa tamme sakwa gi oo nakabetseapana. Mooasoo ewaꞌyoosoo numu ookowsoo maꞌemukwapu. Tamme ka Te Naa-ma mesoo nasoonatzaꞌe. Oosoo gi umuoo sutakoo tusoohanepe tamme-matoo soonoyugwe. Soo Te Naa gi umu suta natusoohanedu te geaꞌa tamme ka te natzooe-ma oo nuutumooekwu. Tamme ka suda natusoohanedu hee-gana, oosoo te pooha-makakwu tamme sakwa yise ka suda namanedu nuutumooe.
Mu sakwa ka kummaꞌa-matoosoo mu numu nanesootuhi suuꞌmu mu nuutumooe gi umu-noꞌyoopana.
Mu ka unu sokwamana muusoo oetu soohane, ka e unne-kwitoo how esoo besaꞌyoo, tooetoo sutaꞌyoo.
Tamme ka tseda-witu atsa tutzaꞌemukwa baa hebese, mooasoo pukwitoo a nananesootuhipu yise ka tukaba tukase, tamme sumuoosoo manekwu ka Te Pabeꞌe pooha-toohakwi.
Tamme noꞌyoona ka sumuoosoo tukaba tuka mee unnena, tamme sumuꞌyoosoo tooe tamme ewaꞌyoopana.
Soo mu Jew numu puu ka oꞌnosoo ka tukana, ka pabow nanesootuhi nobe-witoo tukapu nahanegayina nanesootuhaꞌe Te Naa-matoo. Oꞌno umu Te Naa-no sumusoo manikwu.
Soo hemma namadabuena gi pooha-gaꞌyoo mee nu unnena meeoo.
Esoo tukapu ka mu hemma namadabuena nageana, mu numu pumatoo mu nanesootuhina, ka umu sutakoo tubetse nageana. Nu gi oo petzape mu sakwa gi umu-no nanesootuhipana.
Gi tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe nesootuhina, nanano tukana, yise ka umu numu mu suta-matoo nanesootuhidu-no tukana, umu-no hebe-waꞌneꞌyoo tuwazoo. Oosoo gi toge tabuꞌa.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe gi besa soonammekwu ka oo te manakwe. “Numme unu natzoe,” mee mu. Pana Te Pabeꞌe tamme ooonakwasoo unu natzooe.

“Numme tooe hemma tooe mesoo tuka,” meeꞌe gi sokwamapana, gi oo manepana, gi ka a tookoo ka suta-matoo nanesootuhina nagea u tukapana, oosoo gi pumme tuka-waꞌneꞌyoo, mu saaꞌa ka oo manena ka umu besa pudu tunakaꞌoedyukudu manayahadooa.
Mu sakwa mu tummatzi gi muusoo namakoo tusoohanepana.
Ka nanatumudu a tookoo mu mesoo tuka. Tooe ka suta-matoo a tookoo sapa oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo ka oo sopedakwadoona mu sakwa ka gi oetu tutubengana.
Soo Te Naa unnepu mee naꞌunakwe, “Soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko ka teepu matabuepuna, noꞌyoona hee makoobatu oo-gatuoo.”
Tamme ka gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-baa tukana tamme sakwa noꞌoko hemma tamme oo makana tuka, gi oetu tubengapana. “Esoo a tokoo haaꞌa hemma namadabuena, numu pumatoo nanesootuhina nageana?”
Pana ka tooe haga tooe mumme u tuukweꞌe masoo ka sutakoo nageana, gi oo tukapana,
gi ume putoogoo tumatuguna. Soo numu o tukadu u tuukwedu sumuna meeoo soonammena, “Oosoo tookwa gi suta-matoo nanesootuhidu.”
How sakwa manena nu kummakoosoo tusooyugwena-koobatoo nabeatse-gana nu gi tookoo tuka? Nu ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhi, makoobatoo, “Nu sakwa a mesoo tuka,” mee sumuna mu unakwe.
Tooe how tooe manena tukana, tooetoo hebena, besa sapa oo hane tabua, mu numu te poonnena ka Te Naa besa sooyugwekwu.
Tamme sakwa noꞌobatusoo numu gi ka Te Naa oowemota nemayugwepana, yise Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu, tuwazoo ooosoo.
Nu noꞌoko numudoo soobesaꞌyoo, gi nu nuusoo namakoo tusoohane. Oꞌno mu numu namagwetzoikwu.
Mu sakwa nu-kwaꞌnesoo ka Te Pabeꞌe tumayohokuno.
Nu besa mu-matoo soonamme ka nuka mu soomaꞌyu, ka mumme e tunnedyooepu mu mayohono.

Pana yise sakwa mu e nakasopedakwadoo ka tzotuayuana nanesootuhi-kwitu, ka numu wo nuunoduna-kwitu. Tamme ka te wo nodunana nanesootuhina, mee nanemadabuꞌe kummaꞌyoosoo numu tookwa te moohedu. O umuoo suuꞌmu tu wo wunoduꞌna, o tamme putoogoo tumayohona. Soo Te Naa nawaꞌnesoo mu naana matabuepu. Oꞌno mu numu besa ka Te Naa sooyugwepunne. Umu naana sakwa gi tzotuayapana ka nanesootuhina, umu ka oo manena umu tookwa ka pukwaꞌnekoosoo nana nakabetseadu. Soo nana puu ka tzotuayana nanesootuhina, tooetoo, ka Te Naa unnepu wahana gi besa tumatugupu, oosoo tookwa Te Pabeꞌe gi heesoobedya. Mu momokoꞌne sakwa ka nanana nakabetsea. Mu momokoꞌne ka nanesootuhina tooetoo Te Naa unnepu wahana numu-kobenaꞌyoona umu sakwa tu wo wunodunana. Umu momokoꞌne meeoo unnedu-kwaꞌne, “Nu e kooma unnetoo manedu.” Soo Te Naa ka mu momokoꞌne namadabuese mu manumudoopu, oꞌno mu numu ka mu nanana besa umu-koobatoo sooyugwe. Soo momokoꞌne tu kooma gi heesoobedya, ooonneꞌyoona soo mogoꞌne ka gi tu wo wunodunana, oosoo sakwa ka tu wo nuusebaku suuꞌmu.
Soo Te Naa ka numu matabuese, ka mogoꞌne ka nana-makoo matabue, gi ka nana mogoꞌne-makoo matabuepu.
Ka tubetse mooeꞌugasoo soo Te Naa ka numu matabuese, oꞌno soo mogoꞌne namadabue tu koomma tummatzikwudu.

Mu momokoꞌne sakwa tu wo wunoduna ka nanesootuhina. Oꞌno mu numu oo sopedakwatoo umu puu tookwa tu kooma nakabetseꞌa. Mu Te Naa tutummatziwabe toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo, ka yaanona gi oo petzape ka papaba mu momokoꞌne nasooyugwe.
Te Naa tunetammapu, mu nanana ka mu momokoꞌne-ma nadanumuꞌa mu momokoꞌne punnoꞌo mu nanana-ma nadanumuꞌa.
Ka nagutza mooeꞌugasoo soo mogoꞌne ka nana-nakwana namadabuepu. Obenakwutoo mu nanaatse oꞌongaꞌa yise ka mu momokoꞌne-nakwana kemmadu. Ooonnekoo soo Te Naa namebatusoo te matabuepu.
Umu numu sakwa oo nakasopedakwadoo, ooonneꞌyoona mu momokoꞌne sakwa tu wo wunoduna ka nanesootuhina.
Yise noꞌyoona mu naana oodu tu tzopuhu tu naaku-ma nasookwaꞌe.
Mu momokoꞌne punnoꞌo ka oodu tu tzopuhu naakuse besa oo sooyugwe, soo Te Naa ka mu momokoꞌne ooduoo tu tzopuhu-gana sootuhi, ka tu wo pu-ma mu kwunodunana.
Tooe hanotu tooe, tamme noꞌyoona ka te tumayohope naka, noꞌyoona mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu mana kwingaꞌa-kwitu tooe yoo manakwe, ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhaꞌena. Mu sakwa yise ne unnepu nakabetsea.

Nu gi besa mu-matoo nakasoonamme, ka mu nanesootuhi tunehane-witu. Mu gi toge manakwe mee nu mu nakana. Mu maꞌemukwana, mu nanano sukwe nanahayakwe, ooonneꞌyoona mu gi nasootuhina mee nu suda tunaka, mu numu-makoo, nu yise oo-matu tooe nakaꞌoedyuku.
Tamme ka nanahagonnona oo sopedakwadookwu hanakwatu tubetse tunakaꞌoedyukute, umu ka gi haꞌyoo unnena.
Mu ka nanano tukakwuse, mu tutzasumuyakwe, mu yise tookwa ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatu mu nabatsana soomuꞌwa.

Mu ka gi numu wutooepana susumudu mooe tukagonnoyina. Susumudu umu-matu ewa ka tukapu sukwe haneyakwe, yise susumudu tooꞌe tzuagoꞌe, susumudu punnoꞌo sukwe baagoꞌe. Oosoo suda namanedu. Gi umu tutuha manedu suda masokwamapana, ka mu ewow hemma hee-gana. Mu ka mu tutuha manena tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi soobedyadu-kwaꞌne mu matuku. Nu ka mu mane-wi unu suda soonamme. Mu tubetse unu suda manakwe. Mu sakwa ka oo manena mu nobe-wiꞌyoonasoo tukana, hebe, mu ka unu tseagoena.
Ka pooha natumayohope, ka tukaba naduka-witu, oꞌnosoo nu mooasoo mu tuukwepu, ka Te Pabeꞌe nuka tuukwena. Ka oꞌnosoo, sumu togano ka putoogoo tu napabenase, oosoo Te Pabeꞌe tukaba gwuuse,

oo-koobatoo nanesootuhise, oo tzabokase ka umu punotu meeoo netamma, “Esoo tukaba e tookoo-waꞌneꞌyoo. Mu sakwa ooosapa ka tukaba yoo pooha tuka tabuaꞌyi, oꞌno mu ka mu-koobatoo e nabatsapu soomayuꞌyikwu.”

Ka mu yongo tukamakwuse, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka atsa baa-koobatoo nanesootuhaꞌe, yise meeoo mu netamma, “Esoo atsa baa e puupe-waꞌneꞌyoo. Kummaꞌaꞌyoosoo a pudu natunetammapu, e-toogoo mu namagwetzoikwu, ka mu-koobatoo e nabatsase. Mu ka ekow hebese, e nabatsapu soomayudooa.”

Ka tooe hannanoꞌo tooe tamme ka ekow tukaba tukase, ekow atsa baa hebese, tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsase mu numu oo sopedakwadookwu. Tamme ooosapa ꞌyoo tumayohonokwu, Te Pabeꞌe kodyu petu-witoo tooe.
Soo tooe haga tooe ka gi nasootzagwiyina ka pooha tukaba tukase, tumaꞌemukwa ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsana gi heesoobedyadu-kwaꞌne.
Tamme sakwa noꞌyoona nanasusuꞌmu oetu mooe soohanese, ka pooha nadukadu tuka.
Tamme ka gi oetoo soohanena oo sukwe tukase, ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus tamme-koobatoo nabatsa-kwitu soomuꞌwa, soo sutaꞌyoo tamme-matoosoo kodyukwu.
Ooonneꞌyoona ewaꞌyoo mu-nagatu gi natzooena, tuoegoꞌe, susumudu mu-matu mooasoo tuipu.
Pana tamme ka tammesoo nakwitu soohanese, atasoo te manese, oꞌno soo Te Naa saaꞌa te sootuhikwu.

Pana ka gi togokoo te manoyugwe, oosoo Te Naa te nemadabuekwu, yise saaꞌa soo sutaꞌyoo tamme-matoosoo kodyukwu, oꞌno tamme ka suta te manena maꞌwukwu, soo Te Pabeꞌe yise, gi kadooꞌoo te mayugwekwu, ka saaꞌa mu sutaꞌyoo numu kadooꞌoo naneyugwekwu.
Mu ka nanano sumuse, mu sakwa nanakwutooese ka pooha tukapu ewa tuka.
Mu ka unu tzuagoꞌena, mu sakwa nobe-wiꞌyoosoo tuka, oꞌno saaꞌa Te Naa gi suda mu sooyugwekwu. Nu saaꞌa ewasoo mu tuukwedooa, ka mu-baa petugase.
Ka Te Naa tamme pooha sootuhi-witu nu mu nakasopedakwadoona soogwaꞌe.
Mu ka oꞌnosoo gisoo hemma nakasopedakwadoona ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu, mu sutakoo gi toogoope-gakoo mu nanesootuhidu mumme meeoo mu neyukwe mu oo-toogoo manena ka sutakoo nanesootuhaꞌe.

Nu mu tuukwekwu, hownneꞌyoo umu Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi apegeagonnodu. Gi haga ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi meeoo unne-waꞌneꞌyoo, “Soo Jesus sutaꞌyoo.” Soo tooe haga tooe, “Jesus Te tubetse besa Pabeꞌe,” mee unnedu, ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi yadooꞌa.
Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha sumuꞌyoosoo, pana oosoo te pooha-maka ewow nanaꞌatabatumasoo te sootuhaꞌe.
Ka Te Naa pooha-toohakwi ewaꞌyoo, ewa-baa tamme numu tummatzipu, pana Te Pabeꞌe sumusoo, tamme noꞌyoona oo tummatzikwu.
Ewa-baa tamme ka Te Naa nakabetseamodu, pana sumuꞌyoosoo soo Te Naa besa te neyugwedu.
Soo Te Naa ka tu Besa Pooha-ma nanasusumuoo numu sootuhaꞌe, oꞌno tamme noꞌyoona nanatummatzikwu.
Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi susumudu nanesootuhipu puu numu besa tunedyooedu. Susumudu punnoꞌo ka Te Naa-witu mu numu tuukwedu pumme tu pooha sootuhipu.
Susumudu umu-matu Te Naa unusoo oedyukukwudu. Susumudu punnoꞌo tuoegoedu numu tumabesakuna ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi.

Susumudu nanabesa tu pooha tumadaꞌena ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi nasootuhi. Susumudu punnoꞌo mu numu Te Naa Pooha-toohakwi ka Te Naa unnena tu wahagonnona nageꞌa. Susumudu umu-matu punnoꞌo sutakoo numu-makoo tu pooha, sopedakwadookwu. Susumudu nanaꞌatabatumasoo paꞌanakwatu te yadooawununa nasootuhi. Susumudu umu-matu ka numu atamasoo oo yadooawununa numu tuukweꞌe ka oo unena.
Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha sumuꞌyoosoo, pana nanaꞌatasoo numu sootuhaꞌe, puusoo numu-nagwitu tutzeana Tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma numu sootuhaꞌe.
Soo numu tookoo manepunnena, puu ewa nanama aatadu pana sumuꞌyoosoo; mu nananesootuhidu sumusoo manekwu ka Te Pabeꞌe sumuoosoo.
Tamme nanaꞌataꞌyoosoo mu Jew numu, mu gi Jew numu, mu numu tummatziwabe, mu numu tutunehanedu, nanaꞌataꞌyoosoo, pana tamme noꞌyoona sumu-kwaꞌnesoo nasootuhaꞌe, ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi.
Haꞌoo puu soo te tookoo ewa nanama aata.
Soo numu kuku puu gi meeoo unne-waꞌneꞌyoo, “Nu tookwa gi mu-matu, ka gi a mina.”
Soo numu naka puu punnoꞌo meeoo, “Nu tookwa gi a tookoo-matu, nu ka gi a pooena,” mee unnekwu. Soo numu naka ooonneꞌyoopana togesoo numu tookoo-matu.
Ka e pooe suuꞌmu e tookoo-matu nabenaꞌe, nu gi tunaka-waꞌneꞌyoo, ka gi e naka hee-gana. Tooetoo ka e naka suuꞌmu hee-gana, nu gi hemma egwe-waꞌneꞌyoo ka gi moobe-gana.
Soo Te Naa ka numu tookoo manepunnena ewa-baa nanaꞌatasoo matabuepu gi sumu-kwaꞌnesoo oo matabuꞌe.
Oosoo ka noꞌyoona sumu-kwaꞌnesoo namadabuese, oosoo gi numu tookoo mane-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Menoꞌo yise ewaba nanama aata, tammesoo numu sumusoo manepunnena.
Soo te tookoo namanepunnena puu nanatummatzi, soo numu pooe gi ka numu mi nanenaboa-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo numu kwo, gi ka tu kuku nanenaboa-waꞌneꞌyoo. Gi! Noꞌyoona soo te tookoo nanama aatadu.
Gi natzooedu nanama aatadu gi maawaꞌne sooyugwena, puu sumuna yise gi nananenaboa-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Ka te tookoo-matu tamme gi numu poonnekwuna petzape, umuoo tamme unu mabetseana te kwasu-ma mu mawatzetugu.
Ka mu mesoo napoonnedu, tamme gi yoo mabetsea.
Gadooꞌoo hee, pumme nanenaboa-kwaꞌneꞌyoo te tookoo-matu, noꞌyoona unu nana-matusoo. Noꞌyoona te tookoo manepunnena nanatummatzidu.
Ka sumu-batu besa te sooyugwe, noꞌyoona mu nanama aꞌatadu besa sokwamakute, ka sumu-batu nuummana, noꞌyoona mu nanama te aatana puu oo-waꞌnesoo.
Ooonneꞌyoona noꞌyoona tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe tookoo-waꞌneꞌyoona, unu nanatummatzi.

Soo Te Naa tamme-nagakwitu netutsea susumudu tamme-nagakwitu ka pumme nayadooawabe manekwudu tuwow, yise susumudu ka nanesootuhiba numu tunedyooedu, susumudu tuwow nanasoogwugi namanedu numu tzapoonnekudu, susumudu tuwazoo ka numu tuoegoedu mabesakudu, susumudu numu tutumatzidu, susumudu punnoꞌo mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu moohedu, susumudu yise punnoꞌo nanakummaꞌasoo gi numu nakasopedakwadoona apegeagonnodu ka Te Naa suuꞌmu nakasopedakwadoo.
Gi noꞌyoona tunakaꞌoedyukudu Te Naa nayadooawabekwuna nasootuhi, gi noꞌyoona tuwazoo nanesootuhiba numu tunedyooedu manakwe,
gi noꞌyoona too numu tuoe mabesakudu nasootuhaꞌe, gi noꞌyoona nanaꞌatakoosoo apegeagonnona nasootuhaꞌe, gi noꞌyoona tuwazoo ka tu pooha numu nayadooadu tutunekwegeawunukwuna nasootuhaꞌe.
Pana mu sakwa ka besow mu nasootuhikwuna soogwi. Nu menoꞌo mu tuukwekwu ka tubetse besow numu nasootuhi-kwitu.

Soo numu nanasoobedyana, yisetu. Tamme ka noꞌobatumasoo mesoo apegeana, ka mu numu apegeana, ka mu toha kakasa-gakoo tuwazoo apegeana, pana ka gi numu petzabena, tamme gi hee, ewa tu sukwe naꞌunnewunu-kwaꞌne oo nakasoobedya. Gi tamme haka tummatzaꞌe yoo manena.

Tamme ka hemma manekwuna sopedakwatoona, oo nakasopedakwatoona noꞌoko Te Naa-witu yise tooe hekwitu tooe, o tubetse nakaꞌoedyukuna, oꞌno soo giba nooyooakwu ka meeoo te nanesootuhi, pana tamme ka gi numu petzabena, tamme togesoo gi hee.
Tamme ka noꞌoko hemma te hee-gana nemawunise, ka te tookoo kadooꞌoo namayugwekwuse, pana ka gi numu petzabena, tamme gi oo-koobatoo nasootuhi-waꞌneꞌyoo, tamme togesoo gi hee.

Tamme ka mu numu soobedyana tamme ooosapa besa numu nematugukwu, tooe hemma tooe how mu yugwe sapa, gi kummaꞌakoosoo numu nasoodyagekwu, gi nanaꞌunnekwu, gi meeoo tusooyugwekwu, numme numu ooonakwa besaꞌyoo mee.
Gi suda numu matugukwu, gi nidyapuna, oo soomuꞌwukwu ka suda ume tu matuku.
Tamme besa sokwamakwu ka mu numu besa manakwe, gi besa sokwama ka suda mu manakwe,

pana ka mu numu besa soobedyana, tamme gi suda mu tumatuguna waha-waꞌneꞌyoo, ooosapa oo nakaꞌoedyukute ka besow numu-witu, ooosapa numu netubetzeyaꞌekwu tooe hemma tooe how manese sapa, ooosapa nanasoobedyakwu, tooe suda tamme mu yugwe sapa.
Ewaꞌyoo soo Te Naa tamme pooha sootuhipu, sumu tabeno mobegwa-gakwu petukwutu, ka Te Naa tamme nanasoobedyana gi mobegwakakoo.

Soo Te Naa tamme yadooekwuna nanaꞌatabatumasoo nayadooadu, natunedyooenona ka teepu moobegwaga-matoo, punnoꞌo tu mobegwakana soogwaꞌe, ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona tamme gi hanokoo hemma sopedakwadoo, gi hownnekoo tamme mu numu nakasoobedakwatoo-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Pana tamme ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona noꞌyoona, noꞌoko, nasootuhipu hee-gana, gi ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona te hee-gana soogwikwu.
Nu puu ka tuhaꞌyoona tuhaꞌa-kwaꞌne yadooꞌa, yise tuhaꞌa-kwaꞌne tusooyugwe. Pana nu ka nana manese, ka e tuhaꞌyoona maꞌwuke.

Tamme puu ka gi besaꞌhoo napoonneꞌe-wikoo te napoonnepunne-kwaꞌneꞌyoo, ka saaꞌa tamme ka tubetse napoonnese. Menoꞌo nu huutsetsekoosoo sopedakwatoo, saaꞌa nu noꞌokosoo hemma besa sopedakwadookwu, ka Te Naa nuka sopedakwatoo-kwaꞌnekoosoo.

Umuoo pahebatu Te Naa tamme pooha sootuhipu ooosapa tamme-noꞌyookwutu: ka Te Naa-wi te tunakaꞌoedyukute, Te Naa te magwetzoikwu, tamme yise nanasoobedyakwu, pana te nanasoobedyana, yise tubetse kaahenotu.

Mu sakwa tubetse unu ka mu nanasoobedyana sookwi, ooosapa sakwa mu maneno. Mu sakwa ka Te Naa Besa Pooha muume sootuhikwuna sookwi. Oosoo besaꞌyoo ka mummesoo yadooakwikoo, ka Te Naa unnena mu numu tunesootabuena.
Tamme ka nanakummaꞌamasoo pooha apegeana, tamme Te Naa suuꞌmu yadooꞌe, gi mu numu, gi haga te nakasopedakwatoo.
Tamme ka Te Naa unnepu, tammesoo yadooama wahana, mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu oo nakasopedakwatoo. Umu ka ooonnekoo nakana, umu unu tunakaꞌoedyukukwu, yise nananetummatzina besa nananenuumakute.

Tamme ka kukummaꞌamasoo pooha apegeana, tammesoo nanemabetsea, pana ka Te Naa unnena tammesoo yadooa-ma wahana, tamme noꞌyoona ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu punnoꞌo nananetummatzina besa nakasokwamana, oetoo nakasawekwu.

Nu noꞌoko nanakummaꞌamasoo Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi mu apegeakwuna sookwaꞌe, pana nu ka mummesoo yadooa-ma ka Te Naa unnepu mu wahakwuna petzape. Soo Te Naa unnepu tammesoo yadooa-kwikoo, ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi te apegeana ooonakwasoo besaꞌyoo, oꞌno yise mu numu oo nakasopedakwadookwu. Ka tamme-matusoo Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi oo pooha yadooawunu, sumuꞌyoo ekow pooha nageapu te tunekwegeakwuna tamme yise nananetummatzaꞌe. Noꞌyoona yise tamme tunakaꞌoedyuku manepetugakwu.

Nu puu ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi yadooana mu puu ka gi oo nakasopedakwatoona oosoo gi hownnekoo mu netummatzi-waꞌneꞌyoo. Ka Te Naa unnena mumme e tunedyooe mu numu besa nasootuhaꞌe, ka tammesoo yadooa-ma pumme e tuukwe. Ka Te Naa unnepu, tooetoo numu e tuukweꞌe Te Naa besa pooha-toohakwi e tuusoobedyana tuwazoo.
Yoo manepunne soo tooe haga tooe ka tumooyagakunoo oonatooe oo namooyakakuse, gi ka oo hoobeadoona nakasopedakwatoo-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Soo tumahekwudu punnoꞌo, gi nuummabetsabe-waꞌneꞌyoo, ka tumooyagakunoo kaaheno oo mooyagakuse suuꞌmu oosoo tutumahekwutu.
Tamme ka gi nanakasopedakwadoo-ma numu yadooena mu numu puu gi oo nakasopedakwatoo-waꞌneꞌyoo, tamme sukwe nemuwayaꞌe.
Ekow teepu-kooba ewaꞌyoo nanaꞌatasoo apegeadu numu, umu pummesoo apegeana yise nakasopedakwatoo.
Pana tamme ka gi kummaꞌakoosoo yadooana nakasopedakwadoona ka kummaꞌamasoo mu yadooaꞌa tamme nanatamme wakwaꞌa-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Tamme sakwa ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi nananetummatzi.
Soo Te Naa ka tu Besa Pooha-toohakwi te sootuhise, sumuna tamme pooha yadooakwu. Tamme sakwa yise nanesootuhi, oꞌno tamme ka tammesoo unnewununa mu numu mesoo tunesootabuekwu.
Tamme ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi pooha nanesootuhipana, tamme tammesoo gi oo nakasopedakwatoo.
Tamme sakwa ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi pooha yadooana, nanesootuhina, tunekwu. Tamme sakwa tuwazoo tammesoo yadooa-ma nanesootuhina tunekwu.
Ka te pooha yadooa-toohakwi te nanesootuhaꞌe mu numu gi hownnekoo tamme-no ka Te Naa-matoo nesootuhi-waꞌneꞌyoo umu ka gi te unnewununa nakasopedakwadoona.
Tamme sumuna ka te pooha yadooa-toohakwi besa nanesootuhaꞌe, pana mu numu gi nasootuhi-waꞌneꞌyoo, umu ka gi te nakasopedakwatoona.
Nu suuꞌmuna mumme ooonakwasoo besa ka e pooha yadooa-toohakwi nanesootuhaꞌe.

Pana nu puu ka nanesootuhipe-kwiꞌyoona nugasoo yadooa-ma yadooꞌa. Nu ka nugasoo yadooa-ma mu numu unu tummatzaꞌe, pana mu numu ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi e pooha yadooꞌa gi nasootuhaꞌe ka gi oo nakasopedakwatoona.
E nanumu, ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi nayadooape-kwitu mu sakwa besasoo nakasopedakwatoo. Tamme sakwa gi totsaba-ga, tuha-kwaꞌne, pana yise nanapu-waꞌnekoosoo ka Te Naa unnepu nakasopedakwadoo.
Soo Te Naa unnepu puu meeꞌe, “Tooe mu wakwaꞌa nuga yadooa-ma ka mu numu kummaꞌakoosoo nakadu tooꞌe tuukwepana, umu gisoo oo nakabetsea-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
Nu besasoo mu tuukwekwu soo numu ka tusoomatzooena gi ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukuna, soo Te Naa kummaꞌamasoo mu yadooꞌe. Pana ka mu numu pumme nakaꞌoedyukute, soo Te Naa umuoosoo yadooa-ma mu yadooꞌe.
Ka noꞌyoona tamme tunakaꞌoedyukudu te pooha yadooa-toohakwi ooosapa te apegeagonno, soo gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka tamme-baa petuse te nakana mee te netammakwu, “Umu tookwa maꞌemukwadu.”
Tamme tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka Te Naa besa unnepu-witu te waha tammesoo yadooa-ma, soo gisoo tunakaꞌoedyukudu numu tamme-baa petuse, ka Te Naa unnepu nakasopedakwadookwu,
oosoo yise ka tu maꞌemukwapu wahakwu, ka tu tunekwatzetugu nokosoo. Ka oo manese oosoo Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhikwu, mee unnekwu, “Soo Te Naa togesapa yaa tamme-naga.”

E nanumu, tamme ka nanano nanesootuhina, tamme sakwa tuwazoo nananetummatzi. Sumuꞌyoo numu puu tunekwuhoo, sumuꞌyoo puu nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooe, sumuꞌyoo numu punnoꞌo Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi yadooa. Sumuꞌyoo tunekwugeadu ka pooha yadooawunudu yadooꞌakute.

Ka nanesootuhipe-kwiꞌyoona, soo numu sakwa ka pooha yadooape-ma, penakwa pumme tu sootuhise gi nanano-kwisoo apegeapana, nanapenakwa yadooa. Sumuꞌyoo umu-nagatu sakwa oo tunekwugeaku. Ka gi tunekwugeawabe-gana, tamme sakwa gi pooha yadooapana numu nakana. Wahaꞌyoo tooetoo paheꞌyoo numu nanapenakwa mesoo apegea.

Ka nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooena, tammesoo apegea-ma numu tunedyooe, sumuꞌyoosoo nanapenakwa numu tunedyooe. Soo numu sakwa besa oo nakapunne, unu oetu soohane, ka pumme tu tunedyooepe. Wahaꞌyoo tooetoo paheꞌyoo numu sakwa nanapenakwa numu mesoo tunedyooe.

Soo numu nanesootuhibu tunedyooedu, sakwa ka pumme nakapunnedu ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-ma oo nasootuhise, sakwa gi tunemayuhoo, oꞌno oosoo nasootuhihoodu yise yadooakwu. Mu numu yise ka Te Naa unnepu nakapunnedu nasootuhikwu.
Soo Te Naa ka nanesootuhibu kaaheno meadabena soogwaꞌe, gi tooe hayoo oo nananemadabuekwuna. Ooonneꞌyoona soo numu nanesootuhibu tunedyooedu puusoo mesoo tunemamakwu.

Mu momokoꞌne sakwa gi apegeapana, ka mu numu nanesootuhi sumu-kwiꞌyoona. Yow putoogoo te natunedyooe meana, tooe hanotu tooe tu nananesootuhi. Tubetse moomooasoo Te Naa tamme tunetammakupu, umu momokoꞌne sakwa tu kooma nakapoohwimo.
Umu sakwa ka hemma sosopedakwatoona ka tu nobe-kwi petuse tu kooma tubenga. Oosoo gi toge tabuꞌa mu momokoꞌne ka yadooana, mu tutunakaꞌoedyukudu nanesootuhi sumuꞌu-kwiꞌyoona.
Mu sakwa gi a nesootuꞌadyipana. “Numme suuꞌmu soo Te Naa mooe sootuhaꞌe,” mee gi sokwamapana. Gi mummesoo nasooyugwe-too meagonnopana, ka nanesootuhi sumuꞌuna.
Nu kaaheno mu tuukweꞌe, ka Te Pabeꞌe mumme e tuukwe tuunguna. Umu Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi nasootuhipu oo nakasoopedakwu, ka kaaheno Te Naa unnepu mumme e tuukwe.
Mu numu unu naka tusoomatzooedu, gi oo nakasopedakwadoo-waꞌneꞌyoo gi umu-ma nakaꞌemukwapana.
E nanumu, tamme sakwa tammesoo yadooa-ma nanesootuhibu mu numu tunedyooe, o yisetu. Pana oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo soo numu ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi yadooawununa.
Pana tamme sakwa gi nananokwisoo apegeapana, nanapenakwa yadooayi.
E nanumu, mu ka oo soomaꞌyu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu mumme e tuukwepu, mu ka oo nakaꞌoedyukuse, ooosapa oo nakaꞌoedyukuno.
Mu ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna namagwetzoikwu. Mu ka gi ooosapa tunakaꞌoedyukuna, mu tookwa sukwe naneyugwedu.

Oꞌnosoo nu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu natuukweꞌe. Nu mooasoo mu tuukwepu, ka Te Pabeꞌe nuugwepu-witu. Ka oꞌnosoo ka Te Naa Pooha tunemamakwupu. Oosoo togesapa oo nawahana, soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme suda tumatugu-koobatoo nabatsapu.
Ka oo yaꞌeoose tupe tawaga-kwi natugu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise pahe tabe mease, Te Naa oo mayodupu, esoo Te Naa mooasoo tunemamakwupu.
Puusoo soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Peter tookoope natzapoonnekupu-gaꞌyoo, yise mu Te Pabeꞌe yadooawabe punnoꞌo oo poonne.
Ka saaꞌa ewaꞌyoo (500) tunakaꞌoedyukudu noꞌyoona sumusoo oo poonne, ewaꞌyoo umu-matu tooesoo gwetzoaꞌe.
Ka saaꞌa punnoꞌo James mee naneadu oo wanngaꞌa oo poonne. Yise ka saaꞌa noꞌyoona Te Pabeꞌe yadooawabe punnoꞌo oo poonnesoo.
Nuka tuwazoo pooha natzapoonnekupu, gi numu meeoo soonammeno.

Nu gi unu besaꞌyoona gi nu Te Pabeꞌe yadooawabe mane-waꞌneꞌyoo, nu ka ooka nakaꞌoedyukudu unu kusedyana. Soo Te Pabeꞌe tooe nuka sutakoo sapa e sootuhise yise oo e mayugwepu-gaꞌyoo. Menoꞌo yise nu ka Te Pabeꞌe tubetse besa nakabetsease noꞌoko ka mu oo yadooawabe ooonakwasoo tumayoho ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi.

Numme noꞌyoona sumu-kwaꞌnekoosoo mu tunedyooepu soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsapuna ka tu yaꞌe-kwikoo namayodapu. Esoo naꞌunnedu mumme nakaꞌoedyukuna. Numme noꞌyoona sumu-kwaꞌnesoo tunakaꞌoedyukute.

Numme meeoo mu tuukweꞌe soo Te Pabeꞌe tu yaꞌe-kwikoo namayoda meeꞌe. Pana susumudu mu-matu mee mu numu tunedyooe, soo numu ka yaꞌese gi namayoda-waꞌneꞌyoosoo. Umu tookwa gi ka Te Pabeꞌe namayoda-kwitu nakaꞌoedyukute. Numme mu nemooaga mee umu tookwa sokwama soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe oo yaꞌe-kwikoo oo mayodase mee mu tuukwena. Umu gi oo nakaꞌoedyukute ka besow numu ne tunedyooena, gi ka numu namagwetzoikwuna tuwazoo. Umu gi oo nakaꞌoedyukute umu Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu tuise namayodakwu. Umu tutuha te soobedya ka puu gi oo nakasopedakwadoona soo Te Pabeꞌe te magwetzoikwu.
Tamme oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Pabeꞌe tu yaꞌe-kwikoo namayoda, soo Te Pabeꞌe yise punnoꞌo tamme te yaꞌe-kwikoo mayosukwu.
Ka Adam mee naneadu soo Te Naa mooe manumudoopu. Oogow mane-kwitoo tamme yise yaꞌeyakwe. Tamme namayodakwu, ka Te Pabeꞌe mane-kwitoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko te magwetzoi ka tamme-koobatoo nabatsase.
Noꞌyoona tamme ka toge-kwi oo manepetuse, namayodakwu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe mooeꞌugasoo namayodupu, ka saaꞌa yise oo kodyu petuse, oosoo ka pumme te nakaꞌoedyukute, soo Te Pabeꞌe saaꞌa te mayosudooa.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-kooba tuꞌeyaꞌekwu, soo Te Naa noꞌoko sutakoo pumme wohonedu kadooꞌoo tu mayugwe-kwitoo tooe. Soo Te Naa noꞌoko ka Te Pabeꞌe-tooha te nemayugwepu. Oꞌno soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko mu suda tumayugwedu kadooꞌoo mayugwedooa. Ka nakwitoo soo Te Pabeꞌe ka numu yaꞌeyina kadoo mayugwekwu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe punnoꞌo saaꞌa noꞌoko hemma punowsoo ka Te Naa-matoo nemawunikwu, puusoo tuwazoo oo-toohatoo nanemawunikwu. Oꞌno yise soo Te Naa noꞌokosoo hemma nemadunagakwu. Oꞌnotoo soo te teepu moobekwa-kakwu.
Tamme oo sopedakwatoo soo numu ka tuyaꞌekwakoo namayodayakwe, ooonneꞌyoona tamme ka umuoo tuipu-koobatoo, baa-wi namatzakayakwe.
Oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo tamme ka ooosapa tooe nabatsayina, tamme puu te yaꞌe-kwikoo namayodakwu.
Tooe nonoꞌotsa tabeno nuka tu batsayagate sapa nu ooosapa besa soonamme, ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu mu numu tuukwena. Nu oo nakaꞌoedyukute ooonneꞌyoona nu oo nanetzakwiyiyakwe, ka Te Pabeꞌe.

Nu ka Ephesus mee naneadu-kwiꞌyoona, mu numu oetu e nebatsana e nehowawaꞌe. Saaꞌa soo Te Naa e yaꞌe-kwikoo e mayodase, oo-koobatoo e sootuhikwu. Pana umu gi tunakaꞌoedyukutu-matu meeoo, “Tamme sakwa ooosapa besa sokwama, tukana, baagoena tuwazoo tamme sumuna yabesoo yaꞌekwu.” Tamme ka oo ꞌoedyukuna soo numu ka tu yaꞌe-kwikoo namayodakwu meꞌe, ooonneꞌyoona tamme ka mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-matu unnepu gi nakatogeꞌyookute.
Gi umuoo mumme nemooagadu-ma nakaꞌemukwapana. Umu ka Te Naa besa po-makoo mu takohonedu. Esoo togesapa naꞌunnedu, “Tamme ka sutakoo numu napuaꞌana, tamme punnoꞌo oo-waꞌnesoo manepetugakwu.”
Mu sakwa ka suda mu tumatuguna maꞌwuse oo nakasopedakwatoo ka togetu-kwitu. Susumudu mu-nagatu gisoo ka Te Naa sooꞌoedyukute. Mu sakwa suda oo sokwamaku ka oo mu manena.
Sumuna mu gi hemma nakaꞌoedyukuna meeꞌe tutubengakwu, “Hownnekoo yise soo yaꞌepu namanumudoose nummenummekwu? Hownnekoo ka saaꞌa umu tookoo-gadooa?”
Mu numu mooasoo oo sopedakwatoo ka ewetuhoo nanekwegeana. Te tookoo manepunnena puu, hemma tupooe-kwaꞌneꞌyoosoo. Tamme puu ka tupooe teepu-tooha mabemase, oꞌno oosoo naakwu.
Tamme ka tumasuana, gi tamme ka mooasoo a suana masuꞌa. Tamme ka oo tupooe masuꞌa.
Soo Te Naa ka tumasuape matabuepu, ooka tu sooyugwe-kwikoo yise noꞌobatusoo a pooe matabuepu ooonneꞌyoona soo tumasuape nanakummaꞌyoosoo.
Noꞌyoona puusoo soo hee modu tookoo gi nanakwaꞌneꞌyoosoo. Soo numu tookoo puu sumu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo, soo nunuꞌu tookoo puu ataꞌyoosoo, soo nahoawidu tookoo punnoꞌo ataꞌyoosoo.
Soo tamme paꞌanakwitu ka teepu-koobakwituno naꞌataꞌyoosoo. Soo te paꞌanakwitu puu besa tatabuꞌadu-gaꞌyoo mu hee yaa teepu-koobatoo punnoꞌo besa tatabuꞌadu-gaꞌyoo.
Soo taba besa tabuꞌa, pummesoo tabua-kwikoo, yise soo muha punnoꞌo besa tabuꞌa, tu namadabue-kwaꞌnekoosoo mu paatoozooba punnoꞌo besa tatabuaꞌa pana noꞌyoona nanaꞌatasoo nanamadabuꞌe.
Tamme ka te yaꞌe-kwikoo namanumudoose tamme punnoꞌo pudutupu namayugwekwu. Soo te tookoo gi ka menoꞌotu-kwaꞌneꞌyookwu.

Soo te tookoo yaa teepu-koobatu ka sutaꞌyoona, gi natsooena tamme yaꞌeyina nakooyikwu. Pana tamme ka pudu namanumudoose tamme unu natzooedu, besa tabuadu, gi yaꞌedu tookoo-ga manekwu, oowe manakwana. Te pudu tookoo besaꞌyookwu ka Te Naa-baa te nummenumme.
Soo Te Naa pooha yadooapu mee, “Soo Adam mee naneadu nana nagutza mooeꞌugasoo yow teepu-koobatu namanumudoopu,” pana soo Te Pabeꞌe yise yaaꞌa tamme-baa te magwetzoi petu.
Soo Te Naa mooeꞌugasoo noꞌoko numu sukwe matabuepuna yise saaꞌa oosoosoo Tu Besa Pooha-ma te mapudutupudookwu.

Soo Adam ka teepu-makoo namanumudoopu, pana soo Te Pabeꞌe ebe tamme-koobatu kemmana. Umu Adam nagedu ka teepu-kooba suuꞌmu momokwu. Umu Te Pabeꞌe nagedu ebe tamme-kooba Te Naa-baatoosoo mease oo-baaꞌyookwu. Tamme uga Adam-waꞌneꞌyoosoo, tamme yise saaꞌa ka Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌneꞌyookwu.

E nanumu, tamme ka mu numu manena nagena, tamme gi besa manekwu, tamme ka gi ooosapa yaa teepu-kooba momokwuse, ka kadooꞌoo namayugwekwuse. Pana tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe nagemona, tamme atasoo manese tamme ka Te Naa poonnekwu.

Oꞌno soo tumooyagakunoo namooyagakukwu, ka teepu atasoo manikwuse, oo pudu nakasopedakwatoo ka putoogoo te pudu nanematugukwuna. Mu nanesootuhidu numu mooasoo tuigapu natzayozukwu. Mu tooesoo eka teepu-kooba gwetzoimodu-no mu nananesootuhidu tuipu numu-nosoo, noꞌyoona tamme yabesoo pudu namanumudookwusoo, umu gi kadooꞌoo namayugwedu Te Naa-baa ooosapa gwetzoikwudu.

Tamme ka pudu namanumudoose te tookoo atasoo manise gi tamme kadooꞌoo namayugweku-waꞌneꞌyoosoo. Oꞌno soo Te Naa tunemamakwupu, otoogoo manepetukwu. Soo Etzaꞌa suda unnepu punnoꞌo kadooꞌoo namayugwekwu. Soo Te Naa oo matzooekukwu. Oosoo nayaꞌedu ka namatzooekuse gi kadooꞌoo te mayugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Soo suda numu tumatuguna numu-matoosoo kodyukwu numu goedu. Tamme oo sopedakwatoo ka gi Te Naa unnepu mayohona.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ooonneꞌyoona tamme mane-kwitoo nabatsapu. Oo te magwetzoi tabuapu. Ooonneꞌyoona tamme ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe, ka Tu Besaa Tooa tamme-koobatoo oo nemawunipu.

Ooonneꞌyoona e nanesootuhi nanumu, tamme sakwa gi wahadame tusooyugwepana; ooosapa Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukuno, ooosapa oo nakabetseanona, besa oo tumayohokuna. Tamme ka pudu numu tamme oo mayugwekese. Oꞌno tamme nasootuhikwu.

Ka pukwi mu tutummatzipu-matu mu tumasumudoopu-witu sakwa nu mu tuukwe. Nu mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tutuha manedu Jerusalem-witu mu tummatzikwuna sookwaꞌe. Mu sakwa tumasumudoo mana mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka teepu Galatia mee naneadu-kwitu yoo mane tuungu. Mu sakwa punnoꞌo ooosoo.

Ka nonoꞌotsa mu nanesootuhi sumu-kwiꞌyoona, mu sakwa tumasumudooyina ka Te Naa mumme sootuhipu-matu, ka mu tumasumudooyina tsipunne. Oꞌno yise ka e petugase oosoo namamakwupunnedooa. Oꞌno yise nu gi tumasumudoona mu natuungu-waꞌneꞌyoosoo.
Nu ka mu-baa petugase tooe haga tooe saaꞌa mu tunetutzeapu, ka mu tumasumudoona noko ka mu tubope-noko Jerusalem-witoo tayadooa. Soo tubope saaꞌa umu-witusoo wahadu.
Tooꞌe saaꞌa nu umu-no meadooa ka oo mane-waꞌneꞌyoona. Oꞌno yise umu nu-no napuaꞌa-gadooa.
Nu ka teepu Macedonia mee naneadu-too mease, nu sumuna mu-baa gi haaꞌnotoo nobengekakwu.
Tooetoo nu sumuna mu-baa tomokwu. Mu sumuna e tummatzikwu, ka penakwa e mease tooe hanotoo tooe.
Gi haaꞌnoto nu mu nobengena, nu sakwa wunaꞌme mu-baa ka Te Pabeꞌe nuka meeoo sooyugwe.

Pana nu yaa ka Ephesus mee naneadu-kwiꞌyookwusoo ka tu nayasana mu mamakwunoto tooe yaanoꞌyoopunnekwu, nu ewasoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu mu numu mesoo tunesootabuedooa, tooe menoꞌo ewaꞌyoo numu ne tumooꞌoogena sapa ka te nanesootuhi-kwi.
Ka Timothy mu-baa petugase, ka saaꞌa besa oo matugu. Oꞌno oosoo besa mu napuaꞌa nuummadooa. Oosoo nu-kwaꞌneꞌyoosoo, oosoo Te Pabeꞌe yadooawabe.
Mu sakwa noꞌyoona besa oo matuguna, oo tummatzi, oꞌno yise oosoo yabesoo nu-baatoosoo kodyudooa besa soonammena, numme ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-no oo soogwipunne.

Soo Apollos sakwa tooꞌe, mu susumudu nananesootuhidu-no mu-baa nobenge, meeꞌe nu oo tooe netamma. “Gi nu menoꞌo oo mani-kwaꞌneꞌyoona,” mee soo Apollos. Pana sumuna soo Apollos saaꞌa mumme nanekwegeakwu.
Mu sakwa ooosapa namabetzapepunne ooosapa ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna, mu sakwa gi suipana tooe hemma haꞌoo manese sapa. Natzooesoo nasooyugwepunne.
Noꞌokosoo hemma how mu yugwekwi mu sakwa besa nanasoobedya.

Menoꞌo yise, e pupuaꞌamu, mu sakwa ka Stephanas mee naneadu ka oo nobe-kwitunosoo besa umu-no nananetummatzi. Umuoo numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi mooe tunakaꞌoedyukupu, ka mu tubewa-wiꞌyoona, ka mumme tunakaꞌoedyukudu sootummatzina. Mu sakwa tuwazoo noꞌoko mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tummatzidu tummatzi.
Nu besa soonamme ka Stephanas, Portunas noko Achaicus nu-baa petuse, umu ka nu-baaꞌyoona, tooe mumme gi nu-baakoo sapa.
Umu nu-baa petuse, mu mane-kwitu besa nemadabue. Umu besa e masoonamme, yise besa mu masoonammekwu tuwow, ka mu-baa petugase. Mu sakwa umuoo naana sootubetseyaꞌe.
Umu tunakaꞌoedyukudu yaa Asia-kooba nonobe-gaꞌyoo mu nemaꞌyu. Umu Aquila noko Priscilla mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu umu-no mu nobe-kwi sumuyakwe,
noꞌyoona yise mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu yaatu mu nemaꞌyuyakwe. Mu sakwa nananenoꞌyugwe.
Nu, nuusoo, ka umu ume nemayudu unnena yow botugumena.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe saaꞌa tamme-baa petudooa. Tooe haga tooe ka gi Te Pabeꞌe petzabena, soo suda mu tumatuguna umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.
Nu meeoo nanesootuhidyikwu, “Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus sakwa besa mu sootuhi.”
Nu noꞌoko unu mu soobedya, mumme ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu.

Ka Paul-makoo, Te Naa tunetutzeana, Te Pabeꞌe yadooawabe, yise Timothy punnoꞌo Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu, ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka Corinth mee naneadu-wi nonobe-gaꞌyoo, yise noꞌoko mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka teepu Achaia mee nanaeadu-matoo tuboꞌo tuwow.
Numme mu nanesootuhikute soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe-no mu sootuhina mu magwetzoikwu.
Numme ka Te Pabeꞌe Naa-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe, oosoo ka tutuha te soobedyana te sootuhikwu. Soo Te Naa te sootuhaꞌe tooe hannanoꞌo tooe ka suda hemma manise.
Saaꞌa tamme punnoꞌo mu numu netummatzikwu ka umu suda manese. Tamme mooasoo nasootuhipu, tamme yise kummaꞌakoosoo mesoo netummatzi.

Tooe mu numu suda te matuguse sapa, ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi ooosapa tunakaꞌoedyukuna, ka Te Naa tamme sootuhaꞌe, soo Te Pabeꞌe punnoꞌo te sootuhaꞌe, tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Tamme ka kummaꞌakoosoo numu mesoo netummatzi.
Numme ka suda numme tu matugu sapa numme mumme netummatzi, mu yise ooosapa tunakaꞌoedyukute tooe suda mumme tumatuku sapa.
Numme ooosapa mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu soobedya, numme ka oo sopedakwatoona soo Te Naa mu netummatzikwu numme tu yugwe-waꞌnesoo tooe suda mu namanatzaya, numme-waꞌnesoo.
Mu sakwa oo sopedakwatoo soo hee numme-baatu suda mani numme ka teepu Asia mee naneadu-kwiꞌyoona. Numme meeoo sokwama nummega nagoekwu meeꞌe.

Numme oo sopedakwatoo nummega sumuna uga nagoekwu. Numme yise ka Te Naa-ma tubetse nasoonatzi gi nummesoo mane-ma namagwetzoi. Soo Te Naa puu ka te yaꞌe-kwikoo te mesoo mayodakwu, ka meeoo te soobedyana numme oo-ma suuꞌmu nasoonatzi.
Pana soo Te Naa ne magwetzoinoꞌo. Numme oo-ma suuꞌmu nasoonatzaꞌe, ne magwetzoikwudu.
Mu yise besakoo ne tummatzaꞌepu-gaꞌyoo ka ne nanesootuhikuꞌyina. Oꞌno yise ewaꞌyoo oo nesootuhikwu tamme-koobatoo oosoo ka mu nanesootuhina nanekwegeana.
Numme oo sopedakwatoo ka kaaheno ka Te Naa besa podo besa meana. Numme besa kaaheno mu matugu noꞌoko numu tuwazoo, soo Te Naa ka ne sootuhise numme mu soobedya.

Noꞌoko eka mu-matu ne tubona mu a mesoo nakasopedakwadoo. Mooasoo mu ma-matu nakasopedakwadoona. Nu noꞌoko maka mu nakasopedakwadoona besa sobedyana. Oꞌno yise mu ka Te Naa nesootuhikwu numme-koobatoo, ka Te Pabeꞌe yaa teepu-koobatoosoo kodyu petuse.

Mooasoo nu ka mooeꞌugasoo mu-matu tubose ka mu-baa nobengekwu mee tooꞌe soonammese, nu yise gi oo-toogoo mane, numme ooosapa gi ka Macedonia-wi moꞌo. Tamme saaꞌa ka nanataboegase, besa nanamatoo sokwamakwu. Tamme uga nanano nanesootuhikwu.
Nu gi waha-tamme tusooyugwena, meeoo mu tuukwe nu saaꞌa kemmadooa mee. Nu gi meeoo sukwe unakwe yise gi oo maneyakwe ka mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-kwaꞌne. Soo Te Naa e sopedakwatoo.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe puu gi ooonneꞌyoo, ooosapa tu unne-kwaꞌnesoo maneyakwe. Soo Te Naa puu te sootuhi ka Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo tu unne-kwaꞌnesoo, ooonneꞌyooona tamme oo-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe. Tamme oo nesootuhaꞌe ka Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo. Soo Te Naa puusoo nakwi tunakaꞌoedyuku te matabuena, mu numu ne tuukwe tuunguna ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu. Nu Paul, Timothy yise Silas oowetuoo mu tuukwekwu.
Soo Te Naa Tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma te sootuhi, tamme yise oo sopedakwatoo oosoo tu unne-kwaꞌnesoo manese te magwetzoikwu.
Nu ooosapa gi mu-baa numme, nu ka mu-baaꞌyoona nu uga mu nesagwikukwu. Oosoo Te Naa e sopedakwatoo nu ka ooosapa besa mu nanesootuhikuna.
Gi numme mu ooonnakwa besaꞌyoo mee nasooꞌyugwena, numme mu soonoyugwepunnena. Numme mu netummatzina mu besa sokwamakwu ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna.
Ooonneꞌyoona nu gi mu-baa nobengegena, nu gi mu soonesagwikute.
Nu gi besa soonamme ka mu nesagwikuna. Mu sakwa uga besa manemona besa nanesootuhina nu mu-matoo besa soonamme.
Nu mu-matoo tubopu, oꞌno nu ka mu-baa petugase gi suda soonammekwu ka mu-matu tumaꞌemukwa. Mu sakwa besa e masoonamme. Nu oo sopedakwatoo, nu ka besa soonammena mu punnoꞌo besa sokwamakwu.
Nu suda soonamme ka mu tumaꞌemukwadu nakase, nu yise mu-matu tubo. Nu ka besa mu soobedyana mu sootummatzina, nu gi suda mu sokwamana petzape.
Soo nana tumaꞌemukwadu gi nuka suuꞌmu suda masoonammekute, noꞌoko suda te masokwamakute tuwazoo.
Nagutza wunaꞌme natsasoopedyapunne oosoo ka tumaꞌemukwase. Menoꞌo yise oosoo suda oo soonammekuse oo nemakodyuka ka suda tu manepu.
Mu sakwa yise oo tumaꞌemukwapu soomuꞌwuse, oo nanesootuhiku. Oꞌno yise oosoo saaꞌa gi suda soonammena, gi nasootookedooa.
Mu sakwa yise tubetse besa oo matugu.
Mooeꞌugasoo nu mu-matoo tubose nu meeoo soonammena howga mu e tunetamma-kwaꞌnesoo oo-toogoo manakwe. Mu yise e nakabetseapu-gaꞌyoo.
Menoꞌo mu ka nana tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwuna nu punnoꞌo mu-no mooasoo oo soomuꞌwupu. Nu ka oo manepu soomuꞌwuna, nuka Te Pabeꞌe tunetamma-waꞌnesoo mane.
Soo Sutaꞌyoo ka tumaꞌemukwadu kadooꞌoo mayugweku-waꞌne tabuꞌa tamme oo sopedakwatoo. Soo Sutaꞌyoo noꞌoko kadooꞌoo te mayugwekwu mee tusooyugwe.

Nu ooosapa meadabena ka Troas mee naneadu-kwi petuga nu ooosapa gi mu-baa nobengegaꞌa. Onona nu ka mu numu tuukwe ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu. Soo Te Naa tookwa mooasoo ewow numu sootuhipuna umu yise e nakowyapunne.

Pana nu yise meeoo soonamme nu sakwa gi besa ka umu-baaꞌyoona ka e puaꞌa Titus gi onoko, oonow ka mee nu soonammena. Nu yise sake-wi mangeka ka teepu Macedonia mee naneadu-kwitoo, nu ka Titus watehooka.

Numme ka Te Naa nesootuhaꞌe oosoo ka ooosapa ne moohena, numme yise ka sutakoo matsooekute. Soo Te Naa meeoo ne netammana, numme yise manatooe ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu wahammoꞌo. Mu numu yise oo sopedakwadookwu ka Te Pabeꞌe besaꞌyoona.
Mu numu tunakaꞌoedyukukwudu oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Pabeꞌe besaꞌyoona te magwetzoikwu. Mu numu gi oo soonakaꞌoedyukuna ka yaꞌeyina gi ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petugakwu ka gi gwetzoibu-ma pumme tu sootuhaꞌe.

Tooe numme gi maawaꞌneꞌyoopana Te Pabeꞌe-witu wahammoꞌo. Soo Te Naa meeoo ne netamma, “Mu numu tuukwe ka Mu Pabeꞌe-witu.” Numme toge-kwitu ka Te Naa-witu wahakwu ka Te Pabeꞌe pooha tooha-kwi. Pana numme mu numu tuukweꞌe Te Pabeꞌe-witu gi oe natumunagakupana.

Mu mooasoo ne numu sopedakwatoo numme ka Te Naa yadooakumoꞌo, yisetoo gi hemma hayoosoo mu tuukwe-waꞌneꞌyoo. Numme gi tubope mu mapoonnekute mu mooasoo ne manena sopedakwatoo. Gi yise numme tubope mu-makoo soogwaꞌe ka ne manepunnena wahadu. Mu mooasoo ne besaꞌyoona sopedakwatoo.

Mu, muusoo mu numu tzapoonnekute mu natunedyooepu. Noꞌyoona mu numu oo sopedakwatoo mu ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukute ka oetu numme mu tuukwese. Mu ka natubodu-kwaꞌneꞌyoosoo ka mu numu numme-witu tuukwena. Mu oo tzapoonne soo Te Naa tu Besa Pooha-ma mumme sootuhi. Menoꞌo yise mu numu ne sopedakwatoo numme ka Te Pabeꞌe yadooawabe.
Numme oo sopedakwatoo, numme ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Soo Te Naa ne sopedakwatoo soo Te Pabeꞌe yoo ne matabuepu.
Numme gi nummesoo besa namadabuꞌe, soo Te Naasoo ne matabue, numme yise besa maneke.

Soo Te Naa meeoo ne netammana, “Mu numu tuukweꞌe ka e Besa Pooha-witu Te Pabeꞌe yise te magwetzoi.” Soo ne mooa tumayohope ka tseketadyadu tupe-matoo nanaboꞌo. Pana numme ka ne nanamooatupu tumayohope tamme magwetzoidu tooe nagena umu gi ne magwetzoina, numme tuaꞌe. Soo Te Naa pudu unnena meeoo menoꞌo numme ka mu numu meeoo netamma oo Besa Pooha atasoo te yugwekwu. Tamme yise ooosapa gwetzoikwu.

Oꞌnosoo ka Te Naa yadooawabe Moses mee naneadu ka te mooa tumayohope nagease, soo Moses koba pooha kootabedooa-waꞌne tabuꞌa, mu Jew numu gi oo koba poonne-waꞌneꞌyoo. Pana oosoo poohabe obeda kadoo manekapu.
Menoꞌo tamme ooosapa ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-tooha.

Soo oꞌnosoo naꞌunnedu ka te tumayohope-witu naduya pana gi atasoo te yugwe, te sukwe koꞌe. Soo pudu naꞌunnedu unu natzooꞌe. Oosoo unnepu meeoo te tuukweꞌe Te Naa Besa Pooha atasoo te yugwe tamme besa manekwu.
Soo oꞌnosoo te manena, te nagemona, unu ugasoo natzooe pana menoꞌo gi natzooꞌe-gaꞌyoo oosoo mobegwa-gaꞌyoo, soo pudu naꞌunnedu ka unu natzooena ooosapa gi mobegwa-gaꞌyoo.
Numme gi nasookwaꞌe ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu ne wahakwuna oo sopedakwadoona, numme ka Te Naa Besa Pooha unnena wahamoꞌo. Esoo Pooha ooosapa numme-no gi moobegwaga.
Gi ka unnepu ka Moses ne nanamooatupu tuukwe-kwaꞌne. Soo Moses unnepu moobegwa-gaꞌyoo.

Susumudu mu Jew numu yise gi ka Te Pabeꞌe soonakaꞌoedyukute, tooe menoꞌo pana ka Moses tubona naneꞌa mu Jew numu gi ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukute. Mu Jew numu Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu suuꞌmu oo nakasopedakwatoo ka Moses tubona.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ooka te nakasopedakwadoona te sootuhina tamme yise ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukukwu. Menoꞌo tamme gi ka Te Naa-ma suina, gi too oo-ma nasookwaꞌe, tamme ka Te Naa nakasopedakwadoona.
Soo Te Naa ka tu Besa Pooha-ma atasoo te yugwewunu unusoo nawaꞌnesoo te yugwe.
Soo Te Naa puusoo meeoo ne netamma mu numu tuukwe ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu, numme gi nasootookedu, numme ka numme tu sootuhaꞌe.

Numme togesapa tuukwena, ka Te Naa besa podo meadape. Numme ka nanasuda namanedu po maꞌwukese, numme gi numu nemooagana ka Te Naa unnena kaaheno wahammoꞌo. Mu ne sopedakwadoo numme kaahenoꞌyoo, Te Naa punnoꞌo ne sopedakwatoo.
Umu numu gi Te Pabeꞌe nakasopedakwadoodu ka sutakoo nakabetseꞌa.
Oosoo Sutaꞌyoo mu tzaꞌemukwana, umu gi ka Te Pabeꞌe Besa Pooha nakasopedakwadoo. Umu gi oo nakasopedakwadoo soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa-waꞌneꞌyoosoo.
Numme ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu suuꞌmu, numu tunedyooꞌe gi numme nummesoo tusooyugwena. Ka Te Pabeꞌe numme nakabetseꞌa, ka mu tummatzina.

Menoꞌo numme oo nakasopedakwadoo ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo manepu, yise how unu pooha-gana tubetse besaꞌyoo. Tamme uga togabu-wi. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise tamme-baa petuse, tamme tabua-kwitoo kua. Soo Te Naa ka teepu pudu matabuese, meeoo unakwe, “Soo taba sakwa ka togabu kootabuakupunne.”
Numme ka Te Naa besa unnena sopedakwadoona nasootuhipu, pana numme togesoo sukwe numu, gi nummesoo pooha-gana mu numu yise oo sopedakwadookwu numme ka Te Naa pooha-toohakwi gi nummetusoo.
Tooe hano tooe numme suda namatugupu, gi numme oo namatzooekute, gi too nasootooke.
Numme tu netumooꞌoose sapa, numme gi numme suuꞌmu soo Te Naa ooosapa numme-no, tooe numme tu kusegeaꞌa sapa, gi kadoo namayugwe.
Tooe numme ka Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo nabatsakwuse ooosapa namabetseapunne. Soo Te Pabeꞌe pooha numme-ma natzapoonnekwu. Numme tookoo-gaꞌyoo mesoo nabatsadu, pana soo Te Pabeꞌe ne magwetzoaꞌe.
Pana numme ka oo-koobatoo nabatzase, mu nasootuhina, namagwetzoikwu.
Meeoo nabotugu, “Nu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu meeoo unakwe, nu ka oo nakaꞌoedyukuna.” Numme punnoꞌo ooonneꞌyoosoo.
Numme oo nakaꞌoedyukute soo Te Naa te yaꞌe-kwikoo te mayodakwu, oosoo ka Te Pabeꞌe oo yugwese. Tamme yise ooosapa oo-baayookwu.
Noꞌyoona soo sutaꞌyoo uga numme-tamme kemmadu nanematzagakwunipu. Ewaꞌyoosoo yise numu oo nakaꞌoedyukuna namagwetzoikwu, soo Te Naa yise umu-koobatoo nanesookwugikwu.
Ooonneꞌyoona numme yise gi nasootooke. Ne tookoo kadooꞌoo namayugwese sapa, ne soonammena pudutupusoo namadabuemenasoo nonotsa tabeno.
Soo yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona mu numu ne netumooꞌoona, oꞌno yise numme ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona ooosapa noꞌyoona hee numme-tamme besaꞌyookwu.

Numme yise oo soomaꞌyu ne nasootuhipe ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona, pana numme yise ka sutakoo uga numme-tamme kemmadu soomuꞌwa. Soo menoꞌo hee yaa teepu-kooba gi haaꞌnotosoo meadu, mobegwa-gaꞌyoo saaꞌa ne nasootuhipe Te Naa-baa gi mobegwa-gakoo.
Soo te tookoo yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoonasoo mobegwa-gakwu. Umuoo kadoo namayugwese, tamme kummaꞌakoosoo pudutupu natookoo-makakwu. Te Naa tamme matabuekuna ooosapa namagwetzoinummekwudu.
Menoꞌo tamme yaa teepu-koobasoo te tookoo-wizoo, tooe tamme ka te paꞌanakwatoo te meakwuna soogwipana.
Tamme yise gi a moogooa suuꞌmu, gi tsoapa-waꞌneꞌyoo, tamme tubetse tookoo-gakwu tooe ka saaꞌa yaꞌese sapa.
Tamme ka yaano nanatutuha manemodu gi besa sokwama ka tammesoo tookoo-wiꞌyoona, pana tamme gi tsoapa-waꞌne sokwama. Tamme ka te pooha tookoo soogwaꞌe, oꞌno tamme ooosapa gwetzoimokwu.
Soo Te Naa te mapudutupudookwu, oꞌno tamme gwetzoikwusoo, oosoo yise ka Tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma te sootuhise, oꞌno tamme oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa te magwetzoikwu.

Tamme ka te tunakaꞌoedyukuna nakabetsea, gi ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona hemma te poonnena. Tamme ka tunakabetseana ooosapa besa sokwamakwu tamme oo sopedakwadoo tamme togesoo yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona tamme gi Te Naa-baa.
Tamme ka te tookoo tubetse soomawunaꞌe, oꞌno tamme ka Te Naa-baaꞌyookwu.
Tamme ooosapa ka Te Naa te nakabetseakwuna petzape ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona tooetoo Te Naa-baaꞌyoona.

O saaꞌa tamme ka Te Naa-baa petugakwu, soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona te manepu-makoo te nemadabuekwu. Tamme-matoosoo kodyukwu tamme ka besa tumatuguna tooetoo suda tumatuguna. Tamme ka besa tumatuguna besa nasootuhikwu. Tamme ka suda tumatuguna gi nasootuhikwu.

Numme ka Te Pabeꞌe nakabetseanona, numme mu numu tuukweꞌe Te Pabeꞌe-witu, umu yise oo nakasopedakwadookwu, oꞌno umu sumuna tunakaꞌoedyukukwu. Soo Te Naa mooasoo ne sopedakwadoo, nu yise mumme ne nakasopedakwadookwuna petzape tuwazoo.

Numme gi nummesoo nanesookwugina petukute, pana mu tuukwena nummesoo nakwitu, oꞌno mu gi numme-ma nasookwikwu ka mu numu numme nekwohone petuse. Umu ne wohonedu ooonneꞌyoo ka numu tabua-makoo meadu, gi ka oo tumatugu-makoo.
Tooꞌe numme ka gi sokwamadu-kwaꞌne manakwe mee numme tu netamma sapa, numme ka Te Naa-koobatoo oo manakwe. Numme ka besa tusoyugwena, numme tooe hownnekoo tooe mu tummatzikwu.
Noꞌyoona ne manena ka Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka besa te soobedyana tamme-koobatoo nabatsa.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko tamme-koobatoo nabatsa menoꞌo yise tamme ka sutakoo te nagena mesoo tzadyooikute. Menoꞌo umu ka Te Pabeꞌe mesoo nakabetseꞌa ka puu-koobatoo oo nabatsase, ka tu yaꞌekwikoo oo namayodase.
Menoꞌo tamme gi tooe hayoo tooe oo sooyugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo ka mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu numu-waꞌne. Tamme oꞌnosoo uga ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo soobedyayakwe, pana menoꞌo tamme gi.
Tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyuku manekwuse, tamme pudutupu maneke, pudu namadabuepu-waꞌne. Tamme gi ka oꞌnosoo te tusooyugwe-waꞌne tusooyugwe, besasoo tusooyugwe.
Soo Te Naa atasoo te yugwekese tu pupuaꞌamu te mayugweke, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tamme-koobatoo nabatsase.
Soo Te Naa numu tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwu, meeoo ne netammana, “Mu sakwa mu numu ewetuoo tuukwe.”
Numme yise ka Te Naa yadooawabe manepunnedu, mu numu tuukwedu ka Te Naa umu sootuhipu. Numme meeoo, “Mu sakwa ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyuku,
oꞌno soo Te Pabeꞌe puu gi tumaꞌemukwadu, tamme-koobatoo nabatsa tumaꞌemukwadu-kwaꞌne, oꞌno soo Te Naa besa te mesoo matabuekwu.”
Numme meeoo mu netamma, “Mu ka gisoo besa tunakaꞌoedyukudu, gi oo ooowemota nakwumunapana, ka saaꞌa soo Te Naa mu sootuhi petukwu.”
Meeoo soo Te Naa unnepu nabotugu, “Nu ka mu nanetzagwaꞌena nakase mu sootuhikwu, oꞌno nu mu magwetzoikwu.” Yise menoꞌo soo Te Naa mu namagwetzoikwuna petzape.

Numme ooosapa besa manakwe ka mu numu tunakaꞌoedyukuna gi tzadyooikudu, ooosapa besa unakwe tuwazoo. Numme ooosapa besa manakwe mu numu numme gi nesootzema-koobatoo-waꞌne, numme ka Te Naa yadooawabena.
Mu numu ne sopedakwatoo numme ka Te Naa yadooawabena, tuwazoo numme ooosapa oo-no wunu tooe hemma nanasuda numme-tamme manekese sapa ka Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo.
Numme nuupagedayina, nakwutuma numme tuwazoo, gi maneyakwe ka ewa hemma howyugwena, yise tooe natseagoena, yise gi besa utuiyina.

Mu numu ne poonne, numme besa tumatugupu. Numme ka Te Pabeꞌe nakabetseadu, gi etzaga sutagonno, besa numu ooosapa matugudu, numme ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohaꞌyoona, noꞌoko mu numu numme besa soobedya. Numme ooosapa kaaheno ka Te Naa besa unnepu mu numu tuukwe ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohaꞌyoona, ooosapa kaaheno ka Te Naa besa podo meadape.
Oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo tooe mu numu hayoo unakwe sapa, umu ka ne nesootuhina, tooetoo ne nesootzemana, ka mu numu meeoo numme mu netamma numme kaahenoꞌyoo tooetoo mu nemooagadu,
ka gi ne sopedakwatoo mee mu unakwe sapa tooe noꞌoko numu numme sopedakwatoo. Numme ooosapa tooꞌe nabatsayakwe pana numme togesoo momoꞌo.

Numme-tamme ewasoo suda maneyakwe ooonneꞌyoopana numme ooosapa besa nesokwama. Tooe numme tutuha manemo pana ewaꞌyoo mu numu nasootuhiyakwe. Tooe numme gi hee-ga-kwaꞌne tabuapana menoꞌo numme noꞌoko nasootuhipe hee-gaꞌyoo.
E nanumu, numme noꞌoko hemma kaaheno mu tuukwekwu.
Numme unu mu soobedyana, gi hemma mu-makoo tsitugu, pana mu gi oo neheesoobedya.
Mu sakwa ne soobedya. Nu puu mu soobedya mu doodooamu-ga-kwaꞌnesoo.

Tamme sakwa mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-ma tzabepana: gi umu-matu nodukwadoopana, gi umu-matu besa pupuaꞌamu-gapana. Tamme ka Te Naa besa podo meadu, umuoo sutaꞌyoo kummaꞌakoosoo po-gaꞌyoo gi tamme umu-no mea-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka sutakoo moohedu woho-gaꞌyoo. Soo sutaꞌyoo gi ka Te Pabeꞌe nanetupuaꞌa-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme ka mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-waꞌne gi tusooyugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme sakwa yise gi umu-noꞌyoopana.

Tamme Te Naa doodooamu-matu. Soo Te Naa ooosapa tamme-noꞌyookwu. Tamme gi tooe hemmatoo tooe nanesootuhi-waꞌneꞌyoo. Oosoo meeoo nabotugu tamme Te Naa doodooamu-matu meeꞌe. Soo Te Naa meeoo, “Nu mu-baa nobe-gaꞌyoo. Nu Mu Naa manepunne, umu yise nuga doodooamu mee nu mu natubangakwu.”
Meeoo tuwazoo unakwe, “Mu sakwa gi mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-baaꞌyoopana, mu sakwa gi ka suda namanedu tsitugupana. Mu ka suda namanedu maꞌwukese,
nu e dooamu mu mayugwekwu.”
E besa nanumu, tamme sakwa gi totsabu manekese, ka suda namanedu soomuꞌwake. Tamme sakwa Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyuku, tamme ka Te Naa sopedakwadoona. Soo Te Naa te sootuhina tu doodooamu te mayugwekwu.
Mu sakwa meeoo sokwama numme mu pupuaꞌamu mee. Numme ooosapa besa mu matugu. Numme gi haga nemawunaꞌe ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-matu, numme tuwazoo gi numu nemooagadu.
Nu gi mu nesootzemana meeoo unakwe, nu meeoosoo unakwe nu tubetse besa mu soobedya. Mu ne pupuaꞌamu, haꞌoo ka ne nabatsase, tooetoo togesoo ne momona.
Numme oo sopedakwatoo mu besa manekese, numme besa mu-koobatoo sokwama. Ewa numme-tamme suda namanekena, pana numme besa mu-koobatoo sokwama.
Numme ka teepu Macedonia mee naneadu-kwi petugase, numme gi manega. Numme ewa nanasuda manegena. Mu numu ne netumooꞌoona, numme ewa mu-kwitu soohanena suda mu sokwamakute.
Pana soo Te Naa ooosapa tamme nasootukedu sootuhaꞌe. Soo Te Naa ne sootuhaꞌe, ka Titus numme-baa petuse.

Besa oosoo ka numme-baa petusesoo, soo Titus meeoo ne tuukweꞌe mu oo nenoyugwenoꞌo. Menoꞌo ne tuukwe mu ne tubetse pupuaꞌamu mu suda sokwama ka tumaꞌemukwase, mu yise e sumusoomaꞌyu. Menoꞌo yise nu besa soonamme.

Nu gi suda soonamme menoꞌo tooe nu ka mooeꞌugasoo suda mu nenuumase sapa, ka mu-matoo tubose. Nu gi haaꞌnoto suda soonamme pana menoꞌo nu oo sopedakwadoo e tubona suda mu nenuuma gi haaꞌnoto, yise ka suda-makoo mu makodyu. Nu menoꞌo besa soonamme mu ka Te Naa besa podosoo meadabena tuwazoo. Soo Te Naa suda mu sokwamana petzape ka suda mu tumatugu-kwi, oꞌno mu ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyuku manekekwusoo. Besa mu ka oo manese, numme mu netummatzaꞌe, numme ka mu-matoo tubose, mu yise tunakaꞌoedyukusoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi maneke.

Tamme yise suda sokwama ka oo sopedakwadoona ka suda manese, oosoo besaꞌyoo soo Te Naa te sootuhina te magwetzoikwu. Pana tamme ka suda sokwammana, tamme ka gi te sookwina hee-gana soo suda te sokwammana kadoo te mayugwekwu.

Mu tumaꞌemukwana suda mu masoonamme, mu yise ka suda mu manena nanekwahakwuni. Mu yise yabesoo ka suda tumatugudu nesagwikuhoo. Mu oo tzapoonne mu ka gi suda tumatugudu-matu mu ka suda tumatugudu tzasoopedya.
Nu mu-matoo tubo ka Te Naa-makoo, oꞌno mu muusoo oo tzapoonne, mu ka besa ne soobedyana. Mu ka e nakabetseana, mu e tzapoonnekute. Nu gi sukwe tuboꞌo ka suda numu manese.
Menoꞌo yise mu besa ne masokwama, mu ka Te Naa besa podo manekese. Soo Titus punnoꞌo mu-matoo besa nuumma numme yise punnoꞌo besa sokwama, ka punowsoo kodyuse.
Nu ka gisoo mu-kwitu oo tuukwena mu ka Te Naa podo meꞌa, menoꞌo mu yise ka Te Naa tzapoonnekute mu ka besa manekese. Noꞌyoona soo hee ka Titus ne tuukwena mu-kwitu togesapa.
Soo Titus besa mu soobedya mu ka e nakabetseapugana, e oedyukuna ka mumme oo tunetammakupu, ka besa oo matuguna ka oo mu-baaꞌyoopunne.
Nu besa soonamme ka besa ooosapa mu tumatugu.

Ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka Jerusalem mee naneadu-witu mu tummatzikwu-kwitu nu mu tuukwekwu. Mu nananesootuhidu numu Macedonia-witu puu besa nasootuhaꞌe, umu ka hemma tuukepana ka mu nananesootuhidu tummatzina.
Tooe unu tutuha manepana umu besa sokwama ka tu pupuaꞌamu tummatzina.
Umu ka umusoo tooe gi oo mapuaꞌapana umu ka mu umu tutuha manedu tunakaꞌoedyukudu sootummatzina, ka teepu Judea mee naneadu-kwitu.
Numme gi meeoo mu netamma. Umu puusoo ka Te Naa soobedya oo tumayohope ne soobedya-waꞌne numme tuwow tumayohokute.
Numme ka Titus yaa menoꞌo mu-matoosoo kodyu tuungu. Oosoo ka tu tumasumudoona oo mamakwuhookwu. Oosoo mooasoo umu-naga-kwitu tumasumudoo tuungu.

Mu mooasoo ooosapa besa tunakaꞌoedyukute, mu ka Te Naa sopedakwadoo mu ka oo unnepu unu oo nakabetseana. Menoꞌo yise mu ka tutuha manedu nanesootuhidu tumasumudookuse gi saaꞌa nabagapana ka penebetudooe saaꞌa oetu pebuꞌa, mu ka numme soobedyana.
Gi nuga tunetammana mu Macedonia-witu numu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo ka Te Pabeꞌe unu nesoobedyana ka oo unnepu mayohona, ka mu tutuha manedu nanesootuhidu tumasumudookuna, ka mu tummatzina.

Mooasoo mu oo sopedakwadoo ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus besa manepunne pana gi hemma tuuge ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona, pana Te Pabeꞌe te soobedyana. Oosoo yise noꞌoko tu hemma matusookwunise tamme-baa petuse, yow yise tutuha manena nabatsapu tamme-koobatoo. Oo manese tamme yise besakoo nasootuhaꞌe.
Mooasoo sumu tomokapu mu ka mu tumasumudookwu mee unnese, umu sakwa menoꞌo oo-toogoo namamakwupunne.
Oꞌno yise noꞌyoona mu numu mu sopedakwadookwu mu tookwa togesapa unakwe.
Mu ka mu mapuꞌana ka tumasumudoo-kwitoo pepuꞌana soo Te Naa besa mu-matoo soonamme. Soo Te Naa mu sopedakwadoo ka tutuha mu manepunne.

Umu Jerusalem-witu nananesootuhidu menoꞌo natummatzibu soogwipunne. Mu yise punnoꞌo sumudooe natummatzibu soogwikwu. Umu yise punnoꞌo mu tummatzikwu. Tamme yise nanahoesoo nanatummatzina, yise noꞌyoona tamme gi tutuugekwu.
A nabotugu-kwaꞌnesoo, “Oꞌno soo Te Naa mu numu makana, mu numu ka moogoo manena, tooe umu ewa tutzobase sapa gi hee penaweyakwe. Pana mu numu huutseꞌe tutzobadu gi tutuuge.”
Numme ka Titus besa sooyukwe ka Te Naa oo nesootuhaꞌe. Soo Titus ewa mu-kwitu soohane numme-waꞌneꞌyoosoo.
Numme ka Titus netutzea mu-baasoo oo nobenge tuunguna, oosoo yise yadada oosoo ka tubetse unu mu-baatoo soomeapunnena.
Sumuꞌyoo tunakabetseadu Te Pabeꞌe-witu nanesootuhi-kwitu tunedyooedu oo-noꞌyookwu. Ewaꞌyoosoo mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu manatooe ookow numu nesopedakwadoona oo nebesaꞌyookute.

Mu yaatu tunakaꞌoedyukudu oo netutzease Titus-no mana meakwutu, oꞌno umu saaꞌa ka mu tumasumudoona ka Jerusalem-witu puu hanedooa. Oꞌno mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe nananesootuhidu, yise oo sopedakwadoodooa gi numme nummesoo oo hanekwuse.
Numme gi numu numme tuakwuna petzape ka tummasumudoope ne hanese.
Numme noꞌoko numu ooka sopedakwadoopunnena petzabena numme ka kaaheno tumatuguna, soo Te Naa mooasoo ne sopedakwadoo. Ooonneꞌyoona numme umuoo unu tunakaꞌoedyukudu taꞌya.

Kummaꞌyoosoo tunakaꞌoedyukudu punnoꞌo umu-no. Numme oo netutzea oosoo ewasoo ne tzapoonnekute ka besaꞌyoona. Oosoo besa tu manena petzape. Oosoo mu-matoo tu meana besa soobedya. Oosoo ka oo tubetse oedyukuna mu besa manekekwu.

Mooasoo mu ka Titus sopedakwatoo, oosoo ka nanesootuhibu numu e tunedyooꞌe e tummatzaꞌe, mu sakwa unusoo tunakaꞌoedyuku mee numme mu soobedyana. Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu yaatu noꞌyoona nanetutzeapu, ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi nanesootuhibu tunedyooekwudu. Mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe nesootuhaꞌe umuoo tunakaꞌoedyukudu-koobatoo.
Mu sakwa besa mu numu matugu, oꞌno yise mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu manatu tooe ne sopedakwadoona mu tzapoonneku, ka mu numu besa ne soobedyana, numme togesapa ka mu nanana tuukweꞌe mu-witu.
Ka mu tutuha manedu numu Jerusalem-witu mu tummatzikwuna, nu gi oetu mu nenoyukwena mu-matoo tuboꞌo.

Nu mooasoo mu sopedakwatoo ka mu tumasumudookwuse, nu ka mooasoo mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tuukwese. Ka teepu Macedonia mee naneadu-kwitu, mooeꞌugasoo manakwanasoo mu mu tutuha manedu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tumasumudookukwu mee unakwe. Nu ka mu Macedonia-witu tunakaꞌoedyukudu meeoo tuukwena, umu punnoꞌo, ka mu tutuha manedu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tummatzikwu.
Nu umuoo nanana netutzea umu sakwa mooe tumasumudoo. Nu ka mu numu ooka mooe sopedakwatoona petzabena ka kaaheno mu-kwitu e wahana. Nu mooasoo mu namamakwupunnena mumme e waha-kwaꞌnesoo petzape.

Nu gi mu-baa menoꞌo e petugana petzape ka mu Macedonia-witu tunakaꞌoedyukudu nu-noko, ka mu tumasumudoona gisoo mu mamakwu. Nu nuusoo namanasookwikwu ka meeoo tuukwese nu mu sopedakwatoo mu besa tumatugudu mee nu mu wahase. Mu sumuna punnoꞌo nasookwikwu ka gisoo namamakwupunnena.

Nu mu naana mooe tayakwu nakobenasoo mu sakwa namabetzapepunne ka mu tumasumudoona mooe mamakwupunne, oꞌno nu ka mu-baa petugase mu saaꞌa mu tzakeadooa. Mu yise besa sokwamakwu, ka mu hanekuse. Oꞌno gi nu mu nenoyukwedu-kwaꞌne tabuakwu ka mu-baa e petugase.

Yoo manepunne. Tamme ka huutsekoo hemma pooe masuase, saaꞌa tamme huutsekoosoo yasakwu. Pana tamme ka ewow tubooe masuase, saaꞌa tamme ewow yasakwu. Ooosoo manepunne soo numu natugeana u ka nabagana huutsekoo tugease, ka saaꞌa soo Te Naa huutseꞌe-ma te sootuhikwu.
Pana tamme ka gi nabagase ka saaꞌa soo Te Naa besa te sootuhikwu. Mu sakwa noꞌyoona mu tusooyugwena nakabetsea soo Te Naa besa soonammena mu tugeana petzape, gi mu sukwe tugeana.
Soo Te Naa yise noꞌoko hemma-ma mu sootuhikwu, mu gi hemma soogwikwusoo, oꞌno mu ka mu tutuha manedu tummatzikwu.
Soo Te Naa unnepu meeoo nabotugu, “Soo Te Naa ka umu tutuha manedu sootuhikwu. Mu numu ooosapa besow oo neyugwekwu ka oo ooonnekoo soo Te Naa ooosapa tubetse besaꞌyoo.”
Soo Te Naa ka tu tupooe-ma te sootuhipunne noꞌokosoo hemma nadukadu gi te namatuukekute. Soo Te Naa nanabesasoo te sootuhikwu.

Mu tubetse besakoo nasootuhikwu ka gi nabagana, ka tutuha manedu tummatzise. Mu numu yise ka besa Te Naa sooyugwe, mu mane-koobatoo. Mu ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukuna tzapoonnekukwu, Te Pabeꞌe tamme tunetammakupu tumayohona ka besa mu numu matuguna.
Umu Jerusalem-witu numu tunakaꞌoedyukudu mu nemayuna yise mu nanesootuhikute ka besa mu tumasumudookwuse.
Numme ka Te Naa besa sooyugwe, ka Te Naa numme sootuhaꞌe ka besa ooosapa numme oo tubetse sootuhise gi numu tunenagapu.

Nu ka Te Naa besa podo mu meadabekwuna unu petzape. Ka oo mu manakwe, oꞌno yise nu gi mu nesagwikute ka mu-baa petugase. Oꞌno nu besa mu matugukwu ka Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌnesoo. Mu meeoo, “Soo Paul besa te matugu ka tamme-baaꞌyoona, pana ka tu tubokwi unu te nesagwikute ka tamme-kwingaꞌyoona.” Nu punnoꞌo mu-matu nesagwikukwu ka mu-baa petugase mu ka meeoo unnena, “Numme ka numme tu tunedyooena nummesoo gi mayohopana,” mee mu unakwe.
Numme ka teepu-koobaꞌyoona gi nummesoo ka sutakoo takone-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Numme gi pooha-gaꞌyoo, soo Te Naa puusoo unu pooha-gaꞌyoo unu natzooena. Te Naa pooha-ma numme ka sutakoo matzooekute.

Umu numme netoomooꞌoodu gi haꞌyoosoo unne-waꞌni, numme ka umu-no yadooana. Numme mu tzapoonnekute umu numu nemooagadu. Numme ka Te Naa pooha-ma mu suda unnedu nematzooekuse, umu Te Pabeꞌe nakabetseakwu.
Mu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakabetseana mee ne netamma, oꞌno mu Te Naa po ooowemota meadu makodyukukwu.

Mu tubetse tunakaꞌoedyukudu paba naneꞌyugwe. Mu ne sopedakwatoo numme unu tunakaꞌoedyukute ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi. Numme mooeꞌugasoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu mu tuukwena soo Te Pabeꞌe tu pooha-matu-ma e sootuhise nu mu tunedyooe, nu yise gi sukwe nanaꞌunakwe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo e netammana nu mu tunedyooena mu netummatzaꞌe.
Nu gi oo nasookwaꞌe ekow mumme e tuukwena.
Pana nu gi e tubo-wi mumme e nesuana petzape.
Mu-nagatu meeoo e netamma, “Oosoo Paul ka tubona, oo unnena unu natzooꞌe, pana ka numme-baaꞌyoona oo unnena gi hee.”
Pana gi! Mu ka sutakoo gi maꞌwuna, nu ka mu-baaꞌyoona nu mu ohobu nematugukwu ka e tubo-kwaꞌnesoo.

Susumudu nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu mee naneyugwedu mooasoo mu-baa petugapu, mu nemooagadu meeoo mu netamma, “Numme ka Paul ooonakwa besaꞌyoo. Numme tubetse besa Te Pabeꞌe yadooawabena.” Tooe umu, “Numme unu sokwamadu,” mee mu nanaꞌunnepana, mu gi unu sokwama. Gi too ka Te Naa-waꞌneꞌyoosoo tusooyugwedu. Umuoo gi ka Te Naa yadooawabena, gi mu-matoo natayadu. Umu numu sukwe nemooagamodu. Numme Timothy-no gi umu-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Numme ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu mu mooe tuukweꞌe, ka Te Naa besa pooha-toohakwi. Ooosapa numme nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooemo, yow numme mooeꞌugasoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu numu tunedyooekwudu.
Numme mu oedyukuna mu unusoo tunakaꞌoedyukukwu tubetse besakoo mu nakasopedakwatoo-kwitoo tooe. Oꞌno yise numme mu numu mu-kwingadutusoo tuukwemokwu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu.
Numme numu tunedyookwu ka gisoo Te Pabeꞌe-witu nakadu, gi ka kummaꞌakoosoo numu manena-ma nanaꞌunnena.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tamme-ma nanaꞌunnese oosoo yisetu, pana tamme ka tammesoo nanaꞌunnesoo, oosoo gi hee. Tamme sakwa Te Pabeꞌe-matoo suuꞌmu nanetzakwiyaꞌe.
Mu sakwa e nakapunne gi haaꞌnokosoo nusoo-nawitu mu tuukwe.
Nu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu mu tuukwese, nu yise ka mu besaꞌyookwuna petzape mu ka oo-matoo meakwuse, soo Te Naa punnoꞌo. Mu sakwa ooosapa gi tootsaba-gana ka Te Naa-baa petuga.
Ka nagutza mooeꞌugasoo soo Sutaꞌyoo togogwa ka mooe namadabuepu mogoꞌne, Eve mee naneadu, nemooagapu. Soo Sutaꞌyoo sumuna ka Te Naa besa po oeꞌmoota mu yugwe.
