Mu ooosapa ka mumme nemooagadu besa nakabetsea umu kummaꞌakoosoo Te Pabeꞌe-witu te tuukwekwu, kummaꞌakoosoo poohabe, tooetoo kummaꞌakoosoo naꞌunnedu ka Te Naa-maꞌyoo kemmadu mee unnena. Umuoo numu mee unnena, “Numme yow ka Te Naa tubetse nanayadooawabe,” pana umuoo gi. Umu numu nemooaga, sukweapu Te Naa yadooawabe mee naneyugwena. Oosoo Sutaꞌyoo numu nemooagadu mee naneadu punnoꞌo mee naneꞌyugwe, Te Naa tummatzidu mu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo meeꞌe, ooonneꞌyooona umu numu Sutakoo nakabetseadu. Umu numme-waꞌnesoo, manakwe mee naneꞌyugwe. Pana gi toge manakwe, mu tunemooagana umu-matoosoo kodyukwu. Gi saaꞌa umu-ma nakatzabepana. Nu punnoꞌo besaꞌyoo gi umuoo numu-waꞌne. Nu sumuna gi besa hemma nemadabuewunudu, pana nu oo sopedakwadoo ka pukwitu e nehanena. Numme mooasoo ekow mu tzapoonnekute. Mu meeoo, nu Paul ka sumuna maꞌemukwa. Nu ka gi mu tunekwina ka mu nanesootuhi tunedyooena. Susumudu mu-matoo e nesootzemana mee unakwe, “Soo Paul tookwa gi ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi te tunedyooe, ooonneꞌyoona oosoo gi te tunekwaꞌe tooe ka nanesootuhibu te tunedyooepana.” Oosoo togesapa nu gi hemma nuusoo hee-gaꞌyoo, nu ka nuusoo nakoobatoo manena. Nu ka mu kukummaꞌakoosoo tunakaꞌoedyukudu hemma natuungu, nu ka gi mumme nuka tummatzikwuna petzabena. Oꞌno sakwa nu mu netummatzi gi suda mu nesokwama. Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka teepu Macedonia-wiꞌyoona tu tumasumudoopu nu-baa hanepetu. Gi haga mumme teepu Achaia mee naneadu-koobatu mee unne-waꞌneꞌyoo nu hemma mu-makoo hane. Mu sumuna meeoo sokwama, “Soo Paul gi te petzabedu-kwaꞌne, oosoo puu gi te tunekwaꞌe.” Pana gi! Nu unu mu soobedya. Te Naa e sopedakwadoo nu mu soobedya. Nu ooosapa mu tuukwenokwu, nu kaaheno manenokwu nu ka mu sootzapoonnekuna umu sutaꞌyoo yadooawabe gi nu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Umu puu ooosapa hemma mu-makoo natuunguyakwe, pana nu gi hemma mu natuungudu.
Mu sakwa gi meeoo e netammapana, “Soo Paul gi soonamme,” pana mu sakwa e nakapunne, oꞌno nu mu tuukwekwu, nu besaꞌyoo gi ka mu susumudu-kwaꞌneꞌyoosoo.
Nu tookwa neꞌemukwa ka nanaꞌunnena soo Te Pabeꞌe Pooha puu gi meeoo naꞌunakwe.
Pana yise umu Sutaꞌyoo nayadooawabe puu nanaꞌunakwe numu-waꞌnesoo, nu sakwa nuusoo nawitu gi haaꞌnoto wahahoo.
Mu ooosapa mumme nemooagadu nakabetseꞌa mu ka unu sokwama mee nanatukwena.
Tooe umu suda mu matuguse sapa, umu mu nemooagana, gi mu heesoobedya, pana mu tooesoo mu nakabetsea.
Mu sumuna meeoo sokwama numme sakwa umu-waꞌnesoo nidyapu. Pana gi! Nu gi nidyupu. Nu umu mu nemooagadu ooonakwa besaꞌyoo.
Umu naanaꞌunnena, “Numme tubetse Jew numu Abraham-maꞌyoona suaketu.” Nu punnoꞌo Jew numu, umu-waꞌnesoo. Nu punnoꞌo togesapa Abraham-maꞌyoona suaketu.

Umu meeoo naneyugwe, “Numme ka Te Pabeꞌe besa yadooawabe.” Nu punnoꞌo yadooawabe ooonakwasoo besaꞌyoo. (Nu tookwa gi besa tusooyukwe ka meeoo unnena.) Nu umuoo ooonakwasoo nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooe. Nu ewasoo nakwutumapu unu nuupageta, ewasoo natsasoopedya, yaꞌe sakwa mee nasoobedyana ka Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo.
Manege tooe mu Jew numu tubetse unutseꞌe tooe e wupageta.
Pahe tooe mu Roman numu punnoꞌo hooope-ma e moomooedyakwe, sumu tupe-ma e tatapagetu. Pahe tooe soo e sake patatzopapunne, nu yise sumu tabeno, sumu togano, ka baa-kooba patadyotsenummeyakwe.

Nu ooosapa manatooe nummenummedu. Nu sakwa sumuna batadyaꞌe, mu tuduhadu sumuna e wutzagakwu. Umu nugasoo nanumu mu Jew numu sakwa sumuna e batsapu. Mu gi Jew numu punnoꞌo. Tooe hanoꞌyoona tooe uga sumuna nu nabatsapu mana tubewabe-kwitoo, tooetoo mana baa-koobatoo tuwazoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo. Umu tunakaꞌoedyukudu mee naneyugwedu punnoꞌo e wohoꞌne.
Nu ewasoo gi uwedu ka ewa hemma howyugweduna. Nu tsuayaena unu budyaꞌe ka ewasoo gi tukapu-gana. Ewasoo nu tooꞌe sudyaꞌeyakwe ka gi ewow nagaꞌapu-gana.
Pana nu yise noꞌoko mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu manatu tooe mooe soohaneyakwe.
Nu umu gisoo unu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-kwitu soohane. Umu tumaꞌemukwadu-kwitu tuwazoo nu soohane.
Ka nanaꞌunnena nu sakwa nanaꞌunne ka gi natzooena.
Soo Te Naa oo sopedakwatoo ka gi e esayaꞌedu. Oosoo ka Te Pabeꞌe Naa, tamme sakwa ooosapa meeoo unneyi, “Te Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo.”
Nu ka Damascus-wiꞌyoona soo numu
Pana soo Te Naa e magwetzoi, nu ka tupe koodea-wiꞌyoona kawona-kwikoo natzakweku, oꞌno namatzatzeboa.
Oosoo gi hemma tummatzaꞌe soo numu nanaꞌunnena, pana nu mu tuukwenokwu e tuusobedya-witu, e nosepu-witu ka Te Pabeꞌe-makoo.
Ewasoo tomogapu e nosepu nu toogoopatoo nabika Te Naa-matoo.
Sumunaga e moogooa suuꞌmu mea, howga nagutza e tookoo punnoꞌo, nu gi oo sopedakwatoo, Te Naa suuꞌmu.
Onona nu nanabesow hemma poonne gi hownnekoo oo waha-waꞌneꞌyoo ka Te Naa meeoo nuka netamma.
Nu ewa hemma mesoo wahapana, nu sakwa gi oo-ma nanaꞌunnepana. Nu sakwa ka nugasoo gi natzooena waha.
Tooe nu nuusoo nawitu mu tuukwese, nu gi mu nemooaga, nu ka kaaheno nawitu wahana. Nu gi hemma e nose-witu mu tuukwe, nu ka gisoo nanaꞌunnena.
Nu hemma nagea nuka matzamakwudu tonobe numu tookoo wuma-kwaꞌne. Soo Sutaꞌyoo oo e matabue. Oꞌno nu hee mee nasooyugwe, tooe nu besa nosepu-gase sapa.
Pahe tooe nu ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo nanesootuhiyakwe oo tooꞌe nematzagakwunina.

Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo e netammayakwe, “U ka tuꞌoebuna nasootuhipu, oꞌno u gi numu ooonakwa besa nasooyugwedu.” Nu oo besaꞌyookute ka nuka u tuoeba-makapu, oꞌno nu gi paba nasooyugwe. Nu sakwa unusoo nanaꞌunne ka gi e natzooe-ma, oꞌno soo Te Naa pooha unusoo nu-nagaꞌyookwu.

Ooonneꞌyoona nu besa soonamme, tooe mu numu e tumooꞌoopana. Nu besa soonamme, tooe ka mu numu nuka nesootzemapana, nu ka nuusoo sopedakwadoo o soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe-no ooosapa nu-noꞌyookwu gi e matusookwunaꞌe.
Uune! Nasootzamedu-waꞌne, nu tabuꞌa ka nawitu wahana. Mu sakwa mu numu tuukwe nu togesapa Te Naa nayadooawabe.
Nu mu tzapoonnekute nu togesapa Te Naa nayadooawabe, nu ka nanasookwugi tumadise, ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi. Tooe hee sutaꞌyoo nu-tamme kemmapu nu ooosapa gi nanasookwugi.
Mu punnoꞌo nasootuhi ka mu susumudu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-kwaꞌne besa nasootuhi pana mumme nu gi oe tunnekwaꞌe. Ooonneꞌyoopana mu ka sumuna ne nesagwaꞌekute ka oo ne manakwe, mu suda ne matuku.

Pudusoo nu mu-baa petugakwu. Numme mooasoo waha mu-baa nobengeyakwe, e-no yise pahe manekwu ka mu-baa ne nobengekwuna. Pana numme gi mu tunnekwaꞌe. Numme ka Te Naa besa podo mu meakwuna suuꞌmu soogwaꞌepunne. Mu dooake puu gi ka tu naanapuaꞌamu tummatzi pana mu naanapuaꞌamu tu dooamu ooosapa tummatzi. Mu puu nuga dooamu-waꞌnesoo nuumma.
Nu besa soonammena tooe hownnekoo tooe mu tummatzinoꞌo, oꞌno mu namagwetzoikwu. Meeoo nuumma, nu nanaꞌunusoo mu soobedyakena pana mu gi e petsabedu-kwaꞌne manakwe. Mu sakwa unusoo e soobedyana besa.
Mu meeoo e sooyugwe, “Tooꞌe soo Paul gi ne natumanakakuna natuungupana oosoo ne watze wumooaga.” Pana gi!
Mu ne tutayayina punnoꞌo gi ne natumanakaku tuungu.
Soo Titus ka sumuoo tunakaꞌoedyukudu punoꞌyoodu-no puu gi ne natumunagaku tuungu. Umu nu-kwaꞌnesoo gi hemma natuungu.

Nu gi mu-kobenaꞌyoona numme-koobatoosoo yadooana meeoo unakwe. Numme meeoo mu tuukweꞌe soo Te Naa ka oo sopedakwatoona numme kaahenoꞌyoo. Ka Te Pabeꞌe pooha-toohakwi numme meeoo mu tuukwe. Numme mu tummatzina meeoo unakwe, oꞌno yise mu nanatummatzina ka Te Naa besa podo ooosapa meakwu.

Ka mu-baa e petugase mu sumuna gisoo besa manepunnekwu. Mu sumuna nanano togesoo nanahaꞌa, nanakwohonena, nanasutakuna, mu suuꞌmu mee nasooyugwena, nananewohonena, nananesootzemana, sumuna gi nananoꞌyoona.
Sumuna mu-matu togesoo gisoo nanekwaha ka nanasuda manekese sapa. Nu gi oo mu manekwuna petzape. Nu sumuna suda mu-ma nuummakwu ka mu ooonnekoo.

Nu saaꞌa mu tunetammakudooa. Mooasoo nu mu tuukwepu ka nakwi mu-baaꞌyoona, mu sakwa yise gi suda manepana. Ka penakwa mu-baa petugase, nu mu nemadabuekwu a nabotugu-kwaꞌnesoo, “Ka waahoo numu suda tumatuguna poonnedusoo nawaꞌnesoo mu unnesesoo nu mu nemadabuekwu,” mee nu mu tooꞌe tuukwe.

Menoꞌo yise nu ookowsoo mu tuukwekwusoo, nu mu-naga-kwitu nesagwikukwu mu tumaꞌemukwadu, oꞌno mu e sopedakwadoo nu ka Te Pabeꞌe Pooha-toohakwi yadooana mee unakwe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe unu pooha-gaꞌyoo gi namatzooeku-waꞌneꞌyoo.

Oosoo gi natzooedu-kwaꞌne nanasoobedya nabatsase, pana soo Te Naa Pooha yise ka oo yaꞌese oo mayodake. Numme punnoꞌo gi how mane-waꞌne tabuꞌa, oo-waꞌnesoo. Numme ka mu-baa petugase, numme ka Te Naa pooha-toohakwi ka Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌnesoo, ka Te Naa-tamme mu neyugwekwu.

Mu nuga manena nesootzemadyakwe, mu sakwa mummesoo manena soomayumo. Howꞌoo haaꞌa mu togesapa Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu? Mu sakwa muusoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu sopedakwatoo, sumuna too mu gi.
Numme ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu mu tuukwepu ooonneꞌyoona mu ne sopedakwadoo petugakwu ka Te Pabeꞌe tubetse nayadooawabena.
Numme ka Te Naa-matoo mu nanesootuhiku mu gi suda tumatugupana, numme ka besa mu manekwuna petzape tooe hayoo mumme mu netamma sapa.
Numme ka Te Naa besa podo mu meanona petzape.

Oꞌno numme besa sokwamakwu ka besa mu tumatuguna, besa Te Naa mu oedyukute. Numme ka Te Naa besa podo mu meakwunasoo petzape tooe mu gi maawaꞌneꞌyoo mee numme mu soobedya sapa. Numme mu nanesootuhikute mu sakwa besasoo.
Nu menoꞌo mu-matoo tuboꞌo, oꞌno nu saaꞌa ka mu-baa petugase nu gi unu mu nesagwikukwu. Soo Te Naa Tu Pooha-matu-ma e sootuhi mumme e tummatzi tuunguna.

E nanumu, mu sakwa besa sokwamana, mu sakwa e nakabetsease ka Te Naa besa po-witoosoo kodyu. Mu sakwa mu sokwamana sumusoo mayugwese, oꞌno soo Te Naa mu-noꞌyookwu. Soo Te Naa ka te matabuepuna, ooonneꞌyoona te soobedya.
Mu ka nanapuaꞌamudoosesoo, oꞌno mu nananoꞌyookwu.
Noꞌyoona mu yaatuoo tunakaꞌoedyukudu ooosapa mu nemaya.
Numme meeoo mu nanesootuhikute soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus mu sootuhina soo Te Naa besa nanasoobedya mu matabuena mu noꞌyoona ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi sumusoo manepunne.

Nu Paul mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu nu-baatu-no tuboꞌo ka teepu, Galatia mee naneadu-koobatu noꞌoko tooe hanotu tooe mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-matoo. Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe-no sakwa mu sootuhi, ka numme mu nanesootuhikute. Ka oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe-no meeoo tunetamma soo Te Pabeꞌe ka suda te tumatuguduna te nemawunise te magwetzoikwu yaa eka teepu-koobatu. Ooonneꞌyoona soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsapu. Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe oo yaꞌe-kwikoo oo miyoda. Soo Te Naa ka ꞌyoo manese sakwa ooosapa nanesookwugi. Tamme sakwa ooosapa meeoo nanatuukwe. “Soo Te Naa ooosapa tubetse besaꞌyoo.” Umu, Te Naa-no Te Pabeꞌe, meeoo e netamma, “Noꞌoko meeoo mu numu tuukwe.” Gi sukwe numu, meeoo mumme e tuukwe tuungu.

Soo Te Naa mu tuukwe ka besa tu unnena ka mu sootuhina ka Te Pabeꞌe nabatsa-koobatoo, gi ka hemma how mu yugwe-koobatoo. Mu yise ka besa naꞌunnedu nakaꞌoedyukute. Nu gi besa soonamme ka menoꞌo mu ka atasoo naꞌunnedu nakaꞌoedyukuna, besa naꞌunnedu mee mu oo nemadabuena.
Pana ooosoo gi besa naꞌunnedu, mu numu mu nemooaga, umuoo ka Te Naa besa unnena atasoo naneyugwena, mu yise yabesoo oo nakaꞌoedyukute.

Mooasoo numme mu tuukwe ka Te Naa besa unnepu mu yise oo nakaꞌoedyukute. Mu numu ka atasoo mu tuukwena soo gi besa mu tumatuguna saaꞌa umu-matoosoo kodyukwu. Ka tooe haga tooe numu, numme, tooetoo mu toha kakasa-gakoo, ka atasoo naꞌunnedu mu tuukwe soo Te Naa sakwa gi mu sootuhipana. Ookowsoo nu menoꞌo mu tuukwe. Soo Te Naa gi ooosapa mu sootuhi-waꞌneꞌyoo ka mu numu atasoo naꞌunnedu mumme tuukweꞌe, mu ka oo nakaꞌoedyukuna.
Mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu meeoo, “Soo Paul sukwe numu unnena mu tuukweꞌe besa numu sukwe nesokwamakuna.” Nu mu tuukwekwu, nu gi sukwe numu nakabetseꞌa, nu Te Naa suuꞌmu nakabetseꞌa.
Nu gi sukwe numu unnepu mu tuukweꞌe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Gi haga e tunedyooe ka Te Naa unnepu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus pooha ookow e tunedyooepu.

Mu mooasoo ka oꞌnosoo e sopedakwadoo. Nu ka mu Jew numu tumayohopu nagedu, mu Jew numu nu-noꞌosoo tomopu ooonakwa, nu unu tumayoho. Nu ka mu Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu kusedyana, kadooꞌoo mu tooꞌe mayugwena.
Oꞌno nu gisoo oo sopedakwatoona nu ka gisoo nadooaꞌadoona soo Te Naa e tuutzeapu oo nakaꞌoedyukukwu mee e soopedyana, oosoo ka e sootuhikwuse. Oosoo yise e sootuhi.
Oꞌno yise soo Te Naa oetu soohanese ka e tzapoonnekute ka Jesus Te Pabeꞌe. Oosoo e pooha sootuhise, nu ka mu gi Jew numu ka besa oo unnepu tuukwe.

Oosoo ooka e wahakwuna e poohasootuhi nu yise gi Jerusalem-witoo meꞌa umu mooasoo numu moohedu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-nagatu gi hemmasoo e tunedyooe-waꞌneꞌyoo. Nu kwingaꞌa mea mu numu-baaꞌyoona ka Arabia mee naneadu teepu-koobatoo. Onoꞌyoona soo Te Naa pooha ka oo unnepu e tunedyooꞌe. Oꞌno yise ka saaꞌa nu kodyuka ka Damascus mee naneadu-kwitoo.
Pahe tomose, nu ka Peter nobeꞌnge, nu ka oo sootapoegeana. Waha nasateba-wi nu oo-baa nobeꞌnge.
O nu ka Te Pabeꞌe wanngaꞌa tapoegea James mee naneadu. Ewow ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu moohedu-nagatu, nu gi tapoegeꞌa.
Soo Te Naa oo sopedakwatoo nu togesapa mu tuukweꞌe. Umuoo gi e tunedyooꞌe mumme e tuukwekwuna.
Oꞌno yise mu Syria noko Cilicia mee naneadu teepu-koobatoo nu mea.
Mu Jew numu Judea-witu Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi e sopedakwatoo.
Umu nu-kwitu sukwe nakadu, “Soo Paul te netumooꞌoodu kadoo te tooꞌe mayugwese, menoꞌo yise mu numu tunakaꞌoedyuku tuungu.”
Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka Te Naa nesootuhikwu, ka Paul atasoo manese.

Sumumano watsu matsebuekudu (14) tomokapu soo Te Naa Jerusalem-witoo umu-matoo e taꞌyase. Pana umu Te Pabeꞌe-matoo nanesootuhidu mee naneyugwedu mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-baa watse tzoonooase, umu-nagakwi manepunne. Umu oo sopedakwatoo numme tunakaꞌoedyukudu mesoo wunaꞌme numme ka gi mu Jew numu tumayohokuna nagena oo-ma namagwetzoina. Soo Te Pabeꞌe suuꞌmu te magwetzoikwu. Umu ka pumme tumayoho-kwitoo ne soonoyugwena, umu gi te sukwe manaꞌwena petzape. Nu Paul, Barnabas, Titus-no Jerusalem-wi petugonnoga ka saaꞌa mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu mooheduno watse tunehane. “Nu ooosapa mu tuukweꞌe mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka umu gi Jew numu-nagatu umu sakwa gi Jew numu manepana, ka mu tumayohona gi nagepana. Sumuna menoꞌo mu papabeꞌe e unnena sooꞌoedyukute,” mee nu soonamme. Pana gi! Soo Titus puu gi Jew nana umu gi haꞌyoo oo netamma.
Numme gi mu numu nemooagadu nakabetsea. Numme ka Te Naa unnepu kaaheno mu tuukweꞌe.
Ka mu numu, “Numme moohedu,” mee naneyugwedu, nu gi mu tubetse sopedakwatoo. Soo Te Naa suuꞌmu mu numu manena sopedakwatoo, soo Te Naa gi mu manena watzekute.
Umu puu gi hemma nuka tunedyooe. Umu ka Peter noko e sopedakwatoo numme nawaꞌneꞌyoosoo.
Soo Te Naa tu pooha-matu-ma ka Peter sootuhipu mu Jew oo tunedyooe tuunguna, nuka tuwazoo sootuhipu ka mu gi Jew numu e tunedyooe tuunguna.

Umu mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu moohedu James, Peter, John mee netamma mu oo nakasopedakwatoo ka ooonnekoo Te Naa numme Barnabas-noko pooha sootuhipu. Numme nanamitzadyaꞌme ka nanapuaꞌana numme noꞌyoona meeoo unakwe umu paheꞌyoo James, Peter, John-no sakwa mu Jew numu tunedyooe, numme punnoꞌo mu gi Jew numu tunedyooekwu.

Mee umu ne netamma, “Tamme sakwa noꞌoko mu nananesootuhidu-no mu tutuha manedu numu tummatzi.” Nu tubetse unu oo e manekwuna soogwaꞌe. Oꞌno numme yise Barnabas, Titus-no punowsoo Antioch-witoo kodyukakwu.

Ka saaꞌa soo Peter Antioch-wi petuga. Noꞌyoona numme tunakaꞌoedyukudu mu Jew-nagatu yise mu gi Jew numu tuwazoo nanano tukayakwe. Soo James huuhoo Jew nanana numme-matoo taya. Umu ka petuse, gi ka mu gi Jew numu-no netuka, umu ka gi mu Jew numu tumayohope mayohona. Soo Peter yise nasookwise gi umu gi Jew numu-no tuka mani. Mu otuoo mu Jew numu, Barnabas tooe punnoꞌo gi umu-no tuka mani. Nu yise ka Peter nesagwikute oosoo ka suda tumatuguna.

Soo Peter gi ka Te Naa kaaheno tumayohokute. Oosoo ka Te Naa togesapa unnena gi nakaheesoobedya. Nu noꞌoko numu nakana ka Peter meeoo netamma, “U mow Jew nana. Menoꞌo maneka u uusoo gi mu Jew tumayohokute. U yise menoꞌo mu gi Jew numu ka Jew tumayohope nage tuungu. U tubetse unu maꞌemukwa.”
Numme Jew numu ka gi Jew numu tumaꞌemukwadu mee neꞌa umu ka gi te tumayohona nagena. Numme ooosapa Jew numu.

Numme oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa ne sootuhise, numme oo dooamu mane, numme oo nakaꞌoedyukuna ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-wi gi numme ka mu Jew tumayohona nakabetseana. Soo Te Naa numu sootuhi gi ka mu Jew tumayohope-koobatoosoo suuꞌmu.

Umu numu nemooagadu meeoo te netamma, “Mu ka Te Pabeꞌe suuꞌmu oedyukute oosoo mu magwetzoi pana mu gi mu Jew tumayohope nakabetsea. Mu yise suda tumaduku.” Pana gi! Soo Te Pabeꞌe gi suda te mane tuungu.
Nu mu numu meeoo netammagena, “Gi ka mu Jew tumayohona oedyukupana.” Nu sakwa ka oꞌnosoo ka Jew tumayohope-witoosoo kodyuse, oꞌno yise nu uga unu tumaꞌemukwakwu.

Soo mu Jew tumayohope meeoo e netamma nu sakwa yaꞌe ka suda tumaꞌemukwana. Nu sakwa uga nabatsa gisoo soo Te Pabeꞌe nu-koobatoo nabatsa. Pana nu yise namagwetzoaꞌe. Menoꞌo nu gi ka te nanamooatupu tumayohope nakabetsea-waꞌneꞌyoo ka Te Naa suuꞌmu nu nakabetseakwu. Nu namagwetzoaꞌe ka Te Naa Tooaꞌa-wi nu tunakaꞌoedyukuna pana ne nanamooatupu tumayohope gi e magwetzoaꞌe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe nu-koobatoo nabatsapu, oosoo e tunemadabuekute. Oosoo e soobedyana nu-koobatoo nabatsapu.

Nu sakwa uga ka besaꞌyoona ka mu Jew numu tumayohona nakabetseana soo Te Pabeꞌe sakwa gi nu-koobatoo nabatsapu. Pana oosoo gi oo manepunne. Nu oo sopedakwatoona nu ka Te Pabeꞌe soogwaꞌe nu-koobatoo nabatsakwudu.
Mu numu Galatia-witu, gi toge tusoohane. Mu ka sumuna napoohapu-gana mu gi kaaheno besa tusooyugwe. Mu uga toge-kwitu ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo oo nabatsana sopedakwatoona. Pana menoꞌo mu gi.
Ewetuoo soohane. Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa mumme tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma mu sootuhise ka pumme mu nakaꞌoedyukute, gi ka mu Jew numu tumayohona mu nakabetsea.
Menoꞌo yise mu gi toge tusoohane. Mooasoo uga mu ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-ma nasootuhipu. Menoꞌo yise mu muusoo besa tooꞌe tumatugu, gi ka Te Naa Pooha soomayuna.
Mu ka sumuna oo soomuꞌwa noꞌoko mu manaꞌwena ka tutuha manena ka besow mu mayupu.
Mu ka sumuna gi oo natunedyooꞌe tooe how tooe suda manaꞌwepana. Soo Te Naa nanasookwugi mu pooha sootuhi ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna gi ka mu Jew numu tumayohope mu nage-kwitoo.

Mu Jew numu numu nemooagadu meeoo, “Tamme Te Naa doodooamu togesapa tamme ka Abraham-maꞌyoona tsuagetu. Numme ookow Te Naa tunetammakuna nagedu.” Ooonneꞌyoopana umu gi. Oꞌnosoo ka Abraham-witu meeoo natubotugupu, “Soo Te Naa meeoo, ‘Abraham besaꞌyoo,’ soo Abraham ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukuna.”
Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu yise ka Abraham-nakwana tubetse tsuagetu. Umu oo-waꞌnesoo ka Te Naa-witu nakaꞌoedyukute. Ookow soo Te Naa te tunetammakute.
Meeoo tuwazoo ka oꞌnosoo naboꞌo soo Te Naa ka Abraham besa netamma, “Saaꞌa nu noꞌobatusoo numu sootuhikwu umu ka u-kwaꞌnesoo tusooyugwena ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukute tuwazoo.”
Umuoo tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka Abraham-waꞌneꞌyoosoo, tubetse tunakaꞌoedyukute. Umuoo ooonnekoo soo Te Naa besa sootuhaꞌe.
Umu Jew numu tumayohona nagedu gi nasootuhikwu. Oꞌnosoo meeoo nabotugu, “Soo Te Naa gi mu numu sootuhikwu umu ka gi ka a nabotuguna mayohona.”

Mu numu ka tumayohope nagedu soo Te Naa gi sootuhikwu umu ka noꞌoko gi mayoho-waꞌneꞌyoona, ka mu ewow. Pana umu Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu nasootuhikwu. Esoo oꞌnosoo Te Naa tunemadabuena a nabotuguna mu numu namagwetzoikwu, umu ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe nanasootuhi namadabuepunne tamme-koobatoo oosoo ka puu gi nasootuhipuna. Oo oosoo nabotugu, “Soo numu puu ka sunngabe-ma natzakwenese, ka yaꞌese gi nasootuhikwu.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌobatusoo numu-koobatoo nabatsapu. Menoꞌo yise noꞌobatusoo nasootuhikwu ka Abraham nasootuhi-kwaꞌnesoo. Oꞌno yise soo Te Naa noꞌoko tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma te sootuhikwu, tamme tu netamma-kwaꞌnesoo, tamme ka noꞌyoona Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna.
E nanumu, soo numu ka nanano tunemadabuese, oo botuguse, gi haga umu-matu ka a naꞌunnena atasoo yugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa unnepu ooonneꞌyoo, soo Te Naa gi atasoo oo yugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.

Soo Te Naa ka Abraham meeoo netamma, “Nu oo sootuhikwu sumuoo u-maꞌyoona suagetu gi noꞌoko.” Mee naꞌunakwe, “Sumuꞌyoosoo u-maꞌyoo tsuagetu.” Oosoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu wahakwu. Mooasoo soo Te Naa ka tu unnena tugukepu.
Ewasoo (430) tomokapu mu Jew numu ka tumayohope, natuukwepuna. Umuoo tumayohope ka Te Naa unnena ka Abraham-tamme gi atasoo naneyugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Mu numu nemooagadu meeoo unakwe, “Soo Te Naa meeoo mu numu Jew numu tumayohope nagedu suuꞌmu nasootuhikwu.” Pana gi! Soo Te Naa ka Abraham meeoo netamma, “Nu mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu sootuhikwu.”

Soo Te Naa puusoo meeoo ka Abraham netamma, “Nu mu sootuhikwu ka nuka mu nakaꞌoedyukute.” Ka nagutza mooeꞌugasoo mu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo suuꞌmu ka mu Jew numu tumayohope ka yadooawabe tunetammakupu, oosoo yadooawabe yise ka mu numu ooka tu tunetammakupu mu nage tuungu. Soo Jew tumayohope gi ka Te Naa unnepu netumooꞌoo. Ka gisoo Te Pabeꞌe petu, soo Te Naa mu Jew tumayohopu-too numu mabetsea. Umu-makoo oosoo te mooe tunedyooꞌe. Soo umuoo tumatugu-toohakwi gi numu namagwetzoidu. Mu numu ooosapa suda tumatugutu yaa teepu-koobatu a nabotugu-waꞌneꞌyoosoo. Soo mu Jew tumayohope gi numu besa mayugwedu. Soo numu besa namayugwekwu ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus nakaꞌoedyukuna.
Mooasoo yise soo Te Pabeꞌe namanumudoopu tamme ooweoo tunakaꞌoedyukute. Gi tamme ka te tumayohope soogwaꞌe.
Mu ka Te Pabeꞌe besa nakaꞌoedyukuna. Mu ka baa-wi namatzakase Te Naa doodooamu mane. Oꞌno yise mu ka Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌneꞌyookwu.

Tamme noꞌyoona ka Te Naa-nakwana nanakwaꞌneꞌyoo: Mu Jew numu ka mu gi Jew numu, mu unu hemma howyugwedu umu gi hemma howyugwedu noꞌokosoo, mu nanana mu momokoꞌne-no, noꞌyoona ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna nanawaꞌneꞌyoo.
Tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe wangaꞌana tamme ka Abraham-maꞌyoona tubetse tsuagetu. Soo Te Naa yise noꞌoko te sootuhikwu ka Abraham sootuhi-kwaꞌnesoo.

Ka gisoo Te Pabeꞌe petu numme ka mu Jew numu tumayohona nakabetseadu, tuhaꞌa-kwaꞌne, oosoo puu ka hemma pumme mabetseadu nakabetsea. Soo numu puu ka yaꞌese, ka tu tooa togesoo tuhaꞌakoo, soo oo tooaꞌa ka tu naa hemma, oo tumawugana heedooꞌa,
pana togesoo oosoo ka pumme mabetseadu nakabetseꞌa, ka saaꞌa puusoo namabetsea mane. Oo naa meeoo tunetamma ka oo tomona oe manepetuse.
Ka oꞌnosoo tamme ookow tuhaꞌa-kwaꞌne tamme ka numu tumayohope-too meaꞌa.
Ka hemma toge-kwi mani petuse, soo Te Naa ka Tu Besaa Tooaꞌa ka eka teepu-koobatoo manumudoose, oosoo yise Jew numu mane ka tu nanumu tumayohona oo nage tuungu.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tamme Jew numu tumayohodu magwetzoise tamme yise Te Naa doodooamu mayugwe, tamme ka oo nakaꞌoedyukuse.
Tamme ka Te Naa doodooamuna oosoo ka tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma te sootuhi. Menoꞌo yise tamme Te Naa mee oo natubanga.
Te tumayohope uga te tsitugu menoꞌo yise tamme ookow gi tumayohope-gaꞌyoo. Tamme yise Te Naa tunetammatoo manemokwu oosoo yise te doodooamu-gakwu noꞌoko te sootuhikwu.
Mu uga gi Te Naa sopedakwadoo. Mu nanesootuhiyakwe tooe hemmatoo tooe mu yise oo nakabetseaꞌa, gi ka Te Naa-matoo.
Menoꞌo yise mu Te Naa sopedakwatoo. Soo Te Naa mooasoo mu sopedakwatoo. Gi yise ka yaa teepu-koobatu poohabe nakabetseapana. Umuoo gi te magwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Mu uga tooe how tooe manakwe pana menoꞌo mu ka tooe how tooe mu manena tabeba-gakute mu Jew numu-waꞌnesoo.
Mu ka sumuna gi a nakasopedakwadoo ka nuga unnena, mu ka gi e nakaꞌoedyukuna.
Nu ka mu-baaꞌyoona nu mu-kwaꞌnesoo manepetu nu punnoꞌo gi Jew tumayohope mayoho. Menoꞌo yise mu punnoꞌo sakwa nu-kwaꞌnesoo mane, gi Jew tumayohope mayohopana. Mu ooosapa besa e matugudu.
Mu oo sopedakwatoo nu ka mu-baa petuse, mu tunedyooꞌe tuoeyipana.
Mu gi e matusookwunaꞌe ka e tuoeyaꞌe, tooe mumme e nematzama sapa. Mu besa e matugu, ka toha kasa-gakoo tooetoo ka Te Pabeꞌe mu matugu-kwaꞌne.
Ka nu-toogoo tubetse besaꞌyoona mu uga ka mu pooe mesoo tzayubowse yise e mesoo hemeookwu. Menoꞌo yise mu atasoo nuummatugu.
Nu ka kaahenotu mu tooꞌe tunedyooe mu yise ooweoo e sookwohoꞌne.
Mu numu nemooagadu besa mu matugu, pana umu te tapoka, ka mu soohee-gana. Umu numme mu nagena gi petzape, oꞌno yise umuoo nagekoo mee sokwamana.
Oosoo besaꞌyoo ka numu besa mumme matugu, pana umu sakwa ooosapa besa mu tumatuguku, gi nuka onoko suuꞌmu.
E nanumu, nu suda mu soonammekuna, gi besa nuumma, mu ka gi besa manena. Nu mu suuꞌmu soomayu nu ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme mu tooꞌe soomawunise.
Mu ka oo soonakabetseana, ka mu Jew numu tumayohona ka Moses tubotuguna, mu gi oo nakasopedakwatoo.
Ka Abraham, waahoo nodukwa-ga-kwitu wahadu. Sarah noko oo tummatziwabe Hagar mee nananeadu.

Soo Sarah naatse tooaꞌadoona mooasoo natuukwepu soo Te Naa tu pooha-toohakwi meeoo oo netammana naatse tooaꞌagakwu soo Sarah yise oo nakaꞌoedyukuna. Soo Hagar yise punnoꞌo tooaꞌatoo mogoꞌne tooaꞌadoo tabua-kwaꞌnesoo.
Esoo nanatuukwepu te tuukwe ka menoꞌo hemma manepunnena. Soo numu tummatzidu mogoꞌne ka giba Sinai mee naneadu-kumaba nobe-gaꞌyoo.

Ooweꞌyoona soo Jew numu tumayohope mooe nawaha. Mu Jew numu pummesoo tumayohope nakabetseadu ka numu tummatzidu mogoꞌne-waꞌneꞌyoo. Umuoo numu nedyaweda, ooosapa pummesoo tumayohope nakabetseana. Soo Sarah puusoo mane-gaꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa oo sootuhi ka pumme oo nakaꞌoedyukute. Tamme Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu oo-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna soo Te Naa te sootuhaꞌe.

Mu Jew numu meeoo sokwama, “Soo Jerusalem besaꞌyoo, besa pukwi nanobe-gaꞌyoo.” Tamme nobe ka Te Naa-baa, o yise tubetse Jerusalem. Mu Jew numu uga ewatseꞌyoo, tamme yise Te Naa doodooamu ewasoo manemena,

tamme-witu a nabotugu-kwaꞌnesoo. “Umu Te Naa doodooamu sakwa ooosapa besa sokwamana ka Te Naa ooosapa nesookwugino. Oꞌnosoo umu gi ka Te Naa sopedakwatoo pana menoꞌo soo Te Naa tu doodooamu mu mayugwemena. Soo Te Naa umuoo tu doodooamu ka mu Jew numu Jerusalem-wi nonobe-gakoo ooonakwa unusoo sootuhi.” Ekow mogoꞌne doodooamu-waꞌneꞌyoo tamme.
E nanumu tamme Te Naa doodooamu tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna ka Te Naa Abraham netamma-kwaꞌne.

Esoo nanatugwengape umuoo waahoo nanaꞌatse-witu. Esoo naatse numu-waꞌnesoo nadooaꞌadoo tabuadu ka naatse Te Naa Pooha-wi nadooaꞌadoodu nekuseka. Menoꞌo esoo ooonneꞌyoo, mu Jew numu tamme Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu kusegeayakwe.
Soo Te Naa meeoo tubotugupu, “Soo tuhaꞌyoo ka puusoo manekakoo mogoꞌne-matoo kemmana, punnoꞌo besa nasootuhi. Soo numu tummatziwabe tu tooa nosoo gi nasootuhikwu umu sukwe natayakwunikwu.”
E nanumu tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna ka puusoo manekakoo mogoꞌne tooa-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe te natzamaꞌwuna tamme numu too sookwaꞌe, oosoo ka te sukwe maꞌnaꞌwena petsabena. Gi ka mu Jew numu tumayohope nakabetseapana, tooe ka pumme tumayohope mumme mu nakabetsea tuungu sapa.
Nu, Paul, yise meeoo mu tubetse netamma, mu gi Jew numu manepana. Mu ka Jew numu manese, mu tookwa gi Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukute, ooonneꞌyoona mu gi nasootuhaꞌe.
Mu ka oo manena, mu noꞌoko ka Jew numu tumayohope mayohokwu.
Mu ka tumayohope nakaꞌoedyukuna, mu tookwa gi ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukukwu. Soo Te Naa yise gi mu magwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukuna, soo Te Naa saaꞌa besa te mayugwenokwu.
Tamme yise ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus doodooamu manese, soo numu Jew numu manina, gi hee. Tamme yise Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukuna suuꞌmu nasootuhikwu, yise nanasoobedyakwu.
Mu ugasoo besa ka Te Naa podo meadape, mu numu nemoꞌagadu mooasoo mu tzadyooiku ka kaaheno naꞌunnedu mu nakabetseꞌa.
Soo Te Naa e doodooamu mee mu natubangakwuse mu netutzea, gi ka hemma nakaꞌemukwapana, mee mu netammana.
Pana huuꞌyoo mu-nagatu mu nemooagakwu ewow mu-nagatu suda neeyugwekwu.
Nu oo sopedakwadoo soo Te Naa ekow mu nakasopedakwadookwuna mu sootuhikwu. Mu yise nu-waꞌnesoo tusooyugwekwu. Soo sutaꞌyoo kodyukakwu umu numu nemooagadu-matoo.

Umu numu nemooagadu nu-kwitu naꞌesagoena, nu ka mu Jew numu tumayoho tuungu mee nanaꞌesagoeꞌe nu mu numu mee tuukwena, “Soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsa,” ooonneꞌyoona mu Jew numu ooosapa unu e nekuseka.
Ka mu Jew numu nemooagadu gi nakaꞌoedyukupana umu sakwa mu tsasoopedya.

E nanumu, soo Te Naa mu netutzea gi ka mu Jew numu tumayohope nakabetseapana, gi yise too ka suda tu namanena nakabetseapana tuwow. Sumuꞌyoosoo naꞌunnedu noꞌoko ka Te Naa tumayohona waha mee naꞌunnedu, “Tamme ka tammesoo besa nanasoobedyana tamme sakwa noꞌoko numu besa soobedya.” Mu sakwa Te Naa tumayohope nanatummatzina ka muusoo besa nanasoobedyana.
Mu ka ooosapa muusoo nanahana, mu sumuna muusoo kadoo nananemayugwekwu.
Mu sakwa ooosapa Te Naa Besa Pooha nakabetsea. Oꞌno yise mu gi suda manekwu, numu sukwe tusoomayu-waꞌne.
Soo numu soonammena, suda tusooyukwe pana soo Te Naa Besa Pooha mu numu besa mane tuungu. Numu soonammena ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-no naꞌataꞌyoosoo.
Mu sakwa yise noꞌoko ka Te Naa Besa Pooha tunetammana nakabetsea. Oꞌno yise mu tooe gi ka Jew numu tumayohope nagepana gi hownneꞌyoo.

Soo numu tooe how tooe nanasuda manakwe: nanamaꞌemukwana, numu poohana, hemma namadabue-matoo nanesootuhina, nidyupuna, yabesoo sutana, hee-koobatoo nanakwohonena, numu nasutaꞌana, noꞌoko numu sutakuna, nanahana,
nananenaboaꞌana, baagoena, tooe how tooe manena yise nanasuda tumatuguna. Mooasoo nu meeoo mu tuukweꞌe, “Soo suda tumatuguduna gi Te Naa doodooamu mane-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha ka mu-naga manese nanabesa numu manetuungu, besa nanasobedyana, besa sokwamana, nanapuaꞌana, gi nanahapana,
numu tummatzina, gi yabe sutana, besa tumatuguna, numu besa matuguna, gi esayaꞌena, yise puusoo besa namabetseana. Tamme ka yoo manena tamme ka Te Naa tamme netammana nakabetsea.
Tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe doodooamu manise gi suda tumatugunokwu.
Tamme ekow sutakoo po maꞌwuke. Menoꞌo soo Te Naa Besa Pooha te tunetammakute.
Tamme sakwa gi tamme soo nananasootzaꞌmeku, gi numu nasoodyagepana, gi paba nasooyugwepana, tamme sakwa tunakabetsea.

E nanumu, ka mu-nagatu uga tunakaꞌoedyukudu maꞌemukwakese mu ka Te Naa Besa Pooha nakabetseadu-nagadu sakwa oo tummatzi, oꞌno saaꞌa oo soo besasoo manekadooa. Gi haꞌyoo oo sooyugwepana. Muusoo saaꞌa punnoꞌo besa nanemabetseano oꞌno mu besa nanesootuhinokwu.
Ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme oo tunetammakupu besa nagenona, oꞌno tamme besa nananemabetseanokwu.
Soo numu meeoo nasooyugwedu, “Nu nagutza besaꞌyoo numu e tummatzi-too,” oosoo puusoo nanemooaga.
Tamme sakwa ka besa te tumatuguna sopedakwadoona, gi sakwa tamme numu ooonakwa besa nasooyugwepana,
tamme ka noꞌyoona suda tumatuguna.
Tamme ka tamme tunedyooedu sakwa tumanagaku, ka besa tamme oo tunedyooꞌe.
Gi muusoo nanemooagapana, mu puu gi ka Te Naa nemooaga-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme puu ka tooe hemma tooe masuase, saaꞌa tamme ooonnekoo soo yasakwu.
U ooosoo manepunne. Tamme ka suda manena, ka saaꞌa soo suta te tumatuguna tamme-matoosoo kodyukwu. Tamme ka Te Naa Besa Pooha nakabetseana, saaꞌa soo Te Naa ooosapa te sootuhina, te magwetzoinokwu.
Tamme sakwa gi oo sookwumehoepana ka besaꞌhoo, ooosapa oo nageno, gi oo maꞌwu, oꞌno ka saaꞌa besaꞌyoo tamme-tammesoo kodyudooa.
Menoꞌo yise tamme Te Pabeꞌe nananesootuhidu sakwa besa nanamatuguna noꞌoko mu numu ooosoo matugu.
Esoo nakwi nabodu, nugasoo tuboona. A poonne haaꞌno pabatseꞌe nu tuboꞌo.
Mu numu Jew mu mane tuungudu, mu sukwe tumayohokuna, oꞌno mu numu gi mu nekwohoꞌnekwu mee umu sokwamana.
Tooe umu puusoo Jew numu pana, umu punnoꞌo puusoo gi ka Jew numu tumayohope nakabetseꞌa. Mu-ma umu sukwe nanaꞌunnena mu mu nakabetsease, Jew manekwu, mee unnena.
Nu sakwa puu gi nuusoo nama nanaꞌunne. Nu ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-ma nanaꞌunakwe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe puu nu-koobatoo nabatsa. Menoꞌo yise nu gi ka sutakoo ka teepu-koobatoo nakabetsea-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Soo numu ka Jew-na gi hee. Soo numu yise ka gi Jew-na oosoo punnoꞌo gi hee. Oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo soo Te Naa ka te pudu manumudookwuse.
Umu egea nakaꞌoedyukudu, nu ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhikute, “Mu sootuhi,” mee unnena. Umu tunakabetseadu tubetse Jew numu Te Naa tunetutzeana.
E tookoo unu tutzaga-gaꞌyoo ka Te Pabeꞌe tunetummana numu e tunedyooꞌe, oowetu umu e kusedyana. Tooe haga tooe sakwa gi e nematzamapana, mooasoo nu togekoo tutzagaꞌyoo.
E nanumu, “Soo Te Pabeꞌe sakwa ooosapa besa mu sootuhi,” mee nu mu nanesootuhikuyakwe. Esoo sakwa ooosapa togesapa.
Ka Paul-makoo mumme Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-matoo nabopu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe nuka netutzea ka besa tu unnepu mu numu e tuukwe tuunguna, ka Te Naa pumme meeoo netamma.
Nu ka Te Naa noko Te Pabeꞌe-matoo mu nanesootuhikute umuoo mu sootuhina mu magwetzoikwu.
Soo Te Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo. Tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe-tuna oosoo noꞌoko hemma bebesow-ma te sootuhaꞌe.

Oꞌnosoo gisoo ka Te Naa ka teepu matabue oosoo te netutzease, mee tamme-witu netamma, “E Besaa Tooaꞌa saaꞌa Mu Pabeꞌe Jesus manedooa. Oosoo numu-koobatoo nabatsakwu. Nu saaꞌa gi mu tumaꞌemukwa-kwi mu neyugwedooa, soo E Tooaꞌa unu e soobedyana mu-koobatoo nabatsadooa. Nu saaꞌa yise mu tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwadooa. Nu mumme e dooamu e mayugwekwuna besa soobedya. Nu tubetse unu mu soobedyana besa mu sootuhikwu. Nu oꞌnosoo e tusoohanena gi mu numu tuukwe, pana menoꞌo nu ooka mu nakasopedakwadookwuna petzape, nu nobatu-ma mu sootuhikwu ka Nuga Besaa Tooa mu ꞌoedyukute. Umu saaꞌa ka nuꞌmatoo e nanesootuhina mee unnedooa, ‘Tubetse besaꞌyoo soo Te Naa tusooyugwena, soo Te Naa besa te sootuhikwu.’ “

Soo Te Naa meeoo mooasoo tusoohanepa, ka teepu atasoo manikwuna oe manepetuse, oosoo noꞌoko hemma nanano tuunoyugwe mayugwekwu yaa ka teepu-kooba manipetuse noko ka teepu paꞌanakwatu tuwazoo soo Te Pabeꞌe yise noꞌoko hemma nemadabuepunnedooa.
Noꞌyoona soo Te Naa tusooyugwena ooosapa kaaheno manekena. Mooasoo soo Te Naa tunetutzeapu noꞌobatusoo numu tu dooamu tu mayugwegena ka Te Pabeꞌe mu nakaꞌoedyukute.
Soo Te Naa meeoo tusooyugwe, “Nu e dooamu mu mayugwekwu. Oꞌno yise noꞌyoona numu e tubetse besaꞌyoona sopedakwadookwu.” Mooeꞌugasoo numme ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukute.

Mu saaꞌa ka ne tubetse unnepu nakase oꞌno, yise mu Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukukwu soo Te Naa mu magwetzoikwutu o. Oosoo yise tu Besa Pooha-ma mu sootuhi, oo-ma mu kopokwu pummetusoo mu mayugwekwu tu unne-kwaꞌnesoo.

Soo Te Naa ka tu Besa Pooha-ma te sootuhikwu, te tzapoonnekuna oosoo saaꞌa besa te magwetzoidooa yise tu besa dooamu te mayugwedooa. Oꞌno yise noꞌyoona numu, ka Te Naa tubetse besaꞌyoona sopedakwadookwu.
Nu meeoo tuwazoo unakwe soo Te Naa tookwa tubetse besaꞌyoo nu nanabesa mu-kwitu nakapunne mu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukuna, noꞌoko mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu soobedya.

Nu yise ooosapa ka Te Naa-matoo mu nanesootuhikute, meeꞌe nu unneyakwe, “U, Ne Naa ka Ne Pabeꞌe Jesus tubetse Naa. U tubetse naduyadu. U ka mu numu otuoo besa sootuhiyakwe. Mu yise besa nasootuhiyakwe. Oꞌno umu besa u-kwitu nakasopedakwadookwu.
Umu u sooꞌoedyukukwu besa oo nakasopedakwadookwu, u, Ne Naa, numme netuseapu yise saaꞌa numme besa tunakaꞌoedyukudu sootuhidooa, numme u tuukwe-kwaꞌnesoo.
Umu oo sopedakwadookwu u, Ne Naa, unu pooha-gana ne magwetzoikwu, numme ka u nakaꞌoedyukuna.
U, Ne Naa, ka u pooha-ma Ne Pabeꞌe mayoda ka oo nabatsa-kwikoo. U, Ne Naa, nabaatoo oo bise, nawaꞌnesoo oo matabue.”
Menoꞌo manakwana soo Te Naa noꞌobatusoo poohabe mu numu-no ka Te Pabeꞌe-toohakwi manepunne mayugwe.
Te Pabeꞌe yise ka noꞌokosoo poohabe putooha ka Te Naa neyugwese oosoo yise ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu moohekwu.
Soo Te Naa ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-no nawaꞌnesoo manepunne. Soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko hemma nanemamakwuna nanemadabuena oo-toogoo te moohe.
Ka oꞌnosoo umu gi Te Naa sopedakwadoo mu ka ooosapa tumaꞌemukwana.
Umu ka mu suda manedu numu-waꞌneꞌyoo yaa teepu-koobatu ooosapa gi togekoo, ka sutakoo nakabetsea.
Tamme ka sutakoo podo mea ka sutakoo tookwa nakabetseana, tamme ka sutakoo besa sooyugwena. Noꞌyoona tamme uga nanakwaꞌneꞌyoosoo, suta te tumatuguna yise tamme-matoosoo namakodyukukwu.

Tooe tamme uga gi ka Te Naa napuaꞌapana tamme ka ooosapa tumaꞌemukwana, soo Te Naa unu te soobedya. Oosoo unu tutuha te soobedyana, te sootuhi. Tooe gi ooka te mapuꞌapunne sapa soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo te magwetzoaꞌe.

Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe yaꞌese oo mayodase oo-no soo Te Naa saaꞌa nabatoo te bikwu, oꞌno tamme tunakaꞌoedyukudu tuise, te mayodadooa, yise Te Naa-baatoo te bikakwu tamme yise oo-no hemma nemadunagakwu.
Ooosapa yise Te Pabeꞌe besa te sootuhinokwu ka putoohakwi te manese soo Te Naa tu tubetse besaꞌyoona te tzapoonnekukwu.
Tooe tamme gi ka tamme oo tunetammakuna noꞌoko mayohopana soo Te Naa te sootuhikwu. Oosoo te magwetzoikwu ka te tunakaꞌoedyukute.
Noꞌyoona tamme gi meeꞌe nanaꞌunne-waꞌneꞌyoo, “Numme nummesoo namagwetzoaꞌe ka besa tumatuguna.” Soo Te Naa puusoo tamme sootuhikwu.
Oꞌno oosoo gi te pudu manumudoose ka Te Pabeꞌe-tooha te mayugwe. Ka Te Naa tamme tunemadabuekupu ka besow podo tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe-no meanoꞌokwu.

Mu gi Jew numu-nagatu-matu sakwa oo soomayu ka oꞌnosoo mu hownneꞌyoona. Mu Jew numu uga ooosapa mee mu-kwitu wahayakwe, “Umu gi Jew numu, gi. Numme Jew numu suuꞌmu nanetutzeapu,” meeꞌe umu. Ka gisoo Te Pabeꞌe yaa teepu-kooba petu, mu uga wakwawaꞌa. Soo Te Naa gisoo meeoo mumme netamma, “Nu mu sootuhikwu,” mee. Mu uga Te Naa gi sopedakwatoo, gi hownnekoo mu bi-waꞌneꞌyoo ka gi pumme mu sopedakwadoo. Mu uga gi Te Pabeꞌe-tu, soo Te Naa yise mu sukwe tsasoopedya.
Mu uga Te Naa-kwingaꞌa pana soo Te Pabeꞌe mu-koobatoo nabatsase, menoꞌo yise mu Te Naa doodooamu manepetu.

Numme ka mu gi Jew numu naboꞌoꞌa, ka numme Jew tumayoho-too meana. Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe ka ne mooꞌa tumayohopu kadoo ne mayugweku. Oosoo ne nananenaboana kadoo mayugwekese, noꞌobatusoo numu sumusoo mayugweke, Jew numu yise mu gi Jew tuwazoo. Ka Te Pabeꞌe noꞌo-koosoo hekoobaatoo nabatsase. Menoꞌo yise tamme gi nanakwohonena, tamme nanapuaꞌakwu.
Ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsase oosoo yise Te Naa pupuaꞌamu te mayugwe,
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka petuse noꞌoko te tuukwe soo Te Naa noꞌoko tu pupuaꞌamu te mayugwe.
Ka Te Pabeꞌe nabatsase, oꞌno yise noꞌobatusoo numu ka tu Besa Pooha-ma sootuhi yise tamme noꞌyoona Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhikwu.
Mu menoꞌo gi Jew numu gi wakwawaꞌa manese, mu numme-waꞌneꞌyoosoo Te Naa doodooamu tamme noꞌyoona nanano ka Te Naa-baa natzepotugu.

Menoꞌo tamme tunakaꞌoedyukudu tupe-waꞌneꞌyoo, ka Te Naa tubetse nanesootuhi nobe pumatoo namadabue-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe puu ka nobe-matu besaꞌyoo. Umu Te Pabeꞌe yadooawabe ka nobe pukooba katu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo yise mu punnoꞌo ka nobe-matuoosoo namadabuepunnedusoo. Oosoo noꞌoko nana-ma te totsagedukwu, sumuoosoo nanesootuhi nobe te mayugwekwu. Soo Te Naa tamme-naga nobe-gaꞌyoo ka tu Besa Pooha-ma te sootuhise.
Nu, Paul, nakwutuma ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-koobatoo, nu ka mumme gi Jew numu nanesootuhibu tuneyooena.
Mu mooasoo e sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa e sootuhipu, ka Te Naa pudu tunetammapu mu-toogoo besaꞌhoo mumme e tunedyooe tuunguna.

Oꞌnosoo esoo naꞌunnepu gi haga oo nakadu ka gi numu natuukwe. Menoꞌo soo Te Naa Besa Pooha umu oo yadooawabe tuukwe ka pudu naꞌunnepu. u tuwazoo oo pooha nosepu ekow naꞌunnepu Te Pabeꞌe-witu. Menoꞌo yise mu oo nakasopedakwadookwu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu, mu ka mu-matoo e tubona mesoo neana. Nu oo boꞌo ka Te Naa nuka netamma-kwaꞌnesoo.

Menoꞌo soo Te Naa noꞌobatusoo Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu besa matugu namekoosoo mu Jew numu, mu gi Jew numu tuwazoo. Oosoo te sootuhaꞌe, tu dooamu te mayugwese noꞌoko sumu-kwaꞌnesoo te matabuedooa tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe-toohakwiꞌyoona.

Soo Te Naa e sootuhipu tooe gi e maawaꞌnekoo sapa noꞌoko tu doodooamu-nagatu. Oosoo e pooha-maka ka besa tu unnepu mumme gi Jew numu e tunedyooe tuunguna. Nu noꞌoko numu ooka nakasopedakwadoo mayugwekena soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu sootuhaꞌe. Soo tamme oo sootuhina noꞌoko tooe hemma tooe numu tusooyugwena ooonakwa besaꞌyoo. Nu ka besa naꞌunnedu ka Te Pabeꞌe gi mobekwakwukoo gwetzoibu mu tuukwe.

Soo te matabuepu noꞌoko numu e tuukwe tuungu. Te Manumudoopu uga mu numu gi oogow tuukwepu pana menoꞌo oosoo te tuukwe. Nagutza mooe ugasoo hemma-kobenasoo soo Te Naa mooasoo meeoo tusooyugwepu oosoo ka mu toha kakasa-gakoo menoꞌo tzapoonnekukwu ka unu besa tamme-too tu tusooyugwena soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌokosoo sumusoo te mayugwekwu. Tamme mu tzapoonnekute soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus ka Te Naa unnepu togesapa mayugweke, tamme ooka nakaꞌoedyukudu-nagatu.
Menoꞌo tamme ka Te Naa mesoo nanetzakwiyaꞌena gi hemma-ma nasoosui ka Te Pabeꞌe-ma nasoonatzina.
Tooe nu mu-koobatoo nakwutumase sapa mu sakwa gi nasootookepana. Oꞌno mu mesoo natummatzikwu.
Ooonneꞌyoona nu yaa nanesootuhaꞌe ka Te Naa-matoo mee unnena.
“U Noꞌobatusoo Numu Naa ka yaa teepu-koobatu nokosoo ebe tamme-koobakwitu tooe.
U sakwa ne pewu-kwitu sootuhi U Besa Pooha-ma.
U Ne Pabeꞌe ooosapa numme-koobatu, umu sakwa ookow nakaꞌoedyuku. Oꞌno yise umu ooosapa nanaꞌunusoo nanasoobedyakwu.
Numme yise noꞌoko mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-no oo nakasopedakwadookwu ka noꞌoko numme unu besa u soobedya.
U tubetse unu ne soobedya. Numme gi hownnekoo oo nakasopedakwadoo petu ka numme besa u soobedyana. U tubetse unu besaꞌyoo. U sakwa besa ne mayugweke nawaꞌnesoo.
U tubetse unu besaꞌyoo. U, Ne Naa, u Besa Pooha-ma besa ne tuyugwekute ka ne nanesootuhi, tooetoo ne tusooyugwena ooonakwa besasoo.

Noꞌyoona numme u nakaꞌoedyukudu oo sopedakwadoo u tubetse besaꞌyoo. Ooosapa yise noꞌyoona numme Ne Pabeꞌe-toohakwidu nanesootuhidu mee unnekwu, ‘Soo Te Naa unu besaꞌyoo,’ oosoo ka Tu Pooha-ma besa ne mayugwena.”
Yaahoo ka Te Pabeꞌe tummatziwabena, nu nakwutuma. Nu meeoo mu tubetse netamma, mu sakwa ka Te Naa mumme tunetammakuna nakabetsea ka nasootuhi manese ka mumme oo netutzease.
Oosoo ka besa nayadooadu te tuukweꞌepu tamme sakwa gi numu ooonakwa besa nasooyugwepana, gi nidyapupana ooosapa nanatoo besaꞌyoona ka unu nanasoobedyana.
Tamme sakwa sumusoo maneka. Tamme sakwa noꞌyoona ka Te Naa Besa Pooha nakabetseapunne. Oosoo noꞌoko nanakwaꞌnesoo tusooyugwe te mayugwekese, tamme besa nanamatoo sokwamakwu.
Tamme tunakaꞌoedyukudu noꞌyoona sumuꞌyoosoo. Tamme sumuoosoo ka Te Naa Besa Pooha nakabetsea. Tamme noꞌyoona sumusoo nanetutzeapu tamme yise noꞌyoona Te Naa-baaꞌyookwu.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe sumuꞌyoosoo ka noꞌyoona pumme te nakabetseꞌa. Tamme noꞌyoona sumu-waꞌnesoo baa-wi namatzaka. Tamme noꞌyoona sumu-waꞌnesoo tunakaꞌoedyukute.
Sumuꞌyoosoo soo Te Naa tamme noꞌyoona oo-matoo nanesootuhi oosoo noꞌoko hemma matabuepu, noꞌoko hemma nemadabuepu, noꞌoko te gwetzoimona te nemadabuekupuna tu pooha-ma te sootuhipu.
Tamme noꞌyoona sumuꞌyoo, pana soo Te Pabeꞌe nanaꞌatakoosoo besow poohabe-ma te sootuhi tu sookwikwaꞌnesoo.
Ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu nabotugu-kwaꞌnesoo. “Oosoo ka tu wohomu matzooekuse, oosoo ka Te Naa-baatoosoo kodyuka. Ooonneꞌyoona oosoo numu nanaꞌatakoosoo besow pooha sootuhipu.”
Oosoo tookwa ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona yaa teepu-kooba petupu oꞌno meeoo naꞌunakwe oosoo ka Te Naa-baatoosoo kodyuka.
Menoꞌo yise oosoo ka Te Naa-baatoosoo kodyukase noꞌyonna hee yise namamakwu petu.

Oosoo nanaꞌatakoosoo besow te Pooha-sootuhipu ka te nanatummatzikwuna te nemahanekuna. Susumudu oo yadooawabe, susumudu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu Te Naa-witu tuukwemoꞌodu, susumudu numu nenoyukwedu. Pana noꞌoko mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu nenoyukwe ka Te Pabeꞌe unu mu nakaꞌoedyukukwuna.
Tamme yise noꞌyoona sumusoo manekekwu ka Te Naa Tooa sopedakwatoona, nanakwaꞌnesoo tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Tamme yise natzooepunnedu-kwaꞌne tabuakwu, ka Te Naa tamme tunetammaku-kwaꞌnesoo.

Tamme yise gi waha-tamme tusooyugwekwu, tuhaꞌa-waꞌne. Ka mu numu nemooagadu numme-baa petuse, tamme gi mu nakabetseapana tooe tamme mu tooꞌe nemooaga sapa. Tamme gi ooosapa te soonammena atasoo yugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo, gi nanaꞌemota wumatzakadyipana.
Tamme kaaheno nanadyadooekwu, tamme ka unu nanasoobedyana. Tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌnesoo manekekwu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe o te moohekwudu
tamme yise oo-ma nasoonatzina nanatummatzikwu. Tamme nanano tuunoyugwe tamme ka nanasoobedyana. Oꞌno tamme natzooekwu.
Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mumme e tuukwe tuunguna, “Mu uga ka oꞌnosoo tumaꞌemukwadu ka umu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-kwaꞌne. Mu sakwa gi ooosoo manepana.” Umuoo gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi kaaheno tusooyugwedu.
Umu gi ka Te Naa nakasopedakwadoona. Oo-tamme wakwawaꞌa-waꞌneꞌyoo. Umu gi oo sopedakwatoo ka Te Naa tamme sootuhina, umu ka tusoomatzooena gi sootunakaꞌoedyukuna.
“Gi hownneꞌyoo tooe sutaꞌyoopana,” mee sokwamadu. Umuoo suta tu tusooyugwena pedukudu. Umu tooe how tooe suda manakwe ka meeoo sokwamana. Umu yise nanaꞌunusoo suda manakwe.
Mu ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna, mu gi suta mu manena natunedyooe.
Mu ka Te Pabeꞌe tubetse unnepu naka. Mu ka besow po te nagekwuna natunedyooe, tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe-doodooamuna.

Soo besa oo unnepu tamme ka suta te manena tzadyooikute, ka oꞌnosoo te soomane-kwaꞌne mee naꞌunnedu soo Te Naa pudu numusoo te matabuekwu. Oꞌno tamme kaaheno tusooyugwekwu. Tamme besa nanamatugukwu yise ka Te Naa-waꞌnesoo.
Noꞌyoona sakwa tamme ka suda te tumaꞌemukwana maꞌwu. Tamme sakwa ooosapa kaaheno nanadyadooe, tamme tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka noꞌyoona sumuꞌyoonasoo.
Ka sutana, tamme sakwa yabesoo suta makwu. Tamme sakwa gi wunaꞌme sutapana tu yongo-matoo.
Tamme ka sutana, soo sutaꞌyoo te matzooekukwu.
Tooe haga tooe tuduhadu sakwa gi tuduha mane. Oosoo sakwa hemma natunedyuse hemma howyugwe. Oꞌno yise oosoo tooe hemma tooe ka mu tutuha manedu gea.
Tamme sakwa gi suda yadooapana. Tamme sakwa ooosapa besa unnena oosoo kummaꞌakoosoo numu tummatzi. Tamme sakwa ka besow mu tuukwena umu besa hanesootuhino. Oꞌno soo Te Naa besa mu sootuhikwu.
Tamme sakwa gi ka Te Naa Besa Pooha suda masoonammepana. Menoꞌo tamme oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa te kopose, oosoo yise saaꞌa te magwetzoikwu, oosoo ka Tu Besa Pooha-ma te sootuhise.
Tamme sakwa gi nidyapupana, gi sutapana, gi nananesootzemapana, gi tooe how tooe nanadyugwepana.
Tamme sakwa yise unu nanasoobedyana besa nanamatugu. Tamme sakwa oo soomuꞌwa ka numu suda tamme matugu, soo Te Naa puu te tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwa ka Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo.
Soo Te Naa unu te soobedyana pummesoo dooamu-waꞌne te matugu. Tamme sakwa oo-waꞌnesoo.

Tamme sakwa unu nanasoobedya ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme unu soobedya-kwaꞌne. Oosoo puu tamme-koobatoo nabatsapu. Soo Te Naa besa soonamme ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsapu yise te tumaꞌemukwana oo-koobatoo soomuꞌwa.
Tamme sakwa gi kukummaꞌa-no nanaꞌahegoepana, gi moogoo manepana soo Te Naa doodooamu sakwa gi ooonneꞌyoopana.

Tamme sakwa gi suda apegeapana, tooe hayoo tooe unnepana, suda naꞌunnedu tuukwepana, tamme Te Naa doodooamu sakwa gi suda apegeapana. Tamme sakwa ooosapa besa apegeamo, mee unnena, “Te Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo.”
Tamme oo sopedakwatoo mu Te Naa-no Te Pabeꞌe ka teepu atasoo yugwekwuse. Soo Te Naa mu moogoobu numu noꞌoko nanaꞌahegoedu gi ooka mu maꞌwu, umuoo gi sootuhikwu, umu gi oo-noꞌyookwu.

“Gi hownneꞌyoo ka tumaꞌemukwagonnopana,” meeꞌe mu nemooagana, mu netammakwu. Umuoo gi nakaꞌoedyukupana. Soo Te Naa ka sutakoo umu-matoosoo makodyukukwu noꞌoko mu gi tunakabetseadu umu ka tumaꞌemukwakena.
Tamme sakwa numu nemooagadu sukwe tsasoopedya.

Tamme-notu toganopunne uga ka Te Naa gi nasopedakwatoo, tamme togaba-witu-waꞌneꞌyoo. Menoꞌo yise tamme oetu tabuakute, o tamme ka Te Naa-witu nakasopedakwadoose. Tamme sakwa Te Naa dooamu-kwaꞌne besa oetu nakasopedakwadoo.
Tamme ka Te Naa-witu nakasopedakwatoona, tamme sakwa besaꞌyoona kaaheno ka Te Naa podo besa meadabe.
Tamme sakwa ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme oo soomane tuungu oo-ma sokwama tabua.
Mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu tooe how tooe manakwe, umu ka gi Te Naa-witu nakasopedakwadoona. Tamme sakwa gi umu-ma tzabepana. Umuoo sakwa mu neda.
Ka umu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu suda watze manakwe umu-ma nasookwina gi oo wahapana.

Tooe ka togano-wi sapa, hemma gi pepesow nawatzetugu ka oo-koobatoo tabedooakese numu oo mesoo poonne. Ka te nanesootuhi hoobea-waꞌne oo naꞌunakwe: Umu utuꞌidu sakwa tubonne. Umu tuipu sakwa yozu, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka taba mu-koobatoo tabedooapunnedu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo.

Tamme sakwa unu sokwama manekese, besa kaaheno ooosapa maneno. Tamme sakwa ooosapa besa ka tamme tu sootuhipu-ma maneno. Mu numu menoꞌotu ewa suda tumaꞌemukwa, umu ka gi sosokwamana. Tamme sakwa gi umu-waꞌne manepana.
Tamme sakwa unu sokwamana ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme tunetammakuna nakasopedakwatoo.
Tamme sakwa gi baagoepana, soo nahebedu kadooꞌoo te mayugwekwu. Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha sakwa te tunemadabueku.
Tamme sakwa besa nanadyadooena, nanesootuhi hoobea nananekwuhukuna. Te soonamme-kwikoo puusoo hoobeadoona. Tamme sakwa too ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo tunekwuhu.
Ooosapa tamme sakwa nanesootuhi ka Te Naa-matoo, mee unnena, “U besakoo ne sootuhipu ka Ne Pabeꞌe Jesus-koobatoo. U tubetse besaꞌyoo.”
Tamme sakwa punnoꞌo nananakabetsea tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe nakabetseana.
Momokoꞌne sakwa pummesoo koomamu nakabetsea Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo.
Mu nanana sakwa tu nonodukwamu nemadabue, ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme tunakaꞌoedyukudu nemadabue-kwaꞌne. Oosoo te magwetzoaꞌe.
Mu momokoꞌne sakwa ooosapa tu koomamu nakabetsea tamme tunakaꞌoedyukudu Te Pabeꞌe nakabetsea-kwaꞌne.

Mu nanana sakwa ka tu nonodukawamu besa soobedya ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme tunakaꞌoedyukudu unu soobedya-kwaꞌne. Oosoo unu te soobedyana tamme-koobatoo nabatsa, Oꞌno soo Te Naa te tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwakwu. Besa tu nayadooa-ma ka baa-wi te matzakase, tamme gi totsabu ka manekwu.
Oosoo tamme tunakaꞌoedyukudu nemabetsape ka saaꞌa naa-baatoo te bikwuse. Oosoo besa te mayugwemena, gi maꞌemukwadu, gi totsadu.
Ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme besa soobedya-kwaꞌne, nanana sakwa tu nonodukwamu soobedya. Tamme sakwa te nonodukwamu soobedya tammesoo nasoobedya-kwaꞌne. Tamme ka te nodukwa-no sumuꞌyoosoo.
Numu puu noꞌyoona pummesoo tookoo namakana mabetseꞌa. Tamme sakwa te nonodukwamu mabetsea ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme mabetsea-kwaꞌne.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ooosapa te mabetsea, tamme puu oogowsoo tookoo-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Mee nabotugu, “Soo nana puu tu naanapuaꞌamu-baaꞌyoona mea, oosoo tu nodukwa-baaꞌyookwuse. Umu wahaꞌyoo numu sumuꞌyoosoo numu-waꞌneꞌyookwu.”
Esoo naꞌunnepu togesapa naꞌunnedu tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe-no sumuoosoo numu manekwu.
Noꞌyoona nanana sakwa pummesoo nodukwa besa soobedya ka tammesoo nasoobedya-kwaꞌne, noꞌyoona momokoꞌne sakwa pummesoo koomamu nakabetsea.
Mu doodooake sakwa tu naanapuaꞌamu nakabetsea, ookow soo Te Pabeꞌe besaꞌyookute. Oo manenona besa.
Oꞌnosooo soo Te Naa meeoo te tunetammakupu, “Mu naanapuaꞌamu nakabetsea,” meeꞌe.
Soo Te Naa te sootuhikwu ka tamme tu tunetammakuna podo te tumayohono, mee yise te netamma, “Mu gi tuoebuna, besa sokwamana, wunaꞌmetoo momokwu eka teepu-kooba.”
Mu nanana sakwa pummesoo dooamu besa mabetsea yise ka Te Naa unnepu mu tunedyooeno. Umu sakwa gi nidya noko mu manaanapana.
Mu hemma how yugwedu sakwa mu pumme nedyawena nakabetsea, umu puu ka hemma how yugwenaka Te Pabeꞌe nakabetseꞌa. Umu sakwa gi sukweapu ka pumme nedyawedu nakabetseapana.
Umu sakwa gi ka pumme nedyawedu pumme poonnepunne suuꞌmu oo nakabetseapana, ka besa oo masoonammena umu sakwa oo nakabetsea ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo pumme netamma.
Ka kummaꞌakoosoo numu tummatzina tamme sakwa besa oo soobedya. Tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe tutummatzina,
tamme oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌobatusoo numu besa manedu besow tamme-matu makodyukukwu: namekoosoo ka hemma how yugwedu oo nedyawedu nokosoo.
Ka hemma how yugwedu sakwa soo oo nedyawedu besa matugu. Umu sakwa gi mu netzakwikupana, umu oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa mu nedyawedu. Soo Te Naa gi numu tutzeꞌa.
Yow nakwitoo mumme e netammakwuna, e pupuamu. Tamme sakwa unusoo tunakaꞌoedyuku tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe doodooamuna. Oosoo nanaꞌunusoo tunakaꞌoedyuku te mayugwekwu.
Noꞌoko ka Te Naa tamme pooha sootuhipu-ma, tamme natzooꞌe, tamme sakwa ka sutakoo matzooekuno tooe ka sutakoo tamme maꞌemukwa sapa.
Tamme noꞌobatusoo sutakoo poohabe gi tabuadu-no nanamabetukute gi ka sukwe numu-no.

Tamme sakwa namabetzapepunne ka sutakoo matzooekukwuse. Oꞌno ka tamme-baa oo petuse, tamme oo matzooekukwu, ka Te Naa tamme sootuhise. Tamme sakwa namabetzapepunne ka soyuzu-waꞌne, oosoo puu namabetzapepunne numu-no nagoekwuse:
Tamme sakwa ka kaahenodu sopedakwatoo, kaaheno tusooyugwena, ooosapa kaaheno ka Te Naa besa podo meadabekwu tamme ka besa naꞌunnedu nakaꞌoedyukuna soo Te Pabeꞌe te magwetzoikwu.
Ka sutakoo tamme wohone tooe niwunudu hoa-ma te kwatesangepana, ka oo petuse, oosoo gi how te yugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo tamme ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna.
Tamme gi how nuugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo, tamme ka oo sopedakwatoona ka Te Naa tamme magwetzoi. Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha ka oo unnepu-ma te sootuhi. Ekow naꞌunnepu-ma tamme sakwa ka sutakoo matzooeku.
Tamme sakwa ooosapa nanesootuhina nanetzakwiyino tuwazoo, ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi. Tamme sakwa ooosapa namabetzapepunne noꞌoko mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu nanesootuhikuna.

Nuka tuwazoo mu sakwa nanesootuhiku, nu yise gi nasookwina ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu mu numu tuukwekwu tooe nu oo-koobatoo nakwutumase sapa. E nanesootuhiku nu gi suina mesoo yadooakwu. Soo Te Naa yise tu unnepu-ma e sootuhikwu oꞌno yise ka Te Naa besa unnepu mu numu nakasopedakwadookwu.

E besa puaꞌa Tychicus mee naneadu ka Te Pabeꞌe tummatzidu, nu oo-ma nasoonatzaꞌe. Nu mu-matoo oo taꞌya. Oosoo ka mu-baa petugase, oosoo noꞌoko hemma mu tuukwekwu ka how e manepunnena. Oosoo mu nenoyukwedooa.
Nu ka Te Naa noko Te Pabeꞌe-matoo mu nanesootuhikute mee unnena, “Mu numu sakwa besa nanasoobedya umu ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna. U sakwa umuoo tunakaꞌoedyukudu magwetzoi.
U sakwa noꞌoko numu ooosapa ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus besa soobedyadu sootuhi.”
Numme Paul-no Timothy ka Te Pabeꞌe numme netamma-too manemodu tubona mu Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-matoo, ka Philippi mee naneadu-kwi nonobe-gakoo-matoo ka umu nanesootuhi moohedu-matoo tuwazoo.
Numme mu nanesootuhikute, oꞌno umu Te Naa-no Te Pabeꞌe besa mu sootuhina, mu magwetzoikwu.
Nu ka mu soomayuna Te Naa-matoo mu nanesootuhikunona besa soonamme.
Mu besaꞌyoo e masoonammekute ka e tummatzina. Mu besaꞌyoo e tummatzipu ka mu-baa e pudu petugase, mu yise too togesoo e tummatzaꞌe.
Soo Te Naa ka tu besa podo mumme oo moohe, nu oo tubetse sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa yise ooosapa besatoo mu moohenokwu, ka Te Pabeꞌe kodyu petuno-too tooe.

Nu mu sopedakwatoo mu ooosapa ka Te Naa besa podo meadabekwu, nu ka noꞌoko mu soobedyana tuwow. Soo Te Naa mu sootuhikwu nuka tu sootuhipu-waꞌnekoosoo tooe e nakwutuma sapa, tooetoo mana ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu mu numu e tunesootabue sapa.
Soo Te Naa ka mumme unu e soobedyana sopedakwatoo, ka Te Pabeꞌe mumme soobedya-kwaꞌnekoosoo.
Nu ka unu mu nanasoobedyakwuna mu nanesootuhikute, mu yise ka toge-kwitu unusoo nakasopedakwadoo.
Ooonneꞌyoo mu sakwa ooosapa kaaheno besa manemona oꞌno ka Te Pabeꞌe yaa teepu-koobatoosoo kodyu petuse gi tusooꞌmukwudooa.
Mu ka Te Pabeꞌe unnena nakaꞌoedyukuna besa nanesootuhinona soo Te Pabeꞌe kaaheno Te Naa podo mu moohenokwu. Oꞌno mu numu ka mu poonnena punnoꞌo Te Naa nanesootuhikwu.
E nanumu, nu ka Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo nakwutuma nu ka besakoo mu numu Te Pabeꞌe-wi nanesootuhi tunedyooena.
Noꞌyoona mu tutukwutumadu ka mu numu moohedu nobe-kooba tuyaꞌedu, yise mu numu yaatu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu numu e nanesootuhi tunedyooe-kwi oo sopedakwatoo e nakwutumana.
Tooꞌe noꞌyoona mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu yaatuoo gi ka Te Pabeꞌe-ma nanenasoogwaꞌe besasoo unusoo nanesootuhimena ka yaa Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo e nakwutuma.

Susumudu numu nanesootuhidu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu toge kaaheno numu tunedyooꞌe umu ka besa sootumatuguna. Umuoo numu nanesootuhibu tunedyooꞌe, ka Te Pabeꞌe noko nuka unu soobedyana gi umu hemmasoo sookwi. Umu oo sopedakwatoo ka pukwi e nakwutumana nu ka mu numu Te Pabeꞌe-witu tuukwena. Susumudu mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu numu e tuukwe nuka nuusoogwedakute.

Susumudu nanesootuhibu tunedyooedu mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu tuukweꞌe umu ka e nuusookwedana. Nu ka nakwutumana mee mu naka ewaꞌyoo numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukute umu ka nanesootuhibu tunedyooedu nakana nu mu nuusookwedakukwu mee umu sokwama.
Nu gi haꞌyoo oo soobedya. Nu ka Te Naa besaꞌyookute ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu mu numu nanesootuhi tunedyooe.
Nu ka a namagwetzoikwuna sopedakwadoona besa soonamme ka Te Pabeꞌe Besa Pooha nuka tummatzaꞌe ka nuka mu nanesootuhikunoꞌo.
Gadoo hee pukwi puma e nanenasookwina ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu ooosapa e wahanoꞌo mu numu yise ka oo e manakwe ka Te Pabeꞌe nesookwugikwu tooe how e gwetzoaꞌe tooetoo e nabatsase.
Nu ka nummena yaa teepu-kooba gwetzoina ooosapa nummenummekwu ka Te Pabeꞌe unnena mayohonoꞌo, nu yise ka yaꞌese, nu ooosapa oo-noꞌyookwu ookow te petukuna besaꞌyoo.
Nu ka ooosapa nummena nu mu numu mesoo tuukweꞌe ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu umu yise tunakaꞌoedyukudu manekwu. Nu gi oo sopedakwatoo hanotu ka nu netutzeakwu.
Nu waha-baa tusooyugwe. Nu ka Te Pabeꞌe-baatoo e meakwuna soogwaꞌe, oosoo unu besaꞌyoo;
pana nu oo sopedakwatoo oosoo mumme unu tummatzaꞌe.

Nu oo tubetse sopedakwatoo ka ꞌyoo oo manepunne, nu sakwa yaa teepu-koobasoo. Soo Te Naa e magwetzoikwu ka umu nuka batsakwuse nu yise ooosapa nummenummekwu mu tummatzikwuna noꞌyoona unusoo mu tunakaꞌoedyukukwuna, besa sokwamana mu ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna.
Oꞌno mu ka Te Pabeꞌe unusoo besa sooyugwekwu ka saaꞌa mu-baasoo petugakwusesoo.

Ka tooe how tooe hemma manegena, ka Te Naa besa podo ooosapa meadabe oꞌno mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe besakoosoo nesootuhikwu. Nu ka how mu-baa petugase, tooetoo mu-witu sukwe nakana, oꞌno nu oo sopedakwatoo mu ooosapa ka Te Naa besa podo mea, nananeꞌoedyukuna, nanatummatzina, oꞌno mu kukummaꞌyoosoo Te Pabeꞌe-matoo mu nanesootuhi mea-kwitoo nesawekukwu.
Umu ka oo kadooꞌoo oo namayugwekwudu soo Te Naa yise mu magwetzoi.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu tutzeapuna mu nasootuhaꞌe mu ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna oo-koobatoo ka suda mumme tu matugu.
Menoꞌo mu mooasoo nanasuda namatugu nu-kwaꞌnesoo, nu puu togesoo nanasuda namatugu.
Menoꞌo mu tubetse besa sokwama mu ka Te Pabeꞌe besaꞌyoona sopedakwadoona. Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu soobedyana ka Tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma mu sootuhaꞌe. Mu ka nanasoobedyana besa mu tumatuguna besa oo soobedya.
Mu sakwa nanasoobedyana, besa nanano unnena ka yow manekwuse, oetu nehanena. Mu ka oo manena nuka besa masoonammekute.
Tamme sakwa gi numu tuꞌwepana, gi nasootzaꞌmepana, tammesoo ooonakwa besa sakwa tamme kukumasoo numu besa matugu.
Gi muusoo nakwitu mooe soohanepana mu natummatzibu soogwidu tummatzaꞌe.
Tamme sakwa ka Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌnesoo tusoohane, oosoo puu tamme-witu mooe soohaneyakwe.

Ka oe manakwana Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa-waꞌneꞌyoosoo pana yise gi besa nasooyugwe pumme tu nasooyugwe-kwaꞌne meeoo soonamme, “Gi hownneꞌyoo tooe mu numu gi e sootuhipana.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe gi maawaꞌne nasooyugwese yaa tamme-koobatoo nabatsa. Mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe sutakoo numu-waꞌne matugu ka oo batsase.
Pana soo Te Naa oo yaꞌe-kwikoo oo mayodase noꞌoko numu moohedu oo mayugwe, yise numu ooonakwa besasoo oo matabue.

Ka saaꞌa yise mu noꞌobatusoo numu tooe hanotu tooe mu numu oo sopedakwadookwu ka Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko hemma ooonakwa oo pooha-gakoo. Noꞌobatusoo numu yise tooe hee tooe ka teepu-koobatu meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe netammakwu, “Yow tookwa u unu naduyadu. U noꞌoko ne nemadabuepu.” Ka ꞌyoo mu manena, soo Te Naa nanesookwugikwu.

E nanumu, soo Te Naa te sootuhina ooonneꞌyoona tamme etzaga ooosapa oo nakabetseanoꞌo mu ka nuka mu noko mu ooosapa besa Te Naa tumayohokute mu sakwa ooosapa besa oo tumayohokuno tooe nuka kadookoo sapa. Mu sakwa ooosapa ka Te Naa besa podo meadabe mu ka Te Naa-wi tubetse tunakaꞌoedyukuna.
Gi hayoo unnepana, ka tooe how tooe manena gi numu-no nanepetugupana besakoosoo oo soohanese yise oo mane.

Oꞌno yise mu numu gi mu nesootuꞌidyi-waꞌneꞌyoo. Oꞌno tookwa mu Te Naa dooamu. Mu numu yaatoo menoꞌo sutaꞌyoo suda namanedu nage; pana mu gi umu-waꞌneꞌyoo. Mu tooe togano sapa kootabuapunnekwu paatoosoobaa-waꞌne. Oꞌno mu numu mu sopedakwadookwu ka mu besaꞌyoona.
Oꞌno yise nu besa mu-witu wahakwu ka Te Pabeꞌe kodyu petuse. Oꞌno mu oo sopedakwadookwu nu tookwa besakoo kaaheno mu tunedyooepu.
Nu noꞌoko mu-matoo besa soonamme, tooe nu ka Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo nabatsakwuse sapa, nu ka besa mu tunakaꞌoedyuku tummatzise.
Mu sakwa punnoꞌo nu-koobatoo besa sokwama ka besa kaaheno mumme e tunedyooese.
Nu sakwa ka Te Pabeꞌe nuka meeoo netammase, ka Timothy mu-matoo yabesoo taya. Ka mu-baa oo nummetooase nu saaꞌa besa oo-makoo tunakase, oꞌno nu besa soonammedooa.
Soo Timothy suuꞌmu nu-kwaꞌnesoo tusooyugwedu, ka mumme sootummatzina.
Kukummaꞌyoosoo mu numu ka puusoo hemma soogwaꞌe suuꞌmu gi ka Te Pabeꞌe sootummatzina.
Timothy mooasoo mu tzapoonnekute oosoo ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus nakabetseana. Oosoo besa e tummatzina nu mu numu tuukwe ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu.
Nu ka e manekwuna sopedakwadoohoose ooonneꞌyoona nu sumuna mu-matoo oo tayakwu.
Nu tuwazoo meeoo tusooyukwe nu pudusoo mu-baa petukakwu.

Nu ka Epaphroditus-witu mu tuukwekwu. Oꞌnosoo mu e sootummatzi pana nu gi nuusoo kemma-waꞌne manepunne. Mu yise ka Epaphroditus taya nuka oo tummatzi tuunguna. Oosoo e pabeꞌe-waꞌneꞌyookoosoo, ka e tummatzina numme nano mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu tuukweꞌe oosoo ka Te Pabeꞌe tubetse nakabetseadu. Ka saaꞌa nu-baa petuse, oosoo tuoeyaese tooꞌe yaꞌe. Soo Te Naa namekoosoo ne sootuhise oo mabesaku, soo Te Naa ka nuga suda soonammena gi petzabena. Menoꞌo yise oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo, nu meeoo oetu soobedya oosoo toge tabuꞌa ka mu-baatoosoo oo tayase. Oosoo mumme tu poonnekwuna besa soobedya mu ka tuoeyaꞌe mee oo nakase. Mu punnoꞌo ka besa oo poonne sokwamana, mu besa sokwamakwu ka oo namabesakuna poonnese. Oꞌno nu punnoꞌo besa soonammekwu.
Ka mu-baa oo petugase mu saaꞌa tubetse besa oo-matoo sokwama. Mu numu sakwa oo-waꞌnekoosoo numu besa sooyugwe,
oosoo ka tooꞌe yaꞌese ka mu numu Te Pabeꞌe-witu tuukweꞌe ka nuka tummatzina. Mu gi e tummatzi-waꞌne manepunnena oosoo yise oo mamakwe.

E nanumu, yaahoo mumme mee e yadooekwuna: Mu sakwa ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo besa sokwama ka Te Pabeꞌe natubanga, Te Naa oowetuoo besa sooyugwe mu-matoo tubodyikoo tooe sumu-kwaꞌnesoo unaꞌwepana oꞌno sakwa mu sumuna a nakasopedakwadoo petuga.
Gi mu nakabetseapana umu atasoo numu tunedyooedu numu nemooagadu umu meeoo Jew numu manese sapa ka Te Naa doodooamu manekwu.
Tamme Te Naa doodooamu manese ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhi ka Te Pabeꞌe-too, gi tamme tammesoo hemma manetoo namagwetzoi.
Nu uga ka mu Jew numu tumayohona mu ooonakwa besa nakabetseadu oosoo numu magwetzoikwudu mee oo sooyugwena.

Nu ka nadooaꞌadoose sumu nasatese e tookoo-matu natsegeaꞌakuse, nu yise Jew numu mane umu e nanumu tumayohona tumayohokuna. Noꞌyoona umu e nanumu Jew numu. Nu oo sopedakwatoo nu mu Jew numu Benjamin mee nananeadu numu habena. Nu uga tubetse unu ka mu Jew numu tumayohope nagedu ka umu Pharisee mee puusoo nananeadu-nagatu.
Nu uga mu Jew numu tubetse tunemabetsabekute nu ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu wohonena unu mu kusedyidu. Nu ooosapa besa tumatuguna ka mu Jew numu tumayohona tooꞌe nagena.
Nu tubetse besa tooꞌe Jew tumayohopana yise nu gi oowekoo hemma maꞌyu. Gi, oosoo Te Pabeꞌe suuꞌmu yise e magwetzoi.
Mu Jew numu tumayohona tookwa gi hee. Tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus nanesootuhi manese, oosoo yise numu magwetzoidu, tubetse unu besaꞌyoo.
Menoꞌo nu kaaheno meadabekwu ka Te Naa besa podo, menoꞌo nu ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyuku manese ka mu Jew numu tumayohona gi nage manekwu.

Oosoo tubetse besaꞌyoo ka Te Pabeꞌe doodooamu-nagatu ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi nasootuhina. Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha ka Te Pabeꞌe oo yaꞌe-kwikoo oo mayoda. Nu besa soonammekwu ka mu numu wohoꞌne, tooe nuga mu batsase sapa, umu puu ka Te Pabeꞌe wohoneke.
Nu yise e yaꞌe-kwikoo namayodakwu ka Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌnesoo. Nu yise ooosapa besa soonammekwu ka besa-kwitoo mease gi moobegwaga gwetzoinummekwuse.

Nu menoꞌo gisoo oo mapuꞌa ka e yaꞌe-kwikoo e namayodakwuna. Nu gi ooosapa tubetse besaꞌyoo; pana nu togesoo oo petukunoꞌo ka e besaꞌyookwuna, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mooasoo e mane-koobatoo nabatsapuna. Ka uga putoogoo e kemmapu nu maꞌwukese nu yise menoꞌo Te Pabeꞌe nakabetseano.
E nanumu, nu ka nanasuda puu e manekepu maꞌwukese, menoꞌo nu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakabetseana, nu unusoo besa e manekwuna petukunoꞌo, oꞌno nu oobeoo Te Pabeꞌe-no Te Naa-baa manepetugadooa.
Noꞌyoona tamme meeoo tusooyugwedu numme ka Te Naa besa podo besa meadabepu mee sokwamadu. Mu ka atasoo tusooyukwe manekese soo Te Naa ka besaꞌhoo tu po-witoo mu moohekwusoo.
Tamme sakwa ooosapa oo nageno tamme ka mooasoo oo sopedakwadoona ka kaahenotu Te Naa podo nameadabedu.
Mu sakwa ooosapa nu-kwaꞌnesoo ka Te Naa besa podo meano, yise umu susumudu numu nu-kwaꞌnesoo mane Te Pabeꞌe oedyukudu-kwaꞌnesoo.

Ewaꞌyoosoo numu ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsana netumooꞌoogena. Umu meeoo unnegena soo tamme-koobatoo oo nabatsana, gi hee. Nu ekow mu tuukwekwu menoꞌo, oꞌno sakwa mu gi umu-ma nakatzabepana. Nu oꞌnosoo mooasoo umu-witu mu tuukwepu. Nu tutuha mu sooyugwena yagayakwe.

Umuoo kadooꞌoo namayugwekwu umu ka suda tu manena manoyugwena, ooosapa tu tookoo sutakoo nekwina nakabetseana, tooe ka suda tu manena besa sooyugwepana umu sakwa tooe namaꞌnasookwiku ka suda manena. Umuoo suda manedu tusooyugwena yaa teepu-koobatoosoo mobegwa-gaꞌyoo.
Pana tamme oo sopedakwatoo ka Te Naa-baa te naneana natzepotuguna. Tamme unu oo soogwaꞌe ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus kodyu petukwuna, oosoo suuꞌmu te magwetzoikwu.
Oꞌno soo Te Pabeꞌe nawaꞌnesoo te matabuekwu ka pummesoo Pooha tookoo-waꞌnesoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe mikwoapa hemma ooonakwa pooha-gana noꞌoko hemma nadooha mayugwekwu.

E nanumu, nu ka besa mu soobedyana, nu sakwa mumme e tapoegakwuna besa soobedya. Nu ka besa mu nanesootuhi meꞌa besa mu-matoo soonamme ka oo mu manakwe soo Te Naa besakoo e sootuhaꞌe. Mu sakwa ooosapa ka Te Naa besa podo meadabe.
Umu momokoꞌne, Euodia-no Syntyche mee nananeadu mu gi nanetumooꞌoowamepana, umu ka nanosoo Te Pabeꞌe-wi mooasoo nanesootuhi tunakaꞌoedyukuna.

U punnoꞌo Tubetse Tumatzidu mee naneadu nanana, u sakwa umu momokoꞌne tummatzi oꞌno umu sumusoo tusooyugwekwu. Oꞌnosoo umu momokoꞌne e tummatzaꞌe mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu tuukweꞌe. Soo Clement punnoꞌo e tummatzi yise huuꞌyoo kukummaꞌyoosoo tutunakaꞌoedyukudu menoꞌo mooasoo Te Pabeꞌe-baa manepunnedu.
Mu sakwa ooosapa ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo besa sokwama mee nu mu netamma. Besa sokwama mesoo tuwazoo nu mu netamma.
Mu sakwa noꞌoko numu-tamme besaꞌyoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe pudusoo tamme-baasoo kodyu petukwu.
Gi hemma suda sokwamakupana, ooosapa nanesootuhi Te Naa-matoo oo tuukwena ka hemma mu sookwina, oo-matoo nanesootuhina tooe hekwitoo tooe.
Tooe gi ooka te nakasopedakwatoo sapa, soo Te Naa te magwetzoipu, mu ooosapa besa sokwamakwu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakabetseanona.

E pupuaꞌamu, nakwitoo mumme e tuukwena mu sakwa umu yooonne-kwitu soohane: kaaheno hemma manepunnena soohane ka Te Naa ooosapa nasootsakwina, hemma gi tootsagakoo soohane, besa nanano hemma nematuguna hemma ooosapa besa-kwikoo soohanena, Te Naa Besa Pooha-ma besa tamme maneyina, yise tooe hemma tooe mu numu Te Naa nesootuhi-koobatoo. Mu sakwa yooonnekoo besa-kwitu ooosapa soohane.
Mu sakwa mumme e tunetamma-kwaꞌnesoo manena, ka e poonnena nuga mane-kwaꞌnesoo mane. Oꞌno soo Te Naa mu magwetzoina, ooosapa mu-noꞌyookwu.
Nu ka Te Pabeꞌe besa sooyugwena oo-matoo nanesootuhina mu ka e tummatzi manekasesoo. Mu uga gi hownnekoo e tummatzaꞌe, tooe e sootummatzipana.

Gi nu ka hemma mu-nakwana sookwina, meeoo unakwe. Nu natunedyooepu ka tooe gi nu hemma hee-gana tooe hee-gapana nu besa soonamme. Sumudooe nu gi hemma hee-gaꞌyoo, yise susumudu nu ewow hee-gaꞌyoo. Sumudooe nu besa tukayakwe; sumudooe too nu tuka tuukweyakwe. Tooe how nu manepunnepana,
nu besa soonamme ka Te Pabeꞌe Besa Pooha-ma noꞌokosoo hemma sutakoo tumatzooekukena, nu yise besa soonamme.
Mu tubetse besa e matuku ka e tummatzina ka suda e manese e nakwutumase.
Mu numu Macedonia-wi nonobe-gaꞌyoo mu ka Te Pabeꞌe besa unnedu mumme e tunedyooe oo sopedakwatoo ka mu-baa e petugase, mu suuꞌmu mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-nagatu e tummatzi. Ka mumme e maꞌwukakwuse,
waha mu ka e Thessalonica-wikoo e tummatzaꞌe, toge ka unu natummatziba e soogwaꞌe.
Tooe gi mu-nakwana e tusoogwaꞌe sapa, nu besa oo sooyukwe ka Te Naa besa mu sootuhaꞌe ka hemma nuka mu gea-matoo.
Nu ka nuka mu hee-maka-matoo besa soonamme ka Epaphroditus nuka heme petuse. Nu besa mu sooyukwe ka nuka mu tummatzaꞌe gi nu hemmasoo soogwaꞌe. Soo Te Naa besa mu sooyukwe nuka mu hee-maka.
Soo Te Naa noꞌobatusoo hemma hee-gana ka hemma mu nekwaꞌe sootuhikwu ka Te Pabeꞌe manepu-koobatoo.
Soo Te Naa nanesookwugi. Sakwa ooosapa sakwa manepunne.
Nu noꞌoko mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu yaa nu-baatu-no numme noꞌyoona puu mu nemaꞌyu,
umu yaatuoo Caesar numu-kooba katudu tutummatzidu punnoꞌo.
“Soo Te Pabeꞌe sakwa mu tubetse sootuhino,” mee nu mu nanesootuhikute.
Ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus yadooawabe Paul mee naneadu yise ka tunakaꞌoedyukudu Timothy mee naneadu tubona,

ka umu Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu Te Naa doodooamu Colossae mee naneadu-wi nonobe-gakoo-matoo nabodu. Numme ooosapa mu nanesootuhikuyakwe mee unnena, “U Ne Pabeꞌe Jesus Naa. Numme besa sokwama ka oo nakase ka mu susumudu numu Colossae-witu ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyuku manese. U sakwa ooosapa mu sootuhina mu magwetzoi.”

Mooasoo ka Te Naa unnepu togesapa naꞌunnedu mana kwingaꞌa-kwi noꞌoko ka teepu-koobakwi nawaha, yise ewaꞌyoo numu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakabetsea manemena. Soo Epaphras mee naneadu ne tuukweꞌe oosoosoo ka Te Naa besa unnepu mumme tuukwepu, mu oo nakana oo nakaꞌoedyukute. Mu yise oo tubetse sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa te sootuhaꞌe, tooe gi ooka te mapuꞌa sapa. Mu noꞌoko ka Te Naa doodooamu soobedyana, mu oo sopedakwadoo, ka saaꞌa soo Te Naa besakoo te sootuhikwu, ka puu-baa te petugase.
Ka te puaꞌa, Te Naa yadooawabe Epaphras numme-baa petuse, oosoo mu-kwitu ne tuukweꞌe. Soo Epaphras ka Te Naa besa unnepu mu tuukweyakwe.
Soo Epaphras meeoo, “Te Naa Besa Pooha besa nanasoobedya mu mayugwepu.”

Menoꞌo yise numme ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukuna nakase, numme ooosapa mee mu nanesootuhikuyakwe, “Ne Naa Besa Pooha sakwa umuoo unu sokwama mayugweke.” Umu sakwa ka Te Naa-witu nakasopedakwadoo. Umu sakwa oo sopedakwatoo noꞌoko ka pumme u tunetammakuna.
Oꞌno umu oo mesoo manakwe, ka pumme u netamma-kwaꞌne. U yise besa umu-koobatoo soonammekwu. Umu yise ewa nanabesa tumatugukwu. Umu ka u besa podo meadabekwu. Umu unusoo u sopedakwadookwu.
U unu pooha-gaꞌyoo. U sakwa mu sootuhi, oꞌno umu besa tusoohanekwu. Oꞌno umu gi nasootookekwu, ka mu numu suda pumme mu matugu.

Umu besa sokwamana ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhikwu mee unnena, “U tubetse besaꞌyoo. U ne sootuhise, besa ne mayugweke. Menoꞌo yise numme u doodooamu-no nadatsungakwu, ka umu u sootuhaꞌe. Numme yise u sopedakwadooke.”
Tamme uga ka sutakoo nakabetseadu. Pana soo Te Naa ka suta-makoo te magwetzoise, te tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwa, ka Tu Besaa Tooa nakabetsea te mayugweke.

Tooe tamme gi ka Te Naa poonnepupana, tamme oo sopedakwatoo, soo Te Naa Besaa Tooaꞌa Jesus yise oo-waꞌneꞌyoosoo. Ka oꞌnosoo gisoo hemma namadabuꞌe, ooosapa soo Te Naa Tooa oo-baatu. Soo Te Naa ka Tu Tooaꞌa noꞌoko hemma ka teepu-koobatu matabue tuungu, yise oo-paꞌanakwitu tuwazoo, noꞌoko Te Naa hemma te poonnena matabuepu, noꞌoko poohabe tuwazoo, Te Naa tutummatziwabe mu toha kakasa-gakoo nokosoo. Noꞌyoona Te Pabeꞌe oo tumadabuepu oo-gatuoosoo soo Te Pabeꞌe unu naduyadu. Oosoo noꞌoko hemma mabetseana, noꞌyoona hee yise besa nanano meadabe.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mooe nadatsunga, ooonneꞌyoona tamme tunakaꞌoedyukudu oo nagenokwu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tu yaꞌe-kwikoo mooe namayodakwu.
Soo Te Naa meeoo, “Mu Pabeꞌe saaꞌa mooeꞌugasoo nadatsungadooa, noꞌokosoo hekwi nu-kwaꞌneꞌyookwusoo.”

Soo Te Naa noꞌokosoo hemma ka teepu-koobatu matabue, yise oo-paꞌanakwatu tuwazoo, pana mu numu tumaꞌemukwakese, soo Te Naa gi hownnekoo mu sootuhi-waꞌneꞌyoo, ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsase, soo Te Naa noꞌokosoo hemma ka teepu-koobatu nanakwaꞌnesoo sootuhi.
Mu tuwazoo uga gi ka Te Naa puaꞌa-gaꞌyoo, gi ka Te Naa sopedakwadoo, ooonneꞌyoona mu gi oo nakabetseꞌa.

Pana menoꞌo yise soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsase yise Te Naa pupuaꞌamu mu mayugweke. Tamme ka ooosapa Te Naa besa unnepu nakaꞌoedyukuna, soo Te Naa te puꞌa, yise ka te tumaꞌemukwapu tamme ooemota nemayugwedooa.

Mooasoo noꞌobatusoo numu ka teepu-koobatu ka Te Naa unnepu naka, mu punnoꞌo. Soo Te Naa besa unnepu mee, “Soo Te Naa saaꞌa te sootuhikwu.” Ekow besa naꞌunnedu Nu, Paul, mana tooe hano tooe numu-too tuukwenummekwu.
Tooe ka e tunakaꞌoedyuku-koobatoo mu numu nuka wohoꞌne sapa nu besa soonamme ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tummatzina. Mooasoo soo Te Pabeꞌe nu-kwaꞌnesoo punnoꞌo ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-koobatoo nakwohoꞌne.

Oꞌnosoo Te Naa meeoo tusooyugwe, “Saaꞌa noꞌobatusoo numu E Besaa Tooaꞌa-no meadabekwu. Oꞌno umu oo sopedakwadookwu ka pumme e bise Te Pabeꞌe-no numu nemadabuekwu.” Soo Te Naa uga besa tu tusooyugwena gi mu numu tuukwe. Menoꞌo yise soo Te Naa tu pooha-matu-ma e sootuhise tu besa tusooyugwe-witu mu numu e tuukwe tuungu.

Ooonneꞌyoona nu ooosapa Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi Te Naa unnepu nakasoopedakwudoose, mu numu owetuoo mu tunesootabuenumme. Oꞌno kaaheno nu mu numu tuukwekwu. Ka suda mu tumatuguna umu-matoosoo kodyu-witu nu mu numu tuya tuukwekwu. Soo Te Naa mee e netammana mu numu tunedyooese yise saaꞌa umu ka Te Naa-baa petugase umu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌneꞌyoosoodooa.
Nu sakwa mu tunesootabue, nu ooosapa noꞌoko mu nanesootuhikuyakwe mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu nu gi mu poonnepana mu numu Laodicea mee naneadu-kwi tuwazoo.
Nu mu nanesootuhikute mu sakwa besa sokwama. Mu sakwa nanano manekese, unu nanasoobedya manepetu. Mu Te Naa unnepu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu nakasopedakwadoose, oetoo mu nasootuhikwu.
Tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe sopedakwadoona tamme punnoꞌo noꞌoko hemma sopedakwadookwu, oosoo ka unu soonammena noꞌoko hemma sopedakwadoona.
Nu mu tuukwekwu ka mumme nemooagadu toge oo-waꞌnesoo nanakadu unnepu-ma tamme mu tooꞌe nemooaga, tamme sakwa gi umuoo nakaꞌoedyukupana.
Nu tubetse besa soonamme ka besa mu nanesootuhinoꞌo mu nakana ooosapa besa mu tunakaꞌoedyukute, tooe nu yaa kwingaꞌyoopana soo mumme e nanesootuhikuna ooosapa noꞌyoona mu-baa petugadyagwe.
Mooasoo mu ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-witu natunedyooepu. Mu sakwa ooosapa oo-no meanona,
oo-ma nasoonatsipunne. Mu sakwa nanaꞌunusoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyuku mu natunedyooe-kwaꞌne. Mu sakwa ooosapa mee unneyi, “Soo Te Naa tubetse besa e matugu.”

Mu sakwa gi nanemooagapana Mu numu nemooagadu mu soonamme-kwitu tooꞌe nemaꞌemukwakwu mee mu netammakwu, “Nu ewow hemma sopedakwatoona, unu soonamme, mu numu ewow hemma e tunedyooepu. Nu punnoꞌo ka besa naꞌunnedu mu mesoo tunedyooꞌe, mu sakwa nuga pooha nakabetseꞌa,” mee umu mu tooꞌe nemooagadu mu netammakwu. Gi umuoo nakabetseapana. Umu pummesoo tusooyugwena mu tuukweꞌe. Mu unne-witu o kadooꞌoo. Umuoo pooha sutaꞌyoo, gi ka Te Pabeꞌe Pooha-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Tamme sakwa ka Te Pabeꞌe suuꞌmu nakabetsea. Tooe Te Pabeꞌe numu manese sapa oosoo togesoo ka Te Naa-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Oosoo noꞌokosoo hemma ooonakwakoo pooha-gaꞌyoo, ooonneꞌyoona oosoo mu tubetse magwetzoipu.
Te Pabeꞌe Te Naa doodooamu mu yugweke ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukute, gi ka mu Jew numu tumayoho-too mu tumagwetzoi.
Te Naa mu mapudutupu-too ka mu tuꞌoedyukute, menoꞌo yise mu Te Pabeꞌe-no meanoꞌo. Umu uga sutakoo podo menoꞌo, menoꞌo gi

Oꞌnosoo umu gi Jew numu ka Te Naa gi nakabetseana soo Te Naa gi mu doodooamu-gaꞌyoo. Te Naa uga meeoo mu tooꞌe netamma, “Umu gi Te Naa nakabetseadu mu maꞌemukwana mu-matoosoo kodyukwu yise mu goekwu,” mee mu tooꞌe netamma. Mu uga mooasoo nakoopu-waꞌneꞌyoo. Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsase, soo Te tumayohope menoꞌo atasoo manepetu. Soo Te Naa te maꞌemukwana soomuꞌwase, yise te magwetzoikwu.
Ka Te Pabeꞌe nabatsase, oosoo noꞌoko ka sutakoo poohabe matzooekupu.
Umuoo mumme nemooagadu tu tumayohope mu tuukwekwu ka hownnekoo mu tukakwuna, mu hebena, yise hannanoꞌo mu nanesootuhi tabeba. Mu sakwa gi umuoo nakabetseapana, ka mumme mu nesootzeꞌma.
Umuoo tumayohope numme oꞌnosoo natuukweꞌe ka hemma Te Pabeꞌe-witu. Ka oo habagana numu-baa mooe petu-waꞌne. Pana mooasoo oo petuse, tamme gi ka oo habagana soogwaꞌe.

Umu numu poohadu sumuna mee mu nemooagakwu, “Nu pooha nose. Soo e pooha nosepu meeoo, ‘Mu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo numme ooonakwa unu pooha-gaꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa umuoo nanesootuhina nakakwu, gi tammetu. Tamme sakwa mu toha kakasa-gakoo te nanesootuhiku tuungu,’ “ meeoo umu. Soo Te Naa gi mu sootuhikwu umuoo nakabetseana. Umuoo numu nemooagadu besa sukwe nasooyugwedu, kadoo hee besa puma mu nasooyugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo. Umu suda tusooyugwedu sukwe numu soonammena.

Umuoo gi ka Te Pabeꞌe-toohakwi nanesootuhaꞌe. Tamme sakwa ooosapa ka Te Pabeꞌe-toohakwitu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka te kwo-waꞌneꞌyoo, tamme tunakaꞌoedyukudu yise oo tookoo-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe te makana tamme ooosapa nananotu ka a oho noko a tookoo yise a tamoo-waꞌne puu nananotu. Tamme yise naaꞌna ka Te Naa tamme netamma-kwaꞌnesoo.

Mooasoo mu oo sopedakwatoo mu ka Te Pabeꞌetu maneke ka mu-koobatoo oo nabatsase. Tamme gi ka sutakoo poohabe nakabetseꞌa, ka oꞌnosoo te nakabetseana. Tamme gi ekow teepu-koobatu ka sutakoo numu maꞌemukwana, gi nakabetseapana yise ekow teepu-koobatu mu numu tumayohope-doona gi nakabetseapana. Umuoo unu nabeatse-gana. Umu meeoo gi mownnekoo tukapana, gi mownnekoo tzamapana.
Ka umu hemma yaa teepu-koobatu oo netammana, saaꞌa kadoo namayugwekwudu.
Tamme ka umuoo tumayohope nakabetseana, tamme besow nananesootuhidu-kwaꞌne sukwe tatabuꞌa, tammesoo besa nanemadabuena pana umu ka suda te tusooyugwena gi kaaheno te mayugwekute.

Tamme ka oꞌnosoo mu numu-waꞌneꞌyoo te nanamooatupu tumayohope suuꞌmu nakabetseadu. Ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsase oꞌno tamme atasoo namayugweke, ka suda te tumatuguna kadoo namayugwe-kwaꞌne. Ka Te Pabeꞌe tu yaꞌe-kwikoo oo namayoda-kwaꞌne, tamme punnoꞌo pudu namanumudooke. Menoꞌo yise soo Te Pabeꞌe Te Naa-baatoo nabi, noꞌoko otuoo hemma nemadabuekwuse. Tamme sakwa ooosapa ka Te Naa-baatu soomayu, ka Te Pabeꞌe onoko. Tamme sakwa gi noꞌokosoo hemma soogwi ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona, tamme ka Te Naa doodooamu namayugwekese. Menoꞌo mu numu gi hownnekoo ka Te Pabeꞌe soopedakwudoona gi oo nakasopedakwatoo-kwaꞌneꞌyoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-ma te nasoonatzaꞌe. Pana ka saaꞌa Te Pabeꞌe yaa ka teepu-kooba atasoo oo yugwe petuse, tamme saaꞌa punnoꞌo pudu namanumudookwu oo-waꞌnesoo. Oꞌno yise noꞌyoona numu te poonnekwu ka atasoo te namayugwese tamme tookwa ka Te Pabeꞌe-baatu.

Ka Te Naa doodooamuna tamme sakwa gi ka sutakoo nakabetseapana ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona: gi suda tusooyugwepana, ka nanodukwana gi kukummaꞌa-noosoo nanapootamapana, tamme sakwa gi moogoobupana. Tamme ka moogoobuna, ka hemma namadabuena nakabetseadu-kwaꞌne, gi ka Tamme Manumudoopu madumotsea.
Umuoo tumaꞌemukwape numu-matoosoo kodyuna, kadoo mu mayugwekwu.
Mu punnoꞌo uga umuoo tumaꞌemukwape nakabetseadu.
Pana menoꞌo tamme sakwa gi suda manepana, oꞌnosoo te mane-kwaꞌne. Tamme sakwa gi sutapana, gi nidyanapana, gi numu nesootzemapana, gi nanaꞌesagoekupana, gi suda apegeapana,
soo Te Naa te pudu manumudookwu. Soo Te Naa nawaꞌnesoo te matabuekwu, tamme ka oo sopedakwadoona.
Soo Te Naa tamme noꞌobatusoo sumu-kwaꞌnesoo mayugweke: mu numu, mu wakwawaꞌa, mu tiboꞌo, mu ewow hee-gakoo numu, tutuha manedu tuwazoo, noꞌobatusoo sumu-kwaꞌneꞌyookwu.

Soo Te Naa unu te soobedyana te netutzea tu doodooamu manekwudu, besaꞌhoo numu te mayugwekwu. Tamme sakwa mu numu tummatzi, besa mu matuguna, gi numu ooonakwa besa nasooyugwepana, gi sutapana, gi nidyanapana.
Tamme sakwa gi nananesootzemapana. Ka mu numu tamme suda matuku sapa, tamme sakwa oo soomuꞌwa, soo Te Pabeꞌe puu te tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwapu.
Tamme sakwa unu nanasoobedya Te Naa tunetamma-kwaꞌnesoo. Tamme ka nanasoobedyana, sumu-kwaꞌneꞌyoosoo besa nanano meadabekwu.
Tamme sakwa ooosapa nanano tuunoyugwe, soo Te Naa meeoo te netammana, “Mu sakwa sumuoosoo numu-waꞌneꞌyoo.” Oosoo noꞌoko te sootuhaꞌe tamme yise meeoo, “Soo Te Naa tubetse besa ne matuku.”

Tamme sakwa ewa oetu soohaneyi ka Te Naa unnepu. Oꞌno tamme unu sokwamana tammesoo mesoo nananenoyugwe, ka Te Naa unnepu nanatunedyooe tuwazoo. Tamme sakwa tunekwuna mee unnemo, “Soo Te Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo.
Soo Te Naa besaꞌyoo, ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nemawunise.” Tamme sakwa ooosapa Te Naa nesootuhidyi. Tamme sakwa ka hemma how yugwena, tooetoo haꞌyoo unnena, Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhidyi.
Mu momokoꞌne sakwa pummesoo kooma nakabetsea, umu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakabetseana.
Mu nanana sakwa pummesoo nonodukwamu besa soobedya, besa mu matuguna. Umu sakwa gi mu nekusekapana.
Mu doodooake sakwa ooosapa tu naanapuaꞌamu nakabetsea, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka meeoo tunetammana.
Mu nanana sakwa pummesoo doodooamu gi masutakupana, umu sumuna nasootookekwu.

Mu numu sakwa ooosapa pumme nehanedu nakabetsea. Umu sakwa ooosapa kaaheno oo sooyugwe, ka Te Naa pumme meeoo netamma. Mu sakwa gi ka pumme nehanedu besa sukwe masoonammepana ka pumme oo poonnepunne suuꞌmu besa manegonnona. Ka tooe hemma tooe how yugwena tamme sakwa oo soomane,
tamme ka oo sopedakwadoona saaꞌa soo Te Naa te sootuhaꞌe ka besa te manakwe, tamme togesapa ka Te Pabeꞌe tummatzaꞌe.
Tamme ka suda manena soo suda te manena punnoꞌo tamme-matoosoo nakwukodyukukwu, soo Te Naa ka sumu-kwaꞌne numu sooyugwe gi sumuoosoo tuutzeana.
Soo mumme nehanedu sakwa besa mu tumanakaku, soo Te Naa ka noꞌokosoo hemma nehanedu.
Tamme sakwa ooosapa nanesootuhi gi manatu tooe sukwe soomayu. Tamme sakwa mee unne, “Te Naa tubetse besa te sootuhi.”
Mu sakwa punnoꞌo e nanesootuhiku. Nu ka mu numu Te Pabeꞌe besa unnepu tuukwenummena ooonneꞌyoo nu nakwutuma. E nanesootuhiku nu saaꞌa mu numu mesoo tuukweꞌe ka Te Naa besa unnepu,
ooka mu nakasopedakwatoo-kwikoo, nuka tu tunetammaku-kwaꞌnesoo.

Mu sakwa punnoꞌo nu-kwaꞌnesoo, ooosapa mu gisoo tunakaꞌoedyukudu tuukwe ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu. Tamme sakwa numu soonakana, ka besa naꞌunnedu waha. Tamme sakwa mu numu mesoo nanekwegeayi. Tamme ka mu gi soo tunakaꞌoedyukudu tamme poonnepunne gi suda manepana.
