Ka e puaꞌa, Tychicus mee naneadu eka tubope gwuudu mu-baa petugase, oosoo saaꞌa noꞌoko nu-kwitu mu tuukwedooa. Nu-kwaꞌnesoo soo Tychicus ooosapa manatooe nummenumme ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu, numu tunedyooena. Oosoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukute.
Nu mu-matoo oo taya oꞌno mu oo sopedakwadoo ka how ne manepunnena. Soo Tychicus saaꞌa besa mu masoonammedooa.

E besa puaꞌa, Onesimus mee naneadu oo-no. Mu sumuna mooasoo oo sopedakwadoo oosoo uga mu-nagatu. Mu-baaꞌyoona tuduhana namamea, menoꞌo yise tunakaꞌoedyuku maneke, nu yise oo-ma tubetse nasoonatzaꞌe. Umu saaꞌa noꞌoko yaatu namanena mu tuukwedooa.

Soo nana Aristarchus mee naneadu nu-no nakwutumadu mu nemaꞌyu. Soo Mark mee naneadu, Barnabas wkangaꞌa punnoꞌo mu nemaꞌyu. Mooasoo ka Mark-witu nu mu tuukwepu. Ka mu-baa oo petugase, saaꞌa oo nakabetsea, oo nabaaꞌyoo tuungu.
Soo nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu Jesus Justus mee naneadu punnoꞌo mu nemaꞌyu.

Noꞌoko mu ka Te Naa unnepu wahadu numu tunedyooedu-nagatu, umuoo nanana suuꞌmu Jew numu. Umu ooosapa besa e masoonammenoꞌo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe-witu numu tunedyooedu Epaphras mee naneadu mu nemaꞌyu. Soo Epaphras mu-nagatu kemmana, ooosapa mu nanesootuhikute mu sakwa ooosapa ka Te Naa nakabetseana oo nakaꞌoedyuku.
Nu ka Epaphras-witu meeoo mu tuukweꞌe, oosoo mu tummatzi, yise ka mu numu mu tzageꞌekwitu Laodicea noko Hierapolis mee nananeadu-kwitu.
Oosoo e puaꞌa, Luke mee naneadu mu nemaꞌyu, Demas punnoꞌo.
Nu umu e pupuaꞌamu Laodicea-witu soomaꞌyu. Soo mogoꞌne Nympha mee naneadu, mu tunakaꞌoedyudu oo-baaꞌyoona nanesootuhidu punnoꞌo.
Ka eka tubope mu naneakumakwuse, mu sakwa ka umu Laodicea-witu tunakaꞌoedyudu-matoo a mameaku. Mu sakwa yise ka tubope umu-matoo e tayana nea tuwazoo.
Ka nana Archippus mee naneadu sakwa mu tuukwekwu, “Mooasoo soo Te Pabeꞌe u manekwuna u pooha tuukwe. U sakwa oo tubetse nakabetsea ekow naꞌunnepu.”
Nu, Paul, nuusoo ekow boꞌo. E soomayu, nu nakwutuma. Nu mu nanesootuhikute, soo Te Naa mu sootuhikwu.

Mu Paul, Silas noko Timothy tubona. Mu Te Naa noko Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka Thessalonica mee naneadu-witu. “Mu sakwa ooosapa besa nasootuhi.” Numme ooosapa besow mu-toogoo natuunguyakwe.

Numme ooosapa Te Naa-matoo mu nanesootuhikute mee yise numme unneyakwe, “U, Ne Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo. Besakoo u ka mu Thessalonica-witu numu sootuhipu-gaꞌyoo. Umu yise besa manakwe.” Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu sootuhaꞌe tuwazoo. Wunaꞌme umu oo sopedakwatoo ka saaꞌa Te Pabeꞌe petukwuse pumme mu sootuhikwuse.
Numme oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa unu mu soobedyana, ka puu mu netutzease.

Numme ka Te Naa besa unnepu mu tuukweꞌena numme gi meeoo numu sukwe unnepu mu tuukweꞌe. Unu natzooꞌe esoo besa naꞌunnedu. Ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi mu ka oo unnepu nakaꞌoedyukute. Mu ka ne mu-baakoo oo sopedakwatoo ka ne hownneꞌyoona. Soo Te Naa ne nematunagapu mu-toogoo.
Mu yise numme-waꞌnesoo manakwe, ka Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌne, tuwazoo. Tooe mu ka mu numu mumme tumooꞌoosoo sapa, mu besa sokwama. Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha besa mu masokwamakute.
Mu yise noꞌoko mu Macedonia noko Achaia-witu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka Te Naa besa podo moohekwu.

Oꞌno yise mu noꞌoko mu numu Te Naa besa unnepu tuukweꞌe ka mu teepu, Macedonia noko Achaia-koobatu. Menoꞌo tooe hanotu tooe noꞌyoona mu numu mu-witu wahammoꞌo. Mu ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Gisoo mu-witu pumme ne tuukweꞌe mu numu mu-ma nanaꞌunneyakwe.

Umu meeoo ne tuukweꞌe mu besa sokwama, ka mu-baa ne nobengese. Umu meeoo ne tuukweꞌe mu ka Te Naa besa podo-tamme mea. Menoꞌo mu gi ka mu numu tumadabue-matoo nanesootuhi. Mu ka Te Tubetse Naa menoꞌo nakabetsea.
Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe magwetzoi ka oo yaꞌe-wikoo oo mayodase, oꞌno saaꞌa Te Pabeꞌe ka sumudooe yabesoo petuse te magwetzoikwu. Mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukutu maꞌemukwana saaꞌa umu-matoo kodyudooa.
Umu ne wohonedu ooosapa numme-witu suda mu tuukweꞌe. Mu ka toge-witu sopedakwatoo. Numme ka mu-baaꞌyoona ooosapa besa mu netummatzaꞌe mu oo sopedakwatoo.

Numme ka gisoo mu-baa petuna, ka Philippi-wiꞌyoona tubetse suda namatuku. Pana numme ka mu-baa petuse, gi suaꞌe, ka Te Naa numme besa sootuhaꞌe. Tooe ka susumudu numu numme tumooꞌoo sapa, numme gi nanenasookwina ka Te Naa besa unnena mu tuukweꞌe.
Numme ka Te Naa unnepu kaaheno mu tuukweꞌe. Numme gi suda manakwe. Numme tuwazoo gi mu nemooaga.

Soo Te Naa oo sopedakwatoo ka toge ne manakwe. Soo Te Naa ne netutzea mee ne netamma “Mu numu tuukwe ka besa naꞌunnedu.” Ooonneꞌyoona numme ka Te Naa numme netamma-waꞌnesoo manakwe ka Te Naa unnepu-waꞌnesoo ka mu yadooena; gi ka numu petzabe-waꞌne.
Gi numme hemma mu-makoo soogwaꞌe. Numme gi ooonneꞌyoo soo Te Naa oo sopedakwatoo. Mu punnoꞌo oo sopedakwatoo. Numme toge kaaheno mu tuukwe.
Numme gi mu numu ooonakwa besa nasooyugwedu.
Tooe sakwa mu ka Te Pabeꞌe tuukwewabe makase sapa, numme gi nagutza mu-makoo ookow soogwaꞌe. Numme mu mabetsea ka numu pea tu dooaꞌa mabetsea-kwaꞌne.
Numme noꞌoko besa mu pupuaꞌamu-gaꞌyoo. Numme mu soobedyana, numme besa oo sooyukwe ooonneꞌyoona numme ne tookoo mu-koobatoo mesoo soomawuni. Numme ka Te Naa besa unnena mu tuukweꞌe.
Numme ka Te Naa unnena mu sukwe tuukwe, numme unu manena ne tukapu mayuna, gi mu tunekwi ka hemma how mu yugwekuna.
Mu oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa punnoꞌo oo sopedakwatoo numme ooosapa kaaheno mu matugudu.
Tu naa-waꞌneꞌyoo numme mu-tamme. Numme mu nenoyukwena mee mu netamma,
“Mu sakwa ka Te Naa besa podo mea ka Te Naa tamme meeoo netamma. Soo Te Naa besa te nemadabuese yise saaꞌa te bidooa.”

Numme ooosapa Te Naa nesootuhaꞌe mu-koobatoo. Numme ka manow mu-baa petugase, mu besa sokwama. Mu ne nakapunne ka Te Naa unnepu-witu mumme ne tuukweꞌe. Mu oo nakasopedakwatoo oosoo Te Naa unnepu; gi sukwe numu unnena. Menoꞌo yise mu oo nagenoꞌo ka Te Naa mumme tummatzaꞌe.
Umu Jew numu mee nananeadu puusoo tu nanumu ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu tumooꞌoogena. Mu yise punnoꞌo oosoo manakwe. Mu nanumu punnoꞌo mumme tumooꞌoogena.

Mu Jew numu ooonneꞌyoo. Umu ooosapa suda manakwe ka Te Naa gi petzabedu-waꞌne. Umuoo mu numu tumooꞌoogena. Ka oꞌnosoo umu ka Te Naa yadooawabe-matu goepu-gaꞌyoo. Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus batsa. Numme tuwazoo oekoo tayakwuni.

Ne tooꞌe nedyooikute ka Te Naa unnepu mu wakwawaꞌa ne tuukweꞌe. Oꞌno mu wakwawaꞌa oo nakase, oo oedyukuse namagwetzoikwu. Mu Jew numu ooosapa tooe how tooe manakwe. Yaa menoꞌo mu Jew numu suda tumatugupu umu-matoosoo namakodyukugena.
Ne pupuaꞌamu, gi haaꞌnotu umu Jew numu mu-baakoo ne nekaꞌapunne. Pana numme mu soomaꞌyu, numme sakwa sumu tuwazoo mu-no nanobenge.
Waha numme mu-matoo tooꞌe meayakwe soo Te Kwoho suda tumayugwedu ne tzadyooikuyakwe.
Numme besa mu-matoo sokwama. Mu tuwazoo besa ne masokwama. Ka saaꞌa Te Pabeꞌe yaa petuse,
Te Naa ne netubetseaꞌekwu tooe hannanoꞌo tooe mu-koobatoo.

Ka oꞌnosoo numme ka mu-baaꞌyoona mu tuukweꞌe soo Te Naa meeoo unnepu mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu nanetumooꞌookwu, meeꞌe. Ka saaꞌa numme ka Athens-wiꞌyoona, “Haꞌooga mu menoꞌo?” mee sokwama. Numme meeoo nananetamma, “Yow menoꞌo mu numu nanatumooꞌoogena.” Mu ka sumuna nasootooke. Sumuna soo suda tumatugudu etzaꞌa puhu-wi mu tzanekeana, meeoo mu netammana, “Umu Te Naa po ooemota meꞌa ka mu numu pumme wohoꞌne.” Sumuna numme oo sukwe manakwe, ka Te Naa unnepu mu tuukweꞌena. Numme tubetse unu mu-witu nakasokwama, mu haaꞌa togesoo tunakaꞌoedyukute? Soo e puaꞌa Timothy nu-waꞌnesoo. Oosoo ooosapa ka Te Naa besa unnepu-witu mu numu tuukwekena. Soo Timothy mu numu nanesootuhi nemayugwekena, umu yise tubetse unu ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukute. Nu mu-matoo oo taꞌya. Oosoo sakwa mu nenoyukwena mu ooosapa tunakaꞌoedyuku, tooe mu numu mumme netumooꞌoo sapa.

Menoꞌo oosoo numme-baasoo kodyu petu. Oosoo meeoo ne tuukwe mu ka Te Naa unnepu-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna, mu nanasoobedyana, mu ooosapa ne soomayuna, numme sakwa sumu tooe mu-baasoo petuga, numme tusooyugwe-waꞌnesoo.
Tooe mu numu suda ne matugupana numme besa mu sokwamakute, numme ka meeoo tunakase mu togesoo tunakaꞌoedyukute meeꞌe. Menoꞌo yise numme gi suda mu sokwamakute mu ka Te Naa besa podo meana.
Numme ka Te Naa nesootuhaꞌe mu-koobatoo, mu ka besa ne masokwamase.
Numme ooosapa meeoo nanesootuhiyakwe, “Numme sakwa mu-baatoosoo kodyuse ka mumme ne tunedyooena mamakwu ka pukwi mu tunakaꞌoedyukuna.”
Numme meeoo mu nanesootuhikuyakwe soo Te Naa God ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-no sakwa tooe hownnekoo tooe mu-baatoosoo ne makodyuka.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe sakwa unu nanasoobedya mu mayugwe, nokoꞌo mu numu noꞌokosoo mumme ne soobedya-kwaꞌnesoo.
Oosoo ka nanesootuhi mu mayugwena mu pewu besa mu sootuhikwu. Ka saaꞌa Te Pabeꞌe mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-baa petuse oꞌno mu besa sokwamakwu.

Oꞌno yise, mu ne nanumu, ka Te Naa besa po nagena, ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus tunetammana ka Te Naa unne-waꞌne manekwu. Numme mooasoo ookow mu tuukweꞌepu-gana, menoꞌo tuwazoo numme ookoosoo mu tubetse tuukweꞌe. “Ooosapa ka Te Naa petzabe-waꞌne mu manakwe.”
Ka Te Pabeꞌe ooosapa nage, numme Te Pabeꞌe pooha-toohakwi mu tuukweꞌe ka mu-baaꞌyoona.
Mu sakwa gi nanakummaꞌasoo nasoodyagepana, gi kukummaꞌakoosoo maꞌemukwapana. Oꞌno mu besa-wikoo nananodukwagakwu.
Gi ka Te Naa-wi gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-waꞌneꞌyoopana. Umu gi ka Te Naa besa po sopedakwatoo. Umuoo suda tutusooyugwedu.
Gi nanatumooapana, gi tutzetumepana gi ka nanakummaꞌakoosoo nananodukwa-no nanapootama-pana, mu ka gi besa tumatuguna soo gi besa mu tumatuguna umu-matoosoo kodyudooa, mee numme mooasoo mu tuukweꞌe.
Soo Te Naa besowsoo mu-makoo soogwaꞌe, gi ka suda nanamanedu.
Mu ka Te Naa unnena gi nakabetseana; mu Te Naa unnepu ooowemota manakwe gi esoo sukwe numu unnena. Ooonneꞌyoona soo Te Naa ka Tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma te sootuhi.
Mooasoo Te Naa meeoo mu tunedyooepu muusoo nanasoobedya meeꞌe. Ooonneꞌyoona soo Te Naa ka Tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma te sootuhi.
Mu noꞌoko mu tunakaꞌoedyukuduno ka teepu, Macedonia mee naneadu-koobatu nanasoobedya. Numme menoꞌo mu tuukweꞌe, ne nanumu, mu sakwa ooosapa unusoo nanasoobedya.

Gi nanasoosagwaekupana, gi kukummaꞌakoosoo numu matzamapana. Oo maneno mumme ne tuukwe-kwaꞌne, “Gi toetzegoepana.” Muusoo namagwetzoimmoꞌo oꞌno mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu mu poonnena umu tookwa besa manakwe mee sokwamadooa.

Ne nanumu, umu mooasoo tuipu-witu numme besasoo mu tuukwekwu. Soo Te Naa ekow mu tooꞌe tuukweꞌe, soo numu ka yaꞌese, oo-baa petugayakwe ka oo nakaꞌoedyukuna. Umu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu suda sokwamayakwe ka tu soobedyana yaꞌeyakwe. Mu sakwa gi umu-waꞌnesoo tusooyugwepana.
Tamme tunakaꞌoedyukuna meeoo tuukwe, Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsapuna yise namayodapu, tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukuna tamme punnoꞌo te yaꞌe-wikoo namayodakwu, ka tamme oo bise.

Soo Te Naa tamme tunemayugwekupu meeoo mu numu te tuukwetuungu, sumuꞌyoo numu yotsedu mu toha kakasa-gakoo moohedu-matu saaꞌa paꞌanakwana mooe wuekedooa. Soo Te Naa tumooyagakunoo saaꞌa namooyagakudooa, oꞌno saaꞌa yise punnoꞌo soo Te Pabeꞌe Te Naa-baaꞌyoona tubongo wuekedooa. Mooeꞌugasoo mu tuipu Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu tu yaꞌe-wikoo namayodase oo mooe wegeadooa.
Yise tamme tunakaꞌoedyukudu togesoo gwetzoimodu toogoopatoo natzadyakwegakwu ka koomeba-nagatoo, tubetse paꞌa ka teepu-kooba Te Pabeꞌe wegeakwu. Tamme ooosapa oo-baꞌyookwu.
Eka meeoo naꞌunnedu nakaꞌoedyukuna ooosapa mitoo nananenoyugweno.
Numme gi mu tuukwe-waꞌneꞌyoo ka hannanoꞌo Te Pabeꞌe kodyupetukwuna. Mooasoo mu oo naka, gi haga oo sopedakwatoo ka Te Pabeꞌe tooe hannanoꞌo tooe yabesoo oo petukwuna.

Mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu meeoo sokwama gi hee oo manepunne, gi oo suda namanekwu. Umu yabesoo kadoo namamaꞌekwu. Umu gi oo namamea-waꞌneꞌyoo. Ka koheadu mogoꞌne-waꞌne oosoo puu nuummabu wuma ka dooaꞌa-doona. Ookow tabeba-wi ka Te Pabeꞌe petuse mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu gisoo namamakwupunnekwu. Gi obeda oosoo tamme-tamme kemmakwu.

Mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu puu togano baakoese yise utuina, gi umu tu namanekwuna sopedakwadookwu. Pana mu yise gi ooonneꞌyoo. Mu numu-waꞌnesoo tabua-wisoo mommodu. Mu ka oo tu namanekwuna sopedakwatoo. Tamme sakwa namabetseapunne. Tamme sakwa Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna, unu nanasoobedyana oo soomayuna soo Te Naa te mabetseakwu. Tamme ka besa tunakaꞌoedyukuna tamme sutakoo nematzagakwunina ka Te Pabeꞌe petukwunu-toogoo tamme namamakwupunnekwu.

Te Naa tusoohanena soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme mabetseakwuna. Soo sutaꞌyoo gi tamme-matoo kodyukwu, soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo mooasoo nabatsapu. Tamme ooosapa Te Pabeꞌe podo oo-no meadabekwu. Tamme ooosapa oo-noꞌyookwu ka oo kodyu petuse tooe tamme tuipupana tooetoo how gwetzoipana.
Nananetummatzina, nanatummatzina, nanatukwena ka ooosapa hemma yoo manekena ooosapa mu manekeno.
Umu te moohedu besa tamme mu tunedyooedu-witu, ne nanumu, numme mu tuukwekwu. Umu Te Pabeꞌe tunetutzeana, umu te tunedyooekwu. Tamme sakwa mu netubetseapunne.
Tamme sakwa besa umu-tamme tusooyugwena, mu nakabetseana, mu soobedyana, umu ka Te Naa manewabena. Gi sakwa tammesoo nanagoepana.
Ooosapa oetoo nananenoyugwena. Mu toetzegoedu-mitoo nenoyugwe. Mu nenoyukwe mu nasootookedu. Mu gi nanatzooedu tummatzina. Gi haka sakwaꞌekupana.
Umu suda ume tumatugukudu gi tumakodyukupana. Ooosapa besa nanamatugu.
Ooosapa besa sokwamammo.
Ooosapa nanesootuhina.
Noꞌokosoo hekwi ka Te Naa nesootuhina, “Te Naa besaꞌyoo,” meeꞌe. Ekow soo Te Pabeꞌe te tzapoonnekute ka Te Naa tamme tunemadabuekuna.
Gi ka Te Naa Besa Pooha mu-nagakwi manennummedu netakonepana.
Sumuna numu mee mu netammakwu, “Menoꞌo nuga pooha unnena nu mu tuukwekwu.” “Hownnekoo pooha-gana oosoo meeoo unakwe?” mee mu sokwama. Oosoo ka kaaheno Te Naa unnepuna oꞌno sakwa mu oo nakapunne.
Noꞌoko sutakoo gi nagepana.

Soo Te Naa puusoo noꞌoko te sootuhaꞌe. Numme meeoo oo-matoo nanesootuhi, oosoo sakwa noꞌoko besa mu mabetsea. Oosoo mu mabetseakwu; mu tookoo, mu soonamme-witu, mu moogooꞌa. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka petuse, gi mu hownnekoo mu poonnepetukwu.
Soo Te Naa ka mu netutzease tu unne-kwaꞌnesoo manekwu.
Ne nanumu, mu sakwa ooosapa ne nanesootuhiku
Mu sakwa mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tuukweꞌe tamme nanapupuaꞌamu.
Mu sakwa ka eka mu-matoo ne tubona noꞌoko mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu neaku.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus noꞌoko mu sootuhikwu.
Mu Paul, Silas, noko Timothy tubona, umu ka Te Naa noko Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu ka Thessalonica mee naneadu-witoo nabodu.
Numme mu nanesootuhikute mee unnena, “Te Naa, Te Pabeꞌe Jesus mu sakwa mu numu sootuhise umu besa sokwama, besa gwetzoimo.
U, Ne Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo.” Besa numme ka mu nanesootuhikuna, mu unusoo oo nakaꞌoedyukuna yise besa nasootuhikwu tuwazoo unusoo nanasoobedyakwu.
Numme mu-matoo besa sokwama mee unnena, “Tooe mu numu ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu suda matuguna umu gi suda soonamme-waꞌneꞌyoo umu ooosapa tunakaꞌoedyukukwu.”
Tooe menoꞌo mu ka nanamatsamana, yise tuwazoo nanamooedyugwepana, ka Te Naa besa po nage. Soo Te Naa kaaheno umu-toogoo besaꞌyoo, oosoo ka mumme atasoo yugwena.
Soo Te Naasoo besa mu mayugwekwu. Saaꞌa oosoo ka sutakoo umu mumme kusegea-matoosoo makodyukukwu.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe saaꞌa ka suda-makoo te magwetzoidooa ka paꞌanakwana kodyu petuse. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka petuse, umu pumme tummatzidu, toha kasa-gana-no,
Soo Te Pabeꞌe besa kootabedooadu goso-waꞌne tabuana petukwu. Umu ka te unne-too gi tumayohodu soo Te Naa gi nakasootuhi-waꞌneꞌyoo umu ka gi Te Naa-witu tu sopedakwatoona petzabena.
Umuoo gi Te Naa-baa petuga-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa gi mu sootuhi-waꞌneꞌyoo ka suda mu tumatuguna umu-matoosoo kodyuse, oosoo gi mu magwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo ka unu tu pooha-ga-ma.
Mu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe petuse, mu tubetse nasootuhikwu. Noꞌyoona umu oo nakaꞌoedyukudu ka Te Pabeꞌe netubetseayikwu, mu umu-noꞌyookwu, mu ka mumme ne tuukwena nakaꞌoedyukuna.

Menoꞌo yise numme ooosapa mee mu nanesootuhikuyakwe, soo Te Naa sakwa unu mu pooha-maka. Oꞌno yise mu noꞌoko ka besa mu manena, besa mu tusooyugwena mamakwese mu yise Te Naa besa podo meanokwu. Soo Te Naa yise mee mu netammakwu, “Mu e tusoohaneku-waꞌnesoo besa manakwe.”
Mumme mane-kwitoo, soo Te Pabeꞌe besaꞌyoona napoonnekwu. Mu punnoꞌo oo tzapoonnekwu ka besa manena ka Te Pabeꞌe mumme neyugwetoosoo manena.

Ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme bikwu-witu nu mu tuukwekwu. Gi ka kummaꞌakoosoo mumme nemooaga oo nakabetseapana. Gi suda oo sokwamakupana. Susumudu mu-naga-kwitu mu nemooagadu meeoo mu tuukwekwu, “Soo Te Pabeꞌe pudusoo kodyu petukwu,” meeꞌe. Umu nuupoohadu sumuna, “Ne pooha meeoo ne tuukweꞌe,” mee deaꞌa umu unakwe mooasoo. Sumuna tooe haga tooe meeoo mu tunedyooꞌe. “Umu meeoo tuboꞌo,” mee sumuna umu ne netamma. Numme yise gi oo manakwe. Mooasoo numme mu tuukwe ookow a namanekwuna ka mu-baaꞌyoona. Gi oo soomuꞌwapana numme mooasoo meeoo mu tuukwe mooaꞌugasoo namanekwudu umu saaꞌa ka Te Naa unu netumooꞌookwu. Mooasoo mu numu-matu ka Te Naa watze tumooꞌoo. Umuoo suda tu tumatuguna besa soobedya. Umuoo gi ooka togesapa naꞌunnedu nakaꞌoedyukute. Umuoo soo Te Naa matusookwunikwu, umu ka naꞌesagoedu nakabetseana. Pana menoꞌo hee sapaga ka suda namanedu tzadyooikupunne. Mu ka ooka tzadyooikudu sopedakwatoo. Saaꞌa ka hemma toge manepetuse, oeꞌyoonasoo oo tzadyooikudu nayadooakwu. Oꞌno yise soo sutaꞌyoo nana sutakoo pummesoo pooha mu numu tzapoonnekukwu, oosoo nana sutakoo pooha-gaꞌyoo suta-tamme mu numu moohedu. Oosoo mu Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu mamooakakwu, ka ewow nanesootuhidu tooe netakonekwu. Ka pabow Te Naa nanesootuhi nobe-kwi egease puu oeꞌyoona oosoo mu numu nemadunagakwu. Meeoo yise unnekwu, “Nu yow. Nu oosoo mu Manumudoopu. Nu Mu Tubetse Naa.” Oꞌno yise soo Te Pabeꞌe yaa teepu-koobasoo kodyu petuse, ka tu songapu pooha-ga manese, ka ooka sutakoo pooha-gakoo kadoo mayugwekwu.

O tooꞌe, besa numme ka Te Naa nanetzakwiyigena, “U, Ne Naa besa mu numu sootuhipu.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu soobedya. Soo Te Naa mu netutzea mu ka mooeꞌugasoo tunakaꞌoedyukuna mu ka besa oo soonakaꞌoedyukuna. Ka mumme ne tuukwe-kwaꞌnesoo Te Naa tu besa pooha-matu-ma mu sootuhi, mu yise Te Naa besa podo mea. Oosoo mu magwetzoise, ka saaꞌa mu Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-matoo mease, ooosapa oo-baaꞌyoona, mu oo-waꞌneꞌyookwu.
Yise, ne nanumu, gi nasootookepana. Ka mu-baaꞌyoona mumme ne tuukwepu ooosapa nakaꞌoedyuku, ka mu-matoo ne tubona tuwazoo.

Numme meeoo mu nanesootuhikute soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus ka Te Naa mu nakaꞌoedyukute mu sootuhikwu, oꞌno mu besa tumatuguna besow suuꞌmu apegeakwu. Oosoo te soobedyana, te nenoyugwe, te tummatzina te sootuhaꞌe.
Mu sakwa ooosapa ne nanesootuhiku numme ka mu numu Te Pabeꞌe besa unnepu tuukwena, ewaꞌyoo oo nakase oo nakaꞌoedyukukwu, yise mu-kwaꞌnesoo manekwu.
Ne nanesootuhiku, soo Te Naa sutakoo tamme ooemota mayugweku, tooe ka susumudu numu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu suda numme mu sooyukwe sapa.
Tamme sakwa ooosapa Te Pabeꞌe tunetamma-kwaꞌne mane. Oosoo nanesootuhi mu mayugwese, ka mu numu mumme kusegeadu oo ooemota mu neyugwese, mu magwetzoikwu.
Numme mooasoo oo sopedakwatoo mumme ne tuukwe-kwaꞌne mu manakwe. Mu sakwa ooosapa maneno, ka Te Pabeꞌe-toohakwiꞌyoona.

“Soo Te Pabeꞌe sakwa ooosapa nawaꞌnesoo mu sokwamatuguku,” mee numme mu nanesootuhikuyakwe. “Soo Te Pabeꞌe ooosapa noꞌoko numu soobedyadu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe gi numu nasoomenakwadu.” Numme ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo mu nanesootuhikukwu, “Mu numu unu nana soobedyakwu, Te Naa-waꞌnesoo yise mu gi numu nasoomenakwakwu, ka Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌnesoo.”
Ne nanumu, soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu tunetammakute, “Mu totoetsebu-ma gi tzabepana.” Mu totoetsebu numu gi ne nakabetseadu.
Numme gi tototseabu ka mu-baaꞌyoona, mu ne poonne. Numme tabewano hemma how yugwe yongo-matoo tooe mu numu tunedyooepana.
Tooe mu numutu tunedyooedu sakwa namakayakwe sapa, ooosapa namakayipana, gi hemma mu-makoo soogwaꞌe. Nummesoo nakwitu poohwaꞌe.
Mooasoo numme ka mu-baaꞌyoona meeoo mu netamma, “Mu toetzegoedu sakwa gi namakapana.”
Numme meeoo tunaka susumudu mu-baatu unu toetzebu, gi hemma how yugwedu. Umu ka numu matzama.
Umuoo ooonnekoo soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo te netamma tuungu. “Muusoo nakoobatoo mane gi nakasagwipana, oꞌno yise mu besa sokwamakwu.”
Ne nanumu, ooosapa besa manenona gi nasootookepana.
Mu oo meesoo sopedakwadoo ka mu numu Te Pabeꞌe besa unnena gi mayohodu. Oo tsasoopedya oosoo ka tumaꞌemukwase nasookwikwu.
Pana yise gi mu wohonepana. Umu-too besaꞌyoona besakoosoo mu tuukwe ka mu maꞌemukwa.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe nana-matoo te sokwamatugukute. Oo-matoo yise tamme nanesootuhina oosoo noꞌoko te nakasootuhina nanatamme mu nanatogeꞌyookwuna, yise ooosapa mu besa sokwamamokwu.
Nu Paul nuusoo tupokwu. Oꞌno muusoo oo tubetse sopedakwadookwu esoo nugasoo mi-ma e tubona.
Nu meeoo nanesootuhi soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus noꞌoko mu sootuhikwu.

Nuga tubona, Paul, e puaꞌa, Timothy-matoo. Nu mooasoo Te Pabeꞌe-witu u tunedyooꞌepu mu Te Naa God Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-no meeoo e netamma, “Mu numu tuukwe ka Mu Pabeꞌe-witu.” Soo Te Naa togesapa te magwetzoipu. Te Pabeꞌe tamme poonnekwu ka pumatoo te nanetzakwiyina. Oꞌno tamme oo-waꞌneꞌyookwu.
Nu u sopedakwatoo. U togesoo oo nakaꞌoedyukute ka ume e tuukwena ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-witu. Nu meeoo u nanesootuhikute soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-no sakwa besa u mabetsea, u sootuhina, u magwetzoi.
Nu ka gi soo Macedonia-witoo meana, “U sakwa yaa Ephesus-wizoo,” mee nu u tubetse netamma. “U sakwa mu numu nemooagadu tunedyooe mu tuukwe umu sakwa nukatu tunedyooe-kwaꞌnekoosoo mu tunedyooe.”

Umu sakwa gi mu Jew numu pumme tunedyooena tumayohokupana, yise kukummaꞌakoosoo numu pumme tunedyooena gi nakabetseapana. Oosoo ooonneꞌyoo numu pukwi nanahana, ka oo tu namane-kwi umu Te Naa gi nakaꞌoedyukute. Pana soo Te Naa meeoo te tubetse netamma, “Nuka suuꞌmu nakaꞌoedyuku.”
Sumuba naꞌunnedu soo Te Naa meeoo te netamma, “Nanasoobedyana ka nu-kwitu tubetse tunakaꞌoedyuku kaaheno nuga podo meano.”
Susumudu numu ka Te Naa besa po ooemota maneyugwe. Umuoo sukwe apegea, gi hekwitu nehanepana.
Umuoo ka mu Jew numu tumayohona gi nakasopedakwatoopana numu tooꞌe tunedyooe.
Ka moomooasoo soo Moses nanamooꞌatupu mu Jew numu tumayohona te tuukweꞌe oosoo besaꞌyoo ka pumme tu nakasopedakwatoo.

Tamme sakwa oo nakasopedakwadoo ka mu Jew numu tumayohona ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu too sutaꞌyoo, umu tooꞌe natunedyooena gi ka mooasoo besaꞌyoo numu-doo. Mu ooonneꞌyoo sutaꞌyoo numu: Ka Te Naa-witu suda nanatuukwedu, tu naanapuaꞌamu mesoo goena, kummaꞌakoosoo numu mesoo goena.
Kukummanosoo nanaꞌaheegoena, numu tooe tuduhana, esagoena, suda nana-witu naꞌesagoena, tooe how tooe manakwe.
Yow esoo Te Naa unnepu oo tuukwena. Soo Te Naa meeoo e netamma, “Noꞌoko mu numu nuga besa unnepu tuukwe.”
Nu ka Te Pabeꞌe nesookwugaꞌe unu oo nakabetsea. Nuka oosoo sakwa e nakabetsea e sooyugwena soo Te Pabeꞌe nuka netutzeapu.
Oꞌnosoo nu gisoo tunakaꞌoedyukuna ka Jesus suda netammana, ka oo nanumu kusegeana, nu tookwa ka Te Pabeꞌe wohonepana, gi oo nakasopedakwatoo. Ooonneꞌyoopana soo Te Pabeꞌe e sootuhipu.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe tunakaꞌoedyuku e mayugwe.
Soo tooe haga tooe tubetse togesapa yadooꞌa ka meeoo unnena, “Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka te teepu-kooba petu mu sutakoo numu putamme manese mu magwetzoikwuse.” Nu yow uga tubetse sutaꞌyoo numu.

Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus e sootuhipu. Ooonneꞌyoona mu tzapoonnekute, te mesoo sootuhaꞌe tuwazoo tooꞌe ka pumme te wohoꞌne sapa. Menoꞌo yise tuwazoo te tzapoonnekute umu pumme nakaꞌoedyukudu magwetzoina.
Numme oo nesookwugaꞌe, “U, Ne Naa ooosapa ne moohenummekwudu, gi mobekwa-gaꞌyoo. U Ne Tubetse Naa. Gi haga u poonnedu. Tooe haga tooe, tooe hanotu tooe, sakwa ooosapa u nesootuhimo.”
E puaꞌa, Timothy, nu meeoo u netamma u sakwa oo tubetse nakabetsea ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus noꞌoko hekwitu ka meeoo ume oo pooha netamma-kwaꞌnesoo. U oo soomayu ka oꞌnosoo mu numu u-makoo poohabe poonne.
U sakwa ooosapa Te Naa unnepu nakaꞌoedyukuna oꞌno u ooosapa besa manenokwu. Susumudu numu oe tu tunakaꞌoedyuku soomuꞌwa umu ka gi tubetse besa tu soonamme-kwikoo hemma mayohona.

Soo Hymenaeus-no Alexander mee naneadu ooonneꞌyoo. Nu ka suda-tamme umu tzamuna umu sakwa oo natunedyooese, gi ka Te Naa suda netammadooa. Oꞌno saaꞌa suda tu unnepu nematzagase soo Te Naa oꞌno mu sootuhidooa.
Tamme sakwa noꞌoko tooe hownnekoo tooe numu nanesootuhiku soo Te Naa sakwa mu sootuhi, tamme yise Te Naa oowetoo netubetseꞌa.
Noꞌobatusoo mu numu moohedu tamme sakwa nanesootuhiku tuwazoo. Oꞌno yise umu gi te wohonena tamme ka besa podo gi namatzamana mesoo meadabekwu.
Tamme ka mu numu moohedu nanesootuhikuna, oꞌno yise Te Naa ookow besaꞌyookute.
Mu numu sakwa noꞌyoona ka Te Naa-witu besa nakasopedakwatoo, Te Naa noꞌoko numu soomagwetzoaꞌe.

Soo Te Naa suuꞌmu pumatoo te nanesootuhina. Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus tubetse numu mane. Tamme-kooba nabatsase te magwetzoi. Soo Te Pabeꞌe te naamookwi manepunne. Oꞌno soo Te Pabeꞌe suuꞌmu ka tamme Te Naa noko nanapuaꞌamu mayugwedooa. Soo Te Naa meeoo mu numu tuukwe.
Soo Te Naa nuka yise netutzeapu mu gi Jew numu tunesootabue mee unnena.
Mu naana tooe hanotu tooe sakwa Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhi. Umu sakwa gi sutapana, gi nanahapana ka nanesootuhina. Ka suda tu manena nematzagase oꞌno besa ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhina.

Mu momokoꞌne sakwa punnoꞌo besa tunakaꞌoedyukuna besa nanesootuhi-no. Umu sakwa gi tu nagwe a tubua-ma mu numu nasootzaꞌmekupana, gi how tuwazoo tu tzopuhu-ma namadabue-ma nasootzaꞌmepana gi ka besa tatabuadu-ma namasooapana tuwazoo.
Mu momokoꞌne sakwa besa mu tumatugukugena, oꞌno mu numu mu posopedakwadoona, umu tookwa tubetse tunakaꞌoedyukudu mee mu sooyugwe.
Noꞌyoona mu momokoꞌne sakwa oo nakapunne ka pummetu tunedyooꞌe. Gi pummesoo tusooyugwena wahapana.
Gi sakwa mu momokoꞌne ka mu naana puu tunemadabueku, tuwazoo gi mu naana tunedyooe. Umuoo momokoꞌne sakwa gi unnepana.
Soo nana, Adam mee naneadu mooe namanumudoopu, oꞌno yise soo mogoꞌne Eve mee naneadu oobenakwatu namadabue.
Soo Adam gi nanemooagapu pana soo Eve yise nanemooagase suda mooe tumatugupu.
Ka ꞌyoo manena mu momokoꞌne namagwetzoi umu yise ka oe tunakaꞌoedyukuna ka tooaꞌadoona gi noꞌosoo nummabodona besa oo-toogoo tsebooenokwu yise ka Te Naa besa podo meadabenokwu.
Esoo naꞌunnedu togesapa, “Gi nasookwipana ka nananesootuhidu moohena esoo besaꞌyoo.”

Ka mu nananesootuhidu moohedu sakwa kaaheno besa tumatugudu. Umu sakwa noꞌyoona nanasuꞌmu nonodukwa-ga. Umu sakwa gi suda-ma namaꞌemukwa, besa tutusooyugwedu, gi numu nasootzaꞌmekupana tuwazoo. Umu sakwa ka mu numu tummatzi ka tooe hekwi tooe. Umu sakwa gi puusoo ewow hemma sookwipana, umu gi baagoedu. Umu sakwa gi nidyupupana, gi etzaga sutapana, besa ooosapa numu matugu.

Umu sakwa besa numu tunedyooedu. Umu sakwa oo sopedakwatoo ka tu nodukwa noꞌoko tu dooamu tunemadabueku, oꞌno umu tu naa nakabetseakwu. Umu ka gi pummesoo dooamu meeoo tunedyooena, umu tookwa gi ka Te Naa dooamu meeoo tunedyooe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Umu sakwa gi pudu tunakaꞌoedyukudu. Umu ka ooonneꞌyoona sumuna paba nasooyugwekwu. Soo suda tu tumatuguna umu-matoosoo kodyukwu ka Sutakoo tu yugwe-kwaꞌnesoo.
Umu sakwa mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-tamme kaahenoꞌyoo besa mu nematugu, oꞌno yise numu gi mu nesootzema-waꞌneꞌyoo. Ka mu numu sumuna umu nesootzeꞌma soo sutaꞌyoo suda-kwi mu mesoo mayugwe.

Mu numu nanesootuhidu tummatzikwudu sakwa besa naꞌeyaꞌese oꞌno sakwa umu nanetutzea. Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu sakwa oo mooe sopedakwatoo ka besaꞌyoona. Umu nanetutzeadu sakwa ka Te Naa podo besa tu meakwuna tzapoonne umu sakwa gi esagoepana, gi baagoepana, gi numu tuꞌooepana, gi puusoo hemma natoogoo soogwipana tuwazoo. Ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna ka puusoo nasopedakwadoona ka Te Naa besa podo meana.
Mu pepeawabe ka mu nanesootuhidu tummatziwabe sakwa punnoꞌo besaꞌyoo. Umu sakwa gi numu nesootzemapana, gi etzaga haꞌyoo tooe naneyugwepana, ooosapa kaaheno besa tumatuguna oꞌno besaꞌyoo.
Mu nanesootuhidu tutummatziwabe sakwa nanasusumu nonodukwa-ga, mu doodooamu sakwa punnoꞌo besa mu nakabetsea, noꞌoko tu nobe-witu meeoo tunedyooe tuwazoo.
Umu ka besa mu nanesootuhidu tutummatzina mu numu besa mu sooyugwe. Umuoo gi nasookwina Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-witu wahakwu.
Nu yabesoo u-baa soopetugaꞌa pana sumuna nu gi oo mane-waꞌneꞌyoo. Ooonneꞌyoona nu u-matoo tuboꞌo, oꞌno yise u ka Te Tubetse Naa-matoo nanesootuhibu kaaheno mu numu tunedyooe.

Ka Te Pabeꞌe-ma numme tunekwuꞌu. Te Pabeꞌe yaa teepu-kooba tamme-waꞌnesoo nadooaꞌadoopu. Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha oo tzapoonne oosoo Te Naa Besa Tooaꞌa. Oobe paꞌatoo tamme-koobatoosoo ka Te Naa-baatoo oosoo kodyuka. Noꞌobatusoo numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu nawahana nakakoo. Yise tooe hano tooe susumudu numu oe tunakaꞌoedyukute.
Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha te tuukweꞌe ka saaꞌa susumudu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka Te Pabeꞌe besa podo tu meana maꞌwukakwu, ka tooe hownnekoo tooe sutakoo poohabe nakaꞌoedyukuna pumme nemooagadu.
Mu numu sutakoo tunedyooena umuoo numu nemooaga. Umu numu nemooagadu ka wunaꞌme suda tumatuguna, umu yise ka kaaheno besow gi oo sopedakwatoo.

“Gi nananodukwadoopana, gi noꞌo-baatoosoo tukapu tukapana,” mee mu numu nemooagadu numu netamma, pana soo Te Naa ka noꞌoko tukapu tamme-too matabuepu. Soo Te Naa noꞌokosoo hemma besa matabuepu yise gi hee sutaꞌyoo ka oo-koobatoo te nanesootuhaꞌe.
Soo Te Naa unnepu ka tukapu-koobatoo te nanesootuhinoꞌo, tamme gi oo namanabuekute.
U ka Te Pabeꞌe besa tummatzaꞌe ka umu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tuukwena ka ume e tuukwe-kwitu. U uusoo besa natunedyooe ka besa naꞌunnedu nagenona.
Ka umu naꞌesayaedu numu tunedyooedu u sakwa gi nakabetseapana. U sakwa ka Te Naa besa po tubetse nageno. Oo-makoo natunedyooena.

Esoo u tookoo u mabetseana besaꞌyoo, pana soo Te Naa besa podo numu meanona unusoo besaꞌyoo. Oosoo Te Naa podo nameadu numu natunedyooena besaꞌyoo, ka oo-toogoo meanona unusoo besaꞌyoo. Oosoo Te Naa podo nameadu numu natunedyooena besaꞌyoo ka menoꞌo yaaꞌa ka teepu-koobaꞌyoona pana ka saaꞌa Te Naa-matoo te mease oosoo unusoo besaꞌyoo.
Soo meeoo ume e tuukwena togesapa. U sakwa a nageno.
Nu ka tubetse besow po nagenoꞌo, soo Te Naa noꞌoko numu besa matugu, ka pukwi u tunakaꞌoedyuku u magwetzoikwu.
Noꞌoko numu tunedyooe umu sakwa ka ume e tuukwena nageno.

U sakwa noꞌoko numu soopedya, oꞌno mu numu ume sootubetseyaꞌekwu, yise tubetse unudooe besaꞌyoo. U sakwa ka Te Naa besa podo meanona mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu u poonnena punnoꞌo u-kwaꞌnesoo. Oꞌno gi haga sakwa meeoo u netamma, “U nagutza naatse numme u tunedyooe-kwi.”
Ooosapa ka mu numu Te Naa unnepu-witu tunedyooeno, e petunoꞌotoo tooe.

Mu wakwaꞌetse u pooha poonnena, u nanesootuhikute. Umuoo u-ma matuguse soo Te Naa ka nanesootuhibu noko numu u tunedyooekwuna ooka u sootuhi. U sakwa ooosapa Te Naa unnepu-witu numu tunedyooe. Gi u namatusookwunikwu.
U sakwa e tunetamma tubetse nagenona, oꞌno yise mu numu u poonnena u sopedakwadookwu ka unusoo besa u manenoꞌo.
Besakoo tunakabetseana, besakoo ka Te Naa unnepu suuꞌmu numu tunedyooena, u ka ume nakabetseadu-no namagwetzoikwu.
Tooe mu wakwaꞌetse tumaꞌemukwa sapa gi mu nasakwaꞌekupana, besakoo ooka mu nemadabuekuna, u naa u nemadatugu-kwaꞌnesoo. Mu naana sakwa u pabeꞌe-waꞌnesoo nematugu.
Mu pepeawabe u pea-waꞌne, mu momokoꞌne u punneꞌe-waꞌne. Gi suda umu-tamme tusooyugwepana.

Umu pepeawabe gi kookoomamu-gakoo, umuoo mu doodooamu-no mu mooamu sakwa mu mabetsea. Oꞌnosoo umu naanapuaꞌamu mu mananase umu ka tu naanapuaꞌamu mooatupugoese, oꞌno yise mu doodooamu sakwa mu mabetsea. Oo umu manena Te Naa tunetammana mayohona ka Te Naa besa masoonammekute. Mu doodooamu sakwa Te Naa nakabetsea. Umu gi kookoomamu-gaꞌyoo, gi nanumu-gaꞌyoo.
Mu gi kookoomamu-gaꞌyoo gi nananumu-gaꞌyoo, “Soo Te Naa ne mabetseakwu,” mee sokwama. Ooosapa Te Naa-tamme nanesootuhinoꞌo. Umu ooonneꞌyoo sakwa mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu mabetsea.
Susumudu gi kookoomamu-gaꞌyoo gi kaaheno Te Naa podo meadu ooosapa puusoo tu nasooꞌyugwetoo manedu, gi Te Naa-nakwana nakwitu soonammedu, umuoo gi hee.
“Umu gi kookoomamu-gaꞌyoo sakwa ka besow tumayohope nagena oꞌno umu gi haga mu nesootzema-waꞌneꞌyoo,” mee sakwa u mu tuukwe.

Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu mee naneyugwedu ka gi pummesoo tu nobe-witu manepunnena mabetseana ka tu nanumu-too gi mabetsea umu oo tzapoonne ka gi Te Pabeꞌe-wi tu tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Umu yise mu numu gi soo tunakaꞌoedyukudu ooonakwa sutaꞌyoo.
Mu gi kookoomamu-gaꞌyoo ka nanesootuhi tummatzidu mane-kwitu, ooonnekoo u sakwa netutzea. Mooasoo pepeawabena, sumusoo koomadoopu,

mu numu sakwa oo sopedakwatoo ka besa mu tumatuguna, tu doodooamu besa mabetseapu, wakwawaꞌa besa matuguna, mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tummatzina, mu tutuha manedu numu tuwow, yise noꞌobatusoo besa matugudu.

Mu sususuꞌa tu kookoomamu tuikupu sakwa gi mu numu nanesootuhibu-wi tutummatzipana, ka gisoo pepeawabena. Umu toetzegoekwu oona nonobe-too meana numu nesootzemana gi pumme nehane-kwitu sapa ewa tuukwena. Tooe umu ka Te Pabeꞌe, “Ooosapa nu mu nanesootuhi tummatzikwu,” mee netammase sapa, umu sumuna koomadoose ka tu unnepu gi mayohokwu.
Nu meeoo mu netamma mu gi kookoomamu-gaꞌyoo sususuꞌa sakwa koomadoose ka dooamu-gana mu mabetsea, ka mu tu nobe-witu tuwazoo. Oꞌno umu gi nanesootzeꞌma.
Umu-matu mooasoo ka Te Naa besa po maꞌwukase, ka sutakoo podo manekapu.

Mu gi kookoomamu-gaꞌyoo ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-nagatu nanumu-gana, umuoosoo sakwa mu mabetsea. Oꞌno yise mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu, gi kookoomamu-gakoo, gi oekoo nanumu-gakoo, gi natummatzidu, umuoo sakwa umu tummatzi.
Mu wakwaꞌetse ka besa tunematuguna umuoo sakwa ka mu numu nanesootuhipe tunedyooe yise oo-koobakwisoo natumanakakwu.

Soo Te Naa unnena ooonneꞌyoona mee nabotugupu, “Soo pookoo puu ka numu yasa tummatzise umu sakwa oo-matoo mesoo tuka.” Yise, “Soo tooe haga tooe numu tummatzidu sakwa punnoꞌo natumanakaku ka tu tutummatzi-kwi.”
Tamme gi numu nakaꞌoedyukupana ka mu numu moohedu mu wakwaꞌetse nesootzema. Waahoo tooetoo pihoo numu ooka suda oo tumatuguna poonnedusoo ookow waha, mu saaꞌa mu nakaꞌoedyukudooa.
U sakwa ka mu wakwaꞌetse-matu suda tumatugudu numu-koobenatoo bi, oꞌno umu susumudu saaꞌa gi oo-waꞌnesoo manedooa.
Noꞌoko nanana sumu-kwaꞌnesoo nematugu. Nu ka mu Te Naa, Te Pabeꞌe Jesus ka umu Te Naa tutummatzidu-no ka nuka tu tunemanekuna u tuukwe, “U sakwa noꞌoko Te Naa unnepu nakabetseana gi numu tutzeapana.”
U ka numu moohedu manekwuse, oetu mooe soohanenummese, oꞌno u ka u mi-ma oo-ma matuguse oo nanesootuhikukwu. Ka numu suda manakwe gi umu-ma tzabepana. Ooosapa besa tumatuguno.
Ka baa hebena gi ookow suuꞌmu hebepana, huutsekoo atsa tutzaꞌemukwa baa tuwazoo, oꞌno u numua-witu besa yugwekwu. Oꞌno yise u gi ooosapa tuoeyaꞌe.
Susumudu numu ka suda tumatuguse noꞌyoona numu oo sopedakwatoo ka menoꞌo. Susumudu numu ka suda tu tumatuguna tooe watsetugupana mu numu saaꞌa oetu naka.
Susumudu ka besa manena noꞌyoona numu oo sopedakwadoo. Tooe mu numu gi oo nakase sapa, saaꞌa umu oo sopedakwadoo, gi oosoo ooosapa nawatsetugu.
Noꞌyoona mu numu ka hemma how yugwena sakwa ka meeoo pumme nedyawedu nakabetsea tooe nawangaꞌa-waꞌne manepunnepana.
Mu numu hemma how yugwedu sakwa tubetse tunakabetseꞌa umu ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tummatzina ka besa mu soobedyana.
Umu atasoo numu tunedyooedu gi ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus besa unnepu nagedu,
umu meeoo nasooyugwedu, “Numme numu ooonakwa unu sokwama,” meeꞌe, pana umu gi hemma sopedakwatoo. Umu numu-no tu nanepeduguna nananuusoogwedukuna, nanasagwaꞌekuna suda nananetammana, suda manakwe.
Soo numu ka sukwe nanahana gi ka toge-kwitu sopedakwatoo. Umu numu meeoo sokwama soo tooe haga tooe ka Te Naa besa podo meana ewow hemma hee-gakoo. Pana gi!
Mu numu ka Te Naa besa podo meana gi hemma soogwaꞌe, mooasoo besa nasootuhaꞌe.
Tamme ka nadooaꞌadoose, gi hee-gana yaaꞌa teepu-kooba numu petu tamme yise ka yaꞌese noꞌokosoo hemma yaanoko te heetooꞌapu maꞌwukakwu.
Tamme ka tukapu noko ka pukwi te namasuana mooasoo hee-gana gi hemmasoo soosookwi-waꞌne tabua.
Mu numu ka ewahoosoo hemma soogwina besakoo nanemooagakwu. Umu tubetse unu hemma soogwikwu oosoosoo yise kadoo mu mayugwekwu.
Noꞌobatusoo soo sutaꞌyoo tamme-tamme kemmakwu ka unusoo te tusoogwipunne. Susumudu numu ka unu tusoogwina umuoo ka Te Naa besa po ooemota manekayakwe, yise puusoo suda namasokwamayakwe.

Timothy, u mow Te Naa tubetse nakaꞌoedyukudu. Gi hemma sookwipana ka Te Naa besa po nagenoꞌo: Besa tumatuguna, tubetse tunakaꞌoedyukuna, noꞌoko numu soobedyana, besa numu matuguna. Ooosapa oo nageno tooe hemma tooe how manegena sapa.

U sakwa tubetse unusoo ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyuku. Uusoo nanemabetseano, oꞌno saaꞌa Te Naa-matoo besakoo meadooa. U deaꞌa ka Te Naa tunetammana mayohona u baa-wi namatzakana ewow numu tunedyooꞌe ka umu natunedyooepu-witu.
Soo Te Naa noꞌoko hemma nemamakwupu ookahoo soo Te Pabeꞌe-no umuoo
Ka Te Naa tu sooyugwena oe manepetuse, soo Te Pabeꞌe kodyu petudooa soo Te Naa o unu pooha-gaꞌyoo, noꞌoko hemma nemadabuedu, noꞌoko hemma ooonakwa naduꞌyadu. Tamme ooosapa oo nesookwugikwu.

Te Naa suuꞌmu numu magwetzoidu, gi mobekwa-gaꞌyoo. Oosoo noꞌoko hemma ooonakwakoo pooha-gana soo oo pooha oo naꞌoonnakwi kootabedooapunnedu-kwaꞌne tabuapunne. Gi hemma putsageꞌe mane-waꞌneꞌyoo, ka unu oo pooha-gakoo. Gi haga oo poonnedu. Gi haga oo poonne-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tuwow noꞌyoona numu tooe hanotu tooe sakwa oo-matoo nanesootuhi. Numu ooosapa sakwa oo tubetseyi, noꞌyoona hemma oosoo nematunagakwudu. Togesapa.

Ka mu numu ewow hee-gakoo meeoo netamma, “Gi ka mu numu ooonakwa besa nasooyugwepana.” Umu sakwa gi ka hemma tu hee-ga-ma nasoonatzipana, ka Te Naa-ma suuꞌmu nasoonatzi. Oosoo noꞌoko hemma-ma te sootuhina besa pumatoo te masokwamana, oosoo ka noꞌokosoo hemma hee-gana.

Umu ewow hee-gaꞌyoo sakwa besa tumatuguna ka numu besa tummatzi. Umu sakwa mu tutuha manedu mesoo hee-maka. Soo Te Naa ka oo mu tumatuguse ka hemma besa mu hee-ga-ma umu-matoo makodyukwuse, oꞌno saaꞌa umu nasootuhikwu ka Te Naa-baa petugase.
E puaꞌa Timothy, ooosapa oo sumayu ka Te Naa ume netammapu. Gi ka mu numu ooosapa nanahadu noꞌoko hemma nesopedakwatoo mee unnedu nakabetseapana.
Susumudu gi kaaheno tunakabetseana umu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe po ooemota manekayakwe. “Soo Te Naa sakwa u tubetse sootuhi,” meeꞌe nu u nanesootuhikute.

Paul tubona. Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus meeoo netamma, “Nu ka Paul netutzeakwu oosoo saaꞌa ume tummatzikwu. Oosoo mu numu tunakaꞌoedyukudu moohedooa. Oosoo mu numu tuukwekwu, nu yow mu numu magwetzoikwudu.” Soo Te Naa God Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-no meeoo nuka tunemanekute, “Mu numu tuukwe Te Pabeꞌe mu magwetzoikwu.”
E puaꞌa, e tunedyooepu Timothy-matoo e tubona. Nu u nanesootuhikute soo Te Naa-no soo Te Pabeꞌe besa u mabetsea, u sootuhi, u magwetzoi.

Nu besa soonamme u ka tubetse tunakaꞌoedyukuna. U mooꞌa Lois mee naneadu mooe tunakaꞌoedyukupu-gaꞌyoo, oꞌno yise u pea Eunice mee naneadu punnoꞌo. Nu punnoꞌo ooosapa Te Naa nakabetsea umu te nanamooatupu-waꞌne. Nu u nanesootuhikute. Nu oo soomaꞌyu u suda soonamme ka ume e maꞌwukase. Nu besa u poonnese yise nu besa soonammekwu.
U sakwa u pooha nakabetsea. Soo Te Naa ookow u poohamaka, ka u-ma e matuguse.
Soo Te Naa tu besa pooha-ma te sootuhipu ooonneꞌyoona tamme unu nanasoopedyadu. Oꞌno yise tamme gi nasoogwaꞌe ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu mu numu tuukwemeana.

U sakwa mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu tuukwena gi nanenasookwipana. Gi nu-ma nasookwipana, nu Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo nakwutuma. Gi saaꞌa suipana ka mu numu te tuukweꞌe ka besa naꞌunnedu, tooe tamme mu tumooꞌoo sapa. U ka Te Naa mayukese besa nasootuhikwu oꞌno yise u gi nasookwikwu.
Tooe gi te besow sapa soo Te Naa te magwetzoipu. Oosoo te tutzeapu gisoo ka teepu matabuena. Oosoo meeoo te netamma, “Nuga besa podo mea.”
Menoꞌo yise, Te Pabeꞌe Jesus yaa ka teepu-kooba petuse ka Etzaꞌa tunetammana ka mu numu tuina tzadyooiku yise noꞌoko mu Te Naa besa unnepu-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu magwetzoi.
Nu nanetutzeapu ka besa naꞌunnedu wahakwuse.

Menoꞌo nu nakwutumapana mu numu nu tuukweꞌe ka nuga pukwi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Nu ka Te Pabeꞌe tubetse sopedakwatoo. Oosoo e tummatzikwu, nu yise mu numu tuukwekwu ka besa naꞌunnedu yow teepu-koobasoo oo petunoꞌo-kwitoo tooe. Ooonneꞌyoona nu gi nanenasookwaꞌe.

U sakwa ooosapa mu numu tunedyooe ka ume e tunedyooe-kwaꞌnesoo. Umuoo naꞌunnedu togesapa. U sakwa ooosapa Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna noꞌoko numu besa soobedya. U ka ꞌyoo manena mu numu tzapoonnekute u ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus podo meana.
U sakwa besa oo mabetseana ka Te Naa Besa Pooha ume oo sootuhipu. Tamme noꞌyoona ka oo Besa Pooha-matu nasootuhipu.
Ewaꞌyoo mu Asia-wiꞌyoona kemmatu nu-ma nasookwaꞌe. Phygelus-no Hermogenes punnoꞌo.

Soo Onesiphorus ka Rome-wi petu, unu manena e mayu. Oosoo gi nu-ma nasookwaꞌe oosoo ooosapa e nenoyugwe, nu meeoo nanesootuhi, soo Te Naa sakwa oo sootuhi ka saaꞌa numu-witu nemadabuena. U mooasoo noꞌoko ka hemma besa nuka oo tumatugukupu sopedakwatoo ka Ephesus-wiꞌyoona.
U sakwa yise, e puaꞌa, ohobu tusooyugwe manepunne ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus ume sootuhi.
Ewaꞌyoo mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu e naka, ka umu Te Naa besa unnepu e tuukweꞌe. U sakwa mana numu-nagakwi oo wahanumme oꞌno umu punnoꞌo numu tunedyooe meakwu. Umu punnoꞌo numu moohekwudu.
Tooe ume tu netumooꞌoo sapa sakwa u oho maneno. Gi sakwa puu soo numu mummesoo nasooyugwe-kwi manepana ka Te Pabeꞌe podo meakwuse. U sakwa ka Te Pabeꞌe tunetamma mayohomea.
Soo numu puu ka wutokoꞌo tuateana oo nanematugutoosoo tumayohonokwu. Tamme sakwa puu Te Pabeꞌe tamme nematugutoosoo maneno.
Soo gi tooetsebu numu puu tumasuakuse puusoo oo-matoo mooehane. Tamme nasootuhikwu ka unu tunakaꞌoedyukuna.
U sakwa ka ume e tuukwepu-witu unu soohanenummese, oꞌno u oo nakasopedakwadookwu. Soo Te Naa u tummatzina u oo nakasopedakwadookwu.
U sakwa ooosapa ka Te Pabeꞌe soomayu. Tu yaꞌe-wikoo oosoo namayodapu. O oosoo Te Pabeꞌe. Nu ooosapa mu numu tuukweꞌe eka Te Naa besa unnepu.
Nu ka mu numu tuukwena ka Te Naa besa unnena, umu yise e tumooꞌoo, e wutuma suda tumatugupu numu-waꞌne. Pana ka Te Naa unnepu gi netakone-waꞌneꞌyoo.

Nu ooosapa oo oedyukute ka tunakaꞌoedyukudu te manekena. Oꞌno soo Te Naa te netutzeana tamme saaꞌa tunakaꞌoedyukudooa, yise namagwetzoikwu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus mu magwetzoise saaꞌa mu bikekwu Te Naa-matoo. Umu yise ooosapa oo-baaꞌyookwu.
Soo te hoobea puu meeoo naꞌunne meꞌa, Tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe tumayohokuna-koobatoo nabatsase, tamme oo-matoosoo meakwu.

Tamme ka ooosapa tunakaꞌoedyukuna tooe ka mu numu tamme netumooꞌoo sapa oꞌno tamme saaꞌa oo-no mu numu nemadunagadooa. Tamme ka mu numu-ma suina ka Te Pabeꞌe gi nanena-maꞌyoona. Oosoo punnoꞌo saaꞌa gi te nanena-maꞌyoodooa meeꞌe.
Tooe tamme ka gi te unnepu mayohona sapa, oosoo puu ooosapa tu unnepu mayoho, oosoo gi esayidu.

U sakwa ooosapa mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu meeoo tuukwe, “Soo Te Naa gi ka tu unnepu-koobatu mu naha tuungu.” Umu ka nahana gi hemma besa nemadabue. Gi hownnekoo kaaheno oo nemayugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo. Ka mu numu ooka nakadu Te Naa po oowemota neyugwe.

U sakwa ooosapa tubetse besa mu tunedyooe. Oꞌno saaꞌa soo Te Naa, “U tookwa besa numu tunedyooepu,” mee u netammadooa. U sakwa ka Te Naa unnepu besa kaaheno mu numu tunedyooena oꞌno u gi suda soonammekwu.
Ka tooe mu numu nananepetukute sapa gi nakaꞌoedyukupana. Soo meeoo naꞌunnewunudu nanakwingaꞌasoo ka Te Naa po kwingaꞌa numu nemayugwe.

Soo suda naꞌunnedu numu tookoo pehekudu tuoeba-waꞌneꞌyoo. Oosoo puu paba haano-wi manena kadooꞌoo numu mayugwe. Mu naana Hymenaeus-no Philetus mee nananeadu umu puu ooonneꞌyoo, ooosapa numu-no nahayakwe.
Umu puu Te Naa tubetse po-wiꞌyoona mukwakapu ka mu numu esayaekuna, “Soo numu ka yaꞌese, gi yotse-waꞌneꞌyoo,” mee mu numu nemooaga. Susumudu mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-nagatu, ka Te Naa po oemota neyugwe.
Soo Te Naa ka besa tunakaꞌoedyukudu meeoo tunetamma, “Nu umu e dooamu sopedakwatoo. Soo tooe haga tooe e tooꞌe mee unnedu sakwa ka suda tu manena maꞌwu.”

Ka pabow nobe-wi puu ewaꞌyoo unu nanenagadu tseda nahane. Umu-matu ka oa tupe-ma namadabuedu, susumudu ka ese tupe-ma namadabuedu. Susumudu gi nanenagadu pakwena teepu-ma namadabuedu suu tseda tuwow. Umu unu nanenagadu tseda puu gi nabebuꞌa, umu gi nanenagadu tooe nabebuꞌa pana gi hownneꞌyoo.
Tamme ka gi suda manena, tamme ka unu nanenagadu tseda-waꞌne. Oꞌno yise tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus besa manewabe manekwu. Tamme yise ooosapa noꞌyoona besakoo tumayohonokwu.
U sakwa gi ka suda tusooyugwedu namahane-kwitu soohanepana. U sakwa kaaheno ka besow podo mea, unusoo Te Naa nakaꞌoedyuku. U sakwa ka mu numu soobedyana, gi mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu nesootzemapana.
Soo tooe hayoo tooe naꞌunnewunudu gi pukooba numu naha-waꞌneꞌyoo, ka oo manena tamme nanamanidyunakute.
Soo nanesootuhidu numu tunedyooedu sakwa gi nidyupupana. Noꞌoko besa numu matuguna numu tunedyooe. Ka tooe how tooe suda pumme tusootunagaꞌa sapa gi suda mu numu soobedyapana.

Mu gi toge tusoohanedu numu besa kaaheno tunedyooe gi mu sootuꞌadyipana. Oꞌno sumuna soo Te Naa kaaheno mu mayugwekwu ka sutakoo podo mu meꞌa. Oꞌno umu oo nakasopedakwadoona ka Te Naa unnepu yise oo besa podo meakwu.
Oꞌno mu suda tumayugwedu gi ooosapa tu kwase mu-kooba wumakute. Oosoo sumu noꞌoko mu takoꞌne. Umu ooosapa oo unnetoo manakwe, pana menoꞌo oosoo mu tzamaꞌwu.
U sakwa ka Te Pabeꞌe petukwuna-koobenasoo oo nakasopedakwadoo tamme unusoo manena Te Naa podo meakwu.

Pudusoo mu numu tooe hownnekoo tooe nanasuda manekwu: Unu puusoo nanakamakukwu, moogoobukwu, paba nasooyugwekwu, nidyupukwu, gi too sosokwamakwu, tu dooamu gi mabetseakwu, numu nesootzemakwu, numu wohoꞌnekwu, suda tu namatuguna gi soomuꞌwakwu, tu pupuaꞌamu wohoma umu-witu tuukwena, gi ka Te Naa nanesootamakwu. Puusoo natamme-too hemma nasoohanekukwu, gi Te Naa nakaheesoobedyakwu.
Mu gi totogeꞌyoona numu ka mooasoo gi totogekoo momokoꞌne mu nonobe-toosoo etzaga nemooaga. Umu ooosapa suda tusooyugwedu.
Te Naa unnepu gi nakabetseana ka tooe haꞌyoo tooe naꞌunnedu-ma nakatsape. Umu noꞌobatusoo Te Naa unnepu sukwe nakana Te Naa unnepu gi nakabetseadu.

Mu suda numu tunedyooedu, ka momokoꞌne nemooagana ka Te Naa tuwazoo wohoꞌne. Ka oꞌnosoo mu Jannes-no Jambres mee nananeadu ka Moses wohonepu. Umu ooosapa suda tusooyugwena gi ka togekoo nakaꞌoedyukudu.
Pudusoo mu numu mu sopedakwadookwu, ka gi togeꞌyoona, numu sukwe nemooagadu.
U mooasoo e sopedakwatoo ka Te Naa besaꞌhoo podo e meꞌa. U ka e natunedyooepu mooasoo naka. Nu tuwazoo noꞌoko numu unu soobedya. Tooe ka mu numu nuka wohoꞌne sapa, nu togesoo Te Naa nakabetseanoꞌo.
Umu e tooꞌe batsa ka ona Antioch, Iconium, noko Lystra mee nananeadu-wiꞌyoona, pana soo Te Naa nu-kooba tummatzise nu namagwetzoi.
Tooe haga tooe ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus besa podo meadu mu numu oo wohoꞌnekwu.
Pana umu suda numu tunedyooedu unusoo sutaꞌyookwu. Umu kukummaꞌakoosoo nemooagana puusoo tuwazoo nanemooꞌagapana gi oo sopedakwadoo.
U sakwa yise ooosapa tunakaꞌoedyuku ka nuka togekoo ume tunedyooepu nageno. U ka oo sopedakwadoona,
ka tuhaꞌyoonasoo u ka Te Naa unnena nabotuguna neana oosoo u magwetzoina, u tunedyooenokwu. Te Pabeꞌe Jesus u magwetzoikwu ka pumme u nakaꞌoedyukute.

Noꞌyoona mu Te Naa nanayadooawabe Te Naasoo tunetammapu nabotugu. Soo Te Naa unnepu-makoo kaaheno natunedyooemeꞌa tooe ka gi kaaheno te tunakaꞌoedyukute sapa yise soo Te Naa tu besa podo te mameakute.
Oꞌno yise mu Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukudu namabetzapepunnena ka tooe how tooe besa tumatuguna.

Tamme sakwa ka Te Pabeꞌe nakabetsea oosoo pudusoo kodyu petukwu. Pudusoo kodyu petuse, noꞌoko numu nemadunagakwu. Saaꞌa yise oosoo mu numu toogesoo modu umu mooasoo tuipu tuwazoo nemadunagakwu oosoo te manena sopedakwatoo. Nu ekow naꞌunnedu mu tubetse tuukweꞌe Te Naa yise Te Pabeꞌe nuka tunemanekuna.

U sakwa mu numu tubetse tuukwe ka Te Naa unnepu. U sakwa ooosapa namabetseapunnena ka tooe hannanoꞌo tooe mu numu tuukwe. U sakwa mu numu tuukwe haꞌoo soo numu kaaheno ka Te Naa besa podo meana, gi nidyupuna. U sakwa meeoo soonammena, “Mu numu besa mesoo manakwe yise ooosapa mu tunedyooeno.”
Ka saaꞌa mu numu gi oo nakabetseakwu, pana umu ewow nanakummaꞌakoosoo pumme tunedyooedu pumme mu tuukweꞌe oo-tamme nakasokwama manepetugakwu.
Umu ka numu tubetse natunedyooedu gi nakabetseana, ka a naꞌesayaena suuꞌmu oedyukukwu.

U sakwa ooosapa meeoo soonamme. U sakwa ka ume tu wohoꞌne gi Te Naa unnepu wahamakwupana. U sakwa ooosapa mu numu gisoo ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-witu nakadu tuukwe. U sakwa yise ka Te Naa ume tunetammakuna nakabetsea.
Nu pudusoo nabatsakoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo. U saaꞌa mu numu tunedyooedooa nuga kapi.
Nu tubetse unu sutakoo wohonese, oo makwuhoo. Nu ka Te Naa nuka tunetammakuna mayoho.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe kaaheno tunemadabuedu. Ka saaꞌa oosoo ka mu numu nemadabuena, oosoo nuka sootuhikwu, nu ka kaaheno meadabena. Gi nuka suuꞌmu, soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko numu sootuhikwu umu ka oo kodyu petukwuna petzabena ka oo wutooꞌena.
U sakwa yabesoo nu-matoo kemma.

Demas mee naneadu noꞌoko hemma hee-gana Te Naa ooonakwa oo sooyugwewunu. E maꞌwukase, ka Thessalonica mee naneadu-witoo mea. Soo Crescens mee naneadu punnoꞌo mea ka teepu Galatia mee naneadu-kwitoo. Soo Titus punnoꞌo ka teepu Dalmatia mee naneadu-kwitoo.
Soo Luke mee naneadu suuꞌmu yow nu-baa. U sakwa ka Mark bike, oosoo sakwa besa e tummatzi ka mu numu Te Naa unnepu-witu tuukwe.
Nu ka Tychicus mee naneadu Ephesus-witoo tayapu.
U ka waketoo kemmana, u sakwa e wega gwuuke. Nu ona ka Troas mee naneadu-wi ka Carpus mee naneadu-baa oo maꞌwuke. Pu-witu e neakwuna e tubope noꞌoko saaꞌa haneke.

Soo Alexander oa wehepu mahanedu tubetse unu e nekwohoꞌnepu. U sakwa gi oo-ma tzabepana, oosoo tubetse unu ka naꞌunnedu netumooꞌoo. Soo Te Naasoo oo sopedakwatoo ka tu unnepu oosoo saaꞌa oo nemadunagadooa.
Nu ka mooeꞌugasoo nuka tu nehane gi haga e tummatzi. Umu noꞌyoona e maꞌwuhooka. Soo Te Naa sakwa oo soomuꞌwu ka mu manena mee nu nanesootuhi.
Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe e tummatzi. E sootuhise, nu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu mu tubetse tuukweꞌe. Noꞌyoona mu wakwawaꞌa oetu naka. Nu yise tooe nabatsakwuse sapa namagwetzoi.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe e mabetseakwu noꞌoko ka sutakoo takonegena oꞌno yise nu ka Te Naa-matoo mease, oo-baasoo nobe-gakwu. “Soo Te Pabeꞌe ooosapa tubetse besaꞌyoo,” tamme sakwa ooosapa nanesootuhi.
Nu mu Priscilla noko Aquila noꞌoko ka Onesiphorus nobe-kwitu soomaꞌyu.
Soo Erastus mee naneadu tooesoo ka Corinth mee naneadu-wi. Nu ka Miletus mee naneadu-wiꞌyoona kemmase, ka Trophimus mee naneadu-wi togesoo tuoeyaꞌe.
Gisoo tu tommo petu sakwa u yaa numme-baa petu. Eubulus, Pudens, Linus, Claudia noꞌyoona mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ooosapa u soomaꞌyu.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe sakwa noꞌoko mu sootuhi, “Meeꞌe nu mu nanesootuhikute.”

Paul ka Titus-matoo tubona. Ka oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa umu te nanamooatupu meeoo tuukwepu, “Nu saaꞌa mu magwetzoidooa.” Oosoo gi naesayaepu. Soo Te Naa unnena menoꞌo oo-toogoo manakwe, oꞌno soo Te Naa nuka tunetammakupu mee naꞌunakwe, “U ka e unnena mu numu tunedyooekwu.” Nu yise oo nakabetsease, mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tuukwekwu ka Te Naa besa podo a nameadabekwuna. Oꞌno ka saaꞌa mu Te Naa-baa petugadooa.
U Titus, e puaꞌa, u nu-kwaꞌnesoo unu tunakaꞌoedyukute. Nu u nanesootuhaekuyakwe, soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe-no te magwetzoikwudu, besa u sootuhina ooosapa u magwetzoinokwu.
Nu ka teepu Crete mee naneadu-wi u maꞌwuke nu u tuukwepu u numu nanesootuhi tunedyooekwutu, tooe hanotu tooe mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-nagatu mu nanesootuhi numu tunedyooekwutu e netutzeadooa.

Mu nanesootuhi numu tunedyooekwutu, sakwa besaꞌyoo nanetutzea, umu ka Te Naa doodooamu mabetseakwuse, gi pumme nesootzema-waꞌnekoo. Umu sakwa gi etzaga naneꞌemukwa-waꞌneꞌyoo, gi besa nasooyugwepana, gi etzaga sutadu, gi baagoedu, gi nidyapu, umu sakwa mu wakwawaꞌa mesoo tummatzidu, besa tunakabetseadu, besa tusoohanedu, kaaheeno ka Te Naa podo meadabedu. Umu sakwa susuꞌmuoosoo nodukwa-gana, mu doodooamu punnoꞌo tunakaꞌoedyukudu. Mu doodooamu sakwa tu naanapuaꞌamu nakabetseana, gi noꞌosoo manepana. Umu nanesootuhi numu tunedyooedu sakwa ka tubetse naꞌunnedu pumme tu tunedyooepu-wi tubetse tunakaꞌoedyukumo, oꞌno ka kaaheno mu numu tu tunedyooena sopedakwatoo, yise ka mu numu nemooagadu kaaheno nemayugwe.
Umuoo numu nemooagadu besa tunakaꞌoedyukudu mee naneyugwe. Umuoo ka te nanamooatupu Jew numu tumayohona numu tunedyooeꞌe, ooonneꞌyoona mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu owemota mu nemayugwe.

Umuoo ka mu numu nonobe-kwitu suda neyugwena, ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu kummaꞌakoosoo tunedyooeꞌe. Umuoo numu, oo numu tunedyooe tabua ka ewowsoo obetoo tusoogwipunnena. Mu suda numu tunedyooedu sakwa nanetzadyoiku.
Soo nana Crete-witu puusoo yooonne-kwitu wahana meeoo unakwe, “Numme Crete-witu numu unu esagoedu, sutakoo nunuꞌu-waꞌne, unu totoetzeabuna, unu moomoogoobu.”
Esoo umu-witu nawahana togesapa naꞌunnedu. U sakwa yise kaaheno mu nemayugwe, oꞌno yise umu ka toge naꞌunnedu nakaꞌoedyukukwu.
Oꞌno yise umu numu gi ka mu numu nemooagadu nakabetsea-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Tamme Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu soo tooe hee tooe tamme-too besaꞌyoo. Pana umu numu sutaꞌyoo ewa nabeatse-gaꞌyoo.
Umuoo ka Te Naa unnepu sopedakwatoo mee naneyugwedu, pana umu ooosapa suda tumatuguyakwe, gi ka Te Pabeꞌe nakabetseꞌa.
U sakwa yise ka Te Naa besa unnepu numu tunedyooe.
Mu wakwaꞌetse tuukwena umu sakwa besaꞌyookuna, besa tutusooyugwena, gi pumme neꞌemukwa-waꞌneꞌyoo. Te Naa-wi tubetse tunakaꞌoedyukudu, noꞌoko numu soobesaꞌyookuna ka Te Naa besa podo meadabe.
U sakwa mu pepeawabe tuwazoo tuukweꞌe, umuoo sakwa punnoꞌo ooosapa nanesootuhi, ooosapa besa tumatuguna, gi tunesootzepana, gi baagoepana, ka hemma besow numu tunedyooe.
Umu sakwa mu momokoꞌne meeoo tunedyooe, meeoo mu netammana, “Mu koomamu besa soobedyana, mu doodooamu tuwazoo too besa mabetseana,
gi kummaꞌakoosoo maꞌemukwakupana, mu nobe besa mabetseana, besa numu matuguna, tu koomma nakabetseana, oꞌno yise mu numu Te Naa besa unnepu nesookwuga.”
U sakwa mu pudu nanana tuwazoo meeoo tuukweꞌe, “Gi nanemaꞌemukwapana gi tusoomatzooepana.”
U sakwa ooosapa besa tumatugu, u ka Te Naa besa podo meanoꞌo, oꞌno yise umu u-kwaꞌnesoo. U sakwa mu numu tubetse tunedyooe.
Soo u unnekwuna sakwa besaꞌyoo, oꞌno mu numu gi te netumooꞌoona, te nesootzemakwu.
Noꞌyoona mu numu ka hemma how yugwena sakwa ka pumme nedyawedu nakabetsea. Umu hemma how yugwedu sakwa besa mu masokwamana gi umu-no sukwe nahapana.
Umu sakwa gi hemma umu-makoo tuduhapana, oꞌno mu numu Te Naa unnepu nesoogwugaꞌekwu.

Soo Te Naa besa unnepu noꞌobatusoo numu-baa nanaka petugapu, soo Te Naa ka pumme nakaꞌoedyukudu sootuhina, mu magwetzoaꞌe tooe gi besa mu tumatuguse sapa, soo Te Naa ka suda mu tumatuguna soomuꞌwakwu.

Te Naa unnepu meeoo te tunedyooꞌe, ka sutakoo po maꞌwukase, ka suta mu manena soomuꞌwa. Ooonneꞌyoona sakwa tamme kaaheno ka Te Naa podo mea, ooosapa besa tumatuguna, gi naneꞌemukwapupana, gi tusoomatzooepana ka yow teepu-koobaꞌyoona.
Ka Te Pabeꞌe kodyu petukwuna tamme sookwaꞌe, mee tamme nanesootuhiyakwe.
Ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus tamme-koobatoo nabatsase, oosoo te maꞌemukwana soomuꞌwase, besa gi totsabu te mayugwe, tu doodooamu te mayugwe. Oꞌno yise tamme ooosapa besa tumatugumokwu.

Yooonnekoo hekwitu sakwa u numu tunedyooe. Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu nenoyukwena, mu ume gi nakabetseadu kaaheno nemayugwe, u ka mu moohena. Mu numu sakwa saaꞌa gi u-maꞌyoona nanekoepana ka meeoo pumme u tuukweꞌe.
U sakwa ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu nemayuku umu ka teepu-koobatu pumme moohedu nakabetseana, ewa nanabesa tumatuguna, besa sokwama.
Umu sakwa gi numu nesootzemapana, gi nanahapana tuwazoo. Umu sakwa noꞌobatusoo numu besa matugu.

Mu numu uga noꞌyoona gi besaꞌyoo. Tamme uga ka gisoo tunakaꞌoedyukuna punnoꞌo ooonneꞌyoosoo. Tamme uga gi oo nakasopedakwadoona gi oo nakabetsea, ka tamme tu nemooaga, tamme meeoo tusooyugwe. Tamme nanasuda manena, unu nidyupuna, ka kummaꞌakoosoo numu nasoodyagena, gi ooosapa nanapetsabedu.

Ooonneꞌyoopana soo Te Naa te soobedyana, te sootuhaꞌe. Tooe gi te besaꞌhoo sapa, soo Te Naa te magwetzoipu. Tutuha soo Te Naa te sooyugwena ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-matoo taya. Soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsase, yise suda te tumatuguna nematzagakwunise te magwetzoi. Oosoo yise tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma te sootuhise atasoo te magugwe. Oꞌno yise tamme ka Te Naa besa podo meana tamme oo-baa petugadooa, ka tuise.

Esoo naꞌunnedu togesapa. U sakwa ka meeoo naꞌunnedu mu tunedyooe, oꞌno yise umu tunakaꞌoedyukudu oo-toogoo manekwu gi oo soomuꞌwana, oꞌno ka saaꞌa besa tumatugudooa, ka oo manena umu besa numu tummatzikwu.
Ka mu Jew numu tumayohona noko te natugwengapu, te mooe natunedyooepu-koobatoo gi nanahapana, soo numu nanahana gi hemma numu tummatzaꞌe.
Ka mu numu nanahaꞌa, tooe huu tooe mu netammapunnese gi umu-no ooosapa nahawunupana, mu tsasobedya.
Umu ooonneꞌyoo numu sutaꞌyoona noꞌyoona numu oo sopedakwadoo ka gi mu togeꞌyoona.
Nu yaa Nicapolas-wi tomokwu, nu ka Artemas tooetoo ka Tychicus u-matoo tayakwu. Ka u-baa oo petugase nu-baa saaꞌa nobenge.
Yabesoo ka Zenas numu-koobatoo yadooadu, ka Apollos noko taya, tooe hemma tooe mu sookwina u sakwa mu tummatzi.
Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu sakwa unusoo tunakabetsena, oꞌno umu ka mu numu natummatziba sookwidu tummatzikwu.
Noꞌyoona umu nu-batu u nemaꞌyu. Ne pupuaꞌamu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-matoo ne nemayu. “Soo Te Naa noꞌoko mu sootuhaꞌe,” mee numme mu nanesootuhikute.
Paul tubona, nu nakwutuma ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-koobatoo. Soo e puaꞌa Timothy nu-no ka Philemon-matoo tubokwu.
Ka Philemon nodukwa Apphia, mu tooa Archippus yise ka u-baa nanesootuhidu-matoo tuwazoo tuboꞌo.
Nu meeoo mu nanesootuhikute, soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe-no sakwa besa mu matuguna mu magwetzoi.
U noꞌoko mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu soobedyana yise tubetse unu ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-wi tunaꞌoedyukute, nu u nuka. Ooonneꞌyoona nu ooosapa Te Naa-matoo u nanesootuhikunoꞌo.
U ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus nakaꞌoedyukuduna unusoo besa tumatugunokwu ka numme-no Te Pabeꞌe besa podo meana. Oꞌno sakwa yise u oo sopedakwatoo ka Te Naa tamme sootuhina.
Nu u-matoo besa nakasoonamme u ka umu tunakaꞌoedyukudu besa matuguna, besa mu tummatzaꞌe.
U ka tunakaꞌoedyukuduna, nu sakwa oetoo u tubetse nenoyukwe, ka besa u tumatugu,
pana nu u sukwe tubenga ka besa u tumatugu, nu ka waetsena unu u soobedya, tooꞌe nu ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-koobatoo nakwutumapana.
Nu ka eka nana Onesimus mee naneadu ume uga tummatzidu nekwaꞌe. Nu ka Onesimus Te Naa-tamme nanesootuhi tunedyooepu ka togesoo nakwutumana.
Ka oꞌnosoo oosoo Onesimus uga u-tamme gi he-toogoo besaꞌyoo, menoꞌo yise oosoo unu ta besaꞌyookute.
Tooe nu besa oo soobedya manepetuse sapa, menoꞌo yise nu punowsoo u-matoo oo taꞌya.
Nu menoꞌo nakwutuma ka mu numu tuukwena ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-witu, soo Onesimus sakwa nu-baaꞌyoonasoo e tummatzi mee nu tooe soonamme.
Nu gi u nenoyukwe u natummatzi tuunguna pana u sakwa e tummatzi ka uusoo meeoo soonammena
Soo Onesimus gi haaꞌnotu uga u maꞌwupunne yise oosoo ooosapa u-noꞌyookwu yaa manakwana, ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu manepuna.
Soo Onesimus gi numu sukwe tummatzidu oosoo ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna, ooonneꞌyoona ta ka Onesimus unu soobedya menoꞌo.
Ta ka besa napuaꞌana, nu meeoo u netamma, “U sakwa besa ka Onesimus matugu nuka u matugu-kwaꞌnesoo.”
Ka tooe how tooe ume oo matuguse ka Onesimus hemma ume nakutzikute, nuka oe tunekwi.
Nu nugasoo mi-ma u-matoo tuboꞌo, nu saaꞌa oe u tumanagakudooa. U sakwa gi oo soomuꞌwapana ka nuka u nakutzina, nu ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyuku u mayugwe.
E puaꞌa, u ka yoo manena, besa e masoonammekwu.
Nu eka tubope u-matoo taꞌya. Nu oo sopedakwatoo u ume e netamma-kwaꞌnesoo manekwu, yise ewasoo oo-koobakwisoo tuwazoo.
Mu sakwa nu-toogoo tumabetsabepunne. Mu ka e nanesootuhikuna ka nakwutumana e natzamaꞌwukwuna, nu sumuna mu-baa nobene-gadooa.
Epaphras mee naneadu nakwutumadu nu-waꞌnesoo ka Te Pabeꞌe tumayohokudu punnoꞌo a besana mu sookwikute.
Umu nuka tutummatzidu Mark, Aristarchus, Demas-no Luke u-tamme punnoꞌo meeoosoo tusooyugwe.
“Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus sakwa ooosapa besa mu sootuhi,” meeꞌe nu mu nanesootuhikute.

Ka tubetse besaꞌhoo Te Naa Besaa Tooa, Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-witu nu mu tuukwekwu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa-waꞌneꞌyoosoo. Oosoo tubetse besaꞌyoo. Oꞌnosoo ka teepu kadookoosoo soo Te Naa ka tu Besaa Tooaꞌa mee netamma, “Ka teepu matabuese saaꞌa noꞌoko hemma uusoo nemadabue oo-koobatoo, ka Ta Besa Pooha taka tunetammakuna.” Oꞌnosoo umu Te Naa yadooawabe ka te nanamooatupu tuukweyakwe ka Te Naa besa unnepu-witu. Pana menoꞌo yise tamme etzaga oo nakasopedakwadoo ka Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa-witu te netammakupu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa tunetammapu mamakwuse ka tamme suda manekwi nabatsase, menoꞌo yise Te Naa-baa manepetugapu.

Soo Te Naa puusoo meeoo unakwe, “Soo Mu Pabeꞌe umu nuka tummatzidu mu toha kakasa-gakoo ooonakwasoo unu besaꞌyoo.” Soo Te Naa ewa ka Te Pabeꞌe poohamaka ka umu toha kakasa-gakoo, pumme tummatzidu ooonakwasoo.

Ka Te Pabeꞌe soo Te Naa meeoo netamma, “Menoꞌo nu noꞌoko numu tuukwe, ‘U Nuga Besaa Tooaꞌa,’ “ mee tuwazoo unakwe, “Nu yaahoo u naa. U nu-kwaꞌneꞌyoosoo.” Soo Te Naa ka mu toha kakasa-gakoo, pumme tummatzidu, gi meeoo netammadu.
Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe yaaꞌa teepu-koobatoo tamme-matoo tayase mee unakwe, “Noꞌyoona umu nuka tummatzidu mu toha kakasa-gakoo sakwa oo-matoo nanesootuhi.”
Ka umu pumme tummatzidu soo Te Naa meeoo netamma, “Nu umuoo hukwapa noko goso-waꞌnesoo mu matabuꞌe.”
Ka Tu Tooa soo Te Naa meeoo netamma, “U nu-waꞌneꞌyoosoo.
U ooosapa noꞌoko hemma nemadabuekwu. U numu ooonakwasoo nasootuhikwu u ka ooosapa besa soomanena.”
Mee tuwazoo soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Oꞌnosoo u ka teepu, ka taba, ka muha, yise mu paatoozooba matabuepu.
Saaꞌa umu, mooatupugoe petuga umu yise kadoo manekwu wanapu-waꞌne. Pana u gi mooatupuyina u gi moobegwa-gakwu.
U nu-baaꞌyoona ooosapa nu umu ume wohonedu matzooekukwu.” Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe suuꞌmu meeoo netamma, “Umu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo gi ka u-waꞌneꞌyoo,
umu nuga tutummatziwabe.” Tooe tamme gi mu poonnedupana soo Te Naa tamme mu tummatzi tuungu soo Te Naa ka te magwetzoikwuse.
Tamme sakwa ka Te Naa unnena besa nakabetsea, tamme sakwa gi ka Te Naa besa po oowemota manepana.
Oꞌnosoo umu Te Naa tutummatzidu mu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo ka te nanamooatupu Te Naa unnena tuukweꞌe. Susumudu umu-matu gi oo nakaꞌoedyukuna soo suda mu tumatuguna umu-matoosoo kodyupu.

Menoꞌo soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo te tuukweꞌe soo Te Naa te magwetzoikwu. Umu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu oo nakase, ka oo unnena te tuukwe. Tamme oo sopedakwatoo umu kaaheno te tuukwe soo Te Naa nanasusuꞌmu mu poohamakakwu, oosoo tooe hownne-ma tooe mu sootuhaꞌe, ka Tu Besa Pooha-toohakwi. Ewa nanasookwugaꞌe pooha tumagwetzoigena. Tamme sakwa ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme netammana tubetse nakabetsea. Mee te netammana, “Mu sakwa e nakaꞌoedyuku nu mu magwetzoikwu.” Tamme ka gi oo besa unnepu nakabetseana, soo suda te tumatuguna togesapa tamme-matoosoo kodyukwu.
Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo tubetse netamma, “Saaꞌa u noꞌoko mu numu moohedooa.” Soo Te Naa gi meeoo ka mu toha kakasa-gakoo, pumme tummatzidu, netammadu.
Sumuꞌyoo numu meeoo tubopu-gaꞌyoo ka Te Naa meeoo netammana, “Tooe numme numu gi maawaꞌneꞌyoopana u ne sootuhise ne mabetsea.
Gi haaꞌnoto numme mu toha kakasa-gakoo menakwutu-ma nasootuhaꞌe pana menoꞌo u tubetse besakoo ne sootuhaꞌe.”
Te Naa meeoo ne netamma, “Noꞌoko hemma nuga matabuena besa nemadabuedooa.” Soo Te Naa meeoo, “Tamme saaꞌa noꞌoko hemma besa nemadabuekoo, pana menoꞌo gisoo oe manepetu.”

Ekow naꞌunnedu togesapa ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu. Gi haaꞌnoto soo Te Pabeꞌe ka umu Te Naa tummatzidu menakwutu-ma nasootuhaꞌe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsa soo Te Naa ka meeoo unnena Te Naa te magwetzoise, te sootuhikwu. Menoꞌo yise soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe unu sootuhaꞌe, soo Te Naa noꞌoko hemma tu matabuepu-kooba numu oo moohe tuunguna.

Soo Te Naa noꞌoko hemma tu sootumadabuena matabue. Soo Te Naa besa ka Te Pabeꞌe magwetzoi, oosoo tamme-koobatoo nabatsa yise ka tu yaꞌekwikoo namayoda. Ooonekoo soo Te Pabeꞌe ewow numu moohekena mu nasootuhi-kwitoo.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe nawaꞌnesoo te mayugwemena, ka Te Naa doodooamu te mayugwena. Oosoo Te Tubetse Pabeꞌe manepetu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe gi nasookwina, “E wangaꞌamu, E punneꞌemu,” mee te natubanga.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo ka Te Naa netamma, “Nu naduyadu pooha hoobea nekwuhukwu ka nanesootuhipe-kwiꞌyoona, ‘Te Naa besaꞌyoo,’ mee ka e wangaꞌamu noko e punneꞌemu tuukwena.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeꞌe te netamma, “Nu punnoꞌo mu-kwaꞌnesoo ka Te Naa-wi nasootzagwiyina.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe tuwazoo ka Te Naa tamme-witu mee netamma, “Nu yow e nanumu-baa E Naa-toohakwi mu e nanumu-gaꞌyoo.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yow tamme-baa petuse namanumudoose, yise tamme-koobatoo nabatsa. Soo Te Pabeꞌe kadooꞌoo ka sutakoo mayugweke ka tamme goedu tunetammapu oo tubetse tamatzooekupu.
Oꞌnosoo soo sutaꞌyoo ooosapa te nemooagana te nesuana, “Mu tubetse tuikwu,” mee te netammana. Pana menoꞌo soo Te Pabeꞌe ka sutakoo pooha kadoo nemayugwekepu.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tu nanumu tummatzikwuse ka yaa teepu-kooba petuse gi ka Tu Naa tummatziwabe toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo-kooba tueyaꞌekwuse.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe besaꞌyoo ka tamme-waꞌnesoo manekese, soo Sutaꞌyoo suda oo tooꞌe mane tuungu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe oo nakasopedakwatoo ka sutakoo tamme oo yugwe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe te sootuhina te nanesootuhikute ka Te Naa te tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwa tuunguna.
E nanumu, soo Te Naa te netutzeꞌa tu doodooamu manekwutu yise te magwetzoi. Tamme sakwa ooosapa oo soomayu ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus tubetse besow.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe te nanesootuhikuna ka Te Naa besa unnepu te tuukwe ka Te Naa pumme netamma-kwaꞌnesoo, ooosapa ka Te Naa nakabetsea ka Moses-waꞌne.

Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe pudu unnepu besaꞌyoo, gi ka mu Jew numu mooa tumayohope ka Moses tamme tuukwe-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus ka Moses ooonakwasoo besaꞌyoo, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka oo matabuese, ka nobe-tootu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo oosoo puu ka tu nobe-toona ooonakwasoo besaꞌyoona.
Tooe numu nobe-too sapa soo Te Naa noꞌokosoo hemma matabuepu.
Soo Moses, Te Naa besa tuukwewabe, meeoo te tuukwe, “Soo Te Pabeꞌe saaꞌa petudooa.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus ka Moses ooonakwa besaꞌyoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus ka Te Naa God Besaa Tooaꞌa. Soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko te moohedooa, ka ooosapa te tunakaꞌoedyukute oo sopedakwatoona soo Te Naa te magwetzoikwu.

Ka Te nanamooatupu-witu soo tubope te tuukwe. Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa yadooawabe Moses mee naneadu mu numu mooheka ka teepu Egypt mee naneadu-kwiꞌyoona. Tooe umu ka Te Naa unnepu nakapana umu gi oo nakaꞌoedyukute. Ewasoo (40) tomokapu umu ka gi tunakabetseana. Soo Te Naa meeoo mu netamma, “Nu umuoo maꞌemukwadu gi sootuhi-waꞌneꞌyoo.” Umu yise gi ka Te Naa pumme tunetammaku-kwitoo wupetugaꞌa. Ka oonow sukwe hee-kwanaꞌyoona umu yise noꞌyoona tui tzasooa petuga, umu ka gi Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukuna. Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha mee te netamma, “Ka yaa tabeno ka Te Naa mumme yadooe besa oo nakapunne, mu sakwa oo nakabetsea. Mu sakwa gi tusoomatzooepana, ka mu nanamooatupu manepu-waꞌne. Ewasoo (40) tomoka nu ka mu sootuhina, ewa nanabesahoo mu tooꞌe tzapoonnekuna. Pana umu tusoomatzooena gi e nakaꞌoedyukute. Umu tuwazoo e tooꞌe masutaꞌa. Nu yise mu soosakwiku petugase meeoo unakwe, ‘Umu gi e nakaꞌoedyukuna gi e nakabetsea. Umuoo gi pumme e sootuhi-kwi wupetuga-waꞌneꞌyoo.’ “ E nanumu, noꞌyoona sakwa tamme besasoo, ooosapa tunakaꞌoedyukuna gi suda manepana. Tamme sakwa gi ka Te Tubetse Naa besa po kaꞌabepana. Tamme tunakaꞌoedyukudu sakwa ooosapa ka Te Naa Besa Podo nanesootuhino oetoo nananenoyugwenona. Oꞌno yise soo suda te tusooyugwena gi suda te wuyugwepunnekwu. Mooasoo tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe nanumu maneke, tamme tunakaꞌoedyukuna yise ooosapa oo nakaꞌoedyukunokwu.
Soo Te Naa meeoo te netamma, “Nu mu sootuhikwu.” Tamme sakwa ooosapa ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna, ka Te Naa tamme sootuhina wupetuga
gi ka te nanamooatupu-waꞌne. Tooe umu tamme-waꞌnesoo ka Te Naa unnepu nakapana umu gi oo wupetuga, ka pumme oo sootuhina umu ka gi tunakaꞌoedyukuna.

Tamme menoꞌo ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna, soo Te Naa ooosapa besa te sootuhinoꞌo. Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa ka teepu matabuese oo mamakwupu ka tamme tu sootuhikwuna tamme-too mamakwupunne. Mee naꞌunnepu, “Soo Te Naa noꞌokosoo hemma naapahe (6) tabeba-wisoo matabuepu. Soo Te Naa penakwa tabeba kemmadu-kwi gi hemma howyugwe, ka noꞌoko hemma mooasoo mamakwuse.” Ooonneꞌyoona soo te nasootuhipu oꞌnosoo tamme-too nanemamakwupu.
Soo Te Naa ka numu tu sootuhina besa soobedyana tooe umu te nanamooatupu ka Te Naa unnepu nakapana gi oo nakaꞌoedyukuna gi ka Te Naa pumme sootuhi-kwitu wupetugaꞌa.

Tooe soo numu moohedu Joshua mee naneadu ka mu Jew numu moohepana gi ka Te Naa unusoo tabeba pumme tu tuukwe-kwitoo wupetuga pana gi yow mu tubetse nasootuhinotu. Tamme oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa gi mu sootuhaꞌe. Saaꞌa soo Te Naa nayadooawabe David mee naneadu mee unakwe, “Yaa manakwana, ka Te Naa mumme yadooe mu sakwa gi oo nakasoomatzooapana.”
Soo Te Naa doodooamu tu sootuhikwuna togesoo ooosapa manepunne.
Tamme ka Te Naa tamme magwetzoipu sopedakwadoona gi tammesoo namagwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo, tooesoo soo Te Naa noꞌoko hemma nemadabuemea.
Tamme sakwa ka Te Naa besa podo besakoo meadabena besakoosoo ka Te Naa nakabetseana gi ka te nanamooatupu manepu-waꞌne manepana, oꞌno soo Te Naa te sootuhikwu.

Soo Te Naa besa unnepu tubetse unu pooha-gaꞌyoo. Ka Te Naa unnepu-wi oosoo ka te watze tusooyugwena te soogwina tuwazoo nematzatsebooe. Soo Te Naa te tubetse sopedakwadoona noꞌoko hemma te matabuepu poonne oo sopedakwatoo ka te manena. Oosoo tuwazoo te nemadabuekwu tooe te watze tusooyugwe sapa.

Mooasoo soo Te Pabeꞌe nanesootuhi-baa moohedu tamme yise oo sootumma. Tamme sakwa ooosapa nanaꞌunusoo oo nakaꞌoedyukuno. Mooasoo soo Te Pabeꞌe ka sutakoo sopedakwatoona gi oo tumayohokute ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona ooonneꞌyoona soo sutaꞌyoo ooosapa suda te mane tuungu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus, Te Naa Besaa Tooa, mooasoo ka Te Naa-baa petugapuna, onona oosoo ooosapa te nanesootuhikute.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe suda te soonammekute ka tutuha te namanatsayamoꞌo ka mooasoo oosoo puusoo oo-toogoo meapuna. Ooonneꞌyoona soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus yise te nanesootuhikute ka oꞌnosoo tooesoo yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona soo sutaꞌyoo suda oo tooꞌe mane tuungu pana oosoo gi ka sutakoo nakabetsea.
Ooonneꞌyoona menoꞌo yise tamme ka Te Naa-matoo mesoo nanetzakwiyaꞌe gi oo-ma suina tooe tamme gi maa-waꞌneꞌyoopana. Soo Te Naa te sootuhina te magwetzoikwu ka suta-kwi te manekena.
Yaa ka teepu-koobatu susumudu numu soo Te Naa pooha sootuhi, ka suda numu tutumatugukena mu nematzagakwunaꞌe.
Umu tamme-waꞌneꞌyoosoo sukwe numu tutuha te soobedya obedasoo besa te matugugena. Ooonneꞌyoona umu ka sutakoo tamme-makoo nematzaga.
Umu Jew numu nanesootuhi moohedu ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe ka sutakoo nematzagana noꞌoko suda te tutumatuguna yise pummesoo suda tumatuguna tuwazoo.

Ka oꞌnosoo Te Naa puu mu numu pooha sootuhaꞌe. Soo Te Naa mu-matu netutzeana mu pooha sootuhaꞌe, gi umu puusoo nanetutzea. Soo Te Naa puu ka te namooatupu Aaron mee naneadu netutzease oo pooha sootuhipu.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe puu gi puusoo meeoo nasooyugwena ka numu nanesootuhi moohekwu. Soo Te Naa puusoo oo netutzeapu, ka numu nanesootuhiku meeoo oo netammana oo pooha-makapu. Soo Te Naa yise ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “U Nuga Besaa Tooa. Yaa tabeno manakwana noꞌyoona numu u sopedakwadookwu u yow Nuga Besaa Tooa.”

Penakwa mee tuwazoo oo netamma, “Oꞌnosoo soo besaꞌyoo nanesootuhidu Melchizedek mee naneadu ooosapa besa mu numu nanesootuhikugena. Ka ume e pooha-makase u punnoꞌo ooonnekoosoo pooha-gakwu gi moobegwa-gakoo.”

Ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona soo Te Pabeꞌe ooosapa nanesootuhiyakwe ka Te Naa-matoo nanetzakwiyina. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukuna soo Te Naa oo yaꞌe-kwikoo oo mayodakwu. Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe nanesootuhina nakasootuhi, soo Te Pabeꞌe ooosapa ka Te Naa nakabetseana tooe oo unnena unu namanakwe sapa.
Tooe soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa Besaa Tooaꞌapana, oosoo Te Naa unnena nakabetsea tooe unu nuummaba wumase pummetu batsase sapa.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka noꞌoko Te Naa pooha tunetammapu mamakwuse, oꞌno yise saaꞌa oosoo noꞌoko numu pumme nakabetseadu magwetzoikwu.
Soo Te Naa Tu Besaa Tooaꞌa ka tu pooha nanesootuhipe-matu-ma oo sootuhi ka Melchizedek-waꞌne ka mooasoo meeoo oo netammakese.
Ka Melchizedek-witu, nu saaꞌa mu tuukwedooa. Pana mu gi oo nakasopedakwadoo-waꞌneꞌyoo ka gi oo soonakaꞌoedyukuna.

Wunaꞌme mu oo nakamopana mu ka mumme tu tunedyooena suuꞌmu poohimo. Menoꞌo sakwa mu punnoꞌo mu numu ka Te Naa besa unnena tunedyooe. Mu yise togesoo gi oo nakasopedakwatoo kaaheno hemma manepunnena. Mu oongaꞌa petzedu-waꞌneꞌyoo gi hemma sopedakwadoo. Mu sakwa ka gi etzaga numu tunedyooena mooe natunedyooe ka nanapu manekase a tookoo mesoo tukadu-kwaꞌne. Mu sakwa ka besow ka suda namanedu-makoo sopedakwatoo .

Mooasoo mu ka Te Pabeꞌe besa unnepu-witu sopedakwatoo ka etzaga numu natunedyooena. Gi yise numme ookowsoo mu tuukwe-waꞌneꞌyoosoo: ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna, ka sutakoo nanematzagakwunina. Ka numu baa-wi namatzakana, ka numu nanesootuhikuna umu-ma pooha matuguyina, ka Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌnesoo Te Naa noꞌoko numu mayodakwuna mu tui-kwikoo, ka mu mane-makoosoo mu nemadabuekwu.
Menoꞌo yise ka Te Naa tamme tummatzaꞌe, nu ka Te Pabeꞌe unnena gisoo ooka nakasopedakwatoodu tuukwekwu.

Mooasoo soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsapu. Mooasoo tamme ka te maꞌemukwapu nemawunikese soo Te Naa te sootuhipu ka Tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma te sootuhise yise te magwetzoipu. Tamme oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa unnena besaꞌyoo.

Tamme sakwa gi ka Te Naa besa po maꞌwukapana, tamme ka suda te manena manoyugwena gi tamme sumuna punowsoo kodyu-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe manasookwikute ka tunakaꞌoedyukupana suda tumatugukese ka Te Pabeꞌe pudu batsatu-kwaꞌne tamme manakwe.

Tooe ka Te Naa tamme sootuhaꞌe sapa tamme gi besa manakwe, ka gi he-toogoo besow tubewabe-kwaꞌne. Tooe ka tubewabe-koobatu unu powꞌma sapa soo tsaꞌabu suuꞌmu oe naatape, saaꞌa umuoo tsaꞌabu natunikwutu tamme saaꞌa ka tsaꞌabu-waꞌne namatugudooa te tumaꞌemukwana tamme-matoosoo kodyukwu, ka Te Naa besa po te maꞌwukase.
Nu meeoo mu yadooe pana gi sutaꞌyoo mee nu mu sooyugwe. Nu mu sopedakwatoo mu togesoo besa manakwe, Te Naa mu magwetzoikwu.
Soo Te Naa ooosapa kaaheno tumatugudu. Soo Te Naa oo soomayukwu ka besa mu tumatugupu. Mu ka unu oo soobedyana togesoo oo doodooamu tummatzaꞌe.

Tamme sakwa gi toetzegoepana ooosapa besa tumatuguno. Mu te nanamooatupu puu besa nasootuhaꞌe, besa-kwitoo wupetuga umu ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukuna. Tamme punnoꞌo ka Te Naa tamme besa sootuhi-kwi petugakwusoo.

Ka oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa tu mi mayodase ka togesoo te nanamooatupu momoꞌo ka Abraham meeoo netamma, “Nu nuusoo besa u sootuhikwu, ewaꞌyoo numu u-nakwana suakedooa.” Soo Abraham yise besa soonammena tuutooꞌe, ka saaꞌa yise soo Te Naa oo sootuhaꞌe.

Tamme puu ka te mi mayodase, tamme hemma pooha-gakoo nemaꞌyu. Ooonneꞌyoona soo Te Naa puusoo nanemayu gi hemma tu ooonakwa pooha-gakoo. Soo numu ka mayodase tamme oo sopedakwatoo umu kaaheno tuukwekwu.
Soo Te Naa puu togekoo yadooadu ooosapa, te sootuhikwu mee unnese mu Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu mee netammase, tamme yise oo nakasopedakwatoo oo tubetse sooꞌoedyukukwu.

Wahaba-tamme tamme oo nakasopedakwatoo ka togetu-kwikoo tamme oo yadooꞌe soo Te Naa puu gi esapu. Oosoo ka tu mi mayodase puu kaaheno unnekwu. Ooonneꞌyoona tamme oo sopedakwatoo ka Te Naa tamme sootuhikwuna, tamme oo magwetzoikwuna tuwazoo, tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Tamme ka besa-kwikoo nanatukwena,
oo tubetse sopedakwadookwu ka Te Naa-baa te petugakwuna.
Mooasoo soo Te Pabeꞌe Te Naa-baa petugapu oosoo ooosapa te nanesootuhikute ka Te Naa-matoo gi moobegwa-gakoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Melchizedek-waꞌneꞌyoo oosoo puu numu nanesootuhikudu.

Esoo nana numu nanesootuhikuyidu Melchizedek mee naneadu unu pooha-gaꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa oo netutzea, numu oo nanesootuhiku tuunguna tuwazoo. Soo punakwana oo kemmapu gi nasopedakwadoo, gi oo nanapuaꞌamu, gi ka pumakoo oo suakena wahadu. Gi oo yaꞌena waha. Oosoo tookwu ooosapa gwetzoinummedu gi moobegwa-gakwutu, ka Te Naa Tooaꞌa, Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌnesoo. Soo Melchizedek ka besow podo mu numu kaaheno moohenoꞌo, kaaheno noꞌoko hemma howyugwe ka numu tummatzina. Oosoo yise ka Te Naa pumme sootuhi-kwitoo mu moohega, meeꞌe naꞌunnedu soo oo naneana, ka oogowsoo yadooa-kwi. Meeꞌe owetuoo nawahadu ka oꞌnosoo susumudu mu numu-matu noꞌoko mu numu namahema hanehooka. Soo te namooatupu Abraham mee naneadu tu nanumu-no yise mu nagekase mu numu matzooekuse umu-makoo tu hemma punowsoo haneoo. Ka Abraham kodyugena soo Melchizedek oo takwise oo nanesootuhikute. Soo Abraham yise ka tu hanedooapu-matu ka Melchizedek tosamaka.
Soo Melchizedek tookwa unu pooha-gaꞌyoo, ooonneꞌyoona soo Abraham oo tosamaka.
Saaꞌa soo Moses ka tu nanumu, umu Jew naana tamme nanesootuhikudu mu tosamaka tuungu. Umuoo numu nanesootuhikudu ka mu Jew numu-matu Levi mee naneadu-nakwana kemmadu.

Soo Melchizedek gi ka Levi-nakwana kemmadu, gi Jew nanesootuhidu, gi tuwazoo te nanumu-matu pana soo Abraham oo tosamaka. Mooasoo ka Te Naa ka Abraham sootuhikwu mee oo unakwe sapa, soo Melchizedek oo nanesootuhikute, soo Te Naa yise Abraham sootuhi.
Soo Melchizedek tookwa ka Abraham ooonakwasoo unu pooha-gaꞌyoo, ooonneꞌyoona ka Abraham puusoo nanesootuhikute.
Soo Melchizedek umu Jew numu nanesootuhidu ooonakwasoo unu pooha-gaꞌyoo, oosoo ooosapa gwetzoaꞌe gi moobegwa-gakoo umu Jew numu puu sukwe yaꞌeyakwe.
Soo Abraham puu ka Melchizedek tosamaka umu te Jew nanesootuhikudu punnoꞌo ooosoo manepunnedu-kwaꞌne manepunne,
tooe umu gisoo nadooamudoopu pana.

Soo tamme Jew numu putoogoo tumayohona puu ꞌyoo manepunne, umu numu nanesootuhikudu sakwa umu Levi numu-nagatu-matu. Pana mu Levi numu-nagatu te nanesootuhikudu tookwa gi poopooha-gaꞌyoo, ka Te Naa-matoo ka suda te tumuduguna tu tunematzaga-kwi. Soo Te Naa yise pudutupu tumayohope, putoogoo te tumayohomeakwuna te nemadabuekukwu. Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe pooha-maka, putoogoo te nanemagwetzoi tabuakwuna yaa manakwana. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Melchizedek-kwaꞌnesoo te nanesootuhiku tabuakukwu.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe namanumudooke, ka Judah mee naneadu numu-nagatu. Gi hannanoꞌo ka Judah numu-nagatu pooha-gaꞌyoo numu nanesootuhikudu uga soo Te Naa puu gi hannanoꞌo meeoo mu tunetammakudu.
Menoꞌo tamme oo nakasopedakwadoo soo Te Naa atasoo te tumayohope yugwepu oosoo ka kukummaꞌakoosoo tamme nanesootuhiku tuunguna Melchizedek-waꞌnekoo.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka umu Jew nanana tamme nanesootuhikudu tubetse ataꞌyoosoo. Umu nanana nanesootuhidu sukwe numu-nagatu. Gi tubetse pooha-gaꞌyoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe gi umu-waꞌneꞌyoo ooosapa gwetzoinummekwu gi moobegwa-gakwutu.
Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netammapu, “Nu putoogoo numu u pooha nemagwetzoikwuna u sootuhikwu ka Melchizedek-waꞌnekoosoo. U ooosapa ka eka poohabe hee-gakwu.”

Tooe tamme ka te Jew tumayohotoo meadabepana gi tamme hownnekoosoo oo-toogoo nanemagwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo. Ooonneꞌyoona soo Te Naa ka putoogoo te pudu tumayoho meakwuna te sootuhipu. Menoꞌo manakwana ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme moohe, ka Te Naa tamme tugunaꞌa manekena.

Soo Te Naa unnepu meeoo soo Te Pabeꞌe te nanesootuhikute, tamme yise oo sopedakwatoo oosoo kaahenoꞌyoo. Mee naꞌunakwe, “Soo Te Naa tu mi mayodase kaaheno ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, ‘Nu u pooha-maka, putoogoo numu u nemagwetzoikwuna. Gi nu ekow e unnepu atasoo yugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.’ “ Soo Te Naa puu gi tu mi mayodapana umu Jew nanesootuhikudu tamme meeoo nanesootuhiku tuungu.
Soo Te Naa unnepu tamme oo tunetammakupu ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme nemagwetzoikwuna mooasoo ka te tumayohope ooonakwa besaꞌyoo.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ooosapa te mesoo nanesootuhikute oosoo ka ooosapa gwetzoinummena. Umuoo gi ooosapa te nanesootuhikukwu umuoo sukwe tuikwu.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko te namanayaha-makoo te magwetzoi, oosoo ka ooosapa gwetzoinummena te nanesootuhikuna tamme ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhinona.

Tubetse besaꞌyoo soo Te Pabeꞌe putoogoo te nanemagwetzoina. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa-waꞌnesoo oosoo Te Naa Besaa Tooaꞌana gi totsabu-gaꞌyoo gi suda tumatugudu, gi hee oo ooonakwatu naduyadu pooha-gaꞌyoo. Gi tamme yaa teepu-koobatu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe gi umu tamme nanesootuhikudu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Nonotsa tabeno umu puu tuu tumaꞌemukwana nematzagadape, ka tamme tumaꞌemukwa nokosoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka puu gi hannanoꞌo tumaꞌemukwapuna. Sumuꞌyoosoo soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tamme maꞌemukwa-koobatoo mooasoo nabatsapu, ooonneꞌyoona soo Te Naa besa te sootuhina ooosapa te tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwa.
Soo numu gi tubetse pooha-gaꞌyoo uga te tooe nanesootuhikute. Pana menoꞌo soo Te Naa ka Tu Besaa Tooa Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nemawuni yise tamme ooosapa nanemagwetzoi.

Nu ooosapa mu tuukwenoꞌo soo Te Pabeꞌe umu numu nanesootuhidu ooonakwa besaꞌyoo. Oosoo ka Te Naa-waꞌneꞌyoosoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa-tumadinakwa katuna te nanesootuhikute gi ka mu numu nanesootuhi nobe-too-kwiꞌyoona.
Umu nanesootuhidu numu puu ka Te Naa tosamaka te tumayohope naꞌunne-kwaꞌnesoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe puu, puusoo ka Te Naa-matoo nanemawuni.

Ka te nanamooatupu mooa tumayohope manepunne-kwi, ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona soo Te Pabeꞌe gi nanesootuhi numu manepunne-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme mooasoo tamme nanesootuhikudu-gaꞌyoo soo Te Pabeꞌe gi umu-nagatu. Oosoo Te Pabeꞌe Te Naa tumadinakwu katuna te nanesootuhikute.

Ooonneꞌyoona ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona pukwiꞌyoona mu nanesootuhidyina nobe, ka Te Naa pukwiꞌyoo-waꞌnesoo sukwe manepunne oetu. Tubetse oꞌnosoo ka Moses oona giba-maꞌyoona tunetammakupu, “Yoo saaꞌa mu ka nanesootuhi nobe matabuedooa,” meeꞌe soo Te Naa oo netammapu.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe pooha ka umu yaa teepu-kooba nanesootuhidu numu pooha ooonakwasoo besaꞌyoo. Ooonekoosoo soo Te Pabeꞌe umuoo ooonakwa besasoo te nanesootuhikute. Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe tunetammapu, ka Moses te nanamooatupu oo netammana ooonakwasoo besaꞌyoo.
Soo Te Naa putoogoo te pudu nanesootuhi meakwuna menoꞌo te tuukwe, oꞌnosoo mu tumayohona, ka umu te nanamooatupu gi hemma mu tummatzi.
