Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa meeoo: “Nu ka mu Jew numu ka teepu Egypt mee naneadu-kwikoo mu moohegase besa mu tooꞌe tunetammakute. Pana umu gi e nakabetseꞌa. Nu gi hownnekoo mu tummatzi mane mu sakwa e tsasoopedya, pudusoo nu yise mu tuukwekwu ka putoogoo mu pudu nanesootuhimeakwuna. Nu gi ka mu nanamooatupu meeoo tunetammakudu.
Nu saaꞌa nu-tamme mu soonamme tuoonakuse mu yise ka e unnepu soohanese, e nakabetseadooa.
Oꞌno yise mu e besa doodooamu manekese nu-matoo nanesootuhidooa. Gi mu kummaꞌakoosoo sookwikwu, nu-kwitu pumme tunedyooekwudu. Oowe manakwana noꞌyoona e sopedakwadookwu.
Oꞌno saaꞌa yise nu ka nanasuda mu manepu soomuꞌwakwu.”
Soo Te Naa ka putoogoo mu mooa nanesootuhimeapu, mooasoo mooatupu kadooꞌoo oo mayugwekwu. Menoꞌo soo Te Naa ka tu pudu unnepu te tuukwekwu.
Oꞌnosoo tamme nanamooatupu puusoo putoogoo pooha meapu ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona hee-gaꞌyoo, pukwiꞌyoona mu nanesootuhidyina.

Soo nanesootuhi nobe ka natzekadukuse, soo pukwi oo mooe naꞌegeahookayina Poohabe Pu-kwiꞌyoona mee naneꞌa. Oetu kootabuakudu, pooha tukaba wobe namadabue-kooba natugu. Soo pabaꞌyoo wunapu ka nobe naamootoo natzapata. Ka wunapu natzapadadu-kwingakwuna soo Tubetse Unu Poohakakoo Pukwiꞌyoona mee naneꞌa. Esoo wobe-ma namadabuedu oe, oa tupe oo naꞌoonnakwi nahane, yise besa kookwanadu pukwikoo natunina, wobe namadabuena oa tupe petakwa-gaꞌyoo oe tuwazoo. Soo Aaron natzetono ooweoo natugu, sumu togaba-wisoo boohe naahoodu, ka Te Naa Pooha-ma wahaꞌyoo segetayamadu tupe ka Te Naa unnepu puuma nabona, yise tseda oa tupe-ma namadabuena tuwazoo. Soo tukaba Te Naa ka te nanamooatupu pumatu oo makapu ka tseda-wi.

Oobe ka wobe-ma namadabuena-koobenaꞌyoona mu te nananesootuhi papabeꞌemu numu tumaꞌemukwana nematzagakwuniyakwe. Soo hemma namadabuena oo-kooba wammedu ka mu toha kakasa-ga-kwaꞌne tatabuadu. Mu kasa yise ka wobe namadabue-koobakwi natzapadapunnedu-kwaꞌne tabuapunne. Gi nu menoꞌo hemmasoo owetuoo mu tuukwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Ka Poohabe Pu-kwiꞌyoona mee naneadu mu nanesootuhidu moohedu suuꞌmu nonotsa tabeno meꞌayakwe.

Sumu tomoyina mu tubetse unu pooha-gaꞌyoo ka Tubetse Unu Pooha-gakoo Pukwiꞌyoona mee naneadu-kwi egeayakwe. Nonotsa oe egeana ka kootsoo tooaꞌa, noko seepu puupe yoongana, ookow ka Te Naa nabeamakana, ka mu numu suda tumatugu-koobatoo, pummesoo suda tumatuguna tuwazoo nematzagakwuniyina umu numu suda tu tumatuguna gi sopedakwadoodu-koobatoo tuwazoo.

Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha te tunedyooe tamme ka te Jew numu tumayohope-toohakwi gi tammesoo ka Te Naa-baa petuga-waꞌneꞌyoo tamme ka te Jew tumayohope-toohaꞌyoona mu numu gi puusoo ka wunapu natzapadadu-kwingakwatoo mea-waꞌneꞌyoo.

Pana soo te nanamooatupu tumayohona gi haga numu tummatzaꞌe menoꞌo meeꞌe soo Te Naa Besa Pooha te tunedyooe. Tooe tamme menoꞌo ka Te Naa nabeamakawunupana, oosoo gi ka suda te tumatuguna kadooꞌoo mayugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.

Soo te nanamooatupu putoogoo mooa tumayohona, ekow suuꞌmu te tunedyooe ka te pooha manekwitu. Ka baa hebena, tukana, nabakeana, hemma te nabeatse-gana, noko eka suuꞌmu te tunedyooe. Yow putoogoo te tumayoho meana ka gisoo Te Pabeꞌe-witu te sopedakwatoo, menoꞌo yise soo Te Pabeꞌe besasoo ka kaaheno putoogoo te pudu nanesootuhimeakwuna te tunedyooe.

Ka tumayohope te nanamooatupu mayohomona soo te nananesootuhi papabeꞌemu ka te tumaꞌemukwana tooꞌe nematzagakwunaꞌe, yaa teepu-koobatu ka numu tumadabuena nanesootuhi nobe-kwi nanesootuhi konnona. Ka Te Naa-kobenaꞌyoona, umu ka sukwe numuna, gi hownnekoo te nanesootuhiku-waꞌneꞌyoo.

Umu te nananesootuhi papabeꞌemu yise kootsoo kooma puupe-ma, tooetoo kootsoo natunina kootoosebu baa noko namayuadu-ma te bawutaꞌne mee te netammana, “Mu yise menoꞌo gi totsaba-gaꞌyoo.” Tooe oo mu manakwe sapa oosoo gi te tummatzaꞌe.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme pudu tunemadabuekuna ookow ooonakwa besaꞌyoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe te tuukweꞌe ka Te Naa besa po-witu, tooe soo Te Pabeꞌe gi tootsabu-gapana, tamme-koobatoo nabatsa. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tu yaꞌe-kwikoo namayoda yise ka Te Naa-baa petuga. Oobeꞌyoona ka Te Naa-kobenaꞌyoona soo Te Pabeꞌe nanesootuhina ka te tumaꞌemukwana nematzagakwunaꞌe. Menoꞌo tamme oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa te tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwa, tamme yise oo nakaꞌoedyukunokwu. Soo Te Naa yise gi moobegwaga te sootuhikwu.

ꞌYooonnekoo soo Te Pabeꞌe te tuukweꞌe, ka Te Naa tamme pudu tunetammakuna, te tumayohomeakwuna. Yaa manakwana soo Te Naa besa gi moobegwaga te sootuhikwu, mooasoo soo Te Pabeꞌe te tumaꞌemukwa-koobatoo nabatsapu.

Ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona togesoo gwetzoina soo numu puu ka tu namahe tooe haga-tamme oo nemawunaꞌe, ka tooe hannanoꞌo tooꞌe oo yaꞌese, ka menoꞌo soo numu ka puumatoo oo nanemawunise saaꞌa oo hee-gadooa. Ooonekoo soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tamme-koobatoo nabatsase tamme noꞌoko ka besow nasootuhipe nasootuhi oꞌnosoo ka Te Naa tamme tunetammapu-kwaꞌne.
Ka oꞌnosoo ka tumayohope te nanamooatupu mayohomona tamme-koobatoo hemma nabatsayakwe.

Ka nagutza mooeꞌugasoo soo Moses te pooha tunetammakupu, ka kootsoo tooaꞌa batsase, oo puupe hanese, ka baa noko oo wumayuase, yise ka tonegea, tooetoo ka seepu puhu-matu ooweoo matzakase noꞌoko ka mu numu oo-ma bawutabeꞌa. Ka Pooha natubodu, ka pukwiꞌyoona mu nanesootuhidyina tuwazoo yise noꞌoko hemma ka nanesootuhi nobe-kwitu bawutabea tuwazoo. Soo Moses yise meeoo mu numu netamma, “ ‘Mu ꞌyoo tumatugunokwu,’ meeꞌe soo Te Naa unakwe. Yaa manakwana soo Te Naa besa te sootuhikwu.” Oo-waꞌnesoo manepunne
menoꞌo soo Te Pabeꞌe punnoꞌo ka tamme-koobatoo nabatsase yooonnekoo suuꞌmu soo Te Naa suda te tumatuguna soomuꞌwa.

Ka yaaꞌa teepu-koobaꞌyoona soo te Jew nanesootuhi nobe sagwane ka Te Naa ebe tamme-koobatu tubetse nobe-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona numu tumaꞌemukwana nasoomuꞌwa ka seepu tooetoo kootsoo umu-koobatoo nabatsayakwe. Pana ka Te Naa ebe tamme-koobatoo tubetse nobe-kwiꞌyoona, soo te tumaꞌemukwana tubetse nasoomuꞌwa ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsase.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe puu ka Te Naa tubetse nobe-kwi tzaꞌegea ka oobeꞌyoona te nanesootuhikute gi ka yaaꞌa teepu-kooba nanesootuhi nobe, sukwe numu tumadabue-kwaꞌneꞌyoo.

Nonotsa sumu tomoyina umu te nananesootuhi papabeꞌemu seepu batsayakwe, ka oo puupe haneyina, ka nanesootuhi nobe-kwi egeayakwe, ka mu numu tumaꞌemukwana tooe nematzagakwunina. Ka teepu mooe namadabue manakwana ka Te Naa ka teepu atasoo oo yugwe-kwitoo tooe, soo Te Tubetse Pabeꞌe yaa teepu-kooba petuse, tamme tumaꞌemukwa-koobatoo nabatsa.
Noꞌyoona numu sumusoo yaꞌeyakwe. Obenakwatoo yise soo Te Naa noꞌoko te tumatugupu nemadunagakwu.
Sumusoo soo Te Pabeꞌe ewow numu-koobatoo nabatsapu. Gi tuwazoo oosoo nabatsa-waꞌneꞌyoosoo. Saaꞌa oosoo penakwa kodyu petuse, ka tamme pumme wutooepunnedu magwetzoikwu.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mooasoo tamme-koobatoo nabatsapuna, soo Te Naa yise punnoꞌo te tumaꞌemukwapu soomuꞌwapu. Tooe tamme tooe haaꞌno tooe kootsoo kooma, tooetoo seepu goewunupana, oosoo gi te tummatzi-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme ooosapa uga ka Te Naa tosamakayakwe tooesoo tamme oo sopedakwatoo, tamme tumaꞌemukwana. Tooe tamme ka te tumayohope nakabetseapana, oosoo gi besa te mayugwe.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka yaa teepu-kooba namanumudoose, ka Te Naa meeoo netamma, “Nu yow menoꞌo petu ka nuka u tunetammakupu mayohokwuse, a nabotugu-kwaꞌnesoo. U yaahoo e manumudoopuna ooonneꞌyoona yise nu ka mu numu-koobatoo nabatsa, u gi ka hemma ume tu nabeamakana petzabena.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo, “Soo Te Naa ka hemma nagoena pumme tu nabeamakana gi petzape ka te nanamooatupu putoohakwi tumayohona.”

Soo Te Naa te mooa tumayohodyina gi petzabena ka Te Pabeꞌe oe mayugwese oosoo tamme-koobatoo nabatsa, ka Te Naa unne-waꞌnesoo. Oo ka Te Pabeꞌe manese soo Te Naa yise ka suda te tumatugupu noꞌoko soomuꞌwukwunipu.
Nonotsa tabeno tamme mu Jew numu papabeꞌe konnoyina nanesootuhiyakwe ewasoo te nanamooatupu tumayohope tooꞌe mayohopana, umuoo tumayohope gi ka te maꞌemukwana kadooꞌoo mayugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe sumusoo tamme-koobatoo nabatsapuna, soo Te Naa yise ka te tumaꞌemukwana tubetse soomuꞌwa. Menoꞌo yise soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa tumadinakwa, ka Te Naa-waꞌnesoo pooha-gaꞌyoo.

Menoꞌo ewaꞌyoo numu togesoo ka Te Pabeꞌe gi nakabetseꞌa, soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu sukwe tsasoopedya, ka saaꞌa soo Te Naa gi mu nakabetseakwu. Ka umu tu nemadabuekwi oo manepetuse ka Te Naa tunetamma-kwaꞌnesoo. Ka mu paba nanehane-kwitoo tooe, oꞌno soo Te Naa umu suda nuugwedu pooha tuukwekwu.
Mooasoo soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa doodooamu besa mayugweke oosoo ka tamme-koobatoo nabatsase.
Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa Besa Pooha meeoo,
“Nu saaꞌa sapa ka putoogoo mu pudu nanesootuhimeakwuna mu sootuhikwu. Oꞌno saaꞌa nu ka mu tunakabetseadu sootuhikwu.”
Mee tuwazoo unakwe, “Menoꞌo manakwana yise nu mu tumaꞌemukwa soomuꞌwanokwu.”
Menoꞌo manakwana tamme gi ka Te Naa nabeamakakwu, ka mooasoo te tumaꞌemukwana nasoomuꞌwapu.

E nanumu, tamme uga gi hownnekoo ka Te Naa-baa petuga-waꞌneꞌyoo ka te mooa tumayohope mayohona, ka Te Naa nanesootuhi nobe-kwiꞌyoona. Soo pabaꞌyoo wunapu oo naamootoo natzapadadu ooosapa uga ka Te Naa-makoo te takonepunne, pana menoꞌo yise soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsapu. Oꞌno yise ka Te Naa pumme pudu tunetammakupu-too te tunedyooe meakwu.
Ka Te Pabeꞌe nabatsase soo Te Naa ka tamme takoꞌnedu ka wunapu naamoo tzakebuꞌeoo ka nanesootuhi nobe-kwi natzapadadu, menoꞌo yise tamme kaaheno Te Naa-no mesoo yadooa, gi hee te takoꞌne.
Menoꞌo yise Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko hemma nemadabuena, te nanesootuhikute.
Menoꞌo yise tamme gi ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona suaꞌe ka oo tubetse nakaꞌoedyukuna. Tamme oo sopedakwatoo ka Te Naa te tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwa, tamme yise baa-wi namatzaka.
Tamme sakwa ooosapa oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa te magwetzoi, yise tamme ooosapa ka oo unnepu nakabetsea.
Tamme sakwa nananenoyukwena, nanatummatzina, ooosapa besa maneno, besa nanasoobedyana.
Tamme sakwa ooosapa nanano nanesootuhidyi, ka menoꞌo tamme oo sopedakwatoona soo Te Pabeꞌe pudusoo kodyu petukwu. Mu sakwa gi mu susumudu numu-waꞌne manepana, umu puu gi numu-no nanesootuhi.
Tamme ka mooasoo Te Naa tubetse unnepu sopedakwatoo pana ooosapa tumaꞌemukwatabena, gi hownnekoo saaꞌa soo Te Naa te tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwa-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Saaꞌa soo te tumaꞌemukwana tamme-matoosoo kodyukwu, oꞌno tamme noꞌoko ka Te Naa wohonedu-nosoo natunikwu.
Soo te Jew nanamooatupu tumayohope mee naꞌunakwe, soo wahaꞌyoo numu ka te tumayohope tumooꞌoodu poonnedusoo meeoo unnese, oꞌno sakwa tamme gi oo-toogoo mu nabagapana. Oosoo sakwa tupe-ma natatsaga.

Tamme ka Te Naa pooha unnepu tumooꞌoona, tamme tubetse suda manakwe. Tammesoo kadoo namayugwekwu tamme ka mee unnena, “Soo Te Naa Tooa gi hee. Soo tamme-koobatoo oo nabatsana gi pooha-gaꞌyoo.” Tamme ka Te Naa Besa Pooha tamme magwetzoidu netumooꞌoona.
Tamme ka Te Naa tamme netammapu sopedakwadoopana ka suda te manena manoyugwena, soo suda te tumatugupu tamme-matoosoo kodyukwu ka te nanemadabuese.
Oosoo sumu tabeno te masakwikwutu ka gi te tunakaꞌoedyukute, soo suda te manena ka tamme-matoosoo kodyuse.
Mu sakwa oo soomayu ka oꞌnosoo mu manena gi oo soomuꞌwapana. Mu ka pudu mooeꞌugasoo tunakaꞌoedyukuse, tooe suda mumme tu matugu sapa, mu gi nasootooke.
Mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu uga mu nesootzeꞌmayakwe, mu uga ka mu nanesootuhidu nanesootzemayidu numu tummatziyakwe.

Mu ka mu nakwutumadu tunakaꞌoedyukudu uga tummatzidu tuwow. Tooe ka mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu numu noꞌoko mu hemma hanese sapa, mu gi suda oo sokwamakute ka Te Naa-baakoo besa mu nasootuhikwuna sopedakwadoona. Umuoo Te Naa-baakoo te namahegana gi kadoo namayugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Wunaꞌme menoꞌo maneka mu ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Saaꞌa soo Te Naa oowetoo mu sootuhikwu. Mu sakwa gi nasootookena, gi ka mu nasootuhipe nemawunipana.
Mu sakwa ooosapa ka Te Naa unnepu nakabetseano, oꞌno saaꞌa oosoo mu sootuhidooa ka mee unnena,
“Pudusoo Mu Pabeꞌe mu-baa petukwusoo, yise mu magwetzoikwu.
Umu e tubetse doodooamu ooosapa e nakaꞌoedyukunodu nu magwetzoikwu. Pana umu e besa po maꞌwukadu, nu gi sootuhikwu.”
Pana tamme ka Te Naa besa po gi maꞌwuka-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme namagwetzoikwu, tamme ka ooosapa Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukunona.
Tooe tamme gisoo ka puma Te Naa tamme sootuhikwuna poonnepana, mooasoo tamme oo sopedakwadoo ka oo nakaꞌoedyukuna.
Soo Te Naa meeoo, “Mu nanamooatupu-matu uga besaꞌyoo umu ka e nakaꞌoedyukuna.”

Soo hee noꞌyoona yaa teepu-koobatu menoꞌo te poonnena gi hemmakoo namadabuepu, tubetse kadooꞌoo hee uga. Soo Te Naa ka teepu matabuepu noꞌoko hemma-ma-koobatu madookoopedoopu tooe tamme gi oo manepu poonnepana, tamme oo nakaꞌoedyukute. Soo Te Naa sukwe yadooase noꞌoko hemma te poonnena nemadabuepu.

Oꞌnosoo sumuꞌyoo tooebetse Abel mee naneadu ka Te Naa seepu tookoo nabeamaka. Soo Te Naa ka Abel tumatuguna besaꞌyookute ka besa oo tunakaꞌoedyukute. Soo Abel pabeꞌe ka tu tumasua-matu ka Te Naa sukwe totsaꞌmaka tooe gi oo nakaꞌoedyukupana. Tooꞌe ka Abel oꞌnosoo nabatsapu sapa, tamme togesoo ka oo besa tumatugukepu-makoo natunedyooe.

Soo nana Enoch mee naneadu Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukute. Soo Te Naa oo-matoo besa soonamme, oosoo ka unu pumme oo nakaꞌoedyukute. Soo Te Naa nabatoo oo bi. Soo Enoch yise gi yaꞌepana, ka Te Naa-matoo sukwe mea.

Soo tooe haga tooe ka Te Naa besa masoonamme ka oo nummenummena nakaꞌoedyukuna. Umu numu pumme tubetse nakabetseadu soo Te Naa besa sootuhikwu, umu ka ooosapa besaꞌyoona saaꞌa hemma besowsoo Te Naa-nakwana poonnekwu.

Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa meeoo tusooyugwe, “Nu saaꞌa ka teepu batatzopakudooa.” Soo Te Naa yise ka nana Noah mee naneadu pabatsekoo sake matabue tuungu. Tooe soo Noah gi hannanoꞌo ka teepu batatzopana poonnedupana, oosoo ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukuna, ka pumme oo sakedoo tuunguna matabue. Mu Noah nanodukwa, pihoo tu doodooamu, yise pihoo tu kunoopeamu-no noꞌyoona ka sake-wikoo namagwetzoipu. Noꞌyoona mu numu ka teepu-koobaꞌyoona badatuꞌihoo ka gi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Mu Noah-maꞌyoona suaketu suuꞌmu nasootuhi.

Soo nana Abraham mee naneadu uga umu tu nananumu-naga nobe-gaꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa yise meeoo oo netamma, “U sakwa mana ume e tayakwitoo mea, nu saaꞌa ookow umu u-maꞌyoona suaketu teepu-makadooa.” Soo Abraham yise oetoo mea ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukuna.

Soo Abraham yise ooosapa mana ka Te Naa pumme geakwunakwahana ka teepu-koobakwisoo nummenumme. Soo Abraham tutsekadukupe-kwi nobega numme, oo tooa Isaac mee naneadu, oo kunooꞌoo punnoꞌo Jacob mee naneadu oo-no, umu ka oo nakaꞌoedyukuna soo Te Naa mu sootuhikwu tu unne-waꞌnesoo.
Soo Abraham gi yaa teepu-kooba tu nobe-gana heesoobedya ka Te Naa-baaꞌyookwu mee soonammena ka Te Naa tubetse nakaꞌoedyukuna.
Soo Abraham nodukwa Sarah mee naneadu mooasoo unu peawabe. Pana soo Te Naa oo sootuhise, oosoo koꞌhease tooaꞌadoo ka Te Naa tubetse nakaꞌoedyukuna, mee yise Te Naa oo netamma,

“Umu u-maꞌyoona suakekwutu ewaꞌyookwu gi pumme tasunganoꞌyookwu.” Tooe ka numu meeoo sokwama sapa, “Abraham sumuna yaꞌekwu gisoo dooamu-gana oosoo ka mooasoo unu waꞌetsena,” Abraham punnoꞌo ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukute.

Mu Abraham nanodukwa, tu tooa, tu kunooꞌoo-no tooe gi oo poonnepana ka Te Naa pumme tuukwepu, ooosapa oo nakaꞌoedyukunoꞌo ka tu tui-kwitoo tooe. Pana sumu tabeno oo-toogoo hee manekwu meeꞌe umu oo nakaꞌoedyukute. Umu meeꞌe unakwe, “Esoo teepu gi ooosapa pukooba te gwetzoimokwuna tamme yaanona mease tamme ka Te Naa-baa tubetse manepetugakwu.”

Umu ka meeoo tusooyugwena ka Te Naa-tammetu ooosapa soomayumo umu ka yaa teepu-koobatu gi heesoobedya ka tu tubewa-witoo kodyu-waꞌneꞌyoopana, ka mooasoo Te Naa tu pukwiꞌyookwuna oo mabetsape ka oo tubetse nakaꞌoedyukuna. Soo Te Naa puu gi umu-ma nasookwaꞌe. “Nu mu Tubetse Naa, nu yow ooosapa mu nabaaꞌyookukwu,” ka Te Naa meeꞌe pumme mu natubanga.

Soo Te Naa ka Abraham meeoo netamma, “Nu umu u tooa-maꞌyoona numu suaketu besa sootuhidooa,” tooe gisoo oo tooaꞌa-gakoo sapa. Ka saaꞌa yise oo tooa nawue, oosoo yise Isaac mee nanea, ka Te Naa tunetamma-waꞌnesoo. Ka Isaac tooebetse manekese, saaꞌa soo Te Naa ka Abraham soomapoonnena meeoo oo netamma, “U sakwa u tooa Isaac e nabeamaka.” Soo Abraham ka Te Naa nakabetsea oosoo ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Soo Abraham ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukute tooe ka tu penebe tooa oo nabeamakase sapa soo Te Naa oo mesoo manumudoosoo, meeꞌe soo Abraham tusooyugwe. O yise ka Abraham tusooyugwe-kwaꞌnesoo, soo Te Naa ka Isaac oo tooa punowsoo oo gea.

Ka saaꞌa soo Isaac waꞌetseyikese, umu waahoo tu doodooamu kaaheno mu pooha tuukwe ka umu-maꞌyoona suakekwutu manekwuna. Soo Isaac ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukuna oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa ka oo tooa Jacob mee naneadu besa sootuhikwu.

Soo Jacob, punnoꞌo ka waꞌetseyikese, oo sopedakwatoo hanotu-matu tu kunooꞌoomu-matu soo Te Naa sootuhikwu, soo Jacob ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukuna. Soo Jacob ka tu natzetono-koobakwi nuusoese, nanesootuhina mu pooha tuukweꞌe, ka saaꞌa tu kunooꞌoomu manekwuna.

Soo Jacob tooaꞌa Joseph mee naneadu punnoꞌo ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukute oo sopedakwadoo ka sumu tabeno ka tu nanumu pumme tubewa geakwuna. Tooe oona-kwingaꞌa Egypt-wiꞌyoo pana, soo Joseph ka yaꞌekwuse tu nanumu meeoo netamma, “Saaꞌa soo Te Naa ka mumme tu tubewabe tuukwe-kwitoo mu moohegakwu. Oꞌno saaꞌa mu ka e oho nabenina hanegase oonowsoo oo wumabemadooa.”

Ka saaꞌa mu Egypt-witu numu-kooba katudu mu Jew numu umu tu pudu nadooamudoodu nanaꞌatse goe tuungu. Sumuꞌyoo oongaꞌa besa tabuadu nadooaꞌadoose Moses mee nanea. Umu oo naanapuaꞌamu ka Egypt-witu numu-kooba katudu tunetammana gi suina gi oo nakabetsea, gi tu naꞌatse tooaꞌa oo batsa, umu ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukuna.
Ka saaꞌa soo Moses ka nana manekase meeoo unakwe, “Nu tubetse Jew numu. Nu gi ka Egypt-witu numu-kooba katudu togoꞌo, nu ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna.”

Tooe ka mu Jew numu suda namatugu sapa, soo Moses umu-matu mee nasooyugwe. Soo Moses mee soonamme, “Nu gi ooosapa yaa teepu-koobaꞌyookwu. Nu gi noꞌoko hemma e hee-gana soogwaꞌe ka yaa teepu Egypt mee naneadu-kwiꞌyoona. Nu uga maꞌemukwakwu ka yaanonasoo hemma besa namasoonammena. Nu sakwa puu umu e nanumu-waꞌneꞌyoosoo Te Naa Tooaꞌa, tooe ka Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo nuka suda tu matugu sapa.”

Soo Moses ka saaꞌa Egypt-wiꞌyoona mea, oosoo ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Soo Moses gi ka mu Egypt-witu numu-kooba katudu-ma suaꞌe, tooe pumme oo sutakute sapa. Oosoo ooosapa ka Te Naa nagenoꞌo oo poonnetu-kwaꞌne, tooe gi oo poonnepana.

Saaꞌa soo Moses ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna ka mu numu meeoo netamma, “Mu sakwa seepu batsase, ka oo puupe-ma mu natzakwonaꞌa naꞌooonakwi wumatzua, oꞌno soo nanapu mu naꞌatse tooa yaa togano gi nabatsakwu.”

Saaꞌa soo Te Naa ka tubetse babatseꞌe banunadu Atsa Baa mee naneadu mu-koobenatu ninapatoo pasawoyoꞌakuse, mu Jew numu yise oo-toogoo mea umu ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Mu Egypt-witu numu oo-toogoosoo mu tooꞌe nageka, soo Te Naa ka tubetse baa oetusoo nekodyuoose, umu yise oe batatuihoo, ka gi tunakaꞌoedyukuna.

Soo numu pukwi nogadu-kwi Jericho mee naneadu unu natzooedu oo naꞌooonakwi tupe koodea-gaꞌyoo. Mu Jew numu ka Te Naa oedyukute oosoo ka Jericho-witu mu numu matzooekuna. Soo Te Naa ka mu Jew numu natakwatsukwu (7) tabeba-witoo ka Jericho-naꞌooonakwi sogomea tuungu, soo tupe koodea yise puuwana-tamme yoomedihoo, umu ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna.

Soo mogoꞌne, nanana maꞌemukwadu Rahab mee naneadu, tooe ka mu Jew numu tumooꞌoo-gapana, ka mu Jew tuꞌeyiwabe tu nanumu-makoo tzakwatze, oosoo ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Ka saaꞌa mu sutakoo numu Jericho-witu nagoese, soo Rahab namagwetzoi, oosoo ka mu Jew numu tuꞌeyiwabe tzakwatzese.
Nu menoꞌo gi noꞌoko mu tuukwe-waꞌneꞌyoo ewaꞌyoosoo mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu meeꞌe nananeadu: Gideon, Barak, Samson, Jephthah, David, Samuel yise ewaꞌyoo mu Te Naa nanayadooawabe tuwazoo.

Umu ewa nanasookwugi manekena umu ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukuna. Umuoo tu wohomu matzooekukena, umu ka besow podo numu moohena, umu ka Te Naa pumme sootuhipu hee-gana umu ka oo nakaꞌoedyukuna. Ka mu sutakoo nunuꞌu-makoo namagwetzoi,

koso-ma pumme tu tooꞌe tunihoose sapa namagwetzoi. Umu ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna tooe puusoo gi nanatzooepana, umu unu naduya manemena, umu ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Umu ewow wakwawaꞌa pumme wohonedu matzooekukena.

Ewaꞌyoosoo mu momokoꞌne tooe tu tooaꞌa yaꞌekuꞌyipana mu tooaꞌa tu tui-kwikoo namayodayakwe, umu ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Susumudu numu meeoo nanetamma, “Mu ka Mu Naa Besa Po mee mu netammana gi maꞌwukana, numme mu goekwu.” Umu yise meeꞌe mu nanekwegea, “Numme ooosapa Ne Naa nakabetseadu tooe numme tu goekwuse sapa, numme ka Ne Naa nakaꞌoedyukuna soo Te Naa nabaatoo ne bikwu oo-baa yise numme nobe-gakwu, oosoo yise besa ne sootuhikwu.”
Mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukuna mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-maꞌyoo nanekoꞌe, nakwebaꞌa-ma nuupageta, susumudu natzakunetana nuutumeta, umu-matoo nanehanena nagoꞌe.
Susumudu tupe-ma nadakoꞌe tu yaꞌe-kwitoo tooe, tsegesa-ma natseboka, susumudu tooe hownnekoo tooe nagoꞌe.

Susumudu numu tooe Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhimopana tutuha manakwe yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona ka gi kwasu-gana seepu puhu-wi namasooana, gi nobegana, numu-wana manemodu tupe tawaga-kwi ka giba-maꞌyoona, tooetoo ka teepu tawaga-kwi nonobe-gaꞌyoo. Mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu numu suda mu matugu ka mu wohoꞌnena.
Tooe umuoo besaꞌyoo numupana ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna umu ka Te Naa pumme sootuhina sukwe wutooe, ka Te Pabeꞌe gisoo petu.
Soo Te Naa mooasoo meeoo unnepu oosoo te paba nasootuhikwuna. Umuoo tamme-nosoo ka Te Naa tamme sootuhina hee-gakwu, ka Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko tamme-koobatoo nabatsase.

Tamme oo sopedakwatoo ka besow po ka Te Naa tamme tuukwepu, ewaꞌyoosoo mu tutunakaꞌoedyukudu mooasoo oo-toogoo meapu. Menoꞌo sakwa tamme ka suda te tumaꞌemukwana etzaga maꞌwu, oosoo ooosapa te takonegena. Oꞌno tamme yabesoo ka Te Naa Besa Po-wi tzabekakwusoo.

Tamme sakwa ooosapa ka Te Pabeꞌe nageno, oosoo ka Te Naa Besa Podo te moohe oo pudu nage-ma-kwiꞌyoona ka oo mobegwana-too tooe. Tooe soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu pumme wohone sapa pumme gi mu heesoobedya, tooe pumme te batsayagate sapa soo Te Pabeꞌe gi nasootooke. Soo Te Pabeꞌe tubetse besa soonamme, ka Te Naa Besa Podo meadabena. Menoꞌo yise soo Te Naa-nabatoo ka Te Pabeꞌe bi, “U saaꞌa nu-waꞌneꞌyookwu,” mee oo netammana.
Tamme sakwa punnoꞌo oo soomayuna oo-waꞌnesoo soo Te Pabeꞌe puu gi nasootooke tooe ka mu sutakoo numu suda pumme matugu sapa.
Mu sumuna mee sokwama, “Numme ewa suda manekena numme ka mu numu tumaꞌemukwana wohonekena.” Pana mu gisoo nabatsa ka Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌne.

Tooe tamme ka susumudu unu nanasutatoo meapana gi nasootookepana meeoo soo Te Naa te tunedyooe. Tamme sakwa ooosapa sutatoo meadabe, oꞌno soo Te Naa tu doodooamu-waꞌnesoo te matugu. Tamme sakwa oo soomayu ka a nabotuguna, tamme oo netammapu, “Mu sakwa oo nakatugupunne ka Te Naa mumme tunedyooe. Mu sakwa gi nasootookepana ka mumme oo tunedyooꞌe. Soo Te Naa ka mu soobedyana, mu tunedyooe. Oosoo numu puu ka pummesoo dooamu ka suda mu manakwe mu nenanawaꞌe.” Yooonnekoo soo Te Naa te tzapoonnekute tamme ka oogow doodooamuna.
Soo Te Naa ka gi te heesoobedyana uga ka tooe how tooe te manakwe sapa te tsasoopedyakwu.

Soo nugasoo naa puu ka oꞌnosoo e tunedyooe, nu yise puu oo nakapunneyakwe. Ooonnekoo sakwa tamme ka Te Naa tamme tunedyooena nakatuguyi. Nu ka tooesoo tuhaꞌyoona gi toge tumatuguse soo e naa puu e nesagwikuyakwe.
Soo Te Naa punnoꞌo ka suda te tumatuguse te nenanawikwu, tamme-too oosoo besaꞌyoo. Oꞌno yise tamme besa manekekwu.
Soo te nanenana-wina gi besa numu nenuumadu, pana saaꞌa tamme ka oo natunedyooekese, tamme besa manekese besakoo yise nasootuhinokwu.
Ooonneꞌyoona sakwa tamme nananenoyugweno. Tamme sakwa umu tunakaꞌoedyukudu nenoyugweyi. Tamme sakwa noꞌoko hemma sutakoo maꞌwuke. Oosoo ka mu numu Te Naa besa po-makoo takohoꞌne.
Tamme sakwa ka Te Naa doodooamuna nananemabetseana gi sakwa tamme nanahapana. Umu Te Naa tubetse doodooamu suuꞌmu ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petugakwu.

Ka Te Naa Besa Podo te meadape ka tooe haga tooe numu-nakwi manedu tummatzina oo nenoyugwe, oꞌno oosoo punnoꞌo ka Te Naa besa pumme sootuhi-kwi petugakwu. Soo numu tooe haga tooe ka Te Naa po maꞌwukadu sumuna suda tuukwena, kummaꞌakoosoo numu suta-tamme moohekadooa.

Gi haga tamme-matu sakwa mee soonammepana, “Soo Te Naa nuka sootuhina gi hee. Nu sakwa tooe how tooe mesoo mane, kukummaꞌanosoo mesoo nabotama.” Oꞌnosoo soo nana Esau mee naneadu meeoo tusooyugwe. Soo Esau uga nasootuhikwu oosoo ka mu suuꞌmu pabeꞌena, pana oosoo tu nasootuhipe sumuoo tukapupedo yugwepu.
Mu mooasoo ka Esau-witu naka, ka saaꞌa oosoo Te Naa pumme sootuhina tooꞌe nekwaꞌe. Yagana tooꞌe nanesootuhaꞌe pana soo Te Naa gi oo nakasootuhaꞌe.

Tamme puu gi ka umu yaa teepu-kooba ka Te Naa pukoobaꞌyoona giba petukwana petugase, onona ka Te Naa tuapa tookoope naka. Soo giba nitu-kwaꞌne tabuapunne umu oo-ma suaꞌe. Soo giba kwetu-kwitu tubetse unu toganopunne.
Soo Te Naa yise mu yadooedyina nunuadu-kwaꞌne unaꞌwe mu numu yise unu suina ka Te Naa meeoo netamma, “Gi ne yadooepana numme unu suaꞌe.”

Soo Te Naa meeoo mu netamma, “Gi sakwa haga ka giba tzageꞌe manepana. Gi mu hemma ma-kooba tatokupana. Mu sakwa gi ka mu seepu tooetoo mu kootsoo ka giba-ma tatokupana, ka oo mu manakwe tupe-ma mu tatsaga.”
Soo giba puma nanasui tabuapunne soo Moses meeoo, “Nu kwepekeawunu suina.”

Pana tamme ka Te Naa tubetse nobe-kwitoo nabaꞌe, oowetuoo gi nanasuaꞌe. Tubetse ewaꞌyoo umu Te Naa tutummatzidu mu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo nanano besa sokwamana o. Tamme tunakaꞌoedyukudu punnoꞌo umu-noꞌyookwu. Soo Te Naa te netutzease oto te sootuhikwu, soo Te nananeana ka oo-baa nabotuguna. Mu tutunakaꞌoedyukudu moogooa punnoꞌo o, ka Te Naa besa pumme matabuese. Soo Te Naa onona ka mu gi tutunakaꞌoedyukudu paba nehanekwuse. Soo Te Pabeꞌe punnoꞌo onokwu, mee tamme nanetammana. Oosoo mooasoo te tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwapu, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tamme maꞌemukwa-koobatoo nabatsapuna. Ka tooebetse Abel mee naneadu nabatsase oo pabeꞌe oe naneyugwe. Ka Te Pabeꞌe nabatsase gi haka oe naneyukwe ka oogow nabatsaputoo te nasootuhikwuse.

Tamme sakwa ooosapa ka Te Naa tamme netammana nakabetsea. Soo Te Naa ka giba-maꞌyoona mu te nanamooatupu yadooese ka teepu neyuutsengahoose sapa, umu te nanamooatupu gi oo nakabetseana, yise kadooꞌoo namayugwepu. Menoꞌo yise soo Te Naa ka tu pudu unnepu te tuukwe paꞌanakwana. Tamme sakwa oo nakabetsea saaꞌa oosoo ka teepu noko hemma oo paꞌanakwatu tzadyuutsengekwu.

Soo Te Naa ka noꞌoko hemma tzadyuutsengese noꞌyoona hee oo matabuepu atasoo nuugwekwu. Gi noꞌyoona hee kadooꞌoo namayugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo gi tuwazoo atasoo namayugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo. Pana soo te nasootuhina ka Te Naa-baatu wunaꞌmetoo gwetzoinummekwu gi atasoo namayugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.

Tamme ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe soo Te Naa mee te unnena besa soobedya, “U, Ne Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo. Numme u nesookwugaꞌe u noꞌoko sutakoo hemma kadoo mayugwekwu, soo besaꞌyoo suuꞌmu yise nabenikwu.”
Tamme sakwa ooosapa unu nanasoobedya.
Tamme sakwa kukummaꞌakoosoo wakwawaꞌa nabaaꞌyooku, ka gi hano mu tooi-waꞌne mu manepunne. Susumudu numu sumuna ka mu Te Naa tummatzidu, mu toha kakasa-gakoo, nabaaꞌyooku pana gi mu sopedakwadoo.
Tamme sakwa oetu soohanena ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu suda namatugu-witu soohanena tamme punnoꞌo ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona suda namatuguyakwe. Mu nuutumedadu numu-witu soohanena tuwazoo.
Tamme sakwa meeoo sokwama soo numu nananodukwa-gana besaꞌyoo. Tamme ka kummaꞌanosoo nabootamana soo sutaꞌyoo tamme-matoosoo kodyukwu.

Tamme sakwa gi ewowsoo hemma soogwipana. Tamme sakwa ka mooasoo te hee-ga-matoo besa sokwama, oꞌno soo Te Naa te mabetseakwu. Soo Te Naa mee te netamma, “Nu mu mabetseana gi mu matusookwuni-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
Ooonneꞌyoo tamme togesapa ka meeꞌe, “Nu gi sui. Numu gi nuka manayaha-waꞌneꞌyoosoo. Te Naa nu-kooba tuꞌeyaꞌe e tummatzina.”

Mu numu nanesootuhi moohedu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu mu numu nagutza mooeꞌugasoo tuukwedu besa ka Te Naa Podo meadape, tooe ka tu tunakaꞌoedyuku-kwi nagoese sapa. Tamme sakwa umu-waꞌnesoo besa tunakaꞌoedyukuno.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe puu ooosapa sumu-kwaꞌneꞌyoosoo, ooosapa besaꞌyoo.

Tamme sakwa gi kummaꞌakoosoo numu nakabetseapana, ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu nanaꞌatasoo tamme mu tuukweꞌe sapa, gi ka Te Naa Besa Po maꞌwupana. Soo Te Naa ka besa te sootuhina, tamme nanaꞌunusoo oo nakaꞌoedyukukwu. Soo te nanamooatupu tumayohope ka te tukakwitu nanetammana gi hownnekoo te tummatzi-waꞌneꞌyoo tooe ooka te nakabetsea sapa.

Tamme ka oo nakaꞌoedyukuna ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsapu, soo Te Naa togesoo te sootuhaꞌe. Umu te nanamooatupu tumayohope nagedu soo Te Naa gi mu sootuhi-waꞌneꞌyoo, ka mu Jew numu nanesootuhikudu papabeꞌe nokosoo.

Tamme Jew numu puu ꞌyoo tumayohoyakwe soo nanesootuhi pabeꞌe puu ka seepu nabeamakayakwe ka suda te tumaꞌemukwa-koobatoo oo batsase, oosoo yise ka puupe suuꞌmu ka tu nanesootuhi nobe-kwitoo hanegayakwe, ka oo tookoo yise numu nonoꞌata-wanatoo hanegayina oo tuniyakwe.
Ooosoo soo Te Pabeꞌe puu tamme-koobatoo nabatsa tabuapu, ka mu Jew numu nonoꞌatana-wanatoo nabatsapu.
Ooonneꞌyoona tamme sakwa ka mu Jew numu nanesootuhi tabuana maꞌwukase, ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme mane, tooe numu tamme-maꞌyoona nanekoena, tamme mu nesootzema sapa.
Gi tamme ooosapa yaa teepu-koobaꞌyookwu. Tamme ka Te Naa tamme tumadabueku-kwitoo meakwu.
Tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna, “Soo Te Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo,” mee sakwa tamme ooosapa ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhino.
Tamme sakwa tuwazoo besa nanamatugu, nanatummatzina soo Te Naa besa soonamme ka oo te manakwe.

Tamme sakwa ooosapa mu tamme nanesootuhi moohedu nakabetsea. Ka Te Naa tamme-kooba umu tuꞌeyaꞌe tuungu oosoo ka how besa umu e nakabetsea meeꞌe mu sooyugwena meeoo mu netamma. Tamme ka mu nakabetseana, umu etzaga te tummatzina, umu besa sokwama. Pana tamme ka gi mu nakabetseana, umu te moohedu suda sokwamana, gi hownnekoo te tummatzidooa.
Mu sakwa ooosapa ne nanesootuhiku. Numme oo sopedakwatoo ka Te Naa podo kaaheno numme meadabena.
Mu sakwa ne nanesootuhiku, oꞌno numme sumu tooe mu-baasoo kodyu petukadooa.

Nu mu nemayuwunu ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhi mee unnena, “U, Ne Naa ooosapa tubetse besaꞌyoo. U ne magwetzoaꞌe u ka nanasookwugina. U ka besa u unnepu ne tuukwe oosoo ooosapa togesapa naꞌunnedu soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsapu. U ka Ne Pabeꞌe yaꞌe-kwikoo oo mayodase, yise tamme-kooba oo tueyaꞌe tuungu. U mu sokwamana atasoo mu mayugwekuse, besakoosoo, oꞌno umu u nakabetseakwu. Oꞌno mu ka umu mumme netamma-kwaꞌnesoo manekwu ka Te Pabeꞌe pooha-toohakwi.”
E nanumu, mu sakwa e nakapunne. Nu gi haanoko mu-matoo tubokwu.
Nu ka mu sootuukwena ka Timothy tu nakwutuma-kwiꞌyoona natzatzebooa-kwitu. Ka pudusoo yaa oo petuse, numme saaꞌa mu-baa nobenegadooa.
Nu noꞌoko mumme Te Naa doodooamu, mumme nanesootuhi moohedu, noꞌokosoo mu soomayu. Noꞌyoona mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu yaaꞌa teepu Italy mee naneadu-koobatu mu soomaꞌyu.
“Soo Te Naa noꞌoko mu sootuhikwu,” meeꞌe nu nanesootuhiyakwe.
Nu yow James eka tubope mu tunakaꞌoedykudu-matoo noko mu Jew numu-nagatu tooe hanotu tooe tubo. Nu James ka Te Naa noko Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-wi tunakabetseadu tubona.
E nanesootuhi nanumu, tamme ka noꞌobatusoo he-kwi suda manepunnena, tamme gi sakwa suda oo sokwamakupana.

Tamme ka gi ka sutakoo nakabetseanona unu natzooꞌe, ka Te Pabeꞌe-ma nasootamana, oꞌno oosoo natzooe te mayugwekwu ka te tubetse tunakaꞌoedyuku-kwi. Oꞌno yise tamme ooosapa ka Te Naa besa podo meadabekwu.
Tamme ka ooosapa Te Naa podo meadabena, tamme ka saaꞌa oo moobegwana petugase, onona tamme besow nasootuhibu nasootuhikwu.

Tamme ka gi sooname tumapuaꞌana, tamme sakwa nanesootuhi Te Naa-matoo, oosoo sakwa ka tu besa yadooape-matoo besa te sokwamatuguse te sootuhi, oosoo besa sooname ka noꞌoko te sootuhina. Soo Te Naa gi numu netsagwikudu ka pumme nanesootuhina hemma pumme tu nanetsakwiyaꞌe.

Ka nanesootuhina, tamme sakwa tubetse unu ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyuku. Tamme sakwa gi wahaba tusooyugwepana. Tamme ka gi tubetse tunakaꞌoedyukuna, tamme waha-tamme tusooyugwe, hukwapu-waꞌnekoo sooname-gaꞌyoo. Soo hukwapu puu waha-tamme hukwadu.
Oꞌno yise soo Te Naa gi te sootuhi-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Tamme ka wahaba tusooyugwena gi hemma mamakwu-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Ka mu numu tamme tutuha manedu gi paba nenaka sapa, oꞌno tamme sakwa besa sokwama soo Te Naa puu paba te sooyugwe.

Mu ewow hee-gaꞌyoo numu sakwa oo nakasoopedakwadoo, umu pudusoo yabesoo gadoo manegakwu ka hemma tonegeabu-waꞌnesoo oosoo puu yabesoo tonesaweyakwe. Ka taba udutupunne soo wahabu puu pasayakwe yise soo hemma tonegeana puu saweyakwe yise gi besa tabuayakwe. Soo ewow hee-gaꞌyoo numu sakwa gi ka hemma tu heega-ma nasoonatzipana ka Te Naa-ma nasoonatzina oꞌno suuꞌmu umu besa sokwamakwu.
Tamme ka tooe how tooe maneyipana ka Te Naa besa podo meadabena, tamme besa sokwamakwu ka Te Naa tamme sootuhaꞌe ka unu pumme te soobedya.
Tamme sakwa ka suda tusooyugwena gi, “Ka Te Naa oe neyugwepana,” mee. Oosoo Te Naa gi suda manedu.
Oosoo tammesoo suda tusooyukwena suda te wuyukwe.
Tamme ka ooosapa suda tusooyugwena, pudusoo tamme gi besa manegeakwu. Tamme ka ooosapa suda manetabena oosoo Sutaꞌyoo te goekwu.
Gi ka Suta-ma nanemooagapana.

Soo Te Naa ka besow suuꞌmu te sootuhaꞌe. Soo Te Naa ka taba noko ka paatoozooba besa matabuepuna, umu ooosapa ooonneꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa ooosapa besaꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa ooonneꞌyoo sapa, gi atasoo naneyukwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Soo Te Naa oetu soohanese tu doodooamu te mayugwe ka togekoo tu yadooapu-waꞌnesoo tamme yise o besa doodooamu mane.
E nanesootuhi nanumu, noꞌyoona sakwa tamme besa oo nakapunne, gi sakwa tamme ooosapa apegeagonopana. Tamme sakwa gi etzaga nidyanapana.
Tamme nidyanana gi besa manakwe, gi ka Te Naa tamme sooyukwe-waꞌne.
Tamme sakwa besa-tamme meadabe. Tamme sakwa ka suda te manena maꞌwu. Tamme sakwa ka Te Naa unena nakapunnena oo nakabetsea tamme tu tuukwepu. Ookow unena te magwetzoikwu.
Tamme sakwa gi tammesoo nanemooagapana. Tamme sakwa gi Te Naa unnepu sukwe nakapunnepana, tamme sakwa oo mayohotooe.
Tamme ka Te Naa unena nakase, yabesoo oo soomuꞌwase,
tammesoo nabonneꞌe-wikoo nabonnese, ka meahoose te tabuana soomuꞌwahookadu-waꞌne manepunne.
Soo Te Naa te sootuhikwu tamme ka besa oo unnepu nakabetseana gi oo soomuꞌwapana oo tumayohokuna, soo sutaꞌyoo gi te matzooekute. Tamme gi oo soomuꞌwa-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Tamme ka meeoo unena, “Nu ka Te Naa-matoo ooosapa nanesootuhidu pana tamme ka ooosapa sutakoo unegana tamme tammesoo nanemooꞌaka soo Te Naa gi te sootuhi-kwaꞌneꞌyoo.

Umu Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhidu puu yooonneꞌyoo: Umu puu mu gi koomamu-gakoo pepeawabe tumatzaꞌe, ka gi naanapuaꞌamu-gakoo tooe hownnekoo tooe suta-kwi mu manepunne tuwazoo. Oꞌno saaꞌa umu gi ka sutakoo po nagekwu.
E nanesootuhi nanumu, tamme sakwa gi sumuoosoo suuꞌmu besa matugupana ka numu-nagatu. Tamme ka sumuoosoo suuꞌmu besa matuguna tamme tookwa gi togekoo podo meꞌa.

Mee nu besasoo mu tuukweꞌe tabuakwu: sumuna wahaꞌyoo nanana te nanesootuhipu-wi pepetuoo. Sumuꞌyooga unu nanenagadu-kwi kwaseadu, yise oa kwehepu maꞌnegea-wi namadabuena. Tamme sumuna meeoo oo netammakwu, “Yaaꞌa soo besaꞌyoo kadunoo. U sakwa yaaꞌa katu.” Soo sumuꞌyoo unu tutuha namadabuedu mooa kwasu-kwi namadabuedu tamme sumuna ookow meeoo netammakwu, “Gi ka kadunoo-kooba katupana. U sakwa yaa ꞌwunu tooetoo yaa teepu-kooba katu.”
Tamme suda manakwe. Tamme ka sumuoo besa matuguna ka sumuoo-tamme gi besa matuguna, te tusooyugwena gi besa tabuꞌa ka Te Naa-nagwana.

E pupuamu, ka yaa teepu-koobatu umu tutuha manedu numu-nagatu soo Te Naa sootuhikwu, ka pumme tu nakaꞌoedyukute. Tamme oo manena Te Naa tu doodooamu manepetugakwu. Soo Te Naa meeoo te tubetse netammapu tamme ooosapa saaꞌa oo-baaꞌyookwu, tamme ka oo tubetsetugana, besa oo sooyukwena, besa oo soobedyana. Ooonneꞌyoona sakwa tamme gi mu tutuha manedu numu suda matugupana, ka mu ewow hee-gakoo numu-nagatu puu gi tunakaꞌoedyukute. Umu ooosapa suda te netammana te wumooaga ka te nanehane-kwikoo.
Umu suda ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma pu-matoo te nanesootuhina. Oosoo Te Pabeꞌe besaꞌyoo tamme-nakwana.

Soo Te Naa tubetse unnepu oo tubotuguna tamme oo nagetuguna mee naꞌunakwe, “Tamme sakwa noꞌyoona numu soobedya ka tammesoo te tookoo soobedya-waꞌnesoo.” Ookow sakwa tamme nakabetsea oꞌno tamme besa manekwu.
Tamme ka sumuoosoo mu numu-nagatu besa matuguna, tamme ka Te Naa unnepu gi nakabetsea.
Tamme ka noꞌoko Te Naa unnepu nakabetseana, pana sukwe sumuoosoo Te Naa unepu-matu gi nakabetseana, tamme tookwa togesapa gi Te Naa nakabetseadu.

Yooonekoo sakwa nu besasoo mu tuukwe. Soo Te Naa waha-baa naꞌunedu te tuukwe, “Tamme sakwa gi kukummaꞌakoosoo numu-no nanapootamapana, yise sakwa gi too numu patsapana.” Tamme ka numu patsase, tooe gi kummaꞌakoosoo numu-no nanapootamapana, tamme tooesoo ka Te Naa unnepu gi nakabetsea.

Soo Te Naa meeoo te netamma, “Tamme sakwa ooosapa mu numu tutuha soobedya.” Tamme ka gi mu numu tumatzina, soo Te Naa punnoꞌo gi tamme tutuha soobedya. Soo Te Naa ooosapa tutuha te sooyugwedu. Tamme sakwa ooosapa ka Te Naa unnepu nakabetsea oosoo besa kaaheno te mayukwepunne. Soo Te Naa ka meeoo mooasoo te sooyukwepuna, suda te tumaduguna gi tamme-matoosoo kodyukwu.
Tamme ka mee unena, “Nu Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyuku,” pana gi oo nakabetseana, tamme gi meeoo une-waꞌne tabuꞌa ka gi oo nakaꞌoedyukuna. Tamme ka yoo manena gi namagwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Nu besasoo oowetuoo mu tuukwe tabuakwu. Ka tooe haka tooe tamme-baa petuse, tsuayaꞌena, utzutzuna, tutuha namadabuena
tamme tookwa gi oo soobedyana tamme ka mee oo netammase, “Gi hownneꞌyoo u ka sumuna wutzuꞌmena, besa yooena,” tooe gi hemma oo geapana. Oosoo gi togeꞌyoo tamme ka tammesoo unena gi nakabetseana.
Ooonneꞌyooona tuwazoo tamme ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukute mee unepana gi oo nakabetseana, tamme tookwa gi tunakaꞌoedyukute.
Tamme ka gi tunakabetseana, gi hownnekoo oo tzapoonne-waꞌneꞌyoo ka te tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Tamme ka tunakabetseana oo tzapoonne ka tubetse tunakaꞌoedyukuna.

Tamme ka meeoo unena tamme Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna oosoo suuꞌmu besaꞌyoo pummatoo te nanesootuhina, pana tamme gi Te Naa nakabetseana, oosoo gi te magwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo. Mu tamme-toohatu kwakwase-gaꞌyoo punnoꞌo ka Te Naa-witu soopedakwadoona unu oo-ma umu suaꞌe.
Mee nu besasoo mu tuukwe tabuakwu. Oosoo gi togeꞌyoo tamme meeoo unena, numme oo nakaꞌoedyukupana gi oo nakabetseana.
Ka oꞌnosoo te namooatupu Abraham ka Te Naa nakabetsease, ka tu tooa Isaac mee naneadu ka Te Naa-matoosoo nemawuni. Soo Te Naa meeoo, “Oosoo Abraham besaꞌyoo,”
ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyuukuna, oo tzapoonne tuwazoo ka oo nakaꞌoedyukuna.
Ka ꞌyoo manena oosoo oo tzapoonne, soo Te Naa unnepu togesapa, soo meeꞌe natubodu, “Abraham Te Naa puaꞌa.” Soo Te Naa meeoo, “Soo Abraham besaꞌyoo ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna.”
Soo Te Naa meeoo besaꞌyoo tamme ka oo nakaꞌoedyukuna oo nakabetseana. Gi sakwa sukwe tunakaꞌoedyukuna mee naneyugwepana.

Oꞌnosoo tuwazoo Rahab mee naneadu mogoꞌne oo tzapoone ka Te Naa-wi tu tunakaꞌoedyukuna tu mane-kwi. Ka mu numu watze tuꞌeyaꞌedu ka Te Naa doodooamu-nagatu pu-baa petugase, soo Rahab ka mu numu watze tuꞌeyaꞌedu watzetugu, soo Rahab mu watze tumatzi. Ka ꞌyoo tu mane-kwi, oosoo oo tzapoonne soo Te Naa meeoo, “Soo Rahab besaꞌyoo.”
Yoo manepunne soo te tookoo yaanopana, tamme gi hee ka te moogooa gadooꞌookoo. Ooonneꞌyoona tamme ka tunakaꞌoedyukute mee unepana gi tunakabetseana, te tunakaꞌoedyukuna gi hee.
E pupuaꞌamu, huuꞌyoosoo tamme-nagatu sakwa numu nanesootuhibu tunedyooedu mane. Soo Te Naa mu numu nanesootuhi tutunedyooedu unu tunakabetsea manena soogwaꞌe, noꞌoko numu ooonakwasoo.
Noꞌyoona tamme tuneꞌemukwa. Soo tooe haga tooe gi tuneꞌemukwudu tookwa tubetse besaꞌyoo.

Soo numu ego puu tuutseꞌyoo pana tooe ka tuutsekoo hemma paba mesoo nemadabue. Soo natzipu puu tuutseꞌyoo pana tamme ka pookoo tupa-wi oo hanese, soo pookoo te nakabetseana tooe howtoo tooe pumme te tzamuna, tamme soomane-kwaꞌnesoo manenumme.
Soo sake natzakohakunoo puu tuutseꞌyoo pana ka sake tzamuna, ka tutzidu soomane-kwaꞌne tooe unu tu hukwa sapa. Umu-waꞌneꞌyoo soo numu ego tuutseꞌyoo pana ewa suta-kwi numu nemayukwe.

Tuutseꞌyoo goso puu paba haano-kwi tooe hemma tooe nikute. Mu numu ego ka goso-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo suta numu ego neyugwedu ka teepu-toohatu ooosapa nidabedu gi tookedu goso-nakwana kemmadu. Soo te ego noꞌoko te tookoo totsaba geꞌa ka suda te mane tuunguna.
Noꞌobatusoo hemma modu soo numu mesoo madusooyookute: hootsebaꞌa tooe togogwa sapa tuwazoo.
Pana tooe haga tooe gi hownnekoo pummesoo ego unikwuna tzi-waꞌneꞌyoo. Oosoo numu ego puu ewa nanasuda numu unekute.

Susumana tamme oo-ma Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhina, yise susumana te pupuꞌamu nesootzeꞌma, oo namanedu gi besaꞌyoo. Tamme sakwa gi numu nesootzemapana, ka Te Naa mu numu pu-kwaꞌnesoo mu matabuese. Tamme sakwa gi Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhina numu nesootzemapana nanoꞌo-kwizoo.
E pupuaꞌamu, nu sakwa besasoo mu tuukwe tabua. Sumuꞌyoo patzona puu besa kamadu baa-gana, gi osa kamadu baa-ga-waꞌneꞌyoo tuwazoo.
Sumuꞌyoo tumasuape pu gi nanakummaꞌakoosoo suakute. Soo osa baa puu gi hannanoꞌo besa kama-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme sakwa gi Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhina numu nesootzemapana nanoꞌo-kwizoo.

Tamme numu nanesootuhibu tunedyooedu ka kaahenotu soopedakwadoona, gi sakwa paba nasooyukwepana. Tamme sakwa ka mu numu tzapoonneku ka Te Naa besa podo te meana, ka gi nanahana, gi numu ooonakwasoo besa nasooyugwena.
Tamme ka nanahana, numu ooonakwasoo besa nasooyukwena, tamme ka toge naꞌunepu gi nakabetsea.
Tamme ka nanahana oo-koobatoo paba nasooyugwena, tamme gi ka Te Naa toge unnepu nakabetseꞌa, pana tamme mu numu tumaduguna ka kwase-gakoo unena tamme nakabetsea.
Soo numu ka puusoo besa nasooyukwena numu ooonakwasoo, umu tooe how tooe nanasuda manena nananuusoogweduna mu numu yise ooweoo nanahaꞌa.

Tamme ka Te Naa kaaheno unnepu nakabetseana, tamme yooonneꞌyoo: gi totsaꞌa, gi nanano nanahaꞌa, besa numu matugu, besa numu nakasoopedakwadoo, numu tumatzina, ka toge-kwitu soopedakwadoona, kaahenoꞌyoona.
Umu gi tu nanakwohonena petzabedu, nananosoo besa hemma hanekwu, oosoo yise umu-matoo kodyuka umu yise besaꞌyookwu.
Tamme numu nanano nanakoꞌe, tamme ka tammesoo nakoobatoo hemma soogwina.
Tamme yise ka te nekwina gi hanena tamme nanahakooha, sumuna nanagoekwu yise sumuna tamme matu tu puaꞌa patsowkwu. Tamme ka gi hemma hee-gana, tamme ka gi oowetuoo Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhina.
Tamme yise ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhise, oosoo gi ooka te geana, tamme ka tammesoo sutakoo natoogoo hemma sookwina.
Tamme unu suda manakwe ka ooosapa tooe hemma tooe natoogoosoo soogwina. Tamme ka Sutakoo tumatzina Sutakoo pupuaꞌa-gaꞌyoo. Gi tamme ka Te Naa puaꞌa-gana Sutakoo tuwazoo pupuaꞌa-ga-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Meeoo natubotugu, “Soo Te Naa te matabuese, te moogooa te geapu. Oosoo meeoo te soobedyana tamme sakwa ookow suuꞌmu nakabetsea.”
Soo Te Naa te sootuhikwu ka te tumatzina, ka oo nabotugu-kwaꞌnesoo mee naꞌunedu, “Soo Te Naa mu numu besa nasooyugwedu tumooꞌoo, pana mu sootuhaꞌe umu gi oo manedu.”

Tamme sakwa gi numu ooonakwa besa nasooyukwepana. Tamme sakwa ooosapa Te Naa nakabetsea. Tamme sakwa gi ka tamme-toohatu kwase-gakoo nakabetseapana. Tamme ka kwase-gakoo tubetse unu tumooꞌoose oosoo suihoose, namameahookwu.

Tamme sakwa Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhi, oꞌno yise oosoo te sootuhikwu. Ka te nuumaduguna besow, tamme sakwa gi totsabuga mane. Tamme sakwa gi waha-baa tusooyugwepana, tamme sakwa ooosapa Te Naa-witu soomayu, oꞌno tamme ooosapa Te Naa-noꞌyookwu.
Tamme sakwa unu suda sokwama ka suda tumaduguse.
Tamme ka gi numu ooonakwasoo besa nasooyugwena, tamme oo soopedakwadoo tamme gi maaꞌwaꞌneꞌyoo soo Te Pabeꞌe te sootuhise besasoo te matabuekwu.

E pupuaꞌamu, tamme sakwa mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi nesootzemapana. Tamme ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu nesootzemana mee unena, “Oosoo suda manakwe,” tamme tookwa punnoꞌo gi ka Te Naa unnepu nakabetsea. Soo Te Naa unnepu meeoo, “Noꞌoko numu besa nematugu.” Tamme tookwa gi meeoo sokwama, tamme numu nemadunagaꞌa meeꞌe,

pana soo Te Naa suuꞌmu numu nemadunagakwu. Mooasoo Te Naa tu unnepu mu numu tuukweꞌe. Soo Te Naa suuꞌmu numu gadoo mesoo mayugwekwu, tooetoo numu magwetzoikwu. Tamme sakwa gi kukummaꞌakoosoo mu numu nemadunagapana.

Tamme gi mu numu tuukwe-waꞌneꞌyoo ka saaꞌa hemma manikwuna, tamme ka gi oo soopedakwadoona. Tamme sumuna mee unekwu, “Nu saaꞌa o mease, o tomodooa, hemma-ma tumuna, besa manepunnedooa.” Pana tamme gi oo soopedakwatoo ka hemma manekwuna. Tamme gi oo soopedakwatoo ka oꞌnoto te momokwuna. Ka pagunabe-kwaꞌne ka te songapu yabesoo gadoo manise, tamme yaꞌehookwu.
Tamme sakwa uga meeꞌe une, “Soo Te Naa meeoo te sooyugwena, tamme togesoo momona, tamme yoo manekwu.”
Tamme tookwa nanaꞌunakwe tamme ka meeoo unena tamme oo soopedakwatoo ka te manekwuna. Oosoo gi besa naꞌunedu.
Tamme ka oo soopedakwatoona ka besa te manekwuna pana gi oo manena, tamme tubetse unu tumaꞌemukwa.
Mu tubetse ewow hee-gaꞌyoo numu sakwa ka tu manekwuna soopedakwatoona, umu sumuna sakwikwu, soo suda mu tumadugupu umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.
Soo mu hee-gana yungusanadooadooa tookana-kwana, mu wunapu kwasu unu nanenakadu mu woabe sooakwu.

Umuoo ka mu tzapoonnekuna ka saaꞌa gi hee manepetukwu. Umu meeoo sokwama, “Numme ewatsekoo hemma hee-gaꞌyoo, nummesoo oo nanomatugukwu.” Pana gi! Umu moogoobuna soo suda mu tumadugupu mu-matoosoo kodyukwu. Oosoo goso-waꞌneꞌyoo, oosoosoo ka saaꞌa mu kootsasooakukwu. Tooe ka suda namanedu umu-matoosoo kodyuse sapa, umu togesoo ewow tu hee geapunnena soogwipunne.
Umu ooosapa ka pumme tumatzidu wumooꞌaga ka umu mu natumanagaku-kwi. Umu mu tumatziwabe ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhi. Soo Te Naa unu naduyadu pooha-gaꞌyoo, mu nanekwegeakwu.
Yaa ka teepu-koobatu ewow mu hee-gana ka unu moogoobuna besa sokwamana yabesoo ewa mu hee-gana gadoo namayugwekwu.
Umu besaꞌyoo numu puu nabatsakwu umu ka besaꞌyoona, ka gi umu-punatusoo mawaꞌe. Pana saaꞌa soo suda mu manepu umu-matasoo kodyukwu.

E pupuaꞌamu, tamme sakwa gi nasootookepana tuutooe, ka Te Pabeꞌe yaa teepu-koobatoosoo oo kodyukwunoꞌotoo, soo tumasuadu puu tuutooe. Oosoo tumasuadu puu besow ka a pooe masuꞌa. Soo tumasuadu yise ewatsekoo baa wutooe, oꞌnosoo oo tumasuana besa naakwu. Soo tumasuadu wutooe besow oo naakwuna, tuwazoo oo kwasukwuna, oꞌno yise oo kwasuse, oo yasakwu.
Tamme sakwa yise ka Te Pabeꞌe kodyukwuna wutooe, pudusoo oosoo tamme-baasoo kodyu petukwu.
Pudusoo Te Pabeꞌe te tunemadabuekukwu. Tamme sakwa yise gi mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu suda netammanapana. Tamme ka suda mu netammana, soo Te Naa punnoꞌo suda te netammakwu.
E pupuaꞌamu, mu te nanamooatupu Te Naa nanayadooakudu te tzapoonnekute umu puu gi nasootooke tooe suda manepunnepana.

Ka saaꞌa soo Te Naa mu tubetse sootuhikwu. Soo nana, Job mee naneadu, puu ootoogoo meapu, oosoo nanasuda manepu pana gi nasootooke. Ka saaꞌa soo Te Naa noꞌoko hemma besa oo matabueku. Soo Te Naa ooonneꞌyoo besaꞌyoo oosoo tamme tu sootuhina yise tamme tu tumatzina petzape.

Yise e pupuaꞌamu, tamme sakwa ooosapa toge-kwitu numu tuukwe. Tamme meeoo unena, “Gi esayipana, o togetukana o waha. Tamme ka meeoo unena, tooetoo ka oo kwayadu-kwisoo unena oosoo sakwa ka gi kaaheno unena, soo Te Naasoo saaꞌa te nemadabuedooa.”
Tamme sakwa ka suda manepunnena nanesootuhi. Ka besa sokwamana tamme sakwa tunekwu Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhina.
Sumuꞌyoo tamme-nagatu ka tuoeyise, mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu moohedu sakwa oosoo nekwi. Ka oo-baa petuse, ka yoohoo oo-ma oo tsematzuase nanesootuhiku.
Tamme ka nanesootuhina tunakaꞌoedyukuna, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tuoeyaedu numu besa mayugweyakwe. Soo tuoeyaꞌedu numu tuwazoo ka tumaꞌemakwase, soo Te Naa oo soomuꞌwakwu.

Tamme sakwa ka tumaꞌemukwana kaaheno toge-witu nanatuukwena ka tumaꞌemukwana, yise nanano nanesootuhina, tamme yise besa manekwu. Soo besa tunakabetseadu numu ka oo nanesootuhikuna oosoo ka ewow pooha-gana ewa besa tumayukwe.

Ka oꞌnosoo soo nana Elijah mee naneadu ooonneꞌyoo. Oosoo uga tamme-waꞌneꞌyoosoo: sukwe numu. Oosoo ka Te Naa nanetsagwayaꞌe yise nanesootuhina, ka gi tu powmakwuna nekwise. Esoo gi powmakwu pahe tomo-baa noꞌoko naapahe muha-baawitoo gi powmakwu.
Soo Elijah yise nanesootuhi, powmabe nekwina, yise powmabetu, noꞌyoona mu hee namasuadu besa naa.
E pupuaꞌamu, soo numu ka Te Naa besa po maꞌwukase, tamme sakwa oetusoo oo nekodyuku.
Tamme ka neꞌemukwadu ka Te Naa besa podo nekodyuse, tamme oo yaꞌekwuna-makoo oo magwetzoi, soo suda oo tumaduguna yise nasoomuꞌwukwu. Yaatoo nu a nemoobekwakakwu.
Esoo Peter, Te Naa yadooawabe tubona, ka mu Jew numu Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-matoo, mana ka mu teepu Pontus, Galatia, Cappadocia, Asia noꞌoko Bithynia mee nananeadu-kwi nonobe-gaꞌyoo.

Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa meeoo unnepu soo oo Besa Pooha besa mu mayugwekwu, soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus ka tamme-koobatoo nabatsase. Menoꞌo tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus nakabetsea. Nu meeoo nanesootuhiyakwe, “Soo Te Naa sakwa mu sootuhise mu magwetzoi.”
Tamme sakwa ka Te Naa nesookwugi, oosoo ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus Naa. Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus oo yaꞌe-kwikoo oo mayoda. Soo Te Naa te sootuhise tu doodooamu te mayugweke.
Soo Te Naa te sootuhina ooosapa te tummatzikwu, gi kadooꞌoo namayugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme oo sopedakwatoo ka saaꞌa soo Te Naa te sootuhikwu ka puu-baa te petugase.
Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha te mabetseakwu, tamme ka oe tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Oosoo ooosapa tamme-kooba tueyaꞌedu pu-baa te petuganoꞌoto tooe te magwetzoikwu, ka Te Naa ka teepu atasoo oo yugwekwuse.
Tamme besa sokwama ka a namanekwuna soopedakwuna, tooe menoꞌo noꞌobatusoo mu numu numme wohoꞌne sapa, mu ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna besa.

Mu numu tamme netumooꞌoodu te mapoonnena how unu tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Tamme oo sopedakwatoo tamme oo tubetse nakaꞌoedyukute, oosoo ka ese tupe tooetoo ka oa tupe ooonakwasoo nanenagadu. Umu kadoo mesoo namayugwedu. Soo ese tupe ka oa tupe-no puu besa namadabue, ka goso-koobakoo nakoopatooekuna. Ooonnekoo mu oo mesoo natunedyooꞌe mu ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna, mu ka numu mumme wohoꞌne, oꞌno yise mu ooosapa tunakaꞌoedyukumokwu. Ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus kodyu petuse, mu yise besa nanemadabuekwu.
Tooe mu gi ka Te Pabeꞌe poonnedupana, mu oo soobedyana, oo nakaꞌoedyukuna, besa sokwamana, besa pumme waha-waꞌne.
Mu ka Te Naa besa po mobegwana petugase, mu namagwetzoikwu mu ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna.

Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa yadooawabe oo botugu, ka Te Pabeꞌe nabatsakwuna, yise oo yaꞌe-kwikoo oo namayodakwuna. Umu ka ekow naꞌunnedu-kwitu soohanena, “Hannanoꞌogina ꞌyoo namanekwu, hagagina?” mee sokwama, mu Te Naa tummatzidu mu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo punnoꞌo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe Besa Pooha ka yadooawabe tuukweꞌe soo mu tubotuguna gi umutusoo, oosoo tammetu. Umu te tuukweꞌe ka Te Naa besa unnepu soo Te Naa yise tutuha te soobedyana te magwetzoi.

Tamme sakwa tammesoo namabetsea kaaheno tusooyugwena, gi ka sutakoo tamme maꞌemukwadu-ma emukwapana, tubetse tunakaꞌoedyukuna, soo Te Naa te magwetzoikwu ka Te Pabeꞌe yaa teepu-koobasoo oo kodyu petuse.
Tamme oꞌnosoo uga ka sutakoo podo meadape. Tamme gi ka Te Naa po sopedakwadoona.
Pana menoꞌo tamme sakwa yooꞌmane soo Te Naa ka besaꞌyoona, tamme sakwa oo-waꞌneꞌyoo, ooosapa besa manemo.
Mee nabotugu soo Te Naa unnena, “Mu sakwa besaꞌyoo ka nuka puu besow.”

Tamme ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe ka oo doodooamuna, tamme sakwa ooosapa oo nakabetsea, tamme oo sopedakwadoona oosoo unu pooha-gaꞌyoo. Oosoo gi numu nenaboꞌa ka numu nemadabuekwuse, ka numu besa tooetoo suda manakwe. Tamme gi ooosapa yaa teepu-koobatu. Esoo teepu gi pukwi te natzepotuguna.

Oꞌnosoo soo Te Pabeꞌe nanetutzea, gisoo ka teepu namatabuꞌe, tamme-koobatoo nabatsakwudu, oꞌno tamme namagwetzoikwu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-baa petu, tamme yise ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukukwu. Tooe soo Te Pabeꞌe besaꞌyoopana oosoo tamme-koobatoo nabatsapu. Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe oo yaꞌe-kwikoo oo mayoda, oo Besa Pooha yise te tuukweꞌe ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu. Oꞌno yise soo Te Naa meeoo te tunetammakute, “Soo Te Pabeꞌe besaꞌyoo,” mee. Soo tooe hee tooe kadooꞌoo mesoo namayugwedu gi puma te namagwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme yise ka sutakoo po-makoo namagwetzoi, ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsase.
Tamme tammesoo besa namayugwenokwu ka Te Naa besa podo meakwuse. Tamme unu nanasoobedya ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Tamme sakwa ooosapa unu nanasoobedya.
Tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna yise pudu numu namayugwemena ka Te Naa unnepu-ma. Soo Te Naa unnepu gi kadooꞌoo namayugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Meeoo natubotugu: “Noꞌyoona numu tuikwu. Wahabu-kwaꞌne kadoo namayugwekwu, noꞌyoona hee numu besa sooyugwena atonegea-kwaꞌne pudusoo napoohekwunikwu.
Pana soo Te Naa unnepu ooosapa gi moobegwagakwu.” Yow esoo besa naꞌunnepu mu natuukwena.
Tamme sakwa ka sutakoo po maꞌwukase, tamme sakwa gi numu nemooagapana, gi tuwazoo besa nasooyugwena, kukummaꞌakoosoo numu nasoodyagena, yise gi nananesootzemapana.
Tamme sakwa kaaheno ka Te Naa noko Te Pabeꞌe te sopedakwadoona petzape, ka pudu oongaꞌa tu petzekwuna oo soogwaꞌe-kwaꞌne. Tamme namagwetzoise, oꞌno yise tamme besa manekekwu.
Tamme oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa besaꞌyoona te sootuhikwu.

Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe netutzea, tooe gi mu susumudu numu ooka petzape sapa. Ooonneꞌyoona ka Te Naa ooka sopedakwatoo-wikoo tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe tubetse soogwipunnekwu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tupe-waꞌneꞌyoo, oosoo puu Te Naa nobe-matu manepunnena. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa pooha hee-gaꞌyoo. Tamme punnoꞌo ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna tamme ookow tupe-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme punnoꞌo ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-matu hee-gaꞌyoo. Tamme punnoꞌo mu numu mesoo nanesootuhikute. Soo Te Naa ka te nanesootuhina nekwegeꞌa, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tamme-koobatoo nabatsase.

Mee natubotugu oosoo Te Naa unnena, “Nu ka Mu Pabeꞌe netutzeapu. Soo Mu Pabeꞌe ka tupe namadabuena ka nobe pukooba katu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Mu Pabeꞌe ka mu Jew numu moohekwudu, oosoo sakwa unu nasoobedya. Tooe haga tooe ka Mu Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu gi nasookwikwu.”

Tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe unu soobedya ka oo nakaꞌoedyukuna pana umu gi oo nakaꞌoedyukudu gi oo heesoobedya. Mee natubotugu, soo Te Naa meeoo, “Umu Jew numu moohedu gi ka Mu Pabeꞌe heesoobedyapana, nu yise ookow numu moohe tuunguna.” Mee tuwazoo.

“Soo Mu Pabeꞌe ka tupe mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu numu puma tukwutzangeyi-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Umuoo ka Mu Pabeꞌe-ma nasookwaꞌe. Umuoo kadoo namayakwekwu umu ka gi oo nakaꞌoedyukuna.” Umuoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-ma nasookwaꞌe, umu ka gi Te Naa unnepu nakabetseꞌa. Yoo mu manekwuna soo Te Naa sopedakwadoo.

Pana mu gi ooonneꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa mu netutzeapu tu doodooamu manekwutu pumatoo tubetse nanesootuhikwutu ka Te Naa podo meadapekwutu. Oꞌno mu ka mu numu tuukwekoo ka oo besaꞌyoona oosoo tooe ka uga gi ooka mu nakasopedakwatoo sapa ooka mu sopedakwadoona mu mayugweke. Ka togano-wiꞌyoona mu puu gi hemma poonne-waꞌneꞌyoo, oo uga manepunne. Menoꞌo yise oosoo ka tabua-kwitoo mu moohekese, mu yise noꞌoko hemma poonnena oo nakasopedakwatoo.
Mu uga oꞌnosoo gi ka Te Naa tubetse doodooamu, pana menoꞌo yise oosoo tu doodooamu mu mayugweke. Oꞌnosoo uga soo Te Naa gi mu sootuhaꞌe menoꞌo yise besa mu sootuhaꞌe.

E nanumu, nu togesapa mu netamma mu sakwa ka suda mu tusooyugwena gi tumayohokupana, tamme gi ekow teepu-kooba tubetse manepunne-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme ka yaanona wakwawaꞌa-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme sakwa gi ka sutakoo nakabetseapana, tooe meeoo sokwamapana. Tamme ka oo nakabetseana, soo sutaꞌyoo kadoo te mayugwekwu.

Tamme sakwa ooosapa kaaheno meadabe, tooe ka mu kukummaꞌakoosoo numu tamme sutaꞌyoo mee tamme mu netamma sapa, saaꞌa umu oo sopedakwadookwu tamme tookwa besaꞌyoo. Umu ka puusoo tunakaꞌoedyuku manekese, oꞌno umu oo sopedakwadookwu, ka kaaheno tamme tumatuguna. Umu yise meeoo unnekwu, “Soo Te Naa tookwa besaꞌyoo.”

Tamme sakwa ka mu numu moohedu nakabetsea, ka Te Pabeꞌe umu netutzeapu. Mu noꞌobatusoo numu moohedu, ka suda manedu mesoo wutuma tuungu. Ka umu besow numu meeoo netamma, “Ka oo mu manena numme mu besaꞌyookute.”
Ka besa tumatuguna, ookow soo Te Naa besaꞌyookute. Oꞌno mu gi te togeꞌyookudu numu gi haꞌyoo unne-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Tamme sakwa ooosapa besa maneno ka Te Naa suuꞌmu nakabetseana. Tamme gi nasookwipana ka how soomanena, oꞌno tamme sakwa gi ka sutakoo tamme neyugwe-kwaꞌne mane.
Tamme sakwa noꞌoko numu besa matugu. Tamme sakwa nanasoobedyana, tamme ka noꞌyoona Te Pabeꞌe nanumuna. Tamme sakwa ooosapa oo nakaꞌoedyukuna ka Te Naa besa ooosapa sooyugwe.
Mu ka numu tummatzina, mu sakwa mu nakabetsea ka hayoo mumme mu netamma, mu ka Te Naa nakabetseana. Ka mumme mu nesagwikute sapa, tooetoo ka besa mumme mu nematugu sapa tuwazoo mu nakabetsea.

Mu ka Te Naa nakabetseana soo Te Naa besa mu-matoo soonammekwu ka mee mu unakwe, “Oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo tooe nu namaꞌehoose sapa, ka mu numu nuga kuseka. Oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo nu ka Te Naa nakabetsea, nu oo sopedakwatoo oosoo nu-matoo besa soonammekwu.”

Soo Te Naa gi oo nakaheesoobedya ka meeoo te sukwe unakwe, “Oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo nu ka nakusekahoose nu ka suda manena,” pana soo Te Naa besa tamme-matoo soonammekwu ka mee te unakwe, “Tooe nu nakusekapana nu ka besa mu matuguna, oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo ka tooge manena.”
Soo Te Naa te netutzea ka yoo manekwutu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nakusega, tamme sakwa oo-waꞌneꞌyoona oo nageno.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe puu gi maꞌemukwa, gi numu nemooagadu.

Tooe ka mu numu suda pukwitu mu netamma sapa, oosoo puu umuoo gi suda netamma. Ka mu numu pumme kuseka, oosoo gi mu nedyooikute. Oosoo oo nakaꞌoedyukute soo Te Naa oo tummatzikwu. Soo Te Naa toge ka mu numu nemadabuena.

Tamme ka oꞌnosoo Te Naa besa po ooemota meadu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise tamme-koobatoo nabatsa, soo Te Naa yise ka te maꞌemukwana soomuꞌwa. Tamme yise ka sutakoo po maꞌwukase, ka Te Naa besa podo meadabekwu. Tamme namagwetzoi soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tamme-koobatoo nabatsase. Menoꞌo yise tamme ka Te Naa-matoosoo kodyu, oosoo tamme-kooba tuꞌeyaꞌe.
Mu momokoꞌne koomamu-gaꞌyoo sakwa tu koomamu nakabetsea. Tooe gi ka mu koomamu tunakaꞌoedyukute sapa, umu-matoo tunakaꞌoedyuku manekwu, ka mumme momokoꞌne ooonnekoo, tooe gi hayoo mu unakwe sapa.
Umu oo sopedakwadookwu mu Te Naa doodooamu umu ka mu poonnena, mumme mane-makoo, mu ka Te Naa besa podo meadu.
Mu sakwa gi muusoo unu besa namabetseapana, mu tzopuhu mabetsabena, tooetoo unu nanenagadu-wi namasooana. Mu sakwa besa tabua ka gi nidyapuna, besaꞌyoona.
Mu ka besaꞌyoona, mu unu nanenagadu besa tabuadu namasooape-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Esoo punnoꞌo gi kadooꞌoo namayugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo. Ooonnekoo soo Te Naa besa sooyugwe.
Ka oꞌnosoo Te Naa doodooamu mu momokoꞌne ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna besa namabetzape, yise pummesoo koomamu nakabetseꞌa.
Soo Sarah mee naneadu puu uga ooonneꞌyoo, oosoo ka tu kooma Abraham nakabetseꞌa. Mu oo-waꞌneꞌyookwu, mu ka besa manena gi noꞌokosoo hemma suda soonammekuna.

Mu nanana nonodukwamu-gaꞌyoo sakwa oo sopedakwadoo mu nodukwamu gi mu-kwaꞌne nanatzooe. Mu sakwa besaꞌyoo mee mu sooyukwe umu ka mu natummatzina soogwina, besa nanamatuguna ka nanapa nobe-gana. Soo Te Naa yise ka pumme mu nanetzakwiyaꞌe mu nakasootuhikwu, ka yoo mu manakwe.

Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu sakwa noꞌyoona nanakwaꞌnesoo unnena, tusooyugwena, ka mu pupuaꞌamu suda sokwama mu punnoꞌo sakwa tutuha mu soobedya, unu nanasoobedyana nanasamoomu-kwaꞌne, besa nanamatuguna, mu sakwa gi meeoo tusooyugwepana, “Numme numu ooonakwa besaꞌyoo,” mee.

Mu sakwa gi numu nesootzemapana, tooe mumme mu nesootzema sapa. Tamme sakwa mu numu tamme wohonedu nanesootuhiku, soo Te Naa meeoo te netamma. Tamme ka mu numu nanesootuhikuna, soo Te Naa tamme sootuhikwu.
Tamme oo sopedakwadoo oosoo ka meeꞌe nabotuguna. “Tamme ka gi suda apegeana, gi tunesootzemana, tamme wunaꞌmetoo momokwu, te sokwama-kwaꞌnesoo.
Tamme sakwa kaaheno meadabe, yise ka suda te maꞌnawena tzadyooiku. Tamme sakwa ooosapa nanano tuunoyugwe.
Soo Te Naa oo sopedakwadoo ka numu besa manakwe, oosoo yise ka putamme mu nanesootuhina nekwekakwu. Pana soo Te Naa ka mu suda tumatugudu numu tumooꞌookwu.”
Gi haga te manayaha-waꞌneꞌyoo tamme ka kaaheno tubetse tusooyugwena.

Soo Te Naa te sootuhikwu ka mu numu tamme tumooꞌoo, tamme yise kaaheno meadabekwu. Tamme sakwa ooosapa ka Te Pabeꞌe nakabetseana oo-matoo nanesootuhi. Tamme sakwa gi mu numu-ma suipana, tamme nekusekadu gi suda oo soonammekupana ka tooe how tooe tamme mu yugwesapa. Tamme sakwa ooosapa besa ka mu numu tuukwe ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu, ka ooka mu soonaka, tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukuna.
Tamme oo sopedakwatoo ka toge manena. Oꞌno sumuna umu ka Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo te nekusekadu nasookwikwu. Umu sumuna nasookwina te tumooꞌookwu ka toge te manakwe.
Ka Te Naa meeoo unakwe oosoo besa ka te nanekuseka ka toge te manakwe. Tamme ka maꞌemukwase, mu numu sakwa te tumooꞌoo. Oosoo gi besa, tamme suda manena.

Soo Te Naa te maꞌemukwana soomuꞌwakwu, oꞌno tamme yise oo doodooamu manekwu, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tamme-koobatoo nabatsase. Tooe soo Te Pabeꞌe ooosapa ka Te Naa nakabetseapana, oosoo tamme tumaꞌemukwa-koobatoo nabatsapu. Ka Te Pabeꞌe nabatsase, oo tookoo suuꞌmu yaꞌe oo moogooa gi yaꞌe.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe moogooa ka susumudu moogooa nanesootuhibu tunedyooꞌe.

Umuoo moogooa ka umu numu gi ka Te Naa nakabetseadu-matu ka Noah tu sake mabetsape, tooe soo Te Naa wunaꞌme mu wutooꞌese sapa, ka sutakoo po mu maꞌwukakwuna. Pana namewatsukweꞌyoo (8) numu namagwetzoi, oꞌno ka baa-makoo, umuoo, oꞌno ka sake-wi, ka Te Naa ka teepu batatsopakuse.

Ka Noah baa-makoo namagwetzoipu-kwaꞌnesoo, tamme namagwetzoi tamme ka baa-wi namatzakana. Tamme ka baa-wi namatzakana, tamme namagwetzoi ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhina, “Mu besaꞌyoo,” mee mu te mesoo netamma. Soo Te Naa oo mesoo manakwe, soo Te Pabeꞌe puu tu yaꞌe-kwikoo namayoduse, menoꞌo yise ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona noꞌoko poohabe nemadabue. Gi tamme baa-wi namatzaka ka totsabu te tookoo-makoo sukwe tsabatsugana.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo, “Oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo, tooe mu numu e kusekapana.” Tamme sakwa oo-waꞌnesoo tusooyugwe, tooe tamme tu mooedyukwe sapa, tamme sakwa ka sutakoo po maꞌwuka.
Oꞌno yise tamme ka Te Naa mesoo nakabetsea, gi ka suda te manena tumayohokuna.

Mooasoo tamme ka oꞌnosoo suda manakwe, umu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-waꞌne. Tamme uga ka suda te tumatuguna nakabetseana tooe how tooe suda manena, kummaꞌakoosoo numu-no nabootamana, baagoena, hemma namadabue-matoo nanesootuhina, tooe oo sopedakwadoopana oosoo gi besa namanedu.
Umu te pupuaꞌamu te nekuseka, umu ka gi te nakasopedakwadoona, ka suda mu manakwe tamme gi umu-ma tzabekaꞌa.
Pana ka saaꞌa umu puusoo ka tu tumaꞌemukwapu-kwitu Te Naa tuukwedooa. Soo Te Naa yise mu nemadabuekwu ka how mu besow tooetoo mu sutakoo numu.
Noꞌyoona numu natuukwe Te Pabeꞌe-witu, umu tuipu moogooa punnoꞌo. Oꞌno yise umu tooe mooasoo tuise sapa, umu sumuna saaꞌa ka Te Naa-baa mesoo nobe-gakwu ka tu moogooa menoꞌo ooka nakabetsease.
Pudusoo soo Te Naa atasoo eka teepu yugwekwu. Tamme sakwa kaaheno tusooyugwena gi ka sutakoo tamme maꞌemukwadu nakabetseapana, oꞌno yise tamme besa nanesootuhimokwu.
Tamme sakwa ooosapa unu nanasoobedya, tamme puu gi ka numu maꞌemukwa oo poonne, ka unu mu soobedyana.
Tamme sakwa mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu nabaaꞌyooku, ka tooe hannanoꞌo tooe tamme-baa mu petuse.
Tamme sakwa tammesoo nanasootuhi, soo Te Naa puu nanaꞌatamasoo te sootuhaꞌe ka besa te nanatummatzaꞌe.

Sumuna soo Te Naa besa te yadooakuna te sootuhi. Tamme sakwa oo mesoo wahakwuni, ka Te Naa tamme tunetammakuna. Sumuna soo Te Naa numu te tummatzikwuna te sootuhi. Tamme sakwa besa numu tummatzi, soo Te Naa ka meeoo te netammana. Oꞌno yise mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-tooha meadu mee unnekwu, “Soo Te Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo.” Mu numu sakwa ooosapa meeoo ka Te Naa-witu netammayi, “Noꞌyoona hee sakwa oo nakabetsea.”

E pupuaꞌamu, mu sakwa oo sopedakwadoo mu numu mu tumooꞌookwu mu ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Soo Te Naa unnepu meeoo mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu te nanetumooꞌoo ka tamme namaboonnena weehepu goso-ma namaboonne-kwaꞌne. Mu sakwa besa sokwama mu ka Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌneꞌyoona. Mu numu mu tumooꞌoona mu wohonekwu ka Te Pabeꞌe tu tumooꞌoopu-kwaꞌnesoo. Mu tubetse besa sokwamakwu ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-ma mumme oo sootuhise, mu oo sopedakwadookwu oosoo tookwa Te Naa-waꞌneꞌyoosoo. Ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-ma mumme tu sootuhise tooe mumme tu tumooꞌoo sapa mu besa sokwamakwu.

Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha besa mu mayugwekwu. Gi haga mu-matu sakwa tumaꞌemukwana oowetuoo suda nasooyugwepana. Mu sakwa gi suda manepana, gi numu batzapana, gi hemma tuduhapana, gi kummaꞌakoosoo numu matzamapana.
Pana mu ka Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo nakwutumase, mu sakwa gi oo nasookwikupana. Mu sakwa besa sokwama, ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna.

Menoꞌo soo Te Naa ka mu numu nemadabuedyakwe, mu tumaꞌemukwana umu-matoosoo kodyukwu. Mooeꞌugasoo soo Te Naa ka tu doodooamu nemadabuekwu, pana saaꞌa umu gi ka Te Naa besa unnepu nakaꞌoedyukudu mu ooonakwasoo nuummabu wumakwu.
Meeꞌe nabotugu; “Soo besa tunakaꞌoedyukudu unusoo manena namagwetzoi, umu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi hownnekoosoo puu namagwetzoikwu.”
Soo Te Naa ka suda nuummaba wumakoo mee te soobedyana, tamme sakwa oo nakaꞌoedyuku oosoo te mabetseana, tamme ooosapa kaaheno meadabeno.

Nu mumme nanesootuhidu moohedu tuukwekwu, ka umu Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu mu-kooba mu tuꞌeyaꞌe tuunguna. Ka numu-kooba tuꞌeyaꞌedu besa soonammena gi mu natumanakakwuna umu-nakwana sookwipunnepana. Nu yoo mu mane tuungu nu punnoꞌo yow nanesootuhidu moohedu. Nu oo pooonne, soo Te Pabeꞌe unu nuummaba wumase nabatsa, nu yise saaꞌa mu-kwaꞌnesoo besa soonammedooa ka oo kodyu petuse, oosoo ka Te Tubetse Naa-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Mu sakwa mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka Te Naa besa podo meadabe tuungu, umu sakwa punnoꞌo mu-kwaꞌnesoo. Mu sakwa gi suda mu neyugwepana.
Ka saaꞌa ka Te Pabeꞌe ooosapa tamme-kooba tuꞌeyaꞌedu petuse, oosoo mu manena besaꞌyookukwu mee te netammakwu.

Mu tootooebetse-no, sususuꞌa sakwa ooosapa mu nanamooatupu nakabetsea. Tamme sakwa tammesoo gi numu ooonakwa besa nasooyugwepana oosoo ka mee nabotuguna, “Soo Te Naa ka umu besa nasooyugwedu numu gi besa sooyugwe. Oosoo te sootuhaꞌe ka gi numu ooonakwa besa te nasooyugwe.”
Ooonneꞌyoona tamme sakwa gi numu ooonakwa besa nasooyugwepana. Soo Te Naa suuꞌmu te nemadabuekwu. Ka gi numu ooonakwa besa te nasooyugwe, oosoo Te Naa ka saaꞌa meeoo mesoo unakwe, “Mu besaꞌyoo,” mee.
Tamme sakwa gi tooe hemma tooe suda soonammekupana. Tamme sakwa oo nakaꞌoedyuku soo Te Naa te mabetsea.

Tamme sakwa gi ka sutakoo tamme maꞌemukwadu-ma emukwapana. Tamme sakwa namabetseapunne, oꞌno soo Sutaꞌyoo te wohonedu, gi te matzooekute. Soo Sutaꞌyoo te wohonedu te nesootzemadu, kadoo te mayugwekwu mee tusooyugwe, nunuꞌa-waꞌne.
Tamme oo mesoo matzooekute, ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Tamme oo sopedakwadoona manatutooe noꞌyoona mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka Te Pabeꞌe-kooba nakusega.

Gi haaꞌnoto tamme nakusegapunnese, ka saaꞌa soo Te Naa te sootuhise te magwetzoikwu tamme yise unusoo tunakaꞌoedyukukwu. Soo Te Naa suuꞌmu te sootuhidu te netutzea ooosapa pubaaꞌyookwutu, tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe doodooamuna.
Tamme mee nanesootuhaꞌe, “U, Ne Naa, noꞌoko hemma mabetseanokwu umesoo besa pooha-ma.”

Silvanus mee naneadu nana, ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tubetse tunakaꞌoedyukudu. Oosoo eka tubope mu-matoo gwuukakwu. Nu gi haaꞌno mu-matoo tuboꞌo mu tuukwena soo Te Naa te tubetse magwetzoikwu. Mu sakwa ooosapa oo nakaꞌoedyuku, soo Te Naa mu magwetzoikwu.
Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu yaa ka Rome mee naneadu-kwitu mu soomaꞌyu. Soo e besa puaꞌa, Mark mee naneadu punnoꞌo mu soomaꞌyu.
Mu sakwa besa nanapuaꞌana unu nanasoobedya. Nu meeoo nanesootuhiyakwe, soo Te Naa noꞌoko mu sootuhikwu mu ka Te Pabeꞌe doodooamuna.

Ka Simon Peter-makoo, Te Pabeꞌe Jesus nakabetseadu oo yadooawabe tubono, umu Te Naa tu dooamu-matoo, umu nu-kwaꞌnesoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu. Soo Te Naa mu sootuhaꞌe numme tu sootuhi-kwaꞌnesoo.
Nu mu nanesootuhikuyakwe soo Te Naa mu magwetzoina mu sootuhikwu ka nanaꞌunusoo mu tunakaꞌoedyukute ka Te Naa noko Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-wi.

Soo Te Naa mooasoo te tuukwe, oosoo te tubetse mabetseakwu. Tamme gi ka sutakoo podo meakwu, ka mu numu suda soomanedu yaa teepu-koobatu nagena, tamme ka Te Naa Pooha hee-gana. Tamme yise ka Te Naa besa podo meadabekwu, tamme ka unu Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Soo Te Naa te netutzea tamme oo-waꞌnesoo unu besaꞌyookwu.
Tamme sakwa tubetse unu tunakaꞌoedyuku. Tamme ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna, tamme besaꞌyookwu. Ka besaꞌyoona, ka besow nakabetseakwu.

Tamme ka Te Naa-witu besa nakasopedakwadoona, soo Sutaꞌyoo gi te maꞌemukwa-waꞌneꞌyoo. Ka Sutakoo gi tamme maꞌemukwa, tamme ooosapa Te Naa nakabetseakwu. Tamme ka ooosapa tunakabetseana, tamme ka besa podo meadabenokwu.
Tamme ka Te Naa besa podo meadabena, tamme nanapupuaꞌakwu, tamme nanasamoomu-waꞌneꞌyookwu. Tamme ka nanapuaꞌana, tamme sakwa nanasoobedya.
Tamme ka ekow nakabetseana, tamme nanaꞌunusoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukute. Oꞌno yise tamme ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna, besa manepunnekwu.

Tamme ka gi yooonnekoo nakabetseana tamme tookwa gi ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukute. Tamme tookwa oo soomuꞌwa ka oo-kooba te tumaꞌemukwana nasoomuꞌwa. Tamme yaatu tooꞌe poonnedu-kwaꞌne, pana tamme gi tubootabuꞌe.

Ooonneꞌyoona, e pupuaꞌamu, tamme sakwa tubetse tunakabetsea. Tamme yise oo sopedakwadookwu, ka saaꞌa ka Te Naa nabatoo tamme oo bikwuna. Tamme ka tunakabetseana tamme gi ka Te Naa besa po maꞌwuka-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Oꞌno yise tamme saaꞌa Te Naa-matoo meakwu. Oosoo ka te sootuhise, soo Te Pabeꞌe te magwetzoi, tamme-kooba yise tuꞌeyaꞌedooa.

Nu oo sopedakwatoo mu mooasoo oo nakapu, ka mumme e tuukwedyina. Mu yise oo nakaꞌoedyukute, ooka mu nakasopedakwadoo-kwikoo. Nu oo sopedakwatoo oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo nu mu nemayukute ka e unnepu mu nakabetseana, nu sumuna gi wunaꞌme ka teepu-koobaꞌyookwu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe e tuukweꞌe pudusoo nu nabatsakwu. Nu yise ooosapa mu nemayukukwu mu ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakabetseana, oꞌno mu oo soomayuna tunakabetseamokwu ka yaano e mease.

Numme mu tuukweꞌe ka toge-kwitu mu nakaꞌoedyukuna, gi tooe hayoo tooe sukwe naꞌunnedu numme mu tuukweꞌe, soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus unu pooha-gaꞌyoo, pudusoo kodyu petukwu yaa teepu-koobasoo. Numme togesapa mu tuukweꞌe numme oꞌno mana giba-maꞌyoona ka oo pooha numme poonne, ka Te Naa Te Pabeꞌe-matoo yadooꞌa. Numme oo naka soo Te Naa meeoo, “E Besaa Dooa yow. Tubetse besa e masoonamme. Oosoo nu-kwaꞌneꞌyoosoo, nu unu oo soobedya.”

Tamme tuwazoo oo sopedakwatoo ka Te Naa unnepu, oꞌnosoo nabotugu pudusoo togesapa manepetukwu. Mu sakwa ooosapa Te Naa unnepu nakabetsea, soo Te Naa unnepu tukootabuakunoo-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Oosoo ooka te nakasopedakwatoona te mayugweke. Ka Te Pabeꞌe petukwu-kwitoo tooe tamme namabetsapunnekwu. Soo yaa oo kodyu petukwuna, ka tu taba tsebooeke-kwaꞌneꞌyookwu, oꞌno yise tamme noꞌyoona ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu nakasopedakwadookwu.
Tammesoo oo sopedakwatoo, tamme gi hownnekoo ka Te Naa unnepu tammesoo tusooyugwe-kwikoo oo nakasopedakwadoo-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Soo Te Naa tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma ka tu yadooawabe pooha sootuhipu ka Te Naa unnepu oo waha tuunguna. Esoo Te Naa unnepu, gi sukwe numusoo yadooana nanemadabuena.

Ka oꞌnosoo mu esagoedu Te Naa yadooawabe mee naneyugwetu, menoꞌo mu numu mu-naga-kwitu unne-kwaꞌnesoo. Umu kaaheno mu tuukwe mee naneyakwe pana mu esakoekute, ka Te Pabeꞌe tooꞌe nemooaga ka meeoo unnena. Umu meeoo, “Oosoo gi Te Pabeꞌe tooe tamme-koobatoo nabatsase sapa.” Umuoo puusoo yabesoo kadooꞌoo nanemayugwe, umu ka meeoo mu numu tuukwena. “Oosoo gi Te Pabeꞌe,” mee.
Ewaꞌyoo numu mu nakana, yise ka sutakoo po nake. Ooonneꞌyoona susumudu numu ka umu-ma tzabena suda unakwe ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna.

Umu numu nemooagadu tu natumanakakuookwuna soogwidu sapa, tooe hayoo tooe mu tuukwena, mu yise mu tumanagakute. Umuoo unu moogoobu. Oꞌnosoo meeoo natunetamma soo mu tumaꞌemukwana umu-matoosoo kodyukwu, ooonnekoo umu puusoo kadooꞌoo namayugwekwu.

Soo Te Naa mu toha kakasa-gakoo gi tutuha soobadya tooe umu pumme tummatzidu sapa. Ka umu-matu tumaꞌemukwase, soo sutaꞌyoo umu-matoosoo kodyukwu, umu yise menoꞌo togano-kwi nakwutumakwu. Umu ooosapa oe nakwutumakoo ka Te Naa atasoo ka teepu tu yugwenoꞌoto tooe.

Soo Te Naa oꞌnosoo ka umu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi mu sootuhipu-gaꞌyoo tuwazoo. Soo te nanamooatupu Noah, mana mu numu tooꞌe tuukwe, umu sakwa besasoo tunakaꞌoedyuku, pana umu gi oo nakabetsea. Umu ka pumme tu tuukwe gi tunakaꞌoedyukuna soo teepu yise umu-no padatsopa, umu yise kadoo namayugwe. Soo Te Naa ka Noah suuꞌmu magwetzoihoo natakwatsukwuoo (7) oo nanumu-noko.

Noꞌyooona tuwazoo ka mu Sodom noko Gomorrah mee nananeadu-kwitu suda maꞌemukwadu. Nonoꞌotsa tabeno umu ooosapa tumaꞌemukwa. Sumuꞌyoo nana, Lot mee naneadu suuꞌmu besa manakwe. Oosoo mu poonne ka ooosapa mu maꞌemukwadape, suda soonamme ka tu pupuaꞌamu sutakoo po mu nake. Soo Te Naa ka Lot umuoo numu-nagakoo magwetzoaꞌe. Umu yise kootuꞌihoo, ka suda mu tumatuguna umu-matoosoo kodyuse. Umuoo kadoo namayugwe, oꞌno mu numu ka saaꞌa ka sutakoo po nagena oo sopedakwadookwu, mu tumaꞌemukwana mu-matoosoo kodyukwu tuwazoo.
Soo Te Naa tamme magwetzoikwu tuwazoo, tamme ka besa manena. Umu suda tumatugudu wutumetakwu oosoo ka saaꞌa nanasuꞌmu mu nemadabuedooa, ka how mu besow tooetoo sutahoo.

Oosoo mu wutumetakwu ka umu maꞌemukwadu, ka umu puusoo unu totsamanena, gi pumme moohedu nakabetseana. Umu ka puusoo pummesoo manena unu soonagena, gi hemma tooe soobedyana, ka noꞌoko poohabe-maꞌyoona mesoo nanekoena.

Mu Te Naa tummatziwabe toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo unu ohobu nanatzooe-ma manepunnedu, unutoo pooha nanatzooedu noꞌoko mu numu ooonnakwa. Umuoo toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo puu gi hownnekoo ka Te Naa-kobenaꞌyoona gi tooe haꞌyoo unne-waꞌneꞌyoo, gi umu ka poohabe-kwitu nehane-waꞌneꞌyoo.

Umuoo numu nemooagadu nunuꞌu-waꞌneꞌyoo gi ka besow tooetoo ka sutakoo sopedakwatoo. Umuoo sukwe momoꞌo yaa teepu-kooba, saaꞌa nagoekwudu. Umuoo sutaꞌyoo numu ka sutakoo nakabetseadu, mu maꞌemukwana umu-matoosoo kodyukwu, kadoo mu mayugwekwu, umu ka suda unnena gi oo nakasopedakwadoopana. Umu suda manakwe ka suda manena. Umu besa sokwama ka tabuapa, suda manena. Tooetoo togano umu ka mu nanesootuhi sumu-kwiꞌyoona umu-no tukana, tu baagoena suuꞌmu pedukuna. Tabewano tuwazoo umu baagooena, togesapa umuoo mu numu suda pumme sooyugwena pedukudu.
Umoo numu nemoagadu ka tu nanapootamana petukute. Numu waha-tamme tusooyugwedu maꞌemukwa. Saaꞌa soo suda mu manena umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.
Umuoo suda manakwe, ka Te Naa besa po oowemota manegase, ka unu moogoobuna. Oꞌnosoo soo numu nanesootuhi tunedyooedu Balaam
Pana soo Te Naa ka tzagase tzadyadooakute, ka Balaam nesagwikuna, ka suda oo manakwe. Soo nanesootuhipu numu tunedyooedu, Balaam, yise natzamaꞌwuoo ka suda tooꞌe tusooyugwese. Suda tooꞌe manekwuse.
Umuoo sutaꞌyoo numu gi he-toogoo besaꞌyoo, patzona pasa-kwaꞌneꞌyoo, pagunaba-waꞌne. Umuoo maꞌemukwana umu-matoosoo kodyukwu, umu yise togano-kwi nakwutumakwu.

Umu puusoo papaba-ma suda apegeana naanaꞌunnena. Umuoo numu nemooagadu ka mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe unnepu pudu nakadu mee esayikute, “Umu sakwa tu soomane-kwaꞌne mane,” gi sakwa mu sutakoo moohedu nakabetseapana. Oꞌno yise umu ka sutakoo nakabetseadu-ma tubetse tsabekwu, soo sutaꞌyoo mu matzooekukwu ka hemma how mu tooe yugwe, umu yise ka sutakoo nakabetseakwu suuꞌmu, yise mu ka kwase-gakoo podo meakwu.

Umu esagoedu uga ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu, oꞌno umu gi ka suta-ma emukwa, pana menoꞌo soo sutaꞌyoo mu matzooekute. Umu unu suda manepunne menoꞌo. Umu ka Te Naa besa unnepu pumme tu tuukwese gi sakwa uga oo natunedyooepana. Umu sakwa gi ka Te Naa besa podo uga meapana, menoꞌo umu hanoꞌoba suta-kwi manepetuga, ka gi tunakaꞌoedyukuna.
Umu ka sutakoo po-witoosoo kodyukwu. Umuoo ka a nanatugwenga-waꞌne manakwe, “Soo saduꞌu puu ka tu owaꞌepu-witusoo tuka, yise punnoꞌo soo hogu pumme tu nabakeakuse sapa, ka pasagwabu-witusoo kodyu.”

Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa yadooawabe ka Te Pabeꞌe kodyu petukwu-witu mu numu tuukwe, soo Te Pabeꞌe yadooawabe punnoꞌo ka Te Naa unnepu mu tuukwe. Nu punnoꞌo mooasoo waha tooe mu-matoo tuboyakwe. Ka besa mumme tu tuukwepu sokwamatuoona mee mu netammana.

Numme noꞌyoona meeoo mu netammayakwe, “Ka Te Naa ka teepu atasoo yugwekwuna-kobenasoo, mu numu ka sutakoo nakabetseadu tamme-maꞌyoona nanekoekwu, ka Te Pabeꞌe pudusoo kodyu petukwuna, mee te tunakaꞌoedyukute.”

Umu numu nemooagadu meeoo unakwe, “Ka teepu namadabue manakwanasoo noꞌyoona hee ooosapa manepunne. Umu te nanamooatupu tooe ooosapa manepunne, gi atasoo mane-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe kodyu petukwu mee unnese sapa, gisoo.”
Umu gi oo soonakaꞌoedyukute ka oꞌnosoo Te Naa unnepu ka noꞌoko hemma teepu-koobakwi oo matabuekepu. Ka teepu noko noꞌoko hemma oo-koobakwitu tuwazoo.
Oosoo ka baa, ka teepu-koobakwi hooodabedu, ka powmabu tuwazoo matabuepu. Ka saaꞌa yise ka teepu patatzopaku.

Meeoo soo Te Naa unnepu, yise noꞌoko ka hemma teepu-koobatu nikukwu, ka teepu paꞌanakwitu nokosoo. Mooasoo oosoo nanemadabuepu ka oe hemma manepetuse, soo Te Naa saaꞌa mu numu nemadabuedooa, soo sutaꞌyoo umu numu gi pumme nakabetseadu-matoosoo kodyukwu.

Pana mu, e pupuaꞌamu, mu sakwa oo soomayu, ka soo Te Naa tamme atasoo tusooyugwekute. Mee oosoo tusooyugwe, “Sumuoo tabeba ewa a tommo-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Yise ewa a tommo-gana sumuoo tabeba-waꞌneꞌyoo ka Te Naa-nakwana.”

Tooe soo Te Pabeꞌe tu unne-kwaꞌnesoo manekwuse sapa, oosoo mu ewowsoo numu wutooꞌe, mu tunakaꞌoedyukukwuna, oosoo sumuna ka noꞌoko numu tu maꞌemukwana maꞌwuse, ka pukwi suuꞌmu mu tunakaꞌoedyukukwuna soogwina. Oosoo gi tooe haka tooe suda tumatuguna umu-matoosoo kodyukwuna soogwi, ka gi kadoo mu namayugwena petsabena, ka noꞌoko numu tu matabuepu soobedyana.
Tamme gi o sopedakwatoo hananoꞌo ka teepu paꞌanakwitu, yise noꞌoko hee ka teepu-koobatu, paba nanakowse kadooꞌoo namamaꞌekwu. Soo teepu, yise, noꞌyoona ka teepu-koobatu nosoo nakootzasooꞌowkwu.
Tamme ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukumona, tamme oo tunetammakutoosoo manena, tamme oo sopedakwatoo, ka noꞌoko hemma oo tumadabuepu nakootzasooakwuse.
Ekow teepu nakootzasooakwuna tamme soogwi,
tamme ka oo sopedakwadoona tamme saaꞌa ka pudu teepu-kooba manepunnehoose noꞌyoona hee ka teepu-koobatu yise o paꞌanakwatu pudu namapudupudookwu. Onona noꞌyoona numu kaaheno manese, pudu meadabekwu.

E pupuaꞌamu, tamme sakwa ka Te Pabeꞌe tubetse nakabetsea, oꞌno oosoo ka kodyu petuse saaꞌa te besaꞌyookudooa. Tamme gi ka te mane-ma nasookwidooa. Tamme ka tunakabetseana, tamme besa nanano nanapuaꞌakwu. Tamme yoo manekwu ka pudu teepu-kooba nobe-gakwuse, ka oo paꞌanakwatu nokosoo oo pudu namadabuekwuse.

Tamme sakwa oo sopedakwatoo, soo Te Naa tuutooꞌe, oꞌno ewaꞌyoosoo tamme-matu namagwetzoikwu. Te besa puaꞌa Paul mu-matoo tubo, ekow noꞌoko tu tubope-kwi wahana. Oosoo noꞌoko tu sopedakwatoona po, ka Te Naa pumme tunetammakuna tu nakasopedakwadoo-kwikoo. Oo-naga-witu numu, gi etzaga nakasopedakwatoo. Susumudu numu, gi oo soonammemapuꞌa, waha-tamme tusooyugwedu, ka Paul unnena tzamayuana puusoo ka sutakoo namatoosoo makodyukute, pumme kadooꞌoo yugwekwudu. Umu noꞌoko ka Te Naa besa pooha-toohakwi nabodu tzamayuꞌa.
Gi umu-ma nasooꞌemukwapana, umuoo gi ka Te Naa nakabetseadu. Nu mu tuya tuukweꞌe, umuoo, mu nemooagadu gi nakabetseapana. Mu ka umu-waꞌnesoo manena mu punnoꞌo gi tunakaꞌoedyuku manepetugakwu.

Mu sakwa nanaꞌunusoo oo nakasopedakwatoo ka te nasootuhina, yise ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme magwetzoidu. Tamme sakwa ooosapa mee unnemo, “Te Pabeꞌe tubetse unu besaꞌyoo.” Ooosapa sakwa noꞌyoona numu mee unnemo, “Te Pabeꞌe tubetse nanasoogwugidu.”

Nu mu-matoo tubokwu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu. Ka tubetse mooeꞌugasoo ka teepu pudu namadabuese soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa-baa. Soo Te Pabeꞌe saaꞌa yaa teepu-kooba petu ka mu numu Te Naa besa unnepu tuukwegese, oꞌno yise mu numu oo nakaꞌoedyukudu ooosapa gwetzoimokwu. Ka Te Pabeꞌe yaa teepu-kooba petuse, numu oo manese, numme oo tookoope poonne, numme tuwazoo oo tookoo tzama.

Mooasoo numme ka Te Naa noꞌoko Te Pabeꞌe-no nanapuaꞌana umu-nosoo meadape. Numme ooosapa ka besa naꞌunnedu mu tuukwedyakwe ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu, oꞌno mu oo nakaꞌoedyukuna tamme nanapuaꞌase nananosoo ka Te Naa besa podo meakwu.
Numme ka besa naꞌunnedu mu tuukweꞌe, oꞌno mu numme-no ka Te Naa besa po-wi tzabekakwu. Tamme noꞌyoona yise besa sokwamakwu.

Ekowsoo naꞌunnepu soo Te Pabeꞌe mooasoo ne tuukwepu numme yise punnoꞌo mumme tuukwekwu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee te netamma, “Soo Te Naa kootabedooadu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo tooe hano tooe katuna ka besow po-kooba kootabuapunne.”
Soo tooe haga tooe mee unnedu, “Nu ka Te Naa puaꞌagana ka oo besa podo meꞌa,” pana ka ooosapa tumaꞌemukwatabena oosoo esayaꞌena ka togabadoo nummenumme.
Tamme ka kootabua-kwi momona ka Te Naa-waꞌne ooosapa kootabedooapunnena tamme tookwa nanapuaꞌa. Soo Te Naa noꞌoko ka te tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwapu soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mooasoo tamme-koobatoo nabatsapuna.
Soo tooe haga tooe mee unnedu, “Nu gi tumaꞌemukwadu,” puusoo nanemooaga ka gi kaaheno meana.
Tamme ka te tumaꞌemukwana wahase Te Naa gi totsaba-ga te mayugwekwu.
Tooe haga tooe mee unnedu, “Nu gi tumaꞌemukwadu,” gi ka Te Naa besa unnepu nakaꞌoedyukute, “Te Naa esayaꞌe,” mee tookwa oosoo tusooyugwedu.
E nanumu nu mu-matoo tuboꞌo oꞌno mu gi tumaꞌemukwakwu. Ka tooe haga tooe tamme-nagatu tumaꞌemukwa soo Te Pabeꞌe ka kaahenoꞌyoona te tumaꞌemukwana nematzagakwuni.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mooasoo te tumaꞌemukwa-koobatoo nabatsase, noꞌobatusoo numu tumaꞌemukwana kadoo namayugwe.
Tamme ka Te Naa doodooamuna oo nakaꞌoedyukute, yise oo nakabetseꞌa ka tamme oo tuukwena.
Soo tooe haga tooe gi ka Te Naa nakabetseadu, tooꞌe oosoo mee unnedu pana, “Nu ka Te Naa dooamu-nagatu,” oosoo tookwa esayaꞌe.
