Tooe haga tooe ka Te Naa unnepu nakabetseana soo Te Naa tookwa oo besaꞌyookute. Soo tooe haga tooe mee unnedu, “Nu Te Naa tooaꞌa,” oosoo sakwa ka Te Naa besa podo meano, ka Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌnesoo. Oꞌno yise oosoo puusoo nasopedakwadoo ka Te Naa Tooaꞌana.
E nanumu, oe manakwanasoo mu ka mooeꞌugasoo tunakaꞌoedyukuse mu ka Te Pabeꞌe naka tamme sakwa yise unu nanasoobedya.
Menoꞌo esoo naꞌunnedu unu natzooesoo manemena soo Te Pabeꞌe ka unu nanasoobedya te mayugwena. Mooasoo soo togaba kadoo manemena, ka togaba-wiꞌyoona kaaheno kootabedooa-kwitoo numu kua-kwaꞌneꞌyoo.
Tooe soo tooe haga tooe nu ka gootabedooadu-kwi mee unnedu pana ka sumuoo Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu-nagatu gi petzabena oosoo tookwa togesoo ka togaba-wi.
Soo tooe haga tooe ka tamme-matu Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu unu soobedyadu ka kootabedooadu-kwi nummenumme. Oꞌno yise oosoo ka Te Naa besa podo meadabena gi oo maꞌwuka-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Soo tooe haga tooe ka tamme Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu-nagatu gi petzabedu, tookwa togesoo togaba-wi numme numme, oosoo gi hownnekoo oo sopedakwadookwu-waꞌneꞌyoo ka Te Naa besa podo tu nameana.

Mu Te Naa doodooamu nu mu-matoo tuboꞌo soo mu tumaꞌemukwana nasoomuꞌwapu, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu-koobatoo nabatsapuna. Ooonneꞌyoona yise mu menoꞌo Te Naa besa doodooamu. Mumme nanamooatupu nu tuwazoo mu tuukwekwu mu ka Te Naa tamme Manumudoopu sopedakwatoona. Mumme yise pudu numu nu tuukwekwu mu ka Te Naa unnepu nakabetseana, mu ka sutakoo matzooekute.
Gi sakwa tamme mu gi toge manedu-kwaꞌne manepana. Soo tooe haga tooe ka sutakoo podo meadu tookwa gi ka Te Naa petzape. Soo Te Naa ka suda namanedu gi petzape.
Mu yaa teepu-koobatu numu suda tu manena besa soobedya, umu ka unu moogoomanena puusoo unu nasooyugwena gi ka Te Naa petzabe-kwaꞌne manedu.
Saaꞌa esoo teepu ka mu sutakoo numu-no kadoo namayugwekwu. Soo tooe haga tooe ka Te Naa nakabetseadu soo oo gwetzoinummekwuna gi mobegwa-gakwu.

E nanumu, pudusoo esoo teepu namapudutupudookwu. Mooasoo mu oo naka gisoo ka Te Pabeꞌe ka teepu mapudutupudoo sumuꞌyoo ka Te Pabeꞌe tubetse tumooꞌoopunnedu yaa teepu-kooba tamme-baa petukwu. Mooasoo ewaꞌyoo numu ka Te Pabeꞌe nekwohoꞌne tamme yise oo sopedakwatoo pudusoo Te Pabeꞌe ka teepu mapudutupudookwu.

Umu Te Pabeꞌe nekwohonedu tamme-nagatu uga gi ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tubetse tunakaꞌoedyukute. Umu uga ka tubetse tunakaꞌoedyukuna togesoo tamme-noꞌyookwu. Menoꞌo tamme oo sopedakwatoo umu tookwa gi tubetse tunakaꞌoedyukupana meeoo sukwe naneyukwe gi tookwa umu tubetse tamme-notu ooonneꞌyoona umu te gaꞌabeyakwe.
Mu Te Pabeꞌe tubetse nakaꞌoedyukunodu, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tu Besa Pooha-ma mu sootuhipu, ooonneꞌyoona umu ka togesapa naꞌunnedu sopedakwatoo.
Mu mooasoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu nakasopedakwatoo, soo Te Naa tubetse kaahenotu, ooonneꞌyoona nu mu tuukweꞌe.
Soo tooe haga tooe Jesus gi Te Pabeꞌe mee unnedu esayaꞌe. Esoo esayidu ka Te Pabeꞌe tumooꞌoo oosoo ka gi Te Naa noko ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukuna meeoo unakwe.

Soo tooe haga tooe gi ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu, gi Te Naa Tooaꞌa. Mu sakwa ka Te Naa besa unnepu oe manakwanasoo nakaduguna ooosapa oo nakaꞌoedyukuna, oꞌno mu ooosapa Te Naa noꞌoko Te Pabeꞌe doodooamu manepunnekwu.
Oosoo mooasoo te tunetammakupu, soo te gwetzoimokwuna gi moobegwa-gakwu.
Yaa menoꞌo nu mu tuukwekwu gi ka mu mumme nemooagadu-ma saaꞌa nakatzabepana.

Soo Te Naa ka tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma mu sootuhi. Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha ooosapa ka togesapa naꞌunnedu mu tunedyooenokwu, ka tooe hekwi mu gi kummaꞌakoosoo numu tunedyooedu soogwikwu. Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha mu tunedyooena mu yise ooosapa ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukukwu.
E nanumu, tamme ka ooosapa Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna ka yaa teepu-kooba oo kodyu petuse tamme gi oo-ma suina gi oo nasookwikwu.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ooosapa kaaheno tumatugudu, mu yise oo sopedakwatoo soo tooe haga tooe kaaheno tumatugudu punnoꞌo Te Naa tooaꞌa.
Soo Te Naa tubetse unu te soobedyana, “E doodooamutseꞌe,” mee te natubaꞌnga. Umu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi oo sopedakwatoo ka Te Naa meeoo tamme natubaꞌnga umu ka gi Te Naa sopedakwatoona.

E nanumu, mooasoo tamme Te Naa doodooamu manepu. Tamme ka Te Naa-tamme sootunagakwuna gisoo sopedakwatoo. Tamme oo sopedakwatoo ka Te Pabeꞌe yaa teepu-koobasoo kodyu petuse, oꞌno tamme oo poonnese oo-waꞌneꞌyookwu.

Tamme ka Te Naa atasoo numu nemayugwena oo nakaꞌoedyukudu soo Te Pabeꞌe te pudu manumudookwu mee naꞌunnedu, ooonneꞌyoona oosoo ka suda te tumatuguna soomuꞌwase gi totsaba-ga tamme manekwu, soo Te Pabeꞌe puu gi totsaba-gaꞌyoo.
Soo tooe haga tooe ka Te Naa unnepu gi nakabetseadu tumaꞌemukwa.
Mu oo sopedakwatoo mooasoo ka Te Pabeꞌe yaa teepu-koobatoo, nanasuda te tumatugupu-koobatoo oo nabatsapu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe puu gi tumaꞌemukwadu.
Soo Tooe haga tooe ooosapa tumaꞌemukwadubedu gi Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukute.
E nanumu, tooe haga tooe kaaheno tumatugudu ka Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌneꞌyookwu.

Soo tooe haga tooe ooosapa tumaꞌemukwadu tookwa ka Numu Sooꞌadu, sutakoo nagedu oosoo Gi Togeꞌyoo puu oe-manakwanasoo, ooosapa suda tumatugukepu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yaa teepu-koobasoo petuse, ka sutakoo, numu tumaꞌemukwa mayugwedu kadooꞌoo mayugwekwuse.
Tamme ka Te Naa besa doodooamu manese ka suda namanedu nuuninokwu.

Tooe haga tooe ooosapa gi toge manedu ka Te Naa doodooamu gi petzabedu tookwa, ka Numu Sooꞌadu nagedu. Tamme oo sopedakwatoo ka ooka gi togekoo, Numu Sooꞌadu tumayohokudu oosoo gi Te Naa doodooamu-matu.
Ka Te Pabeꞌe mu nakaꞌoedyuku-kwi manakwanasoo, soo Te Naa unnepu, “Mu sakwa nanasoobedya,” meeꞌe naꞌunnedu mu ooosapa nakanoꞌo.

Mu sakwa gi ka oꞌnosoo tooebetse Cain mee naneadu-kwaꞌne manepana. Soo Cain suda manakwe ka tu wanngaꞌa nuusoogwedukuna, ka tu wanngaꞌa kaaheno tumatugu oo batsase. Soo Cain tookwa ka mu sutakoo nagedu.
Ooonneꞌyoona, E nanumu, mu sutaꞌyoo numu yaa teepu-koobatu puu gi te petzape.
Saaꞌa mu suda manedu numu ka tuꞌina ooosapa togano-kwiꞌyookwu. Tamme ka tuꞌise besa-kwitoo, ooosapa namagwetzoidu-kwitoo meꞌa, tamme ka nanasoobedyana.

Tooe haga tooe gi tu pupuaꞌamu petzabedu tu puaꞌa batsadu-kwaꞌnesoo manepunne. Tamme oo sopedakwatoo soo numu puu ka tu nanumu batsase suda oo tumatuguna oo-matoosoo kodyukwu, yise gi ka Te Naa-baa petugakwu.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe unu te soobedyana, ooonneꞌyoona tamme-koobatoo nabatsapu. Tamme sakwa punnoꞌo oo-waꞌnesoo nanasoobedya.
Soo tooe haga tooe gi hemma tuugedu, ka tu puaꞌa tutuha manakwe sakwa oo tummatzi ka Te Naa unu soobedyana oo-matoo nanesootuhiyana.
E nanumu tamme sakwa unu nanasoobedyana nanatummatzi gi meeoo sukwe unnepana.
Oꞌno tamme ka Te Naa doodooamuna, tammesoo nanasopedakwadookwu. Tamme yise gi suikwu ka Te Naa-koobena manepetugase.
Tooe ka Te Naa tamme tunetammakuna gi mapuꞌapana, te nasootuagaꞌne sapa, soo Te Naa ka te sopedakwadoona tutuha te soobedyana te sootuhaꞌe.
E nanumu, tamme gi ka Te Naa-ma suaꞌekwu ka mooasoo oo sopedakwadoona te tutumaꞌemukwana oo soomuꞌwapu.
Tamme ka Te Naa nanetzakwiyiyina oosoo te nakana te sootuhaꞌe, tamme ka tamme oo tunetammakuna nakabetseana.
Soo Te Naa meeoo soo Jesus Mu Tubetse Pabeꞌe, mu sakwa oo nakaꞌoedyukuna unu nanasoobedya.
Tamme ka Te Naa besa unnepu nakabetseanona soo Te Naa ooosapa tamme-no manenummekwu. Soo Te Naa ooosapa tamme-no manenummekwu, ka tu Besa Pooha-ma te sootuhise.

E nanumu, tamme sakwa gi ka noꞌobatusoo poohabe nakaꞌoedyukupana. Ewa yaa teepu-kooba naꞌesagoꞌe, ka sutakoo poohabe-toohakwi. Ka nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu mee unnedu tamme-baa petuse, tamme sakwa ka hownnekoo oo pooha-gana sopedakwatoo, haꞌoo Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi numu tunedyooe.

Nu mu tuukwekwu, haꞌoo tamme oo sopedakwadookwu, hownnekoo poohabe-toohakwi oosoo numu tunedyooe. Tooe haga tooe ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi unnekwu, mee soo Jesus o kaaheno Te Pabeꞌe, oosoo togesapa naꞌunnedu ka yaa teepu-kooba tamme-baa numu petuse tamme-waꞌneꞌyookwu.

Soo tooe haga tooe yise mee unnedu, soo Jesus Te Pabeꞌe gi togeꞌyoo, oosoo tookwa sutakoo pooha-toohakwiꞌyoona ka Te Pabeꞌe nekwohoꞌne. Soo Te Pabeꞌe tumooꞌoodu, numu nemooagadu, tamme ka oꞌnosoo mu nanekemmadu nakadu menoꞌo yise mooasoo tamme-naga.
Umu esagoedu gi te nemooꞌaga-waꞌneꞌyoo, e nanumu, tamme ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwiꞌyoona, oosoo noꞌoko poohabe matzooekudu.

Soo numu esayaekudu ata-tammesoo numu neyugwedu, ka mu numu gi Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi manepunnedu etzaga nemooaꞌaga. Umuoo numu esagoekuna ka mu numu sutakoo tumayohope mu nagetuunguna mu tunedyooꞌe, ooonneꞌyoona mu sutaꞌyoo numu yaa teepu-koobatu mu nakabetseꞌa.

Tooe haga tooe Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukudu te nakapunnekwu, tamme ka Te Naa doodooamuna. Soo tooe haga tooe gi te soonakadu tookwa gi Te Naa heesoobedya, ooonnekoo tamme oo sopedakwadookwu, haꞌoo sutakoo poohabe oo-nagakoo tooetoo besow.
E nanumu, tamme sakwa Te Naa unnena nakaꞌoedyukuna nanasoobedya. Noꞌyoona Te Naa doodooamu nanasoobedya soo Te Naa ka oo te mayugwena.
Soo tooe haga tooe gi numu petzabedu tookwa gi ka Te Naa doodooamu-matu, soo Te Naa puu ooosapa unu numu soobedyadu.

Tamme oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa puu tamme unu soobedyana, ka tu Besaa Tooa ka yaa teepu-kooba nabatsakupu, ka noꞌoko te tumaꞌemukwana kadoo mayugwena. Ka mooeꞌugasoo soo Te Naa ka unu te soobedyana, ooonneꞌyoona tamme punnoꞌo unu nanasoobedya.
E nanumu tamme sakwa unu nanasoobedyana, ka Te Naa puu tubetse unu tamme soobedya.
Gi haga ka Te Naa tookoope poonnedu. Tamme ka nanasoobedyana soo Te Naa ooosapa tamme-no manenummekwu. Tamme punnoꞌo nanasoobedya manepetukwu, ka Te Naa tamme sooyugwe-waꞌne.
Soo Te Naa ka tu Besa Pooha-ma te sootuhipu. Ooonneꞌyoona ooosapa te tummatzina tamme oo-no besa kemmadape.
Tamme yise oo sopedakwatoo, soo Te Naa ka tu Besaa Tooa yaa teepu-koobatoo taya, ka numu oo magwetzoi tuunguna.
Tooe haga tooe oo nakaꞌoedyukudu soo Te Pabeꞌe Te Naa Tooa, tookwa Te Naa-no meadape.
Tamme oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa unu te soobedya. Soo tooe haga tooe punnoꞌo unu numu soobedyadu tookwa Te Naa-doodooamu-matu.

Tamme nananesootuhidu numu nanaꞌunusoo nanasoobedya manemena, ka Te Naa tamme sooyugwe-waꞌne. Oꞌno saaꞌa ka Te Naa numu nemadabooꞌe tamme puu gi ka Te Naa-ma suikwu, tamme ka mooasoo ka Te Naa unu soobedyana.

Tamme gi ka Te Naa-ma suaꞌe ka unu oo soobedyana. Tamme ka mooasoo unu Te Naa soobedya manepetuse, mooasoo ka te tumaꞌemukwana nasoomuꞌwapu gi hemma-ma suaꞌekwu. Tamme ka suina suda tusooyugwe. Tamme ka mooasoo oo sopedakwatoona soo Te Naa te mabetsea ka unu pumme te soobedya. Tooe haga tooe Te Naa-ma suidu tookwa gisoo ka Te Naa tu soobedya-kwi manakwe.
Soo Te Naa mooeꞌugasoo unu te soobedya ooonneꞌyoona tamme punnoꞌo Te Naa unu soobedya.

Soo tooe haga tooe ka Te Naa unu soobedya mee unnepana ka Te Naa besa doodooamu gi petzabena oosoo tookwa esayaꞌe. Soo tooe haga tooe ka Te Naa doodooamu tookoope poonnepana gi mu petzabedu hownnekoo ka Te Naa yise gi tu tookoope poonnena petzabekwu?
Soo Te Naa mee te netamma, “Soo tooe haga tooe unu e soobedyadu, sakwa umu e doodooamu tuwazoo unu soobedya.”
Tooe haga tooe o soo Jesus Te Tubetse Pabeꞌe meeꞌe naꞌunnedu nakaꞌoedyukudu tookwa Te Naa Tooaꞌa. Tooe haga tooe ka Te Naa unu soobedyadu Te Naa dooamu unu soobedyakwu tuwazoo.
Tamme ka Te Naa unu soobedyana, oo tunetamma-kwaꞌnesoo manena oo nakabetseana tamme tookwa Te Naa doodooamu besa soobedya.
Soo Te Naa tamme tunetammakuna tamme ka oo nakabetseana oosoo gi namanakwe tamme ka Te Naa unu soobedyana.
Tamme Te Naa dooamu gi ka sutakoo nakabetsea ka yaa teepu-koobatu numu mayohona. Tamme ka sutakoo mooasoo matzooekute, ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukuna.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe Te Naa Besaa Tooa Tubetse oedyukudu suuꞌmu ka sutakoo matzooekute. Soo sutaꞌyoo ka numu suta-tamme ohoyugwedu.
Soo Te Naa oo waha soo Te Pabeꞌe oo Besaa Tooa baa-wi namatzakase, soo Te Naa oo wahasoo tuwazoo, ka Te Pabeꞌe nabatsase. Yise nakwitoo ka Te Naa Besa Pooha.
Esoo Te Naa besa yadooapu toge kaahenotu ka Tu Penebe Besa Tuooaꞌa-witu. Mu numu puu ka tu nanumu haꞌyoo unakwe oo nakaꞌoedyukute. Soo Te Naa unnepu ka sukwe numu unnepu, ooonnekoo toge kaahenoꞌyoo.
Soo tooe haga tooe ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu oo sopedakwatoo oosoo Te Naa Penebe Besaa Tooaꞌa. Tooe haga tooe gi ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukudu ka Te Naa neꞌesatooe.
Soo Te Naa meeoo te tunetammakupu ka Te Pabeꞌe mane-koobatoo gi mobegwa-gakwu ooosapa te gwetzoimokwuna te sootuhikwu.
Soo tooe haga tooe ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu tu namagwetzoina nasootuhikwu, soo gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi.
Nu mumme Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu-matoo tuboꞌo oꞌno mu nananesootuhaꞌedu numu ka ooosapa gi mobegwa-gakoo namagwetzoidu, pumme tu sootuhipu sopedakwadookwu.
Tamme oo sopedakwatoo ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhina ka oo tunetammana oedyukuna oosoo te nakana
te sootuhikwu ka pumme te nanetzakwiyi.

Unu nanesootuhi numu ka tunakaꞌoedyukudu maꞌemukwa oo poonnena oosoo sakwa oo nanesootuhiku soo Te Naa yise ka tumaꞌemukwadu magwetzoikwu. Tooe noꞌoko numu tumaꞌemukwana gi besow sapa, soo tooꞌe noꞌobatu soo numu tumaꞌemukwapu mesoo nanematzagakwunaꞌe. Sumubatu numu tumaꞌemukwana gi nananesootuhikwuni-waꞌneꞌyoo oosoo ka tumaꞌemukwadu-matoosoo namakodyukuse oo batsakwu. Ookow tumaꞌemukwape gi hownnekoo tamme nanesootuhi-kwaꞌneꞌyoo.
Tamme oo sopedakwatoo umu nananesootuhidu numu Te Naa doodooamu gi ooosapa tumaꞌemukwano-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Tamme oo sopedakwatoo tamme Te Naa doodooamu, yise soo sutaꞌyoo Gi Togeꞌyoo ka noꞌoko yaa teepu-koobatu mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu numu nemadunagakwu.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-baa yaa teepu-kooba petuse te sootuhaꞌe oꞌno tamme oo-toogoo Te Naa besa sopedakwadookwu. Ka Te Tubetse Pabeꞌe Jesus-toohakwi, soo Te Naa togesapa te sootuhi tamme yise gi mobegwa-ga gwetzoimokwu.
E nanumu, ka Te Naa-matoo suuꞌmu sakwa mu nanesootuhi mea. Yaanotu sapa esoo pooha nanesootuhibu-witu nanemamakwupetu.
Nu yaahoo mu nanesootuhi tunedyooedu ka umu Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-matoo tubokwu tooe hano tooe manepunne. Numme yise noꞌyoona umu Te Pabeꞌe-witu nakaꞌoedyukudu-no besa mu soobedya,
tamme ka Te Naa togesapa oo unnepu gi moobegwaga ooosapa nakabetseana.
“Soo Te Naa te magwetzoikwu te sootuhina,” mee nu nanesootuhi.
Ka mu-matu yaa numme-baa petuse mu ka Te Naa tunetammapu-too togesoo mu nanesootuhi meꞌa. Nu besa mu-matoo nakasoonamme.
Ka Te Pabeꞌe te mooe nakaꞌoedyuku-kwi manakwanasoo soo Te Naa unu nanasoobedyana mee te netammanoꞌo.
Tamme ka Te Naa unu soobedyana tamme oo tumayohokunokwu. Soo Te Naa mee te netammapu, “Nanasoobedyana sakwa mu e podo meadabe.”

Ewaꞌyoona mu numu tunedyooedu numu nemooagadu ka eka teepu-koobakwi maꞌnaꞌwedu gi meeoo unne-waꞌneꞌyoo soo Jesus Te Tubetse Pabeꞌe numu manese yaa teepu-koobatoo nataya. Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe sukwe nekwohonena
gi umu ka Te Pabeꞌe besa podo meadabe. Gi umu-waꞌne manepana. Mu sumuna mu ka Te Naa mumme besa sootuhina watzekadooa.
Mu ka Te Pabeꞌe besa po maꞌwukase ka Te Naa matusookwunikwu. Mu ka ooosapa Te Pabeꞌe besa podo meadabena ka Te Naa noko Te Pabeꞌe nakabetsea.
Ka mu numu nemooagadu mu-baa petuse gi mu nabaaꞌyookupana ka nanesootuhina gi mu nanesootuhi tuungupana. Gi tuwazoo mu tunemabetsabekupana.
Soo tooe haga tooe ka mu numu nemooagadu nabatoo bina mu tumaꞌemukwana mu nenoyukwe tummatzaꞌe.
Nu ewasoo mu soonetammapana gi mu-matoo e sukwe tubona soogwaꞌe. Sumuna nu saaꞌa mu-baa nobenena. Oꞌno saaꞌa tamme besakoo nanatuukwedooa. Tamme yise noꞌyoona besa sokwamadooa.
Numme yaatuoo nananesootuhidu mu nemayudooa.
Nu mu nanesootuhi tunedyooedu ka e besa puaꞌa Gaius-matoo tubokwu. Togesapa u e besa puaꞌa.
Ka ooosapa u manenokwuna nu u nanesootuhikute, oꞌno soo Te Naa ka besa u nanesootuhi meꞌa besakoosoo u sootuhikwu.
Susumudu umu Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu nu-baa petudyipunne yise mu e nobenedyidu-makoo nu meeoo tunaka, u e tooe tuukweꞌe, u toge kaaheno Te Naa besa podo meadape.
Ka umu e besa pupuaꞌamu Te Naa besa podo meꞌa, mee nu mu nakana besa mu-matoo nakasoonamme.
E puaꞌa, u besa manakwe. Ka mu wakwawaꞌa mu-baa petuse ka Te Naa besa unnepu mumme mu tunedyooꞌe u sakwa tubetse besa mu matugu.
Mu u-baa nobenemodu ka kodyu petuse besa u-kwitu nemadabue, u besa mu matugu ka Te Naa tamme tunetammaku-kwaꞌnesoo. Oosoo besaꞌyoo ka besa mu matuguna,
umu manatooe ka Te Pabeꞌe besa unnepu wahammoꞌo. Umu gi ka mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu natummatzi tuungu.
Ta sakwa ka mu nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu maka, ka yoo manena ta ka Te Naa togesapa unnepu mu tuukwe tummatzaꞌe.
Mooasoo nu mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-matoo tubo pana soo Diotrephes mee naneadu gi ne nakabetseꞌa, oosoo ka puu mooe nadatsungakwu mee tusooyugwena.

Nu ka mu-baa petugase nu mu tuukwekwu oosoo nana numme-witu esayaꞌe. Ooosoo tuwazoo gi ka mu nanesootuhibu nu-mu tunedyooedu mu-baa petuna petzape. Oosoo nana ka mu numu nanesootuhibu tunedyooedu tu nanumu umu tummatzaꞌe, mu neꞌyooikuhooyakwe. Ka nanesootuhibu mu numu tunedyooedu mu maka, ka mu-no tuwazoo mu nanesootuhaꞌe mu tayahooyakwe.
E puaꞌa Gaius, ta sakwa gi ka Diotrephes-waꞌne suda tumatugupana. Soo tooe haga tooe besa tumatugudu tookwa Te Naa doodooamu. Soo tooe haga tooe suda tumatugudu tookwa gi Te Naa sopedakwadoo.
Noꞌyoona numu meeoo, soo Demetrius besa kaaheno numu tunedyooedu. Nu punnoꞌo u tuukweꞌe oosoo kaaheno numu tunedyooedu u yise namekoosoo ne sopedakwatoo numme gi esagoedu.
Nu ewasoo u tuukwe penipana gi ooka e sukwe bona petzape. Sumuna saaꞌa nu u-baa petugakwu. Oꞌno saaꞌa ta oetu nanatuukwedooa.
“Ka Gaius sootuhi,” mee nu ka Te Naa-matoo u nanesootuhikuyakwe. Ta pupuaꞌamu yaatu u nemayuyakwe. Nu punnoꞌo ka umu e pupuaꞌamu u-baatu nemayuyakwe.

Jude, ka James wangaꞌa, ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-wi punnoꞌo tunakabetseadu noꞌoko mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-matoo oo tubona. Soo Te Naa noꞌoko te netutzeapu ka unu te soobedyana. Tamme ka Te Naa-doodooamu o ooonneꞌyoona oosoo te tummatzipunne ka Te Pabeꞌe-toohakwi.
Meeoo nu mu nanesootuhikuyakwe, “Soo Te Naa sakwa ooosapa mu sootuhina, mu magwetzoi, yise nanaꞌunusoo nanasoobedya mu mayugwe.”

E besa nanumu, nu ooosapa mu-matoo e tubokwuna soogwaꞌe ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu noꞌoko tamme oo magwetzoikwu-kwitu, tooe ka mu numu mumme tumooꞌoo sapa. Ooonneꞌyoona nu menoꞌo mu-matoo tuboꞌo ooka mu tuukwena, numu mu tubetse nenoyukwe tuunguna, oꞌno umu ooosapa ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukukwu. Tamme tunakaꞌoedyukudu mooasoo ka togesapa naꞌunnedu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu natuukwepu, tamme punnoꞌo ka mu numu natuukwe tuungu. Tamme sakwa ka kaaheno te tusooyugwena gi atasoo neyugwepana.

Nu eka mu tuukweꞌekwu susumudu mu-matu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu, tunakaꞌoedyukute mee naneyakwe. “Soo Te Naa te magwetzoikwu tooe ka sutakoo mu nakabetsea sapa,” mee mu esagoedu tooꞌe unakwe, umukwu too gi ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukupana meeoo unakwe. Tubetse oꞌnosoo umu suda manakwe soo saaꞌa sutaꞌyoo umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.

Menoꞌo yise nu mu nemayukukwu tooe mooasoo mu natuukweꞌepu sapa soo suda mu manena mu numu-matoosoo kodyukwu. Tubetse oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa ka mu Jew numu ka mu Egypt numu-makoo magwetzoipu. Pana ka saaꞌa mu Jew numu kadoo maꞌe, gi pumme mu nakaꞌoedyukute.

Oꞌnosoo tuwazoo ka mu Te Naa tutummatziwabe, toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo maꞌemukwase ka Te Naa umu tunetammakuna mu maꞌwuhoose mu maꞌemukwana umu-matoosoo kodyupu. Oosoo yise togano-kwi mu wutumeta, ka sumu tabeno suda mu tumatuguna nemadabuekwuse.

Umu Sodom noko Gomorrah-witu numu umu tzageꞌe-witu nokosoo ka suda tumatuguna mu manena umu-matoosoo kodyu. Umu nanapootama gi numu mane-kwaꞌne. Ooonekoo mu tumaꞌemukwadu nidabekwu koso gi kootzasooadu-kwiꞌyoona. Tamme sakwa oo sopedakwadoo tamme ka ooosapa tumaꞌemukwana te maꞌemukwana tamme-matoosoo kodyukwu, umu numu maꞌemukwana puu umu-matoosoo kodyupu.

Umu numu nemooagadu sutakoo pooha nosepu-gaꞌyoo ka nanapootamana tooe how tooe nanasoonahadyugwe, yise gi mu numu moohedu nakabetseꞌa. Umuoo tuwazoo ka umu Te Naa tutummatziwabe mu toha kakasa-gakoo nanasuda mu netamma.

Soo mu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo moohedu Michael mee naneadu ka Moses yaꞌese ka oo tookoo-witoo kemmase, soo Sutaꞌyoo yise punnoꞌo oo takonehoo ka Moses tookoo nehegana. Ka Sutakoo sukwe naka yise meeoo, “Soo Te Naa u nedakwu ka suda u unakwe.” Soo Te Naa tummatzidu puu gi suda unakwe tooe ka Sutakoo suda pumme netammase sapa. Pana soo Michael yise gi suda yadooꞌa, oo sukwe naka.

Pana umuoo sutaꞌyoo nanana suda apegea ka gi hemma nakasopedakwadoona. Umu puusoo kadoo namayugwe ka suda apegeana gi hemma sopedakwadoopana. Umu kadoo namayugwe ka sutakoo nakabetseana umu ka oo sopedakwadoona, gi oetu soohanepana tooe how tooe manakwe.

Soo suda mu manepu umu-matoosoo kodyukwu umu ka sutakoo podo meadabena ka oꞌnosoo ka te namooatupu Cain mee naneadu-kwaꞌne. Soo Cain puu tu wanngaꞌa batsapu oosoo nuusoogweda ka Te Naa ooosapa oo tumatugukute. Ooonekoo soo soo Te Naa besa oo nenaka. Umu numu nemooagadu unu moogoobu ka tooe nanesootuhipana Balaam mee naneadu-kwaꞌnesoo. Soo Balaam ewow numu-nakwana tu natumanakakuookwuna ooosapa soogwipunnedu ka numu tooꞌe poohana. Soo suda mu tumatuguna umu-matoosoo kodyukwu. Ka oꞌnosoo te nanamooatupu Korah mee naneadu, tu pupuaꞌmu-no kadoo namayugwepu. Ka Moses mu nekwohone petuse, soo te teepu yise wunabese-ma kadoo mu maꞌe.

Mu numu mu nesootzeꞌma ka mu numu nemooagadu mu-nagakwi manepunne. Ka nanano mu nanesootuhi tuka mu numu nemooagadu suda oeꞌyoona sukwe maneyakwe, gi kaaheno ka nanesootuhi tumayoho, sukwe unu pepewutzena. Umuoo gi he-toogoo besaꞌyoo, gi powmadu koomeba-waꞌneꞌyoo, sukwe wutzagakwunaꞌe. Umuoo toꞌesabu pasa-kwaꞌneꞌyoo tooe unu yubanoo manekase sapa gi pooe-gaꞌyoo. Umu gi he-toogoo besaꞌyoo.

Umuoo ka pedyoomaba napoonne-kwaꞌneꞌyoo noꞌoko hemma tumeatoo tzobadu. Soo suda mu tumatuguna ooonneꞌyoo gi nawatzekute, tuukwunipe-kwaꞌne numu oo poonne tooe how kwingaꞌyoopana. Umuoo numu nemooagadu paatoozooba tui sawe-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Numu puu gi mu nageka-waꞌneꞌyoo.

Ka oꞌnosoo soo mu numu nemooagadu ooosapa togaba-wi mukwamoꞌo. Mooeꞌugasoo nana Adam kunooꞌoo tzoꞌo, Enoch mee naneadu mee ka mu numu tuukweꞌe, “Saaꞌa Te Pabeꞌe petukwusoo umu pumme tutummatzidu mu toha kakasa-ga-no,
ka mu numu nanasuda manepunne mu nemadabuekwuse. Oꞌno yise soo suda numu tumatuguna umu-matoosoo kodyukwu, umu ka Te Naa suda netammase.”
Numu nemooyugwena, numu nesootzemana, suda mesoo manena, puusoo papabatseꞌe naanaꞌunnena, kummaꞌakoosoo numu nanetubetseyaꞌena tuwow, oꞌno mu numu hemma mu hanekukwu.
Mu sakwa gi oo soomuꞌwapana ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus yadooawabe tamme tunetammaku-kwaꞌnesoo oo unnepu.

Ka gisoo Te Pabeꞌe petukwuna oe manakwe mu numu mu-maꞌyoo nanekoekwu ka Te Naa besa manakwe. Umu ka Te Naa gi nakabetseana. Ka suda tu manena manoyugwena, umuoo numu nemooagadu nanaꞌemota numu yugwe. Umu ka gi tunakaꞌoedyukuna umu gi ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-ma nasootuhikwu.
E nanumu mu sakwa ka Te Naa besa unnepu nakaꞌoedyukuna. Mu sakwa ka oo Besa Pooha-toohakwi nanesootuhi.
Ka Te Naa unu mu soobedya yise oo nakaꞌoedyuku ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme magwetzoina soomayuna, saaꞌa tamme ooosapa ka Te Naa-baaꞌyookwuse.
Tamme sakwa mu gi besa tunakabetseadu numu nenoyugwe, oꞌno umu tunakaꞌoedyukukwu.

Yise oo tamme mu magwetzoi tabuakwu ka suda mu nuugwekwese ka goso-wikoo mu natzakwu-kwaꞌne. Tamme sakwa mu tumaꞌemukwadu numu tutuha soobedyana ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoosoo mu makodyuku. Tamme sakwa gi umuoo tumaꞌemukwadu numu-ma nakatzipana.
Soo Te Naa oo madaꞌe ka pumme te nakabetseana, yise namatoosoo te bikwu, gi totsabugana. Soo Te Naa te mabetseana besa te masokwamakwu ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus tamme-koobatoo manepu-witoo.
Soo Te Naa unu pooha-gaꞌyoo te magwetzoikwu. Noꞌyoona tamme sakwa oo nakabetsea. Noꞌyoona numu sakwa mee unne, “Soo Te Naa ooosapa tubetse besaꞌyoo.” Yow e nanesootuhi-kwaꞌneꞌyoosoo.

Ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu tu tubetse namanekwuna, soo Te Naa e pooha nose-kwi, tu tummatzidu toha kasa-gaꞌyoo e tuukwepu. Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe mee nuka John tuukwe tuungu ka e pooha tuusoobedya-kwi ka hemma manemeakwuna. E nosepu mumme pumatoo nananesootuhidu e tuukweꞌe tuunguna.
Soo Te Naa ka mu numu eka besa naꞌunnedu neadu sootuhikwu. Soo tooe haga tooe ka a nakana, a nakabetseana nasootuhikwu, ka pudusoo hemma manepetukwuna nu mu tuukwekwu.

Nu John mu-matoo tuboꞌo mu Te Pabeꞌe-matoo nananesootuhidu tooe hano tooe ka teepu Asia mee naneadu-koobatu. Nu meeoo mu nanesootuhikute umu Te Naa, Te Pabeꞌe-no yise soo Te Naa Besa Pooha mu sootuhise mu magwetzoikwu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe toge kaaheno ka Te Naa besa unnepu te tuukweꞌe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe unu te soobedyana ka suda tamme tumatugu-koobatoo nabatsapu, ooonneꞌyoona Te Pabeꞌe ka suda tamme tumatugupu tubetse nematzakwunipu. Yise Te Pabeꞌe ka tu yaꞌe-kwikoo namayodase ooosapa gwetzoinumme. Ka mu numu nanesootuhiku meeꞌe soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko tamme nananesootuhidu netamma. Tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe besa nakabetsea oosoo yise noꞌokosoo hemma ka teepu-koobatu te nehane katukwu. Gi hee ka Te Pabeꞌe ooonakwatu pooha-gaꞌyoo, oosoo besaꞌyoona gi mobegwa-gaꞌyoo.

Pudusoo soo Te Pabeꞌe koomeba-nagakwi kemmowgese yaa teepu-kooba petuookwu. Noꞌyoona numu ka Te Pabeꞌe poonnekwu. Noꞌyoona mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka yaa teepu-koobakwitu suda sokwammana, sagwikwu ka suda tu tutumatugupu putammesoo kodyuse.
Soo Te Naa meeoo, “Nu yow noꞌokosoo hemma-kobenatusoo, nu noꞌoko hemma eka teepu-koobatu nemadabuepu. Nu ooosapa oe manakwana gwetzoibu manepunnena.”

Nu mumme Te Pabeꞌe-witu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-matoo tuboꞌokwu. Nu punnoꞌo mu-kwaꞌnesoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo nanesootuhidu tooe tamme tu nekuseka, yise tamme tu nanetumooꞌoo sapa. Nu ka Te Naa unnepu Te Pabeꞌe-witu mu numu tunedyooena, ooonneꞌyoona nu yaa baa-kumana pagadudu Patmos mee naneadu-kooba nakwutuma.
Ka nanesootuhi tabeno nu ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhiwununa e ooonakwana nu nadyadooese,

meeoo natunetammakute, “Eka ume e tzapoonnekukwuna mu ta nananesootuhi nanumu tunesootabue ka mu nu-matoo nananesootuhidu ka Ephesus, Smyrna, Pergamos, Thyatira, Sardis, Philadelphia-no Laodicea-wi mamanepunnedu.”
“Hagaga e yadooedyakwe?” mee nu soonammena oo tamme nakwumunase, natakwatsukwuhoo (7) tutukootabuakunoo natzekoonookute nu poonne mu gagatzokwa-matu nidyakwe.

Umu naniwunudu naamookwi soo Te Pabeꞌe numu-waꞌne tabuana wunu, yaa tu tawetzogo noꞌoto oodutsekoo kwaseana, soo Te Pabeꞌe patakwetseaadu oakwadyadu-ma tu anga-koobakwi nakwunateꞌa, mu numu nanesootuhikudu moohedu-kwaꞌne ooosoo namadabue.
Besa toha tzopuhu-gana, soo unu oo tusopedakwadoona gi e-natu. Oo pooe goso-kwaꞌneꞌyoona numu-nagakwi tooe tuboohwaꞌe, gi hemma watzekute.
Oosoo oo kuku unu nadanatzooe tatabuana, weehepu nakooꞌatsawayaꞌneku-kwaꞌne. Oosoo besow ohobu tuapa-gana.
Tu tumadinakwa natakwatsukwuoo (7) paatoozooba hemmapunne. Soo oo koba unu besa kootabedooapunnena, numu kootuboseyikute. Ka yadooana oo tuapa naduya numu-nagakwi pooha tunemeꞌa.

Nu ka oo poonnese oo-koobanatoo anoase nanesootuhikooha. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise tu tumadinakwa nu-ma pooha matugu, mee yise e netamma, “Gi suipana. Nu e yaꞌe-kwikoo namayodapu, menoꞌo yise nu gwetzoibu manepunnena. Nu ka nayaꞌedu matzooekupu.
U sakwa noꞌoko u pooha nosepu, u natzapoonnekukwuna botugumea.

U sakwa ekahoo nakasopedakwadoo, mu natakwatsukwuꞌyoo (7) tugoo tabuagunoo nananesootuhidu manepunnedu, nu umu-naga. Mu natakwatsukwuoo (7) paatoozooba tumadina e hemmapunnena, mu nananesootuhidu manepunnena, nu noꞌoko mu manana-wipunne.
U sakwa ka menoꞌo ume e tunetammakuna botuguse ka Ephesus-witu, mu nananesootuhidu-matoo a taya,” meeꞌe yise soo Te Pabeꞌe. “Nu ooosapa mu nu-matoo nanesootuhidu manana-wina, umu-kooba tueyaꞌe.

Nu mu sopedakwatoo mu ooosapa e nakaꞌoedyukute tooe ka mu sutakoo numu mumme netumooꞌoo sapa. Mu ka gi hemma nasoomenakwana. Besa mu ka mumme nemooagadu-ma gi nakatzabena, tooe mumme mu nanaꞌunnekuna, ‘Numme yaahoo Te Pabeꞌe yadooawabe,’ mee mumme mu nemooaga sapa.
Yise menoꞌo nu mu tuukweꞌehookwu mu uga oꞌnosoo nanasoobedya, menoꞌo yise gi nanaheesoobedya.
Mu sakwa ka oꞌnosoo unu mu nanasoobedya soomayuna, menoꞌo yise punowsoo kodyuse, oꞌno nu yise mu dooamu-gakwu.
Besa mu ka mumme tooꞌe nemooagadu mu Nicolaitan mee nananeadu numu-ma gi nakatzaꞌe, nu punnoꞌo ka umuoo suda manena gi petzape.
Noꞌoko nananesootuhidu nu meeoo netamma, mu sakwa unu nanasoobedyapunne. Oꞌno saaꞌa mu ka Te Naa-baa ka besa-kwi petugase, nu ka ooosapa gi mobegwa-gakoo nanagwetzoidu mu sootuhikwu.
U sakwa ka menoꞌo ume e tunetammakukwuna botuguse ka saaꞌa mu nananesootuhidu Smyrna-matoo oo taya mee nu unnekwu.

‘Ka tubetse mooeꞌugasoo ka teepu gisoo e matabuena, nu ooosapa E Naa-no gwetzoinumme. Nu yise nuka tu batsase sapa, ka e yaꞌe-kwikoo namayoda. Menoꞌo yise nu gwetzoinummena gi mobegwa-gakwu. Nu noꞌoko sutakoo pooha matzooekute. Nu ka tutuha mu manepunnena sopedakwatoo mu ooonneꞌyoopana ooosapa e sooꞌoedyukute, oꞌno nu tubetse besakoo mu sootuhi. Mu gi totogeꞌyoo numu mu nekwohonedu, “Numme suuꞌmu Te Naa dooamu,” meeꞌe naneyugwepana umu ka gi togekoo tumayohokudu.

Pudusoo umuoo sutaꞌyoo numu suda mu neyugwekwu susumudu mu-matu yise nuutumedakwu. Gi haaꞌnotoo mu sutaꞌyoo numu mu netumooꞌoopunnese yise susumudu mu-matu sumuna nagoekwu nu-koobatoo. Ooonneꞌyoopana gi sakwa mu umu-ma suipana. Mu ka ooosapa e nakaꞌoedyukuna nu ka ooosapa nanagwetzoidu gi mobegwa-gakoo mu sootuhikwu ka Te Naa-baatoo.
Noꞌoko mumme numu nu-matoo nanesootuhidu nu mee netamma, mu ooosapa e nakaꞌoedyukunona, nu-matoo nanesootuhinona, nu gi mu matusookwuni-waꞌneꞌyoo, nu ooosapa mu-noꞌyookwu.
U sakwa ka menoꞌo ume e tunetammakukwuna botuguse ka saaꞌa mu nanesootuhidu Pergamos-matoo oo taya, mee nu unnekwu, e tuapa mu-nagakwi pooha tunemeakwu.

Nu ka sutakoo numu gi toge-tamme numu nedyakwedu-naga mu nonobe-gana sopedakwatoo. Pana mu gi umu-ma nakaꞌemukwana, nu-matoo ooosapa nanesootuhimoꞌo tooe ka sumuhoo umu-matu Antipas mee naneadu nu-koobatoo nabatsase sapa, mu ooosapa e nakabetsea sapa tooe.

Susumudu mu-nagatu ka gi togekoo numu-ma nakatzape. Umuoo numu nemooagadu Balaam-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Ka oꞌnosoo puu soo numu nemooagadu Balaam mee naneadu ka Balak numu nemooaga tuungu. Soo Balak yise meeoo pumme nanumu netamma, “Mu Te Naa besa dooamu nemooagana gi totogekoo-matoo mu nanesootuhi tuungu.”
Oosoo menoꞌo, susumudu mu-nagatu ka numu nemooaga ka Nicolaitan mee nananeadu-ma nakatzabena pumme mu neyugwe-too manakwe.
Maꞌno ka mumme nemooagadu-ma mu gi nakatzabepana, nu-tammesoo manese, oꞌno nu mu maꞌemukwapu tusoomuꞌwakwu. Oꞌno yise ka gi oo mu manakwe, soo suda mu manena mu-matoosoo kodyukwu.
Nu noꞌoko mu nananesootuhidu meeoo netammanoꞌo, mu ka ooosapa e nakaꞌoedyukuna, nu besakoo mu sootuhina atasoo mu mayugwekwu, oꞌno yise ooosapa mu-noꞌyookwu.’ “

Nu John ka Te Pabeꞌe tubokute meeoo nuka oo netamma, “U sakwa Thyatira-witoo mu nananesootuhidu-matoo e tubokuse, meeoo mu netamma, ‘Nu yaa Te Naa Besaa Tooaꞌa. Nu noꞌoko gi hemma poohwatzekupunne eka teepu-koobatu. Nu mu-koobenatu, nu ka mu nanesootuhidu-notu.
Nu mu sopedakwatoo mu o manepu, besa e nakaꞌoedyukuna, mu besa nanatummatzi, mu yise gi etzaga nasootooke. Menoꞌo yise mu unusoo nanabesasoo.
Pana sumuꞌyoo mogoꞌne
Huutooe nu ka mogoꞌne tooꞌe neta, pana soo mogoꞌne gi oo maꞌwu.
Oosoo gi toge oo tumatuguna oo-matoosoo kodyuse oo matuꞌoeyikwu.

Mu naneꞌemukwadu punnoꞌo ka gi mu maꞌemukwana nematzagakwunina, oosoo mu-matoosoo kodyuse mu goekwu. Menoꞌo yise mu nananesootuhidu, mu oo sopedakwadoo yise nu noꞌoko mu sokwamana gi watzekute. Soo suda mu manena mu-matoosoo kodyukwu.
Susumudu mu-matu ka mogoꞌne mumme nemooagadu-ma gi nakaꞌemukwadu tooe nanabesa oo unnewunu.
Ooosapa nanesootuhino e kodyu petu-noꞌoto tooe.’

Nu noꞌoko nu-matoo nananesootuhidu meeoo netamma, ‘Tooe haga tooe ka sutakoo matzooekuna ooosapa e nakabetseana ka hemma namamakwu-kwitoo tooe. Ka E Naa nuga tunetammaku-kwaꞌnesoo tamme ka sutakoo kadoo mayugwekwu, oꞌno tamme saaꞌa ewow nanakummaꞌakoosoo numu nehanegatukwu.’

U sakwa ka Sardis-witu mu numu nananesootuhidu-matoo e tubokuse meeoo mu netamma, ‘Nu yow Mu Pabeꞌe. Mu nuka nanetzakwiyaꞌedu nu mabetseꞌa. Nu noꞌoko mu manena gi watzekute. Mu numu meeoo mu nanatuukwe, “Mu numu Sardis-witu besa nananesootuhidu,” meeꞌe pana mu-naga-kwitu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu numu nemooagadu.

Mu ka nagutza mooeꞌugasoo ka e unnena nakase, unu besa tumayohogonno. Mu sakwa ka suda mu manena maꞌwuke besasoo nanesootuhi manegasoo ka oꞌnosoo mu mane-kwaꞌnesoo. Oꞌno soo suda mu tumatuguna gi mu-matoosoo kodyukwu.
Huuꞌyoosoo mu-nagatu besa tuꞌoedyukute gi suda manakwe, mu saaꞌa ka Te Naa-baa nu-no manepetugadooa.

Mumme noꞌoko nuga nanetzakwiyidu ka sutakoo gi nanatoohakuna, oꞌno mu ooosapa Te Naa-baaꞌyookwu. Nu ka Te Naa noko mu ooka toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo, “E nanumu,” meeꞌe mu natubangakakwu. Oꞌno soo Te Naa mu sootuhikwu ka Te Naa-baa ooosapa nanagwetzoidu gi moobegwa-gakoo.’

U sakwa ka mu Philadelphia-witu mu numu nananesootuhidu-matoo tuwazoo e tubokuse meeoo mu netamma, ‘Nu yow Mu Tubetse Pabeꞌe, mu nemadanagakwutu, ka mu Te Naa doodooamu manepunnekwutu, ka mu-matu gi ooka mapuꞌakwutu tuwow.

Nu yow Te Naa doodooamu mu mayugwekese, oꞌno saaꞌa soo Te Naa-nabatoosoo besakoo mu sootuhidooa. Nu mu sopedakwatoo tooe namadugedu numu pana, mu besa e nakaꞌoedyukuna besa e tumayohokute ka mumme e tunetammakute.

Mu Jew numu o mu-baa manepunnedu ka besa mu manakwe mu nesootuhidyi, “Numme suuꞌmu besa Ne Naa doodooamu, okowsoo tutzeapu,” tooꞌe umu meeoo mu nemooagapana ka puusoo ka sutakoo tumayohokuna meehoo unakwe. Nu saaꞌa ꞌyoo mu sootunagadooa umu saaꞌa mu-matusoo kemmase ka tu unnepu sootuꞌadyise oo nemakodyukudooa. Oꞌno saaꞌa umu ka mumme unu e kammakuna sopedakwadoona.
Nanasuda namanedu ka yow teepu-koobatu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu tokunakena mu ka besa nuka nakatumayohokuna, nu ooosapa mu sootuhinokwu, yise mu magwetzoi petugakwu.
Mu sakwa ooosapa nuka nakatumayohokuno ka pudusoo yaa teepu-koobasoo e kodyu petukwuse.’

Noꞌoko mu nu-matoo nananesootuhidu nu meeoo mu netamma, ‘Mu ka sutakoo gi namatzooekunona. Nu ooosapa Te Naa-tooha mu mayugwenokwu, oꞌno saaꞌa mu numme-noꞌyoodooa ooosapa, eka teepu besa pudu namapudutupudoose.’

U sakwa ka Laodicea-witu ka mu nananesootuhidu-matoo e tubokuse meeoo mu netamma, ‘Nu yow Mu Tubetse Pabeꞌe. Ooosapa toge kaahenokoo hemma mu tuukwedu. Nu noꞌoko hemma ka teepu-koobatu matabuepuna, noꞌoko hekwitu poohwaꞌe.
Nu noꞌoko mu-kwitu sopedakwatoo mu waha-tamme tusooyugwedu, mu sakwa nakwitu soohanese sumu-tammesoo tusooyugwe ka besa-tamme.

“Numme ka mooasoo besa manepunnena,” mee mu nasooyugwena, “Oo-mahoo nasoonatzina gi hemma soogwi,” meeꞌe mu sokwama. Ooonneꞌyoona mu gi ka Te Naa nanetzakwiyina. Ka nuga pooha manepunnena gi sooheesoobedyana mu muusoo nanemooꞌaka ka gi nuka nanetzakwiyina nu gi mu sootuhi-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Mu ka ooosapa nu-matoo nanesootuhinona nu mu nakasootuhise, yise mu nu-kwitu nakasopedakwadoose ka nuga besa podo nu-no kaaheno meadabenokwu.
Nu ka mu soobedyana mu nenanawina meeoo mu netamma. Ka gi toge mu mamanena sakwa mu maꞌwuse, nuga mumme tutunetammakuna tumayohoku.
Nu mu paꞌe mu-matu tooe haga tooe e nakaꞌoedyukudu mu ooosapa nu-noꞌyookwu nu-nosoo Te Naa besa podo meadabekwu.’

Noꞌoko mu numu nu-matoo nananesootuhidu nu meeoo netammakwu, ‘Tooe haga tooe nuka nanesootuhidu nuka nakaꞌoedyukunodu saaꞌa nu-no e nanumu nemadanagadooa. Nu punnoꞌo E Naa besa nakaꞌoedyuikupuna, ooonneꞌyoona nu saaꞌa noꞌoko numu nemadunagakwu.’ “
Mee tuwazoo nu pooha tuusoobedya. Soo Te Pabeꞌe besa e tookoope netamma, “Yaatoo kemmase ka saaꞌa hemma manepetukwuna nu u tzapoonnekwu.”
Nu pooha tsebooese soo Te Naa Besa Pooha ka koomeba tawagatoo e bihookase ka Te Naa-kobena numme pepetuga, o ka Te Naa numu nehanegatu-kwi.
Soo Te Naa unu besa pooha-gana o katu.

Soo Te Naa tubetse naduya numu poohawuma, ka pukwi ka natakwatsu-baatu (7) goso manepunnedu-kwiꞌyoona. Mu goso Te Naa Besa Pooha manepunnena, ka yaa te teepu-kooba oosoo natakwatsu-baa (7) numu nanesootuhibu manepunnena. Waha manoꞌyoona watsu matsebooekudu (24) toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo papabeꞌemu mu kwingatu-kwisoo toha namasoana manepunne, o umu Te Naa tutummatzidu a papabeꞌemu aataꞌa.
Soo pukooba mu manepunnena besa patsekoba-waꞌne patatzadyaꞌa. Soo mu a papabeꞌemu manepunnena noꞌoko ka Te Naa mu watsubatu Te Naa besa pupuaꞌamu, gi hemma puu watzekudu.
Sumuꞌyoo natzooebu, sumuꞌyoo punnoꞌo tutummatziba, sumuꞌyoo punnoꞌo soonammeba, sumuꞌyoo punnoꞌo yabesoo he-toogoo natunakabetseadu mamanepunnena.

Nanasusuꞌmu umu watsukweꞌyoo Te Naa besa pupuaꞌamu nanapaheoo (6) kakasa-gaꞌyoo umuoo watsukweꞌyoo nanasusuꞌmuꞌyoo Te Naa pooha manepunnena. Umuoo ooosapa ka Te Naa unu soonagapunnena oo nesookwugaꞌe.
Umu ka Te Naa nesookwugina,

umu waha mano watsumatsebooekudu (24) toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo papabeꞌemu punnoꞌo oo nepesana oo nesookwugaꞌe mee unnemoꞌo, “U tubetse nanasookwugaꞌe. Numme gi mama-waꞌneꞌyoo. U besaꞌyoo unu pooha-gana ka noꞌoko hemma besa umesoo tusooaꞌa-waꞌne matabuepu-gana. Besa deaꞌa ka noꞌoko numu ume nesookwugaꞌe.”
E tuusoobedya-kwi Te Naa tumadinakwa tu mi-wi hemma namaputooedu gwuukatu oo nanaꞌenakwa Te Naa tunetammagepu nabotugu natakwatsu-baa (7) nanasusuꞌmu nanamatzabekudu.

Nu yise tuwazoo sumuhoo poohabe manepunnena toha kasa-gakoo Te Naa tummatzidu poonne, oosoo pabatseꞌe mee unne, “Haga mu-matu eka namabutooedu mabusuke-waꞌne manepunne Te Naa tunemamakwupu ka natakwatsu-baa (7) nanasusu-ma nanasukwesoo nanamatzabekudu?”
Gi haga tooe hanotu tooe namabutooedu mabusuke meana a nea-waꞌneꞌyoo ka gi pooha-gana.
Nu ka oe nabodu e poonnekwuna soogwetakuse, gi haga ooka tu mabusukekwuna mapuꞌapunne, nu yise suda soonammese yagakooha.
Sumuꞌyoo mu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo papabeꞌemu meeoo e netamma, “Gi yagapana. Yahoo Te Pabeꞌe, David manakwana numu suakepu suuꞌmu soo Te Pabeꞌe ka ooka oo mabusukekwuna oo sootuhipuna.”
E tuusoobedya-kwikoo nu ka Te Pabeꞌe poonne ka Te Naa pukwi manepunnena koobenakoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe o ka tamme-koobatoo nabatsapuna ka yotsepu-gana. Soo Te Pabeꞌe naduyadu pooha-gana unu soonammepunne.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka tu mi-wi ka namabutooedu ka Te Naa tunetammakwupu gwuuhu. Mu watsukwuꞌyoo Te Naa besa pupuaꞌamu, umu waha mano watsumatsebooekudu (24) toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo a papabeꞌemu ka Te Pabeꞌe-kobena meatzedo petuse, oo-matoo nanesootuhigonno. Noꞌyoona umu nanasusumuoo oa tupe namadabuena kwekwedadu tseda yoongedana, ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu nanesootuhina oekoo.
Mu meeoo tunekwuhu, “U Ne Pabeꞌe unu nanasookwugaꞌe. U suuꞌmu ka Te Naa tunetammakwepu mabusuke-waꞌne manepunne, numu-koobatoo nabatsapu ka oo numu magwetzoipu-gana.
Noꞌobatusoo numu ume tumagwetzoipu, u ka Te Naa tutummatzidu mayugwepu, umu yise Te Naa-witu numu tunedyooedu ka teepu-koobaꞌyoona.”
Nu oetusoo poonnese tubetse ewow gi nadatsungapu mu toha kakasa-gakoo poonne, numu pookwumehoepu, mu nanaꞌooonakwisoo manepunne.

Umu yise mee naꞌunnedu hoobea papaba nekwugonno tunetzabigonno. “Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu numu-koobatoo nabatsase mu magwetzoi, Te Pabeꞌe besaꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe poohabe sootuhipu, noꞌoko tu sopedakwadoo-baa manepunnena, ka gi hemma wumehoena naduyana, noꞌokosoo hemma manepunnena, noꞌoko hemma ooonakwa unu nanasookwugaꞌe, Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko ekow nasootuhipu.”

Noꞌyoona hee ka Te Naa manumudoopu punnoꞌo mee unnegonno, “Te Pabeꞌe ka mu numu-koobatoo nabatsase menoꞌo gwetzoidu noꞌoko hemma ooonakwa unu nanasookwugaꞌe, mu suuꞌmu tamme-kooba namayugwe, naduya noꞌokosoo hemma mamanepunnena ekow noꞌoko nasootuhipu gi mobegwa-ga.”
Mu watsukwuꞌyoo (4) Te Naa besa pupuaꞌamu punnoꞌo meeoo mu tunemootzadyakupu mu ewa (24) toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo a papabeꞌemu punnoꞌo meatzedose, ka Te Naa Te Pabeꞌe nepesaꞌyookute.

Ka e tuusoobedya-wi soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsapu, ka Te Naa tunemamakwupu gwuuse ka nagutza mooeꞌugasoo a namatzabekuna tzatoꞌase, ka a mooe naꞌunnena mabusuke. Mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka yaa teepu-koobatu maꞌemukwana umu-matoosoo kodyukooha, ka oo mooe namabusukese. Sumuꞌyoo mu watsu-matu mu Te Naa besa pupuaꞌamu-matu pabatse pooha tunekemmaku.
Oꞌno yise nu-kobena tabuapetu soo nana aabu-gaꞌyoo, waaꞌadu noko pongosa hemmadu. Oo mu ewa gi totogekoo matzooekuhookwudu.
Ka nagutza mooeꞌuga-nakwatu a namatzabekuna tzatoꞌase ka penakwa naꞌunnedu soo Te Pabeꞌe tuwazoo mabusuke. Sumuꞌyoo mu watsu-matu mu Te Naa besa pupuaꞌamu-matu punnoꞌo tunekemmaku.
Sumuꞌyoo yise nana atsakwadyadu pookoo-kooba katudu nu-kobena tabuahoobetu, osoo oogow pooha punnoꞌo. Esoo punnoꞌo tsegesa kwuꞌu, oꞌno mu numu yaa teepu-kooba nanagoekooha.

Ka pahe-kwitu soo Te Pabeꞌe namatzabekudu tzatoꞌase punnoꞌo ooka oo mabusukese, mu watsu-matu mu Te Naa besa pupuaꞌamu-matu punnoꞌo tunekemmaku. Sumuꞌyoo nana too pookoo-gaꞌyoo tukapu pukoobakoo natzakwuekuna tu mi-wi tzadyakwedu e-kobena tabuahoopetu.
Ka teepu-kooba petuse, ka teepu-koobatu nadukadu natuukekwuna wahadu, oꞌno mu numu tsagoekwu, a yoohoo noko atsa baa gi natuukekwuna.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise tuwow watsu a namatzabekuna tzatoꞌasoo yise oo mabusukesoo, oꞌno yise mu watsu Te Naa besa pupuaꞌamu-matu pooha tunekemmaku.

Sumuꞌyoo nana aakwadyatu pookoo-gaꞌyoo e-kobena tabuapetu. Osoo yaꞌebu manepunnena, sumuꞌyoo tuwazoo tzageꞌe oo ooonakwa tabuapetu, oo-notusoo, oꞌno mu numu-naga-kwitu-matu ka teepu-koobatu tuikooha. Umu tooe how tooe a tui tatabuana, susumudu punnoꞌo a nanagoena, susumudu tuoebu-ma a tuina, susumudu a tseatuina, yise tuwow susumudu nunuꞌu tugoena.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise tuwazoo ka manege-kwitu namatzabekudu tzatoꞌa ka ookow oo mabusukesoo, Te Pabeꞌe tummatzidu-koobatoo nagoena mu moogooa mooasoo Te Naa-baa manepetuga.

Umu yise ka Te Naa-matoo unu nanesootuhikooha mee unnegonno, “U, Ne Naa nanasookwugaꞌe. U ooosapa togetu. Wunaꞌme manekapu, umu sutaꞌyoo numu numme ume nanesootuhi doodooamu goetabena tooe. Hannanoꞌo umu ne goedu soo suda mu tumatuguna umu-matoosoo kodyukwu?”

Mu nagoepu moogooa nanasusumuꞌyoona besa nasootuhina. Soo Te Naa yise mee mu netamma, “Mu sakwa tuutooepunne. Tooesoo mu e dooamu nagoe penaꞌe. Oꞌno yise mu tugoepu suda tumatuguna umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise tuwazoo ka naapahe-kwitu namatzabekudu tzatoꞌasoo ka ookow oo mabusukesoo, esoo teepu-koobatu wudyusengakooha gi besa namanakwe soo teepu atasoo mani.
Mu susutaꞌyoo numu yise suda sokwamana nasootooke, teepu tawaga-kwi watse ka Te Naa noko Te Pabeꞌe-ma suipunnena.
Umu ka tubetse suda tu namanakwe tooꞌe watsepana gi hownnekoo namatzatsebooe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Umu ka tu matuadyina pumatoosoo kodyu, umu gi hownnekoo how mane-waꞌneꞌyoo, ka Te Naa gi toge soobedyase.

Yise e pooha tuusoobedya-kwi mu watsukweꞌyoo toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo Te Naa tutummatzidu, ka teepu-kooba ka watsubatu pedyoomaba punowsoo tsipunne. Oꞌno soo pedyoomaba gi ka teepu-koobatu noko ka baa-witu suda yugwekwu.

Toge ka umu watsukweoo Te Naa tummatzidu toha kakasa-gakoo ka pedyoomaba mu tzamaꞌwuhookwuse, kummaꞌyoosoo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo Te Naa tummatzidu taba tsebooe-nakwana teepu-koobaꞌyoona tsebooegena, umu-baa manipetu ka tu tukoopona tu gwuu-ma numu puma oo tsepokwuna. Oosoo meehoo unakwe,
“Ka Te Naa nuka nemanekuna, ka mu Te Naa doodooamu pumakoo nasoobedakwadookwuna, nu gisoo mamakwu.”
Ka saaꞌa Te Naa pumme nemanekuna mamakwu, (144,000) mu Jew numu pooha nakoopoꞌokwu, ewaꞌyoo (12,000) noꞌobatusoo

E tuusoobedya-kwi tubetse ewaꞌyoo noꞌobatusoo numu ka teepu-koobatu gi nadatsunga-waꞌneꞌyoo, ka Te Naa noko Te Pabeꞌe kwiyaꞌa mu naꞌooonakwi, ka mooasoo mu naꞌooonakwi mu manepunne sapa mu naꞌooonakwisoo konnopunne. Umuoo gi tototsaba-gaꞌyoo besa sokwamadu.

Umu eka besa nakaꞌoedyukudu, kaaheno Te Naa-ma sokwama tabuapu, ooosapa umu hoobeadookemma mee unnena, “U, Ne Naa ka Ne Pabeꞌe-no tumagwetzoibu manepunnena. Esoo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsapu soo Te Naa tunemadabuepu.”
Noꞌyoona mu Te Naa tummatzidu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo mu papabeꞌemu-no ka Te Naa naꞌooonakwi konnopunnedu ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhikooha.

Mee unnegonno, “U, Ne Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo. U nokosoo hemma sopedakwatoona gi hee u-makoo nawatzetugu-waꞌneꞌyoo, unu naduyadu pooha-gaꞌyoo, numu magwetzoidu. Numme ooosapa u nesookwugaꞌe. U, Ne Naa tubetse nanasookwugi pooha-gaꞌyoo.”
Sumuꞌyoo mu toha kakasakoo papabeꞌe-matu meeoo e tubenga, “Hee numu umu, u haaꞌa mu sopedakwatoo? Hanotu kemmana?”

Nu mee oo nanekwegea, “Nu gi mu sopedakwatoo. U sakwa yise nuka tuukwe.” Oosoo yise meeoo e tuukwe, “Umuoo numu ooosapa Te Naa-matoo nananesootuhi tooe Te Pabeꞌe-koobatu nakusedyipana ooonneꞌyoona umu namagwetzoipu.
Menoꞌo manakwana umu ooosapa Te Naa-baaꞌyoona, ooosapa oo-matoo nanesootuhinokwu, soo Te Naa yise tu pooha-ma mu tzatoboyakwu, nadooha mu mayugwepunnekwu.
Umu gi tzuagoena, puugoꞌe-waꞌneꞌyoo ka oꞌnosoo mu manepu-waꞌne ka besa-kwiꞌyoona, gi umu udututu-baa wuma-kwaꞌne ka oꞌnosoo tu namanatzayapu-waꞌne.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu mabetseana mu sootuhikwu oosoo ka umu soobedyana mu-koobatoo nabatsapuna, menoꞌo manakwana oosoo ooosapa besa mu masokwamana mu sootuhikwu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe natakwatsu-kwitu (7) namatzabekudu tzatoꞌase punnoꞌo ooka oo mabusukese Te Naa-baatu yise gi haaꞌnotoo gi natunemayupunne.
Oꞌno soo natakwatsukwuꞌyoo (7) toha kakasa-gakoo papabeꞌemu, ka Te Naa tutummatziwabe nanasusumuhoo tumooyagakunoo heme.

Sumuꞌyoo kummaꞌyoosoo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo, mu Te Naa tummatzidu-matu Te Naa-kobena wunuhoo petu, ka oa tupe-ma namadabuena tseda yongana. Noꞌyoona Te Naa-matoo nananesootuhipu yadooaba nanemamakwuna mooasoo nakwedapu ka tseda-wi.
Esoo tseda-witu soo nananesootuhipe ka besa kookwanadu-no namayuapunnena ka Te Naa-tamme kookwanapunne.

Soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo yise ka tseda tukwuna ka goso-matu oe yongase paꞌanakwana ka teepu-koobatoo oo wukwatehoo. Ka oo manise oꞌno yise nunuadu, tukwukwutseba, soo teepu unu yutsungawunu, oꞌno mu numu yaa teepu-koobatu ka suda tu tumatuguna putammesoo kodyukwuna sopedakwadookwu.
Mu natakwatsukwuꞌyoo (7) toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo natakwatsukwuꞌyoo (7) tumooyagakukwudu nuummabetsabepunne ka nanapenakwa nanasumuꞌu tumooyagakukwuse.

Soo mooenakwasoo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo mooe tumooyagakuse. Hakwopa, goso, puupe-no namayuadu ka teepu-kooba mani petu. Tooꞌe naamookwitu noꞌobatusoo sunngabe nihoo, yise noꞌobatusoo pooe tumasuape punnoꞌo.
Soo penakwatu toha kasa-gaꞌyoo punnoꞌo tumooyagaku. Tubetse goso pabatsekoo ka tubetse baa-witoo paꞌanakwana wueoo. Tooꞌe naamookwitu soo tubetse baa puupe mani.
Tooꞌe naamookwitu mu pakwe ka tubetse baa-witu tuihoo. Tooꞌe naamookwitu punnoꞌo mu sake baa-koobatu kadooꞌoo namaꞌe.

Soo penakwatu pahe nadatsungadu toha kasa-gaꞌyoo yise punnoꞌo tumooyagaku. Soo pabaꞌyoo paatoozooba pooedabedooa tutsepokwuegaꞌa ka teepu-koobatu. A tooꞌe naamookwitu ka mu baa hooodu yise a batsebooewunu suda kammakooha. Suda manise ewaꞌyoo numu oo hebese tuigonno.
Soo watsu nadatsunga toha kasa-gaꞌyoo punnoꞌo tumooyagaku. Soo taba, ka muha-no ka mu paatoozooba togawiyaꞌnehoo yise mu tooꞌe naamookwitu suuꞌmu kootabuapunne.

Nu yise oetu poonnese sumuꞌyoosoo kweꞌnaꞌa ne paꞌanakwi oo yotsenummena ne tuya tuukwenummena mee unnenumme, “Suda namanekwu, tubetse suda namanekwu. Tubetse suda namanekwu noꞌoko mu numu ka teepu-koobatu gwetzoipunnedu ka umu pihoo toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo nabenidu ka tu tumooyagakuno mu mooyagakuhoose.”

Soo manege nadatsunga toha kasa-gaꞌyoo yise tumooyagaku. E nose-kwi soo sutaꞌyoo suda tumatugupu yaa teepu-koobatoo wuehoo. Oosoo sutaꞌyoo napoohamakahoo ka mu tsoapa pukwi nakwutumana natzakwonaꞌa natzakwona tuunguna.
Ka ookow o tzakwonowse, oetu kweedakooha. Soo kweedadu ka teepu paꞌanakwi manise ka taba habakakuoo.
Mu hoadada-waꞌneꞌyoo ka teepu-kooba mani. Umu unu tubekwudyungadu.
Umu hoadada meeoo nanetamma gi ka pooe-gakoo ka teepu-koobatu, tooetoo mu sunngabe, ka tooe hemma tooe naadu ka teepu-koobatu matzamapana. Mu gi Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukudu numu suuꞌmu manayaha.
Manege muha mu pekwudyana pana gi mu batsapana mee nanetamma. Mu tupekuepu unu nananuumadu.
Mu numu tooꞌe sootui, pana gi tui-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Mu hoadada tu ewa-ma nananakwisoo kemmadu-kwaꞌne tabuadape. Ka mu kwo-kooba oa tupe namadabuena tzotua-kwaꞌne tatabua yise too numu koba-gaꞌyoo.
Umu momokoꞌne-waꞌne tsotsotabuꞌa. Umu unu gunatzooena.
Umu tuwazoo unu ohobudu nungabu-gaꞌyoo. Mu kasa ewow hemma medabedu-kwaꞌne kangagonno ka mu yotsumoꞌo.
Soo mu moohedu sutaꞌyoo mu tsotsoapa pabeꞌe, Gadooꞌoo Hemma Mayugwedu, mee naneadu.
Paheꞌyoo suda namanedu numu-tamme kemma. Mooeꞌugasoo mu hoadada hemma oo yugwe. Wahaꞌyoo yise penaꞌe.

Soo Te Naa ka mu naapahe nadatsungadu toha kakasa-gakoo tumooyagakunoo gwuudu meeoo netamma, “Ka umu watsukwuꞌyoo (4) sutakoo tsoapa ka paba hooodu, Euphrates mee naneadu-kumaba natzakunetadu tzadopeta.”
Umuoo tsotsoapa wunaꞌme tuutooꞌe oꞌno umu yise tooꞌe now mookwitu mu numu-matu goekwu.
Umu ewow (200,000,000) tsotsoapa tutummatziwabe-gaꞌyoo.

Umu boobookoo-gaꞌyoo umu tsotsoapa unu ohobudu weehepu nanungabudoona, soo weehepu pukwi mu kwakwasea atsakwadyana, boohekwadyana, oakwadyana. Mu pookoo wo nunuꞌu-kwaꞌne tatabuana, nidu kweedadu-no mu tupa-wiꞌyoona tsebooewunu, tooꞌe naamookwitu mu numu ka teepu-koobatu goehoo.
Mu pookoo kwase ka togogwa-waꞌne yise numu tokuꞌe.
Ooonneꞌyoopana mu numu penidu ka sutakoo tu nanesootuhina gi maꞌwu.
Mu penidu numu tubatsana, tutuhana, numu tupoohana gi maꞌwu.

Yise ka e tuusoobedya-kwi nu kummaꞌakoosoo unu naduya pooha-gaꞌyoo toha kasa-gakoo poonne paꞌanakwana koomeba-nagaꞌyoo oo wuegena. Peagutukwunupunne-waꞌne oo tzotua manepunne. Oo koba ka taba-waꞌne patakwetseaapunne. Oo kowpa goso-makoo namadabuedu-kwaꞌne tabuana.
Tuutsekoo tubope nadoputooena, oo naꞌenakwa puma natubodu, mooasoo natzakwonadu tu mi-wi gwuuna. Tumadinakwatu oo kuku ka tubetse baa-kooba, soo oenakwatu punnoꞌo ka teepu-kooba tatugupunne.
Paba pooha tunetzabi ka mu natakwatsukwuꞌyoo (7) oo nanekwekadu, punnoꞌo tunetzabi.
Toge ka mu natakwatsukwuoo (7) nunuadu unawena e botugukwuse soo Te Pabeꞌe paꞌanakwana e netahoo, “Gi ka natakwatsukwuoo (7) nunuabu unnewunudu bopana, esoo togesoo nawatsetugupunnedu.”
Soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo tumadinakwatu tu mi toogoopatoo mayodapunne.

Mee unnekooha, “Te Naa e taya ka kaahenotu mumme e tuukwe tuunguna. Oosoo gi wunaꞌmesoo tuutooe-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa ooosapa gwetzoinummedu gi mobekwa-gaꞌyoo. Oosoo ka tamme-koobakwitu noꞌoko hemma matabuepu ka teepu noꞌoko hemma ma-koobakwitu, yise ka tubetse baa-wi gwetzoidu noꞌoko hemma oetu tuwazoo.
Ka natakwatsu (7) nadatzengudu toha kasa-gaꞌyoo tumooyagakukoohase, soo Te Naa ka tu watze tunetammana mamakwuhookwu ka tu yadooawabe tu tuukwepu-waꞌnesoo.”
Nu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe naka paꞌanakwana mee nuka oo netammase, “Meahoose ka namabutooetu tubope ka toha kasa-gakoo mi-wikoo oo gwuuhootooa.”
Nu yise ka toha kasa-gakoo-matoo meahoose ka tuutse namabutooetu tubope oo natuungu. Oosoo mee e netamma, “A gwuuse a tuka. Masoo besa kamma nota peha-waꞌne, pana masoo ka saaꞌa u seenuumakukwu.”
Nu yise ka toha kasa-gakoo unne-kwaꞌnesoo mani.
Oosoo yise mee e netamma, “U sakwa ka Te Naa unnepu noꞌobatusoo numu mu moohedu nokosoo pooha tuukwe.”
Ka hooope Te Naa e geahoose mee e netamma, “Meahoose hooope-ma ka Te Naa pukwiyoona mu nanesootuhi nobe managahoo ka umu e dooamu oeꞌyoona nanesootuhidu saaꞌa datsungahooke.
Pana gi ka puuwanatu oo nanaꞌoonnakwitu managapana oosoo ka mu gi Jew numu pukwitu nehanena. Umu gi Jew numu ka Te Naa gi heesoobedya, gi besa tumatuguna ka mu wakwawaꞌa-toohakwi manemokwu.
Nu waahoo e yadooawabe poohamakakwu. Umu wahaꞌyoo saaꞌa ewa (126O) tabeba-wi mu numu ka e unnepu tuukwemodooa, oꞌno yise mu suda sokwamakwu.

Soo tooe haga tooe ka gi mu nakabetsabedu ka mu sootumooꞌoodu gi hownnekoo mu manayaha-waꞌneꞌyoo.” Umu wahaꞌyoo Te Naa yadooawabe ka Te Naa Besa Pooha punagakoo mu pooha yadooana umu wohonepu puusoo ka suda mu tumatuguna mu-matoosoo makodyukute.

Umu wahaꞌyoo yadooawabe ka pooha-gana ka powmadu mesoo nedyooikudu. Ka baa puupe-kwitoo tu matabuena pooha-gaꞌyoo tuwazoo. Mu Te Naa yadooawabe ookow pooha-gaꞌyoo eka numu suda mu namanatzayapu mu pooha tzapoonnekute, ooonneꞌyoona eka numu suda tumaꞌemukwana umu-matusoo mesoo makodyu.
Umu Te Naa nayadooawabe ka saaꞌa numu ka Te Naa unnena tuukwemakwuse soo sutaꞌyoo nunuꞌu mu Te Naa nayadooawabe goepu.
Mu tookoo gi nakookwu pana ka Jerusalem mee naneadu-kwi namawukwu, po-wi
Paheꞌyoo yise oo naamookwitu tabeno noꞌobatusoo numu yaa teepu-koobatu mu tookoo sookwugikwu ka gi umu mu nakooꞌoo tuungu.

Noꞌyoona mu numu yaa teepu-koobatu besa sokwama ka eka Te Naa nanayadooawabe nagoese. Umu ka besa tu sokwamana tzapoonnena nanahoesoo nanahemaka. Noꞌyoona soo suda namanedu ka mu Te Naa waahoo nayadooawabe tumayugwena kadooꞌoo maneka mee umu sokwama.
Ka pahe yise oo naamookwitu tabeno manekase soo Te Naa songapu ka umu waahoo Te Naa yadooawabe-kwitoo nasongahase, umu yise yotsuhoo noꞌyoona numu oo poonnese suihoo.

Umu wahaꞌyoo Te Naa yadooawabe ka Te Pabeꞌe naka ka pabatse paꞌanakwana mee oo unnese, “Mu sakwa nu-matoo yaa-too kekemmow.” Umu wahaꞌyoo yise koomeba-naga toogoopatoo kuowka mu wohonedu mu sookwugipunne.
Oꞌno soo teepu yutsungakooha soo Jerusalem-matu kadooꞌoo namaꞌe yise ewaꞌyoo numu tuihoo. Mu numu nabenihoodu unutse suihoose mee unnegonno, “Soo Te Naa pooha naduya.”
Mooasoo mu numu soo wahatooe suda namanedu poonneke, yise sumuꞌyoo umu-tammesoo kemmowgenasoo.

Soo natakwatsu (7) a nadatsunga-kwitu toha kasa-gaꞌyoo ka tu tumooyagakunoo mooyagaku. Ewaꞌyoo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo besa sokwamana tunegwuukooha, “Soo sutaꞌyoo menoꞌo manakwana gi hownnekoo numu matzoeku-waꞌne mani. Yaa manakwana soo Te Naa numu nemadunagakwu, gi mobegwa-gakwu.”
Noꞌyoona umu te nanesootuhi papabeꞌemu ka Te Naa-kobena meatzedose ka Te Naa nesookwugaꞌe
mee unnegonno, “U, Ne Naa unu pooha-gaꞌyoo, Ne Naa unu pooha-gaꞌyoo, kadoo ume kumitusoo. U noꞌoko hemma matzooekupu.

Noꞌobatusoo gi u-matoo nanesootuhidu numu uga u soosawikute. Menoꞌo yise umuoo numu tumaꞌemukwana umu-matoosoo kodyukwu, mu tuipu numu tuwazoo ooosoo. Menoꞌo u yise ka umu ume nakabetseadu ka mu numu besa u unnepu tuukwedu, u-matoo nanesootuhidu sootuhikwu. U ka mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu numu ka teepu kadoo mayugwedu punnoꞌo kadoo mayugwekwu.”

Soo Te Naa yoo mani ka tu tunetammakupu-wi petugase ka tu yadooapu tamme-tamme sootuhise, umu yise ookahoo oowekoo sopedakwatoo. Oꞌno yise nunuana tukwukwutsekooha soo teepu unu yutsungakoohase yise papabatsema hakwotukwakooha. Yaahoo esoo Te Naa pooha manepunne.
Nu yise ka e tuusobedya-kwi ka mogoꞌne poonne. Soo mogoꞌne ka mu Jew numu manepunnena wahadu. Soo Te Naa pooha ka mogoꞌne noꞌotu atsa tukwunupunne. O tookwa soo mu numu pabeꞌe pea.
Oosoo mogoꞌne koheꞌadu, paba nanepaga ka tooaꞌadoohookwuse.

Nu yise ka e tuusobedya-kwi pabatsekoo atsa togogwa-waꞌne tabuadu poonne. O oosoo panetogogwa numu goekwudu. Natakwatsukwuoo (7) wo-gana noꞌyoona suta-kwi pooha tsotsowupaka yise sumumanoꞌokoo (10) aa-gaꞌyoo.

Tu kwase-ma tooꞌe naamookwitu ka mu paatoozooba tubongo ka teepu-koobatoo wusawekuwunu. Soo panetogogwa ka mogoꞌne tooaꞌadoodu-kobena wunuhoo, oꞌno oosoo ka oongaꞌa oo nadooaꞌadoohoose oo totzobahookwu mee soonammena.
Esoo naatse Te Pabeꞌe manekwudu. Gi haga Te Pabeꞌe pooha matzooeku-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo panetogogwa gi how oo maꞌe. Esoo naatse Te Naa-baatoo natzagwuuga, obeꞌyoona oosoo saaꞌa numu-koobatoo manedooa.
Soo mogoꞌne oo namatzatseboogese oo-na tubetse hekwana manepetuga, soo Te Naa mooasoo oo-toogoo tumabetsape ka pahe tomoba naamookwitu oo mabetseakwuse.
Te Naa manepunne-kwitu nananepetugudu. Mu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo ka mu moohedu Michael mee naneadu-no panetogogwa nananepetukute Te Naa manepunne-kwitu.
Soo panetogogwa, mu tsotsoapa pupuaꞌamu-no nanematzooekuse, yise ka Te Naa-bakoo gi nanepetzape.
Soo sutaꞌyoo panetogogwa unu pabaꞌyoo ka pudu oe manakwana numu suda mayugwedu, numu nemooagadu ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona ka teepu-koobatoo natayakwuni. Noꞌoko umu pumme tupuaꞌadu punnoꞌo.

Umu yise Te Naa-batu oo pooha nesookwugaꞌe mee unnemoꞌo, “Menoꞌo soo Te Naa tamme magwetzoina namamakwupetu. Soo Te Naa yise ka sutakoo netayakwuni. Menoꞌo soo Te Pabeꞌe ka sutakoo panetogogwa ooonakwa pooha-gaꞌyoo. Soo sutaꞌyoo panetogogwa uga ka Te Naa-kobena wunuyina mu nanesootuhikuna suda nanemadabueyakwe. Ka oo oo manakwe soo Te Naa nabakoo oo tayakwunipu.

Umu Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukudu-koobatu nabatsa ooonneꞌyoona ka sutakoo matzooekukwu umu ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukuna. Oꞌno yise mu mee ka mu numu tunesootabuemona, soo Te Pabeꞌe yise te magwetzoikwu umu ka tunakabetseanona tooe pumme tu goꞌese sapa.

Yaa manakwana noꞌyoona umu Te Naa-batu besa sokwamakwu. Pana mu numu teepu-koobakwitu suda namatuusoobedyakwu ka sutakoo yaa teepu-kooba mani petuse.” Soo sutaꞌyoo panetogogwa unu sutaꞌa ka pudusoo oosoo tu tubetse nakwutumakwuse sopedakwatoona.
Soo sutaꞌyoo panetogogwa ka teepu-koobatoo nuwatzeoose, ka mogoꞌne sookusega.
Soo mogoꞌne ka Te Naa-toohatu ooonneꞌyoona soo sutaꞌyoo gi oo nemooaga-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Soo sutaꞌyoo panetogogwa nanasuda ka mogoꞌne sootunagagena, ooonneꞌyoopana ka mogoꞌne gi mapuꞌa. Soo Te Naa ooosapa ka mogoꞌne tummatzina besa oo sootuhaꞌe oo-kooba tuꞌeyaꞌe.
Soo sutaꞌyoo yise ka Te Naa Besaa Tooa gi mapuꞌahoose mu wakwawaꞌa-ma maniga. Ka mu wakwawaꞌa nananesootuhi manegase sutaꞌyoo panetogogwa gi mu mapuꞌa.

Soo sutaꞌyoo panetogogwa yise ka tubetse baa-kumaba wunupetuga. Yise ka e pooha tuusoobedya-kwi nunuꞌu ka tubetse baa-wiꞌyoona tsebooeke. Sumu mano (10) aa-gana pooha tsotsotuꞌaꞌyaa noꞌoko tu aa-ma. Natakwatsukwuꞌyoo (7) wo-gana noꞌoko mu tu kwo-ma natubotuguna, “Mu sakwa nu-matoo nanesootuhi.”

Soo nunuꞌu e poonnena toohooꞌoo-waꞌne tabuꞌa, pana soo oo kuku ka oo tupa-no, wudaꞌa-waꞌne tabua. Soo sutaꞌyoo panetogogwa ka nunuꞌu sutakoo tu pooha geahoo, oosoo yise sutakoo moohedu oo mayugwese oosoo tunetammadu mane.

Sumuꞌyoo ka nunuꞌu wo-matu pabatsekoo tutzaga-gaꞌyoo, segesa-ma tooꞌe nabatsahoo. Pana soo oo natsegeana besa mani. Noꞌobatusoo mu numu gi Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyudu ka teepu-koobatu oo sookwugaꞌe ka yabesoo besa oo manise, yise oo nakaꞌoedyuku mane.
Mu numu yise ka sutakoo panetogogwa-matoo nanesootuhi oosoo ka nunuꞌu sutakoo pooha-makase. Ka nunuꞌu-matoo tuwazoo nanesootuhina mee unakwe, “Yowsoo nunuꞌu, gi haga a matzooeku-waꞌneꞌyoo.”

Soo sutaꞌyoo panetogogwa ka nunuꞌu nenoyukwe ka Te Naa suda oo netamma tuunguna yise paba naneyugwe, ka umu tamme-kooba ooweoo gwetzoimodu tuwazoo. Ka sutakoo tu pooha oo gea ka pahe yise oo naamookwitu tomoba-witoo oo wumeakuwunukwutu. Oosoo nunuꞌu yise paba kusaꞌa ka Te Naa suda netammakwu mee soonammena ka Te Naa-witu esayiyina.
Oosoo napooha-maka ka umu Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukudu newohonekwuse, oosoo noꞌobatusoo numu moohedu manekwu tooe hanotu tooe ka yaa teepu-koobatu.
Mu gi Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu saaꞌa ka nunuꞌu-matoo nanesootuhikwu.
Mu sakwa e unnena nakapunne,
soo nunuꞌu susumudu Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu-matu wutumakwu, yise susumudu-matu goekwu. Gi tooe hownnekoo tooe namatzatsebooa-waꞌneꞌyoo. Gi suipana. Tamme sakwa ooosapa ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuno.

Kummaꞌyoosoo nunuꞌu yadooawabe, numu nemooagakwudu ka teepu-wiꞌyoona tsebooegena nu oo poonne. Waahoo aa-gaꞌyoo ka seepu dooa-waꞌne. Ka sutakoo panetogogwa-waꞌne yadooakanga. Noꞌoko mu numu yaa teepu-koobatu ka nunuꞌu tutzaga-gaꞌyoo, besa-matoo mu nanesootuhi tuungu.
Soo nunuꞌu ka tu yadooawabe ka numu nemooagadu noꞌoko tu pooha haneku.

Soo numu nemooagadu nunuꞌu yadooawabe nanabesa tumadaꞌe ka nunuꞌu-kobenaꞌyoona. Ka goso nekemmaku ka mu numu pumme poonnepunne. Ooonnekoo soo nunuꞌu yadooawabe ka yaa teepu-koobatu mu numu nemooaga. Soo numu nemooagadu ka mu numu, hemma ka nunuꞌu-kwaꞌne tabuadu matabue tuungu.
Soo nunuꞌu yadooawabe ka tu pooha-toohakwi ka hemma nunuꞌu-kwaꞌne tabuadu namadabuedu mesoo yadooꞌe ka mu numu gi pumatoo nanesootuhidu oo goe tuungu.
Soo nunuꞌu tu yadooawabe meeoo, “Mu numu noꞌobatusoo sakwa nagopo ka tu mi-ma tooetoo tu aa-ma.
Soo tooe haga tooe ka nunuꞌu nanea-ma gi nakopodu gi hemma-ma tumuna gi hemma tumukwu.”
Tamme sumuna ka nunuꞌu sopedakwatoo. Oosoo nana oo naneana ka natzetatsungana 666 manakwe.
Yise ka e pooha tuusoobedya-kwi soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa giba-kooba wunu nu oo poonne. Ewaꞌyoo (144,000) numu oo manepunne onona nagopoꞌo, Te Naa tunetammapu.
Umu tunekwuna, nanakatsebooepunne.
Umu ka Te Naa pudu hoobea watsukweoo umu Te Naa besa pupuaꞌamu mu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo papabeꞌemu-kobenaꞌyoona tuwazoo nekwuhu. Umu numu namagwetzoidu suuꞌmu ka hoobea sopedakwadoo.
Umuoo namagwetzoidu o manepunne ka ooosapa Te Pabeꞌe oedyukumodu gi tototzaba-gaꞌyoo gi hannanoꞌo ka nunuꞌu-matoo nanesootuhidu. Umu yise Te Naa-baa soo Te Naa yise ka gwetzoibu mu sootuhi.
Umuoo numu gi hannano esagoedu, ka suda tu tumatuguna mooasoo nematzagakwunipu.

Nu yise kummaꞌakoosoo toha kasa-gakoo ka teepu-koobakwi oo yotsenumme oo poonne. Oosoo noꞌobatusoo numu noꞌoko ka teepu-koobatu mu nanaꞌatabatumasoo apegeadu tuukweꞌe, “Mu ka mu maꞌemukwana maꞌwukese, soo Te Naa mu sootuhikwu.”
Oosoo pabatse mee unne, “Ka Te Naa nakabetseana oo nakaꞌoedyuku ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhina. Soo Te Naa noꞌokosoo hemma ka teepu-koobatu matabuepu ka tubetse baa yise ka te paꞌanakwatu tuwazoo.”

Soo waha nadatsungadu toha kasa-gaꞌyoo oo-nakwisoo yotsepunnena mee unakwe, “Soo mu numu ka Rome mee naneadu-wi nonobe-gaꞌyoo nanasuda manena yise mu noꞌobatusoo numu ka mu poonnena umu-kwaꞌne nanasuda manakwe. Umuoosoo nanasuda manena umu-matoosoo kodyuhoose kadoo mu mayugwe.”
Oꞌno yise soo pahe nadatsungadu toha kasa-gaꞌyoo punnoꞌo mu-nakwisoo yutseno meeoo unnemena, “Soo tooe haga tooe ka sutakoo nunuꞌu-matoo nanesootuhidu ka nunuꞌu oedyukuna,

soo suda mu manena umu-matoosoo kodyudooa. Umuoo sutaꞌyoo numu saaꞌa ka gi toogedu goso-wi nidooa, oeꞌyoo gi besa namanatzayakwe ka nuummaba wumakwu umu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe poonnena tooe nasootuaganekwu gi how oo madikwu.
Umu Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu yaa manakwana gi ni-waꞌneꞌyoo ka ooosapa Te Naa nakabetseana ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukuna tooe ka mu numu pumme wohoꞌne sapa.”

Sumuꞌyoo yise paꞌanakwana mee unne, “Menoꞌo mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo nabatsase besa nasootukikwu.” Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha yise mee unne, “Aha, gi hee sutaꞌyoo umu-matoo kodyukwu. Umu yise nasootuhikwu ka besa tumatuguse.”
Nu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe poonne oona toha koomeba-ma oo katu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka noꞌoko mu pumme nakaꞌoedyukudu yaa teepu-koobatu matzobakwu.
Soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo petuoose pabatse Te Pabeꞌe mee netamma, “Ka umu yaa teepu-koobatu noꞌoko u-kwi tunakaꞌoedyukudu matzobakooha. Menoꞌo mooasoo soo Te Naa noꞌoko nemamakwuhoo.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko umu pumme nakaꞌoedyukudu matzobakooha.

Soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona kemmadu ka kummaꞌakoosoo toha kasa-gakoo mee netamma, “Noꞌoko ka sutakoo numu yaa teepu-koobatu matzobakooha. Yaa manakwana soo suda mu tumatuguna umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.”
Soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo yise noꞌoko mu sutakoo numu yaa teepu-koobatu matzobase kadooꞌoo mu mamaꞌe.
Tubetse ewaꞌyoo gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu kadoo namamaꞌe. Umu kadoo namamaꞌedu mu puupe yise oodutsekoo baa hoo-waꞌne pookoo natsipunnoꞌo dookapu-wi hoodape.
Yise ka e pooha tuusoobedya-wi natakwatsukwuꞌyoo Te Naa tutummatzidu mu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo ka mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu numu yaa teepu-koobatu suda tumatuguna umu-matoosoo makodyukukwu.

Oꞌno ewaꞌyoo, Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka Te Naa-baa manipetu. Soo pukwi mu konnopunnena ka tubetse besa patatsadyana goso-no namayu-kwaꞌne tabuapunne. Umuoo o konnodu tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi ka nunuꞌu nanea-ma nagopo, umu gi nunuꞌu-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe. Oosoo nunuꞌu gi hownnekoo umu matzooeku-waꞌneꞌyoo.

Umu ka Te Naa pumme magwetzoise besa sokwama Te Naa tunekwukute ka oꞌnosoo Moses tu nanamooatupu manepu-waꞌneꞌyoo, yise ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo oo nabatsapu-witu nekwuꞌu. Umu meeoo, “U, Ne Naa unu pooha-gaꞌyoo besa manakwe. U ooosapa kaaheno manedu, u noꞌobatusoo numu-kooba katudu.

Noꞌobatusoo numu mee u nesookwugaꞌe, ‘U tubetse unu pooha-gaꞌyoo. Gi haga u-kwaꞌne besaꞌyoo. Noꞌobatusoo numu u nakaꞌoedyukuna u-matoo nanesootuhikwu, umu ka u nakasopedakwatoona ka pumme u magwetzoipu.’ “
Nu yise ka Te Naa pukwiꞌyoona poonnese,

mu natakwatsukwuꞌyoo (7) toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo ka Te Naa pukwi manepunne-kwiꞌyoona kuꞌahooke. Umu ka numu nanasuda manepu umu-matoosoo makodyukukwudu. Umu besa toha namasooana oa tupe namadabue-ma tu ama wupaka.
Sumuꞌyoo yise ka umu watsu Te Naa pooha manepunnena-matu ka mu toha kakasa-gakoo nanasusumu tseda yoongedahoo. Soo tseda mu sutakoo numu yaa teepu-koobatu manena-ma nakaanokute.

Soo Te Naa Pooha unu natzooe ka Te Naa pukwiꞌyoona kaanohokwu, gi haga ka Te Naa tzage mane-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Ka mu toha kakasa-gakoo tunetummana mamakwuhoose, oꞌno saaꞌa mu numu ka Te Naa tzageꞌe meesoo manidooa.
Soo Te Naa ka mu natakwatsukwuoo toha kakasa-gakoo pabatseꞌe mee netamma, “Meaꞌase ka natakwatsukwuoo (7) sutakoo tseda-wi nuunetadu ka mu numu nanasuda manepunne ka teepu-koobatoo makodyuhoo.”
Soo mooeꞌugasoo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo ka mease ka pumme tseda-witu ka teepu-koobatu wukwate ka mu numu ka nunuꞌu nagedu yise unu nananuumadu uagoe.
Soo waha nadatsungadu toha kasa-gaꞌyoo tseda-witu ka tubetse baa-witoo wukwatehoo. Soo yise puupe-kwaꞌne manise, noꞌyoona hee ka tubetse baa-witu batatuihoo.
Soo pahe nadatsungadu toha kasa-gaꞌyoo punnoꞌo ka pumme tseda-witu ka teepu-koobatoo wukwatuhoo noꞌyoona yise mu patzona ka baa hooodu-no, puupe mani.
Soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo mee unakwe, “U, Ne Naa u besa manakwe.
Mu sutaꞌyoo ka umu u-kwi tunakaꞌoedyukudu yise umu u yadooawabe goehoo ka mu puupe ka teepu-koobatoo wutookahoo. Menoꞌo yise umu ka puupe hebekwu.”
Nu yise sumuoo nanesootuhiwunu oo naka mee o unakwe, “Aha, Ne Naa unu pooha-gaꞌyoo. U toge tumatuguna. U ka umu u-kwi tunakaꞌoedyukudu u tuukwe-kwaꞌnesoo manakwe.”

Soo watsu nadatsungadu toha kasa-gaꞌyoo pumme tseda-witu ka taba-kooba wukwatekoose, unusoo udutu petuhoo mu yise mu numu tooꞌe kootuꞌi pana umu nanasuda ka Te Naa netamma tooe ka oo pooha ka sutakoo tzadyooikudu sapa. Umu uga ka Te Naa nanesootuhina soo Te Naa uga mu sootuhise, umu gi ka Te Naa nakaheesoobedya yise ka nanasuda tu manena gi maꞌwu.
Soo manege nadatsungadu toha kasa-gaꞌyoo pumme tseda-witu noꞌoko mu nunuꞌu tunetammana umu-koobatoosoo wukwatehoo. Mu nunuꞌu pabeꞌe nagedu togabu-wi mani, puusoo nanatoo nisagoehoose.
Umu nanasuda ka Te Naa te paꞌanakwatu netamma ka nuummaba wumana ka uagoena. Oo manepana umu gi ka nanasuda tu manena maꞌwu.

Soo naapahe nadatsungadu toha kasa-gaꞌyoo pumme tseda-witu ka paba hooodu Euphrates mee naneadu baa-witoo oo wukwatehoo, soo baa yise pasahoo mu soyuzu ka tabatsebooe-nakwa teepu-gaꞌyoo mesoo kemmaꞌakwu oo-toogoo mu tumaꞌekwu.
Mu pihoo tsotsoapa pamogo-kwaꞌne tatabuedu nu poonne. Sumuꞌyoo ka sutakoo panetogogwa tupiꞌyoona, sumuꞌyoo ka nunuꞌu tupiꞌyoona, soo sumuꞌyoo yise punnoꞌo ka esayaꞌedu yadooawabe tupiꞌyoona kemma.
Mu tsotsoapa mu numu nemooagakwudu noꞌobatusoo yaa teepu-koobatu nesumuse ka Te Naa oemota neyugwekwutu oꞌno yise Te Pabeꞌe wohonedu.
Mooasoo soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus mee unnegapu, “Nu saaꞌa petudooasoo gi numu nuka sookwinoꞌo. Namabetsabepunne oꞌno mu gi nasookwidooa. Mu namabetzapepunnedu nu sootuhikwu.”
Mu tsotsoapa tumanisakoekukwitu yise noꞌoko mu numu Te Naa wohonedu nesumuhoo ka Armageddon mee naneadu-wi.
Oꞌno yise soo natakwatsu natasungadu toha kasa-gaꞌyoo pumme tseda-witu ka teepu paꞌanakwitoo wukwatehoo. Soo Te Naa yise tamme-koobatu paba yadooa, “Namamakwuhoo.”
Oꞌno yise tukwukwetsena, nunuꞌana soo teepu unu yutsungakooha.

Soo numu nokatuna Rome mee naneadu ka nanasuda manedu petukwadu pahe-baa nuugotehoo. Noꞌoko ka mu numu nogatuna ka teepu-koobatu kadooꞌoo namaꞌe. Soo Te Naa oo soomayu ka umu numu Rome-wi nogatudu tumaꞌemukwana yise umu-matoosoo kodyu.
Noꞌyoona teepu atasoo mani.
Yise paꞌanakwana papabatse-ma hakwotukwakooha. Mu papabatseꞌyoo hakwotukwadu ka mu numu-koobatoo sawehoo umu numu yise Te Naa oetu tuꞌaganena suda oo netamma pana umu gi ka nanasuda tumanena maꞌwu.

Sumuꞌyoo mu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo-matu sumuoo mu nanasuda manena uga ka tseda-wikoo yoongana-matu nu-matoo kemmase mee e netamma, “Ta sakwa tupoonnega, nu-no kemmow nu u tzapoonnekukwu ka moogoobu mogoꞌne nanasuda tumaꞌemukwana oo-matoosoo kodyu. Soo mogoꞌne bahoodu-kumaba nobe-gaꞌyoo. Esoo mogoꞌne ewabatusoo numu-kooba katudu.
Mu teepu-koobatu numu moohedu ugasoo nanasuda oo-no maneyakwe.”

Soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo yise e bika ka e pooha tuusoobedya-kwi ona numu-wanatoo. Nu sumuoo mogoꞌne poonne ka atsa nunuꞌu-kooba oo katu oosoo nunuꞌu ewow oo-ma natuboꞌo mee naꞌunnedu, “Mu sukwa nu-matoo nanesootuhi.” Soo nunuꞌu natakwatsukwuoo (7) wo-gana sumumanoꞌyoo (10) aa-gaꞌyoo.

Soo mogoꞌne unu nanenagadu-kwi namasooana, unu nanenagadu patze tupe oo-maꞌyoona patakwetseakawunu ewow oa tupe hee-gaꞌyoo. Oa tupe namadabuena tseda yoongana noꞌyoona soo suda oo tumatugupu oowekoo yoongakatu.
Soo mogoꞌne naneana oo oo-ma naboꞌo mee watze naꞌunnedu, “Pabaꞌyoo Rome noꞌobatusoo ka teepu-koobatu suda namanedu mahetapunnedu.”
Soo mogoꞌne ka umu Te Naa dooamu goena mu puupe-ma bayaꞌe. (Nu ka oo poonnese gi oo nakasopedakwatoo).

Soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo yise mee e netamma, “How manena yise u ka oo poonnepana gi oo nakasopedakwatoo? Nu ka mogoꞌne noko ka nunuꞌu natakwatsukwuoo (7) wo-gakoo,-kooba oo katu-kwitu besasoo u tuukwekwu.
Soo nunuꞌu oꞌnosoo uga nummenummedu pana menoꞌo yaꞌepu. Soo nunuꞌu pudusoo ka teepu tzatoboyakwusoo saaꞌa kadoo namayugwekwu. Mu gi Te Naa doodooamu gi oo nakasopedakwatoona ka nunuꞌu poonnese.

U sakwa ekow tuwazoo nakasopedakwatoo soo nunuꞌu natakwatsukwuoo (7) wo-gaꞌyoo natakwatsukwuoo (7) giba manepunnena. Umuoo soo wo punnoꞌo natakwatsukwuꞌyoo (7) numu-kooba aatadu mee tuwazoo naꞌunnedu.
Manegeꞌyoo tuipu sumuꞌyoo togesoo menoꞌo gwetzoinumme sumuꞌyoo gisoo numu pabeꞌe namayugwe, pana ka petuse oosoo gi haaꞌnoto numu-kooba katukwu.
Soo nunuꞌu uga gwetzoidu pana menoꞌo gi, puu ugasoo numu-kooba katudu umu natakwatsu-waꞌneꞌyoosoo (7). Saaꞌa oosoo punnoꞌo kadooꞌoo tubetse namayugwekwusoo.
Soo nunuꞌu sumumanoꞌyoo (10) aa-gaꞌyoo u poonnena sumumanoꞌyoo numu-kooba aatadu mee nanetammana gisoo numu moohedu pana saaꞌa ka nunuꞌu-no numu-kooba aatakwu gi haaꞌnoto.
Umu noꞌyoona ka nunuꞌu nakabetseakwu yise noꞌoko numu pukooba mu aatadu ooka nakabetseꞌa mayugwekwu.”

Soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo mee e netamma, “Oosoo baa hooodu u poonnena mee naꞌunnedu noꞌobatusoo numu yaa teepu-koobatu nanetammana. Soo nunuꞌu numu nemooagadu ka sumumano (10) numu-kooba aatadu-no ka mogoꞌne gi petzabekwu. Umu oo matzooekuse noꞌoko hemma oo hee-gana hanehookwu. Umu goso-ma oo nikuse kadooꞌoo oo tubetse mamaꞌekwu. Soo Te Naa meeoo tusoohanena umu ꞌyoo manakwe. Umu ka Te Naa unne-kwaꞌnesoo manakwe. Soo mogoꞌne ka u pooha tuusoobedya-kwikoo u poonnena ka Rome nanetammana ka numu nanasuda nenoyukwedu. Umu numu-kooba aatadu ka Te Pabeꞌe wohonena ono nanaꞌakwekwu, soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko umu pumme nagedu pummesoo tunetutzeana-no mu matzooekukwu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko numu ooonnakwa pooha-gaꞌyoo.”
Ka saaꞌa nu kummaꞌakoosoo toha kasa-gakoo poonne paꞌanakwana tubongo oo wuekena, oosoo mu toha kasa-gakoo moohedu. Besa patakwetzeakena, noꞌoko ka teepu kootabuakukena.

Pabatseꞌe yadooase mee une, “Noꞌobatusoo numu ka Te Naa tu nakabetseana maꞌwukese ooka Rome-witu namanewunutu Te Naa ooonakwasoo oo sooyukwena. Mu numu-kooba aatadu yaa teepu-koobatu punnoꞌo. Umu hemma-ma tumudu unu moogooba mane ka Rome-witu no tuheꞌnena hemma-ma tumuna, ewa heedooa petuga. Soo pabatseꞌyoo numu pukwi nokatuna, Rome mee naneadu tubetse kadoo namaꞌe. Ewaꞌyoo mu tsotsoapu yise tooe hownneꞌyoo tooe sutaꞌyoo oe manekwu yaa manakwana.”

Te Naa paꞌanakwana paba yadooa meeꞌe unena, “E nanumu, mu Rome numu suda tumaduguna, gi Rome numu-ma tzabepana. Gi too umu-waꞌnesoo manepana, miꞌyoona mea. Oꞌno soo mu tumaꞌemukwana gi mu-matoosoo kodyudooa.”
Soo Te Naa meeꞌe too une, “Mu numu ka Rome-witu suda tumaduguna waha oo-koobakwizoo umu-matoosoo kodyudooa.

Unu oo maꞌe, mu numu puu nuummabu puusoo nagea ka sutakoo numu pu-ma tu poohana, noꞌokosoo hegana. Soo Rome-witu numu meeoo tusooyukwe. ‘Numme yow naduyadu, numu ooonakwa sutakoo pooha-gaꞌyoo. Nu gi a natamawukana. Nu gi hemma suda soonameku-waꞌneꞌyoo.’

Menoꞌo yise noꞌyoona suda mu tumadugupu, sumu tabeba-wizoo oo-matoosoo kodyukwu. Numu tuikwu, suda nasokwamakwu, yise natseatuikwu. Soo Rome goso-ma kadoo kooyugwekwu. Nu oo mu yukwekwu nu unu pooha-gaꞌyoo.”
Ka mu numu-kooba aatadu Rome no tuheneꞌetu gi Te Naa nakabetseadu ka Rome naꞌe, oo kweedapunne, oo poonnena unu suda sokwama.
Umu suaꞌe ka umu ooosoo maꞌekwu mee sokwamana, kwingaꞌasoo konnopunnena mee une, “Udaꞌa suda tooꞌe, tubetse unu suda. Soo pabatseꞌyoo Rome gi nasoonubooedu yabetse kadoo mani.”
Mu hemma-ma tumudu ka teepu-koobatu suda sokwamakwu ka Rome gadoo namayukwe, ka gi haga hemma tumu manese.
Mu numu ka onosoo Rome-witu ewa nanenakadu noꞌobatusoo hemma-ma tumuyakwe.
Mu wakwawaꞌa hemma-ma tumudu ka mu numu umu-baa tooꞌe petu pana gi hownnekoo hemma tumu-waꞌneꞌyoo. Ka tu hemma gadoo nuugwe gi haga oweoo tunehue-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Mu wakwawaꞌa hemma-ma tumudu nesuaꞌe ka mu ooosoo namaꞌekwu mee sokwamana, kwingaꞌasoo konnopunnena,
mee unena, “Uda! Suda tooꞌe, tubetse suda tooe. Soo Rome yabesoo kadooꞌoo namaꞌe. Unu nanenakadu kwasu-gaꞌyoo, oa tupe, unu nanenakadu namasooapu-gaꞌyoo.
Menoꞌo gadooꞌyoo.” Noꞌyoona mu sake Rome-witoo hemma nodu, baa-koobaꞌyoona ewow natumanagayakwedu kwingaꞌasoo konnopunne.
Umu ka oetu kweedapunnedu oo nipunne oo poonnese papabatseꞌe mee une, “Gi hanotu ekeow Rome-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
Umuoo ka suda sokwamana yagana mee unena, “Uda! Suda hiꞌyoo, tubetse suda tooe. Numme besa manekese ka Rome-witu ewa ne tumanagayakwese. Pana Rome yabesoo gadooꞌoo koomani.
Mu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo, mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu, mu nanamooatupu soo Te Naa yadooawabe, soo Te Pabeꞌe tunemayakwewabe punnoꞌo, besa sokwama ka Te Naa tunetammana namamakwupu.”
Yise soo unu natzooedu toha kasa-gaꞌyoo tusoonoo-kwaꞌnekoo pabahoo tupe ka tubetse baa-witoo tawazeoo mee yise une, “Soo Rome mee naneadu yooonnekoosoo kadooꞌoo namaꞌekwu.
Mu tunekwudu, mu tutzadyagakudu-no gi tunemayukakwu. Mu numu hemma matabuedu punnoꞌo gi onona tumatabuemanekwu gi nahongobetookwu tuwazoo.

Mu tugootabuakuno punnoꞌo gi gootabua manekwu, mu numu gi nananodukwadoo-waꞌneꞌyoo. Mu papaba nanana hemma-ma tumudu uga ewa oetu mu natumanakakudu ka teepu-koobatu, umu ka sutakoo pooha-gana numu poohadu, suda numu mayugwe.
Soo Rome oe naneyukwe oosoo ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu koese, yise ka Te Naa yadooawabe noꞌoko mu numu teepu-koobatu nakoedu tuwazoo.”
Nu yise ewatsekoo numu naka tamme-koobakoo Te Naa-baaꞌyoona papabatse mee unena naka, “Soo Te Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo te magwetzoina unu naduyadu pooha-gaꞌyoo, gadooꞌoo hee oo ooonakwa pooha-gaꞌyoo.”
Besa oosoo Te Naa ka oo mu yugwese ka umu pumme nanesootuhidu, unu suda mu yukwe nabatoo namasawekuna, suda manena. Mooasoo yise mu tumaꞌemukwana umu-matoosoo kodyu.
Umu yise ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi papabatseꞌe mee une, “Tamme sakwa ka Te Naa suuꞌmu nesootuhi. Mu Rome numu suda manepu gi nasoomuꞌwa-waꞌneꞌyoo.”

Mu wahamanoꞌyoona watsumatsebooekudu (24) toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo papabeꞌe ka mu watsukweꞌyoo Te Naa besa pupuaꞌamu manena ponnena meatzedose ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhikooha. Ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi mee umu unegono, “Togesapa u Ne Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo.”
Ka Te Naa kumabaaꞌyoona nu tuapu naka mee une, “Noꞌyoona tamme ka Te Naa nakabetseana oo tumatzidu sakwa oo nesootuhi. Noꞌobatusoo numu oo nakaꞌoedyukudu sakwa punnoꞌo Te Naa netubetseyi.”

Nu yise tuwazoo ewow numu nakasoo papabatse ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi mee unekono, “Te Naa mooasoo noꞌokosoo ka sutakoo matzooekupu, soo Te Naa naduyadu pooha-gaꞌyoo, soo Te Naa menoꞌo tamme-kooba tueyaꞌekatu.
Tamme sakwa ka besa-matoo besa sokwama. Soo Te Pabeꞌe uga nabatsapu menoꞌo gwetzoidu mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu pu-toogoo namamakwupunne nadooha mu mayugwekwu.
O umu besa tumadugupu, gi tosadu tunakaꞌoedyukudu.”

Soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo nu-notu yise mee e netamma, “U sakwa eka botugu besa kaaheno ka Te Naa yadooapu mee unakwe, ‘Yaa manakwana umu noꞌyoona ka umu ooosapa Tu Pabeꞌe noꞌyookwu oosoo mu besaa dooamu-gana ooosapa mu sootuhi.’ “

Nu yise ka toha kasa-gakoo-kobena meatzedose oo-matoo nanesootuhikooha. Pana oosoo mee e netamma, “Gi nu-matoo nanesootuhipana. Nu ka Te Naa sukwe natumatziwabe numu-kwaꞌnesoo manedu. Ka Te Naa-matoo suuꞌmu nanesootuhi. Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha ka umu Te Naa numu tunepohabeku-too ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu.”

Nu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe poonne paꞌanakwana aaba-kooba katuna tubongo oo wuekena. Soo Te Pabeꞌe togesapa unakwe ka tu une-kwaꞌnesoo manakwe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe kaaheno besakoo mu numu nemadabuekoo, noꞌoko gi togekoo matzooekudu.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko gi hemma nekwatzekudu. Noꞌobatusoo soo hee ka Te Pabeꞌe-toohakwi manepunnekwu, noꞌobatusoo numu tooe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe suuꞌmu puusoo nawitu soopedakwadoo.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko soo hemma matzooekupu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe Te Naa madumotseapu, oosoo suuꞌmu tu nanumu magwetzoi.
Ka Te Naa manepunne-kwiꞌyoona mu nananesootuhidu-no gi totsabu-gana ka Te Pabeꞌe punnoꞌo aabu-gakoo-nakwi woyooadape.
Ka Te Pabeꞌe sukwe yadooꞌa suda manedu gadooꞌoo mani. Soo nanasuda mu manepu umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.
Ka oodutsekoo oo wunagaꞌa-ma yise oo si-ma mee natuboꞌo, “Yowsoo noꞌoko numu-kooba tubetse katukwudu.”

Nu yise ka toha kasa-gakoo ka taba tabedooapunne-kwi wunudu poonne, noꞌoko mu a toogoo tukadu yozumodu hootsebaꞌa mee mu netamma, “Mu paba tukakwu ka mu ewa sutaꞌyoo numu pudusoo nagoekwu mu saaꞌa oꞌno mu tukakwu soo Te Naa mooasoo tunemamakwu pu-toogoo a namanekwuna.
Mu noꞌobatusoo sutaꞌyoo numu tookoo sooakwu, yise mu hootsebaꞌa pookoo tuina tookoo tukakwu tuwazoo.”
Oꞌno yise nu ka sutakoo nunuꞌu papabeꞌe tu nananumu mu nesumutoo ka Te Pabeꞌe tumooꞌoona poonne.
Mu nunuꞌu papabeꞌemu yadooawabe nahemahoose ka paba hano-kwi nidabedu oa saanoo-kwaꞌne kookwanapunnedu, kweedapunnedu, numu kweekahaꞌekudu-kwitoo natzabepuꞌa togesoo gwetzoina.
Noꞌyoona mu Te Pabeꞌe wohonedu, ka Te Pabeꞌe sukwe yadooase gadoo namaꞌe. Noꞌyoona mu hotsebaꞌa mu tookoo tu wuzuꞌme-kwitoo tukana.

Nu yise ka toha kasa-gakoo poonne paꞌanakwana tubonga wuekena. Oosoo ka sutakoo pukwi nakwutumakwuna teepa tawaga-kwi nanatzakwona pu-ma natzepunooena gwuuna. Soo Te Naa mooasoo ka sutakoo oo tzakuna tuungu.
Soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo ka sutakoo panetogogwa wutuma ka ooosapa umu mooe namanumudoopu numu nemooagapu oo-ma tzakatuse oo tzagunahoo ewa (1OOO) tomoba-witoo.

Soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo ka sutakoo panetogogwa ka pukwi oo nakwutuma-kwitoo tzawunihoose, oo tzatumowse, oo tseboonooehoo. Soo sutaꞌyoo panetogogwa yise ewa tomoba-witoo gi mu numu nemooaga-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo sutaꞌyoo panetogogwa pihoo nanea-gaꞌyoo Etzaꞌa, tooetoo Sutaꞌyoo mee naneꞌa tuwazoo.

Oꞌno mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu Te Naa netuzeana mu numu nehanekwudu mu numu-koobena aataꞌa. O umu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe noko Te Naa unnepu tunedyooedu. Ooonneꞌyoona mu sutaꞌyoo numu mu goꞌe. Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe-no ewa (1000) tomoba-witoo mu numu nemadabuekwu.
Mu sutaꞌyoo numu tuina ka Te Naa tunepohabekuse ka mooe petugase. Ka ewa (1,000) tomoba namamakwuse suuꞌmu.
Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu numu punnoꞌo besa tu sokwamakwuna besa nasootuhikwu. Umu gi ka gi tookedu goso-kwitoo meakwu.
Ka ewa (1,000) tomoba namooese soo Sutaꞌyoo ka tu nakwutama-kwiꞌyoona numu-matoo natzamaꞌwukesoo numu tu nemooaga-witoosoo kodyukwu.
Umu Gog noko Magog Te Naa-matoo nananesootuhidu tumooꞌoodu. Umu tunakaꞌemukwadu ewaꞌyoo, gi nadatsungapu.
Umu noꞌoko ka teepu-koobakwi manakwana kemmase ka umu ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu pukwiꞌyoona takonekwu yise paꞌanakwana ka goso-ma mu nakootsasooakwu.
Soo Sutaꞌyoo numu nemooagadu ka gi tookedu goso-kwitoo ka nunuꞌu yadooawabe numu nemooagadu oetu tzakwunipu. Umu tatabewano yise totogano ooosapa nuumaba wumakwu.
Nu yise ka Te Naa poonne pabatsekoo toha kadunoo-kwi ka mu numu nesootunagakatu. Soo teepu oo paꞌana-kwitu ka teepu-no gadooꞌoo namamaꞌe.

Tuipu numu tooe hano tooe namayosuse, noꞌobatusoo tuipu numu ka Te Naa-kobena konnopunne. Soo Te Naa oꞌnosoo mu manena botugukwu. Sumuꞌyoo yise tubope ka mu numu ooosapa momokwudu naneana pukwi nabona punnoꞌo natzakwunahoo. Mu tuipu numu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu noꞌoko tu manemopu-ma nanemadabuehoo. Noꞌyoona ka umu tubope-wi nanaboꞌo.

Tooe haga tooe naneana gi ka tubope-wi nabodu numu ooosapa gwetzoikwuna nasootuhipu ka gi tookedu nikatudu-kwaꞌne. Oꞌno soo numu yaꞌekwuna ka gi tookedu goso-kwitoo natzawunihoo. Oosoo nikatudu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo Penakwa Numu Yaekwuna mee naneꞌa. Umuoo gi Te Naa hee soobedyadu. Oꞌnosoo Etzaꞌa unnepu gadoo namayugwe, oꞌno manakwana numu gi yaꞌe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
E pooha tuusoobedya-kwi soo Te Naa ekeow teepu-koobatu namapudutupudoo, tamme-koobatu pudu matabuehoo, soo tubetse baa gadooꞌyoo.
O umuoo Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu pudu teepu-kooba tubewa-gaꞌyoo.
Sumuꞌyoo Te Naa oo-tuganaꞌyoona meeoo une, “Menoꞌo manakwana soo Te Naa ooosapa tu dooamu-noꞌyoopunnekwu mu ooosapa Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhikwu. Te Naa ooosapa mu doodooamu-gana mu mabetseakwu.
Umu teaꞌa noꞌyoona besa sokwamana, nuumaba gadooꞌyoo gi tuikwu.”
Soo Te Naa meeoo unakwe, “Nu noꞌoko hemma mapudutupudoo u sakwa te nanumu tuukwe e unena kaaheno togeꞌyoo.”
