Soo Te Naa yise e tuukwe, “Nu noꞌokosoo hemma matabuepu yow nu noꞌoko a mamakwuhoopetu. Nu tooe haga tooe nu-toohatoo nasoomawunidu, ka gwetzoibu, gi mobegwa-gakoo mu sootuhikwu.
Mu numu e besa unnepu nakaꞌoedyukumodu nu besa mu sootuhikwu. Oꞌno yise umuoo pudu teepu-koobatu tabewa-gakwu, nu mu dooamu-gakwu.

Pana mu sutaꞌyoo numu tuuyapa-gaꞌyoo, wahabu tuusooyugwedu, gi toge-matoo nanesootuhidu, numu goedu, yise too gi toge nanakwenagoedu yise nanapoohadu, esagoedu, umuoo ka gi tookedu goso-witoo natsemaꞌanakwu.”
Soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo nu-no yadooadu mee tuwazoo e netamma, “Ta sakwa ka umu Te Pabeꞌe unu soobedyana pukwiꞌyookwuna poopoonnega.”
Soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo e bikase numme oona paꞌa giba tzogwedu-kwi pepetuga. Numme besakoo mu poonne mu nananesootuhidu-pukwiꞌyookwuna, paaꞌanakwana tubongo ka teepu-koobatoo wuekena,
besa tabuana ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi.

Ka e pooha tuusoobedya-toohakwi ka umu sumu mano waha matsebooekudu (12) nanaꞌataꞌyoosoo nanatzakwona-gaꞌyoo Jew numu-ma nananeadu. Mu nananesootuhidu pukwi nobeduguna oo naꞌoonakwi tupe nakooduadoo sumu mano waha matsebooekudu (12).
Watsuba pahe nanaꞌemota nanatsakwoneta, mu numu ka tooe hano manakwana Te Naa-baa petudyina.
Soo tupe koodua oo naꞌoonakwitu sumu mano wahamatsebooekudu (12) papabatsekoo tupe-kooba namadabuꞌe. Umuoo ka Te Pabeꞌe yadooawabe oo tunemadabuepu mooe wahamodu.
Soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo oodutsekoo hoope hemma pu-ma namanagana kwuuna, ka mu nananesootuhidu-pukwiꞌyoona nobe-gakwuna managakwuse.
Ka oo managase nanaꞌemota nananoꞌosoo namanagahoo yise tubetse pabatseꞌyoo (1500 miles). Tubetse ewatsekoo numu mesoo tzidu.
Soo tupe koodua punnoꞌo tubetse besa namadabuepu.
Besa tabuana gi totsa-ga-kwaꞌne tabuapunne.
Ewatsekoo nanaꞌatabasoo besa tatabuadu tupe-ma namadabuepu. Mu po ootoogoo po-kwakwabedu punnoꞌo noꞌyoona oa tupe namadabuena.
Soo Te Pooha Naa, Te Pabeꞌe-no ooosapa mu numu nagasoo nobe-gaꞌyoo, ooonneꞌyoona umu gi nanesootuhi nobe-gaꞌyoo.
Noꞌyoona umu oo doodooamu ka Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko Te Naa pooha-toohakwi manemo. Ooonneꞌyoona gi togaba-gaꞌyoo.
Noꞌobatusoo numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-toohatoo nanemawunikwu.
Gadoo hee pu-mama numu nasoosuina.
Noꞌobatusoo numu oe petudyikwu, ka Te Naa nesoogwugikwuse.
Tooe haga tooe ka Te Naa Tooaꞌana yise oo-noꞌyookwu. Mu sutaꞌyoo numu gi oe naneꞌegakute mu tooe hemmatu tooe nanesootuhidu punnoꞌo gi oe naneꞌega-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Oꞌno yise Te Naa tumatzidu toha kasa-gaꞌyoo nuka tu pooha poonnekuna, ka besa patatzadyadu gi totsa-gakoo baa hoodu ka Te Naa noko Te Pabeꞌe-pukwiꞌyoona nakwana kemmadu.

Umu numu baa hoodu nanaꞌenakwi nanobe-gaꞌyoo, soo besa peha kammadu natukadu ka hoodu nanaꞌenakwi, noꞌoko muha-ma nanakummaꞌakoosoo besa peha kammadu pooe-mamaꞌyoo naayakwe. Soo numu pu-matu peha tukana ooosapa gwetzoimokwu. Mu numu yise gi nanakwohonena. Soo numu besa nanano tuunoꞌyugwe.
Tooe hee sutaꞌyoo otuoo gadooꞌyookwu. Soo Te Naa-no Te Pabeꞌe o numu nehanepunnena, umu ooosapa ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhina, umuoo ooosapa Te Naa dooamuna
ooosapa oo-noꞌyookwu.
Soo Te Naa ka kootabuape manepunnena umu ka oo-baaꞌyoona mu numu gi togabu poonnekwu. Ka ooosapa gi mobegwa-ga gwetzoimokwu, besa sokwamana.

Mee tuwazoo nu tuusoobedya soo Te Naa tumatzidu toha kasa-gaꞌyoo yise mee e netamma, “Nu toge kaaheno tuukwe, ka Te Naa tubetse tunemadipu nuka oo tunemanekupu nu mu tuukweꞌe. Soo Te Naa mu tuukwepu pudusoo a namanekwuna.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe pudusoo ka teepu-kooba kodyu petukwu.” Soo tooe haga tooe ekeow nakaꞌoedyukudu, ka a naꞌunepu mayohona besa sokwamamokwu.
Nu ka hemma poonnese, oo nakase tuwazoo, ka toha kasa-gakoo kobena meatzedose, oo-matoo nanesootuhikooha.
Pana soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo mee e netamma, “Gi nu-matoo nanesootuhipana, ta nawaꞌneꞌyoosoo. Tamme Te Naa-toohatu nanakwaꞌnesoo, tamme sakwa ooosapa ka Te Naa-matoo suuꞌmu nanesootuhimo.”
Mee tuwazoo e netamma, “U nanumu tuukwe soo hemma ꞌyoo manekwuna tuganaꞌa manegena. Mu tubetse gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu sumuna gi nasoomamakwudu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee e netamma, “Nu pudusoo numu-basoo kodyu petukwu. Nu besa tuꞌoedyukudu sootuhikwu pana gi tuꞌoedyukudu suda namanatsayakwu.
Nu yow noꞌoko hemma matabuepu. Nu noꞌoko hemma mamakwu petugakwudu.
Tooe haga tooe ka suta tu manena soomoodyise ka nu-tooha manise besa soonamekwu, ooosapa gwetzoibu nasootuhikwu ooosapa yise nu-noꞌyookwu.
Mu gi toge manedu nu tzasobedyakwu gi nu mu sootuhikwu. Nu ka nanaꞌesagoena, nanasuda tumaduguna, kummaꞌakoosoo-matoo nanesootuhina, numu goena, nanapoohana, umuoo yise gi nasootuhikwu.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeꞌe e netamma, “Noꞌoko hemma u tuusoobedyana te nanumu tuukwe. Nu yow Mu Tubetse Pabeꞌe, unu pooha-gaꞌyoo.”
Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha, Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-no, ka mu yaatoo numu meeoo netamma, “Te Pabeꞌe-tooha manese oo nakaꞌoedyukuna, mu ka gi mobegwa-gakoo gwetzoibu-ma nasootuhikwu.”
Tooe haga tooe a nakadu gi atasoo a neyugwena a wahapana. Tooe haga tooe ka oo manedu gi toge manedu numu-no goso-witoo natsekwunikwu ka noꞌoko a nanemamakwu petugase.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo, “Pudusoo nu petukwu, mee oosoo unegapu.” Numme oo soogwedakuna yabesoo oo petukwuna soogwina nanesootuhiyakwe.
Nu yise noꞌoko mu nanesootuhikute soo Te Pabeꞌe mu sootuhikwu. s Maꞌnoꞌyoo sapa.
